original: BhP_10.01.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.001/1 kathito vaṃśa-vistāro bhavatā soma-sūryayoḥ
analyzed: kathitaḥ vaṃśa vistāraḥ bhavatā soma sūryayoḥ

original: BhP_10.01.001/3 rājñāṃ cobhaya-vaṃśyānāṃ caritaṃ paramādbhutam
analyzed: rājñām ca ubhaya vaṃśyānām caritam parama adbhutam

original: BhP_10.01.002/1 yadoś ca dharma-śīlasya nitarāṃ muni-sattama
analyzed: yadoḥ ca dharma śīlasya nitarām muni sattama

original: BhP_10.01.002/3 tatrāṃśenāvatīrṇasya viṣṇor vīryāṇi śaṃsa naḥ
analyzed: tatra aṃśena avatīrṇasya viṣṇoḥ vīryāṇi śaṃsa naḥ

original: BhP_10.01.003/1 avatīrya yador vaṃśe bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: avatīrya yadoḥ vaṃśe bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.003/3 kṛtavān yāni viśvātmā tāni no vada vistarāt
analyzed: kṛtavān yāni viśvātmā tāni naḥ vada vistarāt

original: BhP_10.01.004/1 nivṛtta-tarṣair upagīyamānād bhavauṣadhāc chrotra-mano-'bhirāmāt
analyzed: nivṛtta tarṣaiḥ upagīyamānāt bhava auṣadhāt śrotra manaḥ abhirāmāt

original: BhP_10.01.004/3 ka uttamaśloka-guṇānuvādāt pumān virajyeta vinā paśughnāt
analyzed: kaḥ uttamaśloka guṇa anuvādāt pumān virajyeta vinā paśu ghnāt

original: BhP_10.01.005/1 pitāmahā me samare 'marañjayair devavratādyātirathais timiṅgilaiḥ
analyzed: pitāmahāḥ me samare marañjayaiḥ devavrata ādya atirathaiḥ timiṅgilaiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.005/3 duratyayaṃ kaurava-sainya-sāgaraṃ kṛtvātaran vatsa-padaṃ sma yat-plavāḥ
analyzed: duratyayam kaurava sainya sāgaram kṛtvā ataran vatsa padam sma yad plavāḥ

original: BhP_10.01.006/1 drauṇy-astra-vipluṣṭam idaṃ mad-aṅgaṃ santāna-bījaṃ kuru-pāṇḍavānām
analyzed: drauṇi astra vipluṣṭam idam mad aṅgam santāna bījam kuru pāṇḍavānām

original: BhP_10.01.006/3 jugopa kukṣiṃ gata ātta-cakro mātuś ca me yaḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāyāḥ
analyzed: jugopa kukṣim gataḥ ātta cakraḥ mātuḥ ca me yaḥ śaraṇam gatāyāḥ

original: BhP_10.01.007/1 vīryāṇi tasyākhila-deha-bhājām antar bahiḥ pūruṣa-kāla-rūpaiḥ
analyzed: vīryāṇi tasya akhila dehabhājām antar bahis pūruṣa kāla rūpaiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.007/3 prayacchato mṛtyum utāmṛtaṃ ca māyā-manuṣyasya vadasva vidvan
analyzed: prayacchataḥ mṛtyum uta amṛtam ca māyā manuṣyasya vadasva vidvan

original: BhP_10.01.008/1 rohiṇyās tanayaḥ prokto rāmaḥ saṅkarṣaṇas tvayā
analyzed: rohiṇyāḥ tanayaḥ proktaḥ rāmaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tvayā

original: BhP_10.01.008/3 devakyā garbha-sambandhaḥ kuto dehāntaraṃ vinā
analyzed: devakyāḥ garbha sambandhaḥ kutas deha antaram vinā

original: BhP_10.01.009/1 kasmān mukundo bhagavān pitur gehād vrajaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: kasmāt mukundaḥ bhagavān pituḥ gehāt vrajam gataḥ

original: BhP_10.01.009/3 kva vāsaṃ jñātibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛtavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: kva vāsam jñātibhiḥ sārdham kṛtavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.010/1 vraje vasan kim akaron madhupuryāṃ ca keśavaḥ
analyzed: vraje vasan kim akarot madhupuryām ca keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.010/3 bhrātaraṃ cāvadhīt kaṃsaṃ mātur addhātad-arhaṇam
analyzed: bhrātaram ca avadhīt kaṃsam mātuḥ addhā a tad arhaṇam

original: BhP_10.01.011/1 dehaṃ mānuṣam āśritya kati varṣāṇi vṛṣṇibhiḥ
analyzed: deham mānuṣam āśritya kati varṣāṇi vṛṣṇibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.011/3 yadu-puryāṃ sahāvātsīt patnyaḥ katy abhavan prabhoḥ
analyzed: yadu puryām saha avātsīt patnyaḥ kati abhavan prabhoḥ

original: BhP_10.01.012/1 etad anyac ca sarvaṃ me mune kṛṣṇa-viceṣṭitam
analyzed: etat anyat ca sarvam me mune kṛṣṇa viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.01.012/3 vaktum arhasi sarvajña śraddadhānāya vistṛtam
analyzed: vaktum arhasi sarvajña śraddadhānāya vistṛtam

original: BhP_10.01.013/1 naiṣātiduḥsahā kṣun māṃ tyaktodam api bādhate
analyzed: na eṣā ati duḥsahā kṣudh mām tyakta udam api bādhate

original: BhP_10.01.013/3 pibantaṃ tvan-mukhāmbhoja- cyutaṃ hari-kathāmṛtam
analyzed: pibantam tvad mukha ambhoja cyutam hari kathā amṛtam

original: BhP_10.01.014/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.014/1 evaṃ niśamya bhṛgu-nandana sādhu-vādaṃ
analyzed: evam niśamya bhṛgunandana sādhuvādam

original: BhP_10.01.014/2 vaiyāsakiḥ sa bhagavān atha viṣṇu-rātam
analyzed: vaiyāsakiḥ sa bhagavān atha viṣṇurātam

original: BhP_10.01.014/3 pratyarcya kṛṣṇa-caritaṃ kali-kalmaṣa-ghnaṃ
analyzed: pratyarcya kṛṣṇa caritam kali kalmaṣa ghnam

original: BhP_10.01.014/4 vyāhartum ārabhata bhāgavata-pradhānaḥ
analyzed: vyāhartum ārabhata bhāgavata pradhānaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.015/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.015/1 samyag vyavasitā buddhis tava rājarṣi-sattama
analyzed: samyak vyavasitā buddhiḥ tava rāja ṛṣi sattama

original: BhP_10.01.015/3 vāsudeva-kathāyāṃ te yaj jātā naiṣṭhikī ratiḥ
analyzed: vāsudeva kathāyām te yat jātā naiṣṭhikī ratiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.016/1 vāsudeva-kathā-praśnaḥ puruṣāṃs trīn punāti hi
analyzed: vāsudeva kathā praśnaḥ puruṣān trīn punāti hi

original: BhP_10.01.016/3 vaktāraṃ pracchakaṃ śrotṝṃs tat-pāda-salilaṃ yathā
analyzed: vaktāram pracchakam śrotṝn tat pāda salilam yathā

original: BhP_10.01.017/1 bhūmir dṛpta-nṛpa-vyāja- daityānīka-śatāyutaiḥ
analyzed: bhūmiḥ dṛpta nṛpa vyāja daitya anīka śata ayutaiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.017/3 ākrāntā bhūri-bhāreṇa brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau
analyzed: ākrāntā bhūri bhāreṇa brahmāṇam śaraṇam yayau

original: BhP_10.01.018/1 gaur bhūtvāśru-mukhī khinnā krandantī karuṇaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: gauḥ bhūtvā aśru mukhī khinnā krandantī karuṇam vibhoḥ

original: BhP_10.01.018/3 upasthitāntike tasmai vyasanaṃ samavocata
analyzed: upasthitā antike tasmai vyasanam samavocata

original: BhP_10.01.019/1 brahmā tad-upadhāryātha saha devais tayā saha
analyzed: brahmā tat upadhārya atha saha devaiḥ tayā saha

original: BhP_10.01.019/3 jagāma sa-tri-nayanas tīraṃ kṣīra-payo-nidheḥ
analyzed: jagāma sa trinayanaḥ tīram kṣīra payonidheḥ

original: BhP_10.01.020/1 tatra gatvā jagannāthaṃ deva-devaṃ vṛṣākapim
analyzed: tatra gatvā jagannātham devadevam vṛṣākapim

original: BhP_10.01.020/3 puruṣaṃ puruṣa-sūktena upatasthe samāhitaḥ
analyzed: puruṣam puruṣasūktena upatasthe samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.021/1 giraṃ samādhau gagane samīritāṃ niśamya vedhās tridaśān uvāca ha
analyzed: giram samādhau gagane samīritām niśamya vedhāḥ tridaśān uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.01.021/3 gāṃ pauruṣīṃ me śṛṇutāmarāḥ punar vidhīyatām āśu tathaiva mā ciram
analyzed: gām pauruṣīm me śṛṇutā amarāḥ punar vidhīyatām āśu tathā eva mā ciram

original: BhP_10.01.022/1 puraiva puṃsāvadhṛto dharā-jvaro bhavadbhir aṃśair yaduṣūpajanyatām
analyzed: purā eva puṃsā avadhṛtaḥ dharā jvaraḥ bhavadbhiḥ aṃśaiḥ yaduṣu upajanyatām

original: BhP_10.01.022/3 sa yāvad urvyā bharam īśvareśvaraḥ sva-kāla-śaktyā kṣapayaṃś cared bhuvi
analyzed: sa yāvat urvyāḥ bharam īśvara īśvaraḥ sva kāla śaktyā kṣapayan caret bhuvi

original: BhP_10.01.023/1 vasudeva-gṛhe sākṣād bhagavān puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: vasudeva gṛhe sākṣāt bhagavān puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_10.01.023/3 janiṣyate tat-priyārthaṃ sambhavantu sura-striyaḥ
analyzed: janiṣyate tad priya artham sambhavantu sura striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.024/1 vāsudeva-kalānantaḥ sahasra-vadanaḥ svarāṭ
BhP_10.01.024/3 agrato bhavitā devo hareḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: agratas bhavitā devaḥ hareḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.01.025/1 viṣṇor māyā bhagavatī yayā sammohitaṃ jagat
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ māyā bhagavatī yayā sammohitam jagat

original: BhP_10.01.025/3 ādiṣṭā prabhuṇāṃśena kāryārthe sambhaviṣyati
analyzed: ādiṣṭā prabhuṇā aṃśena kārya arthe sambhaviṣyati

original: BhP_10.01.026/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.026/1 ity ādiśyāmara-gaṇān prajāpati-patir vibhuḥ
analyzed: iti ādiśya amara gaṇān prajāpati patiḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.01.026/3 āśvāsya ca mahīṃ gīrbhiḥ sva-dhāma paramaṃ yayau
analyzed: āśvāsya ca mahīm gīrbhiḥ sva dhāma paramam yayau

original: BhP_10.01.027/1 śūraseno yadupatir mathurām āvasan purīm
analyzed: śūrasenaḥ yadu patiḥ mathurām āvasan purīm

original: BhP_10.01.027/3 māthurāñ chūrasenāṃś ca viṣayān bubhuje purā
analyzed: māthurām chūrasenān ca viṣayān bubhuje purā

original: BhP_10.01.028/1 rājadhānī tataḥ sābhūt sarva-yādava-bhūbhujām
analyzed: rājadhānī tatas sā abhūt sarva yādava bhūbhujām

original: BhP_10.01.028/3 mathurā bhagavān yatra nityaṃ sannihito hariḥ
analyzed: mathurā bhagavān yatra nityam sannihitaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.01.029/1 tasyāṃ tu karhicic chaurir vasudevaḥ kṛtodvahaḥ
analyzed: tasyām tu karhicit śauriḥ vasudevaḥ kṛta udvahaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.029/3 devakyā sūryayā sārdhaṃ prayāṇe ratham āruhat
analyzed: devakyā sūryayā sārdham prayāṇe ratham āruhat

original: BhP_10.01.030/1 ugrasena-sutaḥ kaṃsaḥ svasuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: ugrasena sutaḥ kaṃsaḥ svasuḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.01.030/3 raśmīn hayānāṃ jagrāha raukmai ratha-śatair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: raśmīn hayānām jagrāha raukmaiḥ ratha śataiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.031/1 catuḥ-śataṃ pāribarhaṃ gajānāṃ hema-mālinām
analyzed: catur śatam pāribarham gajānām hema mālinām

original: BhP_10.01.031/3 aśvānām ayutaṃ sārdhaṃ rathānāṃ ca tri-ṣaṭ-śatam
analyzed: aśvānām ayutam sārdham rathānām ca tri ṣaṣ śatam

original: BhP_10.01.032/1 dāsīnāṃ sukumārīṇāṃ dve śate samalaṅkṛte
analyzed: dāsīnām sukumārīṇām dve śate samalaṅkṛte

original: BhP_10.01.032/3 duhitre devakaḥ prādād yāne duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: duhitre devakaḥ prādāt yāne duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.033/1 śaṅkha-tūrya-mṛdaṅgāś ca nedur dundubhayaḥ samam
analyzed: śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅgāḥ ca neduḥ dundubhayaḥ samam

original: BhP_10.01.033/3 prayāṇa-prakrame tāta vara-vadhvoḥ sumaṅgalam
analyzed: prayāṇa prakrame tāta vara vadhvoḥ su maṅgalam

original: BhP_10.01.034/1 pathi pragrahiṇaṃ kaṃsam ābhāṣyāhāśarīra-vāk
analyzed: pathi pragrahiṇam kaṃsam ābhāṣya āha aśarīra vāc

original: BhP_10.01.034/3 asyās tvām aṣṭamo garbho hantā yāṃ vahase 'budha
analyzed: asyāḥ tvām aṣṭamaḥ garbhaḥ hantā yām vahase budha

original: BhP_10.01.035/1 ity uktaḥ sa khalaḥ pāpo bhojānāṃ kula-pāṃsanaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ sa khalaḥ pāpaḥ bhojānām kula pāṃsanaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.035/3 bhaginīṃ hantum ārabdhaṃ khaḍga-pāṇiḥ kace 'grahīt
analyzed: bhaginīm hantum ārabdham khaḍga pāṇiḥ kace grahīt

original: BhP_10.01.036/1 taṃ jugupsita-karmāṇaṃ nṛśaṃsaṃ nirapatrapam
analyzed: tam jugupsita karmāṇam nṛśaṃsam nirapatrapam

original: BhP_10.01.036/3 vasudevo mahā-bhāga uvāca parisāntvayan
analyzed: vasudevaḥ mahābhāgaḥ uvāca parisāntvayan

original: BhP_10.01.037/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.037/1 ślāghanīya-guṇaḥ śūrair bhavān bhoja-yaśaskaraḥ
analyzed: ślāghanīya guṇaḥ śūraiḥ bhavān bhoja yaśaskaraḥ

original: BhP_10.01.037/3 sa kathaṃ bhaginīṃ hanyāt striyam udvāha-parvaṇi
analyzed: sa katham bhaginīm hanyāt striyam udvāha parvaṇi

original: BhP_10.01.038/1 mṛtyur janmavatāṃ vīra dehena saha jāyate
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ janmavatām vīra dehena saha jāyate

original: BhP_10.01.038/3 adya vābda-śatānte vā mṛtyur vai prāṇināṃ dhruvaḥ
analyzed: adya vā abda śata ante vā mṛtyuḥ vai prāṇinām dhruvaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.039/1 dehe pañcatvam āpanne dehī karmānugo 'vaśaḥ
analyzed: dehe pañcatvam āpanne dehī karma anugaḥ vaśaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.039/3 dehāntaram anuprāpya prāktanaṃ tyajate vapuḥ
analyzed: deha antaram anuprāpya prāktanam tyajate vapuḥ

original: BhP_10.01.040/1 vrajaṃs tiṣṭhan padaikena yathaivaikena gacchati
analyzed: vrajan tiṣṭhan padā ekena yathā eva ekena gacchati

original: BhP_10.01.040/3 yathā tṛṇa-jalaukaivaṃ dehī karma-gatiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: yathā tṛṇa jalaukā evam dehī karma gatim gataḥ

original: BhP_10.01.041/1 svapne yathā paśyati deham īdṛśaṃ manorathenābhiniviṣṭa-cetanaḥ
analyzed: svapne yathā paśyati deham īdṛśam manorathena abhiniviṣṭa cetanaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.041/3 dṛṣṭa-śrutābhyāṃ manasānucintayan prapadyate tat kim api hy apasmṛtiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām manasā anucintayan prapadyate tat kim api hi apasmṛtiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.042/1 yato yato dhāvati daiva-coditaṃ mano vikārātmakam āpa pañcasu
analyzed: yatas yatas dhāvati daiva coditam manaḥ vikāra ātmakam āpa pañcasu

original: BhP_10.01.042/3 guṇeṣu māyā-rociteṣu dehy asau prapadyamānaḥ saha tena jāyate
analyzed: guṇeṣu māyā rociteṣu dehī asau prapadyamānaḥ saha tena jāyate

original: BhP_10.01.043/1 jyotir yathaivodaka-pārthiveṣv adaḥ
analyzed: jyotiḥ yathā eva udaka pārthiveṣu adaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.043/2 samīra-vegānugataṃ vibhāvyate
analyzed: samīra vega anugatam vibhāvyate

original: BhP_10.01.043/3 evaṃ sva-māyā-raciteṣv asau pumān
analyzed: evam sva māyā raciteṣu asau pumān

original: BhP_10.01.043/4 guṇeṣu rāgānugato vimuhyati
analyzed: guṇeṣu rāga anugataḥ vimuhyati

original: BhP_10.01.044/1 tasmān na kasyacid droham ācaret sa tathā-vidhaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt na kasyacid droham ācaret sa tathāvidhaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.044/3 ātmanaḥ kṣemam anvicchan drogdhur vai parato bhayam
analyzed: ātmanaḥ kṣemam anvicchan drogdhuḥ vai paratas bhayam

original: BhP_10.01.045/1 eṣā tavānujā bālā kṛpaṇā putrikopamā
analyzed: eṣā tava anujā bālā kṛpaṇā putrikā upamā

original: BhP_10.01.045/3 hantuṃ nārhasi kalyāṇīm imāṃ tvaṃ dīna-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: hantum nā arhasi kalyāṇīm imām tvam dīna vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.046/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.046/1 evaṃ sa sāmabhir bhedair bodhyamāno 'pi dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: evam sa sāmabhiḥ bhedaiḥ bodhyamānaḥ pi dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.046/3 na nyavartata kauravya puruṣādān anuvrataḥ
analyzed: na nyavartata kauravya puruṣādān anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_10.01.047/1 nirbandhaṃ tasya taṃ jñātvā vicintyānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: nirbandham tasya tam jñātvā vicintya ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.047/3 prāptaṃ kālaṃ prativyoḍhum idaṃ tatrānvapadyata
analyzed: prāptam kālam prativyoḍhum idam tatra anvapadyata

original: BhP_10.01.048/1 mṛtyur buddhimatāpohyo yāvad buddhi-balodayam
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ buddhimatā apohyaḥ yāvat buddhi bala udayam

original: BhP_10.01.048/3 yady asau na nivarteta nāparādho 'sti dehinaḥ
analyzed: yadi asau na nivarteta na aparādhaḥ sti dehinaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.049/1 pradāya mṛtyave putrān mocaye kṛpaṇām imām
analyzed: pradāya mṛtyave putrān mocaye kṛpaṇām imām

original: BhP_10.01.049/3 sutā me yadi jāyeran mṛtyur vā na mriyeta cet
analyzed: sutāḥ me yadi jāyeran mṛtyuḥ vā na mriyeta ced

original: BhP_10.01.050/1 viparyayo vā kiṃ na syād gatir dhātur duratyayā
analyzed: viparyayaḥ vā kim na syāt gatiḥ dhātuḥ duratyayā

original: BhP_10.01.050/3 upasthito nivarteta nivṛttaḥ punar āpatet
analyzed: upasthitaḥ nivarteta nivṛttaḥ punar āpatet

original: BhP_10.01.051/1 agner yathā dāru-viyoga-yogayor adṛṣṭato 'nyan na nimittam asti
analyzed: agneḥ yathā dāru viyoga yogayoḥ adṛṣṭataḥ na nimittam asti

original: BhP_10.01.051/3 evaṃ hi jantor api durvibhāvyaḥ śarīra-saṃyoga-viyoga-hetuḥ
analyzed: evam hi jantoḥ api durvibhāvyaḥ śarīra saṃyoga viyoga hetuḥ

original: BhP_10.01.052/1 evaṃ vimṛśya taṃ pāpaṃ yāvad-ātmani-darśanam
analyzed: evam vimṛśya tam pāpam yāvat ātma nidarśanam

original: BhP_10.01.052/3 pūjayām āsa vai śaurir bahu-māna-puraḥsaram
analyzed: pūjayām āsa vai śauriḥ bahu māna puraḥsaram

original: BhP_10.01.053/1 prasanna-vadanāmbhojo nṛśaṃsaṃ nirapatrapam
analyzed: prasanna vadana ambhojaḥ nṛśaṃsam nirapatrapam

original: BhP_10.01.053/3 manasā dūyamānena vihasann idam abravīt
analyzed: manasā dūyamānena vihasan idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.01.054/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.054/1 na hy asyās te bhayaṃ saumya yad vai sāhāśarīra-vāk
analyzed: na hi asyāḥ te bhayam saumya yat vai sā āha aśarīra vāc

original: BhP_10.01.054/3 putrān samarpayiṣye 'syā yatas te bhayam utthitam
analyzed: putrān samarpayiṣye syāḥ yatas te bhayam utthitam

original: BhP_10.01.055/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.01.055/1 svasur vadhān nivavṛte kaṃsas tad-vākya-sāra-vit
analyzed: svasuḥ vadhāt nivavṛte kaṃsaḥ tad vākya sāra vid

original: BhP_10.01.055/3 vasudevo 'pi taṃ prītaḥ praśasya prāviśad gṛham
analyzed: vasudevaḥ pi tam prītaḥ praśasya prāviśat gṛham

original: BhP_10.01.056/1 atha kāla upāvṛtte devakī sarva-devatā
analyzed: atha kāle upāvṛtte devakī sarva devatā

original: BhP_10.01.056/3 putrān prasuṣuve cāṣṭau kanyāṃ caivānuvatsaram
analyzed: putrān prasuṣuve ca aṣṭau kanyām ca eva anuvatsaram

original: BhP_10.01.057/1 kīrtimantaṃ prathamajaṃ kaṃsāyānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: kīrtimantam prathama jam kaṃsāya ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.057/3 arpayām āsa kṛcchreṇa so 'nṛtād ativihvalaḥ
analyzed: arpayām āsa kṛcchreṇa saḥ ati vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.058/1 kiṃ duḥsahaṃ nu sādhūnāṃ viduṣāṃ kim apekṣitam
analyzed: kim duḥsaham nu sādhūnām viduṣām kim apekṣitam

original: BhP_10.01.058/3 kim akāryaṃ kadaryāṇāṃ dustyajaṃ kiṃ dhṛtātmanām
analyzed: kim akāryam kadaryāṇām dustyajam kim dhṛta ātmanām

original: BhP_10.01.059/1 dṛṣṭvā samatvaṃ tac chaureḥ satye caiva vyavasthitim
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sama tvam tat śaureḥ satye ca eva vyavasthitim

original: BhP_10.01.059/3 kaṃsas tuṣṭa-manā rājan prahasann idam abravīt
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ tuṣṭa manāḥ rājan prahasan idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.01.060/1 pratiyātu kumāro 'yaṃ na hy asmād asti me bhayam
analyzed: pratiyātu kumāraḥ yam na hi asmāt asti me bhayam

original: BhP_10.01.060/3 aṣṭamād yuvayor garbhān mṛtyur me vihitaḥ kila
analyzed: aṣṭamāt yuvayoḥ garbhāt mṛtyuḥ me vihitaḥ kila

original: BhP_10.01.061/1 tatheti sutam ādāya yayāv ānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: tathā iti sutam ādāya yayau ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.01.061/3 nābhyanandata tad-vākyam asato 'vijitātmanaḥ
analyzed: na abhyanandata tad vākyam asataḥ vijita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.062/1 nandādyā ye vraje gopā yāś cāmīṣāṃ ca yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: nanda ādyāḥ ye vraje gopāḥ yāḥ ca amīṣām ca yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.062/3 vṛṣṇayo vasudevādyā devaky-ādyā yadu-striyaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇayaḥ vasudeva ādyāḥ devakī ādyāḥ yadu striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.063/1 sarve vai devatā-prāyā ubhayor api bhārata
analyzed: sarve vai devatā prāyāḥ ubhayoḥ api bhārata

original: BhP_10.01.063/3 jñātayo bandhu-suhṛdo ye ca kaṃsam anuvratāḥ
analyzed: jñātayaḥ bandhu suhṛdaḥ ye ca kaṃsam anuvratāḥ

original: BhP_10.01.064/1 etat kaṃsāya bhagavāñ chaśaṃsābhyetya nāradaḥ
analyzed: etat kaṃsāya bhagavān śaśaṃsa abhyetya nāradaḥ

original: BhP_10.01.064/3 bhūmer bhārāyamāṇānāṃ daityānāṃ ca vadhodyamam
analyzed: bhūmeḥ bhārāyamāṇānām daityānām ca vadha udyamam

original: BhP_10.01.065/1 ṛṣer vinirgame kaṃso yadūn matvā surān iti
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ vinirgame kaṃsaḥ yadūn matvā surān iti

original: BhP_10.01.065/3 devakyā garbha-sambhūtaṃ viṣṇuṃ ca sva-vadhaṃ prati
analyzed: devakyāḥ garbha sambhūtam viṣṇum ca sva vadham prati

original: BhP_10.01.066/1 devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca nigṛhya nigaḍair gṛhe
analyzed: devakīm vasudevam ca nigṛhya nigaḍaiḥ gṛhe

original: BhP_10.01.066/3 jātaṃ jātam ahan putraṃ tayor ajana-śaṅkayā
analyzed: jātam jātam ahan putram tayoḥ ajana śaṅkayā

original: BhP_10.01.067/1 mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhrātṝn sarvāṃś ca suhṛdas tathā
analyzed: mātaram pitaram bhrātṝn sarvān ca suhṛdaḥ tathā

original: BhP_10.01.067/3 ghnanti hy asutṛpo lubdhā rājānaḥ prāyaśo bhuvi
analyzed: ghnanti hi asutṛpaḥ lubdhāḥ rājānaḥ prāyaśas bhuvi

original: BhP_10.01.068/1 ātmānam iha sañjātaṃ jānan prāg viṣṇunā hatam
analyzed: ātmānam iha sañjātam jānan prāk viṣṇunā hatam

original: BhP_10.01.068/3 mahāsuraṃ kālanemiṃ yadubhiḥ sa vyarudhyata
analyzed: mahā asuram kālanemim yadubhiḥ sa vyarudhyata

original: BhP_10.01.069/1 ugrasenaṃ ca pitaraṃ yadu-bhojāndhakādhipam
analyzed: ugrasenam ca pitaram yadu bhoja andhaka adhipam

original: BhP_10.01.069/3 svayaṃ nigṛhya bubhuje śūrasenān mahā-balaḥ
analyzed: svayam nigṛhya bubhuje śūrasenāt mahā balaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.02.001/1 pralamba-baka-cāṇūra- tṛṇāvarta-mahāśanaiḥ
analyzed: pralamba baka cāṇūra tṛṇāvarta mahā aśanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.02.001/3 muṣṭikāriṣṭa-dvivida- pūtanā-keśī-dhenukaiḥ
analyzed: muṣṭika ariṣṭa dvivida pūtanākeśī dhenukaiḥ

original: BhP_10.02.002/1 anyaiś cāsura-bhūpālair bāṇa-bhaumādibhir yutaḥ
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca asura bhūpālaiḥ bāṇa bhauma ādibhiḥ yutaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.002/3 yadūnāṃ kadanaṃ cakre balī māgadha-saṃśrayaḥ
analyzed: yadūnām kadanam cakre balī māgadha saṃśrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.003/1 te pīḍitā niviviśuḥ kuru-pañcāla-kekayān
analyzed: te pīḍitāḥ niviviśuḥ kuru pañcāla kekayān

original: BhP_10.02.003/3 śālvān vidarbhān niṣadhān videhān kośalān api
analyzed: śālvān vidarbhān niṣadhān videhān kośalān api

original: BhP_10.02.004/1 eke tam anurundhānā jñātayaḥ paryupāsate
analyzed: eke tam anurundhānāḥ jñātayaḥ paryupāsate

original: BhP_10.02.004/3 hateṣu ṣaṭsu bāleṣu devakyā augraseninā
analyzed: hateṣu ṣaṭsu bāleṣu devakyāḥ augraseninā

original: BhP_10.02.005/1 saptamo vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma yam anantaṃ pracakṣate
analyzed: saptamaḥ vaiṣṇavam dhāma yam anantam pracakṣate

original: BhP_10.02.005/3 garbho babhūva devakyā harṣa-śoka-vivardhanaḥ
analyzed: garbhaḥ babhūva devakyāḥ harṣa śoka vivardhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.006/1 bhagavān api viśvātmā viditvā kaṃsajaṃ bhayam
analyzed: bhagavān api viśvātmā viditvā kaṃsa jam bhayam

original: BhP_10.02.006/3 yadūnāṃ nija-nāthānāṃ yogamāyāṃ samādiśat
analyzed: yadūnām nija nāthānām yoga māyām samādiśat

original: BhP_10.02.007/1 gaccha devi vrajaṃ bhadre gopa-gobhir alaṅkṛtam
analyzed: gaccha devi vrajam bhadre gopa gobhiḥ alaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_10.02.007/3 rohiṇī vasudevasya bhāryāste nanda-gokule
analyzed: rohiṇī vasudevasya bhāryā āste nanda gokule

original: BhP_10.02.007/5 anyāś ca kaṃsa-saṃvignā vivareṣu vasanti hi
analyzed: anyāḥ ca kaṃsa saṃvignāḥ vivareṣu vasanti hi

original: BhP_10.02.008/1 devakyā jaṭhare garbhaṃ śeṣākhyaṃ dhāma māmakam
analyzed: devakyāḥ jaṭhare garbham śeṣa ākhyam dhāma māmakam

original: BhP_10.02.008/3 tat sannikṛṣya rohiṇyā udare sanniveśaya
analyzed: tat sannikṛṣya rohiṇyāḥ udare sanniveśaya

original: BhP_10.02.009/1 athāham aṃśa-bhāgena devakyāḥ putratāṃ śubhe
analyzed: atha aham aṃśa bhāgena devakyāḥ putra tām śubhe

original: BhP_10.02.009/3 prāpsyāmi tvaṃ yaśodāyāṃ nanda-patnyāṃ bhaviṣyasi
analyzed: prāpsyāmi tvam yaśodāyām nanda patnyām bhaviṣyasi

original: BhP_10.02.010/1 arciṣyanti manuṣyās tvāṃ sarva-kāma-vareśvarīm
analyzed: arciṣyanti manuṣyāḥ tvām sarva kāma vara īśvarīm

original: BhP_10.02.010/3 dhūpopahāra-balibhiḥ sarva-kāma-vara-pradām
analyzed: dhūpa upahāra balibhiḥ sarva kāma vara pradām

original: BhP_10.02.011/1 nāmadheyāni kurvanti sthānāni ca narā bhuvi
analyzed: nāmadheyāni kurvanti sthānāni ca narāḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_10.02.011/3 durgeti bhadrakālīti vijayā vaiṣṇavīti ca
analyzed: durgā iti bhadrakālī iti vijayā vaiṣṇavī iti ca

original: BhP_10.02.012/1 kumudā caṇḍikā kṛṣṇā mādhavī kanyaketi ca
analyzed: kumudā caṇḍikā kṛṣṇā mādhavī kanyakā iti ca

original: BhP_10.02.012/3 māyā nārāyaṇīśānī śāradety ambiketi ca
BhP_10.02.013/1 garbha-saṅkarṣaṇāt taṃ vai prāhuḥ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: garbha saṅkarṣaṇāt tam vai prāhuḥ saṅkarṣaṇam bhuvi

original: BhP_10.02.013/3 rāmeti loka-ramaṇād balabhadraṃ balocchrayāt
analyzed: rāma iti loka ramaṇāt balabhadram bala ucchrayāt

original: BhP_10.02.014/1 sandiṣṭaivaṃ bhagavatā tathety om iti tad-vacaḥ
analyzed: sandiṣṭā evam bhagavatā tathā iti om iti tad vacaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.014/3 pratigṛhya parikramya gāṃ gatā tat tathākarot
analyzed: pratigṛhya parikramya gām gatā tat tathā akarot

original: BhP_10.02.015/1 garbhe praṇīte devakyā rohiṇīṃ yoga-nidrayā
analyzed: garbhe praṇīte devakyāḥ rohiṇīm yoganidrayā

original: BhP_10.02.015/3 aho visraṃsito garbha iti paurā vicukruśuḥ
analyzed: aho visraṃsitaḥ garbhaḥ iti paurāḥ vicukruśuḥ

original: BhP_10.02.016/1 bhagavān api viśvātmā bhaktānām abhayaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api viśvātmā bhaktānām abhayaṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_10.02.016/3 āviveśāṃśa-bhāgena mana ānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: āviveśa aṃśa bhāgena manaḥ ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.02.017/1 sa bibhrat pauruṣaṃ dhāma bhrājamāno yathā raviḥ
analyzed: sa bibhrat pauruṣam dhāma bhrājamānaḥ yathā raviḥ

original: BhP_10.02.017/3 durāsado 'tidurdharṣo bhūtānāṃ sambabhūva ha
analyzed: durāsadaḥ ti durdharṣaḥ bhūtānām sambabhūva ha

original: BhP_10.02.018/1 tato jagan-maṅgalam acyutāṃśaṃ samāhitaṃ śūra-sutena devī
analyzed: tatas jagat maṅgalam acyuta aṃśam samāhitam śūra sutena devī

original: BhP_10.02.018/3 dadhāra sarvātmakam ātma-bhūtaṃ kāṣṭhā yathānanda-karaṃ manastaḥ
analyzed: dadhāra sarva ātmakam ātma bhūtam kāṣṭhā yathā ānanda karam manastaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.019/1 sā devakī sarva-jagan-nivāsa- nivāsa-bhūtā nitarāṃ na reje
analyzed: sā devakī sarva jagat nivāsa nivāsa bhūtā nitarām na reje

original: BhP_10.02.019/3 bhojendra-gehe 'gni-śikheva ruddhā sarasvatī jñāna-khale yathā satī
analyzed: bhoja indra gehe gni śikhā iva ruddhā sarasvatī jñāna khale yathā satī

original: BhP_10.02.020/1 tāṃ vīkṣya kaṃsaḥ prabhayājitāntarāṃ
analyzed: tām vīkṣya kaṃsaḥ prabhayā ajita antarām

original: BhP_10.02.020/2 virocayantīṃ bhavanaṃ śuci-smitām
analyzed: virocayantīm bhavanam śuci smitām

original: BhP_10.02.020/3 āhaiṣa me prāṇa-haro harir guhāṃ
analyzed: āha eṣa me prāṇa haraḥ hariḥ guhām

original: BhP_10.02.020/4 dhruvaṃ śrito yan na pureyam īdṛśī
analyzed: dhruvam śritaḥ yat na purā iyam īdṛśī

original: BhP_10.02.021/1 kim adya tasmin karaṇīyam āśu me yad artha-tantro na vihanti vikramam
analyzed: kim adya tasmin karaṇīyam āśu me yat artha tantraḥ na vihanti vikramam

original: BhP_10.02.021/3 striyāḥ svasur gurumatyā vadho 'yaṃ yaśaḥ śriyaṃ hanty anukālam āyuḥ
analyzed: striyāḥ svasuḥ guru matyāḥ vadhaḥ yam yaśaḥ śriyam hanti anukālam āyuḥ

original: BhP_10.02.022/1 sa eṣa jīvan khalu sampareto varteta yo 'tyanta-nṛśaṃsitena
analyzed: saḥ eṣa jīvan khalu samparetaḥ varteta

original: BhP_10.02.022/3 dehe mṛte taṃ manujāḥ śapanti gantā tamo 'ndhaṃ tanu-mānino dhruvam
analyzed: dehe mṛte tam manujāḥ śapanti gantā tamaḥ ndham tanu māninaḥ dhruvam

original: BhP_10.02.023/1 iti ghoratamād bhāvāt sannivṛttaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: iti ghoratamāt bhāvāt sannivṛttaḥ svayam prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.02.023/3 āste pratīkṣaṃs taj-janma harer vairānubandha-kṛt
analyzed: āste pratīkṣan tad janma hareḥ vaira anubandha kṛt

original: BhP_10.02.024/1 āsīnaḥ saṃviśaṃs tiṣṭhan bhuñjānaḥ paryaṭan mahīm
analyzed: āsīnaḥ saṃviśan tiṣṭhan bhuñjānaḥ paryaṭan mahīm

original: BhP_10.02.024/3 cintayāno hṛṣīkeśam apaśyat tanmayaṃ jagat
analyzed: cintayānaḥ hṛṣīkeśam apaśyat tad mayam jagat

original: BhP_10.02.025/1 brahmā bhavaś ca tatraitya munibhir nāradādibhiḥ
analyzed: brahmā bhavaḥ ca tatra etya munibhiḥ nārada ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.02.025/3 devaiḥ sānucaraiḥ sākaṃ gīrbhir vṛṣaṇam aiḍayan
analyzed: devaiḥ sa anucaraiḥ sākam gīrbhiḥ vṛṣaṇam aiḍayan

original: BhP_10.02.026/1 satya-vrataṃ satya-paraṃ tri-satyaṃ
analyzed: satya vratam satya param tri satyam

original: BhP_10.02.026/2 satyasya yoniṃ nihitaṃ ca satye
analyzed: satyasya yonim nihitam ca satye

original: BhP_10.02.026/3 satyasya satyam ṛta-satya-netraṃ
analyzed: satyasya satyam ṛta satya netram

original: BhP_10.02.026/4 satyātmakaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannāḥ
analyzed: satya ātmakam tvām śaraṇam prapannāḥ

original: BhP_10.02.027/1 ekāyano 'sau dvi-phalas tri-mūlaś catū-rasaḥ pañca-vidhaḥ ṣaḍ-ātmā
analyzed: eka ayanaḥ sau dvi phalaḥ tri mūlaḥ catūrasaḥ pañcavidhaḥ ṣaṣ ātmā

original: BhP_10.02.027/3 sapta-tvag aṣṭa-viṭapo navākṣo daśa-cchadī dvi-khago hy ādi-vṛkṣaḥ
analyzed: sapta tvac aṣṭa viṭapaḥ nava akṣaḥ daśa chadī dvi khagaḥ hi ādi vṛkṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.028/1 tvam eka evāsya sataḥ prasūtis tvaṃ sannidhānaṃ tvam anugrahaś ca
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ eva asya sataḥ prasūtiḥ tvam sannidhānam tvam anugrahaḥ ca

original: BhP_10.02.028/3 tvan-māyayā saṃvṛta-cetasas tvāṃ paśyanti nānā na vipaścito ye
analyzed: tvad māyayā saṃvṛta cetasaḥ tvām paśyanti nānā na vipaścitaḥ ye

original: BhP_10.02.029/1 bibharṣi rūpāṇy avabodha ātmā kṣemāya lokasya carācarasya
analyzed: bibharṣi rūpāṇi avabodhaḥ ātmā kṣemāya lokasya carācarasya

original: BhP_10.02.029/3 sattvopapannāni sukhāvahāni satām abhadrāṇi muhuḥ khalānām
analyzed: sattva upapannāni sukha āvahāni satām abhadrāṇi muhur khalānām

original: BhP_10.02.030/1 tvayy ambujākṣākhila-sattva-dhāmni samādhināveśita-cetasaike
analyzed: tvayi ambuja akṣa akhila sattva dhāmni samādhinā āveśita cetasā eke

original: BhP_10.02.030/3 tvat-pāda-potena mahat-kṛtena kurvanti govatsa-padaṃ bhavābdhim
analyzed: tvad pāda potena mahat kṛtena kurvanti go vatsa padam bhava abdhim

original: BhP_10.02.031/1 svayaṃ samuttīrya sudustaraṃ dyuman
analyzed: svayam samuttīrya su dustaram dyuman

original: BhP_10.02.031/2 bhavārṇavaṃ bhīmam adabhra-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: bhava arṇavam bhīmam adabhra sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_10.02.031/3 bhavat-padāmbhoruha-nāvam atra te
analyzed: bhavat pada ambhoruha nāvam atra te

original: BhP_10.02.031/4 nidhāya yātāḥ sad-anugraho bhavān
analyzed: nidhāya yātāḥ sat anugrahaḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.02.032/1 ye 'nye 'ravindākṣa vimukta-māninas
analyzed: ye nye ravinda akṣa vimukta māninaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.032/2 tvayy asta-bhāvād aviśuddha-buddhayaḥ
analyzed: tvayi asta bhāvāt a viśuddha buddhayaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.032/3 āruhya kṛcchreṇa paraṃ padaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: āruhya kṛcchreṇa param padam tatas

original: BhP_10.02.032/4 patanty adho 'nādṛta-yuṣmad-aṅghrayaḥ
analyzed: patanti adhas na ādṛta yuṣmad aṅghrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.033/1 tathā na te mādhava tāvakāḥ kvacid bhraśyanti mārgāt tvayi baddha-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: tathā na te mādhava tāvakāḥ kvacid bhraśyanti mārgāt tvayi baddha sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_10.02.033/3 tvayābhiguptā vicaranti nirbhayā vināyakānīkapa-mūrdhasu prabho
analyzed: tvayā abhiguptāḥ vicaranti nirbhayāḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.02.034/1 sattvaṃ viśuddhaṃ śrayate bhavān sthitau
analyzed: sattvam viśuddham śrayate bhavān sthitau

original: BhP_10.02.034/2 śarīriṇāṃ śreya-upāyanaṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: śarīriṇām śreyaḥ upāyanam vapuḥ

original: BhP_10.02.034/3 veda-kriyā-yoga-tapaḥ-samādhibhis
analyzed: veda kriyā yoga tapaḥ samādhibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.02.034/4 tavārhaṇaṃ yena janaḥ samīhate
analyzed: tava arhaṇam yena janaḥ samīhate

original: BhP_10.02.035/1 sattvaṃ na ced dhātar idaṃ nijaṃ bhaved
analyzed: sattvam na ced dhātar idam nijam bhavet

original: BhP_10.02.035/2 vijñānam ajñāna-bhidāpamārjanam
analyzed: vijñānam ajñāna bhidā apamārjanam

original: BhP_10.02.035/3 guṇa-prakāśair anumīyate bhavān
analyzed: guṇa prakāśaiḥ anumīyate bhavān

original: BhP_10.02.035/4 prakāśate yasya ca yena vā guṇaḥ
analyzed: prakāśate yasya ca yena vā guṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.036/1 na nāma-rūpe guṇa-janma-karmabhir nirūpitavye tava tasya sākṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: na nāma rūpe guṇa janma karmabhiḥ nirūpitavye tava tasya sākṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.036/3 mano-vacobhyām anumeya-vartmano deva kriyāyāṃ pratiyanty athāpi hi
analyzed: manaḥ vacobhyām anumeya vartmanaḥ deva kriyāyām pratiyanti atha api hi

original: BhP_10.02.037/1 śṛṇvan gṛṇan saṃsmarayaṃś ca cintayan
analyzed: śṛṇvan gṛṇan saṃsmarayan ca cintayan

original: BhP_10.02.037/2 nāmāni rūpāṇi ca maṅgalāni te
analyzed: nāmāni rūpāṇi ca maṅgalāni te

original: BhP_10.02.037/3 kriyāsu yas tvac-caraṇāravindayor
analyzed: kriyāsu yaḥ tvad caraṇa aravindayoḥ

original: BhP_10.02.037/4 āviṣṭa-cetā na bhavāya kalpate
analyzed: āviṣṭa cetāḥ na bhavāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.02.038/1 diṣṭyā hare 'syā bhavataḥ pado bhuvo
analyzed: diṣṭyā hare syāḥ bhavataḥ padaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.038/2 bhāro 'panītas tava janmaneśituḥ
analyzed: bhāro panītaḥ tava janmanā īśituḥ

original: BhP_10.02.038/3 diṣṭyāṅkitāṃ tvat-padakaiḥ suśobhanair
analyzed: diṣṭyā aṅkitām tvad padakaiḥ su śobhanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.02.038/4 drakṣyāma gāṃ dyāṃ ca tavānukampitām
analyzed: drakṣyāma gām dyām ca tava anukampitām

original: BhP_10.02.039/1 na te 'bhavasyeśa bhavasya kāraṇaṃ vinā vinodaṃ bata tarkayāmahe
analyzed: na te bhavasya īśa bhavasya kāraṇam vinā vinodam bata tarkayāmahe

original: BhP_10.02.039/3 bhavo nirodhaḥ sthitir apy avidyayā kṛtā yatas tvayy abhayāśrayātmani
analyzed: bhavaḥ nirodhaḥ sthitiḥ api avidyayā kṛtāḥ yatas tvayi abhaya āśraya ātmani

original: BhP_10.02.040/1 matsyāśva-kacchapa-nṛsiṃha-varāha-haṃsa-
BhP_10.02.040/2 rājanya-vipra-vibudheṣu kṛtāvatāraḥ
analyzed: rājanya vipra vibudheṣu kṛta avatāraḥ

original: BhP_10.02.040/3 tvaṃ pāsi nas tri-bhuvanaṃ ca yathādhuneśa
analyzed: tvam pāsi naḥ tribhuvanam ca yathā adhunā īśa

original: BhP_10.02.040/4 bhāraṃ bhuvo hara yadūttama vandanaṃ te
analyzed: bhāram bhuvaḥ hara yadu uttama vandanam te

original: BhP_10.02.041/1 diṣṭyāmba te kukṣi-gataḥ paraḥ pumān
analyzed: diṣṭyā amba te kukṣi gataḥ paraḥ pumān

original: BhP_10.02.041/2 aṃśena sākṣād bhagavān bhavāya naḥ
analyzed: aṃśena sākṣāt bhagavān bhavāya naḥ

original: BhP_10.02.041/3 mābhūd bhayaṃ bhoja-pater mumūrṣor
analyzed: mā abhūt bhayam bhoja pateḥ mumūrṣoḥ

original: BhP_10.02.041/4 goptā yadūnāṃ bhavitā tavātmajaḥ
analyzed: goptā yadūnām bhavitā tava ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_10.02.042/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.02.042/1 ity abhiṣṭūya puruṣaṃ yad-rūpam anidaṃ yathā
analyzed: iti abhiṣṭūya puruṣam yad rūpam an idam yathā

original: BhP_10.02.042/3 brahmeśānau purodhāya devāḥ pratiyayur divam
analyzed: brahma īśānau purodhāya devāḥ pratiyayuḥ divam

original: BhP_10.03.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.03.001/1 atha sarva-guṇopetaḥ kālaḥ parama-śobhanaḥ
analyzed: atha sarva guṇa upetaḥ kālaḥ parama śobhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.001/3 yarhy evājana-janmarkṣaṃ śāntarkṣa-graha-tārakam
analyzed: yarhi eva ajana janma ṛkṣam śānta ṛkṣa graha tārakam

original: BhP_10.03.002/1 diśaḥ prasedur gaganaṃ nirmaloḍu-gaṇodayam
analyzed: diśaḥ praseduḥ gaganam nirmala uḍu gaṇa udayam

original: BhP_10.03.002/3 mahī maṅgala-bhūyiṣṭha- pura-grāma-vrajākarā
analyzed: mahī pura grāma vraja ākarā

original: BhP_10.03.003/1 nadyaḥ prasanna-salilā hradā jalaruha-śriyaḥ
analyzed: nadyaḥ prasanna salilāḥ hradāḥ jalaruha śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.003/3 dvijāli-kula-sannāda- stavakā vana-rājayaḥ
analyzed: stavakāḥ vana rājayaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.004/1 vavau vāyuḥ sukha-sparśaḥ puṇya-gandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: vavau vāyuḥ sukha sparśaḥ puṇya gandha vahaḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_10.03.004/3 agnayaś ca dvijātīnāṃ śāntās tatra samindhata
analyzed: agnayaḥ ca dvijātīnām śāntāḥ tatra samindhata

original: BhP_10.03.005/1 manāṃsy āsan prasannāni sādhūnām asura-druhām
analyzed: manāṃsi āsan prasannāni sādhūnām asuradruhām

original: BhP_10.03.005/3 jāyamāne 'jane tasmin nedur dundubhayaḥ samam
analyzed: jāyamāne jane tasmin neduḥ dundubhayaḥ samam

original: BhP_10.03.006/1 jaguḥ kinnara-gandharvās tuṣṭuvuḥ siddha-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: jaguḥ kinnara gandharvāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ siddha cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.03.006/3 vidyādharyaś ca nanṛtur apsarobhiḥ samaṃ mudā
analyzed: vidyādharyaḥ ca nanṛtuḥ apsarobhiḥ samam mudā

original: BhP_10.03.007/1 mumucur munayo devāḥ sumanāṃsi mudānvitāḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ munayaḥ devāḥ sumanāṃsi mudā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_10.03.007/3 mandaṃ mandaṃ jaladharā jagarjur anusāgaram
analyzed: mandam mandam jaladharāḥ jagarjuḥ anu sāgaram

original: BhP_10.03.008/1 niśīthe tama-udbhūte jāyamāne janārdane
analyzed: niśīthe tamaḥ udbhūte jāyamāne janārdane

original: BhP_10.03.008/3 devakyāṃ deva-rūpiṇyāṃ viṣṇuḥ sarva-guhā-śayaḥ
analyzed: devakyām deva rūpiṇyām viṣṇuḥ sarva guhā āśayaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.008/5 āvirāsīd yathā prācyāṃ diśīndur iva puṣkalaḥ
analyzed: āvirāsīt yathā prācyām diśi induḥ iva puṣkalaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.009/1 tam adbhutaṃ bālakam ambujekṣaṇaṃ catur-bhujaṃ śaṅkha-gadādy-udāyudham
analyzed: tam adbhutam bālakam ambuja īkṣaṇam catur bhujam śaṅkha gadā ādi udāyudham

original: BhP_10.03.009/3 śrīvatsa-lakṣmaṃ gala-śobhi-kaustubhaṃ pītāmbaraṃ sāndra-payoda-saubhagam
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣmam gala śobhi kaustubham pīta ambaram sāndra payoda saubhagam

original: BhP_10.03.010/1 mahārha-vaidūrya-kirīṭa-kuṇḍala- tviṣā pariṣvakta-sahasra-kuntalam
analyzed: mahārha vaidūrya kirīṭa kuṇḍala tviṣā pariṣvakta sahasra kuntalam

original: BhP_10.03.010/3 uddāma-kāñcy-aṅgada-kaṅkaṇādibhir virocamānaṃ vasudeva aikṣata
analyzed: uddāma kāñci aṅgada kaṅkaṇa ādibhiḥ virocamānam vasudevaḥ aikṣata

original: BhP_10.03.011/1 sa vismayotphulla-vilocano hariṃ sutaṃ vilokyānakadundubhis tadā
analyzed: sa vismaya utphulla vilocanaḥ harim sutam vilokya ānakadundubhiḥ tadā

original: BhP_10.03.011/3 kṛṣṇāvatārotsava-sambhramo 'spṛśan mudā dvijebhyo 'yutam āpluto gavām
analyzed: spṛśan mudā dvijebhyaḥ yutam āplutaḥ gavām

original: BhP_10.03.012/1 athainam astaud avadhārya pūruṣaṃ paraṃ natāṅgaḥ kṛta-dhīḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: athā enam astaut avadhārya pūruṣam param nata aṅgaḥ kṛta dhīḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_10.03.012/3 sva-rociṣā bhārata sūtikā-gṛhaṃ virocayantaṃ gata-bhīḥ prabhāva-vit
analyzed: sva rociṣā bhārata sūtikāgṛham virocayantam gata bhīḥ prabhāva vid

original: BhP_10.03.013/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.03.013/1 vidito 'si bhavān sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
analyzed: viditaḥ si bhavān sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_10.03.013/3 kevalānubhavānanda- svarūpaḥ sarva-buddhi-dṛk
BhP_10.03.014/1 sa eva svaprakṛtyedaṃ sṛṣṭvāgre tri-guṇātmakam
analyzed: saḥ eva sva prakṛtyā idam sṛṣṭvā agre triguṇa ātmakam

original: BhP_10.03.014/3 tad anu tvaṃ hy apraviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭa iva bhāvyase
analyzed: tat anu tvam hi apraviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ iva bhāvyase

original: BhP_10.03.015/1 yatheme 'vikṛtā bhāvās tathā te vikṛtaiḥ saha
analyzed: yathā ime vikṛtāḥ bhāvāḥ tathā te vikṛtaiḥ saha

original: BhP_10.03.015/3 nānā-vīryāḥ pṛthag-bhūtā virājaṃ janayanti hi
analyzed: nānā vīryāḥ pṛthak bhūtāḥ virājam janayanti hi

original: BhP_10.03.016/1 sannipatya samutpādya dṛśyante 'nugatā iva
analyzed: sannipatya samutpādya dṛśyante nugatāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.03.016/3 prāg eva vidyamānatvān na teṣām iha sambhavaḥ
analyzed: prāk eva vidyamāna tvāt na teṣām iha sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.017/1 evaṃ bhavān buddhy-anumeya-lakṣaṇair grāhyair guṇaiḥ sann api tad-guṇāgrahaḥ
analyzed: evam bhavān buddhi anumeya lakṣaṇaiḥ grāhyaiḥ guṇaiḥ san api tad guṇa āgrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.017/3 anāvṛtatvād bahir antaraṃ na te sarvasya sarvātmana ātma-vastunaḥ
analyzed: anāvṛta tvāt bahis antaram na te sarvasya sarva ātmanaḥ ātma vastunaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.018/1 ya ātmano dṛśya-guṇeṣu sann iti vyavasyate sva-vyatirekato 'budhaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ātmanaḥ dṛśya guṇeṣu san iti vyavasyate sva vyatirekataḥ budhaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.018/3 vinānuvādaṃ na ca tan manīṣitaṃ samyag yatas tyaktam upādadat pumān
analyzed: vinā anuvādam na ca tat manīṣitam samyak yatas tyaktam pumān

original: BhP_10.03.019/1 tvatto 'sya janma-sthiti-saṃyamān vibho
analyzed: tvattaḥ sya janma sthiti saṃyamān vibho

original: BhP_10.03.019/2 vadanty anīhād aguṇād avikriyāt
analyzed: vadanti anīhāt aguṇāt avikriyāt

original: BhP_10.03.019/3 tvayīśvare brahmaṇi no virudhyate
analyzed: tvayi īśvare brahmaṇi no virudhyate

original: BhP_10.03.019/4 tvad-āśrayatvād upacaryate guṇaiḥ
analyzed: tvad āśraya tvāt upacaryate guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.03.020/1 sa tvaṃ tri-loka-sthitaye sva-māyayā
analyzed: sa tvam tri loka sthitaye sva māyayā

original: BhP_10.03.020/2 bibharṣi śuklaṃ khalu varṇam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: bibharṣi śuklam khalu varṇam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.020/3 sargāya raktaṃ rajasopabṛṃhitaṃ
analyzed: sargāya raktam rajasā upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_10.03.020/4 kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇaṃ tamasā janātyaye
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca varṇam tamasā jana atyaye

original: BhP_10.03.021/1 tvam asya lokasya vibho rirakṣiṣur gṛhe 'vatīrṇo 'si mamākhileśvara
analyzed: tvam asya lokasya vibhoḥ rirakṣiṣuḥ gṛhe vatīrṇaḥ si mama akhila īśvara

original: BhP_10.03.021/3 rājanya-saṃjñāsura-koṭi-yūthapair nirvyūhyamānā nihaniṣyase camūḥ
analyzed: rājanya saṃjñā asura koṭi yūthapaiḥ nirvyūhyamānā nihaniṣyase camūḥ

original: BhP_10.03.022/1 ayaṃ tv asabhyas tava janma nau gṛhe
analyzed: ayam tu asabhyaḥ tava janma nau gṛhe

original: BhP_10.03.022/2 śrutvāgrajāṃs te nyavadhīt sureśvara
analyzed: śrutvā agrajān te nyavadhīt sureśvara

original: BhP_10.03.022/3 sa te 'vatāraṃ puruṣaiḥ samarpitaṃ
analyzed: sa te vatāram puruṣaiḥ samarpitam

original: BhP_10.03.022/4 śrutvādhunaivābhisaraty udāyudhaḥ
analyzed: śrutvā adhunā eva abhisarati udāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.023/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.03.023/1 athainam ātmajaṃ vīkṣya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: athā enam ātmajam vīkṣya mahā puruṣa lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.03.023/3 devakī tam upādhāvat kaṃsād bhītā suvismitā
analyzed: devakī tam upādhāvat kaṃsāt bhītā su vismitā

original: BhP_10.03.024/0 śrī-devaky uvāca
analyzed: śrī devakī uvāca

original: BhP_10.03.024/1 rūpaṃ yat tat prāhur avyaktam ādyaṃ
analyzed: rūpam yat tat prāhuḥ avyaktam ādyam

original: BhP_10.03.024/2 brahma jyotir nirguṇaṃ nirvikāram
analyzed: brahma jyotiḥ nirguṇam nirvikāram

original: BhP_10.03.024/3 sattā-mātraṃ nirviśeṣaṃ nirīhaṃ
BhP_10.03.024/4 sa tvaṃ sākṣād viṣṇur adhyātma-dīpaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ adhyātma dīpaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.025/1 naṣṭe loke dvi-parārdhāvasāne mahā-bhūteṣv ādi-bhūtaṃ gateṣu
analyzed: naṣṭe loke dvi parārdha avasāne mahābhūteṣu ādi bhūtam gateṣu

original: BhP_10.03.025/3 vyakte 'vyaktaṃ kāla-vegena yāte bhavān ekaḥ śiṣyate 'śeṣa-saṃjñaḥ
analyzed: vyakte vyaktam kāla vegena yāte bhavān ekaḥ śiṣyate śeṣa saṃjñaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.026/1 yo 'yaṃ kālas tasya te 'vyakta-bandho
analyzed: yaḥ yam kālaḥ tasya te vyakta bandho

original: BhP_10.03.026/2 ceṣṭām āhuś ceṣṭate yena viśvam
analyzed: ceṣṭām āhuḥ ceṣṭate yena viśvam

original: BhP_10.03.026/3 nimeṣādir vatsarānto mahīyāṃs
analyzed: nimeṣa ādiḥ vatsara antaḥ mahīyān

original: BhP_10.03.026/4 taṃ tveśānaṃ kṣema-dhāma prapadye
analyzed: tam tvā īśānam kṣema dhāma prapadye

original: BhP_10.03.027/1 martyo mṛtyu-vyāla-bhītaḥ palāyan lokān sarvān nirbhayaṃ nādhyagacchat
analyzed: martyaḥ mṛtyu vyāla bhītaḥ palāyan lokān sarvān nirbhayam na adhyagacchat

original: BhP_10.03.027/3 tvat pādābjaṃ prāpya yadṛcchayādya susthaḥ śete mṛtyur asmād apaiti
analyzed: tvat pāda abjam prāpya yadṛcchayā adya susthaḥ śete mṛtyuḥ asmāt apaiti

original: BhP_10.03.028/1 sa tvaṃ ghorād ugrasenātmajān nas trāhi trastān bhṛtya-vitrāsa-hāsi
analyzed: sa tvam ghorāt ugrasena ātmajān naḥ trāhi trastān bhṛtya vitrāsa hā asi

original: BhP_10.03.028/3 rūpaṃ cedaṃ pauruṣaṃ dhyāna-dhiṣṇyaṃ mā pratyakṣaṃ māṃsa-dṛśāṃ kṛṣīṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: rūpam ca idam pauruṣam dhyāna dhiṣṇyam mā pratyakṣam māṃsa dṛśām kṛṣīṣṭhāḥ

original: BhP_10.03.029/1 janma te mayy asau pāpo mā vidyān madhusūdana
analyzed: janma te mayi asau pāpaḥ mā vidyāt madhusūdana

original: BhP_10.03.029/3 samudvije bhavad-dhetoḥ kaṃsād aham adhīra-dhīḥ
analyzed: samudvije bhavat hetoḥ kaṃsāt aham adhīra dhīḥ

original: BhP_10.03.030/1 upasaṃhara viśvātmann ado rūpam alaukikam
analyzed: upasaṃhara viśvātman adaḥ rūpam alaukikam

original: BhP_10.03.030/3 śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-padma- śriyā juṣṭaṃ catur-bhujam
analyzed: śaṅkha cakra gadā padma śriyā juṣṭam caturbhujam

original: BhP_10.03.031/1 viśvaṃ yad etat sva-tanau niśānte yathāvakāśaṃ puruṣaḥ paro bhavān
analyzed: viśvam yat etat sva tanau niśā ante yathāvakāśam puruṣaḥ paraḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.03.031/3 bibharti so 'yaṃ mama garbhago 'bhūd aho nṛ-lokasya viḍambanaṃ hi tat
analyzed: bibharti saḥ yam mama garbha gaḥ bhūt aho nṛ lokasya viḍambanam hi tat

original: BhP_10.03.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.03.032/1 tvam eva pūrva-sarge 'bhūḥ pṛśniḥ svāyambhuve sati
analyzed: tvam eva pūrva sarge bhūḥ pṛśniḥ svāyambhuve sati

original: BhP_10.03.032/3 tadāyaṃ sutapā nāma prajāpatir akalmaṣaḥ
analyzed: tadā ayam sutapāḥ nāma prajāpatiḥ akalmaṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.033/1 yuvāṃ vai brahmaṇādiṣṭau prajā-sarge yadā tataḥ
analyzed: yuvām vai brahmaṇā ādiṣṭau prajā sarge yadā tatas

original: BhP_10.03.033/3 sanniyamyendriya-grāmaṃ tepāthe paramaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: san niyamya indriya grāmam tepāthe paramam tapaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.034/1 varṣa-vātātapa-hima- gharma-kāla-guṇān anu
analyzed: varṣa vāta ātapa hima gharma kāla guṇān anu

original: BhP_10.03.034/3 sahamānau śvāsa-rodha- vinirdhūta-mano-malau
analyzed: sahamānau śvāsa rodha vinirdhūta manaḥ malau

original: BhP_10.03.035/1 śīrṇa-parṇānilāhārāv upaśāntena cetasā
analyzed: śīrṇa parṇa anila āhārau upaśāntena cetasā

original: BhP_10.03.035/3 mattaḥ kāmān abhīpsantau mad-ārādhanam īhatuḥ
analyzed: mattaḥ kāmān abhīpsantau mad ārādhanam īhatuḥ

original: BhP_10.03.036/1 evaṃ vāṃ tapyatos tīvraṃ tapaḥ parama-duṣkaram
analyzed: evam vām tapyatoḥ tīvram tapaḥ parama duṣkaram

original: BhP_10.03.036/3 divya-varṣa-sahasrāṇi dvādaśeyur mad-ātmanoḥ
analyzed: divya varṣa sahasrāṇi dvādaśa īyuḥ mad ātmanoḥ

original: BhP_10.03.037/1 tadā vāṃ parituṣṭo 'ham amunā vapuṣānaghe
analyzed: tadā vām parituṣṭaḥ ham amunā vapuṣā anaghe

original: BhP_10.03.037/3 tapasā śraddhayā nityaṃ bhaktyā ca hṛdi bhāvitaḥ
analyzed: tapasā śraddhayā nityam bhaktyā ca hṛdi bhāvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.038/1 prādurāsaṃ varada-rāḍ yuvayoḥ kāma-ditsayā
analyzed: prādurāsam vara da rāj yuvayoḥ kāma ditsayā

original: BhP_10.03.038/3 vriyatāṃ vara ity ukte mādṛśo vāṃ vṛtaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: vriyatām varaḥ iti ukte mādṛśaḥ vām vṛtaḥ sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.039/1 ajuṣṭa-grāmya-viṣayāv anapatyau ca dam-patī
analyzed: ajuṣṭa grāmya viṣayau anapatyau ca dampatī

original: BhP_10.03.039/3 na vavrāthe 'pavargaṃ me mohitau deva-māyayā
analyzed: na vavrāthe pavargam me mohitau deva māyayā

original: BhP_10.03.040/1 gate mayi yuvāṃ labdhvā varaṃ mat-sadṛśaṃ sutam
analyzed: gate mayi yuvām labdhvā varam mad sadṛśam sutam

original: BhP_10.03.040/3 grāmyān bhogān abhuñjāthāṃ yuvāṃ prāpta-manorathau
analyzed: grāmyān bhogān abhuñjāthām yuvām prāpta manorathau

original: BhP_10.03.041/1 adṛṣṭvānyatamaṃ loke śīlaudārya-guṇaiḥ samam
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā anyatamam loke śīla audārya guṇaiḥ samam

original: BhP_10.03.041/3 ahaṃ suto vām abhavaṃ pṛśnigarbha iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: aham sutaḥ vām abhavam pṛśnigarbhaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.042/1 tayor vāṃ punar evāham adityām āsa kaśyapāt
analyzed: tayoḥ vām punar eva aham adityām āsa kaśyapāt

original: BhP_10.03.042/3 upendra iti vikhyāto vāmanatvāc ca vāmanaḥ
analyzed: upendraḥ iti vikhyātaḥ vāmana tvāt ca vāmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.043/1 tṛtīye 'smin bhave 'haṃ vai tenaiva vapuṣātha vām
analyzed: tṛtīye smin bhave ham vai tena eva vapuṣā atha vām

original: BhP_10.03.043/3 jāto bhūyas tayor eva satyaṃ me vyāhṛtaṃ sati
analyzed: jātaḥ bhūyas tayoḥ eva satyam me vyāhṛtam sati

original: BhP_10.03.044/1 etad vāṃ darśitaṃ rūpaṃ prāg-janma-smaraṇāya me
analyzed: etat vām darśitam rūpam prāc janma smaraṇāya me

original: BhP_10.03.044/3 nānyathā mad-bhavaṃ jñānaṃ martya-liṅgena jāyate
analyzed: na anyathā mad bhavam jñānam martya liṅgena jāyate

original: BhP_10.03.045/1 yuvāṃ māṃ putra-bhāvena brahma-bhāvena cāsakṛt
analyzed: yuvām mām putra bhāvena brahma bhāvena ca asakṛt

original: BhP_10.03.045/3 cintayantau kṛta-snehau yāsyethe mad-gatiṃ parām
analyzed: cintayantau kṛta snehau yāsyethe mad gatim parām

original: BhP_10.03.046/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.03.046/1 ity uktvāsīd dharis tūṣṇīṃ bhagavān ātma-māyayā
analyzed: iti uktvā āsīt hariḥ tūṣṇīm bhagavān ātma māyayā

original: BhP_10.03.046/3 pitroḥ sampaśyatoḥ sadyo babhūva prākṛtaḥ śiśuḥ
analyzed: pitroḥ sampaśyatoḥ sadyas babhūva prākṛtaḥ śiśuḥ

original: BhP_10.03.047/1 tataś ca śaurir bhagavat-pracoditaḥ
analyzed: tatas ca śauriḥ bhagavat pracoditaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.047/2 sutaṃ samādāya sa sūtikā-gṛhāt
analyzed: sutam samādāya sa sūtikāgṛhāt

original: BhP_10.03.047/3 yadā bahir gantum iyeṣa tarhy ajā
analyzed: yadā bahis gantum iyeṣa tarhi ajā

original: BhP_10.03.047/4 yā yogamāyājani nanda-jāyayā
analyzed: yā yogamāyā ajani nanda jāyayā

original: BhP_10.03.048/1 tayā hṛta-pratyaya-sarva-vṛttiṣu dvāḥ-stheṣu paureṣv api śāyiteṣv atha
analyzed: tayā hṛta pratyaya sarva vṛttiṣu dvāḥstheṣu paureṣu api śāyiteṣu atha

original: BhP_10.03.048/3 dvāraś ca sarvāḥ pihitā duratyayā bṛhat-kapāṭāyasa-kīla-śṛṅkhalaiḥ
analyzed: dvāraḥ ca sarvāḥ pihitāḥ duratyayāḥ bṛhat kapāṭa āyasa kīla śṛṅkhalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.03.049/1 tāḥ kṛṣṇa-vāhe vasudeva āgate svayaṃ vyavaryanta yathā tamo raveḥ
analyzed: tāḥ kṛṣṇa vāhe vasudeve āgate svayam vyavaryanta yathā tamaḥ raveḥ

original: BhP_10.03.049/3 vavarṣa parjanya upāṃśu-garjitaḥ śeṣo 'nvagād vāri nivārayan phaṇaiḥ
analyzed: vavarṣa parjanyaḥ upāṃśu garjitaḥ śeṣaḥ nvagāt vāri nivārayan phaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.03.050/1 maghoni varṣaty asakṛd yamānujā gambhīra-toyaugha-javormi-phenilā
analyzed: maghoni varṣati asakṛt yama anujā gambhīra toya ogha java ūrmi phenilā

original: BhP_10.03.050/3 bhayānakāvarta-śatākulā nadī mārgaṃ dadau sindhur iva śriyaḥ pateḥ
analyzed: bhayānaka āvarta śata ākulā nadī mārgam dadau sindhuḥ iva śriyaḥ pateḥ

original: BhP_10.03.051/1 nanda-vrajaṃ śaurir upetya tatra tān
analyzed: nanda vrajam śauriḥ upetya tatra tān

original: BhP_10.03.051/2 gopān prasuptān upalabhya nidrayā
analyzed: gopān prasuptān upalabhya nidrayā

original: BhP_10.03.051/3 sutaṃ yaśodā-śayane nidhāya tat-
analyzed: sutam yaśodā śayane nidhāya tat

original: BhP_10.03.051/4 sutām upādāya punar gṛhān agāt
analyzed: sutām upādāya punar gṛhān agāt

original: BhP_10.03.052/1 devakyāḥ śayane nyasya vasudevo 'tha dārikām
analyzed: devakyāḥ śayane nyasya dārikām

original: BhP_10.03.052/3 pratimucya pador loham āste pūrvavad āvṛtaḥ
analyzed: pratimucya padoḥ loham āste pūrva vat āvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.03.053/1 yaśodā nanda-patnī ca jātaṃ param abudhyata
analyzed: yaśodā nanda patnī ca jātam param abudhyata

original: BhP_10.03.053/3 na tal-liṅgaṃ pariśrāntā nidrayāpagata-smṛtiḥ
analyzed: na tad liṅgam pariśrāntā nidrayā apagata smṛtiḥ

original: BhP_10.04.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.04.001/1 bahir-antaḥ-pura-dvāraḥ sarvāḥ pūrvavad āvṛtāḥ
analyzed: bahis antaḥpura dvāraḥ sarvāḥ pūrvavat āvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.001/3 tato bāla-dhvaniṃ śrutvā gṛha-pālāḥ samutthitāḥ
analyzed: tatas bāla dhvanim śrutvā gṛhapālāḥ samutthitāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.002/1 te tu tūrṇam upavrajya devakyā garbha-janma tat
analyzed: te tu tūrṇam upavrajya devakyāḥ garbha janma tat

original: BhP_10.04.002/3 ācakhyur bhoja-rājāya yad udvignaḥ pratīkṣate
analyzed: ācakhyuḥ bhojarājāya yat udvignaḥ pratīkṣate

original: BhP_10.04.003/1 sa talpāt tūrṇam utthāya kālo 'yam iti vihvalaḥ
analyzed: sa talpāt tūrṇam utthāya kālaḥ yam iti vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.003/3 sūtī-gṛham agāt tūrṇaṃ praskhalan mukta-mūrdhajaḥ
analyzed: sūtīgṛham agāt tūrṇam praskhalan mukta mūrdhajaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.004/1 tam āha bhrātaraṃ devī kṛpaṇā karuṇaṃ satī
analyzed: tam āha bhrātaram devī kṛpaṇā karuṇam satī

original: BhP_10.04.004/3 snuṣeyaṃ tava kalyāṇa striyaṃ mā hantum arhasi
analyzed: snuṣā iyam tava kalyāṇa striyam mā hantum arhasi

original: BhP_10.04.005/1 bahavo hiṃsitā bhrātaḥ śiśavaḥ pāvakopamāḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ hiṃsitāḥ bhrātar śiśavaḥ pāvaka upamāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.005/3 tvayā daiva-nisṛṣṭena putrikaikā pradīyatām
analyzed: tvayā daiva nisṛṣṭena putrikā ekā pradīyatām

original: BhP_10.04.006/1 nanv ahaṃ te hy avarajā dīnā hata-sutā prabho
analyzed: nanu aham te hi avarajā dīnā hata sutā prabho

original: BhP_10.04.006/3 dātum arhasi mandāyā aṅgemāṃ caramāṃ prajām
analyzed: dātum arhasi mandāyai aṅga imām caramām prajām

original: BhP_10.04.007/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.04.007/1 upaguhyātmajām evaṃ rudatyā dīna-dīnavat
analyzed: upaguhya ātmajām evam rudatyāḥ dīna dīna vat

original: BhP_10.04.007/3 yācitas tāṃ vinirbhartsya hastād ācicchide khalaḥ
analyzed: yācitaḥ tām vinirbhartsya hastāt ācit chide khalaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.008/1 tāṃ gṛhītvā caraṇayor jāta-mātrāṃ svasuḥ sutām
analyzed: tām gṛhītvā caraṇayoḥ jāta mātrām svasuḥ sutām

original: BhP_10.04.008/3 apothayac chilā-pṛṣṭhe svārthonmūlita-sauhṛdaḥ
analyzed: apothayat śilā pṛṣṭhe sva artha unmūlita sauhṛdaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.009/1 sā tad-dhastāt samutpatya sadyo devy ambaraṃ gatā
analyzed: sā tad hastāt samutpatya sadyas devī ambaram gatā

original: BhP_10.04.009/3 adṛśyatānujā viṣṇoḥ sāyudhāṣṭa-mahābhujā
analyzed: adṛśyata anujā viṣṇoḥ sa āyudhā aṣṭa mahā bhujā

original: BhP_10.04.010/1 divya-srag-ambarālepa- ratnābharaṇa-bhūṣitā
analyzed: divya sraj ambara ālepa ratna ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: BhP_10.04.010/3 dhanuḥ-śūleṣu-carmāsi- śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharā
analyzed: dhanuḥ śūla iṣu carmā asi śaṅkha cakra gadā dharā

original: BhP_10.04.011/1 siddha-cāraṇa-gandharvair apsaraḥ-kinnaroragaiḥ
analyzed: siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ apsaraḥ kinnara uragaiḥ

original: BhP_10.04.011/3 upāhṛtoru-balibhiḥ stūyamānedam abravīt
analyzed: upāhṛta uru balibhiḥ stūyamānā idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.04.012/1 kiṃ mayā hatayā manda jātaḥ khalu tavānta-kṛt
analyzed: kim mayā hatayā manda jātaḥ khalu tava antakṛt

original: BhP_10.04.012/3 yatra kva vā pūrva-śatrur mā hiṃsīḥ kṛpaṇān vṛthā
analyzed: yatra kva vā pūrva śatruḥ mā hiṃsīḥ kṛpaṇān vṛthā

original: BhP_10.04.013/1 iti prabhāṣya taṃ devī māyā bhagavatī bhuvi
analyzed: iti prabhāṣya tam devī māyā bhagavatī bhuvi

original: BhP_10.04.013/3 bahu-nāma-niketeṣu bahu-nāmā babhūva ha
analyzed: bahu nāma niketeṣu bahu nāmā babhūva ha

original: BhP_10.04.014/1 tayābhihitam ākarṇya kaṃsaḥ parama-vismitaḥ
analyzed: tayā abhihitam ākarṇya kaṃsaḥ parama vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.014/3 devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca vimucya praśrito 'bravīt
analyzed: devakīm vasudevam ca vimucya praśritaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_10.04.015/1 aho bhaginy aho bhāma mayā vāṃ bata pāpmanā
analyzed: aho bhagini aho bhāma mayā vām bata pāpmanā

original: BhP_10.04.015/3 puruṣāda ivāpatyaṃ bahavo hiṃsitāḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: puruṣādaḥ iva apatyam bahavaḥ hiṃsitāḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.016/1 sa tv ahaṃ tyakta-kāruṇyas tyakta-jñāti-suhṛt khalaḥ
analyzed: sa tu aham tyakta kāruṇyaḥ tyakta jñāti suhṛd khalaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.016/3 kān lokān vai gamiṣyāmi brahma-heva mṛtaḥ śvasan
analyzed: kān lokān vai gamiṣyāmi brahma hā iva mṛtaḥ śvasan

original: BhP_10.04.017/1 daivam apy anṛtaṃ vakti na martyā eva kevalam
analyzed: daivam api anṛtam vakti na martyāḥ eva kevalam

original: BhP_10.04.017/3 yad-viśrambhād ahaṃ pāpaḥ svasur nihatavāñ chiśūn
analyzed: yad viśrambhāt aham pāpaḥ svasuḥ nihatavān śiśūn

original: BhP_10.04.018/1 mā śocataṃ mahā-bhāgāv ātmajān sva-kṛtaṃ bhujaḥ
analyzed: mā śocatam mahābhāgau ātmajān sva kṛtam bhujaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.018/3 jāntavo na sadaikatra daivādhīnās tadāsate
analyzed: na sadā ekatra daiva adhīnāḥ tat āsate

original: BhP_10.04.019/1 bhuvi bhaumāni bhūtāni yathā yānty apayānti ca
analyzed: bhuvi bhaumāni bhūtāni yathā yānti apayānti ca

original: BhP_10.04.019/3 nāyam ātmā tathaiteṣu viparyeti yathaiva bhūḥ
analyzed: na ayam ātmā tathā eteṣu viparyeti yathā eva bhūḥ

original: BhP_10.04.020/1 yathānevaṃ-vido bhedo yata ātma-viparyayaḥ
analyzed: yathā anevaṃvidaḥ bhedaḥ yatas ātma viparyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.020/3 deha-yoga-viyogau ca saṃsṛtir na nivartate
analyzed: deha yoga viyogau ca saṃsṛtiḥ na nivartate

original: BhP_10.04.021/1 tasmād bhadre sva-tanayān mayā vyāpāditān api
analyzed: tasmāt bhadre sva tanayān mayā vyāpāditān api

original: BhP_10.04.021/3 mānuśoca yataḥ sarvaḥ sva-kṛtaṃ vindate 'vaśaḥ
analyzed: mā anuśoca yatas sarvaḥ sva kṛtam vindate vaśaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.022/1 yāvad dhato 'smi hantāsmī- ty ātmānaṃ manyate 'sva-dṛk
analyzed: yāvat hataḥ smi hantāsmi iti ātmānam manyate svadṛś

original: BhP_10.04.022/3 tāvat tad-abhimāny ajño bādhya-bādhakatām iyāt
analyzed: tāvat tad abhimānī ajñaḥ bādhya bādhaka tām iyāt

original: BhP_10.04.023/1 kṣamadhvaṃ mama daurātmyaṃ sādhavo dīna-vatsalāḥ
analyzed: kṣamadhvam mama daurātmyam sādhavaḥ dīna vatsalāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.023/3 ity uktvāśru-mukhaḥ pādau śyālaḥ svasror athāgrahīt
analyzed: iti uktvā aśru mukhaḥ pādau śyālaḥ svasroḥ atha agrahīt

original: BhP_10.04.024/1 mocayām āsa nigaḍād viśrabdhaḥ kanyakā-girā
analyzed: mocayām āsa nigaḍāt viśrabdhaḥ kanyakā girā

original: BhP_10.04.024/3 devakīṃ vasudevaṃ ca darśayann ātma-sauhṛdam
analyzed: devakīm vasudevam ca darśayan ātma sauhṛdam

original: BhP_10.04.025/1 bhrātuḥ samanutaptasya kṣānta-roṣā ca devakī
analyzed: bhrātuḥ samanutaptasya kṣānta roṣā ca devakī

original: BhP_10.04.025/3 vyasṛjad vasudevaś ca prahasya tam uvāca ha
analyzed: vyasṛjat vasudevaḥ ca prahasya tam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.04.026/1 evam etan mahā-bhāga yathā vadasi dehinām
analyzed: evam etat mahābhāga yathā vadasi dehinām

original: BhP_10.04.026/3 ajñāna-prabhavāhaṃ-dhīḥ sva-pareti bhidā yataḥ
analyzed: ajñāna prabhavā ahaṃdhīḥ sva parā iti bhidā yatas

original: BhP_10.04.027/1 śoka-harṣa-bhaya-dveṣa- lobha-moha-madānvitāḥ
analyzed: śoka harṣa bhaya dveṣa lobha moha mada anvitāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.027/3 mitho ghnantaṃ na paśyanti bhāvair bhāvaṃ pṛthag-dṛśaḥ
analyzed: mithas ghnantam na paśyanti bhāvaiḥ bhāvam pṛthak dṛśaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.028/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.04.028/1 kaṃsa evaṃ prasannābhyāṃ viśuddhaṃ pratibhāṣitaḥ
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ evam prasannābhyām viśuddham pratibhāṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.028/3 devakī-vasudevābhyām anujñāto 'viśad gṛham
analyzed: devakī vasudevābhyām anujñātaḥ viśat gṛham

original: BhP_10.04.029/1 tasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ kaṃsa āhūya mantriṇaḥ
analyzed: tasyām rātryām vyatītāyām kaṃsaḥ āhūya mantriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.029/3 tebhya ācaṣṭa tat sarvaṃ yad uktaṃ yoga-nidrayā
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ācaṣṭa tat sarvam yat uktam yoganidrayā

original: BhP_10.04.030/1 ākarṇya bhartur gaditaṃ tam ūcur deva-śatravaḥ
analyzed: ākarṇya bhartuḥ gaditam tam ūcuḥ deva śatravaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.030/3 devān prati kṛtāmarṣā daiteyā nāti-kovidāḥ
analyzed: devān prati kṛta āmarṣāḥ daiteyāḥ na ati kovidāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.031/1 evaṃ cet tarhi bhojendra pura-grāma-vrajādiṣu
analyzed: evam ced tarhi bhoja indra pura grāma vraja ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.04.031/3 anirdaśān nirdaśāṃś ca haniṣyāmo 'dya vai śiśūn
analyzed: anirdaśān nirdaśān ca haniṣyāmaḥ vai śiśūn

original: BhP_10.04.032/1 kim udyamaiḥ kariṣyanti devāḥ samara-bhīravaḥ
analyzed: kim udyamaiḥ kariṣyanti devāḥ samara bhīravaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.032/3 nityam udvigna-manaso jyā-ghoṣair dhanuṣas tava
analyzed: nityam udvigna manasaḥ jyā ghoṣaiḥ dhanuṣaḥ tava

original: BhP_10.04.033/1 asyatas te śara-vrātair hanyamānāḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: asyataḥ te śara vrātaiḥ hanyamānāḥ samantataḥ

original: BhP_10.04.033/3 jijīviṣava utsṛjya palāyana-parā yayuḥ
analyzed: jijīviṣavaḥ utsṛjya palāyana parāḥ yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.04.034/1 kecit prāñjalayo dīnā nyasta-śastrā divaukasaḥ
analyzed: kecid prāñjalayaḥ dīnāḥ nyasta śastrāḥ divaukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.034/3 mukta-kaccha-śikhāḥ kecid bhītāḥ sma iti vādinaḥ
analyzed: mukta kaccha śikhāḥ kecid bhītāḥ smaḥ iti vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.035/1 na tvaṃ vismṛta-śastrāstrān virathān bhaya-saṃvṛtān
analyzed: na tvam vismṛta śastra astrān virathān bhaya saṃvṛtān

original: BhP_10.04.035/3 haṃsy anyāsakta-vimukhān bhagna-cāpān ayudhyataḥ
analyzed: haṃsi anya āsakta vimukhān bhagna cāpān ayudhyataḥ

original: BhP_10.04.036/1 kiṃ kṣema-śūrair vibudhair asaṃyuga-vikatthanaiḥ
analyzed: kim kṣemaśūraiḥ vibudhaiḥ a saṃyuga vikatthanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.04.036/3 raho-juṣā kiṃ hariṇā śambhunā vā vanaukasā
analyzed: rahaḥ juṣā kim hariṇā śambhunā vā vanaukasā

original: BhP_10.04.036/5 kim indreṇālpa-vīryeṇa brahmaṇā vā tapasyatā
analyzed: kim indreṇa alpa vīryeṇa brahmaṇā vā tapasyatā

original: BhP_10.04.037/1 tathāpi devāḥ sāpatnyān nopekṣyā iti manmahe
analyzed: tathā api devāḥ sāpatnyāt na upekṣyāḥ iti manmahe

original: BhP_10.04.037/3 tatas tan-mūla-khanane niyuṅkṣvāsmān anuvratān
analyzed: tatas tad mūla khanane niyuṅkṣva asmān anuvratān

original: BhP_10.04.038/1 yathāmayo 'ṅge samupekṣito nṛbhir na śakyate rūḍha-padaś cikitsitum
analyzed: yathā āmayaḥ ṅge samupekṣitaḥ nṛbhiḥ na śakyate rūḍha padaḥ cikitsitum

original: BhP_10.04.038/3 yathendriya-grāma upekṣitas tathā ripur mahān baddha-balo na cālyate
analyzed: yathā indriya grāmaḥ upekṣitaḥ tathā ripuḥ mahān baddha balaḥ na cālyate

original: BhP_10.04.039/1 mūlaṃ hi viṣṇur devānāṃ yatra dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: mūlam hi viṣṇuḥ devānām yatra dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.039/3 tasya ca brahma-go-viprās tapo yajñāḥ sa-dakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: tasya ca brahma go viprāḥ tapaḥ yajñāḥ sa dakṣiṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.040/1 tasmāt sarvātmanā rājan brāhmaṇān brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt sarva ātmanā rājan brāhmaṇān brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.040/3 tapasvino yajña-śīlān gāś ca hanmo havir-dughāḥ
analyzed: tapasvinaḥ yajña śīlān gāḥ ca hanmaḥ haviḥ dughāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.041/1 viprā gāvaś ca vedāś ca tapaḥ satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
analyzed: viprāḥ gāvaḥ ca vedāḥ ca tapaḥ satyam damaḥ śamaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.041/3 śraddhā dayā titikṣā ca kratavaś ca hares tanūḥ
analyzed: śraddhā dayā titikṣā ca kratavaḥ ca hareḥ tanūḥ

original: BhP_10.04.042/1 sa hi sarva-surādhyakṣo hy asura-dviḍ guhā-śayaḥ
analyzed: sa hi sarva sura adhyakṣaḥ hi asura dviṣ guhā āśayaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.042/3 tan-mūlā devatāḥ sarvāḥ seśvarāḥ sa-catur-mukhāḥ
analyzed: tad mūlāḥ devatāḥ sarvāḥ sa īśvarāḥ sa caturmukhāḥ

original: BhP_10.04.042/5 ayaṃ vai tad-vadhopāyo yad ṛṣīṇāṃ vihiṃsanam
analyzed: ayam vai tad vadha upāyaḥ yat ṛṣīṇām vihiṃsanam

original: BhP_10.04.043/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.04.043/1 evaṃ durmantribhiḥ kaṃsaḥ saha sammantrya durmatiḥ
analyzed: evam durmantribhiḥ kaṃsaḥ saha sammantrya durmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.04.043/3 brahma-hiṃsāṃ hitaṃ mene kāla-pāśāvṛto 'suraḥ
analyzed: brahma hiṃsām hitam mene suraḥ

original: BhP_10.04.044/1 sandiśya sādhu-lokasya kadane kadana-priyān
analyzed: sandiśya sādhu lokasya kadane kadana priyān

original: BhP_10.04.044/3 kāma-rūpa-dharān dikṣu dānavān gṛham āviśat
analyzed: kāma rūpa dharān dikṣu dānavān gṛham āviśat

original: BhP_10.04.045/1 te vai rajaḥ-prakṛtayas tamasā mūḍha-cetasaḥ
analyzed: te vai rajaḥ prakṛtayaḥ tamasā mūḍha cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.045/3 satāṃ vidveṣam ācerur ārād āgata-mṛtyavaḥ
analyzed: satām vidveṣam āceruḥ ārāt āgata mṛtyavaḥ

original: BhP_10.04.046/1 āyuḥ śriyaṃ yaśo dharmaṃ lokān āśiṣa eva ca
analyzed: āyuḥ śriyam yaśaḥ dharmam lokān āśiṣaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.04.046/3 hanti śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi puṃso mahad-atikramaḥ
analyzed: hanti śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi puṃsaḥ mahat atikramaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.05.001/1 nandas tv ātmaja utpanne jātāhlādo mahā-manāḥ
analyzed: nandaḥ tu ātmajaḥ utpanne jāta āhlādaḥ mahāmanāḥ

original: BhP_10.05.001/3 āhūya viprān veda-jñān snātaḥ śucir alaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: āhūya viprān veda jñān snātaḥ śuciḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.002/1 vācayitvā svastyayanaṃ jāta-karmātmajasya vai
analyzed: vācayitvā svastyayanam jātakarma ātmajasya vai

original: BhP_10.05.002/3 kārayām āsa vidhivat pitṛ-devārcanaṃ tathā
analyzed: kārayām āsa vidhivat pitṛ deva arcanam tathā

original: BhP_10.05.003/1 dhenūnāṃ niyute prādād viprebhyaḥ samalaṅkṛte
analyzed: dhenūnām niyute prādāt viprebhyaḥ samalaṅkṛte

original: BhP_10.05.003/3 tilādrīn sapta ratnaugha- śātakaumbhāmbarāvṛtān
analyzed: tila adrīn sapta ratna ogha śātakaumbha ambara āvṛtān

original: BhP_10.05.004/1 kālena snāna-śaucābhyāṃ saṃskārais tapasejyayā
analyzed: kālena snāna śaucābhyām saṃskāraiḥ tapasā ijyayā

original: BhP_10.05.004/3 śudhyanti dānaiḥ santuṣṭyā dravyāṇy ātmātma-vidyayā
analyzed: śudhyanti dānaiḥ santuṣṭyā dravyāṇi ātma ātma vidyayā

original: BhP_10.05.005/1 saumaṅgalya-giro viprāḥ sūta-māgadha-vandinaḥ
analyzed: saumaṅgalya giraḥ viprāḥ sūta māgadha vandinaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.005/3 gāyakāś ca jagur nedur bheryo dundubhayo muhuḥ
analyzed: gāyakāḥ ca jaguḥ neduḥ bheryaḥ dundubhayaḥ muhur

original: BhP_10.05.006/1 vrajaḥ sammṛṣṭa-saṃsikta- dvārājira-gṛhāntaraḥ
analyzed: vrajaḥ sammṛṣṭa saṃsikta dvāra ajira gṛha antaraḥ

original: BhP_10.05.006/3 citra-dhvaja-patākā-srak- caila-pallava-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: citra dhvaja patākā sraj caila pallava toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.05.007/1 gāvo vṛṣā vatsatarā haridrā-taila-rūṣitāḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ vṛṣāḥ vatsatarāḥ haridrā taila rūṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.05.007/3 vicitra-dhātu-barhasrag- vastra-kāñcana-mālinaḥ
BhP_10.05.008/1 mahārha-vastrābharaṇa- kañcukoṣṇīṣa-bhūṣitāḥ
BhP_10.05.008/3 gopāḥ samāyayū rājan nānopāyana-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: gopāḥ samāyayuḥ rājan nānā upāyana pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.009/1 gopyaś cākarṇya muditā yaśodāyāḥ sutodbhavam
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca ākarṇya muditāḥ yaśodāyāḥ suta udbhavam

original: BhP_10.05.009/3 ātmānaṃ bhūṣayāṃ cakrur vastrākalpāñjanādibhiḥ
analyzed: ātmānam vastra ākalpa añjana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.05.010/1 nava-kuṅkuma-kiñjalka- mukha-paṅkaja-bhūtayaḥ
BhP_10.05.010/3 balibhis tvaritaṃ jagmuḥ pṛthu-śroṇyaś calat-kucāḥ
analyzed: balibhiḥ tvaritam jagmuḥ pṛthu śroṇyaḥ calat kucāḥ

original: BhP_10.05.011/1 gopyaḥ sumṛṣṭa-maṇi-kuṇḍala-niṣka-kaṇṭhyaś
analyzed: gopyaḥ su mṛṣṭa maṇi kuṇḍala niṣka kaṇṭhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.011/2 citrāmbarāḥ pathi śikhā-cyuta-mālya-varṣāḥ
analyzed: citra ambarāḥ pathi śikhā cyuta mālya varṣāḥ

original: BhP_10.05.011/3 nandālayaṃ sa-valayā vrajatīr virejur
analyzed: nanda ālayam sa valayāḥ vrajatīḥ virejuḥ

original: BhP_10.05.011/4 vyālola-kuṇḍala-payodhara-hāra-śobhāḥ
analyzed: vyālola kuṇḍala payodhara hāra śobhāḥ

original: BhP_10.05.012/1 tā āśiṣaḥ prayuñjānāś ciraṃ pāhīti bālake
analyzed: tāḥ āśiṣaḥ prayuñjānāḥ ciram pāhi iti bālake

original: BhP_10.05.012/3 haridrā-cūrṇa-tailādbhiḥ siñcantyo 'janam ujjaguḥ
analyzed: haridrā cūrṇa taila adbhiḥ siñcantyaḥ janam ujjaguḥ

original: BhP_10.05.013/1 avādyanta vicitrāṇi vāditrāṇi mahotsave
analyzed: avādyanta vicitrāṇi vāditrāṇi mahā utsave

original: BhP_10.05.013/3 kṛṣṇe viśveśvare 'nante nandasya vrajam āgate
analyzed: kṛṣṇe viśveśvare nante nandasya vrajam āgate

original: BhP_10.05.014/1 gopāḥ parasparaṃ hṛṣṭā dadhi-kṣīra-ghṛtāmbubhiḥ
analyzed: gopāḥ parasparam hṛṣṭāḥ dadhi kṣīra ghṛta ambuṣu

original: BhP_10.05.014/3 āsiñcanto vilimpanto navanītaiś ca cikṣipuḥ
analyzed: āsiñcantaḥ vilimpantaḥ navanītaiḥ ca cikṣipuḥ

original: BhP_10.05.015/1 nando mahā-manās tebhyo vāso 'laṅkāra-go-dhanam
analyzed: nandaḥ mahāmanāḥ tebhyaḥ vāsaḥ laṅkāra go dhanam

original: BhP_10.05.015/3 sūta-māgadha-vandibhyo ye 'nye vidyopajīvinaḥ
analyzed: sūta māgadha vandibhyaḥ ye nye vidyā upajīvinaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.016/1 tais taiḥ kāmair adīnātmā yathocitam apūjayat
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ kāmaiḥ adīna ātmā yathocitam apūjayat

original: BhP_10.05.016/3 viṣṇor ārādhanārthāya sva-putrasyodayāya ca
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ ārādhana arthāya sva putrasya udayāya ca

original: BhP_10.05.017/1 rohiṇī ca mahā-bhāgā nanda-gopābhinanditā
analyzed: rohiṇī ca mahābhāgā nanda gopa abhinanditā

original: BhP_10.05.017/3 vyacarad divya-vāsa-srak- kaṇṭhābharaṇa-bhūṣitā
analyzed: vyacarat divya vāsa sraj kaṇṭha ābharaṇa bhūṣitā

original: BhP_10.05.018/1 tata ārabhya nandasya vrajaḥ sarva-samṛddhimān
analyzed: tatas ārabhya nandasya vrajaḥ sarva samṛddhimān

original: BhP_10.05.018/3 harer nivāsātma-guṇai ramākrīḍam abhūn nṛpa
analyzed: hareḥ nivāsa ātma guṇaiḥ ramā krīḍam abhūt nṛpa

original: BhP_10.05.019/1 gopān gokula-rakṣāyāṃ nirūpya mathurāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: gopān go kula rakṣāyām nirūpya mathurām gataḥ

original: BhP_10.05.019/3 nandaḥ kaṃsasya vārṣikyaṃ karaṃ dātuṃ kurūdvaha
analyzed: nandaḥ kaṃsasya vārṣikyam karam dātum kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.05.020/1 vasudeva upaśrutya bhrātaraṃ nandam āgatam
analyzed: vasudevaḥ upaśrutya bhrātaram nandam āgatam

original: BhP_10.05.020/3 jñātvā datta-karaṃ rājñe yayau tad-avamocanam
analyzed: jñātvā datta karam rājñe yayau tad avamocanam

original: BhP_10.05.021/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya dehaḥ prāṇam ivāgatam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya dehaḥ prāṇam iva āgatam

original: BhP_10.05.021/3 prītaḥ priyatamaṃ dorbhyāṃ sasvaje prema-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ priyatamam dorbhyām sasvaje prema vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.022/1 pūjitaḥ sukham āsīnaḥ pṛṣṭvānāmayam ādṛtaḥ
analyzed: pūjitaḥ sukham āsīnaḥ pṛṣṭvā anāmayam ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.022/3 prasakta-dhīḥ svātmajayor idam āha viśāmpate
analyzed: prasakta dhīḥ sva ātmajayoḥ idam āha viśām pate

original: BhP_10.05.023/1 diṣṭyā bhrātaḥ pravayasa idānīm aprajasya te
analyzed: diṣṭyā bhrātar pravayasaḥ idānīm aprajasya te

original: BhP_10.05.023/3 prajāśāyā nivṛttasya prajā yat samapadyata
analyzed: prajā śāyāḥ nivṛttasya prajā yat samapadyata

original: BhP_10.05.024/1 diṣṭyā saṃsāra-cakre 'smin vartamānaḥ punar-bhavaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā saṃsāra cakre smin vartamānaḥ punarbhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.024/3 upalabdho bhavān adya durlabhaṃ priya-darśanam
analyzed: upalabdhaḥ bhavān adya durlabham priya darśanam

original: BhP_10.05.025/1 naikatra priya-saṃvāsaḥ suhṛdāṃ citra-karmaṇām
analyzed: na ekatra priya saṃvāsaḥ suhṛdām citra karmaṇām

original: BhP_10.05.025/3 oghena vyūhyamānānāṃ plavānāṃ srotaso yathā
analyzed: oghena vyūhyamānānām plavānām srotasaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.05.026/1 kaccit paśavyaṃ nirujaṃ bhūry-ambu-tṛṇa-vīrudham
analyzed: kaccit paśavyam nirujam bhūri ambu tṛṇa vīrudham

original: BhP_10.05.026/3 bṛhad vanaṃ tad adhunā yatrāsse tvaṃ suhṛd-vṛtaḥ
analyzed: bṛhat vanam tat adhunā yatra āsse tvam suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.027/1 bhrātar mama sutaḥ kaccin mātrā saha bhavad-vraje
analyzed: bhrātar mama sutaḥ kaccit mātrā saha bhavat vraje

original: BhP_10.05.027/3 tātaṃ bhavantaṃ manvāno bhavadbhyām upalālitaḥ
analyzed: tātam bhavantam manvānaḥ bhavadbhyām upalālitaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.028/1 puṃsas tri-vargo vihitaḥ suhṛdo hy anubhāvitaḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ trivargaḥ vihitaḥ suhṛdaḥ hi anubhāvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.028/3 na teṣu kliśyamāneṣu tri-vargo 'rthāya kalpate
analyzed: na teṣu kliśyamāneṣu trivargaḥ rthāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.05.029/0 śrī-nanda uvāca
analyzed: śrī nandaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.05.029/1 aho te devakī-putrāḥ kaṃsena bahavo hatāḥ
analyzed: aho te devakīputrāḥ kaṃsena bahavaḥ hatāḥ

original: BhP_10.05.029/3 ekāvaśiṣṭāvarajā kanyā sāpi divaṃ gatā
analyzed: eka avaśiṣṭa avarajā kanyā sā api divam gatā

original: BhP_10.05.030/1 nūnaṃ hy adṛṣṭa-niṣṭho 'yam adṛṣṭa-paramo janaḥ
analyzed: nūnam hi adṛṣṭa niṣṭhaḥ yam adṛṣṭa paramaḥ janaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.030/3 adṛṣṭam ātmanas tattvaṃ yo veda na sa muhyati
analyzed: adṛṣṭam ātmanaḥ tattvam yaḥ veda na sa muhyati

original: BhP_10.05.031/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.05.031/1 karo vai vārṣiko datto rājñe dṛṣṭā vayaṃ ca vaḥ
analyzed: karaḥ vai vārṣikaḥ dattaḥ rājñe dṛṣṭāḥ vayam ca vaḥ

original: BhP_10.05.031/3 neha stheyaṃ bahu-tithaṃ santy utpātāś ca gokule
analyzed: na iha stheyam bahutitham santi utpātāḥ ca gokule

original: BhP_10.05.032/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.05.032/1 iti nandādayo gopāḥ proktās te śauriṇā yayuḥ
analyzed: iti nanda ādayaḥ gopāḥ proktāḥ te śauriṇā yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.05.032/3 anobhir anaḍud-yuktais tam anujñāpya gokulam
analyzed: anobhiḥ anaḍuh yuktaiḥ tam anujñāpya gokulam

original: BhP_10.06.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.06.001/1 nandaḥ pathi vacaḥ śaurer na mṛṣeti vicintayan
analyzed: nandaḥ pathi vacaḥ śaureḥ na mṛṣā iti vicintayan

original: BhP_10.06.001/3 hariṃ jagāma śaraṇam utpātāgama-śaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: harim jagāma śaraṇam utpāta āgama śaṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.002/1 kaṃsena prahitā ghorā pūtanā bāla-ghātinī
analyzed: kaṃsena prahitā ghorā pūtanā bāla ghātinī

original: BhP_10.06.002/3 śiśūṃś cacāra nighnantī pura-grāma-vrajādiṣu
analyzed: śiśūn cacāra nighnantī pura grāma vraja ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.06.003/1 na yatra śravaṇādīni rakṣo-ghnāni sva-karmasu
analyzed: na yatra śravaṇa ādīni rakṣaḥ ghnāni sva karmasu

original: BhP_10.06.003/3 kurvanti sātvatāṃ bhartur yātudhānyaś ca tatra hi
analyzed: kurvanti sātvatām bhartuḥ yātudhānyaḥ ca tatra hi

original: BhP_10.06.004/1 sā khe-cary ekadotpatya pūtanā nanda-gokulam
analyzed: sā khecarī ekadā utpatya pūtanā nanda gokulam

original: BhP_10.06.004/3 yoṣitvā māyayātmānaṃ prāviśat kāma-cāriṇī
analyzed: yoṣitvā māyayā ātmānam prāviśat kāma cāriṇī

original: BhP_10.06.005/1 tāṃ keśa-bandha-vyatiṣakta-mallikāṃ
analyzed: tām keśa bandha vyatiṣakta mallikām

original: BhP_10.06.005/2 bṛhan-nitamba-stana-kṛcchra-madhyamām
analyzed: bṛhat nitamba stanakṛcchra madhyamām

original: BhP_10.06.005/3 suvāsasaṃ kalpita-karṇa-bhūṣaṇa-
analyzed: su vāsasam kalpita karṇabhūṣaṇa

original: BhP_10.06.005/4 tviṣollasat-kuntala-maṇḍitānanām
analyzed: tviṣā ullasat kuntala maṇḍita ānanām

original: BhP_10.06.006/1 valgu-smitāpāṅga-visarga-vīkṣitair
analyzed: valgu smita apāṅga visarga vīkṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.06.006/2 mano harantīṃ vanitāṃ vrajaukasām
analyzed: manaḥ harantīm vanitām vrajaukasām

original: BhP_10.06.006/3 amaṃsatāmbhoja-kareṇa rūpiṇīṃ
analyzed: amaṃsata ambhoja kareṇa rūpiṇīm

original: BhP_10.06.006/4 gopyaḥ śriyaṃ draṣṭum ivāgatāṃ patim
analyzed: gopyaḥ śriyam draṣṭum iva āgatām patim

original: BhP_10.06.007/1 bāla-grahas tatra vicinvatī śiśūn yadṛcchayā nanda-gṛhe 'sad-antakam
analyzed: bālagrahaḥ tatra vicinvatī śiśūn yadṛcchayā nanda gṛhe sa dantakam

original: BhP_10.06.007/3 bālaṃ praticchanna-nijoru-tejasaṃ dadarśa talpe 'gnim ivāhitaṃ bhasi
analyzed: bālam praticchanna nija uru tejasam dadarśa talpe gnim iva āhitam bhasi

original: BhP_10.06.008/1 vibudhya tāṃ bālaka-mārikā-grahaṃ carācarātmā sa nimīlitekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: vibudhya tām bālaka mārikā graham carācara ātmā sa nimīlita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.008/3 anantam āropayad aṅkam antakaṃ yathoragaṃ suptam abuddhi-rajju-dhīḥ
analyzed: anantam āropayat aṅkam antakam yathā uragam suptam a buddhi rajju dhīḥ

original: BhP_10.06.009/1 tāṃ tīkṣṇa-cittām ativāma-ceṣṭitāṃ vīkṣyāntarā koṣa-paricchadāsivat
analyzed: tām tīkṣṇa cittām ati vāma ceṣṭitām vīkṣya antarā koṣa paricchada asi vat

original: BhP_10.06.009/3 vara-striyaṃ tat-prabhayā ca dharṣite nirīkṣyamāṇe jananī hy atiṣṭhatām
analyzed: vara striyam tad prabhayā ca dharṣite nirīkṣyamāṇe jananī hi atiṣṭhatām

original: BhP_10.06.010/1 tasmin stanaṃ durjara-vīryam ulbaṇaṃ
analyzed: tasmin stanam durjara vīryam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.06.010/2 ghorāṅkam ādāya śiśor dadāv atha
analyzed: ghora aṅkam ādāya śiśoḥ dadau atha

original: BhP_10.06.010/3 gāḍhaṃ karābhyāṃ bhagavān prapīḍya tat-
analyzed: gāḍham karābhyām bhagavān prapīḍya tat

original: BhP_10.06.010/4 prāṇaiḥ samaṃ roṣa-samanvito 'pibat
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ samam roṣa samanvitaḥ pibat

original: BhP_10.06.011/1 sā muñca muñcālam iti prabhāṣiṇī niṣpīḍyamānākhila-jīva-marmaṇi
analyzed: sā muñca muñca alam iti prabhāṣiṇī niṣpīḍyamāna akhila jīva marmaṇi

original: BhP_10.06.011/3 vivṛtya netre caraṇau bhujau muhuḥ prasvinna-gātrā kṣipatī ruroda ha
analyzed: vivṛtya netre caraṇau bhujau muhur prasvinna gātrā kṣipatī ruroda ha

original: BhP_10.06.012/1 tasyāḥ svanenātigabhīra-raṃhasā sādrir mahī dyauś ca cacāla sa-grahā
analyzed: tasyāḥ svanena ati gabhīra raṃhasā sa adriḥ mahī dyauḥ ca cacāla sa grahā

original: BhP_10.06.012/3 rasā diśaś ca pratinedire janāḥ petuḥ kṣitau vajra-nipāta-śaṅkayā
analyzed: rasāḥ diśaḥ ca pratinedire janāḥ petuḥ kṣitau vajra nipāta śaṅkayā

original: BhP_10.06.013/1 niśā-carītthaṃ vyathita-stanā vyasur
analyzed: niśācari ittham vyathita stanā vyasuḥ

original: BhP_10.06.013/2 vyādāya keśāṃś caraṇau bhujāv api
analyzed: vyādāya keśān caraṇau bhujau api

original: BhP_10.06.013/3 prasārya goṣṭhe nija-rūpam āsthitā
analyzed: prasārya goṣṭhe nija rūpam āsthitā

original: BhP_10.06.013/4 vajrāhato vṛtra ivāpatan nṛpa
analyzed: vajra āhataḥ vṛtraḥ iva apatat nṛpa

original: BhP_10.06.014/1 patamāno 'pi tad-dehas tri-gavyūty-antara-drumān
analyzed: patamānaḥ pi tad dehaḥ tri gavyūti antara drumān

original: BhP_10.06.014/3 cūrṇayām āsa rājendra mahad āsīt tad adbhutam
analyzed: cūrṇayām āsa rāja indra mahat āsīt tat adbhutam

original: BhP_10.06.015/1 īṣā-mātrogra-daṃṣṭrāsyaṃ giri-kandara-nāsikam
analyzed: īṣā mātra ugra daṃṣṭra āsyam giri kandara nāsikam

original: BhP_10.06.015/3 gaṇḍa-śaila-stanaṃ raudraṃ prakīrṇāruṇa-mūrdhajam
analyzed: gaṇḍaśaila stanam raudram prakīrṇa aruṇa mūrdhajam

original: BhP_10.06.016/1 andha-kūpa-gabhīrākṣaṃ pulināroha-bhīṣaṇam
analyzed: andhakūpa gabhīra akṣam pulina āroha bhīṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.06.016/3 baddha-setu-bhujorv-aṅghri śūnya-toya-hradodaram
analyzed: baddha setu bhuja ūru aṅghri śūnya toya hrada udaram

original: BhP_10.06.017/1 santatrasuḥ sma tad vīkṣya gopā gopyaḥ kalevaram
analyzed: santatrasuḥ sma tat vīkṣya gopāḥ gopyaḥ kalevaram

original: BhP_10.06.017/3 pūrvaṃ tu tan-niḥsvanita- bhinna-hṛt-karṇa-mastakāḥ
analyzed: pūrvam tu tad niḥsvanita bhinna hṛd karṇa mastakāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.018/1 bālaṃ ca tasyā urasi krīḍantam akutobhayam
analyzed: bālam ca tasyāḥ urasi krīḍantam akutobhayam

original: BhP_10.06.018/3 gopyas tūrṇaṃ samabhyetya jagṛhur jāta-sambhramāḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ tūrṇam samabhyetya jagṛhuḥ jāta sambhramāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.019/1 yaśodā-rohiṇībhyāṃ tāḥ samaṃ bālasya sarvataḥ
analyzed: yaśodā rohiṇībhyām tāḥ samam bālasya sarvatas

original: BhP_10.06.019/3 rakṣāṃ vidadhire samyag go-puccha-bhramaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: rakṣām vidadhire samyak go puccha bhramaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.06.020/1 go-mūtreṇa snāpayitvā punar go-rajasārbhakam
analyzed: go mūtreṇa snāpayitvā punar go rajasā arbhakam

original: BhP_10.06.020/3 rakṣāṃ cakruś ca śakṛtā dvādaśāṅgeṣu nāmabhiḥ
analyzed: rakṣām cakruḥ ca śakṛtā dvādaśa aṅgeṣu nāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.06.021/1 gopyaḥ saṃspṛṣṭa-salilā aṅgeṣu karayoḥ pṛthak
analyzed: gopyaḥ saṃspṛṣṭa salilāḥ aṅgeṣu karayoḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_10.06.021/3 nyasyātmany atha bālasya bīja-nyāsam akurvata
analyzed: nyasya ātmani atha bālasya bījanyāsam akurvata

original: BhP_10.06.022/1 avyād ajo 'ṅghri maṇimāṃs tava jānv athorū
analyzed: avyāt ajaḥ ṅghri maṇimān tava jānū atha ūrū

original: BhP_10.06.022/2 yajño 'cyutaḥ kaṭi-taṭaṃ jaṭharaṃ hayāsyaḥ
analyzed: yajñaḥ cyutaḥ kaṭi taṭam jaṭharam haya āsyaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.022/3 hṛt keśavas tvad-ura īśa inas tu kaṇṭhaṃ
analyzed: hṛd keśavaḥ tvat uraḥ īśe inaḥ tu kaṇṭham

original: BhP_10.06.022/4 viṣṇur bhujaṃ mukham urukrama īśvaraḥ kam
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ bhujam mukham urukramaḥ īśvaraḥ kam

original: BhP_10.06.023/1 cakry agrataḥ saha-gado harir astu paścāt
analyzed: cakrī agratas saha gadaḥ hariḥ astu paścāt

original: BhP_10.06.023/2 tvat-pārśvayor dhanur-asī madhu-hājanaś ca
analyzed: tvad pārśvayoḥ dhanuḥ asī madhu hā janaḥ ca

original: BhP_10.06.023/3 koṇeṣu śaṅkha urugāya upary upendras
analyzed: koṇeṣu śaṅkhaḥ urugāyaḥ upari upendraḥ

original: BhP_10.06.023/4 tārkṣyaḥ kṣitau haladharaḥ puruṣaḥ samantāt
analyzed: tārkṣyaḥ kṣitau haladharaḥ puruṣaḥ samantāt

original: BhP_10.06.024/1 indriyāṇi hṛṣīkeśaḥ prāṇān nārāyaṇo 'vatu
analyzed: indriyāṇi hṛṣīkeśaḥ prāṇān nārāyaṇaḥ vatu

original: BhP_10.06.024/3 śvetadvīpa-patiś cittaṃ mano yogeśvaro 'vatu
analyzed: śvetadvīpa patiḥ cittam manaḥ yogeśvaraḥ vatu

original: BhP_10.06.025/1 pṛśnigarbhas tu te buddhim ātmānaṃ bhagavān paraḥ
analyzed: pṛśnigarbhaḥ tu te buddhim ātmānam bhagavān paraḥ

original: BhP_10.06.025/3 krīḍantaṃ pātu govindaḥ śayānaṃ pātu mādhavaḥ
analyzed: krīḍantam pātu govindaḥ śayānam pātu mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.026/1 vrajantam avyād vaikuṇṭha āsīnaṃ tvāṃ śriyaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: vrajantam avyāt vaikuṇṭhaḥ āsīnam tvām śriyaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_10.06.026/3 bhuñjānaṃ yajñabhuk pātu sarva-graha-bhayaṅkaraḥ
analyzed: bhuñjānam yajñabhuj pātu sarva graha bhayaṅkaraḥ

original: BhP_10.06.027/1 ḍākinyo yātudhānyaś ca kuṣmāṇḍā ye 'rbhaka-grahāḥ
analyzed: ḍākinyaḥ yātudhānyaḥ ca kuṣmāṇḍāḥ ye rbhaka grahāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.027/3 bhūta-preta-piśācāś ca yakṣa-rakṣo-vināyakāḥ
analyzed: bhūta preta piśācāḥ ca yakṣa rakṣaḥ vināyakāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.028/1 koṭarā revatī jyeṣṭhā pūtanā mātṛkādayaḥ
analyzed: koṭarā revatī jyeṣṭhā pūtanā mātṛkā ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.028/3 unmādā ye hy apasmārā deha-prāṇendriya-druhaḥ
analyzed: unmādāḥ ye hi apasmārāḥ deha prāṇa indriya druhaḥ
