original: BhP_10.06.029/1 svapna-dṛṣṭā mahotpātā vṛddhā bāla-grahāś ca ye
analyzed: svapna dṛṣṭāḥ mahā utpātāḥ vṛddhāḥ bālagrahāḥ ca ye

original: BhP_10.06.029/3 sarve naśyantu te viṣṇor nāma-grahaṇa-bhīravaḥ
analyzed: sarve naśyantu te viṣṇoḥ nāma grahaṇa bhīravaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.030/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.06.030/1 iti praṇaya-baddhābhir gopībhiḥ kṛta-rakṣaṇam
analyzed: iti praṇaya baddhābhiḥ gopībhiḥ kṛta rakṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.06.030/3 pāyayitvā stanaṃ mātā sannyaveśayad ātmajam
analyzed: pāyayitvā stanam mātā san nyaveśayat ātmajam

original: BhP_10.06.031/1 tāvan nandādayo gopā mathurāyā vrajaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: tāvat nanda ādayaḥ gopāḥ mathurāyāḥ vrajam gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.031/3 vilokya pūtanā-dehaṃ babhūvur ativismitāḥ
analyzed: vilokya pūtanā deham babhūvuḥ ati vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.032/1 nūnaṃ batarṣiḥ sañjāto yogeśo vā samāsa saḥ
analyzed: nūnam bata ṛṣiḥ sañjātaḥ yogeśaḥ vā samāsa saḥ

original: BhP_10.06.032/3 sa eva dṛṣṭo hy utpāto yad āhānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva dṛṣṭaḥ hi utpātaḥ yat āha ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.06.033/1 kalevaraṃ paraśubhiś chittvā tat te vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: kalevaram paraśubhiḥ chittvā tat te vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.033/3 dūre kṣiptvāvayavaśo nyadahan kāṣṭha-veṣṭitam
analyzed: dūre kṣiptvā avayavaśas nyadahan kāṣṭha veṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.06.034/1 dahyamānasya dehasya dhūmaś cāguru-saurabhaḥ
analyzed: dahyamānasya dehasya dhūmaḥ ca aguru saurabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.034/3 utthitaḥ kṛṣṇa-nirbhukta- sapady āhata-pāpmanaḥ
analyzed: utthitaḥ kṛṣṇa nirbhukta sapadi āhata pāpmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.035/1 pūtanā loka-bāla-ghnī rākṣasī rudhirāśanā
analyzed: pūtanā loka bāla ghnī rākṣasī rudhira aśanā

original: BhP_10.06.035/3 jighāṃsayāpi haraye stanaṃ dattvāpa sad-gatim
analyzed: jighāṃsayā api haraye stanam dattvā āpa sat gatim

original: BhP_10.06.036/1 kiṃ punaḥ śraddhayā bhaktyā kṛṣṇāya paramātmane
analyzed: kim punar śraddhayā bhaktyā kṛṣṇāya paramātmane

original: BhP_10.06.036/3 yacchan priyatamaṃ kiṃ nu raktās tan-mātaro yathā
analyzed: yacchan priyatamam kim nu raktāḥ tad mātaraḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.06.037/1 padbhyāṃ bhakta-hṛdi-sthābhyāṃ vandyābhyāṃ loka-vanditaiḥ
analyzed: padbhyām bhakta hṛdisthābhyām vandyābhyām loka vanditaiḥ

original: BhP_10.06.037/3 aṅgaṃ yasyāḥ samākramya bhagavān api tat-stanam
analyzed: aṅgam yasyāḥ samākramya bhagavān api tad stanam

original: BhP_10.06.038/1 yātudhāny api sā svargam avāpa jananī-gatim
analyzed: yātudhānī api sā svargam avāpa jananī gatim

original: BhP_10.06.038/3 kṛṣṇa-bhukta-stana-kṣīrāḥ kim u gāvo 'numātaraḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa bhukta stana kṣīrāḥ kim u gāvaḥ nu mātaraḥ

original: BhP_10.06.039/1 payāṃsi yāsām apibat putra-sneha-snutāny alam
analyzed: payāṃsi yāsām apibat putra sneha snutāni alam

original: BhP_10.06.039/3 bhagavān devakī-putraḥ kaivalyādy-akhila-pradaḥ
BhP_10.06.040/1 tāsām avirataṃ kṛṣṇe kurvatīnāṃ sutekṣaṇam
analyzed: tāsām aviratam kṛṣṇe kurvatīnām suta īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.06.040/3 na punaḥ kalpate rājan saṃsāro 'jñāna-sambhavaḥ
analyzed: na punar kalpate rājan saṃsāraḥ jñāna sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.041/1 kaṭa-dhūmasya saurabhyam avaghrāya vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: kaṭadhūmasya saurabhyam avaghrāya vrajaukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.06.041/3 kim idaṃ kuta eveti vadanto vrajam āyayuḥ
analyzed: kim idam kutas eva iti vadantaḥ vrajam āyayuḥ

original: BhP_10.06.042/1 te tatra varṇitaṃ gopaiḥ pūtanāgamanādikam
analyzed: te tatra varṇitam gopaiḥ pūtanā āgamana ādikam

original: BhP_10.06.042/3 śrutvā tan-nidhanaṃ svasti śiśoś cāsan suvismitāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tad nidhanam svasti śiśoḥ ca āsan su vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.06.043/1 nandaḥ sva-putram ādāya pretyāgatam udāra-dhīḥ
analyzed: nandaḥ sva putram ādāya pretya āgatam udāra dhīḥ

original: BhP_10.06.043/3 mūrdhny upāghrāya paramāṃ mudaṃ lebhe kurūdvaha
analyzed: mūrdhni upāghrāya paramām mudam lebhe kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.06.044/1 ya etat pūtanā-mokṣaṃ kṛṣṇasyārbhakam adbhutam
analyzed: yaḥ etat pūtanā mokṣam kṛṣṇasya arbhakam adbhutam

original: BhP_10.06.044/3 śṛṇuyāc chraddhayā martyo govinde labhate ratim
analyzed: śṛṇuyāt śraddhayā martyaḥ govinde labhate ratim

original: BhP_10.07.001/0 śrī-rājovāca10070011 yena yenāvatāreṇa bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: yena yena avatāreṇa bhagavant hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.07.001/3 karoti karṇa-ramyāṇi mano-jñāni ca naḥ prabho
analyzed: karoti karṇa ramyāṇi manojñāni ca naḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.07.002/1 yac-chṛṇvato 'paity aratir vitṛṣṇā sattvaṃ ca śuddhyaty acireṇa puṃsaḥ
analyzed: yat śṛṇvataḥ upaiti aratiḥ vitṛṣṇā sattvam ca śuddhi ati acireṇa puṃsaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.002/3 bhaktir harau tat-puruṣe ca sakhyaṃ tad eva hāraṃ vada manyase cet
analyzed: bhaktiḥ harau tatpuruṣe ca sakhyam tat eva hāram vada manyase ced

original: BhP_10.07.003/1 athānyad api kṛṣṇasya tokācaritam adbhutam
analyzed: atha anyat api kṛṣṇasya toka ācaritam adbhutam

original: BhP_10.07.003/3 mānuṣaṃ lokam āsādya taj-jātim anurundhataḥ
analyzed: mānuṣam lokam āsādya tad jātim anurundhataḥ

original: BhP_10.07.004/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.07.004/1 kadācid autthānika-kautukāplave janmarkṣa-yoge samaveta-yoṣitām
analyzed: kadācid autthānika kautuka āplave janma ṛkṣa yoge samaveta yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.07.004/3 vāditra-gīta-dvija-mantra-vācakaiś cakāra sūnor abhiṣecanaṃ satī
analyzed: vāditra gīta dvija mantra vācakaiḥ cakāra sūnoḥ abhiṣecanam satī

original: BhP_10.07.005/1 nandasya patnī kṛta-majjanādikaṃ vipraiḥ kṛta-svastyayanaṃ supūjitaiḥ
analyzed: nandasya patnī kṛta majjana ādikam vipraiḥ kṛta svastyayanam su pūjitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.07.005/3 annādya-vāsaḥ-srag-abhīṣṭa-dhenubhiḥ sañjāta-nidrākṣam aśīśayac chanaiḥ
analyzed: annādya vāsaḥ sraj abhīṣṭa dhenubhiḥ sañjāta nidrā akṣam aśīśayat śanais

original: BhP_10.07.006/1 autthānikautsukya-manā manasvinī samāgatān pūjayatī vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: autthānika autsukya manāḥ manasvinī samāgatān pūjayatī vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.006/3 naivāśṛṇod vai ruditaṃ sutasya sā rudan stanārthī caraṇāv udakṣipat
analyzed: na eva aśṛṇot vai ruditam sutasya sā rudan stana arthī caraṇau udakṣipat

original: BhP_10.07.007/1 adhaḥ-śayānasya śiśor ano 'lpaka- pravāla-mṛdv-aṅghri-hataṃ vyavartata
analyzed: adhas śayānasya śiśoḥ anaḥ pravāla mṛdu aṅghri hatam vyavartata

original: BhP_10.07.007/3 vidhvasta-nānā-rasa-kupya-bhājanaṃ vyatyasta-cakrākṣa-vibhinna-kūbaram
analyzed: vidhvasta nānā rasa kupya bhājanam vyatyasta cakra akṣa vibhinna kūbaram

original: BhP_10.07.008/1 dṛṣṭvā yaśodā-pramukhā vraja-striya
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā yaśodā pramukhāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.008/2 autthānike karmaṇi yāḥ samāgatāḥ
analyzed: autthānike karmaṇi yāḥ samāgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.008/3 nandādayaś cādbhuta-darśanākulāḥ
analyzed: nanda ādayaḥ ca adbhuta darśana ākulāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.008/4 kathaṃ svayaṃ vai śakaṭaṃ viparyagāt
analyzed: katham svayam vai śakaṭam viparyagāt

original: BhP_10.07.009/1 ūcur avyavasita-matīn gopān gopīś ca bālakāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ a vyavasita matīn gopān gopīḥ ca bālakāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.009/3 rudatānena pādena kṣiptam etan na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: rudatā anena pādena kṣiptam etat na saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.010/1 na te śraddadhire gopā bāla-bhāṣitam ity uta
analyzed: na te śraddadhire gopāḥ bāla bhāṣitam iti uta

original: BhP_10.07.010/3 aprameyaṃ balaṃ tasya bālakasya na te viduḥ
analyzed: aprameyam balam tasya bālakasya na te viduḥ

original: BhP_10.07.011/1 rudantaṃ sutam ādāya yaśodā graha-śaṅkitā
analyzed: rudantam sutam ādāya yaśodā graha śaṅkitā

original: BhP_10.07.011/3 kṛta-svastyayanaṃ vipraiḥ sūktaiḥ stanam apāyayat
analyzed: kṛta svastyayanam vipraiḥ sūktaiḥ stanam apāyayat

original: BhP_10.07.012/1 pūrvavat sthāpitaṃ gopair balibhiḥ sa-paricchadam
analyzed: pūrvavat sthāpitam gopaiḥ balibhiḥ sa paricchadam

original: BhP_10.07.012/3 viprā hutvārcayāṃ cakrur dadhy-akṣata-kuśāmbubhiḥ
analyzed: viprāḥ cakruḥ dadhi akṣata kuśa ambuṣu

original: BhP_10.07.013/1 ye 'sūyānṛta-dambherṣā- hiṃsā-māna-vivarjitāḥ
analyzed: ye sūyā anṛta dambha īrṣāḥ hiṃsā māna vivarjitāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.013/3 na teṣāṃ satya-śīlānām āśiṣo viphalāḥ kṛtāḥ
analyzed: na teṣām satya śīlānām āśiṣaḥ viphalāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.014/1 iti bālakam ādāya sāmarg-yajur-upākṛtaiḥ
analyzed: iti bālakam ādāya sāma ṛc yajuḥ upākṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_10.07.014/3 jalaiḥ pavitrauṣadhibhir abhiṣicya dvijottamaiḥ
analyzed: jalaiḥ pavitra oṣadhibhiḥ abhiṣicya dvijottamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.07.015/1 vācayitvā svastyayanaṃ nanda-gopaḥ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: vācayitvā svastyayanam nanda gopaḥ samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.015/3 hutvā cāgniṃ dvijātibhyaḥ prādād annaṃ mahā-guṇam
analyzed: hutvā ca agnim dvijātibhyaḥ prādāt annam mahā guṇam

original: BhP_10.07.016/1 gāvaḥ sarva-guṇopetā vāsaḥ-srag-rukma-mālinīḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ sarva guṇa upetāḥ vāsaḥ sraj rukma mālinīḥ

original: BhP_10.07.016/3 ātmajābhyudayārthāya prādāt te cānvayuñjata
analyzed: ātmaja abhyudaya arthāya prādāt te ca anvayuñjata

original: BhP_10.07.017/1 viprā mantra-vido yuktās tair yāḥ proktās tathāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: viprāḥ mantra vidaḥ yuktāḥ taiḥ yāḥ proktāḥ tathā āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.017/3 tā niṣphalā bhaviṣyanti na kadācid api sphuṭam
analyzed: tāḥ niṣphalāḥ bhaviṣyanti na kadācid api sphuṭam

original: BhP_10.07.018/1 ekadāroham ārūḍhaṃ lālayantī sutaṃ satī
analyzed: ekadā āroham ārūḍham lālayantī sutam satī

original: BhP_10.07.018/3 garimāṇaṃ śiśor voḍhuṃ na sehe giri-kūṭavat
analyzed: garimāṇam śiśoḥ voḍhum na sehe giri kūṭa vat

original: BhP_10.07.019/1 bhūmau nidhāya taṃ gopī vismitā bhāra-pīḍitā
analyzed: bhūmau nidhāya tam gopī vismitā bhāra pīḍitā

original: BhP_10.07.019/3 mahā-puruṣam ādadhyau jagatām āsa karmasu
analyzed: mahāpuruṣam ādadhyau jagatām āsa karmasu

original: BhP_10.07.020/1 daityo nāmnā tṛṇāvartaḥ kaṃsa-bhṛtyaḥ praṇoditaḥ
analyzed: daityaḥ nāmnā tṛṇāvartaḥ kaṃsa bhṛtyaḥ praṇoditaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.020/3 cakravāta-svarūpeṇa jahārāsīnam arbhakam
analyzed: cakra vāta sva rūpeṇa jahāra āsīnam arbhakam

original: BhP_10.07.021/1 gokulaṃ sarvam āvṛṇvan muṣṇaṃś cakṣūṃṣi reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: go kulam sarvam āvṛṇvan muṣṇan cakṣūṃṣi reṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.07.021/3 īrayan sumahā-ghora- śabdena pradiśo diśaḥ
analyzed: īrayan su mahā ghora śabdena pradiśaḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.022/1 muhūrtam abhavad goṣṭhaṃ rajasā tamasāvṛtam
analyzed: muhūrtam abhavat goṣṭham rajasā tamasā āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.07.022/3 sutaṃ yaśodā nāpaśyat tasmin nyastavatī yataḥ
analyzed: sutam yaśodā nā apaśyat tasmin nyastavatī yatas

original: BhP_10.07.023/1 nāpaśyat kaścanātmānaṃ paraṃ cāpi vimohitaḥ
analyzed: na apaśyat kaścana ātmānam param ca api vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.023/3 tṛṇāvarta-nisṛṣṭābhiḥ śarkarābhir upadrutaḥ
analyzed: tṛṇa āvarta nisṛṣṭābhiḥ śarkarābhiḥ upadrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.024/1 iti khara-pavana-cakra-pāṃśu-varṣe suta-padavīm abalāvilakṣya mātā
analyzed: iti khara pavana cakra pāṃśu varṣe suta padavīm abalā vilakṣya mātā

original: BhP_10.07.024/3 atikaruṇam anusmaranty aśocad bhuvi patitā mṛta-vatsakā yathā gauḥ
analyzed: ati karuṇam anusmarantī aśocat bhuvi patitā mṛta vatsakā yathā gauḥ

original: BhP_10.07.025/1 ruditam anuniśamya tatra gopyo bhṛśam anutapta-dhiyo 'śru-pūrṇa-mukhyaḥ
analyzed: ruditam anuniśamya tatra gopyaḥ bhṛśam śru pūrṇa mukhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.025/3 rurudur anupalabhya nanda-sūnuṃ pavana upārata-pāṃśu-varṣa-vege
analyzed: ruruduḥ an upalabhya nanda sūnum pavane upārata pāṃśu varṣa vege

original: BhP_10.07.026/1 tṛṇāvartaḥ śānta-rayo vātyā-rūpa-dharo haran
BhP_10.07.026/3 kṛṣṇaṃ nabho-gato gantuṃ nāśaknod bhūri-bhāra-bhṛt
analyzed: kṛṣṇam nabhaḥ gataḥ gantum na aśaknot bhūri bhāra bhṛt

original: BhP_10.07.027/1 tam aśmānaṃ manyamāna ātmano guru-mattayā
analyzed: tam aśmānam manyamānaḥ ātmanaḥ gurumat tayā

original: BhP_10.07.027/3 gale gṛhīta utsraṣṭuṃ nāśaknod adbhutārbhakam
analyzed: gale gṛhītaḥ utsraṣṭum na aśaknot adbhuta arbhakam

original: BhP_10.07.028/1 gala-grahaṇa-niśceṣṭo daityo nirgata-locanaḥ
analyzed: gala grahaṇa niśceṣṭaḥ daityaḥ nirgata locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.028/3 avyakta-rāvo nyapatat saha-bālo vyasur vraje
analyzed: avyakta rāvaḥ nyapatat sahabālaḥ vyasuḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.07.029/1 tam antarikṣāt patitaṃ śilāyāṃ viśīrṇa-sarvāvayavaṃ karālam
analyzed: tam antarikṣāt patitam śilāyām viśīrṇa sarva avayavam karālam

original: BhP_10.07.029/3 puraṃ yathā rudra-śareṇa viddhaṃ striyo rudatyo dadṛśuḥ sametāḥ
analyzed: puram yathā rudra śareṇa viddham striyaḥ rudatyaḥ dadṛśuḥ sametāḥ

original: BhP_10.07.030/1 prādāya mātre pratihṛtya vismitāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasyorasi lambamānam
analyzed: prādāya mātre pratihṛtya vismitāḥ kṛṣṇam ca tasya urasi lambamānam

original: BhP_10.07.030/3 taṃ svastimantaṃ puruṣāda-nītaṃ vihāyasā mṛtyu-mukhāt pramuktam
analyzed: tam svastimantam puruṣāda nītam vihāyasā mṛtyu mukhāt pramuktam

original: BhP_10.07.030/5 gopyaś ca gopāḥ kila nanda-mukhyā labdhvā punaḥ prāpur atīva modam
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca gopāḥ kila nanda mukhyāḥ labdhvā punar prāpuḥ atīva modam

original: BhP_10.07.031/1 aho batāty-adbhutam eṣa rakṣasā bālo nivṛttiṃ gamito 'bhyagāt punaḥ
analyzed: aho bata ati adbhutam eṣa rakṣasā bālaḥ nivṛttim gamitaḥ bhyagāt punar

original: BhP_10.07.031/3 hiṃsraḥ sva-pāpena vihiṃsitaḥ khalaḥ sādhuḥ samatvena bhayād vimucyate
analyzed: hiṃsraḥ sva pāpena vihiṃsitaḥ khalaḥ sādhuḥ samatvena bhayāt vimucyate

original: BhP_10.07.032/1 kiṃ nas tapaś cīrṇam adhokṣajārcanaṃ
analyzed: kim naḥ tapaḥ cīrṇam adhokṣaja arcanam

original: BhP_10.07.032/2 pūrteṣṭa-dattam uta bhūta-sauhṛdam
analyzed: pūrta iṣṭa dattam uta bhūta sauhṛdam

original: BhP_10.07.032/3 yat samparetaḥ punar eva bālako
analyzed: yat samparetaḥ punar eva bālako

original: BhP_10.07.032/4 diṣṭyā sva-bandhūn praṇayann upasthitaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā sva bandhūn praṇayan upasthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.033/1 dṛṣṭvādbhutāni bahuśo nanda-gopo bṛhadvane
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā adbhutāni bahuśas nanda gopaḥ bṛhat vane

original: BhP_10.07.033/3 vasudeva-vaco bhūyo mānayām āsa vismitaḥ
analyzed: vasudeva vacaḥ bhūyas mānayām āsa vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.07.034/1 ekadārbhakam ādāya svāṅkam āropya bhāminī
analyzed: eka dārbhakam ādāya sva aṅkam āropya bhāminī

original: BhP_10.07.034/3 prasnutaṃ pāyayām āsa stanaṃ sneha-pariplutā
analyzed: prasnutam pāyayām āsa stanam sneha pariplutā

original: BhP_10.07.035/1 pīta-prāyasya jananī sutasya rucira-smitam
analyzed: pīta prāyasya jananī sutasya rucira smitam

original: BhP_10.07.035/3 mukhaṃ lālayatī rājañ jṛmbhato dadṛśe idam
analyzed: mukham lālayatī rājam jṛmbhataḥ dadṛśe idam

original: BhP_10.07.036/1 khaṃ rodasī jyotir-anīkam āśāḥ sūryendu-vahni-śvasanāmbudhīṃś ca
analyzed: kham rodasī jyotiḥ anīkam āśāḥ sūrya indu vahni śvasana ambudhīn ca

original: BhP_10.07.036/3 dvīpān nagāṃs tad-duhitṝr vanāni bhūtāni yāni sthira-jaṅgamāni
analyzed: dvīpān nagān tad duhitṝḥ vanāni bhūtāni yāni sthira jaṅgamāni

original: BhP_10.07.037/1 sā vīkṣya viśvaṃ sahasā rājan sañjāta-vepathuḥ
analyzed: sā vīkṣya viśvam sahasā rājan sañjāta vepathuḥ

original: BhP_10.07.037/3 sammīlya mṛgaśāvākṣī netre āsīt suvismitā
analyzed: sammīlya mṛgaśāvākṣī netre āsīt suvismitā

original: BhP_10.08.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.001/1 gargaḥ purohito rājan yadūnāṃ sumahā-tapāḥ
analyzed: gargaḥ purohitaḥ rājan yadūnām su mahā tapāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.001/3 vrajaṃ jagāma nandasya vasudeva-pracoditaḥ
analyzed: vrajam jagāma nandasya vasudeva pracoditaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.002/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā parama-prītaḥ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā parama prītaḥ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_10.08.002/3 ānarcādhokṣaja-dhiyā praṇipāta-puraḥsaram
analyzed: ānarca adhokṣaja dhiyā praṇipāta puraḥsaram

original: BhP_10.08.003/1 sūpaviṣṭaṃ kṛtātithyaṃ girā sūnṛtayā munim
analyzed: su upaviṣṭam kṛta ātithyam girā sūnṛtayā munim

original: BhP_10.08.003/3 nandayitvābravīd brahman pūrṇasya karavāma kim
analyzed: nandayitvā abravīt brahman pūrṇasya karavāma kim

original: BhP_10.08.004/1 mahad-vicalanaṃ nṝṇāṃ gṛhiṇāṃ dīna-cetasām
analyzed: mahat vicalanam nṝṇām gṛhiṇām dīna cetasām

original: BhP_10.08.004/3 niḥśreyasāya bhagavan kalpate nānyathā kvacit
analyzed: niḥśreyasāya bhagavan kalpate na anyathā kvacid

original: BhP_10.08.005/1 jyotiṣām ayanaṃ sākṣād yat taj jñānam atīndriyam
analyzed: jyotiṣām ayanam sākṣāt yat tat jñānam atīndriyam

original: BhP_10.08.005/3 praṇītaṃ bhavatā yena pumān veda parāvaram
analyzed: praṇītam bhavatā yena pumān veda parāvaram

original: BhP_10.08.006/1 tvaṃ hi brahma-vidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ saṃskārān kartum arhasi
analyzed: tvam hi brahma vidām śreṣṭhaḥ saṃskārān kartum arhasi

original: BhP_10.08.006/3 bālayor anayor nṝṇāṃ janmanā brāhmaṇo guruḥ
analyzed: bālayoḥ anayoḥ nṝṇām janmanā brāhmaṇaḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_10.08.007/0 śrī-garga uvāca
analyzed: śrī gargaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.007/1 yadūnām aham ācāryaḥ khyātaś ca bhuvi sarvadā
analyzed: yadūnām aham ācāryaḥ khyātaḥ ca bhuvi sarvadā

original: BhP_10.08.007/3 sutaṃ mayā saṃskṛtaṃ te manyate devakī-sutam
analyzed: sutam mayā saṃskṛtam te manyate devakī sutam

original: BhP_10.08.008/1 kaṃsaḥ pāpa-matiḥ sakhyaṃ tava cānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ pāpa matiḥ sakhyam tava ca ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.08.008/3 devakyā aṣṭamo garbho na strī bhavitum arhati
analyzed: devakyāḥ aṣṭamaḥ garbhaḥ na strī bhavitum arhati

original: BhP_10.08.009/1 iti sañcintayañ chrutvā devakyā dārikā-vacaḥ
analyzed: iti śrutvā devakyāḥ dārikā vacaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.009/3 api hantā gatāśaṅkas tarhi tan no 'nayo bhavet
analyzed: api hantā gata āśaṅkaḥ tarhi tat naḥ nayaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_10.08.010/0 śrī-nanda uvāca
analyzed: śrī nandaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.010/1 alakṣito 'smin rahasi māmakair api go-vraje
analyzed: smin rahasi māmakaiḥ api govraje

original: BhP_10.08.010/3 kuru dvijāti-saṃskāraṃ svasti-vācana-pūrvakam
analyzed: kuru dvijāti saṃskāram svastivācana pūrvakam

original: BhP_10.08.011/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.011/1 evaṃ samprārthito vipraḥ sva-cikīrṣitam eva tat
analyzed: evam samprārthitaḥ vipraḥ sva cikīrṣitam eva tat

original: BhP_10.08.011/3 cakāra nāma-karaṇaṃ gūḍho rahasi bālayoḥ
analyzed: cakāra nāmakaraṇam gūḍhaḥ rahasi bālayoḥ

original: BhP_10.08.012/0 śrī-garga uvāca
analyzed: śrī gargaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.012/1 ayaṃ hi rohiṇī-putro ramayan suhṛdo guṇaiḥ
analyzed: ayam hi rohiṇī putraḥ ramayan suhṛdaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.012/3 ākhyāsyate rāma iti balādhikyād balaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: ākhyāsyate rāmaḥ iti bala ādhikyāt balam viduḥ

original: BhP_10.08.012/5 yadūnām apṛthag-bhāvāt saṅkarṣaṇam uśanty api
analyzed: yadūnām apṛthak bhāvāt saṅkarṣaṇam uśanti api

original: BhP_10.08.013/1 āsan varṇās trayo hy asya gṛhṇato 'nuyugaṃ tanūḥ
analyzed: āsan varṇāḥ trayaḥ hi asya gṛhṇataḥ nuyugam tanūḥ

original: BhP_10.08.013/3 śuklo raktas tathā pīta idānīṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: śuklaḥ raktaḥ tathā pītaḥ idānīm kṛṣṇa tām gataḥ

original: BhP_10.08.014/1 prāg ayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ
analyzed: prāk ayam vasudevasya kvacid jātaḥ tava ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.014/3 vāsudeva iti śrīmān abhijñāḥ sampracakṣate
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ iti śrīmān abhijñāḥ sampracakṣate

original: BhP_10.08.015/1 bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te
analyzed: bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te

original: BhP_10.08.015/3 guṇa-karmānurūpāṇi tāny ahaṃ veda no janāḥ
analyzed: guṇa karma anurūpāṇi tāni aham veda naḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.016/1 eṣa vaḥ śreya ādhāsyad gopa-gokula-nandanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ śreyaḥ ādhāsyat gopa gokula nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.016/3 anena sarva-durgāṇi yūyam añjas tariṣyatha
analyzed: anena sarva durgāṇi yūyam añjas tariṣyatha

original: BhP_10.08.017/1 purānena vraja-pate sādhavo dasyu-pīḍitāḥ
analyzed: purā anena vraja pate sādhavaḥ dasyu pīḍitāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.017/3 arājake rakṣyamāṇā jigyur dasyūn samedhitāḥ
analyzed: arājake rakṣyamāṇāḥ jigyuḥ dasyūn samedhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.018/1 ya etasmin mahā-bhāgāḥ prītiṃ kurvanti mānavāḥ
analyzed: ye etasmin mahābhāgāḥ prītim kurvanti mānavāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.018/3 nārayo 'bhibhavanty etān viṣṇu-pakṣān ivāsurāḥ
analyzed: na arayaḥ bhibhavanti etān viṣṇu pakṣān iva asurāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.019/1 tasmān nandātmajo 'yaṃ te nārāyaṇa-samo guṇaiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt nanda ātmajaḥ yam te nārāyaṇa samaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.019/3 śriyā kīrtyānubhāvena gopāyasva samāhitaḥ
analyzed: śriyā kīrtyā anubhāvena gopāyasva samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.020/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.020/1 ity ātmānaṃ samādiśya garge ca sva-gṛhaṃ gate
analyzed: iti ātmānam samādiśya garge ca sva gṛham gate

original: BhP_10.08.020/3 nandaḥ pramudito mene ātmānaṃ pūrṇam āśiṣām
analyzed: nandaḥ pramuditaḥ mene ātmānam pūrṇam āśiṣām

original: BhP_10.08.021/1 kālena vrajatālpena gokule rāma-keśavau
analyzed: kālena vrajatā alpena gokule rāma keśavau

original: BhP_10.08.021/3 jānubhyāṃ saha pāṇibhyāṃ riṅgamāṇau vijahratuḥ
analyzed: jānubhyām saha pāṇibhyām riṅgamāṇau vijahratuḥ

original: BhP_10.08.022/1 tāv aṅghri-yugmam anukṛṣya sarīsṛpantau
analyzed: tau aṅghri yugmam anukṛṣya sarīsṛpantau

original: BhP_10.08.022/2 ghoṣa-praghoṣa-ruciraṃ vraja-kardameṣu
analyzed: ghoṣa praghoṣa ruciram vraja kardameṣu

original: BhP_10.08.022/3 tan-nāda-hṛṣṭa-manasāv anusṛtya lokaṃ
analyzed: tad nāda hṛṣṭa manasau anusṛtya lokam

original: BhP_10.08.022/4 mugdha-prabhītavad upeyatur anti mātroḥ
analyzed: mugdha prabhīta vat upeyatuḥ anti mātroḥ

original: BhP_10.08.023/1 tan-mātarau nija-sutau ghṛṇayā snuvantyau
analyzed: tad mātarau nija sutau ghṛṇayā snuvantyau

original: BhP_10.08.023/2 paṅkāṅga-rāga-rucirāv upagṛhya dorbhyām
analyzed: paṅka aṅgarāga rucirau upagṛhya dorbhyām

original: BhP_10.08.023/3 dattvā stanaṃ prapibatoḥ sma mukhaṃ nirīkṣya
analyzed: dattvā stanam prapibatoḥ sma mukham nirīkṣya

original: BhP_10.08.023/4 mugdha-smitālpa-daśanaṃ yayatuḥ pramodam
analyzed: mugdha smita alpa daśanam yayatuḥ pramodam

original: BhP_10.08.024/1 yarhy aṅganā-darśanīya-kumāra-līlāv
analyzed: yarhi aṅganā darśanīya kumāra līlau

original: BhP_10.08.024/2 antar-vraje tad abalāḥ pragṛhīta-pucchaiḥ
analyzed: antar vraje tat abalāḥ pragṛhīta pucchaiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.024/3 vatsair itas tata ubhāv anukṛṣyamāṇau
analyzed: vatsaiḥ itas tatas ubhau anukṛṣyamāṇau

original: BhP_10.08.024/4 prekṣantya ujjhita-gṛhā jahṛṣur hasantyaḥ
analyzed: prekṣantyaḥ ujjhita gṛhāḥ jahṛṣuḥ hasantyaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.025/1 śṛṅgy-agni-daṃṣṭry-asi-jala-dvija-kaṇṭakebhyaḥ
analyzed: śṛṅgi agni daṃṣṭri asi jala dvija kaṇṭakebhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.025/2 krīḍā-parāv aticalau sva-sutau niṣeddhum
analyzed: krīḍā parau ati calau sva sutau niṣeddhum

original: BhP_10.08.025/3 gṛhyāṇi kartum api yatra na taj-jananyau
analyzed: gṛhyāṇi kartum api yatra na tad jananyau

original: BhP_10.08.025/4 śekāta āpatur alaṃ manaso 'navasthām
analyzed: śekātaḥ āpatuḥ alam manasaḥ nava sthām

original: BhP_10.08.026/1 kālenālpena rājarṣe rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca gokule
analyzed: kālena alpena rāja ṛṣe rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca gokule

original: BhP_10.08.026/3 aghṛṣṭa-jānubhiḥ padbhir vicakramatur añjasā
analyzed: a ghṛṣṭa jānubhiḥ padbhiḥ vicakramatuḥ añjasā

original: BhP_10.08.027/1 tatas tu bhagavān kṛṣṇo vayasyair vraja-bālakaiḥ
analyzed: tatas tu bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ vayasyaiḥ vraja bālakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.027/3 saha-rāmo vraja-strīṇāṃ cikrīḍe janayan mudam
analyzed: saha rāmaḥ vrajastrīṇām cikrīḍe janayan mudam

original: BhP_10.08.028/1 kṛṣṇasya gopyo ruciraṃ vīkṣya kaumāra-cāpalam
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya gopyaḥ ruciram vīkṣya kaumāra cāpalam

original: BhP_10.08.028/3 śṛṇvantyāḥ kila tan-mātur iti hocuḥ samāgatāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvantyāḥ kila tat mātuḥ iti ha ūcuḥ samāgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.029/1 vatsān muñcan kvacid asamaye krośa-sañjāta-hāsaḥ
analyzed: vatsān muñcan kvacid asamaye krośa sañjāta hāsaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.029/2 steyaṃ svādv atty atha dadhi-payaḥ kalpitaiḥ steya-yogaiḥ
analyzed: steyam svādu atti atha dadhi payaḥ kalpitaiḥ steya yogaiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.029/3 markān bhokṣyan vibhajati sa cen nātti bhāṇḍaṃ bhinnatti
analyzed: markān bhokṣyan vibhajati sa ced na atti bhāṇḍam bhinnatti

original: BhP_10.08.029/4 dravyālābhe sagṛha-kupito yāty upakrośya tokān
analyzed: dravya alābhe sa gṛha kupitaḥ yāti upakrośya tokān

original: BhP_10.08.030/1 hastāgrāhye racayati vidhiṃ pīṭhakolūkhalādyaiś
analyzed: racayati vidhim pīṭhaka ulūkhala ādyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.030/2 chidraṃ hy antar-nihita-vayunaḥ śikya-bhāṇḍeṣu tad-vit
analyzed: chidram hi antar nihita vayunaḥ śikya bhāṇḍeṣu tad vid

original: BhP_10.08.030/3 dhvāntāgāre dhṛta-maṇi-gaṇaṃ svāṅgam artha-pradīpaṃ
analyzed: dhvānta āgāre dhṛta maṇi gaṇam sva aṅgam artha pradīpam

original: BhP_10.08.030/4 kāle gopyo yarhi gṛha-kṛtyeṣu suvyagra-cittāḥ
analyzed: kāle gopyaḥ yarhi gṛha kṛtyeṣu su vyagra cittāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.031/1 evaṃ dhārṣṭyāny uśati kurute mehanādīni vāstau
analyzed: evam dhārṣṭyāni uśati kurute mehana ādīni vāstau

original: BhP_10.08.031/2 steyopāyair viracita-kṛtiḥ supratīko yathāste
analyzed: steya upāyaiḥ viracita kṛtiḥ supratīkaḥ yathā āste

original: BhP_10.08.031/3 itthaṃ strībhiḥ sa-bhaya-nayana-śrī-mukhālokinībhir
analyzed: ittham strībhiḥ sa bhaya nayana śrī mukha ālokinībhiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.031/4 vyākhyātārthā prahasita-mukhī na hy upālabdhum aicchat
analyzed: vyākhyāta arthā prahasita mukhī na hi upālabdhum aicchat

original: BhP_10.08.032/1 ekadā krīḍamānās te rāmādyā gopa-dārakāḥ
analyzed: ekadā krīḍamānāḥ te rāma ādyāḥ gopa dārakāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.032/3 kṛṣṇo mṛdaṃ bhakṣitavān iti mātre nyavedayan
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ mṛdam bhakṣitavān iti mātre nyavedayan

original: BhP_10.08.033/1 sā gṛhītvā kare kṛṣṇam upālabhya hitaiṣiṇī
analyzed: sā gṛhītvā kare kṛṣṇam upālabhya hita eṣiṇī

original: BhP_10.08.033/3 yaśodā bhaya-sambhrānta- prekṣaṇākṣam abhāṣata
analyzed: yaśodā bhaya sambhrānta prekṣaṇa akṣam abhāṣata

original: BhP_10.08.034/1 kasmān mṛdam adāntātman bhavān bhakṣitavān rahaḥ
analyzed: kasmāt mṛdam adānta ātman bhavān bhakṣitavān rahaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.034/3 vadanti tāvakā hy ete kumārās te 'grajo 'py ayam
analyzed: vadanti tāvakāḥ hi ete kumārāḥ te grajaḥ u pi ayam

original: BhP_10.08.035/1 nāhaṃ bhakṣitavān amba sarve mithyābhiśaṃsinaḥ
analyzed: na aham bhakṣitavān amba sarve mithyā abhiśaṃsinaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.035/3 yadi satya-giras tarhi samakṣaṃ paśya me mukham
analyzed: yadi satya giraḥ tarhi samakṣam paśya me mukham

original: BhP_10.08.036/1 yady evaṃ tarhi vyādehī- ty uktaḥ sa bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: yadi evam tarhi vyādehī ti uktaḥ sa bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_10.08.036/3 vyādattāvyāhataiśvaryaḥ krīḍā-manuja-bālakaḥ
BhP_10.08.037/1 sā tatra dadṛśe viśvaṃ jagat sthāsnu ca khaṃ diśaḥ
analyzed: sā tatra dadṛśe viśvam jagat sthāsnu ca kham diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.037/3 sādri-dvīpābdhi-bhūgolaṃ sa-vāyv-agnīndu-tārakam
BhP_10.08.038/1 jyotiś-cakraṃ jalaṃ tejo nabhasvān viyad eva ca
analyzed: jyotiḥ cakram jalam tejaḥ nabhasvān viyat eva ca

original: BhP_10.08.038/3 vaikārikāṇīndriyāṇi mano mātrā guṇās trayaḥ
analyzed: vaikārikāṇi indriyāṇi manaḥ mātrā guṇāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.039/1 etad vicitraṃ saha-jīva-kāla- svabhāva-karmāśaya-liṅga-bhedam
analyzed: etat vicitram saha jīva kāla svabhāva karma āśaya liṅga bhedam

original: BhP_10.08.039/3 sūnos tanau vīkṣya vidāritāsye vrajaṃ sahātmānam avāpa śaṅkām
analyzed: sūnoḥ tanau vīkṣya vidārita āsye vrajam saha ātmānam avāpa śaṅkām

original: BhP_10.08.040/1 kiṃ svapna etad uta devamāyā kiṃ vā madīyo bata buddhi-mohaḥ
analyzed: kim svapnaḥ etat uta deva māyā kim vā madīyaḥ bata buddhi mohaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.040/3 atho amuṣyaiva mamārbhakasya yaḥ kaścanautpattika ātma-yogaḥ
analyzed: atho amuṣya eva mama arbhakasya yaḥ kaścana autpattikaḥ ātma yogaḥ

original: BhP_10.08.041/1 atho yathāvan na vitarka-gocaraṃ ceto-manaḥ-karma-vacobhir añjasā
analyzed: atho yathāvat na vitarka gocaram cetaḥ manaḥ karma vacobhiḥ añjasā

original: BhP_10.08.041/3 yad-āśrayaṃ yena yataḥ pratīyate sudurvibhāvyaṃ praṇatāsmi tat-padam
analyzed: yad āśrayam yena yatas pratīyate su durvibhāvyam praṇatā asmi tat padam

original: BhP_10.08.042/1 ahaṃ mamāsau patir eṣa me suto vrajeśvarasyākhila-vittapā satī
analyzed: aham mama asau patiḥ eṣa me sutaḥ vrajeśvarasya akhila vittapā satī

original: BhP_10.08.042/3 gopyaś ca gopāḥ saha-godhanāś ca me yan-māyayetthaṃ kumatiḥ sa me gatiḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca gopāḥ saha go dhanāḥ ca me yad māyayā ittham kumatiḥ sa me gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.043/1 itthaṃ vidita-tattvāyāṃ gopikāyāṃ sa īśvaraḥ
analyzed: ittham vidita tattvāyām gopikāyām saḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.08.043/3 vaiṣṇavīṃ vyatanon māyāṃ putra-snehamayīṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: vaiṣṇavīm vyatanot māyām putra sneha mayīm vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.08.044/1 sadyo naṣṭa-smṛtir gopī sāropyāroham ātmajam
analyzed: sadyas naṣṭa smṛtiḥ gopī sā āropya āroham ātmajam

original: BhP_10.08.044/3 pravṛddha-sneha-kalila- hṛdayāsīd yathā purā
analyzed: pravṛddha sneha kalila hṛdaya āsīt yathā purā

original: BhP_10.08.045/1 trayyā copaniṣadbhiś ca sāṅkhya-yogaiś ca sātvataiḥ
analyzed: trayyā ca upaniṣadbhiḥ ca sāṅkhya yogaiḥ ca sātvataiḥ

original: BhP_10.08.045/3 upagīyamāna-māhātmyaṃ hariṃ sāmanyatātmajam
analyzed: upagīyamāna māhātmyam harim sā amanyata ātmajam

original: BhP_10.08.046/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.046/1 nandaḥ kim akarod brahman śreya evaṃ mahodayam
analyzed: nandaḥ kim akarot brahman śreyaḥ evam mahā udayam

original: BhP_10.08.046/3 yaśodā ca mahā-bhāgā papau yasyāḥ stanaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: yaśodā ca mahābhāgā papau yasyāḥ stanam hariḥ

original: BhP_10.08.047/1 pitarau nānvavindetāṃ kṛṣṇodārārbhakehitam
analyzed: pitarau na anvavindetām kṛṣṇa udāra arbhaka īhitam

original: BhP_10.08.047/3 gāyanty adyāpi kavayo yal loka-śamalāpaham
analyzed: gāyanti adya api kavayaḥ yat loka śamala apaham

original: BhP_10.08.048/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.08.048/1 droṇo vasūnāṃ pravaro dharayā bhāryayā saha
analyzed: droṇaḥ vasūnām pravaraḥ dharayā bhāryayā saha

original: BhP_10.08.048/3 kariṣyamāṇa ādeśān brahmaṇas tam uvāca ha
analyzed: kariṣyamāṇaḥ ādeśān brahmaṇaḥ tam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.08.049/1 jātayor nau mahādeve bhuvi viśveśvare harau
analyzed: jātayoḥ nau mahādeve bhuvi viśveśvare harau

original: BhP_10.08.049/3 bhaktiḥ syāt paramā loke yayāñjo durgatiṃ taret
analyzed: bhaktiḥ syāt paramā loke yayā añjaḥ durgatim taret

original: BhP_10.08.050/1 astv ity uktaḥ sa bhagavān vraje droṇo mahā-yaśāḥ
analyzed: astu iti uktaḥ sa bhagavān vraje droṇaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_10.08.050/3 jajñe nanda iti khyāto yaśodā sā dharābhavat
analyzed: jajñe nandaḥ iti khyātaḥ yaśodā sā dharā bhavat

original: BhP_10.08.051/1 tato bhaktir bhagavati putrī-bhūte janārdane
analyzed: tatas bhaktiḥ bhagavati putrībhūte janārdane

original: BhP_10.08.051/3 dampatyor nitarām āsīd gopa-gopīṣu bhārata
analyzed: dampatyoḥ nitarām āsīt gopa gopīṣu bhārata

original: BhP_10.08.052/1 kṛṣṇo brahmaṇa ādeśaṃ satyaṃ kartuṃ vraje vibhuḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ brahmaṇaḥ ādeśam satyam kartum vraje vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.08.052/3 saha-rāmo vasaṃś cakre teṣāṃ prītiṃ sva-līlayā
analyzed: saha rāmaḥ vasan cakre teṣām prītim sva līlayā

original: BhP_10.09.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.09.001/1 ekadā gṛha-dāsīṣu yaśodā nanda-gehinī
analyzed: ekadā gṛha dāsīṣu yaśodā nanda gehinī

original: BhP_10.09.001/3 karmāntara-niyuktāsu nirmamantha svayaṃ dadhi
analyzed: karma antara niyuktāsu nirmamantha svayam dadhi

original: BhP_10.09.002/1 yāni yānīha gītāni tad-bāla-caritāni ca
analyzed: yāni yāni iha gītāni tad bāla caritāni ca

original: BhP_10.09.002/3 dadhi-nirmanthane kāle smarantī tāny agāyata
analyzed: dadhi nirmanthane kāle smarantī tāni agāyata

original: BhP_10.09.003/1 kṣaumaṃ vāsaḥ pṛthu-kaṭi-taṭe bibhratī sūtra-naddhaṃ
analyzed: kṣaumam vāsaḥ pṛthu kaṭi taṭe bibhratī sūtra naddham

original: BhP_10.09.003/2 putra-sneha-snuta-kuca-yugaṃ jāta-kampaṃ ca subhrūḥ
analyzed: putra sneha snuta kuca yugam jāta kampam ca subhrūḥ

original: BhP_10.09.003/3 rajjv-ākarṣa-śrama-bhuja-calat-kaṅkaṇau kuṇḍale ca
analyzed: rajju ākarṣa śrama bhuja calat kaṅkaṇau kuṇḍale ca

original: BhP_10.09.003/4 svinnaṃ vaktraṃ kabara-vigalan-mālatī nirmamantha
analyzed: svinnam vaktram kabara vigalat mālatī nirmamantha

original: BhP_10.09.004/1 tāṃ stanya-kāma āsādya mathnantīṃ jananīṃ hariḥ
analyzed: tām stanya kāmaḥ āsādya mathnantīm jananīm hariḥ

original: BhP_10.09.004/3 gṛhītvā dadhi-manthānaṃ nyaṣedhat prītim āvahan
analyzed: gṛhītvā dadhimanthānam nyaṣedhat prītim āvahan

original: BhP_10.09.005/1 tam aṅkam ārūḍham apāyayat stanaṃ sneha-snutaṃ sa-smitam īkṣatī mukham
analyzed: tam aṅkam ārūḍham apāyayat stanam sneha snutam sa smitam īkṣatī mukham

original: BhP_10.09.005/3 atṛptam utsṛjya javena sā yayāv utsicyamāne payasi tv adhiśrite
analyzed: atṛptam utsṛjya javena sā yayau utsicyamāne payasi tu adhiśrite

original: BhP_10.09.006/1 sañjāta-kopaḥ sphuritāruṇādharaṃ sandaśya dadbhir dadhi-mantha-bhājanam
analyzed: sañjāta kopaḥ sphurita aruṇa adharam sandaśya dadbhiḥ dadhimantha bhājanam

original: BhP_10.09.006/3 bhittvā mṛṣāśrur dṛṣad-aśmanā raho jaghāsa haiyaṅgavam antaraṃ gataḥ
analyzed: bhittvā mṛṣā aśruḥ dṛṣad aśmanā rahaḥ jaghāsa haiyaṅgavam antaram gataḥ

original: BhP_10.09.007/1 uttārya gopī suśṛtaṃ payaḥ punaḥ praviśya saṃdṛśya ca dadhy-amatrakam
analyzed: uttārya gopī su śṛtam payaḥ punar praviśya saṃdṛśya ca dadhi amatrakam

original: BhP_10.09.007/3 bhagnaṃ vilokya sva-sutasya karma taj jahāsa taṃ cāpi na tatra paśyatī
analyzed: bhagnam vilokya sva sutasya karma tat jahāsa tam ca api na tatra paśyatī

original: BhP_10.09.008/1 ulūkhalāṅghrer upari vyavasthitaṃ markāya kāmaṃ dadataṃ śici sthitam
analyzed: ulūkhala aṅghreḥ upari vyavasthitam markāya kāmam dadatam śici sthitam

original: BhP_10.09.008/3 haiyaṅgavaṃ caurya-viśaṅkitekṣaṇaṃ nirīkṣya paścāt sutam āgamac chanaiḥ
analyzed: haiyaṅgavam caurya viśaṅkita īkṣaṇam nirīkṣya paścāt sutam āgamat śanais

original: BhP_10.09.009/1 tām ātta-yaṣṭiṃ prasamīkṣya satvaras
analyzed: tām ātta yaṣṭim prasamīkṣya sa tvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.09.009/2 tato 'varuhyāpasasāra bhītavat
analyzed: tatas varuhya apasasāra bhīta vat

original: BhP_10.09.009/3 gopy anvadhāvan na yam āpa yogināṃ
analyzed: gopī anvadhāvat na yam āpa yoginām

original: BhP_10.09.009/4 kṣamaṃ praveṣṭuṃ tapaseritaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: kṣamam praveṣṭum tapasā īritam manaḥ

original: BhP_10.09.010/1 anvañcamānā jananī bṛhac-calac- chroṇī-bharākrānta-gatiḥ sumadhyamā
analyzed: anvañcamānā jananī bṛhat calat śroṇī bhara ākrānta gatiḥ sumadhyamā

original: BhP_10.09.010/3 javena visraṃsita-keśa-bandhana- cyuta-prasūnānugatiḥ parāmṛśat
analyzed: javena visraṃsita keśa bandhana cyuta prasūna anugatiḥ parāmṛśat

original: BhP_10.09.011/1 kṛtāgasaṃ taṃ prarudantam akṣiṇī kaṣantam añjan-maṣiṇī sva-pāṇinā
analyzed: kṛta āgasam tam prarudantam akṣiṇī kaṣantam añjat maṣiṇī sva pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.09.011/3 udvīkṣamāṇaṃ bhaya-vihvalekṣaṇaṃ haste gṛhītvā bhiṣayanty avāgurat
analyzed: udvīkṣamāṇam bhaya vihvala īkṣaṇam haste gṛhītvā bhiṣayantī avāgurat

original: BhP_10.09.012/1 tyaktvā yaṣṭiṃ sutaṃ bhītaṃ vijñāyārbhaka-vatsalā
analyzed: tyaktvā yaṣṭim sutam bhītam vijñāya arbhaka vatsalā

original: BhP_10.09.012/3 iyeṣa kila taṃ baddhuṃ dāmnātad-vīrya-kovidā
analyzed: iyeṣa kila tam baddhum dāmnāta dvīrya kovidā

original: BhP_10.09.013/1 na cāntar na bahir yasya na pūrvaṃ nāpi cāparam
analyzed: na ca antar na bahis yasya na pūrvam na api ca aparam

original: BhP_10.09.013/3 pūrvāparaṃ bahiś cāntar jagato yo jagac ca yaḥ
analyzed: pūrva aparam bahis ca antar jagataḥ yaḥ jagat ca yaḥ

original: BhP_10.09.014/1 taṃ matvātmajam avyaktaṃ martya-liṅgam adhokṣajam
analyzed: tam matvā ātmajam avyaktam martya liṅgam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_10.09.014/3 gopikolūkhale dāmnā babandha prākṛtaṃ yathā
analyzed: gopikā ulūkhale dāmnā babandha prākṛtam yathā

original: BhP_10.09.015/1 tad dāma badhyamānasya svārbhakasya kṛtāgasaḥ
analyzed: tat dāma badhyamānasya su ārbhakasya kṛta āgasaḥ

original: BhP_10.09.015/3 dvy-aṅgulonam abhūt tena sandadhe 'nyac ca gopikā
analyzed: dvi aṅgula ūnam abhūt tena sandadhe ca gopikā

original: BhP_10.09.016/1 yadāsīt tad api nyūnaṃ tenānyad api sandadhe
analyzed: yat āsīt tat api nyūnam tena anyat api sandadhe

original: BhP_10.09.016/3 tad api dvy-aṅgulaṃ nyūnaṃ yad yad ādatta bandhanam
analyzed: tat api dvi aṅgulam nyūnam yat yat ādatta bandhanam

original: BhP_10.09.017/1 evaṃ sva-geha-dāmāni yaśodā sandadhaty api
analyzed: evam sva geha dāmāni yaśodā sandadhatī api

original: BhP_10.09.017/3 gopīnāṃ susmayantīnāṃ smayantī vismitābhavat
analyzed: gopīnām su smayantīnām smayantī vismitā bhavat

original: BhP_10.09.018/1 sva-mātuḥ svinna-gātrāyā visrasta-kabara-srajaḥ
analyzed: sva mātuḥ svinna gātrāyāḥ visrasta kabara srajaḥ

original: BhP_10.09.018/3 dṛṣṭvā pariśramaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛpayāsīt sva-bandhane
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pariśramam kṛṣṇaḥ kṛpayā āsīt sva bandhane

original: BhP_10.09.019/1 evaṃ sandarśitā hy aṅga hariṇā bhṛtya-vaśyatā
analyzed: evam sandarśitā hi aṅga hariṇā bhṛtya vaśya tā

original: BhP_10.09.019/3 sva-vaśenāpi kṛṣṇena yasyedaṃ seśvaraṃ vaśe
analyzed: sva vaśena api kṛṣṇena yasya idam sa īśvaram vaśe

original: BhP_10.09.020/1 nemaṃ viriñco na bhavo na śrīr apy aṅga-saṃśrayā
analyzed: na imam viriñcaḥ na bhavaḥ na śrīḥ api aṅga saṃśrayā

original: BhP_10.09.020/3 prasādaṃ lebhire gopī yat tat prāpa vimuktidāt
analyzed: prasādam lebhire gopī yat tat prāpa vimukti dāt

original: BhP_10.09.021/1 nāyaṃ sukhāpo bhagavān dehināṃ gopikā-sutaḥ
analyzed: na ayam bhagavān dehinām gopikā sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.09.021/3 jñānināṃ cātma-bhūtānāṃ yathā bhaktimatām iha
analyzed: jñāninām ca ātma bhūtānām yathā bhaktimatām iha

original: BhP_10.09.022/1 kṛṣṇas tu gṛha-kṛtyeṣu vyagrāyāṃ mātari prabhuḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tu gṛha kṛtyeṣu vyagrāyām mātari prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.09.022/3 adrākṣīd arjunau pūrvaṃ guhyakau dhanadātmajau
analyzed: adrākṣīt arjunau pūrvam guhyakau dhanada ātmajau

original: BhP_10.09.023/1 purā nārada-śāpena vṛkṣatāṃ prāpitau madāt
analyzed: purā nārada śāpena vṛkṣa tām prāpitau madāt

original: BhP_10.09.023/3 nalakūvara-maṇigrīvāv iti khyātau śriyānvitau
analyzed: nalakūbara maṇigrīvau iti khyātau śriyā anvitau

original: BhP_10.10.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.001/1 kathyatāṃ bhagavann etat tayoḥ śāpasya kāraṇam
analyzed: kathyatām bhagavan etat tayoḥ śāpasya kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.10.001/3 yat tad vigarhitaṃ karma yena vā devarṣes tamaḥ
analyzed: yat tat vigarhitam karma yena vā devarṣeḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.002/1 rudrasyānucarau bhūtvā sudṛptau dhanadātmajau
analyzed: rudrasya anucarau bhūtvā su dṛptau dhanada ātmajau

original: BhP_10.10.002/3 kailāsopavane ramye mandākinyāṃ madotkaṭau
analyzed: kailāsa upavane ramye mandākinyām mada utkaṭau

original: BhP_10.10.003/1 vāruṇīṃ madirāṃ pītvā madāghūrṇita-locanau
analyzed: vāruṇīm madirām pītvā mada āghūrṇita locanau

original: BhP_10.10.003/3 strī-janair anugāyadbhiś ceratuḥ puṣpite vane
analyzed: strī janaiḥ anugāyadbhiḥ ceratuḥ puṣpite vane

original: BhP_10.10.004/1 antaḥ praviśya gaṅgāyām ambhoja-vana-rājini
analyzed: antar praviśya gaṅgāyām ambhoja vana rājini

original: BhP_10.10.004/3 cikrīḍatur yuvatibhir gajāv iva kareṇubhiḥ
analyzed: cikrīḍatuḥ yuvatibhiḥ gajau iva kareṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.10.005/1 yadṛcchayā ca devarṣir bhagavāṃs tatra kaurava
analyzed: yadṛcchayā ca deva ṛṣiḥ bhagavān tatra kaurava

original: BhP_10.10.005/3 apaśyan nārado devau kṣībāṇau samabudhyata
analyzed: apaśyat nāradaḥ devau kṣība aṇau samabudhyata

original: BhP_10.10.006/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā vrīḍitā devyo vivastrāḥ śāpa-śaṅkitāḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vrīḍitāḥ devyaḥ vivastrāḥ śāpa śaṅkitāḥ

original: BhP_10.10.006/3 vāsāṃsi paryadhuḥ śīghraṃ vivastrau naiva guhyakau
analyzed: vāsāṃsi paryadhuḥ śīghram vivastrau nā eva guhyakau

original: BhP_10.10.007/1 tau dṛṣṭvā madirā-mattau śrī-madāndhau surātmajau
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā madirā mattau śrī mada andhau sura ātmajau

original: BhP_10.10.007/3 tayor anugrahārthāya śāpaṃ dāsyann idaṃ jagau
analyzed: tayoḥ anugraha arthāya śāpam dāsyan idam jagau

original: BhP_10.10.008/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.008/1 na hy anyo juṣato joṣyān buddhi-bhraṃśo rajo-guṇaḥ
analyzed: na hi anyaḥ juṣataḥ joṣyān buddhi bhraṃśaḥ rajaḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.008/3 śrī-madād ābhijātyādir yatra strī dyūtam āsavaḥ
analyzed: śrīmadāt ābhijātya ādiḥ yatra strī dyūtam āsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.009/1 hanyante paśavo yatra nirdayair ajitātmabhiḥ
analyzed: hanyante paśavaḥ yatra nirdayaiḥ ajita ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.10.009/3 manyamānair imaṃ deham ajarāmṛtyu naśvaram
analyzed: manyamānaiḥ imam deham ajara amṛtyu naśvaram

original: BhP_10.10.010/1 deva-saṃjñitam apy ante kṛmi-viḍ-bhasma-saṃjñitam
analyzed: deva saṃjñitam api ante kṛmi viṣ bhasma saṃjñitam

original: BhP_10.10.010/3 bhūta-dhruk tat-kṛte svārthaṃ kiṃ veda nirayo yataḥ
analyzed: tad kṛte sva artham kim veda nirayaḥ yatas

original: BhP_10.10.011/1 dehaḥ kim anna-dātuḥ svaṃ niṣektur mātur eva ca
analyzed: dehaḥ kim anna dātuḥ svam niṣektuḥ mātuḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.10.011/3 mātuḥ pitur vā balinaḥ kretur agneḥ śuno 'pi vā
analyzed: mātuḥ pituḥ vā balinaḥ kretuḥ agneḥ śunaḥ vā

original: BhP_10.10.012/1 evaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ deham avyakta-prabhavāpyayam
analyzed: evam sādhāraṇam deham avyakta prabhava apyayam

original: BhP_10.10.012/3 ko vidvān ātmasāt kṛtvā hanti jantūn ṛte 'sataḥ
analyzed: kaḥ vidvān ātmasāt kṛtvā hanti jantūn ṛte sataḥ

original: BhP_10.10.013/1 asataḥ śrī-madāndhasya dāridryaṃ param añjanam
analyzed: asataḥ śrī mada andhasya dāridryam param añjanam

original: BhP_10.10.013/3 ātmaupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ param īkṣate
analyzed: ātma aupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ param īkṣate

original: BhP_10.10.014/1 yathā kaṇṭaka-viddhāṅgo jantor necchati tāṃ vyathām
analyzed: yathā kaṇṭaka viddha aṅgaḥ jantoḥ nā icchati tām vyathām

original: BhP_10.10.014/3 jīva-sāmyaṃ gato liṅgair na tathāviddha-kaṇṭakaḥ
analyzed: jīva sāmyam gataḥ liṅgaiḥ na tathā viddha kaṇṭakaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.015/1 daridro nirahaṃ-stambho muktaḥ sarva-madair iha
analyzed: daridraḥ muktaḥ sarva madaiḥ iha

original: BhP_10.10.015/3 kṛcchraṃ yadṛcchayāpnoti tad dhi tasya paraṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: kṛcchram yadṛcchayā āpnoti tat hi tasya param tapaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.016/1 nityaṃ kṣut-kṣāma-dehasya daridrasyānna-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: nityam kṣudh kṣāma dehasya daridrasya anna kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.016/3 indriyāṇy anuśuṣyanti hiṃsāpi vinivartate
analyzed: indriyāṇi anuśuṣyanti hiṃsā api vinivartate

original: BhP_10.10.017/1 daridrasyaiva yujyante sādhavaḥ sama-darśinaḥ
analyzed: daridrasya eva yujyante sādhavaḥ sama darśinaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.017/3 sadbhiḥ kṣiṇoti taṃ tarṣaṃ tata ārād viśuddhyati
analyzed: sadbhiḥ kṣiṇoti tam tarṣam tatas ārāt viśuddhi ati

original: BhP_10.10.018/1 sādhūnāṃ sama-cittānāṃ mukunda-caraṇaiṣiṇām
analyzed: sādhūnām samacittānām mukunda caraṇa eṣiṇām

original: BhP_10.10.018/3 upekṣyaiḥ kiṃ dhana-stambhair asadbhir asad-āśrayaiḥ
analyzed: upekṣyaiḥ kim dhana stambhaiḥ asadbhiḥ asat āśrayaiḥ

original: BhP_10.10.019/1 tad ahaṃ mattayor mādhvyā vāruṇyā śrī-madāndhayoḥ
analyzed: tat aham mattayoḥ mādhvyā vāruṇyā śrī mada andhayoḥ

original: BhP_10.10.019/3 tamo-madaṃ hariṣyāmi straiṇayor ajitātmanoḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ madam hariṣyāmi straiṇayoḥ ajita ātmanoḥ

original: BhP_10.10.020/1 yad imau loka-pālasya putrau bhūtvā tamaḥ-plutau
analyzed: yat imau lokapālasya putrau bhūtvā tamaḥ plutau

original: BhP_10.10.020/3 na vivāsasam ātmānaṃ vijānītaḥ sudurmadau
analyzed: na vivāsasam ātmānam vijānītaḥ su durmadau

original: BhP_10.10.021/1 ato 'rhataḥ sthāvaratāṃ syātāṃ naivaṃ yathā punaḥ
analyzed: atas rhataḥ sthāvara tām syātām na evam yathā punar

original: BhP_10.10.021/3 smṛtiḥ syān mat-prasādena tatrāpi mad-anugrahāt
analyzed: smṛtiḥ syāt mad prasādena tatra api mad anugrahāt

original: BhP_10.10.022/1 vāsudevasya sānnidhyaṃ labdhvā divya-śarac-chate
analyzed: vāsudevasya sānnidhyam labdhvā divya śarad śate

original: BhP_10.10.022/3 vṛtte svarlokatāṃ bhūyo labdha-bhaktī bhaviṣyataḥ
analyzed: vṛtte svarloka tām bhūyas labdha bhaktī bhaviṣyataḥ

original: BhP_10.10.023/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.023/1 evam uktvā sa devarṣir gato nārāyaṇāśramam
analyzed: evam uktvā sa devarṣiḥ gataḥ nārāyaṇa āśramam

original: BhP_10.10.023/3 nalakūvara-maṇigrīvāv āsatur yamalārjunau
analyzed: nalakūbara maṇigrīvau āsatuḥ yamala arjunau

original: BhP_10.10.024/1 ṛṣer bhāgavata-mukhyasya satyaṃ kartuṃ vaco hariḥ
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ bhāgavata mukhyasya satyam kartum vacaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.10.024/3 jagāma śanakais tatra yatrāstāṃ yamalārjunau
analyzed: jagāma śanakais tatra yatra āstām yamalārjunau

original: BhP_10.10.025/1 devarṣir me priyatamo yad imau dhanadātmajau
analyzed: devarṣiḥ me priyatamaḥ yat imau dhanada ātmajau

original: BhP_10.10.025/3 tat tathā sādhayiṣyāmi yad gītaṃ tan mahātmanā
analyzed: tat tathā sādhayiṣyāmi yat gītam tat mahātmanā

original: BhP_10.10.026/1 ity antareṇārjunayoḥ kṛṣṇas tu yamayor yayau
analyzed: iti antareṇa arjunayoḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu yamayoḥ yayau

original: BhP_10.10.026/3 ātma-nirveśa-mātreṇa tiryag-gatam ulūkhalam
analyzed: ātma nirveśa mātreṇa tiryak gatam ulūkhalam

original: BhP_10.10.027/1 bālena niṣkarṣayatānvag ulūkhalaṃ tad
analyzed: bālena niṣkarṣayata anvak ulūkhalam tat

original: BhP_10.10.027/2 dāmodareṇa tarasotkalitāṅghri-bandhau
analyzed: dāmodareṇa tarasā utkalita aṅghri bandhau

original: BhP_10.10.027/3 niṣpetatuḥ parama-vikramitātivepa-
analyzed: niṣpetatuḥ parama vikramitā ati vepa

original: BhP_10.10.027/4 skandha-pravāla-viṭapau kṛta-caṇḍa-śabdau
analyzed: skandha pravāla viṭapau kṛta caṇḍa śabdau

original: BhP_10.10.028/1 tatra śriyā paramayā kakubhaḥ sphurantau
analyzed: tatra śriyā paramayā kakubhaḥ sphurantau

original: BhP_10.10.028/2 siddhāv upetya kujayor iva jāta-vedāḥ
analyzed: siddhau upetya kujayoḥ iva jātavedāḥ

original: BhP_10.10.028/3 kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya śirasākhila-loka-nāthaṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam praṇamya śirasā akhila loka nātham

original: BhP_10.10.028/4 baddhāñjalī virajasāv idam ūcatuḥ sma
analyzed: baddhāñjalī virajasau idam ūcatuḥ sma

original: BhP_10.10.029/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogiṃs tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā yogin tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_10.10.029/3 vyaktāvyaktam idaṃ viśvaṃ rūpaṃ te brāhmaṇā viduḥ
analyzed: vyakta avyaktam idam viśvam rūpam te brāhmaṇāḥ viduḥ

original: BhP_10.10.030/1 tvam ekaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ dehāsv-ātmendriyeśvaraḥ
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ sarva bhūtānām

original: BhP_10.10.030/3 tvam eva kālo bhagavān viṣṇur avyaya īśvaraḥ
analyzed: tvam eva kālaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.10.031/1 tvaṃ mahān prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā rajaḥ-sattva-tamomayī
analyzed: tvam mahān prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ mayī

original: BhP_10.10.031/3 tvam eva puruṣo 'dhyakṣaḥ sarva-kṣetra-vikāra-vit
analyzed: tvam eva puruṣaḥ dhyakṣaḥ sarva kṣetra vikāra vid

original: BhP_10.10.032/1 gṛhyamāṇais tvam agrāhyo vikāraiḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: gṛhyamāṇaiḥ tvam a grāhyaḥ vikāraiḥ prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.10.032/3 ko nv ihārhati vijñātuṃ prāk siddhaṃ guṇa-saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu iha arhati vijñātum prāk siddham guṇa saṃvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.033/1 tasmai tubhyaṃ bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase
analyzed: tasmai tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase

original: BhP_10.10.033/3 ātma-dyota-guṇaiś channa- mahimne brahmaṇe namaḥ
analyzed: ātma dyota guṇaiḥ channa mahimne brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.034/1 yasyāvatārā jñāyante śarīreṣv aśarīriṇaḥ
analyzed: yasya avatārāḥ jñāyante śarīreṣu aśarīriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.034/3 tais tair atulyātiśayair vīryair dehiṣv asaṅgataiḥ
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ atulya atiśayaiḥ vīryaiḥ dehiṣu asaṅga taiḥ

original: BhP_10.10.035/1 sa bhavān sarva-lokasya bhavāya vibhavāya ca
analyzed: sa bhavān sarva lokasya bhavāya vibhavāya ca

original: BhP_10.10.035/3 avatīrṇo 'ṃśa-bhāgena sāmprataṃ patir āśiṣām
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ ṃśa bhāgena sāmpratam patiḥ āśiṣām

original: BhP_10.10.036/1 namaḥ parama-kalyāṇa namaḥ parama-maṅgala
analyzed: namaḥ parama kalyāṇa namaḥ parama maṅgala

original: BhP_10.10.036/3 vāsudevāya śāntāya yadūnāṃ pataye namaḥ
analyzed: vāsudevāya śāntāya yadūnām pataye namaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.037/1 anujānīhi nau bhūmaṃs tavānucara-kiṅkarau
analyzed: anujānīhi nau bhūman tava anucara kiṅkarau

original: BhP_10.10.037/3 darśanaṃ nau bhagavata ṛṣer āsīd anugrahāt
analyzed: darśanam nau bhagavataḥ ṛṣeḥ āsīt anugrahāt

original: BhP_10.10.038/1 vāṇī guṇānukathane śravaṇau kathāyāṃ
analyzed: vāṇī guṇa anukathane śravaṇau kathāyām

original: BhP_10.10.038/2 hastau ca karmasu manas tava pādayor naḥ
analyzed: hastau ca karmasu manaḥ tava pādayoḥ naḥ

original: BhP_10.10.038/3 smṛtyāṃ śiras tava nivāsa-jagat-praṇāme
analyzed: smṛtyām śiraḥ tava nivāsa jagat praṇāme

original: BhP_10.10.038/4 dṛṣṭiḥ satāṃ darśane 'stu bhavat-tanūnām
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ satām darśane stu bhavat tanūnām

original: BhP_10.10.039/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.039/1 itthaṃ saṅkīrtitas tābhyāṃ bhagavān gokuleśvaraḥ
analyzed: ittham saṅkīrtitaḥ tābhyām bhagavān gokula īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.10.039/3 dāmnā colūkhale baddhaḥ prahasann āha guhyakau
analyzed: dāmnā ca ulūkhale baddhaḥ prahasan āha guhyakau

original: BhP_10.10.040/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.040/1 jñātaṃ mama puraivaitad ṛṣiṇā karuṇātmanā
analyzed: jñātam mama purā eva etat ṛṣiṇā karuṇa ātmanā

original: BhP_10.10.040/3 yac chrī-madāndhayor vāgbhir vibhraṃśo 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat śrī mada andhayoḥ vāgbhiḥ vibhraṃśaḥ nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.041/1 sādhūnāṃ sama-cittānāṃ sutarāṃ mat-kṛtātmanām
analyzed: sādhūnām samacittānām sutarām mad kṛtātmanām

original: BhP_10.10.041/3 darśanān no bhaved bandhaḥ puṃso 'kṣṇoḥ savitur yathā
analyzed: darśanāt naḥ bhavet bandhaḥ puṃso kṣṇoḥ savituḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.10.042/1 tad gacchataṃ mat-paramau nalakūvara sādanam
analyzed: tat gacchatam mad paramau nalakūvara sādanam

original: BhP_10.10.042/3 sañjāto mayi bhāvo vām īpsitaḥ paramo 'bhavaḥ
analyzed: sañjātaḥ mayi bhāvaḥ vām īpsitaḥ paramaḥ bhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.10.043/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.10.043/1 ity uktau tau parikramya praṇamya ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: iti uktau tau parikramya praṇamya ca punar punar

original: BhP_10.10.043/3 baddholūkhalam āmantrya jagmatur diśam uttarām
analyzed: baddha ulūkhalam āmantrya jagmatuḥ diśam uttarām

original: BhP_10.11.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.11.001/1 gopā nandādayaḥ śrutvā drumayoḥ patato ravam
analyzed: gopāḥ nanda ādayaḥ śrutvā drumayoḥ patataḥ ravam

original: BhP_10.11.001/3 tatrājagmuḥ kuru-śreṣṭha nirghāta-bhaya-śaṅkitāḥ
analyzed: tatra ājagmuḥ kuru śreṣṭha nirghāta bhaya śaṅkitāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.002/1 bhūmyāṃ nipatitau tatra dadṛśur yamalārjunau
analyzed: bhūmyām nipatitau tatra dadṛśuḥ yamalārjunau

original: BhP_10.11.002/3 babhramus tad avijñāya lakṣyaṃ patana-kāraṇam
analyzed: babhramuḥ tat a vijñāya lakṣyam patana kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.11.003/1 ulūkhalaṃ vikarṣantaṃ dāmnā baddhaṃ ca bālakam
analyzed: ulūkhalam vikarṣantam dāmnā baddham ca bālakam

original: BhP_10.11.003/3 kasyedaṃ kuta āścaryam utpāta iti kātarāḥ
analyzed: kasya idam kutas āścaryam utpātaḥ iti kātarāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.004/1 bālā ūcur aneneti tiryag-gatam ulūkhalam
analyzed: bālāḥ ūcuḥ anena iti tiryak gatam ulūkhalam

original: BhP_10.11.004/3 vikarṣatā madhya-gena puruṣāv apy acakṣmahi
analyzed: vikarṣatā madhya gena puruṣau api acakṣmahi

original: BhP_10.11.005/1 na te tad-uktaṃ jagṛhur na ghaṭeteti tasya tat
analyzed: na te tat uktam jagṛhuḥ na ghaṭeta iti tasya tat

original: BhP_10.11.005/3 bālasyotpāṭanaṃ tarvoḥ kecit sandigdha-cetasaḥ
analyzed: bālasya utpāṭanam tarvoḥ kecid sandigdha cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.006/1 ulūkhalaṃ vikarṣantaṃ dāmnā baddhaṃ svam ātmajam
analyzed: ulūkhalam vikarṣantam dāmnā baddham svam ātmajam

original: BhP_10.11.006/3 vilokya nandaḥ prahasad- vadano vimumoca ha
analyzed: vilokya nandaḥ prahasat vadanaḥ vimumoca ha

original: BhP_10.11.007/1 gopībhiḥ stobhito 'nṛtyad bhagavān bālavat kvacit
analyzed: gopībhiḥ stobhitaḥ nṛtyat bhagavān bāla vat kvacid

original: BhP_10.11.007/3 udgāyati kvacin mugdhas tad-vaśo dāru-yantravat
analyzed: udgāyati kvacid mugdhaḥ tad vaśaḥ dāruyantra vat

original: BhP_10.11.008/1 bibharti kvacid ājñaptaḥ pīṭhakonmāna-pādukam
analyzed: bibharti kvacid ājñaptaḥ pīṭhaka unmāna pādukam

original: BhP_10.11.008/3 bāhu-kṣepaṃ ca kurute svānāṃ ca prītim āvahan
analyzed: bāhukṣepam ca kurute svānām ca prītim āvahan

original: BhP_10.11.009/1 darśayaṃs tad-vidāṃ loka ātmano bhṛtya-vaśyatām
analyzed: darśayan tad vidām loke ātmanaḥ bhṛtya vaśya tām

original: BhP_10.11.009/3 vrajasyovāha vai harṣaṃ bhagavān bāla-ceṣṭitaiḥ
analyzed: vrajasya uvāha vai harṣam bhagavān bāla ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.010/1 krīṇīhi bhoḥ phalānīti śrutvā satvaram acyutaḥ
analyzed: krīṇīhi bhoḥ phalāni iti śrutvā sa tvaram acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.010/3 phalārthī dhānyam ādāya yayau sarva-phala-pradaḥ
analyzed: phala arthī dhānyam ādāya yayau sarva phala pradaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.011/1 phala-vikrayiṇī tasya cyuta-dhānya-kara-dvayam
analyzed: phala vikrayiṇī tasya cyuta dhānya kara dvayam

original: BhP_10.11.011/3 phalair apūrayad ratnaiḥ phala-bhāṇḍam apūri ca
analyzed: phalaiḥ apūrayat ratnaiḥ phala bhāṇḍam apūri ca

original: BhP_10.11.012/1 sarit-tīra-gataṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bhagnārjunam athāhvayat
analyzed: sarit tīra gatam kṛṣṇam bhagna arjunam atha āhvayat

original: BhP_10.11.012/3 rāmaṃ ca rohiṇī devī krīḍantaṃ bālakair bhṛśam
analyzed: rāmam ca rohiṇī devī krīḍantam bālakaiḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.11.013/1 nopeyātāṃ yadāhūtau krīḍā-saṅgena putrakau
analyzed: na upeyātām yadā āhūtau krīḍā saṅgena putrakau

original: BhP_10.11.013/3 yaśodāṃ preṣayām āsa rohiṇī putra-vatsalām
analyzed: yaśodām preṣayām āsa rohiṇī putra vatsalām

original: BhP_10.11.014/1 krīḍantaṃ sā sutaṃ bālair ativelaṃ sahāgrajam
analyzed: krīḍantam sā sutam bālaiḥ ativelam saha agrajam

original: BhP_10.11.014/3 yaśodājohavīt kṛṣṇaṃ putra-sneha-snuta-stanī
analyzed: yaśodā ajohavīt kṛṣṇam putra sneha snuta stanī

original: BhP_10.11.015/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇāravindākṣa tāta ehi stanaṃ piba
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa aravinda akṣa tāta ehi stanam piba

original: BhP_10.11.015/3 alaṃ vihāraiḥ kṣut-kṣāntaḥ krīḍā-śrānto 'si putraka
analyzed: alam vihāraiḥ kṣudh kṣāntaḥ krīḍā śrāntaḥ si putraka

original: BhP_10.11.016/1 he rāmāgaccha tātāśu sānujaḥ kula-nandana
analyzed: he rāma āgaccha tāta āśu sa anujaḥ kula nandana

original: BhP_10.11.016/3 prātar eva kṛtāhāras tad bhavān bhoktum arhati
analyzed: prātar eva kṛta āhāraḥ tat bhavān bhoktum arhati

original: BhP_10.11.017/1 pratīkṣate tvāṃ dāśārha bhokṣyamāṇo vrajādhipaḥ
analyzed: pratīkṣate tvām dāśārha bhokṣyamāṇaḥ vraja adhipaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.017/3 ehy āvayoḥ priyaṃ dhehi sva-gṛhān yāta bālakāḥ
analyzed: ehi āvayoḥ priyam dhehi sva gṛhān yāta bālakāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.018/1 dhūli-dhūsaritāṅgas tvaṃ putra majjanam āvaha
analyzed: dhūli dhūsarita aṅgaḥ tvam putra majjanam āvaha

original: BhP_10.11.018/3 janmarkṣaṃ te 'dya bhavati viprebhyo dehi gāḥ śuciḥ
analyzed: janma ṛkṣam te dya bhavati viprebhyaḥ dehi gāḥ śuciḥ

original: BhP_10.11.019/1 paśya paśya vayasyāṃs te mātṛ-mṛṣṭān svalaṅkṛtān
analyzed: paśya paśya vayasyān te mātṛ mṛṣṭān su alaṅkṛtān

original: BhP_10.11.019/3 tvaṃ ca snātaḥ kṛtāhāro viharasva svalaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: tvam ca snātaḥ kṛta āhāraḥ viharasva su alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.020/1 itthaṃ yaśodā tam aśeṣa-śekharaṃ matvā sutaṃ sneha-nibaddha-dhīr nṛpa
analyzed: ittham yaśodā tam aśeṣa śekharam matvā sutam sneha nibaddha dhīḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.11.020/3 haste gṛhītvā saha-rāmam acyutaṃ nītvā sva-vāṭaṃ kṛtavaty athodayam
analyzed: haste gṛhītvā saha rāmam acyutam nītvā sva vāṭam kṛtavatī atha udayam

original: BhP_10.11.021/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.11.021/1 gopa-vṛddhā mahotpātān anubhūya bṛhadvane
analyzed: gopa vṛddhāḥ mahā utpātān anubhūya bṛhat vane

original: BhP_10.11.021/3 nandādayaḥ samāgamya vraja-kāryam amantrayan
analyzed: nanda ādayaḥ samāgamya vraja kāryam amantrayan

original: BhP_10.11.022/1 tatropānanda-nāmāha gopo jñāna-vayo-'dhikaḥ
analyzed: tatra upānandanām āha gopaḥ jñāna vayaḥ adhikaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.022/3 deśa-kālārtha-tattva-jñaḥ priya-kṛd rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
BhP_10.11.023/1 utthātavyam ito 'smābhir gokulasya hitaiṣibhiḥ
analyzed: utthātavyam itas smābhiḥ gokulasya hita eṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.023/3 āyānty atra mahotpātā bālānāṃ nāśa-hetavaḥ
analyzed: āyānti atra mahā utpātāḥ bālānām nāśa hetavaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.024/1 muktaḥ kathañcid rākṣasyā bāla-ghnyā bālako hy asau
analyzed: muktaḥ kathañcid rākṣasyā bāla ghnyā bālakaḥ hi asau

original: BhP_10.11.024/3 harer anugrahān nūnam anaś copari nāpatat
analyzed: hareḥ anugrahāt nūnam anaḥ ca upari na apatat

original: BhP_10.11.025/1 cakra-vātena nīto 'yaṃ daityena vipadaṃ viyat
analyzed: cakra vātena nītaḥ yam daityena vipadam viyat

original: BhP_10.11.025/3 śilāyāṃ patitas tatra paritrātaḥ sureśvaraiḥ
analyzed: śilāyām patitaḥ tatra paritrātaḥ sura īśvaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.026/1 yan na mriyeta drumayor antaraṃ prāpya bālakaḥ
analyzed: yat na mriyeta drumayoḥ antaram prāpya bālakaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.026/3 asāv anyatamo vāpi tad apy acyuta-rakṣaṇam
analyzed: asau anyatamaḥ vā api tat api acyuta rakṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.11.027/1 yāvad autpātiko 'riṣṭo vrajaṃ nābhibhaved itaḥ
analyzed: yāvat autpātikaḥ riṣṭaḥ vrajam na abhibhavet itas

original: BhP_10.11.027/3 tāvad bālān upādāya yāsyāmo 'nyatra sānugāḥ
analyzed: tāvat bālān upādāya yāsyāmaḥ nyatra sa anugāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.028/1 vanaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ nāma paśavyaṃ nava-kānanam
analyzed: vanam vṛndāvanam nāma paśavyam nava kānanam

original: BhP_10.11.028/3 gopa-gopī-gavāṃ sevyaṃ puṇyādri-tṛṇa-vīrudham
BhP_10.11.029/1 tat tatrādyaiva yāsyāmaḥ śakaṭān yuṅkta mā ciram
analyzed: tat tatra adya eva yāsyāmaḥ śakaṭān yuṅkta mā ciram

original: BhP_10.11.029/3 godhanāny agrato yāntu bhavatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: go dhanāni agratas yāntu bhavatām yadi rocate

original: BhP_10.11.030/1 tac chrutvaika-dhiyo gopāḥ sādhu sādhv iti vādinaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā eka dhiyaḥ gopāḥ sādhu sādhu iti vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.030/3 vrajān svān svān samāyujya yayū rūḍha-paricchadāḥ
analyzed: vrajān svān svān samāyujya yayuḥ rūḍha paricchadāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.031/1 vṛddhān bālān striyo rājan sarvopakaraṇāni ca
analyzed: vṛddhān bālān striyaḥ rājan sarva upakaraṇāni ca

original: BhP_10.11.031/3 anaḥsv āropya gopālā yattā ātta-śarāsanāḥ
analyzed: anaḥsu āropya gopālāḥ yattāḥ ātta śarāsanāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.032/1 godhanāni puraskṛtya śṛṅgāṇy āpūrya sarvataḥ
analyzed: go dhanāni puraskṛtya śṛṅgāṇi āpūrya sarvatas

original: BhP_10.11.032/3 tūrya-ghoṣeṇa mahatā yayuḥ saha-purohitāḥ
analyzed: tūrya ghoṣeṇa mahatā yayuḥ saha purohitāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.033/1 gopyo rūḍha-rathā nūtna- kuca-kuṅkuma-kāntayaḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ rūḍha rathāḥ kuca kuṅkuma kāntayaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.033/3 kṛṣṇa-līlā jaguḥ prītyā niṣka-kaṇṭhyaḥ suvāsasaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa līlāḥ jaguḥ prītyā niṣka kaṇṭhyaḥ su vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.034/1 tathā yaśodā-rohiṇyāv ekaṃ śakaṭam āsthite
analyzed: tathā yaśodā rohiṇyau ekam śakaṭam āsthite

original: BhP_10.11.034/3 rejatuḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmābhyāṃ tat-kathā-śravaṇotsuke
analyzed: rejatuḥ kṛṣṇa rāmābhyām tad kathā śravaṇa utsuke

original: BhP_10.11.035/1 vṛndāvanaṃ sampraviśya sarva-kāla-sukhāvaham
analyzed: vṛndāvanam sampraviśya sarva kāla sukha āvaham

original: BhP_10.11.035/3 tatra cakrur vrajāvāsaṃ śakaṭair ardha-candravat
analyzed: tatra cakruḥ vraja āvāsam śakaṭaiḥ ardhacandra vat

original: BhP_10.11.036/1 vṛndāvanaṃ govardhanaṃ yamunā-pulināni ca
analyzed: vṛndāvanam govardhanam yamunā pulināni ca

original: BhP_10.11.036/3 vīkṣyāsīd uttamā prītī rāma-mādhavayor nṛpa
analyzed: vīkṣya āsīt uttamā prītiḥ rāma mādhavayoḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.11.037/1 evaṃ vrajaukasāṃ prītiṃ yacchantau bāla-ceṣṭitaiḥ
analyzed: evam vraja okasām prītim yacchantau bāla ceṣṭitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.037/3 kala-vākyaiḥ sva-kālena vatsa-pālau babhūvatuḥ
analyzed: kala vākyaiḥ sva kālena vatsa pālau babhūvatuḥ

original: BhP_10.11.038/1 avidūre vraja-bhuvaḥ saha gopāla-dārakaiḥ
analyzed: avidūre vraja bhuvaḥ saha gopāla dārakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.038/3 cārayām āsatur vatsān nānā-krīḍā-paricchadau
analyzed: cārayām āsatuḥ vatsān nānā krīḍā paricchadau

original: BhP_10.11.039/1 kvacid vādayato veṇuṃ kṣepaṇaiḥ kṣipataḥ kvacit
analyzed: kvacid vādayataḥ veṇum kṣepaṇaiḥ kṣipataḥ kvacid

original: BhP_10.11.039/3 kvacit pādaiḥ kiṅkiṇībhiḥ kvacit kṛtrima-go-vṛṣaiḥ
analyzed: kvacid pādaiḥ kiṅkiṇībhiḥ kvacid kṛtrima govṛṣaiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.040/1 vṛṣāyamāṇau nardantau yuyudhāte parasparam
analyzed: vṛṣāyamāṇau nardantau yuyudhāte parasparam

original: BhP_10.11.040/3 anukṛtya rutair jantūṃś ceratuḥ prākṛtau yathā
analyzed: anukṛtya rutaiḥ jantūn ceratuḥ prākṛtau yathā

original: BhP_10.11.041/1 kadācid yamunā-tīre vatsāṃś cārayatoḥ svakaiḥ
analyzed: kadācid yamunā tīre vatsān cārayatoḥ svakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.041/3 vayasyaiḥ kṛṣṇa-balayor jighāṃsur daitya āgamat
analyzed: vayasyaiḥ kṛṣṇa balayoḥ jighāṃsuḥ daityaḥ āgamat

original: BhP_10.11.042/1 taṃ vatsa-rūpiṇaṃ vīkṣya vatsa-yūtha-gataṃ hariḥ
analyzed: tam vatsa rūpiṇam vīkṣya vatsa yūtha gatam hariḥ

original: BhP_10.11.042/3 darśayan baladevāya śanair mugdha ivāsadat
analyzed: darśayan baladevāya śanais mugdhaḥ iva asadat

original: BhP_10.11.043/1 gṛhītvāpara-pādābhyāṃ saha-lāṅgūlam acyutaḥ
analyzed: gṛhītvā apara pādābhyām saha lāṅgūlam acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.043/3 bhrāmayitvā kapitthāgre prāhiṇod gata-jīvitam
analyzed: bhrāmayitvā kapittha agre prāhiṇot gata jīvitam

original: BhP_10.11.043/5 sa kapitthair mahā-kāyaḥ pātyamānaiḥ papāta ha
analyzed: sa kapitthaiḥ mahā kāyaḥ pātyamānaiḥ papāta ha

original: BhP_10.11.044/1 taṃ vīkṣya vismitā bālāḥ śaśaṃsuḥ sādhu sādhv iti
analyzed: tam vīkṣya vismitāḥ bālāḥ śaśaṃsuḥ sādhu sādhu iti

original: BhP_10.11.044/3 devāś ca parisantuṣṭā babhūvuḥ puṣpa-varṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ca parisantuṣṭāḥ babhūvuḥ puṣpa varṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.045/1 tau vatsa-pālakau bhūtvā sarva-lokaika-pālakau
analyzed: tau vatsa pālakau bhūtvā sarva loka eka pālakau

original: BhP_10.11.045/3 saprātar-āśau go-vatsāṃś cārayantau viceratuḥ
analyzed: sa prātarāśau go vatsān cārayantau viceratuḥ

original: BhP_10.11.046/1 svaṃ svaṃ vatsa-kulaṃ sarve pāyayiṣyanta ekadā
analyzed: svam svam vatsa kulam sarve pāyayiṣyante ekadā

original: BhP_10.11.046/3 gatvā jalāśayābhyāśaṃ pāyayitvā papur jalam
analyzed: gatvā jalāśaya abhyāśam pāyayitvā papuḥ jalam

original: BhP_10.11.047/1 te tatra dadṛśur bālā mahā-sattvam avasthitam
analyzed: te tatra dadṛśuḥ bālāḥ mahā sattvam avasthitam

original: BhP_10.11.047/3 tatrasur vajra-nirbhinnaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgam iva cyutam
analyzed: tatrasuḥ vajra nirbhinnam gireḥ śṛṅgam iva cyutam

original: BhP_10.11.048/1 sa vai bako nāma mahān asuro baka-rūpa-dhṛk
analyzed: sa vai bakaḥ nāma mahān asuraḥ baka rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_10.11.048/3 āgatya sahasā kṛṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇa-tuṇḍo 'grasad balī
analyzed: āgatya sahasā kṛṣṇam tīkṣṇa tuṇḍaḥ grasat balī

original: BhP_10.11.049/1 kṛṣṇaṃ mahā-baka-grastaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmādayo 'rbhakāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam mahā baka grastam dṛṣṭvā rāma ādayaḥ ṛbhakāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.049/3 babhūvur indriyāṇīva vinā prāṇaṃ vicetasaḥ
analyzed: babhūvuḥ indriyāṇi iva vinā prāṇam vicetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.050/1 taṃ tālu-mūlaṃ pradahantam agnivad gopāla-sūnuṃ pitaraṃ jagad-guroḥ
analyzed: tam tālu mūlam pradahantam agni vat gopāla sūnum pitaram jagadguroḥ

original: BhP_10.11.050/3 caccharda sadyo 'tiruṣākṣataṃ bakas tuṇḍena hantuṃ punar abhyapadyata
analyzed: caccharda sadyo tiruṣākṣatam bakaḥ tuṇḍena hantum punar abhyapadyata

original: BhP_10.11.051/1 tam āpatantaṃ sa nigṛhya tuṇḍayor dorbhyāṃ bakaṃ kaṃsa-sakhaṃ satāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tam āpatantam sa nigṛhya tuṇḍayoḥ dorbhyām bakam kaṃsa sakham satām patiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.051/3 paśyatsu bāleṣu dadāra līlayā mudāvaho vīraṇavad divaukasām
analyzed: paśyatsu bāleṣu dadāra līlayā mudā āvahaḥ vīraṇa vat divaukasām

original: BhP_10.11.052/1 tadā bakāriṃ sura-loka-vāsinaḥ samākiran nandana-mallikādibhiḥ
analyzed: tadā baka arim sura loka vāsinaḥ samākiran nandana mallikā ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.11.052/3 samīḍire cānaka-śaṅkha-saṃstavais tad vīkṣya gopāla-sutā visismire
analyzed: samīḍire ca ānaka śaṅkha saṃstavaiḥ tat vīkṣya gopāla sutāḥ visismire

original: BhP_10.11.053/1 muktaṃ bakāsyād upalabhya bālakā rāmādayaḥ prāṇam ivendriyo gaṇaḥ
analyzed: muktam baka āsyāt upalabhya bālakāḥ rāma ādayaḥ prāṇam iva indriyaḥ gaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.11.053/3 sthānāgataṃ taṃ parirabhya nirvṛtāḥ praṇīya vatsān vrajam etya taj jaguḥ
analyzed: sthāna āgatam tam parirabhya nirvṛtāḥ praṇīya vatsān vrajam etya tat jaguḥ

original: BhP_10.11.054/1 śrutvā tad vismitā gopā gopyaś cātipriyādṛtāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā tat vismitāḥ gopāḥ gopyaḥ ca ati priya ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.054/3 pretyāgatam ivotsukyād aikṣanta tṛṣitekṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: pretya āgatam iva utsukyāt aikṣanta tṛṣita īkṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.055/1 aho batāsya bālasya bahavo mṛtyavo 'bhavan
analyzed: aho bata asya bālasya bahavaḥ mṛtyavaḥ bhavan

original: BhP_10.11.055/3 apy āsīd vipriyaṃ teṣāṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yato bhayam
analyzed: api āsīt vipriyam teṣām kṛtam pūrvam yatas bhayam

original: BhP_10.11.056/1 athāpy abhibhavanty enaṃ naiva te ghora-darśanāḥ
analyzed: atha api abhibhavanti enam na eva te ghora darśanāḥ

original: BhP_10.11.056/3 jighāṃsayainam āsādya naśyanty agnau pataṅgavat
analyzed: jighāṃsayā enam āsādya naśyanti agnau pataṅga vat

original: BhP_10.11.057/1 aho brahma-vidāṃ vāco nāsatyāḥ santi karhicit
analyzed: aho brahma vidām vācaḥ nāsatyāḥ santi karhicit

original: BhP_10.11.057/3 gargo yad āha bhagavān anvabhāvi tathaiva tat
analyzed: gargaḥ yat āha bhagavān anvabhāvi tathā eva tat

original: BhP_10.11.058/1 iti nandādayo gopāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma-kathāṃ mudā
analyzed: iti nanda ādayaḥ gopāḥ kṛṣṇa rāma kathām mudā

original: BhP_10.11.058/3 kurvanto ramamāṇāś ca nāvindan bhava-vedanām
analyzed: kurvantaḥ ramamāṇāḥ ca na avindan bhava vedanām

original: BhP_10.11.059/1 evaṃ vihāraiḥ kaumāraiḥ kaumāraṃ jahatur vraje
analyzed: evam vihāraiḥ kaumāraiḥ kaumāram jahatuḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.11.059/3 nilāyanaiḥ setu-bandhair markaṭotplavanādibhiḥ
analyzed: nilāyanaiḥ setu bandhaiḥ markaṭa utplavana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.12.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.12.001/1 kvacid vanāśāya mano dadhad vrajāt prātaḥ samutthāya vayasya-vatsapān
analyzed: kvacid vana āśāya manaḥ dadhat vrajāt prātar samutthāya vayasya vatsapān

original: BhP_10.12.001/3 prabodhayañ chṛṅga-raveṇa cāruṇā vinirgato vatsa-puraḥsaro hariḥ
analyzed: prabodhayam śṛṅga raveṇa cāruṇā vinirgataḥ vatsa puraḥsaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.12.002/1 tenaiva sākaṃ pṛthukāḥ sahasraśaḥ snigdhāḥ suśig-vetra-viṣāṇa-veṇavaḥ
analyzed: tena eva sākam pṛthukāḥ sahasraśas snigdhāḥ suśij vetra viṣāṇa veṇavaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.002/3 svān svān sahasropari-saṅkhyayānvitān vatsān puraskṛtya viniryayur mudā
analyzed: svān svān sahasra upari saṅkhyayā anvitān vatsān puraskṛtya viniryayuḥ mudā

original: BhP_10.12.003/1 kṛṣṇa-vatsair asaṅkhyātair yūthī-kṛtya sva-vatsakān
analyzed: kṛṣṇa vatsaiḥ asaṅkhyātaiḥ yūthīkṛtya sva vatsakān

original: BhP_10.12.003/3 cārayanto 'rbha-līlābhir vijahrus tatra tatra ha
analyzed: cārayantaḥ ṛbha līlābhiḥ vijahruḥ tatra tatra ha

original: BhP_10.12.004/1 phala-prabāla-stavaka- sumanaḥ-piccha-dhātubhiḥ
BhP_10.12.004/3 kāca-guñjā-maṇi-svarṇa- bhūṣitā apy abhūṣayan
analyzed: bhūṣitāḥ api abhūṣayan

original: BhP_10.12.005/1 muṣṇanto 'nyonya-śikyādīn jñātān ārāc ca cikṣipuḥ
analyzed: muṣṇantaḥ nyonya śikya ādīn jñātān ārāt ca cikṣipuḥ

original: BhP_10.12.005/3 tatratyāś ca punar dūrād dhasantaś ca punar daduḥ
analyzed: tatratyāḥ ca punar dūrāt hasantaḥ ca punar daduḥ

original: BhP_10.12.006/1 yadi dūraṃ gataḥ kṛṣṇo vana-śobhekṣaṇāya tam
analyzed: yadi dūram gataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ vana śobhā īkṣaṇāya tam

original: BhP_10.12.006/3 ahaṃ pūrvam ahaṃ pūrvam iti saṃspṛśya remire
analyzed: aham pūrvam aham pūrvam iti saṃspṛśya remire

original: BhP_10.12.007/1 kecid veṇūn vādayanto dhmāntaḥ śṛṅgāṇi kecana
analyzed: kecid veṇūn vādayantaḥ dhmāntaḥ śṛṅgāṇi kecana

original: BhP_10.12.007/3 kecid bhṛṅgaiḥ pragāyantaḥ kūjantaḥ kokilaiḥ pare
analyzed: kecid bhṛṅgaiḥ pragāyantaḥ kūjantaḥ kokilaiḥ pare

original: BhP_10.12.008/1 vicchāyābhiḥ pradhāvanto gacchantaḥ sādhu-haṃsakaiḥ
analyzed: vicchāyābhiḥ pradhāvantaḥ gacchantaḥ sādhu haṃsakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.12.008/3 bakair upaviśantaś ca nṛtyantaś ca kalāpibhiḥ
analyzed: bakaiḥ upaviśantaḥ ca nṛtyantaḥ ca kalāpibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.12.009/1 vikarṣantaḥ kīśa-bālān ārohantaś ca tair drumān
analyzed: vikarṣantaḥ kīśa bālān ārohantaḥ ca taiḥ drumān

original: BhP_10.12.009/3 vikurvantaś ca taiḥ sākaṃ plavantaś ca palāśiṣu
analyzed: vikurvantaḥ ca taiḥ sākam plavantaḥ ca palāśiṣu

original: BhP_10.12.010/1 sākaṃ bhekair vilaṅghantaḥ saritaḥ srava-samplutāḥ
analyzed: sākam bhekaiḥ vilaṅghantaḥ saritaḥ srava samplutāḥ

original: BhP_10.12.010/3 vihasantaḥ praticchāyāḥ śapantaś ca pratisvanān
analyzed: vihasantaḥ praticchāyāḥ śapantaḥ ca

original: BhP_10.12.011/1 itthaṃ satāṃ brahma-sukhānubhūtyā dāsyaṃ gatānāṃ para-daivatena
analyzed: ittham satām brahma sukha anubhūtyā dāsyam gatānām para daivatena

original: BhP_10.12.011/3 māyāśritānāṃ nara-dārakeṇa sākaṃ vijahruḥ kṛta-puṇya-puñjāḥ
analyzed: māyā āśritānām nara dārakeṇa sākam vijahruḥ kṛta puṇya puñjāḥ

original: BhP_10.12.012/1 yat-pāda-pāṃsur bahu-janma-kṛcchrato
analyzed: yad pāda pāṃsuḥ bahu janma kṛcchrataḥ

original: BhP_10.12.012/2 dhṛtātmabhir yogibhir apy alabhyaḥ
analyzed: dhṛta ātmabhiḥ yogibhiḥ api alabhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.012/3 sa eva yad-dṛg-viṣayaḥ svayaṃ sthitaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva yad dṛś viṣayaḥ svayam sthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.012/4 kiṃ varṇyate diṣṭam ato vrajaukasām
analyzed: kim varṇyate diṣṭam atas vrajaukasām

original: BhP_10.12.013/1 athāgha-nāmābhyapatan mahāsuras teṣāṃ sukha-krīḍana-vīkṣaṇākṣamaḥ
analyzed: atha agha nāmā abhyapatat mahā asuraḥ teṣām sukha krīḍana vīkṣaṇa akṣamaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.013/3 nityaṃ yad-antar nija-jīvitepsubhiḥ pītāmṛtair apy amaraiḥ pratīkṣyate
analyzed: nityam yat antar nija jīvita īpsubhiḥ pīta amṛtaiḥ api amaraiḥ pratīkṣyate

original: BhP_10.12.014/1 dṛṣṭvārbhakān kṛṣṇa-mukhān aghāsuraḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā arbhakān kṛṣṇa mukhān agha asuraḥ

original: BhP_10.12.014/2 kaṃsānuśiṣṭaḥ sa bakī-bakānujaḥ
analyzed: kaṃsa anuśiṣṭaḥ sa bakībaka anujaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.014/3 ayaṃ tu me sodara-nāśa-kṛt tayor
analyzed: ayam tu me sodara nāśa kṛt tayoḥ

original: BhP_10.12.014/4 dvayor mamainaṃ sa-balaṃ haniṣye
analyzed: dvayoḥ mama enam sa balam haniṣye

original: BhP_10.12.015/1 ete yadā mat-suhṛdos tilāpaḥ kṛtās tadā naṣṭa-samā vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: ete yadā mad suhṛdoḥ kṛtāḥ tadā naṣṭa samāḥ vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.015/3 prāṇe gate varṣmasu kā nu cintā prajāsavaḥ prāṇa-bhṛto hi ye te
analyzed: prāṇe gate varṣmasu kā nu cintā prajā asavaḥ prāṇabhṛtaḥ hi ye te

original: BhP_10.12.016/1 iti vyavasyājagaraṃ bṛhad vapuḥ sa yojanāyāma-mahādri-pīvaram
analyzed: iti vyavasya ājagaram bṛhat vapuḥ sa yojana āyāma mahā adri pīvaram

original: BhP_10.12.016/3 dhṛtvādbhutaṃ vyātta-guhānanaṃ tadā pathi vyaśeta grasanāśayā khalaḥ
analyzed: dhṛtvā adbhutam vyātta guhā ānanam tadā pathi vyaśeta grasana āśayā khalaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.017/1 dharādharoṣṭho jaladottaroṣṭho dary-ānanānto giri-śṛṅga-daṃṣṭraḥ
BhP_10.12.017/3 dhvāntāntar-āsyo vitatādhva-jihvaḥ paruṣānila-śvāsa-davekṣaṇoṣṇaḥ
BhP_10.12.018/1 dṛṣṭvā taṃ tādṛśaṃ sarve matvā vṛndāvana-śriyam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam tādṛśam sarve matvā vṛndāvana śriyam

original: BhP_10.12.018/3 vyāttājagara-tuṇḍena hy utprekṣante sma līlayā
analyzed: vyātta ajagara tuṇḍena hi utprekṣante sma līlayā

original: BhP_10.12.019/1 aho mitrāṇi gadata sattva-kūṭaṃ puraḥ sthitam
analyzed: aho mitrāṇi gadata sattva kūṭam puras sthitam

original: BhP_10.12.019/3 asmat-saṅgrasana-vyātta- vyāla-tuṇḍāyate na vā
analyzed: asmad saṅgrasana vyātta vyālatuṇḍāyate na vā

original: BhP_10.12.020/1 satyam arka-karāraktam uttarā-hanuvad ghanam
analyzed: satyam arka kara a raktam uttarā hanu vat ghanam

original: BhP_10.12.020/3 adharā-hanuvad rodhas tat-praticchāyayāruṇam
analyzed: adharā hanu vat rodhaḥ tad praticchāyayā aruṇam

original: BhP_10.12.021/1 pratispardhete sṛkkabhyāṃ savyāsavye nagodare
analyzed: pratispardhete sṛkkabhyām savya asavye naga udare

original: BhP_10.12.021/3 tuṅga-śṛṅgālayo 'py etās tad-daṃṣṭrābhiś ca paśyata
analyzed: pi etāḥ tad daṃṣṭrābhiḥ ca paśyata

original: BhP_10.12.022/1 āstṛtāyāma-mārgo 'yaṃ rasanāṃ pratigarjati
analyzed: āstṛta āyāma mārgaḥ yam rasanām pratigarjati

original: BhP_10.12.022/3 eṣāṃ antar-gataṃ dhvāntam etad apy antar-ānanam
analyzed: eṣām antargatam dhvāntam etat api antarānanam

original: BhP_10.12.023/1 dāvoṣṇa-khara-vāto 'yaṃ śvāsavad bhāti paśyata
analyzed: dāva uṣṇa khara vātaḥ yam śvāsa vat bhāti paśyata

original: BhP_10.12.023/3 tad-dagdha-sattva-durgandho 'py antar-āmiṣa-gandhavat
analyzed: tad dagdha sattva durgandhaḥ api antar āmiṣa gandha vat

original: BhP_10.12.024/1 asmān kim atra grasitā niviṣṭān ayaṃ tathā ced bakavad vinaṅkṣyati
analyzed: asmān kim atra grasitā niviṣṭān ayam tathā ced baka vat vinaṅkṣyati

original: BhP_10.12.024/3 kṣaṇād aneneti bakāry-uśan-mukhaṃ vīkṣyoddhasantaḥ kara-tāḍanair yayuḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇāt anena iti bakāri uśat mukham vīkṣya uddhasantaḥ kara tāḍanaiḥ yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.12.025/1 itthaṃ mitho 'tathyam ataj-jña-bhāṣitaṃ
analyzed: ittham mithas tathyam atajjña bhāṣitam

original: BhP_10.12.025/2 śrutvā vicintyety amṛṣā mṛṣāyate
analyzed: śrutvā vicintya iti amṛṣā mṛṣāyate

original: BhP_10.12.025/3 rakṣo viditvākhila-bhūta-hṛt-sthitaḥ
analyzed: rakṣaḥ viditvā akhila bhūta hṛd sthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.025/4 svānāṃ niroddhuṃ bhagavān mano dadhe
analyzed: svānām niroddhum bhagavān manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_10.12.026/1 tāvat praviṣṭās tv asurodarāntaraṃ paraṃ na gīrṇāḥ śiśavaḥ sa-vatsāḥ
analyzed: tāvat praviṣṭāḥ tu asura udara antaram param na gīrṇāḥ śiśavaḥ sa vatsāḥ

original: BhP_10.12.026/3 pratīkṣamāṇena bakāri-veśanaṃ hata-sva-kānta-smaraṇena rakṣasā
analyzed: pratīkṣamāṇena baka ari veśanam hata sva kānta smaraṇena rakṣasā

original: BhP_10.12.027/1 tān vīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ sakalābhaya-prado
analyzed: tān vīkṣya kṛṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.027/2 hy ananya-nāthān sva-karād avacyutān
analyzed: hi an anya nāthān sva karāt avacyutān

original: BhP_10.12.027/3 dīnāṃś ca mṛtyor jaṭharāgni-ghāsān
analyzed: dīnān ca mṛtyoḥ jaṭhara agni ghāsān

original: BhP_10.12.027/4 ghṛṇārdito diṣṭa-kṛtena vismitaḥ
analyzed: ghṛṇā arditaḥ diṣṭa kṛtena vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.028/1 kṛtyaṃ kim atrāsya khalasya jīvanaṃ
analyzed: kṛtyam kim atra asya khalasya jīvanam

original: BhP_10.12.028/2 na vā amīṣāṃ ca satāṃ vihiṃsanam
analyzed: na vai amīṣām ca satām vihiṃsanam

original: BhP_10.12.028/3 dvayaṃ kathaṃ syād iti saṃvicintya
analyzed: dvayam katham syāt iti saṃvicintya

original: BhP_10.12.028/4 jñātvāviśat tuṇḍam aśeṣa-dṛg ghariḥ
analyzed: jñātvā aviśat tuṇḍam aśeṣa dṛś hariḥ

original: BhP_10.12.029/1 tadā ghana-cchadā devā bhayād dhā-heti cukruśuḥ
analyzed: tadā ghanacchadāḥ devāḥ bhayāt dhāhā iti cukruśuḥ

original: BhP_10.12.029/3 jahṛṣur ye ca kaṃsādyāḥ kauṇapās tv agha-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: jahṛṣuḥ ye ca kaṃsa ādyāḥ kauṇapāḥ tu agha bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_10.12.030/1 tac chrutvā bhagavān kṛṣṇas tv avyayaḥ sārbha-vatsakam
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ tu avyayaḥ sārbhavatsakam

original: BhP_10.12.030/3 cūrṇī-cikīrṣor ātmānaṃ tarasā vavṛdhe gale
analyzed: cūrṇīcikīrṣoḥ ātmānam tarasā vavṛdhe gale

original: BhP_10.12.031/1 tato 'tikāyasya niruddha-mārgiṇo hy udgīrṇa-dṛṣṭer bhramatas tv itas tataḥ
analyzed: niruddha mārgiṇaḥ hi udgīrṇa dṛṣṭeḥ bhramataḥ tu itas tatas

original: BhP_10.12.031/3 pūrṇo 'ntar-aṅge pavano niruddho mūrdhan vinirbhidya vinirgato bahiḥ
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ ntaraṅge pavanaḥ niruddhaḥ mūrdhan vinirbhidya vinirgataḥ bahis

original: BhP_10.12.032/1 tenaiva sarveṣu bahir gateṣu prāṇeṣu vatsān suhṛdaḥ paretān
analyzed: tena eva sarveṣu bahis gateṣu prāṇeṣu vatsān suhṛdaḥ paretān

original: BhP_10.12.032/3 dṛṣṭyā svayotthāpya tad-anvitaḥ punar vaktrān mukundo bhagavān viniryayau
analyzed: dṛṣṭyā svayā utthāpya tad anvitaḥ punar vaktrāt mukundaḥ bhagavān viniryayau

original: BhP_10.12.033/1 pīnāhi-bhogotthitam adbhutaṃ mahaj jyotiḥ sva-dhāmnā jvalayad diśo daśa
analyzed: pīna ahi bhoga utthitam adbhutam mahat jyotiḥ sva dhāmnā jvalayat diśaḥ daśa

original: BhP_10.12.033/3 pratīkṣya khe 'vasthitam īśa-nirgamaṃ viveśa tasmin miṣatāṃ divaukasām
analyzed: pratīkṣya khe vasthitam īśa nirgamam viveśa tasmin miṣatām divaukasām

original: BhP_10.12.034/1 tato 'tihṛṣṭāḥ sva-kṛto 'kṛtārhaṇaṃ
analyzed: tatas ti hṛṣṭāḥ kṛta arhaṇam

original: BhP_10.12.034/2 puṣpaiḥ sugā apsarasaś ca nartanaiḥ
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ sugāḥ apsarasaḥ ca nartanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.12.034/3 gītaiḥ surā vādya-dharāś ca vādyakaiḥ
analyzed: gītaiḥ surāḥ vādya dharāḥ ca vādyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.12.034/4 stavaiś ca viprā jaya-niḥsvanair gaṇāḥ
analyzed: stavaiḥ ca viprāḥ jaya niḥsvanaiḥ gaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.12.035/1 tad-adbhuta-stotra-suvādya-gītikā- jayādi-naikotsava-maṅgala-svanān
analyzed: tad adbhuta stotra su vādya gītikāḥ jaya ādinā eka utsava maṅgala svanān

original: BhP_10.12.035/3 śrutvā sva-dhāmno 'nty aja āgato 'cirād dṛṣṭvā mahīśasya jagāma vismayam
analyzed: śrutvā sva dhāmnaḥ ajaḥ cirāt dṛṣṭvā mahīśasya jagāma vismayam

original: BhP_10.12.036/1 rājann ājagaraṃ carma śuṣkaṃ vṛndāvane 'dbhutam
analyzed: rājan ājagaram carma śuṣkam vṛndāvane dbhutam

original: BhP_10.12.036/3 vrajaukasāṃ bahu-tithaṃ babhūvākrīḍa-gahvaram
analyzed: vrajaukasām bahutitham babhūva ākrīḍa gahvaram

original: BhP_10.12.037/1 etat kaumārajaṃ karma harer ātmāhi-mokṣaṇam
analyzed: etat kaumāra jam karma hareḥ ātma ahi mokṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.12.037/3 mṛtyoḥ paugaṇḍake bālā dṛṣṭvocur vismitā vraje
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ paugaṇḍake bālāḥ dṛṣṭvā ūcuḥ vismitāḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.12.038/1 naitad vicitraṃ manujārbha-māyinaḥ parāvarāṇāṃ paramasya vedhasaḥ
analyzed: na etat vicitram manuja arbha māyinaḥ parāvarāṇām paramasya vedhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.038/3 agho 'pi yat-sparśana-dhauta-pātakaḥ prāpātma-sāmyaṃ tv asatāṃ sudurlabham
analyzed: aghaḥ yad sparśana dhauta pātakaḥ prāpa ātma sāmyam tu asatām su durlabham

original: BhP_10.12.039/1 sakṛd yad-aṅga-pratimāntar-āhitā manomayī bhāgavatīṃ dadau gatim
analyzed: sakṛt yad aṅga pratimā antara āhitā manaḥ mayī bhāgavatīm dadau gatim

original: BhP_10.12.039/3 sa eva nityātma-sukhānubhūty-abhi- vyudasta-māyo 'ntar-gato hi kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva nitya ātma sukha anubhūti abhi vyudasta māyaḥ ntargataḥ hi kim punar

original: BhP_10.12.040/0 śrī-sūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.12.040/1 itthaṃ dvijā yādavadeva-dattaḥ śrutvā sva-rātuś caritaṃ vicitram
analyzed: ittham dvijāḥ yādavadevadattaḥ śrutvā sva rātuḥ caritam vicitram

original: BhP_10.12.040/3 papraccha bhūyo 'pi tad eva puṇyaṃ vaiyāsakiṃ yan nigṛhīta-cetāḥ
analyzed: papraccha bhūyas tat eva puṇyam vaiyāsakim yat nigṛhīta cetāḥ

original: BhP_10.12.041/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.12.041/1 brahman kālāntara-kṛtaṃ tat-kālīnaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: brahman kāla antara kṛtam tad kālīnam katham bhavet

original: BhP_10.12.041/3 yat kaumāre hari-kṛtaṃ jaguḥ paugaṇḍake 'rbhakāḥ
analyzed: yat kaumāre hari kṛtam jaguḥ paugaṇḍake rbhakāḥ
