original: BhP_10.12.042/1 tad brūhi me mahā-yogin paraṃ kautūhalaṃ guro
analyzed: tat brūhi me mahā yogin param kautūhalam guro

original: BhP_10.12.042/3 nūnam etad dharer eva māyā bhavati nānyathā
analyzed: nūnam etat hareḥ eva māyā bhavati na anyathā

original: BhP_10.12.043/1 vayaṃ dhanyatamā loke guro 'pi kṣatra-bandhavaḥ
analyzed: vayam dhanyatamāḥ loke guro u pi kṣatrabandhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.12.043/3 vayaṃ pibāmo muhus tvattaḥ puṇyaṃ kṛṣṇa-kathāmṛtam
analyzed: vayam pibāmaḥ muhur tvattaḥ puṇyam kṛṣṇa kathā amṛtam

original: BhP_10.12.044/0 śrī-sūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.12.044/1 itthaṃ sma pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu bādarāyaṇis
analyzed: ittham sma pṛṣṭaḥ sa tu bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.12.044/2 tat-smāritānanta-hṛtākhilendriyaḥ
BhP_10.12.044/3 kṛcchrāt punar labdha-bahir-dṛśiḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: kṛcchrāt punar labdha bahis dṛśiḥ śanais

original: BhP_10.12.044/4 pratyāha taṃ bhāgavatottamottama
analyzed: pratyāha tam bhāgavata uttama uttama

original: BhP_10.13.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.13.001/1 sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahā-bhāga tvayā bhāgavatottama
analyzed: sādhu pṛṣṭam mahābhāga tvayā bhāgavata uttama

original: BhP_10.13.001/3 yan nūtanayasīśasya śṛṇvann api kathāṃ muhuḥ
analyzed: yat nūtanayasi īśasya śṛṇvan api kathām muhur

original: BhP_10.13.002/1 satām ayaṃ sāra-bhṛtāṃ nisargo yad-artha-vāṇī-śruti-cetasām api
analyzed: satām ayam sāra bhṛtām nisargaḥ yad artha vāṇī śruti cetasām api

original: BhP_10.13.002/3 prati-kṣaṇaṃ navya-vad acyutasya yat striyā viṭānām iva sādhu vārtā
analyzed: pratikṣaṇam navya vat acyutasya yat striyāḥ viṭānām iva sādhu vārtā

original: BhP_10.13.003/1 śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājann api guhyaṃ vadāmi te
analyzed: śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ rājan api guhyam vadāmi te

original: BhP_10.13.003/3 brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravo guhyam apy uta
analyzed: brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravaḥ guhyam api uta

original: BhP_10.13.004/1 tathāgha-vadanān mṛtyo rakṣitvā vatsa-pālakān
analyzed: tathā agha vadanān mṛtyoḥ rakṣitvā vatsa pālakān

original: BhP_10.13.004/3 sarit-pulinam ānīya bhagavān idam abravīt
analyzed: sarit pulinam ānīya bhagavān idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.13.005/1 aho 'tiramyaṃ pulinaṃ vayasyāḥ sva-keli-sampan mṛdulāccha-bālukam
analyzed: aho ti ramyam pulinam vayasyāḥ sva keli sampad mṛdula accha bālukam

original: BhP_10.13.005/3 sphuṭat-saro-gandha-hṛtāli-patrika- dhvani-pratidhvāna-lasad-drumākulam
analyzed: sphuṭat saraḥ gandha hṛta āli patrika dhvani pratidhvāna lasat druma ākulam

original: BhP_10.13.006/1 atra bhoktavyam asmābhir divārūḍhaṃ kṣudhārditāḥ
analyzed: atra bhoktavyam asmābhiḥ divā ārūḍham kṣudhā arditāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.006/3 vatsāḥ samīpe 'paḥ pītvā carantu śanakais tṛṇam
analyzed: vatsāḥ samīpe paḥ pītvā carantu śanakais tṛṇam

original: BhP_10.13.007/1 tatheti pāyayitvārbhā vatsān ārudhya śādvale
analyzed: tathā iti pāyayitvā arbhāḥ vatsān ārudhya śādvale

original: BhP_10.13.007/3 muktvā śikyāni bubhujuḥ samaṃ bhagavatā mudā
analyzed: muktvā śikyāni bubhujuḥ samam bhagavatā mudā

original: BhP_10.13.008/1 kṛṣṇasya viṣvak puru-rāji-maṇḍalair
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya viṣvak puru rāji maṇḍalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.008/2 abhyānanāḥ phulla-dṛśo vrajārbhakāḥ
analyzed: abhyānanāḥ phulla dṛśaḥ vraja arbhakāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.008/3 sahopaviṣṭā vipine virejuś
analyzed: saha upaviṣṭāḥ vipine virejuḥ

original: BhP_10.13.008/4 chadā yathāmbhoruha-karṇikāyāḥ
analyzed: chadāḥ yathā ambhoruha karṇikāyāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.009/1 kecit puṣpair dalaiḥ kecit pallavair aṅkuraiḥ phalaiḥ
analyzed: kecid puṣpaiḥ dalaiḥ kecid pallavaiḥ aṅkuraiḥ phalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.009/3 śigbhis tvagbhir dṛṣadbhiś ca bubhujuḥ kṛta-bhājanāḥ
analyzed: śigbhiḥ tvagbhiḥ dṛṣadbhiḥ ca bubhujuḥ kṛta bhājanāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.010/1 sarve mitho darśayantaḥ sva-sva-bhojya-ruciṃ pṛthak
analyzed: sarve mithas darśayantaḥ sva sva bhojya rucim pṛthak

original: BhP_10.13.010/3 hasanto hāsayantaś cā- bhyavajahruḥ saheśvarāḥ
analyzed: hasantaḥ hāsayantaḥ ca abhyavajahruḥ saha īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.011/1 bibhrad veṇuṃ jaṭhara-paṭayoḥ śṛṅga-vetre ca kakṣe
analyzed: bibhrat veṇum jaṭhara paṭayoḥ śṛṅga vetre ca kakṣe

original: BhP_10.13.011/2 vāme pāṇau masṛṇa-kavalaṃ tat-phalāny aṅgulīṣu
analyzed: vāme pāṇau masṛṇa kavalam tad phalāni aṅgulīṣu

original: BhP_10.13.011/3 tiṣṭhan madhye sva-parisuhṛdo hāsayan narmabhiḥ svaiḥ
analyzed: tiṣṭhan madhye sva parisuhṛdaḥ hāsayan narmabhiḥ svaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.011/4 svarge loke miṣati bubhuje yajña-bhug bāla-keliḥ
analyzed: svarge loke miṣati bubhuje yajñabhuj bāla keliḥ

original: BhP_10.13.012/1 bhārataivaṃ vatsa-peṣu bhuñjāneṣv acyutātmasu
analyzed: bhārata evam vatsapeṣu bhuñjāneṣu acyuta ātmasu

original: BhP_10.13.012/3 vatsās tv antar-vane dūraṃ viviśus tṛṇa-lobhitāḥ
analyzed: vatsāḥ tu antar vane dūram viviśuḥ tṛṇa lobhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.013/1 tān dṛṣṭvā bhaya-santrastān ūce kṛṣṇo 'sya bhī-bhayam
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā bhaya santrastān ūce kṛṣṇaḥ sya bhī bhayam

original: BhP_10.13.013/3 mitrāṇy āśān mā viramate- hāneṣye vatsakān aham
analyzed: mitrāṇi āśāt mā viramate ha āneṣye vatsakān aham

original: BhP_10.13.014/1 ity uktvādri-darī-kuñja- gahvareṣv ātma-vatsakān
analyzed: iti uktvā adri darī kuñja gahvareṣu ātma vatsakān

original: BhP_10.13.014/3 vicinvan bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ sapāṇi-kavalo yayau
analyzed: vicinvan bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ sa pāṇi kavalaḥ yayau

original: BhP_10.13.015/1 ambhojanma-janis tad-antara-gato māyārbhakasyeśitur
analyzed: ambhaḥ janma janiḥ tad antara gataḥ māyā arbhakasya īśituḥ

original: BhP_10.13.015/2 draṣṭuṃ mañju mahitvam anyad api tad-vatsān ito vatsapān
analyzed: draṣṭum mañju mahi tvam anyat api tad vatsān itas vatsapān

original: BhP_10.13.015/3 nītvānyatra kurūdvahāntaradadhāt khe 'vasthito yaḥ purā
analyzed: nītvā anyatra kuru udvaha antaradadhāt khe vasthitaḥ yaḥ purā

original: BhP_10.13.015/4 dṛṣṭvāghāsura-mokṣaṇaṃ prabhavataḥ prāptaḥ paraṃ vismayam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā agha asura mokṣaṇam prabhavataḥ prāptaḥ param vismayam

original: BhP_10.13.016/1 tato vatsān adṛṣṭvaitya puline 'pi ca vatsapān
analyzed: tatas vatsān a dṛṣṭvā etya puline ca vatsapān

original: BhP_10.13.016/3 ubhāv api vane kṛṣṇo vicikāya samantataḥ
analyzed: ubhau api vane kṛṣṇaḥ vicikāya samantataḥ

original: BhP_10.13.017/1 kvāpy adṛṣṭvāntar-vipine vatsān pālāṃś ca viśva-vit
analyzed: kvāpi a dṛṣṭvā antar vipine vatsān pālān ca viśva vid

original: BhP_10.13.017/3 sarvaṃ vidhi-kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sahasāvajagāma ha
analyzed: sarvam vidhi kṛtam kṛṣṇaḥ sahasā avajagāma ha

original: BhP_10.13.018/1 tataḥ kṛṣṇo mudaṃ kartuṃ tan-mātṝṇāṃ ca kasya ca
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇaḥ mudam kartum tad mātṝṇām ca kasya ca

original: BhP_10.13.018/3 ubhayāyitam ātmānaṃ cakre viśva-kṛd īśvaraḥ
analyzed: ātmānam cakre viśva kṛt īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.13.019/1 yāvad vatsapa-vatsakālpaka-vapur yāvat karāṅghry-ādikaṃ
analyzed: yāvat vatsapa vatsaka alpaka vapuḥ yāvat kara aṅghri ādikam

original: BhP_10.13.019/2 yāvad yaṣṭi-viṣāṇa-veṇu-dala-śig yāvad vibhūṣāmbaram
analyzed: yāvat yaṣṭi viṣāṇa veṇu dala śik yāvat vibhūṣā ambaram

original: BhP_10.13.019/3 yāvac chīla-guṇābhidhākṛti-vayo yāvad vihārādikaṃ
analyzed: yāvat śīla guṇa abhidhā ākṛti vayaḥ yāvat vihāra ādikam

original: BhP_10.13.019/4 sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ giro 'ṅga-vad ajaḥ sarva-svarūpo babhau
analyzed: sarvam viṣṇu mayam giraḥ ṅga vat ajaḥ sarva sva rūpaḥ babhau

original: BhP_10.13.020/1 svayam ātmātma-govatsān prativāryātma-vatsapaiḥ
analyzed: svayam ātma ātma go vatsān prativārya ātma vatsapaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.020/3 krīḍann ātma-vihāraiś ca sarvātmā prāviśad vrajam
analyzed: krīḍan ātma vihāraiḥ ca sarva ātmā prāviśat vrajam

original: BhP_10.13.021/1 tat-tad-vatsān pṛthaṅ nītvā tat-tad-goṣṭhe niveśya saḥ
analyzed: tad tad vatsān pṛthak nītvā tad tad goṣṭhe niveśya saḥ

original: BhP_10.13.021/3 tat-tad-ātmābhavad rājaṃs tat-tat-sadma praviṣṭavān
analyzed: tad tad ātmā abhavat rājan tat tat sadma praviṣṭavān

original: BhP_10.13.022/1 tan-mātaro veṇu-rava-tvarotthitā utthāpya dorbhiḥ parirabhya nirbharam
analyzed: tad mātaraḥ veṇu rava tvarā utthitāḥ utthāpya dorbhiḥ parirabhya nirbharam

original: BhP_10.13.022/3 sneha-snuta-stanya-payaḥ-sudhāsavaṃ matvā paraṃ brahma sutān apāyayan
analyzed: sneha snuta stanya payaḥ sudhā āsavam matvā param brahma sutān apāyayan

original: BhP_10.13.023/1 tato nṛponmardana-majja-lepanā- laṅkāra-rakṣā-tilakāśanādibhiḥ
analyzed: tatas nṛpa unmardana majja lepanāḥ laṅkāra rakṣā tilaka aśana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.023/3 saṃlālitaḥ svācaritaiḥ praharṣayan sāyaṃ gato yāma-yamena mādhavaḥ
analyzed: saṃlālitaḥ su ācaritaiḥ praharṣayan sāyam gataḥ yām ayamena mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.024/1 gāvas tato goṣṭham upetya satvaraṃ huṅkāra-ghoṣaiḥ parihūta-saṅgatān
analyzed: gāvaḥ tatas goṣṭham upetya sa tvaram huṅkāra ghoṣaiḥ parihūta saṅga tān

original: BhP_10.13.024/3 svakān svakān vatsatarān apāyayan muhur lihantyaḥ sravad audhasaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: svakān svakān vatsatarān apāyayan muhur lihantyaḥ sravat audhasam payaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.025/1 go-gopīnāṃ mātṛtāsminn āsīt snehardhikāṃ vinā
analyzed: go gopīnām mātṛ tā asmin āsīt sneha ṛdhikām vinā

original: BhP_10.13.025/3 purovad āsv api hares tokatā māyayā vinā
analyzed: purovat āsu api hareḥ toka tā māyayā vinā

original: BhP_10.13.026/1 vrajaukasāṃ sva-tokeṣu sneha-vally ābdam anvaham
analyzed: vrajaukasām sva tokeṣu snehavallī ā abdam anvaham

original: BhP_10.13.026/3 śanair niḥsīma vavṛdhe yathā kṛṣṇe tv apūrvavat
analyzed: śanais niḥsīma vavṛdhe yathā kṛṣṇe tu apūrvavat

original: BhP_10.13.027/1 ittham ātmātmanātmānaṃ vatsa-pāla-miṣeṇa saḥ
analyzed: ittham ātma ātmanā ātmānam vatsapāla miṣeṇa saḥ

original: BhP_10.13.027/3 pālayan vatsapo varṣaṃ cikrīḍe vana-goṣṭhayoḥ
analyzed: pālayan vatsapaḥ varṣam cikrīḍe vana goṣṭhayoḥ

original: BhP_10.13.028/1 ekadā cārayan vatsān sa-rāmo vanam āviśat
analyzed: ekadā cārayan vatsān sarāmaḥ vanam āviśat

original: BhP_10.13.028/3 pañca-ṣāsu tri-yāmāsu hāyanāpūraṇīṣv ajaḥ
analyzed: pañcaṣāsu triyāmāsu hāyanāpūraṇīṣu ajaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.029/1 tato vidūrāc carato gāvo vatsān upavrajam
analyzed: tatas vidūrāt carataḥ gāvaḥ vatsān upavrajam

original: BhP_10.13.029/3 govardhanādri-śirasi carantyo dadṛśus tṛṇam
analyzed: govardhana adri śirasi carantyaḥ dadṛśuḥ tṛṇam

original: BhP_10.13.030/1 dṛṣṭvātha tat-sneha-vaśo 'smṛtātmā sa go-vrajo 'tyātmapa-durga-mārgaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā atha tad sneha vaśaḥ smṛta ātmā sa

original: BhP_10.13.030/3 dvi-pāt kakud-grīva udāsya-puccho 'gād dhuṅkṛtair āsru-payā javena
analyzed: dvipād kakud grīvaḥ udāsya pucchaḥ gāt dhuṅkṛtaiḥ āsrupayā javena

original: BhP_10.13.031/1 sametya gāvo 'dho vatsān vatsavatyo 'py apāyayan
analyzed: sametya gāvaḥ vatsān vatsavatyaḥ pi apāyayan

original: BhP_10.13.031/3 gilantya iva cāṅgāni lihantyaḥ svaudhasaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: gilantyaḥ iva ca aṅgāni lihantyaḥ svaudhasam payaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.032/1 gopās tad-rodhanāyāsa- maughya-lajjoru-manyunā
analyzed: gopāḥ tad rodhanāya āsa maughya lajjā uru manyunā

original: BhP_10.13.032/3 durgādhva-kṛcchrato 'bhyetya go-vatsair dadṛśuḥ sutān
analyzed: durga adhva kṛcchrataḥ bhyetya go vatsaiḥ dadṛśuḥ sutān

original: BhP_10.13.033/1 tad-īkṣaṇotprema-rasāplutāśayā jātānurāgā gata-manyavo 'rbhakān
analyzed: tad īkṣaṇa utprema rasa āpluta āśayāḥ jāta anurāgāḥ gata manyavaḥ rbhakān

original: BhP_10.13.033/3 uduhya dorbhiḥ parirabhya mūrdhani ghrāṇair avāpuḥ paramāṃ mudaṃ te
analyzed: uduhya dorbhiḥ parirabhya mūrdhani ghrāṇaiḥ avāpuḥ paramām mudam te

original: BhP_10.13.034/1 tataḥ pravayaso gopās tokāśleṣa-sunirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: tatas pravayasaḥ gopāḥ toka āśleṣa su nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.034/3 kṛcchrāc chanair apagatās tad-anusmṛty-udaśravaḥ
analyzed: kṛcchrāt śanais apagatāḥ tad anusmṛti udaśravaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.035/1 vrajasya rāmaḥ premardher vīkṣyautkaṇṭhyam anukṣaṇam
analyzed: vrajasya rāmaḥ prema ṛdheḥ vīkṣya autkaṇṭhyam anu kṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.13.035/3 mukta-staneṣv apatyeṣv apy ahetu-vid acintayat
analyzed: mukta staneṣu apatyeṣu api a hetu vid acintayat

original: BhP_10.13.036/1 kim etad adbhutam iva vāsudeve 'khilātmani
analyzed: kim etat adbhutam iva vāsudeve khilātmani

original: BhP_10.13.036/3 vrajasya sātmanas tokeṣv apūrvaṃ prema vardhate
analyzed: vrajasya sātmanaḥ tokeṣu apūrvam prema vardhate

original: BhP_10.13.037/1 keyaṃ vā kuta āyātā daivī vā nāry utāsurī
analyzed: kā iyam vā kutas āyātā daivī vā nārī uta āsurī

original: BhP_10.13.037/3 prāyo māyāstu me bhartur nānyā me 'pi vimohinī
analyzed: prāyas māyā astu me bhartuḥ nā anyā me vimohinī

original: BhP_10.13.038/1 iti sañcintya dāśārho vatsān sa-vayasān api
analyzed: iti sañcintya dāśārhaḥ vatsān savayasān api

original: BhP_10.13.038/3 sarvān ācaṣṭa vaikuṇṭhaṃ cakṣuṣā vayunena saḥ
analyzed: sarvān ācaṣṭa vaikuṇṭham cakṣuṣā vayunena saḥ

original: BhP_10.13.039/1 naite sureśā ṛṣayo na caite tvam eva bhāsīśa bhid-āśraye 'pi
analyzed: na ete sura īśāḥ ṛṣayaḥ na ca ete tvam eva bhāsi īśa bhidā āśraye pi

original: BhP_10.13.039/3 sarvaṃ pṛthak tvaṃ nigamāt kathaṃ vadety uktena vṛttaṃ prabhuṇā balo 'vait
analyzed: sarvam pṛthak tvam nigamāt katham vada iti uktena vṛttam prabhuṇā balaḥ vait

original: BhP_10.13.040/1 tāvad etyātmabhūr ātma- mānena truṭy-anehasā
analyzed: tāvat eti ātmabhūḥ ātma mānena truṭi anehasā

original: BhP_10.13.040/3 purovad ābdaṃ krīḍantaṃ dadṛśe sa-kalaṃ harim
analyzed: purovat ā abdam krīḍantam dadṛśe sakalam harim

original: BhP_10.13.041/1 yāvanto gokule bālāḥ sa-vatsāḥ sarva eva hi
analyzed: yāvantaḥ gokule bālāḥ sa vatsāḥ sarve eva hi

original: BhP_10.13.041/3 māyāśaye śayānā me nādyāpi punar utthitāḥ
analyzed: māyā āśaye śayānāḥ me na adya api punar utthitāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.042/1 ita ete 'tra kutratyā man-māyā-mohitetare
analyzed: itas ete tra kutratyāḥ mad māyā mohita itare

original: BhP_10.13.042/3 tāvanta eva tatrābdaṃ krīḍanto viṣṇunā samam
analyzed: tāvantaḥ eva tatra abdam krīḍantaḥ viṣṇunā samam

original: BhP_10.13.043/1 evam eteṣu bhedeṣu ciraṃ dhyātvā sa ātma-bhūḥ
analyzed: evam eteṣu bhedeṣu ciram dhyātvā saḥ ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_10.13.043/3 satyāḥ ke katare neti jñātuṃ neṣṭe kathañcana
analyzed: satyāḥ ke katare na iti jñātum na īṣṭe kathañcana

original: BhP_10.13.044/1 evaṃ sammohayan viṣṇuṃ vimohaṃ viśva-mohanam
analyzed: evam sammohayan viṣṇum vimoham viśva mohanam

original: BhP_10.13.044/3 svayaiva māyayājo 'pi svayam eva vimohitaḥ
analyzed: svayā eva māyayā ajaḥ svayam eva vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.045/1 tamyāṃ tamovan naihāraṃ khadyotārcir ivāhani
analyzed: tamyām tamovat naihāram khadyota arciḥ iva ahani

original: BhP_10.13.045/3 mahatītara-māyaiśyaṃ nihanty ātmani yuñjataḥ
analyzed: nihanti ātmani yuñjataḥ

original: BhP_10.13.046/1 tāvat sarve vatsa-pālāḥ paśyato 'jasya tat-kṣaṇāt
analyzed: tāvat sarve vatsa pālāḥ paśyataḥ jasya tad kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_10.13.046/3 vyadṛśyanta ghana-śyāmāḥ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasaḥ
analyzed: vyadṛśyanta ghana śyāmāḥ pīta kauśeya vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.047/1 catur-bhujāḥ śaṅkha-cakra- gadā-rājīva-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: catur bhujāḥ śaṅkha cakra gadā rājīva pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.047/3 kirīṭinaḥ kuṇḍalino hāriṇo vana-mālinaḥ
analyzed: kirīṭinaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ hāriṇaḥ vanamālinaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.048/1 śrīvatsāṅgada-do-ratna- kambu-kaṅkaṇa-pāṇayaḥ
BhP_10.13.048/3 nūpuraiḥ kaṭakair bhātāḥ kaṭi-sūtrāṅgulīyakaiḥ
analyzed: nūpuraiḥ kaṭakaiḥ bhātāḥ kaṭi sūtra aṅgulīyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.049/1 āṅghri-mastakam āpūrṇās tulasī-nava-dāmabhiḥ
analyzed: ā aṅghri mastakam āpūrṇāḥ tulasī nava dāmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.049/3 komalaiḥ sarva-gātreṣu bhūri-puṇyavad-arpitaiḥ
analyzed: komalaiḥ sarva gātreṣu bhūri puṇyavat arpitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.050/1 candrikā-viśada-smeraiḥ sāruṇāpāṅga-vīkṣitaiḥ
analyzed: candrikā viśada smeraiḥ sa aruṇa apāṅga vīkṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.050/3 svakārthānām iva rajaḥ- sattvābhyāṃ sraṣṭṛ-pālakāḥ
analyzed: svaka arthānām iva rajaḥ sattvābhyām sraṣṭṛ pālakāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.051/1 ātmādi-stamba-paryantair mūrtimadbhiś carācaraiḥ
analyzed: ātma ādi stamba paryantaiḥ mūrtimadbhiḥ carācaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.051/3 nṛtya-gītādy-anekārhaiḥ pṛthak pṛthag upāsitāḥ
analyzed: nṛtya gīta ādi aneka arhaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak upāsitāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.052/1 aṇimādyair mahimabhir ajādyābhir vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: aṇima ādyaiḥ mahimabhiḥ aja ādyābhiḥ vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.052/3 catur-viṃśatibhis tattvaiḥ parītā mahad-ādibhiḥ
analyzed: caturviṃśatibhiḥ tattvaiḥ parītāḥ mahat ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.053/1 kāla-svabhāva-saṃskāra- kāma-karma-guṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: kāla svabhāva saṃskāra kāma karma guṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.13.053/3 sva-mahi-dhvasta-mahibhir mūrtimadbhir upāsitāḥ
analyzed: sva mahi dhvasta mahibhiḥ mūrtimadbhiḥ upāsitāḥ

original: BhP_10.13.054/1 satya-jñānānantānanda- mātraika-rasa-mūrtayaḥ
BhP_10.13.054/3 aspṛṣṭa-bhūri-māhātmyā api hy upaniṣad-dṛśām
analyzed: a spṛṣṭa bhūri māhātmyāḥ api hi upaniṣad dṛśām

original: BhP_10.13.055/1 evaṃ sakṛd dadarśājaḥ para-brahmātmano 'khilān
analyzed: evam sakṛt dadarśa ajaḥ para brahma ātmanaḥ khilān

original: BhP_10.13.055/3 yasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti sa-carācaram
analyzed: yasya bhāsā sarvam idam vibhāti sacarācaram

original: BhP_10.13.056/1 tato 'tikutukodvṛtya- stimitaikādaśendriyaḥ
analyzed: ti kutuka udvṛtya stimita ekādaśa indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.056/3 tad-dhāmnābhūd ajas tūṣṇīṃ pūr-devy-antīva putrikā
analyzed: tad dhāmnā abhūt ajaḥ tūṣṇīm pūḥ devyantī iva putrikā

original: BhP_10.13.057/1 itīreśe 'tarkye nija-mahimani sva-pramitike
analyzed: iti īra īśe tarkye nija mahimani sva pramitike

original: BhP_10.13.057/2 paratrājāto 'tan-nirasana-mukha-brahmaka-mitau
analyzed: tad nirasana mukha brahma ka mitau

original: BhP_10.13.057/3 anīśe 'pi draṣṭuṃ kim idam iti vā muhyati sati
analyzed: anīśe draṣṭum kim idam iti vā muhyati sati

original: BhP_10.13.057/4 cacchādājo jñātvā sapadi paramo 'jā-javanikām
analyzed: cacchāda ajaḥ jñātvā sapadi paramaḥ jāja vanikām

original: BhP_10.13.058/1 tato 'rvāk pratilabdhākṣaḥ kaḥ paretavad utthitaḥ
analyzed: tatas rvāk pratilabdha akṣaḥ kaḥ pareta vat utthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.058/3 kṛcchrād unmīlya vai dṛṣṭīr ācaṣṭedaṃ sahātmanā
analyzed: kṛcchrāt unmīlya vai dṛṣṭīḥ ācaṣṭa idam saha ātmanā

original: BhP_10.13.059/1 sapady evābhitaḥ paśyan diśo 'paśyat puraḥ-sthitam
analyzed: sapadi eva abhitas paśyan diśaḥ paśyat puras sthitam

original: BhP_10.13.059/3 vṛndāvanaṃ janājīvya- drumākīrṇaṃ samā-priyam
analyzed: vṛndāvanam jana ājīvya druma ākīrṇam

original: BhP_10.13.060/1 yatra naisarga-durvairāḥ sahāsan nṛ-mṛgādayaḥ
analyzed: yatra naisarga durvairāḥ saha āsan nṛ mṛga ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.060/3 mitrāṇīvājitāvāsa- druta-ruṭ-tarṣakādikam
analyzed: druta ruṣ tarṣaka ādikam

original: BhP_10.13.061/1 tatrodvahat paśupa-vaṃśa-śiśutva-nāṭyaṃ
analyzed: tatra udvahat

original: BhP_10.13.061/2 brahmādvayaṃ param anantam agādha-bodham
analyzed: brahma advayam param anantam agādha bodham

original: BhP_10.13.061/3 vatsān sakhīn iva purā parito vicinvad
analyzed: vatsān sakhīn iva purā paritas vicinvat

original: BhP_10.13.061/4 ekaṃ sa-pāṇi-kavalaṃ parameṣṭhy acaṣṭa
analyzed: ekam sa pāṇi kavalam parameṣṭhī acaṣṭa

original: BhP_10.13.062/1 dṛṣṭvā tvareṇa nija-dhoraṇato 'vatīrya
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tvareṇa nija dhoraṇataḥ vatīrya

original: BhP_10.13.062/2 pṛthvyāṃ vapuḥ kanaka-daṇḍam ivābhipātya
analyzed: pṛthvyām vapuḥ kanaka daṇḍam iva abhipātya

original: BhP_10.13.062/3 spṛṣṭvā catur-mukuṭa-koṭibhir aṅghri-yugmaṃ
analyzed: spṛṣṭvā catur mukuṭa koṭibhiḥ aṅghri yugmam

original: BhP_10.13.062/4 natvā mud-aśru-sujalair akṛtābhiṣekam
analyzed: natvā mud aśru su jalaiḥ a kṛta abhiṣekam

original: BhP_10.13.063/1 utthāyotthāya kṛṣṇasya cirasya pādayoḥ patan
analyzed: utthāya utthāya kṛṣṇasya cirasya pādayoḥ patan

original: BhP_10.13.063/3 āste mahitvaṃ prāg-dṛṣṭaṃ smṛtvā smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: āste mahi tvam prāk dṛṣṭam smṛtvā smṛtvā punar punar

original: BhP_10.13.064/1 śanair athotthāya vimṛjya locane mukundam udvīkṣya vinamra-kandharaḥ
analyzed: śanais athā utthāya vimṛjya locane mukundam udvīkṣya vinamra kandharaḥ

original: BhP_10.13.064/3 kṛtāñjaliḥ praśrayavān samāhitaḥ sa-vepathur gadgadayailatelayā
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ praśrayavān samāhitaḥ sa vepathuḥ gadgadayā elatelayā

original: BhP_10.14.001/0 śrī-brahmovāca
analyzed: śrī brahmā uvāca

original: BhP_10.14.001/1 naumīḍya te 'bhra-vapuṣe taḍid-ambarāya
analyzed: naumi īḍya te bhra vapuṣe taḍit ambarāya

original: BhP_10.14.001/2 guñjāvataṃsa-paripiccha-lasan-mukhāya
BhP_10.14.001/3 vanya-sraje kavala-vetra-viṣāṇa-veṇu-
analyzed: vanya sraje kavala vetra viṣāṇa veṇu

original: BhP_10.14.001/4 lakṣma-śriye mṛdu-pade paśupāṅgajāya
BhP_10.14.002/1 asyāpi deva vapuṣo mad-anugrahasya svecchā-mayasya na tu bhūta-mayasya ko 'pi
analyzed: asya api deva vapuṣaḥ mad anugrahasya sva icchā mayasya na tu bhūta mayasya kaḥ pi

original: BhP_10.14.002/3 neśe mahi tv avasituṃ manasāntareṇa sākṣāt tavaiva kim utātma-sukhānubhūteḥ
analyzed: nā īśe tu avasitum manasā antareṇa sākṣāt tava eva kim uta ātma sukha anubhūteḥ

original: BhP_10.14.003/1 jñāne prayāsam udapāsya namanta eva
analyzed: jñāne prayāsam udapāsya namante eva

original: BhP_10.14.003/2 jīvanti san-mukharitāṃ bhavadīya-vārtām
analyzed: jīvanti sat mukharitām bhavadīya vārtām

original: BhP_10.14.003/3 sthāne sthitāḥ śruti-gatāṃ tanu-vāṅ-manobhir
analyzed: sthāne sthitāḥ śruti gatām tanu vāc manobhiḥ

original: BhP_10.14.003/4 ye prāyaśo 'jita jito 'py asi tais tri-lokyām
analyzed: ye prāyaśas jita jitaḥ pi asi taiḥ trilokyām

original: BhP_10.14.004/1 śreyaḥ-sṛtiṃ bhaktim udasya te vibho
analyzed: śreyaḥ sṛtim bhaktim udasya te vibho

original: BhP_10.14.004/2 kliśyanti ye kevala-bodha-labdhaye
analyzed: kliśyanti ye kevala bodha labdhaye

original: BhP_10.14.004/3 teṣām asau kleśala eva śiṣyate
analyzed: teṣām asau kleśalaḥ eva śiṣyate

original: BhP_10.14.004/4 nānyad yathā sthūla-tuṣāvaghātinām
analyzed: na anyat yathā sthūla tuṣa avaghātinām

original: BhP_10.14.005/1 pureha bhūman bahavo 'pi yoginas tvad-arpitehā nija-karma-labdhayā
analyzed: purā iha bhūman yoginaḥ tvad arpita īhāḥ nija karma labdhayā

original: BhP_10.14.005/3 vibudhya bhaktyaiva kathopanītayā prapedire 'ñjo 'cyuta te gatiṃ parām
analyzed: vibudhya bhaktyā eva kathā upanītayā prapedire ñjo cyuta te gatim parām

original: BhP_10.14.006/1 tathāpi bhūman mahimāguṇasya te viboddhum arhaty amalāntar-ātmabhiḥ
analyzed: tathā api bhūman mahimā guṇasya te viboddhum arhati amala antarātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.14.006/3 avikriyāt svānubhavād arūpato hy ananya-bodhyātmatayā na cānyathā
analyzed: avikriyāt sva anubhavāt arūpataḥ hi ananya bodhya ātmatayā na ca anyathā

original: BhP_10.14.007/1 guṇātmanas te 'pi guṇān vimātuṃ hitāvatīṛnasya ka īśire 'sya
analyzed: guṇa ātmanaḥ te pi guṇān vimātum ke īśire sya

original: BhP_10.14.007/3 kālena yair vā vimitāḥ su-kalpair bhū-pāṃśavaḥ khe mihikā dyu-bhāsaḥ
analyzed: kālena yaiḥ vā vimitāḥ su kalpaiḥ bhūpa aṃśavaḥ khe mihikāḥ div bhāsaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.008/1 tat te 'nukampāṃ su-samīkṣamāṇo bhuñjāna evātma-kṛtaṃ vipākam
analyzed: tat te nukampām su samīkṣamāṇaḥ bhuñjānaḥ eva ātma kṛtam vipākam

original: BhP_10.14.008/3 hṛd-vāg-vapurbhir vidadhan namas te jīveta yo mukti-pade sa dāya-bhāk
analyzed: hṛd vāc vapurbhiḥ vidadhan namaḥ te jīveta yaḥ mukti pade sa dāya bhāj

original: BhP_10.14.009/1 paśyeśa me 'nāryam ananta ādye parātmani tvayy api māyi-māyini
analyzed: paśya īśa me nāryam anante ādye parātmani tvayi api māyi māyini

original: BhP_10.14.009/3 māyāṃ vitatyekṣitum ātma-vaibhavaṃ hy ahaṃ kiyān aiccham ivārcir agnau
analyzed: māyām vitatya īkṣitum ātma vaibhavam hi aham kiyān aiccham iva arciḥ agnau

original: BhP_10.14.010/1 ataḥ kṣamasvācyuta me rajo-bhuvo hy ajānatas tvat-pṛthag-īśa-māninaḥ
analyzed: atas kṣamasva acyuta me rajaḥ bhuvaḥ hi a jānataḥ tvad pṛthak īśa māninaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.010/3 ajāvalepāndha-tamo-'ndha-cakṣuṣa eṣo 'nukampyo mayi nāthavān iti
analyzed: eṣaḥ nu kampyaḥ mayi nāthavān iti

original: BhP_10.14.011/1 kvāhaṃ tamo-mahad-ahaṃ-kha-carāgni-vār-bhū-
analyzed: kva aham tamaḥ mahat aham kha cara agni vārbhū

original: BhP_10.14.011/2 saṃveṣṭitāṇḍa-ghaṭa-sapta-vitasti-kāyaḥ
analyzed: saṃveṣṭita aṇḍa ghaṭa sapta vitasti kāyaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.011/3 kvedṛg-vidhāvigaṇitāṇḍa-parāṇu-caryā-
analyzed: kva īdṛgvidhā vigaṇita aṇḍa para aṇu caryā

original: BhP_10.14.011/4 vātādhva-roma-vivarasya ca te mahitvam
analyzed: vāta adhva roma vivarasya ca te mahi tvam

original: BhP_10.14.012/1 utkṣepaṇaṃ garbha-gatasya pādayoḥ kiṃ kalpate mātur adhokṣajāgase
analyzed: utkṣepaṇam garbha gatasya pādayoḥ kim kalpate mātuḥ adhokṣaja āgase

original: BhP_10.14.012/3 kim asti-nāsti-vyapadeśa-bhūṣitaṃ tavāsti kukṣeḥ kiyad apy anantaḥ
analyzed: kim asti nāsti vyapadeśa bhūṣitam tava asti kukṣeḥ kiyat api anantaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.013/1 jagat-trayāntodadhi-samplavode nārāyaṇasyodara-nābhi-nālāt
BhP_10.14.013/3 vinirgato 'jas tv iti vāṅ na vai mṛṣā kintv īśvara tvan na vinirgato 'smi
analyzed: vinirgataḥ jaḥ tu iti vāc na vai mṛṣā kintu īśvara tvat na smi

original: BhP_10.14.014/1 nārāyaṇas tvaṃ na hi sarva-dehinām ātmāsy adhīśākhila-loka-sākṣī
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ tvam na hi sarva dehinām ātmā asi adhīśa akhila loka sākṣī

original: BhP_10.14.014/3 nārāyaṇo 'ṅgaṃ nara-bhū-jalāyanāt tac cāpi satyaṃ na tavaiva māyā
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ ṅgam nara bhū jalāyanāt tat ca api satyam na tava eva māyā

original: BhP_10.14.015/1 tac cej jala-sthaṃ tava saj jagad-vapuḥ
analyzed: tat ced jala stham tava sat jagat vapuḥ

original: BhP_10.14.015/2 kiṃ me na dṛṣṭaṃ bhagavaṃs tadaiva
analyzed: kim me na dṛṣṭam bhagavan tadā eva

original: BhP_10.14.015/3 kiṃ vā su-dṛṣṭaṃ hṛdi me tadaiva
analyzed: kim vā su dṛṣṭam hṛdi me tadā eva

original: BhP_10.14.015/4 kiṃ no sapady eva punar vyadarśi
analyzed: kim no sapadi eva punar vyadarśi

original: BhP_10.14.016/1 atraiva māyā-dhamanāvatāre hy asya prapañcasya bahiḥ sphuṭasya
analyzed: atrā eva māyā dhamana avatāre hi asya prapañcasya bahis sphuṭasya

original: BhP_10.14.016/3 kṛtsnasya cāntar jaṭhare jananyā māyātvam eva prakaṭī-kṛtaṃ te
analyzed: kṛtsnasya ca antar jaṭhare jananyāḥ māyā tvam eva prakaṭīkṛtam te

original: BhP_10.14.017/1 yasya kukṣāv idaṃ sarvaṃ sātmaṃ bhāti yathā tathā
analyzed: yasya kukṣau idam sarvam sa ātmam bhāti yathā tathā

original: BhP_10.14.017/3 tat tvayy apīha tat sarvaṃ kim idaṃ māyayā vinā
analyzed: tat tvayi api iha tat sarvam kim idam māyayā vinā

original: BhP_10.14.018/1 adyaiva tvad ṛte 'sya kiṃ mama na te māyātvam ādarśitam
analyzed: adyā eva tvat ṛte sya kim mama na te māyā tvam ādarśitam

original: BhP_10.14.018/2 eko 'si prathamaṃ tato vraja-suhṛd-vatsāḥ samastā api
analyzed: ekaḥ si prathamam tatas vraja suhṛd vatsāḥ samastāḥ api

original: BhP_10.14.018/3 tāvanto 'si catur-bhujās tad akhilaiḥ sākaṃ mayopāsitās
analyzed: tāvantaḥ si catur bhujāḥ tat akhilaiḥ sākam mayā upāsitāḥ

original: BhP_10.14.018/4 tāvanty eva jaganty abhūs tad amitaṃ brahmādvayaṃ śiṣyate
analyzed: tāvanti eva jaganti abhūḥ tat amitam brahma advayam śiṣyate

original: BhP_10.14.019/1 ajānatāṃ tvat-padavīm anātmany ātmātmanā bhāsi vitatya māyām
analyzed: a jānatām tvad padavīm anātmani ātma ātmanā bhāsi vitatya māyām

original: BhP_10.14.019/3 sṛṣṭāv ivāhaṃ jagato vidhāna iva tvam eṣo 'nta iva trinetraḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭau iva aham jagataḥ vidhāne iva tvam eṣaḥ nte iva trinetraḥ

original: BhP_10.14.020/1 sureṣv ṛṣiṣv īśa tathaiva nṛṣv api tiryakṣu yādaḥsv api te 'janasya
analyzed: sureṣu ṛṣiṣu īśa tathā eva nṛṣu api tiryakṣu yādaḥsu api te janasya

original: BhP_10.14.020/3 janmāsatāṃ durmada-nigrahāya prabho vidhātaḥ sad-anugrahāya ca
analyzed: janma asatām durmada nigrahāya prabho vidhātar sat anugrahāya ca

original: BhP_10.14.021/1 ko vetti bhūman bhagavan parātman yogeśvarotīr bhavatas tri-lokyām
analyzed: kaḥ vetti bhūman bhagavan parātman yogeśvara ūtīḥ bhavataḥ trilokyām

original: BhP_10.14.021/3 kva vā kathaṃ vā kati vā kadeti vistārayan krīḍasi yoga-māyām
analyzed: kva vā katham vā kati vā kadā iti vistārayan krīḍasi yogamāyām

original: BhP_10.14.022/1 tasmād idaṃ jagad aśeṣam asat-svarūpaṃ
analyzed: tasmāt idam jagat aśeṣam asat svarūpam

original: BhP_10.14.022/2 svapnābham asta-dhiṣaṇaṃ puru-duḥkha-duḥkham
analyzed: svapna ābham asta dhiṣaṇam puru duḥkha duḥkham

original: BhP_10.14.022/3 tvayy eva nitya-sukha-bodha-tanāv anante
analyzed: tvayi eva nitya sukha bodha tanau anante

original: BhP_10.14.022/4 māyāta udyad api yat sad ivāvabhāti
analyzed: māyātaḥ udyat api yat sat iva avabhāti

original: BhP_10.14.023/1 ekas tvam ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ satyaḥ svayaṃ-jyotir ananta ādyaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ tvam ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ satyaḥ svayam jyotiḥ anantaḥ ādyaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.023/3 nityo 'kṣaro 'jasra-sukho nirañjanaḥ pūrṇādvayo mukta upādhito 'mṛtaḥ
BhP_10.14.024/1 evaṃ-vidhaṃ tvāṃ sakalātmanām api svātmānam ātmātmatayā vicakṣate
analyzed: evaṃvidham tvām sakala ātmanām api sva ātmānam ātma ātma tayā vicakṣate

original: BhP_10.14.024/3 gurv-arka-labdhopaniṣat-sucakṣuṣā ye te tarantīva bhavānṛtāmbudhim
analyzed: guru arka labdha upaniṣad su cakṣuṣā ye te taranti iva bhava anṛta ambudhim

original: BhP_10.14.025/1 ātmānam evātmatayāvijānatāṃ tenaiva jātaṃ nikhilaṃ prapañcitam
analyzed: ātmānam eva ātma tayā avijānatām tena eva jātam nikhilam prapañcitam

original: BhP_10.14.025/3 jñānena bhūyo 'pi ca tat pralīyate rajjvām aher bhoga-bhavābhavau yathā
analyzed: jñānena ca tat pralīyate rajjvām aheḥ bhoga bhava abhavau yathā

original: BhP_10.14.026/1 ajñāna-saṃjñau bhava-bandha-mokṣau dvau nāma nānyau sta ṛta-jña-bhāvāt
analyzed: ajñāna saṃjñau bhava bandha mokṣau dvau nāma na anyau staḥ ṛta jña bhāvāt

original: BhP_10.14.026/3 ajasra-city ātmani kevale pare vicāryamāṇe taraṇāv ivāhanī
analyzed: ajasra citi ātmani kevale pare vicāryamāṇe taraṇau iva ahanī

original: BhP_10.14.027/1 tvām ātmānaṃ paraṃ matvā param ātmānam eva ca
analyzed: tvām ātmānam param matvā param ātmānam eva ca

original: BhP_10.14.027/3 ātmā punar bahir mṛgya aho 'jña-janatājñatā
analyzed: ātmā punar bahis mṛgya aho jña jana tā ajña tā

original: BhP_10.14.028/1 antar-bhave 'nanta bhavantam eva hy atat tyajanto mṛgayanti santaḥ
analyzed: antarbhave nanta bhavantam eva hi a tat tyajantaḥ mṛgayanti santaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.028/3 asantam apy anty ahim antareṇa santaṃ guṇaṃ taṃ kim u yanti santaḥ
analyzed: asantam api anti ahim antareṇa santam guṇam tam kim u yanti santaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.029/1 athāpi te deva padāmbuja-dvaya- prasāda-leśānugṛhīta eva hi
analyzed: atha api te deva pada ambuja dvaya prasāda leśa anugṛhītaḥ eva hi

original: BhP_10.14.029/3 jānāti tattvaṃ bhagavan-mahimno na cānya eko 'pi ciraṃ vicinvan
analyzed: jānāti tattvam bhagavat mahimnaḥ na ca anyaḥ ekaḥ ciram vicinvan

original: BhP_10.14.030/1 tad astu me nātha sa bhūri-bhāgo bhave 'tra vānyatra tu vā tiraścām
analyzed: tat astu me nātha sa bhūri bhāgaḥ bhave vā anyatra tu vā tiraścām

original: BhP_10.14.030/3 yenāham eko 'pi bhavaj-janānāṃ bhūtvā niṣeve tava pāda-pallavam
analyzed: yena aham ekaḥ bhavat janānām bhūtvā niṣeve tava pāda pallavam

original: BhP_10.14.031/1 aho 'ti-dhanyā vraja-go-ramaṇyaḥ stanyāmṛtaṃ pītam atīva te mudā
analyzed: aho ti dhanyāḥ vraja goramaṇyaḥ stanya amṛtam pītam atīva te mudā

original: BhP_10.14.031/3 yāsāṃ vibho vatsatarātmajātmanā yat-tṛptaye 'dyāpi na cālam adhvarāḥ
analyzed: yāsām vibho vatsatara ātmaja ātmanā yad tṛptaye dyā api na ca alam adhvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.14.032/1 aho bhāgyam aho bhāgyaṃ nanda-gopa-vrajaukasām
analyzed: aho bhāgyam aho bhāgyam nanda gopa vraja okasām

original: BhP_10.14.032/3 yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam
analyzed: yat mitram parama ānandam pūrṇam brahma sanātanam

original: BhP_10.14.033/1 eṣāṃ tu bhāgya-mahimācyuta tāvad āstām
analyzed: eṣām tu bhāgya mahimā acyuta tāvat āstām

original: BhP_10.14.033/2 ekādaśaiva hi vayaṃ bata bhūri-bhāgāḥ
analyzed: ekādaśa eva hi vayam bata bhūri bhāgāḥ

original: BhP_10.14.033/3 etad-dhṛṣīka-caṣakair asakṛt pibāmaḥ
analyzed: etat hṛṣīka caṣakaiḥ asakṛt pibāmaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.033/4 śarvādayo 'ṅghry-udaja-madhv-amṛtāsavaṃ te
analyzed: śarva ādayaḥ ṅghri udaja madhu amṛta āsavam te

original: BhP_10.14.034/1 tad bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim apy aṭavyāṃ
analyzed: tat bhūri bhāgyam iha janma kim api aṭavyām

original: BhP_10.14.034/2 yad gokule 'pi katamāṅghri-rajo-'bhiṣekam
analyzed: yat gokule katama aṅghri rajaḥ abhiṣekam

original: BhP_10.14.034/3 yaj-jīvitaṃ tu nikhilaṃ bhagavān mukundas
analyzed: yat jīvitam tu nikhilam bhagavān mukundaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.034/4 tv adyāpi yat-pada-rajaḥ śruti-mṛgyam eva
analyzed: tu adyā api yad pada rajaḥ śruti mṛgyam eva

original: BhP_10.14.035/1 eṣāṃ ghoṣa-nivāsinām uta bhavān kiṃ deva rāteti naś
analyzed: eṣām ghoṣa nivāsinām uta bhavān kim deva rāta iti naḥ

original: BhP_10.14.035/2 ceto viśva-phalāt phalaṃ tvad-aparaṃ kutrāpy ayan muhyati
analyzed: cetaḥ viśva phalāt phalam tvad aparam kutra api ayat muhyati

original: BhP_10.14.035/3 sad-veṣād iva pūtanāpi sa-kulā tvām eva devāpitā
analyzed: sa dveṣāt iva pūtanā api sa kulā tvām eva devā pitā

original: BhP_10.14.035/4 yad-dhāmārtha-suhṛt-priyātma-tanaya-prāṇāśayās tvat-kṛte
analyzed: yad dhāma artha suhṛd priya ātma tanaya prāṇa āśayāḥ tvad kṛte

original: BhP_10.14.036/1 tāvad rāgādayaḥ stenās tāvat kārā-gṛhaṃ gṛham
analyzed: tāvat rāga ādayaḥ stenāḥ tāvat kārāgṛham gṛham

original: BhP_10.14.036/3 tāvan moho 'ṅghri-nigaḍo yāvat kṛṣṇa na te janāḥ
analyzed: tāvat mohaḥ ṅghri nigaḍaḥ yāvat kṛṣṇa na te janāḥ

original: BhP_10.14.037/1 prapañcaṃ niṣprapañco 'pi viḍambayasi bhū-tale
analyzed: prapañcam viḍambayasi bhū tale

original: BhP_10.14.037/3 prapanna-janatānanda- sandohaṃ prathituṃ prabho
analyzed: prapanna janatā ānanda sandoham prathitum prabho

original: BhP_10.14.038/1 jānanta eva jānantu kiṃ bahūktyā na me prabho
analyzed: jānantaḥ eva jānantu kim bahu uktyā na me prabho

original: BhP_10.14.038/3 manaso vapuṣo vāco vaibhavaṃ tava go-caraḥ
analyzed: manasaḥ vapuṣaḥ vācaḥ vaibhavam tava gocaraḥ

original: BhP_10.14.039/1 anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa sarvaṃ tvaṃ vetsi sarva-dṛk
analyzed: anujānīhi mām kṛṣṇa sarvam tvam vetsi sarva dṛś

original: BhP_10.14.039/3 tvam eva jagatāṃ nātho jagad etat tavārpitam
analyzed: tvam eva jagatām nāthaḥ jagat etat tava arpitam

original: BhP_10.14.040/1 śrī-kṛṣṇa vṛṣṇi-kula-puṣkara-joṣa-dāyin
BhP_10.14.040/2 kṣmā-nirjara-dvija-paśūdadhi-vṛddhi-kārin
BhP_10.14.040/3 uddharma-śārvara-hara kṣiti-rākṣasa-dhrug
BhP_10.14.040/4 ā-kalpam ārkam arhan bhagavan namas te
analyzed: ā kalpam ārkam arhan bhagavan namaḥ te

original: BhP_10.14.041/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.14.041/1 ity abhiṣṭūya bhūmānaṃ triḥ parikramya pādayoḥ
analyzed: iti abhiṣṭūya bhūmānam tris parikramya pādayoḥ

original: BhP_10.14.041/3 natvābhīṣṭaṃ jagad-dhātā sva-dhāma pratyapadyata
analyzed: natvā abhīṣṭam jagaddhātā sva dhāma pratyapadyata

original: BhP_10.14.042/1 tato 'nujñāpya bhagavān sva-bhuvaṃ prāg avasthitān
analyzed: tatas nujñāpya bhagavān sva bhuvam prāk avasthitān

original: BhP_10.14.042/3 vatsān pulinam āninye yathā-pūrva-sakhaṃ svakam
analyzed: vatsān pulinam āninye yathāpūrva sakham svakam

original: BhP_10.14.043/1 ekasminn api yāte 'bde prāṇeśaṃ cāntarātmanaḥ
analyzed: ekasmin api yāte bde prāṇa īśam ca antarātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.043/3 kṛṣṇa-māyāhatā rājan kṣaṇārdhaṃ menire 'rbhakāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa māyā hatāḥ rājan kṣaṇa ardham menire rbhakāḥ

original: BhP_10.14.044/1 kiṃ kiṃ na vismarantīha māyā-mohita-cetasaḥ
analyzed: kim kim na vismaranti iha māyā mohita cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.044/3 yan-mohitaṃ jagat sarvam abhīkṣṇaṃ vismṛtātmakam
analyzed: yat mohitam jagat sarvam abhīkṣṇam vismṛta ātmakam

original: BhP_10.14.045/1 ūcuś ca suhṛdaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ sv-āgataṃ te 'ti-raṃhasā
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca suhṛdaḥ kṛṣṇam svāgatam te tiraṃhasā

original: BhP_10.14.045/3 naiko 'py abhoji kavala ehītaḥ sādhu bhujyatām
analyzed: na ekaḥ pi abhoji kavalaḥ ehi itas sādhu bhujyatām

original: BhP_10.14.046/1 tato hasan hṛṣīkeśo 'bhyavahṛtya sahārbhakaiḥ
analyzed: tatas hasan hṛṣīkeśaḥ bhyavahṛtya saha arbhakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.14.046/3 darśayaṃś carmājagaraṃ nyavartata vanād vrajam
analyzed: darśayan carma ajagaram nyavartata vanāt vrajam

original: BhP_10.14.047/1 barha-prasūna-vana-dhātu-vicitritāṅgaḥ
analyzed: barha prasūna vana dhātu vicitrita aṅgaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.047/2 proddāma-veṇu-dala-śṛṅga-ravotsavāḍhyaḥ
BhP_10.14.047/3 vatsān gṛṇann anuga-gīta-pavitra-kīrtir
analyzed: vatsān gṛṇan anuga gīta pavitra kīrtiḥ

original: BhP_10.14.047/4 gopī-dṛg-utsava-dṛśiḥ praviveśa goṣṭham
analyzed: gopī dṛś utsava dṛśiḥ praviveśa goṣṭham

original: BhP_10.14.048/1 adyānena mahā-vyālo yaśodā-nanda-sūnunā
analyzed: adya anena mahā vyālaḥ yaśoda ānanda sūnunā

original: BhP_10.14.048/3 hato 'vitā vayaṃ cāsmād iti bālā vraje jaguḥ
analyzed: hataḥ vayam ca asmāt iti bālāḥ vraje jaguḥ

original: BhP_10.14.049/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.14.049/1 brahman parodbhave kṛṣṇe iyān premā kathaṃ bhavet
analyzed: brahman para udbhave kṛṣṇe iyān premā katham bhavet

original: BhP_10.14.049/3 yo 'bhūta-pūrvas tokeṣu svodbhaveṣv api kathyatām
analyzed: yaḥ bhūta pūrvaḥ tokeṣu sva udbhaveṣu api kathyatām

original: BhP_10.14.050/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.14.050/1 sarveṣām api bhūtānāṃ nṛpa svātmaiva vallabhaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām api bhūtānām nṛpa sva ātmā eva vallabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.050/3 itare 'patya-vittādyās tad-vallabhatayaiva hi
analyzed: itare pati avitta ādyāḥ tad vallabha tayā eva hi

original: BhP_10.14.051/1 tad rājendra yathā snehaḥ sva-svakātmani dehinām
analyzed: tat rāja indra yathā snehaḥ sva svaka ātmani dehinām

original: BhP_10.14.051/3 na tathā mamatālambi- putra-vitta-gṛhādiṣu
analyzed: na tathā mamatā ālambi putra vitta gṛha ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.14.052/1 dehātma-vādināṃ puṃsām api rājanya-sattama
analyzed: deha ātma vādinām puṃsām api rājanya sattama

original: BhP_10.14.052/3 yathā dehaḥ priyatamas tathā na hy anu ye ca tam
analyzed: yathā dehaḥ priyatamaḥ tathā na hi anu ye ca tam

original: BhP_10.14.053/1 deho 'pi mamatā-bhāk cet tarhy asau nātma-vat priyaḥ
analyzed: mamatā bhāj ced tarhi asau na ātma vat priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.053/3 yaj jīryaty api dehe 'smin jīvitāśā balīyasī
analyzed: yat jīryati api dehe smin jīvita āśā balīyasī

original: BhP_10.14.054/1 tasmāt priyatamaḥ svātmā sarveṣām api dehinām
analyzed: tasmāt priyatamaḥ svātmā sarveṣām api dehinām

original: BhP_10.14.054/3 tad-artham eva sakalaṃ jagad etac carācaram
analyzed: tad artham eva sakalam jagat etat carācaram

original: BhP_10.14.055/1 kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhilātmanām
analyzed: kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhila ātmanām

original: BhP_10.14.055/3 jagad-dhitāya so 'py atra dehīvābhāti māyayā
analyzed: jagat hitāya saḥ u pi atra dehī iva ābhāti māyayā

original: BhP_10.14.056/1 vastuto jānatām atra kṛṣṇaṃ sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca
analyzed: vastutas jānatām atra kṛṣṇam sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca

original: BhP_10.14.056/3 bhagavad-rūpam akhilaṃ nānyad vastv iha kiñcana
analyzed: bhagavat rūpam akhilam na anyat vastu iha kiñcana

original: BhP_10.14.057/1 sarveṣām api vastūnāṃ bhāvārtho bhavati sthitaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām api vastūnām bhāva arthaḥ bhavati sthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.14.057/3 tasyāpi bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ kim atad vastu rūpyatām
analyzed: tasya api bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ kim a tat vastu rūpyatām

original: BhP_10.14.058/1 samāśritā ye pada-pallava-plavaṃ mahat-padaṃ puṇya-yaśo murāreḥ
analyzed: samāśritāḥ ye pada pallava plavam mahat padam puṇya yaśaḥ murāreḥ

original: BhP_10.14.058/3 bhavāmbudhir vatsa-padaṃ paraṃ padaṃ padaṃ padaṃ yad vipadāṃ na teṣām
analyzed: bhava ambudhiḥ vatsa padam param padam padam padam yat vipadām na teṣām

original: BhP_10.14.059/1 etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā
analyzed: etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham iha tvayā

original: BhP_10.14.059/3 tat kaumāre hari-kṛtaṃ paugaṇḍe parikīrtitam
analyzed: tat kaumāre hari kṛtam paugaṇḍe parikīrtitam

original: BhP_10.14.060/1 etat suhṛdbhiś caritaṃ murārer aghārdanaṃ śādvala-jemanaṃ ca
analyzed: etat suhṛdbhiḥ caritam murāreḥ agha ardanam śādvala jemanam ca

original: BhP_10.14.060/3 vyaktetarad rūpam ajorv-abhiṣṭavaṃ śṛṇvan gṛṇann eti naro 'khilārthān
analyzed: vyakta itarat rūpam aja uru abhiṣṭavam śṛṇvan gṛṇan eti khila arthān

original: BhP_10.14.061/1 evaṃ vihāraiḥ kaumāraiḥ kaumāraṃ jahatur vraje
analyzed: evam vihāraiḥ kaumāraiḥ kaumāram jahatuḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.14.061/3 nilāyanaiḥ setu-bandhair markaṭotplavanādibhiḥ
analyzed: nilāyanaiḥ setu bandhaiḥ markaṭa utplavana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.15.001/1 tataś ca paugaṇḍa-vayaḥ-śrītau vraje
analyzed: tatas ca paugaṇḍa vayaḥ śrītau vraje

original: BhP_10.15.001/2 babhūvatus tau paśu-pāla-sammatau
analyzed: babhūvatuḥ tau paśupāla sammatau

original: BhP_10.15.001/3 gāś cārayantau sakhibhiḥ samaṃ padair
analyzed: gāḥ cārayantau sakhibhiḥ samam padaiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.001/4 vṛndāvanaṃ puṇyam atīva cakratuḥ
analyzed: vṛndāvanam puṇyam atīva cakratuḥ

original: BhP_10.15.002/1 tan mādhavo veṇum udīrayan vṛto gopair gṛṇadbhiḥ sva-yaśo balānvitaḥ
analyzed: tat mādhavaḥ veṇum udīrayan vṛtaḥ gopaiḥ gṛṇadbhiḥ sva yaśaḥ bala anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.002/3 paśūn puraskṛtya paśavyam āviśad vihartu-kāmaḥ kusumākaraṃ vanam
analyzed: paśūn puraskṛtya paśavyam āviśat vihartu kāmaḥ kusumākaram vanam

original: BhP_10.15.003/1 tan mañju-ghoṣāli-mṛga-dvijākulaṃ mahan-manaḥ-prakhya-payaḥ-sarasvatā
analyzed: tat mañjughoṣa ali mṛga dvija ākulam mahat manaḥ prakhya payaḥ sarasvatā

original: BhP_10.15.003/3 vātena juṣṭaṃ śata-patra-gandhinā nirīkṣya rantuṃ bhagavān mano dadhe
analyzed: vātena juṣṭam śatapatra gandhinā nirīkṣya rantum bhagavān manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_10.15.004/1 sa tatra tatrāruṇa-pallava-śriyā phala-prasūnoru-bhareṇa pādayoḥ
analyzed: sa tatra tatra aruṇa pallava śriyā phala prasūna uru bhareṇa pādayoḥ

original: BhP_10.15.004/3 spṛśac chikhān vīkṣya vanaspatīn mudā smayann ivāhāgra-jam ādi-pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: spṛśat śikhān vīkṣya vanaspatīn mudā smayan iva āha agrajam ādipūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.005/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.15.005/1 aho amī deva-varāmarārcitaṃ pādāmbujaṃ te sumanaḥ-phalārhaṇam
analyzed: aho amī deva vara amara arcitam pāda ambujam te sumanaḥ phala arhaṇam

original: BhP_10.15.005/3 namanty upādāya śikhābhir ātmanas tamo-'pahatyai taru-janma yat-kṛtam
analyzed: namanti upādāya śikhābhiḥ ātmanaḥ tamaḥ upahatyai taru janma yat kṛtam

original: BhP_10.15.006/1 ete 'linas tava yaśo 'khila-loka-tīrthaṃ
analyzed: ete linaḥ tava yaśaḥ khila loka tīrtham

original: BhP_10.15.006/2 gāyanta ādi-puruṣānupathaṃ bhajante
analyzed: gāyantaḥ ādi puruṣa anupatham bhajante

original: BhP_10.15.006/3 prāyo amī muni-gaṇā bhavadīya-mukhyā
analyzed: prāyas amī muni gaṇāḥ bhavadīya mukhyā

original: BhP_10.15.006/4 gūḍhaṃ vane 'pi na jahaty anaghātma-daivam
analyzed: gūḍham vane na jahati anagha ātma daivam

original: BhP_10.15.007/1 nṛtyanty amī śikhina īḍya mudā hariṇyaḥ
analyzed: nṛtyanti amī śikhinaḥ īḍya mudā hariṇyaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.007/2 kurvanti gopya iva te priyam īkṣaṇena
analyzed: kurvanti gopyaḥ iva te priyam īkṣaṇena

original: BhP_10.15.007/3 sūktaiś ca kokila-gaṇā gṛham āgatāya
analyzed: sūktaiḥ ca kokila gaṇāḥ gṛham āgatāya

original: BhP_10.15.007/4 dhanyā vanaukasa iyān hi satāṃ nisargaḥ
analyzed: dhanyāḥ vanaukasaḥ iyān hi satām nisargaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.008/1 dhanyeyam adya dharaṇī tṛṇa-vīrudhas tvat-
analyzed: dhanyā iyam adya dharaṇī tṛṇa vīrudhaḥ tvat

original: BhP_10.15.008/2 pāda-spṛśo druma-latāḥ karajābhimṛṣṭāḥ
analyzed: pāda spṛśaḥ druma latāḥ karaja abhimṛṣṭāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.008/3 nadyo 'drayaḥ khaga-mṛgāḥ sadayāvalokair
analyzed: nadyaḥ drayaḥ khaga mṛgāḥ sa dayā avalokaiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.008/4 gopyo 'ntareṇa bhujayor api yat-spṛhā śrīḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ntareṇa bhujayoḥ api yad spṛhā śrīḥ

original: BhP_10.15.009/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.15.009/1 evaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ śrīmat kṛṣṇaḥ prīta-manāḥ paśūn
analyzed: evam vṛndāvanam śrīmat kṛṣṇaḥ prīta manāḥ paśūn

original: BhP_10.15.009/3 reme sañcārayann adreḥ sarid-rodhaḥsu sānugaḥ
analyzed: reme sañcārayan adreḥ sarit rodhaḥsu sa anugaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.010/1 kvacid gāyati gāyatsu madāndhāliṣv anuvrataiḥ
analyzed: kvacid gāyati gāyatsu mada andha aliṣu anuvrataiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.010/3 upagīyamāna-caritaḥ pathi saṅkarṣaṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: upagīyamāna caritaḥ pathi saṅkarṣaṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.011/1 anujalpati jalpantaṃ kala-vākyaiḥ śukaṃ kvacit
analyzed: anujalpati jalpantam kala vākyaiḥ śukam kvacid

original: BhP_10.15.011/3 kvacit sa-valgu kūjantam anukūjati kokilam
analyzed: kvacid savalgu kūjantam anukūjati kokilam

original: BhP_10.15.011/5 kvacic ca kāla-haṃsānām anukūjati kūjitam
analyzed: kvacid ca kālahaṃsānām anukūjati kūjitam

original: BhP_10.15.011/7 abhinṛtyati nṛtyantaṃ barhiṇaṃ hāsayan kvacit
analyzed: abhinṛtyati nṛtyantam barhiṇam hāsayan kvacid

original: BhP_10.15.012/1 megha-gambhīrayā vācā nāmabhir dūra-gān paśūn
analyzed: megha gambhīrayā vācā nāmabhiḥ dūra gān paśūn

original: BhP_10.15.012/3 kvacid āhvayati prītyā go-gopāla-manojñayā
analyzed: kvacid āhvayati prītyā go gopāla manojñayā

original: BhP_10.15.013/1 cakora-krauñca-cakrāhva- bhāradvājāṃś ca barhiṇaḥ
analyzed: cakora krauñca cakra āhva bhāradvājān ca barhiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.013/3 anurauti sma sattvānāṃ bhīta-vad vyāghra-siṃhayoḥ
analyzed: anurauti sma sattvānām bhīta vat vyāghra siṃhayoḥ

original: BhP_10.15.014/1 kvacit krīḍā-pariśrāntaṃ gopotsaṅgopabarhaṇam
analyzed: kvacid krīḍā pariśrāntam gopa utsaṅga upabarhaṇam

original: BhP_10.15.014/3 svayaṃ viśramayaty āryaṃ pāda-saṃvāhanādibhiḥ
analyzed: svayam viśramayati āryam pāda saṃvāhana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.015/1 nṛtyato gāyataḥ kvāpi valgato yudhyato mithaḥ
analyzed: nṛtyataḥ gāyataḥ kvāpi valgataḥ yudhyataḥ mithas

original: BhP_10.15.015/3 gṛhīta-hastau gopālān hasantau praśaśaṃsatuḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta hastau gopālān hasantau praśaśaṃsatuḥ

original: BhP_10.15.016/1 kvacit pallava-talpeṣu niyuddha-śrama-karśitaḥ
analyzed: kvacid pallava talpeṣu niyuddha śrama karśitaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.016/3 vṛkṣa-mūlāśrayaḥ śete gopotsaṅgopabarhaṇaḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣa mūla āśrayaḥ śete gopa utsaṅga upabarhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.017/1 pāda-saṃvāhanaṃ cakruḥ kecit tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pāda saṃvāhanam cakruḥ kecid tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.017/3 apare hata-pāpmāno vyajanaiḥ samavījayan
analyzed: apare hata pāpmānaḥ vyajanaiḥ samavījayan

original: BhP_10.15.018/1 anye tad-anurūpāṇi manojñāni mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: anye tad anurūpāṇi manojñāni mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.018/3 gāyanti sma mahā-rāja sneha-klinna-dhiyaḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: gāyanti sma mahā rāja sneha klinna dhiyaḥ śanais

original: BhP_10.15.019/1 evaṃ nigūḍhātma-gatiḥ sva-māyayā gopātmajatvaṃ caritair viḍambayan
analyzed: evam nigūḍha ātma gatiḥ sva māyayā gopa ātmaja tvam caritaiḥ viḍambayan

original: BhP_10.15.019/3 reme ramā-lālita-pāda-pallavo grāmyaiḥ samaṃ grāmya-vad īśa-ceṣṭitaḥ
analyzed: reme ramā lālita pāda pallavaḥ grāmyaiḥ samam grāmya vat īśa ceṣṭitaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.020/1 śrīdāmā nāma gopālo rāma-keśavayoḥ sakhā
analyzed: śrīdāmā nāma gopālaḥ rāma keśavayoḥ sakhā

original: BhP_10.15.020/3 subala-stokakṛṣṇādyā gopāḥ premṇedam abruvan
analyzed: subala stoka kṛṣṇa ādyāḥ gopāḥ premṇā idam abruvan

original: BhP_10.15.021/1 rāma rāma mahā-bāho kṛṣṇa duṣṭa-nibarhaṇa
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho kṛṣṇa duṣṭa nibarhaṇa

original: BhP_10.15.021/3 ito 'vidūre su-mahad vanaṃ tālāli-saṅkulam
analyzed: itas vidūre su mahat vanam tāla ali saṅkulam

original: BhP_10.15.022/1 phalāni tatra bhūrīṇi patanti patitāni ca
analyzed: phalāni tatra bhūrīṇi patanti patitāni ca

original: BhP_10.15.022/3 santi kintv avaruddhāni dhenukena durātmanā
analyzed: santi kintu avaruddhāni dhenukena durātmanā

original: BhP_10.15.023/1 so 'ti-vīryo 'suro rāma he kṛṣṇa khara-rūpa-dhṛk
analyzed: saḥ tivīryaḥ suraḥ rāma he kṛṣṇa khara rūpa dhṛk

original: BhP_10.15.023/3 ātma-tulya-balair anyair jñātibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: ātma tulya balaiḥ anyaiḥ jñātibhiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.024/1 tasmāt kṛta-narāhārād bhītair nṛbhir amitra-han
analyzed: tasmāt kṛta nara āhārāt bhītaiḥ nṛbhiḥ amitra han

original: BhP_10.15.024/3 na sevyate paśu-gaṇaiḥ pakṣi-saṅghair vivarjitam
analyzed: na sevyate paśu gaṇaiḥ pakṣi saṅghaiḥ vivarjitam

original: BhP_10.15.025/1 vidyante 'bhukta-pūrvāṇi phalāni surabhīṇi ca
analyzed: vidyante bhukta pūrvāṇi phalāni surabhīṇi ca

original: BhP_10.15.025/3 eṣa vai surabhir gandho viṣūcīno 'vagṛhyate
analyzed: eṣa vai surabhiḥ gandhaḥ viṣūcīnaḥ vagṛhyate

original: BhP_10.15.026/1 prayaccha tāni naḥ kṛṣṇa gandha-lobhita-cetasām
analyzed: prayaccha tāni naḥ kṛṣṇa gandha lobhita cetasām

original: BhP_10.15.026/3 vāñchāsti mahatī rāma gamyatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: vāñchā asti mahatī rāma gamyatām yadi rocate

original: BhP_10.15.027/1 evaṃ suhṛd-vacaḥ śrutvā suhṛt-priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: evam suhṛd vacaḥ śrutvā suhṛd priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.15.027/3 prahasya jagmatur gopair vṛtau tālavanaṃ prabhū
analyzed: prahasya jagmatuḥ gopaiḥ vṛtau tāla vanam prabhū

original: BhP_10.15.028/1 balaḥ praviśya bāhubhyāṃ tālān samparikampayan
analyzed: balaḥ praviśya bāhubhyām tālān samparikampayan

original: BhP_10.15.028/3 phalāni pātayām āsa mataṅ-gaja ivaujasā
analyzed: phalāni pātayām āsa mataṅga jaḥ iva ojasā

original: BhP_10.15.029/1 phalānāṃ patatāṃ śabdaṃ niśamyāsura-rāsabhaḥ
analyzed: phalānām patatām śabdam niśamya asura rāsabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.029/3 abhyadhāvat kṣiti-talaṃ sa-nagaṃ parikampayan
analyzed: abhyadhāvat kṣiti talam sa nagam parikampayan

original: BhP_10.15.030/1 sametya tarasā pratyag dvābhyāṃ padbhyāṃ balaṃ balī
analyzed: sametya tarasā pratyak dvābhyām padbhyām balam balī

original: BhP_10.15.030/3 nihatyorasi kā-śabdaṃ muñcan paryasarat khalaḥ
analyzed: nihatya urasi kā śabdam muñcan paryasarat khalaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.031/1 punar āsādya saṃrabdha upakroṣṭā parāk sthitaḥ
analyzed: punar āsādya saṃrabdhaḥ upakroṣṭā parāk sthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.031/3 caraṇāv aparau rājan balāya prākṣipad ruṣā
analyzed: caraṇau aparau rājan balāya prākṣipat ruṣā

original: BhP_10.15.032/1 sa taṃ gṛhītvā prapador bhrāmayitvaika-pāṇinā
analyzed: sa tam gṛhītvā prapadoḥ bhrāmayitvā eka pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.15.032/3 cikṣepa tṛṇa-rājāgre bhrāmaṇa-tyakta-jīvitam
analyzed: cikṣepa tṛṇarāja agre bhrāmaṇa tyakta jīvitam

original: BhP_10.15.033/1 tenāhato mahā-tālo vepamāno bṛhac-chirāḥ
analyzed: tena āhataḥ mahā tālaḥ vepamānaḥ bṛhat śirāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.033/3 pārśva-sthaṃ kampayan bhagnaḥ sa cānyaṃ so 'pi cāparam
analyzed: pārśva stham kampayan bhagnaḥ sa ca anyam ca aparam

original: BhP_10.15.034/1 balasya līlayotsṛṣṭa- khara-deha-hatāhatāḥ
analyzed: balasya khara deha hata āhatāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.034/3 tālāś cakampire sarve mahā-vāteritā iva
analyzed: tālāḥ cakampire sarve mahā vāta īritāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.15.035/1 naitac citraṃ bhagavati hy anante jagad-īśvare
analyzed: na etat citram bhagavati hi anante jagat īśvare

original: BhP_10.15.035/3 ota-protam idaṃ yasmiṃs tantuṣv aṅga yathā paṭaḥ
analyzed: otaprotam idam yasmin tantuṣu aṅga yathā paṭaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.036/1 tataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca jñātayo dhenukasya ye
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇam ca rāmam ca jñātayaḥ dhenukasya ye

original: BhP_10.15.036/3 kroṣṭāro 'bhyadravan sarve saṃrabdhā hata-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: kroṣṭāraḥ bhyadravan sarve saṃrabdhāḥ hata bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.037/1 tāṃs tān āpatataḥ kṛṣṇo rāmaś ca nṛpa līlayā
analyzed: tān tān āpatataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rāmaḥ ca nṛpa līlayā

original: BhP_10.15.037/3 gṛhīta-paścāc-caraṇān prāhiṇot tṛṇa-rājasu
analyzed: gṛhīta paścāt caraṇān prāhiṇot tṛṇa rājasu

original: BhP_10.15.038/1 phala-prakara-saṅkīrṇaṃ daitya-dehair gatāsubhiḥ
analyzed: phala prakara saṅkīrṇam daitya dehaiḥ gatāsubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.038/3 rarāja bhūḥ sa-tālāgrair ghanair iva nabhas-talam
analyzed: rarāja bhūḥ sa tāla agraiḥ ghanaiḥ iva nabhastalam

original: BhP_10.15.039/1 tayos tat su-mahat karma niśamya vibudhādayaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat su mahat karma niśamya vibudha ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.039/3 mumucuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi cakrur vādyāni tuṣṭuvuḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi cakruḥ vādyāni tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: BhP_10.15.040/1 atha tāla-phalāny ādan manuṣyā gata-sādhvasāḥ
analyzed: atha tāla phalāni ādan manuṣyāḥ gata sādhvasāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.040/3 tṛṇaṃ ca paśavaś cerur hata-dhenuka-kānane
analyzed: tṛṇam ca paśavaḥ ceruḥ hata dhenuka kānane

original: BhP_10.15.041/1 kṛṣṇaḥ kamala-patrākṣaḥ puṇya-śravaṇa-kīrtanaḥ
BhP_10.15.041/3 stūyamāno 'nugair gopaiḥ sāgrajo vrajam āvrajat
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ nugaiḥ gopaiḥ sa agrajaḥ vrajam āvrajat

original: BhP_10.15.042/1 taṃ gorajaś-churita-kuntala-baddha-barha-
analyzed: tam go rajaḥ churita kuntala baddha barha

original: BhP_10.15.042/2 vanya-prasūna-rucirekṣaṇa-cāru-hāsam
analyzed: vanya prasūna rucira īkṣaṇa cāru hāsam

original: BhP_10.15.042/3 veṇum kvaṇantam anugair upagīta-kīrtiṃ
analyzed: veṇum kvaṇantam anugaiḥ upagīta kīrtim

original: BhP_10.15.042/4 gopyo didṛkṣita-dṛśo 'bhyagaman sametāḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ didṛkṣita dṛśaḥ bhyagaman sametāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.043/1 pītvā mukunda-mukha-sāragham akṣi-bhṛṅgais
analyzed: pītvā mukunda mukha sāragham akṣi bhṛṅgaiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.043/2 tāpaṃ jahur viraha-jaṃ vraja-yoṣito 'hni
analyzed: tāpam jahuḥ viraha jam vraja yoṣitaḥ hni

original: BhP_10.15.043/3 tat sat-kṛtiṃ samadhigamya viveśa goṣṭhaṃ
analyzed: tat satkṛtim samadhigamya viveśa goṣṭham

original: BhP_10.15.043/4 savrīḍa-hāsa-vinayaṃ yad apāṅga-mokṣam
analyzed: sa vrīḍa hāsa vinayam yat apāṅga mokṣam

original: BhP_10.15.044/1 tayor yaśodā-rohiṇyau putrayoḥ putra-vatsale
analyzed: tayoḥ yaśodā rohiṇyau putrayoḥ putra vatsale

original: BhP_10.15.044/3 yathā-kāmaṃ yathā-kālaṃ vyadhattāṃ paramāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: yathākāmam yathākālam vyadhattām parama āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.045/1 gatādhvāna-śramau tatra majjanonmardanādibhiḥ
analyzed: gata adhvāna śramau tatra majjana unmardana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.15.045/3 nīvīṃ vasitvā rucirāṃ divya-srag-gandha-maṇḍitau
analyzed: nīvīm vasitvā rucirām divya sraj gandha maṇḍitau

original: BhP_10.15.046/1 janany-upahṛtaṃ prāśya svādy annam upalālitau
analyzed: jananī upahṛtam prāśya svādi annam upalālitau

original: BhP_10.15.046/3 saṃviśya vara-śayyāyāṃ sukhaṃ suṣupatur vraje
analyzed: saṃviśya vara śayyāyām sukham suṣupatuḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.15.047/1 evaṃ sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo vṛndāvana-caraḥ kvacit
analyzed: evam sa bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ vṛndāvana caraḥ kvacid

original: BhP_10.15.047/3 yayau rāmam ṛte rājan kālindīṃ sakhibhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yayau rāmam ṛte rājan kālindīm sakhibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.048/1 atha gāvaś ca gopāś ca nidāghātapa-pīḍitāḥ
analyzed: atha gāvaḥ ca gopāḥ ca nidāgha ātapa pīḍitāḥ

original: BhP_10.15.048/3 duṣṭaṃ jalaṃ papus tasyās tṛṣṇārtā viṣa-dūṣitam
analyzed: duṣṭam jalam papuḥ tasyāḥ tṛṣṇā ārtāḥ viṣa dūṣitam

original: BhP_10.15.049/1 viṣāmbhas tad upaspṛśya daivopahata-cetasaḥ
analyzed: viṣa ambhaḥ tat upaspṛśya daiva upahata cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.15.049/3 nipetur vyasavaḥ sarve salilānte kurūdvaha
analyzed: nipetuḥ vyasavaḥ sarve salila ante kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.15.050/1 vīkṣya tān vai tathā-bhūtān kṛṣṇo yogeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: vīkṣya tān vai tathābhūtān kṛṣṇaḥ yogeśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.15.050/3 īkṣayāmṛta-varṣiṇyā sva-nāthān samajīvayat
analyzed: īkṣayā amṛta varṣiṇyā sva nāthān samajīvayat

original: BhP_10.15.051/1 te sampratīta-smṛtayaḥ samutthāya jalāntikāt
analyzed: te sampratīta smṛtayaḥ samutthāya jala antikāt

original: BhP_10.15.051/3 āsan su-vismitāḥ sarve vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
analyzed: āsan su vismitāḥ sarve vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam

original: BhP_10.15.052/1 anvamaṃsata tad rājan govindānugrahekṣitam
analyzed: anvamaṃsata tat rājan govinda anugraha īkṣitam

original: BhP_10.15.052/3 pītvā viṣaṃ paretasya punar utthānam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: pītvā viṣam paretasya punar utthānam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.001/1 vilokya dūṣitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇāhinā vibhuḥ
analyzed: vilokya dūṣitām kṛṣṇām kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇa ahinā vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.16.001/3 tasyā viśuddhim anvicchan sarpaṃ tam udavāsayat
analyzed: tasyāḥ viśuddhim anvicchan sarpam tam udavāsayat

original: BhP_10.16.002/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.002/1 katham antar-jale 'gādhe nyagṛhṇād bhagavān ahim
analyzed: katham antar jale gādhe nyagṛhṇāt bhagavān ahim

original: BhP_10.16.002/3 sa vai bahu-yugāvāsaṃ yathāsīd vipra kathyatām
analyzed: sa vai bahu yuga āvāsam yathā āsīt vipra kathyatām

original: BhP_10.16.003/1 brahman bhagavatas tasya bhūmnaḥ svacchanda-vartinaḥ
analyzed: brahman bhagavataḥ tasya bhūmnaḥ svacchanda vartinaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.003/3 gopālodāra-caritaṃ kas tṛpyetāmṛtaṃ juṣan
analyzed: gopāla udāra caritam kaḥ tṛpyeta amṛtam juṣan

original: BhP_10.16.004/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.004/1 kālindyāṃ kāliyasyāsīd hradaḥ kaścid viṣāgninā
analyzed: kālindyām kāliyasya āsīt hradaḥ kaścid viṣa agninā

original: BhP_10.16.004/3 śrapyamāṇa-payā yasmin patanty upari-gāḥ khagāḥ
analyzed: śrapyamāṇa payāḥ yasmin patanti uparigāḥ khagāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.005/1 vipruṣmatā viṣadormi- mārutenābhimarśitāḥ
analyzed: vipruṣmatā mārutena abhimarśitāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.005/3 mriyante tīra-gā yasya prāṇinaḥ sthira-jaṅgamāḥ
analyzed: mriyante tīra gāḥ yasya prāṇinaḥ sthira jaṅgamāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.006/1 taṃ caṇḍa-vega-viṣa-vīryam avekṣya tena
analyzed: tam caṇḍa vega viṣa vīryam avekṣya tena

original: BhP_10.16.006/2 duṣṭāṃ nadīṃ ca khala-saṃyamanāvatāraḥ
analyzed: duṣṭām nadīm ca khala saṃyamana avatāraḥ

original: BhP_10.16.006/3 kṛṣṇaḥ kadambam adhiruhya tato 'ti-tuṅgam
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ kadambam adhiruhya tituṅgam

original: BhP_10.16.006/4 āsphoṭya gāḍha-raśano nyapatad viṣode
analyzed: āsphoṭya gāḍha raśanaḥ nyapatat viṣode

original: BhP_10.16.007/1 sarpa-hradaḥ puruṣa-sāra-nipāta-vega-
analyzed: sarpa hradaḥ puruṣa sāra nipāta vega

original: BhP_10.16.007/2 saṅkṣobhitoraga-viṣocchvasitāmbu-rāśiḥ
analyzed: saṅkṣobhita uraga viṣa ucchvasita amburāśiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.007/3 paryak pluto viṣa-kaṣāya-bibhīṣaṇormir
analyzed: paryak plutaḥ viṣa kaṣāya bibhīṣaṇa ūrmiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.007/4 dhāvan dhanuḥ-śatam ananta-balasya kiṃ tat
analyzed: dhāvan dhanuḥ śatam ananta balasya kim tat

original: BhP_10.16.008/1 tasya hrade viharato bhuja-daṇḍa-ghūrṇa-
analyzed: tasya hrade viharataḥ bhuja daṇḍa ghūrṇa

original: BhP_10.16.008/2 vār-ghoṣam aṅga vara-vāraṇa-vikramasya
analyzed: vārghoṣam aṅga vara vāraṇa vikramasya

original: BhP_10.16.008/3 āśrutya tat sva-sadanābhibhavaṃ nirīkṣya
analyzed: āśrutya tat sva sadana abhibhavam nirīkṣya

original: BhP_10.16.008/4 cakṣuḥ-śravāḥ samasarat tad amṛṣyamāṇaḥ
analyzed: cakṣuḥśravāḥ samasarat tat a mṛṣyamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.009/1 taṃ prekṣaṇīya-sukumāra-ghanāvadātaṃ
analyzed: tam prekṣaṇīya sukumāra ghana avadātam

original: BhP_10.16.009/2 śrīvatsa-pīta-vasanaṃ smita-sundarāsyam
analyzed: śrīvatsa pīta vasanam smita sundara āsyam

original: BhP_10.16.009/3 krīḍantam apratibhayaṃ kamalodarāṅghriṃ
analyzed: krīḍantam apratibhayam kamala udara aṅghrim

original: BhP_10.16.009/4 sandaśya marmasu ruṣā bhujayā cachāda
analyzed: sandaśya marmasu ruṣā bhujayā cachāda

original: BhP_10.16.010/1 taṃ nāga-bhoga-parivītam adṛṣṭa-ceṣṭam
analyzed: tam nāga bhoga parivītam adṛṣṭa ceṣṭam

original: BhP_10.16.010/2 ālokya tat-priya-sakhāḥ paśupā bhṛśārtāḥ
analyzed: ālokya tad priya sakhāḥ paśupāḥ bhṛśa ārtāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.010/3 kṛṣṇe 'rpitātma-suhṛd-artha-kalatra-kāmā
analyzed: kṛṣṇe rpita ātma suhṛd artha kalatra kāmā

original: BhP_10.16.010/4 duḥkhānuśoka-bhaya-mūḍha-dhiyo nipetuḥ
analyzed: duḥkha anuśoka bhaya mūḍha dhiyaḥ nipetuḥ

original: BhP_10.16.011/1 gāvo vṛṣā vatsataryaḥ krandamānāḥ su-duḥkhitāḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ vṛṣāḥ vatsataryaḥ krandamānāḥ su duḥkhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.011/3 kṛṣṇe nyastekṣaṇā bhītā rudantya iva tasthire
analyzed: kṛṣṇe nyasta īkṣaṇāḥ bhītāḥ rudantyaḥ iva tasthire

original: BhP_10.16.012/1 atha vraje mahotpātās tri-vidhā hy ati-dāruṇāḥ
analyzed: atha vraje mahā utpātāḥ trividhāḥ hi ati dāruṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.012/3 utpetur bhuvi divy ātmany āsanna-bhaya-śaṃsinaḥ
analyzed: utpetuḥ bhuvi divi ātmani āsanna bhaya śaṃsinaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.013/1 tān ālakṣya bhayodvignā gopā nanda-purogamāḥ
analyzed: tān ālakṣya bhaya udvignāḥ gopāḥ nanda purogamāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.013/3 vinā rāmeṇa gāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ jñātvā cārayituṃ gatam
analyzed: vinā rāmeṇa gāḥ kṛṣṇam jñātvā cārayitum gatam

original: BhP_10.16.014/1 tair durnimittair nidhanaṃ matvā prāptam atad-vidaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ durnimittaiḥ nidhanam matvā prāptam a tad vidaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.014/3 tat-prāṇās tan-manaskās te duḥkha-śoka-bhayāturāḥ
analyzed: tad prāṇāḥ tad manaskāḥ te duḥkha śoka bhaya āturāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.015/1 ā-bāla-vṛddha-vanitāḥ sarve 'ṅga paśu-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: ā bāla vṛddha vanitāḥ sarve paśu vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.015/3 nirjagmur gokulād dīnāḥ kṛṣṇa-darśana-lālasāḥ
analyzed: nirjagmuḥ gokulāt dīnāḥ kṛṣṇa darśana lālasāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.016/1 tāṃs tathā kātarān vīkṣya bhagavān mādhavo balaḥ
analyzed: tān tathā kātarān vīkṣya bhagavān mādhavaḥ balaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.016/3 prahasya kiñcin novāca prabhāva-jño 'nujasya saḥ
analyzed: prahasya kiñcid nā uvāca prabhāva jñaḥ nujasya saḥ

original: BhP_10.16.017/1 te 'nveṣamāṇā dayitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sūcitayā padaiḥ
analyzed: te nveṣamāṇāḥ dayitam kṛṣṇam sūcitayā padaiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.017/3 bhagaval-lakṣaṇair jagmuḥ padavyā yamunā-taṭam
analyzed: bhagavat lakṣaṇaiḥ jagmuḥ padavyāḥ yamunā taṭam

original: BhP_10.16.018/1 te tatra tatrābja-yavāṅkuśāśani- dhvajopapannāni padāni viś-pateḥ
analyzed: te tatra tatra abja yava aṅkuśa aśani dhvaja upapannāni padāni viśpateḥ

original: BhP_10.16.018/3 mārge gavām anya-padāntarāntare nirīkṣamāṇā yayur aṅga satvarāḥ
analyzed: mārge gavām anya pada antara antare nirīkṣamāṇāḥ yayuḥ aṅga sa tvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.019/1 antar hrade bhujaga-bhoga-parītam ārāt
analyzed: antar hrade bhujaga bhoga parītam ārāt

original: BhP_10.16.019/2 kṛṣṇaṃ nirīham upalabhya jalāśayānte
analyzed: kṛṣṇam nirīham upalabhya jalāśaya ante

original: BhP_10.16.019/3 gopāṃś ca mūḍha-dhiṣaṇān paritaḥ paśūṃś ca
analyzed: gopān ca mūḍha dhiṣaṇān paritas paśūn ca

original: BhP_10.16.019/4 saṅkrandataḥ parama-kaśmalam āpur ārtāḥ
analyzed: saṅkrandataḥ parama kaśmalam āpuḥ ārtāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.020/1 gopyo 'nurakta-manaso bhagavaty anante
analyzed: gopyaḥ nurakta manasaḥ bhagavati anante

original: BhP_10.16.020/2 tat-sauhṛda-smita-viloka-giraḥ smarantyaḥ
analyzed: tad sauhṛda smita viloka giraḥ smarantyaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.020/3 graste 'hinā priyatame bhṛśa-duḥkha-taptāḥ
analyzed: graste hinā priyatame bhṛśa duḥkha taptāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.020/4 śūnyaṃ priya-vyatihṛtaṃ dadṛśus tri-lokam
analyzed: śūnyam priya vyatihṛtam dadṛśuḥ trilokam

original: BhP_10.16.021/1 tāḥ kṛṣṇa-mātaram apatyam anupraviṣṭāṃ
analyzed: tāḥ kṛṣṇa mātaram apatyam anupraviṣṭām

original: BhP_10.16.021/2 tulya-vyathāḥ samanugṛhya śucaḥ sravantyaḥ
analyzed: tulya vyathāḥ samanugṛhya śucaḥ sravantyaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.021/3 tās tā vraja-priya-kathāḥ kathayantya āsan
analyzed: tāḥ tāḥ vraja priya kathāḥ kathayantyaḥ āsan

original: BhP_10.16.021/4 kṛṣṇānane 'rpita-dṛśo mṛtaka-pratīkāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa ānane rpita dṛśaḥ mṛtaka pratīkāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.022/1 kṛṣṇa-prāṇān nirviśato nandādīn vīkṣya taṃ hradam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa prāṇān nirviśataḥ nanda ādīn vīkṣya tam hradam

original: BhP_10.16.022/3 pratyaṣedhat sa bhagavān rāmaḥ kṛṣṇānubhāva-vit
analyzed: pratyaṣedhat sa bhagavān rāmaḥ kṛṣṇa anubhāva vid

original: BhP_10.16.023/1 ittham sva-gokulam ananya-gatiṃ nirīkṣya
analyzed: ittham sva gokulam ananya gatim nirīkṣya

original: BhP_10.16.023/2 sa-strī-kumāram ati-duḥkhitam ātma-hetoḥ
analyzed: sa strī kumāram ati duḥkhitam ātma hetoḥ

original: BhP_10.16.023/3 ājñāya martya-padavīm anuvartamānaḥ
analyzed: ājñāya martya padavīm anuvartamānaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.023/4 sthitvā muhūrtam udatiṣṭhad uraṅga-bandhāt
analyzed: sthitvā muhūrtam udatiṣṭhat uraṅga bandhāt

original: BhP_10.16.024/1 tat-prathyamāna-vapuṣā vyathitātma-bhogas
analyzed: tad prathyamāna vapuṣā vyathita ātma bhogaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.024/2 tyaktvonnamayya kupitaḥ sva-phaṇān bhujaṅgaḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā unnamayya kupitaḥ sva phaṇān bhujaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.024/3 tasthau śvasañ chvasana-randhra-viṣāmbarīṣa-
analyzed: tasthau śvasam śvasana randhra viṣa ambarīṣa

original: BhP_10.16.024/4 stabdhekṣaṇolmuka-mukho harim īkṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: stabdha īkṣaṇa ulmuka mukhaḥ harim īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.025/1 taṃ jihvayā dvi-śikhayā parilelihānaṃ
analyzed: tam jihvayā dvi śikhayā parilelihānam

original: BhP_10.16.025/2 dve sṛkvaṇī hy ati-karāla-viṣāgni-dṛṣṭim
analyzed: dve sṛkvaṇī hi ati karāla viṣa agni dṛṣṭim

original: BhP_10.16.025/3 krīḍann amuṃ parisasāra yathā khagendro
analyzed: krīḍan amum parisasāra yathā khaga indraḥ

original: BhP_10.16.025/4 babhrāma so 'py avasaraṃ prasamīkṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: babhrāma saḥ u pi avasaram prasamīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.026/1 evaṃ paribhrama-hataujasam unnatāṃsam
analyzed: evam paribhrama hata ojasam unnata aṃsam

original: BhP_10.16.026/2 ānamya tat-pṛthu-śiraḥsv adhirūḍha ādyaḥ
analyzed: ānamya tad pṛthu śiraḥsu adhirūḍhaḥ ādyaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.026/3 tan-mūrdha-ratna-nikara-sparśāti-tāmra-
analyzed: tad mūrdha ratna nikara sparśa ati tāmra

original: BhP_10.16.026/4 pādāmbujo 'khila-kalādi-gurur nanarta
analyzed: pāda ambujaḥ khila kalā ādi guruḥ nanarta

original: BhP_10.16.027/1 taṃ nartum udyatam avekṣya tadā tadīya-
analyzed: tam na ṛtum udyatam avekṣya tadā tadīya

original: BhP_10.16.027/2 gandharva-siddha-muni-cāraṇa-deva-vadhvaḥ
analyzed: gandharva siddha muni cāraṇa deva vadhvaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.027/3 prītyā mṛdaṅga-paṇavānaka-vādya-gīta-
analyzed: prītyā mṛdaṅga paṇava ānaka vādya gīta

original: BhP_10.16.027/4 puṣpopahāra-nutibhiḥ sahasopaseduḥ
analyzed: puṣpa upahāra nutibhiḥ sahasā upaseduḥ

original: BhP_10.16.028/1 yad yac chiro na namate 'ṅga śataika-śīrṣṇas
analyzed: yat yat śiraḥ na namate ṅga śata eka śīrṣṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.028/2 tat tan mamarda khara-daṇḍa-dharo 'ṅghri-pātaiḥ
analyzed: tat tat mamarda khara daṇḍa dharaḥ ṅghri pātaiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.028/3 kṣīṇāyuṣo bhramata ulbaṇam āsyato 'sṛṅ
analyzed: kṣīṇa āyuṣaḥ bhramataḥ ulbaṇam āsyataḥ sṛj

original: BhP_10.16.028/4 nasto vaman parama-kaśmalam āpa nāgaḥ
analyzed: nastas vaman parama kaśmalam āpa nāgaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.029/1 tasyākṣibhir garalam udvamataḥ śiraḥsu
analyzed: tasya akṣibhiḥ garalam udvamataḥ śiraḥsu

original: BhP_10.16.029/2 yad yat samunnamati niḥśvasato ruṣoccaiḥ
analyzed: yat yat samunnamati niḥśvasataḥ ruṣā uccais

original: BhP_10.16.029/3 nṛtyan padānunamayan damayāṃ babhūva
analyzed: nṛtyan padā anunamayan damayām babhūva

original: BhP_10.16.029/4 puṣpaiḥ prapūjita iveha pumān purāṇaḥ
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ prapūjitaḥ iva iha pumān purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.030/1 tac-citra-tāṇḍava-virugna-phaṇā-sahasro
analyzed: tat citra tāṇḍava virugna phaṇā sahasraḥ

original: BhP_10.16.030/2 raktaṃ mukhair uru vaman nṛpa bhagna-gātraḥ
analyzed: raktam mukhaiḥ uru vaman nṛpa bhagna gātraḥ

original: BhP_10.16.030/3 smṛtvā carācara-guruṃ puruṣaṃ purāṇaṃ
analyzed: smṛtvā carācara gurum puruṣam purāṇam

original: BhP_10.16.030/4 nārāyaṇaṃ tam araṇaṃ manasā jagāma
analyzed: nārāyaṇam tam araṇam manasā jagāma

original: BhP_10.16.031/1 kṛṣṇasya garbha-jagato 'ti-bharāvasannaṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya garbha jagataḥ tibhara avasannam

original: BhP_10.16.031/2 pārṣṇi-prahāra-parirugna-phaṇātapatram
analyzed: pārṣṇi prahāra parirugna phaṇa ātapatram

original: BhP_10.16.031/3 dṛṣṭvāhim ādyam upasedur amuṣya patnya
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ahim ādyam upaseduḥ amuṣya patnya

original: BhP_10.16.031/4 ārtāḥ ślathad-vasana-bhūṣaṇa-keśa-bandhāḥ
analyzed: ārtāḥ ślathat vasana bhūṣaṇa keśa bandhāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.032/1 tās taṃ su-vigna-manaso 'tha puraskṛtārbhāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tam suvigna manasaḥ puraskṛtā arbhāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.032/2 kāyaṃ nidhāya bhuvi bhūta-patiṃ praṇemuḥ
analyzed: kāyam nidhāya bhuvi bhūtapatim praṇemuḥ

original: BhP_10.16.032/3 sādhvyaḥ kṛtāñjali-puṭāḥ śamalasya bhartur
analyzed: sādhvyaḥ kṛta añjali puṭāḥ śamalasya bhartuḥ

original: BhP_10.16.032/4 mokṣepsavaḥ śaraṇa-daṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannāḥ
analyzed: mokṣa īpsavaḥ śaraṇa dam śaraṇam prapannāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.033/0 nāga-patnya ūcuḥ
analyzed: nāga patnyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.16.033/1 nyāyyo hi daṇḍaḥ kṛta-kilbiṣe 'smiṃs
analyzed: nyāyyaḥ hi daṇḍaḥ kṛta kilbiṣe smin

original: BhP_10.16.033/2 tavāvatāraḥ khala-nigrahāya
analyzed: tava avatāraḥ khala nigrahāya

original: BhP_10.16.033/3 ripoḥ sutānām api tulya-dṛṣṭir
analyzed: ripoḥ sutānām api tulya dṛṣṭiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.033/4 dhatse damaṃ phalam evānuśaṃsan
analyzed: dhatse damam phalam eva anuśaṃsan

original: BhP_10.16.034/1 anugraho 'yaṃ bhavataḥ kṛto hi no daṇḍo 'satāṃ te khalu kalmaṣāpahaḥ
analyzed: anugrahaḥ yam bhavataḥ kṛtaḥ hi naḥ satām te khalu kalmaṣa apahaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.034/3 yad dandaśūkatvam amuṣya dehinaḥ krodho 'pi te 'nugraha eva sammataḥ
analyzed: yat dandaśūka tvam amuṣya dehinaḥ krodhaḥ u pi te nugrahaḥ eva sammataḥ

original: BhP_10.16.035/1 tapaḥ sutaptaṃ kim anena pūrvaṃ nirasta-mānena ca māna-dena
analyzed: tapaḥ su taptam kim anena pūrvam nirasta mānena ca mānadena

original: BhP_10.16.035/3 dharmo 'tha vā sarva-janānukampayā yato bhavāṃs tuṣyati sarva-jīvaḥ
analyzed: vā sarva jana anukampayā yatas bhavān tuṣyati sarva jīvaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.036/1 kasyānubhāvo 'sya na deva vidmahe tavāṅghri-reṇu-sparaśādhikāraḥ
analyzed: kasya anubhāvaḥ sya na deva vidmahe tava aṅghri reṇu sparaśa adhikāraḥ

original: BhP_10.16.036/3 yad-vāñchayā śrīr lalanācarat tapo vihāya kāmān su-ciraṃ dhṛta-vratā
analyzed: yad vāñchayā śrīḥ lalanā acarat tapaḥ vihāya kāmān su ciram dhṛta vratā

original: BhP_10.16.037/1 na nāka-pṛṣṭhaṃ na ca sārva-bhaumaṃ
analyzed: na nāka pṛṣṭham na ca sārvabhaumam

original: BhP_10.16.037/2 na pārameṣṭhyaṃ na rasādhipatyam
analyzed: na pārameṣṭhyam na rasa ādhipatyam

original: BhP_10.16.037/3 na yoga-siddhīr apunar-bhavaṃ vā
analyzed: na yoga siddhīḥ apunarbhavam vā

original: BhP_10.16.037/4 vāñchanti yat-pāda-rajaḥ-prapannāḥ
analyzed: vāñchanti yad pāda rajaḥ prapannāḥ

original: BhP_10.16.038/1 tad eṣa nāthāpa durāpam anyais tamo-janiḥ krodha-vaśo 'py ahīśaḥ
analyzed: tat eṣa nātha apa durāpam anyaiḥ tamaḥ janiḥ krodha vaśaḥ pi ahīśaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.038/3 saṃsāra-cakre bhramataḥ śarīriṇo yad-icchataḥ syād vibhavaḥ samakṣaḥ
analyzed: saṃsāra cakre bhramataḥ śarīriṇaḥ yat icchataḥ syāt vibhavaḥ samakṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.039/1 namas tubhyaṃ bhagavate puruṣāya mahātmane
analyzed: namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate puruṣāya mahātmane

original: BhP_10.16.039/3 bhūtāvāsāya bhūtāya parāya paramātmane
analyzed: bhūta āvāsāya bhūtāya parasmai paramātmane

original: BhP_10.16.040/1 jñāna-vijñāna-nīdhaye brahmaṇe 'nanta-śaktaye
BhP_10.16.040/3 aguṇāyāvikārāya namas te prākṛtāya ca
analyzed: aguṇāya avikārāya namaḥ te prākṛtāya ca

original: BhP_10.16.041/1 kālāya kāla-nābhāya kālāvayava-sākṣiṇe
analyzed: kālāya kālanābhāya kāla avayava sākṣiṇe

original: BhP_10.16.041/3 viśvāya tad-upadraṣṭre tat-kartre viśva-hetave
analyzed: viśvāya tad upadraṣṭre tad kartre viśva hetave

original: BhP_10.16.042/1 bhūta-mātrendriya-prāṇa- mano-buddhy-āśayātmane
BhP_10.16.042/3 tri-guṇenābhimānena gūḍha-svātmānubhūtaye
analyzed: triguṇena abhimānena gūḍha sva ātma anubhūtaye

original: BhP_10.16.043/1 namo 'nantāya sūkṣmāya kūṭa-sthāya vipaścite
analyzed: namaḥ nantāya sūkṣmāya kūṭasthāya vipaścite

original: BhP_10.16.043/3 nānā-vādānurodhāya vācya-vācaka-śaktaye
BhP_10.16.044/1 namaḥ pramāṇa-mūlāya kavaye śāstra-yonaye
analyzed: namaḥ pramāṇa mūlāya kavaye śāstra yonaye

original: BhP_10.16.044/3 pravṛttāya nivṛttāya nigamāya namo namaḥ
analyzed: pravṛttāya nivṛttāya nigamāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.045/1 namaḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya vasudeva-sutāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya vasudeva sutāya ca

original: BhP_10.16.045/3 pradyumnāyāniruddhāya sātvatāṃ pataye namaḥ
analyzed: pradyumnāya aniruddhāya sātvatām pataye namaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.046/1 namo guṇa-pradīpāya guṇātma-cchādanāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ guṇa pradīpāya guṇa ātma chādanāya ca

original: BhP_10.16.046/3 guṇa-vṛtty-upalakṣyāya guṇa-draṣṭre sva-saṃvide
analyzed: guṇa vṛtti upalakṣyāya guṇa draṣṭre sva saṃvide

original: BhP_10.16.047/1 avyākṛta-vihārāya sarva-vyākṛta-siddhaye
analyzed: avyākṛta vihārāya sarva vyākṛta siddhaye

original: BhP_10.16.047/3 hṛṣīkeśa namas te 'stu munaye mauna-śīline
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśa namaḥ te stu munaye mauna śīline

original: BhP_10.16.048/1 parāvara-gati-jñāya sarvādhyakṣāya te namaḥ
BhP_10.16.048/3 aviśvāya ca viśvāya tad-draṣṭre 'sya ca hetave
analyzed: aviśvāya ca viśvāya tad draṣṭre sya ca hetave

original: BhP_10.16.049/1 tvaṃ hy asya janma-sthiti-saṃyamān vibho
analyzed: tvam hi asya janma sthiti saṃyamān vibho

original: BhP_10.16.049/2 guṇair anīho 'kṛta-kāla-śakti-dhṛk
analyzed: guṇaiḥ anīhaḥ kṛta kāla śakti dhṛk

original: BhP_10.16.049/3 tat-tat-svabhāvān pratibodhayan sataḥ
analyzed: tad tad svabhāvān pratibodhayan sataḥ

original: BhP_10.16.049/4 samīkṣayāmogha-vihāra īhase
analyzed: samīkṣaya amogha vihāraḥ īhase

original: BhP_10.16.050/1 tasyaiva te 'mūs tanavas tri-lokyāṃ
analyzed: tasya eva te mūḥ tanavaḥ trilokyām

original: BhP_10.16.050/2 śāntā aśāntā uta mūḍha-yonayaḥ
analyzed: śāntāḥ a śāntāḥ uta mūḍha yonayaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.050/3 śāntāḥ priyās te hy adhunāvituṃ satāṃ
analyzed: śāntāḥ priyāḥ te hi satām

original: BhP_10.16.050/4 sthātuś ca te dharma-parīpsayehataḥ
analyzed: sthātuḥ ca te dharma parīpsayā īhataḥ

original: BhP_10.16.051/1 aparādhaḥ sakṛd bhartrā soḍhavyaḥ sva-prajā-kṛtaḥ
analyzed: aparādhaḥ sakṛt bhartrā soḍhavyaḥ sva prajā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.051/3 kṣantum arhasi śāntātman mūḍhasya tvām ajānataḥ
analyzed: kṣantum arhasi śānta ātman mūḍhasya tvām a jānataḥ

original: BhP_10.16.052/1 anugṛhṇīṣva bhagavan prāṇāṃs tyajati pannagaḥ
analyzed: anugṛhṇīṣva bhagavan prāṇān tyajati pannagaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.052/3 strīṇāṃ naḥ sādhu-śocyānāṃ patiḥ prāṇaḥ pradīyatām
analyzed: strīṇām naḥ sādhu śocyānām patiḥ prāṇaḥ pradīyatām

original: BhP_10.16.053/1 vidhehi te kiṅkarīṇām anuṣṭheyaṃ tavājñayā
analyzed: vidhehi te kiṅkarīṇām anuṣṭheyam tava ājñayā

original: BhP_10.16.053/3 yac-chraddhayānutiṣṭhan vai mucyate sarvato bhayāt
analyzed: yat śraddhayā anutiṣṭhan vai mucyate sarvatas bhayāt

original: BhP_10.16.054/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.054/1 itthaṃ sa nāga-patnībhir bhagavān samabhiṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: ittham sa nāga patnībhiḥ bhagavān samabhiṣṭutaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.054/3 mūrcchitaṃ bhagna-śirasaṃ visasarjāṅghri-kuṭṭanaiḥ
analyzed: mūrcchitam bhagna śirasam visasarja aṅghri kuṭṭanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.055/1 pratilabdhendriya-prāṇaḥ kāliyaḥ śanakair harim
analyzed: pratilabdha indriya prāṇaḥ kāliyaḥ śanakais harim

original: BhP_10.16.055/3 kṛcchrāt samucchvasan dīnaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prāha kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: kṛcchrāt samucchvasan dīnaḥ kṛṣṇam prāha kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_10.16.056/0 kāliya uvāca
analyzed: kāliyaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.056/1 vayaṃ khalāḥ sahotpattyā tamasā dīrgha-manyavaḥ
analyzed: vayam khalāḥ saha utpattyā tamasā dīrgha manyavaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.056/3 svabhāvo dustyajo nātha lokānāṃ yad asad-grahaḥ
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ dustyajaḥ nātha lokānām yat asat grahaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.057/1 tvayā sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ dhātar guṇa-visarjanam
analyzed: tvayā sṛṣṭam idam viśvam dhātar guṇa visarjanam

original: BhP_10.16.057/3 nānā-svabhāva-vīryaujo- yoni-bījāśayākṛti
analyzed: nānā svabhāva vīrya ojaḥ yoni bīja āśaya ākṛti

original: BhP_10.16.058/1 vayaṃ ca tatra bhagavan sarpā jāty-uru-manyavaḥ
analyzed: vayam ca tatra bhagavan sarpāḥ jāti uru manyavaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.058/3 kathaṃ tyajāmas tvan-māyāṃ dustyajāṃ mohitāḥ svayam
analyzed: katham tyajāmaḥ tvad māyām dustyajām mohitāḥ svayam

original: BhP_10.16.059/1 bhavān hi kāraṇaṃ tatra sarva-jño jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: bhavān hi kāraṇam tatra sarvajñaḥ jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.16.059/3 anugrahaṃ nigrahaṃ vā manyase tad vidhehi naḥ
analyzed: anugraham nigraham vā manyase tat vidhehi naḥ

original: BhP_10.16.060/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.060/1 ity ākarṇya vacaḥ prāha bhagavān kārya-mānuṣaḥ
analyzed: iti ākarṇya vacaḥ prāha bhagavān kārya mānuṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.060/3 nātra stheyaṃ tvayā sarpa samudraṃ yāhi mā ciram
analyzed: na atra stheyam tvayā sarpa samudram yāhi mā ciram

original: BhP_10.16.060/5 sva-jñāty-apatya-dārāḍhyo go-nṛbhir bhujyate nadī
analyzed: sva jñāti apatya dāra āḍhyaḥ go nṛbhiḥ bhujyate nadī

original: BhP_10.16.061/1 ya etat saṃsmaren martyas tubhyaṃ mad-anuśāsanam
analyzed: yaḥ etat saṃsmaret martyaḥ tubhyam mad anuśāsanam

original: BhP_10.16.061/3 kīrtayann ubhayoḥ sandhyor na yuṣmad bhayam āpnuyāt
analyzed: kīrtayan ubhayoḥ sandhyoḥ na yuṣmat bhayam āpnuyāt

original: BhP_10.16.062/1 yo 'smin snātvā mad-ākrīḍe devādīṃs tarpayej jalaiḥ
BhP_10.16.062/3 upoṣya māṃ smarann arcet sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: upoṣya mām smaran arcet sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: BhP_10.16.063/1 dvīpaṃ ramaṇakaṃ hitvā hradam etam upāśritaḥ
analyzed: dvīpam ramaṇakam hitvā hradam etam upāśritaḥ

original: BhP_10.16.063/3 yad-bhayāt sa suparṇas tvāṃ nādyān mat-pāda-lāñchitam
analyzed: yad bhayāt sa suparṇaḥ tvām na adyāt mad pāda lāñchitam

original: BhP_10.16.064/0 śrī-ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.16.064/1 mukto bhagavatā rājan kṛṣṇenādbhuta-karmaṇā
analyzed: muktaḥ bhagavatā rājan kṛṣṇena adbhuta karmaṇā

original: BhP_10.16.064/3 taṃ pūjayām āsa mudā nāga-patnyaś ca sādaram
analyzed: tam pūjayām āsa mudā nāga patnyaḥ ca sādaram

original: BhP_10.16.065/1 divyāmbara-sraṅ-maṇibhiḥ parārdhyair api bhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: divya ambara sraj maṇibhiḥ parārdhyaiḥ api bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.16.065/3 divya-gandhānulepaiś ca mahatyotpala-mālayā
analyzed: divya gandha anulepaiḥ ca mahatyā utpala mālayā

original: BhP_10.16.066/1 pūjayitvā jagan-nāthaṃ prasādya garuḍa-dhvajam
analyzed: pūjayitvā jagannātham prasādya garuḍadhvajam

original: BhP_10.16.066/3 tataḥ prīto 'bhyanujñātaḥ parikramyābhivandya tam
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ bhyanujñātaḥ parikramya abhivandya tam

original: BhP_10.16.067/1 sa-kalatra-suhṛt-putro dvīpam abdher jagāma ha
analyzed: sa kalatra suhṛd putraḥ dvīpam abdheḥ jagāma ha

original: BhP_10.16.067/3 tadaiva sāmṛta-jalā yamunā nirviṣābhavat
analyzed: tadā eva sa amṛta jalā yamunā nirviṣā abhavat

original: BhP_10.16.067/7 anugrahād bhagavataḥ krīḍā-mānuṣa-rūpiṇaḥ
analyzed: anugrahāt bhagavataḥ krīḍā mānuṣa rūpiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.17.001/1 nāgālayaṃ ramaṇakaṃ kathaṃ tatyāja kāliyaḥ
analyzed: nāga ālayam ramaṇakam katham tatyāja kāliyaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.001/3 kṛtaṃ kiṃ vā suparṇasya tenaikenāsamañjasam
analyzed: kṛtam kim vā suparṇasya tena ekena asamañjasam

original: BhP_10.17.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.17.002/1 upahāryaiḥ sarpa-janair māsi māsīha yo baliḥ
analyzed: upahāryaiḥ sarpa janaiḥ māsi māsi iha yaḥ baliḥ

original: BhP_10.17.002/3 vānaspatyo mahā-bāho nāgānāṃ prāṅ-nirūpitaḥ
analyzed: vānaspatyaḥ mahā bāho nāgānām prāk nirūpitaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.003/1 svaṃ svaṃ bhāgaṃ prayacchanti nāgāḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi
analyzed: svam svam bhāgam prayacchanti nāgāḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi

original: BhP_10.17.003/3 gopīthāyātmanaḥ sarve suparṇāya mahātmane
analyzed: gopīthāya ātmanaḥ sarve suparṇāya mahātmane
