original: BhP_10.17.004/1 viṣa-vīrya-madāviṣṭaḥ kādraveyas tu kāliyaḥ
analyzed: viṣa vīrya mada āviṣṭaḥ kādraveyaḥ tu kāliyaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.004/3 kadarthī-kṛtya garuḍaṃ svayaṃ taṃ bubhuje balim
analyzed: kadarthīkṛtya garuḍam svayam tam bubhuje balim

original: BhP_10.17.005/1 tac chrutvā kupito rājan bhagavān bhagavat-priyaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā kupitaḥ rājan bhagavān bhagavat priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.005/3 vijighāṃsur mahā-vegaḥ kāliyaṃ samapādravat
analyzed: vijighāṃsuḥ mahā vegaḥ kāliyam samapādravat

original: BhP_10.17.006/1 tam āpatantaṃ tarasā viṣāyudhaḥ pratyabhyayād utthita-naika-mastakaḥ
analyzed: tam āpatantam tarasā viṣa āyudhaḥ pratyabhyayāt utthita na eka mastakaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.006/3 dadbhiḥ suparṇaṃ vyadaśad dad-āyudhaḥ karāla-jihrocchvasitogra-locanaḥ
analyzed: dadbhiḥ suparṇam vyadaśat karāla jihra ucchvasita ugra locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.007/1 taṃ tārkṣya-putraḥ sa nirasya manyumān
analyzed: tam tārkṣyaputraḥ sa nirasya manyumān

original: BhP_10.17.007/2 pracaṇḍa-vego madhusūdanāsanaḥ
BhP_10.17.007/3 pakṣeṇa savyena hiraṇya-rociṣā
analyzed: pakṣeṇa savyena hiraṇya rociṣā

original: BhP_10.17.007/4 jaghāna kadru-sutam ugra-vikramaḥ
analyzed: jaghāna kadru sutam ugra vikramaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.008/1 suparṇa-pakṣābhihataḥ kāliyo 'tīva vihvalaḥ
analyzed: suparṇa pakṣa abhihataḥ tīva vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.008/3 hradaṃ viveśa kālindyās tad-agamyaṃ durāsadam
analyzed: hradam viveśa kālindyāḥ tat agamyam durāsadam

original: BhP_10.17.009/1 tatraikadā jala-caraṃ garuḍo bhakṣyam īpsitam
analyzed: tatra ekadā jalacaram garuḍaḥ bhakṣyam īpsitam

original: BhP_10.17.009/3 nivāritaḥ saubhariṇā prasahya kṣudhito 'harat
analyzed: nivāritaḥ saubhariṇā prasahya kṣudhitaḥ harat

original: BhP_10.17.010/1 mīnān su-duḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā dīnān mīna-patau hate
analyzed: mīnān su duḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā dīnān mīnapatau hate

original: BhP_10.17.010/3 kṛpayā saubhariḥ prāha tatratya-kṣemam ācaran
analyzed: kṛpayā saubhariḥ prāha tatratya kṣemam ācaran

original: BhP_10.17.011/1 atra praviśya garuḍo yadi matsyān sa khādati
analyzed: atra praviśya garuḍaḥ yadi matsyān sa khādati

original: BhP_10.17.011/3 sadyaḥ prāṇair viyujyeta satyam etad bravīmy aham
analyzed: sadyas prāṇaiḥ viyujyeta satyam etat bravīmi aham

original: BhP_10.17.012/1 tat kāliyaḥ paraṃ veda nānyaḥ kaścana lelihaḥ
analyzed: tat kāliyaḥ param veda na anyaḥ kaścana lelihaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.012/3 avātsīd garuḍād bhītaḥ kṛṣṇena ca vivāsitaḥ
analyzed: avātsīt garuḍāt bhītaḥ kṛṣṇena ca vivāsitaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.013/1 kṛṣṇaṃ hradād viniṣkrāntaṃ divya-srag-gandha-vāsasam
analyzed: kṛṣṇam hradāt viniṣkrāntam divya sraj gandha vāsasam

original: BhP_10.17.013/3 mahā-maṇi-gaṇākīrṇaṃ jāmbūnada-pariṣkṛtam
analyzed: mahā maṇi gaṇa ākīrṇam jāmbūnada pariṣkṛtam

original: BhP_10.17.014/1 upalabhyotthitāḥ sarve labdha-prāṇā ivāsavaḥ
analyzed: upalabhya utthitāḥ sarve labdha prāṇāḥ iva asavaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.014/3 pramoda-nibhṛtātmāno gopāḥ prītyābhirebhire
analyzed: pramoda nibhṛta ātmānaḥ gopāḥ prītyā abhirebhire

original: BhP_10.17.015/1 yaśodā rohiṇī nando gopyo gopāś ca kaurava
analyzed: yaśodā rohiṇī nandaḥ gopyaḥ gopāḥ ca kaurava

original: BhP_10.17.015/3 kṛṣṇaṃ sametya labdhehā āsan śuṣkā nagā api
analyzed: kṛṣṇam sametya labdha īhāḥ āsan śuṣkāḥ nagāḥ api

original: BhP_10.17.016/1 rāmaś cācyutam āliṅgya jahāsāsyānubhāva-vit
analyzed: rāmaḥ ca acyutam āliṅgya jahāsa asya anubhāva vid

original: BhP_10.17.016/3 premṇā tam aṅkam āropya punaḥ punar udaikṣata
analyzed: premṇā tam aṅkam āropya punar punar udaikṣata

original: BhP_10.17.016/5 gāvo vṛṣā vatsataryo lebhire paramāṃ mudam
analyzed: gāvaḥ vṛṣāḥ vatsataryaḥ lebhire paramām mudam

original: BhP_10.17.017/1 nandaṃ viprāḥ samāgatya guravaḥ sa-kalatrakāḥ
analyzed: nandam viprāḥ samāgatya guravaḥ sa kalatrakāḥ

original: BhP_10.17.017/3 ūcus te kāliya-grasto diṣṭyā muktas tavātmajaḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ te kāliya grastaḥ diṣṭyā muktaḥ tava ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.018/1 dehi dānaṃ dvi-jātīnāṃ kṛṣṇa-nirmukti-hetave
analyzed: dehi dānam dvijātīnām kṛṣṇa nirmukti hetave

original: BhP_10.17.018/3 nandaḥ prīta-manā rājan gāḥ suvarṇaṃ tadādiśat
analyzed: nandaḥ prīta manāḥ rājan gāḥ suvarṇam tadā ādiśat

original: BhP_10.17.019/1 yaśodāpi mahā-bhāgā naṣṭa-labdha-prajā satī
analyzed: yaśodā api mahābhāgā naṣṭa labdha prajā satī

original: BhP_10.17.019/3 pariṣvajyāṅkam āropya mumocāśru-kalāṃ muhuḥ
analyzed: pariṣvajya aṅkam āropya mumoca aśru kalām muhur

original: BhP_10.17.020/1 tāṃ rātriṃ tatra rājendra kṣut-tṛḍbhyāṃ śrama-karṣitāḥ
analyzed: tām rātrim tatra rāja indra kṣudh tṛḍbhyām śrama karṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.17.020/3 ūṣur vrayaukaso gāvaḥ kālindyā upakūlataḥ
analyzed: ūṣuḥ vrayaukasaḥ gāvaḥ kālindyāḥ upakūlataḥ

original: BhP_10.17.021/1 tadā śuci-vanodbhūto dāvāgniḥ sarvato vrajam
analyzed: tadā śuci vana udbhūtaḥ dāva agniḥ sarvatas vrajam

original: BhP_10.17.021/3 suptaṃ niśītha āvṛtya pradagdhum upacakrame
analyzed: suptam niśīthe āvṛtya pradagdhum upacakrame

original: BhP_10.17.022/1 tata utthāya sambhrāntā dahyamānā vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: tatas utthāya sambhrāntāḥ dahyamānāḥ vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.17.022/3 kṛṣṇaṃ yayus te śaraṇaṃ māyā-manujam īśvaram
analyzed: kṛṣṇam yayuḥ te śaraṇam māyā manujam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.17.023/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bhaga he rāmāmita-vikrama
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābhaga he rāma amita vikrama

original: BhP_10.17.023/3 eṣa ghoratamo vahnis tāvakān grasate hi naḥ
analyzed: eṣa ghoratamaḥ vahniḥ tāvakān grasate hi naḥ

original: BhP_10.17.024/1 su-dustarān naḥ svān pāhi kālāgneḥ suhṛdaḥ prabho
analyzed: su dustarān naḥ svān pāhi kālāgneḥ suhṛdaḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.17.024/3 na śaknumas tvac-caraṇaṃ santyaktum akuto-bhayam
analyzed: na śaknumaḥ tvad caraṇam san tyaktum akutobhayam

original: BhP_10.17.025/1 itthaṃ sva-jana-vaiklavyaṃ nirīkṣya jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: ittham sva jana vaiklavyam nirīkṣya jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.17.025/3 tam agnim apibat tīvram ananto 'nanta-śakti-dhṛk
analyzed: tam agnim apibat tīvram anantaḥ nanta śakti dhṛk

original: BhP_10.18.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.18.001/1 atha kṛṣṇaḥ parivṛto jñātibhir muditātmabhiḥ
analyzed: atha kṛṣṇaḥ parivṛtaḥ jñātibhiḥ mudita ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.18.001/3 anugīyamāno nyaviśad vrajaṃ gokula-maṇḍitam
analyzed: anugīyamānaḥ nyaviśat vrajam gokula maṇḍitam

original: BhP_10.18.002/1 vraje vikrīḍator evaṃ gopāla-cchadma-māyayā
analyzed: vraje vikrīḍatoḥ evam gopāla chadma māyayā

original: BhP_10.18.002/3 grīṣmo nāmartur abhavan nāti-preyāñ charīriṇām
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ nāma ṛtuḥ abhavat na ati preyān śarīriṇām

original: BhP_10.18.003/1 sa ca vṛndāvana-guṇair vasanta iva lakṣitaḥ
analyzed: sa ca vṛndāvana guṇaiḥ vasantaḥ iva lakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.003/3 yatrāste bhagavān sākṣād rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ
analyzed: yatra āste bhagavān sākṣāt rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.004/1 yatra nirjhara-nirhrāda- nivṛtta-svana-jhillikam
analyzed: yatra nirjhara nirhrāda nivṛtta svana jhillikam

original: BhP_10.18.004/3 śaśvat tac-chīkararjīṣa- druma-maṇḍala-maṇḍitam
analyzed: śaśvat tat śīkara rjīṣa druma maṇḍala maṇḍitam

original: BhP_10.18.005/1 sarit-saraḥ-prasravaṇormi-vāyunā kahlāra-kañjotpala-reṇu-hāriṇā
analyzed: sarit saraḥ prasravaṇa ūrmi vāyunā kahlāra kañja utpala reṇu hāriṇā

original: BhP_10.18.005/3 na vidyate yatra vanaukasāṃ davo nidāgha-vahny-arka-bhavo 'ti-śādvale
analyzed: na vidyate yatra vanaukasām davaḥ tiśādvale

original: BhP_10.18.006/1 agādha-toya-hradinī-taṭormibhir dravat-purīṣyāḥ pulinaiḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: agādha toya hradinī taṭa ūrmibhiḥ dravat purīṣyāḥ pulinaiḥ samantataḥ

original: BhP_10.18.006/3 na yatra caṇḍāṃśu-karā viṣolbaṇā bhuvo rasaṃ śādvalitaṃ ca gṛhṇate
analyzed: na yatra caṇḍa aṃśu karāḥ viṣa ulbaṇāḥ bhuvaḥ rasam śādvalitam ca gṛhṇate

original: BhP_10.18.007/1 vanaṃ kusumitaṃ śrīman nadac-citra-mṛga-dvijam
analyzed: vanam kusumitam śrīmat nadat citra mṛga dvijam

original: BhP_10.18.007/3 gāyan mayūra-bhramaraṃ kūjat-kokila-sārasam
analyzed: gāyat mayūra bhramaram kūjat kokila sārasam

original: BhP_10.18.008/1 krīḍiṣyamāṇas tat krṣṇo bhagavān bala-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: krīḍiṣyamāṇaḥ tat krṣṇaḥ bhagavān bala saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.008/3 veṇuṃ viraṇayan gopair go-dhanaiḥ saṃvṛto 'viśat
analyzed: veṇum viraṇayan gopaiḥ go dhanaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ viśat

original: BhP_10.18.009/1 pravāla-barha-stabaka- srag-dhātu-kṛta-bhūṣaṇāḥ
BhP_10.18.009/3 rāma-kṛṣṇādayo gopā nanṛtur yuyudhur jaguḥ
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇa ādayaḥ gopāḥ nanṛtuḥ yuyudhuḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_10.18.010/1 kṛṣṇasya nṛtyataḥ kecij jaguḥ kecid avādayan
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya nṛtyataḥ kecid jaguḥ kecid avādayan

original: BhP_10.18.010/3 veṇu-pāṇitalaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ praśaśaṃsur athāpare
analyzed: veṇu pāṇi talaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ praśaśaṃsuḥ atha apare

original: BhP_10.18.011/1 gopa-jāti-praticchannā devā gopāla-rūpiṇau
analyzed: gopa jāti praticchannāḥ devāḥ gopāla rūpiṇau

original: BhP_10.18.011/3 īḍire kṛṣṇa-rāmau ca naṭā iva naṭaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: īḍire kṛṣṇa rāmau ca naṭāḥ iva naṭam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.18.012/1 bhramaṇair laṅghanaiḥ kṣepair āsphoṭana-vikarṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: bhramaṇaiḥ laṅghanaiḥ kṣepaiḥ āsphoṭana vikarṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.18.012/3 cikrīḍatur niyuddhena kāka-pakṣa-dharau kvacit
analyzed: cikrīḍatuḥ niyuddhena kākapakṣa dharau kvacid

original: BhP_10.18.013/1 kvacin nṛtyatsu cānyeṣu gāyakau vādakau svayam
analyzed: kvacid nṛtyatsu ca anyeṣu gāyakau vādakau svayam

original: BhP_10.18.013/3 śaśaṃsatur mahā-rāja sādhu sādhv iti vādinau
analyzed: śaśaṃsatuḥ mahā rāja sādhu sādhu iti vādinau

original: BhP_10.18.014/1 kvacid bilvaiḥ kvacit kumbhaiḥ kvacāmalaka-muṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: kvacid bilvaiḥ kvacid kumbhaiḥ kva ca āmalaka muṣṭibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.18.014/3 aspṛśya-netra-bandhādyaiḥ kvacin mṛga-khagehayā
analyzed: a spṛśya netra bandha ādyaiḥ kvacid mṛga kha ga hayā

original: BhP_10.18.015/1 kvacic ca dardura-plāvair vividhair upahāsakaiḥ
analyzed: kvacid ca dardura plāvaiḥ vividhaiḥ upahāsakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.18.015/3 kadācit syandolikayā karhicin nṛpa-ceṣṭayā
analyzed: kadācid syandolikayā karhicit nṛpa ceṣṭayā

original: BhP_10.18.016/1 evaṃ tau loka-siddhābhiḥ krīḍābhiś ceratur vane
analyzed: evam tau loka siddhābhiḥ krīḍābhiḥ ceratuḥ vane

original: BhP_10.18.016/3 nady-adri-droṇi-kuñjeṣu kānaneṣu saraḥsu ca
analyzed: nadī adri droṇi kuñjeṣu kānaneṣu saraḥsu ca

original: BhP_10.18.017/1 paśūṃś cārayator gopais tad-vane rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: paśūn cārayatoḥ gopaiḥ tad vane rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.18.017/3 gopa-rūpī pralambo 'gād asuras taj-jihīrṣayā
analyzed: gopa rūpī pralambaḥ gāt asuraḥ tad jihīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.18.018/1 taṃ vidvān api dāśārho bhagavān sarva-darśanaḥ
analyzed: tam vidvān api dāśārhaḥ bhagavān sarva darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.018/3 anvamodata tat-sakhyaṃ vadhaṃ tasya vicintayan
analyzed: anvamodata tad sakhyam vadham tasya vicintayan

original: BhP_10.18.019/1 tatropāhūya gopālān kṛṣṇaḥ prāha vihāra-vit
analyzed: tatra upāhūya gopālān kṛṣṇaḥ prāha vihāra vid

original: BhP_10.18.019/3 he gopā vihariṣyāmo dvandvī-bhūya yathā-yatham
analyzed: he gopāḥ vihariṣyāmaḥ dvandvībhūya yathāyatham

original: BhP_10.18.020/1 tatra cakruḥ parivṛḍhau gopā rāma-janārdanau
analyzed: tatra cakruḥ parivṛḍhau gopāḥ rāma janārdanau

original: BhP_10.18.020/3 kṛṣṇa-saṅghaṭṭinaḥ kecid āsan rāmasya cāpare
analyzed: kṛṣṇa saṅghaṭṭinaḥ kecid āsan rāmasya ca apare

original: BhP_10.18.021/1 ācerur vividhāḥ krīḍā vāhya-vāhaka-lakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: āceruḥ vividhāḥ krīḍāḥ vāhya vāhaka lakṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.18.021/3 yatrārohanti jetāro vahanti ca parājitāḥ
analyzed: yatra ārohanti jetāraḥ vahanti ca parājitāḥ

original: BhP_10.18.022/1 vahanto vāhyamānāś ca cārayantaś ca go-dhanam
analyzed: vahantaḥ vāhyamānāḥ ca cārayantaḥ ca go dhanam

original: BhP_10.18.022/3 bhāṇḍīrakaṃ nāma vaṭaṃ jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa-purogamāḥ
analyzed: bhāṇḍīrakam nāma vaṭam jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa purogamāḥ

original: BhP_10.18.023/1 rāma-saṅghaṭṭino yarhi śrīdāma-vṛṣabhādayaḥ
analyzed: rāma saṅghaṭṭinaḥ yarhi śrīdāma vṛṣabha ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.023/3 krīḍāyāṃ jayinas tāṃs tān ūhuḥ kṛṣṇādayo nṛpa
analyzed: krīḍāyām jayinaḥ tān tān ūhuḥ kṛṣṇa ādayaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.18.024/1 uvāha kṛṣṇo bhagavān śrīdāmānaṃ parājitaḥ
analyzed: uvāha kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān śrīdāmānam parājitaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.024/3 vṛṣabhaṃ bhadrasenas tu pralambo rohiṇī-sutam
analyzed: vṛṣabham bhadrasenaḥ tu pralambaḥ rohiṇī sutam

original: BhP_10.18.025/1 aviṣahyaṃ manyamānaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ dānava-puṅgavaḥ
analyzed: aviṣahyam manyamānaḥ kṛṣṇam dānava puṅgavaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.025/3 vahan drutataraṃ prāgād avarohaṇataḥ param
analyzed: vahan drutataram prāgāt avarohaṇataḥ param

original: BhP_10.18.026/1 tam udvahan dharaṇi-dharendra-gauravaṃ
analyzed: tam udvahan dharaṇidhara indra gauravam

original: BhP_10.18.026/2 mahāsuro vigata-rayo nijaṃ vapuḥ
analyzed: mahā asuraḥ vigata rayaḥ nijam vapuḥ

original: BhP_10.18.026/3 sa āsthitaḥ puraṭa-paricchado babhau
analyzed: saḥ āsthitaḥ puraṭa paricchadaḥ babhau

original: BhP_10.18.026/4 taḍid-dyumān uḍupati-vāḍ ivāmbudaḥ
analyzed: taḍit dyumān uḍupativāh iva ambudaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.027/1 nirīkṣya tad-vapur alam ambare carat
analyzed: nirīkṣya tad vapuḥ alam ambare carat

original: BhP_10.18.027/2 pradīpta-dṛg bhru-kuṭi-taṭogra-daṃṣṭrakam
BhP_10.18.027/3 jvalac-chikhaṃ kaṭaka-kirīṭa-kuṇḍala-
analyzed: jvalat śikham kaṭaka kirīṭa kuṇḍala

original: BhP_10.18.027/4 tviṣādbhutaṃ haladhara īṣad atrasat
analyzed: tviṣā adbhutam haladharaḥ īṣat atrasat

original: BhP_10.18.028/1 athāgata-smṛtir abhayo ripuṃ balo vihāya sārtham iva harantam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: atha āgata smṛtiḥ abhayaḥ ripum balaḥ vihāya sārtham iva harantam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.028/3 ruṣāhanac chirasi dṛḍhena muṣṭinā surādhipo girim iva vajra-raṃhasā
analyzed: ruṣā ahanat śirasi dṛḍhena muṣṭinā surādhipaḥ girim iva vajra raṃhasā

original: BhP_10.18.029/1 sa āhataḥ sapadi viśīrṇa-mastako mukhād vaman rudhiram apasmṛto 'suraḥ
analyzed: saḥ āhataḥ sapadi viśīrṇa mastakaḥ mukhāt vaman rudhiram suraḥ

original: BhP_10.18.029/3 mahā-ravaṃ vyasur apatat samīrayan girir yathā maghavata āyudhāhataḥ
analyzed: mahā ravam vyasuḥ apatat samīrayan giriḥ yathā maghavataḥ āyudha āhataḥ

original: BhP_10.18.030/1 dṛṣṭvā pralambaṃ nihataṃ balena bala-śālinā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā pralambam nihatam balena bala śālinā

original: BhP_10.18.030/3 gopāḥ su-vismitā āsan sādhu sādhv iti vādinaḥ
analyzed: gopāḥ su vismitāḥ āsan sādhu sādhu iti vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.031/1 āśiṣo 'bhigṛṇantas taṃ praśaśaṃsus tad-arhaṇam
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ bhigṛṇantaḥ tam praśaśaṃsuḥ tad arhaṇam

original: BhP_10.18.031/3 pretyāgatam ivāliṅgya prema-vihvala-cetasaḥ
analyzed: pretya āgatam iva āliṅgya prema vihvala cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.18.032/1 pāpe pralambe nihate devāḥ parama-nirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: pāpe pralambe nihate devāḥ parama nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.18.032/3 abhyavarṣan balaṃ mālyaiḥ śaśaṃsuḥ sādhu sādhv iti
analyzed: abhyavarṣan balam mālyaiḥ śaśaṃsuḥ sādhu sādhu iti

original: BhP_10.19.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.19.001/1 krīḍāsakteṣu gopeṣu tad-gāvo dūra-cāriṇīḥ
analyzed: krīḍā sakteṣu gopeṣu tat gāvaḥ dūra cāriṇīḥ

original: BhP_10.19.001/3 svairaṃ carantyo viviśus tṛṇa-lobhena gahvaram
analyzed: svairam carantyaḥ viviśuḥ tṛṇa lobhena gahvaram

original: BhP_10.19.002/1 ajā gāvo mahiṣyaś ca nirviśantyo vanād vanam
analyzed: ajāḥ gāvaḥ mahiṣyaḥ ca nirviśantyaḥ vanāt vanam

original: BhP_10.19.002/3 īṣīkāṭavīṃ nirviviśuḥ krandantyo dāva-tarṣitāḥ
analyzed: īṣīkā aṭavīm nirviviśuḥ krandantyaḥ dāva tarṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.003/1 te 'paśyantaḥ paśūn gopāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmādayas tadā
analyzed: te paśyantaḥ paśūn gopāḥ kṛṣṇa rāma ādayaḥ tadā

original: BhP_10.19.003/3 jātānutāpā na vidur vicinvanto gavāṃ gatim
analyzed: jāta anutāpāḥ na viduḥ vicinvantaḥ gavām gatim

original: BhP_10.19.004/1 tṛṇais tat-khura-dac-chinnair goṣ-padair aṅkitair gavām
analyzed: tṛṇaiḥ tad khurada chinnaiḥ goṣpadaiḥ aṅkitaiḥ gavām

original: BhP_10.19.004/3 mārgam anvagaman sarve naṣṭājīvyā vicetasaḥ
analyzed: mārgam anvagaman sarve naṣṭa ājīvyāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.19.005/1 muñjāṭavyāṃ bhraṣṭa-mārgaṃ krandamānaṃ sva-godhanam
analyzed: muñja aṭavyām bhraṣṭa mārgam krandamānam sva go dhanam

original: BhP_10.19.005/3 samprāpya tṛṣitāḥ śrāntās tatas te sannyavartayan
analyzed: samprāpya tṛṣitāḥ śrāntāḥ tatas te sannyavartayan

original: BhP_10.19.006/1 tā āhūtā bhagavatā megha-gambhīrayā girā
analyzed: tāḥ āhūtāḥ bhagavatā megha gambhīrayā girā

original: BhP_10.19.006/3 sva-nāmnāṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā pratineduḥ praharṣitāḥ
analyzed: sva nāmnām ninadam śrutvā pratineduḥ praharṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.007/1 tataḥ samantād dava-dhūmaketur yadṛcchayābhūt kṣaya-kṛd vanaukasām
analyzed: tatas samantāt dava dhūma ketuḥ yadṛcchayā abhūt kṣaya kṛt vanaukasām

original: BhP_10.19.007/3 samīritaḥ sārathinolbaṇolmukair vilelihānaḥ sthira-jaṅgamān mahān
analyzed: samīritaḥ sārathinā ulbaṇa ulmukaiḥ vilelihānaḥ sthira jaṅgamān mahān

original: BhP_10.19.008/1 tam āpatantaṃ parito davāgniṃ gopāś ca gāvaḥ prasamīkṣya bhītāḥ
analyzed: tam āpatantam paritas dava agnim gopāḥ ca gāvaḥ prasamīkṣya bhītāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.008/3 ūcuś ca kṛṣṇaṃ sa-balaṃ prapannā yathā hariṃ mṛtyu-bhayārditā janāḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ ca kṛṣṇam sa balam prapannāḥ yathā harim mṛtyu bhaya arditāḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.009/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-vīra he rāmāmogha vikrama
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahāvīra he rāma amogha vikrama

original: BhP_10.19.009/3 dāvāgninā dahyamānān prapannāṃs trātum arhathaḥ
analyzed: dāva agninā dahyamānān prapannān trātum arhathaḥ

original: BhP_10.19.010/1 nūnaṃ tvad-bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇa na cārhanty avasāditum
analyzed: nūnam tvad bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇa na ca arhanti avasāditum

original: BhP_10.19.010/3 vayaṃ hi sarva-dharma-jña tvan-nāthās tvat-parāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: vayam hi sarva dharma jña tvad nāthāḥ tvad parāyaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.011/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.19.011/1 vaco niśamya kṛpaṇaṃ bandhūnāṃ bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: vacaḥ niśamya kṛpaṇam bandhūnām bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_10.19.011/3 nimīlayata mā bhaiṣṭa locanānīty abhāṣata
analyzed: nimīlayata mā bhaiṣṭa locanāni iti abhāṣata

original: BhP_10.19.012/1 tatheti mīlitākṣeṣu bhagavān agnim ulbaṇam
analyzed: tathā iti mīlita akṣeṣu bhagavān agnim ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.19.012/3 pītvā mukhena tān kṛcchrād yogādhīśo vyamocayat
analyzed: pītvā mukhena tān kṛcchrāt yoga adhīśaḥ vyamocayat

original: BhP_10.19.013/1 tataś ca te 'kṣīṇy unmīlya punar bhāṇḍīram āpitāḥ
analyzed: tatas ca te kṣīṇi unmīlya punar bhāṇḍīram āpitāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.013/3 niśamya vismitā āsann ātmānaṃ gāś ca mocitāḥ
analyzed: niśamya vismitāḥ āsan ātmānam gāḥ ca mocitāḥ

original: BhP_10.19.014/1 kṛṣṇasya yoga-vīryaṃ tad yoga-māyānubhāvitam
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya yoga vīryam tat yogamāyā anubhāvitam

original: BhP_10.19.014/3 dāvāgner ātmanaḥ kṣemaṃ vīkṣya te menire 'maram
analyzed: dāva agneḥ ātmanaḥ kṣemam vīkṣya te menire maram

original: BhP_10.19.015/1 gāḥ sannivartya sāyāhne saha-rāmo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: gāḥ san nivartya sāyāhne saharāmaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.19.015/3 veṇuṃ viraṇayan goṣṭham agād gopair abhiṣṭutaḥ
analyzed: veṇum viraṇayan goṣṭham agāt gopaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ

original: BhP_10.19.016/1 gopīnāṃ paramānanda āsīd govinda-darśane
analyzed: gopīnām parama ānandaḥ āsīt govinda darśane

original: BhP_10.19.016/3 kṣaṇaṃ yuga-śatam iva yāsāṃ yena vinābhavat
analyzed: kṣaṇam yuga śatam iva yāsām yena vinā abhavat

original: BhP_10.20.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.20.001/1 tayos tad adbhutaṃ karma dāvāgner mokṣam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat adbhutam karma dāva agneḥ mokṣam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.001/3 gopāḥ strībhyaḥ samācakhyuḥ pralamba-vadham eva ca
analyzed: gopāḥ strībhyaḥ samācakhyuḥ pralamba vadham eva ca

original: BhP_10.20.002/1 gopa-vṛddhāś ca gopyaś ca tad upākarṇya vismitāḥ
analyzed: gopa vṛddhāḥ ca gopyaḥ ca tat upākarṇya vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.002/3 menire deva-pravarau kṛṣṇa-rāmau vrajaṃ gatau
analyzed: menire deva pravarau kṛṣṇa rāmau vrajam gatau

original: BhP_10.20.003/1 tataḥ prāvartata prāvṛṭ sarva-sattva-samudbhavā
analyzed: tatas prāvartata prāvṛṣ sarva sattva samudbhavā

original: BhP_10.20.003/3 vidyotamāna-paridhir visphūrjita-nabhas-talā
analyzed: vidyotamāna paridhiḥ visphūrjita nabhastalā

original: BhP_10.20.004/1 sāndra-nīlāmbudair vyoma sa-vidyut-stanayitnubhiḥ
analyzed: sāndra nīla ambudaiḥ vyoma sa vidyut stanayitnubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.20.004/3 aspaṣṭa-jyotir ācchannaṃ brahmeva sa-guṇaṃ babhau
analyzed: aspaṣṭa jyotiḥ ācchannam brahmā iva sa guṇam babhau

original: BhP_10.20.005/1 aṣṭau māsān nipītaṃ yad bhūmyāś coda-mayaṃ vasu
analyzed: aṣṭau māsān nipītam yat bhūmyāḥ coda mayam vasu

original: BhP_10.20.005/3 sva-gobhir moktum ārebhe parjanyaḥ kāla āgate
analyzed: sva gobhiḥ moktum ārebhe parjanyaḥ kāle āgate

original: BhP_10.20.006/1 taḍidvanto mahā-meghāś caṇḍa -śvasana -vepitāḥ
analyzed: taḍidvantaḥ mahā meghāḥ caṇḍa śvasana vepitāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.006/3 prīṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ hy asya mumucuḥ karuṇā iva
analyzed: prīṇanam jīvanam hi asya mumucuḥ karuṇāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.20.007/1 tapaḥ-kṛśā deva-mīḍhā āsīd varṣīyasī mahī
analyzed: tapaḥ kṛśā devamīḍhā āsīt varṣīyasī mahī

original: BhP_10.20.007/3 yathaiva kāmya-tapasas tanuḥ samprāpya tat-phalam
analyzed: yathā eva kāmya tapasaḥ tanuḥ samprāpya tad phalam

original: BhP_10.20.008/1 niśā-mukheṣu khadyotās tamasā bhānti na grahāḥ
analyzed: niśā mukheṣu khadyotāḥ tamasā bhānti na grahāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.008/3 yathā pāpena pāṣaṇḍā na hi vedāḥ kalau yuge
analyzed: yathā pāpena pāṣaṇḍāḥ na hi vedāḥ kalau yuge

original: BhP_10.20.009/1 śrutvā parjanya-ninadaṃ maṇḍukāḥ sasṛjur giraḥ
analyzed: śrutvā parjanya ninadam maṇḍukāḥ sasṛjuḥ giraḥ

original: BhP_10.20.009/3 tūṣṇīṃ śayānāḥ prāg yadvad brāhmaṇā niyamātyaye
analyzed: tūṣṇīm śayānāḥ prāk yadvat brāhmaṇāḥ niyama atyaye

original: BhP_10.20.010/1 āsann utpatha-gāminyaḥ kṣudra-nadyo 'nuśuṣyatīḥ
analyzed: āsan utpatha gāminyaḥ kṣudra nadyaḥ nuśuṣyatīḥ

original: BhP_10.20.010/3 puṃso yathāsvatantrasya deha-draviṇa -sampadaḥ
analyzed: puṃsaḥ yathā svatantrasya deha draviṇa sampadaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.011/1 haritā haribhiḥ śaṣpair indragopaiś ca lohitā
analyzed: haritā haribhiḥ śaṣpaiḥ indragopaiḥ ca lohitā

original: BhP_10.20.011/3 ucchilīndhra-kṛta-cchāyā nṛṇāṃ śrīr iva bhūr abhūt
analyzed: ucchilīndhra kṛta chāyā nṛṇām śrīḥ iva bhūḥ abhūt

original: BhP_10.20.012/1 kṣetrāṇi śaṣya-sampadbhiḥ karṣakāṇāṃ mudaṃ daduḥ
analyzed: kṣetrāṇi śaṣya sampadbhiḥ karṣakāṇām mudam daduḥ

original: BhP_10.20.012/3 māninām anutāpaṃ vai daivādhīnam ajānatām
analyzed: māninām anutāpam vai daiva adhīnam a jānatām

original: BhP_10.20.013/1 jala-sthalaukasaḥ sarve nava-vāri-niṣevayā
analyzed: jala sthala okasaḥ sarve nava vāri niṣevayā

original: BhP_10.20.013/3 abibhran ruciraṃ rūpaṃ yathā hari-niṣevayā
analyzed: abibhran ruciram rūpam yathā hari niṣevayā

original: BhP_10.20.014/1 saridbhiḥ saṅgataḥ sindhuś cukṣobha śvasanormimān
analyzed: saridbhiḥ saṅgataḥ sindhuḥ cukṣobha śvasana ūrmimān

original: BhP_10.20.014/3 apakva-yoginaś cittaṃ kāmāktaṃ guṇa-yug yathā
analyzed: apakva yoginaḥ cittam kāma aktam guṇa yuj yathā

original: BhP_10.20.015/1 girayo varṣa-dhārābhir hanyamānā na vivyathuḥ
analyzed: girayaḥ varṣa dhārābhiḥ hanyamānāḥ na vivyathuḥ

original: BhP_10.20.015/3 abhibhūyamānā vyasanair yathādhokṣaja-cetasaḥ
analyzed: abhibhūyamānāḥ vyasanaiḥ yathā adhokṣaja cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.016/1 mārgā babhūvuḥ sandigdhās tṛṇaiś channā hy asaṃskṛtāḥ
analyzed: mārgāḥ babhūvuḥ sandigdhāḥ tṛṇaiḥ channāḥ hi a saṃskṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.016/3 nābhyasyamānāḥ śrutayo dvijaiḥ kālena cāhatāḥ
analyzed: na abhyasyamānāḥ śrutayaḥ dvijaiḥ kālena ca āhatāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.017/1 loka-bandhuṣu megheṣu vidyutaś cala-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: loka bandhuṣu megheṣu vidyutaḥ cala sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.017/3 sthairyaṃ na cakruḥ kāminyaḥ puruṣeṣu guṇiṣv iva
analyzed: sthairyam na cakruḥ kāminyaḥ puruṣeṣu guṇiṣu iva

original: BhP_10.20.018/1 dhanur viyati māhendraṃ nirguṇaṃ ca guṇiny abhāt
analyzed: dhanuḥ viyati māhendram nirguṇam ca guṇinī abhāt

original: BhP_10.20.018/3 vyakte guṇa-vyatikare 'guṇavān puruṣo yathā
analyzed: vyakte guṇa vyatikare guṇavān puruṣaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.20.019/1 na rarājoḍupaś channaḥ sva-jyotsnā-rājitair ghanaiḥ
analyzed: na rarāja uḍupaḥ channaḥ sva jyotsnā rājitaiḥ ghanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.20.019/3 ahaṃ-matyā bhāsitayā sva-bhāsā puruṣo yathā
analyzed: ahaṃmatyā bhāsitayā sva bhāsā puruṣaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.20.020/1 meghāgamotsavā hṛṣṭāḥ pratyanandañ chikhaṇḍinaḥ
analyzed: megha āgama utsavāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ pratyanandam śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.020/3 gṛheṣu tapta-nirviṇṇā yathācyuta-janāgame
analyzed: gṛheṣu tapta nirviṇṇāḥ yathā acyuta janāgame

original: BhP_10.20.021/1 pītvāpaḥ pādapāḥ padbhir āsan nānātma-mūrtayaḥ
analyzed: pītvā apaḥ pādapāḥ padbhiḥ āsan nānā ātma mūrtayaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.021/3 prāk kṣāmās tapasā śrāntā yathā kāmānusevayā
analyzed: prāk kṣāmāḥ tapasā śrāntāḥ yathā kāma anusevayā

original: BhP_10.20.022/1 saraḥsv aśānta-rodhaḥsu nyūṣur aṅgāpi sārasāḥ
analyzed: saraḥsu aśānta rodhaḥsu nyūṣuḥ aṅga api sārasāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.022/3 gṛheṣv aśānta-kṛtyeṣu grāmyā iva durāśayāḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu a śānta kṛtyeṣu grāmyāḥ iva durāśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.023/1 jalaughair nirabhidyanta setavo varṣatīśvare
analyzed: jala oghaiḥ nirabhidyanta setavaḥ varṣati īśvare

original: BhP_10.20.023/3 pāṣaṇḍinām asad-vādair veda-mārgāḥ kalau yathā
analyzed: pāṣaṇḍinām asat vādaiḥ veda mārgāḥ kalau yathā

original: BhP_10.20.024/1 vyamuñcan vāyubhir nunnā bhūtebhyaś cāmṛtaṃ ghanāḥ
analyzed: vyamuñcan vāyubhiḥ nunnāḥ bhūtebhyaḥ ca amṛtam ghanāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.024/3 yathāśiṣo viś-patayaḥ kāle kāle dvijeritāḥ
analyzed: yathā āśiṣaḥ viśpatayaḥ kāle kāle dvija īritāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.025/1 evaṃ vanaṃ tad varṣiṣṭhaṃ pakva-kharjura-jambumat
analyzed: evam vanam tat varṣiṣṭham pakva kharjura jambumat

original: BhP_10.20.025/3 go-gopālair vṛto rantuṃ sa-balaḥ prāviśad dhariḥ
analyzed: go gopālaiḥ vṛtaḥ rantum sa balaḥ prāviśat hariḥ

original: BhP_10.20.026/1 dhenavo manda-gāminya ūdho-bhāreṇa bhūyasā
analyzed: dhenavaḥ manda gāminyaḥ ūdhaḥ bhāreṇa bhūyasā

original: BhP_10.20.026/3 yayur bhagavatāhūtā drutaṃ prītyā snuta-stanāḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ bhagavatā āhūtāḥ drutam prītyā snuta stanāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.027/1 vanaukasaḥ pramuditā vana-rājīr madhu-cyutaḥ
analyzed: vanaukasaḥ pramuditāḥ vana rājīḥ madhu cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.027/3 jala-dhārā girer nādād āsannā dadṛśe guhāḥ
analyzed: jala dhārāḥ gireḥ nādāt āsannāḥ dadṛśe guhāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.028/1 kvacid vanaspati-kroḍe guhāyāṃ cābhivarṣati
analyzed: kvacid vanaspati kroḍe guhāyām ca abhivarṣati

original: BhP_10.20.028/3 nirviśya bhagavān reme kanda-mūla-phalāśanaḥ
analyzed: nirviśya bhagavān reme kanda mūla phala aśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.029/1 dadhy-odanaṃ samānītaṃ śilāyāṃ salilāntike
analyzed: dadhyodanam samānītam śilāyām salila antike

original: BhP_10.20.029/3 sambhojanīyair bubhuje gopaiḥ saṅkarṣaṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: sambhojanīyaiḥ bubhuje gopaiḥ saṅkarṣaṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.030/1 śādvalopari saṃviśya carvato mīlitekṣaṇān
analyzed: śādvala upari saṃviśya carvataḥ mīlita īkṣaṇān

original: BhP_10.20.030/3 tṛptān vṛṣān vatsatarān gāś ca svodho-bhara-śramāḥ
analyzed: tṛptān vṛṣān vatsatarān gāḥ ca svaḥ odhaḥ bhara śramāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.031/1 prāvṛṭ-śriyaṃ ca tāṃ vīkṣya sarva-kāla-sukhāvahām
analyzed: prāvṛṣ śriyam ca tām vīkṣya sarva kāla sukha āvahām

original: BhP_10.20.031/3 bhagavān pūjayāṃ cakre ātma-śakty-upabṛṃhitām
analyzed: bhagavān ātma śakti upabṛṃhitām

original: BhP_10.20.032/1 evaṃ nivasatos tasmin rāma-keśavayor vraje
analyzed: evam nivasatoḥ tasmin rāma keśavayoḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.20.032/3 śarat samabhavad vyabhrā svacchāmbv-aparuṣānilā
analyzed: śarad samabhavat vyabhrā su accha ambu aparuṣa anilā

original: BhP_10.20.033/1 śaradā nīrajotpattyā nīrāṇi prakṛtiṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: śaradā nīraja utpattyā nīrāṇi prakṛtim yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.20.033/3 bhraṣṭānām iva cetāṃsi punar yoga-niṣevayā
analyzed: bhraṣṭānām iva cetāṃsi punar yoga niṣevayā

original: BhP_10.20.034/1 vyomno 'bbhraṃ bhūta-śābalyaṃ bhuvaḥ paṅkam apāṃ malam
analyzed: vyomnaḥ bbhram bhūtaśābalyam bhuvaḥ paṅkam apām malam

original: BhP_10.20.034/3 śaraj jahārāśramiṇāṃ kṛṣṇe bhaktir yathāśubham
analyzed: śarad jahāra āśramiṇām kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ yathāśubham

original: BhP_10.20.035/1 sarva-svaṃ jaladā hitvā virejuḥ śubhra-varcasaḥ
analyzed: sarva svam jaladāḥ hitvā virejuḥ śubhra varcasaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.035/3 yathā tyaktaiṣaṇāḥ śāntā munayo mukta-kilbiṣāḥ
analyzed: yathā tyakta eṣaṇāḥ śāntāḥ munayaḥ mukta kilbiṣāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.036/1 girayo mumucus toyaṃ kvacin na mumucuḥ śivam
analyzed: girayaḥ mumucuḥ toyam kvacid na mumucuḥ śivam

original: BhP_10.20.036/3 yathā jñānāmṛtaṃ kāle jñānino dadate na vā
analyzed: yathā jñāna amṛtam kāle jñāninaḥ dadate na vā

original: BhP_10.20.037/1 naivāvidan kṣīyamāṇaṃ jalaṃ gādha-jale-carāḥ
analyzed: na eva avidan kṣīyamāṇam jalam gādha jalecarāḥ

original: BhP_10.20.037/3 yathāyur anv-ahaṃ kṣayyaṃ narā mūḍhāḥ kuṭumbinaḥ
analyzed: yathā āyuḥ anvaham kṣayyam narāḥ mūḍhāḥ kuṭumbinaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.038/1 gādha-vāri-carās tāpam avindañ charad-arka-jam
analyzed: gādha vāri carāḥ tāpam avindam śarad arka jam

original: BhP_10.20.038/3 yathā daridraḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kuṭumby avijitendriyaḥ
analyzed: yathā daridraḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kuṭumbī avijita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.039/1 śanaiḥ śanair jahuḥ paṅkaṃ sthalāny āmaṃ ca vīrudhaḥ
analyzed: śanais śanais jahuḥ paṅkam sthalāni āmam ca vīrudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.039/3 yathāhaṃ-mamatāṃ dhīrāḥ śarīrādiṣv anātmasu
analyzed: yathā ahaṃmamatām dhīrāḥ śarīra ādiṣu anātmasu

original: BhP_10.20.040/1 niścalāmbur abhūt tūṣṇīṃ samudraḥ śarad-āgame
analyzed: niścala ambuḥ abhūt tūṣṇīm samudraḥ śarad āgame

original: BhP_10.20.040/3 ātmany uparate samyaṅ munir vyuparatāgamaḥ
analyzed: ātmani uparate samyak muniḥ vyuparata āgamaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.041/1 kedārebhyas tv apo 'gṛhṇan karṣakā dṛḍha-setubhiḥ
analyzed: kedārebhyaḥ tu apaḥ gṛhṇan karṣakāḥ dṛḍha setubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.20.041/3 yathā prāṇaiḥ sravaj jñānaṃ tan-nirodhena yoginaḥ
analyzed: yathā prāṇaiḥ sravat jñānam tad nirodhena yoginaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.042/1 śarad-arkāṃśu-jāṃs tāpān bhūtānām uḍupo 'harat
analyzed: śarad arka aṃśu jān tāpān bhūtānām uḍupaḥ harat

original: BhP_10.20.042/3 dehābhimāna-jaṃ bodho mukundo vraja-yoṣitām
analyzed: deha abhimāna jam bodhaḥ mukundaḥ vraja yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.20.043/1 kham aśobhata nirmeghaṃ śarad-vimala-tārakam
analyzed: kham aśobhata nirmegham śarad vimala tārakam

original: BhP_10.20.043/3 sattva-yuktaṃ yathā cittaṃ śabda-brahmārtha-darśanam
analyzed: sattva yuktam yathā cittam śabda brahma artha darśanam

original: BhP_10.20.044/1 akhaṇḍa-maṇḍalo vyomni rarājoḍu-gaṇaiḥ śaśī
analyzed: akhaṇḍa maṇḍalaḥ vyomni rarāja uḍu gaṇaiḥ śaśī

original: BhP_10.20.044/3 yathā yadu-patiḥ kṛṣṇo vṛṣṇi-cakrāvṛto bhuvi
analyzed: yathā yadu patiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ vṛṣṇi cakra āvṛtaḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_10.20.045/1 āśliṣya sama-śītoṣṇaṃ prasūna-vana-mārutam
analyzed: āśliṣya sama śīta uṣṇam prasūna vana mārutam

original: BhP_10.20.045/3 janās tāpaṃ jahur gopyo na kṛṣṇa-hṛta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: janāḥ tāpam jahuḥ gopyaḥ na kṛṣṇa hṛta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.20.046/1 gāvo mṛgāḥ khagā nāryaḥ puṣpiṇyaḥ śaradābhavan
analyzed: gāvaḥ mṛgāḥ khagāḥ nāryaḥ puṣpiṇyaḥ śaradā abhavan

original: BhP_10.20.046/3 anvīyamānāḥ sva-vṛṣaiḥ phalair īśa-kriyā iva
analyzed: anvīyamānāḥ sva vṛṣaiḥ phalaiḥ īśa kriyāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.20.047/1 udahṛṣyan vārijāni sūryotthāne kumud vinā
analyzed: udahṛṣyan vāri jāni sūrya utthāne kumud vinā

original: BhP_10.20.047/3 rājñā tu nirbhayā lokā yathā dasyūn vinā nṛpa
analyzed: rājñā tu nirbhayāḥ lokāḥ yathā dasyūn vinā nṛpa

original: BhP_10.20.048/1 pura-grāmeṣv āgrayaṇair indriyaiś ca mahotsavaiḥ
analyzed: pura grāmeṣu āgrayaṇaiḥ indriyaiḥ ca mahā utsavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.20.048/3 babhau bhūḥ pakva-śaṣyāḍhyā kalābhyāṃ nitarāṃ hareḥ
analyzed: babhau bhūḥ pakva śaṣya āḍhyā kalābhyām nitarām hareḥ

original: BhP_10.20.049/1 vaṇiṅ-muni-nṛpa-snātā nirgamyārthān prapedire
analyzed: vaṇij muni nṛpa snātāḥ nirgamya arthān prapedire

original: BhP_10.20.049/3 varṣa-ruddhā yathā siddhāḥ sva-piṇḍān kāla āgate
analyzed: varṣa ruddhāḥ yathā siddhāḥ sva piṇḍān kāle āgate

original: BhP_10.21.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.21.001/1 itthaṃ śarat-svaccha-jalaṃ padmākara-sugandhinā
analyzed: ittham śarad svaccha jalam padma ākara sugandhinā

original: BhP_10.21.001/3 nyaviśad vāyunā vātaṃ sa -go-gopālako 'cyutaḥ
analyzed: nyaviśat vāyunā vātam sa cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.002/1 kusumita-vanarāji-śuṣmi-bhṛṅga dvija-kula-ghuṣṭa-saraḥ-sarin-mahīdhram
analyzed: kusumita vana rāji śuṣmi bhṛṅga dvija kula ghuṣṭa saraḥ sarit mahīdhram

original: BhP_10.21.002/3 madhupatir avagāhya cārayan gāḥ saha-paśu-pāla-balaś cukūja veṇum
analyzed: madhupatiḥ avagāhya cārayan gāḥ saha paśupāla balaḥ cukūja veṇum

original: BhP_10.21.003/1 tad vraja-striya āśrutya veṇu-gītaṃ smarodayam
analyzed: tat vraja striyaḥ āśrutya veṇu gītam smara udayam

original: BhP_10.21.003/3 kāścit parokṣaṃ kṛṣṇasya sva-sakhībhyo 'nvavarṇayan
analyzed: kāścid parokṣam kṛṣṇasya sva sakhībhyaḥ nu avarṇayan

original: BhP_10.21.004/1 tad varṇayitum ārabdhāḥ smarantyaḥ kṛṣṇa-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: tat varṇayitum ārabdhāḥ smarantyaḥ kṛṣṇa ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.21.004/3 nāśakan smara-vegena vikṣipta-manaso nṛpa
analyzed: na aśakan smara vegena vikṣipta manasaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.21.005/1 barhāpīḍaṃ naṭa-vara-vapuḥ karṇayoḥ karṇikāraṃ
analyzed: barha āpīḍam naṭa vara vapuḥ karṇayoḥ karṇikāram

original: BhP_10.21.005/2 bibhrad vāsaḥ kanaka-kapiśaṃ vaijayantīṃ ca mālām
analyzed: bibhrat vāsaḥ kanaka kapiśam vaijayantīm ca mālām

original: BhP_10.21.005/3 randhrān veṇor adhara-sudhayāpūrayan gopa-vṛndair
analyzed: randhrān veṇoḥ adhara sudhayā apūrayan gopa vṛndaiḥ

original: BhP_10.21.005/4 vṛndāraṇyaṃ sva-pada-ramaṇaṃ prāviśad gīta-kīrtiḥ
analyzed: vṛndāraṇyam sva pada ramaṇam prāviśat gīta kīrtiḥ

original: BhP_10.21.006/1 iti veṇu-ravaṃ rājan sarva-bhūta-manoharam
analyzed: iti veṇu ravam rājan sarva bhūta manoharam

original: BhP_10.21.006/3 śrutvā vraja-striyaḥ sarvā varṇayantyo 'bhirebhire
analyzed: śrutvā vraja striyaḥ sarvāḥ varṇayantyaḥ bhirebhire

original: BhP_10.21.007/0 śrī-gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.21.007/1 akṣaṇvatāṃ phalam idaṃ na paraṃ vidāmaḥ
analyzed: akṣaṇvatām phalam idam na param vidāmaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.007/2 sakhyaḥ paśūn anaviveśayator vayasyaiḥ
analyzed: sakhyaḥ paśūn an a viveśayatoḥ vayasyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.21.007/3 vaktraṃ vrajeśa-sutayor anaveṇu-juṣṭaṃ
analyzed: vaktram vraja īśa sutayoḥ ana veṇu juṣṭam

original: BhP_10.21.007/4 yair vā nipītam anurakta-kaṭākṣa-mokṣam
analyzed: yaiḥ vā nipītam anurakta kaṭākṣa mokṣam

original: BhP_10.21.008/1 cūta-pravāla-barha-stabakotpalābja mālānupṛkta-paridhāna-vicitra-veśau
analyzed: cūta pravāla barha stabaka utpala abja mālā anupṛkta paridhāna vicitra veśau

original: BhP_10.21.008/3 madhye virejatur alaṃ paśu-pāla-goṣṭhyāṃ raṅge yathā naṭa-varau kvaca gāyamānau
analyzed: madhye virejatuḥ alam paśupāla goṣṭhyām raṅge yathā naṭa varau kva ca gāyamānau

original: BhP_10.21.009/1 gopyaḥ kim ācarad ayaṃ kuśalaṃ sma veṇur
analyzed: gopyaḥ kim ācarat ayam kuśalam sma veṇuḥ

original: BhP_10.21.009/2 dāmodarādhara-sudhām api gopikānām
analyzed: dāmodara adhara sudhām api gopikānām

original: BhP_10.21.009/3 bhuṅkte svayaṃ yad avaśiṣṭa-rasaṃ hradinyo
analyzed: bhuṅkte svayam yat avaśiṣṭa rasam

original: BhP_10.21.009/4 hṛṣyat-tvaco 'śru mumucus taravo yathāryaḥ
analyzed: hṛṣyat tvacaḥ śru mumucuḥ taravaḥ yathā aryaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.010/1 vṛndāvanaṃ sakhi bhuvo vitanoti kīṛtiṃ
analyzed: vṛndāvanam sakhi bhuvaḥ vitanoti kīṛtim

original: BhP_10.21.010/2 yad devakī-suta-padāmbuja-labdha-lakṣmi
analyzed: yat devakī suta pada ambuja labdha lakṣmi

original: BhP_10.21.010/3 govinda-veṇum anu matta-mayūra-nṛtyaṃ
analyzed: govinda veṇum anu matta mayūra nṛtyam

original: BhP_10.21.010/4 prekṣyādri-sānv-avaratānya-samasta-sattvam
analyzed: prekṣya adri sānu avarata anya samasta sattvam

original: BhP_10.21.011/1 dhanyāḥ sma mūḍha-gatayo 'pi hariṇya etā
analyzed: dhanyāḥ sma mūḍha gatayaḥ pi hariṇyaḥ etā

original: BhP_10.21.011/2 yā nanda-nandanam upātta-vicitra-veśam
analyzed: yā nanda nandanam upātta vicitra veśam

original: BhP_10.21.011/3 ākarṇya veṇu-raṇitaṃ saha-kṛṣṇa-sārāḥ
analyzed: ākarṇya veṇu raṇitam saha kṛṣṇa sārāḥ

original: BhP_10.21.011/4 pūjāṃ dadhur viracitāṃ praṇayāvalokaiḥ
analyzed: pūjām viracitām praṇaya avalokaiḥ

original: BhP_10.21.012/1 kṛṣṇaṃ nirīkṣya vanitotsava-rūpa-śīlaṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam nirīkṣya vanitā utsava rūpa śīlam

original: BhP_10.21.012/2 śrutvā ca tat-kvaṇita-veṇu-vivikta-gītam
analyzed: śrutvā ca tat kvaṇita veṇu vivikta gītam

original: BhP_10.21.012/3 devyo vimāna-gatayaḥ smara-nunna-sārā
analyzed: devyaḥ vimāna gatayaḥ smara nunna sārā

original: BhP_10.21.012/4 bhraśyat-prasūna-kabarā mumuhur vinīvyaḥ
analyzed: bhraśyat prasūna kabarāḥ mumuhuḥ vinīvyaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.013/1 gāvaś ca kṛṣṇa-mukha-nirgata-veṇu-gīta
analyzed: gāvaḥ ca kṛṣṇa mukha nirgata veṇu gīta

original: BhP_10.21.013/2 pīyūṣam uttabhita-karṇa-puṭaiḥ pibantyaḥ
analyzed: pīyūṣam uttabhita karṇa puṭaiḥ pibantyaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.013/3 śāvāḥ snuta-stana-payaḥ-kavalāḥ sma tasthur
analyzed: śāvāḥ snuta stana payaḥ kavalāḥ sma tasthuḥ

original: BhP_10.21.013/4 govindam ātmani dṛśāśru-kalāḥ spṛśantyaḥ
analyzed: govindam ātmani dṛśā aśru kalāḥ spṛśantyaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.014/1 prāyo batāmba vihagā munayo vane 'smin
analyzed: prāyas bata amba vihagāḥ munayaḥ vane smin

original: BhP_10.21.014/2 kṛṣṇekṣitaṃ tad-uditaṃ kala-veṇu-gītam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa īkṣitam tat uditam kala veṇu gītam

original: BhP_10.21.014/3 āruhya ye druma-bhujān rucira-pravālān
analyzed: āruhya ye druma bhujān rucira pravālān

original: BhP_10.21.014/4 śṛṇvanti mīlita-dṛśo vigatānya-vācaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvanti mīlita dṛśaḥ vigata anya vācaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.015/1 nadyas tadā tad upadhārya mukunda-gītam
analyzed: nadyaḥ tadā tat upadhārya mukunda gītam

original: BhP_10.21.015/2 āvarta-lakṣita-manobhava-bhagna-vegāḥ
analyzed: āvarta lakṣita manobhava bhagna vegāḥ

original: BhP_10.21.015/3 āliṅgana-sthagitam ūrmi-bhujair murārer
analyzed: āliṅgana sthagitam ūrmi bhujaiḥ murāreḥ

original: BhP_10.21.015/4 gṛhṇanti pāda-yugalaṃ kamalopahārāḥ
analyzed: gṛhṇanti pāda yugalam kamala upahārāḥ

original: BhP_10.21.016/1 dṛṣṭvātape vraja-paśūn saha rāma-gopaiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ātape vraja paśūn saha rāma gopaiḥ

original: BhP_10.21.016/2 sañcārayantam anu veṇum udīrayantam
analyzed: sañcārayantam anu veṇum udīrayantam

original: BhP_10.21.016/3 prema-pravṛddha uditaḥ kusumāvalībhiḥ
analyzed: prema pravṛddhaḥ uditaḥ kusuma āvalībhiḥ

original: BhP_10.21.016/4 sakhyur vyadhāt sva-vapuṣāmbuda ātapatram
analyzed: sakhyuḥ vyadhāt sva vapuṣā ambudaḥ ātapatram

original: BhP_10.21.017/1 pūrṇāḥ pulindya urugāya-padābja-rāga
analyzed: pūrṇāḥ pulindyaḥ uru gāya pada abja rāga

original: BhP_10.21.017/2 śrī-kuṅkumena dayitā-stana-maṇḍitena
analyzed: śrī kuṅkumena dayitā stana maṇḍitena

original: BhP_10.21.017/3 tad-darśana-smara-rujas tṛṇa-rūṣitena
analyzed: tad darśana smara rujaḥ tṛṇa rūṣitena

original: BhP_10.21.017/4 limpantya ānana-kuceṣu jahus tad-ādhim
analyzed: limpantyaḥ ānana kuceṣu jahuḥ tad ādhim

original: BhP_10.21.018/1 hantāyam adrir abalā hari-dāsa-varyo
analyzed: hanta ayam adriḥ abalāḥ hari dāsa varyo

original: BhP_10.21.018/2 yad rāma-kṛṣṇa-caraṇa-sparaśa-pramodaḥ
analyzed: yat rāmakṛṣṇa caraṇa sparaśa pramodaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.018/3 mānaṃ tanoti saha-go-gaṇayos tayor yat
analyzed: mānam tanoti saha go gaṇayoḥ tayoḥ yat

original: BhP_10.21.018/4 pānīya-sūyavasa-kandara-kandamūlaiḥ
BhP_10.21.019/1 gā gopakair anu-vanaṃ nayator udāra
analyzed: gāḥ gopakaiḥ anu vanam nayatoḥ udāra

original: BhP_10.21.019/2 veṇu-svanaiḥ kala-padais tanu-bhṛtsu sakhyaḥ
analyzed: veṇu svanaiḥ kala padaiḥ tanubhṛtsu sakhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.019/3 aspandanaṃ gati-matāṃ pulakas taruṇāṃ
analyzed: a spandanam gatimatām pulakaḥ taruṇām

original: BhP_10.21.019/4 niryoga-pāśa-kṛta-lakṣaṇayor vicitram
analyzed: niryoga pāśa kṛta lakṣaṇayoḥ vicitram

original: BhP_10.21.020/1 evaṃ-vidhā bhagavato yā vṛndāvana-cāriṇaḥ
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ bhagavataḥ yāḥ vṛndāvana cāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.21.020/3 varṇayantyo mitho gopyaḥ krīḍās tan-mayatāṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: varṇayantyaḥ mithas gopyaḥ krīḍāḥ tad maya tām yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.22.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.22.001/1 hemante prathame māsi nanda-vraja-kamārikāḥ
BhP_10.22.001/3 cerur haviṣyaṃ bhuñjānāḥ kātyāyany-arcana-vratam
analyzed: ceruḥ haviṣyam bhuñjānāḥ kātyāyanī arcana vratam

original: BhP_10.22.002/1 āplutyāmbhasi kālindyā jalānte codite 'ruṇe
analyzed: āplutya ambhasi kālindyāḥ jala ante ca udite

original: BhP_10.22.002/3 kṛtvā pratikṛtiṃ devīm ānarcur nṛpa saikatīm
analyzed: kṛtvā pratikṛtim devīm ānarcuḥ nṛpa saikatīm

original: BhP_10.22.003/1 gandhair mālyaiḥ surabhibhir balibhir dhūpa-dīpakaiḥ
analyzed: gandhaiḥ mālyaiḥ surabhibhiḥ balibhiḥ dhūpa dīpakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.22.003/3 uccāvacaiś copahāraiḥ pravāla-phala-taṇḍulaiḥ
analyzed: uccāvacaiḥ ca upahāraiḥ pravāla phala taṇḍulaiḥ

original: BhP_10.22.004/1 kātyāyani mahā-māye mahā-yoginy adhīśvari
BhP_10.22.004/3 nanda-gopa-sutaṃ devi patiṃ me kuru te namaḥ
analyzed: nanda gopa sutam devi patim me kuru te namaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.004/5 iti mantraṃ japantyas tāḥ pūjāṃ cakruḥ kamārikāḥ
analyzed: iti mantram japantyaḥ tāḥ pūjām cakruḥ kamārikāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.005/1 evaṃ māsaṃ vrataṃ ceruḥ kumāryaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ
analyzed: evam māsam vratam ceruḥ kumāryaḥ kṛṣṇa cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.005/3 bhadrakālīṃ samānarcur bhūyān nanda-sutaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: bhadrakālīm samānarcuḥ bhūyāt nanda sutaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_10.22.006/1 ūṣasy utthāya gotraiḥ svair anyonyābaddha-bāhavaḥ
analyzed: ūṣasi utthāya gotraiḥ svaiḥ anyonya ābaddha bāhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.006/3 kṛṣṇam uccair jagur yāntyaḥ kālindyāṃ snātum anvaham
analyzed: kṛṣṇam uccais jaguḥ yāntyaḥ kālindyām snātum anvaham

original: BhP_10.22.007/1 nadyāḥ kadācid āgatya tīre nikṣipya pūrva-vat
analyzed: nadyāḥ kadācid āgatya tīre nikṣipya pūrvavat

original: BhP_10.22.007/3 vāsāṃsi kṛṣṇaṃ gāyantyo vijahruḥ salile mudā
analyzed: vāsāṃsi kṛṣṇam gāyantyaḥ vijahruḥ salile mudā

original: BhP_10.22.008/1 bhagavāṃs tad abhipretya kṛṣno yogeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: bhagavān tat abhipretya kṛṣnaḥ yoga īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.22.008/3 vayasyair āvṛtas tatra gatas tat-karma-siddhaye
analyzed: vayasyaiḥ āvṛtaḥ tatra gataḥ tad karma siddhaye

original: BhP_10.22.009/1 tāsāṃ vāsāṃsy upādāya nīpam āruhya satvaraḥ
analyzed: tāsām vāsāṃsi upādāya nīpam āruhya sa tvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.22.009/3 hasadbhiḥ prahasan bālaiḥ parihāsam uvāca ha
analyzed: hasadbhiḥ prahasan bālaiḥ parihāsam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.22.010/1 atrāgatyābalāḥ kāmaṃ svaṃ svaṃ vāsaḥ pragṛhyatām
analyzed: atrā āgatya abalāḥ kāmam svam svam vāsaḥ pragṛhyatām

original: BhP_10.22.010/3 satyaṃ bravāṇi no narma yad yūyaṃ vrata-karśitāḥ
analyzed: satyam bravāṇi naḥ narma yat yūyam vrata karśitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.011/1 na mayodita-pūrvaṃ vā anṛtaṃ tad ime viduḥ
analyzed: na mayā udita pūrvam vai anṛtam tat ime viduḥ

original: BhP_10.22.011/3 ekaikaśaḥ pratīcchadhvaṃ sahaiveti su-madhyamāḥ
analyzed: ekaikaśas pratīcchadhvam saha eva iti sumadhyamāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.012/1 tasya tat kṣvelitaṃ dṛṣṭvā gopyaḥ prema-pariplutāḥ
analyzed: tasya tat kṣvelitam dṛṣṭvā gopyaḥ prema pariplutāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.012/3 vrīḍitāḥ prekṣya cānyonyaṃ jāta-hāsā na niryayuḥ
analyzed: vrīḍitāḥ prekṣya ca anyonyam jāta hāsāḥ na niryayuḥ

original: BhP_10.22.013/1 evaṃ bruvati govinde narmaṇākṣipta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: evam bruvati govinde narmaṇā ākṣipta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.013/3 ā-kaṇṭha-magnāḥ śītode vepamānās tam abruvan
analyzed: ā kaṇṭha magnāḥ śīta ude vepamānāḥ tam abruvan

original: BhP_10.22.014/1 mānayaṃ bhoḥ kṛthās tvāṃ tu nanda-gopa-sutaṃ priyam
analyzed: mānayam bhoḥ kṛthāḥ tvām tu nanda gopa sutam priyam

original: BhP_10.22.014/3 jānīmo 'ṅga vraja-ślāghyaṃ dehi vāsāṃsi vepitāḥ
analyzed: jānīmaḥ u ṅga vraja ślāghyam dehi vāsāṃsi vepitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.015/1 śyāmasundara te dāsyaḥ karavāma tavoditam
analyzed: śyāmasundara te dāsyaḥ karavāma tava uditam

original: BhP_10.22.015/3 dehi vāsāṃsi dharma-jña no ced rājñe bruvāma he
analyzed: dehi vāsāṃsi dharma jña no ced rājñe bruvāma he

original: BhP_10.22.016/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.22.016/1 bhavatyo yadi me dāsyo mayoktaṃ vā kariṣyatha
analyzed: bhavatyaḥ yadi me dāsyaḥ mayā uktam vā kariṣyatha

original: BhP_10.22.016/3 atrāgatya sva-vāsāṃsi pratīcchata śuci-smitāḥ
analyzed: atra āgatya sva vāsāṃsi pratīcchata śuci smitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.016/5 no cen nāhaṃ pradāsye kiṃ kruddho rājā kariṣyati
analyzed: no ced na aham pradāsye kim kruddhaḥ rājā kariṣyati

original: BhP_10.22.017/1 tato jalāśayāt sarvā dārikāḥ śīta-vepitāḥ
analyzed: tatas jalāśayāt sarvāḥ dārikāḥ śīta vepitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.017/3 pāṇibhyāṃ yonim ācchādya protteruḥ śīta-karśitāḥ
analyzed: pāṇibhyām yonim ācchādya protteruḥ śīta karśitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.018/1 bhagavān āhatā vīkṣya śuddha -bhāva-prasāditaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān vīkṣya śuddha bhāva prasāditaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.018/3 skandhe nidhāya vāsāṃsi prītaḥ provāca sa-smitam
analyzed: skandhe nidhāya vāsāṃsi prītaḥ provāca sa smitam

original: BhP_10.22.019/1 yūyaṃ vivastrā yad apo dhṛta-vratā vyagāhataitat tad u deva-helanam
analyzed: yūyam vivastrāḥ yat apaḥ dhṛta vratāḥ vyagāhata etat tat u deva helanam

original: BhP_10.22.019/3 baddhvāñjaliṃ mūrdhny apanuttaye 'ṃhasaḥ kṛtvā namo 'dho-vasanaṃ pragṛhyatām
analyzed: baddhvā añjalim mūrdhni apanuttaye ṃhasaḥ kṛtvā namaḥ dhovasanam pragṛhyatām

original: BhP_10.22.020/1 ity acyutenābhihitaṃ vrajābalā matvā vivastrāplavanaṃ vrata-cyutim
analyzed: iti acyutena abhihitam vrajābalā matvā vivastra āplavanam vrata cyutim

original: BhP_10.22.020/3 tat-pūrti-kāmās tad-aśeṣa-karmaṇāṃ sākṣāt-kṛtaṃ nemur avadya-mṛg yataḥ
analyzed: tad pūrti kāmāḥ tad aśeṣa karmaṇām sākṣātkṛtam nemuḥ avadya mṛś yatas

original: BhP_10.22.021/1 tās tathāvanatā dṛṣṭvā bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tathā avanatāḥ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.021/3 vāsāṃsi tābhyaḥ prāyacchat karuṇas tena toṣitaḥ
analyzed: vāsāṃsi tābhyaḥ prāyacchat karuṇaḥ tena toṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.022/1 dṛḍhaṃ pralabdhās trapayā ca hāpitāḥ
analyzed: dṛḍham pralabdhāḥ trapayā ca hāpitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.022/2 prastobhitāḥ krīḍana-vac ca kāritāḥ
analyzed: prastobhitāḥ krīḍana vat ca kāritāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.022/3 vastrāṇi caivāpahṛtāny athāpy amuṃ
analyzed: vastrāṇi ca eva apahṛtāni atha api amum

original: BhP_10.22.022/4 tā nābhyasūyan priya-saṅga-nirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ na abhyasūyan priya saṅga nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.023/1 paridhāya sva-vāsāṃsi preṣṭha-saṅgama-sajjitāḥ
analyzed: paridhāya sva vāsāṃsi preṣṭha saṅgama sajjitāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.023/3 gṛhīta-cittā no celus tasmin lajjāyitekṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta cittāḥ no celuḥ tasmin lajjāyita īkṣaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.024/1 tāsāṃ vijñāya bhagavān sva-pāda-sparśa-kāmyayā
analyzed: tāsām vijñāya bhagavān sva pāda sparśa kāmyayā

original: BhP_10.22.024/3 dhṛta-vratānāṃ saṅkalpam āha dāmodaro 'balāḥ
analyzed: dhṛta vratānām saṅkalpam āha dāmodaraḥ balāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.025/1 saṅkalpo viditaḥ sādhvyo bhavatīnāṃ mad-arcanam
analyzed: saṅkalpaḥ viditaḥ sādhvyaḥ bhavatīnām mad arcanam

original: BhP_10.22.025/3 mayānumoditaḥ so 'sau satyo bhavitum arhati
analyzed: mayā anumoditaḥ saḥ sau satyaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: BhP_10.22.026/1 na mayy āveśita-dhiyāṃ kāmaḥ kāmāya kalpate
analyzed: na mayi āveśita dhiyām kāmaḥ kāmāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.22.026/3 bharjitā kvathitā dhānāḥ prāyo bījāya neśate
analyzed: bharjitā kvathitāḥ dhānāḥ prāyas bījāya neśate

original: BhP_10.22.027/1 yātābalā vrajaṃ siddhā mayemā raṃsyathā kṣapāḥ
analyzed: yāta abalāḥ vrajam siddhāḥ mayā imāḥ raṃsyathāḥ kṣapāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.027/3 yad uddiśya vratam idaṃ cerur āryārcanaṃ satīḥ
analyzed: yat uddiśya vratam idam ceruḥ ārya arcanam satīḥ

original: BhP_10.22.028/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.22.028/1 ity ādiṣṭā bhagavatā labdha-kāmāḥ kumārikāḥ
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭāḥ bhagavatā labdha kāmāḥ kumārikāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.028/3 dhyāyantyas tat-padāmbhojam kṛcchrān nirviviśur vrajam
analyzed: dhyāyantyaḥ tad pada ambhojam kṛcchrāt nirviviśuḥ vrajam

original: BhP_10.22.029/1 atha gopaiḥ parivṛto bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: atha gopaiḥ parivṛtaḥ bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.029/3 vṛndāvanād gato dūraṃ cārayan gāḥ sahāgrajaḥ
analyzed: vṛndāvanāt gataḥ dūram cārayan gāḥ sahāgrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.030/1 nidaghārkātape tigme chāyābhiḥ svābhir ātmanaḥ
analyzed: nidagha arka ātape tigme chāyābhiḥ svābhiḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.030/3 ātapatrāyitān vīkṣya drumān āha vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: ātapatrāyitān vīkṣya drumān āha vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.031/1 he stoka-kṛṣṇa he aṃśo śrīdāman subalārjuna
analyzed: he stoka kṛṣṇa he aṃśo śrīdāman subala arjuna

original: BhP_10.22.031/3 viśāla vṛṣabhaujasvin devaprastha varūthapa
analyzed: viśāla vṛṣabha ojasvin devaprastha varūthapa

original: BhP_10.22.032/1 paśyataitān mahā-bhāgān parārthaikānta-jīvitān
analyzed: paśyata etān mahābhāgān parārtha ekānta jīvitān

original: BhP_10.22.032/3 vāta-varṣātapa-himān sahanto vārayanti naḥ
analyzed: vāta varṣa ātapa himān sahantaḥ vārayanti naḥ

original: BhP_10.22.033/1 aho eṣāṃ varaṃ janma sarva -prāṇy-upajīvanam
analyzed: aho eṣām varam janma sarva prāṇi upajīvanam

original: BhP_10.22.033/3 su-janasyeva yeṣāṃ vai vimukhā yānti nārthinaḥ
analyzed: su janasya iva yeṣām vai vimukhāḥ yānti na arthinaḥ

original: BhP_10.22.034/1 patra-puṣpa-phala-cchāyā- mūla-valkala-dārubhiḥ
analyzed: patra puṣpa phala chāyāḥ mūla valkala dārubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.22.034/3 gandha-niryāsa-bhasmāsthi- tokmaiḥ kāmān vitanvate
analyzed: gandha niryāsa bhasma asthi tokmaiḥ kāmān vitanvate

original: BhP_10.22.035/1 etāvaj janma-sāphalyaṃ dehinām iha dehiṣu
analyzed: etāvat janma sāphalyam dehinām iha dehiṣu

original: BhP_10.22.035/3 prāṇair arthair dhiyā vācā śreya-ācaraṇaṃ sadā
analyzed: prāṇaiḥ arthaiḥ dhiyā vācā śreyaḥ ācaraṇam sadā

original: BhP_10.22.036/1 iti pravāla-stabaka- phala-puṣpa-dalotkaraiḥ
analyzed: iti

original: BhP_10.22.036/3 tarūṇāṃ namra-śākhānāṃ madhyato yamunāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: tarūṇām namra śākhānām madhyatas yamunām gataḥ

original: BhP_10.22.037/1 tatra gāḥ pāyayitvāpaḥ su-mṛṣṭāḥ śītalāḥ śivāḥ
analyzed: tatra gāḥ pāyayitvā apaḥ su mṛṣṭāḥ śītalāḥ śivāḥ

original: BhP_10.22.037/3 tato nṛpa svayaṃ gopāḥ kāmaṃ svādu papur jalam
analyzed: tatas nṛpa svayam gopāḥ kāmam svādu papuḥ jalam

original: BhP_10.22.038/1 tasyā upavane kāmaṃ cārayantaḥ paśūn nṛpa
analyzed: tasyāḥ upavane kāmam cārayantaḥ paśūn nṛpa

original: BhP_10.22.038/3 kṛṣṇa-rāmāv upāgamya kṣudh-ārtā idam abravan
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau upāgamya kṣudhā ārtāḥ idam abravan

original: BhP_10.23.001/0 śrī-gopa ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī gopaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.23.001/1 rāma rāma mahā-bāho kṛṣṇa duṣṭa-nibarhaṇa
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho kṛṣṇa duṣṭa nibarhaṇa

original: BhP_10.23.001/3 eṣā vai bādhate kṣun nas tac-chāntiṃ kartum arhathaḥ
analyzed: eṣā vai bādhate kṣudh naḥ tat śāntim kartum arhathaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.23.002/1 iti vijñāpito gopair bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: iti vijñāpitaḥ gopaiḥ bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.002/3 bhaktāyā vipra-bhāryāyāḥ prasīdann idam abravīt
analyzed: bhaktāyāḥ vipra bhāryāyāḥ prasīdan idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.23.003/1 prayāta deva-yajanaṃ brāhmaṇā brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: prayāta devayajanam brāhmaṇāḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.003/3 satram āṅgirasaṃ nāma hy āsate svarga-kāmyayā
analyzed: satram āṅgirasam nāma hi āsate svarga kāmyayā

original: BhP_10.23.004/1 tatra gatvaudanaṃ gopā yācatāsmad-visarjitāḥ
analyzed: tatra gatvā odanam gopāḥ yācata asmad visarjitāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.004/3 kīrtayanto bhagavata āryasya mama cābhidhām
analyzed: kīrtayantaḥ bhagavataḥ āryasya mama ca abhidhām

original: BhP_10.23.005/1 ity ādiṣṭā bhagavatā gatvā yācanta te tathā
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭāḥ bhagavatā gatvā yācanta te tathā

original: BhP_10.23.005/3 kṛtāñjali-puṭā viprān daṇḍa-vat patitā bhuvi
analyzed: kṛta añjali puṭā viprān daṇḍa vat patitā bhuvi

original: BhP_10.23.006/1 he bhūmi-devāḥ śṛṇuta kṛṣṇasyādeśa-kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: he bhūmidevāḥ śṛṇuta kṛṣṇasya ādeśa kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.006/3 prāptāñ jānīta bhadraṃ vo gopān no rāma-coditān
analyzed: prāptām jānīta bhadram vaḥ gopān naḥ rāma coditān

original: BhP_10.23.007/1 gāś cārayantāv avidūra odanaṃ rāmācyutau vo laṣato bubhukṣitau
analyzed: gāḥ cārayantau avidūre odanam rāma acyutau vaḥ laṣataḥ bubhukṣitau

original: BhP_10.23.007/3 tayor dvijā odanam arthinor yadi śraddhā ca vo yacchata dharma-vittamāḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ dvijāḥ odanam arthinoḥ yadi śraddhā ca vaḥ yacchata dharma vittamāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.008/1 dīkṣāyāḥ paśu-saṃsthāyāḥ sautrāmaṇyāś ca sattamāḥ
analyzed: dīkṣāyāḥ paśu saṃsthāyāḥ sautrāmaṇyāḥ ca sattamāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.008/3 anyatra dīkṣitasyāpi nānnam aśnan hi duṣyati
analyzed: anyatra dīkṣitasya api na annam aśnan hi duṣyati

original: BhP_10.23.009/1 iti te bhagavad-yācñāṃ śṛṇvanto 'pi na śuśruvuḥ
analyzed: iti te bhagavat yācñām śṛṇvantaḥ pi na śuśruvuḥ

original: BhP_10.23.009/3 kṣudrāśā bhūri-karmāṇo bāliśā vṛddha-māninaḥ
analyzed: kṣudra āśāḥ bhūri karmāṇaḥ bāliśāḥ vṛddha māninaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.010/1 deśaḥ kālaḥ pṛthag dravyaṃ mantra-tantrartvijo 'gnayaḥ
analyzed: deśaḥ kālaḥ pṛthak dravyam mantra tantra ṛtvijaḥ gnayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.010/3 devatā yajamānaś ca kratur dharmaś ca yan-mayaḥ
analyzed: devatā yajamānaḥ ca kratuḥ dharmaḥ ca yad mayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.011/1 taṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣād bhagavantam adhokṣajam
analyzed: tam brahma paramam sākṣāt bhagavantam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_10.23.011/3 manuṣya-dṛṣṭyā duṣprajñā martyātmāno na menire
analyzed: manuṣya dṛṣṭyā duṣprajñāḥ martya ātmānaḥ na menire

original: BhP_10.23.012/1 na te yad om iti procur na neti ca parantapa
analyzed: na te yat om iti procuḥ na na iti ca parantapa

original: BhP_10.23.012/3 gopā nirāśāḥ pratyetya tathocuḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmayoḥ
analyzed: gopāḥ nirāśāḥ pratyetya tathā ūcuḥ kṛṣṇa rāmayoḥ

original: BhP_10.23.013/1 tad upākarṇya bhagavān prahasya jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: tat upākarṇya bhagavān prahasya jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.23.013/3 vyājahāra punar gopān darśayan laukikīṃ gatim
analyzed: vyājahāra punar gopān darśayan laukikīm gatim

original: BhP_10.23.014/1 māṃ jñāpayata patnībhyaḥ sa-saṅkarṣaṇam āgatam
analyzed: mām jñāpayata patnībhyaḥ sa saṅkarṣaṇam āgatam

original: BhP_10.23.014/3 dāsyanti kāmam annaṃ vaḥ snigdhā mayy uṣitā dhiyā
analyzed: dāsyanti kāmam annam vaḥ snigdhāḥ mayi uṣitāḥ dhiyā

original: BhP_10.23.015/1 gatvātha patnī-śālāyāṃ dṛṣṭvāsīnāḥ sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: gatvā atha patnīśālāyām dṛṣṭvā āsīnāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.015/3 natvā dvija-satīr gopāḥ praśritā idam abruvan
analyzed: natvā dvijasatīḥ gopāḥ praśritāḥ idam abruvan

original: BhP_10.23.016/1 namo vo vipra-patnībhyo nibodhata vacāṃsi naḥ
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ vipra patnībhyaḥ nibodhata vacāṃsi naḥ

original: BhP_10.23.016/3 ito 'vidūre caratā kṛṣṇeneheṣitā vayam
analyzed: itas vidūre caratā kṛṣṇena iha iṣitāḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.23.017/1 gāś cārayan sa gopālaiḥ sa-rāmo dūram āgataḥ
analyzed: gāḥ cārayan sa gopālaiḥ sarāmaḥ dūram āgataḥ

original: BhP_10.23.017/3 bubhukṣitasya tasyānnaṃ sānugasya pradīyatām
analyzed: bubhukṣitasya tasya annam sa anugasya pradīyatām

original: BhP_10.23.018/1 śrutvācyutam upāyātaṃ nityaṃ tad-darśanotsukāḥ
analyzed: śrutvā acyutam upāyātam nityam tad darśana utsukāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.018/3 tat-kathākṣipta-manaso babhūvur jāta-sambhramāḥ
analyzed: tad kathā kṣipta manasaḥ babhūvuḥ jāta sambhramāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.019/1 catur-vidhaṃ bahu-guṇam annam ādāya bhājanaiḥ
analyzed: caturvidham bahuguṇam annam ādāya bhājanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.23.019/3 abhisasruḥ priyaṃ sarvāḥ samudram iva nimnagāḥ
analyzed: abhisasruḥ priyam sarvāḥ samudram iva nimnagāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.020/1 niṣidhyamānāḥ patibhir bhrātṛbhir bandhubhiḥ sutaiḥ
analyzed: niṣidhyamānāḥ patibhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ bandhubhiḥ sutaiḥ

original: BhP_10.23.020/3 bhagavaty uttama-śloke dīrgha-śruta -dhṛtāśayāḥ
analyzed: bhagavati uttamaśloke dīrghaśruta dhṛta āśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.021/1 yamunopavane 'śoka nava-pallava-maṇḍite
analyzed: yamunā upavane śoka nava pallava maṇḍite

original: BhP_10.23.021/3 vicarantaṃ vṛtaṃ gopaiḥ sāgrajaṃ dadṛśuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: vicarantam vṛtam gopaiḥ sa agrajam dadṛśuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.022/1 śyāmaṃ hiraṇya-paridhiṃ vanamālya-barha-
analyzed: śyāmam hiraṇya paridhim vanamālya barha

original: BhP_10.23.022/2 dhātu-pravāla-naṭa-veṣam anavratāṃse
analyzed: dhātu pravāla naṭa veṣam anavrata aṃse

original: BhP_10.23.022/3 vinyasta-hastam itareṇa dhunānam abjaṃ
analyzed: vinyasta hastam itareṇa dhunānam abjam

original: BhP_10.23.022/4 karṇotpalālaka-kapola-mukhābja-hāsam
analyzed: karṇa utpala alaka kapola mukha abja hāsam

original: BhP_10.23.023/1 prāyaḥ-śruta-priyatamodaya-karṇa-pūrair
analyzed: prāyas śruta priyatama udaya karṇapūraiḥ

original: BhP_10.23.023/2 yasmin nimagna-manasas tam athākṣi-randraiḥ
analyzed: yasmin nimagna manasaḥ tam atha akṣi randraiḥ

original: BhP_10.23.023/3 antaḥ praveśya su-ciraṃ parirabhya tāpaṃ
analyzed: antar praveśya su ciram parirabhya tāpam

original: BhP_10.23.023/4 prājñaṃ yathābhimatayo vijahur narendra
analyzed: prājñam yathā abhimatayaḥ vijahuḥ narendra

original: BhP_10.23.024/1 tās tathā tyakta-sarvāśāḥ prāptā ātma-didṛkṣayā
analyzed: tāḥ tathā tyakta sarva āśāḥ prāptāḥ ātma didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_10.23.024/3 vijñāyākhila-dṛg-draṣṭā prāha prahasitānanaḥ
analyzed: vijñāya akhila dṛś draṣṭā prāha prahasita ānanaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.025/1 svāgataṃ vo mahā-bhāgā āsyatāṃ karavāma kim
analyzed: svāgatam vaḥ mahābhāgāḥ āsyatām karavāma kim

original: BhP_10.23.025/3 yan no didṛkṣayā prāptā upapannam idaṃ hi vaḥ
analyzed: yat naḥ didṛkṣayā prāptāḥ upapannam idam hi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.026/1 nanv addhā mayi kurvanti kuśalāḥ svārtha-darśinaḥ
analyzed: nanu addhā mayi kurvanti kuśalāḥ sva artha darśinaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.026/3 ahaituky avyavahitāṃ bhaktim ātma-priye yathā
analyzed: ahaitukī avyavahitām bhaktim ātma priye yathā

original: BhP_10.23.027/1 prāṇa-buddhi-manaḥ-svātma dārāpatya-dhanādayaḥ
analyzed: prāṇa buddhi manaḥ sva ātma dāra apatya dhana ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.027/3 yat-samparkāt priyā āsaṃs tataḥ ko nv aparaḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: yad samparkāt priyāḥ āsan tatas kaḥ nu aparaḥ priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.028/1 tad yāta deva-yajanaṃ patayo vo dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: tat yāta devayajanam patayaḥ vaḥ dvijātayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.028/3 sva-satraṃ pārayiṣyanti yuṣmābhir gṛha-medhinaḥ
analyzed: sva satram pārayiṣyanti yuṣmābhiḥ gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.029/0 śrī-patnya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī patnyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.23.029/1 maivaṃ vibho 'rhati bhavān gadituṃ nr-śaṃsaṃ
analyzed: mā evam vibhoḥ rhati bhavān gaditum nrśaṃsam

original: BhP_10.23.029/2 satyaṃ kuruṣva nigamaṃ tava pada-mūlam
analyzed: satyam kuruṣva nigamam tava pada mūlam

original: BhP_10.23.029/3 prāptā vayaṃ tulasi-dāma padāvasṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: prāptāḥ vayam padāvasṛṣṭam

original: BhP_10.23.029/4 keśair nivoḍhum atilaṅghya samasta-bandhūn
analyzed: keśaiḥ nivoḍhum atilaṅghya samasta bandhūn

original: BhP_10.23.030/1 gṛhṇanti no na patayaḥ pitarau sutā vā
analyzed: gṛhṇanti naḥ na patayaḥ pitarau sutāḥ vā

original: BhP_10.23.030/2 na bhrātṛ-bandhu-suhṛdaḥ kuta eva cānye
analyzed: na bhrātṛ bandhu suhṛdaḥ kutas eva ca anye

original: BhP_10.23.030/3 tasmād bhavat-prapadayoḥ patitātmanāṃ no
analyzed: tasmāt bhavat prapadayoḥ patita ātmanām no

original: BhP_10.23.030/4 nānyā bhaved gatir arindama tad vidhehi
analyzed: na anyā bhavet gatiḥ arindama tat vidhehi

original: BhP_10.23.031/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.23.031/1 patayo nābhyasūyeran pitṛ-bhrātṛ-sutādayaḥ
analyzed: patayaḥ na abhyasūyeran pitṛ bhrātṛ suta ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.031/3 lokāś ca vo mayopetā devā apy anumanvate
analyzed: lokāḥ ca vaḥ mayā upetāḥ devāḥ api anumanvate

original: BhP_10.23.032/1 na prītaye 'nurāgāya hy aṅga-saṅgo nṛṇām iha
analyzed: na prītaye nurāgāya hi aṅgasaṅgaḥ nṛṇām iha

original: BhP_10.23.032/3 tan mano mayi yuñjānā acirān mām avāpsyatha
analyzed: tat manaḥ mayi yuñjānāḥ acirāt mām avāpsyatha

original: BhP_10.23.033/1 śravaṇād darśanād dhyānān mayi bhāvo 'nukīrtanāt
analyzed: śravaṇāt darśanāt dhyānāt mayi bhāvaḥ nu kīrtanāt

original: BhP_10.23.033/3 na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tato gṛhān
analyzed: na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tatas gṛhān

original: BhP_10.23.034/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.23.034/1 ity uktā dvija-patnyas tā yajña-vāṭaṃ punar gatāḥ
analyzed: iti uktāḥ dvija patnyaḥ tāḥ yajña vāṭam punar gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.034/3 te cānasūyavas tābhiḥ strībhiḥ satram apārayan
analyzed: te ca anasūyavaḥ tābhiḥ strībhiḥ satram apārayan

original: BhP_10.23.035/1 tatraikā vidhṛtā bhartrā bhagavantaṃ yathā-śrutam
analyzed: tatra ekā vidhṛtā bhartrā bhagavantam yathāśrutam

original: BhP_10.23.035/3 hṛḍopaguhya vijahau dehaṃ karmānubandhanam
analyzed: vijahau deham karma anubandhanam

original: BhP_10.23.036/1 bhagavān api govindas tenaivānnena gopakān
analyzed: bhagavān api govindaḥ tena evā annena gopakān

original: BhP_10.23.036/3 catur-vidhenāśayitvā svayaṃ ca bubhuje prabhuḥ
analyzed: caturvidhena āśayitvā svayam ca bubhuje prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.23.037/1 evaṃ līlā-nara-vapur nr-lokam anuśīlayan
analyzed: evam līlā nara vapuḥ anuśīlayan

original: BhP_10.23.037/3 reme go-gopa-gopīnāṃ ramayan rūpa-vāk-kṛtaiḥ
analyzed: reme go gopa gopīnām ramayan rūpa vāc kṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_10.23.038/1 athānusmṛtya viprās te anvatapyan kṛtāgasaḥ
analyzed: atha anusmṛtya viprāḥ te anvatapyan kṛta āgasaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.038/3 yad viśveśvarayor yācñām ahanma nṛ-viḍambayoḥ
analyzed: yat viśva īśvarayoḥ yācñām ahanma nṛ viḍambayoḥ

original: BhP_10.23.039/1 dṛṣṭvā strīṇāṃ bhagavati kṛṣṇe bhaktim alaukikīm
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā strīṇām bhagavati kṛṣṇe bhaktim alaukikīm

original: BhP_10.23.039/3 ātmānaṃ ca tayā hīnam anutaptā vyagarhayan
analyzed: ātmānam ca tayā hīnam anutaptāḥ vyagarhayan

original: BhP_10.23.040/1 dhig janma nas tri-vṛd yat tad dhig vrataṃ dhig bahu-jñatām
analyzed: dhik janma naḥ trivṛt yat tat dhik vratam dhik bahu jña tām

original: BhP_10.23.040/3 dhik kulaṃ dhik kriyā-dākṣyaṃ vimukhā ye tv adhokṣaje
analyzed: dhik kulam dhik kriyā dākṣyam vimukhāḥ ye tu adhokṣaje

original: BhP_10.23.041/1 nūnaṃ bhagavato māyā yoginām api mohinī
analyzed: nūnam bhagavataḥ māyā yoginām api mohinī

original: BhP_10.23.041/3 yad vayaṃ guravo nṛṇāṃ svārthe muhyāmahe dvijāḥ
analyzed: yat vayam guravaḥ nṛṇām sva arthe muhyāmahe dvijāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.042/1 aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagad-gurau
analyzed: aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagadgurau

original: BhP_10.23.042/3 duranta-bhāvaṃ yo 'vidhyan mṛtyu-pāśān gṛhābhidhān
analyzed: duranta bhāvam yaḥ vidhyat mṛtyu pāśān gṛha abhidhān

original: BhP_10.23.043/1 nāsāṃ dvijāti-saṃskāro na nivāso gurāv api
analyzed: na āsām dvijāti saṃskāraḥ na nivāsaḥ gurau api

original: BhP_10.23.043/3 na tapo nātma-mīmāṃsā na śaucaṃ na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ
analyzed: na tapaḥ na ātma mīmāṃsā na śaucam na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.044/1 tathāpi hy uttamaḥ-śloke kṛṣṇe yogeśvareśvare
analyzed: tathā api hi uttamaḥśloke kṛṣṇe yogeśvara īśvare

original: BhP_10.23.044/3 bhaktir dṛḍhā na cāsmākaṃ saṃskārādimatām api
analyzed: bhaktiḥ dṛḍhā na ca asmākam saṃskāra ādimatām api

original: BhP_10.23.045/1 nanu svārtha-vimūḍhānāṃ pramattānāṃ gṛhehayā
analyzed: nanu sva artha vimūḍhānām pramattānām gṛhehayā

original: BhP_10.23.045/3 aho naḥ smārayām āsa gopa-vākyaiḥ satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: aho naḥ smārayām āsa gopa vākyaiḥ satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.23.046/1 anyathā pūrṇa-kāmasya kaivalyādy-aśiṣāṃ pateḥ
analyzed: anyathā pūrṇa kāmasya kaivalyāt yaśiṣām pateḥ

original: BhP_10.23.046/3 īśitavyaiḥ kim asmābhir īśasyaitad viḍambanam
analyzed: īśitavyaiḥ kim asmābhiḥ īśasya etat viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.23.047/1 hitvānyān bhajate yaṃ śrīḥ pāda-sparśāśayāsakṛt
analyzed: hitvā anyān bhajate yam śrīḥ pāda sparśa āśayā asakṛt

original: BhP_10.23.047/3 svātma-doṣāpavargeṇa tad-yācñā jana-mohinī
analyzed: sva ātma doṣa apavargeṇa tad yācñā jana mohinī

original: BhP_10.23.048/1 deśaḥ kālaḥ pṛthag dravyaṃ mantra-tantrartvijo 'gnayaḥ
analyzed: deśaḥ kālaḥ pṛthak dravyam mantra tantra ṛtvijaḥ gnayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.048/3 devatā yajamānaś ca kratur dharmaś ca yan-mayaḥ
analyzed: devatā yajamānaḥ ca kratuḥ dharmaḥ ca yad mayaḥ

original: BhP_10.23.049/1 sa eva bhagavān sākṣād viṣṇur yogeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva bhagavān sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ yoga īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.23.049/3 jāto yaduṣv ity āśṛṇma hy api mūḍhā na vidmahe
analyzed: jātaḥ yaduṣu iti āśṛṇma hi api mūḍhāḥ na vidmahe

original: BhP_10.23.050/1 tasmai namo bhagavate kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase

original: BhP_10.23.050/3 yan-māyā-mohita-dhiyo bhramāmaḥ karma-vartmasu
analyzed: yat māyā mohita dhiyaḥ bhramāmaḥ karma vartmasu

original: BhP_10.23.051/1 sa vai na ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sva-māyā-mohitātmanām
analyzed: sa vai naḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sva māyā mohita ātmanām

original: BhP_10.23.051/3 avijñatānubhāvānāṃ kṣantum arhaty atikramam
analyzed: avijña tā anubhāvānām kṣantum arhati atikramam

original: BhP_10.23.052/1 iti svāgham anusmṛtya kṛṣṇe te kṛta-helanāḥ
analyzed: iti sva agham anusmṛtya kṛṣṇe te kṛta helanāḥ

original: BhP_10.23.052/3 didṛkṣavo vrajam atha kaṃsād bhītā na cācalan
analyzed: didṛkṣavaḥ vrajam atha kaṃsāt bhītāḥ na ca acalan

original: BhP_10.24.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.24.001/1 bhagavān api tatraiva baladevena saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api tatra eva baladevena saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.001/3 apaśyan nivasan gopān indra-yāga-kṛtodyamān
analyzed: apaśyat nivasan gopān indra yāga kṛta udyamān

original: BhP_10.24.002/1 tad-abhijño 'pi bhagavān sarvātmā sarva-darśanaḥ
analyzed: tad abhijñaḥ pi bhagavān sarva ātmā sarva darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.002/3 praśrayāvanato 'pṛcchad vṛddhān nanda-purogamān
analyzed: pṛcchat vṛddhān nanda purogamān

original: BhP_10.24.003/1 kathyatāṃ me pitaḥ ko 'yaṃ sambhramo va upāgataḥ
analyzed: kathyatām me pitar kaḥ yam sambhramaḥ vaḥ upāgataḥ

original: BhP_10.24.003/3 kiṃ phalaṃ kasya voddeśaḥ kena vā sādhyate makhaḥ
analyzed: kim phalam kasya vā uddeśaḥ kena vā sādhyate makhaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.004/1 etad brūhi mahān kāmo mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave pitaḥ
analyzed: etat brūhi mahān kāmaḥ mahyam śuśrūṣave pitar

original: BhP_10.24.004/3 na hi gopyaṃ hi sadhūnāṃ kṛtyaṃ sarvātmanām iha
analyzed: na hi gopyam hi sadhūnām kṛtyam sarva ātmanām iha

original: BhP_10.24.004/5 asty asva-para-dṛṣṭīnām amitrodāsta-vidviṣām
analyzed: asti a sva para dṛṣṭīnām amitra udāsta vidviṣām

original: BhP_10.24.005/1 udāsīno 'ri-vad varjya
analyzed: udāsīnaḥ ri vat varjya

original: BhP_10.24.005/2 ātma-vat suhṛd ucyate
analyzed: ātma vat suhṛd ucyate

original: BhP_10.24.006/1 jñatvājñātvā ca karmāṇi jano 'yam anutiṣṭhati
analyzed: jñatvā a jñātvā ca karmāṇi janaḥ yam anutiṣṭhati

original: BhP_10.24.006/3 viduṣaḥ karma-siddhiḥ syād yathā nāviduṣo bhavet
analyzed: viduṣaḥ karma siddhiḥ syāt yathā na a viduṣaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_10.24.007/1 tatra tāvat kriyā-yogo bhavatāṃ kiṃ vicāritaḥ
analyzed: tatra tāvat kriyā yogaḥ bhavatām kim vicāritaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.007/3 atha vā laukikas tan me pṛcchataḥ sādhu bhaṇyatām
analyzed: atha vā laukikaḥ tat me pṛcchataḥ sādhu bhaṇyatām

original: BhP_10.24.008/0 śrī-nanda uvāca
analyzed: śrī nandaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.24.008/1 parjanyo bhagavān indro meghās tasyātma-mūrtayaḥ
analyzed: parjanyaḥ bhagavān indraḥ meghāḥ tasya ātma mūrtayaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.008/3 te 'bhivarṣanti bhūtānāṃ prīṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ payaḥ
analyzed: te bhivarṣanti bhūtānām prīṇanam jīvanam payaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.009/1 taṃ tāta vayam anye ca vārmucāṃ patim īśvaram
analyzed: tam tāta vayam anye ca vārmucām patim īśvaram

original: BhP_10.24.009/3 dravyais tad-retasā siddhair yajante kratubhir narāḥ
analyzed: dravyaiḥ tad retasā siddhaiḥ yajante kratubhiḥ narāḥ

original: BhP_10.24.010/1 tac-cheṣeṇopajīvanti tri-varga-phala-hetave
analyzed: tad śeṣeṇa upajīvanti trivarga phala hetave

original: BhP_10.24.010/3 puṃsāṃ puruṣa-kārāṇāṃ parjanyaḥ phala-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: puṃsām puruṣakārāṇām parjanyaḥ phala bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.011/1 ya enaṃ visṛjed dharmaṃ paramparyāgataṃ naraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ enam visṛjet dharmam paramparya āgatam naraḥ

original: BhP_10.24.011/3 kāmād dveṣād bhayāl lobhāt sa vai nāpnoti śobhanam
analyzed: kāmāt dveṣāt bhayāt lobhāt sa vai na āpnoti śobhanam

original: BhP_10.24.012/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.24.012/1 vaco niśamya nandasya tathānyeṣāṃ vrajaukasām
analyzed: vacaḥ niśamya nandasya tathā anyeṣām vrajaukasām

original: BhP_10.24.012/3 indrāya manyuṃ janayan pitaraṃ prāha keśavaḥ
analyzed: indrāya manyum janayan pitaram prāha keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.013/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.24.013/1 karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva pralīyate
analyzed: karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇā eva pralīyate

original: BhP_10.24.013/3 sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate
analyzed: sukham duḥkham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva abhipadyate

original: BhP_10.24.014/1 asti ced īśvaraḥ kaścit phala-rūpy anya-karmaṇām
analyzed: asti ced īśvaraḥ kaścid phala rūpī anya karmaṇām

original: BhP_10.24.014/3 kartāraṃ bhajate so 'pi na hy akartuḥ prabhur hi saḥ
analyzed: kartāram bhajate na hi akartuḥ prabhuḥ hi saḥ

original: BhP_10.24.015/1 kim indreṇeha bhūtānāṃ sva-sva-karmānuvartinām
analyzed: kim indreṇa iha bhūtānām sva sva karma anuvartinām

original: BhP_10.24.015/3 anīśenānyathā kartuṃ svabhāva-vihitaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: anīśena anyathā kartum svabhāva vihitam nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.24.016/1 svabhāva-tantro hi janaḥ svabhāvam anuvartate
analyzed: svabhāva tantraḥ hi janaḥ svabhāvam anuvartate

original: BhP_10.24.016/3 svabhāva-stham idaṃ sarvaṃ sa-devāsura-mānuṣam
analyzed: svabhāva stham idam sarvam sa deva asura mānuṣam

original: BhP_10.24.017/1 dehān uccāvacāñ jantuḥ prāpyotsṛjati karmaṇā
analyzed: dehān uccāvacām jantuḥ prāpya utsṛjati karmaṇā

original: BhP_10.24.017/3 śatrur mitram udāsīnaḥ karmaiva gurur īśvaraḥ
analyzed: śatruḥ mitram udāsīnaḥ karma eva guruḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.24.018/1 tasmāt sampūjayet karma svabhāva-sthaḥ sva-karma-kṛt
analyzed: tasmāt sampūjayet karma svabhāva sthaḥ sva karma kṛt

original: BhP_10.24.018/3 anjasā yena varteta tad evāsya hi daivatam
analyzed: anjasā yena varteta tat eva asya hi daivatam

original: BhP_10.24.019/1 ājīvyaikataraṃ bhāvaṃ yas tv anyam upajīvati
analyzed: ājīvya ekataram bhāvam yaḥ tu anyam upajīvati

original: BhP_10.24.019/3 na tasmād vindate kṣemaṃ jārān nāry asatī yathā
analyzed: na tasmāt vindate kṣemam jārān nārī asatī yathā

original: BhP_10.24.020/1 varteta brahmaṇā vipro rājanyo rakṣayā bhuvaḥ
analyzed: varteta brahmaṇā vipraḥ rājanyaḥ rakṣayā bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.020/3 vaiśyas tu vārtayā jīvec chūdras tu dvija-sevayā
analyzed: vaiśyaḥ tu vārtayā jīvet śūdraḥ tu dvija sevayā

original: BhP_10.24.021/1 kṛṣi-vāṇijya-go-rakṣā kusīdaṃ tūryam ucyate
analyzed: kṛṣi vāṇijya gorakṣā kusīdam tūryam ucyate

original: BhP_10.24.021/3 vārtā catur-vidhā tatra vayaṃ go-vṛttayo 'niśam
analyzed: vārtā caturvidhā tatra vayam go vṛttayaḥ niśam

original: BhP_10.24.022/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti sthity-utpatty-anta-hetavaḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti sthiti utpatti anta hetavaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.022/3 rajasotpadyate viśvam anyonyaṃ vividhaṃ jagat
analyzed: rajasā utpadyate viśvam anyonyam vividham jagat

original: BhP_10.24.023/1 rajasā coditā meghā varṣanty ambūni sarvataḥ
analyzed: rajasā coditāḥ meghāḥ varṣanti ambūni sarvatas

original: BhP_10.24.023/3 prajās tair eva sidhyanti mahendraḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: prajāḥ taiḥ eva sidhyanti mahā indraḥ kim kariṣyati

original: BhP_10.24.024/1 na naḥ purojanapadā na grāmā na gṛhā vayam
analyzed: na naḥ puras janapadāḥ na grāmāḥ na gṛhāḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.24.024/3 vanaukasas tāta nityaṃ vana-śaila-nivāsinaḥ
analyzed: vanaukasaḥ tāta nityam vana śaila nivāsinaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.025/1 tasmād gavāṃ brāhmaṇānām adreś cārabhyatāṃ makhaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt gavām brāhmaṇānām adreḥ ca ārabhyatām makhaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.025/3 ya indra-yāga-sambhārās tair ayaṃ sādhyatāṃ makhaḥ
analyzed: ye indra yāga sambhārāḥ taiḥ ayam sādhyatām makhaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.026/1 pacyantāṃ vividhāḥ pākāḥ sūpāntāḥ pāyasādayaḥ
analyzed: pacyantām vividhāḥ pākāḥ sūpa antāḥ pāyasa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.026/3 saṃyāvāpūpa-śaṣkulyaḥ sarva-dohaś ca gṛhyatām
analyzed: saṃyāva apūpa śaṣkulyaḥ sarva dohaḥ ca gṛhyatām

original: BhP_10.24.027/1 hūyantām agnayaḥ samyag brāhmaṇair brahma-vādibhiḥ
analyzed: hūyantām agnayaḥ samyak brāhmaṇaiḥ brahma vādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.24.027/3 annaṃ bahu-guṇaṃ tebhyo deyaṃ vo dhenu-dakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: annam bahu guṇam tebhyaḥ deyam vaḥ dhenu dakṣiṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.24.028/1 anyebhyaś cāśva-cāṇḍāla- patitebhyo yathārhataḥ
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ ca aśva cāṇḍāla patitebhyaḥ yathārhataḥ

original: BhP_10.24.028/3 yavasaṃ ca gavāṃ dattvā giraye dīyatāṃ baliḥ
analyzed: yavasam ca gavām dattvā giraye dīyatām baliḥ

original: BhP_10.24.029/1 sv-alaṅkṛtā bhuktavantaḥ sv-anuliptāḥ su-vāsasaḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtāḥ bhuktavantaḥ su anuliptāḥ su vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.029/3 pradakṣiṇāṃ ca kuruta go-viprānala-parvatān
analyzed: pradakṣiṇām ca kuruta go vipra analaparvatān

original: BhP_10.24.030/1 etan mama mataṃ tāta kriyatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: etat mama matam tāta kriyatām yadi rocate

original: BhP_10.24.030/3 ayaṃ go-brāhmaṇādrīṇāṃ mahyaṃ ca dayito makhaḥ
analyzed: ayam go brāhmaṇa adrīṇām mahyam ca dayitaḥ makhaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.031/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.24.031/1 kālātmanā bhagavatā śakra-darpa-jighāṃsayā
analyzed: kāla ātmanā bhagavatā śakra darpa jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.24.031/3 proktaṃ niśamya nandādyāḥ sādhv agṛhṇanta tad-vacaḥ
analyzed: proktam niśamya nanda ādyāḥ sādhu agṛhṇanta tad vacaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.032/1 tathā ca vyadadhuḥ sarvaṃ yathāha madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca vyadadhuḥ sarvam yathā āha madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.032/3 vācayitvā svasty-ayanaṃ tad-dravyeṇa giri-dvijān
analyzed: vācayitvā svastyayanam tad dravyeṇa giri dvijān

original: BhP_10.24.033/1 upahṛtya balīn samyag ādṛtā yavasaṃ gavām
analyzed: upahṛtya balīn samyak ādṛtāḥ yavasam gavām

original: BhP_10.24.033/3 go-dhanāni puraskṛtya giriṃ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: go dhanāni puraskṛtya girim cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam

original: BhP_10.24.034/1 anāṃsy anaḍud-yuktāni te cāruhya sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: anāṃsi anaḍuh yuktāni te ca āruhya su alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.24.034/3 gopyaś ca kṛṣṇa-vīryāṇi gāyantyaḥ sa-dvijāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca kṛṣṇa vīryāṇi gāyantyaḥ sa dvija āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.035/1 kṛṣṇas tv anyatamaṃ rūpaṃ gopa-viśrambhaṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tu anyatamam rūpam gopa viśrambhaṇam gataḥ

original: BhP_10.24.035/3 śailo 'smīti bruvan bhūri balim ādad bṛhad-vapuḥ
analyzed: śailaḥ smi iti bruvan bhūri balim ādat bṛhat vapuḥ

original: BhP_10.24.036/1 tasmai namo vraja-janaiḥ saha cakra ātmanātmane
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ vraja janaiḥ saha cakre ātmanā ātmane

original: BhP_10.24.036/3 aho paśyata śailo 'sau rūpī no 'nugrahaṃ vyadhāt
analyzed: aho paśyata śailaḥ sau rūpī naḥ nugraham vyadhāt

original: BhP_10.24.037/1 eṣo 'vajānato martyān kāma-rūpī vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: eṣaḥ martyān kāmarūpī vanaukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.24.037/3 hanti hy asmai namasyāmaḥ śarmaṇe ātmano gavām
analyzed: hanti hi asmai namasyāmaḥ śarmaṇe ātmanaḥ gavām

original: BhP_10.24.038/1 ity adri-go-dvija-makhaṃ vāsudeva-pracoditāḥ
analyzed: iti adrigo dvija makham vāsudeva pracoditāḥ

original: BhP_10.24.038/3 yathā vidhāya te gopā saha-kṛṣṇā vrajaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: yathā vidhāya te gopā saha kṛṣṇāḥ vrajam yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.25.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.25.001/1 indras tadātmanaḥ pūjāṃ vijñāya vihatāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: indraḥ tadā ātmanaḥ pūjām vijñāya vihatām nṛpa

original: BhP_10.25.001/3 gopebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa-nāthebhyo nandādibhyaś cukopa ha
analyzed: gopebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa nāthebhyaḥ nanda ādibhyaḥ cukopa ha

original: BhP_10.25.002/1 gaṇaṃ sāṃvartakaṃ nāma meghānāṃ cānta-kārīṇām
analyzed: gaṇam sāṃvartakam nāma meghānām ca anta kārīṇām

original: BhP_10.25.002/3 indraḥ pracodayat kruddho vākyaṃ cāheśa-māny uta
analyzed: indraḥ pracodayat kruddhaḥ vākyam ca āha īśamāni uta

original: BhP_10.25.003/1 aho śrī-mada-māhātmyaṃ gopānāṃ kānanaukasām
analyzed: aho śrīmat amāhātmyam gopānām kānanaukasām

original: BhP_10.25.003/3 kṛṣṇaṃ martyam upāśritya ye cakrur deva-helanam
analyzed: kṛṣṇam martyam upāśritya ye cakruḥ deva helanam

original: BhP_10.25.004/1 yathādṛḍhaiḥ karma-mayaiḥ kratubhir nāma-nau-nibhaiḥ
analyzed: yathā dṛḍhaiḥ karma mayaiḥ kratubhiḥ nāma nau nibhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.25.004/3 vidyām ānvīkṣikīṃ hitvā titīrṣanti bhavārṇavam
analyzed: vidyām ānvīkṣikīm hitvā titīrṣanti bhava arṇavam

original: BhP_10.25.005/1 vācālaṃ bāliśaṃ stabdham ajñaṃ paṇḍita-māninam
analyzed: vācālam bāliśam stabdham ajñam paṇḍita māninam

original: BhP_10.25.005/3 kṛṣṇaṃ martyam upāśritya gopā me cakrur apriyam
analyzed: kṛṣṇam martyam upāśritya gopāḥ me cakruḥ apriyam

original: BhP_10.25.006/1 eṣāṃ śriyāvaliptānāṃ kṛṣṇenādhmāpitātmanām
analyzed: eṣām śriyā avaliptānām kṛṣṇena ādhmāpita ātmanām

original: BhP_10.25.006/3 dhunuta śrī-mada-stambhaṃ paśūn nayata saṅkṣayam
analyzed: dhunuta śrīmat astambham paśūn nayata saṅkṣayam

original: BhP_10.25.007/1 ahaṃ cairāvataṃ nāgam āruhyānuvraje vrajam
analyzed: aham ca airāvatam nāgam āruhya anuvraje vrajam

original: BhP_10.25.007/3 marud-gaṇair mahā-vegair nanda-goṣṭha-jighāṃsayā
analyzed: marut gaṇaiḥ mahā vegaiḥ nanda goṣṭha jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.25.008/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.25.008/1 itthaṃ maghavatājñaptā meghā nirmukta-bandhanāḥ
analyzed: ittham maghavatā ājñaptāḥ meghāḥ nirmukta bandhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.008/3 nanda-gokulam āsāraiḥ pīḍayām āsur ojasā
analyzed: nanda gokulam āsāraiḥ pīḍayām āsuḥ ojasā

original: BhP_10.25.009/1 vidyotamānā vidyudbhiḥ stanantaḥ stanayitnubhiḥ
analyzed: vidyotamānāḥ vidyudbhiḥ stanantaḥ stanayitnubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.25.009/3 tīvrair marud-gaṇair nunnā vavṛṣur jala-śarkarāḥ
analyzed: tīvraiḥ marut gaṇaiḥ nunnāḥ vavṛṣuḥ jala śarkarāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.010/1 sthūṇā-sthūlā varṣa-dhārā muñcatsv abhreṣv abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: sthūṇā sthūlāḥ varṣa dhārāḥ muñcatsu abhreṣu abhīkṣṇaśas

original: BhP_10.25.010/3 jalaughaiḥ plāvyamānā bhūr nādṛśyata natonnatam
analyzed: jala oghaiḥ plāvyamānā bhūḥ na adṛśyata nata unnatam

original: BhP_10.25.011/1 aty-āsārāti-vātena paśavo jāta-vepanāḥ
analyzed: ati āsāra ati vātena paśavaḥ jāta vepanāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.011/3 gopā gopyaś ca śītārtā govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: gopāḥ gopyaḥ ca śīta ārtāḥ govindam śaraṇam yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.25.012/1 śiraḥ sutāṃś ca kāyena pracchādyāsāra-pīḍitāḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ sutān ca kāyena pracchādya asāra pīḍitāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.012/3 vepamānā bhagavataḥ pāda-mūlam upāyayuḥ
