analyzed: vepamānāḥ bhagavataḥ pāda mūlam upāyayuḥ

original: BhP_10.25.013/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bhāga tvan-nāthaṃ gokulaṃ prabho
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābhāga tvad nātham gokulam prabho

original: BhP_10.25.013/3 trātum arhasi devān naḥ kupitād bhakta-vatsala
analyzed: trātum arhasi devān naḥ kupitāt bhakta vatsala

original: BhP_10.25.014/1 śilā-varṣāti-vātena hanyamānam acetanam
analyzed: śilā varṣa ati vātena hanyamānam acetanam

original: BhP_10.25.014/3 nirīkṣya bhagavān mene kupitendra-kṛtaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: nirīkṣya bhagavān mene kupita indra kṛtam hariḥ

original: BhP_10.25.015/1 apartv aty-ulbaṇaṃ varṣam ati-vātaṃ śilā-mayam
analyzed: apartu ati ulbaṇam varṣam ati vātam śilā mayam

original: BhP_10.25.015/3 sva-yāge vihate 'smābhir indro nāśāya varṣati
analyzed: sva yāge vihate smābhiḥ indraḥ nāśāya varṣati

original: BhP_10.25.016/1 tatra pratividhiṃ samyag ātma-yogena sādhaye
analyzed: tatra prati vidhim samyak ātma yogena sādhaye

original: BhP_10.25.016/3 lokeśa-mānināṃ mauḍhyād dhaniṣye śrī-madaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: lokeśa māninām mauḍhyāt dhaniṣye śrī madam tamaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.017/1 na hi sad-bhāva-yuktānāṃ surāṇām īśa-vismayaḥ
analyzed: na hi sadbhāva yuktānām surāṇām īśa vismayaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.017/3 matto 'satāṃ māna-bhaṅgaḥ praśamāyopakalpate
analyzed: mattaḥ satām māna bhaṅgaḥ praśamāya upakalpate

original: BhP_10.25.018/1 tasmān mac-charaṇaṃ goṣṭhaṃ man-nāthaṃ mat-parigraham
analyzed: tasmāt mad śaraṇam goṣṭham mad nātham mad parigraham

original: BhP_10.25.018/3 gopāye svātma-yogena so 'yaṃ me vrata āhitaḥ
analyzed: gopāye sva ātma yogena saḥ yam me vrate āhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.019/1 ity uktvaikena hastena kṛtvā govardhanācalam
analyzed: iti uktvā ekena hastena kṛtvā govardhana acalam

original: BhP_10.25.019/3 dadhāra līlayā viṣṇuś chatrākam iva bālakaḥ
analyzed: dadhāra līlayā viṣṇuḥ chatrākam iva bālakaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.020/1 athāha bhagavān gopān he 'mba tāta vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: athā āha bhagavān gopān he mba tāta vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.020/3 yathopajoṣaṃ viśata giri-gartaṃ sa-go-dhanāḥ
analyzed: yathopajoṣam viśata giri gartam sa go dhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.021/1 na trāsa iha vaḥ kāryo mad-dhastādri-nipātanāt
analyzed: na trāsaḥ iha vaḥ kāryaḥ mad hasta adri nipātanāt

original: BhP_10.25.021/3 vāta-varṣa-bhayenālaṃ tat-trāṇaṃ vihitaṃ hi vaḥ
analyzed: vāta varṣa bhayena alam tat trāṇam vihitam hi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.022/1 tathā nirviviśur gartaṃ kṛṣṇāśvāsita-mānasaḥ
analyzed: tathā nirviviśuḥ gartam kṛṣṇā āśvāsita mānasaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.022/3 yathāvakāśaṃ sa-dhanāḥ sa-vrajāḥ sopajīvinaḥ
analyzed: yathāvakāśam sa dhanāḥ sa vrajāḥ sa upajīvinaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.023/1 kṣut-tṛḍ-vyathāṃ sukhāpekṣāṃ hitvā tair vraja-vāsibhiḥ
analyzed: kṣudh tṛṣ vyathām sukha apekṣām hitvā taiḥ vraja vāsibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.25.023/3 vīkṣyamāṇo dadhārādriṃ saptāhaṃ nācalat padāt
analyzed: vīkṣyamāṇaḥ dadhāra adrim sapta aham na acalat padāt

original: BhP_10.25.024/1 kṛṣṇa-yogānubhāvaṃ taṃ niśamyendro 'ti-vismitaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa yoga anubhāvam tam niśamya indraḥ ti vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.024/3 nistambho bhraṣṭa-saṅkalpaḥ svān meghān sannyavārayat
analyzed: nistambhaḥ bhraṣṭa saṅkalpaḥ svān meghān san nyavārayat

original: BhP_10.25.025/1 khaṃ vyabhram uditādityaṃ vāta-varṣaṃ ca dāruṇam
analyzed: kham vyabhram udita ādityam vāta varṣam ca dāruṇam

original: BhP_10.25.025/3 niśamyoparataṃ gopān govardhana-dharo 'bravīt
analyzed: niśamya uparatam gopān govardhana dharaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_10.25.026/1 niryāta tyajata trāsaṃ gopāḥ sa-strī-dhanārbhakāḥ
analyzed: niryāta tyajata trāsam gopāḥ sa strīdhana arbhakāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.026/3 upārataṃ vāta-varṣaṃ vyuda-prāyāś ca nimnagāḥ
analyzed: upāratam vāta varṣam vyuda prāyāḥ ca nimnagāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.027/1 tatas te niryayur gopāḥ svaṃ svam ādāya go-dhanam
analyzed: tatas te niryayuḥ gopāḥ svam svam ādāya go dhanam

original: BhP_10.25.027/3 śakaṭoḍhopakaraṇaṃ strī-bāla-sthavirāḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: śakaṭa ūḍha upakaraṇam strī bāla sthavirāḥ śanais

original: BhP_10.25.028/1 bhagavān api taṃ śailaṃ sva-sthāne pūrva-vat prabhuḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api tam śailam sva sthāne pūrvavat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.25.028/3 paśyatāṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ sthāpayām āsa līlayā
analyzed: paśyatām sarva bhūtānām sthāpayām āsa līlayā

original: BhP_10.25.029/1 taṃ prema-vegān nirbhṛtā vrajaukaso
analyzed: tam prema vegāt nirbhṛtāḥ vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.029/2 yathā samīyuḥ parirambhaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: yathā samīyuḥ parirambhaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.25.029/3 gopyaś ca sa-sneham apūjayan mudā
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca sa sneham apūjayat mudā

original: BhP_10.25.029/4 dadhy-akṣatādbhir yuyujuḥ sad-āśiṣaḥ
analyzed: dadhi akṣata adbhiḥ yuyujuḥ sat āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.030/1 yaśodā rohiṇī nando rāmaś ca balināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: yaśodā rohiṇī nandaḥ rāmaḥ ca balinām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.25.030/3 kṛṣṇam āliṅgya yuyujur āśiṣaḥ sneha-kātarāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam āliṅgya yuyujuḥ āśiṣaḥ sneha kātarāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.031/1 divi deva-gaṇāḥ siddhāḥ sādhyā gandharva-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: divi deva gaṇāḥ siddhāḥ sādhyāḥ gandharva cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.031/3 tuṣṭuvur mumucus tuṣṭāḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi pārthiva
analyzed: tuṣṭuvuḥ mumucuḥ tuṣṭāḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi pārthiva

original: BhP_10.25.032/1 śaṅkha-dundubhayo nedur divi deva-pracoditāḥ
analyzed: śaṅkha dundubhayaḥ neduḥ divi deva pracoditāḥ

original: BhP_10.25.032/3 jagur gandharva-patayas tumburu-pramukhā nṛpa
analyzed: jaguḥ gandharva patayaḥ tumburu pramukhāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.25.033/1 tato 'nuraktaiḥ paśupaiḥ pariśrito rājan sva-goṣṭhaṃ sa-balo 'vrajad dhariḥ
analyzed: tatas nuraktaiḥ paśupaiḥ pariśritaḥ rājan sva goṣṭham sa balaḥ vrajat hariḥ

original: BhP_10.25.033/3 tathā-vidhāny asya kṛtāni gopikā gāyantya īyur muditā hṛdi-spṛśaḥ
analyzed: tathāvidhāni asya kṛtāni gopikāḥ gāyantyaḥ īyuḥ muditāḥ hṛdispṛśaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.26.001/1 evaṃ-vidhāni karmāṇi gopāḥ kṛṣṇasya vīkṣya te
analyzed: evaṃvidhāni karmāṇi gopāḥ kṛṣṇasya vīkṣya te

original: BhP_10.26.001/3 atad-vīrya-vidaḥ procuḥ samabhyetya su-vismitāḥ
analyzed: a tad vīrya vidaḥ procuḥ samabhyetya su vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.002/1 bālakasya yad etāni karmāṇy aty-adbhutāni vai
analyzed: bālakasya yat etāni karmāṇi ati adbhutāni vai

original: BhP_10.26.002/3 katham arhaty asau janma grāmyeṣv ātma-jugupsitam
analyzed: katham arhati asau janma grāmyeṣu ātma jugupsitam

original: BhP_10.26.003/1 yaḥ sapta-hāyano bālaḥ kareṇaikena līlayā
analyzed: yaḥ sapta hāyanaḥ bālaḥ kareṇa ekena līlayā

original: BhP_10.26.003/3 kathaṃ bibhrad giri-varaṃ puṣkaraṃ gaja-rāḍ iva
analyzed: katham bibhrat giri varam puṣkaram gaja rāj iva

original: BhP_10.26.004/1 tokenāmīlitākṣeṇa pūtanāyā mahaujasaḥ
analyzed: tokena āmīlita akṣeṇa pūtanāyāḥ mahā ojasaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.004/3 pītaḥ stanaḥ saha prāṇaiḥ kāleneva vayas tanoḥ
analyzed: pītaḥ stanaḥ saha prāṇaiḥ kālena iva vayaḥ tanoḥ

original: BhP_10.26.005/1 hinvato 'dhaḥ śayānasya māsyasya caraṇāv udak
analyzed: hinvataḥ dhar śayānasya māsyasya caraṇau udak

original: BhP_10.26.005/3 ano 'patad viparyastaṃ rudataḥ prapadāhatam
analyzed: ano patat viparyastam rudataḥ prapada āhatam

original: BhP_10.26.006/1 eka-hāyana āsīno hriyamāṇo vihāyasā
analyzed: eka hāyanaḥ āsīnaḥ hriyamāṇaḥ vihāyasā

original: BhP_10.26.006/3 daityena yas tṛṇāvartam ahan kaṇṭha-grahāturam
analyzed: daityena yaḥ tṛṇāvartam ahan kaṇṭhagraha āturam

original: BhP_10.26.007/1 kvacid dhaiyaṅgava-stainye mātrā baddha udūkhale
analyzed: kvacid haiyaṅgava stainye mātrā baddhe udūkhale

original: BhP_10.26.007/3 gacchann arjunayor madhye bāhubhyāṃ tāv apātayat
analyzed: gacchan arjunayoḥ madhye bāhubhyām tau apātayat

original: BhP_10.26.008/1 vane sañcārayan vatsān sa-rāmo bālakair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: vane sañcārayan vatsān sarāmaḥ bālakaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.008/3 hantu-kāmaṃ bakaṃ dorbhyāṃ mukhato 'rim apāṭayat
analyzed: hantu kāmam bakam dorbhyām mukhataḥ rim apāṭayat

original: BhP_10.26.009/1 vatseṣu vatsa-rūpeṇa praviśantaṃ jighāṃsayā
analyzed: vatseṣu vatsa rūpeṇa praviśantam jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.26.009/3 hatvā nyapātayat tena kapitthāni ca līlayā
analyzed: hatvā nyapātayat tena kapitthāni ca līlayā

original: BhP_10.26.010/1 hatvā rāsabha-daiteyaṃ tad-bandhūṃś ca balānvitaḥ
analyzed: hatvā rāsabha daiteyam tad bandhūn ca bala anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.010/3 cakre tāla-vanaṃ kṣemaṃ paripakva-phalānvitam
analyzed: cakre tāla vanam kṣemam paripakva phala anvitam

original: BhP_10.26.011/1 pralambaṃ ghātayitvograṃ balena bala-śālinā
analyzed: pralambam ghātayitvā ugram balena bala śālinā

original: BhP_10.26.011/3 amocayad vraja-paśūn gopāṃś cāraṇya-vahnitaḥ
analyzed: amocayat vraja paśūn gopān ca araṇya vahnitaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.012/1 āśī-viṣatamāhīndraṃ damitvā vimadaṃ hradāt
analyzed: āśīviṣa tamāhi indram damitvā vimadam hradāt

original: BhP_10.26.012/3 prasahyodvāsya yamunāṃ cakre 'sau nirviṣodakām
analyzed: prasahya udvāsya yamunām cakre nirviṣodakām

original: BhP_10.26.013/1 dustyajaś cānurāgo 'smin sarveṣāṃ no vrajaukasām
analyzed: dustyajaḥ ca anurāgaḥ smin sarveṣām naḥ vrajaukasām

original: BhP_10.26.013/3 nanda te tanaye 'smāsu tasyāpy autpattikaḥ katham
analyzed: nanda te tanaye smāsu tasya api autpattikaḥ katham

original: BhP_10.26.014/1 kva sapta-hāyano bālaḥ kva mahādri-vidhāraṇam
analyzed: kva sapta hāyanaḥ bālaḥ kva mahā adri vidhāraṇam

original: BhP_10.26.014/3 tato no jāyate śaṅkā vraja-nātha tavātmaje
analyzed: tatas naḥ jāyate śaṅkā vrajanātha tava ātmaje

original: BhP_10.26.015/0 śrī-nanda uvāca
analyzed: śrī nandaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.26.015/1 śrūyatāṃ me vaco gopā vyetu śaṅkā ca vo 'rbhake
analyzed: śrūyatām me vacaḥ gopāḥ vyetu śaṅkā ca vaḥ rbhake

original: BhP_10.26.015/3 enam kumāram uddiśya gargo me yad uvāca ha
analyzed: enam kumāram uddiśya gargaḥ me yat uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.26.016/1 varṇās trayaḥ kilāsyāsan gṛhṇato 'nu-yugaṃ tanūḥ
analyzed: varṇāḥ trayaḥ kila asya āsan gṛhṇataḥ nu yugam tanūḥ

original: BhP_10.26.016/3 śuklo raktas tathā pīta idānīṃ kṛṣṇatāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: śuklaḥ raktaḥ tathā pītaḥ idānīm kṛṣṇa tām gataḥ

original: BhP_10.26.017/1 prāgayaṃ vasudevasya kvacij jātas tavātmajaḥ
analyzed: prāk ayam vasudevasya kvacid jātaḥ tava ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.017/3 vāsudeva iti śrīmān abhijñāḥ sampracakṣate
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ iti śrīmān abhijñāḥ sampracakṣate

original: BhP_10.26.018/1 bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te
analyzed: bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te

original: BhP_10.26.018/3 guṇa -karmānurūpāṇi tāny ahaṃ veda no janāḥ
analyzed: guṇa karma anurūpāṇi tāni aham veda naḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.019/1 eṣa vaḥ śreya ādhāsyad gopa-gokula-nandanaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ śreyaḥ ādhāsyat gopa gokula nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.019/3 anena sarva-durgāṇi yūyam añjas tariṣyatha
analyzed: anena sarva durgāṇi yūyam añjas tariṣyatha

original: BhP_10.26.020/1 purānena vraja-pate sādhavo dasyu-pīḍitāḥ
analyzed: purā anena vraja pate sādhavaḥ dasyu pīḍitāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.020/3 arājake rakṣyamāṇā jigyur dasyūn samedhitāḥ
analyzed: arājake rakṣyamāṇāḥ jigyuḥ dasyūn samedhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.021/1 ya etasmin mahā-bhāge prītiṃ kurvanti mānavāḥ
analyzed: ye etasmin mahābhāge prītim kurvanti mānavāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.021/3 nārayo 'bhibhavanty etān viṣṇu-pakṣān ivāsurāḥ
analyzed: na arayaḥ bhibhavanti etān viṣṇu pakṣān iva asurāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.022/1 tasmān nanda kumāro 'yaṃ nārāyaṇa-samo guṇaiḥ
analyzed: tasmāt nanda kumāraḥ yam nārāyaṇa samaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.26.022/3 śriyā kīrtyānubhāvena tat-karmasu na vismayaḥ
analyzed: śriyā kīrtyā anubhāvena tad karmasu na vismayaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.023/1 ity addhā māṃ samādiśya garge ca sva-gṛhaṃ gate
analyzed: iti addhā mām samādiśya garge ca sva gṛham gate

original: BhP_10.26.023/3 manye nārāyaṇasyāṃśaṃ kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa-kāriṇam
analyzed: manye nārāyaṇasya aṃśam kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa kāriṇam

original: BhP_10.26.024/1 iti nanda-vacaḥ śrutvā garga-gītaṃ taṃ vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: iti nanda vacaḥ śrutvā garga gītam tam vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.26.024/3 muditā nandam ānarcuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca gata-vismayāḥ
analyzed: muditāḥ nandam ānarcuḥ kṛṣṇam ca gata vismayāḥ

original: BhP_10.26.025/1 deve varṣati yajña-viplava-ruṣā vajrāsma-varṣānilaiḥ
analyzed: deve varṣati yajña viplava ruṣā vajra asma varṣa anilaiḥ

original: BhP_10.26.025/2 sīdat-pāla-paśu-striy ātma-śaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvānukampy utsmayan
analyzed: sīdat pāla paśu striy ātma śaraṇam dṛṣṭvā anukampī utsmayan

original: BhP_10.26.025/3 utpāṭyaika-kareṇa śailam abalo līlocchilīndhraṃ yathā
analyzed: utpāṭya eka kareṇa śailam abalaḥ līlā ucchilīndhram yathā

original: BhP_10.26.025/4 bibhrad goṣṭham apān mahendra-mada-bhit prīyān na indro gavām
analyzed: bibhrat goṣṭham apāt mahā indra mada bhid prīyāt naḥ indraḥ gavām

original: BhP_10.27.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.27.001/1 govardhane dhṛte śaile āsārād rakṣite vraje
analyzed: govardhane dhṛte śaile āsārāt rakṣite vraje

original: BhP_10.27.001/3 go-lokād āvrajat kṛṣṇaṃ surabhiḥ śakra eva ca
analyzed: go lokāt āvrajat kṛṣṇam surabhiḥ śakraḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.27.002/1 vivikta upasaṅgamya vrīḍītaḥ kṛta-helanaḥ
analyzed: vivikte upasaṅgamya kṛta helanaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.002/3 pasparśa pādayor enaṃ kirīṭenārka-varcasā
analyzed: pasparśa pādayoḥ enam kirīṭena arka varcasā

original: BhP_10.27.003/1 dṛṣṭa-śrutānubhāvo 'sya kṛṣṇasyāmita-tejasaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭa śruta anubhāvaḥ sya kṛṣṇasya amita tejasaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.003/3 naṣṭa-tri-lokeśa-mada idam āha kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: naṣṭa triloka īśa madaḥ idam āha kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_10.27.004/0 indra uvāca
analyzed: indraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.27.004/1 viśuddha-sattvaṃ tava dhāma śāntaṃ tapo-mayaṃ dhvasta-rajas-tamaskam
analyzed: viśuddha sattvam tava dhāma śāntam tapaḥ mayam dhvasta rajaḥ tamaskam

original: BhP_10.27.004/3 māyā-mayo 'yaṃ guṇa-sampravāho na vidyate te grahaṇānubandhaḥ
analyzed: māyā mayaḥ yam guṇa sampravāhaḥ na vidyate te grahaṇa anubandhaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.005/1 kuto nu tad-dhetava īśa tat-kṛtā lobhādayo ye 'budha-linga-bhāvāḥ
analyzed: kutas nu tad hetavaḥ īśa tad kṛtāḥ lobha ādayaḥ ye budha linga bhāvāḥ

original: BhP_10.27.005/3 tathāpi daṇḍaṃ bhagavān bibharti dharmasya guptyai khala-nigrahāya
analyzed: tathā api daṇḍam bhagavān bibharti dharmasya guptyai khala nigrahāya

original: BhP_10.27.006/1 pitā gurus tvaṃ jagatām adhīśo duratyayaḥ kāla upātta-daṇḍaḥ
analyzed: pitā guruḥ tvam jagatām adhīśaḥ duratyayaḥ kālaḥ upātta daṇḍaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.006/3 hitāya cecchā-tanubhiḥ samīhase mānaṃ vidhunvan jagad-īśa-māninām
analyzed: hitāya ca icchā tanubhiḥ samīhase mānam vidhunvan jagadīśa māninām

original: BhP_10.27.007/1 ye mad-vidhājñā jagad-īśa-māninas tvāṃ vīkṣya kāle 'bhayam āśu tan-madam
analyzed: ye madvidha ājñāḥ jagadīśa māninaḥ tvām vīkṣya kāle bhayam āśu tad madam

original: BhP_10.27.007/3 hitvārya-mārgaṃ prabhajanty apasmayā īhā khalānām api te 'nuśāsanam
analyzed: hitvā ārya mārgam prabhajanti apasmayāḥ īhā khalānām api te nu śāsanam

original: BhP_10.27.008/1 sa tvaṃ mamaiśvarya-mada-plutasya kṛtāgasas te 'viduṣaḥ prabhāvam
analyzed: sa tvam mama aiśvarya mada plutasya kṛta āgasaḥ te viduṣaḥ prabhāvam

original: BhP_10.27.008/3 kṣantuṃ prabho 'thārhasi mūḍha-cetaso maivaṃ punar bhūn matir īśa me 'satī
analyzed: kṣantum prabho thā arhasi mūḍha cetasaḥ mā evam punar bhūt matiḥ īśa me satī

original: BhP_10.27.009/1 tavāvatāro 'yam adhokṣajeha bhuvo bharāṇām uru-bhāra-janmanām
analyzed: tava avatāraḥ yam adhokṣaja iha bhuvaḥ bharāṇām uru bhāra janmanām

original: BhP_10.27.009/3 camū-patīnām abhavāya deva bhavāya yuṣmac-caraṇānuvartinām
analyzed: camū patīnām abhavāya deva bhavāya yuṣmad caraṇa anuvartinām

original: BhP_10.27.010/1 namas tubhyaṃ bhagavate puruṣāya mahātmane
analyzed: namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate puruṣāya mahātmane

original: BhP_10.27.010/3 vāsudevāya kṛṣṇāya sātvatāṃ pataye namaḥ
analyzed: vāsudevāya kṛṣṇāya sātvatām pataye namaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.011/1 svacchandopātta-dehāya viśuddha-jñāna-mūrtaye
analyzed: svacchanda upātta dehāya viśuddha jñāna mūrtaye

original: BhP_10.27.011/3 sarvasmai sarva-bījāya sarva-bhūtātmane namaḥ
analyzed: sarvasmai sarva bījāya sarva bhūta ātmane namaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.012/1 mayedaṃ bhagavan goṣṭha- nāśāyāsāra-vāyubhiḥ
analyzed: mayā idam bhagavan goṣṭha nāśāya asāra vāyubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.27.012/3 ceṣṭitaṃ vihate yajñe māninā tīvra-manyunā
analyzed: ceṣṭitam vihate yajñe māninā tīvra manyunā

original: BhP_10.27.013/1 tvayeśānugṛhīto 'smi dhvasta-stambho vṛthodyamaḥ
analyzed: tvayā īśa anugṛhītaḥ smi dhvasta stambhaḥ vṛthak udyamaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.013/3 īśvaraṃ gurum ātmānaṃ tvām ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: īśvaram gurum ātmānam tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ

original: BhP_10.27.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.27.014/1 evaṃ saṅkīrtitaḥ kṛṣṇo maghonā bhagavān amum
analyzed: evam saṅkīrtitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ maghonā bhagavān amum

original: BhP_10.27.014/3 megha-gambhīrayā vācā prahasann idam abravīt
analyzed: megha gambhīrayā vācā prahasan idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.27.015/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.27.015/1 mayā te 'kāri maghavan makha-bhaṅgo 'nugṛhṇatā
analyzed: mayā te kāri maghavan makha bhaṅgaḥ nugṛhṇatā

original: BhP_10.27.015/3 mad-anusmṛtaye nityaṃ mattasyendra-śriyā bhṛśam
analyzed: mad anusmṛtaye nityam mattasya indra śriyā bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.27.016/1 mām aiśvarya-śrī-madāndho daṇḍa pāṇiṃ na paśyati
analyzed: mām aiśvarya śrī mada andhaḥ daṇḍa pāṇim na paśyati

original: BhP_10.27.016/3 taṃ bhraṃśayāmi sampadbhyo yasya cecchāmy anugraham
analyzed: tam bhraṃśayāmi sampadbhyaḥ yasya ca icchāmi anugraham

original: BhP_10.27.017/1 gamyatāṃ śakra bhadraṃ vaḥ kriyatāṃ me 'nuśāsanam
analyzed: gamyatām śakra bhadram vaḥ kriyatām me nuśāsanam

original: BhP_10.27.017/3 sthīyatāṃ svādhikāreṣu yuktair vaḥ stambha-varjitaiḥ
analyzed: sthīyatām sva adhikāreṣu yuktaiḥ vaḥ stambha varjitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.27.018/1 athāha surabhiḥ kṛṣṇam abhivandya manasvinī
analyzed: atha āha surabhiḥ kṛṣṇam abhivandya manasvinī

original: BhP_10.27.018/3 sva-santānair upāmantrya gopa-rūpiṇam īśvaram
analyzed: sva santānaiḥ upāmantrya gopa rūpiṇam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.27.019/0 surabhir uvāca
analyzed: surabhiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.27.019/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin viśvātman viśva-sambhava
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahāyogin viśvātman viśva sambhava

original: BhP_10.27.019/3 bhavatā loka-nāthena sa-nāthā vayam acyuta
analyzed: bhavatā loka nāthena sa nāthāḥ vayam acyuta

original: BhP_10.27.020/1 tvaṃ naḥ paramakaṃ daivaṃ tvaṃ na indro jagat-pate
analyzed: tvam naḥ paramakam daivam tvam naḥ indraḥ jagatpate

original: BhP_10.27.020/3 bhavāya bhava go-vipra devānāṃ ye ca sādhavaḥ
analyzed: bhavāya bhava go vipra devānām ye ca sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.021/1 indraṃ nas tvābhiṣekṣyāmo brahmaṇā coditā vayam
analyzed: indram naḥ tvā abhiṣekṣyāmaḥ brahmaṇā coditāḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.27.021/3 avatīrṇo 'si viśvātman bhūmer bhārāpanuttaye
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ si viśvātman bhūmeḥ bhāra apanuttaye

original: BhP_10.27.022/0 śṛī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śṛīśukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.27.022/1 evaṃ kṛṣṇam upāmantrya surabhiḥ payasātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇam upāmantrya surabhiḥ payasā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.27.022/3 jalair ākāśa-gaṅgāyā airāvata-karoddhṛtaiḥ
analyzed: jalaiḥ ākāśagaṅgāyāḥ airāvata kara uddhṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_10.27.023/1 indraḥ surarṣibhiḥ sākaṃ codito deva-mātṛbhiḥ
analyzed: indraḥ sura ṛṣibhiḥ sākam coditaḥ deva mātṛbhiḥ

original: BhP_10.27.023/3 abhyasiñcata dāśārhaṃ govinda iti cābhyadhāt
analyzed: abhyasiñcata dāśārham govindaḥ iti ca abhyadhāt

original: BhP_10.27.024/1 tatrāgatās tumburu-nāradādayo gandharva-vidyādhara-siddha-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: tatra āgatāḥ tumburu nārada ādayaḥ gandharva vidyādhara siddha cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.27.024/3 jagur yaśo loka-malāpahaṃ hareḥ surāṅganāḥ sannanṛtur mudānvitāḥ
analyzed: jaguḥ yaśaḥ loka mala apaham hareḥ sura aṅganāḥ san nanṛtuḥ mudā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_10.27.025/1 taṃ tuṣṭuvur deva-nikāya-ketavo hy avākiraṃś cādbhuta-puṣpa-vṛṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: tam tuṣṭuvuḥ deva nikāya ketavaḥ hi avākiran ca adbhuta puṣpa vṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.27.025/3 lokāḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim āpnuvaṃs trayo gāvas tadā gām anayan payo-drutām
analyzed: lokāḥ parām nirvṛtim āpnuvan trayaḥ gāvaḥ tadā gām anayan payaḥ drutām

original: BhP_10.27.026/1 nānā-rasaughāḥ sarito vṛkṣā āsan madhu-sravāḥ
analyzed: nānā rasa oghāḥ saritaḥ vṛkṣāḥ āsan madhu sravāḥ

original: BhP_10.27.026/3 akṛṣṭa-pacyauṣadhayo girayo 'bibhran un maṇīn
analyzed: a kṛṣṭapacyā oṣadhayaḥ girayaḥ bibhran ud maṇīn

original: BhP_10.27.027/1 kṛṣṇe 'bhiṣikta etāni sarvāṇi kuru-nandana
analyzed: kṛṣṇe bhiṣikte etāni sarvāṇi kuru nandana

original: BhP_10.27.027/3 nirvairāṇy abhavaṃs tāta krūrāṇy api nisargataḥ
analyzed: nirvairāṇi abhavan tāta krūrāṇi api nisargataḥ

original: BhP_10.27.028/1 iti go-gokula-patiṃ govindam abhiṣicya saḥ
analyzed: iti go go kula patim govindam abhiṣicya saḥ

original: BhP_10.27.028/3 anujñāto yayau śakro vṛto devādibhir divam
analyzed: anujñātaḥ yayau śakraḥ vṛtaḥ deva ādibhiḥ divam

original: BhP_10.28.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.28.001/1 ekādaśyāṃ nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam
analyzed: ekādaśyām nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam

original: BhP_10.28.001/3 snātuṃ nandas tu kālindyāṃ dvādaśyāṃ jalam āviśat
analyzed: snātum nandaḥ tu kālindyām dvādaśyām jalam āviśat

original: BhP_10.28.002/1 taṃ gṛhītvānayad bhṛtyo varuṇasyāsuro 'ntikam
analyzed: tam gṛhītvā anayat bhṛtyaḥ varuṇasya asuraḥ ntikam

original: BhP_10.28.002/3 avajñāyāsurīṃ velāṃ praviṣṭam udakaṃ niśi
analyzed: avajñāya āsurīm velām praviṣṭam udakam niśi

original: BhP_10.28.003/1 cukruśus tam apaśyantaḥ kṛṣṇa rāmeti gopakāḥ
analyzed: cukruśuḥ tam a paśyantaḥ kṛṣṇa rāma iti gopakāḥ

original: BhP_10.28.003/3 bhagavāṃs tad upaśrutya pitaraṃ varuṇāhṛtam
analyzed: bhagavān tat upaśrutya pitaram varuṇa āhṛtam

original: BhP_10.28.003/5 tad-antikaṃ gato rājan svānām abhaya-do vibhuḥ
analyzed: tad antikam gataḥ rājan svānām abhaya daḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.28.004/1 prāptaṃ vīkṣya hṛṣīkeśaṃ loka-pālaḥ saparyayā
analyzed: prāptam vīkṣya hṛṣīkeśam lokapālaḥ saparyayā

original: BhP_10.28.004/3 mahatyā pūjayitvāha tad-darśana-mahotsavaḥ
analyzed: mahatyā pūjayitvā āha tad darśana mahā utsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.28.005/0 śrī-varuṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī varuṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.28.005/1 adya me nibhṛto deho 'dyaivārtho 'dhigataḥ prabho
analyzed: adya me nibhṛtaḥ dehaḥ dyā eva arthaḥ dhigataḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.28.005/3 tvat-pāda-bhājo bhagavann avāpuḥ pāram adhvanaḥ
analyzed: tvad pāda bhājaḥ bhagavan avāpuḥ pāram adhvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.28.006/1 namas tubhyaṃ bhagavate brahmaṇe paramātmane
analyzed: namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate brahmaṇe paramātmane

original: BhP_10.28.006/3 na yatra śrūyate māyā loka-sṛṣṭi-vikalpanā
analyzed: na yatra śrūyate māyā loka sṛṣṭi vikalpanā

original: BhP_10.28.007/1 ajānatā māmakena mūḍhenākārya-vedinā
analyzed: a jānatā māmakena mūḍhena akārya vedinā

original: BhP_10.28.007/3 ānīto 'yaṃ tava pitā tad bhavān kṣantum arhati
analyzed: ānītaḥ yam tava pitā tat bhavān kṣantum arhati

original: BhP_10.28.008/1 mamāpy anugrahaṃ kṛṣṇa kartum arhasy aśeṣa-dṛk
analyzed: mama api anugraham kṛṣṇa kartum arhasi aśeṣa dṛś

original: BhP_10.28.008/3 govinda nīyatām eṣa pitā te pitṛ-vatsala
analyzed: govinda nīyatām eṣa pitā te pitṛ vatsala

original: BhP_10.28.009/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.28.009/1 evaṃ prasāditaḥ kṛṣṇo bhagavān īśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam prasāditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.28.009/3 ādāyāgāt sva-pitaraṃ bandhūnāṃ cāvahan mudam
analyzed: ādāya āgāt sva pitaram bandhūnām ca avahat mudam

original: BhP_10.28.010/1 nandas tv atīndriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā loka-pāla-mahodayam
analyzed: nandaḥ tu atīndriyam dṛṣṭvā lokapāla mahodayam

original: BhP_10.28.010/3 kṛṣṇe ca sannatiṃ teṣāṃ jñātibhyo vismito 'bravīt
analyzed: kṛṣṇe ca sannatim teṣām jñātibhyaḥ vismitaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_10.28.011/1 te cautsukya-dhiyo rājan matvā gopās tam īśvaram
analyzed: te ca autsukya dhiyaḥ rājan matvā gopāḥ tam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.28.011/3 api naḥ sva-gatiṃ sūkṣmām upādhāsyad adhīśvaraḥ
analyzed: api naḥ sva gatim sūkṣmām upādhāsyat adhīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.28.012/1 iti svānāṃ sa bhagavān vijñāyākhila-dṛk svayam
analyzed: iti svānām sa bhagavān vijñāya akhila dṛś svayam

original: BhP_10.28.012/3 saṅkalpa-siddhaye teṣāṃ kṛpayaitad acintayat
analyzed: saṅkalpa siddhaye teṣām kṛpayā etat acintayat

original: BhP_10.28.013/1 jano vai loka etasminn avidyā-kāma-karmabhiḥ
analyzed: janaḥ vai loke etasmin avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.28.013/3 uccāvacāsu gatiṣu na veda svāṃ gatiṃ bhraman
analyzed: uccāvacāsu gatiṣu na veda svām gatim bhraman

original: BhP_10.28.014/1 iti sañcintya bhagavān mahā-kāruṇiko hariḥ
analyzed: iti sañcintya bhagavān mahā kāruṇikaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.28.014/3 darśayām āsa lokaṃ svaṃ gopānāṃ tamasaḥ param
analyzed: darśayām āsa lokam svam gopānām tamasaḥ param

original: BhP_10.28.015/1 satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ yad brahma-jyotiḥ sanātanam
analyzed: satyam jñānam anantam yat brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam

original: BhP_10.28.015/3 yad dhi paśyanti munayo guṇāpāye samāhitāḥ
analyzed: yat hi paśyanti munayaḥ guṇa apāye samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.28.016/1 te tu brahma-hradam nītā magnāḥ kṛṣṇena coddhṛtāḥ
analyzed: te tu brahmahradam nītāḥ magnāḥ kṛṣṇena ca uddhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.28.016/3 dadṛśur brahmaṇo lokaṃ yatrākrūro 'dhyagāt purā
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ brahmaṇaḥ lokam yatra akrūraḥ dhyagāt purā

original: BhP_10.28.017/1 nandādayas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramānanda-nivṛtāḥ
analyzed: nanda ādayaḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā parama ānanda nivṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.28.017/3 kṛṣṇaṃ ca tatra cchandobhiḥ stūyamānaṃ su-vismitāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānam su vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.29.001/1 bhagavān api tā rātṛīḥ śāradotphulla-mallikāḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api tāḥ rātṛīḥ śārada utphulla mallikāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.001/3 vīkṣya rantuṃ manaś cakre yoga-māyām upāśritaḥ
analyzed: vīkṣya rantum manaḥ cakre yoga māyām upāśritaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.002/1 tadoḍurājaḥ kakubhaḥ karair mukhaṃ prācyā vilimpann aruṇena śantamaiḥ
analyzed: tadā uḍurājaḥ kakubhaḥ karaiḥ mukham prācyā vilimpan aruṇena śantamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.29.002/3 sa carṣaṇīnām udagāc chuco mṛjan priyaḥ priyāyā iva dīrgha-darśanaḥ
analyzed: sa carṣaṇīnām udagāt śucaḥ mṛjan priyaḥ priyāyāḥ iva dīrgha darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.003/1 dṛṣṭvā kumudvantam akhaṇḍa-maṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kumudvantam akhaṇḍa maṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.29.003/2 ramānanābhaṃ nava-kuṅkumāruṇam
BhP_10.29.003/3 vanaṃ ca tat-komala-gobhī rañjitaṃ
analyzed: vanam ca tat komala gobhiḥ rañjitam

original: BhP_10.29.003/4 jagau kalaṃ vāma-dṛśāṃ manoharam
analyzed: jagau kalam vāma dṛśām manoharam

original: BhP_10.29.004/1 niśamya gītāṃ tad anaṅga-vardhanaṃ vraja-striyaḥ kṛṣṇa-gṛhīta-mānasāḥ
analyzed: niśamya gītām tat anaṅga vardhanam vraja striyaḥ kṛṣṇa gṛhīta mānasāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.004/3 ājagmur anyonyam alakṣitodyamāḥ sa yatra kānto java-lola-kuṇḍalāḥ
analyzed: ājagmuḥ anyonyam alakṣita udyamāḥ sa yatra kāntaḥ java lola kuṇḍalāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.005/1 duhantyo 'bhiyayuḥ kāścid dohaṃ hitvā samutsukāḥ
analyzed: duhantyaḥ bhiyayuḥ kāścid doham hitvā samutsukāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.005/3 payo 'dhiśritya saṃyāvam anudvāsyāparā yayuḥ
analyzed: payaḥ dhiśritya saṃyāvam an udvāsya aparāḥ yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.29.006/1 pariveṣayantyas tad dhitvā pāyayantyaḥ śiśūn payaḥ
analyzed: pariveṣayantyaḥ tat hitvā pāyayantyaḥ śiśūn payaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.006/3 śuśrūṣantyaḥ patīn kāścid aśnantyo 'pāsya bhojanam
analyzed: śuśrūṣantyaḥ patīn kāścid aśnantyaḥ u pā asya bhojanam

original: BhP_10.29.007/1 limpantyaḥ pramṛjantyo 'nyā añjantyaḥ kāśca locane
analyzed: limpantyaḥ pramṛjantyaḥ nyāḥ añjantyaḥ kāḥ ca locane

original: BhP_10.29.007/3 vyatyasta-vastrābharaṇāḥ kāścit kṛṣṇāntikaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: vyatyasta vastra ābharaṇāḥ kāścid kṛṣṇa antikam yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.29.008/1 tā vāryamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ pitṛbhir bhrātṛ-bandhubhiḥ
analyzed: tāḥ vāryamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ bhrātṛ bandhubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.29.008/3 govindāpahṛtātmāno na nyavartanta mohitāḥ
analyzed: govinda apahṛta ātmānaḥ na nyavartanta mohitāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.009/1 antar-gṛha-gatāḥ kāścid gopyo 'labdha-vinirgamāḥ
analyzed: antargṛha gatāḥ kāścid gopyaḥ labdha vinirgamāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.009/3 kṛṣṇaṃ tad-bhāvanā-yuktā dadhyur mīlita-locanāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam tad bhāvanā yuktāḥ dadhyuḥ mīlita locanāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.010/1 duḥsaha-preṣṭha-viraha- tīvra-tāpa-dhutāśubhāḥ
BhP_10.29.010/3 dhyāna-prāptācyutāśleṣa- nirvṛtyā kṣīṇa-maṅgalāḥ
BhP_10.29.011/1 tam eva paramātmānaṃ jāra-buddhyāpi saṅgatāḥ
analyzed: tam eva paramātmānam jāra buddhyā api saṅga tāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.011/3 jahur guṇa-mayaṃ dehaṃ sadyaḥ prakṣīṇa-bandhanāḥ
analyzed: jahuḥ guṇa mayam deham sadyas prakṣīṇa bandhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.012/0 śrī-parīkṣid uvāca
analyzed: śrī parīkṣit uvāca

original: BhP_10.29.012/1 kṛṣṇaṃ viduḥ paraṃ kāntaṃ na tu brahmatayā mune
analyzed: kṛṣṇam viduḥ param kāntam na tu brahma tayā mune

original: BhP_10.29.012/3 guṇa-pravāhoparamas tāsāṃ guṇa-dhiyāṃ katham
analyzed: guṇa pravāha uparamaḥ tāsām guṇa dhiyām katham

original: BhP_10.29.013/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.29.013/1 uktaṃ purastād etat te caidyaḥ siddhiṃ yathā gataḥ
analyzed: uktam purastāt etat te caidyaḥ siddhim yathā gataḥ

original: BhP_10.29.013/3 dviṣann api hṛṣīkeśaṃ kim utādhokṣaja-priyāḥ
analyzed: dviṣan api hṛṣīkeśam kim uta adhokṣaja priyāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.014/1 nṛṇāṃ niḥśreyasārthāya vyaktir bhagavato nṛpa
analyzed: nṛṇām niḥśreyasa arthāya vyaktiḥ bhagavataḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.29.014/3 avyayasyāprameyasya nirguṇasya guṇātmanaḥ
analyzed: avyayasya aprameyasya nirguṇasya guṇa ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.015/1 kāmaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ sneham aikyaṃ sauhṛdam eva ca
analyzed: kāmam krodham bhayam sneham aikyam sauhṛdam eva ca

original: BhP_10.29.015/3 nityaṃ harau vidadhato yānti tan-mayatāṃ hi te
analyzed: nityam harau vidadhataḥ yānti tad maya tām hi te

original: BhP_10.29.016/1 na caivaṃ vismayaḥ kāryo bhavatā bhagavaty aje
analyzed: na ca evam vismayaḥ kāryaḥ bhavatā bhagavati aje

original: BhP_10.29.016/3 yogeśvareśvare kṛṣṇe yata etad vimucyate
analyzed: yoga īśvara īśvare kṛṣṇe yatas etat vimucyate

original: BhP_10.29.017/1 tā dṛṣṭvāntikam āyātā bhagavān vraja-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ dṛṣṭvā antikam āyātāḥ bhagavān vraja yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.017/3 avadad vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vācaḥ peśair vimohayan
analyzed: avadat vadatām śreṣṭhaḥ vācaḥ peśaiḥ vimohayan

original: BhP_10.29.018/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.29.018/1 svāgataṃ vo mahā-bhāgāḥ priyaṃ kiṃ karavāṇi vaḥ
analyzed: svāgatam vaḥ mahābhāgāḥ priyam kim karavāṇi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.018/3 vrajasyānāmayaṃ kaccid brūtāgamana-kāraṇam
analyzed: vrajasya anāmayam kaccit brūta āgamana kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.29.019/1 rajany eṣā ghora-rūpā ghora-sattva-niṣevitā
analyzed: rajanī eṣā ghora rūpā ghora sattva niṣevitā

original: BhP_10.29.019/3 pratiyāta vrajaṃ neha stheyaṃ strībhiḥ su-madhyamāḥ
analyzed: pratiyāta vrajam na iha stheyam strībhiḥ sumadhyamāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.020/1 mātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā bhrātaraḥ patayaś ca vaḥ
analyzed: mātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ patayaḥ ca vaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.020/3 vicinvanti hy apaśyanto mā kṛḍhvaṃ bandhu-sādhvasam
analyzed: vicinvanti hi a paśyantaḥ mā kṛḍhvam bandhu sādhvasam

original: BhP_10.29.021/1 dṛṣṭaṃ vanaṃ kusumitaṃ rākeśa-kara-rañjitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭam vanam kusumitam rākeśa kara rañjitam

original: BhP_10.29.021/3 yamunānila-līlaijat taru-pallava-śobhitam
analyzed: yamunā anila līlā aijat taru pallava śobhitam

original: BhP_10.29.022/1 tad yāta mā ciraṃ goṣṭhaṃ śuśrūṣadhvaṃ patīn satīḥ
analyzed: tat yāta mā ciram goṣṭham śuśrūṣadhvam patīn satīḥ

original: BhP_10.29.022/3 krandanti vatsā bālāś ca tān pāyayata duhyata
analyzed: krandanti vatsāḥ bālāḥ ca tān pāyayata duhyata

original: BhP_10.29.023/1 atha vā mad-abhisnehād bhavatyo yantritāśayāḥ
analyzed: atha vā mad abhisnehāt bhavatyaḥ yantrita āśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.023/3 āgatā hy upapannaṃ vaḥ prīyante mayi jantavaḥ
analyzed: āgatāḥ hi upapannam vaḥ prīyante mayi jantavaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.024/1 bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ strīṇāṃ paro dharmo hy amāyayā
analyzed: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇam strīṇām paraḥ dharmaḥ hi amāyayā

original: BhP_10.29.024/3 tad-bandhūnāṃ ca kalyāṇaḥ prajānāṃ cānupoṣaṇam
analyzed: tad bandhūnām ca kalyāṇaḥ prajānām ca anupoṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.29.025/1 duḥśīlo durbhago vṛddho jaḍo rogy adhano 'pi vā
analyzed: duḥśīlaḥ durbhagaḥ vṛddhaḥ jaḍaḥ rogī vā

original: BhP_10.29.025/3 patiḥ strībhir na hātavyo lokepsubhir apātakī
analyzed: patiḥ strībhiḥ na hātavyaḥ loka īpsubhiḥ a pātakī

original: BhP_10.29.026/1 asvargyam ayaśasyaṃ ca phalgu kṛcchraṃ bhayāvaham
analyzed: asvargyam ayaśasyam ca phalgu kṛcchram bhaya āvaham

original: BhP_10.29.026/3 jugupsitaṃ ca sarvatra hy aupapatyaṃ kula-striyaḥ
analyzed: jugupsitam ca sarvatra hi aupapatyam kulastriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.027/1 śravaṇād darśanād dhyānān mayi bhāvo 'nukīrtanāt
analyzed: śravaṇāt darśanāt dhyānāt mayi bhāvaḥ nu kīrtanāt

original: BhP_10.29.027/3 na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tato gṛhān
analyzed: na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tatas gṛhān

original: BhP_10.29.028/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.29.028/1 iti vipriyam ākarṇya gopyo govinda-bhāṣitam
analyzed: iti vipriyam ākarṇya gopyaḥ govinda bhāṣitam

original: BhP_10.29.028/3 viṣaṇṇā bhagna-saṅkalpāś cintām āpur duratyayām
analyzed: viṣaṇṇāḥ bhagna saṅkalpāḥ cintām āpuḥ duratyayām

original: BhP_10.29.029/1 kṛtvā mukhāny ava śucaḥ śvasanena śuṣyad
analyzed: kṛtvā mukhāni ava śucaḥ śvasanena śuṣyat

original: BhP_10.29.029/2 bimbādharāṇi caraṇena bhuvaḥ likhantyaḥ
analyzed: bimba adharāṇi caraṇena bhuvaḥ likhantyaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.029/3 asrair upātta-masibhiḥ kuca-kuṅkumāni
analyzed: asraiḥ upāttam asibhiḥ kuca kuṅkumāni

original: BhP_10.29.029/4 tasthur mṛjantya uru-duḥkha-bharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm
analyzed: tasthuḥ mṛjantyaḥ uru duḥkha bharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm

original: BhP_10.29.030/1 preṣṭhaṃ priyetaram iva pratibhāṣamāṇaṃ
analyzed: preṣṭham priyetaram iva pratibhāṣamāṇam

original: BhP_10.29.030/2 kṛṣṇaṃ tad-artha-vinivartita-sarva-kāmāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam tad artha vinivartita sarva kāmāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.030/3 netre vimṛjya ruditopahate sma kiñcit
analyzed: netre vimṛjya rudita upahate sma kiñcid

original: BhP_10.29.030/4 saṃrambha-gadgada-giro 'bruvatānuraktāḥ
analyzed: saṃrambha gadgada giraḥ bruvatā anuraktāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.031/0 śrī-gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.29.031/1 maivaṃ vibho 'rhati bhavān gadituṃ nṛ-śaṃsaṃ
analyzed: mā evam vibhoḥ rhati bhavān gaditum nṛśaṃsam

original: BhP_10.29.031/2 santyajya sarva-viṣayāṃs tava pāda-mūlam
analyzed: santyajya sarva viṣayān tava pāda mūlam

original: BhP_10.29.031/3 bhaktā bhajasva duravagraha mā tyajāsmān
analyzed: bhaktāḥ bhajasva duravagraha mā tyaja asmān

original: BhP_10.29.031/4 devo yathādi-puruṣo bhajate mumukṣūn
analyzed: devaḥ yathā ādipuruṣaḥ bhajate mumukṣūn

original: BhP_10.29.032/1 yat paty-apatya-suhṛdām anuvṛttir aṅga
analyzed: yat pati apatya suhṛdām anuvṛttiḥ aṅga

original: BhP_10.29.032/2 strīṇāṃ sva-dharma iti dharma-vidā tvayoktam
analyzed: strīṇām svadharmaḥ iti dharma vidā tvayā uktam

original: BhP_10.29.032/3 astv evam etad upadeśa-pade tvayīśe
analyzed: astu evam etat upadeśa pade tvayi īśe

original: BhP_10.29.032/4 preṣṭho bhavāṃs tanu-bhṛtāṃ kila bandhur ātmā
analyzed: preṣṭhaḥ bhavān tanubhṛtām kila bandhuḥ ātmā

original: BhP_10.29.033/1 kurvanti hi tvayi ratiṃ kuśalāḥ sva ātman
analyzed: kurvanti hi tvayi ratim kuśalāḥ sve ātman

original: BhP_10.29.033/2 nitya-priye pati-sutādibhir ārti-daiḥ kim
analyzed: nitya priye pati suta ādibhiḥ ārti daiḥ kim

original: BhP_10.29.033/3 tan naḥ prasīda parameśvara mā sma chindyā
analyzed: tat naḥ prasīda parameśvara mā sma chindyāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.033/4 āśāṃ dhṛtāṃ tvayi cirād aravinda-netra
analyzed: āśām dhṛtām tvayi cirāt aravinda netra

original: BhP_10.29.034/1 cittaṃ sukhena bhavatāpahṛtaṃ gṛheṣu
analyzed: cittam sukhena bhavatā apahṛtam gṛheṣu

original: BhP_10.29.034/2 yan nirviśaty uta karāv api gṛhya-kṛtye
analyzed: yat nirviśati uta karau api gṛhya kṛtye

original: BhP_10.29.034/3 pādau padaṃ na calatas tava pāda-mūlād
analyzed: pādau padam na calataḥ tava pāda mūlāt

original: BhP_10.29.034/4 yāmaḥ kathaṃ vrajam atho karavāma kiṃ vā
analyzed: yāmaḥ katham vrajam atho karavāma kim vā

original: BhP_10.29.035/1 siñcāṅga nas tvad-adharāmṛta-pūrakeṇa
analyzed: siñca aṅga naḥ tvad adhara amṛta pūrakeṇa

original: BhP_10.29.035/2 hāsāvaloka-kala-gīta-ja-hṛc-chayāgnim
BhP_10.29.035/3 no ced vayaṃ virahajāgny-upayukta-dehā
analyzed: no ced vayam viraha ja agni upayukta dehā

original: BhP_10.29.035/4 dhyānena yāma padayoḥ padavīṃ sakhe te
analyzed: dhyānena yāma padayoḥ padavīm sakhe te

original: BhP_10.29.036/1 yarhy ambujākṣa tava pāda-talaṃ ramāyā
analyzed: yarhi ambuja akṣa tava pāda talam ramāyā

original: BhP_10.29.036/2 datta-kṣaṇaṃ kvacid araṇya-jana-priyasya
analyzed: dattakṣaṇam kvacid araṇya jana priyasya

original: BhP_10.29.036/3 asprākṣma tat-prabhṛti nānya-samakṣam añjaḥ
analyzed: asprākṣma tad prabhṛti na anya samakṣam añjas

original: BhP_10.29.036/4 sthātuṃs tvayābhiramitā bata pārayāmaḥ
analyzed: sthātum tvayā abhiramitāḥ bata pārayāmaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.037/1 śrīr yat padāmbuja-rajaś cakame tulasyā
analyzed: śrīḥ yat pada ambuja rajaḥ cakame tulasyā

original: BhP_10.29.037/2 labdhvāpi vakṣasi padaṃ kila bhṛtya-juṣṭam
analyzed: labdhvā api vakṣasi padam kila bhṛtya juṣṭam

original: BhP_10.29.037/3 yasyāḥ sva-vīkṣaṇa utānya-sura-prayāsas
analyzed: yasyāḥ sva vīkṣaṇe

original: BhP_10.29.037/4 tadvad vayaṃ ca tava pāda-rajaḥ prapannāḥ
analyzed: tadvat vayam ca tava pāda rajaḥ prapannāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.038/1 tan naḥ prasīda vṛjinārdana te 'nghri-mūlaṃ
analyzed: tat naḥ prasīda vṛjina ardana te nghri mūlam

original: BhP_10.29.038/2 prāptā visṛjya vasatīs tvad-upāsanāśāḥ
analyzed: prāptāḥ visṛjya vasatīḥ tvad upāsana āśāḥ

original: BhP_10.29.038/3 tvat-sundara-smita-nirīkṣaṇa-tīvra-kāma
analyzed: tvad sundara smita nirīkṣaṇa tīvra kāma

original: BhP_10.29.038/4 taptātmanāṃ puruṣa-bhūṣaṇa dehi dāsyam
analyzed: tapta ātmanām puruṣa bhūṣaṇa dehi dāsyam

original: BhP_10.29.039/1 vīkṣyālakāvṛta-mukhaṃ tava kuṇdala-śrī
analyzed: vīkṣya alaka āvṛta mukham tava kuṇdala śrī

original: BhP_10.29.039/2 gaṇḍa-sthalādhara-sudhaṃ hasitāvalokam
analyzed: gaṇḍa sthala adhara sudham hasita avalokam

original: BhP_10.29.039/3 dattābhayaṃ ca bhuja-daṇḍa-yugaṃ vilokya
analyzed: datta abhayam ca bhuja daṇḍa yugam vilokya

original: BhP_10.29.039/4 vakṣaḥ śriyaika-ramaṇaṃ ca bhavāma dāsyaḥ
analyzed: vakṣaḥ śriyā eka ramaṇam ca bhavāma dāsyaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.040/1 kā stry aṅga te kala-padāyata-veṇu-gīta-
analyzed: kā strī aṅga te kala pada āyata veṇu gīta

original: BhP_10.29.040/2 sammohitārya-caritān na calet tri-lokyām
analyzed: sammohita ārya caritāt na calet trilokyām

original: BhP_10.29.040/3 trailokya-saubhagam idaṃ ca nirīkṣya rūpaṃ
analyzed: trailokya saubhagam idam ca nirīkṣya rūpam

original: BhP_10.29.040/4 yad go-dvija-druma-mṛgāḥ pulakāny abibhran
analyzed: yat go dvija druma mṛgāḥ pulakāni abibhran

original: BhP_10.29.041/1 vyaktaṃ bhavān vraja-bhayārti-haro 'bhijāto
analyzed: vyaktam bhavān vraja bhaya ārti haraḥ

original: BhP_10.29.041/2 devo yathādi-puruṣaḥ sura-loka-goptā
analyzed: devaḥ yathā ādipuruṣaḥ sura loka goptā

original: BhP_10.29.041/3 tan no nidhehi kara-paṅkajam ārta-bandho
analyzed: tat naḥ nidhehi kara paṅkajam ārta bandho

original: BhP_10.29.041/4 tapta-staneṣu ca śiraḥsu ca kiṅkarīṇām
analyzed: tapta staneṣu ca śiraḥsu ca kiṅkarīṇām

original: BhP_10.29.042/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.29.042/1 iti viklavitaṃ tāsāṃ śrutvā yogeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: iti viklavitam tāsām śrutvā yoga īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.29.042/3 prahasya sa-dayaṃ gopīr ātmārāmo 'py arīramat
analyzed: prahasya sa dayam gopīḥ ātma ārāmaḥ pi arīramat

original: BhP_10.29.043/1 tābhiḥ sametābhir udāra-ceṣṭitaḥ priyekṣaṇotphulla-mukhībhir acyutaḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ sametābhiḥ udāra ceṣṭitaḥ priya īkṣaṇa utphulla mukhībhiḥ acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.043/3 udāra-hāsa-dvija-kunda-dīdhatir vyarocataiṇāṅka ivoḍubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: udāra hāsa dvija kunda dīdhatiḥ vyarocata eṇa aṅkaḥ iva uḍubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.044/1 upagīyamāna udgāyan vanitā-śata-yūthapaḥ
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ udgāyan vanitā śata yūthapaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.044/3 mālāṃ bibhrad vaijayantīṃ vyacaran maṇḍayan vanam
analyzed: mālām bibhrat vaijayantīm vyacarat maṇḍayan vanam

original: BhP_10.29.045/1 nadyāḥ pulinam āviśya gopībhir hima-vālukam
analyzed: nadyāḥ pulinam āviśya gopībhiḥ hima vālukam

original: BhP_10.29.045/3 juṣṭaṃ tat-taralānandi kumudāmoda-vāyunā
analyzed: juṣṭam tat tarala ānandi kumuda āmoda vāyunā

original: BhP_10.29.046/1 bāhu-prasāra-parirambha-karālakoru nīvī-stanālabhana-narma-nakhāgra-pātaiḥ
analyzed: bāhu prasāra parirambha karālaka ūru nīvī stana ālabhana narma nakha agra pātaiḥ

original: BhP_10.29.046/3 kṣvelyāvaloka-hasitair vraja-sundarīṇām uttambhayan rati-patiṃ ramayāṃ cakāra
analyzed: kṣvelyā avaloka hasitaiḥ vraja sundarīṇām uttambhayan ratipatim cakāra

original: BhP_10.29.047/1 evaṃ bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇāl labdha-mānā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: evam bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇāt labdha mānāḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.047/3 ātmānaṃ menire strīṇāṃ māninyo hy adhikaṃ bhuvi
analyzed: ātmānam menire strīṇām māninyaḥ hi adhikam bhuvi

original: BhP_10.29.048/1 tāsāṃ tat-saubhaga-madaṃ vīkṣya mānaṃ ca keśavaḥ
analyzed: tāsām tat saubhaga madam vīkṣya mānam ca keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.29.048/3 praśamāya prasādāya tatraivāntaradhīyata
analyzed: praśamāya prasādāya tatra eva antaradhīyata

original: BhP_10.30.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.30.001/1 antarhite bhagavati sahasaiva vrajāṅganāḥ
analyzed: antarhite bhagavati sahasā eva vraja aṅganāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.001/3 atapyaṃs tam acakṣāṇāḥ kariṇya iva yūthapam
analyzed: atapyan tam a cakṣāṇāḥ kariṇyaḥ iva yūthapam

original: BhP_10.30.002/1 gatyānurāga-smita-vibhramekṣitair mano-ramālāpa-vihāra-vibhramaiḥ
analyzed: gatyā anurāga smita vibhrama īkṣitaiḥ manorama ālāpa vihāra vibhramaiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.002/3 ākṣipta-cittāḥ pramadā ramā-pates tās tā viceṣṭā jagṛhus tad-ātmikāḥ
analyzed: ākṣipta cittāḥ pramadāḥ ramāpateḥ tāḥ tāḥ viceṣṭāḥ jagṛhuḥ tad ātmikāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.003/1 gati-smita-prekṣaṇa-bhāṣaṇādiṣu priyāḥ priyasya pratirūḍha-mūrtayaḥ
analyzed: gati smita prekṣaṇa bhāṣaṇa ādiṣu priyāḥ priyasya pratirūḍha mūrtayaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.003/3 asāv ahaṃ tv ity abalās tad-ātmikā nyavediṣuḥ kṛṣṇa-vihāra-vibhramāḥ
analyzed: asau aham tu iti abalāḥ tad ātmikāḥ nyavediṣuḥ kṛṣṇa vihāra vibhramāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.004/1 gāyantya uccair amum eva saṃhatā vicikyur unmattaka-vad vanād vanam
analyzed: gāyantyaḥ uccais amum eva saṃhatāḥ vicikyuḥ unmattaka vat vanāt vanam

original: BhP_10.30.004/3 papracchur ākāśa-vad antaraṃ bahir bhūteṣu santaṃ puruṣaṃ vanaspatīn
analyzed: papracchuḥ ākāśa vat antaram bahis bhūteṣu santam puruṣam vanaspatīn

original: BhP_10.30.005/1 dṛṣṭo vaḥ kaccid aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha no manaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ vaḥ kaccit aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha naḥ manaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.005/3 nanda-sūnur gato hṛtvā prema-hāsāvalokanaiḥ
analyzed: nanda sūnuḥ gataḥ hṛtvā prema hāsa avalokanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.006/1 kaccit kurabakāśoka- nāga-punnāga-campakāḥ
analyzed: kaccit kurabaka aśoka nāga punnāga campakāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.006/3 rāmānujo māninīnām ito darpa-hara-smitaḥ
analyzed: rāma anujaḥ māninīnām itas darpa hara smitaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.007/1 kaccit tulasi kalyāṇi govinda-caraṇa-priye
analyzed: kaccit tulasi kalyāṇi govinda caraṇa priye

original: BhP_10.30.007/3 saha tvāli-kulair bibhrad dṛṣṭas te 'ti-priyo 'cyutaḥ
analyzed: saha tvā ali kulaiḥ bibhrat dṛṣṭaḥ te tipriyaḥ cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.008/1 mālaty adarśi vaḥ kaccin mallike jāti-yūthike
analyzed: mālati adarśi vaḥ kaccit mallike jāti yūthike

original: BhP_10.30.008/3 prītiṃ vo janayan yātaḥ kara-sparśena mādhavaḥ
analyzed: prītim vaḥ janayan yātaḥ kara sparśena mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.009/1 cūta-priyāla-panasāsana-kovidāra jambv-arka-bilva-bakulāmra-kadamba-nīpāḥ
BhP_10.30.009/3 ye 'nye parārtha-bhavakā yamunopakūlāḥ śaṃsantu kṛṣṇa-padavīṃ rahitātmanāṃ naḥ
analyzed: ye nye parārtha bhavakāḥ yamunā upakūlāḥ śaṃsantu kṛṣṇa padavīm rahita ātmanām naḥ

original: BhP_10.30.010/1 kiṃ te kṛtaṃ kṣiti tapo bata keśavāṅghri-
analyzed: kim te kṛtam kṣiti tapaḥ bata keśava aṅghri

original: BhP_10.30.010/2 sparśotsavotpulakitāṅga-nahair vibhāsi
analyzed: sparśa utsava utpulakita aṅganahaiḥ vibhāsi

original: BhP_10.30.010/3 apy aṅghri-sambhava urukrama-vikramād vā
analyzed: api aṅghri sambhave urukrama vikramāt vā

original: BhP_10.30.010/4 āho varāha-vapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇena
analyzed: āho varāha vapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇena

original: BhP_10.30.011/1 apy eṇa-patny upagataḥ priyayeha gātrais
analyzed: api eṇa patnī upagataḥ priyayā iha gātraiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.011/2 tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi su-nirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ
analyzed: tanvan dṛśām sakhi su nirvṛtim acyutaḥ vaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.011/3 kāntāṅga-saṅga-kuca-kuṅkuma-rañjitāyāḥ
analyzed: kānta aṅga saṅga kuca kuṅkuma rañjitāyāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.011/4 kunda-srajaḥ kula-pater iha vāti gandhaḥ
analyzed: kunda srajaḥ kula pateḥ iha vāti gandhaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.012/1 bāhuṃ priyāṃsa upadhāya gṛhīta-padmo
analyzed: bāhum priya aṃsaḥ upadhāya gṛhīta padmaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.012/2 rāmānujas tulasikāli-kulair madāndhaiḥ
analyzed: rāma anujaḥ tulasika ali kulaiḥ mada andhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.012/3 anvīyamāna iha vas taravaḥ praṇāmaṃ
analyzed: anvīyamānaḥ iha vaḥ taravaḥ praṇāmam

original: BhP_10.30.012/4 kiṃ vābhinandati caran praṇayāvalokaiḥ
analyzed: kim vā abhinandati caran praṇaya avalokaiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.013/1 pṛcchatemā latā bāhūn apy āśliṣṭā vanaspateḥ
analyzed: pṛcchata imāḥ latāḥ bāhūn api āśliṣṭāḥ vanaspateḥ

original: BhP_10.30.013/3 nūnaṃ tat-karaja-spṛṣṭā bibhraty utpulakāny aho
analyzed: nūnam tad karaja spṛṣṭāḥ bibhrati utpulakāni aho

original: BhP_10.30.014/1 ity unmatta-vaco gopyaḥ kṛṣṇānveṣaṇa-kātarāḥ
analyzed: iti unmatta vacaḥ gopyaḥ kṛṣṇa anveṣaṇa kātarāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.014/3 līlā bhagavatas tās tā hy anucakrus tad-ātmikāḥ
analyzed: līlāḥ bhagavataḥ tāḥ tāḥ hi anucakruḥ tad ātmikāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.015/1 kasyācit pūtanāyantyāḥ kṛṣṇāyanty apibat stanam
analyzed: kasyācid pūtanāyantyāḥ kṛṣṇāyantī apibat stanam

original: BhP_10.30.015/3 tokayitvā rudaty anyā padāhan śakaṭāyatīm
analyzed: tokayitvā rudatī anyā padā ahan śakaṭāyatīm

original: BhP_10.30.016/1 daityāyitvā jahārānyām eko kṛṣṇārbha-bhāvanām
analyzed: jahāra anyām ekaḥ kṛṣṇa arbha bhāvanām

original: BhP_10.30.016/3 riṅgayām āsa kāpy aṅghrī karṣantī ghoṣa-niḥsvanaiḥ
analyzed: riṅgayām āsa kā api aṅghrī karṣantī ghoṣa niḥsvanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.017/1 kṛṣṇa-rāmāyite dve tu gopāyantyaś ca kāścana
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmāyite dve tu gopāyantyaḥ ca kāścana

original: BhP_10.30.017/3 vatsāyatīṃ hanti cānyā tatraikā tu bakāyatīm
analyzed: vatsāyatīm hanti ca anyā tatra ekā tu bakāyatīm

original: BhP_10.30.018/1 āhūya dūra-gā yadvat kṛṣṇas tam anuvartatīm
analyzed: āhūya dūra gāḥ yadvat kṛṣṇaḥ tam anuvartatīm

original: BhP_10.30.018/3 veṇuṃ kvaṇantīṃ krīḍantīm anyāḥ śaṃsanti sādhv iti
analyzed: veṇum kvaṇantīm krīḍantīm anyāḥ śaṃsanti sādhu iti

original: BhP_10.30.019/1 kasyāñcit sva-bhujaṃ nyasya calanty āhāparā nanu
analyzed: kasyāñcid sva bhujam nyasya calantī āha aparā nanu

original: BhP_10.30.019/3 kṛṣṇo 'haṃ paśyata gatiṃ lalitām iti tan-manāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ ham paśyata gatim lalitām iti tad manāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.020/1 mā bhaiṣṭa vāta-varṣābhyāṃ tat-trāṇaṃ vihitaṃ maya
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa vāta varṣābhyām tat trāṇam vihitam maya

original: BhP_10.30.020/3 ity uktvaikena hastena yatanty unnidadhe 'mbaram
analyzed: iti uktvā ekena hastena yatantī unnidadhe mbaram

original: BhP_10.30.021/1 āruhyaikā padākramya śirasy āhāparāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: āruhya ekā padā ākramya śirasi āha aparām nṛpa

original: BhP_10.30.021/3 duṣṭāhe gaccha jāto 'haṃ khalānām nanu daṇḍa-kṛt
analyzed: duṣṭa ahe gaccha jātaḥ ham khalānām nanu daṇḍa kṛt

original: BhP_10.30.022/1 tatraikovāca he gopā dāvāgniṃ paśyatolbaṇam
analyzed: tatra ekā uvāca he gopāḥ dāva agnim paśyata ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.30.022/3 cakṣūṃṣy āśv apidadhvaṃ vo vidhāsye kṣemam añjasā
analyzed: cakṣūṃṣi āśu apidadhvam vaḥ vidhāsye kṣemam añjasā

original: BhP_10.30.023/1 baddhānyayā srajā kācit tanvī tatra ulūkhale
analyzed: baddhā anyayā srajā kācid tanvī tatra ulūkhale

original: BhP_10.30.023/3 badhnāmi bhāṇḍa-bhettāraṃ haiyaṅgava-muṣaṃ tv iti
analyzed: badhnāmi bhāṇḍa bhettāram tu iti

original: BhP_10.30.023/5 bhītā su-dṛk pidhāyāsyaṃ bheje bhīti-viḍambanam
analyzed: bhītā sudṛś pidhāya āsyam bheje bhīti viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.30.024/1 evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ pṛcchamānā vrṇdāvana-latās tarūn
analyzed: evam kṛṣṇam pṛcchamānāḥ vrṇdāvana latāḥ tarūn

original: BhP_10.30.024/3 vyacakṣata vanoddeśe padāni paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: vyacakṣata vana uddeśe padāni paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.025/1 padāni vyaktam etāni nanda-sūnor mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: padāni vyaktam etāni nanda sūnoḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.025/3 lakṣyante hi dhvajāmbhoja- vajrāṅkuśa-yavādibhiḥ
analyzed: lakṣyante hi dhvaja ambhoja vajra aṅkuśa yava ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.026/1 tais taiḥ padais tat-padavīm anvicchantyo 'grato'balāḥ
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ padaiḥ tad padavīm anvicchantyaḥ gratobalāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.026/3 vadhvāḥ padaiḥ su-pṛktāni vilokyārtāḥ samabruvan
analyzed: vadhvāḥ padaiḥ su pṛktāni vilokya ārtāḥ samabruvan

original: BhP_10.30.027/1 kasyāḥ padāni caitāni yātāyā nanda-sūnunā
analyzed: kasyāḥ padāni ca etāni yātāyāḥ nanda sūnunā

original: BhP_10.30.027/3 aṃsa-nyasta-prakoṣṭhāyāḥ kareṇoḥ kariṇā yathā
analyzed: aṃsa nyasta prakoṣṭhāyāḥ kareṇoḥ kariṇā yathā

original: BhP_10.30.028/1 anayārādhito nūnaṃ bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: anayā ārādhitaḥ nūnam bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.30.028/3 yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto yām anayad rahaḥ
analyzed: yat naḥ vihāya govindaḥ prītaḥ yām anayat rahaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.029/1 dhanyā aho amī ālyo govindāṅghry-abja-reṇavaḥ
analyzed: dhanyāḥ aho amī ālyaḥ govinda aṅghri abja reṇavaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.029/3 yān brahmeśau ramā devī dadhur mūrdhny agha-nuttaye
analyzed: yān brahma īśau ramā devī mūrdhni agha nuttaye

original: BhP_10.30.030/1 tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat
analyzed: tasyāḥ amūni naḥ kṣobham kurvanti uccais padāni yat

original: BhP_10.30.030/3 yaikāpahṛtya gopīnām raho bhunkte 'cyutādharam
analyzed: yā ekā apahṛtya gopīnām rahaḥ bhunkte cyuta adharam

original: BhP_10.30.030/5 na lakṣyante padāny atra tasyā nūnaṃ tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ
analyzed: na lakṣyante padāni atra tasyāḥ nūnam tṛṇa aṅkuraiḥ

original: BhP_10.30.030/7 khidyat-sujātāṅghri-talām unninye preyasīṃ priyaḥ
analyzed: khidyat sujāta aṅghri talām unninye preyasīm priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.031/1 imāny adhika-magnāni padāni vahato vadhūm
analyzed: imāni adhika magnāni padāni vahataḥ vadhūm

original: BhP_10.30.031/3 gopyaḥ paśyata kṛṣṇasya bhārākrāntasya kāminaḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ paśyata kṛṣṇasya bhāra ākrāntasya kāminaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.031/5 atrāvaropitā kāntā puṣpa-hetor mahātmanā
analyzed: atrā avaropitā kāntā puṣpa hetoḥ mahātmanā

original: BhP_10.30.032/1 atra prasūnāvacayaḥ priyārthe preyasā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: atra prasūna avacayaḥ priya arthe preyasā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.032/3 prapadākramaṇa ete paśyatāsakale pade
analyzed: prapada ākramaṇe ete paśyata a sakale pade

original: BhP_10.30.033/1 keśa-prasādhanaṃ tv atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam
analyzed: keśa prasādhanam tu atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam

original: BhP_10.30.033/3 tāni cūḍayatā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam
analyzed: tāni cūḍayatā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam

original: BhP_10.30.034/1 reme tayā cātma-rata ātmārāmo 'py akhaṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: reme tayā ca ātma rataḥ ātma ārāmaḥ api akhaṇḍitaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.034/3 kāmināṃ darśayan dainyaṃ strīṇāṃ caiva durātmatām
analyzed: kāminām darśayan dainyam strīṇām ca eva durātmatām

original: BhP_10.30.035/1 ity evaṃ darśayantyas tāś cerur gopyo vicetasaḥ
analyzed: iti evam darśayantyaḥ tāḥ ceruḥ gopyaḥ vicetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.035/3 yāṃ gopīm anayat kṛṣṇo vihāyānyāḥ striyo vane
analyzed: yām gopīm anayat kṛṣṇaḥ vihāya anyāḥ striyaḥ vane

original: BhP_10.30.036/1 sā ca mene tadātmānaṃ variṣṭhaṃ sarva-yoṣitām
analyzed: sā ca mene tadā ātmānam variṣṭham sarva yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.30.036/3 hitvā gopīḥ kāma-yānā mām asau bhajate priyaḥ
analyzed: hitvā gopīḥ kāmayānāḥ mām asau bhajate priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.037/1 tato gatvā vanoddeśaṃ dṛptā keśavam abravīt
analyzed: tatas gatvā vana uddeśam dṛptā keśavam abravīt

original: BhP_10.30.037/3 na pāraye 'haṃ calituṃ naya māṃ yatra te manaḥ
analyzed: na pāraye ham calitum naya mām yatra te manaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.038/1 evam uktaḥ priyām āha skandha āruhyatām iti
analyzed: evam uktaḥ priyām āha skandhaḥ āruhyatām iti

original: BhP_10.30.038/3 tataś cāntardadhe kṛṣṇaḥ sā vadhūr anvatapyata
analyzed: tatas ca antardadhe kṛṣṇaḥ sā vadhūḥ anvatapyata

original: BhP_10.30.039/1 hā nātha ramaṇa preṣṭha kvāsi kvāsi mahā-bhuja
analyzed: hā nātha ramaṇa preṣṭha kva asi kva asi mahā bhuja

original: BhP_10.30.039/3 dāsyās te kṛpaṇāyā me sakhe darśaya sannidhim
analyzed: dāsyāḥ te kṛpaṇāyāḥ me sakhe darśaya sannidhim

original: BhP_10.30.040/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.30.040/1 anvicchantyo bhagavato mārgaṃ gopyo 'vidūritaḥ
analyzed: anvicchantyaḥ bhagavataḥ mārgam gopyaḥ vidūritaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.040/3 dadṛśuḥ priya-viśleṣān mohitāṃ duḥkhitāṃ sakhīm
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ priya viśleṣāt mohitām duḥkhitām sakhīm

original: BhP_10.30.041/1 tayā kathitam ākarṇya māna-prāptiṃ ca mādhavāt
analyzed: tayā kathitam ākarṇya māna prāptim ca mādhavāt

original: BhP_10.30.041/3 avamānaṃ ca daurātmyād vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: avamānam ca daurātmyāt vismayam paramam yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.30.042/1 tato 'viśan vanaṃ candra jyotsnā yāvad vibhāvyate
analyzed: tatas viśan vanam candra jyotsnā yāvat vibhāvyate

original: BhP_10.30.042/3 tamaḥ praviṣṭam ālakṣya tato nivavṛtuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ praviṣṭam ālakṣya tatas nivavṛtuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.30.043/1 tan-manaskās tad-alāpās tad-viceṣṭās tad-ātmikāḥ
analyzed: tad manaskāḥ tad alāpāḥ tad viceṣṭāḥ tad ātmikāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.043/3 tad-guṇān eva gāyantyo nātmagārāṇi sasmaruḥ
analyzed: tad guṇān eva gāyantyaḥ na ātma gārāṇi sasmaruḥ

original: BhP_10.30.044/1 punaḥ pulinam āgatya kālindyāḥ kṛṣṇa-bhāvanāḥ
analyzed: punar pulinam āgatya kālindyāḥ kṛṣṇa bhāvanāḥ

original: BhP_10.30.044/3 samavetā jaguḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tad-āgamana-kāṅkṣitāḥ
analyzed: samavetāḥ jaguḥ kṛṣṇam tad āgamana kāṅkṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.31.001/0 gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.31.001/1 jayati te 'dhikaṃ janmanā vrajaḥ śrayata indirā śaśvad atra hi
analyzed: jayati te dhikam janmanā vrajaḥ śrayate indirā śaśvat atra hi

original: BhP_10.31.001/3 dayita dṛśyatāṃ dikṣu tāvakās tvayi dhṛtāsavas tvāṃ vicinvate
analyzed: dayita dṛśyatām dikṣu tāvakāḥ tvayi dhṛta asavaḥ tvām vicinvate

original: BhP_10.31.002/1 śarad-udāśaye sādhu-jāta-sat- sarasijodara-śrī-muṣā dṛśā
analyzed: śarad udāśaye sādhu jāta sat sarasija udara śrī muṣā dṛśā

original: BhP_10.31.002/3 surata-nātha te 'śulka-dāsikā vara-da nighnato neha kiṃ vadhaḥ
analyzed: surata nātha te śulkadāsikāḥ vara da nighnataḥ na iha kim vadhaḥ

original: BhP_10.31.003/1 viṣa-jalāpyayād vyāla-rākṣasād varṣa-mārutād vaidyutānalāt
analyzed: viṣa jala apyayāt vyāla rākṣasāt varṣa mārutāt vaidyuta analāt

original: BhP_10.31.003/3 vṛṣa-mayātmajād viśvato bhayād ṛṣabha te vayaṃ rakṣitā muhuḥ
analyzed: vṛṣa maya ātmajāt viśvatas bhayāt ṛṣabha te vayam rakṣitāḥ muhur

original: BhP_10.31.004/1 na khalu gopīkā-nandano bhavān akhila-dehinām antarātma-dṛk
analyzed: na khalu gopīkānandanaḥ bhavān akhila dehinām antarātma dṛś

original: BhP_10.31.004/3 vikhanasārthito viśva-guptaye sakha udeyivān sātvatāṃ kule
analyzed: vikhanasā arthitaḥ viśva guptaye sakhaḥ udeyivān sātvatām kule

original: BhP_10.31.005/1 viracitābhayaṃ vṛṣṇi-dhūrya te caraṇam īyuṣāṃ saṃsṛter bhayāt
analyzed: viracita abhayam vṛṣṇi dhūrya te caraṇam īyuṣām saṃsṛteḥ bhayāt

original: BhP_10.31.005/3 kara-saroruhaṃ kānta kāma-daṃ śirasi dhehi naḥ śrī-kara-graham
analyzed: kara saroruham kānta kāma dam śirasi dhehi naḥ śrī kara graham

original: BhP_10.31.006/1 vraja-janārti-han vīra yoṣitāṃ nija-jana-smaya-dhvaṃsana-smita
analyzed: vraja jana ārti han vīra yoṣitām nija jana smaya dhvaṃsana smita

original: BhP_10.31.006/3 bhaja sakhe bhavat-kiṅkarīḥ sma no jalaruhānanaṃ cāru darśaya
analyzed: bhaja sakhe bhavat kiṅkarīḥ sma naḥ jalaruha ānanam cāru darśaya

original: BhP_10.31.007/1 praṇata-dehināṃ pāpa-karṣaṇaṃ tṛṇa-carānugaṃ śrī-niketanam
BhP_10.31.007/3 phaṇi-phaṇārpitaṃ te padāmbujaṃ kṛṇu kuceṣu naḥ kṛndhi hṛc-chayam
analyzed: phaṇi phaṇa arpitam te pada ambujam kṛṇu kuceṣu naḥ kṛndhi hṛcchayam

original: BhP_10.31.008/1 madhurayā girā valgu-vākyayā budha-manojñayā puṣkarekṣaṇa
analyzed: madhurayā girā valgu vākyayā budha manojñayā puṣkara īkṣaṇa

original: BhP_10.31.008/3 vidhi-karīr imā vīra muhyatīr adhara-sīdhunāpyāyayasva naḥ
analyzed: vidhi karīḥ imāḥ vīra muhyatīḥ adharasi idhunā āpyāyayasva naḥ

original: BhP_10.31.009/1 tava kathāmṛtaṃ tapta-jīvanaṃ kavibhir īḍitaṃ kalmaṣāpaham
analyzed: tava kathā amṛtam tapta jīvanam kavibhiḥ īḍitam kalmaṣa apaham

original: BhP_10.31.009/3 śravaṇa-maṅgalaṃ śrīmad ātataṃ bhuvi gṛṇanti ye bhūri-dā janāḥ
analyzed: śravaṇa maṅgalam śrīmat ātatam bhuvi gṛṇanti ye bhūri dāḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_10.31.010/1 prahasitaṃ priya-prema-vīkṣaṇaṃ viharaṇaṃ ca te dhyāna-maṅgalam
analyzed: prahasitam priya prema vīkṣaṇam viharaṇam ca te dhyāna maṅgalam

original: BhP_10.31.010/3 rahasi saṃvido yā hṛdi spṛśaḥ kuhaka no manaḥ kṣobhayanti hi
analyzed: rahasi saṃvidaḥ yāḥ hṛdi spṛśaḥ kuhaka naḥ manaḥ kṣobhayanti hi

original: BhP_10.31.011/1 calasi yad vrajāc cārayan paśūn nalina-sundaraṃ nātha te padam
analyzed: calasi yat vrajāt cārayan paśūn nalina sundaram nātha te padam

original: BhP_10.31.011/3 śila-tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ sīdatīti naḥ kalilatāṃ manaḥ kānta gacchati
analyzed: śila tṛṇa aṅkuraiḥ sīdati iti naḥ kalila tām manaḥ kānta gacchati

original: BhP_10.31.012/1 dina-parikṣaye nīla-kuntalair vanaruhānanaṃ bibhrad āvṛtam
analyzed: dina parikṣaye nīla kuntalaiḥ vanaruha ānanam bibhrat āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.31.012/3 ghana-rajasvalaṃ darśayan muhur manasi naḥ smaraṃ vīra yacchasi
analyzed: ghana rajasvalam darśayan muhur manasi naḥ smaram vīra yacchasi

original: BhP_10.31.013/1 praṇata-kāma-daṃ padmajārcitaṃ dharaṇi-maṇḍanaṃ dhyeyam āpadi
BhP_10.31.013/3 caraṇa-paṅkajaṃ śantamaṃ ca te ramaṇa naḥ staneṣv arpayādhi-han
analyzed: caraṇa paṅkajam śantamam ca te ramaṇa naḥ staneṣu arpaya adhi han

original: BhP_10.31.014/1 surata-vardhanaṃ śoka-nāśanaṃ svarita-veṇunā suṣṭhu cumbitam
analyzed: surata vardhanam śoka nāśanam svarita veṇunā suṣṭhu cumbitam

original: BhP_10.31.014/3 itara-rāga-vismāraṇaṃ nṛṇāṃ vitara vīra nas te 'dharāmṛtam
analyzed: itara rāga vismāraṇam nṛṇām vitara vīra naḥ te dharā amṛtam

original: BhP_10.31.015/1 aṭati yad bhavān ahni kānanaṃ truṭi yugāyate tvām apaśyatām
analyzed: aṭati yat bhavān ahni kānanam truṭi yugāyate tvām apaśyatām

original: BhP_10.31.015/3 kuṭila-kuntalaṃ śrī-mukhaṃ ca te jaḍa udīkṣatāṃ pakṣma-kṛd dṛśām
analyzed: kuṭila kuntalam śrī mukham ca te jaḍaḥ udīkṣatām pakṣma kṛt dṛśām

original: BhP_10.31.016/1 pati-sutānvaya-bhrātṛ-bāndhavān ativilaṅghya te 'nty acyutāgatāḥ
analyzed: pati suta anvaya bhrātṛ bāndhavān ati vilaṅghya te acyuta āgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.31.016/3 gati-vidas tavodgīta-mohitāḥ kitava yoṣitaḥ kas tyajen niśi
analyzed: gati vidaḥ tava udgīta mohitāḥ kitava yoṣitaḥ kaḥ tyajet niśi

original: BhP_10.31.017/1 rahasi saṃvidaṃ hṛc-chayodayaṃ prahasitānanaṃ prema-vīkṣaṇam
analyzed: rahasi saṃvidam hṛcchaya udayam prahasita ānanam prema vīkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.31.017/3 bṛhad-uraḥ śriyo vīkṣya dhāma te muhur ati-spṛhā muhyate manaḥ
analyzed: bṛhat uraḥ śriyaḥ vīkṣya dhāma te muhur ati spṛhāḥ muhyate manaḥ

original: BhP_10.31.018/1 vraja-vanaukasāṃ vyaktir aṅga te vṛjina-hantry alaṃ viśva-maṅgalam
analyzed: vraja vanaukasām vyaktiḥ aṅga te vṛjina hantri alam viśva maṅgalam

original: BhP_10.31.018/3 tyaja manāk ca nas tvat-spṛhātmanāṃ sva-jana-hṛd-rujāṃ yan niṣūdanam
analyzed: tyaja manāk ca naḥ tvad spṛhā ātmanām sva jana hṛd rujām yat niṣūdanam

original: BhP_10.31.019/1 yat te sujāta-caraṇāmburuhaṃ staneṣu
analyzed: yat te sujāta caraṇa amburuham staneṣu

original: BhP_10.31.019/2 bhītāḥ śanaiḥ priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu
analyzed: bhītāḥ śanais priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu

original: BhP_10.31.019/3 tenāṭavīm aṭasi tad vyathate na kiṃ svit
analyzed: tena aṭavīm aṭasi tat vyathate na kim svid

original: BhP_10.31.019/4 kūrpādibhir bhramati dhīr bhavad-āyuṣāṃ naḥ
analyzed: kūrpa ādibhiḥ bhramati dhīḥ bhavat āyuṣām naḥ

original: BhP_10.32.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.32.001/1 iti gopyaḥ pragāyantyaḥ pralapantyaś ca citradhā
analyzed: iti gopyaḥ pragāyantyaḥ pralapantyaḥ ca citradhā

original: BhP_10.32.001/3 ruruduḥ su-svaraṃ rājan kṛṣṇa-darśana-lālasāḥ
analyzed: ruruduḥ su svaram rājan kṛṣṇa darśana lālasāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.002/1 tāsām āvirabhūc chauriḥ smayamāna-mukhāmbujaḥ
analyzed: tāsām āvirabhūt śauriḥ smayamāna mukha ambujaḥ

original: BhP_10.32.002/3 pītāmbara-dharaḥ sragvī sākṣān manmatha-manmathaḥ
BhP_10.32.003/1 taṃ vilokyāgataṃ preṣṭhaṃ prīty-utphulla-dṛśo 'balāḥ
analyzed: tam vilokya āgatam preṣṭham prīti utphulla dṛśaḥ balāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.003/3 uttasthur yugapat sarvās tanvaḥ prāṇam ivāgatam
analyzed: uttasthuḥ yugapad sarvāḥ tanvaḥ prāṇam iva āgatam

original: BhP_10.32.004/1 kācit karāmbujaṃ śaurer jagṛhe 'ñjalinā mudā
analyzed: kācid kara ambujam śaureḥ jagṛhe ñjalinā mudā

original: BhP_10.32.004/3 kācid dadhāra tad-bāhum aṃse candana-bhūṣitam
analyzed: kācid dadhāra tad bāhum aṃse candana bhūṣitam

original: BhP_10.32.005/1 kācid añjalināgṛhṇāt tanvī tāmbūla-carvitam
analyzed: kācid añjalinā agṛhṇāt tanvī tāmbūla carvitam

original: BhP_10.32.005/3 ekā tad-aṅghri-kamalaṃ santaptā stanayor adhāt
analyzed: ekā tad aṅghri kamalam santaptā stanayoḥ adhāt

original: BhP_10.32.006/1 ekā bhru-kuṭim ābadhya prema-saṃrambha-vihvalā
analyzed: ekā bhrukuṭim ābadhya prema saṃrambha vihvalā

original: BhP_10.32.006/3 ghnantīvaikṣat kaṭākṣepaiḥ sandaṣṭa-daśana-cchadā
analyzed: ghnantī iva aikṣat kaṭa ākṣepaiḥ sandaṣṭa daśanacchadā

original: BhP_10.32.007/1 aparānimiṣad-dṛgbhyāṃ juṣāṇā tan-mukhāmbujam
analyzed: aparā nimiṣat dṛgbhyām juṣāṇā tad mukha ambujam

original: BhP_10.32.007/3 āpītam api nātṛpyat santas tac-caraṇaṃ yathā
analyzed: āpītam api na atṛpyat santaḥ tad caraṇam yathā

original: BhP_10.32.008/1 taṃ kācin netra-randhreṇa hṛdi kṛtvā nimīlya ca
analyzed: tam kācid netra randhreṇa hṛdi kṛtvā nimīlya ca

original: BhP_10.32.008/3 pulakāṅgy upaguhyāste yogīvānanda-samplutā
analyzed: pulaka aṅgī upaguhya āste yogī iva ānanda samplutā

original: BhP_10.32.009/1 sarvās tāḥ keśavāloka- paramotsava-nirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ keśava āloka parama utsava nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.009/3 jahur viraha-jaṃ tāpaṃ prājñaṃ prāpya yathā janāḥ
analyzed: jahuḥ viraha jam tāpam prājñam prāpya yathā janāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.010/1 tābhir vidhūta-śokābhir bhagavān acyuto vṛtaḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ vidhūta śokābhiḥ bhagavān acyutaḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.32.010/3 vyarocatādhikaṃ tāta puruṣaḥ śaktibhir yathā
analyzed: vyarocata adhikam tāta puruṣaḥ śaktibhiḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.32.011/1 tāḥ samādāya kālindyā nirviśya pulinaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: tāḥ samādāya kālindyāḥ nirviśya pulinam vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.32.011/3 vikasat-kunda-mandāra surabhy-anila-ṣaṭpadam
analyzed: vikasat kunda mandāra surabhi anila ṣaṭpadam

original: BhP_10.32.012/1 śarac-candrāṃśu-sandoha- dhvasta-doṣā-tamaḥ śivam
analyzed: śarad candra aṃśu sandoha dhvasta doṣā tamaḥ śivam

original: BhP_10.32.012/3 kṛṣṇāyā hasta-taralā cita-komala-vālukam
analyzed: kṛṣṇāyāḥ hasta taralā cita komala vālukam

original: BhP_10.32.013/1 tad-darśanāhlāda-vidhūta-hṛd-rujo manorathāntaṃ śrutayo yathā yayuḥ
analyzed: tad darśana āhlāda vidhūta hṛdrujaḥ manoratha antam śrutayaḥ yathā yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.32.013/3 svair uttarīyaiḥ kuca-kuṅkumāṅkitair acīkḷpann āsanam ātma-bandhave
analyzed: svaiḥ uttarīyaiḥ kuca kuṅkuma aṅkitaiḥ acīkḷpan āsanam ātmabandhave

original: BhP_10.32.014/1 tatropaviṣṭo bhagavān sa īśvaro yogeśvarāntar-hṛdi kalpitāsanaḥ
analyzed: tatra upaviṣṭaḥ bhagavān saḥ īśvaraḥ yogeśvara antar hṛdi kalpita āsanaḥ

original: BhP_10.32.014/3 cakāsa gopī-pariṣad-gato 'rcitas trailokya-lakṣmy-eka-padaṃ vapur dadhat
analyzed: cakāsa gopī pariṣad gataḥ rcitaḥ trailokya lakṣmī eka padam vapuḥ dadhat

original: BhP_10.32.015/1 sabhājayitvā tam anaṅga-dīpanaṃ sahāsa-līlekṣaṇa-vibhrama-bhruvā
analyzed: sabhājayitvā tam anaṅga dīpanam sa hāsa līlā īkṣaṇa vibhrama bhruvā

original: BhP_10.32.015/3 saṃsparśanenāṅka-kṛtāṅghri-hastayoḥ saṃstutya īṣat kupitā babhāṣire
analyzed: saṃsparśanena aṅka kṛta aṅghri hastayoḥ saṃstutya īṣat kupitāḥ babhāṣire

original: BhP_10.32.016/0 śrī-gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.32.016/1 bhajato 'nubhajanty eka eka etad-viparyayam
analyzed: bhajataḥ nu bhajanti ekaḥ ekaḥ etad viparyayam

original: BhP_10.32.016/3 nobhayāṃś ca bhajanty eka etan no brūhi sādhu bhoḥ
analyzed: na ubhayān ca bhajanti eke etat naḥ brūhi sādhu bhoḥ

original: BhP_10.32.017/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.32.017/1 mitho bhajanti ye sakhyaḥ svārthaikāntodyamā hi te
analyzed: mithas bhajanti ye sakhyaḥ sva artha ekānta udyamāḥ hi te

original: BhP_10.32.017/3 na tatra sauhṛdaṃ dharmaḥ svārthārthaṃ tad dhi nānyathā
analyzed: na tatra sauhṛdam dharmaḥ svārtha artham tat hi na anyathā

original: BhP_10.32.018/1 bhajanty abhajato ye vai karuṇāḥ pitarau yathā
analyzed: bhajanti a bhajataḥ ye vai karuṇāḥ pitarau yathā

original: BhP_10.32.018/3 dharmo nirapavādo 'tra sauhṛdaṃ ca su-madhyamāḥ
analyzed: dharmaḥ sauhṛdam ca sumadhyamāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.019/1 bhajato 'pi na vai kecid bhajanty abhajataḥ kutaḥ
analyzed: na vai kecid bhajanti a bhajataḥ kutas

original: BhP_10.32.019/3 ātmārāmā hy āpta-kāmā akṛta-jñā guru-druhaḥ
analyzed: ātma ārāmāḥ hi āpta kāmāḥ akṛtajñāḥ guru druhaḥ

original: BhP_10.32.020/1 nāhaṃ tu sakhyo bhajato 'pi jantūn bhajāmy amīṣām anuvṛtti-vṛttaye
analyzed: na aham tu sakhyaḥ jantūn bhajāmi amīṣām anuvṛtti vṛttaye

original: BhP_10.32.020/3 yathādhano labdha-dhane vinaṣṭe tac-cintayānyan nibhṛto na veda
analyzed: yathā adhanaḥ labdha dhane vinaṣṭe tad cintayā anyat nibhṛtaḥ na veda

original: BhP_10.32.021/1 evaṃ mad-arthojjhita-loka-veda svānām hi vo mayy anuvṛttaye 'balāḥ
analyzed: evam mad artha ujjhita loka veda svānām hi vaḥ mayi anuvṛttaye balāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.021/3 mayāparokṣaṃ bhajatā tirohitaṃ māsūyituṃ mārhatha tat priyaṃ priyāḥ
analyzed: mayā aparokṣam bhajatā tirohitam mā asūyitum mā arhatha tat priyam priyāḥ

original: BhP_10.32.022/1 na pāraye 'haṃ niravadya-saṃyujāṃ sva-sādhu-kṛtyaṃ vibudhāyuṣāpi vaḥ
analyzed: na pāraye ham niravadya saṃyujām sva sādhu kṛtyam vibudha āyuṣā api vaḥ

original: BhP_10.32.022/3 yā mābhajan durjara-geha-śṛṅkhalāḥ saṃvṛścya tad vaḥ pratiyātu sādhunā
analyzed: yāḥ mā ābhajan durjara geha śṛṅkhalāḥ saṃvṛścya tat vaḥ pratiyātu sādhunā

original: BhP_10.33.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.33.001/1 itthaṃ bhagavato gopyaḥ śrutvā vācaḥ su-peśalāḥ
analyzed: ittham bhagavataḥ gopyaḥ śrutvā vācaḥ su peśalāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.001/3 jahur viraha-jaṃ tāpaṃ tad-aṅgopacitāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: jahuḥ viraha jam tāpam tad aṅga upacita āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.002/1 tatrārabhata govindo rāsa-krīḍām anuvrataiḥ
analyzed: tatra ārabhata govindaḥ rāsakrīḍām anuvrataiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.002/3 strī-ratnair anvitaḥ prītair anyonyābaddha-bāhubhiḥ
analyzed: strī ratnaiḥ anvitaḥ prītaiḥ anyonya ābaddha bāhubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.003/1 rāsotsavaḥ sampravṛtto gopī-maṇḍala-maṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: rāsa utsavaḥ sampravṛttaḥ gopī maṇḍala maṇḍitaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.003/3 yogeśvareṇa kṛṣṇena tāsāṃ madhye dvayor dvayoḥ
analyzed: yogeśvareṇa kṛṣṇena tāsām madhye dvayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: BhP_10.33.003/5 praviṣṭena gṛhītānāṃ kaṇṭhe sva-nikaṭaṃ striyaḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭena gṛhītānām kaṇṭhe sva nikaṭam striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.003/7 yaṃ manyeran nabhas tāvad vimāna-śata-saṅkulam
analyzed: yam manyeran nabhaḥ tāvat vimāna śata saṅkulam

original: BhP_10.33.003/9 divaukasāṃ sa-dārāṇām autsukyāpahṛtātmanām
analyzed: divaukasām sa dārāṇām autsukya apahṛta ātmanām

original: BhP_10.33.004/1 tato dundubhayo nedur nipetuḥ puṣpa-vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: tatas dundubhayaḥ neduḥ nipetuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.004/3 jagur gandharva-patayaḥ sa-strīkās tad-yaśo 'malam
analyzed: jaguḥ gandharva patayaḥ sa strīkāḥ tat yaśaḥ malam

original: BhP_10.33.005/1 valayānāṃ nūpurāṇāṃ kiṅkiṇīnāṃ ca yoṣitām
analyzed: valayānām nūpurāṇām kiṅkiṇīnām ca yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.33.005/3 sa-priyāṇām abhūc chabdas tumulo rāsa-maṇḍale
analyzed: sa priyāṇām abhūt śabdaḥ tumulaḥ rāsa maṇḍale

original: BhP_10.33.006/1 tatrātiśuśubhe tābhir bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: tatra atiśuśubhe tābhiḥ bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.006/3 madhye maṇīnāṃ haimānāṃ mahā-marakato yathā
analyzed: madhye maṇīnām haimānām mahā marakataḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.33.007/1 pāda-nyāsair bhuja-vidhutibhiḥ sa-smitair bhrū-vilāsair
analyzed: pāda nyāsaiḥ bhuja vidhutibhiḥ sa smitaiḥ bhrū vilāsaiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.007/2 bhajyan madhyaiś cala-kuca-paṭaiḥ kuṇḍalair gaṇḍa-lolaiḥ
analyzed: bhajyan madhyaiḥ cala kuca paṭaiḥ kuṇḍalaiḥ gaṇḍa lolaiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.007/3 svidyan-mukhyaḥ kavara-rasanāgranthayaḥ kṛṣṇa-vadhvo
analyzed: svid yat mukhyaḥ kavara rasanā granthayaḥ kṛṣṇa vadhvaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.007/4 gāyantyas taṃ taḍita iva tā megha-cakre virejuḥ
analyzed: gāyantyaḥ tam taḍitaḥ iva tāḥ megha cakre virejuḥ

original: BhP_10.33.008/1 uccair jagur nṛtyamānā rakta-kaṇṭhyo rati-priyāḥ
analyzed: uccais jaguḥ nṛtyamānāḥ rakta kaṇṭhyaḥ rati priyāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.008/3 kṛṣṇābhimarśa-muditā yad-gītenedam āvṛtam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa abhimarśa muditā yat gītena idam āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.33.009/1 kācit samaṃ mukundena svara-jātīr amiśritāḥ
analyzed: kācid samam mukundena svara jātīḥ a miśritāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.009/3 unninye pūjitā tena prīyatā sādhu sādhv iti
analyzed: unninye pūjitā tena prīyatā sādhu sādhu iti

original: BhP_10.33.009/5 tad eva dhruvam unninye tasyai mānaṃ ca bahv adāt
analyzed: tat eva dhruvam unninye tasyai mānam ca bahu adāt

original: BhP_10.33.010/1 kācid rāsa-pariśrāntā pārśva-sthasya gadā-bhṛtaḥ
analyzed: kācid rāsa pariśrāntā pārśva sthasya gadābhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.010/3 jagrāha bāhunā skandhaṃ ślathad-valaya-mallikā
analyzed: jagrāha bāhunā skandham ślathat valaya mallikā

original: BhP_10.33.011/1 tatraikāṃsa-gataṃ bāhuṃ kṛṣṇasyotpala-saurabham
analyzed: tatra eka aṃsa gatam bāhum kṛṣṇasya utpala saurabham

original: BhP_10.33.011/3 candanāliptam āghrāya hṛṣṭa-romā cucumba ha
analyzed: candana āliptam āghrāya hṛṣṭa romā cucumba ha

original: BhP_10.33.012/1 kasyāścin nāṭya-vikṣipta kuṇḍala-tviṣa-maṇḍitam
analyzed: kasyāścid nāṭya vikṣipta kuṇḍala tviṣa maṇḍitam

original: BhP_10.33.012/3 gaṇḍaṃ gaṇḍe sandadhatyāḥ prādāt tāmbūla-carvitam
analyzed: gaṇḍam gaṇḍe sandadhatyāḥ prādāt tāmbūla carvitam

original: BhP_10.33.013/1 nṛtyatī gāyatī kācit kūjan nūpura-mekhalā
analyzed: nṛtyatī gāyatī kācid kūjat nūpura mekhalā

original: BhP_10.33.013/3 pārśva-sthācyuta-hastābjaṃ śrāntādhāt stanayoḥ śivam
analyzed: pārśva sthā acyuta hasta abjam śrāntā adhāt stanayoḥ śivam

original: BhP_10.33.014/1 gopyo labdhvācyutaṃ kāntaṃ śriya ekānta-vallabham
analyzed: gopyaḥ labdhvā acyutam kāntam śriyaḥ ekānta vallabham

original: BhP_10.33.014/3 gṛhīta-kaṇṭhyas tad-dorbhyāṃ gāyantyas tam vijahrire
analyzed: gṛhīta kaṇṭhyaḥ tad dorbhyām gāyantyaḥ tam vijahrire

original: BhP_10.33.015/1 karṇotpalālaka-viṭaṅka-kapola-gharma-
BhP_10.33.015/2 vaktra-śriyo valaya-nūpura-ghoṣa-vādyaiḥ
analyzed: vaktra śriyaḥ valaya nūpura ghoṣa vādyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.015/3 gopyaḥ samaṃ bhagavatā nanṛtuḥ sva-keśa-
analyzed: gopyaḥ samam bhagavatā nanṛtuḥ sva keśa

original: BhP_10.33.015/4 srasta-srajo bhramara-gāyaka-rāsa-goṣṭhyām
analyzed: srasta srajaḥ bhramara gāyaka rāsa goṣṭhyām

original: BhP_10.33.016/1 evaṃ pariṣvaṅga-karābhimarśa- snigdhekṣaṇoddāma-vilāsa-hāsaiḥ
analyzed: evam pariṣvaṅga kara abhimarśa snigdha īkṣaṇa uddāma vilāsa hāsaiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.016/3 reme rameśo vraja-sundarībhir yathārbhakaḥ sva-pratibimba-vibhramaḥ
analyzed: reme rameśaḥ vraja sundarībhiḥ yathā arbhakaḥ sva pratibimba vibhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.017/1 tad-aṅga-saṅga-pramudākulendriyāḥ keśān dukūlaṃ kuca-paṭṭikāṃ vā
analyzed: tad aṅga saṅga pramudā ākula indriyāḥ keśān dukūlam kuca paṭṭikām vā

original: BhP_10.33.017/3 nāñjaḥ prativyoḍhum alaṃ vraja-striyo visrasta-mālābharaṇāḥ kurūdvaha
analyzed: na añjas prativyoḍhum alam vraja striyaḥ visrasta mālā ābharaṇāḥ kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.33.018/1 kṛṣṇa-vikrīḍitaṃ vīkṣya mumuhuḥ khe-cara-striyaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa vikrīḍitam vīkṣya mumuhuḥ khecara striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.018/3 kāmārditāḥ śaśāṅkaś ca sa-gaṇo vismito 'bhavat
analyzed: kāma arditāḥ śaśāṅkaḥ ca sa gaṇaḥ vismitaḥ bhavat

original: BhP_10.33.019/1 kṛtvā tāvantam ātmānaṃ yāvatīr gopa-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: kṛtvā tāvantam ātmānam yāvatīḥ gopa yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.019/3 reme sa bhagavāṃs tābhir ātmārāmo 'pi līlayā
analyzed: reme sa bhagavān tābhiḥ ātma ārāmaḥ līlayā

original: BhP_10.33.020/1 tāsāṃ rati-vihāreṇa śrāntānāṃ vadanāni saḥ
analyzed: tāsām rati vihāreṇa śrāntānām vadanāni saḥ

original: BhP_10.33.020/3 prāmṛjat karuṇaḥ premṇā śantamenāṅga pāṇinā
analyzed: prāmṛjat karuṇaḥ premṇā śantamena aṅga pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.33.021/1 gopyaḥ sphurat-puraṭa-kuṇḍala-kuntala-tviḍ-
analyzed: gopyaḥ sphurat puraṭa kuṇḍala kuntala tviṣ

original: BhP_10.33.021/2 gaṇḍa-śriyā sudhita-hāsa-nirīkṣaṇena
analyzed: gaṇḍa śriyā sudhita hāsa nirīkṣaṇena

original: BhP_10.33.021/3 mānaṃ dadhatya ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtāni
analyzed: mānam dadhatyaḥ ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtāni

original: BhP_10.33.021/4 puṇyāni tat-kara-ruha-sparśa-pramodāḥ
analyzed: puṇyāni tad kararuha sparśa pramodāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.022/1 tābhir yutaḥ śramam apohitum aṅga-saṅga-
analyzed: tābhiḥ yutaḥ śramam apohitum aṅgasaṅga

original: BhP_10.33.022/2 ghṛṣṭa-srajaḥ sa kuca-kuṅkuma-rañjitāyāḥ
analyzed: ghṛṣṭa srajaḥ sa kuca kuṅkuma rañjitāyāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.022/3 gandharva-pālibhir anudruta āviśad vāḥ
analyzed: gandharva pālibhiḥ anudrutaḥ āviśat vāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.022/4 śrānto gajībhir ibha-rāḍ iva bhinna-setuḥ
analyzed: śrāntaḥ gajībhiḥ ibha rāj iva bhinna setuḥ

original: BhP_10.33.023/1 so 'mbhasy alaṃ yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ
analyzed: saḥ mbhasi alam yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.023/2 premṇekṣitaḥ prahasatībhir itas tato 'ṅga
analyzed: premṇā īkṣitaḥ prahasatībhiḥ itas tatas ṅga

original: BhP_10.33.023/3 vaimānikaiḥ kusuma-varṣibhir īdyamāno
analyzed: vaimānikaiḥ kusuma varṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.023/4 reme svayaṃ sva-ratir atra gajendra-līlaḥ
analyzed: reme svayam sva ratiḥ atra gaja indra līlaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.024/1 tataś ca kṛṣṇopavane jala-sthala prasūna-gandhānila-juṣṭa-dik-taṭe
analyzed: tatas ca kṛṣṇa upavane jala sthala prasūna gandha anila juṣṭa diś taṭe

original: BhP_10.33.024/3 cacāra bhṛṅga-pramadā-gaṇāvṛto yathā mada-cyud dviradaḥ kareṇubhiḥ
analyzed: cacāra bhṛṅga pramadā gaṇa āvṛtaḥ yathā mada cyut dviradaḥ kareṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.33.025/1 evaṃ śaśāṅkāṃśu-virājitā niśāḥ sa satya-kāmo 'nuratābalā-gaṇaḥ
analyzed: evam śaśāṅka aṃśu virājitāḥ niśāḥ sa satyakāmaḥ nuratā balā gaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.025/3 siṣeva ātmany avaruddha-saurataḥ sarvāḥ śarat-kāvya-kathā-rasāśrayāḥ
analyzed: siṣeva ātmani avaruddha saurataḥ sarvāḥ śarad kāvya kathā rasa āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.026/0 śrī-parīkṣid uvāca
analyzed: śrī parīkṣit uvāca

original: BhP_10.33.026/1 saṃsthāpanāya dharmasya praśamāyetarasya ca
analyzed: saṃsthāpanāya dharmasya praśamāya itarasya ca

original: BhP_10.33.026/3 avatīrṇo hi bhagavān aṃśena jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ hi bhagavān aṃśena jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.33.027/1 sa kathaṃ dharma-setūnāṃ vaktā kartābhirakṣitā
analyzed: sa katham dharma setūnām vaktā kartā abhirakṣitā

original: BhP_10.33.027/3 pratīpam ācarad brahman para-dārābhimarśanam
analyzed: pratīpam ācarat brahman para dāra abhimarśanam

original: BhP_10.33.028/1 āpta-kāmo yadu-patiḥ kṛtavān vai jugupsitam
analyzed: āpta kāmaḥ yadupatiḥ kṛtavān vai jugupsitam

original: BhP_10.33.028/3 kim-abhiprāya etan naḥ śaṃśayaṃ chindhi su-vrata
analyzed: kimabhiprāyaḥ etat naḥ śaṃśayam chindhi suvrata

original: BhP_10.33.029/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.33.029/1 dharma-vyatikramo dṛṣṭa īśvarāṇāṃ ca sāhasam
analyzed: dharma vyatikramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ īśvarāṇām ca sāhasam

original: BhP_10.33.029/3 tejīyasāṃ na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva-bhujo yathā
analyzed: tejīyasām na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva bhujaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.33.030/1 naitat samācarej jātu manasāpi hy anīśvaraḥ
analyzed: na etat samācaret jātu manasā api hi anīśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.33.030/3 vinaśyaty ācaran mauḍhyād yathārudro 'bdhi-jaṃ viṣam
analyzed: vinaśyati ācaran mauḍhyāt yathā a rudraḥ bdhi jam viṣam

original: BhP_10.33.031/1 īśvarāṇāṃ vacaḥ satyaṃ tathaivācaritaṃ kvacit
analyzed: īśvarāṇām vacaḥ satyam tathā eva ācaritam kvacid

original: BhP_10.33.031/3 teṣāṃ yat sva-vaco-yuktaṃ buddhimāṃs tat samācaret
analyzed: teṣām yat sva vacaḥ yuktam buddhimān tat samācaret

original: BhP_10.33.032/1 kuśalācaritenaiṣām iha svārtho na vidyate
analyzed: kuśala ācaritena eṣām iha sva arthaḥ na vidyate

original: BhP_10.33.032/3 viparyayeṇa vānartho nirahaṅkāriṇāṃ prabho
analyzed: viparyayeṇa vā anarthaḥ nirahaṅkāriṇām prabho

original: BhP_10.33.033/1 kim utākhila-sattvānāṃ tiryaṅ-martya-divaukasām
analyzed: kim uta akhila sattvānām tiryak martya divaukasām

original: BhP_10.33.033/3 īśituś ceśitavyānāṃ kuśalākuśalānvayaḥ
analyzed: īśituḥ ca īśitavyānām kuśala akuśala anvayaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.034/1 yat-pāda-paṅkaja-parāga-niṣeva-tṛptā
analyzed: yad pāda paṅkaja parāga niṣeva tṛptā

original: BhP_10.33.034/2 yoga-prabhāva-vidhutākhila-karma-bandhāḥ
analyzed: yoga prabhāva vidhuta akhila karma bandhāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.034/3 svairaṃ caranti munayo 'pi na nahyamānās
analyzed: svairam caranti munayaḥ pi na nahyamānāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.034/4 tasyecchayātta-vapuṣaḥ kuta eva bandhaḥ
analyzed: tasya icchayā tad vapuṣaḥ kutas eva bandhaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.035/1 gopīnāṃ tat-patīnāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām
analyzed: gopīnām tad patīnām ca sarveṣām eva dehinām

original: BhP_10.33.035/3 yo 'ntaś carati so 'dhyakṣaḥ krīḍaneneha deha-bhāk
analyzed: yaḥ ntar carati saḥ dhyakṣaḥ krīḍanena iha deha bhāj

original: BhP_10.33.036/1 anugrahāya bhaktānāṃ mānuṣaṃ deham āsthitaḥ
analyzed: anugrahāya bhaktānām mānuṣam deham āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.036/3 bhajate tādṛśīḥ krīḍa yāḥ śrutvā tat-paro bhavet
analyzed: bhajate tādṛśīḥ krīḍa yāḥ śrutvā tad paraḥ bhavet

original: BhP_10.33.037/1 nāsūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitās tasya māyayā
analyzed: na asūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitāḥ tasya māyayā
