original: BhP_10.33.037/3 manyamānāḥ sva-pārśva-sthān svān svān dārān vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: manyamānāḥ sva pārśva sthān svān svān dārān vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.038/1 brahma-rātra upāvṛtte vāsudevānumoditāḥ
analyzed: brahmarātre upāvṛtte vāsudeva anumoditāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.038/3 anicchantyo yayur gopyaḥ sva-gṛhān bhagavat-priyāḥ
analyzed: an icchantyaḥ yayuḥ gopyaḥ sva gṛhān bhagavat priyāḥ

original: BhP_10.33.039/1 vikrīḍitaṃ vraja-vadhūbhir idaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ
analyzed: vikrīḍitam vraja vadhūbhiḥ idam ca viṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_10.33.039/2 śraddhānvito 'nuśṛṇuyād atha varṇayed yaḥ
analyzed: śraddhā anvitaḥ nu śṛṇuyāt atha varṇayet yaḥ

original: BhP_10.33.039/3 bhaktiṃ parāṃ bhagavati pratilabhya kāmaṃ
analyzed: bhaktim parām bhagavati pratilabhya kāmam

original: BhP_10.33.039/4 hṛd-rogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ
analyzed: hṛd rogam āśu apahinoti acireṇa dhīraḥ

original: BhP_10.34.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.34.001/1 ekadā deva-yātrāyāṃ gopālā jāta-kautukāḥ
analyzed: ekadā deva yātrāyām gopālāḥ jāta kautukāḥ

original: BhP_10.34.001/3 anobhir anaḍud-yuktaiḥ prayayus te 'mbikā-vanam
analyzed: anobhiḥ anaḍuh yuktaiḥ prayayuḥ te mbikā vanam

original: BhP_10.34.002/1 tatra snātvā sarasvatyāṃ devaṃ paśu-patiṃ vibhum
analyzed: tatra snātvā sarasvatyām devam paśupatim vibhum

original: BhP_10.34.002/3 ānarcur arhaṇair bhaktyā devīṃ ca ṇṛpate 'mbikām
analyzed: ānarcuḥ arhaṇaiḥ bhaktyā devīm ca ṇṛpate mbikām

original: BhP_10.34.003/1 gāvo hiraṇyaṃ vāsāṃsi madhu madhv-annam ādṛtāḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ hiraṇyam vāsāṃsi madhu madhu annam ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.34.003/3 brāhmaṇebhyo daduḥ sarve devo naḥ prīyatām iti
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ daduḥ sarve devaḥ naḥ prīyatām iti

original: BhP_10.34.004/1 ūṣuḥ sarasvatī-tīre jalaṃ prāśya yata-vratāḥ
analyzed: ūṣuḥ sarasvatī tīre jalam prāśya yata vratāḥ

original: BhP_10.34.004/3 rajanīṃ tāṃ mahā-bhāgā nanda-sunandakādayaḥ
analyzed: rajanīm tām mahābhāgāḥ nanda sunandaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.005/1 kaścin mahān ahis tasmin vipine 'ti-bubhukṣitaḥ
analyzed: kaścid mahān ahiḥ tasmin vipine tibubhukṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.005/3 yadṛcchayāgato nandaṃ śayānam ura-go 'grasīt
analyzed: yadṛcchayā āgataḥ nandam śayānam uragaḥ grasīt

original: BhP_10.34.006/1 sa cukrośāhinā grastaḥ kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahān ayam
analyzed: sa cukrośa ahinā grastaḥ kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahān ayam

original: BhP_10.34.006/3 sarpo māṃ grasate tāta prapannaṃ parimocaya
analyzed: sarpaḥ mām grasate tāta prapannam parimocaya

original: BhP_10.34.007/1 tasya cākranditaṃ śrutvā gopālāḥ sahasotthitāḥ
analyzed: tasya ca ākranditam śrutvā gopālāḥ sahasā utthitāḥ

original: BhP_10.34.007/3 grastaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā vibhrāntāḥ sarpaṃ vivyadhur ulmukaiḥ
analyzed: grastam ca dṛṣṭvā vibhrāntāḥ sarpam vivyadhuḥ ulmukaiḥ

original: BhP_10.34.008/1 alātair dahyamāno 'pi nāmuñcat tam uraṅgamaḥ
analyzed: alātaiḥ dahyamānaḥ pi nā amuñcat tam uraṅgamaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.008/3 tam aspṛśat padābhyetya bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tam aspṛśat padā abhyetya bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_10.34.009/1 sa vai bhagavataḥ śrīmat pāda-sparśa-hatāśubhaḥ
analyzed: sa vai bhagavataḥ śrīmat pāda sparśa hata aśubhaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.009/3 bheje sarpa-vapur hitvā rūpaṃ vidyādharārcitam
analyzed: bheje sarpa vapuḥ hitvā rūpam vidyādhara arcitam

original: BhP_10.34.010/1 tam apṛcchad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ praṇataṃ samavasthitam
analyzed: tam apṛcchat dhṛṣīkeśaḥ praṇatam samavasthitam

original: BhP_10.34.010/3 dīpyamānena vapuṣā puruṣaṃ hema-mālinam
analyzed: dīpyamānena vapuṣā puruṣam hema mālinam

original: BhP_10.34.011/1 ko bhavān parayā lakṣmyā rocate 'dbhuta-darśanaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān parayā lakṣmyā rocate dbhuta darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.011/3 kathaṃ jugupsitām etāṃ gatiṃ vā prāpito 'vaśaḥ
analyzed: katham jugupsitām etām gatim vā prāpitaḥ vaśaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.012/0 sarpa uvāca
analyzed: sarpaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.34.012/1 ahaṃ vidyādharaḥ kaścit sudarśana iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: aham vidyādharaḥ kaścid sudarśanaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.012/3 śriyā svarūpa-sampattyā vimānenācaran diśaḥ
analyzed: śriyā sva rūpa sampattyā vimānena ācaran diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.013/1 ṛṣīn virūpāṅgirasaḥ prāhasaṃ rūpa-darpitaḥ
analyzed: ṛṣīn virūpa aṅgirasaḥ prāhasam rūpa darpitaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.013/3 tair imāṃ prāpito yoniṃ pralabdhaiḥ svena pāpmanā
analyzed: taiḥ imām prāpitaḥ yonim pralabdhaiḥ svena pāpmanā

original: BhP_10.34.014/1 śāpo me 'nugrahāyaiva kṛtas taiḥ karuṇātmabhiḥ
analyzed: śāpaḥ me nugrahāya eva kṛtaḥ taiḥ karuṇa ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.34.014/3 yad ahaṃ loka-guruṇā padā spṛṣṭo hatāśubhaḥ
analyzed: yat aham lokaguruṇā padā spṛṣṭaḥ hata aśubhaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.015/1 taṃ tvāhaṃ bhava-bhītānāṃ prapannānāṃ bhayāpaham
analyzed: tam tvā aham bhava bhītānām prapannānām bhaya apaham

original: BhP_10.34.015/3 āpṛcche śāpa-nirmuktaḥ pāda-sparśād amīva-han
analyzed: āpṛcche śāpa nirmuktaḥ pāda sparśāt amīva han

original: BhP_10.34.016/1 prapanno 'smi mahā-yogin mahā-puruṣa sat-pate
analyzed: prapannaḥ smi mahā yogin mahā puruṣa satpate

original: BhP_10.34.016/3 anujānīhi māṃ deva sarva-lokeśvareśvara
analyzed: anujānīhi mām deva sarva loka īśvara īśvara

original: BhP_10.34.017/1 brahma-daṇḍād vimukto 'haṃ sadyas te 'cyuta darśanāt
analyzed: brahmadaṇḍāt vimuktaḥ ham sadyas te cyuta darśanāt

original: BhP_10.34.017/3 yan-nāma gṛhṇann akhilān śrotṝn ātmānam eva ca
analyzed: yad nāma gṛhṇan akhilān śrotṝn ātmānam eva ca

original: BhP_10.34.017/5 sadyaḥ punāti kiṃ bhūyas tasya spṛṣṭaḥ padā hi te
analyzed: sadyas punāti kim bhūyas tasya spṛṣṭaḥ padā hi te

original: BhP_10.34.018/1 ity anujñāpya dāśārhaṃ parikramyābhivandya ca
analyzed: iti anujñāpya dāśārham parikramya abhivandya ca

original: BhP_10.34.018/3 sudarśano divaṃ yātaḥ kṛcchrān nandaś ca mocitaḥ
analyzed: sudarśanaḥ divam yātaḥ kṛcchrāt nandaḥ ca mocitaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.019/1 niśāmya kṛṣṇasya tad ātma-vaibhavaṃ
analyzed: niśāmya kṛṣṇasya tat ātma vaibhavam

original: BhP_10.34.019/2 vrajaukaso vismita-cetasas tataḥ
analyzed: vraja okasaḥ vismita cetasaḥ tatas

original: BhP_10.34.019/3 samāpya tasmin niyamaṃ punar vrajaṃ
analyzed: samāpya tasmin niyamam punar vrajam

original: BhP_10.34.019/4 ṇṛpāyayus tat kathayanta ādṛtāḥ
analyzed: ṇṛpāyayuḥ tat kathayantaḥ ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.34.020/1 kadācid atha govindo rāmaś cādbhuta-vikramaḥ
analyzed: kadācid atha govindaḥ rāmaḥ ca adbhuta vikramaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.020/3 vijahratur vane rātryāṃ madhya-gau vraja-yoṣitām
analyzed: vijahratuḥ vane rātryām madhya gau vraja yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.34.021/1 upagīyamānau lalitaṃ strī-janair baddha-sauhṛdaiḥ
analyzed: upagīyamānau lalitam strī janaiḥ baddha sauhṛdaiḥ

original: BhP_10.34.021/3 sv-alaṅkṛtānuliptāṅgau sragvinau virajo-'mbarau
analyzed: su alaṅkṛta anulipta aṅgau sragvinau viraja umbarau

original: BhP_10.34.022/1 niśā-mukhaṃ mānayantāv uditoḍupa-tārakam
analyzed: niśā mukham mānayantau udita uḍupa tārakam

original: BhP_10.34.022/3 mallikā-gandha-mattāli- juṣṭaṃ kumuda-vāyunā
BhP_10.34.023/1 jagatuḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ manaḥ-śravaṇa-maṅgalam
analyzed: jagatuḥ sarva bhūtānām manaḥ śravaṇa maṅgalam

original: BhP_10.34.023/3 tau kalpayantau yugapat svara-maṇḍala-mūrcchitam
analyzed: tau kalpayantau yugapad svara maṇḍala mūrcchitam

original: BhP_10.34.024/1 gopyas tad-gītam ākarṇya mūrcchitā nāvidan nṛpa
analyzed: gopyaḥ tad gītam ākarṇya mūrcchitāḥ na avidat nṛpa

original: BhP_10.34.024/3 sraṃsad-dukūlam ātmānaṃ srasta-keśa-srajaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: sraṃsat dukūlam ātmānam srasta keśa srajam tatas

original: BhP_10.34.025/1 evaṃ vikrīḍatoḥ svairaṃ gāyatoḥ sampramatta-vat
analyzed: evam vikrīḍatoḥ svairam gāyatoḥ sampramatta vat

original: BhP_10.34.025/3 śaṅkhacūḍa iti khyāto dhanadānucaro 'bhyagāt
analyzed: śaṅkhacūḍaḥ iti khyātaḥ dhanada anucaraḥ bhyagāt

original: BhP_10.34.026/1 tayor nirīkṣato rājaṃs tan-nāthaṃ pramadā-janam
analyzed: tayoḥ nirīkṣataḥ rājan tad nātham pramadā janam

original: BhP_10.34.026/3 krośantaṃ kālayām āsa diśy udīcyām aśaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: krośantam kālayām āsa diśi udīcyām a śaṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.027/1 krośantaṃ kṛṣṇa rāmeti vilokya sva-parigraham
analyzed: krośantam kṛṣṇa rāma iti vilokya sva parigraham

original: BhP_10.34.027/3 yathā gā dasyunā grastā bhrātarāv anvadhāvatām
analyzed: yathā gāḥ dasyunā grastāḥ bhrātarau anvadhāvatām

original: BhP_10.34.028/1 mā bhaiṣṭety abhayārāvau śāla-hastau tarasvinau
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa iti abhaya ārāvau śāla hastau tarasvinau

original: BhP_10.34.028/3 āsedatus taṃ tarasā tvaritaṃ guhyakādhamam
analyzed: āsedatuḥ tam tarasā tvaritam guhyaka adhamam

original: BhP_10.34.029/1 sa vīkṣya tāv anuprāptau kāla-mṛtyū ivodvijan
analyzed: sa vīkṣya tau anuprāptau kāla mṛtyū iva udvijan

original: BhP_10.34.029/3 viṣṛjya strī-janaṃ mūḍhaḥ prādravaj jīvitecchayā
analyzed: viṣṛjya strī janam mūḍhaḥ prādravat jīvita icchayā

original: BhP_10.34.030/1 tam anvadhāvad govindo yatra yatra sa dhāvati
analyzed: tam anvadhāvat govindaḥ yatra yatra sa dhāvati

original: BhP_10.34.030/3 jihīrṣus tac-chiro-ratnaṃ tasthau rakṣan striyo balaḥ
analyzed: jihīrṣuḥ tad śiraḥ ratnam tasthau rakṣan striyaḥ balaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.031/1 avidūra ivābhyetya śiras tasya durātmanaḥ
analyzed: avidūre iva abhyetya śiraḥ tasya durātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.34.031/3 jahāra muṣṭinaivāṅga saha-cūḍa-maṇiṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: jahāra muṣṭinā eva aṅga sahacūḍa maṇim vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.34.032/1 śaṅkhacūḍaṃ nihatyaivaṃ maṇim ādāya bhāsvaram
analyzed: śaṅkhacūḍam nihatya evam maṇim ādāya bhāsvaram

original: BhP_10.34.032/3 agrajāyādadāt prītyā paśyantīnāṃ ca yoṣitām
analyzed: agra jāyā adadāt prītyā paśyantīnām ca yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.35.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.35.001/1 gopyaḥ kṛṣṇe vanaṃ yāte tam anudruta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ kṛṣṇe vanam yāte tam anudruta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.001/3 kṛṣṇa-līlāḥ pragāyantyo ninyur duḥkhena vāsarān
analyzed: kṛṣṇa līlāḥ pragāyantyaḥ ninyuḥ duḥkhena vāsarān

original: BhP_10.35.002/0 śrī-gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.35.002/1 vāma-bāhu-kṛta-vāma-kapolo valgita-bhrur adharārpita-veṇum
analyzed: vāma bāhu kṛta vāma kapolaḥ valgita bhruḥ adhara arpita veṇum

original: BhP_10.35.002/3 komalāṅgulibhir āśrita-mārgaṃ gopya īrayati yatra mukundaḥ
analyzed: komala aṅgulibhiḥ āśrita mārgam gopyaḥ īrayati yatra mukundaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.003/1 vyoma-yāna-vanitāḥ saha siddhair vismitās tad upadhārya sa-lajjāḥ
analyzed: vyoma yāna vanitāḥ saha siddhaiḥ vismitāḥ tat upadhārya sa lajjāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.003/3 kāma-mārgaṇa-samarpita-cittāḥ kaśmalaṃ yayur apasmṛta-nīvyaḥ
analyzed: kāma mārgaṇa samarpita cittāḥ kaśmalam yayuḥ apasmṛta nīvyaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.004/1 hanta citram abalāḥ śṛṇutedaṃ hāra-hāsa urasi sthira-vidyut
analyzed: hanta citram abalāḥ śṛṇuta idam hāra hāse urasi sthira vidyut

original: BhP_10.35.004/3 nanda-sūnur ayam ārta-janānāṃ narma-do yarhi kūjita-veṇuḥ
analyzed: nanda sūnuḥ ayam ārta janānām narmadaḥ yarhi kūjita veṇuḥ

original: BhP_10.35.005/1 vṛndaśo vraja-vṛṣā mṛga-gāvo veṇu-vādya-hṛta-cetasa ārāt
analyzed: vṛndaśas vraja vṛṣāḥ mṛga gāvaḥ veṇu vādya hṛta cetasaḥ ārāt

original: BhP_10.35.005/3 danta-daṣṭa-kavalā dhṛta-karṇā nidritā likhita-citram ivāsan
analyzed: danta daṣṭa kavalāḥ dhṛta karṇāḥ nidritāḥ likhita citram iva āsan

original: BhP_10.35.006/1 barhiṇa-stabaka-dhātu-palāśair baddha-malla-paribarha-viḍambaḥ
BhP_10.35.006/3 karhicit sa-bala āli sa gopair gāḥ samāhvayati yatra mukundaḥ
analyzed: karhicit sa balaḥ āli sa gopaiḥ gāḥ samāhvayati yatra mukundaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.007/1 tarhi bhagna-gatayaḥ sarito vai tat-padāmbuja-rajo 'nila-nītam
analyzed: tarhi bhagna gatayaḥ saritaḥ vai tad pada ambuja rajaḥ nilanītam

original: BhP_10.35.007/3 spṛhayatīr vayam ivābahu-puṇyāḥ prema-vepita-bhujāḥ stimitāpaḥ
analyzed: spṛhayatīḥ vayam iva a bahu puṇyāḥ prema vepita bhujāḥ stimita apaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.008/1 anucaraiḥ samanuvarṇita-vīrya ādi-pūruṣa ivācala-bhūtiḥ
analyzed: anucaraiḥ samanuvarṇita vīryaḥ ādipūruṣaḥ iva acalabhūtiḥ

original: BhP_10.35.008/3 vana-caro giri-taṭeṣu carantīr veṇunāhvayati gāḥ sa yadā hi
analyzed: vana caraḥ giri taṭeṣu carantīḥ veṇunā āhvayati gāḥ sa yadā hi

original: BhP_10.35.009/1 vana-latās tarava ātmani viṣṇuṃ vyañjayantya iva puṣpa-phalāḍhyāḥ
analyzed: vana latāḥ taravaḥ ātmani viṣṇum vyañjayantyaḥ iva puṣpa phala āḍhyāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.009/3 praṇata-bhāra-viṭapā madhu-dhārāḥ prema-hṛṣṭa-tanavo vavṛṣuḥ sma
analyzed: praṇata bhāra viṭapāḥ madhu dhārāḥ prema hṛṣṭa tanavaḥ vavṛṣuḥ sma

original: BhP_10.35.010/1 darśanīya-tilako vana-mālā- divya-gandha-tulasī-madhu-mattaiḥ
analyzed: darśanīya tilakaḥ vanamālā divya gandha tulasī madhu mattaiḥ

original: BhP_10.35.010/3 ali-kulair alaghu gītām abhīṣṭam ādriyan yarhi sandhita-veṇuḥ
analyzed: ali kulaiḥ alaghu gītām abhīṣṭam ādriyan yarhi sandhita veṇuḥ

original: BhP_10.35.011/1 sarasi sārasa-haṃsa-vihaṅgāś cāru-gītā-hṛta-cetasa etya
analyzed: sarasi sārasa haṃsa vihaṅgāḥ cāru gīta āhṛta cetasaḥ etya

original: BhP_10.35.011/3 harim upāsata te yata-cittā hanta mīlita-dṛśo dhṛta-maunāḥ
analyzed: harim upāsata te yata cittāḥ hanta mīlita dṛśaḥ dhṛta maunāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.012/1 saha-balaḥ srag-avataṃsa-vilāsaḥ sānuṣu kṣiti-bhṛto vraja-devyaḥ
BhP_10.35.012/3 harṣayan yarhi veṇu-raveṇa jāta-harṣa uparambhati viśvam
analyzed: harṣayan yarhi veṇu raveṇa jāta harṣaḥ uparambhati viśvam

original: BhP_10.35.013/1 mahad-atikramaṇa-śaṅkita-cetā manda-mandam anugarjati meghaḥ
analyzed: mahat atikramaṇa śaṅkita cetāḥ mandamandam anugarjati meghaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.013/3 suhṛdam abhyavarṣat sumanobhiś chāyayā ca vidadhat pratapatram
analyzed: suhṛdam abhyavarṣat sumanobhiḥ chāyayā ca vidadhat pratapatram

original: BhP_10.35.014/1 vividha-gopa-caraṇeṣu vidagdho veṇu-vādya urudhā nija-śikṣāḥ
analyzed: vividha gopa caraṇeṣu vidagdhaḥ veṇu vādyaḥ urudhā nija śikṣāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.014/3 tava sutaḥ sati yadādhara-bimbe datta-veṇur anayat svara-jātīḥ
analyzed: tava sutaḥ sati yadā adhara bimbe datta veṇuḥ anayat svara jātīḥ

original: BhP_10.35.015/1 savanaśas tad upadhārya sureśāḥ śakra-śarva-parameṣṭhi-purogāḥ
analyzed: savanaśas tat upadhārya sura īśāḥ śakra śarva parameṣṭhi purogāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.015/3 kavaya ānata-kandhara-cittāḥ kaśmalaṃ yayur aniścita-tattvāḥ
analyzed: kavayaḥ ānata kandhara cittāḥ kaśmalam yayuḥ aniścita tattvāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.016/1 nija-padābja-dalair dhvaja-vajra nīrajāṅkuśa-vicitra-lalāmaiḥ
analyzed: nija pada abja dalaiḥ dhvaja vajra nīraja aṅkuśa vicitra lalāmaiḥ

original: BhP_10.35.016/3 vraja-bhuvaḥ śamayan khura-todaṃ varṣma-dhurya-gatir īḍita-veṇuḥ
analyzed: vraja bhuvaḥ śamayan khura todam varṣma dhurya gatiḥ īḍita veṇuḥ

original: BhP_10.35.017/1 vrajati tena vayaṃ sa-vilāsa vīkṣaṇārpita-manobhava-vegāḥ
analyzed: vrajati tena vayam savilāsa vīkṣaṇa arpita manobhava vegāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.017/3 kuja-gatiṃ gamitā na vidāmaḥ kaśmalena kavaraṃ vasanaṃ vā
analyzed: ku jagatim gamitāḥ na vidāmaḥ kaśmalena kavaram vasanam vā

original: BhP_10.35.018/1 maṇi-dharaḥ kvacid āgaṇayan gā mālayā dayita-gandha-tulasyāḥ
analyzed: maṇidharaḥ kvacid āgaṇayan gāḥ mālayā dayita gandha tulasyāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.018/3 praṇayino 'nucarasya kadāṃse prakṣipan bhujam agāyata yatra
analyzed: praṇayinaḥ nucarasya kadā aṃse prakṣipan bhujam agāyata yatra

original: BhP_10.35.019/1 kvaṇita-veṇu-rava-vañcita-cittāḥ kṛṣṇam anvasata kṛṣṇa-gṛhiṇyaḥ
analyzed: kvaṇita veṇu rava vañcita cittāḥ kṛṣṇam anvasata kṛṣṇa gṛhiṇyaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.019/3 guṇa-gaṇārṇam anugatya hariṇyo gopikā iva vimukta-gṛhāśāḥ
analyzed: guṇa gaṇa arṇam anugatya hariṇyaḥ gopikāḥ iva vimukta gṛha āśāḥ

original: BhP_10.35.020/1 kunda-dāma-kṛta-kautuka-veṣo gopa-godhana-vṛto yamunāyām
analyzed: kunda dāma kṛta kautuka veṣaḥ gopa go dhana vṛtaḥ yamunāyām

original: BhP_10.35.020/3 nanda-sūnur anaghe tava vatso narma-daḥ praṇayiṇāṃ vijahāra
analyzed: nanda sūnuḥ anaghe tava vatsaḥ narmadaḥ praṇayiṇām vijahāra

original: BhP_10.35.021/1 manda-vāyur upavāty anakūlaṃ mānayan malayaja-sparśena
analyzed: manda vāyuḥ upavāti anakūlam mānayan malayaja sparśena

original: BhP_10.35.021/3 vandinas tam upadeva-gaṇā ye vādya-gīta-balibhiḥ parivavruḥ
analyzed: vandinaḥ tam upadeva gaṇāḥ ye vādya gīta balibhiḥ parivavruḥ

original: BhP_10.35.022/1 vatsalo vraja-gavāṃ yad aga-dhro vandyamāna-caraṇaḥ pathi vṛddhaiḥ
analyzed: vatsalaḥ vraja gavām yat agadhraḥ vandyamāna caraṇaḥ pathi vṛddhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.35.022/3 kṛtsna-go-dhanam upohya dinānte gīta-veṇur anugeḍita-kīrtiḥ
analyzed: kṛtsna go dhanam upohya dina ante gīta veṇuḥ anugeḍita kīrtiḥ

original: BhP_10.35.023/1 utsavaṃ śrama-rucāpi dṛśīnām unnayan khura-rajaś-churita-srak
analyzed: utsavam śrama rucā api dṛśīnām unnayan khura rajaḥ churita sraj

original: BhP_10.35.023/3 ditsayaiti suhṛd-āsiṣa eṣa devakī-jaṭhara-bhūr uḍu-rājaḥ
analyzed: ditsayā eti suhṛdā āsiṣe eṣa devakī jaṭhara bhūḥ uḍurājaḥ

original: BhP_10.35.024/1 mada-vighūrṇita-locana īṣat māna-daḥ sva-suhṛdāṃ vana-mālī
analyzed: mada vighūrṇita locanaḥ īṣat mānadaḥ sva suhṛdām vanamālī

original: BhP_10.35.024/3 badara-pāṇḍu-vadano mṛdu-gaṇḍaṃ maṇḍayan kanaka-kuṇḍala-lakṣmyā
analyzed: badara pāṇḍu vadanaḥ mṛdu gaṇḍam maṇḍayan kanaka kuṇḍala lakṣmyā

original: BhP_10.35.025/1 yadu-patir dvirada-rāja-vihāro yāminī-patir ivaiṣa dinānte
analyzed: yadu patiḥ dvirada rāja vihāraḥ yāminīpatiḥ iva eṣa dina ante

original: BhP_10.35.025/3 mudita-vaktra upayāti durantaṃ mocayan vraja-gavāṃ dina-tāpam
analyzed: mudita vaktraḥ upayāti durantam mocayan vraja gavām dina tāpam

original: BhP_10.35.026/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.35.026/1 evaṃ vraja-striyo rājan kṛṣṇa-līlānugāyatīḥ
analyzed: evam vraja striyaḥ rājan kṛṣṇa līlā anugāyatīḥ

original: BhP_10.35.026/3 remire 'haḥsu tac-cittās tan-manaskā mahodayāḥ
analyzed: remire haḥsu tad cittāḥ tad manaskāḥ mahā udayāḥ

original: BhP_10.36.001/0 śrī bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.36.001/1 atha tarhy āgato goṣṭham ariṣṭo vṛṣabhāsuraḥ
analyzed: atha tarhi āgataḥ goṣṭham ariṣṭaḥ vṛṣabha asuraḥ

original: BhP_10.36.001/3 mahīm mahā-kakut-kāyaḥ kampayan khura-vikṣatām
analyzed: mahīm mahā kakud kāyaḥ kampayan khura vikṣatām

original: BhP_10.36.002/1 rambhamāṇaḥ kharataraṃ padā ca vilikhan mahīm
analyzed: rambhamāṇaḥ kharataram padā ca vilikhan mahīm

original: BhP_10.36.002/3 udyamya pucchaṃ vaprāṇi viṣāṇāgreṇa coddharan
analyzed: udyamya puccham vaprāṇi viṣāṇa agreṇa ca uddharan

original: BhP_10.36.002/5 kiñcit kiñcic chakṛn muñcan mūtrayan stabdha-locanaḥ
analyzed: kiñcid kiñcid śakṛt muñcan mūtrayan stabdha locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.003/1 yasya nirhrāditenāṅga niṣṭhureṇa gavāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: yasya nirhrāditena aṅga niṣṭhureṇa gavām nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.36.003/3 patanty akālato garbhāḥ sravanti sma bhayena vai
analyzed: patanti akālataḥ garbhāḥ sravanti sma bhayena vai

original: BhP_10.36.004/1 nirviśanti ghanā yasya kakudy acala-śaṅkayā
analyzed: nirviśanti ghanāḥ yasya kakudi acala śaṅkayā

original: BhP_10.36.004/3 taṃ tīkṣṇa-śṛṅgam udvīkṣya gopyo gopāś ca tatrasuḥ
analyzed: tam tīkṣṇa śṛṅgam udvīkṣya gopyaḥ gopāḥ ca tatrasuḥ

original: BhP_10.36.005/1 paśavo dudruvur bhītā rājan santyajya go-kulam
analyzed: paśavaḥ dudruvuḥ bhītāḥ rājan santyajya gokulam

original: BhP_10.36.005/3 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti te sarve govindaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti te sarve govindam śaraṇam yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.36.006/1 bhagavān api tad vīkṣya go-kulaṃ bhaya-vidrutam
analyzed: bhagavān api tat vīkṣya gokulam bhaya vidrutam

original: BhP_10.36.006/3 mā bhaiṣṭeti girāśvāsya vṛṣāsuram upāhvayat
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa iti girā āśvāsya vṛṣā asuram upāhvayat

original: BhP_10.36.007/1 gopālaiḥ paśubhir manda trāsitaiḥ kim asattama
analyzed: gopālaiḥ paśubhiḥ manda trāsitaiḥ kim asattama

original: BhP_10.36.007/3 mayi śāstari duṣṭānāṃ tvad-vidhānāṃ durātmanām
analyzed: mayi śāstari duṣṭānām tvadvidhānām durātmanām

original: BhP_10.36.008/1 ity āsphotyācyuto 'riṣṭaṃ tala-śabdena kopayan
analyzed: iti āsphotya acyutaḥ riṣṭam tala śabdena kopayan

original: BhP_10.36.008/3 sakhyur aṃse bhujābhogaṃ prasāryāvasthito hariḥ
analyzed: sakhyuḥ aṃse bhuja ābhogam prasārya avasthitaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.36.009/1 so 'py evaṃ kopito 'riṣṭaḥ khureṇāvanim ullikhan
analyzed: saḥ pi evam kopitaḥ riṣṭaḥ khureṇa avanim ullikhan

original: BhP_10.36.009/3 udyat-puccha-bhraman-meghaḥ kruddhaḥ kṛṣṇam upādravat
analyzed: udyat puccha bhramat meghaḥ kruddhaḥ kṛṣṇam upādravat

original: BhP_10.36.010/1 agra-nyasta-viṣāṇāgraḥ stabdhāsṛg-locano 'cyutam
analyzed: agra nyasta viṣāṇa agraḥ cyutam

original: BhP_10.36.010/3 kaṭākṣipyādravat tūrṇam indra-mukto 'śanir yathā
analyzed: kaṭākṣipya adravat tūrṇam śaniḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.36.011/1 gṛhītvā śṛṅgayos taṃ vā aṣṭādaśa padāni saḥ
analyzed: gṛhītvā śṛṅgayoḥ tam vai aṣṭādaśa padāni saḥ

original: BhP_10.36.011/3 pratyapovāha bhagavān gajaḥ prati-gajaṃ yathā
analyzed: pratyapovāha bhagavān gajaḥ pratigajam yathā

original: BhP_10.36.012/1 so 'paviddho bhagavatā punar utthāya satvaram
analyzed: saḥ paviddhaḥ bhagavatā punar utthāya sa tvaram

original: BhP_10.36.012/3 āpatat svinna-sarvāṅgo niḥśvasan krodha-mūrcchitaḥ
analyzed: āpatat svinna sarva aṅgaḥ niḥśvasan krodha mūrcchitaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.013/1 tam āpatantaṃ sa nigṛhya śṛṅgayoḥ padā samākramya nipātya bhū-tale
analyzed: tam āpatantam sa nigṛhya śṛṅgayoḥ padā samākramya nipātya bhū tale

original: BhP_10.36.013/3 niṣpīḍayām āsa yathārdram ambaraṃ kṛtvā viṣāṇena jaghāna so 'patat
analyzed: niṣpīḍayām āsa yathā ārdram ambaram kṛtvā viṣāṇena jaghāna saḥ u patat

original: BhP_10.36.014/1 asṛg vaman mūtra-śakṛt samutsṛjan kṣipaṃś ca pādān anavasthitekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: asṛj vaman mūtra śakṛt samutsṛjan kṣipan ca pādān anavasthita īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.014/3 jagāma kṛcchraṃ nirṛter atha kṣayaṃ puṣpaiḥ kiranto harim īḍire surāḥ
analyzed: jagāma kṛcchram nirṛteḥ atha kṣayam puṣpaiḥ kirantaḥ harim īḍire surāḥ

original: BhP_10.36.015/1 evaṃ kukudminaṃ hatvā stūyamānaḥ dvijātibhiḥ
analyzed: evam kukudminam hatvā stūyamānaḥ dvijātibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.36.015/3 viveśa goṣṭhaṃ sa-balo gopīnāṃ nayanotsavaḥ
analyzed: viveśa goṣṭham sa balaḥ gopīnām nayana utsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.016/1 ariṣṭe nihate daitye kṛṣṇenādbhuta-karmaṇā
analyzed: ariṣṭe nihate daitye kṛṣṇena adbhuta karmaṇā

original: BhP_10.36.016/3 kaṃsāyāthāha bhagavān nārado deva-darśanaḥ
analyzed: kaṃsāya atha āha bhagavān nāradaḥ devadarśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.017/1 yaśodāyāḥ sutāṃ kanyāṃ devakyāḥ kṛṣṇam eva ca
analyzed: yaśodāyāḥ sutām kanyām devakyāḥ kṛṣṇam eva ca

original: BhP_10.36.017/3 rāmaṃ ca rohiṇī-putraṃ vasudevena bibhyatā
analyzed: rāmam ca rohiṇī putram vasudevena bibhyatā

original: BhP_10.36.017/5 nyastau sva-mitre nande vai yābhyāṃ te puruṣā hatāḥ
analyzed: nyastau sva mitre nande vai yābhyām te puruṣāḥ hatāḥ

original: BhP_10.36.018/1 niśamya tad bhoja-patiḥ kopāt pracalitendriyaḥ
analyzed: niśamya tat bhojapatiḥ kopāt pracalita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.018/3 niśātam asim ādatta vasudeva-jighāṃsayā
analyzed: niśātam asim ādatta vasudeva jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.36.019/1 nivārito nāradena tat-sutau mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: nivāritaḥ nāradena tad sutau mṛtyum ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.019/3 jñātvā loha-mayaiḥ pāśair babandha saha bhāryayā
analyzed: jñātvā loha mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ babandha saha bhāryayā

original: BhP_10.36.020/1 pratiyāte tu devarṣau kaṃsa ābhāṣya keśinam
analyzed: pratiyāte tu deva ṛṣau kaṃse ābhāṣya keśinam

original: BhP_10.36.020/3 preṣayām āsa hanyetāṃ bhavatā rāma-keśavau
analyzed: preṣayām āsa hanyetām bhavatā rāma keśavau

original: BhP_10.36.021/1 tato muṣṭika-cāṇūra śala-tośalakādikān
analyzed: tatas muṣṭika cāṇūra śalataḥ ūśalaka ādikān

original: BhP_10.36.021/3 amātyān hastipāṃś caiva samāhūyāha bhoja-rāṭ
analyzed: amātyān hastipān ca eva samāhūya āha bhojarāj

original: BhP_10.36.022/1 bho bho niśamyatām etad vīra-cāṇūra-muṣṭikau
analyzed: bho bho niśamyatām etat vīra cāṇūra muṣṭikau

original: BhP_10.36.022/3 nanda-vraje kilāsāte sutāv ānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: nanda vraje sutau ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.36.023/1 rāma-kṛṣṇau tato mahyaṃ mṛtyuḥ kila nidarśitaḥ
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇau tatas mahyam mṛtyuḥ kila nidarśitaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.023/3 bhavadbhyām iha samprāptau hanyetāṃ malla-līlayā
analyzed: bhavadbhyām iha samprāptau hanyetām malla līlayā

original: BhP_10.36.024/1 mañcāḥ kriyantāṃ vividhā malla-raṅga-pariśritāḥ
analyzed: mañcāḥ kriyantām vividhāḥ malla raṅga pariśritāḥ

original: BhP_10.36.024/3 paurā jānapadāḥ sarve paśyantu svaira-saṃyugam
analyzed: paurāḥ jānapadāḥ sarve paśyantu svaira saṃyugam

original: BhP_10.36.025/1 mahāmātra tvayā bhadra raṅga-dvāry upanīyatām
analyzed: mahāmātra tvayā bhadra raṅga dvāri upanīyatām

original: BhP_10.36.025/3 dvipaḥ kuvalayāpīḍo jahi tena mamāhitau
analyzed: dvipaḥ kuvalayāpīḍaḥ jahi tena mama ahitau

original: BhP_10.36.026/1 ārabhyatāṃ dhanur-yāgaś caturdaśyāṃ yathā-vidhi
analyzed: ārabhyatām dhanuḥ yāgaḥ caturdaśyām yathāvidhi

original: BhP_10.36.026/3 viśasantu paśūn medhyān bhūta-rājāya mīḍhuṣe
analyzed: viśasantu paśūn medhyān bhūtarājāya mīḍhuṣe

original: BhP_10.36.027/1 ity ājñāpyārtha-tantra-jña āhūya yadu-puṅgavam
analyzed: iti ājñāpya artha tantra jñaḥ āhūya yadu puṅgavam

original: BhP_10.36.027/3 gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇiṃ tato 'krūram uvāca ha
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim krūram uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.36.028/1 bho bho dāna-pate mahyaṃ kriyatāṃ maitram ādṛtaḥ
analyzed: bho bho dānapate mahyam kriyatām maitram ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.36.028/3 nānyas tvatto hitatamo vidyate bhoja-vṛṣṇiṣu
analyzed: na anyaḥ tvattaḥ hitatamaḥ vidyate bhoja vṛṣṇiṣu

original: BhP_10.36.029/1 atas tvām āśritaḥ saumya kārya-gaurava-sādhanam
analyzed: atas tvām āśritaḥ saumya kārya gaurava sādhanam

original: BhP_10.36.029/3 yathendro viṣṇum āśritya svārtham adhyagamad vibhuḥ
analyzed: yathā indraḥ viṣṇum āśritya sva artham adhyagamat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.36.030/1 gaccha nanda-vrajaṃ tatra sutāv ānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: gaccha nanda vrajam tatra sutau ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.36.030/3 āsāte tāv ihānena rathenānaya mā ciram
analyzed: āsāte tau iha anena rathena ānaya mā ciram

original: BhP_10.36.031/1 nisṛṣṭaḥ kila me mṛtyur devair vaikuṇṭha-saṃśrayaiḥ
analyzed: nisṛṣṭaḥ kila me mṛtyuḥ devaiḥ vaikuṇṭha saṃśrayaiḥ

original: BhP_10.36.031/3 tāv ānaya samaṃ gopair nandādyaiḥ sābhyupāyanaiḥ
analyzed: tau ānaya samam gopaiḥ nanda ādyaiḥ sa abhyupāyanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.36.032/1 ghātayiṣya ihānītau kāla-kalpena hastinā
analyzed: ghātayiṣye iha ānītau kāla kalpena hastinā

original: BhP_10.36.032/3 yadi muktau tato mallair ghātaye vaidyutopamaiḥ
analyzed: yadi muktau tatas mallaiḥ ghātaye vaidyuta upamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.36.033/1 tayor nihatayos taptān vasudeva-purogamān
analyzed: tayoḥ nihatayoḥ taptān vasudeva purogamān

original: BhP_10.36.033/3 tad-bandhūn nihaniṣyāmi vṛṣṇi-bhoja-daśārhakān
analyzed: tad bandhūn nihaniṣyāmi vṛṣṇi bhoja daśārhakān

original: BhP_10.36.034/1 ugrasenaṃ ca pitaraṃ sthaviraṃ rājya-kāmukaṃ
analyzed: ugrasenam ca pitaram sthaviram rājya kāmukam

original: BhP_10.36.034/3 tad-bhrātaraṃ devakaṃ ca ye cānye vidviṣo mama
analyzed: tad bhrātaram devakam ca ye ca anye vidviṣaḥ mama

original: BhP_10.36.035/1 tataś caiṣā mahī mitra
analyzed: tatas ca eṣā mahī mitra

original: BhP_10.36.035/2 bhavitrī naṣṭa-kaṇṭakā
analyzed: bhavitrī naṣṭa kaṇṭakā

original: BhP_10.36.036/1 jarāsandho mama gurur dvivido dayitaḥ sakhā
analyzed: jarāsandhaḥ mama guruḥ dvividaḥ dayitaḥ sakhā

original: BhP_10.36.036/3 śambaro narako bāṇo mayy eva kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ
analyzed: śambaraḥ narakaḥ bāṇaḥ mayi eva kṛta sauhṛdāḥ

original: BhP_10.36.036/5 tair ahaṃ sura-pakṣīyān hatvā bhokṣye mahīṃ nṛpān
analyzed: taiḥ aham sura pakṣīyān hatvā bhokṣye mahīm nṛpān

original: BhP_10.36.037/1 etaj jñātvānaya kṣipraṃ rāma-kṛṣṇāv ihārbhakau
analyzed: etat jñātvā ānaya kṣipram rāma kṛṣṇau iha arbhakau

original: BhP_10.36.037/3 dhanur-makha-nirīkṣārthaṃ draṣṭuṃ yadu-pura-śriyam
analyzed: dhanuḥ makha nirīkṣā artham draṣṭum yadu pura śriyam

original: BhP_10.36.038/0 śrī-akrūra uvāca
analyzed: śrī akrūraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.36.038/1 rājan manīṣitaṃ sadhryak tava svāvadya-mārjanam
analyzed: rājan manīṣitam sadhryak tava svāvadya mārjanam

original: BhP_10.36.038/3 siddhy-asiddhyoḥ samaṃ kuryād daivaṃ hi phala-sādhanam
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ samam kuryāt daivam hi phala sādhanam

original: BhP_10.36.039/1 manorathān karoty uccair jano daiva-hatān api
analyzed: manorathān karoti uccais janaḥ daiva hatān api

original: BhP_10.36.039/3 yujyate harṣa-śokābhyāṃ tathāpy ājñāṃ karomi te
analyzed: yujyate harṣa śokābhyām tathā api ājñām karomi te

original: BhP_10.36.040/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.36.040/1 evam ādiśya cākrūraṃ mantriṇaś ca viṣṛjya saḥ
analyzed: evam ādiśya ca akrūram mantriṇaḥ ca viṣṛjya saḥ

original: BhP_10.36.040/3 praviveśa gṛhaṃ kaṃsas tathākrūraḥ svam ālayam
analyzed: praviveśa gṛham kaṃsaḥ tathā akrūraḥ svam ālayam

original: BhP_10.37.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.37.001/1 keśī tu kaṃsa-prahitaḥ khurair mahīṃ
analyzed: keśī tu kaṃsa prahitaḥ khuraiḥ mahīm

original: BhP_10.37.001/2 mahā-hayo nirjarayan mano-javaḥ
analyzed: mahā hayaḥ nirjarayan manojavaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.001/3 saṭāvadhūtābhra-vimāna-saṅkulaṃ
analyzed: saṭā avadhūta abhra vimāna saṅkulam

original: BhP_10.37.001/4 kurvan nabho heṣita-bhīṣitākhilaḥ
analyzed: kurvan nabhaḥ heṣita bhīṣita akhilaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.002/1 taṃ trāsayantaṃ bhagavān sva-gokulaṃ
analyzed: tam trāsayantam bhagavān sva gokulam

original: BhP_10.37.002/2 tad-dheṣitair vāla-vighūrṇitāmbudam
analyzed: tad heṣitaiḥ vāla vighūrṇita ambudam

original: BhP_10.37.002/3 ātmānam ājau mṛgayantam agra-ṇīr
analyzed: ātmānam ājau mṛgayantam agraṇīḥ

original: BhP_10.37.002/4 upāhvayat sa vyanadan mṛgendra-vat
analyzed: upāhvayat sa vyanadat mṛgendra vat

original: BhP_10.37.003/1 sa taṃ niśāmyābhimukho makhena khaṃ
analyzed: sa tam niśāmya abhimukhaḥ makhena kham

original: BhP_10.37.003/2 pibann ivābhyadravad aty-amarṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: piban iva abhyadravat atyamarṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.003/3 jaghāna padbhyām aravinda-locanaṃ
analyzed: jaghāna padbhyām aravinda locanam

original: BhP_10.37.003/4 durāsadaś caṇḍa-javo duratyayaḥ
analyzed: durāsadaḥ caṇḍa javaḥ duratyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.004/1 tad vañcayitvā tam adhokṣajo ruṣā pragṛhya dorbhyāṃ parividhya pādayoḥ
analyzed: tat vañcayitvā tam adhokṣajaḥ ruṣā pragṛhya dorbhyām parividhya pādayoḥ

original: BhP_10.37.004/3 sāvajñam utsṛjya dhanuḥ-śatāntare yathoragaṃ tārkṣya-suto vyavasthitaḥ
analyzed: sa avajñam utsṛjya dhanuḥ śata antare yathā uragam tārkṣyasutaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.005/1 saḥ labdha-saṃjñaḥ punar utthito ruṣā
analyzed: saḥ labdha saṃjñaḥ punar utthitaḥ ruṣā

original: BhP_10.37.005/2 vyādāya keśī tarasāpatad dharim
analyzed: vyādāya keśī tarasā apatat harim

original: BhP_10.37.005/3 so 'py asya vaktre bhujam uttaraṃ smayan
analyzed: saḥ pi asya vaktre bhujam uttaram smayan

original: BhP_10.37.005/4 praveśayām āsa yathoragaṃ bile
analyzed: praveśayām āsa yathā uragam bile

original: BhP_10.37.006/1 dantā nipetur bhagavad-bhuja-spṛśas
analyzed: dantāḥ nipetuḥ bhagavat bhuja spṛśaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.006/2 te keśinas tapta-maya-spṛśo yathā
analyzed: te keśinaḥ tapta maya spṛśaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.37.006/3 bāhuś ca tad-deha-gato mahātmano
analyzed: bāhuḥ ca tad deha gataḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.006/4 yathāmayaḥ saṃvavṛdhe upekṣitaḥ
analyzed: yathā āmayaḥ saṃvavṛdhe upekṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.007/1 samedhamānena sa kṛṣṇa-bāhunā niruddha-vāyuś caraṇāṃś ca vikṣipan
analyzed: samedhamānena sa kṛṣṇa bāhunā niruddha vāyuḥ caraṇān ca vikṣipan

original: BhP_10.37.007/3 prasvinna-gātraḥ parivṛtta-locanaḥ papāta laṇḍaṃ visṛjan kṣitau vyasuḥ
analyzed: prasvinna gātraḥ parivṛtta locanaḥ papāta laṇḍam visṛjan kṣitau vyasuḥ

original: BhP_10.37.008/1 tad-dehataḥ karkaṭikā-phalopamād vyasor apākṛṣya bhujaṃ mahā-bhujaḥ
analyzed: tad dehataḥ karkaṭikā phala upamāt vyasoḥ apākṛṣya bhujam mahā bhujaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.008/3 avismito 'yatna-hatārikaḥ suraiḥ prasūna-varṣair varṣadbhir īḍitaḥ
analyzed: a vismitaḥ yatna hata arikaḥ suraiḥ prasūna varṣaiḥ varṣadbhiḥ īḍitaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.009/1 devarṣir upasaṅgamya bhāgavata-pravaro nṛpa
analyzed: deva ṛṣiḥ upasaṅgamya bhāgavata pravaraḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.37.009/3 kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa-karmāṇaṃ rahasy etad abhāṣata
analyzed: kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa karmāṇam rahasi etat abhāṣata

original: BhP_10.37.010/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇāprameyātman yogeśa jagad-īśvara
BhP_10.37.010/3 vāsudevākhilāvāsa sātvatāṃ pravara prabho
analyzed: vāsudeva akhila āvāsa sātvatām pravara prabho

original: BhP_10.37.011/1 tvam ātmā sarva-bhūtānām eko jyotir ivaidhasām
analyzed: tvam ātmā sarva bhūtānām ekaḥ jyotiḥ iva edhasām

original: BhP_10.37.011/3 gūḍho guhā-śayaḥ sākṣī mahā-puruṣa īśvaraḥ
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ guhā āśayaḥ sākṣī mahāpuruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.37.012/1 ātmanātmāśrayaḥ pūrvaṃ māyayā sasṛje guṇān
analyzed: ātmanā ātma āśrayaḥ pūrvam māyayā sasṛje guṇān

original: BhP_10.37.012/3 tair idaṃ satya-saṅkalpaḥ sṛjasy atsy avasīśvaraḥ
analyzed: taiḥ idam satya saṅkalpaḥ sṛjasi atsi avasi īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.37.013/1 sa tvaṃ bhūdhara-bhūtānāṃ daitya-pramatha-rakṣasām
analyzed: sa tvam bhūdhara bhūtānām daitya pramatha rakṣasām

original: BhP_10.37.013/3 avatīrṇo vināśāya sādhunāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ vināśāya sādhunām rakṣaṇāya ca

original: BhP_10.37.014/1 diṣṭyā te nihato daityo līlayāyaṃ hayākṛtiḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā te nihataḥ daityaḥ līlayā ayam haya ākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_10.37.014/3 yasya heṣita-santrastās tyajanty animiṣā divam
analyzed: yasya heṣita santrastāḥ tyajanti animiṣāḥ divam

original: BhP_10.37.015/1 cāṇūraṃ muṣṭikaṃ caiva mallān anyāṃś ca hastinam
analyzed: cāṇūram muṣṭikam ca eva mallān anyān ca hastinam

original: BhP_10.37.015/3 kaṃsaṃ ca nihataṃ drakṣye paraśvo 'hani te vibho
analyzed: kaṃsam ca nihatam drakṣye paraśvas hani te vibho

original: BhP_10.37.016/1 tasyānu śaṅkha-yavana- murāṇāṃ narakasya ca
analyzed: tasya anu śaṅkhayavana murāṇām narakasya ca

original: BhP_10.37.016/3 pārijātāpaharaṇam indrasya ca parājayam
analyzed: pārijāta apaharaṇam indrasya ca parājayam

original: BhP_10.37.017/1 udvāhaṃ vīra-kanyānāṃ vīrya-śulkādi-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: udvāham vīra kanyānām vīrya śulka ādi lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.37.017/3 nṛgasya mokṣaṇaṃ śāpād dvārakāyāṃ jagat-pate
analyzed: nṛgasya mokṣaṇam śāpāt dvārakāyām jagatpate

original: BhP_10.37.018/1 syamantakasya ca maṇer ādānaṃ saha bhāryayā
analyzed: syamantakasya ca maṇeḥ ādānam saha bhāryayā

original: BhP_10.37.018/3 mṛta-putra-pradānaṃ ca brāhmaṇasya sva-dhāmataḥ
analyzed: mṛta putra pradānam ca brāhmaṇasya sva dhāmataḥ

original: BhP_10.37.019/1 pauṇḍrakasya vadhaṃ paścāt kāśi-puryāś ca dīpanam
analyzed: pauṇḍrakasya vadham paścāt kāśi puryāḥ ca dīpanam

original: BhP_10.37.019/3 dantavakrasya nidhanaṃ caidyasya ca mahā-kratau
analyzed: dantavakrasya nidhanam caidyasya ca mahā kratau

original: BhP_10.37.020/1 yāni cānyāni vīryāṇi dvārakām āvasan bhavān
analyzed: yāni ca anyāni vīryāṇi dvārakām āvasan bhavān

original: BhP_10.37.020/3 kartā drakṣyāmy ahaṃ tāni geyāni kavibhir bhuvi
analyzed: kartā drakṣyāmi aham tāni geyāni kavibhiḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_10.37.021/1 atha te kāla-rūpasya kṣapayiṣṇor amuṣya vai
analyzed: atha te kāla rūpasya kṣapayiṣṇoḥ amuṣya vai

original: BhP_10.37.021/3 akṣauhiṇīnāṃ nidhanaṃ drakṣyāmy arjuna-sāratheḥ
analyzed: akṣauhiṇīnām nidhanam drakṣyāmi arjuna sāratheḥ

original: BhP_10.37.022/1 viśuddha-vijñāna-ghanaṃ sva-saṃsthayā
analyzed: viśuddha vijñāna ghanam sva saṃsthayā

original: BhP_10.37.022/2 samāpta-sarvārtham amogha-vāñchitam
analyzed: samāpta sarva artham amogha vāñchitam

original: BhP_10.37.022/3 sva-tejasā nitya-nivṛtta-māyā-
analyzed: sva tejasā nitya nivṛtta māyā

original: BhP_10.37.022/4 guṇa-pravāhaṃ bhagavantam īmahi
analyzed: guṇa pravāham bhagavantam īmahi

original: BhP_10.37.023/1 tvām īśvaraṃ svāśrayam ātma-māyayā vinirmitāśeṣa-viśeṣa-kalpanam
analyzed: tvām īśvaram sva āśrayam ātma māyayā vinirmita aśeṣa viśeṣa kalpanam

original: BhP_10.37.023/3 krīḍārtham adyātta-manuṣya-vigrahaṃ nato 'smi dhuryaṃ yadu-vṛṣṇi-sātvatām
analyzed: krīḍā artham adya ātta manuṣya vigraham nataḥ smi dhuryam yadu vṛṣṇi sātvatām

original: BhP_10.37.024/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.37.024/1 evaṃ yadu-patiṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bhāgavata-pravaro muniḥ
analyzed: evam yadu patim kṛṣṇam bhāgavata pravaraḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_10.37.024/3 praṇipatyābhyanujñāto yayau tad-darśanotsavaḥ
analyzed: praṇipatya abhyanujñātaḥ yayau tad darśana utsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.025/1 bhagavān api govindo hatvā keśinam āhave
analyzed: bhagavān api govindaḥ hatvā keśinam āhave

original: BhP_10.37.025/3 paśūn apālayat pālaiḥ prītair vraja-sukhāvahaḥ
analyzed: paśūn apālayat pālaiḥ prītaiḥ vraja sukha āvahaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.026/1 ekadā te paśūn pālāś cārayanto 'dri-sānuṣu
analyzed: ekadā te paśūn pālāḥ cārayantaḥ dri sānuṣu

original: BhP_10.37.026/3 cakrur nilāyana-krīḍāś cora-pālāpadeśataḥ
analyzed: cakruḥ nilāyana krīḍāḥ corapa ālāpa deśataḥ

original: BhP_10.37.027/1 tatrāsan katicic corāḥ pālāś ca katicin nṛpa
analyzed: tatra āsan katicid corāḥ pālāḥ ca katicid nṛpa

original: BhP_10.37.027/3 meṣāyitāś ca tatraike vijahrur akuto-bhayāḥ
analyzed: meṣāyitāḥ ca tatra eke vijahruḥ akutobhayāḥ

original: BhP_10.37.028/1 maya-putro mahā-māyo vyomo gopāla-veṣa-dhṛk
BhP_10.37.028/3 meṣāyitān apovāha prāyaś corāyito bahūn
analyzed: meṣāyitān apovāha prāyas corāyitaḥ bahūn

original: BhP_10.37.029/1 giri-daryāṃ vinikṣipya nītaṃ nītaṃ mahāsuraḥ
analyzed: giri daryām vinikṣipya nītam nītam mahā asuraḥ

original: BhP_10.37.029/3 śilayā pidadhe dvāraṃ catuḥ-pañcāvaśeṣitāḥ
analyzed: śilayā pidadhe dvāram catur pañca avaśeṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.37.030/1 tasya tat karma vijñāya kṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇa-daḥ satām
analyzed: tasya tat karma vijñāya kṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇa daḥ satām

original: BhP_10.37.030/3 gopān nayantaṃ jagrāha vṛkaṃ harir ivaujasā
analyzed: gopān nayantam jagrāha vṛkam hariḥ iva ojasā

original: BhP_10.37.031/1 sa nijaṃ rūpam āsthāya girīndra-sadṛśaṃ balī
analyzed: sa nijam rūpam āsthāya giri indra sadṛśam balī

original: BhP_10.37.031/3 icchan vimoktum ātmānaṃ nāśaknod grahaṇāturaḥ
analyzed: icchan vimoktum ātmānam na aśaknot grahaṇa āturaḥ

original: BhP_10.37.032/1 taṃ nigṛhyācyuto dorbhyāṃ pātayitvā mahī-tale
analyzed: tam nigṛhya acyutaḥ dorbhyām pātayitvā mahī tale

original: BhP_10.37.032/3 paśyatāṃ divi devānāṃ paśu-māram amārayat
analyzed: paśyatām divi devānām paśumāram amārayat

original: BhP_10.37.033/1 guhā-pidhānaṃ nirbhidya gopān niḥsārya kṛcchrataḥ
analyzed: guhā pidhānam nirbhidya gopān niḥsārya kṛcchrataḥ

original: BhP_10.37.033/3 stūyamānaḥ surair gopaiḥ praviveśa sva-gokulam
analyzed: stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ gopaiḥ praviveśa sva gokulam

original: BhP_10.38.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.38.001/1 akrūro 'pi ca tāṃ rātriṃ madhu-puryāṃ mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: akrūraḥ ca tām rātrim madhupuryām mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.38.001/3 uṣitvā ratham āsthāya prayayau nanda-gokulam
analyzed: uṣitvā ratham āsthāya prayayau nanda gokulam

original: BhP_10.38.002/1 gacchan pathi mahā-bhāgo bhagavaty ambujekṣaṇe
analyzed: gacchan pathi mahābhāgaḥ bhagavati ambuja īkṣaṇe

original: BhP_10.38.002/3 bhaktiṃ parām upagata evam etad acintayat
analyzed: bhaktim parām upagataḥ evam etat acintayat

original: BhP_10.38.003/1 kiṃ mayācaritaṃ bhadraṃ kiṃ taptaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
analyzed: kim mayā ācaritam bhadram kim taptam paramam tapaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.003/3 kiṃ vāthāpy arhate dattaṃ yad drakṣyāmy adya keśavam
analyzed: kim vā atha api arhate dattam yat drakṣyāmi adya keśavam

original: BhP_10.38.004/1 mamaitad durlabhaṃ manya uttamaḥ-śloka-darśanam
analyzed: mama etat durlabham manye uttamaḥśloka darśanam

original: BhP_10.38.004/3 viṣayātmano yathā brahma- kīrtanaṃ śūdra-janmanaḥ
analyzed: viṣaya ātmanaḥ yathā brahma kīrtanam śūdrajanmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.005/1 maivaṃ mamādhamasyāpi syād evācyuta-darśanam
analyzed: mā evam mama adhamasya api syāt eva acyuta darśanam

original: BhP_10.38.005/3 hriyamāṇaḥ kala-nadyā kvacit tarati kaścana
analyzed: hriyamāṇaḥ kala nadyā kvacid tarati kaścana

original: BhP_10.38.006/1 mamādyāmaṅgalaṃ naṣṭaṃ phalavāṃś caiva me bhavaḥ
analyzed: mama ādya amaṅgalam naṣṭam phalavān ca eva me bhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.006/3 yan namasye bhagavato yogi-dhyeyānghri-paṅkajam
analyzed: yat namasye bhagavataḥ yogi dhyeya anghri paṅkajam

original: BhP_10.38.007/1 kaṃso batādyākṛta me 'ty-anugrahaṃ drakṣye 'ṅghri-padmaṃ prahito 'munā hareḥ
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ bata adya akṛta me drakṣye ṅghri padmam prahitaḥ munā hareḥ

original: BhP_10.38.007/3 kṛtāvatārasya duratyayaṃ tamaḥ pūrve 'taran yan-nakha-maṇḍala-tviṣā
analyzed: kṛta avatārasya duratyayam tamaḥ pūrve taran yat nakha maṇḍala tviṣā

original: BhP_10.38.008/1 yad arcitaṃ brahma-bhavādibhiḥ suraiḥ
analyzed: yat arcitam brahma bhava ādibhiḥ suraiḥ

original: BhP_10.38.008/2 śriyā ca devyā munibhiḥ sa-sātvataiḥ
analyzed: śriyā ca devyā munibhiḥ sa sātvataiḥ

original: BhP_10.38.008/3 go-cāraṇāyānucaraiś carad vane
analyzed: go cāraṇāya anucaraiḥ carat vane

original: BhP_10.38.008/4 yad gopikānāṃ kuca-kuṅkumāṅkitam
analyzed: yat gopikānām kuca kuṅkuma aṅkitam

original: BhP_10.38.009/1 drakṣyāmi nūnaṃ su-kapola-nāsikaṃ smitāvalokāruṇa-kañja-locanam
analyzed: drakṣyāmi nūnam su kapola nāsikam smita avaloka aruṇa kañja locanam

original: BhP_10.38.009/3 mukhaṃ mukundasya guḍālakāvṛtaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ me pracaranti vai mṛgāḥ
analyzed: mukham mukundasya guḍālaka āvṛtam pradakṣiṇam me pracaranti vai mṛgāḥ

original: BhP_10.38.010/1 apy adya viṣṇor manujatvam īyuṣo bhārāvatārāya bhuvo nijecchayā
analyzed: api adya viṣṇoḥ manuja tvam īyuṣaḥ bhāra avatārāya bhuvaḥ nija icchayā

original: BhP_10.38.010/3 lāvaṇya-dhāmno bhavitopalambhanaṃ mahyaṃ na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ
analyzed: lāvaṇya dhāmnaḥ bhavitā upalambhanam mahyam na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.011/1 ya īkṣitāhaṃ-rahito 'py asat-satoḥ sva-tejasāpāsta-tamo-bhidā-bhramaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ īkṣita ahaṃrahitaḥ pi asat satoḥ sva tejasā apāsta tamaḥ bhidā bhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.011/3 sva-māyayātman racitais tad-īkṣayā prāṇākṣa-dhībhiḥ sadaneṣv abhīyate
analyzed: sva māyayā ātman racitaiḥ tad īkṣayā prāṇa akṣa dhībhiḥ sadaneṣu abhīyate

original: BhP_10.38.012/1 yasyākhilāmīva-habhiḥ su-maṅgalaiḥ vāco vimiśrā guṇa-karma-janmabhiḥ
analyzed: yasya akhila āmīva habhiḥ su maṅgalaiḥ vācaḥ vimiśrāḥ guṇa karma janmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.38.012/3 prāṇanti śumbhanti punanti vai jagat yās tad-viraktāḥ śava-śobhanā matāḥ
analyzed: prāṇanti śumbhanti punanti vai jagat yāḥ tad viraktāḥ śava śobhanāḥ matāḥ

original: BhP_10.38.013/1 sa cāvatīrṇaḥ kila satvatānvaye sva-setu-pālāmara-varya-śarma-kṛt
analyzed: sa ca avatīrṇaḥ kila satvata anvaye sva setu pāla amara varya śarma kṛt

original: BhP_10.38.013/3 yaśo vitanvan vraja āsta īśvaro gāyanti devā yad aśeṣa-maṅgalam
analyzed: yaśaḥ vitanvan vraje āste īśvaraḥ gāyanti devāḥ yat aśeṣa maṅgalam

original: BhP_10.38.014/1 taṃ tv adya nūnaṃ mahatāṃ gatiṃ guruṃ
analyzed: tam tu adya nūnam mahatām gatim gurum

original: BhP_10.38.014/2 trailokya-kāntaṃ dṛśiman-mahotsavam
analyzed: trailokya kāntam dṛśimat mahā utsavam

original: BhP_10.38.014/3 rūpaṃ dadhānaṃ śriya īpsitāspadaṃ
analyzed: rūpam dadhānam śriyaḥ īpsita āspadam

original: BhP_10.38.014/4 drakṣye mamāsann uṣasaḥ su-darśanāḥ
analyzed: drakṣye mama āsan uṣasaḥ su darśanāḥ

original: BhP_10.38.015/1 athāvarūḍhaḥ sapadīśayo rathāt pradhāna-puṃsoś caraṇaṃ sva-labdhaye
analyzed: athā avarūḍhaḥ sapadīśayoḥ rathāt pradhāna puṃsoḥ caraṇam sva labdhaye

original: BhP_10.38.015/3 dhiyā dhṛtaṃ yogibhir apy ahaṃ dhruvaṃ namasya ābhyāṃ ca sakhīn vanaukasaḥ
analyzed: dhiyā dhṛtam yogibhiḥ api aham dhruvam namasyaḥ ābhyām ca sakhīn vanaukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.016/1 apy aṅghri-mūle patitasya me vibhuḥ
analyzed: api aṅghri mūle patitasya me vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.38.016/2 śirasy adhāsyan nija-hasta-paṅkajam
analyzed: śirasi adhāsyan nija hasta paṅkajam

original: BhP_10.38.016/3 dattābhayaṃ kāla-bhujāṅga-raṃhasā
analyzed: datta abhayam kāla bhuja aṅga raṃhasā

original: BhP_10.38.016/4 prodvejitānāṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇāṃ ṇṛnām
analyzed: prodvejitānām śaraṇa eṣiṇām ṇṛnām

original: BhP_10.38.017/1 samarhaṇaṃ yatra nidhāya kauśikas tathā baliś cāpa jagat-trayendratām
analyzed: samarhaṇam yatra nidhāya kauśikaḥ tathā baliḥ ca āpa jagattraya indra tām

original: BhP_10.38.017/3 yad vā vihāre vraja-yoṣitāṃ śramaṃ sparśena saugandhika-gandhy apānudat
analyzed: yat vā vihāre vraja yoṣitām śramam sparśena saugandhika gandhi apānudat

original: BhP_10.38.018/1 na mayy upaiṣyaty ari-buddhim acyutaḥ
analyzed: na mayi upaiṣyati ari buddhim acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.018/2 kaṃsasya dūtaḥ prahito 'pi viśva-dṛk
analyzed: kaṃsasya dūtaḥ prahitaḥ pi viśva dṛś

original: BhP_10.38.018/3 yo 'ntar bahiś cetasa etad īhitaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ ntar bahis cetasaḥ etat īhitam

original: BhP_10.38.018/4 kṣetra-jña īkṣaty amalena cakṣuṣā
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ īkṣati amalena cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_10.38.019/1 apy aṅghri-mūle 'vahitaṃ kṛtāñjaliṃ
analyzed: api aṅghri mūle vahitam kṛtāñjalim

original: BhP_10.38.019/2 mām īkṣitā sa-smitam ārdrayā dṛśā
analyzed: mām īkṣitā sa smitam ārdrayā dṛśā

original: BhP_10.38.019/3 sapady apadhvasta-samasta-kilbiṣo
analyzed: sapadi apadhvasta samasta kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.019/4 voḍhā mudaṃ vīta-viśaṅka ūrjitām
analyzed: voḍhā mudam vīta viśaṅkaḥ ūrjitām

original: BhP_10.38.020/1 suhṛttamaṃ jñātim ananya-daivataṃ dorbhyāṃ bṛhadbhyāṃ parirapsyate 'tha mām
analyzed: suhṛttamam jñātim an anya daivatam dorbhyām bṛhadbhyām parirapsyate mām

original: BhP_10.38.020/3 ātmā hi tīrthī-kriyate tadaiva me bandhaś ca karmātmaka ucchvasity ataḥ
analyzed: ātmā hi tīrthīkriyate tadā eva me bandhaḥ ca karma ātmakaḥ ucchvasiti atas

original: BhP_10.38.021/1 labdhvāṅga-saṅgam praṇatam kṛtāñjaliṃ
analyzed: labdhvā aṅgasaṅgam praṇatam kṛtāñjalim

original: BhP_10.38.021/2 māṃ vakṣyate 'krūra tatety uruśravāḥ
analyzed: mām vakṣyate krūra tata iti uruśravāḥ

original: BhP_10.38.021/3 tadā vayaṃ janma-bhṛto mahīyasā
analyzed: tadā vayam janma bhṛtaḥ mahīyasā

original: BhP_10.38.021/4 naivādṛto yo dhig amuṣya janma tat
analyzed: na eva ādṛtaḥ yaḥ dhik amuṣya janma tat

original: BhP_10.38.022/1 na tasya kaścid dayitaḥ suhṛttamo na cāpriyo dveṣya upekṣya eva vā
analyzed: na tasya kaścid dayitaḥ suhṛttamaḥ na ca apriyaḥ dveṣyaḥ upekṣyaḥ eva vā

original: BhP_10.38.022/3 tathāpi bhaktān bhajate yathā tathā sura-drumo yadvad upāśrito 'rtha-daḥ
analyzed: tathā api bhaktān bhajate yathā tathā suradrumaḥ yadvat upāśritaḥ ṛtha daḥ

original: BhP_10.38.023/1 kiṃ cāgrajo māvanataṃ yadūttamaḥ smayan pariṣvajya gṛhītam añjalau
analyzed: kim ca agrajaḥ mā avanatam yadu uttamaḥ smayan pariṣvajya gṛhītam añjalau

original: BhP_10.38.023/3 gṛhaṃ praveṣyāpta-samasta-satkṛtaṃ samprakṣyate kaṃsa-kṛtaṃ sva-bandhuṣu
analyzed: gṛham praveṣya āpta samasta satkṛtam samprakṣyate kaṃsa kṛtam sva bandhuṣu

original: BhP_10.38.024/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.38.024/1 iti sañcintayan kṛṣṇaṃ śvaphalka-tanayo 'dhvani
analyzed: iti sañcintayan kṛṣṇam śvaphalka tanayaḥ dhvani

original: BhP_10.38.024/3 rathena gokulaṃ prāptaḥ sūryaś cāsta-giriṃ nṛpa
analyzed: rathena gokulam prāptaḥ sūryaḥ ca asta girim nṛpa

original: BhP_10.38.025/1 padāni tasyākhila-loka-pāla- kirīṭa-juṣṭāmala-pāda-reṇoḥ
analyzed: padāni tasya akhila lokapāla kirīṭa juṣṭa amala pāda reṇoḥ

original: BhP_10.38.025/3 dadarśa goṣṭhe kṣiti-kautukāni vilakṣitāny abja-yavāṅkuśādyaiḥ
analyzed: dadarśa goṣṭhe kṣiti kautukāni vilakṣitāni abja yava aṅkuśa ādyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.38.026/1 tad-darśanāhlāda-vivṛddha-sambhramaḥ
analyzed: tad darśana āhlāda vivṛddha sambhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.026/2 premṇordhva-romāśru-kalākulekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: premṇā ūrdhva roma aśru kalā ākula īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.026/3 rathād avaskandya sa teṣv aceṣṭata
analyzed: rathāt avaskandya sa teṣu aceṣṭata

original: BhP_10.38.026/4 prabhor amūny aṅghri-rajāṃsy aho iti
analyzed: prabhoḥ amūni aṅghri rajāṃsi aho iti

original: BhP_10.38.027/1 dehaṃ-bhṛtām iyān artho hitvā dambhaṃ bhiyaṃ śucam
analyzed: dehaṃbhṛtām iyān arthaḥ hitvā dambham bhiyam śucam

original: BhP_10.38.027/3 sandeśād yo harer liṅga- darśana-śravaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: sandeśāt yaḥ hareḥ liṅga darśana śravaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.38.028/1 dadarśa kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ ca vraje go-dohanaṃ gatau
analyzed: dadarśa kṛṣṇam rāmam ca vraje godohanam gatau

original: BhP_10.38.028/2 pīta-nīlāmbara-dharau śarad-amburahekṣaṇau
analyzed: pīta nīla ambara dharau śarad ambu raha īkṣaṇau

original: BhP_10.38.029/1 kiśorau śyāmala-śvetau śrī-niketau bṛhad-bhujau
analyzed: kiśorau śyāmala śvetau śrīniketau bṛhat bhujau

original: BhP_10.38.029/3 su-mukhau sundara-varau bala-dvirada-vikramau
analyzed: su mukhau sundara varau bala dvirada vikramau

original: BhP_10.38.030/1 dhvaja-vajrāṅkuśāmbhojaiś cihnitair aṅghribhir vrajam
analyzed: dhvaja vajra aṅkuśa ambhojaiḥ cihnitaiḥ aṅghribhiḥ vrajam

original: BhP_10.38.030/3 śobhayantau mahātmānau sānukrośa-smitekṣaṇau
analyzed: śobhayantau mahātmānau sa anukrośa smita īkṣaṇau

original: BhP_10.38.031/1 udāra-rucira-krīḍau sragviṇau vana-mālinau
analyzed: udāra rucira krīḍau sragviṇau vana mālinau

original: BhP_10.38.031/3 puṇya-gandhānuliptāṅgau snātau viraja-vāsasau
analyzed: puṇya gandha anulipta aṅgau snātau viraja vāsasau

original: BhP_10.38.032/1 pradhāna-puruṣāv ādyau jagad-dhetū jagat-patī
BhP_10.38.032/3 avatīrṇau jagaty-arthe svāṃśena bala-keśavau
analyzed: avatīrṇau jagatī arthe sva aṃśena bala keśavau

original: BhP_10.38.033/1 diśo vitimirā rājan kurvāṇau prabhayā svayā
analyzed: diśaḥ vitimirāḥ rājan kurvāṇau prabhayā svayā

original: BhP_10.38.033/3 yathā mārakataḥ śailo raupyaś ca kanakācitau
analyzed: yathā mārakataḥ śailaḥ raupyaḥ ca kanaka ācitau

original: BhP_10.38.034/1 rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya so 'krūraḥ sneha-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya saḥ krūraḥ sneha vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.034/3 papāta caraṇopānte daṇḍa-vad rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: papāta caraṇa upānte daṇḍa vat rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.38.035/1 bhagavad-darśanāhlāda- bāṣpa-paryākulekṣaṇaḥ
BhP_10.38.035/3 pulakacitāṅga autkaṇṭhyāt svākhyāne nāśakan nṛpa
analyzed: pulaka cita aṅgaḥ autkaṇṭhyāt su ākhyāne nā aśakat nṛpa

original: BhP_10.38.036/1 bhagavāṃs tam abhipretya rathāṅgāṅkita-pāṇinā
analyzed: bhagavān tam abhipretya rathāṅga aṅkita pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.38.036/3 parirebhe 'bhyupākṛṣya prītaḥ praṇata-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: parirebhe bhyupākṛṣya prītaḥ praṇata vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.037/1 saṅkarṣaṇaś ca praṇatam upaguhya mahā-manāḥ
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇaḥ ca praṇatam upaguhya mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_10.38.037/3 gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇī anayat sānujo gṛham
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇī anayat sa anujaḥ gṛham

original: BhP_10.38.038/1 pṛṣṭvātha sv-āgataṃ tasmai nivedya ca varāsanam
analyzed: pṛṣṭvā atha svāgatam tasmai nivedya ca varāsanam

original: BhP_10.38.038/3 prakṣālya vidhi-vat pādau madhu-parkārhaṇam āharat
analyzed: prakṣālya vidhivat pādau madhuparka arhaṇam āharat

original: BhP_10.38.039/1 nivedya gāṃ cātithaye saṃvāhya śrāntam āḍṛtaḥ
analyzed: nivedya gām ca atithaye saṃvāhya śrāntam

original: BhP_10.38.039/3 annaṃ bahu-guṇaṃ medhyaṃ śraddhayopāharad vibhuḥ
analyzed: annam bahu guṇam medhyam śraddhayā upāharat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.38.040/1 tasmai bhuktavate prītyā rāmaḥ parama-dharma-vit
analyzed: tasmai bhuktavate prītyā rāmaḥ parama dharma vid

original: BhP_10.38.040/3 makha-vāsair gandha-mālyaiḥ parāṃ prītiṃ vyadhāt punaḥ
analyzed: makha vāsaiḥ gandha mālyaiḥ parām prītim vyadhāt punar

original: BhP_10.38.041/1 papraccha sat-kṛtaṃ nandaḥ kathaṃ stha niranugrahe
analyzed: papraccha satkṛtam nandaḥ katham stha niranugrahe

original: BhP_10.38.041/3 kaṃse jīvati dāśārha sauna-pālā ivāvayaḥ
analyzed: kaṃse jīvati dāśārha saunapālāḥ iva avayaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.042/1 yo 'vadhīt sva-svasus tokān krośantyā asu-tṛp khalaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vadhīt sva svasuḥ tokān krośantyāḥ asutṛp khalaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.042/3 kiṃ nu svit tat-prajānāṃ vaḥ kuśalaṃ vimṛśāmahe
analyzed: kim nu svid tat prajānām vaḥ kuśalam vimṛśāmahe

original: BhP_10.38.043/1 itthaṃ sūnṛtayā vācā nandena su-sabhājitaḥ
analyzed: ittham sūnṛtayā vācā nandena su sabhājitaḥ

original: BhP_10.38.043/3 akrūraḥ paripṛṣṭena jahāv adhva-pariśramam
analyzed: akrūraḥ paripṛṣṭena jahau adhva pariśramam

original: BhP_10.39.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.39.001/1 sukhopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅke rama-kṛṣṇoru-mānitaḥ
analyzed: sukha upaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅke rama kṛṣṇa ūru mānitaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.001/3 lebhe manorathān sarvān pathi yān sa cakāra ha
analyzed: lebhe manorathān sarvān pathi yān sa cakāra ha

original: BhP_10.39.002/1 kim alabhyaṃ bhagavati prasanne śrī-niketane
analyzed: kim alabhyam bhagavati prasanne śrīniketane

original: BhP_10.39.002/3 tathāpi tat-parā rājan na hi vāñchanti kiñcana
analyzed: tathā api tad parāḥ rājan na hi vāñchanti kiñcana

original: BhP_10.39.003/1 sāyantanāśanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
BhP_10.39.003/3 suhṛtsu vṛttaṃ kaṃsasya papracchānyac cikīrṣitam
analyzed: suhṛtsu vṛttam kaṃsasya papraccha anyat cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_10.39.004/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.39.004/1 tāta saumyāgataḥ kaccit sv-āgataṃ bhadram astu vaḥ
analyzed: tāta saumya āgataḥ kaccit svāgatam bhadram astu vaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.004/3 api sva-jñāti-bandhūnām anamīvam anāmayam
analyzed: api sva jñāti bandhūnām anamīvam anāmayam

original: BhP_10.39.005/1 kiṃ nu naḥ kuśalaṃ pṛcche edhamāne kulāmaye
analyzed: kim nu naḥ kuśalam pṛcche edhamāne kula āmaye

original: BhP_10.39.005/3 kaṃse mātula-nāmnāṅga svānāṃ nas tat-prajāsu ca
analyzed: kaṃse mātula nāmnā aṅga svānām naḥ tad prajāsu ca

original: BhP_10.39.006/1 aho asmad abhūd bhūri pitror vṛjinam āryayoḥ
analyzed: aho asmat abhūt bhūri pitroḥ vṛjinam āryayoḥ

original: BhP_10.39.006/3 yad-dhetoḥ putra-maraṇaṃ yad-dhetor bandhanaṃ tayoḥ
analyzed: yad hetoḥ putra maraṇam yad hetoḥ bandhanam tayoḥ

original: BhP_10.39.007/1 diṣṭyādya darśanaṃ svānāṃ mahyaṃ vaḥ saumya kāṅkṣitam
analyzed: diṣṭyā adya darśanam svānām mahyam vaḥ saumya kāṅkṣitam

original: BhP_10.39.007/3 sañjātaṃ varṇyatāṃ tāta tavāgamana-kāraṇam
analyzed: sañjātam varṇyatām tāta tava āgamana kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.39.008/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.39.008/1 pṛṣṭo bhagavatā sarvaṃ varṇayām āsa mādhavaḥ
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavatā sarvam varṇayām āsa mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.008/3 vairānubandhaṃ yaduṣu vasudeva-vadhodyamam
analyzed: vaira anubandham yaduṣu vasudeva vadha udyamam

original: BhP_10.39.009/1 yat-sandeśo yad-arthaṃ vā dūtaḥ sampreṣitaḥ svayam
analyzed: yad sandeśaḥ yad artham vā dūtaḥ sampreṣitaḥ svayam

original: BhP_10.39.009/3 yad uktaṃ nāradenāsya sva-janmānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: yat uktam nāradena asya sva janma ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.39.010/1 śrutvākrūra-vacaḥ kṛṣṇo balaś ca para-vīra-hā
analyzed: śrutvā akrūra vacaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ balaḥ ca para vīra hā

original: BhP_10.39.010/3 prahasya nandaṃ pitaraṃ rājñā diṣṭaṃ vijajñatuḥ
analyzed: prahasya nandam pitaram rājñā diṣṭam vijajñatuḥ

original: BhP_10.39.011/1 gopān samādiśat so 'pi gṛhyatāṃ sarva-go-rasaḥ
analyzed: gopān samādiśat saḥ pi gṛhyatām sarva go rasaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.011/3 upāyanāni gṛhṇīdhvaṃ yujyantāṃ śakaṭāni ca
analyzed: upāyanāni gṛhṇīdhvam yujyantām śakaṭāni ca

original: BhP_10.39.012/1 yāsyāmaḥ śvo madhu-purīṃ dāsyāmo nṛpate rasān
analyzed: yāsyāmaḥ śvas madhupurīm dāsyāmaḥ nṛpate rasān

original: BhP_10.39.012/3 drakṣyāmaḥ su-mahat parva yānti jānapadāḥ kila
analyzed: drakṣyāmaḥ su mahat parva yānti jānapadāḥ kila

original: BhP_10.39.012/5 evam āghoṣayat kṣatrā nanda-gopaḥ sva-gokule
analyzed: evam āghoṣayat kṣatrā nanda gopaḥ sva gokule

original: BhP_10.39.013/1 gopyas tās tad upaśrutya babhūvur vyathitā bhṛśam
analyzed: gopyaḥ tāḥ tat upaśrutya babhūvuḥ vyathitāḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.39.013/3 rāma-kṛṣṇau purīṃ netum akrūraṃ vrajam āgatam
analyzed: rāma kṛṣṇau purīm netum akrūram vrajam āgatam

original: BhP_10.39.014/1 kāścit tat-kṛta-hṛt-tāpa śvāsa-mlāna-mukha-śriyaḥ
analyzed: kāścid tad kṛta hṛd tāpa śvāsa mlāna mukha śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.014/3 sraṃsad-dukūla-valaya keśa-granthyaś ca kāścana
analyzed: sraṃsat dukūla valaya keśa granthyaḥ ca kāścana

original: BhP_10.39.015/1 anyāś ca tad-anudhyāna nivṛttāśeṣa-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: anyāḥ ca tad anudhyāna nivṛtta aśeṣa vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.015/3 nābhyajānann imaṃ lokam ātma-lokaṃ gatā iva
analyzed: na abhyajānan imam lokam ātma lokam gatāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.39.016/1 smarantyaś cāparāḥ śaurer anurāga-smiteritāḥ
analyzed: smarantyaḥ ca aparāḥ śaureḥ anurāga smita īritāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.016/3 hṛdi-spṛśaś citra-padā giraḥ sammumuhuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: hṛdispṛśaḥ citra padāḥ giraḥ sammumuhuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.017/1 gatiṃ su-lalitāṃ ceṣṭāṃ snigdha-hāsāvalokanam
analyzed: gatim su lalitām ceṣṭām snigdha hāsa avalokanam

original: BhP_10.39.017/3 śokāpahāni narmāṇi proddāma-caritāni ca
analyzed: śoka apahāni narmāṇi proddāma caritāni ca

original: BhP_10.39.018/1 cintayantyo mukundasya bhītā viraha-kātarāḥ
analyzed: cintayantyaḥ mukundasya bhītāḥ viraha kātarāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.018/3 sametāḥ saṅghaśaḥ procur aśru-mukhyo 'cyutāśayāḥ
analyzed: sametāḥ saṅghaśas procuḥ cyuta āśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.019/0 śrī-gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.39.019/1 aho vidhātas tava na kvacid dayā saṃyojya maitryā praṇayena dehinaḥ
analyzed: aho vidhātar tava na kvacid dayā saṃyojya maitryā praṇayena dehinaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.019/3 tāṃś cākṛtārthān viyunaṅkṣy apārthakaṃ vikrīḍitaṃ te 'rbhaka-ceṣṭitaṃ yathā
analyzed: tān ca akṛtārthān viyunaṅkṣi apārthakam vikrīḍitam te rbhaka ceṣṭitam yathā

original: BhP_10.39.020/1 yas tvaṃ pradarśyāsita-kuntalāvṛtaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam pradarśya asita kuntala āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.39.020/2 mukunda-vaktraṃ su-kapolam un-nasam
analyzed: mukunda vaktram su kapolam unnasam

original: BhP_10.39.020/3 śokāpanoda-smita-leśa-sundaraṃ
analyzed: śoka apanoda smita leśa sundaram

original: BhP_10.39.020/4 karoṣi pārokṣyam asādhu te kṛtam
analyzed: karoṣi pārokṣyam asādhu te kṛtam

original: BhP_10.39.021/1 krūras tvam akrūra-samākhyayā sma naś
analyzed: krūraḥ tvam akrūra samākhyayā sma naś

original: BhP_10.39.021/2 cakṣur hi dattaṃ harase batājña-vat
analyzed: cakṣuḥ hi dattam harase bata ajñavat

original: BhP_10.39.021/3 yenaika-deśe 'khila-sarga-sauṣṭhavaṃ
analyzed: yena eka deśe khila sarga sauṣṭhavam

original: BhP_10.39.021/4 tvadīyam adrākṣma vayaṃ madhu-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: tvadīyam adrākṣma vayam madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.022/1 na nanda-sūnuḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅga-sauhṛdaḥ
analyzed: na nanda sūnuḥ kṣaṇabhaṅga sauhṛdaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.022/2 samīkṣate naḥ sva-kṛtāturā bata
analyzed: samīkṣate naḥ sva kṛta āturā bata

original: BhP_10.39.022/3 vihāya gehān sva-janān sutān patīṃs
analyzed: vihāya gehān sva janān sutān patīn

original: BhP_10.39.022/4 tad-dāsyam addhopagatā nava-priyaḥ
analyzed: tad dāsyam addhā upagatā nava priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.023/1 sukhaṃ prabhātā rajanīyam āśiṣaḥ satyā babhūvuḥ pura-yoṣitāṃ dhruvam
analyzed: sukham prabhātāḥ rajanīyam āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ babhūvuḥ pura yoṣitām dhruvam

original: BhP_10.39.023/3 yāḥ saṃpraviṣṭasya mukhaṃ vrajas-pateḥ pāsyanty apāṅgotkalita-smitāsavam
analyzed: yāḥ saṃpraviṣṭasya mukham vrajaspateḥ pāsyanti apāṅga utkalita smita āsavam

original: BhP_10.39.024/1 tāsāṃ mukundo madhu-mañju-bhāṣitair
analyzed: tāsām mukundaḥ madhu mañju bhāṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.024/2 gṛhīta-cittaḥ para-vān manasvy api
analyzed: gṛhīta cittaḥ paravān manasvī api

original: BhP_10.39.024/3 kathaṃ punar naḥ pratiyāsyate 'balā
analyzed: katham punar naḥ pratiyāsyate balā

original: BhP_10.39.024/4 grāmyāḥ salajja-smita-vibhramair bhraman
analyzed: grāmyāḥ sa lajjā smita vibhramaiḥ bhraman

original: BhP_10.39.025/1 adya dhruvaṃ tatra dṛśo bhaviṣyate dāśārha-bhojāndhaka-vṛṣṇi-sātvatām
analyzed: adya dhruvam tatra dṛśaḥ bhaviṣyate dāśārha bhoja andhaka vṛṣṇi sātvatām

original: BhP_10.39.025/3 mahotsavaḥ śrī-ramaṇaṃ guṇāspadaṃ drakṣyanti ye cādhvani devakī-sutam
analyzed: mahā utsavaḥ śrī ramaṇam guṇa āspadam drakṣyanti ye ca adhvani devakī sutam

original: BhP_10.39.026/1 maitad-vidhasyākaruṇasya nāma bhūd akrūra ity etad atīva dāruṇaḥ
analyzed: mā etadvidhasya akaruṇasya nāma bhūt akrūraḥ iti etat atīva dāruṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.026/3 yo 'sāv anāśvāsya su-duḥkhitam janaṃ priyāt priyaṃ neṣyati pāram adhvanaḥ
analyzed: an āśvāsya su duḥkhitam janam priyāt priyam neṣyati pāram adhvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.027/1 anārdra-dhīr eṣa samāsthito rathaṃ tam anv amī ca tvarayanti durmadāḥ
analyzed: an ārdra dhīḥ eṣa samāsthitaḥ ratham tam anu amī ca tvarayanti durmadāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.027/3 gopā anobhiḥ sthavirair upekṣitaṃ daivaṃ ca no 'dya pratikūlam īhate
analyzed: gopāḥ anobhiḥ sthaviraiḥ upekṣitam daivam ca naḥ dya pratikūlam īhate

original: BhP_10.39.028/1 nivārayāmaḥ samupetya mādhavaṃ kiṃ no 'kariṣyan kula-vṛddha-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: nivārayāmaḥ samupetya mādhavam kim no kariṣyan kula vṛddha bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.028/3 mukunda-saṅgān nimiṣārdha-dustyajād daivena vidhvaṃsita-dīna-cetasām
analyzed: mukunda saṅgāt nimiṣa ardha dustyajāt daivena vidhvaṃsita dīna cetasām

original: BhP_10.39.029/1 yasyānurāga-lalita-smita-valgu-mantra
analyzed: yasya anurāga lalita smita valgu mantra

original: BhP_10.39.029/2 līlāvaloka-parirambhaṇa-rāsa-goṣṭhām
analyzed: līlā avaloka parirambhaṇa rāsa goṣṭhām

original: BhP_10.39.029/3 nītāḥ sma naḥ kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadā vinā taṃ
analyzed: nītāḥ sma naḥ kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadā vinā tam

original: BhP_10.39.029/4 gopyaḥ kathaṃ nv atitarema tamo durantam
analyzed: gopyaḥ katham nu atitarema tamaḥ durantam

original: BhP_10.39.030/1 yo 'hnaḥ kṣaye vrajam ananta-sakhaḥ parīto
analyzed: yaḥ hnaḥ kṣaye vrajam ananta sakhaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.030/2 gopair viśan khura-rajaś-churitālaka-srak
analyzed: gopaiḥ viśan khura rajaḥ churita alaka sraj

original: BhP_10.39.030/3 veṇuṃ kvaṇan smita-katākṣa-nirīkṣaṇena
analyzed: veṇum kvaṇan smita kata akṣa nirīkṣaṇena

original: BhP_10.39.030/4 cittaṃ kṣiṇoty amum ṛte nu kathaṃ bhavema
analyzed: cittam kṣiṇoti amum ṛte nu katham bhavema

original: BhP_10.39.031/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.39.031/1 evaṃ bruvāṇā virahāturā bhṛśaṃ vraja-striyaḥ kṛṣṇa-viṣakta-mānasāḥ
analyzed: evam bruvāṇāḥ viraha āturāḥ bhṛśam vraja striyaḥ kṛṣṇa viṣakta mānasāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.031/3 visṛjya lajjāṃ ruruduḥ sma su-svaraṃ govinda dāmodara mādhaveti
analyzed: visṛjya lajjām ruruduḥ sma su svaram govinda dāmodara mādhava iti

original: BhP_10.39.032/1 strīṇām evaṃ rudantīnām udite savitary atha
analyzed: strīṇām evam rudantīnām udite savitari atha

original: BhP_10.39.032/3 akrūraś codayām āsa kṛta-maitrādiko ratham
analyzed: akrūraḥ codayām āsa kṛta maitra ādikaḥ ratham

original: BhP_10.39.033/1 gopās tam anvasajjanta nandādyāḥ śakaṭais tataḥ
analyzed: gopāḥ tam anvasajjanta nanda ādyāḥ śakaṭaiḥ tatas

original: BhP_10.39.033/3 ādāyopāyanaṃ bhūri kumbhān go-rasa-sambhṛtān
analyzed: ādāya upāyanam bhūri kumbhān gorasa sambhṛtān

original: BhP_10.39.034/1 gopyaś ca dayitaṃ kṛṣṇam anuvrajyānurañjitāḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca dayitam kṛṣṇam anuvrajya anurañjitāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.034/3 pratyādeśaṃ bhagavataḥ kāṅkṣantyaś cāvatasthire
analyzed: pratyādeśam bhagavataḥ kāṅkṣantyaḥ ca avatasthire

original: BhP_10.39.035/1 tās tathā tapyatīr vīkṣya sva-prasthāṇe yadūttamaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ tathā tapyatīḥ vīkṣya sva prasthāṇe yadu uttamaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.035/3 sāntvayām asa sa-premair āyāsya iti dautyakaiḥ
analyzed: sāntvayām asa sa premaiḥ āyāsye iti dautyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.036/1 yāvad ālakṣyate ketur yāvad reṇū rathasya ca
analyzed: yāvat ālakṣyate ketuḥ yāvat reṇuḥ rathasya ca

original: BhP_10.39.036/3 anuprasthāpitātmāno lekhyānīvopalakṣitāḥ
analyzed: anuprasthāpita ātmānaḥ lekhyāni iva upalakṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.39.037/1 tā nirāśā nivavṛtur govinda-vinivartane
analyzed: tāḥ nirāśāḥ nivavṛtuḥ govinda vinivartane

original: BhP_10.39.037/3 viśokā ahanī ninyur gāyantyaḥ priya-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: viśokāḥ ahanī ninyuḥ gāyantyaḥ priya ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.39.038/1 bhagavān api samprāpto rāmākrūra-yuto nṛpa
analyzed: bhagavān api samprāptaḥ rāma akrūra yutaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.39.038/3 rathena vāyu-vegena kālindīm agha-nāśinīm
analyzed: rathena vāyu vegena kālindīm agha nāśinīm

original: BhP_10.39.039/1 tatropaspṛśya pānīyaṃ pītvā mṛṣṭaṃ maṇi-prabham
analyzed: tatra upaspṛśya pānīyam pītvā mṛṣṭam maṇi prabham

original: BhP_10.39.039/3 vṛkṣa-ṣaṇḍam upavrajya sa-rāmo ratham āviśat
analyzed: vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍam upavrajya sarāmaḥ ratham āviśat

original: BhP_10.39.040/1 akrūras tāv upāmantrya niveśya ca rathopari
analyzed: akrūraḥ tau upāmantrya niveśya ca ratha upari

original: BhP_10.39.040/3 kālindyā hradam āgatya snānaṃ vidhi-vad ācarat
analyzed: kālindyāḥ hradam āgatya snānam vidhivat ācarat

original: BhP_10.39.041/1 nimajjya tasmin salile japan brahma sanātanam
analyzed: nimajjya tasmin salile japan brahma sanātanam

original: BhP_10.39.041/3 tāv eva dadṛśe 'krūro rāma-kṛṣṇau samanvitau
analyzed: tau eva dadṛśe krūraḥ rāma kṛṣṇau samanvitau

original: BhP_10.39.042/1 tau ratha-sthau katham iha sutāv ānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: tau ratha sthau katham iha sutau ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.39.042/3 tarhi svit syandane na sta ity unmajjya vyacaṣṭa saḥ
analyzed: tarhi svid syandane na staḥ iti unmajjya vyacaṣṭa saḥ

original: BhP_10.39.043/1 tatrāpi ca yathā-pūrvam āsīnau punar eva saḥ
analyzed: tatra api ca yathāpūrvam āsīnau punar eva saḥ

original: BhP_10.39.043/3 nyamajjad darśanaṃ yan me mṛṣā kiṃ salile tayoḥ
analyzed: nyamajjat darśanam yat me mṛṣā kim salile tayoḥ

original: BhP_10.39.044/1 bhūyas tatrāpi so 'drākṣīt stūyamānam ahīśvaram
analyzed: bhūyas tatra api saḥ drākṣīt stūyamānam ahīśvaram

original: BhP_10.39.044/3 siddha-cāraṇa-gandharvair asurair nata-kandharaiḥ
analyzed: siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ asuraiḥ nata kandharaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.045/1 sahasra-śirasaṃ devaṃ sahasra-phaṇa-maulinam
analyzed: sahasra śirasam devam sahasra phaṇa maulinam

original: BhP_10.39.045/3 nīlāmbaraṃ visa-śvetaṃ śṛṅgaiḥ śvetam iva sthitam
analyzed: nīla ambaram śṛṅgaiḥ śvetam iva sthitam

original: BhP_10.39.046/1 tasyotsaṅge ghana-syāmaṃ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
analyzed: tasya utsaṅge ghanasya āmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam

original: BhP_10.39.046/3 puruṣaṃ catur-bhujaṃ śāntam padma-patrāruṇekṣaṇam
analyzed: puruṣam catur bhujam śāntam padma patra aruṇa īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.39.047/1 cāru-prasanna-vadanaṃ cāru-hāsa-nirīkṣaṇam
analyzed: cāru prasanna vadanam cāru hāsa nirīkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.39.047/3 su-bhrūnnasaṃ caru-karṇaṃ su-kapolāruṇādharam
analyzed: su bhrū unnasam caru karṇam su kapola aruṇa adharam

original: BhP_10.39.048/1 pralamba-pīvara-bhujaṃ tuṅgāṃsoraḥ-sthala-śriyam
analyzed: pralamba pīvara bhujam tuṅga aṃsa uraḥsthala śriyam

original: BhP_10.39.048/3 kambu-kaṇṭhaṃ nimna-nābhiṃ valimat-pallavodaram
BhP_10.39.049/1 bṛhat-kati-tata-śroṇi karabhoru-dvayānvitam
BhP_10.39.049/3 cāru-jānu-yugaṃ cāru jaṅghā-yugala-saṃyutam
analyzed: cāru jānu yugam cāru jaṅghā yugala saṃyutam

original: BhP_10.39.050/1 tuṅga-gulphāruṇa-nakha vrāta-dīdhitibhir vṛtam
analyzed: tuṅga gulpha aruṇa nakha vrāta dīdhitibhiḥ vṛtam

original: BhP_10.39.050/3 navāṅguly-aṅguṣṭha-dalair vilasat-pāda-paṅkajam
BhP_10.39.051/1 su-mahārha-maṇi-vrāta kirīṭa-kaṭakāṅgadaiḥ
analyzed: su mahārha maṇi vrāta kirīṭa kaṭaka aṅgadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.051/3 kaṭi-sūtra-brahma-sūtra hāra-nūpura-kuṇḍalaiḥ
analyzed: kaṭisūtra brahmasūtra hāra nūpura kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.052/1 bhrājamānaṃ padma-karaṃ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharam
analyzed: bhrājamānam padma karam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam

original: BhP_10.39.052/3 śrīvatsa-vakṣasaṃ bhrājat kaustubhaṃ vana-mālinam
analyzed: śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubham vanamālinam

original: BhP_10.39.053/1 sunanda-nanda-pramukhaiḥ parṣadaiḥ sanakādibhiḥ
analyzed: sunanda nanda pramukhaiḥ parṣadaiḥ sanaka ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.053/3 sureśair brahma-rudrādyair navabhiś ca dvijottamaiḥ
analyzed: sura īśaiḥ brahma rudra ādyaiḥ navabhiḥ ca dvijottamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.054/1 prahrāda-nārada-vasu pramukhair bhāgavatottamaiḥ
analyzed: prahrāda nārada vasu pramukhaiḥ bhāgavata uttamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.054/3 stūyamānaṃ pṛthag-bhāvair vacobhir amalātmabhiḥ
analyzed: stūyamānam pṛthagbhāvaiḥ vacobhiḥ amala ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.39.055/1 śriyā puṣṭyā girā kāntyā kīrtyā tuṣṭyelayorjayā
analyzed: śriyā puṣṭyā girā kāntyā kīrtyā tuṣṭyā ilayoḥ ūrjayā

original: BhP_10.39.055/3 vidyayāvidyayā śaktyā māyayā ca niṣevitam
analyzed: vidyayā avidyayā śaktyā māyayā ca niṣevitam

original: BhP_10.39.056/1 vilokya su-bhṛśaṃ prīto bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
analyzed: vilokya su bhṛśam prītaḥ bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.056/3 hṛṣyat-tanūruho bhāva- pariklinnātma-locanaḥ
analyzed: hṛṣyat tanūruhaḥ bhāva pariklinna ātma locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.39.057/1 girā gadgadayāstauṣīt sattvam ālambya sātvataḥ
analyzed: girā gadgadayā astauṣīt sattvam ālambya sātvataḥ

original: BhP_10.39.057/3 praṇamya mūrdhnāvahitaḥ kṛtāñjali-puṭaḥ śanaiḥ
analyzed: praṇamya mūrdhnā avahitaḥ kṛta añjali puṭaḥ śanais

original: BhP_10.40.001/0 śrī-akrūra uvāca
analyzed: śrī akrūraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.40.001/1 nato 'smy ahaṃ tvākhila-hetu-hetuṃ nārāyaṇaṃ pūruṣam ādyam avyayam
analyzed: nataḥ smi aham tvā akhila hetu hetum nārāyaṇam pūruṣam ādyam avyayam

original: BhP_10.40.001/3 yan-nābhi-jātād aravinda-koṣād brahmāvirāsīd yata eṣa lokaḥ
analyzed: yat nābhi jātāt aravinda koṣāt brahmā avirāsīt yatas eṣa lokaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.002/1 bhūs toyam agniḥ pavanaṃ kham ādir mahān ajādir mana indriyāṇi
analyzed: bhūḥ toyam agniḥ pavanam kham ādiḥ mahān aja ādiḥ manaḥ indriyāṇi

original: BhP_10.40.002/3 sarvendriyārthā vibudhāś ca sarve ye hetavas te jagato 'ṅga-bhūtāḥ
analyzed: sarva indriya arthāḥ vibudhāḥ ca sarve ye hetavaḥ te jagataḥ ṅga bhūtāḥ

original: BhP_10.40.003/1 naite svarūpaṃ vidur ātmanas te hy ajādayo 'nātmatayā gṛhītaḥ
analyzed: na ete sva rūpam viduḥ ātmanaḥ te hi aja ādayaḥ na ātma tayā gṛhītaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.003/3 ajo 'nubaddhaḥ sa guṇair ajāyā guṇāt paraṃ veda na te svarūpam
analyzed: ajaḥ sa guṇaiḥ ajāyāḥ guṇāt param veda na te sva rūpam

original: BhP_10.40.004/1 tvāṃ yogino yajanty addhā mahā-puruṣam īśvaram
analyzed: tvām yoginaḥ yajanti addhā mahāpuruṣam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.40.004/3 sādhyātmaṃ sādhibhūtaṃ ca sādhidaivaṃ ca sādhavaḥ
analyzed: sa adhyātmam sa adhibhūtam ca sa adhidaivam ca sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.005/1 trayyā ca vidyayā kecit tvāṃ vai vaitānikā dvijāḥ
analyzed: trayyā ca vidyayā kecid tvām vai vaitānikāḥ dvijāḥ

original: BhP_10.40.005/3 yajante vitatair yajñair nānā-rūpāmarākhyayā
analyzed: yajante vitataiḥ yajñaiḥ nānā rūpa amara ākhyayā

original: BhP_10.40.006/1 eke tvākhila-karmāṇi sannyasyopaśamaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: eke tvā akhila karmāṇi sannyasya upaśamam gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.40.006/3 jñānino jñāna-yajñena yajanti jñāna-vigraham
analyzed: jñāninaḥ jñāna yajñena yajanti jñāna vigraham

original: BhP_10.40.007/1 anye ca saṃskṛtātmāno vidhinābhihitena te
analyzed: anye ca saṃskṛta ātmānaḥ vidhinā abhihitena te

original: BhP_10.40.007/3 yajanti tvan-mayās tvāṃ vai bahu-mūrty-eka-mūrtikam
analyzed: yajanti tvad mayāḥ tvām vai bahu mūrti eka mūrtikam

original: BhP_10.40.008/1 tvām evānye śivoktena mārgeṇa śiva-rūpiṇam
analyzed: tvām eva anye śiva uktena mārgeṇa śiva rūpiṇam

original: BhP_10.40.008/3 bahv-ācārya-vibhedena bhagavantarn upāsate
analyzed: bahu ācārya vibhedena upāsate

original: BhP_10.40.009/1 sarva eva yajanti tvāṃ sarva-deva-mayeśvaram
analyzed: sarve eva yajanti tvām sarva deva maya īśvaram

original: BhP_10.40.009/3 ye 'py anya-devatā-bhaktā yady apy anya-dhiyaḥ prabho
analyzed: ye pi anya devatā bhaktāḥ yadi api anya dhiyaḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.40.010/1 yathādri-prabhavā nadyaḥ parjanyāpūritāḥ prabho
analyzed: yathā adri prabhavāḥ nadyaḥ parjanya āpūritāḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.40.010/3 viśanti sarvataḥ sindhuṃ tadvat tvāṃ gatayo 'ntataḥ
analyzed: viśanti sarvatas sindhum tadvat tvām gatayaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.011/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti bhavataḥ prakṛter guṇāḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti bhavataḥ prakṛteḥ guṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.40.011/3 teṣu hi prākṛtāḥ protā ā-brahma-sthāvarādayaḥ
analyzed: teṣu hi prākṛtāḥ protāḥ ābrahma sthāvara ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.012/1 tubhyaṃ namas te tv aviṣakta-dṛṣṭaye
analyzed: tubhyam namaḥ te tu a viṣakta dṛṣṭaye

original: BhP_10.40.012/2 sarvātmane sarva-dhiyāṃ ca sākṣiṇe
analyzed: sarva ātmane sarva dhiyām ca sākṣiṇe

original: BhP_10.40.012/3 guṇa-pravāho 'yam avidyayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: guṇa pravāhaḥ yam avidyayā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.012/4 pravartate deva-nṛ-tiryag-ātmasu
analyzed: pravartate deva nṛ tiryak ātmasu

original: BhP_10.40.013/1 agnir mukhaṃ te 'vanir aṅghrir īkṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: agniḥ mukham te vaniḥ aṅghriḥ īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.40.013/2 sūryo nabho nābhir atho diśaḥ śrutiḥ
analyzed: sūryaḥ nabhaḥ nābhiḥ atha u diśaḥ śrutiḥ

original: BhP_10.40.013/3 dyauḥ kaṃ surendrās tava bāhavo 'rṇavāḥ
analyzed: dyauḥ kam sura indrāḥ tava bāhavaḥ rṇavāḥ

original: BhP_10.40.013/4 kukṣir marut prāṇa-balaṃ prakalpitam
analyzed: kukṣiḥ marut prāṇa balam prakalpitam

original: BhP_10.40.014/1 romāṇi vṛkṣauṣadhayaḥ śiroruhā
analyzed: romāṇi vṛkṣa oṣadhayaḥ śiroruhā

original: BhP_10.40.014/2 meghāḥ parasyāsthi-nakhāni te 'drayaḥ
analyzed: meghāḥ parasya asthi nakhāni te drayaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.014/3 nimeṣaṇaṃ rātry-ahanī prajāpatir
analyzed: nimeṣaṇam rātri ahanī prajāpatiḥ

original: BhP_10.40.014/4 meḍhras tu vṛṣṭis tava vīryam iṣyate
analyzed: meḍhraḥ tu vṛṣṭiḥ tava vīryam iṣyate

original: BhP_10.40.015/1 tvayy avyayātman puruṣe prakalpitā lokāḥ sa-pālā bahu-jīva-saṅkulāḥ
analyzed: tvayi avyaya ātman puruṣe prakalpitāḥ lokāḥ sa pālāḥ bahu jīva saṅkulāḥ

original: BhP_10.40.015/3 yathā jale sañjihate jalaukaso 'py udumbare vā maśakā mano-maye
analyzed: yathā jale sañjihate jalaukasaḥ pi udumbare vā maśakāḥ manaḥ maye

original: BhP_10.40.016/1 yāni yānīha rūpāṇi krīḍanārthaṃ bibharṣi hi
analyzed: yāni yāni iha rūpāṇi krīḍana artham bibharṣi hi

original: BhP_10.40.016/3 tair āmṛṣṭa-śuco lokā mudā gāyanti te yaśaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ āmṛṣṭa śucaḥ lokāḥ mudā gāyanti te yaśaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.017/1 namaḥ kāraṇa-matsyāya pralayābdhi-carāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ kāraṇa matsyāya pralaya abdhi carāya ca

original: BhP_10.40.017/3 hayaśīrṣṇe namas tubhyaṃ madhu-kaiṭabha-mṛtyave
analyzed: haya śīrṣṇe namaḥ tubhyam madhu kaiṭabha mṛtyave

original: BhP_10.40.018/1 akūpārāya bṛhate namo mandara-dhāriṇe
analyzed: akūpārāya bṛhate namaḥ mandara dhāriṇe

original: BhP_10.40.018/3 kṣity-uddhāra-vihārāya namaḥ śūkara-mūrtaye
analyzed: kṣiti uddhāra vihārāya namaḥ śūkara mūrtaye

original: BhP_10.40.019/1 namas te 'dbhuta-siṃhāya sādhu-loka-bhayāpaha
analyzed: namaḥ te dbhuta siṃhāya sādhu loka bhaya apaha

original: BhP_10.40.019/3 vāmanāya namas tubhyaṃ krānta-tribhuvanāya ca
analyzed: vāmanāya namaḥ tubhyam krānta tribhuvanāya ca

original: BhP_10.40.020/1 namo bhṛguṇāṃ pataye dṛpta-kṣatra-vana-cchide
analyzed: namaḥ bhṛguṇām pataye dṛpta kṣatra vana chide

original: BhP_10.40.020/3 namas te raghu-varyāya rāvaṇānta-karāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ te raghu varyāya rāvaṇa anta karāya ca

original: BhP_10.40.021/1 namas te vāsudevāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ te vāsudevāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca

original: BhP_10.40.021/3 pradyumnāyaniruddhāya sātvatāṃ pataye namaḥ
BhP_10.40.022/1 namo buddhāya śuddhāya daitya-dānava-mohine
analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya śuddhāya daitya dānava mohine

original: BhP_10.40.022/3 mleccha-prāya-kṣatra-hantre namas te kalki-rūpiṇe
analyzed: mleccha prāya kṣatra hantre namaḥ te kalki rūpiṇe

original: BhP_10.40.023/1 bhagavan jīva-loko 'yaṃ mohitas tava māyayā
analyzed: bhagavan jīvalokaḥ yam mohitaḥ tava māyayā

original: BhP_10.40.023/3 ahaṃ mamety asad-grāho bhrāmyate karma-vartmasu
analyzed: aham mama iti asat grāhaḥ bhrāmyate karma vartmasu

original: BhP_10.40.024/1 ahaṃ cātmātmajāgāra- dārārtha-svajanādiṣu
analyzed: aham ca ātmā ātmajā āgāra dāra artha sva jana ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.40.024/3 bhramāmi svapna-kalpeṣu mūḍhaḥ satya-dhiyā vibho
analyzed: bhramāmi svapna kalpeṣu mūḍhaḥ satya dhiyā vibho

original: BhP_10.40.025/1 anityānātma-duḥkheṣu viparyaya-matir hy aham
analyzed: anitya anātma duḥkheṣu viparyaya matiḥ hi aham

original: BhP_10.40.025/3 dvandvārāmas tamo-viṣṭo na jāne tvātmanaḥ priyam
analyzed: dvandva ārāmaḥ tamaḥ viṣṭaḥ na jāne tvā ātmanaḥ priyam

original: BhP_10.40.026/1 yathābudho jalaṃ hitvā praticchannaṃ tad-udbhavaiḥ
analyzed: yathā abudhaḥ jalam hitvā praticchannam tad udbhavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.40.026/3 abhyeti mṛga-tṛṣṇāṃ vai tadvat tvāhaṃ parāṅ-mukhaḥ
analyzed: abhyeti mṛgatṛṣṇām vai tadvat tvā aham parāṅmukhaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.027/1 notsahe 'haṃ kṛpaṇa-dhīḥ kāma-karma-hataṃ manaḥ
analyzed: na utsahe ham kṛpaṇa dhīḥ kāma karma hatam manaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.027/3 roddhuṃ pramāthibhiś cākṣair hriyamāṇam itas tataḥ
analyzed: roddhum pramāthibhiḥ ca akṣaiḥ hriyamāṇam itas tatas

original: BhP_10.40.028/1 so 'haṃ tavāṅghry-upagato 'smy asatāṃ durāpaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ham tava aṅghri upagataḥ smi asatām durāpam

original: BhP_10.40.028/2 tac cāpy ahaṃ bhavad-anugraha īśa manye
analyzed: tat ca api aham bhavat anugrahe īśa manye

original: BhP_10.40.028/3 puṃso bhaved yarhi saṃsaraṇāpavargas
analyzed: puṃsaḥ bhavet yarhi saṃsaraṇa apavargaḥ

original: BhP_10.40.028/4 tvayy abja-nābha sad-upāsanayā matiḥ syāt
analyzed: tvayi abjanābha sat upāsanayā matiḥ syāt

original: BhP_10.40.029/1 namo vijñāna-mātrāya sarva-pratyaya-hetave
analyzed: namaḥ vijñāna mātrāya sarva pratyaya hetave

original: BhP_10.40.029/3 puruṣeśa-pradhānāya brahmaṇe 'nanta-śaktaye
BhP_10.40.030/1 namas te vāsudevāya sarva-bhūta-kṣayāya ca
analyzed: namaḥ te vāsudevāya sarva bhūta kṣayāya ca

original: BhP_10.40.030/3 hṛṣīkeśa namas tubhyaṃ prapannaṃ pāhi māṃ prabho
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśa namaḥ tubhyam prapannam pāhi mām prabho

original: BhP_10.41.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.41.001/1 stuvatas tasya bhagavān darśayitvā jale vapuḥ
analyzed: stuvataḥ tasya bhagavān darśayitvā jale vapuḥ

original: BhP_10.41.001/3 bhūyaḥ samāharat kṛṣṇo naṭo nāṭyam ivātmanaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas samāharat kṛṣṇaḥ naṭaḥ nāṭyam iva ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.002/1 so 'pi cāntarhitaṃ vīkṣya jalād unmajya satvaraḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi ca antarhitam vīkṣya jalāt unmajya sa tvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.41.002/3 kṛtvā cāvaśyakaṃ sarvaṃ vismito ratham āgamat
analyzed: kṛtvā ca āvaśyakam sarvam vismitaḥ ratham āgamat

original: BhP_10.41.003/1 tam apṛcchad dhṛṣīkeśaḥ kiṃ te dṛṣṭam ivādbhutam
analyzed: tam apṛcchat dhṛṣīkeśaḥ kim te dṛṣṭam iva adbhutam

original: BhP_10.41.003/3 bhūmau viyati toye vā tathā tvāṃ lakṣayāmahe
analyzed: bhūmau viyati toye vā tathā tvām lakṣayāmahe

original: BhP_10.41.004/0 śrī-akrūra uvāca
analyzed: śrī akrūraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.41.004/1 adbhutānīha yāvanti bhūmau viyati vā jale
analyzed: adbhutāni iha yāvanti bhūmau viyati vā jale

original: BhP_10.41.004/3 tvayi viśvātmake tāni kiṃ me 'dṛṣṭaṃ vipaśyataḥ
analyzed: tvayi viśvātmake tāni kim me dṛṣṭam vipaśyataḥ

original: BhP_10.41.005/1 yatrādbhutāni sarvāṇi bhūmau viyati vā jale
analyzed: yatra adbhutāni sarvāṇi bhūmau viyati vā jale

original: BhP_10.41.005/3 taṃ tvānupaśyato brahman kiṃ me dṛṣṭam ihādbhutam
analyzed: tam tvā anupaśyataḥ brahman kim me dṛṣṭam iha adbhutam

original: BhP_10.41.006/1 ity uktvā codayām āsa syandanaṃ gāndinī-sutaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā codayām āsa syandanam gāndinī sutaḥ
