original: BhP_10.41.006/3 mathurām anayad rāmaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ caiva dinātyaye
analyzed: mathurām anayat rāmam kṛṣṇam ca eva dina atyaye

original: BhP_10.41.007/1 mārge grāma-janā rājaṃs tatra tatropasaṅgatāḥ
analyzed: mārge grāma janāḥ rājan tatra tatra upasaṅgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.007/3 vasudeva-sutau vīkṣya prītā dṛṣṭiṃ na cādaduḥ
analyzed: vasudeva sutau vīkṣya prītāḥ dṛṣṭim na ca ādaduḥ

original: BhP_10.41.008/1 tāvad vrajaukasas tatra nanda-gopādayo 'grataḥ
analyzed: tāvat vraja okasaḥ tatra nanda gopa ādayaḥ gratas

original: BhP_10.41.008/3 puropavanam āsādya pratīkṣanto 'vatasthire
analyzed: purā upavanam āsādya pratīkṣantaḥ vatasthire

original: BhP_10.41.009/1 tān sametyāha bhagavān akrūraṃ jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: tān sametya āha bhagavān akrūram jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.41.009/3 gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇiṃ praśritaṃ prahasann iva
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim praśritam prahasan iva

original: BhP_10.41.010/1 bhavān praviśatām agre saha-yānaḥ purīṃ gṛham
analyzed: bhavān praviśatām agre sahayānaḥ purīm gṛham

original: BhP_10.41.010/3 vayaṃ tv ihāvamucyātha tato drakṣyāmahe purīm
analyzed: vayam tu iha avamucya atha tatas drakṣyāmahe purīm

original: BhP_10.41.011/0 śrī-akrūra uvāca
analyzed: śrī akrūraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.41.011/1 nāhaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ rahitaḥ pravekṣye mathurāṃ prabho
analyzed: na aham bhavadbhyām rahitaḥ pravekṣye mathurām prabho

original: BhP_10.41.011/3 tyaktuṃ nārhasi māṃ nātha bhaktaṃ te bhakta-vatsala
analyzed: tyaktum nā arhasi mām nātha bhaktam te bhakta vatsala

original: BhP_10.41.012/1 āgaccha yāma gehān naḥ sa-nāthān kurv adhokṣaja
analyzed: āgaccha yāma gehān naḥ sa nāthān kuru adhokṣaja

original: BhP_10.41.012/3 sahāgrajaḥ sa-gopālaiḥ suhṛdbhiś ca suhṛttama
analyzed: saha agrajaḥ sa gopālaiḥ suhṛdbhiḥ ca suhṛttama

original: BhP_10.41.013/1 punīhi pāda-rajasā gṛhān no gṛha-medhinām
analyzed: punīhi pāda rajasā gṛhān naḥ gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_10.41.013/3 yac-chaucenānutṛpyanti pitaraḥ sāgnayaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: yat śaucena anutṛpyanti pitaraḥ sa agnayaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.014/1 avanijyāṅghri-yugalam āsīt ślokyo balir mahān
analyzed: avanijya aṅghri yugalam āsīt ślokyaḥ baliḥ mahān

original: BhP_10.41.014/3 aiśvaryam atulaṃ lebhe gatiṃ caikāntināṃ tu yā
analyzed: aiśvaryam atulam lebhe gatim ca ekāntinām tu yā

original: BhP_10.41.015/1 āpas te 'ṅghry-avanejanyas trīṃl lokān śucayo 'punan
analyzed: āpaḥ te ṅghri avanejanyaḥ trīn lokān śucayaḥ punan

original: BhP_10.41.015/3 śirasādhatta yāḥ śarvaḥ svar yātāḥ sagarātmajāḥ
analyzed: śirasā adhatta yāḥ śarvaḥ svar yātāḥ sagara ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.016/1 deva-deva jagan-nātha puṇya-śravaṇa-kīrtana
analyzed: devadeva jagannātha puṇya śravaṇa kīrtana

original: BhP_10.41.016/3 yadūttamottamaḥ-śloka nārāyaṇa namo 'stu te
analyzed: nārāyaṇa namaḥ stu te

original: BhP_10.41.017/0 śrī-bhagavan uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavan uvāca

original: BhP_10.41.017/1 āyāsye bhavato geham aham arya-samanvitaḥ
analyzed: āyāsye bhavataḥ geham aham arya samanvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.017/3 yadu-cakra-druhaṃ hatvā vitariṣye suhṛt-priyam
analyzed: yadu cakra druham hatvā vitariṣye suhṛd priyam

original: BhP_10.41.018/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.41.018/1 evam ukto bhagavatā so 'krūro vimanā iva
analyzed: evam uktaḥ bhagavatā saḥ krūraḥ vimanāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.41.018/3 purīṃ praviṣṭaḥ kaṃsāya karmāvedya gṛhaṃ yayau
analyzed: purīm praviṣṭaḥ kaṃsāya karma āvedya gṛham yayau

original: BhP_10.41.019/1 athāparāhne bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇānvitaḥ
analyzed: atha aparāhne bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.019/3 mathurāṃ prāviśad gopair didṛkṣuḥ parivāritaḥ
analyzed: mathurām prāviśat gopaiḥ didṛkṣuḥ parivāritaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.020/1 dadarśa tāṃ sphāṭika-tuṇga-gopura- dvārāṃ bṛhad-dhema-kapāṭa-toraṇām
analyzed: dadarśa tām dvārām bṛhat hema kapāṭa toraṇām

original: BhP_10.41.020/3 tāmrāra-koṣṭhāṃ parikhā-durāsadām udyāna-ramyopavanopaśobhitām
analyzed: tāmra āra koṣṭhām parikhā durāsadām udyāna ramya upavana upaśobhitām

original: BhP_10.41.021/1 sauvarṇa-śṛṅgāṭaka-harmya-niṣkuṭaiḥ śreṇī-sabhābhir bhavanair upaskṛtām
analyzed: sauvarṇa śṛṅgāṭaka harmya niṣkuṭaiḥ śreṇī sabhābhiḥ bhavanaiḥ upaskṛtām

original: BhP_10.41.021/3 vaidūrya-vajrāmala-nīla-vidrumair muktā-haridbhir valabhīṣu vediṣu
analyzed: vaidūrya vajra amala nīla vidrumaiḥ muktā haridbhiḥ valabhīṣu vediṣu

original: BhP_10.41.022/1 juṣṭeṣu jālāmukha-randhra-kuṭṭimeṣv āviṣṭa-pārāvata-barhi-nāditām
analyzed: juṣṭeṣu jālāmukha randhra kuṭṭimeṣu āviṣṭa pārāvata barhi nāditām

original: BhP_10.41.022/3 saṃsikta-rathyāpaṇa-mārga-catvarāṃ prakīrṇa-mālyāṅkura-lāja-taṇḍulām
analyzed: saṃsikta rathyā āpaṇa mārga catvarām prakīrṇa mālya aṅkura lāja taṇḍulām

original: BhP_10.41.023/1 āpūrṇa-kumbhair dadhi-candanokṣitaiḥ prasūna-dīpāvalibhiḥ sa-pallavaiḥ
analyzed: āpūrṇa kumbhaiḥ dadhi candana ukṣitaiḥ prasūna dīpa āvalibhiḥ sa pallavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.41.023/3 sa-vṛnda-rambhā-kramukaiḥ sa-ketubhiḥ sv-alaṅkṛta-dvāra-gṛhāṃ sa-paṭṭikaiḥ
analyzed: sa vṛnda rambhā kramukaiḥ sa ketubhiḥ su alaṅkṛta dvāragṛhām sa paṭṭikaiḥ

original: BhP_10.41.024/1 tāṃ sampraviṣṭau vasudeva-nandanau vṛtau vayasyair naradeva-vartmanā
analyzed: tām sampraviṣṭau vasudeva nandanau vṛtau vayasyaiḥ naradeva vartmanā

original: BhP_10.41.024/3 draṣṭuṃ samīyus tvaritāḥ pura-striyo harmyāṇi caivāruruhur nṛpotsukāḥ
analyzed: draṣṭum samīyuḥ tvaritāḥ pura striyaḥ harmyāṇi ca eva āruruhuḥ nṛpa utsukāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.025/1 kāścid viparyag-dhṛta-vastra-bhūṣaṇā
analyzed: kāścid viparyak dhṛta vastra bhūṣaṇā

original: BhP_10.41.025/2 vismṛtya caikaṃ yugaleṣv athāparāḥ
analyzed: vismṛtya ca ekam yugaleṣu atha aparāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.025/3 kṛtaika-patra-śravanaika-nūpurā
analyzed: kṛta eka patra śravana eka nūpurā

original: BhP_10.41.025/4 nāṅktvā dvitīyaṃ tv aparāś ca locanam
analyzed: na aṅktvā dvitīyam tu aparāḥ ca locanam

original: BhP_10.41.026/1 aśnantya ekās tad apāsya sotsavā abhyajyamānā akṛtopamajjanāḥ
analyzed: aśnantyaḥ ekāḥ tat apāsya sa utsavāḥ abhyajyamānāḥ a kṛta upamajjanāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.026/3 svapantya utthāya niśamya niḥsvanaṃ prapāyayantyo 'rbham apohya mātaraḥ
analyzed: svapantyaḥ utthāya niśamya niḥsvanam prapāyayantyaḥ ṛbham apohya mātaraḥ

original: BhP_10.41.027/1 manāṃsi tāsām aravinda-locanaḥ pragalbha-līlā-hasitāvalokaiḥ
analyzed: manāṃsi tāsām aravinda locanaḥ pragalbha līlā hasita avalokaiḥ

original: BhP_10.41.027/3 jahāra matta-dviradendra-vikramo dṛśāṃ dadac chrī-ramaṇātmanotsavam
analyzed: jahāra matta dvirada indra vikramaḥ dṛśām dadat śrī ramaṇa ātmanā utsavam

original: BhP_10.41.028/1 dṛṣṭvā muhuḥ śrutam anudruta-cetasas taṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā muhur śrutam anudruta cetasaḥ tam

original: BhP_10.41.028/2 tat-prekṣaṇotsmita-sudhokṣaṇa-labdha-mānāḥ
analyzed: tad prekṣaṇa utsmita sudhā ukṣaṇa labdha mānāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.028/3 ānanda-mūrtim upaguhya dṛśātma-labdhaṃ
analyzed: ānanda mūrtim upaguhya dṛśā ātma labdham

original: BhP_10.41.028/4 hṛṣyat-tvaco jahur anantam arindamādhim
analyzed: hṛṣyat tvacaḥ jahuḥ anantam arindama ādhim

original: BhP_10.41.029/1 prāsāda-śikharārūḍhāḥ prīty-utphulla-mukhāmbujāḥ
analyzed: prāsāda śikhara ārūḍhāḥ prīti utphulla mukha ambujāḥ

original: BhP_10.41.029/3 abhyavarṣan saumanasyaiḥ pramadā bala-keśavau
analyzed: abhyavarṣan saumanasyaiḥ pramadāḥ bala keśavau

original: BhP_10.41.030/1 dadhy-akṣataiḥ soda-pātraiḥ srag-gandhair abhyupāyanaiḥ
analyzed: dadhi akṣataiḥ sa udapātraiḥ sraj gandhaiḥ abhyupāyanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.41.030/3 tāv ānarcuḥ pramuditās tatra tatra dvijātayaḥ
analyzed: tau ānarcuḥ pramuditāḥ tatra tatra dvijātayaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.031/1 ūcuḥ paurā aho gopyas tapaḥ kim acaran mahat
analyzed: ūcuḥ paurāḥ aho gopyaḥ tapaḥ kim acarat mahat

original: BhP_10.41.031/3 yā hy etāv anupaśyanti nara-loka-mahotsavau
analyzed: yāḥ hi etau anupaśyanti nara loka mahā utsavau

original: BhP_10.41.032/1 rajakaṃ kañcid āyāntaṃ raṅga-kāraṃ gadāgrajaḥ
analyzed: rajakam kañcid āyāntam raṅgakāram gadāgrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.032/3 dṛṣṭvāyācata vāsāṃsi dhautāny aty-uttamāni ca
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ayācata vāsāṃsi dhautāni atyuttamāni ca

original: BhP_10.41.033/1 dehy āvayoḥ samucitāny aṅga vāsāṃsi cārhatoḥ
analyzed: dehi āvayoḥ samucitāni aṅga vāsāṃsi ca arhatoḥ

original: BhP_10.41.033/3 bhaviṣyati paraṃ śreyo dātus te nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: bhaviṣyati param śreyaḥ dātuḥ te na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.034/1 sa yācito bhagavatā paripūrṇena sarvataḥ
analyzed: sa yācitaḥ bhagavatā paripūrṇena sarvatas

original: BhP_10.41.034/3 sākṣepaṃ ruṣitaḥ prāha bhṛtyo rājñaḥ su-durmadaḥ
analyzed: sa ākṣepam ruṣitaḥ prāha bhṛtyaḥ rājñaḥ su durmadaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.035/1 īdṛśāny eva vāsāṃsī nityaṃ giri-vane-caraḥ
analyzed: īdṛśāni eva vāsāṃsī nityam giri vanecaraḥ

original: BhP_10.41.035/3 paridhatta kim udvṛttā rāja-dravyāṇy abhīpsatha
analyzed: paridhatta kim udvṛttāḥ rāja dravyāṇi

original: BhP_10.41.036/1 yātāśu bāliśā maivaṃ prārthyaṃ yadi jijīvīṣā
analyzed: yāta āśu bāliśāḥ mā evam prārthyam yadi jijīvīṣā

original: BhP_10.41.036/3 badhnanti ghnanti lumpanti dṛptaṃ rāja-kulāni vai
analyzed: badhnanti ghnanti lumpanti dṛptam rāja kulāni vai

original: BhP_10.41.037/1 evaṃ vikatthamānasya kupito devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: evam vikatthamānasya kupitaḥ devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.037/3 rajakasya karāgreṇa śiraḥ kāyād apātayat
analyzed: rajakasya kara agreṇa śiraḥ kāyāt apātayat

original: BhP_10.41.038/1 tasyānujīvinaḥ sarve vāsaḥ-kośān visṛjya vai
analyzed: tasya anujīvinaḥ sarve vāsaḥ kośān visṛjya vai

original: BhP_10.41.038/3 dudruvuḥ sarvato mārgaṃ vāsāṃsi jagṛhe 'cyutaḥ
analyzed: dudruvuḥ sarvatas mārgam vāsāṃsi jagṛhe cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.039/1 vasitvātma-priye vastre kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇas tathā
analyzed: vasitvā ātma priye vastre kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tathā

original: BhP_10.41.039/3 śeṣāṇy ādatta gopebhyo visṛjya bhuvi kānicit
analyzed: śeṣāṇi ādatta gopebhyaḥ visṛjya bhuvi kānicid

original: BhP_10.41.040/1 tatas tu vāyakaḥ prītas tayor veṣam akalpayat
analyzed: tatas tu vāyakaḥ prītaḥ tayoḥ veṣam akalpayat

original: BhP_10.41.040/3 vicitra-varṇaiś caileyair ākalpair anurūpataḥ
analyzed: vicitra varṇaiḥ caileyaiḥ ākalpaiḥ anurūpatas

original: BhP_10.41.041/1 nānā-lakṣaṇa-veṣābhyāṃ kṛṣṇa-rāmau virejatuḥ
analyzed: nānā lakṣaṇa veṣābhyām kṛṣṇa rāmau virejatuḥ

original: BhP_10.41.041/3 sv-alaṅkṛtau bāla-gajau parvaṇīva sitetarau
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtau bāla gajau parvaṇi iva sitetarau

original: BhP_10.41.042/1 tasya prasanno bhagavān prādāt sārūpyam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasya prasannaḥ bhagavān prādāt sārūpyam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.042/3 śriyaṃ ca paramāṃ loke balaiśvarya-smṛtīndriyam
analyzed: śriyam ca paramām loke bala aiśvarya smṛti indriyam

original: BhP_10.41.043/1 tataḥ sudāmno bhavanaṃ mālā-kārasya jagmatuḥ
analyzed: tatas sudāmnaḥ bhavanam mālākārasya jagmatuḥ

original: BhP_10.41.043/3 tau dṛṣṭvā sa samutthāya nanāma śirasā bhuvi
analyzed: tau dṛṣṭvā sa samutthāya nanāma śirasā bhuvi

original: BhP_10.41.044/1 tayor āsanam ānīya pādyaṃ cārghyārhaṇādibhiḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ āsanam ānīya pādyam ca arghya arhaṇa ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.41.044/3 pūjāṃ sānugayoś cakre srak-tāmbūlānulepanaiḥ
analyzed: pūjām sa anugayoḥ cakre srak tāmbūla anulepanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.41.045/1 prāha naḥ sārthakaṃ janma pāvitaṃ ca kulaṃ prabho
analyzed: prāha naḥ sārthakam janma pāvitam ca kulam prabho

original: BhP_10.41.045/3 pitṛ-devarṣayo mahyaṃ tuṣṭā hy āgamanena vām
analyzed: pitṛ deva ṛṣayaḥ mahyam tuṣṭāḥ hi āgamanena vām

original: BhP_10.41.046/1 bhavantau kila viśvasya jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ param
analyzed: bhavantau kila viśvasya jagataḥ kāraṇam param

original: BhP_10.41.046/3 avatīrṇāv ihāṃśena kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca
analyzed: avatīrṇau iha aṃśena kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca

original: BhP_10.41.047/1 na hi vāṃ viṣamā dṛṣṭiḥ suhṛdor jagad-ātmanoḥ
analyzed: na hi vām viṣamā dṛṣṭiḥ suhṛdoḥ jagat ātmanoḥ

original: BhP_10.41.047/3 samayoḥ sarva-bhūteṣu bhajantaṃ bhajator api
analyzed: samayoḥ sarva bhūteṣu bhajantam bhajatoḥ api

original: BhP_10.41.048/1 tāv ajñāpayataṃ bhṛtyaṃ kim ahaṃ karavāṇi vām
analyzed: tau ajñāpayatam bhṛtyam kim aham karavāṇi vām

original: BhP_10.41.048/3 puṃso 'ty-anugraho hy eṣa bhavadbhir yan niyujyate
analyzed: hi eṣa bhavadbhiḥ yat niyujyate

original: BhP_10.41.049/1 ity abhipretya rājendra sudāmā prīta-mānasaḥ
analyzed: iti abhipretya rāja indra sudāmā prīta mānasaḥ

original: BhP_10.41.049/3 śastaiḥ su-gandhaiḥ kusumair mālā viracitā dadau
analyzed: śastaiḥ su gandhaiḥ kusumaiḥ mālāḥ viracitāḥ dadau

original: BhP_10.41.050/1 tābhiḥ sv-alaṅkṛtau prītau kṛṣṇa-rāmau sahānugau
analyzed: tābhiḥ su alaṅkṛtau prītau kṛṣṇa rāmau saha anugau

original: BhP_10.41.050/3 praṇatāya prapannāya dadatur vara-dau varān
analyzed: praṇatāya prapannāya dadatuḥ vara dau varān

original: BhP_10.41.051/1 so 'pi vavre 'calāṃ bhaktiṃ tasminn evākhilātmani
analyzed: saḥ pi vavre calām bhaktim tasmin eva akhilātmani

original: BhP_10.41.051/3 tad-bhakteṣu ca sauhārdaṃ bhūteṣu ca dayāṃ parām
analyzed: tad bhakteṣu ca sauhārdam bhūteṣu ca dayām parām

original: BhP_10.41.052/1 iti tasmai varaṃ dattvā śriyaṃ cānvaya-vardhinīm
analyzed: iti tasmai varam dattvā śriyam ca anvaya vardhinīm

original: BhP_10.41.052/3 balam āyur yaśaḥ kāntiṃ nirjagāma sahāgrajaḥ
analyzed: balam āyuḥ yaśaḥ kāntim nirjagāma saha agrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.42.001/1 atha vrajan rāja-pathena mādhavaḥ striyaṃ gṛhītāṅga-vilepa-bhājanām
analyzed: atha vrajan rāja pathena mādhavaḥ striyam gṛhīta aṅga vilepa bhājanām

original: BhP_10.42.001/3 vilokya kubjāṃ yuvatīṃ varānanāṃ papraccha yāntīṃ prahasan rasa-pradaḥ
analyzed: vilokya kubjām yuvatīm varānanām papraccha yāntīm prahasan rasa pradaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.002/1 kā tvaṃ varorv etad u hānulepanaṃ kasyāṅgane vā kathayasva sādhu naḥ
analyzed: kā tvam vara uru etat u ha anulepanam kasya aṅgane vā kathayasva sādhu naḥ

original: BhP_10.42.002/3 dehy āvayor aṅga-vilepam uttamaṃ śreyas tatas te na cirād bhaviṣyati
analyzed: dehi āvayoḥ aṅga vilepam uttamam śreyaḥ tatas te na cirāt bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_10.42.003/0 sairandhry uvāca
analyzed: sairandhrī uvāca

original: BhP_10.42.003/1 dāsy asmy ahaṃ sundara kaṃsa-sammatā
analyzed: dāsī asmi aham sundara kaṃsa sammatā

original: BhP_10.42.003/2 trivakra-nāmā hy anulepa-karmaṇi
analyzed: trivakra nāmā hi anulepa karmaṇi

original: BhP_10.42.003/3 mad-bhāvitaṃ bhoja-pater ati-priyaṃ
analyzed: mad bhāvitam bhoja pateḥ ati priyam

original: BhP_10.42.003/4 vinā yuvāṃ ko 'nyatamas tad arhati
analyzed: vinā yuvām kaḥ nyatamaḥ tat arhati

original: BhP_10.42.004/1 rūpa-peśala-mādhurya hasitālāpa-vīkṣitaiḥ
analyzed: rūpa peśala mādhurya hasita ālāpa vīkṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.42.004/3 dharṣitātmā dadau sāndram ubhayor anulepanam
analyzed: dharṣita ātmā dadau sāndram ubhayoḥ anulepanam

original: BhP_10.42.005/1 tatas tāv aṅga-rāgeṇa sva-varṇetara-śobhinā
analyzed: tatas tau aṅga rāgeṇa sva varṇa itara śobhinā

original: BhP_10.42.005/3 samprāpta-para-bhāgena śuśubhāte 'nurañjitau
analyzed: samprāpta parabhāgena śuśubhāte nurañjitau

original: BhP_10.42.006/1 prasanno bhagavān kubjāṃ trivakrāṃ rucirānanām
analyzed: prasannaḥ bhagavān kubjām tri vakrām rucira ānanām

original: BhP_10.42.006/3 ṛjvīṃ kartuṃ manaś cakre darśayan darśane phalam
analyzed: ṛjvīm kartum manaḥ cakre darśayan darśane phalam

original: BhP_10.42.007/1 padbhyām ākramya prapade dry-aṅguly-uttāna-pāṇinā
analyzed: padbhyām ākramya prapade dri aṅguli uttāna pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.42.007/3 pragṛhya cibuke 'dhyātmam udanīnamad acyutaḥ
analyzed: pragṛhya cibuke dhyā ātmam udanīnamat acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.008/1 sā tadarju-samānāṅgī bṛhac-chroṇi-payodharā
analyzed: sā tad arju samāna aṅgī bṛhat śroṇi payodharā

original: BhP_10.42.008/3 mukunda-sparśanāt sadyo babhūva pramadottamā
analyzed: mukunda sparśanāt sadyas babhūva pramadā uttamā

original: BhP_10.42.009/1 tato rūpa-guṇaudārya- sampannā prāha keśavam
analyzed: tatas rūpa guṇa audārya sampannā prāha keśavam

original: BhP_10.42.009/3 uttarīyāntam akṛṣya smayantī jāta-hṛc-chayā
analyzed: uttarīya antam a kṛṣya smayantī jāta hṛd śayā

original: BhP_10.42.010/1 ehi vīra gṛhaṃ yāmo na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
analyzed: ehi vīra gṛham yāmaḥ na tvām tyaktum iha utsahe

original: BhP_10.42.010/3 tvayonmathita-cittāyāḥ prasīda puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: tvayā unmathita cittāyāḥ prasīda puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.42.011/1 evaṃ striyā yācyamānaḥ kṛṣṇo rāmasya paśyataḥ
analyzed: evam striyā yācyamānaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rāmasya paśyataḥ

original: BhP_10.42.011/3 mukhaṃ vīkṣyānu gopānāṃ prahasaṃs tām uvāca ha
analyzed: mukham vīkṣya anu gopānām prahasan tām uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.42.012/1 eṣyāmi te gṛhaṃ su-bhru puṃsām ādhi-vikarśanam
analyzed: eṣyāmi te gṛham subhru puṃsām ādhi vikarśanam

original: BhP_10.42.012/3 sādhitārtho 'gṛhāṇāṃ naḥ pānthānāṃ tvaṃ parāyaṇam
analyzed: sādhita arthaḥ gṛhāṇām naḥ pānthānām tvam parāyaṇam

original: BhP_10.42.013/1 visṛjya mādhvyā vāṇyā tām vrajan mārge vaṇik-pathaiḥ
analyzed: visṛjya mādhvyā vāṇyā tām vrajan mārge vaṇikpathaiḥ

original: BhP_10.42.013/3 nānopāyana-tāmbūla- srag-gandhaiḥ sāgrajo 'rcitaḥ
BhP_10.42.014/1 tad-darśana-smara-kṣobhād ātmānaṃ nāvidan striyaḥ
analyzed: tad darśana smara kṣobhāt ātmānam na avidan striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.014/3 visrasta-vāsaḥ-kavara valayā lekhya-mūrtayaḥ
analyzed: visrasta vāsaḥ kavara valayāḥ lekhya mūrtayaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.015/1 tataḥ paurān pṛcchamāno dhanuṣaḥ sthānam acyutaḥ
analyzed: tatas paurān pṛcchamānaḥ dhanuṣaḥ sthānam acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.015/3 tasmin praviṣṭo dadṛśe dhanur aindram ivādbhutam
analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭaḥ dadṛśe dhanuḥ aindram iva adbhutam

original: BhP_10.42.016/1 puruṣair bahubhir guptam arcitaṃ paramarddhimat
analyzed: puruṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ guptam arcitam parama ṛddhimat

original: BhP_10.42.016/3 vāryamāṇo nṛbhiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prasahya dhanur ādade
analyzed: vāryamāṇaḥ nṛbhiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prasahya dhanuḥ ādade

original: BhP_10.42.017/1 kareṇa vāmena sa-līlam uddhṛtaṃ sajyaṃ ca kṛtvā nimiṣeṇa paśyatām
analyzed: kareṇa vāmena sa līlam uddhṛtam sa jyam ca kṛtvā nimiṣeṇa paśyatām

original: BhP_10.42.017/3 nṛṇāṃ vikṛṣya prababhañja madhyato yathekṣu-daṇḍaṃ mada-kary urukramaḥ
analyzed: nṛṇām vikṛṣya prababhañja madhyatas yathā ikṣu daṇḍam mada karī uru kramaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.018/1 dhanuṣo bhajyamānasya śabdaḥ khaṃ rodasī diśaḥ
analyzed: dhanuṣaḥ bhajyamānasya śabdaḥ kham rodasī diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.018/3 pūrayām āsa yaṃ śrutvā kaṃsas trāsam upāgamat
analyzed: pūrayām āsa yam śrutvā kaṃsaḥ trāsam upāgamat

original: BhP_10.42.019/1 tad-rakṣiṇaḥ sānucaraṃ kupitā ātatāyinaḥ
analyzed: tad rakṣiṇaḥ sa anucaram kupitāḥ ātatāyinaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.019/3 gṛhītu-kāmā āvavrur gṛhyatāṃ vadhyatām iti
analyzed: gṛhītu kāmāḥ āvavruḥ gṛhyatām vadhyatām iti

original: BhP_10.42.020/1 atha tān durabhiprāyān vilokya bala-keśavau
analyzed: atha tān durabhiprāyān vilokya bala keśavau

original: BhP_10.42.020/3 kruddhau dhanvana ādāya śakale tāṃś ca jaghnatuḥ
analyzed: kruddhau dhanvanaḥ ādāya śakale tān ca jaghnatuḥ

original: BhP_10.42.021/1 balaṃ ca kaṃsa-prahitaṃ hatvā śālā-mukhāt tataḥ
analyzed: balam ca kaṃsa prahitam hatvā śālāmukhāt tatas

original: BhP_10.42.021/3 niṣkramya ceratur hṛṣṭau nirīkṣya pura-sampadaḥ
analyzed: niṣkramya ceratuḥ hṛṣṭau nirīkṣya pura sampadaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.022/1 tayos tad adbhutaṃ vīryaṃ niśāmya pura-vāsinaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ tat adbhutam vīryam niśāmya pura vāsinaḥ

original: BhP_10.42.022/3 tejaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ rūpaṃ ca menire vibudhottamau
analyzed: tejaḥ prāgalbhyam rūpam ca menire vibudha uttamau

original: BhP_10.42.023/1 tayor vicaratoḥ svairam ādityo 'stam upeyivān
analyzed: tayoḥ vicaratoḥ svairam ādityaḥ stam upeyivān

original: BhP_10.42.023/3 kṛṣṇa-rāmau vṛtau gopaiḥ purāc chakaṭam īyatuḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau vṛtau gopaiḥ purāt śakaṭam īyatuḥ

original: BhP_10.42.024/1 gopyo mukunda-vigame virahāturā yā āśāsatāśiṣa ṛtā madhu-pury abhūvan
analyzed: gopyaḥ mukunda vigame viraha āturāḥ yāḥ āśāsata āśiṣaḥ ṛtāḥ madhupuri abhūvan

original: BhP_10.42.024/3 sampaśyatāṃ puruṣa-bhūṣaṇa-gātra-lakṣmīṃ hitvetarān nu bhajataś cakame 'yanaṃ śrīḥ
analyzed: sampaśyatām puruṣa bhūṣaṇa gātra lakṣmīm hitvā itarān nu bhajataḥ cakame yanam śrīḥ

original: BhP_10.42.025/1 avaniktāṅghri-yugalau bhuktvā kṣīropasecanam
analyzed: avanikta aṅghri yugalau bhuktvā kṣīra upasecanam

original: BhP_10.42.025/3 ūṣatus tāṃ sukhaṃ rātriṃ jñātvā kaṃsa-cikīrṣitam
analyzed: ūṣatuḥ tām sukham rātrim jñātvā kaṃsa cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_10.42.026/1 kaṃsas tu dhanuṣo bhaṅgaṃ rakṣiṇāṃ sva-balasya ca
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ tu dhanuṣaḥ bhaṅgam rakṣiṇām sva balasya ca

original: BhP_10.42.026/3 vadhaṃ niśamya govinda- rāma-vikrīḍitaṃ param
analyzed: vadham niśamya govinda rāma vikrīḍitam param

original: BhP_10.42.027/1 dīrgha-prajāgaro bhīto durnimittāni durmatiḥ
analyzed: dīrgha prajāgaraḥ bhītaḥ durnimittāni durmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.42.027/3 bahūny acaṣṭobhayathā mṛtyor dautya-karāṇi ca
analyzed: bahūni acaṣṭa ubhayathā mṛtyoḥ dautya karāṇi ca

original: BhP_10.42.028/1 adarśanaṃ sva-śirasaḥ pratirūpe ca saty api
analyzed: adarśanam sva śirasaḥ pratirūpe ca sati api

original: BhP_10.42.028/3 asaty api dvitīye ca dvai-rūpyaṃ jyotiṣāṃ tathā
analyzed: asati api dvitīye ca dvairūpyam jyotiṣām tathā

original: BhP_10.42.029/1 chidra-pratītiś chāyāyāṃ prāṇa-ghoṣānupaśrutiḥ
analyzed: chidra pratītiḥ chāyāyām prāṇa ghoṣa an upaśrutiḥ

original: BhP_10.42.029/3 svarṇa-pratītir vṛkṣeṣu sva-padānām adarśanam
analyzed: svarṇa pratītiḥ vṛkṣeṣu sva padānām adarśanam

original: BhP_10.42.030/1 svapne preta-pariṣvaṅgaḥ khara-yānaṃ viṣādanam
analyzed: svapne preta pariṣvaṅgaḥ khara yānam viṣādanam

original: BhP_10.42.030/3 yāyān nalada-māly ekas tailābhyakto dig-ambaraḥ
analyzed: yāyāt nalada mālī ekaḥ taila abhyaktaḥ digambaraḥ

original: BhP_10.42.031/1 anyāni cetthaṃ-bhūtāni svapna-jāgaritāni ca
analyzed: anyāni ca itthaṃbhūtāni svapna jāgaritāni ca

original: BhP_10.42.031/3 paśyan maraṇa-santrasto nidrāṃ lebhe na cintayā
analyzed: paśyan maraṇa santrastaḥ nidrām lebhe na cintayā

original: BhP_10.42.032/1 vyuṣṭāyāṃ niśi kauravya sūrye cādbhyaḥ samutthite
analyzed: vyuṣṭāyām niśi kauravya sūrye ca adbhyaḥ samutthite

original: BhP_10.42.032/3 kārayām āsa vai kaṃso malla-krīḍā-mahotsavam
analyzed: kārayām āsa vai kaṃsaḥ malla krīḍā mahā utsavam

original: BhP_10.42.033/1 ānarcuḥ puruṣā raṅgaṃ tūrya-bheryaś ca jaghnire
analyzed: ānarcuḥ puruṣāḥ raṅgam tūrya bheryaḥ ca jaghnire

original: BhP_10.42.033/3 mañcāś cālaṅkṛtāḥ sragbhiḥ patākā-caila-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: mañcāḥ ca alaṅkṛtāḥ sragbhiḥ patākā caila toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.42.034/1 teṣu paurā jānapadā brahma-kṣatra-purogamāḥ
analyzed: teṣu paurāḥ jānapadāḥ brahma kṣatra purogamāḥ

original: BhP_10.42.034/3 yathopajoṣaṃ viviśū rājānaś ca kṛtāsanāḥ
analyzed: yathopajoṣam viviśuḥ rājānaḥ ca kṛta āsanāḥ

original: BhP_10.42.035/1 kaṃsaḥ parivṛto 'mātyai rāja-mañca upāviśat
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ parivṛtaḥ mātyaiḥ rāja mañce upāviśat

original: BhP_10.42.035/3 maṇḍaleśvara-madhya-stho hṛdayena vidūyatā
analyzed: maṇḍaleśvara madhya sthaḥ hṛdayena vidūyatā

original: BhP_10.42.036/1 vādyamānesu tūryeṣu malla-tālottareṣu ca
analyzed: vādyamānesu tūryeṣu malla tāla uttareṣu ca

original: BhP_10.42.036/3 mallāḥ sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ dṛptāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ samāsata
analyzed: mallāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ dṛptāḥ sa upādhyāyāḥ samāsata

original: BhP_10.42.037/1 cāṇūro muṣṭikaḥ kūtaḥ śalas tośala eva ca
analyzed: cāṇūraḥ muṣṭikaḥ kūtaḥ śalaḥ tośalaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.42.037/3 ta āsedur upasthānaṃ valgu-vādya-praharṣitāḥ
analyzed: te āseduḥ upasthānam valgu vādya praharṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.42.038/1 nanda-gopādayo gopā bhoja-rāja-samāhutāḥ
analyzed: nanda gopa ādayaḥ gopāḥ bhojarāja samāhutāḥ

original: BhP_10.42.038/3 niveditopāyanās ta ekasmin mañca āviśan
analyzed: nivedita upāyanāḥ te ekasmin mañce āviśan

original: BhP_10.43.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.43.001/1 atha kṛṣṇaś ca rāmaś ca kṛta-śaucau parantapa
analyzed: atha kṛṣṇaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca kṛta śaucau parantapa

original: BhP_10.43.001/3 malla-dundubhi-nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā draṣṭum upeyatuḥ
analyzed: malla dundubhi nirghoṣam śrutvā draṣṭum upeyatuḥ

original: BhP_10.43.002/1 raṅga-dvāraṃ samāsādya tasmin nāgam avasthitam
analyzed: raṅgadvāram samāsādya tasmin nāgam avasthitam

original: BhP_10.43.002/3 apaśyat kuvalayāpīḍaṃ kṛṣṇo 'mbaṣṭha-pracoditam
analyzed: apaśyat kuvalayāpīḍam kṛṣṇaḥ mbaṣṭha pracoditam

original: BhP_10.43.003/1 baddhvā parikaraṃ śauriḥ samuhya kuṭilālakān
analyzed: baddhvā parikaram śauriḥ samuhya kuṭila alakān

original: BhP_10.43.003/3 uvāca hastipaṃ vācā megha-nāda-gabhīrayā
analyzed: uvāca hastipam vācā megha nāda gabhīrayā

original: BhP_10.43.004/1 ambaṣṭhāmbaṣṭha mārgaṃ nau dehy apakrama mā ciram
analyzed: ambaṣṭha ambaṣṭha mārgam nau dehi apakrama mā ciram

original: BhP_10.43.004/3 no cet sa-kuñjaraṃ tvādya nayāmi yama-sādanam
analyzed: no ced sa kuñjaram tvā adya nayāmi yama sādanam

original: BhP_10.43.005/1 evaṃ nirbhartsito 'mbaṣṭhaḥ kupitaḥ kopitaṃ gajam
analyzed: evam nirbhartsitaḥ mbaṣṭhaḥ kupitaḥ kopitam gajam

original: BhP_10.43.005/3 codayām āsa kṛṣṇāya kālāntaka-yamopamam
analyzed: codayām āsa kṛṣṇāya kāla antaka yama upamam

original: BhP_10.43.006/1 karīndras tam abhidrutya kareṇa tarasāgrahīt
analyzed: kari indraḥ tam abhidrutya kareṇa tarasā agrahīt

original: BhP_10.43.006/3 karād vigalitaḥ so 'muṃ nihatyāṅghriṣv alīyata
analyzed: karāt vigalitaḥ saḥ mum nihatya aṅghriṣu alīyata

original: BhP_10.43.007/1 saṅkruddhas tam acakṣāṇo ghrāṇa-dṛṣṭiḥ sa keśavam
analyzed: saṅkruddhaḥ tam a cakṣāṇaḥ ghrāṇa dṛṣṭiḥ sa keśavam

original: BhP_10.43.007/3 parāmṛśat puṣkareṇa sa prasahya vinirgataḥ
analyzed: parāmṛśat puṣkareṇa sa prasahya vinirgataḥ

original: BhP_10.43.008/1 pucche pragṛhyāti-balaṃ dhanuṣaḥ pañca-viṃśatim
analyzed: pucche pragṛhya atibalam dhanuṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatim

original: BhP_10.43.008/3 vicakarṣa yathā nāgaṃ suparṇa iva līlayā
analyzed: vicakarṣa yathā nāgam suparṇaḥ iva līlayā

original: BhP_10.43.009/1 sa paryāvartamānena savya-dakṣiṇato 'cyutaḥ
analyzed: sa paryāvartamānena cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.009/3 babhrāma bhrāmyamāṇena go-vatseneva bālakaḥ
analyzed: babhrāma bhrāmyamāṇena go vatsena iva bālakaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.010/1 tato 'bhimakham abhyetya pāṇināhatya vāraṇam
analyzed: tatas bhi makham abhyetya pāṇinā āhatya vāraṇam

original: BhP_10.43.010/3 prādravan pātayām āsa spṛśyamānaḥ pade pade
analyzed: prādravan pātayām āsa spṛśyamānaḥ pade pade

original: BhP_10.43.011/1 sa dhāvan kṛīdayā bhūmau patitvā sahasotthitaḥ
analyzed: sa dhāvan kṛīdayā bhūmau patitvā sahasā utthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.011/3 tam matvā patitaṃ kruddho dantābhyāṃ so 'hanat kṣitim
analyzed: tam matvā patitam kruddhaḥ dantābhyām saḥ hanat kṣitim

original: BhP_10.43.012/1 sva-vikrame pratihate kuñjarendro 'ty-amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: sva vikrame pratihate tya marṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.012/3 codyamāno mahāmātraiḥ kṛṣṇam abhyadravad ruṣā
analyzed: codyamānaḥ mahāmātraiḥ kṛṣṇam abhyadravat ruṣā

original: BhP_10.43.013/1 tam āpatantam āsādya bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: tam āpatantam āsādya bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.013/3 nigṛhya pāṇinā hastaṃ pātayām āsa bhū-tale
analyzed: nigṛhya pāṇinā hastam pātayām āsa bhū tale

original: BhP_10.43.014/1 patitasya padākramya mṛgendra iva līlayā
analyzed: patitasya padā ākramya mṛgendraḥ iva līlayā

original: BhP_10.43.014/3 dantam utpāṭya tenebhaṃ hastipāṃś cāhanad dhariḥ
analyzed: dantam utpāṭya tena ibham hastipān ca ahanat hariḥ

original: BhP_10.43.015/1 mṛtakaṃ dvipam utsṛjya danta-pāṇiḥ samāviśat
analyzed: mṛtakam dvipam utsṛjya danta pāṇiḥ samāviśat

original: BhP_10.43.015/3 aṃsa-nyasta-viṣāṇo 'sṛṅ- mada-bindubhir aṅkitaḥ
analyzed: aṃsa nyasta viṣāṇaḥ sṛj mada bindubhiḥ aṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.015/5 virūḍha-sveda-kaṇikā vadanāmburuho babhau
analyzed: virūḍha sveda kaṇikā vadana amburuhaḥ babhau

original: BhP_10.43.016/1 vṛtau gopaiḥ katipayair baladeva-janārdanau
analyzed: vṛtau gopaiḥ katipayaiḥ baladeva janārdanau

original: BhP_10.43.016/3 raṅgaṃ viviśatū rājan gaja-danta-varāyudhau
analyzed: raṅgam viviśatuḥ rājan gaja danta vara āyudhau

original: BhP_10.43.017/1 mallānām aśanir nṛṇāṃ nara-varaḥ strīṇāṃ smaro mūrtimān
analyzed: mallānām aśaniḥ nṛṇām nara varaḥ strīṇām smaraḥ mūrtimān

original: BhP_10.43.017/2 gopānāṃ sva-jano 'satāṃ kṣiti-bhujāṃ śāstā sva-pitroḥ śiśuḥ
analyzed: gopānām sva jano satām kṣitibhujām śāstā sva pitroḥ śiśuḥ

original: BhP_10.43.017/3 mṛtyur bhoja-pater virāḍ aviduṣāṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ yogināṃ
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ bhoja pateḥ virāj aviduṣām tattvam param yoginām

original: BhP_10.43.017/4 vṛṣṇīnāṃ para-devateti vidito raṅgaṃ gataḥ sāgrajaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇīnām para devatā iti viditaḥ raṅgam gataḥ sa agrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.018/1 hataṃ kuvalayāpīḍaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāv api durjayau
analyzed: hatam kuvalayāpīḍam dṛṣṭvā tau api durjayau

original: BhP_10.43.018/3 kaṃso manasy api tadā bhṛśam udvivije nṛpa
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ manasi api tadā bhṛśam udvivije nṛpa

original: BhP_10.43.019/1 tau rejatū raṅga-gatau mahā-bhujau vicitra-veṣābharaṇa-srag-ambarau
analyzed: tau rejatuḥ raṅga gatau mahā bhujau vicitra veṣa ābharaṇa sraj ambarau

original: BhP_10.43.019/3 yathā naṭāv uttama-veṣa-dhāriṇau manaḥ kṣipantau prabhayā nirīkṣatām
analyzed: yathā naṭau uttama veṣa dhāriṇau manaḥ kṣipantau prabhayā

original: BhP_10.43.020/1 nirīkṣya tāv uttama-pūruṣau janā mañca-sthitā nāgara-rāṣṭrakā nṛpa
analyzed: nirīkṣya tau uttama pūruṣau janāḥ mañca sthitāḥ nāgara rāṣṭrakāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.43.020/3 praharṣa-vegotkalitekṣaṇānanāḥ papur na tṛptā nayanais tad-ānanam
analyzed: praharṣa vega utkalita īkṣaṇa ānanāḥ papuḥ na tṛptāḥ nayanaiḥ tad ānanam

original: BhP_10.43.021/1 pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ lihanta iva jihvayā
analyzed: pibantaḥ iva cakṣurbhyām lihantaḥ iva jihvayā

original: BhP_10.43.021/3 jighranta iva nāsābhyāṃ śliṣyanta iva bāhubhiḥ
analyzed: jighrantaḥ iva nāsābhyām śliṣyantaḥ iva bāhubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.43.022/1 ūcuḥ parasparaṃ te vai yathā-dṛṣṭaṃ yathā-śrutam
analyzed: ūcuḥ parasparam te vai yathādṛṣṭam yathāśrutam

original: BhP_10.43.022/3 tad-rūpa-guṇa-mādhurya- prāgalbhya-smāritā iva
analyzed: tad rūpa guṇa mādhurya prāgalbhya smāritāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.43.023/1 etau bhagavataḥ sākṣād dharer nārāyaṇasya hi
analyzed: etau bhagavataḥ sākṣāt hareḥ nārāyaṇasya hi

original: BhP_10.43.023/3 avatīrṇāv ihāṃśena vasudevasya veśmani
analyzed: avatīrṇau iha aṃśena vasudevasya veśmani

original: BhP_10.43.024/1 eṣa vai kila devakyāṃ jāto nītaś ca gokulam
analyzed: eṣa vai kila devakyām jātaḥ nītaḥ ca gokulam

original: BhP_10.43.024/3 kālam etaṃ vasan gūḍho vavṛdhe nanda-veśmani
analyzed: kālam etam vasan gūḍhaḥ vavṛdhe nanda veśmani

original: BhP_10.43.025/1 pūtanānena nītāntaṃ cakravātaś ca dānavaḥ
analyzed: pūtanā anena nīta antam cakra vātaḥ ca dānavaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.025/3 arjunau guhyakaḥ keśī dhenuko 'nye ca tad-vidhāḥ
analyzed: arjunau guhyakaḥ keśī dhenukaḥ nye ca tadvidhāḥ

original: BhP_10.43.026/1 gāvaḥ sa-pālā etena dāvāgneḥ parimocitāḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ sa pālāḥ etena dāva agneḥ parimocitāḥ

original: BhP_10.43.026/3 kāliyo damitaḥ sarpa indraś ca vimadaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: kāliyaḥ damitaḥ sarpaḥ indraḥ ca vimadaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.027/1 saptāham eka-hastena dhṛto 'dri-pravaro 'munā
analyzed: sapta aham eka hastena dhṛtaḥ dri pravaraḥ munā

original: BhP_10.43.027/3 varṣa-vātāśanibhyaś ca paritrātaṃ ca gokulam
analyzed: varṣa vāta aśanibhyaḥ ca paritrātam ca gokulam

original: BhP_10.43.028/1 gopyo 'sya nitya-mudita- hasita-prekṣaṇaṃ mukham
analyzed: mukham

original: BhP_10.43.028/3 paśyantyo vividhāṃs tāpāṃs taranti smāśramaṃ mudā
analyzed: paśyantyaḥ vividhān tāpān taranti sma āśramam mudā

original: BhP_10.43.029/1 vadanty anena vaṃśo 'yaṃ yadoḥ su-bahu-viśrutaḥ
analyzed: vadanti anena vaṃśaḥ yam yadoḥ su bahu viśrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.029/3 śriyaṃ yaśo mahatvaṃ ca lapsyate parirakṣitaḥ
analyzed: śriyam yaśaḥ mahatvam ca lapsyate parirakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.030/1 ayaṃ cāsyāgrajaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ kamala-locanaḥ
analyzed: ayam ca asya agrajaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.030/3 pralambo nihato yena vatsako ye bakādayaḥ
analyzed: pralambaḥ nihataḥ yena vatsakaḥ ye baka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.031/1 janeṣv evaṃ bruvāṇeṣu tūryeṣu ninadatsu ca
analyzed: janeṣu evam bruvāṇeṣu tūryeṣu ninadatsu ca

original: BhP_10.43.031/3 kṛṣṇa-rāmau samābhāṣya cāṇūro vākyam abravīt
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau samābhāṣya cāṇūraḥ vākyam abravīt

original: BhP_10.43.032/1 he nanda-sūno he rāma bhavantau vīra-sammatau
analyzed: he nanda sūno he rāma bhavantau vīra sammatau

original: BhP_10.43.032/3 niyuddha-kuśalau śrutvā rājñāhūtau didṛkṣuṇā
analyzed: niyuddha kuśalau śrutvā rājñā āhūtau didṛkṣuṇā

original: BhP_10.43.033/1 priyaṃ rājñaḥ prakurvatyaḥ śreyo vindanti vai prajāḥ
analyzed: priyam rājñaḥ prakurvatyaḥ śreyaḥ vindanti vai prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.43.033/3 manasā karmaṇā vācā viparītam ato 'nyathā
analyzed: manasā karmaṇā vācā viparītam atas nyathā

original: BhP_10.43.034/1 nityaṃ pramuditā gopā vatsa-pālā yathā-sphuṭam
analyzed: nityam pramuditāḥ gopāḥ vatsa pālāḥ yathā sphuṭam

original: BhP_10.43.034/3 vaneṣu malla-yuddhena krīḍantaś cārayanti gāḥ
analyzed: vaneṣu malla yuddhena krīḍantaḥ cārayanti gāḥ

original: BhP_10.43.035/1 tasmād rājñaḥ priyaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ ca karavāma he
analyzed: tasmāt rājñaḥ priyam yūyam vayam ca karavāma he

original: BhP_10.43.035/3 bhūtāni naḥ prasīdanti sarva-bhūta-mayo nṛpaḥ
analyzed: bhūtāni naḥ prasīdanti sarva bhūta mayaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.036/1 tan niśamyābravīt kṛṣṇo deśa-kālocitaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: tat niśamya abravīt kṛṣṇaḥ deśa kāla ucitam vacaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.036/3 niyuddham ātmano 'bhīṣṭaṃ manyamāno 'bhinandya ca
analyzed: niyuddham ātmanaḥ bhīṣṭam manyamānaḥ bhinandya ca

original: BhP_10.43.037/1 prajā bhoja-pater asya vayaṃ cāpi vane-carāḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ bhoja pateḥ asya vayam ca api vanecarāḥ

original: BhP_10.43.037/3 karavāma priyaṃ nityaṃ tan naḥ param anugrahaḥ
analyzed: karavāma priyam nityam tat naḥ param anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.038/1 bālā vayaṃ tulya-balaiḥ krīḍiṣyāmo yathocitam
analyzed: bālāḥ vayam tulya balaiḥ krīḍiṣyāmaḥ yathocitam

original: BhP_10.43.038/3 bhaven niyuddhaṃ mādharmaḥ spṛśen malla-sabhā-sadaḥ
analyzed: bhavet niyuddham mā adharmaḥ spṛśet malla sabhāsadaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.039/0 cāṇūra uvāca
analyzed: cāṇūraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.43.039/1 na bālo na kiśoras tvaṃ balaś ca balināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: na bālaḥ na kiśoraḥ tvam balaḥ ca balinām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.43.039/3 līlayebho hato yena sahasra-dvipa-sattva-bhṛt
analyzed: līlayā ibhaḥ hataḥ yena sahasra dvipa sattva bhṛt

original: BhP_10.43.040/1 tasmād bhavadbhyāṃ balibhir yoddhavyaṃ nānayo 'tra vai
analyzed: tasmāt bhavadbhyām balibhiḥ yoddhavyam vai

original: BhP_10.43.040/3 mayi vikrama vārṣṇeya balena saha muṣṭikaḥ
analyzed: mayi vikrama vārṣṇeya balena saha muṣṭikaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.44.001/1 evaṃ carcita-saṅkalpo bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: evam carcita saṅkalpaḥ bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.001/3 āsasādātha caṇūraṃ muṣṭtikaṃ rohiṇī-sutaḥ
analyzed: āsasāda atha caṇūram muṣṭtikam rohiṇīsutaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.002/1 hastābhyāṃ hastayor baddhvā padbhyām eva ca pādayoḥ
analyzed: hastābhyām hastayoḥ baddhvā padbhyām eva ca pādayoḥ

original: BhP_10.44.002/3 vicakarṣatur anyonyaṃ prasahya vijigīṣayā
analyzed: vicakarṣatuḥ anyonyam prasahya vijigīṣayā

original: BhP_10.44.003/1 aratnī dve aratnibhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ caiva jānunī
analyzed: aratnī dve aratnibhyām jānubhyām ca eva jānunī

original: BhP_10.44.003/3 śiraḥ śīrṣṇorasoras tāv anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ śīrṣṇā urasā uraḥ tau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ

original: BhP_10.44.004/1 paribhrāmaṇa-vikṣepa- parirambhāvapātanaiḥ
analyzed: paribhrāmaṇa vikṣepa parirambha avapātanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.44.004/3 utsarpaṇāpasarpaṇaiś cānyonyaṃ pratyarundhatām
analyzed: utsarpaṇa apasarpaṇaiḥ ca anyonyam pratyarundhatām

original: BhP_10.44.005/1 utthāpanair unnayanaiś cālanaiḥ sthāpanair api
analyzed: utthāpanaiḥ unnayanaiḥ cālanaiḥ sthāpanaiḥ api

original: BhP_10.44.005/3 parasparaṃ jigīṣantāv apacakratur ātmanaḥ
analyzed: parasparam jigīṣantau apacakratuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.006/1 tad balābalavad yuddhaṃ sametāḥ sarva-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: tat balābalavat yuddham sametāḥ sarva yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.006/3 ūcuḥ parasparaṃ rājan sānukampā varūthaśaḥ
analyzed: ūcuḥ parasparam rājan sa anukampāḥ varūthaśas

original: BhP_10.44.007/1 mahān ayaṃ batādharma eṣāṃ rāja-sabhā-sadām
analyzed: mahān ayam bata adharmaḥ eṣām rāja sabhāsadām

original: BhP_10.44.007/3 ye balābalavad yuddhaṃ rājño 'nvicchanti paśyataḥ
analyzed: ye balābalavat yuddham rājñaḥ nu icchanti paśyataḥ

original: BhP_10.44.008/1 kva vajra-sāra-sarvāṅgau mallau śailendra-sannibhau
analyzed: kva vajra sāra sarva aṅgau mallau śailendra sannibhau

original: BhP_10.44.008/3 kva cāti-sukumārāṅgau kiśorau nāpta-yauvanau
analyzed: kva ca ati sukumāra aṅgau kiśorau na āpta yauvanau

original: BhP_10.44.009/1 dharma-vyatikramo hy asya samājasya dhruvaṃ bhavet
analyzed: dharma vyatikramaḥ hi asya samājasya dhruvam bhavet

original: BhP_10.44.009/3 yatrādharmaḥ samuttiṣṭhen na stheyaṃ tatra karhicit
analyzed: yatra adharmaḥ samuttiṣṭhet na stheyam tatra karhicit

original: BhP_10.44.010/1 na sabhāṃ praviśet prājñaḥ sabhya-doṣān anusmaran
analyzed: na sabhām praviśet prājñaḥ sabhya doṣān anusmaran

original: BhP_10.44.010/3 abruvan vibruvann ajño naraḥ kilbiṣam aśnute
analyzed: a bruvan vibruvan ajñaḥ naraḥ kilbiṣam aśnute

original: BhP_10.44.011/1 valgataḥ śatrum abhitaḥ kṛṣṇasya vadanāmbujam
analyzed: valgataḥ śatrum abhitas kṛṣṇasya vadana ambujam

original: BhP_10.44.011/3 vīkṣyatāṃ śrama-vāry-uptaṃ padma-kośam ivāmbubhiḥ
analyzed: vīkṣyatām śrama vāri uptam padmakośam iva ambubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.44.012/1 kiṃ na paśyata rāmasya mukham ātāmra-locanam
analyzed: kim na paśyata rāmasya mukham ātāmra locanam

original: BhP_10.44.012/3 muṣṭikaṃ prati sāmarṣaṃ hāsa-saṃrambha-śobhitam
analyzed: muṣṭikam prati sa amarṣam hāsa saṃrambha śobhitam

original: BhP_10.44.013/1 puṇyā bata vraja-bhuvo yad ayaṃ nṛ-liṅga
analyzed: puṇyāḥ bata vraja bhuvaḥ yat ayam nṛliṅga

original: BhP_10.44.013/2 gūḍhaḥ purāṇa-puruṣo vana-citra-mālyaḥ
BhP_10.44.013/3 gāḥ pālayan saha-balaḥ kvaṇayaṃś ca veṇuṃ
analyzed: gāḥ pālayan sahabalaḥ kvaṇayan ca veṇum

original: BhP_10.44.013/4 vikrīdayāñcati giritra-ramārcitāṅghriḥ
BhP_10.44.014/1 gopyas tapaḥ kim acaran yad amuṣya rūpaṃ
analyzed: gopyaḥ tapaḥ kim acaran yat amuṣya rūpam

original: BhP_10.44.014/2 lāvaṇya-sāram asamordhvam ananya-siddham
BhP_10.44.014/3 dṛgbhiḥ pibanty anusavābhinavaṃ durāpam
analyzed: pibanti anusava abhinavam durāpam

original: BhP_10.44.014/4 ekānta-dhāma yaśasaḥ śrīya aiśvarasya
analyzed: ekānta dhāma yaśasaḥ aiśvarasya

original: BhP_10.44.015/1 yā dohane 'vahanane mathanopalepa preṅkheṅkhanārbha-ruditokṣaṇa-mārjanādau
analyzed: yā dohane vahanane mathana upalepa preṅkha iṅkhana arbha rudita ukṣaṇa mārjana ādau

original: BhP_10.44.015/3 gāyanti cainam anurakta-dhiyo 'śru-kaṇṭhyo dhanyā vraja-striya urukrama-citta-yānāḥ
analyzed: gāyanti ca enam anurakta dhiyaḥ śru kaṇṭhyaḥ dhanyāḥ vrajastriyaḥ urukrama citta yānāḥ

original: BhP_10.44.016/1 prātar vrajād vrajata āviśataś ca sāyaṃ
analyzed: prātar vrajāt vrajataḥ āviśataḥ ca sāyam

original: BhP_10.44.016/2 gobhiḥ samaṃ kvaṇayato 'sya niśamya veṇum
analyzed: gobhiḥ samam kvaṇayataḥ sya niśamya veṇum

original: BhP_10.44.016/3 nirgamya tūrṇam abalāḥ pathi bhūri-puṇyāḥ
analyzed: nirgamya tūrṇam abalāḥ pathi bhūri puṇyāḥ

original: BhP_10.44.016/4 paśyanti sa-smita-mukhaṃ sa-dayāvalokam
analyzed: paśyanti sa smita mukham sa dayā avalokam

original: BhP_10.44.017/1 evaṃ prabhāṣamāṇāsu strīṣu yogeśvaro hariḥ
analyzed: evam prabhāṣamāṇāsu strīṣu yogeśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.44.017/3 śatruṃ hantuṃ manaś cakre bhagavān bharatarṣabha
analyzed: śatrum hantum manaḥ cakre bhagavān bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.44.018/1 sa-bhayāḥ strī-giraḥ śrutvā putra-sneha-śucāturau
analyzed: sa bhayāḥ strī giraḥ śrutvā putra sneha śucā āturau

original: BhP_10.44.018/3 pitarāv anvatapyetāṃ putrayor abudhau balam
analyzed: pitarau anvatapyetām putrayoḥ abudhau balam

original: BhP_10.44.019/1 tais tair niyuddha-vidhibhir vividhair acyutetarau
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ niyuddha vidhibhiḥ vividhaiḥ acyutetarau

original: BhP_10.44.019/3 yuyudhāte yathānyonyaṃ tathaiva bala-muṣṭikau
analyzed: yuyudhāte yathā anyonyam tathā eva balamuṣṭikau

original: BhP_10.44.020/1 bhagavad-gātra-niṣpātair vajra-nīṣpeṣa-niṣṭhuraiḥ
BhP_10.44.020/3 cāṇūro bhajyamānāṅgo muhur glānim avāpa ha
analyzed: cāṇūraḥ bhajyamāna aṅgaḥ muhur glānim avāpa ha

original: BhP_10.44.021/1 sa śyena-vega utpatya muṣṭī-kṛtya karāv ubhau
analyzed: sa śyena vegaḥ utpatya muṣṭīkṛtya karau ubhau

original: BhP_10.44.021/3 bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ kruddho vakṣasy abādhata
analyzed: bhagavantam vāsudevam kruddhaḥ vakṣasi abādhata

original: BhP_10.44.022/1 nācalat tat-prahāreṇa mālāhata iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na acalat tad prahāreṇa mālā hataḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.022/3 bāhvor nigṛhya cāṇūraṃ bahuśo bhrāmayan hariḥ
analyzed: bāhvoḥ nigṛhya cāṇūram bahuśas bhrāmayan hariḥ

original: BhP_10.44.023/1 bhū-pṛṣṭhe pothayām āsa tarasā kṣīṇa jīvitam
analyzed: bhū pṛṣṭhe pothayām āsa tarasā kṣīṇa jīvitam

original: BhP_10.44.023/3 visrastākalpa-keśa-srag indra-dhvaja ivāpatat
analyzed: visrasta akalpa keśa sraj indra dhvajaḥ iva apatat

original: BhP_10.44.024/1 tathaiva muṣṭikaḥ pūrvaṃ sva-muṣṭyābhihatena vai
analyzed: tathā eva muṣṭikaḥ pūrvam sva muṣṭyā abhihatena vai

original: BhP_10.44.024/3 balabhadreṇa balinā talenābhihato bhṛśam
analyzed: balabhadreṇa balinā talena abhihataḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.44.025/1 pravepitaḥ sa rudhiram udvaman mukhato 'rditaḥ
analyzed: pravepitaḥ sa rudhiram udvaman mukhataḥ rditaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.025/3 vyasuḥ papātorvy-upasthe vātāhata ivāṅghripaḥ
analyzed: vyasuḥ papāta urvī upasthe vāta āhataḥ iva aṅghripaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.026/1 tataḥ kūṭam anuprāptaṃ rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tatas kūṭam anuprāptam rāmaḥ praharatām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.026/3 avadhīl līlayā rājan sāvajñaṃ vāma-muṣṭinā
analyzed: avadhīt līlayā rājan sa avajñam vāma muṣṭinā

original: BhP_10.44.027/1 tarhy eva hi śalaḥ kṛṣṇa- prapadāhata-śīrṣakaḥ
analyzed: tarhi eva hi śalaḥ kṛṣṇa prapada āhata śīrṣakaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.027/3 dvidhā vidīrṇas tośalaka ubhāv api nipetatuḥ
analyzed: dvidhā vidīrṇaḥ tośalakaḥ ubhau api nipetatuḥ

original: BhP_10.44.028/1 cāṇūre muṣṭike kūṭe śale tośalake hate
analyzed: cāṇūre muṣṭike kūṭe śale tośalake hate

original: BhP_10.44.028/3 śeṣāḥ pradudruvur mallāḥ sarve prāṇa-parīpsavaḥ
analyzed: śeṣāḥ pradudruvuḥ mallāḥ sarve prāṇa parīpsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.029/1 gopān vayasyān ākṛṣya taiḥ saṃsṛjya vijahratuḥ
analyzed: gopān vayasyān ākṛṣya taiḥ saṃsṛjya vijahratuḥ

original: BhP_10.44.029/3 vādyamāneṣu tūryeṣu valgantau ruta-nūpurau
analyzed: vādyamāneṣu tūryeṣu valgantau ruta nūpurau

original: BhP_10.44.030/1 janāḥ prajahṛṣuḥ sarve karmaṇā rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: janāḥ prajahṛṣuḥ sarve karmaṇā rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.44.030/3 ṛte kaṃsaṃ vipra-mukhyāḥ sādhavaḥ sādhu sādhv iti
analyzed: ṛte kaṃsam vipra mukhyāḥ sādhavaḥ sādhu sādhu iti

original: BhP_10.44.031/1 hateṣu malla-varyeṣu vidruteṣu ca bhoja-rāṭ
analyzed: hateṣu malla varyeṣu vidruteṣu ca bhojarāj

original: BhP_10.44.031/3 nyavārayat sva-tūryāṇi vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha
analyzed: nyavārayat sva tūryāṇi vākyam ca idam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.44.032/1 niḥsārayata durvṛttau vasudevātmajau purāt
analyzed: niḥsārayata durvṛttau vasudeva ātmajau purāt

original: BhP_10.44.032/3 dhanaṃ harata gopānāṃ nandaṃ badhnīta durmatim
analyzed: dhanam harata gopānām nandam badhnīta durmatim

original: BhP_10.44.033/1 vasudevas tu durmedhā hanyatām āśv asattamaḥ
analyzed: vasudevaḥ tu durmedhāḥ hanyatām āśu asattamaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.033/3 ugrasenaḥ pitā cāpi sānugaḥ para-pakṣa-gaḥ
analyzed: ugrasenaḥ pitā ca api sa anugaḥ para pakṣa gaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.034/1 evaṃ vikatthamāne vai kaṃse prakupito 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: evam vikatthamāne vai kaṃse prakupitaḥ vyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.034/3 laghimnotpatya tarasā mañcam uttuṅgam āruhat
analyzed: laghimnā utpatya tarasā mañcam uttuṅgam āruhat

original: BhP_10.44.035/1 tam āviśantam ālokya mṛtyum ātmana āsanāt
analyzed: tam āviśantam ālokya mṛtyum ātmanaḥ āsanāt

original: BhP_10.44.035/3 manasvī sahasotthāya jagṛhe so 'si-carmaṇī
analyzed: manasvī sahasā utthāya jagṛhe saḥ si carmaṇī

original: BhP_10.44.036/1 taṃ khaḍga-pāṇiṃ vicarantam āśu śyenaṃ yathā dakṣiṇa-savyam ambare
analyzed: tam khaḍga pāṇim vicarantam āśu śyenam yathā dakṣiṇa savyam ambare

original: BhP_10.44.036/3 samagrahīd durviṣahogra-tejā yathoragaṃ tārkṣya-sutaḥ prasahya
analyzed: samagrahīt durviṣahā ugra tejāḥ yathā uragam tārkṣyasutaḥ prasahya

original: BhP_10.44.037/1 pragṛhya keśeṣu calat-kirītaṃ nipātya raṅgopari tuṅga-mañcāt
analyzed: pragṛhya keśeṣu calat kirītam nipātya raṅga upari tuṅga mañcāt

original: BhP_10.44.037/3 tasyopariṣṭāt svayam abja-nābhaḥ papāta viśvāśraya ātma-tantraḥ
analyzed: tasya upariṣṭāt svayam abjanābhaḥ papāta viśvāśrayaḥ ātmatantraḥ

original: BhP_10.44.038/1 taṃ samparetaṃ vicakarṣa bhūmau harir yathebhaṃ jagato vipaśyataḥ
analyzed: tam samparetam vicakarṣa bhūmau hariḥ yathā ibham jagataḥ vipaśyataḥ

original: BhP_10.44.038/3 hā heti śabdaḥ su-mahāṃs tadābhūd udīritaḥ sarva-janair narendra
analyzed: hā hā iti śabdaḥ su mahān tadā abhūt udīritaḥ sarva janaiḥ narendra

original: BhP_10.44.039/1 sa nityadodvigna-dhiyā tam īśvaraṃ pibann adan vā vicaran svapan śvasan
analyzed: sa nityadā udvigna dhiyā tam īśvaram piban adan vā vicaran svapan śvasan

original: BhP_10.44.039/3 dadarśa cakrāyudham agrato yatas tad eva rūpaṃ duravāpam āpa
analyzed: dadarśa cakrāyudham agratas yatas tat eva rūpam duravāpam āpa

original: BhP_10.44.040/1 tasyānujā bhrātaro 'ṣṭau kaṅka-nyagrodhakādayaḥ
analyzed: tasya anujāḥ bhrātaraḥ ṣṭau kaṅka nyagrodhaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.040/3 abhyadhāvann ati-kruddhā bhrātur nirveśa-kāriṇaḥ
analyzed: abhyadhāvan ati kruddhāḥ bhrātuḥ nirveśa kāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.041/1 tathāti-rabhasāṃs tāṃs tu saṃyattān rohiṇī-sutaḥ
analyzed: tathā ati rabhasān tān tu saṃyattān rohiṇīsutaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.041/3 ahan parigham udyamya paśūn iva mṛgādhipaḥ
analyzed: ahan parigham udyamya paśūn iva mṛgādhipaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.042/1 nedur dundubhayo vyomni brahmeśādyā vibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: neduḥ dundubhayaḥ vyomni brahma īśa ādyāḥ vibhūtayaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.042/3 puṣpaiḥ kirantas taṃ prītāḥ śaśaṃsur nanṛtuḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ kirantaḥ tam prītāḥ śaśaṃsuḥ nanṛtuḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.043/1 teṣāṃ striyo mahā-rāja suhṛn-maraṇa-duḥkhitāḥ
analyzed: teṣām striyaḥ mahā rāja suhṛd maraṇa duḥkhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.44.043/3 tatrābhīyur vinighnantyaḥ śīrṣāṇy aśru-vilocanāḥ
analyzed: tatra abhīyuḥ vinighnantyaḥ śīrṣāṇi aśru vilocanāḥ

original: BhP_10.44.044/1 śayānān vīra-śayāyāṃ patīn āliṅgya śocatīḥ
analyzed: śayānān vīraśayāyām patīn āliṅgya śocatīḥ

original: BhP_10.44.044/3 vilepuḥ su-svaraṃ nāryo visṛjantyo muhuḥ śucaḥ
analyzed: vilepuḥ su svaram nāryaḥ visṛjantyaḥ muhur śucaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.045/1 hā nātha priya dharma-jña karuṇānātha-vatsala
analyzed: hā nātha priya dharma jña karuṇā nātha vatsala

original: BhP_10.44.045/3 tvayā hatena nihatā vayaṃ te sa-gṛha-prajāḥ
analyzed: tvayā hatena nihatāḥ vayam te sa gṛha prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.44.046/1 tvayā virahitā patyā purīyaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: tvayā virahitā patyā purī iyam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.44.046/3 na śobhate vayam iva nivṛttotsava-maṅgalā
analyzed: na śobhate vayam iva nivṛtta utsava maṅgalā

original: BhP_10.44.047/1 anāgasāṃ tvaṃ bhūtānāṃ kṛtavān droham ulbaṇam
analyzed: anāgasām tvam bhūtānām kṛtavān droham ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.44.047/3 tenemāṃ bho daśāṃ nīto bhūta-dhruk ko labheta śam
analyzed: tena imām bho daśām nītaḥ kaḥ labheta śam

original: BhP_10.44.048/1 sarveṣām iha bhūtānām eṣa hi prabhavāpyayaḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām iha bhūtānām eṣa hi prabhava apyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.048/3 goptā ca tad-avadhyāyī na kvacit sukham edhate
analyzed: goptā ca tad avadhyāyī na kvacid sukham edhate

original: BhP_10.44.049/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.44.049/1 rāja-yoṣita āśvāsya bhagavāṃl loka-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: rāja yoṣitaḥ āśvāsya bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.44.049/3 yām āhur laukikīṃ saṃsthāṃ hatānāṃ samakārayat
analyzed: yām āhuḥ laukikīm saṃsthām hatānām samakārayat

original: BhP_10.44.050/1 mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva mocayitvātha bandhanāt
analyzed: mātaram pitaram ca eva mocayitvā atha bandhanāt

original: BhP_10.44.050/3 kṛṣṇa-rāmau vavandāte śirasā spṛśya pādayoḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau vavandāte śirasā spṛśya pādayoḥ

original: BhP_10.44.051/1 devakī vasudevaś ca vijñāya jagad-īśvarau
analyzed: devakī vasudevaḥ ca vijñāya jagat īśvarau

original: BhP_10.44.051/3 kṛta-saṃvandanau putrau sasvajāte na śaṅkitau
analyzed: kṛta saṃvandanau putrau na śaṅkitau

original: BhP_10.45.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.45.001/1 pitarāv upalabdhārthau viditvā puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: pitarau upalabdha arthau viditvā puruṣottamaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.001/3 mā bhūd iti nijāṃ māyāṃ tatāna jana-mohinīm
analyzed: mā bhūt iti nijām māyām tatāna jana mohinīm

original: BhP_10.45.002/1 uvāca pitarāv etya sāgrajaḥ sātvanarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: uvāca pitarā etya sa agrajaḥ sātvana ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.002/3 praśrayāvanataḥ prīṇann amba tāteti sādaram
analyzed: praśraya avanataḥ prīṇan amba tāta iti sādaram

original: BhP_10.45.003/1 nāsmatto yuvayos tāta nityotkaṇṭhitayor api
analyzed: na asmattaḥ yuvayoḥ tāta nitya utkaṇṭhitayoḥ api

original: BhP_10.45.003/3 bālya-paugaṇḍa-kaiśorāḥ putrābhyām abhavan kvacit
analyzed: bālya paugaṇḍa kaiśorāḥ putrābhyām abhavan kvacid

original: BhP_10.45.004/1 na labdho daiva-hatayor vāso nau bhavad-antike
analyzed: na labdhaḥ daiva hatayoḥ vāsaḥ nau bhavat antike

original: BhP_10.45.004/3 yāṃ bālāḥ pitṛ-geha-sthā vindante lālitā mudam
analyzed: yām bālāḥ pitṛ geha sthāḥ vindante lālitāḥ mudam

original: BhP_10.45.005/1 sarvārtha-sambhavo deho janitaḥ poṣito yataḥ
analyzed: sarva artha sambhavaḥ dehaḥ janitaḥ poṣitaḥ yatas

original: BhP_10.45.005/3 na tayor yāti nirveśaṃ pitror martyaḥ śatāyuṣā
analyzed: na tayoḥ yāti nirveśam pitroḥ martyaḥ śata āyuṣā

original: BhP_10.45.006/1 yas tayor ātmajaḥ kalpa ātmanā ca dhanena ca
analyzed: yaḥ tayoḥ ātmajaḥ kalpaḥ ātmanā ca dhanena ca

original: BhP_10.45.006/3 vṛttiṃ na dadyāt taṃ pretya sva-māṃsaṃ khādayanti hi
analyzed: vṛttim na dadyāt tam pretya sva māṃsam khādayanti hi

original: BhP_10.45.007/1 mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ bhāryāṃ sādhvīṃ sutam śiśum
analyzed: mātaram pitaram vṛddham bhāryām sādhvīm sutam śiśum

original: BhP_10.45.007/3 guruṃ vipraṃ prapannaṃ ca kalpo 'bibhrac chvasan-mṛtaḥ
analyzed: gurum vipram prapannam ca kalpaḥ bibhrat śvasat mṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.008/1 tan nāv akalpayoḥ kaṃsān nityam udvigna-cetasoḥ
analyzed: tat nau akalpayoḥ kaṃsāt nityam udvigna cetasoḥ

original: BhP_10.45.008/3 mogham ete vyatikrāntā divasā vām anarcatoḥ
analyzed: mogham ete vyatikrāntāḥ divasāḥ vām an arcatoḥ

original: BhP_10.45.009/1 tat kṣantum arhathas tāta mātar nau para-tantrayoḥ
analyzed: tat kṣantum arhathaḥ tāta mātar nau paratantrayoḥ

original: BhP_10.45.009/3 akurvator vāṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kliṣṭayor durhṛdā bhṛśam
analyzed: a kurvatoḥ vām śuśrūṣām kliṣṭayoḥ durhṛdā bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.45.010/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.45.010/1 iti māyā-manuṣyasya harer viśvātmano girā
analyzed: iti māyā manuṣyasya hareḥ viśvātmanaḥ girā

original: BhP_10.45.010/3 mohitāv aṅkam āropya pariṣvajyāpatur mudam
analyzed: mohitau aṅkam āropya pariṣvajya āpatuḥ mudam

original: BhP_10.45.011/1 siñcantāv aśru-dhārābhiḥ sneha-pāśena cāvṛtau
analyzed: siñcantau aśru dhārābhiḥ sneha pāśena ca āvṛtau

original: BhP_10.45.011/3 na kiñcid ūcatū rājan bāṣpa-kaṇṭhau vimohitau
analyzed: na kiñcid ūcatuḥ rājan bāṣpa kaṇṭhau vimohitau

original: BhP_10.45.012/1 evam āśvāsya pitarau bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: evam āśvāsya pitarau bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.012/3 mātāmahaṃ tūgrasenaṃ yadūnām akaron ṇṛpam
analyzed: mātāmaham tu ugrasenam yadūnām akarot ṇṛpam

original: BhP_10.45.013/1 āha cāsmān mahā-rāja prajāś cājñaptum arhasi
analyzed: āha ca asmān mahā rāja prajāḥ ca ājñaptum arhasi

original: BhP_10.45.013/3 yayāti-śāpād yadubhir nāsitavyaṃ nṛpāsane
analyzed: yayāti śāpāt yadubhiḥ na āsitavyam nṛpa āsane

original: BhP_10.45.014/1 mayi bhṛtya upāsīne bhavato vibudhādayaḥ
analyzed: mayi bhṛtye upāsīne bhavataḥ vibudha ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.014/3 baliṃ haranty avanatāḥ kim utānye narādhipāḥ
analyzed: balim haranti avanatāḥ kim uta anye narādhipāḥ

original: BhP_10.45.015/1 sarvān svān jñati-sambandhān digbhyaḥ kaṃsa-bhayākulān
analyzed: sarvān svān jñati sambandhān digbhyaḥ kaṃsa bhaya ākulān

original: BhP_10.45.015/3 yadu-vṛṣṇy-andhaka-madhu dāśārha-kukurādikān
BhP_10.45.016/1 sabhājitān samāśvāsya videśāvāsa-karśitān
analyzed: sabhājitān samāśvāsya videśa āvāsa karśitān

original: BhP_10.45.016/3 nyavāsayat sva-geheṣu vittaiḥ santarpya viśva-kṛt
analyzed: nyavāsayat sva geheṣu vittaiḥ santarpya viśvakṛt

original: BhP_10.45.017/1 kṛṣṇa-saṅkarṣaṇa-bhujair guptā labdha-manorathāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa saṅkarṣaṇa bhujaiḥ guptāḥ labdha manorathāḥ

original: BhP_10.45.017/3 gṛheṣu remire siddhāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma-gata-jvarāḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu remire siddhāḥ kṛṣṇa rāma gata jvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.45.018/1 vīkṣanto 'har ahaḥ prītā mukunda-vadanāmbujam
analyzed: vīkṣantaḥ har ahar prītāḥ mukunda vadana ambujam

original: BhP_10.45.018/3 nityaṃ pramuditaṃ śrīmat sa-daya-smita-vīkṣaṇam
analyzed: nityam pramuditam śrīmat sa dayā smita vīkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.45.019/1 tatra pravayaso 'py āsan yuvāno 'ti-balaujasaḥ
analyzed: tatra pravayasaḥ pi āsan yuvānaḥ ti bala ojasaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.019/3 pibanto 'kṣair mukundasya mukhāmbuja-sudhāṃ muhuḥ
analyzed: pibantaḥ kṣaiḥ mukundasya mukha ambuja sudhām muhur

original: BhP_10.45.020/1 atha nandaṃ samasādya bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: atha nandam samasādya bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.020/3 saṅkarṣaṇaś ca rājendra pariṣvajyedam ūcatuḥ
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇaḥ ca rāja indra pariṣvajya idam ūcatuḥ

original: BhP_10.45.021/1 pitar yuvābhyāṃ snigdhābhyāṃ poṣitau lālitau bhṛśam
analyzed: pitar yuvābhyām snigdhābhyām poṣitau lālitau bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.45.021/3 pitror abhyadhikā prītir ātmajeṣv ātmano 'pi hi
analyzed: pitroḥ abhyadhikā prītiḥ ātmajeṣu hi

original: BhP_10.45.022/1 sa pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣṇītāṃ sva-putra-vat
analyzed: sa pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣṇītām sva putra vat

original: BhP_10.45.022/3 śiśūn bandhubhir utsṛṣṭān akalpaiḥ poṣa-rakṣaṇe
analyzed: śiśūn bandhubhiḥ utsṛṣṭān akalpaiḥ poṣa rakṣaṇe

original: BhP_10.45.023/1 yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃn tāta vayaṃ ca sneha-duḥkhitān
analyzed: yāta yūyam vrajan tāta vayam ca sneha duḥkhitān

original: BhP_10.45.023/3 jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham
analyzed: jñātīn vaḥ draṣṭum eṣyāmaḥ vidhāya suhṛdām sukham

original: BhP_10.45.024/1 evaṃ sāntvayya bhagavān nandaṃ sa-vrajam acyutaḥ
analyzed: evam sāntvayya bhagavān nandam sa vrajam acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.024/3 vāso-'laṅkāra-kupyādyair arhayām āsa sādaram
analyzed: vāsa ulaṅkāra kupya ādyaiḥ arhayām āsa sādaram

original: BhP_10.45.025/1 ity uktas tau pariṣvajya nandaḥ praṇaya-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tau pariṣvajya nandaḥ praṇaya vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.025/3 pūrayann aśrubhir netre saha gopair vrajaṃ yayau
analyzed: pūrayan aśrubhiḥ netre saha gopaiḥ vrajam yayau

original: BhP_10.45.026/1 atha śūra-suto rājan putrayoḥ samakārayat
analyzed: atha śūra sutaḥ rājan putrayoḥ samakārayat

original: BhP_10.45.026/3 purodhasā brāhmaṇaiś ca yathāvad dvija-saṃskṛtim
analyzed: purodhasā brāhmaṇaiḥ ca yathāvat dvija saṃskṛtim

original: BhP_10.45.027/1 tebhyo 'dād dakṣiṇā gāvo rukma-mālāḥ sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ dāt dakṣiṇā gāvaḥ rukma mālāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.45.027/3 sv-alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ sampūjya sa-vatsāḥ kṣauma-mālinīḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ sampūjya sa vatsāḥ kṣauma mālinīḥ

original: BhP_10.45.028/1 yāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma-janmarkṣe mano-dattā mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: yāḥ kṛṣṇa rāma janma ṛkṣe manaḥ dattāḥ mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.45.028/3 tāś cādadād anusmṛtya kaṃsenādharmato hṛtāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ca adadāt anusmṛtya kaṃsena adharmataḥ hṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.45.029/1 tataś ca labdha-saṃskārau dvijatvaṃ prāpya su-vratau
analyzed: tatas ca labdha saṃskārau dvija tvam prāpya suvratau

original: BhP_10.45.029/3 gargād yadu-kulācāryād gāyatraṃ vratam āsthitau
analyzed: gargāt yadu kula ācāryāt gāyatram vratam āsthitau

original: BhP_10.45.030/1 prabhavau sarva-vidyānāṃ sarva-jñau jagad-īśvarau
analyzed: prabhavau sarva vidyānām sarvajñau jagat īśvarau

original: BhP_10.45.030/3 nānya-siddhāmalaṃ jñānaṃ gūhamānau narehitaiḥ
analyzed: na anya siddha amalam jñānam gūhamānau nara īhitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.45.031/1 atho guru-kule vāsam icchantāv upajagmatuḥ
analyzed: atha u guru kule vāsam icchantau upajagmatuḥ

original: BhP_10.45.031/3 kāśyaṃ sāndīpaniṃ nāma hy avanti-pura-vāsinam
analyzed: kāśyam sāndīpanim nāma hi avanti pura vāsinam

original: BhP_10.45.032/1 yathopasādya tau dāntau gurau vṛttim aninditām
analyzed: yathā upasādya tau dāntau gurau vṛttim aninditām

original: BhP_10.45.032/3 grāhayantāv upetau sma bhaktyā devam ivādṛtau
analyzed: grāhayantau upetau sma bhaktyā devam iva ādṛtau

original: BhP_10.45.033/1 tayor dvija-varas tuṣṭaḥ śuddha-bhāvānuvṛttibhiḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ dvijavaraḥ tuṣṭaḥ śuddha bhāva anuvṛttibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.45.033/3 provāca vedān akhilān saṅgopaniṣado guruḥ
analyzed: provāca vedān akhilān saṅga upaniṣadaḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_10.45.034/1 sa-rahasyaṃ dhanur-vedaṃ dharmān nyāya-pathāṃs tathā
analyzed: sa rahasyam dhanurvedam dharmān nyāya pathān tathā

original: BhP_10.45.034/3 tathā cānvīkṣikīṃ vidyāṃ rāja-nītiṃ ca ṣaḍ-vidhām
analyzed: tathā ca ānvīkṣikīm vidyām rāja nītim ca ṣaḍvidhām

original: BhP_10.45.035/1 sarvaṃ nara-vara-śreṣṭhau sarva-vidyā-pravartakau
analyzed: sarvam nara vara śreṣṭhau sarva vidyā pravartakau

original: BhP_10.45.035/3 sakṛn nigada-mātreṇa tau sañjagṛhatur nṛpa
analyzed: sakṛt nigada mātreṇa tau sañjagṛhatuḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.45.036/1 aho-rātraiś catuḥ-ṣaṣṭyā saṃyattau tāvatīḥ kalāḥ
analyzed: ahorātraiḥ catuḥṣaṣṭyā saṃyattau tāvatīḥ kalāḥ

original: BhP_10.45.036/3 guru-dakṣiṇayācāryaṃ chandayām āsatur nṛpa
analyzed: guru dakṣiṇayā ācāryam chandayām āsatuḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.45.037/1 dvijas tayos taṃ mahimānam adbhutaṃ
analyzed: dvijaḥ tayoḥ tam mahimānam adbhutam

original: BhP_10.45.037/2 saṃlokṣya rājann ati-mānusīṃ matim
analyzed: saṃlokṣya rājan atimānusīm matim

original: BhP_10.45.037/3 sammantrya patnyā sa mahārṇave mṛtaṃ
analyzed: sammantrya patnyā sa mahā arṇave mṛtam

original: BhP_10.45.037/4 bālaṃ prabhāse varayāṃ babhūva ha
analyzed: bālam prabhāse babhūva ha

original: BhP_10.45.038/1 tethety athāruhya mahā-rathau rathaṃ
analyzed: atha āruhya mahā rathau ratham

original: BhP_10.45.038/2 prabhāsam āsādya duranta-vikramau
analyzed: prabhāsam āsādya duranta vikramau

original: BhP_10.45.038/3 velām upavrajya niṣīdatuḥ kṣanaṃ
analyzed: velām upavrajya niṣīdatuḥ

original: BhP_10.45.038/4 sindhur viditvārhanam āharat tayoḥ
analyzed: sindhuḥ viditvā arhanam āharat tayoḥ

original: BhP_10.45.039/1 tam āha bhagavān āśu guru-putraḥ pradīyatām
analyzed: tam āha bhagavān āśu guru putraḥ pradīyatām

original: BhP_10.45.039/3 yo 'sāv iha tvayā grasto bālako mahatormiṇā
analyzed: sau iha tvayā grastaḥ bālakaḥ mahatā ūrmiṇā

original: BhP_10.45.040/0 śrī-samudra uvāca
analyzed: śrī samudraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.45.040/1 na cāhārṣam ahaṃ deva daityaḥ pañcajano mahān
analyzed: na ca ahārṣam aham deva daityaḥ pañcajanaḥ mahān

original: BhP_10.45.040/3 antar-jala-caraḥ kṛṣṇa śaṅkha-rūpa-dharo 'suraḥ
analyzed: antar jalacaraḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_10.45.041/1 āste tenāhṛto nūnaṃ tac chrutvā satvaraṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: āste tena āhṛtaḥ nūnam tat śrutvā sa tvaram prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.45.041/3 jalam āviśya taṃ hatvā nāpaśyad udare 'rbhakam
analyzed: jalam āviśya tam hatvā na apaśyat udare rbhakam

original: BhP_10.45.042/1 tad-aṅga-prabhavaṃ śaṅkham ādāya ratham āgamat
analyzed: tad aṅga prabhavam śaṅkham ādāya ratham āgamat

original: BhP_10.45.042/3 tataḥ saṃyamanīṃ nāma yamasya dayitāṃ purīm
analyzed: tatas saṃyamanīm nāma yamasya dayitām purīm

original: BhP_10.45.043/1 gatvā janārdanaḥ śaṅkhaṃ pradadhmau sa-halāyudhaḥ
analyzed: gatvā janārdanaḥ śaṅkham pradadhmau sa halāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.043/2 śaṅkha-nirhrādam ākarṇya prajā-saṃyamano yamaḥ
analyzed: śaṅkha nirhrādam ākarṇya prajā saṃyamanaḥ yamaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.044/1 tayoḥ saparyāṃ mahatīṃ cakre bhakty-upabṛṃhitām
analyzed: tayoḥ saparyām mahatīm cakre bhakti upabṛṃhitām

original: BhP_10.45.044/3 uvācāvanataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ sarva-bhūtāśayālayam
analyzed: uvāca avanataḥ kṛṣṇam sarva bhūta āśaya ālayam

original: BhP_10.45.044/5 līlā-manuṣyayor viṣṇo yuvayoḥ karavāma kim
analyzed: līlā manuṣyayoḥ viṣṇo yuvayoḥ karavāma kim

original: BhP_10.45.045/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.45.045/1 guru-putram ihānītaṃ nija-karma-nibandhanam
analyzed: guru putram iha ānītam nija karma nibandhanam

original: BhP_10.45.045/3 ānayasva mahā-rāja mac-chāsana-puraskṛtaḥ
analyzed: ānayasva mahā rāja mad śāsana puraskṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.046/1 tatheti tenopānītaṃ guru-putraṃ yadūttamau
analyzed: tathā iti tena upānītam guru putram yadu uttamau

original: BhP_10.45.046/3 dattvā sva-gurave bhūyo vṛṇīṣveti tam ūcatuḥ
analyzed: dattvā sva gurave bhūyaḥ vṛṇīṣva iti tam ūcatuḥ

original: BhP_10.45.047/0 śrī-gurur uvāca
analyzed: śrī guruḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.45.047/1 samyak sampādito vatsa bhavadbhyāṃ guru-niṣkrayaḥ
analyzed: samyak sampāditaḥ vatsa bhavadbhyām guru niṣkrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.45.047/3 ko nu yuṣmad-vidha-guroḥ kāmānām avaśiṣyate
analyzed: kaḥ nu yuṣmadvidha guroḥ kāmānām avaśiṣyate

original: BhP_10.45.048/1 gacchataṃ sva-gṛhaṃ vīrau kīrtir vām astu pāvanī
analyzed: gacchatam sva gṛham vīrau kīrtiḥ vām astu pāvanī

original: BhP_10.45.048/3 chandāṃsy ayāta-yāmāni bhavantv iha paratra ca
analyzed: chandāṃsi ayātayāmāni bhavantu iha paratra ca

original: BhP_10.45.049/1 guruṇaivam anujñātau rathenānila-raṃhasā
analyzed: guruṇā evam anujñātau rathena anila raṃhasā

original: BhP_10.45.049/3 āyātau sva-puraṃ tāta parjanya-ninadena vai
analyzed: āyātau sva puram tāta parjanya ninadena vai

original: BhP_10.45.050/1 samanandan prajāḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā rāma-janārdanau
analyzed: samanandan prajāḥ sarvāḥ dṛṣṭvā rāma janārdanau

original: BhP_10.45.050/3 apaśyantyo bahv ahāni naṣṭa-labdha-dhanā iva
analyzed: a paśyantyaḥ bahu ahāni naṣṭa labdha dhanāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.46.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.46.001/1 vṛṣṇīnāṃ pravaro mantrī kṛṣṇasya dayitaḥ sakhā
analyzed: vṛṣṇīnām pravaraḥ mantrī kṛṣṇasya dayitaḥ sakhā

original: BhP_10.46.001/3 śiṣyo bṛhaspateḥ sākṣād uddhavo buddhi-sattamaḥ
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ bṛhaspateḥ sākṣāt uddhavaḥ buddhi sattamaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.002/1 tam āha bhagavān preṣṭhaṃ bhaktam ekāntinaṃ kvacit
analyzed: tam āha bhagavān preṣṭham bhaktam ekāntinam kvacid

original: BhP_10.46.002/3 gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇiṃ prapannārti-haro hariḥ
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim prapanna ārti haraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.46.003/1 gacchoddhava vrajaṃ saumya pitror nau prītim āvaha
analyzed: gaccha uddhava vrajam saumya pitroḥ nau prītim āvaha

original: BhP_10.46.003/3 gopīnāṃ mad-viyogādhiṃ mat-sandeśair vimocaya
analyzed: gopīnām mad viyoga ādhim mad sandeśaiḥ vimocaya

original: BhP_10.46.004/1 tā man-manaskā tṛṣṭ-prāṇā mad-arthe tyakta-daihikāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ mad manaskā tṛṣṭ prāṇāḥ mad arthe tyakta daihikāḥ

original: BhP_10.46.004/3 mām eva dayitaṃ preṣṭham ātmānaṃ manasā gatāḥ
analyzed: mām eva dayitam preṣṭham ātmānam manasā gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.46.004/5 ye tyakta-loka-dharmāś ca mad-arthe tān bibharmy aham
analyzed: ye tyakta loka dharmāḥ ca mad arthe tān bibharmi aham

original: BhP_10.46.005/1 mayi tāḥ preyasāṃ preṣṭhe dūra-sthe gokula-striyaḥ
analyzed: mayi tāḥ preyasām preṣṭhe dūra sthe gokula striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.005/3 smarantyo 'ṅga vimuhyanti virahautkaṇṭhya-vihvalāḥ
analyzed: smarantyaḥ ṅga vimuhyanti viraha autkaṇṭhya vihvalāḥ

original: BhP_10.46.006/1 dhārayanty ati-kṛcchreṇa prāyaḥ prāṇān kathañcana
analyzed: dhārayanti atikṛcchreṇa prāyas prāṇān kathañcana

original: BhP_10.46.006/3 pratyāgamana-sandeśair ballavyo me mad-ātmikāḥ
analyzed: pratyāgamana sandeśaiḥ ballavyaḥ me mad ātmikāḥ

original: BhP_10.46.007/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.46.007/1 ity ukta uddhavo rājan sandeśaṃ bhartur ādṛtaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ uddhavaḥ rājan sandeśam bhartuḥ ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.007/3 ādāya ratham āruhya prayayau nanda-gokulam
analyzed: ādāya ratham āruhya prayayau nanda gokulam

original: BhP_10.46.008/1 prāpto nanda-vrajaṃ śrīmān nimlocati vibhāvasau
analyzed: prāptaḥ nanda vrajam śrīmān nimlocati vibhāvasau

original: BhP_10.46.008/3 channa-yānaḥ praviśatāṃ paśūnāṃ khura-reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: channa yānaḥ praviśatām paśūnām khura reṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.46.009/1 vāsitārthe 'bhiyudhyadbhir nāditaṃ śuśmibhir vṛṣaiḥ
analyzed: vāsita arthe bhiyudhyadbhiḥ nāditam śuśmibhiḥ vṛṣaiḥ

original: BhP_10.46.009/3 dhāvantībhiś ca vāsrābhir udho-bhāraiḥ sva-vatsakān
analyzed: dhāvantībhiḥ ca vāsrābhiḥ udhas bhāraiḥ sva vatsakān

original: BhP_10.46.010/1 itas tato vilaṅghadbhir go-vatsair maṇḍitaṃ sitaiḥ
analyzed: itas tatas vilaṅghadbhiḥ go vatsaiḥ maṇḍitam sitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.46.010/3 go-doha-śabdābhiravaṃ veṇūnāṃ niḥsvanena ca
analyzed: godoha śabda abhiravam veṇūnām niḥsvanena ca

original: BhP_10.46.011/1 gāyantībhiś ca karmāṇi śubhāni bala-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: gāyantībhiḥ ca karmāṇi śubhāni bala kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.46.011/3 sv-alaṅkṛtābhir gopībhir gopaiś ca su-virājitam
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtābhiḥ gopībhiḥ gopaiḥ ca su virājitam

original: BhP_10.46.012/1 agny-arkātithi-go-vipra- pitṛ-devārcanānvitaiḥ
analyzed: agni arka atithi go vipra pitṛ deva arcana anvitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.46.012/3 dhūpa-dīpaiś ca mālyaiś ca gopāvāsair mano-ramam
analyzed: dhūpa dīpaiḥ ca mālyaiḥ ca gopa āvāsaiḥ manoramam

original: BhP_10.46.013/1 sarvataḥ puṣpita-vanaṃ dvijāli-kula-nāditam
analyzed: sarvatas puṣpita vanam dvija āli kula nāditam

original: BhP_10.46.013/3 haṃsa-kāraṇḍavākīrṇaiḥ padma-ṣaṇḍaiś ca maṇḍitam
analyzed: haṃsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇaiḥ padma ṣaṇḍaiḥ ca maṇḍitam

original: BhP_10.46.014/1 tam āgataṃ samāgamya kṛṣṇasyānucaraṃ priyam
analyzed: tam āgatam samāgamya kṛṣṇasya anucaram priyam

original: BhP_10.46.014/3 nandaḥ prītaḥ pariṣvajya vāsudeva-dhiyārcayat
analyzed: nandaḥ prītaḥ pariṣvajya vāsudeva dhiyā arcayat

original: BhP_10.46.015/1 bhojitaṃ paramānnena saṃviṣṭaṃ kaśipau sukham
analyzed: bhojitam parama annena saṃviṣṭam kaśipau sukham

original: BhP_10.46.015/3 gata-śramaṃ paryapṛcchat pāda-saṃvāhanādibhiḥ
analyzed: gata śramam paryapṛcchat pāda saṃvāhana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.46.016/1 kaccid aṅga mahā-bhāga sakhā naḥ śūra-nandanaḥ
analyzed: kaccit aṅga mahābhāga sakhā naḥ śūra nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.016/3 āste kuśaly apatyādyair yukto muktaḥ suhṛd-vrataḥ
analyzed: āste kuśalī apatya ādyaiḥ yuktaḥ muktaḥ suhṛd vrataḥ

original: BhP_10.46.017/1 diṣṭyā kaṃso hataḥ pāpaḥ sānugaḥ svena pāpmanā
analyzed: diṣṭyā kaṃsaḥ hataḥ pāpaḥ sa anugaḥ svena pāpmanā

original: BhP_10.46.017/3 sādhūnāṃ dharma-śīlānāṃ yadūnāṃ dveṣṭi yaḥ sadā
analyzed: sādhūnām dharma śīlānām yadūnām dveṣṭi yaḥ sadā

original: BhP_10.46.018/1 api smarati naḥ kṛṣṇo mātaraṃ suhṛdaḥ sakhīn
analyzed: api smarati naḥ kṛṣṇaḥ mātaram suhṛdaḥ sakhīn

original: BhP_10.46.018/3 gopān vrajaṃ cātma-nāthaṃ gāvo vṛndāvanaṃ girim
analyzed: gopān vrajam ca ātmanātham gāvaḥ vṛndāvanam girim

original: BhP_10.46.019/1 apy āyāsyati govindaḥ sva-janān sakṛd īkṣitum
analyzed: api āyāsyati govindaḥ sva janān sakṛt īkṣitum

original: BhP_10.46.019/3 tarhi drakṣyāma tad-vaktraṃ su-nasaṃ su-smitekṣaṇam
analyzed: tarhi drakṣyāma tad vaktram su nasam su smita īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.46.020/1 dāvāgner vāta-varṣāc ca vṛṣa-sarpāc ca rakṣitāḥ
analyzed: dāva agneḥ vāta varṣāt ca vṛṣa sarpāt ca rakṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.46.020/3 duratyayebhyo mṛtyubhyaḥ kṛṣṇena su-mahātmanā
analyzed: duratyayebhyaḥ mṛtyubhyaḥ kṛṣṇena su mahātmanā

original: BhP_10.46.021/1 smaratāṃ kṛṣṇa-vīryāṇi līlāpāṅga-nirīkṣitam
analyzed: smaratām kṛṣṇa vīryāṇi līlā apāṅga nirīkṣitam

original: BhP_10.46.021/3 hasitaṃ bhāṣitaṃ cāṅga sarvā naḥ śithilāḥ kriyāḥ
analyzed: hasitam bhāṣitam ca aṅga sarvāḥ naḥ śithilāḥ kriyāḥ

original: BhP_10.46.022/1 saric-chaila-vanoddeśān mukunda-pada-bhūṣitān
analyzed: sarit śaila vana uddeśāt mukunda pada bhūṣitān

original: BhP_10.46.022/3 ākrīḍān īkṣyamāṇānāṃ mano yāti tad-ātmatām
analyzed: ākrīḍān īkṣyamāṇānām manaḥ yāti tad ātma tām

original: BhP_10.46.023/1 manye kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca prāptāv iha surottamau
analyzed: manye kṛṣṇam ca rāmam ca prāptau iha sura uttamau

original: BhP_10.46.023/3 surāṇāṃ mahad-arthāya gargasya vacanaṃ yathā
analyzed: surāṇām mahat arthāya gargasya vacanam yathā

original: BhP_10.46.024/1 kaṃsaṃ nāgāyuta-prāṇaṃ mallau gaja-patiṃ yathā
analyzed: kaṃsam nāga ayuta prāṇam mallau gaja patim yathā

original: BhP_10.46.024/3 avadhiṣṭāṃ līlayaiva paśūn iva mṛgādhipaḥ
analyzed: avadhiṣṭām līlayā eva paśūn iva mṛgādhipaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.025/1 tāla-trayaṃ mahā-sāraṃ dhanur yaṣṭim ivebha-rāṭ
analyzed: tāla trayam mahā sāram dhanuḥ yaṣṭim iva ibha rāj

original: BhP_10.46.025/3 babhañjaikena hastena saptāham adadhād girim
analyzed: babhañja ekena hastena sapta aham adadhāt girim

original: BhP_10.46.026/1 pralambo dhenuko 'riṣṭas tṛṇāvarto bakādayaḥ
BhP_10.46.026/3 daityāḥ surāsura-jito hatā yeneha līlayā
analyzed: daityāḥ sura asura jitaḥ hatāḥ yena iha līlayā

original: BhP_10.46.027/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.46.027/1 iti saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya nandaḥ kṛṣṇānurakta-dhīḥ
analyzed: iti saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya nandaḥ kṛṣṇa anurakta dhīḥ

original: BhP_10.46.027/3 aty-utkaṇṭho 'bhavat tūṣṇīṃ prema-prasara-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: ati utkaṇṭhaḥ bhavat tūṣṇīm prema prasara vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.028/1 yaśodā varṇyamānāni putrasya caritāni ca
analyzed: yaśodā varṇyamānāni putrasya caritāni ca

original: BhP_10.46.028/3 śṛṇvanty aśrūṇy avāsrākṣīt sneha-snuta-payodharā
analyzed: śṛṇvantī aśrūṇi avāsrākṣīt sneha snuta payodharā

original: BhP_10.46.029/1 tayor itthaṃ bhagavati kṛṣṇe nanda-yaśodayoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ ittham bhagavati kṛṣṇe nanda yaśodayoḥ

original: BhP_10.46.029/3 vīkṣyānurāgaṃ paramaṃ nandam āhoddhavo mudā
analyzed: vīkṣya anurāgam paramam nandam āha uddhavaḥ mudā

original: BhP_10.46.030/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.46.030/1 yuvāṃ ślāghyatamau nūnaṃ dehinām iha māna-da
analyzed: yuvām ślāghyatamau nūnam dehinām iha mānada

original: BhP_10.46.030/3 nārāyaṇe 'khila-gurau yat kṛtā matir īdṛśī
analyzed: nārāyaṇe khila gurau yat kṛtā matiḥ īdṛśī

original: BhP_10.46.031/1 etau hi viśvasya ca bīja-yonī rāmo mukundaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānam
analyzed: etau hi viśvasya ca bīja yonī rāmaḥ mukundaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānam

original: BhP_10.46.031/3 anvīya bhūteṣu vilakṣaṇasya jñānasya ceśāta imau purāṇau
analyzed: anvīya bhūteṣu vilakṣaṇasya jñānasya ca īśātaḥ imau purāṇau

original: BhP_10.46.032/1 yasmin janaḥ prāṇa-viyoga-kāle kṣanaṃ samāveśya mano 'viśuddham
analyzed: yasmin janaḥ prāṇa viyoga kāle kṣanam samāveśya manaḥ viśuddham

original: BhP_10.46.032/3 nirhṛtya karmāśayam āśu yāti parāṃ gatiṃ brahma-mayo 'rka-varṇaḥ
analyzed: nirhṛtya karma āśayam āśu yāti parām gatim brahma mayaḥ rka varṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.033/1 tasmin bhavantāv akhilātma-hetau nārāyaṇe kāraṇa-martya-mūrtau
analyzed: tasmin bhavantau akhila ātma hetau nārāyaṇe kāraṇa martya mūrtau

original: BhP_10.46.033/3 bhāvaṃ vidhattāṃ nitarāṃ mahātman kiṃ vāvaśiṣṭaṃ yuvayoḥ su-kṛtyam
analyzed: bhāvam vidhattām nitarām mahātman kim vā avaśiṣṭam yuvayoḥ su kṛtyam

original: BhP_10.46.034/1 āgamiṣyaty adīrgheṇa kālena vrajam acyutaḥ
analyzed: āgamiṣyati adīrgheṇa kālena vrajam acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.034/3 priyaṃ vidhāsyate pitror bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: priyam vidhāsyate pitroḥ bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_10.46.035/1 hatvā kaṃsaṃ raṅga-madhye pratīpaṃ sarva-sātvatām
analyzed: hatvā kaṃsam raṅga madhye pratīpam sarva sātvatām

original: BhP_10.46.035/3 yad āha vaḥ samāgatya kṛṣṇaḥ satyaṃ karoti tat
analyzed: yat āha vaḥ samāgatya kṛṣṇaḥ satyam karoti tat

original: BhP_10.46.036/1 mā khidyataṃ mahā-bhāgau drakṣyathaḥ kṛṣṇam antike
analyzed: mā khidyatam mahābhāgau drakṣyathaḥ kṛṣṇam antike

original: BhP_10.46.036/3 antar hṛdi sa bhūtānām āste jyotir ivaidhasi
analyzed: antar hṛdi sa bhūtānām āste jyotiḥ iva edhasi

original: BhP_10.46.037/1 na hy asyāsti priyaḥ kaścin nāpriyo vāsty amāninaḥ
analyzed: na hi asya asti priyaḥ kaścid na apriyaḥ vā asti amāninaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.037/3 nottamo nādhamo vāpi sa-mānasyāsamo 'pi vā
analyzed: na uttamaḥ na adhamaḥ vā api vā

original: BhP_10.46.038/1 na mātā na pitā tasya na bhāryā na sutādayaḥ
analyzed: na mātā na pitā tasya na bhāryā na suta ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.038/3 nātmīyo na paraś cāpi na deho janma eva ca
analyzed: na ātmīyaḥ na paraḥ ca api na dehaḥ janma eva ca

original: BhP_10.46.039/1 na cāsya karma vā loke sad-asan-miśra-yoniṣu
analyzed: na ca asya karma vā loke sat asat miśra yoniṣu

original: BhP_10.46.039/3 krīḍārthaṃ so 'pi sādhūnāṃ paritrāṇāya kalpate
analyzed: krīḍā artham saḥ pi sādhūnām paritrāṇāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.46.040/1 sattvaṃ rajas tama iti bhajate nirguṇo guṇān
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti bhajate nirguṇaḥ guṇān

original: BhP_10.46.040/3 krīḍann atīto 'pi guṇaiḥ sṛjaty avan hanty ajaḥ
analyzed: krīḍan atītaḥ u pi guṇaiḥ sṛjati avan hanti ajaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.041/1 yathā bhramarikā-dṛṣṭyā bhrāmyatīva mahīyate
analyzed: yathā bhramarikā dṛṣṭyā bhrāmyati iva mahīyate

original: BhP_10.46.041/3 citte kartari tatrātmā kartevāhaṃ-dhiyā smṛtaḥ
analyzed: citte kartari tatra ātmā kartā iva ahaṃdhiyā smṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.042/1 yuvayor eva naivāyam ātmajo bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: yuvayoḥ eva na eva ayam ātmajaḥ bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_10.46.042/3 sarveṣām ātmajo hy ātmā pitā mātā sa īśvaraḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām ātma jaḥ hi ātmā pitā mātā saḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.46.043/1 dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ bhūta-bhavad-bhaviṣyat
analyzed: dṛṣṭam śrutam bhūta bhavat bhaviṣyat

original: BhP_10.46.043/2 sthāsnuś cariṣṇur mahad alpakaṃ ca
analyzed: sthāsnuḥ cariṣṇuḥ mahat alpakam ca

original: BhP_10.46.043/3 vinācyutād vastu tarāṃ na vācyaṃ
analyzed: vinā acyutāt vastu tarām na vācyam

original: BhP_10.46.043/4 sa eva sarvaṃ paramātma-bhūtaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva sarvam paramātma bhūtaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.044/1 evaṃ niśā sā bruvator vyatītā nandasya kṛṣṇānucarasya rājan
analyzed: evam niśā sā bruvatoḥ vyatītā nandasya kṛṣṇa anucarasya rājan

original: BhP_10.46.044/3 gopyaḥ samutthāya nirūpya dīpān vāstūn samabhyarcya daudhīny amanthun
analyzed: gopyaḥ samutthāya nirūpya dīpān vāstūn samabhyarcya daudhīni amanthun

original: BhP_10.46.045/1 tā dīpa-dīptair maṇibhir virejū rajjūr vikarṣad-bhuja-kaṅkaṇa-srajaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ dīpa dīptaiḥ maṇibhiḥ virejuḥ rajjūḥ vikarṣat bhuja kaṅkaṇa srajaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.045/3 calan-nitamba-stana-hāra-kuṇḍala- tviṣat-kapolāruṇa-kuṅkumānanāḥ
BhP_10.46.046/1 udgāyatīnām aravinda-locanaṃ vrajāṅganānāṃ divam aspṛśad dhvaniḥ
analyzed: udgāyatīnām aravinda locanam vraja aṅganānām divam aspṛśat dhvaniḥ

original: BhP_10.46.046/3 dadhnaś ca nirmanthana-śabda-miśrito nirasyate yena diśām amaṅgalam
analyzed: dadhnaḥ ca nirmanthana śabda miśritaḥ nirasyate yena diśām amaṅgalam

original: BhP_10.46.047/1 bhagavaty udite sūrye nanda-dvāri vrajaukasaḥ
analyzed: bhagavati udite sūrye nanda dvāri vraja okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.047/3 dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ śātakaumbhaṃ kasyāyam iti cābruvan
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ratham śātakaumbham kasya ayam iti ca abruvan

original: BhP_10.46.048/1 akrūra āgataḥ kiṃ vā yaḥ kaṃsasyārtha-sādhakaḥ
analyzed: akrūraḥ āgataḥ kim vā yaḥ kaṃsasya artha sādhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.048/3 yena nīto madhu-purīṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kamala-locanaḥ
analyzed: yena nītaḥ madhupurīm kṛṣṇaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.46.049/1 kiṃ sādhayiṣyaty asmābhir bhartuḥ prītasya niṣkṛtim
analyzed: kim sādhayiṣyati asmābhiḥ bhartuḥ prītasya niṣkṛtim

original: BhP_10.46.049/3 tataḥ strīṇāṃ vadantīnām uddhavo 'gāt kṛtāhnikaḥ
analyzed: tatas strīṇām vadantīnām uddhavaḥ gāt kṛta āhnikaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.001/1 taṃ vīkṣya kṛṣānucaraṃ vraja-striyaḥ
analyzed: tam vīkṣya kṛṣā anucaram vraja striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.001/2 pralamba-bāhuṃ nava-kañja-locanam
analyzed: pralamba bāhum nava kañja locanam

original: BhP_10.47.001/3 pītāmbaraṃ puṣkara-mālinaṃ lasan-
analyzed: pīta ambaram puṣkara mālinam lasan

original: BhP_10.47.001/4 mukhāravindaṃ parimṛṣṭa-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: mukha aravindam parimṛṣṭa kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.47.002/1 su-vismitāḥ ko 'yam apīvya-darśanaḥ
analyzed: su vismitāḥ kaḥ yam

original: BhP_10.47.002/2 kutaś ca kasyācyuta-veṣa-bhūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: kutas ca kasya acyuta veṣa bhūṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.002/3 iti sma sarvāḥ parivavrur utsukās
analyzed: iti sma sarvāḥ parivavruḥ utsukāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.002/4 tam uttamaḥ-śloka-padāmbujāśrayam
analyzed: tam uttamaḥśloka pada ambuja āśrayam

original: BhP_10.47.003/1 taṃ praśrayeṇāvanatāḥ su-sat-kṛtaṃ sa-vrīḍa-hāsekṣaṇa-sūnṛtādibhiḥ
analyzed: tam praśrayeṇa avanatāḥ su satkṛtam sa vrīḍa hāsa īkṣaṇa sūnṛta ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.003/3 rahasy apṛcchann upaviṣṭam āsane vijñāya sandeśa-haraṃ ramā-pateḥ
analyzed: rahasi apṛcchan upaviṣṭam āsane vijñāya sandeśa haram ramāpateḥ

original: BhP_10.47.004/1 jānīmas tvāṃ yadu-pateḥ pārṣadaṃ samupāgatam
analyzed: jānīmaḥ tvām yadu pateḥ pārṣadam samupāgatam

original: BhP_10.47.004/3 bhartreha preṣitaḥ pitror bhavān priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: bhartrā iha preṣitaḥ pitroḥ bhavān priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.47.005/1 anyathā go-vraje tasya smaraṇīyaṃ na cakṣmahe
analyzed: anyathā go vraje tasya smaraṇīyam na cakṣmahe

original: BhP_10.47.005/3 snehānubandho bandhūnāṃ muner api su-dustyajaḥ
analyzed: sneha anubandhaḥ bandhūnām muneḥ api su dustyajaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.006/1 anyeṣv artha-kṛtā maitrī yāvad-artha-viḍambanam
analyzed: anyeṣu artha kṛtā maitrī yāvat artha viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.47.006/3 pumbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsv iva ṣaṭpadaiḥ
analyzed: pumbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsu iva ṣaṭpadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.007/1 niḥsvaṃ tyajanti gaṇikā akalpaṃ nṛpatiṃ prajāḥ
analyzed: niḥsvam tyajanti gaṇikāḥ akalpam nṛpatim prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.007/3 adhīta-vidyā ācāryam ṛtvijo datta-dakṣiṇam
analyzed: adhīta vidyāḥ ācāryam ṛtvijaḥ datta dakṣiṇam

original: BhP_10.47.008/1 khagā vīta-phalaṃ vṛkṣaṃ bhuktvā cātithayo gṛham
analyzed: khagāḥ vīta phalam vṛkṣam bhuktvā ca atithayaḥ gṛham

original: BhP_10.47.008/3 dagdhaṃ mṛgās tathāraṇyaṃ jārā bhuktvā ratāṃ striyam
analyzed: dagdham mṛgāḥ tathā araṇyam jārāḥ bhuktvā ratām striyam

original: BhP_10.47.009/1 iti gopyo hi govinde gata-vāk-kāya-mānasāḥ
analyzed: iti gopyaḥ hi govinde gata vāc kāya mānasāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.009/3 kṛṣṇa-dūte samāyāte uddhave tyakta-laukikāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa dūte samāyāte uddhave tyakta laukikāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.010/1 gāyantyaḥ prīya-karmāṇi rudantyaś ca gata-hriyaḥ
analyzed: gāyantyaḥ prīya karmāṇi rudantyaḥ ca gata hriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.010/3 tasya saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya yāni kaiśora-bālyayoḥ
analyzed: tasya saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya yāni kaiśora bālyayoḥ
