original: BhP_10.47.011/1 kācin madhukaraṃ dṛṣṭvā dhyāyantī kṛṣṇa-saṅgamam
analyzed: kācid madhukaram dṛṣṭvā dhyāyantī kṛṣṇa saṅgamam

original: BhP_10.47.011/3 priya-prasthāpitaṃ dūtaṃ kalpayitvedam abravīt
analyzed: priya prasthāpitam dūtam kalpayitvā idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.47.012/0 gopy uvāca
analyzed: gopī uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.012/1 madhupa kitava-bandho mā spṛśaṅghriṃ sapatnyāḥ
analyzed: madhupa kitava bandho mā spṛśa aṅghrim sapatnyāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.012/2 kuca-vilulita-mālā-kuṅkuma-śmaśrubhir naḥ
analyzed: kuca vilulita mālā kuṅkuma śmaśrubhiḥ naḥ

original: BhP_10.47.012/3 vahatu madhu-patis tan-māninīnāṃ prasādaṃ
analyzed: vahatu madhupatiḥ tad māninīnām prasādam

original: BhP_10.47.012/4 yadu-sadasi viḍambyaṃ yasya dūtas tvam īdṛk
analyzed: yadu sadasi viḍambyam yasya dūtaḥ tvam īdṛś

original: BhP_10.47.013/1 sakṛd adhara-sudhāṃ svāṃ mohinīṃ pāyayitvā
analyzed: sakṛt adhara sudhām svām mohinīm pāyayitvā

original: BhP_10.47.013/2 sumanasa iva sadyas tatyaje 'smān bhavādṛk
analyzed: sumanasaḥ iva sadyas tatyaje smān bhavādṛś

original: BhP_10.47.013/3 paricarati kathaṃ tat-pāda-padmaṃ nu padmā
analyzed: paricarati katham tat pāda padmam nu padmā

original: BhP_10.47.013/4 hy api bata hṛta-cetā hy uttamaḥ-śloka-jalpaiḥ
analyzed: hi api bata hṛta cetāḥ hi uttamaḥśloka jalpaiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.014/1 kim iha bahu ṣaḍ-aṅghre gāyasi tvaṃ yadūnām
analyzed: kim iha bahu ṣaṣ aṅghre gāyasi tvam yadūnām

original: BhP_10.47.014/2 adhipatim agṛhāṇām agrato naḥ purāṇam
analyzed: adhipatim a gṛhāṇām agratas naḥ purāṇam

original: BhP_10.47.014/3 vijaya-sakha-sakhīnāṃ gīyatāṃ tat-prasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: vijayasakha sakhīnām gīyatām tad prasaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.014/4 kṣapita-kuca-rujas te kalpayantīṣṭam iṣṭāḥ
analyzed: kṣapita kuca rujaḥ te kalpayanti iṣṭam iṣṭāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.015/1 divi bhuvi ca rasāyāṃ kāḥ striyas tad-durāpāḥ
analyzed: divi bhuvi ca rasāyām kāḥ striyaḥ tad durāpāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.015/2 kapaṭa-rucira-hāsa-bhrū-vijṛmbhasya yāḥ syuḥ
analyzed: kapaṭa rucira hāsa bhrū vijṛmbhasya yāḥ syuḥ

original: BhP_10.47.015/3 caraṇa-raja upāste yasya bhūtir vayaṃ kā
analyzed: caraṇarajaḥ upāste yasya bhūtiḥ vayam kā

original: BhP_10.47.015/4 api ca kṛpaṇa-pakṣe hy uttamaḥ-śloka-śabdaḥ
analyzed: api ca kṛpaṇa pakṣe hi uttamaḥśloka śabdaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.016/1 visṛja śirasi pādaṃ vedmy ahaṃ cātu-kārair
analyzed: visṛja śirasi pādam vedmi aham cātukāraiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.016/2 anunaya-viduṣas te 'bhyetya dautyair mukundāt
analyzed: anunaya viduṣaḥ te bhyetya dautyaiḥ mukundāt

original: BhP_10.47.016/3 sva-kṛta iha viṣṛṣṭāpatya-paty-anya-lokā
analyzed: svakṛte iha viṣṛṣṭa apatya pati anya lokā

original: BhP_10.47.016/4 vyasṛjad akṛta-cetāḥ kiṃ nu sandheyam asmin
analyzed: vyasṛjat akṛta cetāḥ kim nu sandheyam asmin

original: BhP_10.47.017/1 mṛgayur iva kapīndraṃ vivyadhe lubdha-dharmā
analyzed: mṛgayuḥ iva kapi indram vivyadhe lubdha dharmā

original: BhP_10.47.017/2 striyam akṛta virūpāṃ strī-jitaḥ kāma-yānām
analyzed: striyam akṛta virūpām strī jitaḥ kāmayānām

original: BhP_10.47.017/3 balim api balim attvāveṣṭayad dhvāṅkṣa-vad yas
analyzed: balim api balim attvā aveṣṭayat dhvāṅkṣavat yaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.017/4 tad alam asita-sakhyair dustyajas tat-kathārthaḥ
analyzed: tat alam asita sakhyaiḥ dustyajaḥ tad kathā arthaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.018/1 yad-anucarita-līlā-karṇa-pīyūṣa-vipruṭ-
analyzed: yad anucarita līlā karṇa pīyūṣa vipruṣ

original: BhP_10.47.018/2 sakṛd-adana-vidhūta-dvandva-dharmā vinaṣṭāḥ
analyzed: sakṛt adana vidhūta dvandva dharmāḥ vinaṣṭāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.018/3 sapadi gṛha-kuṭumbaṃ dīnam utsṛjya dīnā
analyzed: sapadi gṛha kuṭumbam dīnam utsṛjya dīnā

original: BhP_10.47.018/4 bahava iha vihaṅgā bhikṣu-caryāṃ caranti
analyzed: bahavaḥ iha vihaṅgāḥ bhikṣu caryām caranti

original: BhP_10.47.019/1 vayam ṛtam iva jihma-vyāhṛtaṃ śraddadhānāḥ
analyzed: vayam ṛtam iva jihma vyāhṛtam śraddadhānāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.019/2 kulika-rutam ivājñāḥ kṛṣṇa-vadhvo hariṇyaḥ
analyzed: kulika rutam iva ajñāḥ kṛṣṇa vadhvaḥ hariṇyaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.019/3 dadṛśur asakṛd etat tan-nakha-sparśa-tīvra
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ asakṛt etat tat nakha sparśa tīvra

original: BhP_10.47.019/4 smara-ruja upamantrin bhaṇyatām anya-vārtā
analyzed: smara rujaḥ upamantrin bhaṇyatām anya vārtā

original: BhP_10.47.020/1 priya-sakha punar āgāḥ preyasā preṣitaḥ kiṃ
analyzed: priya sakha punar āgāḥ preyasā preṣitaḥ kim

original: BhP_10.47.020/2 varaya kim anurundhe mānanīyo 'si me 'ṅga
analyzed: varaya kim anurundhe mānanīyaḥ si me ṅga

original: BhP_10.47.020/3 nayasi katham ihāsmān dustyaja-dvandva-pārśvaṃ
analyzed: nayasi katham iha asmān dustyaja dvandva pārśvam

original: BhP_10.47.020/4 satatam urasi saumya śrīr vadhūḥ sākam āste
analyzed: satatam urasi saumya śrīḥ vadhūḥ sākam āste

original: BhP_10.47.021/1 api bata madhu-puryām ārya-putro 'dhunāste
analyzed: api bata madhupuryām āryaputraḥ

original: BhP_10.47.021/2 smarati sa pitṛ-gehān saumya bandhūṃś ca gopān
analyzed: smarati sa pitṛ gehān saumya bandhūn ca gopān

original: BhP_10.47.021/3 kvacid api sa kathā naḥ kiṅkarīṇāṃ gṛṇīte
analyzed: kvacid api sa kathā naḥ kiṅkarīṇām gṛṇīte

original: BhP_10.47.021/4 bhujam aguru-sugandhaṃ mūrdhny adhāsyat kadā nu
analyzed: bhujam aguru sugandham mūrdhni adhāsyat kadā nu

original: BhP_10.47.022/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.022/1 athoddhavo niśamyaivaṃ kṛṣṇa-darśana-lālasāḥ
analyzed: atha uddhavaḥ niśamya evam kṛṣṇa darśana lālasāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.022/3 sāntvayan priya-sandeśair gopīr idam abhāṣata
analyzed: sāntvayan priya sandeśaiḥ gopīḥ idam abhāṣata

original: BhP_10.47.023/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.023/1 aho yūyaṃ sma pūrṇārthā bhavatyo loka-pūjitāḥ
analyzed: aho yūyam sma pūrṇa arthāḥ bhavatyaḥ loka pūjitāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.023/3 vāsudeve bhagavati yāsām ity arpitaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati yāsām iti arpitam manaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.024/1 dāna-vrata-tapo-homa japa-svādhyāya-saṃyamaiḥ
analyzed: dāna vrata tapaḥ homa japa svādhyāya saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.024/3 śreyobhir vividhaiś cānyaiḥ kṛṣṇe bhaktir hi sādhyate
analyzed: śreyobhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca anyaiḥ kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ hi sādhyate

original: BhP_10.47.025/1 bhagavaty uttamaḥ-śloke bhavatībhir anuttamā
analyzed: bhagavatī uttamaḥśloke bhavatībhiḥ anuttamā

original: BhP_10.47.025/3 bhaktiḥ pravartitā diṣṭyā munīnām api durlabhā
analyzed: bhaktiḥ pravartitā diṣṭyā munīnām api durlabhā

original: BhP_10.47.026/1 diṣṭyā putrān patīn dehān sva-janān bhavanāni ca
analyzed: diṣṭyā putrān patīn dehān sva janān bhavanāni ca

original: BhP_10.47.026/3 hitvāvṛnīta yūyaṃ yat kṛṣṇākhyaṃ puruṣaṃ param
analyzed: hitvā avṛnīta yūyam yat kṛṣṇa ākhyam puruṣam param

original: BhP_10.47.027/1 sarvātma-bhāvo 'dhikṛto bhavatīnām adhokṣaje
analyzed: sarva ātma bhāvaḥ dhi kṛtaḥ bhavatīnām adhokṣaje

original: BhP_10.47.027/3 viraheṇa mahā-bhāgā mahān me 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
analyzed: viraheṇa mahābhāgā mahān me nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.028/1 śrūyatāṃ priya-sandeśo bhavatīnāṃ sukhāvahaḥ
analyzed: śrūyatām priya sandeśaḥ bhavatīnām sukha āvahaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.028/3 yam ādāyāgato bhadrā ahaṃ bhartū rahas-karaḥ
analyzed: yam ādāya āgataḥ bhadrā aham bhartuḥ rahaskaraḥ

original: BhP_10.47.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.029/1 bhavatīnāṃ viyogo me na hi sarvātmanā kvacit
analyzed: bhavatīnām viyogaḥ me na hi sarva ātmanā kvacid

original: BhP_10.47.029/3 yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu khaṃ vāyv-agnir jalaṃ mahī
analyzed: yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu kham vāyu agniḥ jalam mahī

original: BhP_10.47.029/5 tathāhaṃ ca manaḥ-prāṇa- bhūtendriya-guṇāśrayaḥ
analyzed: tathā aham ca manaḥ prāṇa bhūta indriya guṇa āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.030/1 ātmany evātmanātmānaṃ sṛje hanmy anupālaye
analyzed: ātmani eva ātmanā ātmānam sṛje hanmi anupālaye

original: BhP_10.47.030/3 ātma-māyānubhāvena bhūtendriya-guṇātmanā
analyzed: ātma māyā anubhāvena bhūta indriya guṇa ātmanā

original: BhP_10.47.031/1 ātmā jñāna-mayaḥ śuddho vyatirikto 'guṇānvayaḥ
analyzed: ātmā jñāna mayaḥ śuddhaḥ vyatiriktaḥ guṇa anvayaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.031/3 suṣupti-svapna-jāgradbhir māyā-vṛttibhir īyate
analyzed: suṣupti svapna jāgradbhiḥ māyā vṛttibhiḥ īyate

original: BhP_10.47.032/1 yenendriyārthān dhyāyeta mṛṣā svapna-vad utthitaḥ
analyzed: yena indriya arthān dhyāyeta mṛṣā svapna vat utthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.032/3 tan nirundhyād indriyāṇi vinidraḥ pratyapadyata
analyzed: tat nirundhyāt indriyāṇi vinidraḥ pratyapadyata

original: BhP_10.47.033/1 etad-antaḥ samāmnāyo yogaḥ sāṅkhyaṃ manīṣiṇām
analyzed: etad antaḥ samāmnāyaḥ yogaḥ sāṅkhyam manīṣiṇām

original: BhP_10.47.033/3 tyāgas tapo damaḥ satyaṃ samudrāntā ivāpagāḥ
analyzed: tyāgaḥ tapaḥ damaḥ satyam samudra antāḥ iva āpagāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.034/1 yat tv ahaṃ bhavatīnāṃ vai dūre varte priyo dṛśām
analyzed: yat tu aham bhavatīnām vai dūre varte priyaḥ dṛśām

original: BhP_10.47.034/3 manasaḥ sannikarṣārthaṃ mad-anudhyāna-kāmyayā
analyzed: manasaḥ sannikarṣa artham mad anudhyāna kāmyayā

original: BhP_10.47.035/1 yathā dūra-care preṣṭhe mana āviśya vartate
analyzed: yathā dūracare preṣṭhe manaḥ āviśya vartate

original: BhP_10.47.035/3 strīṇāṃ ca na tathā cetaḥ sannikṛṣṭe 'kṣi-gocare
analyzed: strīṇām ca na tathā cetaḥ sannikṛṣṭe kṣi gocare

original: BhP_10.47.036/1 mayy āveśya manaḥ kṛtsnaṃ vimuktāśeṣa-vṛtti yat
analyzed: mayi āveśya manaḥ kṛtsnam vimukta aśeṣa vṛtti yat

original: BhP_10.47.036/3 anusmarantyo māṃ nityam acirān mām upaiṣyatha
analyzed: anusmarantyaḥ mām nityam acirāt mām upaiṣyatha

original: BhP_10.47.037/1 yā mayā krīḍatā rātryāṃ vane 'smin vraja āsthitāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ mayā krīḍatā rātryām vane smin vraje āsthitāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.037/3 alabdha-rāsāḥ kalyāṇyo māpur mad-vīrya-cintayā
analyzed: alabdha rāsāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ mā āpuḥ mad vīrya cintayā

original: BhP_10.47.038/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.038/1 evaṃ priyatamādiṣṭam ākarṇya vraja-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: evam priyatama ādiṣṭam ākarṇya vraja yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.038/3 tā ūcur uddhavaṃ prītās tat-sandeśāgata-smṛtīḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ūcuḥ uddhavam prītāḥ tad sandeśa āgata smṛtīḥ

original: BhP_10.47.039/0 gopya ūcuḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.47.039/1 diṣṭyāhito hataḥ kaṃso yadūnāṃ sānugo 'gha-kṛt
analyzed: diṣṭyā āhitaḥ hataḥ kaṃsaḥ yadūnām sa anugaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.039/3 diṣṭyāptair labdha-sarvārthaiḥ kuśaly āste 'cyuto 'dhunā
analyzed: diṣṭi āptaiḥ labdha sarva arthaiḥ kuśalī āste cyutaḥ dhunā

original: BhP_10.47.040/1 kaccid gadāgrajaḥ saumya karoti pura-yoṣitām
analyzed: kaccit gadāgrajaḥ saumya karoti pura yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.47.040/3 prītiṃ naḥ snigdha-savrīḍa- hāsodārekṣaṇārcitaḥ
analyzed: prītim naḥ snigdha sa vrīḍa hāsa udāra īkṣaṇa arcitaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.041/1 kathaṃ rati-viśeṣa-jñaḥ priyaś ca pura-yoṣitām
analyzed: katham rati viśeṣa jñaḥ priyaḥ ca pura yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.47.041/3 nānubadhyeta tad-vākyair vibhramaiś cānubhājitaḥ
analyzed: na anubadhyeta tad vākyaiḥ vibhramaiḥ ca anubhājitaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.042/1 api smarati naḥ sādho govindaḥ prastute kvacit
analyzed: api smarati naḥ sādho govindaḥ prastute kvacid

original: BhP_10.47.042/3 goṣṭhi-madhye pura-strīṇām grāmyāḥ svaira-kathāntare
analyzed: goṣṭhi madhye pura strīṇām grāmyāḥ svaira kathā antare

original: BhP_10.47.043/1 tāḥ kiṃ niśāḥ smarati yāsu tadā priyābhir
analyzed: tāḥ kim niśāḥ smarati yāsu tadā priyābhiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.043/2 vṛndāvane kumuda-kunda-śaśāṅka-ramye
analyzed: vṛndāvane kumuda kunda śaśāṅka ramye

original: BhP_10.47.043/3 reme kvaṇac-caraṇa-nūpura-rāsa-goṣṭhyām
analyzed: reme kvaṇat caraṇa nūpura rāsa goṣṭhyām

original: BhP_10.47.043/4 asmābhir īḍita-manojña-kathaḥ kadācit
analyzed: asmābhiḥ īḍita manojña kathaḥ kadācid

original: BhP_10.47.044/1 apy eṣyatīha dāśārhas taptāḥ sva-kṛtayā śucā
analyzed: api eṣyati iha dāśārhaḥ taptāḥ sva kṛtayā śucā

original: BhP_10.47.044/3 sañjīvayan nu no gātrair yathendro vanam ambudaiḥ
analyzed: sañjīvayan nu naḥ gātraiḥ yathā indraḥ vanam ambudaiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.045/1 kasmāt kṛṣṇa ihāyāti prāpta-rājyo hatāhitaḥ
analyzed: kasmāt kṛṣṇaḥ iha āyāti prāpta rājyaḥ hata ahitaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.045/3 narendra-kanyā udvāhya prītaḥ sarva-suhṛd-vṛtaḥ
analyzed: narendra kanyāḥ udvāhya prītaḥ sarva suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.046/1 kim asmābhir vanaukobhir anyābhir vā mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: kim asmābhiḥ vana okobhiḥ anyābhiḥ vā mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.046/3 śrī-pater āpta-kāmasya kriyetārthaḥ kṛtātmanaḥ
analyzed: śrīpateḥ āpta kāmasya kriyeta arthaḥ kṛtātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.047/1 paraṃ saukhyaṃ hi nairāśyaṃ svairiṇy apy āha piṅgalā
analyzed: param saukhyam hi nairāśyam svairiṇī api āha piṅgalā

original: BhP_10.47.047/3 taj jānatīnāṃ naḥ kṛṣṇe tathāpy āśā duratyayā
analyzed: tat jānatīnām naḥ kṛṣṇe tathā api āśā duratyayā

original: BhP_10.47.048/1 ka utsaheta santyaktum uttamaḥśloka-saṃvidam
analyzed: kaḥ utsaheta san tyaktum uttamaḥśloka saṃvidam

original: BhP_10.47.048/3 anicchato 'pi yasya śrīr aṅgān na cyavate kvacit
analyzed: an icchataḥ pi yasya śrīḥ aṅgāt na cyavate kvacid

original: BhP_10.47.049/1 saric-chaila-vanoddeśā gāvo veṇu-ravā ime
analyzed: sarit śaila vana uddeśāḥ gāvaḥ veṇu ravāḥ ime

original: BhP_10.47.049/3 saṅkarṣaṇa-sahāyena kṛṣṇenācaritāḥ prabho
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇa sahāyena kṛṣṇena ācaritāḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.47.050/1 punaḥ punaḥ smārayanti nanda-gopa-sutaṃ bata
analyzed: punar punar smārayanti nanda gopa sutam bata

original: BhP_10.47.050/3 śrī-niketais tat-padakair vismartuṃ naiva śaknumaḥ
analyzed: śrī niketaiḥ tat padakaiḥ vismartum nā eva śaknumaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.051/1 gatyā lalitayodāra- hāsa-līlāvalokanaiḥ
analyzed: gatyā lalitayā udāra hāsa līlā avalokanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.051/3 mādhvyā girā hṛta-dhiyaḥ kathaṃ taṃ vismarāma he
analyzed: mādhvyā girā hṛta dhiyaḥ katham tam vismarāma he

original: BhP_10.47.052/1 he nātha he ramā-nātha vraja-nāthārti-nāśana
analyzed: he nātha he ramānātha vrajanātha ārti nāśana

original: BhP_10.47.052/3 magnam uddhara govinda gokulaṃ vṛjinārṇavāt
analyzed: magnam uddhara govinda gokulam vṛjina arṇavāt

original: BhP_10.47.053/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.053/1 tatas tāḥ kṛṣṇa-sandeśair vyapeta-viraha-jvarāḥ
analyzed: tatas tāḥ kṛṣṇa sandeśaiḥ vyapeta viraha jvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.053/3 uddhavaṃ pūjayāṃ cakrur jñātvātmānam adhokṣajam
analyzed: uddhavam cakruḥ jñātvā ātmānam adhokṣajam

original: BhP_10.47.054/1 uvāsa katicin māsān gopīnāṃ vinudan śucaḥ
analyzed: uvāsa katicid māsān gopīnām vinudan śucaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.054/3 kṛṣṇa-līlā-kathāṃ gāyan ramayām āsa gokulam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa līlā kathām gāyan ramayām āsa gokulam

original: BhP_10.47.055/1 yāvanty ahāni nandasya vraje 'vātsīt sa uddhavaḥ
analyzed: yāvanti ahāni nandasya vraje vātsīt saḥ uddhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.055/3 vrajaukasāṃ kṣaṇa-prāyāṇy āsan kṛṣṇasya vārtayā
analyzed: vrajaukasām kṣaṇa prāyāṇi āsan kṛṣṇasya vārtayā

original: BhP_10.47.056/1 sarid-vana-giri-droṇīr vīkṣan kusumitān drumān
analyzed: sarit vana giri droṇīḥ vīkṣan kusumitān drumān

original: BhP_10.47.056/3 kṛṣṇaṃ saṃsmārayan reme hari-dāso vrajaukasām
analyzed: kṛṣṇam saṃsmārayan reme hari dāsaḥ vrajaukasām

original: BhP_10.47.057/1 dṛṣṭvaivam-ādi gopīnāṃ kṛṣṇāveśātma-viklavam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā evamādi gopīnām kṛṣṇa āveśa ātma viklavam

original: BhP_10.47.057/3 uddhavaḥ parama-prītas tā namasyann idaṃ jagau
analyzed: uddhavaḥ parama prītaḥ tāḥ namasyan idam jagau

original: BhP_10.47.058/1 etāḥ paraṃ tanu-bhṛto bhuvi gopa-vadhvo
analyzed: etāḥ param tanubhṛtaḥ bhuvi gopa vadhvaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.058/2 govinda eva nikhilātmani rūḍha-bhāvāḥ
analyzed: govinde eva nikhila ātmani rūḍha bhāvāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.058/3 vāñchanti yad bhava-bhiyo munayo vayaṃ ca
analyzed: vāñchanti yat bhava bhiyaḥ munayaḥ vayam ca

original: BhP_10.47.058/4 kiṃ brahma-janmabhir ananta-kathā-rasasya
analyzed: kim brahma janmabhiḥ ananta kathā rasasya

original: BhP_10.47.059/1 kvemāḥ striyo vana-carīr vyabhicāra-duṣṭāḥ
analyzed: kva imāḥ striyaḥ vana carīḥ vyabhicāra duṣṭāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.059/2 kṛṣṇe kva caiṣa paramātmani rūḍha-bhāvaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇe kva ca eṣa paramātmani rūḍha bhāvaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.059/3 nanv īśvaro 'nubhajato 'viduṣo 'pi sākṣāc
analyzed: nanu īśvaraḥ sākṣāt

original: BhP_10.47.059/4 chreyas tanoty agada-rāja ivopayuktaḥ
analyzed: chreyaḥ tanoti agada rājaḥ iva upayuktaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.060/1 nāyaṃ śriyo 'ṅga u nitānta-rateḥ prasādaḥ
analyzed: na ayam śriyaḥ ṅgaḥ u nitānta rateḥ prasādaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.060/2 svar-yoṣitāṃ nalina-gandha-rucāṃ kuto 'nyāḥ
analyzed: svar yoṣitām nalina gandha rucām kutas nyāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.060/3 rāsotsave 'sya bhuja-daṇḍa-gṛhīta-kaṇṭha-
analyzed: rāsa utsave bhuja daṇḍa gṛhīta kaṇṭha

original: BhP_10.47.060/4 labdhāśiṣāṃ ya udagād vraja-vallabhīnām
analyzed: labdha āśiṣām yaḥ udagāt vraja vallabhīnām

original: BhP_10.47.061/1 āsām aho caraṇa-reṇu-juṣām ahaṃ syāṃ
analyzed: āsām aho caraṇa reṇu juṣām aham syām

original: BhP_10.47.061/2 vṛndāvane kim api gulma-latauṣadhīnām
analyzed: vṛndāvane kim api gulma latā oṣadhīnām

original: BhP_10.47.061/3 yā dustyajaṃ sva-janam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā
analyzed: yā dustyajam sva janam ārya patham ca hitvā

original: BhP_10.47.061/4 bhejur mukunda-padavīṃ śrutibhir vimṛgyām
analyzed: bhejuḥ mukunda padavīm śrutibhiḥ vimṛgyām

original: BhP_10.47.062/1 yā vai śriyārcitam ajādibhir āpta-kāmair
analyzed: yāḥ vai śriyā arcitam aja ādibhiḥ āpta kāmaiḥ

original: BhP_10.47.062/2 yogeśvarair api yad ātmani rāsa-goṣṭhyām
analyzed: yoga īśvaraiḥ api yat ātmani rāsagoṣṭhyām

original: BhP_10.47.062/3 kṛṣṇasya tad bhagavataḥ caraṇāravindaṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya tat bhagavataḥ caraṇa aravindam

original: BhP_10.47.062/4 nyastaṃ staneṣu vijahuḥ parirabhya tāpam
analyzed: nyastam staneṣu vijahuḥ parirabhya tāpam

original: BhP_10.47.063/1 vande nanda-vraja-strīṇāṃ pāda-reṇum abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: vande nanda vraja strīṇām pāda reṇum abhīkṣṇaśas

original: BhP_10.47.063/3 yāsāṃ hari-kathodgītaṃ punāti bhuvana-trayam
analyzed: yāsām hari kathā udgītam punāti bhuvanatrayam

original: BhP_10.47.064/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.47.064/1 atha gopīr anujñāpya yaśodāṃ nandam eva ca
analyzed: atha gopīḥ anujñāpya yaśodām nandam eva ca

original: BhP_10.47.064/3 gopān āmantrya dāśārho yāsyann āruruhe ratham
analyzed: gopān āmantrya dāśārhaḥ yāsyan āruruhe ratham

original: BhP_10.47.065/1 taṃ nirgataṃ samāsādya nānopāyana-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: tam nirgatam samāsādya nānā upāyana pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.065/3 nandādayo 'nurāgeṇa prāvocann aśru-locanāḥ
analyzed: nanda ādayaḥ nurāgeṇa prāvocan aśru locanāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.066/1 manaso vṛttayo naḥ syuḥ kṛṣṇa pādāmbujāśrayāḥ
analyzed: manasaḥ vṛttayaḥ naḥ syuḥ kṛṣṇa pāda ambuja āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_10.47.066/3 vāco 'bhidhāyinīr nāmnāṃ kāyas tat-prahvaṇādiṣu
analyzed: vācaḥ abhidhāyinīḥ nāmnām kāyaḥ

original: BhP_10.47.067/1 karmabhir bhrāmyamāṇānāṃ yatra kvāpīśvarecchayā
analyzed: karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇānām yatra kvāpi īśvara icchayā

original: BhP_10.47.067/3 maṅgalācaritair dānai ratir naḥ kṛṣṇa īśvare
analyzed: maṅgala ācaritaiḥ dānaiḥ ratiḥ naḥ kṛṣṇe īśvare

original: BhP_10.47.068/1 evaṃ sabhājito gopaiḥ kṛṣṇa-bhaktyā narādhipa
analyzed: evam sabhājitaḥ gopaiḥ kṛṣṇa bhaktyā narādhipa

original: BhP_10.47.068/3 uddhavaḥ punar āgacchan mathurāṃ kṛṣṇa-pālitām
analyzed: uddhavaḥ punar āgacchan mathurām kṛṣṇa pālitām

original: BhP_10.47.069/1 kṛṣṇāya praṇipatyāha bhakty-udrekaṃ vrajaukasām
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya bhakti udrekam vraja okasām

original: BhP_10.47.069/3 vasudevāya rāmāya rājñe copāyanāny adāt
analyzed: vasudevāya rāmāya rājñe ca upāyanāni adāt

original: BhP_10.48.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.48.001/1 atha vijñāya bhagavān sarvātmā sarva-darśanaḥ
analyzed: atha vijñāya bhagavān sarva ātmā sarva darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.001/3 sairandhryāḥ kāma-taptāyāḥ priyam icchan gṛhaṃ yayau
analyzed: sairandhryāḥ kāma taptāyāḥ priyam icchan gṛham yayau

original: BhP_10.48.002/1 mahārhopaskarair āḍhyaṃ kāmopāyopabṛṃhitam
analyzed: mahārha upaskaraiḥ āḍhyam kāma upāya upabṛṃhitam

original: BhP_10.48.002/3 muktā-dāma-patākābhir vitāna-śayanāsanaiḥ
analyzed: muktā dāma patākābhiḥ vitāna śayana āsanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.002/5 dhūpaiḥ surabhibhir dīpaiḥ srag-gandhair api maṇḍitam
analyzed: dhūpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ dīpaiḥ sraj gandhaiḥ api maṇḍitam

original: BhP_10.48.003/1 gṛhaṃ tam āyāntam avekṣya sāsanāt sadyaḥ samutthāya hi jāta-sambhramā
analyzed: gṛham tam āyāntam avekṣya sā āsanāt sadyas samutthāya hi jāta sambhramā

original: BhP_10.48.003/3 yathopasaṅgamya sakhībhir acyutaṃ sabhājayām āsa sad-āsanādibhiḥ
analyzed: yathā upasaṅgamya sakhībhiḥ acyutam sabhājayām āsa sadā āsana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.004/1 tathoddhavaḥ sādhutayābhipūjito nyaṣīdad urvyām abhimṛśya cāsanam
analyzed: tathā uddhavaḥ sādhu tayā abhipūjitaḥ nyaṣīdat urvyām abhimṛśya ca āsanam

original: BhP_10.48.004/3 kṛṣṇo 'pi tūrṇaṃ śayanaṃ mahā-dhanaṃ viveśa lokācaritāny anuvrataḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ pi tūrṇam śayanam mahādhanam viveśa loka ācaritāni anuvrataḥ

original: BhP_10.48.005/1 sā majjanālepa-dukūla-bhūṣaṇa srag-gandha-tāmbūla-sudhāsavādibhiḥ
analyzed: sā majjana ālepa dukūla bhūṣaṇa sraj gandha tāmbūla sudhā āsava ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.005/3 prasādhitātmopasasāra mādhavaṃ sa-vrīḍa-līlotsmita-vibhramekṣitaiḥ
analyzed: prasādhita ātmā upasasāra mādhavam sa vrīḍa līlā utsmita vibhrama īkṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.006/1 āhūya kāntāṃ nava-saṅgama-hriyā viśaṅkitāṃ kaṅkaṇa-bhūṣite kare
analyzed: āhūya kāntām nava saṅgama hriyā viśaṅkitām kaṅkaṇa bhūṣite kare

original: BhP_10.48.006/3 pragṛhya śayyām adhiveśya rāmayā reme 'nulepārpaṇa-puṇya-leśayā
analyzed: pragṛhya śayyām adhiveśya rāmayā reme nulepa arpaṇa puṇya leśayā

original: BhP_10.48.007/1 sānaṅga-tapta-kucayor urasas tathākṣṇor
analyzed: sā anaṅga tapta kucayoḥ urasaḥ tathā akṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_10.48.007/2 jighranty ananta-caraṇena rujo mṛjantī
analyzed: jighrantī ananta caraṇena rujaḥ mṛjantī

original: BhP_10.48.007/3 dorbhyāṃ stanāntara-gataṃ parirabhya kāntam
analyzed: dorbhyām stana antara gatam parirabhya kāntam

original: BhP_10.48.007/4 ānanda-mūrtim ajahād ati-dīrgha-tāpam
analyzed: ānanda mūrtim ajahāt ati dīrgha tāpam

original: BhP_10.48.008/1 saivaṃ kaivalya-nāthaṃ taṃ prāpya duṣprāpyam īśvaram
analyzed: sā evam kaivalya nātham tam prāpya duṣprāpyam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.48.008/3 aṅga-rāgārpaṇenāho durbhagedam ayācata
analyzed: aṅgarāga arpaṇena aho durbhagā idam ayācata

original: BhP_10.48.009/1 sahoṣyatām iha preṣṭha dināni katicin mayā
analyzed: saha uṣyatām iha preṣṭha dināni katicid mayā

original: BhP_10.48.009/3 ramasva notsahe tyaktuṃ saṅgaṃ te 'mburuhekṣaṇa
analyzed: ramasva nā utsahe tyaktum saṅgam te mburuha īkṣaṇa

original: BhP_10.48.010/1 tasyai kāma-varaṃ dattvā mānayitvā ca māna-daḥ
analyzed: tasyai kāma varam dattvā mānayitvā ca mānadaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.010/3 sahoddhavena sarveśaḥ sva-dhāmāgamad ṛddhimat
analyzed: saha uddhavena sarva īśaḥ svadhām āgamat ṛddhimat

original: BhP_10.48.011/1 durārdhyaṃ samārādhya viṣṇuṃ sarveśvareśvaram
analyzed: durārdhyam samārādhya viṣṇum sarva īśvara īśvaram

original: BhP_10.48.011/3 yo vṛṇīte mano-grāhyam asattvāt kumanīṣy asau
analyzed: yaḥ vṛṇīte manaḥ grāhyam asattvāt kumanīṣī asau

original: BhP_10.48.012/1 akrūra-bhavanaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ saha-rāmoddhavaḥ prabhuḥ
analyzed: akrūra bhavanam kṛṣṇaḥ saharāma uddhavaḥ prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.48.012/3 kiñcic cikīrṣayan prāgād akrūra-prīya-kāmyayā
analyzed: kiñcid cikīrṣayan prāgāt akrūra prīya kāmyayā

original: BhP_10.48.013/1 sa tān nara-vara-śreṣṭhān ārād vīkṣya sva-bāndhavān
analyzed: sa tān nara vara śreṣṭhān ārāt vīkṣya sva bāndhavān

original: BhP_10.48.013/3 pratyutthāya pramuditaḥ pariṣvajyābhinandya ca
analyzed: pratyutthāya pramuditaḥ pariṣvajya abhinandya ca

original: BhP_10.48.014/1 nanāma kṛṣṇaṃ rāmaṃ ca sa tair apy abhivāditaḥ
analyzed: nanāma kṛṣṇam rāmam ca sa taiḥ api abhivāditaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.014/3 pūjayām āsa vidhi-vat kṛtāsana-parigrahān
analyzed: pūjayām āsa vidhivat kṛta āsana parigrahān

original: BhP_10.48.015/1 pādāvanejanīr āpo dhārayan śirasā nṛpa
analyzed: pāda avanejanīḥ āpaḥ dhārayan śirasā nṛpa

original: BhP_10.48.015/3 arhaṇenāmbarair divyair gandha-srag-bhūṣaṇottamaiḥ
analyzed: arhaṇena ambaraiḥ divyaiḥ gandha sraj bhūṣaṇa uttamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.016/1 arcitvā śirasānamya pādāv aṅka-gatau mṛjan
analyzed: arcitvā śirasā ānamya pādau aṅka gatau mṛjan

original: BhP_10.48.016/3 praśrayāvanato 'krūraḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmāv abhāṣata
analyzed: krūraḥ kṛṣṇa rāmau abhāṣata

original: BhP_10.48.017/1 diṣṭyā pāpo hataḥ kaṃsaḥ sānugo vām idaṃ kulam
analyzed: diṣṭyā pāpaḥ hataḥ kaṃsaḥ sa anugaḥ vām idam kulam

original: BhP_10.48.017/3 bhavadbhyām uddhṛtaṃ kṛcchrād durantāc ca samedhitam
analyzed: bhavadbhyām uddhṛtam kṛcchrāt durantāt ca samedhitam

original: BhP_10.48.018/1 yuvāṃ pradhāna-puruṣau jagad-dhetū jagan-mayau
analyzed: yuvām pradhāna puruṣau jagat hetū jagat mayau

original: BhP_10.48.018/3 bhavadbhyāṃ na vinā kiñcit param asti na cāparam
analyzed: bhavadbhyām na vinā kiñcid param asti na ca aparam

original: BhP_10.48.019/1 ātma-sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvam anvāviśya sva-śaktibhiḥ
analyzed: ātma sṛṣṭam idam viśvam anvāviśya sva śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.019/3 īyate bahudhā brahman śru ta-pratyakṣa-gocaram
analyzed: īyate bahudhā brahman śru ta pratyakṣa gocaram

original: BhP_10.48.020/1 yathā hi bhūteṣu carācareṣu mahy-ādayo yoniṣu bhānti nānā
analyzed: yathā hi bhūteṣu carācareṣu mahi ādayaḥ yoniṣu bhānti nānā

original: BhP_10.48.020/3 evaṃ bhavān kevala ātma-yoniṣv ātmātma-tantro bahudhā vibhāti
analyzed: evam bhavān kevalaḥ ātmayoniṣu ātmā ātmatantraḥ bahudhā vibhāti

original: BhP_10.48.021/1 sṛjasy atho lumpasi pāsi viśvaṃ rajas-tamaḥ-sattva-guṇaiḥ sva-śaktibhiḥ
analyzed: sṛjasi atho lumpasi pāsi viśvam rajaḥ tamaḥ sattva guṇaiḥ sva śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.021/3 na badhyase tad-guṇa-karmabhir vā jñānātmanas te kva ca bandha-hetuḥ
analyzed: na badhyase tad guṇa karmabhiḥ vā jñāna ātmanaḥ te kva ca bandha hetuḥ

original: BhP_10.48.022/1 dehādy-upādher anirūpitatvād bhavo na sākṣān na bhidātmanaḥ syāt
analyzed: deha ādi upādheḥ anirūpita tvāt bhavaḥ na sākṣāt na bhidā ātmanaḥ syāt

original: BhP_10.48.022/3 ato na bandhas tava naiva mokṣaḥ syātām nikāmas tvayi no 'vivekaḥ
analyzed: atas na bandhaḥ tava nā eva mokṣaḥ syātām nikāmaḥ tvayi no vivekaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.023/1 tvayodito 'yaṃ jagato hitāya yadā yadā veda-pathaḥ purāṇaḥ
analyzed: tvayā uditaḥ yam jagataḥ hitāya yadā yadā veda pathaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.023/3 bādhyeta pāṣaṇḍa-pathair asadbhis tadā bhavān sattva-guṇaṃ bibharti
analyzed: bādhyeta pāṣaṇḍa pathaiḥ asadbhiḥ tadā bhavān sattva guṇam bibharti

original: BhP_10.48.024/1 sa tvam prabho 'dya vasudeva-gṛhe 'vatīrṇaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam prabho vasudeva gṛhe vatīrṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.024/2 svāṃśena bhāram apanetum ihāsi bhūmeḥ
analyzed: sva aṃśena bhāram apanetum iha asi bhūmeḥ

original: BhP_10.48.024/3 akṣauhiṇī-śata-vadhena suretarāṃśa-
analyzed: akṣauhiṇī śata vadhena suretara aṃśa

original: BhP_10.48.024/4 rājñām amuṣya ca kulasya yaśo vitanvan
analyzed: rājñām amuṣya ca kulasya yaśaḥ vitanvan

original: BhP_10.48.025/1 adyeśa no vasatayaḥ khalu bhūri-bhāgā
analyzed: adyā īśa naḥ vasatayaḥ khalu bhūri bhāgā

original: BhP_10.48.025/2 yaḥ sarva-deva-pitṛ-bhūta-nṛ-deva-mūrtiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sarva deva pitṛ bhūta nṛ deva mūrtiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.025/3 yat-pāda-śauca-salilaṃ tri-jagat punāti
analyzed: yat pāda śauca salilam trijagat punāti

original: BhP_10.48.025/4 sa tvaṃ jagad-gurur adhokṣaja yāḥ praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: sa tvam jagadguruḥ adhokṣaja yāḥ praviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.026/1 kaḥ paṇḍitas tvad aparaṃ śaraṇaṃ samīyād
analyzed: kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ tvat aparam śaraṇam samīyāt

original: BhP_10.48.026/2 bhakta-priyād ṛta-giraḥ suhṛdaḥ kṛta-jñāt
analyzed: bhakta priyāt ṛta giraḥ suhṛdaḥ kṛtajñāt

original: BhP_10.48.026/3 sarvān dadāti suhṛdo bhajato 'bhikāmān
analyzed: sarvān dadāti suhṛdaḥ bhajataḥ bhikāmān

original: BhP_10.48.026/4 ātmānam apy upacayāpacayau na yasya
analyzed: ātmānam api upacaya apacayau na yasya

original: BhP_10.48.027/1 diṣṭyā janārdana bhavān iha naḥ pratīto
analyzed: diṣṭyā janārdana bhavān iha naḥ pratīto

original: BhP_10.48.027/2 yogeśvarair api durāpa-gatiḥ sureśaiḥ
analyzed: yoga īśvaraiḥ api durāpagatiḥ sura īśaiḥ

original: BhP_10.48.027/3 chindhy āśu naḥ suta-kalatra-dhanāpta-geha-
analyzed: chinddhi āśu naḥ suta kalatra dhana āpta gā iha

original: BhP_10.48.027/4 dehādi-moha-raśanāṃ bhavadīya-māyām
analyzed: deha ādi moha raśanām bhavadīya māyām

original: BhP_10.48.028/1 ity arcitaḥ saṃstutaś ca bhaktena bhagavān hariḥ
analyzed: iti arcitaḥ saṃstutaḥ ca bhaktena bhagavān hariḥ

original: BhP_10.48.028/3 akrūraṃ sa-smitaṃ prāha gīrbhiḥ sammohayann iva
analyzed: akrūram sa smitam prāha gīrbhiḥ sammohayan iva

original: BhP_10.48.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.48.029/1 tvaṃ no guruḥ pitṛvyaś ca ślāghyo bandhuś ca nityadā
analyzed: tvam naḥ guruḥ pitṛvyaḥ ca ślāghyaḥ bandhuḥ ca nityadā

original: BhP_10.48.029/3 vayaṃ tu rakṣyāḥ poṣyāś ca anukampyāḥ prajā hi vaḥ
analyzed: vayam tu rakṣyāḥ poṣyāḥ ca anukampyāḥ prajāḥ hi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.030/1 bhavad-vidhā mahā-bhāgā niṣevyā arha-sattamāḥ
analyzed: bhavadvidhāḥ mahābhāgāḥ niṣevyāḥ arha sattamāḥ

original: BhP_10.48.030/3 śreyas-kāmair nṛbhir nityaṃ devāḥ svārthā na sādhavaḥ
analyzed: śreyaskāmaiḥ nṛbhiḥ nityam devāḥ sva arthāḥ na sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.031/1 na hy am-mayāni tīrthāni na devā mṛc-chilā-mayāḥ
analyzed: na hi am mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ mṛd śilā mayāḥ

original: BhP_10.48.031/3 te punanty uru-kālena darśanād eva sādhavaḥ
analyzed: te punanti uru kālena darśanāt eva sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.032/1 sa bhavān suhṛdāṃ vai naḥ śreyān śreyaś-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: sa bhavān suhṛdām vai naḥ śreyān śreyaḥ cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.48.032/3 jijñāsārthaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ gacchasva tvaṃ gajāhvayam
analyzed: jijñāsā artham pāṇḍavānām gacchasva tvam gajāhvayam

original: BhP_10.48.033/1 pitary uparate bālāḥ saha mātrā su-duḥkhitāḥ
analyzed: pitari uparate bālāḥ saha mātrā su duḥkhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.48.033/3 ānītāḥ sva-puraṃ rājñā vasanta iti śuśruma
analyzed: ānītāḥ sva puram rājñā vasante iti śuśruma

original: BhP_10.48.034/1 teṣu rājāmbikā-putro bhrātṛ-putreṣu dīna-dhīḥ
analyzed: teṣu rājā ambikā putraḥ bhrātṛ putreṣu dīna dhīḥ

original: BhP_10.48.034/3 samo na vartate nūnaṃ duṣputra-vaśa-go 'ndha-dṛk
analyzed: samaḥ na vartate nūnam duṣputra vaśagaḥ

original: BhP_10.48.035/1 gaccha jānīhi tad-vṛttam adhunā sādhv asādhu vā
analyzed: gaccha jānīhi tad vṛttam adhunā sādhu asādhu vā

original: BhP_10.48.035/3 vijñāya tad vidhāsyāmo yathā śaṃ suhṛdāṃ bhavet
analyzed: vijñāya tat vidhāsyāmaḥ yathā śam suhṛdām bhavet

original: BhP_10.48.036/1 ity akrūraṃ samādiśya bhagavān harir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: iti akrūram samādiśya bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.48.036/3 saṅkarṣaṇoddhavābhyāṃ vai tataḥ sva-bhavanaṃ yayau
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇa uddhavābhyām vai tatas sva bhavanam yayau

original: BhP_10.49.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.49.001/1 sa gatvā hāstinapuraṃ pauravendra-yaśo-'ṅkitam
analyzed: sa gatvā hāstinapuram paurava indra yaśaḥ oṅkitam

original: BhP_10.49.001/3 dadarśa tatrāmbikeyaṃ sa-bhīṣmaṃ viduraṃ pṛthām
analyzed: dadarśa tatra ambikeyam sa bhīṣmam viduram pṛthām

original: BhP_10.49.002/1 saha-putraṃ ca bāhlīkaṃ bhāradvājaṃ sa-gautamam
analyzed: saha putram ca vāhlīkam bhāradvājam sa gautamam

original: BhP_10.49.002/3 karnaṃ suyodhanaṃ drauṇiṃ pāṇḍavān suhṛdo 'parān
analyzed: karnam suyodhanam drauṇim pāṇḍavān parān

original: BhP_10.49.003/1 yathāvad upasaṅgamya bandhubhir gāndinī-sutaḥ
analyzed: yathāvat upasaṅgamya bandhubhiḥ gāndinī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.003/3 sampṛṣṭas taiḥ suhṛd-vārtāṃ svayaṃ cāpṛcchad avyayam
analyzed: sampṛṣṭaḥ taiḥ suhṛd vārtām svayam ca apṛcchat avyayam

original: BhP_10.49.004/1 uvāsa katicin māsān rājño vṛtta-vivitsayā
analyzed: uvāsa katicid māsān rājñaḥ vṛtta vivitsayā

original: BhP_10.49.004/3 duṣprajasyālpa-sārasya khala-cchandānuvartinaḥ
analyzed: duṣprajasya alpa sārasya khala chanda anuvartinaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.005/1 teja ojo balaṃ vīryaṃ praśrayādīṃś ca sad-guṇān
analyzed: tejaḥ ojaḥ balam vīryam praśraya ādīn ca sat guṇān

original: BhP_10.49.005/3 prajānurāgaṃ pārtheṣu na sahadbhiś cikīṛṣitam
analyzed: prajā anurāgam pārtheṣu na sahadbhiḥ cikīṛṣitam

original: BhP_10.49.006/1 kṛtaṃ ca dhārtarāṣṭrair yad gara-dānādy apeśalam
analyzed: kṛtam ca dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ yat gara dāna ādi apeśalam

original: BhP_10.49.006/3 ācakhyau sarvam evāsmai pṛthā vidura eva ca
analyzed: ācakhyau sarvam eva asmai pṛthā viduraḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.49.007/1 pṛthā tu bhrātaraṃ prāptam akrūram upasṛtya tam
analyzed: pṛthā tu bhrātaram prāptam akrūram upasṛtya tam

original: BhP_10.49.007/3 uvāca janma-nilayaṃ smaranty aśru-kalekṣaṇā
analyzed: uvāca janma nilayam smarantī aśru kala īkṣaṇā

original: BhP_10.49.008/1 api smaranti naḥ saumya pitarau bhrātaraś ca me
analyzed: api smaranti naḥ saumya pitarau bhrātaraḥ ca me

original: BhP_10.49.008/3 bhaginyau bhrātṛ-putrāś ca jāmayaḥ sakhya eva ca
analyzed: bhaginyau bhrātṛ putrāḥ ca jāmayaḥ sakhyaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.49.009/1 bhrātreyo bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇyo bhakta-vatsalaḥ
BhP_10.49.009/3 paitṛ-ṣvasreyān smarati rāmaś cāmburuhekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: paitṛṣvasreyān smarati rāmaḥ ca amburuha īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.010/1 sapatna-madhye śocantīṃ vṛkānāṃ hariṇīm iva
analyzed: sapatna madhye śocantīm vṛkānām hariṇīm iva

original: BhP_10.49.010/3 sāntvayiṣyati māṃ vākyaiḥ pitṛ-hīnāṃś ca bālakān
analyzed: sāntvayiṣyati mām vākyaiḥ pitṛ hīnān ca bālakān

original: BhP_10.49.011/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin viśvātman viśva-bhāvana
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahāyogin viśvātman viśvabhāvana

original: BhP_10.49.011/3 prapannāṃ pāhi govinda śiśubhiś cāvasīdatīm
analyzed: prapannām pāhi govinda śiśubhiḥ ca avasīdatīm

original: BhP_10.49.012/1 nānyat tava padāmbhojāt paśyāmi śaraṇaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: na anyat tava pada ambhojāt paśyāmi śaraṇam nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.49.012/3 bibhyatāṃ mṛtyu-saṃsārād īsvarasyāpavargikāt
analyzed: bibhyatām mṛtyu saṃsārāt īsvarasya āpavargikāt

original: BhP_10.49.013/1 namaḥ kṛṣṇāya śuddhāya brahmaṇe paramātmane
analyzed: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya śuddhāya brahmaṇe paramātmane

original: BhP_10.49.013/3 yogeśvarāya yogāya tvām ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā
analyzed: yogeśvarāya yogāya tvām aham śaraṇam gatā

original: BhP_10.49.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.49.014/1 ity anusmṛtya sva-janaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca jagad-īśvaram
analyzed: iti anusmṛtya sva janam kṛṣṇam ca jagat īśvaram

original: BhP_10.49.014/3 prārudad duḥkhitā rājan bhavatāṃ prapitāmahī
analyzed: prārudat duḥkhitā rājan bhavatām prapitāmahī

original: BhP_10.49.015/1 sama-duḥkha-sukho 'krūro viduraś ca mahā-yaśāḥ
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukhaḥ krūraḥ viduraḥ ca mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_10.49.015/3 sāntvayām āsatuḥ kuntīṃ tat-putrotpatti-hetubhiḥ
analyzed: sāntvayām āsatuḥ kuntīm tad putra utpatti hetubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.49.016/1 yāsyan rājānam abhyetya viṣamaṃ putra-lālasam
analyzed: yāsyan rājānam abhyetya viṣamam putra lālasam

original: BhP_10.49.016/3 avadat suhṛdāṃ madhye bandhubhiḥ sauhṛdoditam
analyzed: avadat suhṛdām madhye bandhubhiḥ sauhṛda uditam

original: BhP_10.49.017/0 akrūra uvāca
analyzed: akrūraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.49.017/1 bho bho vaicitravīrya tvaṃ kurūṇāṃ kīrti-vardhana
analyzed: bho bho vaicitravīrya tvam kurūṇām kīrti vardhana

original: BhP_10.49.017/3 bhrātary uparate pāṇḍāv adhunāsanam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: bhrātari uparate pāṇḍau adhunā āsanam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.018/1 dharmeṇa pālayann urvīṃ prajāḥ śīlena rañjayan
analyzed: dharmeṇa pālayan urvīm prajāḥ śīlena rañjayan

original: BhP_10.49.018/3 vartamānaḥ samaḥ sveṣu śreyaḥ kīrtim avāpsyasi
analyzed: vartamānaḥ samaḥ sveṣu śreyaḥ kīrtim avāpsyasi

original: BhP_10.49.019/1 anyathā tv ācaraṃl loke garhito yāsyase tamaḥ
analyzed: anyathā tu ācaran loke garhitaḥ yāsyase tamaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.019/3 tasmāt samatve vartasva pāṇḍaveṣv ātmajeṣu ca
analyzed: tasmāt samatve vartasva pāṇḍaveṣu ātmajeṣu ca

original: BhP_10.49.020/1 neha cātyanta-saṃvāsaḥ kasyacit kenacit saha
analyzed: na iha ca atyanta saṃvāsaḥ kasyacid kenacid saha

original: BhP_10.49.020/3 rājan svenāpi dehena kim u jāyātmajādibhiḥ
analyzed: rājan svena api dehena kim jāyā ātmaja ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.49.021/1 ekaḥ prasūyate jantur eka eva pralīyate
analyzed: ekaḥ prasūyate jantuḥ ekaḥ eva pralīyate

original: BhP_10.49.021/3 eko 'nubhuṅkte sukṛtam eka eva ca duṣkṛtam
analyzed: ekaḥ nu bhuṅkte sukṛtam ekaḥ eva ca duṣkṛtam

original: BhP_10.49.022/1 adharmopacitaṃ vittaṃ haranty anye 'lpa-medhasaḥ
analyzed: adharma upacitam vittam haranti anye lpa medhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.022/3 sambhojanīyāpadeśair jalānīva jalaukasaḥ
analyzed: sambhojanīya apadeśaiḥ jalāni iva jalaukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.023/1 puṣṇāti yān adharmeṇa sva-buddhyā tam apaṇḍitam
analyzed: puṣṇāti yān adharmeṇa sva buddhyā tam apaṇḍitam

original: BhP_10.49.023/3 te 'kṛtārthaṃ prahiṇvanti prāṇā rāyaḥ sutādayaḥ
analyzed: te kṛtārtham prahiṇvanti prāṇāḥ rāyaḥ suta ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.024/1 svayaṃ kilbiṣam ādāya tais tyakto nārtha-kovidaḥ
analyzed: svayam kilbiṣam ādāya taiḥ tyaktaḥ na artha kovidaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.024/3 asiddhārtho viśaty andhaṃ sva-dharma-vimukhas tamaḥ
analyzed: a siddhārthaḥ viśati andham svadharma vimukhaḥ tamaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.025/1 tasmāl lokam imaṃ rājan svapna-māyā-manoratham
analyzed: tasmāt lokam imam rājan svapna māyā manoratham

original: BhP_10.49.025/3 vīkṣyāyamyātmanātmānaṃ samaḥ śānto bhava prabho
analyzed: vīkṣya āyamya ātmanā ātmānam samaḥ śāntaḥ bhava prabho

original: BhP_10.49.026/0 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.49.026/1 yathā vadati kalyāṇīṃ vācaṃ dāna-pate bhavān
analyzed: yathā vadati kalyāṇīm vācam dānapate bhavān

original: BhP_10.49.026/3 tathānayā na tṛpyāmi martyaḥ prāpya yathāmṛtam
analyzed: tathā anayā na tṛpyāmi martyaḥ prāpya yathā amṛtam

original: BhP_10.49.027/1 tathāpi sūnṛtā saumya hṛdi na sthīyate cale
analyzed: tathā api sūnṛtā saumya hṛdi na sthīyate cale

original: BhP_10.49.027/3 putrānurāga-viṣame vidyut saudāmanī yathā
analyzed: putra anurāga viṣame vidyut saudāmanī yathā

original: BhP_10.49.028/1 īśvarasya vidhiṃ ko nu vidhunoty anyathā pumān
analyzed: īśvarasya vidhim kaḥ nu vidhunoti anyathā pumān

original: BhP_10.49.028/3 bhūmer bhārāvatārāya yo 'vatīrṇo yadoḥ kule
analyzed: bhūmeḥ bhāra avatārāya yaḥ vatīrṇaḥ yadoḥ kule

original: BhP_10.49.029/1 yo durvimarśa-pathayā nija-māyayedaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ durvimarśa pathayā nija māyayā idam

original: BhP_10.49.029/2 sṛṣṭvā guṇān vibhajate tad-anupraviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā guṇān vibhajate tad anupraviṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.029/3 tasmai namo duravabodha-vihāra-tantra-
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ duravabodha vihāra tantra

original: BhP_10.49.029/4 saṃsāra-cakra-gataye parameśvarāya
analyzed: saṃsāra cakra gataye parameśvarāya

original: BhP_10.49.030/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.49.030/1 ity abhipretya nṛpater abhiprāyaṃ sa yādavaḥ
analyzed: iti abhipretya nṛpateḥ abhiprāyam sa yādavaḥ

original: BhP_10.49.030/3 suhṛdbhiḥ samanujñātaḥ punar yadu-purīm agāt
analyzed: suhṛdbhiḥ samanujñātaḥ punar yadu purīm agāt

original: BhP_10.49.031/1 śaśaṃsa rāma-kṛṣṇābhyāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra-viceṣṭitam
analyzed: śaśaṃsa rāma kṛṣṇābhyām dhṛtarāṣṭra viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.49.031/3 pāṇdavān prati kauravya yad-arthaṃ preṣitaḥ svayam
analyzed: pāṇdavān prati kauravya yad artham preṣitaḥ svayam

original: BhP_10.50.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.50.001/1 astiḥ prāptiś ca kaṃsasya mahiṣyau bharatarṣabha
analyzed: astiḥ prāptiḥ ca kaṃsasya mahiṣyau bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.50.001/3 mṛte bhartari duḥkhārte īyatuḥ sma pitur gṛhān
analyzed: mṛte bhartari duḥkha ārte īyatuḥ sma pituḥ gṛhān

original: BhP_10.50.002/1 pitre magadha-rājāya jarāsandhāya duḥkhite
analyzed: pitre magadha rājāya jarāsandhāya duḥkhite

original: BhP_10.50.002/3 vedayāṃ cakratuḥ sarvam ātma-vaidhavya-kāraṇam
analyzed: vedayām cakratuḥ sarvam ātma vaidhavya kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.50.003/1 sa tad apriyam ākarṇya śokāmarṣa-yuto nṛpa
analyzed: sa tat apriyam ākarṇya śoka amarṣa yutaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.50.003/3 ayādavīṃ mahīṃ kartuṃ cakre paramam udyamam
analyzed: ayādavīm mahīm kartum cakre paramam udyamam

original: BhP_10.50.004/1 akṣauhiṇībhir viṃśatyā tisṛbhiś cāpi saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: akṣauhiṇībhiḥ viṃśatyā tisṛbhiḥ ca api saṃvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.004/3 yadu-rājadhānīṃ mathurāṃ nyarudhat sarvato diśam
analyzed: yadu rājadhānīm mathurām nyarudhat sarvatas diśam

original: BhP_10.50.005/1 nirīkṣya tad-balaṃ kṛṣṇa udvelam iva sāgaram
analyzed: nirīkṣya tat balam kṛṣṇaḥ udvelam iva sāgaram

original: BhP_10.50.005/3 sva-puraṃ tena saṃruddhaṃ sva-janaṃ ca bhayākulam
analyzed: sva puram tena saṃruddham sva janam ca bhaya ākulam

original: BhP_10.50.006/1 cintayām āsa bhagavān hariḥ kāraṇa-mānuṣaḥ
analyzed: cintayām āsa bhagavān hariḥ kāraṇa mānuṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.006/3 tad-deśa-kālānuguṇaṃ svāvatāra-prayojanam
analyzed: tad deśa kāla anuguṇam sva avatāra prayojanam

original: BhP_10.50.007/1 haniṣyāmi balaṃ hy etad bhuvi bhāraṃ samāhitam
analyzed: haniṣyāmi balam hi etat bhuvi bhāram samāhitam

original: BhP_10.50.007/3 māgadhena samānītaṃ vaśyānāṃ sarva-bhūbhujām
analyzed: māgadhena samānītam vaśyānām sarva bhūbhujām

original: BhP_10.50.008/1 akṣauhiṇībhiḥ saṅkhyātaṃ bhaṭāśva-ratha-kuñjaraiḥ
analyzed: akṣauhiṇībhiḥ saṅkhyātam bhaṭa aśva ratha kuñjaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.008/3 māgadhas tu na hantavyo bhūyaḥ kartā balodyamam
analyzed: māgadhaḥ tu na hantavyaḥ bhūyas kartā bala udyamam

original: BhP_10.50.009/1 etad-artho 'vatāro 'yaṃ bhū-bhāra-haraṇāya me
analyzed: etad arthaḥ vatāraḥ yam bhū bhāra haraṇāya me

original: BhP_10.50.009/3 saṃrakṣaṇāya sādhūnāṃ kṛto 'nyeṣāṃ vadhāya ca
analyzed: saṃrakṣaṇāya sādhūnām kṛtaḥ nyeṣām vadhāya ca

original: BhP_10.50.010/1 anyo 'pi dharma-rakṣāyai dehaḥ saṃbhriyate mayā
analyzed: anyaḥ api dharma rakṣāyai dehaḥ saṃbhriyate mayā

original: BhP_10.50.010/3 virāmāyāpy adharmasya kāle prabhavataḥ kvacit
analyzed: virāmāya api adharmasya kāle prabhavataḥ kvacid

original: BhP_10.50.011/1 evaṃ dhyāyati govinda ākāśāt sūrya-varcasau
analyzed: evam dhyāyati govindaḥ ākāśāt sūrya varcasau

original: BhP_10.50.011/3 rathāv upasthitau sadyaḥ sa-sūtau sa-paricchadau
analyzed: rathau upasthitau sadyas sa sūtau sa paricchadau

original: BhP_10.50.012/1 āyudhāni ca divyāni purāṇāni yadṛcchayā
analyzed: āyudhāni ca divyāni purāṇāni yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_10.50.012/3 dṛṣṭvā tāni hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṅkarṣaṇam athābravīt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tāni hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṅkarṣaṇam atha abravīt

original: BhP_10.50.013/1 paśyārya vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ yadūnāṃ tvāvatāṃ prabho
analyzed: paśya ārya vyasanam prāptam yadūnām tvāvatām prabho

original: BhP_10.50.013/3 eṣa te ratha āyāto dayitāny āyudhāni ca
analyzed: eṣa te rathaḥ āyātaḥ dayitāni āyudhāni ca

original: BhP_10.50.014/1 etad-arthaṃ hi nau janma sādhūnām īśa śarma-kṛt
analyzed: etad artham hi nau janma sādhūnām īśa śarma kṛt

original: BhP_10.50.014/3 trayo-viṃśaty-anīkākhyaṃ bhūmer bhāram apākuru
analyzed: trayoviṃśati anīka ākhyam bhūmeḥ bhāram apākuru

original: BhP_10.50.015/1 evaṃ sammantrya dāśārhau daṃśitau rathinau purāt
analyzed: evam sammantrya dāśārhau daṃśitau rathinau purāt

original: BhP_10.50.015/3 nirjagmatuḥ svāyudhāḍhyau balenālpīyasā vṛtau
analyzed: nirjagmatuḥ sva āyudha āḍhyau balena alpīyasā vṛtau

original: BhP_10.50.016/1 śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau vinirgatya harir dāruka-sārathiḥ
analyzed: śaṅkham dadhmau vinirgatya hariḥ dāruka sārathiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.016/3 tato 'bhūt para-sainyānāṃ hṛdi vitrāsa-vepathuḥ
analyzed: tatas bhūt para sainyānām hṛdi vitrāsa vepathuḥ

original: BhP_10.50.017/1 tāv āha māgadho vīkṣya he kṛṣṇa puruṣādhama
analyzed: tau āha māgadhaḥ vīkṣya he kṛṣṇa puruṣa adhama

original: BhP_10.50.017/3 na tvayā yoddhum icchāmi bālenaikena lajjayā
analyzed: na tvayā yoddhum icchāmi bālena ekena lajjayā

original: BhP_10.50.017/5 guptena hi tvayā manda na yotsye yāhi bandhu-han
analyzed: guptena hi tvayā manda na yotsye yāhi bandhu han

original: BhP_10.50.018/1 tava rāma yadi śraddhā yudhyasva dhairyam udvaha
analyzed: tava rāma yadi śraddhā yudhyasva dhairyam udvaha

original: BhP_10.50.018/3 hitvā vā mac-charaiś chinnaṃ dehaṃ svar yāhi māṃ jahi
analyzed: hitvā vā mat śaraiḥ chinnam deham svar yāhi mām jahi

original: BhP_10.50.019/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.50.019/1 na vai śūrā vikatthante darśayanty eva pauruṣam
analyzed: na vai śūrāḥ vikatthante darśayanti eva pauruṣam

original: BhP_10.50.019/3 na gṛhṇīmo vaco rājann āturasya mumūrṣataḥ
analyzed: na gṛhṇīmaḥ vacaḥ rājan āturasya mumūrṣataḥ

original: BhP_10.50.020/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.50.020/1 jarā-sutas tāv abhisṛtya mādhavau mahā-balaughena balīyasāvṛnot
analyzed: jarāsutaḥ tau abhisṛtya mādhavau mahā bala oghena balīyasā avṛnot

original: BhP_10.50.020/3 sa-sainya-yāna-dhvaja-vāji-sārathī sūryānalau vāyur ivābhra-reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: sa sainya yāna dhvaja vāji sārathī sūrya analau vāyuḥ iva abhra reṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.021/1 suparṇa-tāla-dhvaja-cihitnau rathāv
analyzed: suparṇa tāla dhvaja cihitnau rathau

original: BhP_10.50.021/2 alakṣayantyo hari-rāmayor mṛdhe
analyzed: a lakṣayantyaḥ hari rāmayoḥ mṛdhe

original: BhP_10.50.021/3 striyaḥ purāṭṭālaka-harmya-gopuraṃ
analyzed: striyaḥ pura aṭṭālaka harmya gopuram

original: BhP_10.50.021/4 samāśritāḥ sammumuhuḥ śucārditaḥ
analyzed: samāśritāḥ sammumuhuḥ śucā arditaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.022/1 hariḥ parānīka-payomucāṃ muhuḥ śilīmukhāty-ulbaṇa-varṣa-pīḍitam
analyzed: hariḥ para anīka payomucām muhur śilīmukha ati ulbaṇa varṣa pīḍitam

original: BhP_10.50.022/3 sva-sainyam ālokya surāsurārcitaṃ vyasphūrjayac chārṅga-śarāsanottamam
analyzed: sva sainyam ālokya sura asura arcitam vyasphūrjayat śārṅga śarāsana uttamam

original: BhP_10.50.023/1 gṛhṇan niśaṅgād atha sandadhac charān
analyzed: gṛhṇan niśaṅgāt atha sandadhat śarān

original: BhP_10.50.023/2 vikṛṣya muñcan śita-bāṇa-pūgān
analyzed: vikṛṣya muñcan śita bāṇa pūgān

original: BhP_10.50.023/3 nighnan rathān kuñjara-vāji-pattīn
analyzed: nighnan rathān kuñjara vāji pattīn

original: BhP_10.50.023/4 nirantaraṃ yadvad alāta-cakram
analyzed: nirantaram yadvat alāta cakram

original: BhP_10.50.024/1 nirbhinna-kumbhāḥ kariṇo nipetur anekaśo 'śvāḥ śara-vṛkṇa-kandharāḥ
analyzed: nirbhinna kumbhāḥ kariṇaḥ nipetuḥ anekaśas śvāḥ śara vṛkṇa kandharāḥ

original: BhP_10.50.024/3 rathā hatāśva-dhvaja-sūta-nāyakāḥ padāyataś chinna-bhujoru-kandharāḥ
analyzed: rathāḥ hata aśva dhvaja sūta nāyakāḥ padāyataḥ chinna bhuja ūru kandharāḥ

original: BhP_10.50.025/1 sañchidyamāna-dvipadebha-vājinām aṅga-prasūtāḥ śataśo 'sṛg-āpagāḥ
analyzed: sañchidyamāna dvipada ibha vājinām aṅga prasūtāḥ sṛgāpagāḥ

original: BhP_10.50.025/3 bhujāhayaḥ pūruṣa-śīrṣa-kacchapā hata-dvipa-dvīpa-haya grahākulāḥ
analyzed: bhuja ahayaḥ pūruṣa śīrṣa kacchapāḥ hata dvipa dvīpa haya graha ākulāḥ

original: BhP_10.50.026/1 karoru-mīnā nara-keśa-śaivalā dhanus-taraṅgāyudha-gulma-saṅkulāḥ
analyzed: kara ūru mīnāḥ nara keśa śaivalāḥ dhanuḥ taraṅga āyudha gulma saṅkulāḥ

original: BhP_10.50.026/3 acchūrikāvarta-bhayānakā mahā- maṇi-pravekābharaṇāśma-śarkarāḥ
analyzed: acchūrikā āvarta bhayānakāḥ mahā maṇi praveka ābharaṇa aśma śarkarāḥ

original: BhP_10.50.027/1 pravartitā bhīru-bhayāvahā mṛdhe manasvināṃ harṣa-karīḥ parasparam
analyzed: pravartitāḥ bhīru bhaya āvahāḥ mṛdhe manasvinām harṣa karīḥ parasparam

original: BhP_10.50.027/3 vinighnatārīn muṣalena durmadān saṅkarṣaṇenāparīmeya-tejasā
analyzed: vinighnatā arīn muṣalena durmadān saṅkarṣaṇena aparīmeya tejasā

original: BhP_10.50.028/1 balaṃ tad aṅgārṇava-durga-bhairavaṃ duranta-pāraṃ magadhendra-pālitam
analyzed: balam tat aṅga arṇava durga bhairavam duranta pāram magadha indra pālitam

original: BhP_10.50.028/3 kṣayaṃ praṇītaṃ vasudeva-putrayor vikrīḍitaṃ taj jagad-īśayoḥ param
analyzed: kṣayam praṇītam vasudeva putrayoḥ vikrīḍitam tat jagat īśayoḥ param

original: BhP_10.50.029/1 sthity-udbhavāntaṃ bhuvana-trayasya yaḥ
analyzed: sthiti udbhava antam bhuvana trayasya yaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.029/2 samīhite 'nanta-guṇaḥ sva-līlayā
analyzed: samīhite nanta guṇaḥ sva līlayā

original: BhP_10.50.029/3 na tasya citraṃ para-pakṣa-nigrahas
analyzed: na tasya citram parapakṣa nigrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.029/4 tathāpi martyānuvidhasya varṇyate
analyzed: tathā api martyānuvidhasya varṇyate

original: BhP_10.50.030/1 jagrāha virathaṃ rāmo jarāsandhaṃ mahā-balam
analyzed: jagrāha viratham rāmaḥ jarāsandham mahā balam

original: BhP_10.50.030/3 hatānīkāvaśiṣṭāsuṃ siṃhaḥ siṃham ivaujasā
analyzed: hata anīka avaśiṣṭa asum siṃhaḥ siṃham iva ojasā

original: BhP_10.50.031/1 badhyamānaṃ hatārātiṃ pāśair vāruṇa-mānuṣaiḥ
analyzed: badhyamānam hata arātim pāśaiḥ vāruṇa mānuṣaiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.031/3 vārayām āsa govindas tena kārya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: vārayām āsa govindaḥ tena kārya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.50.032/1 sā mukto loka-nāthābhyāṃ vrīḍito vīra-sammataḥ
analyzed: sā muktaḥ loka nāthābhyām vrīḍitaḥ vīra sammataḥ

original: BhP_10.50.032/3 tapase kṛta-saṅkalpo vāritaḥ pathi rājabhiḥ
analyzed: tapase kṛta saṅkalpaḥ vāritaḥ pathi rājabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.033/1 vākyaiḥ pavitrārtha-padair nayanaiḥ prākṛtair api
analyzed: vākyaiḥ pavitra artha padaiḥ nayanaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ api

original: BhP_10.50.033/3 sva-karma-bandha-prāpto 'yaṃ yadubhis te parābhavaḥ
analyzed: sva karma bandha prāptaḥ yam yadubhiḥ te parābhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.034/1 hateṣu sarvānīkeṣu nṛpo bārhadrathas tadā
analyzed: hateṣu sarva anīkeṣu nṛpaḥ bārhadrathaḥ tadā

original: BhP_10.50.034/3 upekṣito bhagavatā magadhān durmanā yayau
analyzed: upekṣitaḥ bhagavatā magadhān durmanāḥ yayau

original: BhP_10.50.035/1 mukundo 'py akṣata-balo nistīrṇāri-balārṇavaḥ
BhP_10.50.035/3 vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumais trīdaśair anumoditaḥ
analyzed: vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumaiḥ trīdaśaiḥ anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.036/1 māthurair upasaṅgamya vijvarair muditātmabhiḥ
analyzed: māthuraiḥ upasaṅgamya vijvaraiḥ mudita ātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.036/3 upagīyamāna-vijayaḥ sūta-māgadha-vandibhiḥ
analyzed: upagīyamāna vijayaḥ sūta māgadha vandibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.037/1 śaṅkha-dundubhayo nedur bherī-tūryāṇy anekaśaḥ
analyzed: śaṅkha dundubhayaḥ neduḥ bherī tūryāṇi anekaśas

original: BhP_10.50.037/3 vīṇā-veṇu-mṛdaṅgāni puraṃ praviśati prabhau
analyzed: vīṇā veṇu mṛdaṅgāni puram praviśati prabhau

original: BhP_10.50.038/1 sikta-mārgāṃ hṛṣṭa-janāṃ patākābhir abhyalaṅkṛtām
analyzed: sikta mārgām hṛṣṭa janām patākābhiḥ abhyalaṅkṛtām

original: BhP_10.50.038/3 nirghuṣṭāṃ brahma-ghoṣeṇa kautukābaddha-toraṇām
analyzed: nirghuṣṭām brahmaghoṣeṇa kautuka ābaddha toraṇām

original: BhP_10.50.039/1 nicīyamāno nārībhir mālya-dadhy-akṣatāṅkuraiḥ
analyzed: nicīyamānaḥ nārībhiḥ mālya dadhi akṣata aṅkuraiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.039/3 nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sa-snehaṃ prīty-utkalita-locanaiḥ
analyzed: nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sa sneham prīti utkalita locanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.040/1 āyodhana-gataṃ vittam anantaṃ vīra-bhūṣaṇam
analyzed: āyodhana gatam vittam anantam vīra bhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.50.040/3 yadu-rājāya tat sarvam āhṛtaṃ prādiśat prabhuḥ
analyzed: yadu rājāya tat sarvam āhṛtam prādiśat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.50.041/1 evaṃ saptadaśa-kṛtvas tāvaty akṣauhiṇī-balaḥ
analyzed: evam saptadaśa kṛtvas tāvatī akṣauhiṇī balaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.041/3 yuyudhe māgadho rājā yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇa-pālitaiḥ
analyzed: yuyudhe māgadhaḥ rājā yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇa pālitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.042/1 akṣiṇvaṃs tad-balaṃ sarvaṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-tejasā
analyzed: akṣiṇvan tat balam sarvam vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa tejasā

original: BhP_10.50.042/3 hateṣu sveṣv anīkeṣu tyakto 'gād aribhir nṛpaḥ
analyzed: hateṣu sveṣu anīkeṣu tyaktaḥ gāt aribhiḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.043/1 aṣṭādaśama saṅgrāma āgāmini tad-antarā
analyzed: aṣṭādaśamaḥ saṅgrāme āgāmini tad antarā

original: BhP_10.50.043/3 nārada-preṣito vīro yavanaḥ pratyadṛśyata
analyzed: nārada preṣitaḥ vīraḥ yavanaḥ pratyadṛśyata

original: BhP_10.50.044/1 rurodha mathurām etya tisṛbhir mleccha-koṭibhiḥ
analyzed: rurodha mathurām etya tisṛbhiḥ mleccha koṭibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.044/3 nṛ-loke cāpratidvandvo vṛṣṇīn śrutvātma-sammitān
analyzed: nṛ loke ca apratidvandvaḥ vṛṣṇīn śrutvā ātma sammitān

original: BhP_10.50.045/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvācintayat kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa sahāyavān
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā acintayat kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa sahāyavān

original: BhP_10.50.045/3 aho yadūnāṃ vṛjinaṃ prāptaṃ hy ubhayato mahat
analyzed: aho yadūnām vṛjinam prāptam hi ubhayatas mahat

original: BhP_10.50.046/1 yavano 'yaṃ nirundhe 'smān adya tāvan mahā-balaḥ
analyzed: yavanaḥ yam nirundhe smān adya tāvat mahā balaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.046/3 māgadho 'py adya vā śvo vā paraśvo vāgamiṣyati
analyzed: māgadhaḥ pi adya vā śvas vā paraśvas vā āgamiṣyati

original: BhP_10.50.047/1 āvayoḥ yudhyator asya yady āgantā jarā-sutaḥ
analyzed: āvayoḥ yudhyatoḥ asya yadi āgantā jarāsutaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.047/3 bandhūn haniṣyaty atha vā neṣyate sva-puraṃ balī
analyzed: bandhūn haniṣyati atha vā neṣyate sva puram balī

original: BhP_10.50.048/1 tasmād adya vidhāsyāmo durgaṃ dvipada-durgamam
analyzed: tasmāt adya vidhāsyāmaḥ durgam dvipada durgamam

original: BhP_10.50.048/3 tatra jñātīn samādhāya yavanaṃ ghātayāmahe
analyzed: tatra jñātīn samādhāya yavanam ghātayāmahe

original: BhP_10.50.049/1 iti sammantrya bhagavān durgaṃ dvādaśa-yojanam
analyzed: iti sammantrya bhagavān durgam dvādaśa yojanam

original: BhP_10.50.049/3 antaḥ-samudre nagaraṃ kṛtsnādbhutam acīkarat
analyzed: antar samudre nagaram kṛtsna adbhutam acīkarat

original: BhP_10.50.050/1 dṛśyate yatra hi tvāṣṭraṃ vijñānaṃ śilpa-naipuṇam
analyzed: dṛśyate yatra hi tvāṣṭram vijñānam śilpa naipuṇam

original: BhP_10.50.050/3 rathyā-catvara-vīthībhir yathā-vāstu vinirmitam
analyzed: rathyā catvara vīthībhiḥ yathāvāstu vinirmitam

original: BhP_10.50.051/1 sura-druma-latodyāna- vicitropavanānvitam
analyzed: sura druma latā udyāna vicitra upavana anvitam

original: BhP_10.50.051/3 hema-śṛṅgair divi-spṛgbhiḥ sphaṭikāṭṭāla-gopuraiḥ
analyzed: hema śṛṅgaiḥ   sphaṭika aṭṭāla gopuraiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.052/1 rājatārakuṭaiḥ koṣṭhair hema-kumbhair alaṅkṛtaiḥ
analyzed: rājata ārakuṭaiḥ koṣṭhaiḥ hema kumbhaiḥ alaṅkṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.052/3 ratna-kūtair gṛhair hemair mahā-mārakata-sthalaiḥ
analyzed: ratna kūtaiḥ gṛhaiḥ hemaiḥ mahā mārakata sthalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.50.053/1 vāstoṣpatīnāṃ ca gṛhair vallabhībhiś ca nirmitam
analyzed: vāstoṣpatīnām ca gṛhaiḥ vallabhībhiḥ ca nirmitam

original: BhP_10.50.053/3 cātur-varṇya-janākīrṇaṃ yadu-deva-gṛhollasat
analyzed: cāturvarṇya jana ākīrṇam yadu deva gṛha ullasat

original: BhP_10.50.054/1 sudharmāṃ pārijātaṃ ca mahendraḥ prāhiṇod dhareḥ
analyzed: sudharmām pārijātam ca mahā indraḥ prāhiṇot hareḥ

original: BhP_10.50.054/3 yatra cāvasthito martyo martya-dharmair na yujyate
analyzed: yatra ca avasthitaḥ martyaḥ martya dharmaiḥ na yujyate

original: BhP_10.50.055/1 śyāmaika-varṇān varuṇo hayān śuklān mano-javān
analyzed: śyāma eka varṇān varuṇaḥ hayān śuklān manojavān

original: BhP_10.50.055/3 aṣṭau nidhi-patiḥ kośān loka-pālo nijodayān
analyzed: aṣṭau nidhipatiḥ kośān lokapālaḥ nija udayān

original: BhP_10.50.056/1 yad yad bhagavatā dattam ādhipatyaṃ sva-siddhaye
analyzed: yat yat bhagavatā dattam ādhipatyam sva siddhaye

original: BhP_10.50.056/3 sarvaṃ pratyarpayām āsur harau bhūmi-gate nṛpa
analyzed: sarvam pratyarpayām āsuḥ harau bhūmi gate nṛpa

original: BhP_10.50.057/1 tatra yoga-prabhāvena nītvā sarva-janaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: tatra yoga prabhāvena nītvā sarva janam hariḥ

original: BhP_10.50.057/3 prajā-pālena rāmeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ samanumantritaḥ
analyzed: prajāpālena rāmeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ samanumantritaḥ

original: BhP_10.50.057/5 nirjagāma pura-dvārāt padma-mālī nirāyudhaḥ
analyzed: nirjagāma pura dvārāt padmamālī nirāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.001/1 taṃ vilokya viniṣkrāntam ujjihānam ivoḍupam
analyzed: tam vilokya viniṣkrāntam ujjihānam iva uḍupam

original: BhP_10.51.001/3 darśanīyatamaṃ śyāmaṃ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
analyzed: darśanīyatamam śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam

original: BhP_10.51.002/1 śrīvatsa-vakṣasaṃ bhrājat kaustubhāmukta-kandharam
analyzed: śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubha mukta kandharam

original: BhP_10.51.002/3 pṛthu-dīrgha-catur-bāhuṃ nava-kañjāruṇekṣaṇam
analyzed: pṛthu dīrgha catur bāhum nava kañja aruṇa īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.51.003/1 nitya-pramuditaṃ śrīmat su-kapolaṃ śuci-smitam
analyzed: nitya pramuditam śrīmat su kapolam śuci smitam

original: BhP_10.51.003/3 mukhāravindaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ sphuran-makara-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: mukha aravindam bibhrāṇam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.51.004/1 vāsudevo hy ayam iti pumān śrīvatsa-lāñchanaḥ
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ hi ayam iti pumān śrīvatsalāñchanaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.004/3 catur-bhujo 'ravindākṣo vana-māly ati-sundaraḥ
BhP_10.51.005/1 lakṣaṇair nārada-proktair nānyo bhavitum arhati
analyzed: lakṣaṇaiḥ nārada proktaiḥ na anyaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: BhP_10.51.005/3 nirāyudhaś calan padbhyāṃ yotsye 'nena nirāyudhaḥ
analyzed: nirāyudhaḥ calan padbhyām yotsye nena nirāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.006/1 iti niścitya yavanaḥ prādravad taṃ parāṅ-mukham
analyzed: iti niścitya yavanaḥ prādravat tam parāṅmukham

original: BhP_10.51.006/3 anvadhāvaj jighṛkṣus taṃ durāpam api yoginām
analyzed: anvadhāvat jighṛkṣuḥ tam durāpam api yoginām

original: BhP_10.51.007/1 hasta-prāptam ivātmānaṃ harīṇā sa pade pade
analyzed: hasta prāptam iva ātmānam harīṇā sa pade pade

original: BhP_10.51.007/3 nīto darśayatā dūraṃ yavaneśo 'dri-kandaram
analyzed: nītaḥ darśayatā dūram yavana īśaḥ dri kandaram

original: BhP_10.51.008/1 palāyanaṃ yadu-kule jātasya tava nocitam
analyzed: palāyanam yadu kule jātasya tava nā ucitam

original: BhP_10.51.008/3 iti kṣipann anugato nainaṃ prāpāhatāśubhaḥ
analyzed: iti kṣipan anugataḥ na enam prāpa ahata aśubhaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.009/1 evaṃ kṣipto 'pi bhagavān prāviśad giri-kandaram
analyzed: evam kṣiptaḥ u pi bhagavān prāviśat giri kandaram

original: BhP_10.51.009/3 so 'pi praviṣṭas tatrānyaṃ śayānaṃ dadṛśe naram
analyzed: saḥ pi praviṣṭaḥ tatra anyam śayānam dadṛśe naram

original: BhP_10.51.010/1 nanv asau dūram ānīya śete mām iha sādhu-vat
analyzed: nanu asau dūram ānīya śete mām iha sādhu vat

original: BhP_10.51.010/3 iti matvācyutaṃ mūḍhas taṃ padā samatāḍayat
analyzed: iti matvā acyutam mūḍhaḥ tam padā samatāḍayat

original: BhP_10.51.011/1 sa utthāya ciraṃ suptaḥ śanair unmīlya locane
analyzed: saḥ utthāya ciram suptaḥ śanais unmīlya locane

original: BhP_10.51.011/3 diśo vilokayan pārśve tam adrākṣīd avasthitam
analyzed: diśaḥ vilokayan pārśve tam adrākṣīt avasthitam

original: BhP_10.51.012/1 sa tāvat tasya ruṣṭasya dṛṣṭi-pātena bhārata
analyzed: sa tāvat tasya ruṣṭasya dṛṣṭipātena bhārata

original: BhP_10.51.012/3 deha-jenāgninā dagdho bhasma-sād abhavat kṣaṇāt
analyzed: deha jena agninā dagdhaḥ bhasmasāt abhavat kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_10.51.013/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.013/1 ko nāma sa pumān brahman kasya kiṃ-vīrya eva ca
analyzed: kaḥ nāma sa pumān brahman kasya kiṃvīryaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.51.013/3 kasmād guhāṃ gataḥ śiṣye kiṃ-tejo yavanārdanaḥ
analyzed: kasmāt guhām gataḥ śiṣye kiṃtejaḥ yavana ardanaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.014/1 sa ikṣvāku-kule jāto māndhātṛ-tanayo mahān
analyzed: saḥ ikṣvāku kule jātaḥ māndhātṛ tanayaḥ mahān

original: BhP_10.51.014/3 mucukunda iti khyāto brahmaṇyaḥ satya-saṅgaraḥ
analyzed: mucukundaḥ iti khyātaḥ brahmaṇyaḥ satya saṅgaraḥ

original: BhP_10.51.015/1 sa yācitaḥ sura-gaṇair indrādyair ātma-rakṣaṇe
analyzed: sa yācitaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ indra ādyaiḥ ātma rakṣaṇe

original: BhP_10.51.015/3 asurebhyaḥ paritrastais tad-rakṣāṃ so 'karoc ciram
analyzed: asurebhyaḥ paritrastaiḥ tad rakṣām saḥ karot ciram

original: BhP_10.51.016/1 labdhvā guhaṃ te svaḥ-pālaṃ mucukundam athābruvan
analyzed: labdhvā guham te svaḥpālam mucukundam atha abruvan

original: BhP_10.51.016/3 rājan viramatāṃ kṛcchrād bhavān naḥ paripālanāt
analyzed: rājan viramatām kṛcchrāt bhavān naḥ paripālanāt

original: BhP_10.51.017/1 nara-lokaṃ parityajya rājyaṃ nihata-kaṇṭakam
analyzed: nara lokam parityajya rājyam nihata kaṇṭakam

original: BhP_10.51.017/3 asmān pālayato vīra kāmās te sarva ujjhitāḥ
analyzed: asmān pālayataḥ vīra kāmāḥ te sarve ujjhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.51.018/1 sutā mahiṣyo bhavato jñātayo 'mātya-mantrinaḥ
analyzed: sutāḥ mahiṣyaḥ bhavataḥ jñātayaḥ mātya mantrinaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.018/3 prajāś ca tulya-kālīnā nādhunā santi kālitāḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ ca tulya kālīnāḥ na adhunā santi kālitāḥ

original: BhP_10.51.019/1 kālo balīyān balināṃ bhagavān īśvaro 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ balīyān balinām bhagavān īśvaraḥ vyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.019/3 prajāḥ kālayate krīḍan paśu-pālo yathā paśūn
analyzed: prajāḥ kālayate krīḍan paśupālaḥ yathā paśūn

original: BhP_10.51.020/1 varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te ṛte kaivalyam adya naḥ
analyzed: varam vṛṇīṣva bhadram te ṛte kaivalyam adya naḥ

original: BhP_10.51.020/3 eka eveśvaras tasya bhagavān viṣṇur avyayaḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ tasya bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.021/1 evam uktaḥ sa vai devān abhivandya mahā-yaśāḥ
analyzed: evam uktaḥ sa vai devān abhivandya mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_10.51.021/3 aśayiṣṭa guhā-viṣṭo nidrayā deva-dattayā
analyzed: aśayiṣṭa guhā āviṣṭaḥ nidrayā deva dattayā

original: BhP_10.51.022/1 yavane bhasma-sān nīte bhagavān sātvatarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: yavane bhasmasāt nīte bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.022/3 ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa mucukundāya dhīmate
analyzed: ātmānam darśayām āsa mucukundāya dhīmate

original: BhP_10.51.023/1 tam ālokya ghana-śyāmaṃ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
analyzed: tam ālokya ghana śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam

original: BhP_10.51.023/3 śrīvatsa-vakṣasaṃ bhrājat kaustubhena virājitam
analyzed: śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubhena virājitam

original: BhP_10.51.024/1 catur-bhujaṃ rocamānaṃ vaijayantyā ca mālayā
analyzed: catur bhujam rocamānam vaijayantyā ca mālayā

original: BhP_10.51.024/3 cāru-prasanna-vadanaṃ sphuran-makara-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: cāru prasanna vadanam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.51.025/1 prekṣaṇīyaṃ nṛ-lokasya sānurāga-smitekṣaṇam
analyzed: prekṣaṇīyam nṛ lokasya sa anurāga smita īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.51.025/3 apīvya-vayasaṃ matta- mṛgendrodāra-vikramam
analyzed: matta mṛgendra udāra vikramam

original: BhP_10.51.026/1 paryapṛcchan mahā-buddhis tejasā tasya dharṣitaḥ
analyzed: paryapṛcchat mahā buddhiḥ tejasā tasya dharṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.026/3 śaṅkitaḥ śanakai rājā durdharṣam iva tejasā
analyzed: śaṅkitaḥ śanakais rājā durdharṣam iva tejasā

original: BhP_10.51.027/0 śrī-mucukunda uvāca
analyzed: śrī mucukundaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.027/1 ko bhavān iha samprāpto vipine giri-gahvare
analyzed: kaḥ bhavān iha samprāptaḥ vipine giri gahvare

original: BhP_10.51.027/3 padbhyāṃ padma-palāśābhyāṃ vicarasy uru-kaṇṭake
analyzed: padbhyām padma palāśābhyām vicarasi uru kaṇṭake

original: BhP_10.51.028/1 kiṃ svit tejasvināṃ tejo bhagavān vā vibhāvasuḥ
analyzed: kim svid tejasvinām tejaḥ bhagavān vā vibhāvasuḥ

original: BhP_10.51.028/3 sūryaḥ somo mahendro vā loka-pālo paro 'pi vā
analyzed: sūryaḥ somaḥ mahendraḥ vā vā

original: BhP_10.51.029/1 manye tvāṃ deva-devānāṃ trayāṇāṃ puruṣarṣabham
analyzed: manye tvām deva devānām trayāṇām puruṣa ṛṣabham

original: BhP_10.51.029/3 yad bādhase guhā-dhvāntaṃ pradīpaḥ prabhayā yathā
analyzed: yat bādhase guhā dhvāntam pradīpaḥ prabhayā yathā

original: BhP_10.51.030/1 śuśrūṣatām avyalīkam asmākaṃ nara-puṅgava
analyzed: śuśrūṣatām avyalīkam asmākam nara puṅgava

original: BhP_10.51.030/3 sva-janma karma gotraṃ vā kathyatāṃ yadi rocate
analyzed: sva janma karma gotram vā kathyatām yadi rocate

original: BhP_10.51.031/1 vayaṃ tu puruṣa-vyāghra aikṣvākāḥ kṣatra-bandhavaḥ
analyzed: vayam tu puruṣa vyāghraḥ aikṣvākāḥ kṣatra bandhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.031/3 mucukunda iti prokto yauvanāśvātmajaḥ prabho
analyzed: mucukundaḥ iti proktaḥ yauvanāśva ātmajaḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.51.032/1 cira-prajāgara-śrānto nidrayāpahatendriyaḥ
analyzed: cira prajāgara śrāntaḥ nidrayā apahata indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.032/3 śaye 'smin vijane kāmaṃ kenāpy utthāpito 'dhunā
analyzed: śaye smin vijane kāmam kena api utthāpitaḥ dhunā

original: BhP_10.51.033/1 so 'pi bhasmī-kṛto nūnam ātmīyenaiva pāpmanā
analyzed: saḥ pi bhasmīkṛtaḥ nūnam ātmīyena eva pāpmanā

original: BhP_10.51.033/3 anantaraṃ bhavān śrīmāṃl lakṣito 'mitra-śāsanaḥ
analyzed: anantaram bhavān śrīmān lakṣitaḥ mitra śāsanaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.034/1 tejasā te 'viṣahyeṇa bhūri draṣṭuṃ na śaknumaḥ
analyzed: tejasā te viṣahyeṇa bhūri draṣṭum na śaknumaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.034/3 hataujasā mahā-bhāga mānanīyo 'si dehinām
analyzed: hata ojasā mahābhāga mānanīyaḥ si dehinām

original: BhP_10.51.035/1 evaṃ sambhāṣito rājñā bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: evam sambhāṣitaḥ rājñā bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.035/3 pratyāha prahasan vāṇyā megha-nāda-gabhīrayā
analyzed: pratyāha prahasan vāṇyā megha nāda gabhīrayā

original: BhP_10.51.036/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.036/1 janma-karmābhidhānāni santi me 'ṅga sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: janma karma abhidhānāni santi me ṅga sahasraśas

original: BhP_10.51.036/3 na śakyante 'nusaṅkhyātum anantatvān mayāpi hi
analyzed: na śakyante nusaṅkhyātum ananta tvāt mayā api hi

original: BhP_10.51.037/1 kvacid rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāny uru-janmabhiḥ
analyzed: kvacid rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni uru janmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.037/3 guṇa-karmābhidhānāni na me janmāni karhicit
analyzed: guṇa karma abhidhānāni na me janmāni karhicit

original: BhP_10.51.038/1 kāla-trayopapannāni janma-karmāṇi me nṛpa
analyzed: kāla traya upapannāni janma karmāṇi me nṛpa

original: BhP_10.51.038/3 anukramanto naivāntaṃ gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ
analyzed: anukramantaḥ na eva antam gacchanti parama ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.039/1 tathāpy adyatanāny aṅga śṛnuṣva gadato mama
analyzed: tathā api adyatanāni aṅga śṛnuṣva gadataḥ mama

original: BhP_10.51.039/3 vijñāpito viriñcena purāhaṃ dharma-guptaye
analyzed: vijñāpitaḥ viriñcena purā aham dharma guptaye

original: BhP_10.51.040/1 bhūmer bhārāyamāṇānām asurāṇāṃ kṣayāya ca
analyzed: bhūmeḥ bhārāyamāṇānām asurāṇām kṣayāya ca

original: BhP_10.51.040/3 avatīrṇo yadu-kule gṛha ānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: avatīrṇaḥ yadu kule gṛhe ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.51.040/5 vadanti vāsudeveti vasudeva-sutaṃ hi mām
analyzed: vadanti vāsudeva iti vasudeva sutam hi mām

original: BhP_10.51.041/1 kālanemir hataḥ kaṃsaḥ pralambādyāś ca sad-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: kālanemiḥ hataḥ kaṃsaḥ pralamba ādyāḥ ca sat dviṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.041/3 ayaṃ ca yavano dagdho rājaṃs te tigma-cakṣuṣā
analyzed: ayam ca yavanaḥ dagdhaḥ rājan te tigma cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_10.51.042/1 so 'haṃ tavānugrahārthaṃ guhām etām upāgataḥ
analyzed: saḥ ham tava anugraha artham guhām etām upāgataḥ

original: BhP_10.51.042/3 prārthitaḥ pracuraṃ pūrvaṃ tvayāhaṃ bhakta-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: prārthitaḥ pracuram pūrvam tvayā aham bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.043/1 varān vṛṇīṣva rājarṣe sarvān kāmān dadāmi te
analyzed: varān vṛṇīṣva rājarṣe sarvān kāmān dadāmi te

original: BhP_10.51.043/3 māṃ prasanno janaḥ kaścin na bhūyo 'rhati śocitum
analyzed: mām prasannaḥ janaḥ kaścid na bhūyas rhati śocitum

original: BhP_10.51.044/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.044/1 ity uktas taṃ praṇamyāha mucukundo mudānvitaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ tam praṇamya āha mucukundaḥ mudā anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.044/3 jñātvā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ garga-vākyam anusmaran
analyzed: jñātvā nārāyaṇam devam garga vākyam anusmaran

original: BhP_10.51.045/0 śrī-mucukunda uvāca
analyzed: śrī mucukundaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.045/1 vimohito 'yaṃ jana īśa māyayā tvadīyayā tvāṃ na bhajaty anartha-dṛk
analyzed: vimohitaḥ yam janaḥ īśa māyayā tvadīyayā tvām na bhajati anartha dṛś

original: BhP_10.51.045/3 sukhāya duḥkha-prabhaveṣu sajjate gṛheṣu yoṣit puruṣaś ca vañcitaḥ
analyzed: sukhāya duḥkha prabhaveṣu sajjate gṛheṣu yoṣit puruṣaḥ ca vañcitaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.046/1 labdhvā jano durlabham atra mānuṣaṃ
analyzed: labdhvā janaḥ durlabham atra mānuṣam

original: BhP_10.51.046/2 kathañcid avyaṅgam ayatnato 'nagha
analyzed: kathañcid avyaṅgam ayatnataḥ nagha

original: BhP_10.51.046/3 pādāravindaṃ na bhajaty asan-matir
analyzed: pāda aravindam na bhajati asat matiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.046/4 gṛhāndha-kūpe patito yathā paśuḥ
analyzed: gṛha andhakūpe patitaḥ yathā paśuḥ

original: BhP_10.51.047/1 mamaiṣa kālo 'jita niṣphalo gato rājya-śriyonnaddha-madasya bhū-pateḥ
analyzed: mama eṣa kālaḥ jita niṣphalaḥ gataḥ rājya śriyā unnaddha madasya bhūpateḥ

original: BhP_10.51.047/3 martyātma-buddheḥ suta-dāra-kośa-bhūṣv āsajjamānasya duranta-cintayā
analyzed: martya ātma buddheḥ suta dāra kośa bhūṣu āsajjamānasya duranta cintayā

original: BhP_10.51.048/1 kalevare 'smin ghaṭa-kuḍya-sannibhe
analyzed: kalevare smin ghaṭa kuḍya sannibhe

original: BhP_10.51.048/2 nirūḍha-māno nara-deva ity aham
analyzed: nirūḍha mānaḥ naradevaḥ iti aham

original: BhP_10.51.048/3 vṛto rathebhāśva-padāty-anīkapair
analyzed: vṛtaḥ ratha ibha aśva padāti anīkapaiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.048/4 gāṃ paryaṭaṃs tvāgaṇayan su-durmadaḥ
analyzed: gām paryaṭan tu āgaṇayan su durmadaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.049/1 pramattam uccair itikṛtya-cintayā pravṛddha-lobhaṃ viṣayeṣu lālasam
analyzed: pramattam uccais iti kṛtya cintayā pravṛddha lobham viṣayeṣu lālasam

original: BhP_10.51.049/3 tvam apramattaḥ sahasābhipadyase kṣul-lelihāno 'hir ivākhum antakaḥ
analyzed: tvam apramattaḥ sahasā abhipadyase kṣudh lelihānaḥ hiḥ iva ākhum antakaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.050/1 purā rathair hema-pariṣkṛtaiś caran
analyzed: purā rathaiḥ hema pariṣkṛtaiḥ caran

original: BhP_10.51.050/2 mataṃ-gajair vā nara-deva-saṃjñitaḥ
analyzed: mataṃga jaiḥ vā naradeva saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.050/3 sa eva kālena duratyayena te
analyzed: saḥ eva kālena duratyayena te

original: BhP_10.51.050/4 kalevaro viṭ-kṛmi-bhasma-saṃjñitaḥ
BhP_10.51.051/1 nirjitya dik-cakram abhūta-vigraho varāsana-sthaḥ sama-rāja-vanditaḥ
analyzed: nirjitya diś cakram abhūta vigrahaḥ varāsana sthaḥ sama rāja vanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.051/3 gṛheṣu maithunya-sukheṣu yoṣitāṃ krīḍā-mṛgaḥ pūruṣa īśa nīyate
analyzed: gṛheṣu maithunya sukheṣu yoṣitām krīḍāmṛgaḥ pūruṣaḥ īśa nīyate

original: BhP_10.51.052/1 karoti karmāṇi tapaḥ-suniṣṭhito nivṛtta-bhogas tad-apekṣayādadat
analyzed: karoti karmāṇi tapaḥ su niṣṭhitaḥ nivṛtta bhogaḥ tad apekṣayā adadat

original: BhP_10.51.052/3 punaś ca bhūyāsam ahaṃ sva-rāḍ iti pravṛddha-tarṣo na sukhāya kalpate
analyzed: punar ca bhūyāsam aham svarāj iti pravṛddha tarṣaḥ na sukhāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.51.053/1 bhavāpavargo bhramato yadā bhavej janasya tarhy acyuta sat-samāgamaḥ
analyzed: bhava apavargaḥ bhramataḥ yadā bhavet janasya tarhi acyuta sat samāgamaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.053/3 sat-saṅgamo yarhi tadaiva sad-gatau parāvareśe tvayi jāyate matiḥ
analyzed: sat saṅgamaḥ yarhi tadā eva sat gatau parāvara īśe tvayi jāyate matiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.054/1 manye mamānugraha īśa te kṛto rājyānubandhāpagamo yadṛcchayā
analyzed: manye mama anugrahaḥ īśa te kṛtaḥ rājya anubandha apagamaḥ yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_10.51.054/3 yaḥ prārthyate sādhubhir eka-caryayā vanaṃ vivikṣadbhir akhaṇḍa-bhūmi-paiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ prārthyate sādhubhiḥ eka caryayā vanam vivikṣadbhiḥ akhaṇḍa bhūmipaiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.055/1 na kāmaye 'nyaṃ tava pāda-sevanād akiñcana-prārthyatamād varaṃ vibho
analyzed: na kāmaye tava pāda sevanāt akiñcana prārthyatamāt varam vibho

original: BhP_10.51.055/3 ārādhya kas tvāṃ hy apavarga-daṃ hare vṛṇīta āryo varam ātma-bandhanam
analyzed: ārādhya kaḥ tvām hi apavarga dam hare vṛṇīte āryaḥ varam ātma bandhanam

original: BhP_10.51.056/1 tasmād visṛjyāśiṣa īśa sarvato rajas-tamaḥ-sattva-guṇānubandhanāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt visṛjya āśiṣaḥ īśa sarvatas rajaḥ tamaḥ sattva guṇa anubandhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.51.056/3 nirañjanaṃ nirguṇam advayaṃ paraṃ tvāṃ jñāpti-mātraṃ puruṣaṃ vrajāmy aham
analyzed: nirañjanam nirguṇam advayam param tvām puruṣam vrajāmi aham

original: BhP_10.51.057/1 ciram iha vṛjinārtas tapyamāno 'nutāpair
analyzed: ciram iha vṛjina ārtaḥ tapyamānaḥ nu tāpaiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.057/2 avitṛṣa-ṣaḍ-amitro 'labdha-śāntiḥ kathañcit
analyzed: a vitṛṣa ṣaṣ amitraḥ labdha śāntiḥ kathañcid

original: BhP_10.51.057/3 śaraṇa-da samupetas tvat-padābjaṃ parātman
analyzed: śaraṇa da samupetaḥ tvad pada abjam parātman

original: BhP_10.51.057/4 abhayam ṛtam aśokaṃ pāhi māpannam īśa
analyzed: abhayam ṛtam aśokam pāhi mā āpannam īśa

original: BhP_10.51.058/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.51.058/1 sārvabhauma mahā-rāja matis te vimalorjitā
analyzed: sārvabhauma mahā rāja matiḥ te vimala ūrjitā

original: BhP_10.51.058/3 varaiḥ pralobhitasyāpi na kāmair vihatā yataḥ
analyzed: varaiḥ pralobhitasya api na kāmaiḥ vihatāḥ yatas

original: BhP_10.51.059/1 pralobhito varair yat tvam apramādāya viddhi tat
analyzed: pralobhitaḥ varaiḥ yat tvam a pramādāya viddhi tat

original: BhP_10.51.059/3 na dhīr ekānta-bhaktānām āśīrbhir bhidyate kvacit
analyzed: na dhīḥ ekānta bhaktānām āśīrbhiḥ bhidyate kvacid

original: BhP_10.51.060/1 yuñjānānām abhaktānāṃ prāṇāyāmādibhir manaḥ
analyzed: yuñjānānām abhaktānām prāṇāyāma ādibhiḥ manaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.060/3 akṣīṇa-vāsanaṃ rājan dṛśyate punar utthitam
analyzed: akṣīṇa vāsanam rājan dṛśyate punar utthitam

original: BhP_10.51.061/1 vicarasva mahīṃ kāmaṃ mayy āveśita-mānasaḥ
analyzed: vicarasva mahīm kāmam mayi āveśita mānasaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.061/3 astv evaṃ nityadā tubhyaṃ bhaktir mayy anapāyinī
analyzed: astu evam nityadā tubhyam bhaktiḥ mayi anapāyinī

original: BhP_10.51.062/1 kṣātra-dharma-sthito jantūn nyavadhīr mṛgayādibhiḥ
analyzed: kṣātra dharma sthitaḥ jantūn nyavadhīḥ mṛgayā ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.51.062/3 samāhitas tat tapasā jahy aghaṃ mad-upāśritaḥ
analyzed: samāhitaḥ tat tapasā jahi agham mad upāśritaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.063/1 janmany anantare rājan sarva-bhūta-suhṛttamaḥ
analyzed: janmani anantare rājan sarva bhūta suhṛttamaḥ

original: BhP_10.51.063/3 bhūtvā dvija-varas tvaṃ vai mām upaiṣyasi kevalam
analyzed: bhūtvā dvijavaraḥ tvam vai mām upaiṣyasi kevalam

original: BhP_10.52.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.52.001/1 itthaṃ so 'nagrahīto 'nga kṛṣṇenekṣvāku nandanaḥ
analyzed: ittham saḥ nagrahītaḥ kṛṣṇena ikṣvāku nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.001/3 taṃ parikramya sannamya niścakrāma guhā-mukhāt
analyzed: tam parikramya sannamya niścakrāma guhā mukhāt

original: BhP_10.52.002/1 saṃvīkṣya kṣullakān martyān paśūn vīrud-vanaspatīn
analyzed: saṃvīkṣya kṣullakān martyān paśūn vīrudh vanaspatīn

original: BhP_10.52.002/3 matvā kali-yugaṃ prāptaṃ jagāma diśam uttarām
analyzed: matvā kali yugam prāptam jagāma diśam uttarām

original: BhP_10.52.003/1 tapaḥ-śraddhā-yuto dhīro niḥsaṅgo mukta-saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ śraddhā yutaḥ dhīraḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ mukta saṃśayaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.003/3 samādhāya manaḥ kṛṣṇe prāviśad gandhamādanam
analyzed: samādhāya manaḥ kṛṣṇe prāviśat gandhamādanam

original: BhP_10.52.004/1 badary-āśramam āsādya nara-nārāyaṇālayam
analyzed: badaryāśramam āsādya nara nārāyaṇa ālayam

original: BhP_10.52.004/3 sarva-dvandva-sahaḥ śāntas tapasārādhayad dharim
analyzed: sarva dvandva sahaḥ śāntaḥ tapasā ārādhayat harim

original: BhP_10.52.005/1 bhagavān punar āvrajya purīṃ yavana-veṣṭitām
analyzed: bhagavān punar āvrajya purīm yavana veṣṭitām

original: BhP_10.52.005/3 hatvā mleccha-balaṃ ninye tadīyaṃ dvārakāṃ dhanam
analyzed: hatvā mleccha balam ninye tadīyam dvārakām dhanam

original: BhP_10.52.006/1 nīyamāne dhane gobhir nṛbhiś cācyuta-coditaiḥ
analyzed: nīyamāne dhane gobhiḥ nṛbhiḥ ca acyuta coditaiḥ

original: BhP_10.52.006/3 ājagāma jarāsandhas trayo-viṃśaty-anīka-paḥ
analyzed: ājagāma jarāsandhaḥ trayoviṃśati anīkapaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.007/1 vilokya vega-rabhasaṃ ripu-sainyasya mādhavau
analyzed: vilokya vega rabhasam ripu sainyasya mādhavau

original: BhP_10.52.007/3 manuṣya-ceṣṭām āpannau rājan dudruvatur drutam
analyzed: manuṣya ceṣṭām āpannau rājan dudruvatuḥ drutam

original: BhP_10.52.008/1 vihāya vittaṃ pracuram abhītau bhīru-bhīta-vat
analyzed: vihāya vittam pracuram abhītau bhīru bhīta vat

original: BhP_10.52.008/3 padbhyāṃ palāśābhyāṃ celatur bahu-yojanam
analyzed: padbhyām palāśābhyām celatuḥ bahu yojanam

original: BhP_10.52.009/1 palāyamānau tau dṛṣṭvā māgadhaḥ prahasan balī
analyzed: palāyamānau tau dṛṣṭvā māgadhaḥ prahasan balī

original: BhP_10.52.009/3 anvadhāvad rathānīkair īśayor apramāṇa-vit
analyzed: anvadhāvat ratha anīkaiḥ īśayoḥ apramāṇa vid

original: BhP_10.52.010/1 pradrutya dūraṃ saṃśrāntau tuṅgam āruhatāṃ girim
analyzed: pradrutya dūram saṃśrāntau tuṅgam āruhatām girim

original: BhP_10.52.010/3 pravarṣaṇākhyaṃ bhagavān nityadā yatra varṣati
analyzed: pravarṣaṇa ākhyam bhagavān nityadā yatra varṣati

original: BhP_10.52.011/1 girau nilīnāv ājñāya nādhigamya padaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: girau nilīnau ājñāya na adhigamya padam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.52.011/3 dadāha girim edhobhiḥ samantād agnim utsṛjan
analyzed: dadāha girim edhobhiḥ samantāt agnim utsṛjan

original: BhP_10.52.012/1 tata utpatya tarasā dahyamāna-taṭād ubhau
analyzed: tatas utpatya tarasā dahyamāna taṭāt ubhau

original: BhP_10.52.012/3 daśaika-yojanāt tuṅgān nipetatur adho bhuvi
analyzed: daśa eka yojanāt tuṅgāt nipetatuḥ adhas bhuvi

original: BhP_10.52.013/1 alakṣyamāṇau ripuṇā sānugena yadūttamau
analyzed: alakṣyamāṇau ripuṇā sa anugena yadu uttamau

original: BhP_10.52.013/3 sva-puraṃ punar āyātau samudra-parikhāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: sva puram punar āyātau samudra parikhām nṛpa

original: BhP_10.52.014/1 so 'pi dagdhāv iti mṛṣā manvāno bala-keśavau
analyzed: saḥ u pi dagdhau iti mṛṣā manvānaḥ bala keśavau

original: BhP_10.52.014/3 balam ākṛṣya su-mahan magadhān māgadho yayau
analyzed: balam ākṛṣya su mahat magadhāt māgadhaḥ yayau

original: BhP_10.52.015/1 ānartādhipatiḥ śrīmān raivato raivatīṃ sutām
analyzed: ānarta adhipatiḥ śrīmān raivataḥ raivatīm sutām

original: BhP_10.52.015/3 brahmaṇā coditaḥ prādād balāyeti puroditam
analyzed: brahmaṇā coditaḥ prādāt balāya iti purā uditam

original: BhP_10.52.016/1 bhagavān api govinda upayeme kurūdvaha
analyzed: bhagavān api govindaḥ upayeme kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.52.016/3 vaidarbhīṃ bhīṣmaka-sutāṃ śriyo mātrāṃ svayaṃ-vare
analyzed: vaidarbhīm bhīṣmaka sutām śriyaḥ mātrām svayaṃvare

original: BhP_10.52.017/1 pramathya tarasā rājñaḥ śālvādīṃś caidya-pakṣa-gān
analyzed: pramathya tarasā rājñaḥ śālva ādīn caidya pakṣa gān

original: BhP_10.52.017/3 paśyatāṃ sarva-lokānāṃ tārkṣya-putraḥ sudhām iva
analyzed: paśyatām sarva lokānām tārkṣyaputraḥ sudhām iva

original: BhP_10.52.018/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.52.018/1 bhagavān bhīṣmaka-sutāṃ rukmiṇīṃ rucirānanām
analyzed: bhagavān bhīṣmaka sutām rukmiṇīm rucira ānanām

original: BhP_10.52.018/3 rākṣasena vidhānena upayema iti śrutam
analyzed: rākṣasena vidhānena upayeme iti śrutam

original: BhP_10.52.019/1 bhagavan śrotum icchāmi kṛṣṇasyāmita-tejasaḥ
analyzed: bhagavan śrotum icchāmi kṛṣṇasya amita tejasaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.019/3 yathā māgadha-śālvādīn jitvā kanyām upāharat
analyzed: yathā māgadha śālva ādīn jitvā kanyām upāharat

original: BhP_10.52.020/1 brahman kṛṣṇa-kathāḥ puṇyā mādhvīr loka-malāpahāḥ
analyzed: brahman kṛṣṇa kathāḥ puṇyāḥ mādhvīḥ loka mala apahāḥ

original: BhP_10.52.020/3 ko nu tṛpyeta śṛṇvānaḥ śruta-jño nitya-nūtanāḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu tṛpyeta śṛṇvānaḥ śruta jñaḥ nitya nūtanāḥ
