original: BhP_10.52.021/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.52.021/1 rājāsīd bhīṣmako nāma vidarbhādhipatir mahān
analyzed: rājā āsīt bhīṣmakaḥ nāma vidarbha adhipatiḥ mahān

original: BhP_10.52.021/3 tasya pancābhavan putrāḥ kanyaikā ca varānanā
analyzed: tasya panca abhavan putrāḥ kanyā ekā ca varānanā

original: BhP_10.52.022/1 rukmy agrajo rukmaratho rukmabāhur anantaraḥ
BhP_10.52.022/3 rukmakeśo rukmamālī rukmiṇy eṣā svasā satī
analyzed: rukma keśaḥ rukma mālī rukmiṇī eṣā svasā satī

original: BhP_10.52.023/1 sopaśrutya mukundasya rūpa-vīrya-guṇa-śriyaḥ
analyzed: sā upaśrutya mukundasya rūpa vīrya guṇa śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.023/3 gṛhāgatair gīyamānās taṃ mene sadṛśaṃ patim
analyzed: gṛha āgataiḥ gīyamānāḥ tam mene sadṛśam patim

original: BhP_10.52.024/1 tāṃ buddhi-lakṣaṇaudārya- rūpa-śīla-guṇāśrayām
analyzed: tām buddhi lakṣaṇa audārya rūpa śīla guṇa āśrayām

original: BhP_10.52.024/3 kṛṣṇaś ca sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ samudvoḍhuṃ mano dadhe
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ ca sadṛśīm bhāryām samudvoḍhum manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_10.52.025/1 bandhūnām icchatāṃ dātuṃ kṛṣṇāya bhaginīṃ nṛpa
analyzed: bandhūnām icchatām dātum kṛṣṇāya bhaginīm nṛpa

original: BhP_10.52.025/3 tato nivārya kṛṣṇa-dviḍ rukmī caidyam amanyata
analyzed: tatas nivārya kṛṣṇa dviṣ rukmī caidyam amanyata

original: BhP_10.52.026/1 tad avetyāsitāpāṅgī vaidarbhī durmanā bhṛśam
analyzed: tat avetya asita apāṅgī vaidarbhī durmanāḥ bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.52.026/3 vicintyāptaṃ dvijaṃ kañcit kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇod drutam
analyzed: vicintya āptam dvijam kañcid kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇot drutam

original: BhP_10.52.027/1 dvārakāṃ sa samabhyetya pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ
analyzed: dvārakām sa samabhyetya pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.027/3 apaśyad ādyaṃ puruṣam āsīnaṃ kāñcanāsane
analyzed: apaśyat ādyam puruṣam āsīnam kāñcana āsane

original: BhP_10.52.028/1 dṛṣṭvā brahmaṇya-devas tam avaruhya nijāsanāt
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā brahmaṇyadevaḥ tam avaruhya nija āsanāt

original: BhP_10.52.028/3 upaveśyārhayāṃ cakre yathātmānaṃ divaukasaḥ
analyzed: upaveśya arhayām cakre yathā ātmānam divaukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.029/1 taṃ bhuktavantaṃ viśrāntam upagamya satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: tam bhuktavantam viśrāntam upagamya satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.52.029/3 pāṇinābhimṛśan pādāv avyagras tam apṛcchata
analyzed: pāṇinā abhimṛśan pādau avyagraḥ tam apṛcchata

original: BhP_10.52.030/1 kaccid dvija-vara-śreṣṭha dharmas te vṛddha-sammataḥ
analyzed: kaccit dvijavara śreṣṭha dharmaḥ te vṛddha sammataḥ

original: BhP_10.52.030/3 vartate nāti-kṛcchreṇa santuṣṭa-manasaḥ sadā
analyzed: vartate na atikṛcchreṇa santuṣṭa manasaḥ sadā

original: BhP_10.52.031/1 santuṣṭo yarhi varteta brāhmaṇo yena kenacit
analyzed: santuṣṭaḥ yarhi varteta brāhmaṇaḥ yena kenacid

original: BhP_10.52.031/3 ahīyamānaḥ svad dharmāt sa hy asyākhila-kāma-dhuk
analyzed: a hīyamānaḥ svat dharmāt sa hi asya akhila kāmaduh

original: BhP_10.52.032/1 asantuṣṭo 'sakṛl lokān āpnoty api sureśvaraḥ
analyzed: asantuṣṭaḥ sakṛt lokān āpnoti api sureśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.52.032/3 akiñcano 'pi santuṣṭaḥ śete sarvāṅga-vijvaraḥ
analyzed: akiñcanaḥ pi santuṣṭaḥ śete sarva aṅga vijvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.52.033/1 viprān sva-lābha-santuṣṭān sādhūn bhūta-suhṛttamān
analyzed: viprān sva lābha santuṣṭān sādhūn bhūta suhṛttamān

original: BhP_10.52.033/3 nirahaṅkāriṇaḥ śāntān namasye śirasāsakṛt
analyzed: nirahaṅkāriṇaḥ śāntān namasye śirasā asakṛt

original: BhP_10.52.034/1 kaccid vaḥ kuśalaṃ brahman rājato yasya hi prajāḥ
analyzed: kaccit vaḥ kuśalam brahman rājataḥ yasya hi prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.52.034/3 sukhaṃ vasanti viṣaye pālyamānāḥ sa me priyaḥ
analyzed: sukham vasanti viṣaye pālyamānāḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.035/1 yatas tvam āgato durgaṃ nistīryeha yad-icchayā
analyzed: yatas tvam āgataḥ durgam nistīrya iha yad icchayā

original: BhP_10.52.035/3 sarvaṃ no brūhy aguhyaṃ cet kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāma te
analyzed: sarvam naḥ brūhi a guhyam ced kim kāryam karavāma te

original: BhP_10.52.036/1 evaṃ sampṛṣṭa-sampraśno brāhmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinā
analyzed: evam sampṛṣṭa sampraśnaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinā

original: BhP_10.52.036/3 līlā-gṛhīta-dehena tasmai sarvam avarṇayat
analyzed: līlā gṛhīta dehena tasmai sarvam avarṇayat

original: BhP_10.52.037/0 śrī-rukmiṇy uvāca
analyzed: śrī rukmiṇī uvāca

original: BhP_10.52.037/1 śrutvā guṇān bhuvana-sundara śṛṇvatāṃ te
analyzed: śrutvā guṇān bhuvana sundara śṛṇvatām te

original: BhP_10.52.037/2 nirviśya karṇa-vivarair harato 'ṅga-tāpam
analyzed: nirviśya karṇa vivaraiḥ harataḥ ṅga tāpam

original: BhP_10.52.037/3 rūpaṃ dṛśāṃ dṛśimatām akhilārtha-lābhaṃ
analyzed: rūpam dṛśām dṛśimatām akhila artha lābham

original: BhP_10.52.037/4 tvayy acyutāviśati cittam apatrapaṃ me
analyzed: tvayi acyuta āviśati cittam apatrapam me

original: BhP_10.52.038/1 kā tvā mukunda mahatī kula-śīla-rūpa-
analyzed: kā tvā mukunda mahatī kula śīla rūpa

original: BhP_10.52.038/2 vidyā-vayo-draviṇa-dhāmabhir ātma-tulyam
analyzed: vidyā vayaḥ draviṇa dhāmabhiḥ ātma tulyam

original: BhP_10.52.038/3 dhīrā patiṃ kulavatī na vṛṇīta kanyā
analyzed: dhīrā patim kulavatī na vṛṇīta kanyā

original: BhP_10.52.038/4 kāle nṛ-siṃha nara-loka-mano-'bhirāmam
analyzed: kāle nṛsiṃha nara loka manobhirāmam

original: BhP_10.52.039/1 tan me bhavān khalu vṛtaḥ patir aṅga jāyām
analyzed: tat me bhavān khalu vṛtaḥ patiḥ aṅga jāyām

original: BhP_10.52.039/2 ātmārpitaś ca bhavato 'tra vibho vidhehi
analyzed: ātmā arpitaḥ ca bhavataḥ tra vibho vidhehi

original: BhP_10.52.039/3 mā vīra-bhāgam abhimarśatu caidya ārād
analyzed: mā vīrabhāgam abhimarśatu caidyaḥ ārāt

original: BhP_10.52.039/4 gomāyu-van mṛga-pater balim ambujākṣa
analyzed: gomāyu vat mṛgapateḥ balim ambuja akṣa

original: BhP_10.52.040/1 pūrteṣṭa-datta-niyama-vrata-deva-vipra
BhP_10.52.040/2 gurv-arcanādibhir alaṃ bhagavān pareśaḥ
analyzed: guru arcana ādibhiḥ alam bhagavān pareśaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.040/3 ārādhito yadi gadāgraja etya pāṇiṃ
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ yadi gadāgrajaḥ etya pāṇim

original: BhP_10.52.040/4 gṛhṇātu me na damaghoṣa-sutādayo 'nye
analyzed: gṛhṇātu me na damaghoṣa suta ādayaḥ nye

original: BhP_10.52.041/1 śvo bhāvini tvam ajitodvahane vidarbhān
analyzed: śvas bhāvini tvam ajita udvahane vidarbhān

original: BhP_10.52.041/2 guptaḥ sametya pṛtanā-patibhiḥ parītaḥ
analyzed: guptaḥ sametya pṛtanā patibhiḥ parītaḥ

original: BhP_10.52.041/3 nirmathya caidya-magadhendra-balaṃ prasahya
analyzed: nirmathya caidya magadha indra balam prasahya

original: BhP_10.52.041/4 māṃ rākṣasena vidhinodvaha vīrya-śulkām
analyzed: mām rākṣasena vidhinā udvaha vīrya śulkām

original: BhP_10.52.042/1 antaḥ-purāntara-carīm anihatya bandhūn
analyzed: antaḥpura antara carīm a nihatya bandhūn

original: BhP_10.52.042/2 tvām udvahe katham iti pravadāmy upāyam
analyzed: tvām udvahe katham iti pravadāmi upāyam

original: BhP_10.52.042/3 pūrve-dyur asti mahatī kula-deva-yātrā
analyzed: pūrvedyus asti mahatī kuladeva yātrā

original: BhP_10.52.042/4 yasyāṃ bahir nava-vadhūr girijām upeyāt
analyzed: yasyām bahis nava vadhūḥ girijām upeyāt

original: BhP_10.52.043/1 yasyāṅghri-paṅkaja-rajaḥ-snapanaṃ mahānto
analyzed: yasya aṅghri paṅkaja rajaḥ snapanam

original: BhP_10.52.043/2 vāñchanty umā-patir ivātma-tamo-'pahatyai
analyzed: vāñchanti umāpatiḥ iva ātma tama upahatyai

original: BhP_10.52.043/3 yarhy ambujākṣa na labheya bhavat-prasādaṃ
analyzed: yarhi ambuja akṣa na labheya bhavat prasādam

original: BhP_10.52.043/4 jahyām asūn vrata-kṛśān śata-janmabhiḥ syāt
analyzed: jahyām asūn vrata kṛśān śata janmabhiḥ syāt

original: BhP_10.52.044/0 brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.52.044/1 ity ete guhya-sandeśā yadu-deva mayāhṛtāḥ
analyzed: iti ete guhya sandeśāḥ yadu deva mayā āhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.52.044/3 vimṛśya kartuṃ yac cātra kriyatāṃ tad anantaram
analyzed: vimṛśya kartum yat ca atra kriyatām tat anantaram

original: BhP_10.53.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.53.001/1 vaidarbhyāḥ sa tu sandeśaṃ niśamya yadu-nandanaḥ
analyzed: vaidarbhyāḥ sa tu sandeśam niśamya yadu nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.001/3 pragṛhya pāṇinā pāṇiṃ prahasann idam abravīt
analyzed: pragṛhya pāṇinā pāṇim prahasan idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.53.002/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.53.002/1 tathāham api tac-citto nidrāṃ ca na labhe niśi
analyzed: tathā aham api tad cittaḥ nidrām ca na labhe niśi

original: BhP_10.53.002/3 vedāham rukmiṇā dveṣān mamodvāho nivāritaḥ
analyzed: veda aham rukmiṇā dveṣāt mama udvāhaḥ nivāritaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.003/1 tām ānayiṣya unmathya rājanyāpasadān mṛdhe
analyzed: tām ānayiṣye unmathya rājanya apasadān mṛdhe

original: BhP_10.53.003/3 mat-parām anavadyāṅgīm edhaso 'gni-śikhām iva
analyzed: mad parām anavadya aṅgīm edhasaḥ gni śikhām iva

original: BhP_10.53.004/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.53.004/1 udvāharkṣaṃ ca vijñāya rukmiṇyā madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: udvāha ṛkṣam ca vijñāya rukmiṇyāḥ madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.004/3 rathaḥ saṃyujyatām āśu dārukety āha sārathim
analyzed: rathaḥ saṃyujyatām āśu dāruka iti āha sārathim

original: BhP_10.53.005/1 sa cāśvaiḥ śaibya-sugrīva- meghapuṣpa-balāhakaiḥ
analyzed: sa ca aśvaiḥ śaibya sugrīva meghapuṣpa balāhakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.005/3 yuktaṃ ratham upānīya tasthau prāñjalir agrataḥ
analyzed: yuktam ratham upānīya tasthau prāñjaliḥ agratas

original: BhP_10.53.006/1 āruhya syandanaṃ śaurir dvijam āropya tūrṇa-gaiḥ
analyzed: āruhya syandanam śauriḥ dvijam āropya tūrṇagaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.006/3 ānartād eka-rātreṇa vidarbhān agamad dhayaiḥ
analyzed: ānartāt eka rātreṇa vidarbhān agamat hayaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.007/1 rājā sa kuṇḍina-patiḥ putra-sneha-vaśānugaḥ
analyzed: rājā sa kuṇḍina patiḥ putra sneha vaśa anugaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.007/3 śiśupālāya svāṃ kanyāṃ dāsyan karmāṇy akārayat
analyzed: śiśupālāya svām kanyām dāsyan karmāṇi akārayat

original: BhP_10.53.008/1 puraṃ sammṛṣṭa-saṃsikta- mārga-rathyā-catuṣpatham
analyzed: puram sammṛṣṭa saṃsikta mārga rathyā catuṣpatham

original: BhP_10.53.008/3 citra-dhvaja-patākābhis toraṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam
analyzed: citra dhvaja patākābhiḥ toraṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_10.53.009/1 srag-gandha-mālyābharaṇair virajo-'mbara-bhūṣitaiḥ
analyzed: sraj gandha mālya ābharaṇaiḥ viraja umbara bhūṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.009/3 juṣṭaṃ strī-puruṣaiḥ śrīmad- gṛhair aguru-dhūpitaiḥ
analyzed: juṣṭam strī puruṣaiḥ śrīmat gṛhaiḥ aguru dhūpitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.010/1 pitṝn devān samabhyarcya viprāṃś ca vidhi-van nṛpa
analyzed: pitṝn devān samabhyarcya viprān ca vidhivat nṛpa

original: BhP_10.53.010/3 bhojayitvā yathā-nyāyaṃ vācayām āsa maṅgalam
analyzed: bhojayitvā yathānyāyam vācayām āsa maṅgalam

original: BhP_10.53.011/1 su-snātāṃ su-datīṃ kanyāṃ kṛta-kautuka-maṅgalām
analyzed: su snātām sudatīm kanyām kṛta kautukamaṅgalām

original: BhP_10.53.011/3 āhatāṃśuka-yugmena bhūṣitāṃ bhūṣaṇottamaiḥ
analyzed: āhata aṃśuka yugmena bhūṣitām bhūṣaṇa uttamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.012/1 cakruḥ sāma-rg-yajur-mantrair vadhvā rakṣāṃ dvijottamāḥ
analyzed: cakruḥ sāma ṛc yajuḥ mantraiḥ vadhvāḥ rakṣām dvijottamāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.012/3 purohito 'tharva-vid vai juhāva graha-śāntaye
analyzed: tharva vid vai juhāva graha śāntaye

original: BhP_10.53.013/1 hiraṇya-rūpya vāsāṃsi tilāṃś ca guḍa-miśritān
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpya vāsāṃsi tilān ca guḍa miśritān

original: BhP_10.53.013/3 prādād dhenūś ca viprebhyo rājā vidhi-vidāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: prādāt dhenūḥ ca viprebhyaḥ rājā vidhi vidām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.014/1 evaṃ cedi-patī rājā damaghoṣaḥ sutāya vai
analyzed: evam cedi patiḥ rājā damaghoṣaḥ sutāya vai

original: BhP_10.53.014/3 kārayām āsa mantra-jñaiḥ sarvam abhyudayocitam
analyzed: kārayām āsa mantra jñaiḥ sarvam abhyudaya ucitam

original: BhP_10.53.015/1 mada-cyudbhir gajānīkaiḥ syandanair hema-mālibhiḥ
analyzed: mada cyudbhiḥ gaja anīkaiḥ syandanaiḥ hema mālibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.015/3 patty-aśva-saṅkulaiḥ sainyaiḥ parītaḥ kuṇdīnaṃ yayau
analyzed: patti aśva saṅkulaiḥ sainyaiḥ parītaḥ kuṇdīnam yayau

original: BhP_10.53.016/1 taṃ vai vidarbhādhipatiḥ samabhyetyābhipūjya ca
analyzed: tam vai vidarbha adhipatiḥ samabhyetya abhipūjya ca

original: BhP_10.53.016/3 niveśayām āsa mudā kalpitānya-niveśane
analyzed: niveśayām āsa mudā kalpita anya niveśane

original: BhP_10.53.017/1 tatra śālvo jarāsandho dantavakro vidūrathaḥ
analyzed: tatra śālvaḥ jarāsandhaḥ dantavakraḥ vidūrathaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.017/3 ājagmuś caidya-pakṣīyāḥ pauṇḍrakādyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: ājagmuḥ caidya pakṣīyāḥ pauṇḍraka ādyāḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_10.53.018/1 kṛṣṇa-rāma-dviṣo yattāḥ kanyāṃ caidyāya sādhitum
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāma dviṣaḥ yattāḥ kanyām caidyāya sādhitum

original: BhP_10.53.018/3 yady āgatya haret kṛṣno rāmādyair yadubhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yadi āgatya haret kṛṣnaḥ rāma ādyaiḥ yadubhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.019/1 yotsyāmaḥ saṃhatās tena iti niścita-mānasāḥ
analyzed: yotsyāmaḥ saṃhatāḥ tena iti niścita mānasāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.019/3 ājagmur bhū-bhujaḥ sarve samagra-bala-vāhanāḥ
analyzed: ājagmuḥ bhūbhujaḥ sarve samagra bala vāhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.020/1 śrutvaitad bhagavān rāmo vipakṣīya nṛpodyamam
analyzed: śrutvā etat bhagavān rāmaḥ nṛpa udyamam

original: BhP_10.53.020/3 kṛṣṇaṃ caikaṃ gataṃ hartuṃ kanyāṃ kalaha-śaṅkitaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam ca ekam gatam hartum kanyām kalaha śaṅkitaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.021/1 balena mahatā sārdhaṃ bhrātṛ-sneha-pariplutaḥ
analyzed: balena mahatā sārdham bhrātṛ sneha pariplutaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.021/3 tvaritaḥ kuṇḍinaṃ prāgād gajāśva-ratha-pattibhiḥ
analyzed: tvaritaḥ kuṇḍinam prāgāt gaja aśva ratha pattibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.022/1 bhīṣma-kanyā varārohā kāṅkṣanty āgamanaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: bhīṣma kanyā varārohā kāṅkṣantī āgamanam hareḥ

original: BhP_10.53.022/3 pratyāpattim apaśyantī dvijasyācintayat tadā
analyzed: pratyāpattim a paśyantī dvijasya acintayat tadā

original: BhP_10.53.023/1 aho tri-yāmāntarita udvāho me 'lpa-rādhasaḥ
analyzed: aho tri yāma antaritaḥ udvāhaḥ me lpa rādhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.023/3 nāgacchaty aravindākṣo nāhaṃ vedmy atra kāraṇam
analyzed: na āgacchati aravinda akṣaḥ na aham vedmi atra kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.53.023/5 so 'pi nāvartate 'dyāpi mat-sandeśa-haro dvijaḥ
analyzed: saḥ pi nā āvartate mad sandeśa haraḥ dvijaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.024/1 api mayy anavadyātmā dṛṣṭvā kiñcij jugupsitam
analyzed: api mayi anavadya ātmā dṛṣṭvā kiñcid jugupsitam

original: BhP_10.53.024/3 mat-pāṇi-grahaṇe nūnaṃ nāyāti hi kṛtodyamaḥ
analyzed: mad pāṇigrahaṇe nūnam na āyāti hi kṛta udyamaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.025/1 durbhagāyā na me dhātā nānukūlo maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: durbhagāyāḥ na me dhātā na anukūlaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.53.025/3 devī vā vimukhī gaurī rudrāṇī girijā satī
analyzed: devī vā vimukhī gaurī rudrāṇī girijā satī

original: BhP_10.53.026/1 evaṃ cintayatī bālā govinda-hṛta-mānasā
analyzed: evam cintayatī bālā govinda hṛta mānasā

original: BhP_10.53.026/3 nyamīlayata kāla-jñā netre cāśru-kalākule
analyzed: nyamīlayata kāla jñā netre ca aśru kalā ākule

original: BhP_10.53.027/1 evaṃ vadhvāḥ pratīkṣantyā govindāgamanaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: evam vadhvāḥ pratīkṣantyāḥ govinda āgamanam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.53.027/3 vāma ūrur bhujo netram asphuran priya-bhāṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: vāmaḥ ūruḥ bhujaḥ netram asphuran priya bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.028/1 atha kṛṣṇa-vinirdiṣṭaḥ sa eva dvija-sattamaḥ
analyzed: atha kṛṣṇa vinirdiṣṭaḥ saḥ eva dvijasattamaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.028/3 antaḥpura-carīṃ devīṃ rāja-putrīm dadarśa ha
analyzed: antaḥpuracarīm devīm rāja putrīm dadarśa ha

original: BhP_10.53.029/1 sā taṃ prahṛṣṭa-vadanam avyagrātma-gatiṃ satī
analyzed: sā tam prahṛṣṭa vadanam avyagra ātma gatim satī

original: BhP_10.53.029/3 ālakṣya lakṣaṇābhijñā samapṛcchac chuci-smitā
analyzed: ālakṣya lakṣaṇa abhijñā samapṛcchat śuci smitā

original: BhP_10.53.030/1 tasyā āvedayat prāptaṃ śaśaṃsa yadu-nandanam
analyzed: tasyāḥ āvedayat prāptam śaśaṃsa yadunandanam

original: BhP_10.53.030/3 uktaṃ ca satya-vacanam ātmopanayanaṃ prati
analyzed: uktam ca satya vacanam ātma upanayanam prati

original: BhP_10.53.031/1 tam āgataṃ samājñāya vaidarbhī hṛṣṭa-mānasā
analyzed: tam āgatam samājñāya vaidarbhī hṛṣṭa mānasā

original: BhP_10.53.031/3 na paśyantī brāhmaṇāya priyam anyan nanāma sā
analyzed: na paśyantī brāhmaṇāya priyam anyat nanāma sā

original: BhP_10.53.032/1 prāptau śrutvā sva-duhitur udvāha-prekṣaṇotsukau
analyzed: prāptau śrutvā sva duhituḥ udvāha prekṣaṇa utsukau

original: BhP_10.53.032/3 abhyayāt tūrya-ghoṣeṇa rāma-kṛṣṇau samarhaṇaiḥ
analyzed: abhyayāt tūrya ghoṣeṇa rāma kṛṣṇau samarhaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.033/1 madhu-parkam upānīya vāsāṃsi virajāṃsi saḥ
analyzed: madhuparkam upānīya vāsāṃsi virajāṃsi saḥ

original: BhP_10.53.033/3 upāyanāny abhīṣṭāni vidhi-vat samapūjayat
analyzed: upāyanāni abhīṣṭāni vidhivat samapūjayat

original: BhP_10.53.034/1 tayor niveśanaṃ śrīmad upākalpya mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ niveśanam śrīmat upākalpya mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.034/3 sa-sainyayoḥ sānugayor ātithyaṃ vidadhe yathā
analyzed: sa sainyayoḥ sa anugayoḥ ātithyam vidadhe yathā

original: BhP_10.53.035/1 evaṃ rājñāṃ sametānāṃ yathā-vīryaṃ yathā-vayaḥ
analyzed: evam rājñām sametānām yathāvīryam yathāvayas

original: BhP_10.53.035/3 yathā-balaṃ yathā-vittaṃ sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ samarhayat
analyzed: yathābalam yathāvittam sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ samarhayat

original: BhP_10.53.036/1 kṛṣṇam āgatam ākarṇya vidarbha-pura-vāsinaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam āgatam ākarṇya vidarbha pura vāsinaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.036/3 āgatya netrāñjalibhiḥ papus tan-mukha-paṅkajam
analyzed: āgatya netra añjalibhiḥ papuḥ tad mukha paṅkajam

original: BhP_10.53.037/1 asyaiva bhāryā bhavituṃ rukmiṇy arhati nāparā
analyzed: asya eva bhāryā bhavitum rukmiṇī arhati na aparā

original: BhP_10.53.037/3 asāv apy anavadyātmā bhaiṣmyāḥ samucitaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: asau api anavadya ātmā bhaiṣmyāḥ samucitaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.038/1 kiñcit su-caritaṃ yan nas tena tuṣṭas tri-loka-kṛt
analyzed: kiñcid su caritam yat naḥ tena tuṣṭaḥ tri loka kṛt

original: BhP_10.53.038/3 anugṛhṇātu gṛhṇātu vaidarbhyāḥ pāṇim acyutaḥ
analyzed: anugṛhṇātu gṛhṇātu vaidarbhyāḥ pāṇim acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.039/1 evaṃ prema-kalā-baddhā vadanti sma puraukasaḥ
analyzed: evam prema kalā baddhāḥ vadanti sma puraukasaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.039/3 kanyā cāntaḥ-purāt prāgād bhaṭair guptāmbikālayam
analyzed: kanyā ca antaḥpurāt prāgāt bhaṭaiḥ guptā ambikālayam

original: BhP_10.53.040/1 padbhyāṃ viniryayau draṣṭuṃ bhavānyāḥ pāda-pallavam
analyzed: padbhyām viniryayau draṣṭum bhavānyāḥ pāda pallavam

original: BhP_10.53.040/3 sā cānudhyāyatī samyaṅ mukunda-caraṇāmbujam
analyzed: sā ca anudhyāyatī samyak mukunda caraṇa ambujam

original: BhP_10.53.041/1 yata-vāṅ mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ sakhībhiḥ parivāritā
analyzed: yata vāc mātṛbhiḥ sārdham sakhībhiḥ parivāritā

original: BhP_10.53.041/3 guptā rāja-bhaṭaiḥ śūraiḥ sannaddhair udyatāyudhaiḥ
analyzed: guptāḥ rāja bhaṭaiḥ śūraiḥ sannaddhaiḥ udyata āyudhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.041/5 mṛḍaṅga-śaṅkha-paṇavās tūrya-bheryaś ca jaghnire
analyzed: mṛḍaṅga śaṅkha paṇavāḥ tūrya bheryaḥ ca jaghnire

original: BhP_10.53.042/1 nānopahāra balibhir vāramukhyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: nānā upahāra balibhiḥ vāramukhyāḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_10.53.042/3 srag-gandha-vastrābharaṇair dvija-patnyaḥ sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: sraj gandha vastra ābharaṇaiḥ dvija patnyaḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.043/1 gāyantyaś ca stuvantaś ca gāyakā vādya-vādakāḥ
analyzed: gāyantyaḥ ca stuvantaḥ ca gāyakāḥ vādya vādakāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.043/3 parivārya vadhūṃ jagmuḥ sūta-māgadha-vandinaḥ
analyzed: parivārya vadhūm jagmuḥ sūta māgadha vandinaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.044/1 āsādya devī-sadanaṃ dhauta-pāda-karāmbujā
analyzed: āsādya devī sadanam dhauta pāda kara ambujā

original: BhP_10.53.044/3 upaspṛśya śuciḥ śāntā praviveśāmbikāntikam
analyzed: upaspṛśya śuciḥ śāntā praviveśa ambikā antikam

original: BhP_10.53.045/1 tāṃ vai pravayaso bālāṃ vidhi-jñā vipra-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: tām vai pravayasaḥ bālām vidhi jñāḥ vipra yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.045/3 bhavānīṃ vandayāṃ cakrur bhava-patnīṃ bhavānvitām
analyzed: bhavānīm cakruḥ bhava patnīm bhava anvitām

original: BhP_10.53.046/1 namasye tvāmbike 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sva-santāna-yutāṃ śivām
analyzed: namasye tvā ambike bhīkṣṇam sva santāna yutām śivām

original: BhP_10.53.046/3 bhūyāt patir me bhagavān kṛṣṇas tad anumodatām
analyzed: bhūyāt patiḥ me bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ tat anumodatām

original: BhP_10.53.047/1 adbhir gandhākṣatair dhūpair vāsaḥ-sraṅ-mālya bhūṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: adbhiḥ gandha akṣataiḥ dhūpaiḥ vāsaḥ sraj mālya bhūṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.53.047/3 nānopahāra-balibhiḥ pradīpāvalibhiḥ pṛthak
analyzed: nānā upahāra balibhiḥ pradīpa āvalibhiḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_10.53.048/1 vipra-striyaḥ patimatīs tathā taiḥ samapūjayat
analyzed: vipra striyaḥ patimatīḥ tathā taiḥ samapūjayat

original: BhP_10.53.048/3 lavaṇāpūpa-tāmbūla- kaṇṭha-sūtra-phalekṣubhiḥ
BhP_10.53.049/1 tasyai striyas tāḥ pradaduḥ śeṣāṃ yuyujur āśiṣaḥ
analyzed: tasyai striyaḥ tāḥ pradaduḥ śeṣām yuyujuḥ āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.049/3 tābhyo devyai namaś cakre śeṣāṃ ca jagṛhe vadhūḥ
analyzed: tābhyaḥ devyai namaḥ cakre śeṣām ca jagṛhe vadhūḥ

original: BhP_10.53.050/1 muni-vratam atha tyaktvā niścakrāmāmbikā-gṛhāt
analyzed: muni vratam atha tyaktvā niścakrāma ambikāgṛhāt

original: BhP_10.53.050/3 pragṛhya pāṇinā bhṛtyāṃ ratna-mudropaśobhinā
analyzed: pragṛhya pāṇinā bhṛtyām ratna mudrā upaśobhinā

original: BhP_10.53.051/1 tāṃ deva-māyām iva dhīra-mohinīṃ su-madhyamāṃ kuṇḍala-maṇḍitānanām
analyzed: tām deva māyām iva dhīra mohinīm sumadhyamām kuṇḍala maṇḍita ānanām

original: BhP_10.53.051/3 śyāmāṃ nitambārpita-ratna-mekhalāṃ vyañjat-stanīṃ kuntala-śaṅkitekṣaṇām
analyzed: śyāmām nitamba arpita ratna mekhalām vyañjat stanīm kuntala śaṅkita īkṣaṇām

original: BhP_10.53.052/1 śuci-smitāṃ bimba-phalādhara-dyuti- śoṇāyamāna-dvija-kunda-kuḍmalām
analyzed: śuci smitām bimba phala adhara dyuti śoṇāyamāna dvija kunda kuḍmalām

original: BhP_10.53.052/3 padā calantīṃ kala-haṃsa-gāminīṃ siñjat-kalā-nūpura-dhāma-śobhinā
analyzed: padā calantīm kalahaṃsa gāminīm siñjat kalā nūpura dhāma śobhinā

original: BhP_10.53.053/1 vilokya vīrā mumuhuḥ samāgatā yaśasvinas tat-kṛta-hṛc-chayārditāḥ
analyzed: vilokya vīrāḥ mumuhuḥ samāgatāḥ yaśasvinaḥ tad kṛta hṛcchaya arditāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.053/3 yāṃ vīkṣya te nṛpatayas tad udāra-hāsa- vrīdāvaloka-hṛta-cetasa ujjhitāstrāḥ
analyzed: yām vīkṣya te nṛpatayaḥ tat udāra hāsa vrīda avaloka hṛta cetasaḥ ujjhita astrāḥ

original: BhP_10.53.054/1 petuḥ kṣitau gaja-rathāśva-gatā vimūḍhā yātrā-cchalena haraye 'rpayatīṃ sva-śobhām
analyzed: petuḥ kṣitau gaja ratha aśva gatāḥ vimūḍhāḥ yātrā chalena haraye rpayatīm sva śobhām

original: BhP_10.53.054/3 saivaṃ śanaiś calayatī cala-padma-kośau prāptiṃ tadā bhagavataḥ prasamīkṣamāṇā
analyzed: sā evam śanais calayatī cala padma kośau prāptim tadā bhagavataḥ prasamīkṣamāṇā

original: BhP_10.53.055/1 utsārya vāma-karajair alakān apaṅgaiḥ prāptān hriyaikṣata nṛpān dadṛśe 'cyutaṃ ca
analyzed: utsārya vāma kara jaiḥ alakān apaṅgaiḥ prāptān hriyā aikṣata nṛpān dadṛśe cyutam ca

original: BhP_10.53.055/3 tāṃ rāja-kanyāṃ ratham ārurakṣatīṃ jahāra kṛṣṇo dviṣatāṃ samīkṣatām
analyzed: tām rāja kanyām ratham ārurakṣatīm jahāra kṛṣṇaḥ dviṣatām samīkṣatām

original: BhP_10.53.056/1 rathaṃ samāropya suparṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ rājanya-cakraṃ paribhūya mādhavaḥ
analyzed: ratham samāropya suparṇa lakṣaṇam rājanya cakram paribhūya mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.53.056/3 tato yayau rāma-purogamaḥ śanaiḥ śṛgāla-madhyād iva bhāga-hṛd dhariḥ
analyzed: tatas yayau rāma purogamaḥ śanais śṛgāla madhyāt iva bhāga hṛt hariḥ

original: BhP_10.53.057/1 taṃ māninaḥ svābhibhavaṃ yaśaḥ-kṣayaṃ
analyzed: tam māninaḥ sva abhibhavam yaśaḥ kṣayam

original: BhP_10.53.057/2 pare jarāsandha-mukhā na sehire
analyzed: pare jarāsandha mukhāḥ na sehire

original: BhP_10.53.057/3 aho dhig asmān yaśa ātta-dhanvanāṃ
analyzed: aho dhik asmān yaśaḥ ātta dhanvanām

original: BhP_10.53.057/4 gopair hṛtaṃ keśariṇāṃ mṛgair iva
analyzed: gopaiḥ hṛtam keśariṇām mṛgaiḥ iva

original: BhP_10.54.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.54.001/1 iti sarve su-saṃrabdhā vāhān āruhya daṃśitāḥ
analyzed: iti sarve su saṃrabdhāḥ vāhān āruhya daṃśitāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.001/3 svaiḥ svair balaiḥ parikrāntā anvīyur dhṛta-kārmukāḥ
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ balaiḥ parikrāntāḥ anvīyuḥ dhṛta kārmukāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.002/1 tān āpatata ālokya yādavānīka-yūthapāḥ
analyzed: tān āpatataḥ ālokya yādava anīka yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.002/3 tasthus tat-sammukhā rājan visphūrjya sva-dhanūṃṣi te
analyzed: tasthuḥ tad sammukhāḥ rājan visphūrjya sva dhanūṃṣi te

original: BhP_10.54.003/1 aśva-pṛṣṭhe gaja-skandhe rathopasthe 'stra kovidāḥ
analyzed: aśva pṛṣṭhe gaja skandhe rathopasthe stra kovidāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.003/3 mumucuḥ śara-varṣāṇi meghā adriṣv apo yathā
analyzed: mumucuḥ śara varṣāṇi meghāḥ adriṣu apaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.54.004/1 patyur balaṃ śarāsāraiś channaṃ vīkṣya su-madhyamā
analyzed: patyuḥ balam śara āsāraiḥ channam vīkṣya sumadhyamā

original: BhP_10.54.004/3 sa-vrīḍm aikṣat tad-vaktraṃ bhaya-vihvala-locanā
analyzed: sa vrīḍm aikṣat tad vaktram bhaya vihvala locanā

original: BhP_10.54.005/1 prahasya bhagavān āha mā sma bhair vāma-locane
analyzed: prahasya bhagavān āha mā sma bhaiḥ vāma locane

original: BhP_10.54.005/3 vinaṅkṣyaty adhunaivaitat tāvakaiḥ śātravaṃ balam
analyzed: vinaṅkṣyati adhunā eva etat tāvakaiḥ śātravam balam

original: BhP_10.54.006/1 teṣāṃ tad-vikramaṃ vīrā gada-saṅkarṣanādayaḥ
analyzed: teṣām tad vikramam vīrāḥ gada saṅkarṣana ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.006/3 amṛṣyamāṇā nārācair jaghnur haya-gajān rathān
analyzed: amṛṣyamāṇāḥ nārācaiḥ jaghnuḥ haya gajān rathān

original: BhP_10.54.007/1 petuḥ śirāṃsi rathinām aśvināṃ gajināṃ bhuvi
analyzed: petuḥ śirāṃsi rathinām aśvinām gajinām bhuvi

original: BhP_10.54.007/3 sa-kuṇḍala-kirīṭāni soṣṇīṣāṇi ca koṭiśaḥ
analyzed: sa kuṇḍala kirīṭāni sa uṣṇīṣāṇi ca koṭiśas

original: BhP_10.54.008/1 hastāḥ sāsi-gadeṣv-āsāḥ karabhā ūravo 'ṅghrayaḥ
analyzed: hastāḥ sa asi gadā iṣvāsāḥ karabhāḥ ūravaḥ ṅghrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.008/3 aśvāśvatara-nāgoṣṭra- khara-martya-śirāṃsi ca
analyzed: aśva aśvatara nāga uṣṭra khara martyaśirāṃsi ca

original: BhP_10.54.009/1 hanyamāna-balānīkā vṛṣṇibhir jaya-kāṅkṣibhiḥ
analyzed: hanyamāna bala anīkāḥ vṛṣṇibhiḥ jaya kāṅkṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.009/3 rājāno vimukhā jagmur jarāsandha-puraḥ-sarāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ vimukhāḥ jagmuḥ jarāsandha puraḥsarāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.010/1 śiśupālaṃ samabhyetya hṛta-dāram ivāturam
analyzed: śiśupālam samabhyetya hṛta dāram iva āturam

original: BhP_10.54.010/3 naṣṭa-tviṣaṃ gatotsāhaṃ śuṣyad-vadanam abruvan
analyzed: naṣṭa tviṣam gata utsāham śuṣyat vadanam abruvan

original: BhP_10.54.011/1 bho bhoḥ puruṣa-śārdūla daurmanasyam idaṃ tyaja
analyzed: bho bhoḥ puruṣa śārdūla daurmanasyam idam tyaja

original: BhP_10.54.011/3 na priyāpriyayo rājan niṣṭhā dehiṣu dṛśyate
analyzed: na priya apriyayoḥ rājan niṣṭhā dehiṣu dṛśyate

original: BhP_10.54.012/1 yathā dāru-mayī yoṣit nṛtyate kuhakecchayā
analyzed: yathā dāru mayī yoṣit nṛtyate kuhaka icchayā

original: BhP_10.54.012/3 evam īśvara-tantro 'yam īhate sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
analyzed: evam īśvara tantraḥ yam īhate sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: BhP_10.54.013/1 śaureḥ sapta-daśāhaṃ vai saṃyugāni parājitaḥ
analyzed: śaureḥ saptadaśa aham vai saṃyugāni parājitaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.013/3 trayo-viṃśatibhiḥ sainyair jigye ekam ahaṃ param
analyzed: trayoviṃśatibhiḥ sainyaiḥ jigye ekam aham param

original: BhP_10.54.014/1 tathāpy ahaṃ na śocāmi na prahṛṣyāmi karhicit
analyzed: tathā api aham na śocāmi na prahṛṣyāmi karhicit

original: BhP_10.54.014/3 kālena daiva-yuktena jānan vidrāvitaṃ jagat
analyzed: kālena daiva yuktena jānan vidrāvitam jagat

original: BhP_10.54.015/1 adhunāpi vayaṃ sarve vīra-yūthapa-yūthapāḥ
analyzed: adhunā api vayam sarve vīra yūthapa yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.015/3 parājitāḥ phalgu-tantrair yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇa-pālitaiḥ
analyzed: parājitāḥ phalgu tantraiḥ yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇa pālitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.016/1 ripavo jigyur adhunā kāla ātmānusāriṇi
analyzed: ripavaḥ jigyuḥ adhunā kāle ātma anusāriṇi

original: BhP_10.54.016/3 tadā vayaṃ vijeṣyāmo yadā kālaḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tadā vayam vijeṣyāmaḥ yadā kālaḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.017/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.54.017/1 evaṃ prabodhito mitraiś caidyo 'gāt sānugaḥ puram
analyzed: evam prabodhitaḥ mitraiḥ caidyaḥ gāt sa anugaḥ puram

original: BhP_10.54.017/3 hata-śeṣāḥ punas te 'pi yayuḥ svaṃ svaṃ puraṃ nṛpāḥ
analyzed: hata śeṣāḥ punar te pi yayuḥ svam svam puram nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.018/1 rukmī tu rākṣasodvāhaṃ kṛṣṇa-dviḍ asahan svasuḥ
analyzed: rukmī tu rākṣasa udvāham kṛṣṇa dviṣ asahan svasuḥ

original: BhP_10.54.018/3 pṛṣṭhato 'nvagamat kṛṣṇam akṣauhiṇyā vṛto balī
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas nvagamat kṛṣṇam akṣauhiṇyā vṛtaḥ balī

original: BhP_10.54.019/1 rukmy amarṣī su-saṃrabdhaḥ śṛṇvatāṃ sarva-bhūbhujām
analyzed: rukmī amarṣī su saṃrabdhaḥ śṛṇvatām sarva bhūbhujām

original: BhP_10.54.019/3 pratijajñe mahā-bāhur daṃśitaḥ sa-śarāsanaḥ
analyzed: pratijajñe mahā bāhuḥ daṃśitaḥ sa śarāsanaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.020/1 ahatvā samare kṛṣṇam apratyūhya ca rukmiṇīm
analyzed: a hatvā samare kṛṣṇam a pratyūhya ca rukmiṇīm

original: BhP_10.54.020/3 kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmi satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
analyzed: kuṇḍinam na pravekṣyāmi satyam etat bravīmi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.021/1 ity uktvā ratham āruhya sārathiṃ prāha satvaraḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā ratham āruhya sārathim prāha sa tvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.54.021/3 codayāśvān yataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tasya me saṃyugaṃ bhavet
analyzed: codaya aśvān yatas kṛṣṇaḥ tasya me saṃyugam bhavet

original: BhP_10.54.022/1 adyāhaṃ niśitair bāṇair gopālasya su-durmateḥ
analyzed: adya aham niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ gopālasya su durmateḥ

original: BhP_10.54.022/3 neṣye vīrya-madaṃ yena svasā me prasabhaṃ hṛtā
analyzed: neṣye vīrya madam yena svasā me prasabham hṛtā

original: BhP_10.54.023/1 vikatthamānaḥ kumatir īśvarasyāpramāṇa-vit
analyzed: vikatthamānaḥ kumatiḥ īśvarasya apramāṇa vid

original: BhP_10.54.023/3 rathenaikena govindaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭhety athāhvayat
analyzed: rathena ekena govindam tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti atha āhvayat

original: BhP_10.54.024/1 dhanur vikṛṣya su-dṛḍhaṃ jaghne kṛṣṇaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
analyzed: dhanuḥ vikṛṣya su dṛḍham jaghne kṛṣṇam tribhiḥ śaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.024/3 āha cātra kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha yadūnāṃ kula-pāṃsana
analyzed: āha ca atra kṣaṇam tiṣṭha yadūnām kula pāṃsana

original: BhP_10.54.025/1 yatra yāsi svasāraṃ me muṣitvā dhvāṅkṣa-vad dhaviḥ
analyzed: yatra yāsi svasāram me muṣitvā dhvāṅkṣa vat haviḥ

original: BhP_10.54.025/3 hariṣye 'dya madaṃ manda māyinaḥ kūṭa-yodhinaḥ
analyzed: hariṣye dya madam manda māyinaḥ kūṭa yodhinaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.026/1 yāvan na me hato bāṇaiḥ śayīthā muñca dārīkām
analyzed: yāvat na me hataḥ bāṇaiḥ śayīthāḥ muñca dārīkām

original: BhP_10.54.026/3 smayan kṛṣṇo dhanuś chittvā ṣaḍbhir vivyādha rukmiṇam
analyzed: smayan kṛṣṇaḥ dhanuḥ chittvā ṣaḍbhiḥ vivyādha rukmiṇam

original: BhP_10.54.027/1 aṣṭabhiś caturo vāhān dvābhyāṃ sūtaṃ dhvajaṃ tribhiḥ
analyzed: aṣṭabhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān dvābhyām sūtam dhvajam tribhiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.027/3 sa cānyad dhanur ādhāya kṛṣṇaṃ vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: sa ca anyat dhanuḥ ādhāya kṛṣṇam vivyādha pañcabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.028/1 tais tāditaḥ śaraughais tu ciccheda dhanur acyutaḥ
analyzed: taiḥ tāditaḥ śara oghaiḥ tu ciccheda dhanuḥ acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.028/3 punar anyad upādatta tad apy acchinad avyayaḥ
analyzed: punar anyat upādatta tat api acchinat avyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.029/1 parighaṃ paṭṭiśaṃ śūlaṃ carmāsī śakti-tomarau
analyzed: parigham paṭṭiśam śūlam carma āsī śakti tomarau

original: BhP_10.54.029/3 yad yad āyudham ādatta tat sarvaṃ so 'cchinad dhariḥ
analyzed: yat yat āyudham ādatta tat sarvam saḥ chinat hariḥ

original: BhP_10.54.030/1 tato rathād avaplutya khaḍga-pāṇir jighāṃsayā
analyzed: tatas rathāt avaplutya khaḍga pāṇiḥ jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.54.030/3 kṛṣṇam abhyadravat kruddhaḥ pataṅga iva pāvakam
analyzed: kṛṣṇam abhyadravat kruddhaḥ pataṅgaḥ iva pāvakam

original: BhP_10.54.031/1 tasya cāpatataḥ khaḍgaṃ tilaśaś carma ceṣubhiḥ
analyzed: tasya ca āpatataḥ khaḍgam tilaśas carma ca iṣubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.031/3 chittvāsim ādade tigmaṃ rukmiṇaṃ hantum udyataḥ
analyzed: chittvā asim ādade tigmam rukmiṇam hantum udyataḥ

original: BhP_10.54.032/1 dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛ-vadhodyogaṃ rukmiṇī bhaya-vihvalā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛ vadha udyogam rukmiṇī bhaya vihvalā

original: BhP_10.54.032/3 patitvā pādayor bhartur uvāca karuṇaṃ satī
analyzed: patitvā pādayoḥ bhartuḥ uvāca karuṇam satī

original: BhP_10.54.033/0 śrī-rukmiṇy uvāca
analyzed: śrī rukmiṇī uvāca

original: BhP_10.54.033/1 yogeśvarāprameyātman deva-deva jagat-pate
analyzed: yogeśvara aprameya ātman devadeva jagatpate

original: BhP_10.54.033/3 hantuṃ nārhasi kalyāṇa bhrātaraṃ me mahā-bhuja
analyzed: hantum nā arhasi kalyāṇa bhrātaram me mahā bhuja

original: BhP_10.54.034/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.54.034/1 tayā paritrāsa-vikampitāṅgayā śucāvaśuṣyan-mukha-ruddha-kaṇṭhayā
analyzed: tayā paritrāsa vikampita aṅgayā śucā avaśuṣyat mukha ruddha kaṇṭhayā

original: BhP_10.54.034/3 kātarya-visraṃsita-hema-mālayā gṛhīta-pādaḥ karuṇo nyavartata
analyzed: kātarya visraṃsita hema mālayā gṛhīta pādaḥ karuṇaḥ nyavartata

original: BhP_10.54.035/1 cailena baddhvā tam asādhu-kārīṇaṃ sa-śmaśru-keśaṃ pravapan vyarūpayat
analyzed: cailena baddhvā tam a sādhu kārīṇam sa śmaśru keśam pravapan vyarūpayat

original: BhP_10.54.035/3 tāvan mamarduḥ para-sainyam adbhutaṃ yadu-pravīrā nalinīṃ yathā gajāḥ
analyzed: tāvat mamarduḥ para sainyam adbhutam yadu pravīrāḥ nalinīm yathā gajāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.036/1 kṛṣṇāntikam upavrajya dadṛśus tatra rukmiṇam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa antikam upavrajya dadṛśuḥ tatra rukmiṇam

original: BhP_10.54.036/3 tathā-bhūtaṃ hata-prāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṅkarṣaṇo vibhuḥ
analyzed: tathābhūtam hata prāyam dṛṣṭvā saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.54.036/5 vimucya baddhaṃ karuṇo bhagavān kṛṣṇam abravīt
analyzed: vimucya baddham karuṇaḥ bhagavān kṛṣṇam abravīt

original: BhP_10.54.037/1 asādhv idaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa kṛtam asmaj-jugupsitam
analyzed: asādhu idam tvayā kṛṣṇa kṛtam asmad jugupsitam

original: BhP_10.54.037/3 vapanaṃ śmaśru-keśānāṃ vairūpyaṃ suhṛdo vadhaḥ
analyzed: vapanam śmaśru keśānām vairūpyam suhṛdaḥ vadhaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.038/1 maivāsmān sādhvy asūyethā bhrātur vairūpya-cintayā
analyzed: mā eva asmān sādhvi asūyethāḥ bhrātuḥ vairūpya cintayā

original: BhP_10.54.038/3 sukha-duḥkha-do na cānyo 'sti yataḥ sva-kṛta-bhuk pumān
analyzed: sukha duḥkha daḥ na ca anyaḥ sti yatas sva kṛta bhuj pumān

original: BhP_10.54.039/1 bandhur vadhārha-doṣo 'pi na bandhor vadham arhati
analyzed: bandhuḥ na bandhoḥ vadham arhati

original: BhP_10.54.039/3 tyājyaḥ svenaiva doṣeṇa hataḥ kiṃ hanyate punaḥ
analyzed: tyājyaḥ svena eva doṣeṇa hataḥ kim hanyate punar

original: BhP_10.54.040/1 kṣatriyāṇām ayaṃ dharmaḥ prajāpati-vinirmitaḥ
analyzed: kṣatriyāṇām ayam dharmaḥ prajāpati vinirmitaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.040/3 bhrātāpi bhrātaraṃ hanyād yena ghoratamas tataḥ
analyzed: bhrātā api bhrātaram hanyāt yena ghoratamaḥ tatas

original: BhP_10.54.041/1 rājyasya bhūmer vittasya striyo mānasya tejasaḥ
analyzed: rājyasya bhūmeḥ vittasya striyaḥ mānasya tejasaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.041/3 mānino 'nyasya vā hetoḥ śrī-madāndhāḥ kṣipanti hi
analyzed: māninaḥ nyasya vā hetoḥ śrī mada andhāḥ kṣipanti hi

original: BhP_10.54.042/1 taveyaṃ viṣamā buddhiḥ sarva-bhūteṣu durhṛdām
analyzed: tava iyam viṣamā buddhiḥ sarva bhūteṣu durhṛdām

original: BhP_10.54.042/3 yan manyase sadābhadraṃ suhṛdāṃ bhadram ajña-vat
analyzed: yat manyase sadā abhadram suhṛdām bhadram ajña vat

original: BhP_10.54.043/1 ātma-moho nṛṇām eva kalpate deva-māyayā
analyzed: ātma mohaḥ nṛṇām eva kalpate deva māyayā

original: BhP_10.54.043/3 suhṛd durhṛd udāsīna iti dehātma-māninām
analyzed: suhṛd durhṛd udāsīnaḥ iti deha ātma māninām

original: BhP_10.54.044/1 eka eva paro hy ātmā sarveṣām api dehinām
analyzed: ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā sarveṣām api dehinām

original: BhP_10.54.044/3 nāneva gṛhyate mūḍhair yathā jyotir yathā nabhaḥ
analyzed: nānā iva gṛhyate mūḍhaiḥ yathā jyotiḥ yathā nabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.045/1 deha ādy-antavān eṣa dravya-prāṇa-guṇātmakaḥ
BhP_10.54.045/3 ātmany avidyayā kḷptaḥ saṃsārayati dehinam
analyzed: ātmani avidyayā kḷptaḥ saṃsārayati dehinam

original: BhP_10.54.046/1 nātmano 'nyena saṃyogo viyogaś casataḥ sati
analyzed: na ātmanaḥ nyena saṃyogaḥ viyogaḥ ca sataḥ sati

original: BhP_10.54.046/3 tad-dhetutvāt tat-prasiddher dṛg-rūpābhyāṃ yathā raveḥ
analyzed: tad hetu tvāt tad prasiddheḥ dṛś rūpābhyām yathā raveḥ

original: BhP_10.54.047/1 janmādayas tu dehasya vikriyā nātmanaḥ kvacit
analyzed: janma ādayaḥ tu dehasya vikriyāḥ na ātmanaḥ kvacid

original: BhP_10.54.047/3 kalānām iva naivendor mṛtir hy asya kuhūr iva
analyzed: kalānām iva nā evā indoḥ mṛtiḥ hi asya kuhūḥ iva

original: BhP_10.54.048/1 yathā śayāna ātmānaṃ viṣayān phalam eva ca
analyzed: yathā śayānaḥ ātmānam viṣayān phalam eva ca

original: BhP_10.54.048/3 anubhuṅkte 'py asaty arthe tathāpnoty abudho bhavam
analyzed: anubhuṅkte pi asati arthe tathā āpnoti abudhaḥ bhavam

original: BhP_10.54.049/1 tasmād ajñāna-jaṃ śokam ātma-śoṣa-vimohanam
analyzed: tasmāt ajñāna jam śokam ātma śoṣa vimohanam

original: BhP_10.54.049/3 tattva-jñānena nirhṛtya sva-sthā bhava śuci-smite
analyzed: tattva jñānena nirhṛtya svasthā bhava śuci smite

original: BhP_10.54.050/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.54.050/1 evaṃ bhagavatā tanvī rāmeṇa pratibodhitā
analyzed: evam bhagavatā tanvī rāmeṇa pratibodhitā

original: BhP_10.54.050/3 vaimanasyaṃ parityajya mano buddhyā samādadhe
analyzed: vaimanasyam parityajya manaḥ buddhyā samādadhe

original: BhP_10.54.051/1 prāṇāvaśeṣa utsṛṣṭo dviḍbhir hata-bala-prabhaḥ
analyzed: prāṇa avaśeṣaḥ utsṛṣṭaḥ dviḍbhiḥ hata bala prabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.051/3 smaran virūpa-karaṇaṃ vitathātma-manorathaḥ
analyzed: smaran virūpa karaṇam vitatha ātma manorathaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.051/5 cakre bhojakaṭaṃ nāma nivāsāya mahat puram
analyzed: cakre bhojakaṭam nāma nivāsāya mahat puram

original: BhP_10.54.052/1 ahatvā durmatiṃ kṛṣṇam apratyūhya yavīyasīm
analyzed: a hatvā durmatim kṛṣṇam a pratyūhya yavīyasīm

original: BhP_10.54.052/3 kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmīty uktvā tatrāvasad ruṣā
analyzed: kuṇḍinam na pravekṣyāmi iti uktvā tatra avasat ruṣā

original: BhP_10.54.053/1 bhagavān bhīṣmaka-sutām evaṃ nirjitya bhūmi-pān
analyzed: bhagavān bhīṣmaka sutām evam nirjitya bhūmipān

original: BhP_10.54.053/3 puram ānīya vidhi-vad upayeme kurūdvaha
analyzed: puram ānīya vidhivat upayeme kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.54.054/1 tadā mahotsavo nṝṇāṃ yadu-puryāṃ gṛhe gṛhe
analyzed: tadā mahā utsavaḥ nṝṇām yadu puryām gṛhe gṛhe

original: BhP_10.54.054/3 abhūd ananya-bhāvānāṃ kṛṣṇe yadu-patau nṛpa
analyzed: abhūt ananya bhāvānām kṛṣṇe yadupatau nṛpa

original: BhP_10.54.055/1 narā nāryaś ca muditāḥ pramṛṣṭa-maṇi-kuṇḍalāḥ
analyzed: narāḥ nāryaḥ ca muditāḥ pramṛṣṭa maṇi kuṇḍalāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.055/3 pāribarham upājahrur varayoś citra-vāsasoḥ
analyzed: pāribarham upājahruḥ varayoḥ citra vāsasoḥ

original: BhP_10.54.056/1 sā vṛṣṇi-pury uttambhitendra-ketubhir
analyzed: sā vṛṣṇi purī uttambhitā indra ketubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.056/2 vicitra-mālyāmbara-ratna-toraṇaiḥ
analyzed: vicitra mālya ambara ratna toraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.056/3 babhau prati-dvāry upakḷpta-maṅgalair
analyzed: babhau pratidvāri upakḷpta maṅgalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.056/4 āpūrṇa-kumbhāguru-dhūpa-dīpakaiḥ
analyzed: āpūrṇa kumbha aguru dhūpa dīpakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.54.057/1 sikta-mārgā mada-cyudbhir āhūta-preṣṭha-bhūbhujām
analyzed: sikta mārgāḥ mada cyudbhiḥ āhūta preṣṭha bhūbhujām

original: BhP_10.54.057/3 gajair dvāḥsu parāmṛṣṭa- rambhā-pūgopaśobhitā
analyzed: gajaiḥ dvāḥsu parāmṛṣṭa rambhā pūga upaśobhitā

original: BhP_10.54.058/1 kuru-sṛñjaya-kaikeya- vidarbha-yadu-kuntayaḥ
analyzed: kuru sṛñjaya kaikeya vidarbha yadu kuntayaḥ

original: BhP_10.54.058/3 mitho mumudire tasmin sambhramāt paridhāvatām
analyzed: mithas mumudire tasmin sambhramāt paridhāvatām

original: BhP_10.54.059/1 rukmiṇyā haraṇaṃ śrutvā gīyamānaṃ tatas tataḥ
analyzed: rukmiṇyāḥ haraṇam śrutvā gīyamānam tatas tatas

original: BhP_10.54.059/3 rājāno rāja-kanyāś ca babhūvur bhṛśa-vismitāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ rāja kanyāḥ ca babhūvuḥ bhṛśa vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.54.060/1 dvārakāyām abhūd rājan mahā-modaḥ puraukasām
analyzed: dvārakāyām abhūt rājan mahā modaḥ puraukasām

original: BhP_10.54.060/3 rukmiṇyā ramayopetaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇaṃ śriyaḥ patim
analyzed: rukmiṇyā ramayā upetam dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam śriyaḥ patim

original: BhP_10.55.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.55.001/1 kāmas tu vāsudevāṃśo dagdhaḥ prāg rudra-manyunā
analyzed: kāmaḥ tu vāsudeva aṃśaḥ dagdhaḥ prāk rudra manyunā

original: BhP_10.55.001/3 dehopapattaye bhūyas tam eva pratyapadyata
analyzed: deha upapattaye bhūyas tam eva pratyapadyata

original: BhP_10.55.002/1 sa eva jāto vaidarbhyāṃ kṛṣṇa-vīrya-samudbhavaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva jātaḥ vaidarbhyām kṛṣṇa vīrya samudbhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.002/3 pradyumna iti vikhyātaḥ sarvato 'navamaḥ pituḥ
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ sarvatas navamaḥ pituḥ

original: BhP_10.55.003/1 taṃ śambaraḥ kāma-rūpī hṛtvā tokam anirdaśam
analyzed: tam śambaraḥ kāmarūpī hṛtvā tokam anirdaśam

original: BhP_10.55.003/3 sa viditvātmanaḥ śatruṃ prāsyodanvaty agād gṛham
analyzed: sa viditvā ātmanaḥ śatrum prāsya udanvati agāt gṛham

original: BhP_10.55.004/1 taṃ nirjagāra balavān mīnaḥ so 'py aparaiḥ saha
analyzed: tam nirjagāra balavān mīnaḥ saḥ u pi aparaiḥ saha

original: BhP_10.55.004/3 vṛto jālena mahatā gṛhīto matsya-jīvibhiḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ jālena mahatā gṛhītaḥ matsya jīvibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.55.005/1 taṃ śambarāya kaivartā upājahrur upāyanam
analyzed: tam śambarāya kaivartāḥ upājahruḥ upāyanam

original: BhP_10.55.005/3 sūdā mahānasaṃ nītvā- vadyan sudhitinādbhutam
analyzed: sūdāḥ mahānasam nītvā vadyan sudhitinā adbhutam

original: BhP_10.55.006/1 dṛṣṭvā tad-udare bālam māyāvatyai nyavedayan
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tad udare bālam māyāvatyai nyavedayan

original: BhP_10.55.006/3 nārado 'kathayat sarvaṃ tasyāḥ śaṅkita-cetasaḥ
analyzed: nārado kathayat sarvam tasyāḥ śaṅkita cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.006/5 bālasya tattvam utpattiṃ matsyodara-niveśanam
analyzed: bālasya tattvam utpattim matsya udara niveśanam

original: BhP_10.55.007/1 sā ca kāmasya vai patnī ratir nāma yaśasvinī
analyzed: sā ca kāmasya vai patnī ratiḥ nāma yaśasvinī

original: BhP_10.55.007/3 patyur nirdagdha-dehasya dehotpattim pratīkṣatī
analyzed: patyuḥ nirdagdha dehasya deha utpattim pratīkṣatī

original: BhP_10.55.008/1 nirūpitā śambareṇa sā sūdaudana-sādhane
analyzed: nirūpitā śambareṇa sā sūda odana sādhane

original: BhP_10.55.008/3 kāmadevaṃ śiśuṃ buddhvā cakre snehaṃ tadārbhake
analyzed: kāmadevam śiśum buddhvā cakre sneham tadā arbhake

original: BhP_10.55.009/1 nāti-dīrgheṇa kālena sa kārṣṇi rūḍha-yauvanaḥ
analyzed: na ati dīrgheṇa kālena sa kārṣṇi rūḍha yauvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.009/3 janayām āsa nārīṇāṃ vīkṣantīnāṃ ca vibhramam
analyzed: janayām āsa nārīṇām vīkṣantīnām ca vibhramam

original: BhP_10.55.010/1 sā tam patiṃ padma-dalāyatekṣaṇaṃ pralamba-bāhuṃ nara-loka-sundaram
analyzed: sā tam patim padma dala āyata īkṣaṇam pralamba bāhum nara loka sundaram

original: BhP_10.55.010/3 sa-vrīḍa-hāsottabhita-bhruvekṣatī prītyopatasthe ratir aṅga saurataiḥ
analyzed: sa vrīḍa hāsa uttabhita bhruvā īkṣatī prītyā upatasthe ratiḥ aṅga saurataiḥ

original: BhP_10.55.011/1 tām aha bhagavān kārṣṇir mātas te matir anyathā
analyzed: tām aha bhagavān kārṣṇiḥ mātar te matiḥ anyathā

original: BhP_10.55.011/3 mātṛ-bhāvam atikramya vartase kāminī yathā
analyzed: mātṛ bhāvam atikramya vartase kāminī yathā

original: BhP_10.55.012/0 ratir uvāca
analyzed: ratiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.55.012/1 bhavān nārāyaṇa-sutaḥ śambareṇa hṛto gṛhāt
analyzed: bhavān nārāyaṇa sutaḥ śambareṇa hṛtaḥ gṛhāt

original: BhP_10.55.012/3 ahaṃ te 'dhikṛtā patnī ratiḥ kāmo bhavān prabho
analyzed: aham te dhikṛtā patnī ratiḥ kāmaḥ bhavān prabho

original: BhP_10.55.013/1 eṣa tvānirdaśaṃ sindhāv akṣipac chambaro 'suraḥ
analyzed: eṣa tvā anirdaśam sindhau akṣipat śambaraḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_10.55.013/3 matsyo 'grasīt tad-udarād itaḥ prāpto bhavān prabho
analyzed: matsyaḥ grasīt tad udarāt itas prāptaḥ bhavān prabho

original: BhP_10.55.014/1 tam imaṃ jahi durdharṣaṃ durjayaṃ śatrum ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tam imam jahi durdharṣam durjayam śatrum ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.014/3 māyā-śata-vidaṃ taṃ ca māyābhir mohanādibhiḥ
analyzed: māyā śata vidam tam ca māyābhiḥ mohana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.55.015/1 parīśocati te mātā kurarīva gata-prajā
analyzed: parīśocati te mātā kurarī iva gata prajā

original: BhP_10.55.015/3 putra-snehākulā dīnā vivatsā gaur ivāturā
analyzed: putra sneha ākulā dīnā vivatsā gauḥ iva āturā

original: BhP_10.55.016/1 prabhāṣyaivaṃ dadau vidyāṃ pradyumnāya mahātmane
analyzed: prabhāṣya evam dadau vidyām pradyumnāya mahātmane

original: BhP_10.55.016/3 māyāvatī mahā-māyāṃ sarva-māyā-vināśinīm
BhP_10.55.017/1 sa ca śambaram abhyetya saṃyugāya samāhvayat
analyzed: sa ca śambaram abhyetya saṃyugāya samāhvayat

original: BhP_10.55.017/3 aviṣahyais tam ākṣepaiḥ kṣipan sañjanayan kalim
analyzed: aviṣahyaiḥ tam ākṣepaiḥ kṣipan san janayan kalim

original: BhP_10.55.018/1 so 'dhikṣipto durvācobhiḥ padāhata ivoragaḥ
analyzed: saḥ dhikṣiptaḥ durvācobhiḥ pada āhataḥ iva uragaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.018/3 niścakrāma gadā-pāṇir amarṣāt tāmra-locanaḥ
analyzed: niścakrāma gadā pāṇiḥ amarṣāt tāmra locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.019/1 gadām āvidhya tarasā pradyumnāya mahātmane
analyzed: gadām āvidhya tarasā pradyumnāya mahātmane

original: BhP_10.55.019/3 prakṣipya vyanadan nādaṃ vajra-niṣpeṣa-niṣṭhuram
analyzed: prakṣipya vyanadat nādam vajra niṣpeṣa niṣṭhuram

original: BhP_10.55.020/1 tām āpatantīṃ bhagavān pradyumno gadayā gadām
analyzed: tām āpatantīm bhagavān pradyumnaḥ gadayā gadām

original: BhP_10.55.020/3 apāsya śatrave kruddhaḥ prāhiṇot sva-gadāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: apāsya śatrave kruddhaḥ prāhiṇot sva gadām nṛpa

original: BhP_10.55.021/1 sa ca māyāṃ samāśritya daiteyīṃ maya-darśitam
analyzed: sa ca māyām samāśritya daiteyīm maya darśitam

original: BhP_10.55.021/3 mumuce 'stra-mayaṃ varṣaṃ kārṣṇau vaihāyaso 'suraḥ
analyzed: mumuce stra mayam varṣam kārṣṇau vaihāyasau suraḥ

original: BhP_10.55.022/1 bādhyamāno 'stra-varṣeṇa raukmiṇeyo mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: bādhyamānaḥ stra varṣeṇa raukmiṇeyaḥ mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.022/3 sattvātmikāṃ mahā-vidyāṃ sarva-māyopamardinīm
analyzed: sattva ātmikām mahā vidyām sarva māyā upamardinīm

original: BhP_10.55.023/1 tato gauhyaka-gāndharva- paiśācoraga-rākṣasīḥ
analyzed: tatas gauhyaka gāndharva paiśāca uraga rākṣasīḥ

original: BhP_10.55.023/3 prāyuṅkta śataśo daityaḥ kārṣṇir vyadhamayat sa tāḥ
analyzed: prāyuṅkta śataśas daityaḥ kārṣṇiḥ vyadhamayat sa tāḥ

original: BhP_10.55.024/1 niśātam asim udyamya sa-kirīṭaṃ sa-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: niśātam asim udyamya sa kirīṭam sa kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.55.024/3 śambarasya śiraḥ kāyāt tāmra-śmaśrv ojasāharat
analyzed: śambarasya śiraḥ kāyāt tāmra śmaśru ojasā aharat

original: BhP_10.55.025/1 ākīryamāṇo divi-jaiḥ stuvadbhiḥ kusumotkaraiḥ
analyzed: ākīryamāṇaḥ divijaiḥ stuvadbhiḥ kusuma utkaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.55.025/3 bhāryayāmbara-cāriṇyā puraṃ nīto vihāyasā
analyzed: bhāryayā ambara cāriṇyā puram nītaḥ vihāyasā

original: BhP_10.55.026/1 antaḥ-pura-varaṃ rājan lalanā-śata-saṅkulam
analyzed: antaḥpura varam rājan lalanā śata saṅkulam

original: BhP_10.55.026/3 viveśa patnyā gaganād vidyuteva balāhakaḥ
analyzed: viveśa patnyā gaganāt vidyutā iva balāhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.027/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā jalada-śyāmaṃ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā jalada śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam

original: BhP_10.55.027/3 pralamba-bāhuṃ tāmrākṣaṃ su-smitaṃ rucirānanam
analyzed: pralamba bāhum tāmra akṣam su smitam rucira ānanam

original: BhP_10.55.028/1 sv-alaṅkṛta-mukhāmbhojaṃ nīla-vakrālakālibhiḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛta mukha ambhojam nīla vakra alaka ālibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.55.028/3 kṛṣṇaṃ matvā striyo hrītā nililyus tatra tatra ha
analyzed: kṛṣṇam matvā striyaḥ hrītāḥ nililyuḥ tatra tatra ha

original: BhP_10.55.029/1 avadhārya śanair īṣad vailakṣaṇyena yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: avadhārya śanais īṣat vailakṣaṇyena yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.029/3 upajagmuḥ pramuditāḥ sa-strī ratnaṃ su-vismitāḥ
analyzed: upajagmuḥ pramuditāḥ sa strī ratnam su vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.55.030/1 atha tatrāsitāpāṅgī vaidarbhī valgu-bhāṣiṇī
analyzed: atha tatra asitāpāṅgī vaidarbhī valgu bhāṣiṇī

original: BhP_10.55.030/3 asmarat sva-sutaṃ naṣṭaṃ sneha-snuta-payodharā
analyzed: asmarat sva sutam naṣṭam sneha snuta payodharā

original: BhP_10.55.031/1 ko nv ayam nara-vaidūryaḥ kasya vā kamalekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu ayam nara vaidūryaḥ kasya vā kamala īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.031/3 dhṛtaḥ kayā vā jaṭhare keyaṃ labdhā tv anena vā
analyzed: dhṛtaḥ kayā vā jaṭhare kā iyam labdhā tu anena vā

original: BhP_10.55.032/1 mama cāpy ātmajo naṣṭo nīto yaḥ sūtikā-gṛhāt
analyzed: mama ca api ātmajaḥ naṣṭaḥ nītaḥ yaḥ sūtikāgṛhāt

original: BhP_10.55.032/3 etat-tulya-vayo-rūpo yadi jīvati kutracit
analyzed: etad tulya vayaḥ rūpaḥ yadi jīvati kutracid

original: BhP_10.55.033/1 kathaṃ tv anena samprāptaṃ sārūpyaṃ śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ
analyzed: katham tu anena samprāptam sārūpyam śārṅgadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.033/3 ākṛtyāvayavair gatyā svara-hāsāvalokanaiḥ
analyzed: ākṛtyā avayavaiḥ gatyā svara hāsa avalokanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.55.034/1 sa eva vā bhaven nūnaṃ yo me garbhe dhṛto 'rbhakaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva vā bhavet nūnam yaḥ me garbhe dhṛtaḥ ṛbhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.034/3 amuṣmin prītir adhikā vāmaḥ sphurati me bhujaḥ
analyzed: amuṣmin prītiḥ adhikā vāmaḥ sphurati me bhujaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.035/1 evaṃ mīmāṃsamaṇāyāṃ vaidarbhyāṃ devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: evam mīmāṃsamaṇāyām vaidarbhyām devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.035/3 devaky-ānakadundubhyām uttamaḥ-śloka āgamat
analyzed: devakī ānakadundubhyām uttamaḥ ślokaḥ āgamat

original: BhP_10.55.036/1 vijñātārtho 'pi bhagavāṃs tūṣṇīm āsa janārdanaḥ
analyzed: vijñāta arthaḥ pi bhagavān tūṣṇīm āsa janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.036/3 nārado 'kathayat sarvaṃ śambarāharaṇādikam
analyzed: kathayat sarvam śambara āharaṇa ādikam

original: BhP_10.55.037/1 tac chrutvā mahad āścaryaṃ kṛṣṇāntaḥ-pura-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā mahat āścaryam kṛṣṇa antaḥpura yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.037/3 abhyanandan bahūn abdān naṣṭaṃ mṛtam ivāgatam
analyzed: abhyanandan bahūn abdān naṣṭam mṛtam iva āgatam

original: BhP_10.55.038/1 devakī vasudevaś ca kṛṣṇa-rāmau tathā striyaḥ
analyzed: devakī vasudevaḥ ca kṛṣṇa rāmau tathā striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.038/3 dampatī tau pariṣvajya rukmiṇī ca yayur mudam
analyzed: dampatī tau pariṣvajya rukmiṇī ca yayuḥ mudam

original: BhP_10.55.039/1 naṣṭaṃ pradyumnam āyātam ākarṇya dvārakaukasaḥ
analyzed: naṣṭam pradyumnam āyātam ākarṇya dvārakā okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.55.039/3 aho mṛta ivāyāto bālo diṣṭyeti hābruvan
analyzed: aho mṛtaḥ iva āyātaḥ bālaḥ diṣṭyā iti ha abruvan

original: BhP_10.55.040/1 yaṃ vai muhuḥ pitṛ-sarūpa-nijeśa-bhāvās
analyzed: yam vai muhur pitṛ sarūpa nija īśa bhāvāḥ

original: BhP_10.55.040/2 tan-mātaro yad abhajan raha-rūḍha-bhāvāḥ
analyzed: tad mātaraḥ yat abhajan raha rūḍha bhāvāḥ

original: BhP_10.55.040/3 citraṃ na tat khalu ramāspada-bimba-bimbe
analyzed: citram na tat khalu rama āspada bimba bimbe

original: BhP_10.55.040/4 kāme smare 'kṣa-viṣaye kim utānya-nāryaḥ
analyzed: kāme smare kṣa viṣaye kim uta anya nāryaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.56.001/1 satrājitaḥ sva-tanayāṃ kṛṣṇāya kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: satrājitaḥ sva tanayām kṛṣṇāya kṛta kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.001/3 syamantakena maṇinā svayam udyamya dattavān
analyzed: syamantakena maṇinā svayam udyamya dattavān

original: BhP_10.56.002/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.56.002/1 satrājitaḥ kim akarod brahman kṛṣṇasya kilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: satrājitaḥ kim akarot brahman kṛṣṇasya kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.002/3 syamantakaḥ kutas tasya kasmād dattā sutā hareḥ
analyzed: syamantakaḥ kutas tasya kasmāt dattā sutā hareḥ

original: BhP_10.56.003/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.56.003/1 āsīt satrājitaḥ sūryo bhaktasya paramaḥ sakhā
analyzed: āsīt satrājitaḥ sūryaḥ bhaktasya paramaḥ sakhā

original: BhP_10.56.003/3 prītas tasmai maṇiṃ prādāt sa ca tuṣṭaḥ syamantakam
analyzed: prītaḥ tasmai maṇim prādāt sa ca tuṣṭaḥ syamantakam

original: BhP_10.56.004/1 sa taṃ bibhran maṇiṃ kaṇṭhe bhrājamāno yathā raviḥ
analyzed: sa tam bibhran maṇim kaṇṭhe bhrājamānaḥ yathā raviḥ

original: BhP_10.56.004/3 praviṣṭo dvārakāṃ rājan tejasā nopalakṣitaḥ
analyzed: praviṣṭaḥ dvārakām rājan tejasā na upalakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.005/1 taṃ vilokya janā dūrāt tejasā muṣṭa-dṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: tam vilokya janāḥ dūrāt tejasā muṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.005/3 dīvyate 'kṣair bhagavate śaśaṃsuḥ sūrya-śaṅkitāḥ
analyzed: dīvyate kṣaiḥ bhagavate śaśaṃsuḥ sūrya śaṅkitāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.006/1 nārāyaṇa namas te 'stu śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dhara
analyzed: nārāyaṇa namaḥ te stu śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: BhP_10.56.006/3 dāmodarāravindākṣa govinda yadu-nandana
analyzed: dāmodara aravinda akṣa govinda yadu nandana

original: BhP_10.56.007/1 eṣa āyāti savitā tvāṃ didṛkṣur jagat-pate
analyzed: eṣaḥ āyāti savitā tvām didṛkṣuḥ jagatpate

original: BhP_10.56.007/3 muṣṇan gabhasti-cakreṇa nṛṇāṃ cakṣūṃṣi tigma-guḥ
analyzed: muṣṇan gabhasti cakreṇa nṛṇām cakṣūṃṣi tigma guḥ

original: BhP_10.56.008/1 nanv anvicchanti te mārgaṃ trī-lokyāṃ vibudharṣabhāḥ
analyzed: nanu anvicchanti te mārgam trīlokyām vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.008/3 jñātvādya gūḍhaṃ yaduṣu draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ yāty ajaḥ prabho
analyzed: jñātvā adya gūḍham yaduṣu draṣṭum tvām yāti ajaḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.56.009/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.56.009/1 niśamya bāla-vacanaṃ prahasyāmbuja-locanaḥ
analyzed: niśamya bāla vacanam prahasya ambuja locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.009/3 prāha nāsau ravir devaḥ satrājin maṇinā jvalan
analyzed: prāha na asau raviḥ devaḥ satrājit maṇinā jvalan

original: BhP_10.56.010/1 satrājit sva-gṛhaṃ śrīmat kṛta-kautuka-maṅgalam
analyzed: satrājit sva gṛham śrīmat kṛta kautukamaṅgalam

original: BhP_10.56.010/3 praviśya deva-sadane maṇiṃ viprair nyaveśayat
analyzed: praviśya deva sadane maṇim vipraiḥ nyaveśayat

original: BhP_10.56.011/1 dine dine svarṇa-bhārān aṣṭau sa sṛjati prabho
analyzed: dine dine svarṇa bhārān aṣṭau sa sṛjati prabho

original: BhP_10.56.011/3 durbhikṣa-māry-ariṣṭāni sarpādhi-vyādhayo 'śubhāḥ
analyzed: durbhikṣam ārya ariṣṭāni śubhāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.011/5 na santi māyinas tatra yatrāste 'bhyarcito maṇiḥ
analyzed: na santi māyinaḥ tatra yatra āste bhyarcitaḥ maṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.56.012/1 sa yācito maṇiṃ kvāpi yadu-rājāya śauriṇā
analyzed: sa yācitaḥ maṇim kvāpi yadu rājāya śauriṇā

original: BhP_10.56.012/3 naivārtha-kāmukaḥ prādād yācñā-bhaṅgam atarkayan
analyzed: na eva artha kāmukaḥ prādāt yācñā bhaṅgam a tarkayan

original: BhP_10.56.013/1 tam ekadā maṇiṃ kaṇṭhe pratimucya mahā-prabham
analyzed: tam ekadā maṇim kaṇṭhe pratimucya mahā prabham

original: BhP_10.56.013/3 praseno hayam āruhya mṛgāyāṃ vyacarad vane
analyzed: prasenaḥ hayam āruhya mṛgāyām vyacarat vane

original: BhP_10.56.014/1 prasenaṃ sa-hayaṃ hatvā maṇim ācchidya keśarī
analyzed: prasenam sa hayam hatvā maṇim ācchidya keśarī

original: BhP_10.56.014/3 giriṃ viśan jāmbavatā nihato maṇim icchatā
analyzed: girim viśan jāmbavatā nihataḥ maṇim icchatā

original: BhP_10.56.015/1 so 'pi cakre kumārasya maṇiṃ krīḍanakaṃ bile
analyzed: saḥ pi cakre kumārasya maṇim krīḍanakam bile

original: BhP_10.56.015/3 apaśyan bhrātaraṃ bhrātā satrājit paryatapyata
analyzed: apaśyan bhrātaram bhrātā satrājit paryatapyata

original: BhP_10.56.016/1 prāyaḥ kṛṣṇena nihato maṇi-grīvo vanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: prāyas kṛṣṇena nihataḥ maṇigrīvaḥ vanam gataḥ

original: BhP_10.56.016/3 bhrātā mameti tac chrutvā karṇe karṇe 'japan janāḥ
analyzed: bhrātā mama iti tat śrutvā karṇe karṇe japan janāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.017/1 bhagavāṃs tad upaśrutya duryaśo liptam ātmani
analyzed: bhagavān tat upaśrutya duryaśaḥ liptam ātmani

original: BhP_10.56.017/3 mārṣṭuṃ prasena-padavīm anvapadyata nāgaraiḥ
analyzed: mārṣṭum prasena padavīm anvapadyata nāgaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.56.018/1 hataṃ prasenaṃ aśvaṃ ca vīkṣya keśariṇā vane
analyzed: hatam prasenam aśvam ca vīkṣya keśariṇā vane

original: BhP_10.56.018/3 taṃ cādri-pṛṣṭhe nihatam ṛkṣeṇa dadṛśur janāḥ
analyzed: tam ca adri pṛṣṭhe nihatam ṛkṣeṇa dadṛśuḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.019/1 ṛkṣa-rāja-bilaṃ bhīmam andhena tamasāvṛtam
analyzed: ṛkṣa rāja bilam bhīmam andhena tamasā āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.56.019/3 eko viveśa bhagavān avasthāpya bahiḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: ekaḥ viveśa bhagavān avasthāpya bahis prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.020/1 tatra dṛṣṭvā maṇi-preṣṭhaṃ bāla-krīḍanakaṃ kṛtam
analyzed: tatra dṛṣṭvā maṇi preṣṭham bāla krīḍanakam kṛtam

original: BhP_10.56.020/3 hartuṃ kṛta-matis tasminn avatasthe 'rbhakāntike
analyzed: hartum kṛta matiḥ tasmin avatasthe ṛbhaka antike

original: BhP_10.56.021/1 tam apūrvaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrī cukrośa bhīta-vat
analyzed: tam apūrvam naram dṛṣṭvā dhātrī cukrośa bhīta vat

original: BhP_10.56.021/3 tac chrutvābhyadravat kruddho jāmbavān balināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā abhyadravat kruddhaḥ jāmbavān balinām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.022/1 sa vai bhagavatā tena yuyudhe svāmīnātmanaḥ
analyzed: sa vai bhagavatā tena yuyudhe svāmīn ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.022/3 puruṣam prākṛtaṃ matvā kupito nānubhāva-vit
analyzed: puruṣam prākṛtam matvā kupitaḥ na anubhāva vid

original: BhP_10.56.023/1 dvandva-yuddhaṃ su-tumulam ubhayor vijigīṣatoḥ
analyzed: dvandva yuddham su tumulam ubhayoḥ vijigīṣatoḥ

original: BhP_10.56.023/3 āyudhāśma-drumair dorbhiḥ kravyārthe śyenayor iva
analyzed: āyudha aśma drumaiḥ dorbhiḥ kravya arthe śyenayoḥ iva

original: BhP_10.56.024/1 āsīt tad aṣṭā-vimśāham itaretara-muṣṭibhiḥ
analyzed: āsīt tat aṣṭāvimśa aham itaretara muṣṭibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.56.024/3 vajra-niṣpeṣa-paruṣair aviśramam ahar-niśam
analyzed: vajra niṣpeṣa paruṣaiḥ aviśramam aharniśam

original: BhP_10.56.025/1 kṛṣṇa-muṣṭi-viniṣpāta niṣpiṣṭāṅgoru bandhanaḥ
BhP_10.56.025/3 kṣīṇa-sattvaḥ svinna-gātras tam āhātīva vismitaḥ
analyzed: kṣīṇa sattvaḥ svinna gātraḥ tam āha atīva vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.026/1 jāne tvāṃ saṛva-bhūtānāṃ prāṇa ojaḥ saho balam
analyzed: jāne tvām sa ṛva bhūtānām prāṇaḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ balam

original: BhP_10.56.026/3 viṣṇuṃ purāṇa-puruṣaṃ prabhaviṣṇum adhīśvaram
analyzed: viṣṇum purāṇapuruṣam prabhaviṣṇum adhīśvaram

original: BhP_10.56.027/1 tvaṃ hi viśva-sṛjām sraṣṭā sṛṣṭānām api yac ca sat
analyzed: tvam hi viśvasṛjām sraṣṭā sṛṣṭānām api yat ca sat

original: BhP_10.56.027/3 kālaḥ kalayatām īśaḥ para ātmā tathātmanām
analyzed: kālaḥ kalayatām īśaḥ paraḥ ātmā tathā ātmanām

original: BhP_10.56.028/1 yasyeṣad-utkalita-roṣa-kaṭākṣa-mokṣair
analyzed: yasya īṣat utkalita roṣa kaṭākṣa mokṣaiḥ

original: BhP_10.56.028/2 vartmādiśat kṣubhita-nakra-timiṅgalo 'bdhiḥ
analyzed: vartma ādiśat kṣubhita nakra timiṅgalaḥ bdhiḥ

original: BhP_10.56.028/3 setuḥ kṛtaḥ sva-yaśa ujjvalitā ca laṅkā
analyzed: setuḥ kṛtaḥ sva yaśaḥ ujjvalitā ca laṅkā

original: BhP_10.56.028/4 rakṣaḥ-śirāṃsi bhuvi petur iṣu-kṣatāni
analyzed: rakṣaḥ śirāṃsi bhuvi petuḥ iṣu kṣatāni

original: BhP_10.56.029/1 iti vijñāta-viijñānam ṛkṣa-rājānam acyutaḥ
analyzed: iti ṛkṣa rājānam acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.029/3 vyājahāra mahā-rāja bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: vyājahāra mahā rāja bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.030/1 abhimṛśyāravindākṣaḥ pāṇinā śaṃ-kareṇa tam
analyzed: abhimṛśya aravinda akṣaḥ pāṇinā śaṃkareṇa tam

original: BhP_10.56.030/3 kṛpayā parayā bhaktaṃ megha-gambhīrayā girā
analyzed: kṛpayā parayā bhaktam megha gambhīrayā girā

original: BhP_10.56.031/1 maṇi-hetor iha prāptā vayam ṛkṣa-pate bilam
analyzed: maṇi hetoḥ iha prāptāḥ vayam ṛkṣa pate bilam

original: BhP_10.56.031/3 mithyābhiśāpaṃ pramṛjann ātmano maṇināmunā
analyzed: mithyā abhiśāpam pramṛjan ātmanaḥ maṇinā amunā

original: BhP_10.56.032/1 ity uktaḥ svāṃ duhitaraṃ kanyāṃ jāmbavatīṃ mudā
analyzed: iti uktaḥ svām duhitaram kanyām jāmbavatīm mudā

original: BhP_10.56.032/3 arhaṇārtham sa maṇinā kṛṣṇāyopajahāra ha
analyzed: arhaṇa artham sa maṇinā kṛṣṇāya upajahāra ha

original: BhP_10.56.033/1 adṛṣṭvā nirgamaṃ śaureḥ praviṣṭasya bilaṃ janāḥ
analyzed: a dṛṣṭvā nirgamam śaureḥ praviṣṭasya bilam janāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.033/3 pratīkṣya dvādaśāhāni duḥkhitāḥ sva-puraṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: pratīkṣya dvādaśa ahāni duḥkhitāḥ sva puram yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.56.034/1 niśamya devakī devī rakmiṇy ānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: niśamya devakī devī rakmiṇī ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.56.034/3 suhṛdo jñātayo 'śocan bilāt kṛṣṇam anirgatam
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ jñātayaḥ śocan bilāt kṛṣṇam anirgatam

original: BhP_10.56.035/1 satrājitaṃ śapantas te duḥkhitā dvārakaukasaḥ
analyzed: satrājitam śapantaḥ te duḥkhitāḥ dvārakā okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.035/3 upatasthuś candrabhāgāṃ durgāṃ kṛṣṇopalabdhaye
analyzed: upatasthuḥ candrabhāgām durgām kṛṣṇa upalabdhaye

original: BhP_10.56.036/1 teṣāṃ tu devy-upasthānāt pratyādiṣṭāśiṣā sa ca
analyzed: teṣām tu devī upasthānāt pratyādiṣṭa āśiṣā sa ca

original: BhP_10.56.036/3 prādurbabhūva siddhārthaḥ sa-dāro harṣayan hariḥ
analyzed: prādurbabhūva siddhārthaḥ sa dāraḥ harṣayan hariḥ

original: BhP_10.56.037/1 upalabhya hṛṣīkeśaṃ mṛtaṃ punar ivāgatam
analyzed: upalabhya hṛṣīkeśam mṛtam punar iva āgatam

original: BhP_10.56.037/3 saha patnyā maṇi-grīvaṃ sarve jāta-mahotsavāḥ
analyzed: saha patnyā maṇigrīvam sarve jāta mahā utsavāḥ

original: BhP_10.56.038/1 satrājitaṃ samāhūya sabhāyāṃ rāja-sannidhau
analyzed: satrājitam samāhūya sabhāyām rāja sannidhau

original: BhP_10.56.038/3 prāptiṃ cākhyāya bhagavān maṇiṃ tasmai nyavedayat
analyzed: prāptim ca ākhyāya bhagavān maṇim tasmai nyavedayat

original: BhP_10.56.039/1 sa cāti-vrīḍito ratnaṃ gṛhītvāvāṅ-mukhas tataḥ
analyzed: sa ca ati vrīḍitaḥ ratnam gṛhītvā avāṅmukhaḥ tatas

original: BhP_10.56.039/3 anutapyamāno bhavanam agamat svena pāpmanā
analyzed: anutapyamānaḥ bhavanam agamat svena pāpmanā

original: BhP_10.56.040/1 so 'nudhyāyaṃs tad evāghaṃ balavad-vigrahākulaḥ
analyzed: saḥ nu dhyāyan tat eva agham balavat vigraha ākulaḥ

original: BhP_10.56.040/3 kathaṃ mṛjāmy ātma-rajaḥ prasīded vācyutaḥ katham
analyzed: katham mṛjāmi ātma rajaḥ prasīdet vā acyutaḥ katham

original: BhP_10.56.041/1 kim kṛtvā sādhu mahyaṃ syān na śaped vā jano yathā
analyzed: kim kṛtvā sādhu mahyam syāt na śapet vā janaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.56.041/3 adīrgha-darśanaṃ kṣudraṃ mūḍhaṃ draviṇa-lolupam
analyzed: a dīrgha darśanam kṣudram mūḍham draviṇa lolupam

original: BhP_10.56.042/1 dāsye duhitaraṃ tasmai strī-ratnaṃ ratnam eva ca
analyzed: dāsye duhitaram tasmai strī ratnam ratnam eva ca

original: BhP_10.56.042/3 upāyo 'yaṃ samīcīnas tasya śāntir na cānyathā
analyzed: upāyaḥ yam samīcīnaḥ tasya śāntiḥ na ca anyathā

original: BhP_10.56.043/1 evaṃ vyavasito buddhyā satrājit sva-sutāṃ śubhām
analyzed: evam vyavasitaḥ buddhyā satrājit sva sutām śubhām

original: BhP_10.56.043/3 maṇiṃ ca svayam udyamya kṛṣṇāyopajahāra ha
analyzed: maṇim ca svayam udyamya kṛṣṇāya upajahāra ha

original: BhP_10.56.044/1 tāṃ satyabhāmāṃ bhagavān upayeme yathā-vidhi
analyzed: tām satyabhāmām bhagavān upayeme yathāvidhi

original: BhP_10.56.044/3 bahubhir yācitāṃ śīla- rūpaudārya-guṇānvitām
analyzed: bahubhiḥ yācitām śīla rūpa audārya guṇa anvitām

original: BhP_10.56.045/1 bhagavān āha na maṇiṃ pratīcchāmo vayaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: bhagavān āha na maṇim pratīcchāmaḥ vayam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.56.045/3 tavāstāṃ deva-bhaktasya vayaṃ ca phala-bhāginaḥ
analyzed: tava āstām deva bhaktasya vayam ca phala bhāginaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.57.001/1 vijñātārtho 'pi govindo dagdhān ākarṇya pāṇḍavān
analyzed: vijñāta arthaḥ pi govindaḥ dagdhān ākarṇya pāṇḍavān

original: BhP_10.57.001/3 kuntīṃ ca kulya-karaṇe saha-rāmo yayau kurūn
analyzed: kuntīm ca kulya karaṇe saharāmaḥ yayau kurūn

original: BhP_10.57.002/1 bhīṣmaṃ kṛpaṃ sa viduraṃ gāndhārīṃ droṇam eva ca
analyzed: bhīṣmam kṛpam sa viduram gāndhārīm droṇam eva ca

original: BhP_10.57.002/3 tulya-duḥkhau ca saṅgamya hā kaṣṭam iti hocatuḥ
analyzed: tulya duḥkhau ca saṅgamya hā kaṣṭam iti ha ūcatuḥ

original: BhP_10.57.003/1 labdhvaitad antaraṃ rājan śatadhanvānam ūcatuḥ
analyzed: labdhvā etat antaram rājan śatadhanvānam ūcatuḥ

original: BhP_10.57.003/3 akrūra-kṛtavarmāṇau maniḥ kasmān na gṛhyate
analyzed: akrūra kṛtavarmāṇau maniḥ kasmāt na gṛhyate

original: BhP_10.57.004/1 yo 'smabhyaṃ sampratiśrutya kanyā-ratnaṃ vigarhya naḥ
analyzed: yaḥ smabhyam sampratiśrutya kanyā ratnam vigarhya naḥ

original: BhP_10.57.004/3 kṛṣṇāyādān na satrājit kasmād bhrātaram anviyāt
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya adāt na satrājit kasmāt bhrātaram anviyāt

original: BhP_10.57.005/1 evaṃ bhinna-matis tābhyāṃ satrājitam asattamaḥ
analyzed: evam bhinna matiḥ tābhyām satrājitam asattamaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.005/3 śayānam avadhīl lobhāt sa pāpaḥ kṣīṇa jīvitaḥ
analyzed: śayānam avadhīt lobhāt sa pāpaḥ kṣīṇa jīvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.006/1 strīṇāṃ vikrośamānānāṃ krandantīnām anātha-vat
analyzed: strīṇām vikrośamānānām krandantīnām anātha vat

original: BhP_10.57.006/3 hatvā paśūn saunika-van maṇim ādāya jagmivān
analyzed: hatvā paśūn saunika vat maṇim ādāya jagmivān

original: BhP_10.57.007/1 satyabhāmā ca pitaraṃ hataṃ vīkṣya śucārpitā
analyzed: satyabhāmā ca pitaram hatam vīkṣya śucā arpitā

original: BhP_10.57.007/3 vyalapat tāta tāteti hā hatāsmīti muhyatī
analyzed: vyalapat tāta tāta iti hā hatā asmi iti muhyatī

original: BhP_10.57.008/1 taila-droṇyāṃ mṛtaṃ prāsya jagāma gajasāhvayam
analyzed: taila droṇyām mṛtam prāsya jagāma gajasāhvayam

original: BhP_10.57.008/3 kṛṣṇāya viditārthāya taptācakhyau pitur vadham
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya vidita arthāya taptā ācakhyau pituḥ vadham

original: BhP_10.57.009/1 tad ākarṇyeśvarau rājann anusṛtya nṛ-lokatām
analyzed: tat ākarṇya īśvarau rājan anusṛtya nṛ loka tām

original: BhP_10.57.009/3 aho naḥ paramaṃ kaṣṭam ity asrākṣau vilepatuḥ
analyzed: aho naḥ paramam kaṣṭam iti asra akṣau vilepatuḥ

original: BhP_10.57.010/1 āgatya bhagavāṃs tasmāt sa-bhāryaḥ sāgrajaḥ puram
analyzed: āgatya bhagavān tasmāt sa bhāryaḥ sa agrajaḥ puram

original: BhP_10.57.010/3 śatadhanvānam ārebhe hantuṃ hartuṃ maṇiṃ tataḥ
analyzed: śatadhanvānam ārebhe hantum hartum maṇim tatas

original: BhP_10.57.011/1 so 'pi kṛtodyamaṃ jñātvā bhītaḥ prāṇa-parīpsayā
analyzed: saḥ pi kṛta udyamam jñātvā bhītaḥ prāṇa parīpsayā

original: BhP_10.57.011/3 sāhāyye kṛtavarmāṇam ayācata sa cābravīt
analyzed: sāhāyye kṛtavarmāṇam ayācata sa ca abravīt

original: BhP_10.57.012/1 nāham īsvarayoḥ kuryāṃ helanaṃ rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: na aham ī svarayoḥ kuryām helanam rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.57.012/3 ko nu kṣemāya kalpeta tayor vṛjinam ācaran
analyzed: kaḥ nu kṣemāya kalpeta tayoḥ vṛjinam ācaran

original: BhP_10.57.013/1 kaṃsaḥ sahānugo 'pīto yad-dveṣāt tyājitaḥ śriyā
analyzed: kaṃsaḥ pītaḥ yad dveṣāt tyājitaḥ śriyā

original: BhP_10.57.013/3 jarāsandhaḥ saptadaśa- saṃyugād viratho gataḥ
analyzed: jarāsandhaḥ saptadaśa saṃyugāt virathaḥ gataḥ

original: BhP_10.57.014/1 pratyākhyātaḥ sa cākrūraṃ pārṣṇi-grāham ayācata
analyzed: pratyākhyātaḥ sa ca akrūram pārṣṇigrāham ayācata

original: BhP_10.57.014/3 so 'py āha ko virudhyeta vidvān īśvarayor balam
analyzed: saḥ u pi āha kaḥ virudhyeta vidvān īśvarayoḥ balam

original: BhP_10.57.015/1 ya idaṃ līlayā viśvaṃ sṛjaty avati hanti ca
analyzed: yaḥ idam līlayā viśvam sṛjati avati hanti ca

original: BhP_10.57.015/3 ceṣṭāṃ viśva-sṛjo yasya na vidur mohitājayā
analyzed: ceṣṭām viśvasṛjaḥ yasya na viduḥ mohita ājayā

original: BhP_10.57.016/1 yaḥ sapta-hāyanaḥ śailam utpāṭyaikena pāṇinā
analyzed: yaḥ sapta hāyanaḥ śailam utpāṭya ekena pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.57.016/3 dadhāra līlayā bāla ucchilīndhram ivārbhakaḥ
analyzed: dadhāra līlayā bālaḥ ucchilīndhram iva arbhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.017/1 namas tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāyādbhuta-karmaṇe
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya adbhuta karmaṇe

original: BhP_10.57.017/3 anantāyādi-bhūtāya kūṭa-sthāyātmane namaḥ
analyzed: anantāya ādi bhūtāya kūṭasthāya ātmane namaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.018/1 pratyākhyātaḥ sa tenāpi śatadhanvā mahā-maṇim
analyzed: pratyākhyātaḥ sa tena api śatadhanvā mahā maṇim

original: BhP_10.57.018/3 tasmin nyasyāśvam āruhya śata-yojana-gaṃ yayau
analyzed: tasmin nyasya aśvam āruhya śata yojana gam yayau

original: BhP_10.57.019/1 garuḍa-dhvajam āruhya rathaṃ rāma-janārdanau
analyzed: garuḍa dhvajam āruhya ratham rāma janārdanau

original: BhP_10.57.019/3 anvayātāṃ mahā-vegair aśvai rājan guru-druham
analyzed: anvayātām mahā vegaiḥ aśvaiḥ rājan guru druham

original: BhP_10.57.020/1 mithilāyām upavane visṛjya patitaṃ hayam
analyzed: mithilāyām upavane visṛjya patitam hayam

original: BhP_10.57.020/3 padbhyām adhāvat santrastaḥ kṛṣṇo 'py anvadravad ruṣā
analyzed: padbhyām adhāvat santrastaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pi anvadravat ruṣā

original: BhP_10.57.021/1 padāter bhagavāṃs tasya padātis tigma-neminā
analyzed: padāteḥ bhagavān tasya padātiḥ tigmaneminā

original: BhP_10.57.021/3 cakreṇa śira utkṛtya vāsasor vyacinon maṇim
analyzed: cakreṇa śiraḥ utkṛtya vāsasoḥ vyacinot maṇim

original: BhP_10.57.022/1 alabdha-maṇir āgatya kṛṣṇa āhāgrajāntikam
analyzed: alabdha maṇiḥ āgatya kṛṣṇaḥ āha agraja antikam

original: BhP_10.57.022/3 vṛthā hataḥ śatadhanur maṇis tatra na vidyate
analyzed: vṛthā hataḥ śatadhanuḥ maṇiḥ tatra na vidyate

original: BhP_10.57.023/1 tata āha balo nūnaṃ sa maṇiḥ śatadhanvanā
analyzed: tatas āha balaḥ nūnam sa maṇiḥ śatadhanvanā

original: BhP_10.57.023/3 kasmiṃścit puruṣe nyastas tam anveṣa puraṃ vraja
analyzed: kasmiṃścid puruṣe nyastaḥ tam anveṣa puram vraja

original: BhP_10.57.024/1 ahaṃ vaideham icchāmi draṣṭuṃ priyatamaṃ mama
analyzed: aham vaideham icchāmi draṣṭum priyatamam mama

original: BhP_10.57.024/3 ity uktvā mithilāṃ rājan viveśa yada-nandanaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā mithilām rājan viveśa yada nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.025/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya maithilaḥ prīta-mānasaḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya maithilaḥ prīta mānasaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.025/3 arhayāṃ āsa vidhi-vad arhaṇīyaṃ samarhaṇaiḥ
analyzed: arhayāṃ āsa vidhivat arhaṇīyam samarhaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.57.026/1 uvāsa tasyāṃ katicin mithilāyāṃ samā vibhuḥ
analyzed: uvāsa tasyām katicid mithilāyām samāḥ vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.57.026/3 mānitaḥ prīti-yuktena janakena mahātmanā
analyzed: mānitaḥ prīti yuktena janakena mahātmanā

original: BhP_10.57.026/5 tato 'śikṣad gadāṃ kāle dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ
analyzed: śikṣat gadām kāle dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.027/1 keśavo dvārakām etya nidhanaṃ śatadhanvanaḥ
analyzed: keśavaḥ dvārakām etya nidhanam śatadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.027/3 aprāptiṃ ca maṇeḥ prāha priyāyāḥ priya-kṛd vibhuḥ
analyzed: aprāptim ca maṇeḥ prāha priyāyāḥ priya kṛt vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.57.028/1 tataḥ sa kārayām āsa kriyā bandhor hatasya vai
analyzed: tatas sa kārayām āsa kriyāḥ bandhoḥ hatasya vai

original: BhP_10.57.028/3 sākaṃ suhṛdbhir bhagavān yā yāḥ syuḥ sāmparāyikīḥ
analyzed: sākam suhṛdbhiḥ bhagavān yāḥ yāḥ syuḥ sāmparāyikīḥ

original: BhP_10.57.029/1 akrūraḥ kṛtavarmā ca śrutvā śatadhanor vadham
analyzed: akrūraḥ kṛtavarmā ca śrutvā śatadhanoḥ vadham

original: BhP_10.57.029/3 vyūṣatur bhaya-vitrastau dvārakāyāḥ prayojakau
analyzed: vyūṣatuḥ bhaya vitrastau dvārakāyāḥ prayojakau

original: BhP_10.57.030/1 akrūre proṣite 'riṣṭāny āsan vai dvārakaukasām
analyzed: akrūre proṣite riṣṭāni āsan vai dvārakā okasām

original: BhP_10.57.030/3 śārīrā mānasās tāpā muhur daivika-bhautikāḥ
analyzed: śārīrāḥ mānasāḥ tāpāḥ muhur daivika bhautikāḥ

original: BhP_10.57.031/1 ity aṅgopadiśanty eke vismṛtya prāg udāhṛtam
analyzed: iti aṅga upadiśanti eke vismṛtya prāk udāhṛtam

original: BhP_10.57.031/3 muni-vāsa-nivāse kiṃ ghaṭetāriṣṭa-darśanam
analyzed: muni vāsa nivāse kim ghaṭeta ariṣṭa darśanam

original: BhP_10.57.032/1 deve 'varṣati kāśīśaḥ śvaphalkāyāgatāya vai
analyzed: deve varṣati kāsīśaḥ śvaphalkāya āgatāya vai

original: BhP_10.57.032/3 sva-sutāṃ gāṇdinīṃ prādāt tato 'varṣat sma kāśiṣu
analyzed: sva sutām gāṇdinīm prādāt tatas varṣat sma kāśiṣu

original: BhP_10.57.033/1 tat-sutas tat-prabhāvo 'sāv akrūro yatra yatra ha
analyzed: tad sutaḥ saḥ akrūraḥ yatra yatra ha

original: BhP_10.57.033/3 devo 'bhivarṣate tatra nopatāpā na mārīkāḥ
analyzed: devaḥ bhivarṣate tatra na upatāpāḥ na mārīkāḥ

original: BhP_10.57.034/1 iti vṛddha-vacaḥ śrutvā naitāvad iha kāraṇam
analyzed: iti vṛddha vacaḥ śrutvā na etāvat iha kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.57.034/3 iti matvā samānāyya prāhākrūraṃ janārdanaḥ
analyzed: iti matvā samānāyya prāha akrūram janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.035/1 pūjayitvābhibhāṣyainaṃ kathayitvā priyāḥ kathāḥ
analyzed: pūjayitvā abhibhāṣya enam kathayitvā priyāḥ kathāḥ

original: BhP_10.57.035/3 vijñatākhila-citta jñaḥ smayamāna uvāca ha
analyzed: vijña tā akhila citta jñaḥ smayamānaḥ uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.57.036/1 nanu dāna-pate nyastas tvayy āste śatadhanvanā
analyzed: nanu dānapate nyastaḥ tvayi āste śatadhanvanā

original: BhP_10.57.036/3 syamantako maniḥ śrīmān viditaḥ pūrvam eva naḥ
analyzed: syamantakaḥ maniḥ śrīmān viditaḥ pūrvam eva naḥ

original: BhP_10.57.037/1 satrājito 'napatyatvād gṛhṇīyur duhituḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: satrājitaḥ napatya tvāt gṛhṇīyuḥ duhituḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_10.57.037/3 dāyaṃ ninīyāpaḥ piṇḍān vimucyarṇaṃ ca śeṣitam
analyzed: dāyam ninīya apaḥ piṇḍān vimucya ṛṇam ca śeṣitam

original: BhP_10.57.038/1 tathāpi durdharas tv anyais tvayy āstāṃ su-vrate maṇiḥ
analyzed: tathā api durdharaḥ tu anyaiḥ tvayi āstām suvrate maṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.57.038/3 kintu mām agrajaḥ samyaṅ na pratyeti maṇiṃ prati
analyzed: kintu mām agrajaḥ samyak na pratyeti maṇim prati

original: BhP_10.57.039/1 darśayasva mahā-bhāga bandhūnāṃ śāntim āvaha
analyzed: darśayasva mahābhāga bandhūnām śāntim āvaha

original: BhP_10.57.039/3 avyucchinnā makhās te 'dya vartante rukma-vedayaḥ
analyzed: a vyucchinnāḥ makhāḥ te dya vartante rukma vedayaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.040/1 evaṃ sāmabhir ālabdhaḥ śvaphalka-tanayo maṇim
analyzed: evam sāmabhiḥ ālabdhaḥ śvaphalka tanayaḥ maṇim

original: BhP_10.57.040/3 ādāya vāsasācchannaḥ dadau sūrya-sama-prabham
analyzed: ādāya vāsasā ācchannaḥ dadau sūrya sama prabham

original: BhP_10.57.041/1 syamantakaṃ darśayitvā jñātibhyo raja ātmanaḥ
analyzed: syamantakam darśayitvā jñātibhyaḥ rajaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.57.041/3 vimṛjya maṇinā bhūyas tasmai pratyarpayat prabhuḥ
analyzed: vimṛjya maṇinā bhūyas tasmai pratyarpayat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.57.042/1 yas tv etad bhagavata īśvarasya viṣṇor
analyzed: yaḥ tu etat bhagavataḥ īśvarasya viṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_10.57.042/2 vīryāḍhyaṃ vṛjina-haraṃ su-maṅgalaṃ ca
analyzed: vīrya āḍhyam vṛjina haram su maṅgalam ca

original: BhP_10.57.042/3 ākhyānaṃ paṭhati śṛṇoty anusmared vā
analyzed: ākhyānam paṭhati śṛṇoti anusmaret vā

original: BhP_10.57.042/4 duṣkīrtiṃ duritam apohya yāti śāntim
analyzed: duṣkīrtim duritam apohya yāti śāntim

original: BhP_10.58.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.58.001/1 ekadā pāṇḍavān draṣṭuṃ pratītān puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: ekadā pāṇḍavān draṣṭum pratītān puruṣottamaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.001/3 indraprasthaṃ gataḥ śṛīmān yuyudhānādibhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: indraprastham gataḥ śṛīmān yuyudhāna ādibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.002/1 dṛṣṭvā tam āgataṃ pārthā mukundam akhileśvaram
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam āgatam pārthāḥ mukundam akhila īśvaram

original: BhP_10.58.002/3 uttasthur yugapad vīrāḥ prāṇā mukhyam ivāgatam
analyzed: uttasthuḥ yugapad vīrāḥ prāṇāḥ mukhyam iva āgatam

original: BhP_10.58.003/1 pariṣvajyācyutaṃ vīrā aṅga-saṅga-hatainasaḥ
analyzed: pariṣvajya acyutam vīrāḥ aṅga saṅga hata enasaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.003/3 sānurāga-smitaṃ vaktraṃ vīkṣya tasya mudaṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: sa anurāga smitam vaktram vīkṣya tasya mudam yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.004/1 yudhiṣṭhirasya bhīmasya kṛtvā pādābhivandanam
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhirasya bhīmasya kṛtvā pāda abhivandanam

original: BhP_10.58.004/3 phālgunaṃ parirabhyātha yamābhyāṃ cābhivanditaḥ
analyzed: phālgunam parirabhya atha yamābhyām ca abhivanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.005/1 paramāsana āsīnaṃ kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇam aninditā
analyzed: parama āsane āsīnam kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇam aninditā

original: BhP_10.58.005/3 navoḍhā vrīḍitā kiñcic chanair etyābhyavandata
analyzed: na voḍhā vrīḍitā kiñcid śanais etya abhyavandata

original: BhP_10.58.006/1 tathaiva sātyakiḥ pārthaiḥ pūjitaś cābhivanditaḥ
analyzed: tathā eva sātyakiḥ pārthaiḥ pūjitaḥ ca abhivanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.006/3 niṣasādāsane 'nye ca pūjitāḥ paryupāsata
analyzed: niṣasāda āsane nye ca pūjitāḥ paryupāsata

original: BhP_10.58.007/1 pṛthām samāgatya kṛtābhivādanas tayāti-hārdārdra-dṛśābhirambhitaḥ
analyzed: pṛthām samāgatya kṛta abhivādanaḥ tayā ati hārda ārdra dṛśā abhirambhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.007/3 āpṛṣṭavāṃs tāṃ kuśalaṃ saha-snuṣāṃ pitṛ-ṣvasāram paripṛṣṭa-bāndhavaḥ
analyzed: āpṛṣṭavān tām kuśalam saha snuṣām pitṛṣvasāram paripṛṣṭa bāndhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.008/1 tam āha prema-vaiklavya- ruddha-kaṇṭhāśru-locanā
analyzed: tam āha prema vaiklavya ruddha kaṇṭha aśru locanā

original: BhP_10.58.008/3 smarantī tān bahūn kleśān kleśāpāyātma-darśanam
analyzed: smarantī tān bahūn kleśān kleśa āpāya ātma darśanam

original: BhP_10.58.009/1 tadaiva kuśalaṃ no 'bhūt sa-nāthās te kṛtā vayam
analyzed: tadā eva kuśalam naḥ bhūt sa nāthāḥ te kṛtāḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.58.009/3 jñatīn naḥ smaratā kṛṣṇa bhrātā me preṣitas tvayā
analyzed: jñatīn naḥ smaratā kṛṣṇa bhrātā me preṣitaḥ tvayā

original: BhP_10.58.010/1 na te 'sti sva-para-bhrāntir viśvasya suhṛd-ātmanaḥ
analyzed: na te sti sva para bhrāntiḥ viśvasya suhṛd ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.010/3 tathāpi smaratāṃ śaśvat kleśān haṃsi hṛdi sthitaḥ
analyzed: tathā api smaratām śaśvat kleśān haṃsi hṛdi sthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.011/0 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.58.011/1 kiṃ na ācaritaṃ śreyo na vedāham adhīśvara
analyzed: kim naḥ ācaritam śreyaḥ na veda aham adhīśvara

original: BhP_10.58.011/3 yogeśvarāṇāṃ durdarśo yan no dṛṣṭaḥ ku-medhasām
analyzed: yoga īśvarāṇām durdarśaḥ yat naḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kumedhasām

original: BhP_10.58.012/1 iti vai vārṣikān māsān rājñā so 'bhyarthitaḥ sukham
analyzed: iti vai vārṣikān māsān rājñā saḥ abhyarthitaḥ sukham

original: BhP_10.58.012/3 janayan nayanānandam indraprasthaukasāṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: janayan nayana ānandam indraprastha okasām vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.013/1 ekadā ratham āruhya vijayo vānara-dhvajam
analyzed: ekadā ratham āruhya vijayaḥ vānaradhvajam

original: BhP_10.58.013/3 gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur ādāya tūṇau cākṣaya-sāyakau
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam dhanuḥ ādāya tūṇau ca akṣaya sāyakau

original: BhP_10.58.014/1 sākaṃ kṛṣṇena sannaddho vihartuṃ vipinaṃ mahat
analyzed: sākam kṛṣṇena sannaddhaḥ vihartum vipinam mahat

original: BhP_10.58.014/3 bahu-vyāla-mṛgākīrṇaṃ prāviśat para-vīra-hā
analyzed: bahu vyāla mṛga ākīrṇam prāviśat para vīra hā

original: BhP_10.58.015/1 tatrāvidhyac charair vyāghrān śūkarān mahiṣān rurūn
analyzed: tatra avidhyat śaraiḥ vyāghrān śūkarān mahiṣān rurūn

original: BhP_10.58.015/3 śarabhān gavayān khaḍgān hariṇān śaśa-śallakān
analyzed: śarabhān gavayān khaḍgān hariṇān śaśa śallakān

original: BhP_10.58.016/1 tān ninyuḥ kiṅkarā rājñe medhyān parvaṇy upāgate
analyzed: tān ninyuḥ kiṅkarāḥ rājñe medhyān parvaṇi upāgate

original: BhP_10.58.016/3 tṛṭ-parītaḥ pariśrānto bibhatsur yamunām agāt
analyzed: tṛṣ parītaḥ pariśrāntaḥ bibhatsuḥ yamunām agāt

original: BhP_10.58.017/1 tatropaspṛśya viśadaṃ pītvā vāri mahā-rathau
analyzed: tatra upaspṛśya viśadam pītvā vāri mahā rathau

original: BhP_10.58.017/3 kṛṣṇau dadṛśatuḥ kanyāṃ carantīṃ cāru-darśanām
analyzed: kṛṣṇau dadṛśatuḥ kanyām carantīm cāru darśanām
