original: BhP_10.58.018/1 tām āsādya varārohāṃ su-dvijāṃ rucirānanām
analyzed: tām āsādya varārohām su dvijām rucira ānanām

original: BhP_10.58.018/3 papraccha preṣitaḥ sakhyā phālgunaḥ pramadottamām
analyzed: papraccha preṣitaḥ sakhyā phālgunaḥ pramadā uttamām

original: BhP_10.58.019/1 kā tvaṃ kasyāsi su-śroṇi kuto vā kiṃ cikīrṣasi
analyzed: kā tvam kasya asi suśroṇi kutas vā kim cikīrṣasi

original: BhP_10.58.019/3 manye tvāṃ patim icchantīṃ sarvaṃ kathaya śobhane
analyzed: manye tvām patim icchantīm sarvam kathaya śobhane

original: BhP_10.58.020/0 śrī-kālindy uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.58.020/1 ahaṃ devasya savitur duhitā patim icchatī
analyzed: aham devasya savituḥ duhitā patim icchatī

original: BhP_10.58.020/3 viṣṇuṃ vareṇyaṃ vara-daṃ tapaḥ paramam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: viṣṇum vareṇyam vara dam tapaḥ paramam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.021/1 nānyaṃ patiṃ vṛṇe vīra tam ṛte śrī-niketanam
analyzed: na anyam patim vṛṇe vīra tam ṛte śrīniketanam

original: BhP_10.58.021/3 tuṣyatāṃ me sa bhagavān mukundo 'nātha-saṃśrayaḥ
analyzed: tuṣyatām me sa bhagavān mukundaḥ nātha saṃśrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.022/1 kālindīti samākhyātā vasāmi yamunā-jale
analyzed: kālindī iti samākhyātā vasāmi yamunā jale

original: BhP_10.58.022/3 nirmite bhavane pitrā yāvad acyuta-darśanam
analyzed: nirmite bhavane pitrā yāvat acyuta darśanam

original: BhP_10.58.023/1 tathāvadad guḍākeśo vāsudevāya so 'pi tām
analyzed: tathā avadat guḍākeśaḥ vāsudevāya saḥ pi tām

original: BhP_10.58.023/3 ratham āropya tad-vidvān dharma-rājam upāgamat
analyzed: ratham āropya tad vidvān dharmarājam upāgamat

original: BhP_10.58.024/1 yadaiva kṛṣṇaḥ sandiṣṭaḥ pārthānāṃ paramādbutam
analyzed: yadā eva kṛṣṇaḥ sandiṣṭaḥ pārthānām parama adbutam

original: BhP_10.58.024/3 kārayām āsa nagaraṃ vicitraṃ viśvakarmaṇā
analyzed: kārayām āsa nagaram vicitram viśvakarmaṇā

original: BhP_10.58.025/1 bhagavāṃs tatra nivasan svānāṃ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: bhagavān tatra nivasan svānām priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.58.025/3 agnaye khāṇḍavaṃ dātum arjunasyāsa sārathiḥ
analyzed: agnaye khāṇḍavam dātum arjunasya āsa sārathiḥ

original: BhP_10.58.026/1 so 'gnis tuṣṭo dhanur adād dhayān śvetān rathaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: saḥ agniḥ tuṣṭaḥ dhanuḥ adāt dhayān śvetān ratham nṛpa

original: BhP_10.58.026/3 arjunāyākṣayau tūṇau varma cābhedyam astribhiḥ
analyzed: arjunāya akṣayau tūṇau varma ca abhedyam astribhiḥ

original: BhP_10.58.027/1 mayaś ca mocito vahneḥ sabhāṃ sakhya upāharat
analyzed: mayaḥ ca mocitaḥ vahneḥ sabhām sakhye upāharat

original: BhP_10.58.027/3 yasmin duryodhanasyāsīj jala-sthala-dṛśi-bhramaḥ
analyzed: yasmin duryodhanasya āsīt jala sthala dṛśi bhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.028/1 sa tena samanujñātaḥ suhṛdbhiś cānumoditaḥ
analyzed: sa tena samanujñātaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ ca anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.028/3 āyayau dvārakāṃ bhūyaḥ sātyaki-pramakhair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: āyayau dvārakām bhūyas sātyaki pramakhaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.029/1 athopayeme kālindīṃ su-puṇya-rtv-ṛkṣa ūrjite
analyzed: atha upayeme kālindīm su puṇya ṛtu ṛkṣe ūrjite

original: BhP_10.58.029/3 vitanvan paramānandaṃ svānāṃ parama-maṅgalaḥ
analyzed: vitanvan parama ānandam svānām parama maṅgalaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.030/1 vindyānuvindyāv āvantyau duryodhana-vaśānugau
analyzed: vindya anuvindyau āvantyau duryodhana vaśa anugau

original: BhP_10.58.030/3 svayaṃ-vare sva-bhaginīṃ kṛṣṇe saktāṃ nyaṣedhatām
analyzed: svayaṃvare sva bhaginīm kṛṣṇe saktām nyaṣedhatām

original: BhP_10.58.031/1 rājādhidevyās tanayāṃ mitravindāṃ pitṛ-ṣvasuḥ
analyzed: rājādhidevyāḥ tanayām mitravindām pitṛṣvasuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.031/3 prasahya hṛtavān kṛṣṇo rājan rājñāṃ prapaśyatām
analyzed: prasahya hṛtavān kṛṣṇaḥ rājan rājñām prapaśyatām

original: BhP_10.58.032/1 nagnajin nāma kauśalya āsīd rājāti-dhārmikaḥ
analyzed: nagnajit nāma kauśalyaḥ āsīt rājā ati dhārmikaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.032/3 tasya satyābhavat kanyā devī nāgnajitī nṛpa
analyzed: tasya satyā abhavat kanyā devī nāgnajitī nṛpa

original: BhP_10.58.033/1 na tāṃ śekur nṛpā voḍhum ajitvā sapta-go-vṛṣān
analyzed: na tām śekuḥ nṛpāḥ voḍhum a jitvā sapta go vṛṣān

original: BhP_10.58.033/3 tīkṣṇa-śṛṅgān su-durdharṣān vīrya-gandhāsahān khalān
analyzed: tīkṣṇa śṛṅgān su durdharṣān vīrya gandha asahān khalān

original: BhP_10.58.034/1 tāṃ śrutvā vṛṣa-jil-labhyāṃ bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: tām śrutvā vṛṣajit labhyām bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_10.58.034/3 jagāma kauśalya-puraṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
analyzed: jagāma kauśalyapuram sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.035/1 sa kośala-patiḥ prītaḥ pratyutthānāsanādibhiḥ
analyzed: sa kośala patiḥ prītaḥ pratyutthāna āsana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.58.035/3 arhaṇenāpi guruṇā pūjayan pratinanditaḥ
analyzed: arhaṇena api guruṇā pūjayan pratinanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.036/1 varaṃ vilokyābhimataṃ samāgataṃ narendra-kanyā cakame ramā-patim
analyzed: varam vilokya abhimatam samāgatam narendra kanyā cakame ramāpatim

original: BhP_10.58.036/3 bhūyād ayaṃ me patir āśiṣo 'nalaḥ karotu satyā yadi me dhṛto vrataḥ
analyzed: bhūyāt ayam me patiḥ āśiṣaḥ nalaḥ karotu satyāḥ yadi me dhṛtaḥ vrataḥ

original: BhP_10.58.037/1 yat-pāda-paṅkaja-rajaḥ śirasā bibharti
analyzed: yat pāda paṅkaja rajaḥ śirasā bibharti

original: BhP_10.58.037/2 śṛīr abya-jaḥ sa-giriśaḥ saha loka-pālaiḥ
analyzed: śṛīḥ abyajaḥ sa giriśaḥ saha lokapālaiḥ

original: BhP_10.58.037/3 līlā-tanuḥ sva-kṛta-setu-parīpsayā yaḥ
BhP_10.58.037/4 kāle 'dadhat sa bhagavān mama kena tuṣyet
analyzed: kāle dadhat sa bhagavān mama kena tuṣyet

original: BhP_10.58.038/1 arcitaṃ punar ity āha nārāyaṇa jagat-pate
analyzed: arcitam punar iti āha nārāyaṇa jagatpate

original: BhP_10.58.038/3 ātmānandena pūrṇasya karavāṇi kim alpakaḥ
analyzed: ātma ānandena pūrṇasya karavāṇi kim alpakaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.039/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.58.039/1 tam āha bhagavān hṛṣṭaḥ kṛtāsana-parigrahaḥ
analyzed: tam āha bhagavān hṛṣṭaḥ kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.039/3 megha-gambhīrayā vācā sa-smitaṃ kuru-nandana
analyzed: megha gambhīrayā vācā sa smitam kuru nandana

original: BhP_10.58.040/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.58.040/1 narendra yācñā kavibhir vigarhitā rājanya-bandhor nija-dharma-vartinaḥ
analyzed: narendra yācñā kavibhiḥ vigarhitā rājanyabandhoḥ nija dharma vartinaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.040/3 tathāpi yāce tava sauhṛdecchayā kanyāṃ tvadīyāṃ na hi śulka-dā vayam
analyzed: tathā api yāce tava sauhṛda icchayā kanyām tvadīyām na hi śulkadāḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.58.041/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.58.041/1 ko 'nyas te 'bhyadhiko nātha kanyā-vara ihepsitaḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ te bhyadhikaḥ nātha kanyā varaḥ iha īpsitaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.041/3 guṇaika-dhāmno yasyāṅge śrīr vasaty anapāyinī
analyzed: guṇa eka dhāmnaḥ yasya aṅge śrīḥ vasati anapāyinī

original: BhP_10.58.042/1 kintv asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ samayaḥ sātvatarṣabha
analyzed: kintu asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ pūrvam samayaḥ sātvata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.58.042/3 puṃsāṃ vīrya-parīkṣārthaṃ kanyā-vara-parīpsayā
analyzed: puṃsām vīrya parīkṣā artham kanyā vara parīpsayā

original: BhP_10.58.043/1 saptaite go-vṛṣā vīra durdāntā duravagrahāḥ
analyzed: sapta ete go vṛṣāḥ vīra durdāntāḥ duravagrahāḥ

original: BhP_10.58.043/3 etair bhagnāḥ su-bahavo bhinna-gātrā nṛpātmajāḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ bhagnāḥ su bahavaḥ bhinna gātrāḥ nṛpa ātmajāḥ

original: BhP_10.58.044/1 yad ime nigṛhītāḥ syus tvayaiva yadu-nandana
analyzed: yat ime nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ tvayā eva yadunandana

original: BhP_10.58.044/3 varo bhavān abhimato duhitur me śriyaḥ-pate
analyzed: varaḥ bhavān abhimataḥ duhituḥ me śriyaḥpate

original: BhP_10.58.045/1 evaṃ samayam ākarṇya baddhvā parikaraṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: evam samayam ākarṇya baddhvā parikaram prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.045/3 ātmānaṃ saptadhā kṛtvā nyagṛhṇāl līlayaiva tān
analyzed: ātmānam saptadhā kṛtvā nyagṛhṇāt līlayā eva tān

original: BhP_10.58.046/1 baddhvā tān dāmabhiḥ śaurir bhagna-darpān hataujasaḥ
analyzed: baddhvā tān dāmabhiḥ śauriḥ bhagna darpān hata ojasaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.046/3 vyakarsal līlayā baddhān bālo dāru-mayān yathā
analyzed: vyakarsat līlayā baddhān bālaḥ dāru mayān yathā

original: BhP_10.58.047/1 tataḥ prītaḥ sutāṃ rājā dadau kṛṣṇāya vismitaḥ
analyzed: tatas prītaḥ sutām rājā dadau kṛṣṇāya vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.047/3 tāṃ pratyagṛhṇād bhagavān vidhi-vat sadṛśīṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: tām pratyagṛhṇāt bhagavān vidhivat sadṛśīm prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.048/1 rāja-patnyaś ca duhituḥ kṛṣṇaṃ labdhvā priyaṃ patim
analyzed: rāja patnyaḥ ca duhituḥ kṛṣṇam labdhvā priyam patim

original: BhP_10.58.048/3 lebhire paramānandaṃ jātaś ca paramotsavaḥ
analyzed: lebhire parama ānandam jātaḥ ca parama utsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.049/1 śaṅkha-bhery-ānakā nedur gīta-vādya-dvijāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: śaṅkha bherī ānakāḥ neduḥ gīta vādya dvija āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.049/3 narā nāryaḥ pramuditāḥ suvāsaḥ-srag-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: narāḥ nāryaḥ pramuditāḥ su vāsaḥ sraj alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.58.050/1 daśa-dhenu-sahasrāṇi pāribarham adād vibhuḥ
analyzed: daśa dhenu sahasrāṇi pāribarham adāt vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.050/3 yuvatīnāṃ tri-sāhasraṃ niṣka-grīva-suvāsasam
analyzed: yuvatīnām tri sāhasram niṣka grīva su vāsasam

original: BhP_10.58.051/1 nava-nāga-sahasrāṇi nāgāc chata-guṇān rathān
analyzed: nava nāga sahasrāṇi nāgāt śataguṇān rathān

original: BhP_10.58.051/3 rathāc chata-guṇān aśvān aśvāc chata-guṇān narān
analyzed: rathāt śataguṇān aśvān aśvāt śataguṇān narān

original: BhP_10.58.052/1 dampatī ratham āropya mahatyā senayā vṛtau
analyzed: dampatī ratham āropya mahatyā senayā vṛtau

original: BhP_10.58.052/3 sneha-praklinna-hṛdayo yāpayām āsa kośalaḥ
analyzed: sneha praklinna hṛdayaḥ yāpayām āsa kośalaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.053/1 śrutvaitad rurudhur bhūpā nayantaṃ pathi kanyakām
analyzed: śrutvā etat rurudhuḥ bhūpāḥ nayantam pathi kanyakām

original: BhP_10.58.053/3 bhagna-vīryāḥ su-durmarṣā yadubhir go-vṛṣaiḥ purā
analyzed: bhagna vīryāḥ su durmarṣāḥ yadubhiḥ go vṛṣaiḥ purā

original: BhP_10.58.054/1 tān asyataḥ śara-vrātān bandhu-priya-kṛd arjunaḥ
analyzed: tān asyataḥ śara vrātān bandhu priya kṛt arjunaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.054/3 gāṇḍīvī kālayām āsa siṃhaḥ kṣudra-mṛgān iva
analyzed: gāṇḍīvī kālayām āsa siṃhaḥ kṣudra mṛgān iva

original: BhP_10.58.055/1 pāribarham upāgṛhya dvārakām etya satyayā
analyzed: pāribarham upāgṛhya dvārakām etya satyayā

original: BhP_10.58.055/3 reme yadūnām ṛṣabho bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: reme yadūnām ṛṣabhaḥ bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.58.056/1 śrutakīrteḥ sutāṃ bhadrāṃ upayeme pitṛ-ṣvasuḥ
analyzed: śrutakīrteḥ sutām bhadrām upayeme pitṛṣvasuḥ

original: BhP_10.58.056/3 kaikeyīṃ bhrātṛbhir dattāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ santardanādibhiḥ
analyzed: kaikeyīm bhrātṛbhiḥ dattām kṛṣṇaḥ santardana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.58.057/1 sutāṃ ca madrādhipater lakṣmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇair yatām
analyzed: sutām ca madra adhipateḥ lakṣmaṇām lakṣaṇaiḥ yatām

original: BhP_10.58.057/3 svayaṃ-vare jahāraikaḥ sa suparṇaḥ sudhām iva
analyzed: svayaṃvare jahāra ekaḥ sa suparṇaḥ sudhām iva

original: BhP_10.58.058/1 anyāś caivaṃ-vidhā bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasyāsan sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: anyāḥ ca evaṃvidhāḥ bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya āsan sahasraśas

original: BhP_10.58.058/3 bhaumaṃ hatvā tan-nirodhād āhṛtāś cāru-darśanāḥ
analyzed: bhaumam hatvā tad nirodhāt āhṛtāḥ cāru darśanāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.001/1 śrī-rājovāca yathā hato bhagavatā bhaumo yene ca tāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca yathā hataḥ bhagavatā bhaumaḥ yene ca tāḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.001/3 niruddhā etad ācakṣva vikramaṃ śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ
analyzed: niruddhāḥ etat ācakṣva vikramam śārṅgadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.59.002/1 indreṇa hṛta-chatreṇa hṛta-kuṇḍala-bandhunā
analyzed: indreṇa hṛta chatreṇa hṛta kuṇḍala bandhunā

original: BhP_10.59.002/3 hṛtāmarādri-sthānena jñāpito bhauma-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: hṛta amara adri sthānena jñāpitaḥ bhauma ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.59.003/1 sa-bhāryo garuḍārūḍhaḥ prāg-jyotiṣa-puraṃ yayau
analyzed: sa bhāryaḥ garuḍa ārūḍhaḥ prāgjyotiṣa puram yayau

original: BhP_10.59.003/3 giri-durgaiḥ śastra-durgair jalāgny-anila-durgamam
analyzed: giri durgaiḥ śastra durgaiḥ jala agni anila durgamam

original: BhP_10.59.003/5 mura-pāśāyutair ghorair dṛḍhaiḥ sarvata āvṛtam
analyzed: mura pāśa ayutaiḥ ghoraiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ sarvatas āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.59.004/1 gadayā nirbibhedādrīn śastra-durgāṇi sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: gadayā nirbibheda adrīn śastra durgāṇi sāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.004/3 cakreṇāgniṃ jalaṃ vāyuṃ mura-pāśāṃs tathāsinā
analyzed: cakreṇa agnim jalam vāyum murapāśān tathā asinā

original: BhP_10.59.005/1 śaṅkha-nādena yantrāṇi hṛdayāni manasvinām
analyzed: śaṅkha nādena yantrāṇi hṛdayāni manasvinām

original: BhP_10.59.005/3 prākāraṃ gadayā gurvyā nirbibheda gadādharaḥ
analyzed: prākāram gadayā gurvyā nirbibheda gadādharaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.006/1 pāñcajanya-dhvaniṃ śrutvā yugāntaśani-bhīṣaṇam
analyzed: pāñcajanya dhvanim śrutvā yugānta śani bhīṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.59.006/3 muraḥ śayāna uttasthau daityaḥ pañca-śirā jalāt
analyzed: muraḥ śayānaḥ uttasthau daityaḥ pañcaśirāḥ jalāt

original: BhP_10.59.007/1 tri-śūlam udyamya su-durnirīkṣaṇo yugānta-sūryānala-rocir ulbaṇaḥ
analyzed: triśūlam udyamya su durnirīkṣaṇaḥ yugānta sūrya anala rociḥ ulbaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.007/3 grasaṃs tri-lokīm iva pañcabhir mukhair abhyadravat tārkṣya-sutaṃ yathoragaḥ
analyzed: grasan trilokīm iva pañcabhiḥ mukhaiḥ abhyadravat tārkṣyasutam yathā uragaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.008/1 āvidhya śūlaṃ tarasā garutmate nirasya vaktrair vyanadat sa pañcabhiḥ
analyzed: āvidhya śūlam tarasā garutmate nirasya vaktraiḥ vyanadat sa pañcabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.008/3 sa rodasī sarva-diśo 'mbaraṃ mahān āpūrayann aṇḍa-kaṭāham āvṛṇot
analyzed: sa rodasī sarva diśaḥ mbaram mahān āpūrayan aṇḍa kaṭāham āvṛṇot

original: BhP_10.59.009/1 tadāpatad vai tri-śikhaṃ garutmate hariḥ śarābhyām abhinat tridhojasā
analyzed: tadā apatat vai triśikham garutmate hariḥ śarābhyām abhinat tridhā ujasā

original: BhP_10.59.009/3 mukheṣu taṃ cāpi śarair atāḍayat tasmai gadāṃ so 'pi ruṣā vyamuñcata
analyzed: mukheṣu tam ca api śaraiḥ atāḍayat tasmai gadām ruṣā vyamuñcata

original: BhP_10.59.010/1 tām āpatantīṃ gadayā gadāṃ mṛdhe gadāgrajo nirbibhide sahasradhā
analyzed: tām āpatantīm gadayā gadām mṛdhe gadāgrajaḥ nirbibhide sahasradhā

original: BhP_10.59.010/3 udyamya bāhūn abhidhāvato 'jitaḥ śirāṃsi cakreṇa jahāra līlayā
analyzed: udyamya bāhūn abhidhāvataḥ jitaḥ śirāṃsi cakreṇa jahāra līlayā

original: BhP_10.59.011/1 vyasuḥ papātāmbhasi kṛtta-śīrṣo nikṛtta-śṛṅgo 'drir ivendra-tejasā
analyzed: vyasuḥ papāta ambhasi kṛtta śīrṣaḥ nikṛtta śṛṅgaḥ driḥ iva indra tejasā

original: BhP_10.59.011/3 tasyātmajāḥ sapta pitur vadhāturāḥ pratikriyāmarṣa-juṣaḥ samudyatāḥ
analyzed: tasya ātmajāḥ sapta pituḥ vadha āturāḥ pratikriyā āmarṣa juṣaḥ samudyatāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.012/1 tāmro 'ntarikṣaḥ śravaṇo vibhāvasur
analyzed: tāmraḥ ntarikṣaḥ śravaṇaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: BhP_10.59.012/2 vasur nabhasvān aruṇaś ca saptamaḥ
analyzed: vasuḥ nabhasvān aruṇaḥ ca saptamaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.012/3 pīṭhaṃ puraskṛtya camū-patiṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: pīṭham puraskṛtya camūpatim mṛdhe

original: BhP_10.59.012/4 bhauma-prayuktā niragan dhṛtāyudhāḥ
analyzed: bhauma prayuktāḥ niragan dhṛta āyudhāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.013/1 prāyuñjatāsādya śarān asīn gadāḥ śakty-ṛṣṭi-śūlāny ajite ruṣolbaṇāḥ
analyzed: prāyuñjata āsādya śarān asīn gadāḥ śakti ṛṣṭi śūlāni ajite ruṣā ulbaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.013/3 tac-chastra-kūṭaṃ bhagavān sva-mārgaṇair amogha-vīryas tilaśaś cakarta ha
analyzed: tat śastra kūṭam bhagavān sva mārgaṇaiḥ amogha vīryaḥ tilaśas cakarta ha

original: BhP_10.59.014/1 tān pīṭha-mukhyān anayad yama-kṣayaṃ
analyzed: tān pīṭha mukhyān anayat yama kṣayam

original: BhP_10.59.014/2 nikṛtta-śīrṣoru-bhujāṅghri-varmaṇaḥ
analyzed: nikṛtta śīrṣa ūru bhuja aṅghri varmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.014/3 svānīka-pān acyuta-cakra-sāyakais
analyzed: sva anīkapān acyuta cakra sāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.014/4 tathā nirastān narako dharā-sutaḥ
analyzed: tathā nirastāt narakaḥ dharāsutaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.014/5 nirīkṣya durmarṣaṇa āsravan-madair
analyzed: nirīkṣya durmarṣaṇaḥ āsravat madaiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.014/6 gajaiḥ payodhi-prabhavair nirākramāt
analyzed: gajaiḥ payodhi prabhavaiḥ nirākramāt

original: BhP_10.59.015/1 dṛṣṭvā sa-bhāryaṃ garuḍopari sthitaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā sa bhāryam garuḍa upari sthitam

original: BhP_10.59.015/2 sūryopariṣṭāt sa-taḍid ghanaṃ yathā
analyzed: sūrya upariṣṭāt sa taḍit ghanam yathā

original: BhP_10.59.015/3 kṛṣṇaṃ sa tasmai vyasṛjac chata-ghnīṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam sa tasmai vyasṛjat śataghnīm

original: BhP_10.59.015/4 yodhāś ca sarve yugapac ca vivyadhuḥ
analyzed: yodhāḥ ca sarve yugapad ca vivyadhuḥ

original: BhP_10.59.016/1 tad bhauma-sainyaṃ bhagavān gadāgrajo
analyzed: tat bhauma sainyam bhagavān gadāgrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.016/2 vicitra-vājair niśitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
analyzed: vicitra vājaiḥ niśitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.016/3 nikṛtta-bāhūru-śirodhra-vigrahaṃ
analyzed: nikṛtta bāhu ūru śiraḥ dhra vigraham

original: BhP_10.59.016/4 cakāra tarhy eva hatāśva-kuñjaram
analyzed: cakāra tarhi eva hata aśva kuñjaram

original: BhP_10.59.017/1 yāni yodhaiḥ prayuktāni śastrāstrāṇi kurūdvaha
analyzed: yāni yodhaiḥ prayuktāni śastra astrāṇi kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.59.017/3 haris tāny acchinat tīkṣṇaiḥ śarair ekaikaśas trībhiḥ
analyzed: hariḥ tāni acchinat tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiḥ ekaikaśas trībhiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.018/1 uhyamānaḥ suparṇena pakṣābhyāṃ nighnatā gajān
analyzed: uhyamānaḥ suparṇena pakṣābhyām nighnatā gajān

original: BhP_10.59.018/3 gurutmatā hanyamānās tuṇḍa-pakṣa-nakher gajāḥ
analyzed: gurutmatā hanyamānāḥ tuṇḍapakṣa nakheḥ gajāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.019/1 puram evāviśann ārtā narako yudhy ayudhyata
analyzed: puram eva āviśan ārtāḥ narakaḥ yudhi ayudhyata

original: BhP_10.59.020/1 dṛṣṭvā vidrāvitaṃ sainyaṃ garuḍenārditaṃ svakaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā vidrāvitam sainyam garuḍena arditam svakam

original: BhP_10.59.020/3 taṃ bhaumaḥ prāharac chaktyā vajraḥ pratihato yataḥ
analyzed: tam bhaumaḥ prāharat śaktyā vajraḥ pratihataḥ yatas

original: BhP_10.59.020/5 nākampata tayā viddho mālāhata iva dvipaḥ
analyzed: na akampata tayā viddhaḥ mālā hataḥ iva dvipaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.021/1 śūlaṃ bhaumo 'cyutaṃ hantum ādade vitathodyamaḥ
analyzed: śūlam bhaumaḥ cyutam hantum ādade vitatha udyamaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.021/3 tad-visargāt pūrvam eva narakasya śiro hariḥ
analyzed: tad visargāt pūrvam eva narakasya śiraḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.59.021/5 apāharad gaja-sthasya cakreṇa kṣura-neminā
analyzed: apāharat gaja sthasya cakreṇa kṣura neminā

original: BhP_10.59.022/1 sa-kuṇḍalaṃ cāru-kirīṭa-bhūṣaṇaṃ babhau pṛthivyāṃ patitam samujjvalam
analyzed: sa kuṇḍalam cāru kirīṭa bhūṣaṇam babhau pṛthivyām patitam samujjvalam

original: BhP_10.59.022/3 ha heti sādhv ity ṛṣayaḥ sureśvarā mālyair mukundaṃ vikiranta īdire
analyzed: ha ha iti sādhu iti ṛṣayaḥ sura īśvarāḥ mālyaiḥ mukundam vikirantaḥ īdire

original: BhP_10.59.023/1 tataś ca bhūḥ kṛṣṇam upetya kuṇḍale
analyzed: tatas ca bhūḥ kṛṣṇam upetya kuṇḍale

original: BhP_10.59.023/2 pratapta-jāmbūnada-ratna-bhāsvare
analyzed: pratapta jāmbūnada ratna bhāsvare

original: BhP_10.59.023/3 sa-vaijayantyā vana-mālayārpayat
analyzed: sa vaijayantyā vanamālayā arpayat

original: BhP_10.59.023/4 prācetasaṃ chatram atho mahā-maṇim
analyzed: prācetasam chatram atha u mahā maṇim

original: BhP_10.59.024/1 astauṣīd atha viśveśaṃ devī deva-varārcitam
analyzed: astauṣīt atha viśveśam devī deva vara arcitam

original: BhP_10.59.024/3 prāñjaliḥ praṇatā rājan bhakti-pravaṇayā dhiyā
analyzed: prāñjaliḥ praṇatā rājan bhakti pravaṇayā dhiyā

original: BhP_10.59.025/0 bhūmir uvāca
analyzed: bhūmiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.59.025/1 namas te deva-deveśa śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dhara
analyzed: namaḥ te devadeveśa śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: BhP_10.59.025/3 bhaktecchopātta-rūpāya paramātman namo 'stu te
analyzed: bhakta icchā upātta rūpāya paramātman namaḥ stu te

original: BhP_10.59.026/1 namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja-māline
analyzed: namaḥ paṅkajanābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja māline

original: BhP_10.59.026/3 namaḥ paṅkaja-netrāya namas tepaṅkajāṅghraye
analyzed: namaḥ paṅkaja netrāya namaḥ te paṅkaja aṅghraye

original: BhP_10.59.027/1 namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ vāsudevāya viṣṇave
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam vāsudevāya viṣṇave

original: BhP_10.59.027/3 puruṣāyādi-bījāya pūrṇa-bodhāya te namaḥ
BhP_10.59.028/1 ajāya janayitre 'sya brahmaṇe 'nanta-śaktaye
analyzed: ajāya janayitre sya brahmaṇe nanta śaktaye

original: BhP_10.59.028/3 parāvarātman bhūtātman paramātman namo 'stu te
analyzed: stu

original: BhP_10.59.029/1 tvaṃ vai sisṛkṣur aja utkaṭaṃ prabho
analyzed: tvam vai sisṛkṣuḥ ajaḥ utkaṭam prabho

original: BhP_10.59.029/2 tamo nirodhāya bibharṣy asaṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: tamaḥ nirodhāya bibharṣi asaṃvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.029/3 sthānāya sattvaṃ jagato jagat-pate
analyzed: sthānāya sattvam jagataḥ jagatpate

original: BhP_10.59.029/4 kālaḥ pradhānaṃ puruṣo bhavān paraḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ pradhānam puruṣaḥ bhavān paraḥ

original: BhP_10.59.030/1 ahaṃ payo jyotir athānilo nabho mātrāṇi devā mana indriyāṇi
analyzed: aham payaḥ jyotiḥ atha anilaḥ nabhaḥ mātrāṇi devāḥ manaḥ indriyāṇi

original: BhP_10.59.030/3 kartā mahān ity akhilaṃ carācaraṃ tvayy advitīye bhagavan ayaṃ bhramaḥ
analyzed: kartā mahān iti akhilam carācaram tvayi advitīye bhagavan ayam bhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.031/1 tasyātmajo 'yaṃ tava pāda-paṅkajaṃ bhītaḥ prapannārti-haropasāditaḥ
analyzed: tasya ātmajaḥ yam tava pāda paṅkajam bhītaḥ prapanna ārti hara upasāditaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.031/3 tat pālayainaṃ kuru hasta-paṅkajaṃ śirasy amuṣyākhila-kalmaṣāpaham
analyzed: tat pālaya enam kuru hasta paṅkajam śirasi amuṣya akhila kalmaṣa apaham

original: BhP_10.59.032/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.59.032/1 iti bhūmy-arthito vāgbhir bhagavān bhakti-namrayā
analyzed: iti bhūmi arthitaḥ vāgbhiḥ bhagavān bhakti namrayā

original: BhP_10.59.032/3 dattvābhayaṃ bhauma-gṛham prāviśat sakalarddhimat
analyzed: dattvā abhayam bhauma gṛham prāviśat sakala ṛddhimat

original: BhP_10.59.033/1 tatra rājanya-kanyānāṃ ṣaṭ-sahasrādhikāyutam
analyzed: tatra rājanya kanyānām ṣaṣ sahasra adhika ayutam

original: BhP_10.59.033/3 bhaumāhṛtānāṃ vikramya rājabhyo dadṛśe hariḥ
analyzed: bhauma āhṛtānām vikramya rājabhyaḥ dadṛśe hariḥ

original: BhP_10.59.034/1 tam praviṣṭaṃ striyo vīkṣya nara-varyaṃ vimohitāḥ
analyzed: tam praviṣṭam striyaḥ vīkṣya nara varyam vimohitāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.034/3 manasā vavrire 'bhīṣṭaṃ patiṃ daivopasāditam
analyzed: manasā vavrire bhīṣṭam patim daiva upasāditam

original: BhP_10.59.035/1 bhūyāt patir ayaṃ mahyaṃ dhātā tad anumodatām
analyzed: bhūyāt patiḥ ayam mahyam dhātā tat anumodatām

original: BhP_10.59.035/3 iti sarvāḥ pṛthak kṛṣṇe bhāvena hṛdayaṃ dadhuḥ
analyzed: iti sarvāḥ pṛthak kṛṣṇe bhāvena hṛdayam

original: BhP_10.59.036/1 tāḥ prāhiṇod dvāravatīṃ su-mṛṣṭa-virajo-'mbarāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ prāhiṇot dvāravatīm su mṛṣṭa viraja umbarāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.036/3 nara-yānair mahā-kośān rathāśvān draviṇaṃ mahāt
analyzed: nara yānaiḥ mahā kośān ratha aśvān draviṇam mahāt

original: BhP_10.59.037/1 airāvata-kulebhāṃś ca catur-dantāṃs tarasvinaḥ
analyzed: airāvata kulebhān ca catur dantān tarasvinaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.037/3 pāṇḍurāṃś ca catuḥ-ṣaṣṭiṃ prerayām āsa keśavaḥ
analyzed: pāṇḍurān ca catuḥṣaṣṭim prerayām āsa keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.038/1 gatvā surendra-bhavanaṃ dattvādityai ca kuṇḍale
analyzed: gatvā sura indra bhavanam dattvā adityai ca kuṇḍale

original: BhP_10.59.038/3 pūjitas tridaśendreṇa mahendryāṇyā ca sa-priyaḥ
analyzed: pūjitaḥ tridaśa indreṇa mahā indryāṇyā ca sa priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.039/1 codito bhāryayotpāṭya pārījātaṃ garutmati
analyzed: coditaḥ bhāryayā utpāṭya pārī jātam garutmati

original: BhP_10.59.039/3 āropya sendrān vibudhān nirjityopānayat puram
analyzed: āropya sa indrān vibudhān nirjitya upānayat puram

original: BhP_10.59.040/1 sthāpitaḥ satyabhāmāyā gṛhodyānopaśobhanaḥ
analyzed: sthāpitaḥ satyabhāmāyāḥ gṛha udyāna upaśobhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.040/3 anvagur bhramarāḥ svargāt tad-gandhāsava-lampaṭāḥ
analyzed: anvaguḥ bhramarāḥ svargāt tad gandha āsava lampaṭāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.041/1 yayāca ānamya kirīṭa-koṭibhiḥ pādau spṛśann acyutam artha-sādhanam
analyzed: yayāca ānamya kirīṭa koṭibhiḥ pādau spṛśan acyutam artha sādhanam

original: BhP_10.59.041/3 siddhārtha etena vigṛhyate mahān aho surāṇāṃ ca tamo dhig āḍhyatām
analyzed: siddhārthaḥ etena vigṛhyate mahān aho surāṇām ca tamaḥ dhik āḍhya tām

original: BhP_10.59.042/1 atho muhūrta ekasmin nānāgāreṣu tāḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: atha u muhūrte ekasmin nānā āgāreṣu tāḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.042/3 yathopayeme bhagavān tāvad-rūpa-dharo 'vyayaḥ
analyzed: yathā upayeme bhagavān tāvat rūpa dharaḥ vyayaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.043/1 gṛheṣu tāsām anapāyy atarka-kṛn nirasta-sāmyātiśayeṣv avasthitaḥ
analyzed: gṛheṣu tāsām anapāyī a tarka kṛt nirasta sāmya atiśayeṣu avasthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.59.043/3 reme ramābhir nija-kāma-sampluto yathetaro gārhaka-medhikāṃś caran
analyzed: reme ramābhiḥ nija kāma samplutaḥ yathā itaraḥ gārhakamedhikān caran

original: BhP_10.59.044/1 itthaṃ ramā-patim avāpya patiṃ striyas tā
analyzed: ittham ramā patim avāpya patim striyaḥ tāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.044/2 brahmādayo 'pi na viduḥ padavīṃ yadīyām
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ na viduḥ padavīm yadīyām

original: BhP_10.59.044/3 bhejur mudāviratam edhitayānurāga
analyzed: bhejuḥ mudā a viratam edhitayā anurāga

original: BhP_10.59.044/4 hāsāvaloka-nava-saṅgama-jalpa-lajjāḥ
analyzed: hāsa avalokana vasaṅgama jalpa lajjāḥ

original: BhP_10.59.045/1 pratyudgamāsana-varārhaṇa-pada-śauca-
analyzed: pratyudgama āsana vara arhaṇa pada śauca

original: BhP_10.59.045/2 tāmbūla-viśramaṇa-vījana-gandha-mālyaiḥ
analyzed: tāmbūla viśramaṇa vījana gandha mālyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.045/3 keśa-prasāra-śayana-snapanopahāryaiḥ
analyzed: keśa prasāra śayana snapana upahāryaiḥ

original: BhP_10.59.045/4 dāsī-śatā api vibhor vidadhuḥ sma dāsyam
analyzed: dāsī śatāḥ api vibhoḥ vidadhuḥ sma dāsyam

original: BhP_10.60.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.001/1 karhicit sukham āsīnaṃ sva-talpa-sthaṃ jagad-gurum
analyzed: karhicit sukham āsīnam sva talpa stham jagadgurum

original: BhP_10.60.001/3 patiṃ paryacarad bhaiṣmī vyajanena sakhī-janaiḥ
analyzed: patim paryacarat bhaiṣmī vyajanena sakhī janaiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.002/1 yas tv etal līlayā viśvaṃ sṛjaty atty avatīśvaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu etat līlayā viśvam sṛjati atti avati īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.60.002/3 sa hi jātaḥ sva-setūnāṃ gopīthāya yaduṣv ajaḥ
analyzed: sa hi jātaḥ sva setūnām gopīthāya yaduṣu ajaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.003/1 tasmin antar-gṛhe bhrājan- muktā-dāma-vilambinā
analyzed: tasmin antargṛhe bhrājat muktā dāma vilambinā

original: BhP_10.60.003/3 virājite vitānena dīpair maṇi-mayair api
analyzed: virājite vitānena dīpaiḥ maṇi mayaiḥ api

original: BhP_10.60.004/1 mallikā-dāmabhiḥ puṣpair dvirepha-kula-nādite
analyzed: mallikā dāmabhiḥ puṣpaiḥ dvirepha kula nādite

original: BhP_10.60.004/3 jāla-randhra-praviṣṭaiś ca gobhiś candramaso 'malaiḥ
analyzed: jāla randhra praviṣṭaiḥ ca gobhiḥ candramasaḥ malaiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.005/1 pārijāta-vanāmoda- vāyunodyāna-śālinā
analyzed: pārijāta vana āmoda vāyunā udyāna śālinā

original: BhP_10.60.005/3 dhūpair aguru-jai rājan jāla-randhra-vinirgataiḥ
analyzed: dhūpaiḥ aguru jaiḥ rājan jāla randhra vinirgataiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.006/1 payaḥ-phena-nibhe śubhre paryaṅke kaśipūttame
analyzed: payaḥ phena nibhe śubhre paryaṅke kaśipu uttame

original: BhP_10.60.006/3 upatasthe sukhāsīnaṃ jagatām īśvaraṃ patim
analyzed: upatasthe sukha āsīnam jagatām īśvaram patim

original: BhP_10.60.007/1 vāla-vyajanam ādāya ratna-daṇḍaṃ sakhī-karāt
analyzed: vāla vyajanam ādāya ratna daṇḍam sakhī karāt

original: BhP_10.60.007/3 tena vījayatī devī upāsāṃ cakra īśvaram
analyzed: tena vījayatī devī upāsām cakre īśvaram

original: BhP_10.60.008/1 sopācyutaṃ kvaṇayatī maṇi-nūpurābhyāṃ
analyzed: sā upācyutam kvaṇayatī maṇi nūpurābhyām

original: BhP_10.60.008/2 reje 'ṅgulīya-valaya-vyajanāgra-hastā
analyzed: reje ṅgulīya valaya vyajana agra hastā

original: BhP_10.60.008/3 vastrānta-gūḍha-kuca-kuṅkuma-śoṇa-hāra-
BhP_10.60.008/4 bhāsā nitamba-dhṛtayā ca parārdhya-kāñcyā
analyzed: bhāsā nitamba dhṛtayā ca parārdhya kāñcyā

original: BhP_10.60.009/1 tāṃ rūpiṇīṃ śrīyam ananya-gatiṃ nirīkṣya
analyzed: tām rūpiṇīm śrīyam ananyagatim nirīkṣya

original: BhP_10.60.009/2 yā līlayā dhṛta-tanor anurūpa-rūpā
analyzed: yā līlayā dhṛta tanoḥ anurūpa rūpā

original: BhP_10.60.009/3 prītaḥ smayann alaka-kuṇḍala-niṣka-kaṇṭha-
analyzed: prītaḥ smayan alaka kuṇḍala niṣka kaṇṭha

original: BhP_10.60.009/4 vaktrollasat-smita-sudhāṃ harir ābabhāṣe
analyzed: vaktra ullasat smita sudhām hariḥ ābabhāṣe

original: BhP_10.60.010/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.010/1 rāja-putrīpsitā bhūpair loka-pāla-vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: rāja putrī īpsitā bhūpaiḥ lokapāla vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.010/3 mahānubhāvaiḥ śrīmadbhī rūpaudārya-balorjitaiḥ
analyzed: mahā anubhāvaiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ rūpa audārya bala ūrjitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.011/1 tān prāptān arthino hitvā caidyādīn smara-durmadān
analyzed: tān prāptān arthinaḥ hitvā caidya ādīn smara durmadān

original: BhP_10.60.011/3 dattā bhrātrā sva-pitrā ca kasmān no vavṛṣe 'samān
analyzed: dattā bhrātrā sva pitrā ca kasmāt naḥ vavṛṣe samān

original: BhP_10.60.012/1 rājabhyo bibhyataḥ su-bhru samudraṃ śaraṇaṃ gatān
analyzed: rājabhyaḥ bibhyataḥ subhru samudram śaraṇam gatān

original: BhP_10.60.012/3 balavadbhiḥ kṛta-dveṣān prāyas tyakta-nṛpāsanān
analyzed: balavadbhiḥ kṛta dveṣān prāyas tyakta nṛpāsanān

original: BhP_10.60.013/1 aspaṣṭa-vartmanām puṃsām aloka-patham īyuṣām
analyzed: aspaṣṭa vartmanām puṃsām aloka patham īyuṣām

original: BhP_10.60.013/3 āsthitāḥ padavīṃ su-bhru prāyaḥ sīdanti yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: āsthitāḥ padavīm subhru prāyas sīdanti yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.014/1 niṣkiñcanā vayaṃ śaśvan niṣkiñcana-jana-priyāḥ
analyzed: niṣkiñcanāḥ vayam śaśvat niṣkiñcana jana priyāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.014/3 tasmā tprāyeṇa na hy āḍhyā māṃ bhajanti su-madhyame
analyzed: tasmāt prāyeṇa na hi āḍhyāḥ mām bhajanti sumadhyame

original: BhP_10.60.015/1 yayor ātma-samaṃ vittaṃ janmaiśvaryākṛtir bhavaḥ
analyzed: yayoḥ ātma samam vittam janma aiśvarya ākṛtiḥ bhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.015/3 tayor vivāho maitrī ca nottamādhamayoḥ kvacit
analyzed: tayoḥ vivāhaḥ maitrī ca na uttama adhamayoḥ kvacid

original: BhP_10.60.016/1 vaidarbhy etad avijñāya tvayādīrgha-samīkṣayā
analyzed: vaidarbhi etat a vijñāya tvayā a dīrgha samīkṣayā

original: BhP_10.60.016/3 vṛtā vayaṃ guṇair hīnā bhikṣubhiḥ ślāghitā mudhā
analyzed: vṛtāḥ vayam guṇaiḥ hīnāḥ bhikṣubhiḥ ślāghitāḥ mudhā

original: BhP_10.60.017/1 athātmano 'nurūpaṃ vai bhajasva kṣatriyarṣabham
analyzed: atha ātmanaḥ nurūpam vai bhajasva kṣatriya ṛṣabham

original: BhP_10.60.017/3 yena tvam āśiṣaḥ satyā ihāmutra ca lapsyase
analyzed: yena tvam āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ iha amutra ca lapsyase

original: BhP_10.60.018/1 caidya-śālva-jarāsandha dantavakrādayo nṛpāḥ
analyzed: caidya śālva jarāsandha dantavakra ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.018/3 mama dviṣanti vāmoru rukmī cāpi tavāgrajaḥ
analyzed: mama dviṣanti vāma ūro rukmī ca api tava agrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.019/1 teṣāṃ vīrya-madāndhānāṃ dṛptānāṃ smaya-nuttaye
analyzed: teṣām vīrya mada andhānām dṛptānām smaya nuttaye

original: BhP_10.60.019/3 ānitāsi mayā bhadre tejopaharatāsatām
analyzed: ānitā asi mayā bhadre teja upaharatā asatām

original: BhP_10.60.020/1 udāsīnā vayaṃ nūnaṃ na stry-apatyārtha-kāmukāḥ
analyzed: udāsīnāḥ vayam nūnam na strī apatya artha kāmukāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.020/3 ātma-labdhyāsmahe pūrṇā gehayor jyotir-akriyāḥ
analyzed: ātma labdhyā āsmahe pūrṇāḥ gehayoḥ jyotiḥ akriyāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.021/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.021/1 etāvad uktvā bhagavān ātmānaṃ vallabhām iva
analyzed: etāvat uktvā bhagavān ātmānam vallabhām iva

original: BhP_10.60.021/3 manyamānām aviśleṣāt tad-darpa-ghna upāramat
analyzed: manyamānām aviśleṣāt tad darpa ghnaḥ upāramat

original: BhP_10.60.022/1 iti trilokeśa-pates tadātmanaḥ priyasya devy aśruta-pūrvam apriyam
analyzed: iti triloka īśa pateḥ tad ātmanaḥ priyasya devi a śruta pūrvam apriyam

original: BhP_10.60.022/3 āśrutya bhītā hṛdi jāta-vepathuś cintāṃ durantāṃ rudatī jagāma ha
analyzed: āśrutya bhītā hṛdi jāta vepathuḥ cintām durantām rudatī jagāma ha

original: BhP_10.60.023/1 padā su-jātena nakhāruṇa-śrīyā bhuvaṃ likhanty aśrubhir añjanāsitaiḥ
analyzed: padā sujātena nakha aruṇa śrīyāḥ bhuvam likhanti aśrubhiḥ añjana asitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.023/3 āsiñcatī kuṅkuma-rūṣitau stanau tasthāv adho-mukhy ati-duḥkha-ruddha-vāk
analyzed: āsiñcatī kuṅkuma rūṣitau stanau tasthau adhomukhī ati duḥkha ruddha vāc

original: BhP_10.60.024/1 tasyāḥ su-duḥkha-bhaya-śoka-vinaṣṭa-buddher
analyzed: tasyāḥ su duḥkha bhaya śoka vinaṣṭa buddheḥ

original: BhP_10.60.024/2 hastāc chlathad-valayato vyajanaṃ papāta
analyzed: hastāt ślathat valayataḥ vyajanam papāta

original: BhP_10.60.024/3 dehaś ca viklava-dhiyaḥ sahasaiva muhyan
analyzed: dehaḥ ca viklava dhiyaḥ sahasā eva muhyan

original: BhP_10.60.024/4 rambheva vāyu-vihato pravikīrya keśān
analyzed: rambhā iva vāyu vihato pravikīrya keśān

original: BhP_10.60.025/1 tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ priyāyāḥ prema-bandhanam
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ priyāyāḥ prema bandhanam

original: BhP_10.60.025/3 hāsya-prauḍhim ajānantyāḥ karuṇaḥ so 'nvakampata
analyzed: hāsya prauḍhim a jānantyāḥ karuṇaḥ saḥ nu akampata

original: BhP_10.60.026/1 paryaṅkād avaruhyāśu tām utthāpya catur-bhujaḥ
analyzed: paryaṅkāt avaruhya āśu tām utthāpya caturbhujaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.026/3 keśān samuhya tad-vaktraṃ prāmṛjat padma-pāṇinā
analyzed: keśān samuhya tad vaktram prāmṛjat padma pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.60.027/1 pramṛjyāśru-kale netre stanau copahatau śucā
analyzed: pramṛjya aśru kale netre stanau ca upahatau śucā

original: BhP_10.60.027/3 āśliṣya bāhunā rājan ananya-viṣayāṃ satīm
analyzed: āśliṣya bāhunā rājan ananya viṣayām satīm

original: BhP_10.60.028/1 sāntvayām āsa sāntva-jñaḥ kṛpayā kṛpaṇāṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: sāntvayām āsa sāntva jñaḥ kṛpayā kṛpaṇām prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.60.028/3 hāsya-prauḍhi-bhramac-cittām atad-arhāṃ satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: hāsya prauḍhi bhramat cittām a tad arhām satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.029/1 mā mā vaidarbhy asūyethā jāne tvāṃ mat-parāyaṇām
analyzed: mā mā vaidarbhi asūyethāḥ jāne tvām mad parāyaṇām

original: BhP_10.60.029/3 tvad-vacaḥ śrotu-kāmena kṣvelyācaritam aṅgane
analyzed: tvad vacaḥ śrotu kāmena kṣvelyā ācaritam aṅgane

original: BhP_10.60.030/1 mukhaṃ ca prema-saṃrambha- sphuritādharam īkṣitum
analyzed: mukham ca prema saṃrambha sphurita adharam īkṣitum

original: BhP_10.60.030/3 kaṭā-kṣepāruṇāpāṅgaṃ sundara-bhru-kuṭī-taṭam
analyzed: kaṭa ākṣepa aruṇa apāṅgam sundara bhrukuṭi taṭam

original: BhP_10.60.031/1 ayaṃ hi paramo lābho gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinām
analyzed: ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_10.60.031/3 yan narmair īyate yāmaḥ priyayā bhīru bhāmini
analyzed: yat narmaiḥ īyate yāmaḥ priyayā bhīru bhāmini

original: BhP_10.60.032/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.032/1 saivaṃ bhagavatā rājan vaidarbhī parisāntvitā
analyzed: sā evam bhagavatā rājan vaidarbhī parisāntvitā

original: BhP_10.60.032/3 jñātvā tat-parihāsoktiṃ priya-tyāga-bhayaṃ jahau
analyzed: jñātvā tad parihāsa uktim priya tyāga bhayam jahau

original: BhP_10.60.033/1 babhāṣa ṛṣabhaṃ puṃsāṃ vīkṣantī bhagavan-mukham
analyzed: babhāṣa ṛṣabham puṃsām vīkṣantī bhagavat mukham

original: BhP_10.60.033/3 sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-rucira- snigdhāpāṅgena bhārata
analyzed: sa vrīḍa hāsa rucira snigdha apāṅgena bhārata

original: BhP_10.60.034/0 śrī-rukmiṇy uvāca
analyzed: śrī rukmiṇī uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.034/1 nanv evam etad aravinda-vilocanāha yad vai bhavān bhagavato 'sadṛśī vibhūmnaḥ
analyzed: nanu evam etat aravinda vilocanā āha yat vai bhavān sadṛśī vibhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.034/3 kva sve mahimny abhirato bhagavāṃs try-adhīśaḥ kvāhaṃ guṇa-prakṛtir ajña-gṛhīta-pādā
analyzed: kva sve mahimni abhirataḥ bhagavān tryadhīśaḥ kva aham guṇa prakṛtiḥ ajña gṛhīta pādā

original: BhP_10.60.035/1 satyaṃ bhayād iva guṇebhya urukramāntaḥ
analyzed: satyam bhayāt iva guṇebhyaḥ uru krama antaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.035/2 śete samudra upalambhana-mātra ātmā
analyzed: śete samudre upalambhana mātraḥ ātmā

original: BhP_10.60.035/3 nityaṃ kad-indriya-gaṇaiḥ kṛta-vigrahas tvaṃ
analyzed: nityam kad indriya gaṇaiḥ kṛta vigrahaḥ tvam

original: BhP_10.60.035/4 tvat-sevakair nṛpa-padaṃ vidhutaṃ tamo 'ndham
analyzed: tvad sevakaiḥ nṛpa padam vidhutam tamaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.036/1 tvat-pāda-padma-makaranda-juṣāṃ munīnāṃ
analyzed: tvad pāda padma makaranda juṣām munīnām

original: BhP_10.60.036/2 vartmāsphuṭaṃ nr-paśubhir nanu durvibhāvyam
analyzed: vartma asphuṭam nṛ paśubhiḥ nanu durvibhāvyam

original: BhP_10.60.036/3 yasmād alaukikam ivehitam īśvarasya
analyzed: yasmāt alaukikam iva īhitam īśvarasya

original: BhP_10.60.036/4 bhūmaṃs tavehitam atho anu ye bhavantam
analyzed: bhūman tava īhitam atha u anu ye bhavantam

original: BhP_10.60.037/1 niṣkiñcano nanu bhavān na yato 'sti kiñcid
analyzed: niṣkiñcanaḥ nanu bhavān na yatas sti kiñcid

original: BhP_10.60.037/2 yasmai baliṃ bali-bhujo 'pi haranty ajādyāḥ
analyzed: yasmai balim balibhujaḥ pi haranti aja ādyāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.037/3 na tvā vidanty asu-tṛpo 'ntakam āḍhyatāndhāḥ
analyzed: na tvā vidanti asutṛpaḥ ntakam āḍhya tā andhāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.037/4 preṣṭho bhavān bali-bhujām api te 'pi tubhyam
analyzed: preṣṭhaḥ bhavān balibhujām api te pi tubhyam

original: BhP_10.60.038/1 tvaṃ vai samasta-puruṣārtha-mayaḥ phalātmā
analyzed: tvam vai samasta puruṣa artha mayaḥ phala ātmā

original: BhP_10.60.038/2 yad-vāñchayā su-matayo visṛjanti kṛtsnam
analyzed: yad vāñchayā sumatayaḥ visṛjanti kṛtsnam

original: BhP_10.60.038/3 teṣāṃ vibho samucito bhavataḥ samājaḥ
analyzed: teṣām vibho samucitaḥ bhavataḥ samājaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.038/4 puṃsaḥ striyāś ca ratayoḥ sukha-duḥkhinor na
analyzed: puṃsaḥ striyāḥ ca ratayoḥ sukha duḥkhinoḥ na

original: BhP_10.60.039/1 tvaṃ nyasta-daṇḍa-munibhir gaditānubhāva
analyzed: tvam nyasta daṇḍa munibhiḥ gadita anubhāva

original: BhP_10.60.039/2 ātmātma-daś ca jagatām iti me vṛto 'si
analyzed: ātmā ātma daḥ ca jagatām iti me vṛtaḥ si

original: BhP_10.60.039/3 hitvā bhavad-bhruva udīrita-kāla-vega-
analyzed: hitvā bhavat bhruvaḥ udīrita kāla vega

original: BhP_10.60.039/4 dhvastāśiṣo 'bja-bhava-nāka-patīn kuto 'nye
analyzed: dhvasta āśiṣaḥ bja bhava nāka patīn kutas nye

original: BhP_10.60.040/1 jāḍyaṃ vacas tava gadāgraja yas tu bhūpān
analyzed: jāḍyam vacaḥ tava gadāgraja yaḥ tu bhūpān

original: BhP_10.60.040/2 vidrāvya śārṅga-ninadena jahartha māṃ tvam
analyzed: vidrāvya śārṅga ninadena jahartha mām tvam

original: BhP_10.60.040/3 siṃho yathā sva-balim īśa paśūn sva-bhāgaṃ
analyzed: siṃhaḥ yathā sva balim īśa paśūn sva bhāgam

original: BhP_10.60.040/4 tebhyo bhayād yad udadhiṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ bhayāt yat udadhim śaraṇam prapannaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.041/1 yad-vāñchayā nṛpa-śikhāmaṇayo 'nga-vainya-
analyzed: yad vāñchayā nṛpa śikhāmaṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.041/2 jāyanta-nāhuṣa-gayādaya aikya-patyam
analyzed: jāyanta nāhuṣa gaya ādayaḥ aikya apatyam

original: BhP_10.60.041/3 rājyaṃ visṛjya viviśur vanam ambujākṣa
analyzed: rājyam visṛjya viviśuḥ vanam ambuja akṣa

original: BhP_10.60.041/4 sīdanti te 'nupadavīṃ ta ihāsthitāḥ kim
analyzed: sīdanti te nu padavīm te iha āsthitāḥ kim

original: BhP_10.60.042/1 kānyaṃ śrayeta tava pāda-saroja-gandham
analyzed: kā anyam śrayeta tava pāda saroja gandham

original: BhP_10.60.042/2 āghrāya san-mukharitaṃ janatāpavargam
analyzed: āghrāya sat mukharitam janatā apavargam

original: BhP_10.60.042/3 lakṣmy-ālayaṃ tv avigaṇayya guṇālayasya
analyzed: lakṣmī ālayam tu a vigaṇayya guṇālayasya

original: BhP_10.60.042/4 martyā sadoru-bhayam artha-viviita-dṛṣṭiḥ
analyzed: martyā sadoḥ ubhayam

original: BhP_10.60.043/1 taṃ tvānurūpam abhajaṃ jagatām adhīśam
analyzed: tam tvā anurūpam abhajam jagatām adhīśam

original: BhP_10.60.043/2 ātmānam atra ca paratra ca kāma-pūram
analyzed: ātmānam atra ca paratra ca kāma pūram

original: BhP_10.60.043/3 syān me tavāṅghrir araṇaṃ sṛtibhir bhramantyā
analyzed: syāt me tava aṅghriḥ araṇam sṛtibhiḥ bhramantyā

original: BhP_10.60.043/4 yo vai bhajantam upayāty anṛtāpavargaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vai bhajantam upayāti anṛta apavargaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.044/1 tasyāḥ syur acyuta nṛpā bhavatopadiṣṭāḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ syuḥ acyuta nṛpāḥ bhavatā upadiṣṭāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.044/2 strīṇāṃ gṛheṣu khara-go-śva-viḍāla-bhṛtyāḥ
analyzed: strīṇām gṛheṣu khara go śva viḍāla bhṛtyāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.044/3 yat-karṇa-mūlam an-karṣaṇa nopayāyād
analyzed: yat karṇa mūlam an karṣaṇa na upayāyāt

original: BhP_10.60.044/4 yuṣmat-kathā mṛḍa-viriñca-sabhāsu gītā
analyzed: yuṣmad kathā mṛḍa viriñca sabhāsu gītā

original: BhP_10.60.045/1 tvak-śmaśru-roma-nakha-keśa-pinaddham antar
analyzed: tvak śmaśru roma nakha keśa pinaddham antar

original: BhP_10.60.045/2 māṃsāsthi-rakta-kṛmi-viṭ-kapha-pitta-vātam
BhP_10.60.045/3 jīvac-chavaṃ bhajati kānta-matir vimūḍhā
analyzed: jīvat śavam bhajati kānta matiḥ vimūḍhā

original: BhP_10.60.045/4 yā te padābja-makarandam ajighratī strī
analyzed: yā te pada abja makarandam a jighratī strī

original: BhP_10.60.046/1 astv ambujākṣa mama te caraṇānurāga
analyzed: astu ambuja akṣa mama te caraṇa anurāga

original: BhP_10.60.046/2 ātman ratasya mayi cānatirikta-dṛṣṭeḥ
analyzed: ātman ratasya mayi ca anatirikta dṛṣṭeḥ

original: BhP_10.60.046/3 yarhy asya vṛddhaya upātta-rajo-'ti-mātro
analyzed: yarhi asya vṛddhaye upātta rajoti mātraḥ

original: BhP_10.60.046/4 mām īkṣase tad u ha naḥ paramānukampā
analyzed: mām īkṣase tat u ha naḥ paramā anukampā

original: BhP_10.60.047/1 naivālīkam ahaṃ manye vacas te madhusūdana
analyzed: na eva alīkam aham manye vacaḥ te madhusūdana

original: BhP_10.60.047/3 ambāyā eva hi prāyaḥ kanyāyāḥ syād ratiḥ kvacit
analyzed: ambāyāḥ eva hi prāyas kanyāyāḥ syāt ratiḥ kvacid

original: BhP_10.60.048/1 vyūḍhāyāś cāpi puṃścalyā mano 'bhyeti navaṃ navam
analyzed: vyūḍhāyāḥ ca api puṃścalyāḥ manaḥ bhyeti navam navam

original: BhP_10.60.048/3 budho 'satīṃ na bibhṛyāt tāṃ bibhrad ubhaya-cyutaḥ
analyzed: budhaḥ satīm na bibhṛyāt tām bibhrat ubhaya cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.049/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.049/1 sādhvy etac-chrotu-kāmais tvaṃ rāja-putrī pralambhitā
analyzed: sādhvi etad śrotu kāmaiḥ tvam rāja putrī pralambhitā

original: BhP_10.60.049/3 mayoditaṃ yad anvāttha sarvaṃ tat satyam eva hi
analyzed: mayā uditam yat anvāttha sarvam tat satyam eva hi

original: BhP_10.60.050/1 yān yān kāmayase kāmān mayy akāmāya bhāmini
analyzed: yān yān kāmayase kāmān mayi akāmāya bhāmini

original: BhP_10.60.050/3 santi hy ekānta-bhaktāyās tava kalyāṇi nityada
analyzed: santi hi ekānta bhaktāyāḥ tava kalyāṇi nitya da

original: BhP_10.60.051/1 upalabdhaṃ pati-prema pāti-vratyaṃ ca te 'naghe
analyzed: upalabdham pati prema pātivratyam ca te naghe

original: BhP_10.60.051/3 yad vākyaiś cālyamānāyā na dhīr mayy apakarṣitā
analyzed: yat vākyaiḥ cālyamānāyāḥ na dhīḥ mayi apakarṣitā

original: BhP_10.60.052/1 ye māṃ bhajanti dāmpatye tapasā vrata-caryayā
analyzed: ye mām bhajanti dāmpatye tapasā vrata caryayā

original: BhP_10.60.052/3 kāmātmāno 'pavargeśaṃ mohitā mama māyayā
analyzed: pavarga īśam mohitāḥ mama māyayā

original: BhP_10.60.053/1 māṃ prāpya māniny apavarga-sampadaṃ
analyzed: mām prāpya māninī apavarga sampadam

original: BhP_10.60.053/2 vāñchanti ye sampada eva tat-patim
analyzed: vāñchanti ye sampadaḥ eva tad patim

original: BhP_10.60.053/3 te manda-bhāgā niraye 'pi ye nṛṇāṃ
analyzed: te mandabhāgāḥ niraye ye nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.60.053/4 mātrātmakatvāt nirayaḥ su-saṅgamaḥ
BhP_10.60.054/1 diṣṭyā gṛheśvary asakṛn mayi tvayā kṛtānuvṛttir bhava-mocanī khalaiḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā gṛheśvari asakṛt mayi tvayā kṛta anuvṛttiḥ bhava mocanī khalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.60.054/3 su-duṣkarāsau sutarāṃ durāśiṣo hy asuṃ-bharāyā nikṛtiṃ juṣaḥ striyāḥ
analyzed: su duṣkarā asau sutarām durāśiṣaḥ hi asuṃbharāyāḥ nikṛtim juṣaḥ striyāḥ

original: BhP_10.60.055/1 na tvādṛśīm praṇayinīṃ gṛhiṇīṃ gṛheṣu
analyzed: na tvādṛśīm praṇayinīm gṛhiṇīm gṛheṣu

original: BhP_10.60.055/2 paśyāmi mānini yayā sva-vivāha-kāle
analyzed: paśyāmi mānini yayā sva vivāha kāle

original: BhP_10.60.055/3 prāptān nṛpān na vigaṇayya raho-haro me
analyzed: prāptān nṛpān na vigaṇayya rahoharaḥ me

original: BhP_10.60.055/4 prasthāpito dvija upaśruta-sat-kathasya
analyzed: prasthāpitaḥ dvijaḥ upaśruta sat kathasya

original: BhP_10.60.056/1 bhrātur virūpa-karaṇaṃ yudhi nirjitasya
analyzed: bhrātuḥ virūpa karaṇam yudhi nirjitasya

original: BhP_10.60.056/2 prodvāha-parvaṇi ca tad-vadham akṣa-goṣṭhyām
analyzed: prodvāha parvaṇi ca tad vadham akṣa goṣṭhyām

original: BhP_10.60.056/3 duḥkhaṃ samuttham asaho 'smad-ayoga-bhītyā
analyzed: duḥkham samuttham asaho smad ayoga bhītyā

original: BhP_10.60.056/4 naivābravīḥ kim api tena vayaṃ jitās te
analyzed: na eva abravīḥ kim api tena vayam jitāḥ te

original: BhP_10.60.057/1 dūtas tvayātma-labhane su-vivikta-mantraḥ
analyzed: dūtaḥ tvayā ātma labhane su vivikta mantraḥ

original: BhP_10.60.057/2 prasthāpito mayi cirāyati śūnyam etat
analyzed: prasthāpitaḥ mayi cirāyati śūnyam etat

original: BhP_10.60.057/3 matvā jihāsa idaṃ aṅgam ananya-yogyaṃ
analyzed: matvā jihāse idam aṅgam an anya yogyam

original: BhP_10.60.057/4 tiṣṭheta tat tvayi vayaṃ pratinandayāmaḥ
analyzed: tiṣṭheta tat tvayi vayam pratinandayāmaḥ

original: BhP_10.60.058/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.60.058/1 evaṃ saurata-saṃlāpair bhagavān jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam saurata saṃlāpaiḥ bhagavān jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.60.058/3 sva-rato ramayā reme nara-lokaṃ viḍambayan
analyzed: svarataḥ ramayā reme nara lokam viḍambayan

original: BhP_10.60.059/1 tathānyāsām api vibhur gṛhesu gṛhavān iva
analyzed: tathā anyāsām api vibhuḥ gṛhesu gṛhavān iva

original: BhP_10.60.059/3 āsthito gṛha-medhīyān dharmān loka-gurur hariḥ
analyzed: āsthitaḥ gṛhamedhīyān dharmān loka guruḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.61.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.61.001/1 ekaikaśas tāḥ kṛṣṇasya putrān daśa-daśābaāḥ
analyzed: ekaikaśas tāḥ kṛṣṇasya putrān daśa daśa ābaāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.001/3 ajījanann anavamān pituḥ sarvātma-sampadā
analyzed: ajījanan anavamān pituḥ sarva ātma sampadā

original: BhP_10.61.002/1 gṛhād anapagaṃ vīkṣya rāja-putryo 'cyutaṃ sthitam
analyzed: gṛhāt anapagam vīkṣya cyutam sthitam

original: BhP_10.61.002/3 preṣṭhaṃ nyamaṃsata svaṃ svaṃ na tat-tattva-vidaḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: preṣṭham nyamaṃsata svam svam na tad tattva vidaḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.003/1 cārv-abja-kośa-vadanāyata-bāhu-netra-
analyzed: cāru abja kośa vadana āyata bāhu netra

original: BhP_10.61.003/2 sa-prema-hāsa-rasa-vīkṣita-valgu-jalpaiḥ
analyzed: sa prema hāsa rasa vīkṣita valgu jalpaiḥ

original: BhP_10.61.003/3 sammohitā bhagavato na mano vijetuṃ
analyzed: sammohitāḥ bhagavataḥ na manaḥ vijetum

original: BhP_10.61.003/4 svair vibhramaiḥ samaśakan vanitā vibhūmnaḥ
analyzed: svaiḥ vibhramaiḥ samaśakan vanitāḥ vibhūmnaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.004/1 smāyāvaloka-lava-darśita-bhāva-hāri
BhP_10.61.004/2 bhrū-maṇḍala-prahita-saurata-mantra-śauṇḍaiḥ
analyzed: bhrūmaṇḍala prahita saurata mantra śauṇḍaiḥ

original: BhP_10.61.004/3 patnyas tu śoḍaśa-sahasram anaṅga-bāṇair
analyzed: patnyaḥ tu anaṅga bāṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.61.004/4 yasyendriyaṃ vimathitum karaṇair na śekuḥ
analyzed: yasya indriyam vimathitum karaṇaiḥ na śekuḥ

original: BhP_10.61.005/1 itthaṃ ramā-patim avāpya patiṃ striyas tā
analyzed: ittham ramā patim avāpya patim striyaḥ tāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.005/2 brahmādayo 'pi na viduḥ padavīṃ yadīyām
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ na viduḥ padavīm yadīyām

original: BhP_10.61.005/3 bhejur mudāviratam edhitayānurāga-
analyzed: bhejuḥ mudā a viratam edhitayā anurāga

original: BhP_10.61.005/4 hāsāvaloka-nava-saṅgama-lālasādyam
BhP_10.61.006/1 pratyudgamāsana-varārhaṇa-pāda-śauca-
analyzed: pratyudgama āsana vara arhaṇa pāda śauca

original: BhP_10.61.006/2 tāmbūla-viśramaṇa-vījana-gandha-mālyaiḥ
analyzed: tāmbūla viśramaṇa vījana gandha mālyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.61.006/3 keśa-prasāra-śayana-snapanopahāryaiḥ
analyzed: keśa prasāra śayana snapana upahāryaiḥ

original: BhP_10.61.006/4 dāsī-śatā api vibhor vidadhuḥ sma dāsyam
analyzed: dāsī śatāḥ api vibhoḥ vidadhuḥ sma dāsyam

original: BhP_10.61.007/1 tāsāṃ yā daśa-putrāṇāṃ kṛṣṇa-strīṇāṃ puroditāḥ
analyzed: tāsām yāḥ daśa putrāṇām kṛṣṇa strīṇām purā uditāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.007/3 aṣṭau mahiṣyas tat-putrān pradyumnādīn gṛṇāmi te
analyzed: aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ tad putrān pradyumna ādīn gṛṇāmi te

original: BhP_10.61.008/1 cārudeṣṇaḥ sudeṣṇaś ca cārudehaś ca vīryavān
analyzed: cārudeṣṇaḥ sudeṣṇaḥ ca cārudehaḥ ca vīryavān

original: BhP_10.61.008/3 sucāruś cāruguptaś ca bhadracārus tathāparaḥ
analyzed: sucāruḥ cāruguptaḥ ca bhadracāruḥ tathā aparaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.009/1 cārucandro vicāruś ca cāruś ca daśamo hareḥ
analyzed: cārucandraḥ vicāruḥ ca cāruḥ ca daśamaḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_10.61.009/3 pradyumna-pramukhā jātā rukmiṇyāṃ nāvamāḥ pituḥ
analyzed: pradyumna pramukhāḥ jātāḥ rukmiṇyām na avamāḥ pituḥ

original: BhP_10.61.010/1 bhānuḥ subhānuḥ svarbhānuḥ prabhānur bhānumāṃs tathā
BhP_10.61.010/3 candrabhānur bṛhadbhānur atibhānus tathāṣṭamaḥ
analyzed: candrabhānuḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ atibhānuḥ tathā aṣṭamaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.011/1 śrībhānuḥ pratibhānuś ca satyabhāmātmajā daśa
analyzed: śrībhānuḥ pratibhānuḥ ca satyabhāmā ātmajāḥ daśa

original: BhP_10.61.011/3 sāmbaḥ sumitraḥ purujic chatajic ca sahasrajit
analyzed: sāmbaḥ sumitraḥ purujit śatajit ca sahasrajit

original: BhP_10.61.012/1 viyayaś citraketuś ca vasumān draviḍaḥ kratuḥ
analyzed: viyayaḥ citraketuḥ ca vasumān draviḍaḥ kratuḥ

original: BhP_10.61.012/3 jāmbavatyāḥ sutā hy ete sāmbādyāḥ pitṛ-sammatāḥ
analyzed: jāmbavatyāḥ sutāḥ hi ete sāmba ādyāḥ pitṛ sammatāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.013/1 vīraś candro 'śvasenaś ca citragur vegavān vṛṣaḥ
analyzed: vīraḥ candraḥ śvasenaḥ ca citraguḥ vegavān vṛṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.013/3 āmaḥ śaṅkur vasuḥ śrīmān kuntir nāgnajiteḥ sutāḥ
analyzed: āmaḥ śaṅkuḥ vasuḥ śrīmān kuntiḥ nāgnajiteḥ sutāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.014/1 śrutaḥ kavir vṛṣo vīraḥ subāhur bhadra ekalaḥ
analyzed: śrutaḥ kaviḥ vṛṣaḥ vīraḥ subāhuḥ bhadraḥ ekalaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.014/3 śāntir darśaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ kālindyāḥ somako 'varaḥ
analyzed: śāntiḥ darśaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ kālindyāḥ somakaḥ varaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.015/1 praghoṣo gātravān siṃho balaḥ prabala ūrdhagaḥ
analyzed: praghoṣaḥ gātravān siṃhaḥ balaḥ prabalaḥ ūrdhagaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.015/3 mādryāḥ putrā mahāśaktiḥ saha ojo 'parājitaḥ
analyzed: mādryāḥ putrāḥ mahāśaktiḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ parājitaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.016/1 vṛko harṣo 'nilo gṛdhro vardhanonnāda eva ca
BhP_10.61.016/3 mahāṃsaḥ pāvano vahnir mitravindātmajāḥ kṣudhiḥ
BhP_10.61.017/1 saṅgrāmajid bṛhatsenaḥ śūraḥ praharaṇo 'rijit
analyzed: saṅgrāma jit bṛhat senaḥ śūraḥ praharaṇaḥ ri jit

original: BhP_10.61.017/3 jayaḥ subhadro bhadrāyā vāma āyuś ca satyakaḥ
analyzed: jayaḥ subhadraḥ bhadrāyāḥ vāmaḥ āyuḥ ca satyakaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.018/1 dīptimāṃs tāmrataptādyā rohiṇyās tanayā hareḥ
analyzed: dīptimān tāmratapta ādyāḥ rohiṇyāḥ tanayāḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_10.61.018/3 pradyamnāc cāniruddho 'bhūd rukmavatyāṃ mahā-balaḥ
analyzed: pradyamnāt ca aniruddhaḥ bhūt rukmavatyām mahā balaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.018/5 putryāṃ tu rukmiṇo rājan nāmnā bhojakaṭe pure
analyzed: putryām tu rukmiṇaḥ rājan nāmnā bhojakaṭe pure

original: BhP_10.61.019/1 eteṣāṃ putra-pautrāś ca babhūvuḥ koṭiśo nṛpa
analyzed: eteṣām putra pautrāḥ ca babhūvuḥ koṭiśas nṛpa

original: BhP_10.61.019/3 mātaraḥ kṛṣṇa-jātīnāṃ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa
analyzed: mātaraḥ kṛṣṇa jātīnām sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa

original: BhP_10.61.020/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.61.020/1 kathaṃ rukmy arī-putrāya prādād duhitaraṃ yudhi
analyzed: katham rukmī arī putrāya prādāt duhitaram yudhi

original: BhP_10.61.020/3 kṛṣṇena paribhūtas taṃ hantuṃ randhraṃ pratīkṣate
analyzed: kṛṣṇena paribhūtaḥ tam hantum randhram pratīkṣate

original: BhP_10.61.020/5 etad ākhyāhi me vidvan dviṣor vaivāhikaṃ mithaḥ
analyzed: etat ākhyāhi me vidvan dviṣoḥ vaivāhikam mithas

original: BhP_10.61.021/1 anāgatam atītaṃ ca vartamānam atīndriyam
analyzed: anāgatam atītam ca vartamānam atīndriyam

original: BhP_10.61.021/3 viprakṛṣṭaṃ vyavahitaṃ samyak paśyanti yoginaḥ
analyzed: viprakṛṣṭam vyavahitam samyak paśyanti yoginaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.022/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.61.022/1 vṛtaḥ svayaṃ-vare sākṣād anaṇgo 'ṇga-yutas tayā
analyzed: vṛtaḥ svayaṃvare sākṣāt an aṇgaḥ ṇga yutaḥ tayā

original: BhP_10.61.022/3 rājñaḥ sametān nirjitya jahāraika-ratho yudhi
analyzed: rājñaḥ sametān nirjitya jahāra eka rathaḥ yudhi

original: BhP_10.61.023/1 yady apy anusmaran vairaṃ rukmī kṛṣṇāvamānitaḥ
analyzed: yadi api anusmaran vairam rukmī kṛṣṇa avamānitaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.023/3 vyatarad bhāgineyāya sutāṃ kurvan svasuḥ priyam
analyzed: vyatarat bhāgineyāya sutām kurvan svasuḥ priyam

original: BhP_10.61.024/1 rukmiṇyās tanayāṃ rājan kṛtavarma-suto balī
analyzed: rukmiṇyāḥ tanayām rājan kṛtavarma sutaḥ balī

original: BhP_10.61.024/3 upayeme viśālākṣīṃ kanyāṃ cārumatīṃ kila
analyzed: upayeme viśāla akṣīm kanyām cārumatīm kila

original: BhP_10.61.025/1 dauhitrāyāniruddhāya pautrīṃ rukmy ādadād dhareḥ
analyzed: dauhitrāya aniruddhāya pautrīm rukmī ādadāt hareḥ

original: BhP_10.61.025/3 rocanāṃ baddha-vairo 'pi svasuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: rocanām baddha vairaḥ pi svasuḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.61.025/5 jānann adharmaṃ tad yaunaṃ sneha-pāśānubandhanaḥ
analyzed: jānan adharmam tat yaunam sneha pāśa anubandhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.026/1 tasminn abhyudaye rājan rukmiṇī rāma-keśavau
analyzed: tasmin abhyudaye rājan rukmiṇī rāma keśavau

original: BhP_10.61.026/3 puraṃ bhojakaṭaṃ jagmuḥ sāmba-pradyumnakādayaḥ
analyzed: puram bhoja kaṭam jagmuḥ sāmba pradyumnaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.027/1 tasmin nivṛtta udvāhe kāliṅga-pramukhā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: tasmin nivṛtte udvāhe kāliṅga pramukhāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.027/3 dṛptās te rukmiṇaṃ procur balam akṣair vinirjaya
analyzed: dṛptāḥ te rukmiṇam procuḥ balam akṣaiḥ vinirjaya

original: BhP_10.61.028/1 anakṣa-jño hy ayaṃ rājann api tad-vyasanaṃ mahat
analyzed: an akṣa jñaḥ hi ayam rājan api tad vyasanam mahat

original: BhP_10.61.028/3 ity ukto balam āhūya tenākṣair rukmy adīvyata
analyzed: iti uktaḥ balam āhūya tena akṣaiḥ rukmī adīvyata

original: BhP_10.61.029/1 śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ rāmas tatrādade paṇam
analyzed: śatam sahasram ayutam rāmaḥ tatra ādade paṇam

original: BhP_10.61.029/3 taṃ tu rukmy ajayat tatra kāliṅgaḥ prāhasad balam
analyzed: tam tu rukmī ajayat tatra kāliṅgaḥ prāhasat balam

original: BhP_10.61.029/5 dantān sandarśayann uccair nāmṛṣyat tad dhalāyudhaḥ
analyzed: dantān sandarśayan uccais na amṛṣyat tat halāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.030/1 tato lakṣaṃ rukmy agṛhṇād glahaṃ tatrājayad balaḥ
analyzed: tatas lakṣam rukmī agṛhṇāt glaham tatra ajayat balaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.030/3 jitavān aham ity āha rukmī kaitavam āśritaḥ
analyzed: jitavān aham iti āha rukmī kaitavam āśritaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.031/1 manyunā kṣubhitaḥ śrīmān samudra iva parvaṇi
analyzed: manyunā kṣubhitaḥ śrīmān samudraḥ iva parvaṇi

original: BhP_10.61.031/3 jātyāruṇākṣo 'ti-ruṣā nyarbudaṃ glaham ādade
analyzed: jātyā aruṇa akṣaḥ tiruṣā nyarbudam glaham ādade

original: BhP_10.61.032/1 taṃ cāpi jitavān rāmo dharmeṇa chalam āśritaḥ
analyzed: tam ca api jitavān rāmaḥ dharmeṇa chalam āśritaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.032/3 rukmī jitaṃ mayātreme vadantu prāśnikā iti
analyzed: rukmī jitam mayā atra ime vadantu prāśnikāḥ iti

original: BhP_10.61.033/1 tadābravīn nabho-vāṇī balenaiva jito glahaḥ
analyzed: tadā abravīt nabhaḥ vāṇī balena eva jitaḥ glahaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.033/3 dharmato vacanenaiva rukmī vadati vai mṛṣā
analyzed: dharmataḥ vacanena eva rukmī vadati vai mṛṣā

original: BhP_10.61.034/1 tām anādṛtya vaidarbho duṣṭa-rājanya-coditaḥ
analyzed: tām an ādṛtya vaidarbhaḥ duṣṭa rājanya coditaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.034/3 saṅkarṣaṇaṃ parihasan babhāṣe kāla-coditaḥ
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇam parihasan babhāṣe kāla coditaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.035/1 naivākṣa-kovidā yūyaṃ gopālā vana-gocarāḥ
analyzed: na eva akṣa kovidāḥ yūyam gopālāḥ vana gocarāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.035/3 akṣair dīvyanti rājāno bāṇaiś ca na bhavādṛśāḥ
analyzed: akṣaiḥ dīvyanti rājānaḥ bāṇaiḥ ca na bhavādṛśāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.036/1 rukmiṇaivam adhikṣipto rājabhiś copahāsitaḥ
analyzed: rukmiṇā evam adhikṣiptaḥ rājabhiḥ ca upahāsitaḥ

original: BhP_10.61.036/3 kruddhaḥ parigham udyamya jaghne taṃ nṛmṇa-saṃsadi
analyzed: kruddhaḥ parigham udyamya jaghne tam nṛmṇa saṃsadi

original: BhP_10.61.037/1 kaliṅga-rājaṃ tarasā gṛhītvā daśame pade
analyzed: kaliṅga rājam tarasā gṛhītvā daśame pade

original: BhP_10.61.037/3 dantān apātayat kruddho yo 'hasad vivṛtair dvijaiḥ
analyzed: dantān apātayat kruddhaḥ yaḥ hasat vivṛtaiḥ dvijaiḥ

original: BhP_10.61.038/1 anye nirbhinna-bāhūru- śiraso rudhirokṣitāḥ
analyzed: anye nirbhinna bāhu ūru śirasaḥ rudhira ukṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.038/3 rājāno dudravar bhītā balena paṅghārditāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ dudravar bhītāḥ balena paṅgha arditāḥ

original: BhP_10.61.039/1 nihate rukmiṇi śyāle nābravīt sādhv asādhu vā
analyzed: nihate rukmiṇi śyāle na abravīt sādhu asādhu vā

original: BhP_10.61.039/3 rakmiṇī-balayo rājan sneha-bhaṅga-bhayād dhariḥ
analyzed: rakmiṇī balayoḥ rājan sneha bhaṅga bhayāt hariḥ

original: BhP_10.61.040/1 tato 'niruddhaṃ saha sūryayā varaṃ rathaṃ samāropya yayuḥ kuśasthalīm
analyzed: tatas niruddham saha sūryayā varam ratham samāropya yayuḥ kuśasthalīm

original: BhP_10.61.040/3 rāmādayo bhojakaṭād daśārhāḥ siddhākhilārthā madhusūdanāśrayāḥ
analyzed: rāma ādayaḥ bhoja kaṭāt daśārhāḥ siddha akhila arthāḥ madhusūdana āśrayāḥ

original: BhP_10.62.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.62.001/1 bāṇasya tanayām ūṣām upayeme yadūttamaḥ
analyzed: bāṇasya tanayām ūṣām upayeme yadu uttamaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.001/3 tatra yuddham abhūd ghoraṃ hari-śaṅkarayor mahat
analyzed: tatra yuddham abhūt ghoram hari śaṅkarayoḥ mahat

original: BhP_10.62.001/5 etat sarvaṃ mahā-yogin samākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi
analyzed: etat sarvam mahā yogin samākhyātum tvam arhasi

original: BhP_10.62.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.62.002/1 bāṇaḥ putra-śata-jyeṣṭho baler āsīn mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: bāṇaḥ putra śata jyeṣṭhaḥ baleḥ āsīt mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.002/3 yena vāmana-rūpāya haraye 'dāyi medinī
analyzed: yena vāmana rūpāya haraye dāyi medinī

original: BhP_10.62.002/5 tasyaurasaḥ suto bānaḥ śiva-bhakti-rataḥ sadā
analyzed: tasya aurasaḥ sutaḥ bānaḥ śiva bhakti rataḥ sadā

original: BhP_10.62.002/1 mānyo vadānyo dhīmāṃś ca satya-sandho dṛḍha-vrataḥ
analyzed: mānyaḥ vadānyaḥ dhīmān ca satya sandhaḥ dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: BhP_10.62.002/3 śoṇitākhye pure ramye sa rājyam akarot purā
analyzed: śoṇita ākhye pure ramye sa rājyam akarot purā

original: BhP_10.62.002/5 tasya śambhoḥ prasādena kiṅkarā iva te 'marāḥ
analyzed: tasya śambhoḥ prasādena kiṅkarāḥ iva te marāḥ

original: BhP_10.62.002/1 sahasra-bāhur vādyena tāṇdave 'toṣayan mṛḍam
analyzed: sahasra bāhuḥ vādyena tāṇdave toṣayan mṛḍam

original: BhP_10.62.003/1 bhagavān sarva-bhūteśaḥ śaraṇyo bhakta-vatsalaḥ
BhP_10.62.003/3 vareṇa chandayām āsa sa taṃ vavre purādhipam
analyzed: vareṇa chandayām āsa sa tam vavre pura adhipam

original: BhP_10.62.004/1 sa ekadāha giriśaṃ pārśva-sthaṃ vīrya-durmadaḥ
analyzed: saḥ ekadā āha giriśam pārśva stham vīrya durmadaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.004/3 kirīṭenārka-varṇena saṃspṛśaṃs tat-padāmbujam
analyzed: kirīṭena arka varṇena saṃspṛśan tad pada ambujam

original: BhP_10.62.005/1 namasye tvāṃ mahā-deva lokānāṃ gurum īśvaram
analyzed: namasye tvām mahādeva lokānām gurum īśvaram

original: BhP_10.62.005/3 puṃsām apūrṇa-kāmānāṃ kāma-pūrāmarāṅghripam
analyzed: puṃsām a pūrṇa kāmānām kāma pūra amara aṅghripam

original: BhP_10.62.006/1 doḥ-sahasraṃ tvayā dattaṃ paraṃ bhārāya me 'bhavat
analyzed: dos sahasram tvayā dattam param bhārāya me bhavat

original: BhP_10.62.006/3 tri-lokyāṃ pratiyoddhāraṃ na labhe tvad ṛte samam
analyzed: trilokyām pratiyoddhāram na labhe tvat ṛte samam

original: BhP_10.62.007/1 kaṇḍūtyā nibhṛtair dorbhir yuyutsur dig-gajān aham
analyzed: kaṇḍūtyā nibhṛtaiḥ dorbhiḥ yuyutsuḥ diggajān aham

original: BhP_10.62.007/3 ādyāyāṃ cūrṇayann adrīn bhītās te 'pi pradudruvuḥ
analyzed: ādyāyām cūrṇayan adrīn bhītāḥ te pi pradudruvuḥ

original: BhP_10.62.008/1 tac chrutvā bhagavān kruddhaḥ ketus te bhajyate yadā
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhagavān kruddhaḥ ketuḥ te bhajyate yadā

original: BhP_10.62.008/3 tvad-darpa-ghnaṃ bhaven mūḍha saṃyugaṃ mat-samena te
analyzed: tvad darpa ghnam bhavet mūḍha saṃyugam mad samena te

original: BhP_10.62.009/1 ity uktaḥ kumatir hṛṣṭaḥ sva-gṛhaṃ prāviśan nṛpa
analyzed: iti uktaḥ kumatiḥ hṛṣṭaḥ sva gṛham prāviśat nṛpa

original: BhP_10.62.009/3 pratīkṣan giriśādeśaṃ sva-vīrya-naśanam kudhīḥ
analyzed: pratīkṣan giriśa ādeśam sva vīrya naśanam kudhīḥ

original: BhP_10.62.010/1 tasyoṣā nāma duhitā svapne prādyumninā ratim
analyzed: tasya uṣā nāma duhitā svapne prādyumninā ratim

original: BhP_10.62.010/3 kanyālabhata kāntena prāg adṛṣṭa-śrutena sā
analyzed: kanyā alabhata kāntena prāk adṛṣṭa śrutena sā

original: BhP_10.62.011/1 sā tatra tam apaśyantī kvāsi kānteti vādinī
analyzed: sā tatra tam a paśyantī kva asi kānta iti vādinī

original: BhP_10.62.011/3 sakhīnāṃ madhya uttasthau vihvalā vrīḍitā bhṛśam
analyzed: sakhīnām madhye uttasthau vihvalā vrīḍitā bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.62.012/1 bāṇasya mantrī kumbhāṇḍaś citralekhā ca tat-sutā
analyzed: bāṇasya mantrī kumbhāṇḍaḥ citralekhā ca tad sutā

original: BhP_10.62.012/3 sakhy apṛcchat sakhīm ūṣāṃ kautūhala-samanvitā
analyzed: sakhī apṛcchat sakhīm ūṣām kautūhala samanvitā

original: BhP_10.62.013/1 kaṃ tvaṃ mṛgayase su-bhru kīdṛśas te manorathaḥ
analyzed: kam tvam mṛgayase subhru kīdṛśaḥ te manorathaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.013/3 hasta-grāhaṃ na te 'dyāpi rāja-putry upalakṣaye
analyzed: hasta grāham na te rāja putri upalakṣaye

original: BhP_10.62.014/1 dṛṣṭaḥ kaścin naraḥ svapne śyāmaḥ kamala-locanaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kaścid naraḥ svapne śyāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.014/3 pīta-vāsā bṛhad-bāhur yoṣitāṃ hṛdayaṃ-gamaḥ
analyzed: pīta vāsāḥ bṛhat bāhuḥ yoṣitām hṛdayaṃgamaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.015/1 tam ahaṃ mṛgaye kāntaṃ pāyayitvādharaṃ madhu
analyzed: tam aham mṛgaye kāntam pāyayitvā adharam madhu

original: BhP_10.62.015/3 kvāpi yātaḥ spṛhayatīṃ kṣiptvā māṃ vṛjinārṇave
analyzed: kvāpi yātaḥ spṛhayatīm kṣiptvā mām vṛjina arṇave

original: BhP_10.62.016/0 citralekhovāca
analyzed: citralekhā uvāca

original: BhP_10.62.016/1 vyasanaṃ te 'pakarṣāmi tri-lokyāṃ yadi bhāvyate
analyzed: vyasanam te trilokyām yadi bhāvyate

original: BhP_10.62.016/3 tam āneṣye varaṃ yas te mano-hartā tam ādiśa
analyzed: tam āneṣye varam yaḥ te manaḥ hartā tam ādiśa

original: BhP_10.62.017/1 ity uktvā deva-gandharva siddha-cāraṇa-pannagān
analyzed: iti uktvā deva gandharva siddha cāraṇa pannagān

original: BhP_10.62.017/3 daitya-vidyādharān yakṣān manujāṃś ca yathālikhat
analyzed: daitya vidyādharān yakṣān manujān ca yathā alikhat

original: BhP_10.62.018/1 manujeṣu ca sā vṛṣnīn śūram ānakadundubhim
analyzed: manujeṣu ca sā vṛṣnīn śūram ānakadundubhim

original: BhP_10.62.018/3 vyalikhad rāma-kṛṣṇau ca pradyumnaṃ vīkṣya lajjitā
analyzed: vyalikhat rāma kṛṣṇau ca pradyumnam vīkṣya lajjitā

original: BhP_10.62.019/1 aniruddhaṃ vilikhitaṃ vīkṣyoṣāvāṅ-mukhī hriyā
analyzed: aniruddham vilikhitam vīkṣya uṣā avāk mukhī hriyā

original: BhP_10.62.019/3 so 'sāv asāv iti prāha smayamānā mahī-pate
analyzed: saḥ u sau asau iti prāha smayamānā mahīpate

original: BhP_10.62.020/1 citralekhā tam ājñāya pautraṃ kṛṣṇasya yoginī
analyzed: citralekhā tam ājñāya pautram kṛṣṇasya yoginī

original: BhP_10.62.020/3 yayau vihāyasā rājan dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇa-pālitām
analyzed: yayau vihāyasā rājan dvārakām kṛṣṇa pālitām

original: BhP_10.62.021/1 tatra suptaṃ su-paryaṅke prādyumniṃ yogam āsthitā
analyzed: tatra suptam su paryaṅke prādyumnim yogam āsthitā

original: BhP_10.62.021/3 gṛhītvā śoṇita-puraṃ sakhyai priyam adarśayat
analyzed: gṛhītvā śoṇita puram sakhyai priyam adarśayat

original: BhP_10.62.022/1 sā ca taṃ sundara-varaṃ vilokya muditānanā
analyzed: sā ca tam sundara varam vilokya mudita ānanā

original: BhP_10.62.022/3 duṣprekṣye sva-gṛhe pumbhī reme prādyumninā samam
analyzed: duṣprekṣye sva gṛhe pumbhiḥ reme prādyumninā samam

original: BhP_10.62.023/1 parārdhya-vāsaḥ-srag-gandha- dhūpa-dīpāsanādibhiḥ
BhP_10.62.023/3 pāna-bhojana-bhakṣyaiś ca vākyaiḥ śuśrūṣaṇārcitaḥ
analyzed: pāna bhojana bhakṣyaiḥ ca vākyaiḥ śuśrūṣaṇa arcitaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.024/1 gūḍhaḥ kanyā-pure śaśvat- pravṛddha-snehayā tayā
analyzed: gūḍhaḥ kanyāpure śaśvat pravṛddha snehayā tayā

original: BhP_10.62.024/3 nāhar-gaṇān sa bubudhe ūṣayāpahṛtendriyaḥ
analyzed: na ahargaṇān sa bubudhe ūṣayā apahṛta indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.025/1 tāṃ tathā yadu-vīreṇa bhujyamānāṃ hata-vratām
analyzed: tām tathā yadu vīreṇa bhujyamānām hata vratām

original: BhP_10.62.025/3 hetubhir lakṣayāṃ cakrur āpṛītāṃ duravacchadaiḥ
analyzed: hetubhiḥ cakruḥ āpṛītām duravacchadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.62.026/1 bhaṭā āvedayāṃ cakrū rājaṃs te duhitur vayam
analyzed: bhaṭāḥ āvedayām cakruḥ rājan te duhituḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.62.026/3 viceṣṭitaṃ lakṣayāma kanyāyāḥ kula-dūṣaṇam
analyzed: viceṣṭitam lakṣayāma kanyāyāḥ kula dūṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.62.027/1 anapāyibhir asmābhir guptāyāś ca gṛhe prabho
analyzed: anapāyibhiḥ asmābhiḥ guptāyāḥ ca gṛhe prabho

original: BhP_10.62.027/3 kanyāyā dūṣaṇaṃ pumbhir duṣprekṣyāyā na vidmahe
analyzed: kanyāyāḥ dūṣaṇam pumbhiḥ duṣprekṣyāyāḥ na vidmahe

original: BhP_10.62.028/1 tataḥ pravyathito bāṇo duhituḥ śruta-dūṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas pravyathitaḥ bāṇaḥ duhituḥ śruta dūṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.028/3 tvaritaḥ kanyakāgāraṃ prāpto 'drākṣīd yadūdvaham
analyzed: tvaritaḥ kanyakāgāram prāptaḥ drākṣīt yadu udvaham

original: BhP_10.62.029/1 kāmātmajaṃ taṃ bhuvanaika-sundaraṃ śyāmaṃ piśaṅgāmbaram ambujekṣaṇam
analyzed: kāma ātmajam tam bhuvana eka sundaram śyāmam piśaṅga ambaram ambuja īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.62.029/3 bṛhad-bhujaṃ kuṇḍala-kuntala-tviṣā smitāvalokena ca maṇḍitānanam
analyzed: bṛhat bhujam kuṇḍala kuntala tviṣā smita avalokena ca maṇḍita ānanam

original: BhP_10.62.030/1 dīvyantam akṣaiḥ priyayābhinṛmṇayā tad-aṅga-saṅga-stana-kuṅkuma-srajam
analyzed: dīvyantam akṣaiḥ priyayā abhinṛmṇayā tad aṅga saṅga stana kuṅkuma srajam

original: BhP_10.62.030/3 bāhvor dadhānaṃ madhu-mallikāśritāṃ tasyāgra āsīnam avekṣya vismitaḥ
analyzed: bāhvoḥ dadhānam madhu mallikā āśritām tasya agre āsīnam avekṣya vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.031/1 sa taṃ praviṣṭaṃ vṛtam ātatāyibhir bhaṭair anīkair avalokya mādhavaḥ
analyzed: sa tam praviṣṭam vṛtam ātatāyibhiḥ bhaṭaiḥ anīkaiḥ avalokya mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.62.031/3 udyamya maurvaṃ parighaṃ vyavasthito yathāntako daṇḍa-dharo jighāṃsayā
analyzed: udyamya maurvam parigham vyavasthitaḥ yathā antakaḥ daṇḍadharaḥ jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.62.032/1 jighṛkṣayā tān paritaḥ prasarpataḥ śuno yathā śūkara-yūthapo 'hanat
analyzed: jighṛkṣayā tān paritas prasarpataḥ śunaḥ yathā śūkara yūthapaḥ hanat

original: BhP_10.62.032/3 te hanyamānā bhavanād vinirgatā nirbhinna-mūrdhoru-bhujāḥ pradudruvuḥ
analyzed: te hanyamānāḥ bhavanāt vinirgatāḥ nirbhinna mūrdha ūru bhujāḥ pradudruvuḥ

original: BhP_10.62.033/1 taṃ nāga-pāśair bali-nandano balī ghnantaṃ sva-sainyaṃ kupito babandha ha
analyzed: tam nāgapāśaiḥ balinandanaḥ balī ghnantam sva sainyam kupitaḥ babandha ha

original: BhP_10.62.033/3 ūṣā bhṛśaṃ śoka-viṣāda-vihvalā baddhaṃ niśamyāśru-kalākṣy arautsīt
analyzed: ūṣā bhṛśam śoka viṣāda vihvalā baddham niśamya aśru kala akṣī arautsīt

original: BhP_10.63.001/0 śṛī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śṛīśukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.63.001/1 apaśyatāṃ cāniruddhaṃ tad-bandhūnāṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: apaśyatām ca aniruddham tad bandhūnām ca bhārata

original: BhP_10.63.001/3 catvāro vārṣikā māsā vyatīyur anuśocatām
analyzed: catvāraḥ vārṣikāḥ māsāḥ vyatīyuḥ anuśocatām

original: BhP_10.63.002/1 nāradāt tad upākarṇya vārtāṃ baddhasya karma ca
analyzed: nāradāt tat upākarṇya vārtām baddhasya karma ca

original: BhP_10.63.002/3 prayayuḥ śoṇita-puraṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-daivatāḥ
analyzed: prayayuḥ śoṇitapuram vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa daivatāḥ

original: BhP_10.63.003/1 pradyumno yuyudhānaś ca gadaḥ sāmbo 'tha sāraṇaḥ
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ yuyudhānaḥ ca gadaḥ sāmbaḥ tha sāraṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.003/3 nandopananda-bhadrādyā rāma-kṛṣṇānuvartinaḥ
analyzed: nanda upananda bhadra ādyāḥ rāmakṛṣṇa anuvartinaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.004/1 akṣauhiṇībhir dvādaśabhiḥ sametāḥ sarvato diśam
analyzed: akṣauhiṇībhiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ sametāḥ sarvatas diśam

original: BhP_10.63.004/3 rurudhur bāṇa-nagaraṃ samantāt sātvatarṣabhāḥ
analyzed: rurudhuḥ bāṇa nagaram samantāt sātvata ṛṣabhāḥ

original: BhP_10.63.005/1 bhajyamāna-purodyāna- prākārāṭṭāla-gopuram
analyzed: bhajyamāna pura udyāna prākāra aṭṭāla gopuram

original: BhP_10.63.005/3 prekṣamāṇo ruṣāviṣṭas tulya-sainyo 'bhiniryayau
analyzed: prekṣamāṇaḥ ruṣā āviṣṭaḥ tulya sainyaḥ bhiniryayau

original: BhP_10.63.006/1 bāṇārthe bhagavān rudraḥ sa-sutaḥ pramathair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: bāṇa arthe bhagavān rudraḥ sa sutaḥ pramathaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.006/3 āruhya nandi-vṛṣabhaṃ yuyudhe rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: āruhya nandi vṛṣabham yuyudhe rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.63.007/1 āsīt su-tumulaṃ yuddham adbhutaṃ roma-harṣaṇam
analyzed: āsīt su tumulam yuddham adbhutam roma harṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.63.007/3 kṛṣṇa-śaṅkarayo rājan pradyumna-guhayor api
analyzed: kṛṣṇa śaṅkarayoḥ rājan pradyumna guhayoḥ api

original: BhP_10.63.008/1 kumbhāṇḍa-kūpakarṇābhyāṃ balena saha saṃyugaḥ
analyzed: kumbhāṇḍa kūpa karṇābhyām balena saha saṃyugaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.008/3 sāmbasya bāṇa-putreṇa bāṇena saha sātyakeḥ
analyzed: sāmbasya bāṇa putreṇa bāṇena saha sātyakeḥ

original: BhP_10.63.009/1 brahmādayaḥ surādhīśā munayaḥ siddha-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ sura adhīśāḥ munayaḥ siddha cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.63.009/3 gandharvāpsaraso yakṣā vimānair draṣṭum āgaman
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ yakṣāḥ vimānaiḥ draṣṭum āgaman

original: BhP_10.63.010/1 śaṅkarānucarān śaurir bhūta-pramatha-guhyakān
BhP_10.63.010/3 ḍākinīr yātudhānāṃś ca vetālān sa-vināyakān
analyzed: ḍākinīḥ yātudhānān ca vetālān sa vināyakān

original: BhP_10.63.011/1 preta-mātṛ-piśācāṃś ca kuṣmāṇḍān brahma-rākṣasān
analyzed: preta mātṛ piśācān ca kuṣmāṇḍān brahmarākṣasān

original: BhP_10.63.011/3 drāvayām āsa tīkṣṇāgraiḥ śaraiḥ śārṅga-dhanuś-cyutaiḥ
analyzed: drāvayām āsa tīkṣṇa agraiḥ śaraiḥ śārṅga dhanuḥ cyutaiḥ

original: BhP_10.63.012/1 pṛthag-vidhāni prāyuṅkta piṇāky astrāṇi śārṅgiṇe
analyzed: pṛthagvidhāni prāyuṅkta piṇākī astrāṇi śārṅgiṇe

original: BhP_10.63.012/3 praty-astraiḥ śamayām āsa śārṅga-pāṇir avismitaḥ
analyzed: pratyastraiḥ śamayām āsa śārṅgapāṇiḥ a vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.013/1 brahmāstrasya ca brahmāstraṃ vāyavyasya ca pārvatam
analyzed: brahmāstrasya ca brahmāstram vāyavyasya ca pārvatam

original: BhP_10.63.013/3 āgneyasya ca pārjanyaṃ naijaṃ pāśupatasya ca
analyzed: āgneyasya ca pārjanyam naijam pāśupatasya ca

original: BhP_10.63.014/1 mohayitvā tu giriśaṃ jṛmbhaṇāstreṇa jṛmbhitam
analyzed: mohayitvā tu giriśam jṛmbhaṇa astreṇa jṛmbhitam

original: BhP_10.63.014/3 bāṇasya pṛtanāṃ śaurir jaghānāsi-gadeṣubhiḥ
analyzed: bāṇasya pṛtanām śauriḥ jaghāna asi gadā iṣubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.63.015/1 skandaḥ pradyumna-bāṇaughair ardyamānaḥ samantataḥ
analyzed: skandaḥ pradyumna bāṇa oghaiḥ ardyamānaḥ samantataḥ

original: BhP_10.63.015/3 asṛg vimuñcan gātrebhyaḥ śikhināpakramad raṇāt
analyzed: asṛj vimuñcan gātrebhyaḥ śikhinā apakramat raṇāt

original: BhP_10.63.016/1 kumbhāṇḍa-kūpakarṇaś ca petatur muṣalārditau
analyzed: kumbhāṇḍa kūpa karṇaḥ ca petatuḥ muṣala arditau

original: BhP_10.63.016/3 dudruvus tad-anīkani hata-nāthāni sarvataḥ
analyzed: dudruvuḥ tad anīka ni hata nāthāni sarvatas

original: BhP_10.63.017/1 viśīryamāṇam sva-balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāṇo 'ty-amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: viśīryamāṇam sva balam dṛṣṭvā bāṇo tya marṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.017/3 kṛṣṇam abhyadravat saṅkhye rathī hitvaiva sātyakim
analyzed: kṛṣṇam abhyadravat saṅkhye rathī hitvā eva sātyakim

original: BhP_10.63.018/1 dhanūṃṣy ākṛṣya yugapad bāṇaḥ pañca-śatāni vai
analyzed: dhanūṃṣi ākṛṣya yugapad bāṇaḥ pañca śatāni vai

original: BhP_10.63.018/3 ekaikasmin śarau dvau dvau sandadhe raṇa-durmadaḥ
analyzed: ekaikasmin śarau dvau dvau sandadhe raṇa durmadaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.019/1 tāni ciccheda bhagavān dhanūṃsi yugapad dhariḥ
analyzed: tāni ciccheda bhagavān dhanūṃsi yugapad hariḥ

original: BhP_10.63.019/3 sārathiṃ ratham aśvāṃś ca hatvā śaṅkham apūrayat
analyzed: sārathim ratham aśvān ca hatvā śaṅkham apūrayat

original: BhP_10.63.020/1 tan-mātā koṭarā nāma nagnā makta-śiroruhā
analyzed: tad mātā koṭarā nāma nagnā makta śiroruhā

original: BhP_10.63.020/3 puro 'vatasthe kṛṣṇasya putra-prāṇa-rirakṣayā
analyzed: puras vatasthe kṛṣṇasya putra prāṇa rirakṣayā

original: BhP_10.63.021/1 tatas tiryaṅ-mukho nagnām anirīkṣan gadāgrajaḥ
analyzed: tatas tiryak mukhaḥ nagnām a nirīkṣan gadāgrajaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.021/3 bāṇaś ca tāvad virathaś chinna-dhanvāviśat puram
analyzed: bāṇaḥ ca tāvat virathaḥ chinna dhanvā aviśat puram

original: BhP_10.63.022/1 vidrāvite bhūta-gaṇe jvaras tu trī-śirās trī-pāt
analyzed: vidrāvite bhūta gaṇe jvaraḥ tu trīśirāḥ trīpād

original: BhP_10.63.022/3 abhyadhāvata dāśārhaṃ dahann iva diśo daśa
analyzed: abhyadhāvata dāśārham dahan iva diśaḥ daśa

original: BhP_10.63.023/1 atha nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ taṃ dṛṣṭvā vyasṛjaj jvaram
analyzed: atha nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā vyasṛjat jvaram

original: BhP_10.63.023/3 māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaś ca yuyudhāte jvarāv ubhau
analyzed: māheśvaraḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ ca yuyudhāte jvarau ubhau

original: BhP_10.63.024/1 māheśvaraḥ samākrandan vaiṣṇavena balārditaḥ
analyzed: māheśvaraḥ samākrandan vaiṣṇavena bala arditaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.024/3 alabdhvābhayam anyatra bhīto māheśvaro jvaraḥ
analyzed: a labdhvā abhayam anyatra bhītaḥ māheśvaraḥ jvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.024/5 śaraṇārthī hṛṣīkeśaṃ tuṣṭāva prayatāñjaliḥ
analyzed: śaraṇa arthī hṛṣīkeśam tuṣṭāva prayata añjaliḥ

original: BhP_10.63.025/0 jvara uvāca
analyzed: jvaraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.63.025/1 namāmi tvānanta-śaktiṃ pareśam sarvātmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñapti-mātram
analyzed: namāmi tvā anantaśaktim para īśam sarva ātmānam kevalam jñapti mātram

original: BhP_10.63.025/3 viśvotpatti-sthāna-saṃrodha-hetuṃ yat tad brahma brahma-liṅgam praśāntam
analyzed: viśva utpatti sthāna saṃrodha hetum yat tat brahma brahma liṅgam praśāntam

original: BhP_10.63.026/1 kālo daivaṃ karma jīvaḥ svabhāvo dravyaṃ kṣetraṃ prāṇa ātmā vikāraḥ
analyzed: kālaḥ daivam karma jīvaḥ svabhāvaḥ dravyam kṣetram prāṇaḥ ātmā vikāraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.026/3 tat-saṅghāto bīja-roha-pravāhas tvan-māyaiṣā tan-niṣedhaṃ prapadye
analyzed: tad saṅghātaḥ bīja roha pravāhaḥ tvad māyā eṣā tad niṣedham prapadye

original: BhP_10.63.027/1 nānā-bhāvair līlayaivopapannair devān sādhūn loka-setūn bibharṣi
analyzed: nānā bhāvaiḥ līlayā eva upapannaiḥ devān sādhūn loka setūn bibharṣi

original: BhP_10.63.027/3 haṃsy unmārgān hiṃsayā vartamānān janmaitat te bhāra-hārāya bhūmeḥ
analyzed: haṃsi unmārgān hiṃsayā vartamānān janma etat te bhāra hārāya bhūmeḥ

original: BhP_10.63.028/1 tapto 'ham te tejasā duḥsahena śāntogreṇāty-ulbaṇena jvareṇa
analyzed: taptaḥ ham te tejasā duḥsahena śānta ugreṇa ati ulbaṇena jvareṇa

original: BhP_10.63.028/3 tāvat tāpo dehināṃ te 'nghri-mūlaṃ no severan yāvad āśānubaddhāḥ
analyzed: tāvat tāpaḥ dehinām te nghri mūlam no severan yāvat āśā anubaddhāḥ

original: BhP_10.63.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.63.029/1 tri-śiras te prasanno 'smi vyetu te maj-jvarād bhayam
analyzed: tri śiraḥ te prasannaḥ smi vyetu te mad jvarāt bhayam

original: BhP_10.63.029/3 yo nau smarati saṃvādaṃ tasya tvan na bhaved bhayam
analyzed: yaḥ nau smarati saṃvādam tasya tvat na bhavet bhayam

original: BhP_10.63.030/1 ity ukto 'cyutam ānamya gato māheśvaro jvaraḥ
analyzed: iti cyutam ānamya gataḥ māheśvaraḥ jvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.030/3 bāṇas tu ratham ārūḍhaḥ prāgād yotsyan janārdanam
analyzed: bāṇaḥ tu ratham ārūḍhaḥ prāgāt yotsyan janārdanam

original: BhP_10.63.031/1 tato bāhu-sahasreṇa nānāyudha-dharo 'suraḥ
analyzed: tatas bāhu sahasreṇa nānā āyudha dharaḥ suraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.031/3 mumoca parama-kruddho bāṇāṃś cakrāyudhe nṛpa
analyzed: mumoca parama kruddhaḥ bāṇān cakra āyudhe nṛpa

original: BhP_10.63.032/1 tasyāsyato 'strāṇy asakṛc cakreṇa kṣura-neminā
analyzed: tasya asyataḥ strāṇi asakṛt cakreṇa kṣura neminā

original: BhP_10.63.032/3 ciccheda bhagavān bāhūn śākhā iva vanaspateḥ
analyzed: ciccheda bhagavān bāhūn śākhāḥ iva vanaspateḥ

original: BhP_10.63.033/1 bāhuṣu chidyamāneṣu bāṇasya bhagavān bhavaḥ
analyzed: bāhuṣu chidyamāneṣu bāṇasya bhagavān bhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.033/3 bhaktānakampy upavrajya cakrāyudham abhāṣata
analyzed: bhakta anakampī upavrajya cakrāyudham abhāṣata

original: BhP_10.63.034/0 śrī-rudra uvāca
analyzed: śrī rudraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.63.034/1 tvaṃ hi brahma paraṃ jyotir gūḍhaṃ brahmaṇi vāṅ-maye
analyzed: tvam hi brahma param jyotiḥ gūḍham brahmaṇi vāc maye

original: BhP_10.63.034/3 yaṃ paśyanty amalātmāna ākāśam iva kevalam
analyzed: yam paśyanti amala ātmānaḥ ākāśam iva kevalam

original: BhP_10.63.035/1 nābhir nabho 'gnir mukham ambu reto
analyzed: nābhiḥ nabhaḥ gniḥ mukham ambu retaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.035/2 dyauḥ śīrṣam āśāḥ śrutir aṅghrir urvī
analyzed: dyauḥ śīrṣam āśāḥ śrutiḥ aṅghriḥ urvī

original: BhP_10.63.035/3 candro mano yasya dṛg arka ātmā
analyzed: candraḥ manaḥ yasya dṛś arkaḥ ātmā

original: BhP_10.63.035/4 ahaṃ samudro jaṭharaṃ bhujendraḥ
analyzed: aham samudraḥ jaṭharam bhuja indraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.036/1 romāṇi yasyauṣadhayo 'mbu-vāhāḥ
analyzed: romāṇi yasya oṣadhayaḥ mbu vāhāḥ

original: BhP_10.63.036/2 keśā viriñco dhiṣaṇā visargaḥ
analyzed: keśāḥ viriñcaḥ dhiṣaṇā visargaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.036/3 prajā-patir hṛdayaṃ yasya dharmaḥ
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ hṛdayam yasya dharmaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.036/4 sa vai bhavān puruṣo loka-kalpaḥ
analyzed: sa vai bhavān puruṣaḥ loka kalpaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.037/1 tavāvatāro 'yam akuṇṭha-dhāman dharmasya guptyai jagato hitāya
analyzed: tava avatāraḥ yam akuṇṭha dhāman dharmasya guptyai jagataḥ hitāya

original: BhP_10.63.037/3 vayaṃ ca sarve bhavatānubhāvitā vibhāvayāmo bhuvanāni sapta
analyzed: vayam ca sarve bhavatā anubhāvitāḥ vibhāvayāmaḥ bhuvanāni sapta

original: BhP_10.63.038/1 tvam eka ādyaḥ puruṣo 'dvitīyas turyaḥ sva-dṛg dhetur ahetur īśaḥ
analyzed: tvam ekaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ turyaḥ svadṛś dhetuḥ ahetuḥ īśaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.038/3 pratīyase 'thāpi yathā-vikāraṃ sva-māyayā sarva-guṇa-prasiddhyai
analyzed: pratīyase thā api yathāvikāram sva māyayā sarva guṇa prasiddhyai

original: BhP_10.63.039/1 yathaiva sūryaḥ pihitaś chāyayā svayā
analyzed: yathā eva sūryaḥ pihitaḥ chāyayā svayā

original: BhP_10.63.039/2 chāyāṃ ca rūpāṇi ca sañcakāsti
analyzed: chāyām ca rūpāṇi ca sañcakāsti

original: BhP_10.63.039/3 evaṃ guṇenāpihito guṇāṃs tvam
analyzed: evam guṇena apihitaḥ guṇān tvam

original: BhP_10.63.039/4 ātma-pradīpo guṇinaś ca bhūman
analyzed: ātma pradīpaḥ guṇinaḥ ca bhūman

original: BhP_10.63.040/1 yan-māyā-mohita-dhiyaḥ putra-dāra-gṛhādiṣu
analyzed: yat māyā mohita dhiyaḥ putra dāra gṛha ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.63.040/3 unmajjanti nimajjanti prasaktā vṛjinārṇave
