analyzed: unmajjanti nimajjanti prasaktāḥ vṛjina arṇave

original: BhP_10.63.041/1 deva-dattam imaṃ labdhvā nṛ-lokam ajitendriyaḥ
analyzed: devadattam imam labdhvā nṛ lokam ajita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.041/3 yo nādriyeta tvat-pādau sa śocyo hy ātma-vañcakaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ na ādriyeta tvad pādau sa śocyaḥ hi ātma vañcakaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.042/1 yas tvāṃ visṛjate martya ātmānaṃ priyam īśvaram
analyzed: yaḥ tvām visṛjate martyaḥ ātmānam priyam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.63.042/3 viparyayendriyārthārthaṃ viṣam atty amṛtaṃ tyajan
BhP_10.63.043/1 ahaṃ brahmātha vibudhā munayaś cāmalāśayāḥ
analyzed: aham brahmā atha vibudhāḥ munayaḥ ca amala āśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.63.043/3 sarvātmanā prapannās tvām ātmānaṃ preṣṭham īśvaram
analyzed: sarva ātmanā prapannāḥ tvām ātmānam preṣṭham īśvaram

original: BhP_10.63.044/1 taṃ tvā jagat-sthity-udayānta-hetuṃ
analyzed: tam tvā jagat sthiti udaya anta hetum

original: BhP_10.63.044/2 samaṃ prasāntaṃ suhṛd-ātma-daivam
analyzed: samam suhṛd ātma daivam

original: BhP_10.63.044/3 ananyam ekaṃ jagad-ātma-ketaṃ
analyzed: ananyam ekam jagat ātma ketam

original: BhP_10.63.044/4 bhavāpavargāya bhajāma devam
analyzed: bhava apavargāya bhajāma devam

original: BhP_10.63.045/1 ayaṃ mameṣṭo dayito 'nuvartī mayābhayaṃ dattam amuṣya deva
analyzed: ayam mama iṣṭaḥ dayitaḥ nuvartī mayā abhayam dattam amuṣya deva

original: BhP_10.63.045/3 sampādyatāṃ tad bhavataḥ prasādo yathā hi te daitya-patau prasādaḥ
analyzed: sampādyatām tat bhavataḥ prasādaḥ yathā hi te daitya patau prasādaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.046/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.63.046/1 yad āttha bhagavaṃs tvaṃ naḥ karavāma priyaṃ tava
analyzed: yat āttha bhagavan tvam naḥ karavāma priyam tava

original: BhP_10.63.046/3 bhavato yad vyavasitaṃ tan me sādhv anumoditam
analyzed: bhavataḥ yat vyavasitam tat me sādhu anumoditam

original: BhP_10.63.047/1 avadhyo 'yaṃ mamāpy eṣa vairocani-suto 'suraḥ
analyzed: avadhyaḥ yam mama api eṣa suraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.047/3 prahrādāya varo datto na vadhyo me tavānvayaḥ
analyzed: prahrādāya varaḥ dattaḥ na vadhyaḥ me tava anvayaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.048/1 darpopaśamanāyāsya pravṛkṇā bāhavo mayā
analyzed: darpa upaśamanāya asya pravṛkṇāḥ bāhavaḥ mayā

original: BhP_10.63.048/3 sūditaṃ ca balaṃ bhūri yac ca bhārāyitaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: sūditam ca balam bhūri yat ca bhārāyitam bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.049/1 catvāro 'sya bhujāḥ śiṣṭā bhaviṣyaty ajarāmaraḥ
analyzed: catvāraḥ sya bhujāḥ śiṣṭāḥ bhaviṣyati ajara amaraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.049/3 pārṣada-mukhyo bhavato na kutaścid-bhayo 'suraḥ
analyzed: pārṣada mukhyaḥ bhavataḥ na suraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.050/1 iti labdhvābhayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇamya śirasāsuraḥ
analyzed: iti labdhvā abhayam kṛṣṇam praṇamya śirasā asuraḥ

original: BhP_10.63.050/3 prādyumniṃ ratham āropya sa-vadhvo samupānayat
analyzed: prādyumnim ratham āropya sa vadhvaḥ samupānayat

original: BhP_10.63.051/1 akṣauhiṇyā parivṛtaṃ su-vāsaḥ-samalaṅkṛtam
analyzed: akṣauhiṇyā parivṛtam su vāsaḥ samalaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_10.63.051/3 sa-patnīkaṃ puras-kṛtya yayau rudrānumoditaḥ
analyzed: sa patnīkam puraskṛtya yayau rudra anumoditaḥ

original: BhP_10.63.052/1 sva-rājadhānīṃ samalaṅkṛtāṃ dhvajaiḥ
analyzed: sva rājadhānīm samalaṅkṛtām dhvajaiḥ

original: BhP_10.63.052/2 sa-toraṇair ukṣita-mārga-catvarām
analyzed: sa toraṇaiḥ ukṣita mārga catvarām

original: BhP_10.63.052/3 viveśa śaṅkhānaka-dundubhi-svanair
analyzed: viveśa śaṅkha ānaka dundubhi svanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.63.052/4 abhyudyataḥ paura-suhṛd-dvijātibhiḥ
analyzed: abhyudyataḥ paura suhṛd dvijātibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.63.053/1 ya evaṃ kṛṣṇa-vijayaṃ śaṅkareṇa ca saṃyugam
analyzed: yaḥ evam kṛṣṇa vijayam śaṅkareṇa ca saṃyugam

original: BhP_10.63.053/3 saṃsmaret prātar utthāya na tasya syāt parājayaḥ
analyzed: saṃsmaret prātar utthāya na tasya syāt parājayaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.64.001/1 ekadopavanaṃ rājan jagmur yadu-kumārakāḥ
analyzed: ekadā upavanam rājan jagmuḥ yadu kumārakāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.001/3 vihartuṃ sāmba-pradyumna cāru-bhānu-gadādayaḥ
analyzed: vihartum sāmba pradyumna cārubhānu gada ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.002/1 krīḍitvā su-ciraṃ tatra vicinvantaḥ pipāsitāḥ
analyzed: krīḍitvā su ciram tatra vicinvantaḥ pipāsitāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.002/3 jalaṃ nirudake kūpe dadṛśuḥ sattvam adbhutam
analyzed: jalam nirudake kūpe dadṛśuḥ sattvam adbhutam

original: BhP_10.64.003/1 kṛkalāsaṃ giri-nibhaṃ vīkṣya vismita-mānasāḥ
analyzed: kṛkalāsam giri nibham vīkṣya vismita mānasāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.003/3 tasya coddharaṇe yatnaṃ cakrus te kṛpayānvitāḥ
analyzed: tasya ca uddharaṇe yatnam cakruḥ te kṛpayā anvitāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.004/1 carma-jais tāntavaiḥ pāśair baddhvā patitam arbhakāḥ
analyzed: carma jaiḥ tāntavaiḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā patitam arbhakāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.004/3 nāśaknuran samuddhartuṃ kṛṣṇāyācakhyur utsukāḥ
analyzed: na aśaknuran samuddhartum kṛṣṇāya ācakhyuḥ utsukāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.005/1 tatrāgatyāravindākṣo bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: tatra āgatya aravinda akṣaḥ bhagavān viśvabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.005/3 vīkṣyojjahāra vāmena taṃ kareṇa sa līlayā
analyzed: vīkṣya ujjahāra vāmena tam kareṇa sa līlayā

original: BhP_10.64.006/1 sa uttamaḥ-śloka-karābhimṛṣṭo vihāya sadyaḥ kṛkalāsa-rūpam
analyzed: saḥ uttamaḥśloka kara abhimṛṣṭaḥ vihāya sadyas kṛkalāsa rūpam

original: BhP_10.64.006/3 santapta-cāmīkara-cāru-varṇaḥ svargy adbhutālaṅkaraṇāmbara-srak
BhP_10.64.007/1 papraccha vidvān api tan-nidānaṃ janeṣu vikhyāpayituṃ mukundaḥ
analyzed: papraccha vidvān api tad nidānam janeṣu vikhyāpayitum mukundaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.007/3 kas tvaṃ mahā-bhāga vareṇya-rūpo devottamaṃ tvāṃ gaṇayāmi nūnam
analyzed: kaḥ tvam mahābhāga vareṇya rūpaḥ deva uttamam tvām gaṇayāmi nūnam

original: BhP_10.64.008/1 daśām imāṃ vā katamena karmaṇā samprāpito 'sy atad-arhaḥ su-bhadra
analyzed: daśām imām vā katamena karmaṇā samprāpitaḥ si a tad arhaḥ su bhadra

original: BhP_10.64.008/3 ātmānam ākhyāhi vivitsatāṃ no yan manyase naḥ kṣamam atra vaktum
analyzed: ātmānam ākhyāhi vivitsatām naḥ yat manyase naḥ kṣamam atra vaktum

original: BhP_10.64.009/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.64.009/1 iti sma rājā sampṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇenānanta-mūrtinā
analyzed: iti sma rājā sampṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇena ananta mūrtinā

original: BhP_10.64.009/3 mādhavaṃ praṇipatyāha kirīṭenārka-varcasā
analyzed: mādhavam praṇipatya āha kirīṭena arka varcasā

original: BhP_10.64.010/0 nṛga uvāca
analyzed: nṛgaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.64.010/1 nṛgo nāma narendro 'ham ikṣvāku-tanayaḥ prabho
analyzed: nṛgaḥ nāma narendraḥ ham ikṣvāku tanayaḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.64.010/3 dāniṣv ākhyāyamāneṣu yadi te karṇam aspṛśam
analyzed: dāniṣu ākhyāyamāneṣu yadi te karṇam aspṛśam

original: BhP_10.64.011/1 kiṃ nu te 'viditaṃ nātha sarva-bhūtātma-sākṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: kim nu te viditam nātha sarva bhūta ātma sākṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.011/3 kālenāvyāhata-dṛśo vakṣye 'thāpi tavājñayā
analyzed: kālena avyāhata dṛśaḥ vakṣye thā api tava ājñayā

original: BhP_10.64.012/1 yāvatyaḥ sikatā bhūmer yāvatyo divi tārakāḥ
analyzed: yāvatyaḥ sikatāḥ bhūmeḥ yāvatyaḥ divi tārakāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.012/3 yāvatyo varṣa-dhārāś ca tāvatīr adadaṃ sma gāḥ
analyzed: yāvatyaḥ varṣa dhārāḥ ca tāvatīḥ adadam sma gāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.013/1 payasvinīs taruṇīḥ śīla-rūpa- guṇopapannāḥ kapilā hema-sṛṅgīḥ
analyzed: payasvinīḥ taruṇīḥ śīla rūpa guṇa upapannāḥ kapilāḥ hema sṛṅgīḥ

original: BhP_10.64.013/3 nyāyārjitā rūpya-khurāḥ sa-vatsā dukūla-mālābharaṇā dadāv aham
analyzed: nyāya arjitāḥ rūpya khurāḥ sa vatsāḥ dukūla mālā ābharaṇāḥ dadau aham

original: BhP_10.64.014/1 sv-alaṅkṛtebhyo guṇa-śīlavadbhyaḥ sīdat-kuṭumbebhya ṛta-vratebhyaḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ guṇa śīlavadbhyaḥ sīdat kuṭumbebhyaḥ ṛta vratebhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.014/3 tapaḥ-śruta-brahma-vadānya-sadbhyaḥ prādāṃ yuvabhyo dvija-puṅgavebhyaḥ
analyzed: tapaḥ śruta brahma vadānya sadbhyaḥ prādām yuvabhyaḥ dvija puṅgavebhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.015/1 go-bhū-hiraṇyāyatanāśva-hastinaḥ kanyāḥ sa-dāsīs tila-rūpya-śayyāḥ
analyzed: go bhū hiraṇya āyatana aśva hastinaḥ kanyāḥ sa dāsīḥ tila rūpya śayyāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.015/3 vāsāṃsi ratnāni paricchadān rathān iṣṭaṃ ca yajñaiś caritaṃ ca pūrtam
analyzed: vāsāṃsi ratnāni paricchadān rathān iṣṭam ca yajñaiḥ caritam ca pūrtam

original: BhP_10.64.016/1 kasyacid dvija-mukhyasya bhraṣṭā gaur mama go-dhane
analyzed: kasyacid dvijamukhyasya bhraṣṭā gauḥ mama go dhane

original: BhP_10.64.016/3 sampṛktāviduṣā sā ca mayā dattā dvijātaye
analyzed: sampṛktā a viduṣā sā ca mayā dattā dvijātaye

original: BhP_10.64.017/1 tāṃ nīyamānāṃ tat-svāmī dṛṣṭrovāca mameti tam
analyzed: tām nīyamānām tad svāmī dṛṣṭrā uvāca mama iti tam

original: BhP_10.64.017/3 mameti parigrāhy āha nṛgo me dattavān iti
analyzed: mama iti parigrāhī āha nṛgaḥ me dattavān iti

original: BhP_10.64.018/1 viprau vivadamānau mām ūcatuḥ svārtha-sādhakau
analyzed: viprau vivadamānau mām ūcatuḥ sva artha sādhakau

original: BhP_10.64.018/3 bhavān dātāpaharteti tac chrutvā me 'bhavad bhramaḥ
analyzed: bhavān dātā apahartā iti tat śrutvā me bhavat bhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.019/1 anunītāv ubhau viprau dharma-kṛcchra-gatena vai
analyzed: anunītau ubhau viprau dharma kṛcchra gatena vai

original: BhP_10.64.019/3 gavāṃ lakṣaṃ prakṛṣṭānāṃ dāsyāmy eṣā pradīyatām
analyzed: gavām lakṣam prakṛṣṭānām dāsyāmi eṣā pradīyatām

original: BhP_10.64.020/1 bhavantāv anugṛhṇītāṃ kiṅkarasyāvijānataḥ
analyzed: bhavantau anugṛhṇītām kiṅkarasya a vijānataḥ

original: BhP_10.64.020/3 samuddharataṃ māṃ kṛcchrāt patantaṃ niraye 'śucau
analyzed: samuddharatam mām kṛcchrāt patantam niraye śucau

original: BhP_10.64.021/1 nāhaṃ pratīcche vai rājann ity uktvā svāmy apākramat
analyzed: na aham pratīcche vai rājan iti uktvā svāmī apākramat

original: BhP_10.64.021/3 nānyad gavām apy ayutam icchāmīty aparo yayau
analyzed: na anyat gavām api ayutam icchāmi iti aparaḥ yayau

original: BhP_10.64.022/1 etasminn antare yāmair dūtair nīto yama-kṣayam
analyzed: etasmin antare yāmaiḥ dūtaiḥ nītaḥ yama kṣayam

original: BhP_10.64.022/3 yamena pṛṣṭas tatrāhaṃ deva-deva jagat-pate
analyzed: yamena pṛṣṭaḥ tatra aham devadeva jagatpate

original: BhP_10.64.023/1 pūrvaṃ tvam aśubhaṃ bhuṅkṣa utāho nṛpate śubham
analyzed: pūrvam tvam aśubham bhuṅkṣe uta aho nṛpate śubham

original: BhP_10.64.023/3 nāntaṃ dānasya dharmasya paśye lokasya bhāsvataḥ
analyzed: na antam dānasya dharmasya paśye lokasya bhāsvataḥ

original: BhP_10.64.024/1 pūrvaṃ devāśubhaṃ bhuñja iti prāha pateti saḥ
analyzed: pūrvam deva aśubham bhuñje iti prāha pata iti saḥ

original: BhP_10.64.024/3 tāvad adrākṣam ātmānaṃ kṛkalāsaṃ patan prabho
analyzed: tāvat adrākṣam ātmānam kṛkalāsam patan prabho

original: BhP_10.64.025/1 brahmaṇyasya vadānyasya tava dāsasya keśava
analyzed: brahmaṇyasya vadānyasya tava dāsasya keśava

original: BhP_10.64.025/3 smṛtir nādyāpi vidhvastā bhavat-sandarśanārthinaḥ
analyzed: smṛtiḥ na adya api vidhvastā bhavat sandarśana arthinaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.026/1 sa tvaṃ kathaṃ mama vibho 'kṣi-pathaḥ parātmā
analyzed: sa tvam katham mama vibho kṣipathaḥ parātmā

original: BhP_10.64.026/2 yogeśvaraḥ śruti-dṛśāmala-hṛd-vibhāvyaḥ
BhP_10.64.026/3 sākṣād adhokṣaja uru-vyasanāndha-buddheḥ
analyzed: sākṣāt adhokṣajaḥ uru vyasana andha buddheḥ

original: BhP_10.64.026/4 syān me 'nudṛśya iha yasya bhavāpavargaḥ
analyzed: syāt me nu dṛśyaḥ iha yasya bhava apavargaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.027/1 deva-deva jagan-nātha govinda puruṣottama
analyzed: devadeva jagannātha govinda puruṣottama

original: BhP_10.64.027/3 nārāyaṇa hṛṣīkeśa puṇya-ślokācyutāvyaya
analyzed: nārāyaṇa hṛṣīkeśa puṇyaśloka acyuta avyaya

original: BhP_10.64.028/1 anujānīhi māṃ kṛṣṇa yāntaṃ deva-gatiṃ prabho
analyzed: anujānīhi mām kṛṣṇa yāntam deva gatim prabho

original: BhP_10.64.028/3 yatra kvāpi sataś ceto bhūyān me tvat-padāspadam
analyzed: yatra kvāpi sataḥ cetaḥ bhūyāt me tvad pada āspadam

original: BhP_10.64.029/1 namas te sarva-bhāvāya brahmaṇe 'nanta-śaktaye
analyzed: namaḥ te sarva bhāvāya brahmaṇe nanta śaktaye

original: BhP_10.64.029/3 kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya yogānāṃ pataye namaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya yogānām pataye namaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.030/1 ity uktvā taṃ parikramya pādau spṛṣṭvā sva-maulinā
analyzed: iti uktvā tam parikramya pādau spṛṣṭvā sva maulinā

original: BhP_10.64.030/3 anujñāto vimānāgryam āruhat paśyatāṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: anujñātaḥ vimāna agryam āruhat paśyatām nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.64.031/1 kṛṣṇaḥ parijanaṃ prāha bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ parijanam prāha bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.031/3 brahmaṇya-devo dharmātmā rājanyān anuśikṣayan
analyzed: brahmaṇyadevaḥ dharma ātmā rājanyān anuśikṣayan

original: BhP_10.64.032/1 durjaraṃ bata brahma-svaṃ bhuktam agner manāg api
analyzed: durjaram bata brahma svam bhuktam agneḥ manāk api

original: BhP_10.64.032/3 tejīyaso 'pi kim uta rājñāṃ īśvara-māninām
analyzed: tejīyasaḥ pi kim uta rājñām īśvara māninām

original: BhP_10.64.033/1 nāhaṃ hālāhalaṃ manye viṣaṃ yasya pratikriyā
analyzed: na aham hālāhalam manye viṣam yasya pratikriyā

original: BhP_10.64.033/3 brahma-svaṃ hi viṣaṃ proktaṃ nāsya pratividhir bhuvi
analyzed: brahma svam hi viṣam proktam na asya pratividhiḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_10.64.034/1 hinasti viṣam attāraṃ vahnir adbhiḥ praśāmyati
analyzed: hinasti viṣam attāram vahniḥ adbhiḥ praśāmyati

original: BhP_10.64.034/3 kulaṃ sa-mūlaṃ dahati brahma-svāraṇi-pāvakaḥ
analyzed: kulam sa mūlam dahati brahma sva araṇi pāvakaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.035/1 brahma-svaṃ duranujñātaṃ bhuktaṃ hanti tri-pūruṣam
analyzed: brahma svam duranujñātam bhuktam hanti tri pūruṣam

original: BhP_10.64.035/3 prasahya tu balād bhuktaṃ daśa pūrvān daśāparān
analyzed: prasahya tu balāt bhuktam daśa pūrvān daśa aparān

original: BhP_10.64.036/1 rājāno rāja-lakṣmyāndhā nātma-pātaṃ vicakṣate
analyzed: rājānaḥ rāja lakṣmyā andhāḥ na ātmapātam vicakṣate

original: BhP_10.64.036/3 nirayaṃ ye 'bhimanyante brahma-svaṃ sādhu bāliśāḥ
analyzed: nirayam ye bhimanyante brahma svam sādhu bāliśāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.037/1 gṛhṇanti yāvataḥ pāṃśūn krandatām aśru-bindavaḥ
analyzed: gṛhṇanti yāvataḥ pāṃśūn krandatām aśru bindavaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.037/3 viprāṇāṃ hṛta-vṛttīnām vadānyānāṃ kuṭumbinām
analyzed: viprāṇām hṛta vṛttīnām vadānyānām kuṭumbinām

original: BhP_10.64.038/1 rājāno rāja-kulyāś ca tāvato 'bdān niraṅkuśāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ rājakulyāḥ ca tāvataḥ bdāt niraṅkuśāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.038/3 kumbhī-pākeṣu pacyante brahma-dāyāpahāriṇaḥ
analyzed: kumbhīpākeṣu pacyante brahma dāya apahāriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.039/1 sva-dattāṃ para-dattāṃ vā brahma-vṛttiṃ harec ca yaḥ
analyzed: sva dattām para dattām vā brahmavṛttim haret ca yaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.039/3 ṣaṣṭi-varṣa-sahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyāṃ jāyate kṛmiḥ
analyzed: ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ

original: BhP_10.64.040/1 na me brahma-dhanaṃ bhūyād yad gṛdhvālpāyuṣo narāḥ
analyzed: na me brahma dhanam bhūyāt yat gṛdhvā alpa āyuṣaḥ narāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.040/3 parājitāś cyutā rājyād bhavanty udvejino 'hayaḥ
analyzed: parājitāḥ cyutāḥ rājyāt bhavanti udvejinaḥ hayaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.041/1 vipraṃ kṛtāgasam api naiva druhyata māmakāḥ
analyzed: vipram kṛta āgasam api nā eva druhyata māmakāḥ

original: BhP_10.64.041/3 ghnantaṃ bahu śapantaṃ vā namas-kuruta nityaśaḥ
analyzed: ghnantam bahu śapantam vā namaskuruta nityaśas

original: BhP_10.64.042/1 yathāhaṃ praṇame viprān anukālaṃ samāhitaḥ
analyzed: yathā aham praṇame viprān anukālam samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.042/3 tathā namata yūyaṃ ca yo 'nyathā me sa daṇḍa-bhāk
analyzed: tathā namata yūyam ca yaḥ nyathā me sa daṇḍa bhāj

original: BhP_10.64.043/1 brāhmaṇārtho hy apahṛto hartāraṃ pātayaty adhaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇa arthaḥ hi apahṛtaḥ hartāram pātayati adhas

original: BhP_10.64.043/3 ajānantam api hy enaṃ nṛgaṃ brāhmaṇa-gaur iva
analyzed: a jānantam api hi enam nṛgam brāhmaṇa gauḥ iva

original: BhP_10.64.044/1 evaṃ viśrāvya bhagavān mukundo dvārakaukasaḥ
analyzed: evam viśrāvya bhagavān mukundaḥ dvārakā okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.64.044/3 pāvanaḥ sarva-lokānāṃ viveśa nija-mandiram
analyzed: pāvanaḥ sarva lokānām viveśa nija mandiram

original: BhP_10.65.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.65.001/1 balabhadraḥ kuru-śreṣṭha bhagavān ratham āsthitaḥ
analyzed: balabhadraḥ kuru śreṣṭha bhagavān ratham āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.001/3 suhṛd-didṛkṣur utkaṇṭhaḥ prayayau nanda-gokulam
analyzed: suhṛd didṛkṣuḥ utkaṇṭhaḥ prayayau nanda gokulam

original: BhP_10.65.002/1 pariṣvaktaś cirotkaṇṭhair gopair gopībhir eva ca
analyzed: pariṣvaktaḥ cira utkaṇṭhaiḥ gopaiḥ gopībhiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.65.002/3 rāmo 'bhivādya pitarāv āśīrbhir abhinanditaḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ bhivādya pitarā āśīrbhiḥ abhinanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.003/1 ciraṃ naḥ pāhi dāśārha sānujo jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: ciram naḥ pāhi dāśārha sa anujaḥ jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.65.003/3 ity āropyāṅkam āliṅgya netraiḥ siṣicatur jalaiḥ
analyzed: iti āropya aṅkam āliṅgya netraiḥ siṣicatuḥ jalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.65.004/1 gopa-vṛddhāṃś ca vidhi-vad yaviṣṭhair abhivanditaḥ
analyzed: gopa vṛddhān ca vidhivat yaviṣṭhaiḥ abhivanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.004/3 yathā-vayo yathā-sakhyaṃ yathā-sambandham ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yathāvayas yathāsakhyam yathāsambandham ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.005/1 samupetyātha gopālān hāsya-hasta-grahādibhiḥ
analyzed: samupetya atha gopālān hāsya hasta graha ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.65.005/3 viśrāntam sukham āsīnaṃ papracchuḥ paryupāgatāḥ
analyzed: viśrāntam sukham āsīnam papracchuḥ paryupāgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.006/1 pṛṣṭāś cānāmayaṃ sveṣu prema-gadgadayā girā
analyzed: pṛṣṭāḥ ca anāmayam sveṣu prema gadgadayā girā

original: BhP_10.65.006/3 kṛṣṇe kamala-patrākṣe sannyastākhila-rādhasaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇe kamala pattra akṣe sannyasta akhila rādhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.007/1 kaccin no bāndhavā rāma sarve kuśalam āsate
analyzed: kaccit naḥ bāndhavāḥ rāma sarve kuśalam āsate

original: BhP_10.65.007/3 kaccit smaratha no rāma yūyaṃ dāra-sutānvitāḥ
analyzed: kaccit smaratha naḥ rāma yūyam dāra suta anvitāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.008/1 diṣṭyā kaṃso hataḥ pāpo diṣṭyā muktāḥ suhṛj-janāḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā kaṃsaḥ hataḥ pāpaḥ diṣṭyā muktāḥ suhṛd janāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.008/3 nihatya nirjitya ripūn diṣṭyā durgaṃ samāśrītāḥ
analyzed: nihatya nirjitya ripūn diṣṭyā durgam samāśrītāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.009/1 gopyo hasantyaḥ papracchū rāma-sandarśanādṛtāḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ hasantyaḥ papracchuḥ rāma sandarśana ādṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.009/3 kaccid āste sukhaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pura-strī-jana-vallabhaḥ
analyzed: kaccit āste sukham kṛṣṇaḥ pura strī jana vallabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.010/1 kaccit smarati vā bandhūn pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca saḥ
analyzed: kaccit smarati vā bandhūn pitaram mātaram ca saḥ

original: BhP_10.65.010/3 apy asau mātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sakṛd apy āgamiṣyati
analyzed: api asau mātaram draṣṭum sakṛt api āgamiṣyati

original: BhP_10.65.010/5 api vā smarate 'smākam anusevāṃ mahā-bhujaḥ
analyzed: api vā smarate smākam anusevām mahā bhujaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.011/1 mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhrātṝn patīn putrān svasṝn api
analyzed: mātaram pitaram bhrātṝn patīn putrān svasṝn api

original: BhP_10.65.011/3 yad-arthe jahima dāśārha dustyajān sva-janān prabho
analyzed: yad arthe jahima dāśārha dustyajān sva janān prabho

original: BhP_10.65.012/1 tā naḥ sadyaḥ parityajya gataḥ sañchinna-sauhṛdaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ sadyas parityajya gataḥ sañchinna sauhṛdaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.012/3 kathaṃ nu tādṛśaṃ strībhir na śraddhīyeta bhāṣitam
analyzed: katham nu tādṛśam strībhiḥ na śraddhīyeta bhāṣitam

original: BhP_10.65.013/1 kathaṃ nu gṛhṇanty anavasthitātmano
analyzed: katham nu gṛhṇanti anavasthita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.013/2 vacaḥ kṛta-ghnasya budhāḥ pura-striyaḥ
analyzed: vacaḥ kṛtaghnasya budhāḥ pura striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.013/3 gṛhṇanti vai citra-kathasya sundara-
analyzed: gṛhṇanti vai citrakathasya sundara

original: BhP_10.65.013/4 smitāvalokocchvasita-smarāturāḥ
analyzed: smita avaloka ucchvasita smara āturāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.014/1 kiṃ nas tat-kathayā gopyaḥ kathāḥ kathayatāparāḥ
analyzed: kim naḥ tad kathayā gopyaḥ kathāḥ kathayata aparāḥ

original: BhP_10.65.014/3 yāty asmābhir vinā kālo yadi tasya tathaiva naḥ
analyzed: yāti asmābhiḥ vinā kālaḥ yadi tasya tathā eva naḥ

original: BhP_10.65.015/1 iti prahasitaṃ śaurer jalpitaṃ cāru-vīkṣitam
analyzed: iti prahasitam śaureḥ jalpitam cāru vīkṣitam

original: BhP_10.65.015/3 gatiṃ prema-pariṣvaṅgaṃ smarantyo ruruduḥ striyaḥ
analyzed: gatim prema pariṣvaṅgam smarantyaḥ ruruduḥ striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.016/1 saṅkarṣaṇas tāḥ kṛṣṇasya sandeśair hṛdayaṃ-gamaiḥ
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tāḥ kṛṣṇasya sandeśaiḥ hṛdayaṃgamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.65.016/3 sāntvayām āsa bhagavān nānānunaya-kovidaḥ
analyzed: sāntvayām āsa bhagavān nānā anunaya kovidaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.017/1 dvau māsau tatra cāvātsīn madhuṃ mādhavaṃ eva ca
analyzed: dvau māsau tatra ca avātsīt madhum mādhavam eva ca

original: BhP_10.65.017/3 rāmaḥ kṣapāsu bhagavān gopīnāṃ ratim āvahan
analyzed: rāmaḥ kṣapāsu bhagavān gopīnām ratim āvahan

original: BhP_10.65.018/1 pūrṇa-candra-kalā-mṛṣṭe kaumudī-gandha-vāyunā
BhP_10.65.018/3 yamunopavane reme sevite strī-gaṇair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: yamunā upavane reme sevite strī gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.019/1 varuṇa-preṣitā devī vāruṇī vṛkṣa-koṭarāt
analyzed: varuṇa preṣitā devī vāruṇī vṛkṣa koṭarāt

original: BhP_10.65.019/3 patantī tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ sva-gandhenādhyavāsayat
analyzed: patantī tat vanam sarvam sva gandhena adhyavāsayat

original: BhP_10.65.020/1 taṃ gandhaṃ madhu-dhārāyā vāyunopahṛtaṃ balaḥ
analyzed: tam gandham madhu dhārāyāḥ vāyunā upahṛtam balaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.020/3 āghrāyopagatas tatra lalanābhiḥ samaṃ papau
analyzed: āghrāya upagataḥ tatra lalanābhiḥ samam papau

original: BhP_10.65.021/1 upagīyamāno gandharvair vanitā-śobhi-maṇḍale
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ vanitā śobhi maṇḍale

original: BhP_10.65.021/3 reme kareṇu-yūtheśo māhendra iva vāraṇaḥ
analyzed: reme kareṇu yūtha īśaḥ māhendraḥ iva vāraṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.022/1 nedur dundubhayo vyomni vavṛṣuḥ kusumair mudā
analyzed: neduḥ dundubhayaḥ vyomni vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ mudā

original: BhP_10.65.022/3 gandharvā munayo rāmaṃ tad-vīryair īḍire tadā
analyzed: gandharvāḥ munayaḥ rāmam tad vīryaiḥ īḍire tadā

original: BhP_10.65.023/1 upagīyamāna-carito vanitābhir halāyudha
analyzed: upagīyamāna caritaḥ vanitābhiḥ halāyudha

original: BhP_10.65.023/3 vaneṣu vyacarat kṣīvo mada-vihvala-locanaḥ
analyzed: vaneṣu vyacarat kṣīvaḥ mada vihvala locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.024/1 sragvy eka-kuṇḍalo matto vaijayantyā ca mālayā
analyzed: sragvī eka kuṇḍalaḥ mattaḥ vaijayantyā ca mālayā

original: BhP_10.65.024/3 bibhrat smita-mukhāmbhojaṃ sveda-prāleya-bhūṣitam
analyzed: bibhrat smita mukha ambhojam sveda prāleya bhūṣitam

original: BhP_10.65.025/1 sa ājuhāva yamunāṃ jala-krīḍārtham īśvaraḥ
analyzed: saḥ ājuhāva yamunām jala krīḍā artham īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.65.025/3 nijaṃ vākyam anādṛtya matta ity āpagāṃ balaḥ
analyzed: nijam vākyam an ādṛtya mattaḥ iti āpagām balaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.025/1 anāgatāṃ halāgreṇa kupito vicakarṣa ha
analyzed: anāgatām hala agreṇa kupitaḥ vicakarṣa ha

original: BhP_10.65.026/1 pāpe tvaṃ mām avajñāya yan nāyāsi mayāhutā
analyzed: pāpe tvam mām avajñāya yat na āyāsi mayā a hutā

original: BhP_10.65.026/3 neṣye tvāṃ lāṅgalāgreṇa śatadhā kāma-cāriṇīm
analyzed: neṣye tvām lāṅgala agreṇa śatadhā kāma cāriṇīm

original: BhP_10.65.027/1 evaṃ nirbhartsitā bhītā yamunā yadu-nandanam
analyzed: evam nirbhartsitā bhītā yamunā yadunandanam

original: BhP_10.65.027/3 uvāca cakitā vācaṃ patitā pādayor nṛpa
analyzed: uvāca cakitā vācam patitā pādayoḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.65.028/1 rāma rāma mahā-bāho na jāne tava vikramam
analyzed: rāma rāma mahā bāho na jāne tava vikramam

original: BhP_10.65.028/3 yasyaikāṃśena vidhṛtā jagatī jagataḥ pate
analyzed: yasya eka aṃśena vidhṛtā jagatī jagataḥ pate

original: BhP_10.65.029/1 paraṃ bhāvaṃ bhagavato bhagavan mām ajānatīm
analyzed: param bhāvam bhagavataḥ bhagavat mām a jānatīm

original: BhP_10.65.029/3 moktum arhasi viśvātman prapannāṃ bhakta-vatsala
analyzed: moktum arhasi viśvātman prapannām bhakta vatsala

original: BhP_10.65.030/1 tato vyamuñcad yamunāṃ yācito bhagavān balaḥ
analyzed: tatas vyamuñcat yamunām yācitaḥ bhagavān balaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.030/3 vijagāha jalaṃ strībhiḥ kareṇubhir ivebha-rāṭ
analyzed: vijagāha jalam strībhiḥ kareṇubhiḥ iva ibha rāj

original: BhP_10.65.031/1 kāmaṃ vihṛtya salilād uttīrṇāyāsītāmbare
analyzed: kāmam vihṛtya salilāt uttīrṇāya āsīta ambare

original: BhP_10.65.031/3 bhūṣaṇāni mahārhāṇi dadau kāntiḥ śubhāṃ srajam
analyzed: bhūṣaṇāni mahārhāṇi dadau kāntiḥ śubhām srajam

original: BhP_10.65.032/1 vasitvā vāsasī nīle mālāṃ āmucya kāñcanīm
analyzed: vasitvā vāsasī nīle mālām āmucya kāñcanīm

original: BhP_10.65.032/3 reye sv-alaṅkṛto lipto māhendra iva vāraṇaḥ
analyzed: reye su alaṅkṛtaḥ liptaḥ māhendraḥ iva vāraṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.65.033/1 adyāpi dṛśyate rājan yamunākṛṣṭa-vartmanā
analyzed: adyā api dṛśyate rājan yamunā ākṛṣṭa vartmanā

original: BhP_10.65.033/3 balasyānanta-vīryasya vīryaṃ sūcayatīva hi
analyzed: balasya ananta vīryasya vīryam sūcayati iva hi

original: BhP_10.65.034/1 evaṃ sarvā niśā yātā ekeva ramato vraje
analyzed: evam sarvāḥ niśāḥ yātāḥ ekā iva ramataḥ vraje

original: BhP_10.65.034/3 rāmasyākṣipta-cittasya mādhuryair vraja-yoṣitām
analyzed: rāmasya ākṣipta cittasya mādhuryaiḥ vraja yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.66.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.66.001/1 nanda-vrajaṃ gate rāme karūṣādhipatir nṛpa
analyzed: nanda vrajam gate rāme karūṣa adhipatiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.66.001/3 vāsudevo 'ham ity ajño dūtaṃ kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇot
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ ham iti ajñaḥ dūtam kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇot

original: BhP_10.66.002/1 tvaṃ vāsudevo bhagavān avatīṛno jagat-patiḥ
analyzed: tvam vāsudevaḥ bhagavān avatīṛnaḥ jagatpatiḥ

original: BhP_10.66.002/3 iti prastobhito bālair mena ātmānam acyutam
analyzed: iti prastobhitaḥ bālaiḥ mene ātmānam acyutam

original: BhP_10.66.003/1 dūtaṃ ca prāhiṇon mandaḥ kṛṣṇāyāvyakta-vartmane
analyzed: dūtam ca prāhiṇot mandaḥ kṛṣṇāya avyakta vartmane

original: BhP_10.66.003/3 dvārakāyāṃ yathā bālo nṛpo bāla-kṛto 'budhaḥ
analyzed: dvārakāyām yathā bālaḥ nṛpaḥ bāla kṛtaḥ budhaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.004/1 dūtas tu dvārakām etya sabhāyām āsthitaṃ prabhum
analyzed: dūtaḥ tu dvārakām etya sabhāyām āsthitam prabhum

original: BhP_10.66.004/3 kṛṣṇaṃ kamala-patrākṣaṃ rāja-sandeśam abravīt
analyzed: kṛṣṇam kamala patra akṣam rāja sandeśam abravīt

original: BhP_10.66.005/1 vāsudevo 'vatīrno 'ham eka eva na cāparaḥ
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ vatīḥ naḥ ham ekaḥ eva na ca aparaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.005/3 bhūtānām anukampārthaṃ tvaṃ tu mithyābhidhāṃ tyaja
analyzed: bhūtānām anukampā artham tvam tu mithyā abhidhām tyaja

original: BhP_10.66.006/1 yāni tvam asmac-cihnāni mauḍhyād bibharṣi sātvata
analyzed: yāni tvam asmad cihnāni mauḍhyāt bibharṣi sātvata

original: BhP_10.66.006/3 tyaktvaihi māṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ no ced dehi mamāhavam
analyzed: tyaktvā ehi mām tvam śaraṇam no ced dehi mama āhavam

original: BhP_10.66.007/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.66.007/1 katthanaṃ tad upākarṇya pauṇḍrakasyālpa-medhasaḥ
analyzed: katthanam tat upākarṇya pauṇḍrakasya alpa medhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.007/3 ugrasenādayaḥ sabhyā uccakair jahasus tadā
analyzed: ugrasena ādayaḥ sabhyāḥ uccakais jahasuḥ tadā

original: BhP_10.66.008/1 uvāca dūtaṃ bhagavān parihāsa-kathām anu
analyzed: uvāca dūtam bhagavān parihāsa kathām anu

original: BhP_10.66.008/3 utsrakṣye mūḍha cihnāni yais tvam evaṃ vikatthase
analyzed: utsrakṣye mūḍha cihnāni yaiḥ tvam evam vikatthase

original: BhP_10.66.009/1 mukhaṃ tad apidhāyājña kaṅka-gṛdhra-vaṭair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: mukham tat apidhāya ājña kaṅka gṛdhra vaṭaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.009/3 śayiṣyase hatas tatra bhavitā śaraṇaṃ śunām
analyzed: śayiṣyase hataḥ tatra bhavitā śaraṇam śunām

original: BhP_10.66.010/1 iti dūtas tam ākṣepaṃ svāmine sarvam āharat
analyzed: iti dūtaḥ tam ākṣepam svāmine sarvam āharat

original: BhP_10.66.010/3 kṛṣṇo 'pi ratham āsthāya kāśīm upajagāma ha
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ u pi ratham āsthāya kāśīm upajagāma ha

original: BhP_10.66.011/1 pauṇḍrako 'pi tad-udyogam upalabhya mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: pauṇḍrakaḥ pi tad udyogam upalabhya mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.011/3 akṣauhiṇībhyāṃ saṃyukto niścakrāma purād drutam
analyzed: akṣauhiṇībhyām saṃyuktaḥ niścakrāma purāt drutam

original: BhP_10.66.012/1 tasya kāśī-patir mitraṃ pārṣṇi-grāho 'nvayān nṛpa
analyzed: tasya kāśīpatiḥ mitram pārṣṇigrāhaḥ nu ayāt nṛpa

original: BhP_10.66.012/3 akṣauhiṇībhis tisṛbhir apaśyat pauṇḍrakaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: akṣauhiṇībhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ apaśyat pauṇḍrakam hariḥ

original: BhP_10.66.013/1 śaṅkhāry-asi-gadā-śārṅga- śrīvatsādy-upalakṣitam
analyzed: śaṅkha āri asi gadā śārṅga śrīvatsa ādi upalakṣitam

original: BhP_10.66.013/3 bibhrāṇaṃ kaustubha-maṇiṃ vana-mālā-vibhūṣitam
analyzed: bibhrāṇam kaustubha maṇim vanamālā vibhūṣitam

original: BhP_10.66.014/1 kauśeya-vāsasī pīte vasānaṃ garuḍa-dhvajam
analyzed: kauśeya vāsasī pīte vasānam garuḍadhvajam

original: BhP_10.66.014/3 amūlya-mauly-ābharaṇaṃ sphuran-makara-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: amūlya maulya ābharaṇam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.66.015/1 dṛṣṭvā tam ātmanas tulyaṃ veṣaṃ kṛtrimam āsthitam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam ātmanaḥ tulyam veṣam kṛtrimam āsthitam

original: BhP_10.66.015/3 yathā naṭaṃ raṅga-gataṃ vijahāsa bhṛśaṃ harīḥ
analyzed: yathā naṭam raṅga gatam vijahāsa bhṛśam harīḥ

original: BhP_10.66.016/1 śulair gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ śakty-ṛṣṭi-prāsa-tomaraiḥ
analyzed: śulaiḥ gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ śakti ṛṣṭi prāsa tomaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.66.016/3 asibhiḥ paṭṭiśair bāṇaiḥ prāharann arayo harim
analyzed: asibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ bāṇaiḥ prāharan arayaḥ harim

original: BhP_10.66.017/1 kṛṣṇas tu tat pauṇḍraka-kāśirājayor
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tu tat pauṇḍraka kāśi rājayoḥ

original: BhP_10.66.017/2 balaṃ gaja-syandana-vāji-patti-mat
analyzed: balam gaja syandana vāji pattimat

original: BhP_10.66.017/3 gadāsi-cakreṣubhir ārdayad bhṛśaṃ
analyzed: gadā asi cakra iṣubhiḥ ārdayat bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.66.017/4 yathā yugānte huta-bhuk pṛthak prajāḥ
analyzed: yathā yuga ante hutabhuj pṛthak prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.66.018/1 āyodhanaṃ tad ratha-vāji-kuñjara- dvipat-kharoṣṭrair ariṇāvakhaṇḍitaiḥ
analyzed: āyodhanam tat ratha vāji kuñjara dvipad khara uṣṭraiḥ ariṇa avakhaṇḍitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.66.018/3 babhau citaṃ moda-vahaṃ manasvinām ākrīḍanaṃ bhūta-pater ivolbaṇam
analyzed: babhau citam moda vaham manasvinām ākrīḍanam bhūtapateḥ iva ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.66.019/1 athāha pauṇḍrakaṃ śaurir bho bho pauṇḍraka yad bhavān
analyzed: atha āha pauṇḍrakam śauriḥ bho bho pauṇḍraka yat bhavān

original: BhP_10.66.019/3 dūta-vākyena mām āha tāny astraṇy utsṛjāmi te
analyzed: dūta vākyena mām āha tāni utsṛjāmi te

original: BhP_10.66.020/1 tyājayiṣye 'bhidhānaṃ me yat tvayājña mṛṣā dhṛtam
analyzed: tyājayiṣye bhidhānam me yat tvayā ājña mṛṣā dhṛtam

original: BhP_10.66.020/3 vrajāmi śaranaṃ te 'dya yadi necchāmi saṃyugam
analyzed: vrajāmi śaranam te dya yadi na icchāmi saṃyugam

original: BhP_10.66.021/1 iti kṣiptvā śitair bāṇair virathī-kṛtya pauṇḍrakam
analyzed: iti kṣiptvā śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ virathīkṛtya pauṇḍrakam

original: BhP_10.66.021/3 śiro 'vṛścad rathāṅgena vajreṇendro yathā gireḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ vṛścat rathāṅgena vajreṇa indraḥ yathā gireḥ

original: BhP_10.66.022/1 tathā kāśī-pateḥ kāyāc chira utkṛtya patribhiḥ
analyzed: tathā kāśīpateḥ kāyāt śiraḥ utkṛtya patribhiḥ

original: BhP_10.66.022/3 nyapātayat kāśī-puryāṃ padma-kośam ivānilaḥ
analyzed: nyapātayat kāśī puryām padma kośam iva anilaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.023/1 evaṃ matsariṇam hatvā pauṇḍrakaṃ sa-sakhaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: evam matsariṇam hatvā pauṇḍrakam sa sakham hariḥ

original: BhP_10.66.023/3 dvārakām āviśat siddhair gīyamāna-kathāmṛtaḥ
analyzed: dvārakām āviśat siddhaiḥ gīyamāna kathā amṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.024/1 sa nityaṃ bhagavad-dhyāna- pradhvastākhila-bandhanaḥ
analyzed: sa nityam bhagavat dhyāna pradhvasta akhila bandhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.024/3 bibhrāṇaś ca hare rājan svarūpaṃ tan-mayo 'bhavat
analyzed: bibhrāṇaḥ ca hare rājan sva rūpam tad mayaḥ bhavat

original: BhP_10.66.025/1 śiraḥ patitam ālokya rāja-dvāre sa-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: śiraḥ patitam ālokya rājadvāre sa kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.66.025/3 kim idaṃ kasya vā vaktram iti saṃśiśire janāḥ
analyzed: kim idam kasya vā vaktram iti saṃśiśire janāḥ

original: BhP_10.66.026/1 rājñaḥ kāśī-pater jñātvā mahiṣyaḥ putra-bāndhavāḥ
analyzed: rājñaḥ kāśīpateḥ jñātvā mahiṣyaḥ putra bāndhavāḥ

original: BhP_10.66.026/3 paurāś ca hā hatā rājan nātha nātheti prārudan
analyzed: paurāḥ ca hā hatāḥ rājan nātha nātha iti prārudan

original: BhP_10.66.027/1 sudakṣiṇas tasya sutaḥ kṛtvā saṃsthā-vidhiṃ pateḥ
analyzed: sudakṣiṇaḥ tasya sutaḥ kṛtvā saṃsthā vidhim pateḥ

original: BhP_10.66.027/3 nihatya pitṛ-hantāraṃ yāsyāmy apacitiṃ pituḥ
analyzed: nihatya pitṛ hantāram yāsyāmi apacitim pituḥ

original: BhP_10.66.028/1 ity ātmanābhisandhāya sopādhyāyo maheśvaram
analyzed: iti ātmanā abhisandhāya sa upādhyāyaḥ maheśvaram

original: BhP_10.66.028/3 su-dakṣiṇo 'rcayām āsa parameṇa samādhinā
analyzed: sudakṣiṇaḥ rcayām āsa parameṇa samādhinā

original: BhP_10.66.029/1 prīto 'vimukte bhagavāṃs tasmai varam adād vibhuḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ vimukte bhagavān tasmai varam adāt vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.66.029/3 pitṛ-hantṛ-vadhopāyaṃ sa vavre varam īpsitam
analyzed: pitṛ hantṛ vadha upāyam sa vavre varam īpsitam

original: BhP_10.66.030/1 dakṣiṇāgniṃ paricara brāhmaṇaiḥ samam ṛtvijam
analyzed: dakṣiṇāgnim paricara brāhmaṇaiḥ samam ṛtvijam

original: BhP_10.66.030/3 abhicāra-vidhānena sa cāgniḥ pramathair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: abhicāra vidhānena sa ca agniḥ pramathaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.031/1 sādhayiṣyati saṅkalpam abrahmaṇye prayojitaḥ
analyzed: sādhayiṣyati saṅkalpam abrahmaṇye prayojitaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.031/3 ity ādiṣṭas tathā cakre kṛṣṇāyābhicaran vratī
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭaḥ tathā cakre kṛṣṇāya abhicaran vratī

original: BhP_10.66.032/1 tato 'gnir utthitaḥ kuṇḍān mūrtimān ati-bhīṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas gniḥ utthitaḥ kuṇḍāt mūrtimān ati bhīṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.032/3 tapta-tāmra-śikhā-śmaśrur aṅgārodgāri-locanaḥ
analyzed: tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśruḥ aṅgāra udgāri locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.033/1 daṃṣṭrogra-bhru-kuṭī-daṇḍa- kaṭhorāsyaḥ sva-jihvayā
analyzed: daṃṣṭra ugra bhrukuṭī daṇḍa kaṭhora āsyaḥ sva jihvayā

original: BhP_10.66.033/3 ālihan sṛkvaṇī nagno vidhunvaṃs tri-śikhaṃ jvalat
analyzed: ālihan sṛkvaṇī nagnaḥ vidhunvan tri śikham jvalat

original: BhP_10.66.034/1 padbhyāṃ tāla-pramāṇābhyāṃ kampayann avanī-talam
analyzed: padbhyām tāla pramāṇābhyām kampayan avanī talam

original: BhP_10.66.034/3 so 'bhyadhāvad vṛto bhūtair dvārakāṃ pradahan diśaḥ
analyzed: saḥ bhyadhāvat vṛtaḥ bhūtaiḥ dvārakām pradahan diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.035/1 tam ābhicāra-dahanam āyāntaṃ dvārakaukasaḥ
analyzed: tam ābhicāra dahanam āyāntam dvārakā okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.035/3 vilokya tatrasuḥ sarve vana-dāhe mṛgā yathā
analyzed: vilokya tatrasuḥ sarve vana dāhe mṛgāḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.66.036/1 akṣaiḥ sabhāyāṃ krīḍantaṃ bhagavantaṃ bhayāturāḥ
analyzed: akṣaiḥ sabhāyām krīḍantam bhagavantam bhaya āturāḥ

original: BhP_10.66.036/3 trāhi trāhi tri-lokeśa vahneḥ pradahataḥ puram
analyzed: trāhi trāhi triloka īśa vahneḥ pradahataḥ puram

original: BhP_10.66.037/1 śrutvā taj jana-vaiklavyaṃ dṛṣṭvā svānāṃ ca sādhvasam
analyzed: śrutvā tat jana vaiklavyam dṛṣṭvā svānām ca sādhvasam

original: BhP_10.66.037/3 śaraṇyaḥ samprahasyāha mā bhaiṣṭety avitāsmy aham
analyzed: śaraṇyaḥ samprahasya āha mā bhaiṣṭa iti avitāsmi aham

original: BhP_10.66.038/1 sarvasyāntar-bahiḥ-sākṣī kṛtyāṃ māheśvarīṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: sarvasya antar bahis sākṣī kṛtyām māheśvarīm vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.66.038/3 vijñāya tad-vighātārthaṃ pārśva-sthaṃ cakram ādiśat
analyzed: vijñāya tad vighāta artham pārśva stham cakram ādiśat

original: BhP_10.66.039/1 tat sūrya-koṭi-pratimaṃ sudarśanaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ pralayānala-prabham
analyzed: tat sūrya koṭi pratimam sudarśanam jājvalyamānam pralaya anala prabham

original: BhP_10.66.039/3 sva-tejasā khaṃ kakubho 'tha rodasī cakraṃ mukundāstraṃ athāgnim ārdayat
analyzed: sva tejasā kham kakubhaḥ tha rodasī cakram mukunda astram atha agnim ārdayat

original: BhP_10.66.040/1 kṛtyānalaḥ pratihataḥ sa rathānga-pāṇer
analyzed: kṛtyā analaḥ pratihataḥ sa rathān gapāṇeḥ

original: BhP_10.66.040/2 astraujasā sa nṛpa bhagna-mukho nivṛttaḥ
analyzed: astra ojasā sa nṛpa bhagna mukhaḥ nivṛttaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.040/3 vārāṇasīṃ parisametya sudakṣiṇaṃ taṃ
analyzed: vārāṇasīm parisametya sudakṣiṇam tam

original: BhP_10.66.040/4 sartvig-janaṃ samadahat sva-kṛto 'bhicāraḥ
analyzed: sa ṛtvij janam samadahat svakṛtaḥ bhicāraḥ

original: BhP_10.66.041/1 cakraṃ ca viṣṇos tad-anupraviṣṭaṃ vārānasīṃ sāṭṭa-sabhālayāpaṇām
analyzed: cakram ca viṣṇoḥ tad anupraviṣṭam vārānasīm sa aṭṭa sabhā ālaya āpaṇām

original: BhP_10.66.041/3 sa-gopurāṭṭālaka-koṣṭha-saṅkulāṃ sa-kośa-hasty-aśva-rathānna-śālinīm
analyzed: sa gopura aṭṭālaka koṣṭha saṅkulām sa kośa hasti aśva ratha anna śālinīm

original: BhP_10.66.042/1 dagdhvā vārāṇasīṃ sarvāṃ viṣṇoś cakraṃ sudarśanam
analyzed: dagdhvā vārāṇasīm sarvām viṣṇoḥ cakram sudarśanam

original: BhP_10.66.042/3 bhūyaḥ pārśvam upātiṣṭhat kṛṣṇasyākliṣṭa-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas pārśvam upātiṣṭhat kṛṣṇasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.66.043/1 ya enaṃ śrāvayen martya uttamaḥ-śloka-vikramam
analyzed: yaḥ enam śrāvayet martyaḥ uttamaḥ śloka vikramam

original: BhP_10.66.043/3 samāhito vā śṛṇuyāt sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: samāhitaḥ vā śṛṇuyāt sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: BhP_10.67.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.67.001/1 bhuyo 'haṃ śrotum icchāmi rāmasyādbhuta-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: bhuyaḥ ham śrotum icchāmi rāmasya adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.67.001/3 anantasyāprameyasya yad anyat kṛtavān prabhuḥ
analyzed: anantasya aprameyasya yat anyat kṛtavān prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.67.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.67.002/1 narakasya sakhā kaścid dvivido nāma vānaraḥ
analyzed: narakasya sakhā kaścid dvividaḥ nāma vānaraḥ

original: BhP_10.67.002/3 sugrīva-sacivaḥ so 'tha bhrātā maindasya vīryavān
analyzed: sugrīva sacivaḥ saḥ tha bhrātā maindasya vīryavān

original: BhP_10.67.003/1 sakhyuḥ so 'pacitiṃ kurvan vānaro rāṣṭra-viplavam
analyzed: sakhyuḥ saḥ upacitim kurvan vānaraḥ rāṣṭra viplavam

original: BhP_10.67.003/3 pura-grāmākarān ghoṣān adahad vahnim utsṛjan
analyzed: pura grāma ākarān ghoṣān adahat vahnim utsṛjan

original: BhP_10.67.004/1 kvacit sa śailān utpāṭya tair deśān samacūrṇayat
analyzed: kvacid sa śailān utpāṭya taiḥ deśān samacūrṇayat

original: BhP_10.67.004/3 ānartān sutarām eva yatrāste mitra-hā hariḥ
analyzed: ānartān sutarām eva yatra āste mitra hā hariḥ

original: BhP_10.67.005/1 kvacit samudra-madhya-stho dorbhyām utkṣipya taj-jalam
analyzed: kvacid samudra madhya sthaḥ dorbhyām utkṣipya tat jalam

original: BhP_10.67.005/3 deśān nāgāyuta-prāṇo velā-kūle nyamajjayat
analyzed: deśān nāga ayuta prāṇaḥ velā kūle nyamajjayat

original: BhP_10.67.006/1 āśramān ṛṣi-mukhyānāṃ kṛtvā bhagna-vanaspatīn
analyzed: āśramān ṛṣi mukhyānām kṛtvā bhagna vanaspatīn

original: BhP_10.67.006/3 adūṣayac chakṛn-mūtrair agnīn vaitānikān khalaḥ
analyzed: adūṣayat śakṛt mūtraiḥ agnīn vaitānikān khalaḥ

original: BhP_10.67.007/1 puruṣān yoṣito dṛptaḥ kṣmābhṛd-dronī-guhāsu saḥ
analyzed: puruṣān yoṣitaḥ dṛptaḥ saḥ

original: BhP_10.67.007/3 nikṣipya cāpyadhāc chailaiḥ peśaṣkārīva kīṭakam
analyzed: nikṣipya ca api adhāt śailaiḥ peśaṣkārī iva kīṭakam

original: BhP_10.67.008/1 evaṃ deśān viprakurvan dūṣayaṃś ca kula-striyaḥ
analyzed: evam deśān viprakurvan dūṣayan ca kulastriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.67.008/3 śrutvā su-lalitaṃ gītaṃ giriṃ raivatakaṃ yayau
analyzed: śrutvā su lalitam gītam girim raivatakam yayau

original: BhP_10.67.009/1 tatrāpaśyad yadu-patiṃ rāmaṃ puṣkara-mālinam
analyzed: tatra apaśyat yadupatim rāmam puṣkara mālinam

original: BhP_10.67.009/3 sudarśanīya-sarvāṅgaṃ lalanā-yūtha-madhya-gam
analyzed: su darśanīya sarva aṅgam lalanā yūtha madhya gam

original: BhP_10.67.010/1 gāyantaṃ vāruṇīṃ pītvā mada-vihvala-locanam
analyzed: gāyantam vāruṇīm pītvā mada vihvala locanam

original: BhP_10.67.010/3 vibhrājamānaṃ vapuṣā prabhinnam iva vāraṇam
analyzed: vibhrājamānam vapuṣā prabhinnam iva vāraṇam

original: BhP_10.67.011/1 duṣṭaḥ śākhā-mṛgaḥ śākhām ārūḍhaḥ kampayan drumān
analyzed: duṣṭaḥ śākhāmṛgaḥ śākhām ārūḍhaḥ kampayan drumān

original: BhP_10.67.011/3 cakre kilakilā-śabdam ātmānaṃ sampradarśayan
analyzed: cakre kilakilā śabdam ātmānam sampradarśayan

original: BhP_10.67.012/1 tasya dhārṣṭyaṃ kaper vīkṣya taruṇyo jāti-cāpalāḥ
analyzed: tasya dhārṣṭyam kapeḥ vīkṣya taruṇyaḥ jāti cāpalāḥ

original: BhP_10.67.012/3 hāsya-priyā vijahasur baladeva-parigrahāḥ
analyzed: hāsya priyāḥ vijahasuḥ baladeva parigrahāḥ

original: BhP_10.67.013/1 tā helayām āsa kapir bhrū-kṣepair sammukhādibhiḥ
analyzed: tāḥ āsa kapiḥ bhrū kṣepaiḥ sammukha ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.67.013/3 darśayan sva-gudaṃ tāsāṃ rāmasya ca nirīkṣitaḥ
analyzed: darśayan sva gudam tāsām rāmasya ca nirīkṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.67.014/1 taṃ grāvṇā prāharat kruddho balaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tam grāvṇā prāharat kruddhaḥ balaḥ praharatām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.67.014/3 sa vañcayitvā grāvāṇaṃ madirā-kalaśaṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: sa vañcayitvā grāvāṇam madirā kalaśam kapiḥ

original: BhP_10.67.015/1 gṛhītvā helayām āsa dhūrtas taṃ kopayan hasan
analyzed: gṛhītvā āsa dhūrtaḥ tam kopayan hasan

original: BhP_10.67.015/3 nirbhidya kalaśaṃ duṣṭo vāsāṃsy āsphālayad balam
analyzed: nirbhidya kalaśam duṣṭaḥ vāsāṃsi āsphālayat balam

original: BhP_10.67.015/5 kadarthī-kṛtya balavān vipracakre madoddhataḥ
analyzed: kadarthīkṛtya balavān vipracakre mada uddhataḥ

original: BhP_10.67.016/1 taṃ tasyāvinayaṃ dṛṣṭvā deśāṃś ca tad-upadrutān
analyzed: tam tasya avinayam dṛṣṭvā deśān ca tad upadrutān

original: BhP_10.67.016/3 kruddho muṣalam ādatta halaṃ cāri-jighāṃsayā
analyzed: kruddhaḥ muṣalam ādatta halam ca ari jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.67.017/1 dvivido 'pi mahā-vīryaḥ śālam udyamya pāṇinā
analyzed: dvividaḥ pi mahā vīryaḥ śālam udyamya pāṇinā

original: BhP_10.67.017/3 abhyetya tarasā tena balaṃ mūrdhany atāḍayat
analyzed: abhyetya tarasā tena balam mūrdhani atāḍayat

original: BhP_10.67.018/1 taṃ tu saṅkarṣaṇo mūrdhni patantam acalo yathā
analyzed: tam tu saṅkarṣaṇaḥ mūrdhni patantam acalaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.67.018/3 pratijagrāha balavān sunandenāhanac ca tam
analyzed: pratijagrāha balavān sunandena ahanat ca tam

original: BhP_10.67.019/1 mūṣalāhata-mastiṣko vireje rakta-dhārayā
analyzed: mūṣala āhata mastiṣkaḥ vireje rakta dhārayā

original: BhP_10.67.019/3 girir yathā gairikayā prahāraṃ nānucintayan
analyzed: giriḥ yathā gairikayā prahāram na anucintayan

original: BhP_10.67.020/1 punar anyaṃ samutkṣipya kṛtvā niṣpatram ojasā
analyzed: punar anyam samutkṣipya kṛtvā niṣpatram ojasā

original: BhP_10.67.020/3 tenāhanat su-saṅkruddhas taṃ balaḥ śatadhācchinat
analyzed: tena ahanat su saṅkruddhaḥ tam balaḥ śatadhā ācchinat

original: BhP_10.67.021/1 tato 'nyena ruṣā jaghne taṃ cāpi śatadhācchinat
analyzed: tatas ruṣā jaghne tam ca api śatadhā ācchinat

original: BhP_10.67.022/1 evaṃ yudhyan bhagavatā bhagne bhagne punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: evam yudhyan bhagavatā bhagne bhagne punar punar

original: BhP_10.67.022/3 ākṛṣya sarvato vṛkṣān nirvṛkṣam akarod vanam
analyzed: ākṛṣya sarvatas vṛkṣān nirvṛkṣam akarot vanam

original: BhP_10.67.023/1 tato 'muñcac chilā-varṣaṃ balasyopary amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: tatas muñcat śilā varṣam balasya upari amarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.67.023/3 tat sarvaṃ cūrṇayāṃ āsa līlayā muṣalāyudhaḥ
analyzed: tat sarvam āsa līlayā

original: BhP_10.67.024/1 sa bāhū tāla-saṅkāśau muṣṭī-kṛtya kapīśvaraḥ
analyzed: sa bāhū tāla saṅkāśau muṣṭīkṛtya kapi īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.67.024/3 āsādya rohiṇī-putraṃ tābhyāṃ vakṣasy arūrujat
analyzed: āsādya rohiṇīputram tābhyām vakṣasi arūrujat

original: BhP_10.67.025/1 yādavendro 'pi taṃ dorbhyāṃ tyaktvā muṣala-lāṅgale
analyzed: yādava indraḥ pi tam dorbhyām tyaktvā muṣala lāṅgale

original: BhP_10.67.025/3 jatrāv abhyardayat kruddhaḥ so 'patad rudhiraṃ vaman
analyzed: jatrau abhyardayat kruddhaḥ saḥ patat rudhiram vaman

original: BhP_10.67.026/1 cakampe tena patatā sa-ṭaṅkaḥ sa-vanaspatiḥ
analyzed: cakampe tena patatā sa ṭaṅkaḥ sa vanaspatiḥ

original: BhP_10.67.026/3 parvataḥ kuru-śārdūla vāyunā naur ivāmbhasi
analyzed: parvataḥ kuru śārdūla vāyunā nauḥ iva ambhasi

original: BhP_10.67.027/1 jaya-śabdo namaḥ-śabdaḥ sādhu sādhv iti cāmbare
analyzed: jaya śabdaḥ namaḥ śabdaḥ sādhu sādhu iti ca ambare

original: BhP_10.67.027/3 sura-siddha-munīndrāṇām āsīt kusuma-varṣiṇām
analyzed: sura siddha muni indrāṇām āsīt kusuma varṣiṇām

original: BhP_10.67.028/1 evaṃ nihatya dvividaṃ jagad-vyatikarāvaham
analyzed: evam nihatya dvividam jagat vyatikara āvaham

original: BhP_10.67.028/3 saṃstūyamāno bhagavān janaiḥ sva-puram āviśat
analyzed: saṃstūyamānaḥ bhagavān janaiḥ sva puram āviśat

original: BhP_10.68.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.68.001/1 duryodhana-sutāṃ rājan lakṣmaṇāṃ samitiṃ-jayaḥ
analyzed: duryodhana sutām rājan lakṣmaṇām samitiṃjayaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.001/3 svayaṃvara-sthām aharat sāmbo jāmbavatī-sutaḥ
analyzed: svayaṃvara sthām aharat sāmbaḥ jāmbavatī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.002/1 kauravāḥ kupitā ūcur durvinīto 'yam arbhakaḥ
analyzed: kauravāḥ kupitāḥ ūcuḥ durvinītaḥ yam arbhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.002/3 kadarthī-kṛtya naḥ kanyām akāmām aharad balāt
analyzed: kadarthīkṛtya naḥ kanyām akāmām aharat balāt

original: BhP_10.68.003/1 badhnītemaṃ durvinītaṃ kiṃ kariṣyanti vṛṣṇayaḥ
analyzed: badhnīta imam durvinītam kim kariṣyanti vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.003/3 ye 'smat-prasādopacitāṃ dattāṃ no bhuñjate mahīm
analyzed: ye smad prasāda upacitām dattām naḥ bhuñjate mahīm

original: BhP_10.68.004/1 nigṛhītaṃ sutaṃ śrutvā yady eṣyantīha vṛṣṇayaḥ
analyzed: nigṛhītam sutam śrutvā yadi eṣyanti iha vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.004/3 bhagna-darpāḥ śamaṃ yānti prāṇā iva su-saṃyatāḥ
analyzed: bhagna darpāḥ śamam yānti prāṇāḥ iva su saṃyatāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.005/1 iti karṇaḥ śalo bhūrir yajñaketuḥ suyodhanaḥ
analyzed: iti karṇaḥ śalaḥ bhūriḥ yajñaketuḥ suyodhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.005/3 sāmbam ārebhire yoddhuṃ kuru-vṛddhānumoditāḥ
analyzed: sāmbam ārebhire yoddhum kuru vṛddha anumoditāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.006/1 dṛṣṭvānudhāvataḥ sāmbo dhārtarāṣṭrān mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā anudhāvataḥ sāmbaḥ dhārtarāṣṭrān mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.006/3 pragṛhya ruciraṃ cāpaṃ tasthau siṃha ivaikalaḥ
analyzed: pragṛhya ruciram cāpam tasthau siṃhaḥ iva ekalaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.007/1 taṃ te jighṛkṣavaḥ kruddhās tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti bhāṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tam te jighṛkṣavaḥ kruddhāḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.007/3 āsādya dhanvino bāṇaiḥ karṇāgraṇyaḥ samākiran
analyzed: āsādya dhanvinaḥ bāṇaiḥ karṇāgraṇyaḥ samākiran

original: BhP_10.68.008/1 so 'paviddhaḥ kuru-śreṣṭha kurubhir yadu-nandanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ u paviddhaḥ kuru śreṣṭha kurubhiḥ yadu nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.008/3 nāmṛṣyat tad acintyārbhaḥ siṃha kṣudra-mṛgair iva
analyzed: na amṛṣyat tat acintya arbhaḥ siṃha kṣudra mṛgaiḥ iva

original: BhP_10.68.009/1 visphūrjya ruciraṃ cāpaṃ sarvān vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
analyzed: visphūrjya ruciram cāpam sarvān vivyādha sāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.68.009/3 karṇādīn ṣaḍ rathān vīras tāvadbhir yugapat pṛthak
analyzed: karṇa ādīn ṣaṭ rathān vīraḥ tāvadbhiḥ yugapad pṛthak

original: BhP_10.68.010/1 caturbhiś caturo vāhān ekaikena ca sārathīn
analyzed: caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān ekaikena ca sārathīn

original: BhP_10.68.010/3 rathinaś ca maheṣvāsāṃs tasya tat te 'bhyapūjayan
analyzed: rathinaḥ ca mahā iṣvāsān tasya tat te bhyapūjayan

original: BhP_10.68.011/1 taṃ tu te virathaṃ cakruś catvāraś caturo hayān
analyzed: tam tu te viratham cakruḥ catvāraḥ caturaḥ hayān

original: BhP_10.68.011/3 ekas tu sārathiṃ jaghne cicchedaṇyaḥ śarāsanam
analyzed: ekaḥ tu sārathim jaghne cicchedaṇyaḥ śarāsanam

original: BhP_10.68.012/1 taṃ baddhvā virathī-kṛtya kṛcchreṇa kuravo yudhi
analyzed: tam baddhvā virathīkṛtya kṛcchreṇa kuravaḥ yudhi

original: BhP_10.68.012/3 kumāraṃ svasya kanyāṃ ca sva-puraṃ jayino 'viśan
analyzed: kumāram svasya kanyām ca sva puram jayinaḥ viśan

original: BhP_10.68.013/1 tac chrutvā nāradoktena rājan sañjāta-manyavaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā nārada uktena rājan sañjāta manyavaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.013/3 kurūn praty udyamaṃ cakrur ugrasena-pracoditāḥ
analyzed: kurūn prati udyamam cakruḥ ugrasena pracoditāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.014/1 sāntvayitvā tu tān rāmaḥ sannaddhān vṛṣṇi-puṅgavān
analyzed: sāntvayitvā tu tān rāmaḥ sannaddhān vṛṣṇi puṅgavān

original: BhP_10.68.014/3 naicchat kurūṇāṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ kaliṃ kali-malāpahaḥ
analyzed: na aicchat kurūṇām vṛṣṇīnām kalim kali mala apahaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.015/1 jagāma hāstina-puraṃ rathenāditya-varcasā
analyzed: jagāma hāstinapuram rathena āditya varcasā

original: BhP_10.68.015/3 brāhmaṇaiḥ kula-vṛddhaiś ca vṛtaś candra iva grahaiḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ kula vṛddhaiḥ ca vṛtaḥ candraḥ iva grahaiḥ

original: BhP_10.68.016/1 gatvā gajāhvayaṃ rāmo bāhyopavanam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: gatvā gajāhvayam rāmaḥ bāhya upavanam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.016/3 uddhavaṃ preṣayām āsa dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ bubhutsayā
analyzed: uddhavam preṣayām āsa dhṛtarāṣṭram bubhutsayā

original: BhP_10.68.017/1 so 'bhivandyāmbikā-putraṃ bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ ca bāhlikam
analyzed: saḥ bhivandya ambikā putram bhīṣmam droṇam ca bāhlikam

original: BhP_10.68.017/3 duryodhanaṃ ca vidhi-vad rāmam āgataṃ abravīt
analyzed: duryodhanam ca vidhivat rāmam āgatam abravīt

original: BhP_10.68.018/1 te 'ti-prītās tam ākarṇya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ suhṛt-tamam
analyzed: te ti prītāḥ tam ākarṇya prāptam rāmam suhṛttamam

original: BhP_10.68.018/3 tam arcayitvābhiyayuḥ sarve maṅgala-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: tam arcayitvā abhiyayuḥ sarve maṅgala pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.019/1 taṃ saṅgamya yathā-nyāyaṃ gām arghyaṃ ca nyavedayan
analyzed: tam saṅgamya yathānyāyam gām arghyam ca nyavedayan

original: BhP_10.68.019/3 teṣāṃ ye tat-prabhāva-jñāḥ praṇemuḥ śirasā balam
analyzed: teṣām ye tad prabhāva jñāḥ praṇemuḥ śirasā balam

original: BhP_10.68.020/1 bandhūn kuśalinaḥ śrutvā pṛṣṭvā śivam anāmayam
analyzed: bandhūn kuśalinaḥ śrutvā pṛṣṭvā śivam anāmayam

original: BhP_10.68.020/3 parasparam atho rāmo babhāṣe 'viklavaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: parasparam atho rāmaḥ babhāṣe viklavam vacaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.021/1 ugrasenaḥ kṣiteśeśo yad va ājñāpayat prabhuḥ
analyzed: ugrasenaḥ kṣiteśa īśaḥ yat vaḥ ājñāpayat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.68.021/3 tad avyagra-dhiyaḥ śrutvā kurudhvam avilambitam
analyzed: tat avyagra dhiyaḥ śrutvā kurudhvam avilambitam

original: BhP_10.68.022/1 yad yūyaṃ bahavas tv ekaṃ jitvādharmeṇa dhārmikam
analyzed: yat yūyam bahavaḥ tu ekam jitvā adharmeṇa dhārmikam

original: BhP_10.68.022/3 abadhnītātha tan mṛṣye bandhūnām aikya-kāmyayā
analyzed: abadhnīta atha tat mṛṣye bandhūnām aikya kāmyayā

original: BhP_10.68.023/1 vīrya-śaurya-balonnaddham ātma-śakti-samaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: vīrya śaurya bala unnaddham ātma śakti samam vacaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.023/3 kuravo baladevasya niśamyocuḥ prakopitāḥ
analyzed: kuravaḥ baladevasya niśamya ūcuḥ prakopitāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.024/1 aho mahac citram idaṃ kāla-gatyā duratyayā
analyzed: aho mahat citram idam kālagatyā duratyayā

original: BhP_10.68.024/3 ārurukṣaty upānad vai śiro mukuṭa-sevitam
analyzed: ārurukṣati upānat vai śiraḥ mukuṭa sevitam

original: BhP_10.68.025/1 ete yaunena sambaddhāḥ saha-śayyāsanāśanāḥ
analyzed: ete yaunena sambaddhāḥ saha śayyā āsana aśanāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.025/3 vṛṣṇayas tulyatāṃ nītā asmad-datta-nṛpāsanāḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇayaḥ tulya tām nītāḥ asmad datta nṛpa āsanāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.026/1 cāmara-vyajane śaṅkham ātapatraṃ ca pāṇḍuram
analyzed: cāmara vyajane śaṅkham ātapatram ca pāṇḍuram

original: BhP_10.68.026/3 kirīṭam āsanaṃ śayyāṃ bhuñjate 'smad-upekṣayā
analyzed: kirīṭam āsanam śayyām bhuñjate smad upekṣayā

original: BhP_10.68.027/1 alaṃ yadūnāṃ naradeva-lāñchanair dātuḥ pratīpaiḥ phaṇinām ivāmṛtam
analyzed: alam yadūnām naradeva lāñchanaiḥ dātuḥ pratīpaiḥ phaṇinām iva amṛtam

original: BhP_10.68.027/3 ye 'smat-prasādopacitā hi yādavā ājñāpayanty adya gata-trapā bata
analyzed: ye smad prasāda upacitāḥ hi yādavāḥ ājñāpayanti adya gatatrapāḥ bata

original: BhP_10.68.028/1 katham indro 'pi kurubhir bhīṣma-droṇārjunādibhiḥ
analyzed: katham indraḥ pi kurubhiḥ bhīṣma droṇa arjuna ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.68.028/3 adattam avarundhīta siṃha-grastam ivoraṇaḥ
analyzed: a dattam avarundhīta siṃha grastam iva uraṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.029/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.68.029/1 janma-bandhu-śrīyonnaddha- madās te bharatarṣabha
analyzed: madāḥ te bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.68.029/3 āśrāvya rāmaṃ durvācyam asabhyāḥ puram āviśan
analyzed: āśrāvya rāmam durvācyam asabhyāḥ puram āviśan

original: BhP_10.68.030/1 dṛṣṭvā kurūnāṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ śrutvāvācyāni cācyutaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā kurūnām dauḥśīlyam śrutvā avācyāni ca acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.030/3 avocat kopa-saṃrabdho duṣprekṣyaḥ prahasan muhuḥ
analyzed: avocat kopa saṃrabdhaḥ duṣprekṣyaḥ prahasan muhur

original: BhP_10.68.031/1 nūnaṃ nānā-madonnaddhāḥ śāntiṃ necchanty asādhavaḥ
analyzed: nūnam nānā mada unnaddhāḥ śāntim nā icchanti asādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.031/3 teṣāṃ hi praśamo daṇḍaḥ paśūnāṃ laguḍo yathā
analyzed: teṣām hi praśamaḥ daṇḍaḥ paśūnām laguḍaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.68.032/1 aho yadūn su-saṃrabdhān kṛṣṇaṃ ca kupitaṃ śanaiḥ
analyzed: aho yadūn su saṃrabdhān kṛṣṇam ca kupitam śanais

original: BhP_10.68.032/3 sāntvayitvāham eteṣāṃ śamam icchann ihāgataḥ
analyzed: sāntvayitvā aham eteṣām śamam icchan iha āgataḥ

original: BhP_10.68.033/1 ta ime manda-matayaḥ kalahābhiratāḥ khalāḥ
analyzed: te ime manda matayaḥ kalaha abhiratāḥ khalāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.033/3 taṃ mām avajñāya muhur durbhāṣān mānino 'bruvan
analyzed: tam mām avajñāya muhur durbhāṣān māninaḥ bruvan

original: BhP_10.68.034/1 nograsenaḥ kila vibhur bhoja-vṛṣṇy-andhakeśvaraḥ
analyzed: na ugrasenaḥ kila vibhuḥ bhoja vṛṣṇi andhaka īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.68.034/3 śakrādayo loka-pālā yasyādeśānuvartinaḥ
analyzed: śakra ādayaḥ lokapālāḥ yasya ādeśa anuvartinaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.035/1 sudharmākramyate yena pārijāto 'marāṅghripaḥ
analyzed: sudharmā ākramyate yena pārijātaḥ mara aṅghripaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.035/3 ānīya bhujyate so 'sau na kilādhyāsanārhaṇaḥ
analyzed: ānīya bhujyate saḥ sau na kila adhyāsana arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.036/1 yasya pāda-yugaṃ sākṣāc chrīr upāste 'khileśvarī
analyzed: yasya pāda yugam sākṣāt śrīḥ upāste khila īśvarī

original: BhP_10.68.036/3 sa nārhati kila śrīśo naradeva-paricchadān
analyzed: sa nā arhati kila śrīśaḥ naradeva paricchadān

original: BhP_10.68.037/1 yasyāṅghri-paṅkaja-rajo 'khila-loka-pālair
analyzed: yasya aṅghri paṅkaja rajaḥ khila lokapālaiḥ

original: BhP_10.68.037/2 mauly-uttamair dhṛtam upāsita-tīrtha-tīrtham
analyzed: mauli uttamaiḥ dhṛtam upāsita tīrtha tīrtham

original: BhP_10.68.037/3 brahmā bhavo 'ham api yasya kalāḥ kalāyāḥ
analyzed: brahmā bhavaḥ ham api yasya kalāḥ kalāyāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.037/4 śrīś codvahema ciram asya nṛpāsanaṃ kva
analyzed: śrīḥ ca udvahema ciram asya nṛpāsanam kva

original: BhP_10.68.038/1 bhuñjate kurubhir dattaṃ bhū-khaṇḍaṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ kila
analyzed: bhuñjate kurubhiḥ dattam bhūkhaṇḍam vṛṣṇayaḥ kila

original: BhP_10.68.038/3 upānahaḥ kila vayaṃ svayaṃ tu kuravaḥ śiraḥ
analyzed: upānahaḥ kila vayam svayam tu kuravaḥ śiraḥ

original: BhP_10.68.039/1 aho aiśvarya-mattānāṃ mattānām iva māninām
analyzed: aho aiśvarya mattānām mattānām iva māninām

original: BhP_10.68.039/3 asambaddhā giṛo rukṣāḥ kaḥ sahetānuśāsītā
analyzed: a sambaddhāḥ giṛaḥ rukṣāḥ kaḥ saheta anuśāsīta

original: BhP_10.68.040/1 adya niṣkauravaṃ pṛthvīṃ kariṣyāmīty amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: adya niṣkauravam pṛthvīm kariṣyāmi iti amarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.040/3 gṛhītvā halam uttasthau dahann iva jagat-trayam
analyzed: gṛhītvā halam uttasthau dahan iva jagattrayam

original: BhP_10.68.041/1 lāṅgalāgreṇa nagaram udvidārya gajāhvayam
analyzed: lāṅgala agreṇa nagaram udvidārya gajāhvayam

original: BhP_10.68.041/3 vicakarṣa sa gaṅgāyāṃ prahariṣyann amarṣitaḥ
analyzed: vicakarṣa sa gaṅgāyām prahariṣyan amarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.042/1 jala-yānam ivāghūrṇaṃ gaṅgāyāṃ nagaraṃ patat
analyzed: jalayānam iva āghūrṇam gaṅgāyām nagaram patat

original: BhP_10.68.042/3 ākṛṣyamāṇam ālokya kauravāḥ jāta-sambhramāḥ
analyzed: ākṛṣyamāṇam ālokya kauravāḥ jāta sambhramāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.043/1 tam eva śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ sa-kuṭumbā jijīviṣavaḥ
analyzed: tam eva śaraṇam jagmuḥ sa kuṭumbāḥ jijīviṣavaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.043/3 sa-lakṣmaṇaṃ puras-kṛtya sāmbaṃ prāñjalayaḥ prabhum
analyzed: sa lakṣmaṇam puraskṛtya sa ambam prāñjalayaḥ prabhum

original: BhP_10.68.044/1 rāma rāmākhilādhāra prabhāvaṃ na vidāma te
analyzed: rāma rāma akhila ādhāra prabhāvam na vidāma te

original: BhP_10.68.044/3 mūḍhānāṃ naḥ ku-buddhīnāṃ kṣantum arhasy atikramam
analyzed: mūḍhānām naḥ ku buddhīnām kṣantum arhasi atikramam

original: BhP_10.68.045/1 sthity-utpatty-apyayānāṃ tvam eko hetur nirāśrayaḥ
analyzed: sthiti utpatti apyayānām tvam ekaḥ hetuḥ nirāśrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.045/3 lokān krīḍanakān īśa krīḍatas te vadanti hi
analyzed: lokān krīḍanakān īśa krīḍataḥ te vadanti hi

original: BhP_10.68.046/1 tvam eva mūrdhnīdam ananta līlayā bhū-maṇḍalaṃ bibharṣi sahasra-mūrdhan
analyzed: tvam eva mūrdhni idam ananta līlayā bhū maṇḍalam bibharṣi sahasramūrdhan

original: BhP_10.68.046/3 ante ca yaḥ svātma-niruddha-viśvaḥ śeṣe 'dvitīyaḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ
analyzed: ante ca yaḥ sva ātma niruddha viśvaḥ śeṣe dvitīyaḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.047/1 kopas te 'khila-śikṣārthaṃ na dveṣān na ca matsarāt
analyzed: kopaḥ te khila śikṣā artham na dveṣāt na ca matsarāt

original: BhP_10.68.047/3 bibhrato bhagavan sattvaṃ sthiti-pālana-tatparaḥ
analyzed: bibhrataḥ bhagavan sattvam sthiti pālana tatparaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.048/1 namas te sarva-bhūtātman sarva-śakti-dharāvyaya
analyzed: namaḥ te sarva bhūta ātman sarva śakti dhara avyaya

original: BhP_10.68.048/3 viśva-karman namas te 'stu tvāṃ vayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: viśvakarman namaḥ te stu tvām vayam śaraṇam gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.68.049/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.68.049/1 evaṃ prapannaiḥ saṃvignair vepamānāyanair balaḥ
analyzed: evam prapannaiḥ saṃvignaiḥ vepamāna ayanaiḥ balaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.049/3 prasāditaḥ su-prasanno mā bhaiṣṭety abhayaṃ dadau
analyzed: prasāditaḥ su prasannaḥ mā bhaiṣṭa iti abhayam dadau

original: BhP_10.68.050/1 duryodhanaḥ pāribarhaṃ kuñjarān ṣaṣṭi-hāyanān
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ pāribarham kuñjarān ṣaṣṭihāyanān

original: BhP_10.68.050/3 dadau ca dvādaśa-śatāny ayutāni turaṅgamān
analyzed: dadau ca dvādaśa śatāni ayutāni turaṅgamān

original: BhP_10.68.051/1 rathānāṃ ṣaṭ-sahasrāṇi raukmāṇāṃ sūrya-varcasām
analyzed: rathānām ṣaṣ sahasrāṇi raukmāṇām sūrya varcasām

original: BhP_10.68.051/3 dāsīnāṃ niṣka-kaṇṭhīnāṃ sahasraṃ duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: dāsīnām niṣka kaṇṭhīnām sahasram duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.052/1 pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ bhagavān sātvatarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: pratigṛhya tu tat sarvam bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.052/3 sa-sutaḥ sa-snuṣaḥ prāyāt suhṛdbhir abhinanditaḥ
analyzed: sa sutaḥ sa snuṣaḥ prāyāt suhṛdbhiḥ abhinanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.053/1 tataḥ praviṣṭaḥ sva-puraṃ halāyudhaḥ
analyzed: tatas praviṣṭaḥ sva puram halāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.053/2 sametya bandhūn anurakta-cetasaḥ
analyzed: sametya bandhūn anurakta cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.68.053/3 śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ yadu-puṅgavānāṃ
analyzed: śaśaṃsa sarvam yadu puṅgavānām

original: BhP_10.68.053/4 madhye sabhāyāṃ kuruṣu sva-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: madhye sabhāyām kuruṣu sva ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.68.054/1 adyāpi ca puraṃ hy etat sūcayad rāma-vikramam
analyzed: adyā api ca puram hi etat sūcayat rāma vikramam

original: BhP_10.68.054/3 samunnataṃ dakṣiṇato gaṅgāyām anudṛśyate
analyzed: samunnatam dakṣiṇatas gaṅgāyām anudṛśyate

original: BhP_10.69.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.69.001/1 narakaṃ nihataṃ śrutvā tathodvāhaṃ ca yoṣitām
analyzed: narakam nihatam śrutvā tathā udvāham ca yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.69.001/3 kṛṣṇenaikena bahvīnāṃ tad-didṛkṣuḥ sma nāradaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇena ekena bahvīnām tad didṛkṣuḥ sma nāradaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.002/1 citraṃ bataitad ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak
analyzed: citram bata etat ekena vapuṣā yugapad pṛthak

original: BhP_10.69.002/3 gṛheṣu dvy-aṣṭa-sāhasraṃ striya eka udāvahat
analyzed: gṛheṣu dvi aṣṭa sāhasram striyaḥ ekaḥ udāvahat

original: BhP_10.69.003/1 ity utsuko dvāravatīṃ devarṣir draṣṭum āgamat
analyzed: iti utsukaḥ dvāravatīm devarṣiḥ draṣṭum āgamat

original: BhP_10.69.003/3 puṣpitopavanārāma- dvijāli-kula-nāditām
analyzed: puṣpita upavana ārāma dvija āli kula nāditām

original: BhP_10.69.004/1 utphullendīvarāmbhoja- kahlāra-kumudotpalaiḥ
analyzed: utphulla indīvara ambhoja kahlāra kumuda utpalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.004/3 churiteṣu saraḥsūccaiḥ kūjitāṃ haṃsa-sārasaiḥ
analyzed: churiteṣu saraḥsu uccais kūjitām haṃsa sārasaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.005/1 prāsāda-lakṣair navabhir juṣṭāṃ sphāṭika-rājataiḥ
analyzed: prāsāda lakṣaiḥ navabhiḥ juṣṭām sphāṭika rājataiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.005/3 mahā-marakata-prakhyaiḥ svarṇa-ratna-paricchadaiḥ
analyzed: mahā marakata prakhyaiḥ svarṇa ratna paricchadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.006/1 vibhakta-rathyā-patha-catvarāpaṇaiḥ śālā-sabhābhī rucirāṃ surālayaiḥ
analyzed: vibhakta rathyāpatha catvara āpaṇaiḥ śālā sabhābhiḥ rucirām surālayaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.006/3 saṃsikta-mārgāṅgana-vīthi-dehalīṃ patat-patāka-dhvaja-vāritātapām
analyzed: saṃsikta mārga aṅgana vīthi dehalīm patat patāka dhvaja vārita ātapām

original: BhP_10.69.007/1 tasyām antaḥ-puraṃ śrīmad arcitaṃ sarva-dhiṣṇya-paiḥ
analyzed: tasyām antaḥpuram śrīmat arcitam sarva dhiṣṇyapaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.007/3 hareḥ sva-kauśalaṃ yatra tvaṣṭrā kārtsnyena darśitam
analyzed: hareḥ sva kauśalam yatra tvaṣṭrā kārtsnyena darśitam

original: BhP_10.69.008/1 tatra ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sadma- sahasraiḥ samalaṅkṛtam
analyzed: tatra ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sadma sahasraiḥ samalaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_10.69.008/3 viveśaikatomaṃ śaureḥ patnīnāṃ bhavanaṃ mahat
analyzed: viveśa ekatomam śaureḥ patnīnām bhavanam mahat

original: BhP_10.69.009/1 viṣṭabdhaṃ vidruma-stambhair vaidūrya-phalakottamaiḥ
analyzed: viṣṭabdham vidruma stambhaiḥ vaidūrya phalaka uttamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.009/3 indranīla-mayaiḥ kuḍyair jagatyā cāhata-tviṣā
analyzed: indranīla mayaiḥ kuḍyaiḥ jagatyā ca ahata tviṣā

original: BhP_10.69.010/1 vitānair nirmitais tvaṣṭrā muktā-dāma-vilambibhiḥ
analyzed: vitānaiḥ nirmitaiḥ tvaṣṭrā muktā dāma vilambibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.010/3 dāntair āsana-paryaṅkair maṇy-uttama-pariṣkṛtaiḥ
analyzed: dāntaiḥ āsana paryaṅkaiḥ maṇi uttama pariṣkṛtaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.011/1 dāsībhir niṣka-kaṇṭhībhiḥ su-vāsobhir alaṅkṛtam
analyzed: dāsībhiḥ niṣka kaṇṭhībhiḥ su vāsobhiḥ alaṅkṛtam

original: BhP_10.69.011/3 pumbhiḥ sa-kañcukoṣṇīṣa su-vastra-maṇi-kuṇḍalaiḥ
analyzed: pumbhiḥ sa kañcuka uṣṇīṣa su vastra maṇi kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.012/1 ratna-pradīpa-nikara-dyutibhir nirasta- dhvāntaṃ vicitra-valabhīṣu śikhaṇḍino 'ṅga
analyzed: ratna pradīpa nikara dyutibhiḥ nirasta dhvāntam vicitra valabhīṣu śikhaṇḍinaḥ ṅga

original: BhP_10.69.012/3 nṛtyanti yatra vihitāguru-dhūpam akṣair niryāntam īkṣya ghana-buddhaya unnadantaḥ
analyzed: nṛtyanti yatra vihita aguru dhūpam akṣaiḥ niryāntam īkṣya ghana buddhayaḥ unnadantaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.013/1 tasmin samāna-guṇa-rūpa-vayaḥ-su-veṣa-
analyzed: tasmin samāna guṇa rūpa vayaḥ su veṣa

original: BhP_10.69.013/2 dāsī-sahasra-yutayānusavaṃ gṛhiṇyā
analyzed: dāsī sahasra yutayā anusavam gṛhiṇyā

original: BhP_10.69.013/3 vipro dadarśa camara-vyajanena rukma-
analyzed: vipraḥ dadarśa camara vyajanena rukma

original: BhP_10.69.013/4 daṇḍena sātvata-patiṃ parivījayantyā
analyzed: daṇḍena sātvata patim parivījayantyā

original: BhP_10.69.014/1 taṃ sannirīkṣya bhagavān sahasotthita-śrī-
analyzed: tam san nirīkṣya bhagavān sahasā utthita śrī

original: BhP_10.69.014/2 paryaṅkataḥ sakala-dharma-bhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: paryaṅkataḥ sakala dharma bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.014/3 ānamya pāda-yugalaṃ śirasā kirīṭa-
analyzed: ānamya pāda yugalam śirasā kirīṭa

original: BhP_10.69.014/4 juṣṭena sāñjalir avīviśad āsane sve
analyzed: juṣṭena sā añjaliḥ avīviśat āsane sve

original: BhP_10.69.015/1 tasyāvanijya caraṇau tad-apaḥ sva-mūrdhnā
analyzed: tasya avanijya caraṇau tad apaḥ sva mūrdhnā

original: BhP_10.69.015/2 bibhraj jagad-gurutamo 'pi satāṃ patir hi
analyzed: bibhrat satām patiḥ hi

original: BhP_10.69.015/3 brahmaṇya-deva iti yad guṇa-nāma yuktaṃ
analyzed: brahmaṇyadevaḥ iti yat guṇa nāma yuktam

original: BhP_10.69.015/4 tasyaiva yac-caraṇa-śaucam aśeṣa-tīrtham
analyzed: tasya eva yat caraṇa śaucam aśeṣa tīrtham

original: BhP_10.69.016/1 sampūjya deva-ṛṣi-varyam ṛṣiḥ purāṇo
analyzed: sampūjya deva ṛṣi varyam ṛṣiḥ purāṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.016/2 nārāyaṇo nara-sakho vidhinoditena
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ nara sakhaḥ vidhinā uditena

original: BhP_10.69.016/3 vāṇyābhibhāṣya mitayāmṛta-miṣṭayā taṃ
analyzed: vāṇyā abhibhāṣya mitayā amṛtam iṣṭayā tam

original: BhP_10.69.016/4 prāha prabho bhagavate karavāma he kim
analyzed: prāha prabho bhagavate karavāma he kim

original: BhP_10.69.017/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.69.017/1 naivādbhutaṃ tvayi vibho 'khila-loka-nāthe
analyzed: na eva adbhutam tvayi vibho khila loka nāthe

original: BhP_10.69.017/2 maitrī janeṣu sakaleṣu damaḥ khalānām
analyzed: maitrī janeṣu sakaleṣu damaḥ khalānām

original: BhP_10.69.017/3 niḥśreyasāya hi jagat-sthiti-rakṣaṇābhyāṃ
analyzed: niḥśreyasāya hi jagat sthiti rakṣaṇābhyām

original: BhP_10.69.017/4 svairāvatāra urugāya vidāma suṣṭhu
analyzed: svaira avatāraḥ uru gāya vidāma suṣṭhu

original: BhP_10.69.018/1 dṛṣṭaṃ tavāṅghri-yugalaṃ janatāpavargaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭam tava aṅghri yugalam janatā apavargam

original: BhP_10.69.018/2 brahmādibhir hṛdi vicintyam agādha-bodhaiḥ
analyzed: brahma ādibhiḥ hṛdi vicintyam agādha bodhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.018/3 saṃsāra-kūpa-patitottaraṇāvalambaṃ
analyzed: saṃsāra kūpa patita uttaraṇa avalambam

original: BhP_10.69.018/4 dhyāyaṃś carāmy anugṛhāṇa yathā smṛtiḥ syāt
analyzed: dhyāyan carāmi anugṛhāṇa yathā smṛtiḥ syāt

original: BhP_10.69.019/1 tato 'nyad āviśad gehaṃ kṛṣṇa-patnyāḥ sa nāradaḥ
analyzed: tatas āviśat geham kṛṣṇa patnyāḥ sa nāradaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.019/3 yogeśvareśvarasyāṅga yoga-māyā-vivitsayā
analyzed: yogeśvara īśvarasya aṅga yoga māyā vivitsayā

original: BhP_10.69.020/1 dīvyantam akṣais tatrāpi priyayā coddhavena ca
analyzed: dīvyantam akṣaiḥ tatra api priyayā ca uddhavena ca

original: BhP_10.69.020/3 pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā pratyutthānāsanādibhiḥ
analyzed: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā pratyutthāna āsana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.021/1 pṛṣṭaś cāviduṣevāsau kadāyāto bhavān iti
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ ca aviduṣā iva asau kadā āyātaḥ bhavān iti

original: BhP_10.69.021/3 kriyate kiṃ nu pūrṇānām apūrṇair asmad-ādibhiḥ
analyzed: kriyate kim nu pūrṇānām apūrṇaiḥ asmat ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.022/1 athāpi brūhi no brahman janmaitac chobhanaṃ kuru
analyzed: athā api brūhi naḥ brahman janma etat śobhanam kuru

original: BhP_10.69.022/3 sa tu vismita utthāya tūṣṇīm anyad agād gṛham
analyzed: sa tu vismitaḥ utthāya tūṣṇīm anyat agāt gṛham

original: BhP_10.69.023/1 tatrāpy acaṣṭa govindaṃ lālayantaṃ sutān śiśūn
analyzed: tatra api acaṣṭa govindam lālayantam sutān śiśūn

original: BhP_10.69.023/3 tato 'nyasmin gṛhe 'paśyan majjanāya kṛtodyamam
analyzed: tatas gṛhe paśyan majjanāya kṛta udyamam

original: BhP_10.69.024/1 juhvantaṃ ca vitānāgnīn yajantaṃ pañcabhir makhaiḥ
analyzed: juhvantam ca vitāna agnīn yajantam pañcabhiḥ makhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.024/3 bhojayantaṃ dvijān kvāpi bhuñjānam avaśeṣitam
analyzed: bhojayantam dvijān kvāpi bhuñjānam avaśeṣitam

original: BhP_10.69.025/1 kvāpi sandhyām upāsīnaṃ japantaṃ brahma vāg-yatam
analyzed: kvāpi sandhyām upāsīnam japantam brahma vāgyatam

original: BhP_10.69.025/3 ekatra cāsi-carmābhyāṃ carantam asi-vartmasu
analyzed: ekatra ca asi carmābhyām carantam asi vartmasu

original: BhP_10.69.026/1 aśvair gajai rathaiḥ kvāpi vicarantaṃ gadāgrajam
analyzed: aśvaiḥ gajaiḥ rathaiḥ kvāpi vicarantam gadāgrajam

original: BhP_10.69.026/3 kvacic chayānaṃ paryaṅke stūyamānaṃ ca vandibhiḥ
analyzed: kvacid śayānam paryaṅke stūyamānam ca vandibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.027/1 mantrayantaṃ ca kasmiṃścin mantribhiś coddhavādibhiḥ
analyzed: mantrayantam ca kasmiṃścid mantribhiḥ ca uddhava ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.027/3 jala-krīḍā-rataṃ kvāpi vāramukhyābalāvṛtam
analyzed: jala krīḍā ratam kvāpi vāramukhyā bala āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.69.028/1 kutracid dvija-mukhyebhyo dadataṃ gāḥ sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: kutracid dvijamukhyebhyaḥ dadatam gāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.69.028/3 itihāsa-purāṇāni śṛṇvantaṃ maṅgalāni ca
analyzed: itihāsa purāṇāni śṛṇvantam maṅgalāni ca

original: BhP_10.69.029/1 hasantaṃ hāsa-kathayā kadācit priyayā gṛhe
analyzed: hasantam hāsa kathayā kadācid priyayā gṛhe

original: BhP_10.69.029/3 kvāpi dharmaṃ sevamānam artha-kāmau ca kutracit
analyzed: kvāpi dharmam sevamānam artha kāmau ca kutracid

original: BhP_10.69.030/1 dhyāyantam ekam āsīnaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param
analyzed: dhyāyantam ekam āsīnam puruṣam prakṛteḥ param

original: BhP_10.69.030/3 śuśrūṣantaṃ gurūn kvāpi kāmair bhogaiḥ saparyayā
analyzed: śuśrūṣantam gurūn kvāpi kāmaiḥ bhogaiḥ saparyayā

original: BhP_10.69.031/1 kurvantaṃ vigrahaṃ kaiścit sandhiṃ cānyatra keśavam
analyzed: kurvantam vigraham kaiścid sandhim ca anyatra keśavam

original: BhP_10.69.031/3 kutrāpi saha rāmeṇa cintayantaṃ satāṃ śivam
analyzed: kutra api saha rāmeṇa cintayantam satām śivam

original: BhP_10.69.032/1 putrāṇāṃ duhitṝṇāṃ ca kāle vidhy-upayāpanam
analyzed: putrāṇām duhitṝṇām ca kāle vidhi upayāpanam

original: BhP_10.69.032/3 dārair varais tat-sadṛśaiḥ kalpayantaṃ vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: dāraiḥ varaiḥ tad sadṛśaiḥ kalpayantam vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.033/1 prasthāpanopanayanair apatyānāṃ mahotsavān
analyzed: prasthāpana upanayanaiḥ apatyānām mahā utsavān

original: BhP_10.69.033/3 vīkṣya yogeśvareśasya yeṣāṃ lokā visismire
analyzed: vīkṣya yogeśvara īśasya yeṣām lokāḥ visismire

original: BhP_10.69.034/1 yajantaṃ sakalān devān kvāpi kratubhir ūrjitaiḥ
analyzed: yajantam sakalān devān kvāpi kratubhiḥ ūrjitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.034/3 pūrtayantaṃ kvacid dharmaṃ kūrpārāma-maṭhādibhiḥ
analyzed: pūrtayantam kvacid dharmam kūrpārāma maṭha ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.035/1 carantaṃ mṛgayāṃ kvāpi hayam āruhya saindhavam
analyzed: carantam mṛgayām kvāpi hayam āruhya saindhavam

original: BhP_10.69.035/3 ghnantaṃ tatra paśūn medhyān parītaṃ yadu-puṅgavaiḥ
analyzed: ghnantam tatra paśūn medhyān parītam yadu puṅgavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.036/1 avyakta-lingaṃ prakṛtiṣv antaḥ-pura-gṛhādiṣu
BhP_10.69.036/3 kvacic carantaṃ yogeśaṃ tat-tad-bhāva-bubhutsayā
analyzed: kvacid carantam yogeśam tad tad bhāva bubhutsayā

original: BhP_10.69.037/1 athovāca hṛṣīkeśaṃ nāradaḥ prahasann iva
analyzed: athā uvāca hṛṣīkeśam nāradaḥ prahasan iva

original: BhP_10.69.037/3 yoga-māyodayaṃ vīkṣya mānuṣīm īyuṣo gatim
analyzed: yoga māyā udayam vīkṣya mānuṣīm īyuṣaḥ gatim

original: BhP_10.69.038/1 vidāma yoga-māyās te durdarśā api māyinām
analyzed: vidāma yoga māyāḥ te durdarśāḥ api māyinām

original: BhP_10.69.038/3 yogeśvarātman nirbhātā bhavat-pāda-niṣevayā
analyzed: yoga īśvara ātman nirbhātā bhavat pāda niṣevayā

original: BhP_10.69.039/1 anujānīhi māṃ deva lokāṃs te yaśasāplutān
analyzed: anujānīhi mām deva lokān te yaśasā āplutān

original: BhP_10.69.039/3 paryaṭāmi tavodgāyan līlā bhuvana-pāvanīḥ
analyzed: paryaṭāmi tava udgāyan līlāḥ bhuvana pāvanīḥ

original: BhP_10.69.040/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.69.040/1 brahman dhannasya vaktāhaṃ kartā tad-anumoditā
analyzed: brahman dhannasya vaktā aham kartā tad anumoditā

original: BhP_10.69.040/3 tac chikṣayan lokam imam āsthitaḥ putra mā khidaḥ
analyzed: tat śikṣayan lokam imam āsthitaḥ putra mā khidaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.041/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.69.041/1 ity ācarantaṃ sad-dharmān pāvanān gṛha-medhinām
analyzed: iti ācarantam sat dharmān pāvanān gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_10.69.041/3 tam eva sarva-geheṣu santam ekaṃ dadarśa ha
analyzed: tam eva sarva geheṣu santam ekam dadarśa ha

original: BhP_10.69.042/1 kṛṣṇasyānanta-vīryasya yoga-māyā-mahodayam
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya ananta vīryasya yoga māyā mahā udayam

original: BhP_10.69.042/3 muhur dṛṣṭvā ṛṣir abhūd vismito jāta-kautukaḥ
analyzed: muhur dṛṣṭvā ṛṣiḥ abhūt vismitaḥ jāta kautukaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.043/1 ity artha-kāma-dharmeṣu kṛṣṇena śraddhitātmanā
analyzed: iti artha kāma dharmeṣu kṛṣṇena śraddhita ātmanā

original: BhP_10.69.043/3 samyak sabhājitaḥ prītas tam evānusmaran yayau
analyzed: samyak sabhājitaḥ prītaḥ tam eva anusmaran yayau

original: BhP_10.69.044/1 evaṃ manuṣya-padavīm anuvartamāno nārāyaṇo 'khila-bhavāya gṛhīta-śaktiḥ
analyzed: evam manuṣya padavīm anuvartamānaḥ khila bhavāya gṛhīta śaktiḥ

original: BhP_10.69.044/3 reme 'ṇga ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-varāṅganānāṃ sa-vrīḍa-sauhṛda-nirīkṣaṇa-hāsa-juṣṭaḥ
analyzed: reme ṇga ṣoḍaśa sahasra vara aṅganānām sa vrīḍa sauhṛda nirīkṣaṇa hāsa juṣṭaḥ

original: BhP_10.69.045/1 yānīha viśva-vilayodbhava-vṛtti-hetuḥ
analyzed: yāni iha viśva vilaya udbhava vṛtti hetuḥ

original: BhP_10.69.045/2 karmāṇy ananya-viṣayāṇi harīś cakāra
analyzed: karmāṇi ananya viṣayāṇi harīḥ cakāra

original: BhP_10.69.045/3 yas tv aṅga gāyati śṛṇoty anumodate vā
analyzed: yaḥ tu aṅga gāyati śṛṇoti anumodate vā

original: BhP_10.69.045/4 bhaktir bhaved bhagavati hy apavarga-mārge
analyzed: bhaktiḥ bhavet bhagavati hi apavarga mārge

original: BhP_10.70.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.70.001/1 athoṣasy upavṛttāyāṃ kukkuṭān kūjato 'śapan
analyzed: atha uṣasi upavṛttāyām kukkuṭān śapan

original: BhP_10.70.001/3 gṛhīta-kaṇṭhyaḥ patibhir mādhavyo virahāturāḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta kaṇṭhyaḥ patibhiḥ mādhavyaḥ viraha āturāḥ

original: BhP_10.70.002/1 vayāṃsy aroruvan kṛṣṇaṃ bodhayantīva vandinaḥ
analyzed: vayāṃsi aroruvan kṛṣṇam bodhayanti iva vandinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.002/3 gāyatsv aliṣv anidrāṇi mandāra-vana-vāyubhiḥ
analyzed: gāyatsu aliṣu anidrāṇi mandāra vana vāyubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.003/1 muhūrtaṃ taṃ tu vaidarbhī nāmṛṣyad ati-śobhanam
analyzed: muhūrtam tam tu vaidarbhī na amṛṣyat ati śobhanam

original: BhP_10.70.003/3 parirambhaṇa-viśleṣāt priya-bāhv-antaraṃ gatā
analyzed: parirambhaṇa viśleṣāt priya bāhu antaram gatā

original: BhP_10.70.004/1 brāhme muhūrta utthāya vāry upaspṛśya mādhavaḥ
analyzed: brāhme muhūrte utthāya vāri upaspṛśya mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.004/3 dadhyau prasanna-karaṇa ātmānaṃ tamasaḥ param
analyzed: dadhyau prasanna karaṇaḥ ātmānam tamasaḥ param

original: BhP_10.70.005/1 ekaṃ svayaṃ-jyotir ananyam avyayaṃ sva-saṃsthayā nitya-nirasta-kalmaṣam
analyzed: ekam svayam jyotiḥ ananyam avyayam sva saṃsthayā nitya nirasta kalmaṣam

original: BhP_10.70.005/3 brahmākhyam asyodbhava-nāśa-hetubhiḥ sva-śaktibhir lakṣita-bhāva-nirvṛtim
analyzed: brahma ākhyam asya udbhava nāśa hetubhiḥ sva śaktibhiḥ lakṣita bhāva nirvṛtim

original: BhP_10.70.006/1 athāpluto 'mbhasy amale yathā-vidhi
analyzed: atha āplutaḥ mbhasi amale yathāvidhi

original: BhP_10.70.006/2 kriyā-kalāpaṃ paridhāya vāsasī
analyzed: kriyā kalāpam paridhāya vāsasī

original: BhP_10.70.006/3 cakāra sandhyopagamādi sattamo
analyzed: cakāra sandhyā upagama ādi sattamaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.006/4 hutānalo brahma jajāpa vāg-yataḥ
analyzed: huta analaḥ brahma jajāpa vāgyataḥ

original: BhP_10.70.007/1 upasthāyārkam udyantaṃ tarpayitvātmanaḥ kalāḥ
analyzed: upasthāya arkam udyantam tarpayitvā ātmanaḥ kalāḥ

original: BhP_10.70.007/3 devān ṛṣīn pitṝn vṛddhān viprān abhyarcya cātmavān
analyzed: devān ṛṣīn pitṝn vṛddhān viprān abhyarcya ca ātmavān

original: BhP_10.70.008/1 dhenūnāṃ rukma-śṛṅgīnāṃ sādhvīnāṃ mauktika-srajām
analyzed: dhenūnām rukma śṛṅgīnām sādhvīnām mauktika srajām

original: BhP_10.70.008/3 payasvinīnāṃ gṛṣṭīnāṃ sa-vatsānāṃ su-vāsasām
analyzed: payasvinīnām gṛṣṭīnām sa vatsānām su vāsasām

original: BhP_10.70.009/1 dadau rūpya-khurāgrāṇāṃ kṣaumājina-tilaiḥ saha
analyzed: dadau rūpya khura agrāṇām kṣauma ajina tilaiḥ saha

original: BhP_10.70.009/3 alaṅkṛtebhyo viprebhyo badvaṃ badvaṃ dine dine
analyzed: alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ viprebhyaḥ badvam badvam dine dine

original: BhP_10.70.010/1 go-vipra-devatā-vṛddha- gurūn bhūtāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: go vipra devatā vṛddha gurūn bhūtāni sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.70.010/3 namaskṛtyātma-sambhūtīr maṅgalāni samaspṛśat
analyzed: namaskṛtya ātma sambhūtīḥ maṅgalāni samaspṛśat

original: BhP_10.70.011/1 ātmānaṃ bhūṣayām āsa nara-loka-vibhūṣaṇam
analyzed: ātmānam bhūṣayām āsa nara loka vibhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.70.011/3 vāsobhir bhūṣaṇaiḥ svīyair divya-srag-anulepanaiḥ
analyzed: vāsobhiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ svīyaiḥ divya sraj anulepanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.012/1 avekṣyājyaṃ tathādarśaṃ go-vṛṣa-dvija-devatāḥ
analyzed: avekṣya ājyam tathā ādarśam go vṛṣa dvija devatāḥ

original: BhP_10.70.012/3 kāmāṃś ca sarva-varṇānāṃ paurāntaḥ-pura-cāriṇām
analyzed: kāmān ca sarva varṇānām paura antaḥpura cāriṇām

original: BhP_10.70.012/5 pradāpya prakṛtīḥ kāmaiḥ pratoṣya pratyanandata
analyzed: pradāpya prakṛtīḥ kāmaiḥ pratoṣya pratyanandata

original: BhP_10.70.013/1 saṃvibhajyāgrato viprān srak-tāmbūlānulepanaiḥ
analyzed: saṃvibhajya agratas viprān sraj tāmbūla anulepanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.013/3 suhṛdaḥ prakṛtīr dārān upāyuṅkta tataḥ svayam
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ prakṛtīḥ dārān upāyuṅkta tatas svayam

original: BhP_10.70.014/1 tāvat sūta upānīya syandanaṃ paramādbhutam
analyzed: tāvat sūtaḥ upānīya syandanam parama adbhutam

original: BhP_10.70.014/3 sugrīvādyair hayair yuktaṃ praṇamyāvasthito 'grataḥ
analyzed: sugrīva ādyaiḥ hayaiḥ yuktam praṇamya avasthitaḥ gratas

original: BhP_10.70.015/1 gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇī sārathes tam athāruhat
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇī sāratheḥ tam atha āruhat

original: BhP_10.70.015/3 sātyaky-uddhava-saṃyuktaḥ pūrvādrim iva bhāskaraḥ
analyzed: sātyaki uddhava saṃyuktaḥ pūrva adrim iva bhāskaraḥ

original: BhP_10.70.016/1 īkṣito 'ntaḥ-pura-strīṇāṃ sa-vrīḍa-prema-vīkṣitaiḥ
analyzed: īkṣitaḥ ntaḥpura strīṇām sa vrīḍa prema vīkṣitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.016/3 kṛcchrād visṛṣṭo niragāj jāta-hāso haran manaḥ
analyzed: kṛcchrāt visṛṣṭaḥ niragāt jāta hāsaḥ haran manaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.017/1 sudharmākhyāṃ sabhāṃ sarvair vṛṣṇibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
analyzed: sudharma ākhyām sabhām sarvaiḥ vṛṣṇibhiḥ parivāritaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.017/3 prāviśad yan-niviṣṭānāṃ na santy aṅga ṣaḍ ūrmayaḥ
analyzed: prāviśat yat niviṣṭānām na santi aṅga ṣaṭ ūrmayaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.018/1 tatropavistaḥ paramāsane vibhur babhau sva-bhāsā kakubho 'vabhāsayan
analyzed: tatra upavistaḥ parama āsane vibhuḥ babhau sva bhāsā kakubhaḥ vabhāsayan

original: BhP_10.70.018/3 vṛto nṛ-siṃhair yadubhir yadūttamo yathoḍu-rājo divi tārakā-gaṇaiḥ
analyzed: vṛtaḥ nṛ siṃhaiḥ yadubhiḥ yadu uttamaḥ yathā uḍurājaḥ divi tārakā gaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.019/1 tatropamantriṇo rājan nānā-hāsya-rasair vibhum
analyzed: tatra upamantriṇaḥ rājan nānā hāsya rasaiḥ vibhum

original: BhP_10.70.019/3 upatasthur naṭācāryā nartakyas tāṇḍavaiḥ pṛthak
analyzed: upatasthuḥ naṭa ācāryāḥ nartakyaḥ tāṇḍavaiḥ pṛthak

original: BhP_10.70.020/1 mṛdaṅga-vīṇā-muraja- veṇu-tāla-dara-svanaiḥ
analyzed: mṛdaṅga vīṇā muraja veṇu tāla dara svanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.020/3 nanṛtur jagus tuṣṭuvuś ca sūta-māgadha-vandinaḥ
analyzed: nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ ca sūta māgadha vandinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.021/1 tatrāhur brāhmaṇāḥ kecid āsīnā brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: tatra āhuḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kecid āsīnāḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.021/3 pūrveṣāṃ puṇya-yaśasāṃ rājñāṃ cākathayan kathāḥ
analyzed: pūrveṣām puṇya yaśasām rājñām ca akathayan kathāḥ
