original: BhP_10.70.022/1 tatraikaḥ puruṣo rājann āgato 'pūrva-darśanaḥ
analyzed: tatra ekaḥ puruṣaḥ rājan pūrva darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.022/3 vijñāpito bhagavate pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ
analyzed: vijñāpitaḥ bhagavate pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.023/1 sa namaskṛtya kṛṣṇāya pareśāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
analyzed: sa namaskṛtya kṛṣṇāya pareśāya kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: BhP_10.70.023/3 rājñām āvedayad duḥkhaṃ jarāsandha-nirodha-jam
analyzed: rājñām āvedayat duḥkham jarāsandha nirodha jam

original: BhP_10.70.024/1 ye ca dig-vijaye tasya sannatiṃ na yayur nṛpāḥ
analyzed: ye ca digvijaye tasya sannatim na yayuḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_10.70.024/3 prasahya ruddhās tenāsann ayute dve girivraje
analyzed: prasahya ruddhāḥ tena āsan ayute dve girivraje

original: BhP_10.70.025/0 rājāna ūcuḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.70.025/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇāprameyātman prapanna-bhaya-bhañjana
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa aprameya ātman prapanna bhaya bhañjana

original: BhP_10.70.025/3 vayaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmo bhava-bhītāḥ pṛthag-dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vayam tvām śaraṇam yāmaḥ bhava bhītāḥ pṛthak dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.026/1 loko vikarma-nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ
analyzed: lokaḥ vikarma nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.026/2 karmaṇy ayaṃ tvad-udite bhavad-arcane sve
analyzed: karmaṇi ayam tvad udite bhavat arcane sve

original: BhP_10.70.026/3 yas tāvad asya balavān iha jīvitāśāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tāvat asya balavān iha jīvita āśām

original: BhP_10.70.026/4 sadyaś chinatty animiṣāya namo 'stu tasmai
analyzed: sadyas chinatti animiṣāya namaḥ stu tasmai

original: BhP_10.70.027/1 loke bhavāñ jagad-inaḥ kalayāvatīrṇaḥ
analyzed: loke jagadinaḥ kalayā avatīrṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.027/2 sad-rakṣaṇāya khala-nigrahaṇāya cānyaḥ
analyzed: sat rakṣaṇāya khala nigrahaṇāya ca anyaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.027/3 kaścit tvadīyam atiyāti nideśam īśa
analyzed: kaścid tvadīyam atiyāti nideśam īśa

original: BhP_10.70.027/4 kiṃ vā janaḥ sva-kṛtam ṛcchati tan na vidmaḥ
analyzed: kim vā janaḥ sva kṛtam ṛcchati tat na vidmaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.028/1 svapnāyitaṃ nṛpa-sukhaṃ para-tantram īśa
analyzed: svapnāyitam nṛpa sukham paratantram īśa

original: BhP_10.70.028/2 śaśvad-bhayena mṛtakena dhuraṃ vahāmaḥ
analyzed: śaśvat bhayena mṛtakena dhuram vahāmaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.028/3 hitvā tad ātmani sukhaṃ tvad-anīha-labhyaṃ
analyzed: hitvā tat ātmani sukham tvad anīha labhyam

original: BhP_10.70.028/4 kliśyāmahe 'ti-kṛpaṇās tava māyayeha
analyzed: kliśyāmahe ti kṛpaṇāḥ tava māyayā iha

original: BhP_10.70.029/1 tan no bhavān praṇata-śoka-harāṅghri-yugmo
analyzed: tat naḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.70.029/2 baddhān viyuṅkṣva magadhāhvaya-karma-pāśāt
analyzed: baddhān viyuṅkṣva magadha āhvaya karma pāśāt

original: BhP_10.70.029/3 yo bhū-bhujo 'yuta-mataṅgaja-vīryam eko
analyzed: yaḥ bhūbhujaḥ yuta mataṅga ja vīryam ekaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.029/4 bibhrad rurodha bhavane mṛga-rāḍ ivāvīḥ
analyzed: bibhrat rurodha bhavane mṛgarāj iva āvīḥ

original: BhP_10.70.030/1 yo vai tvayā dvi-nava-kṛtva udātta-cakra
analyzed: yaḥ vai tvayā dvi nava kṛtvas udātta cakra

original: BhP_10.70.030/2 bhagno mṛdhe khalu bhavantam ananta-vīryam
analyzed: bhagnaḥ mṛdhe khalu bhavantam ananta vīryam

original: BhP_10.70.030/3 jitvā nṛ-loka-nirataṃ sakṛd ūḍha-darpo
analyzed: jitvā nṛ loka niratam sakṛt ūḍha darpaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.030/4 yuṣmat-prajā rujati no 'jita tad vidhehi
analyzed: yuṣmad prajā rujati naḥ jita tat vidhehi

original: BhP_10.70.031/0 dūta uvāca
analyzed: dūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.70.031/1 iti māgadha-saṃruddhā bhavad-darśana-kaṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: iti māgadha saṃruddhāḥ bhavat darśana kaṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.031/3 prapannāḥ pāda-mūlaṃ te dīnānāṃ śaṃ vidhīyatām
analyzed: prapannāḥ pāda mūlam te dīnānām śam vidhīyatām

original: BhP_10.70.032/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.70.032/1 rāja-dūte bruvaty evaṃ devarṣiḥ parama-dyutiḥ
analyzed: rāja dūte bruvati evam devarṣiḥ parama dyutiḥ

original: BhP_10.70.032/3 bibhrat piṅga-jaṭā-bhāraṃ prādurāsīd yathā raviḥ
analyzed: bibhrat piṅga jaṭā bhāram prādurāsīt yathā raviḥ

original: BhP_10.70.033/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ sarva-lokeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ sarva loka īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.70.033/3 vavanda utthitaḥ śīrṣṇā sa-sabhyaḥ sānugo mudā
analyzed: vavanda utthitaḥ śīrṣṇā sa sabhyaḥ sa anugaḥ mudā

original: BhP_10.70.034/1 sabhājayitvā vidhi-vat kṛtāsana-parigraham
analyzed: sabhājayitvā vidhivat kṛta āsana parigraham

original: BhP_10.70.034/3 babhāṣe sunṛtair vākyaiḥ śraddhayā tarpayan munim
analyzed: babhāṣe su nṛtaiḥ vākyaiḥ śraddhayā tarpayan munim

original: BhP_10.70.035/1 api svid adya lokānāṃ trayāṇām akuto-bhayam
analyzed: api svid adya lokānām trayāṇām akutobhayam

original: BhP_10.70.035/3 nanu bhūyān bhagavato lokān paryaṭato guṇaḥ
analyzed: nanu bhūyān bhagavataḥ lokān paryaṭataḥ guṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.036/1 na hi te 'viditaṃ kiñcil lokeṣv īśvara-kartṛṣu
analyzed: na hi te viditam kiñcid lokeṣu īśvara kartṛṣu

original: BhP_10.70.036/3 atha pṛcchāmahe yuṣmān pāṇḍavānāṃ cikīrṣitam
analyzed: atha pṛcchāmahe yuṣmān pāṇḍavānām cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_10.70.037/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.70.037/1 dṛṣṭā māyā te bahuśo duratyayā māyā vibho viśva-sṛjaś ca māyinaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭā māyā te bahuśas duratyayā māyāḥ vibho viśvasṛjaḥ ca māyinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.037/3 bhūteṣu bhūmaṃś carataḥ sva-śaktibhir vahner iva cchanna-ruco na me 'dbhutam
analyzed: bhūteṣu bhūman carataḥ sva śaktibhiḥ vahneḥ iva channa rucaḥ na me dbhutam

original: BhP_10.70.038/1 tavehitaṃ ko 'rhati sādhu vedituṃ sva-māyayedaṃ sṛjato niyacchataḥ
analyzed: tava īhitam kaḥ rhati sādhu veditum sva māyayā idam sṛjataḥ niyacchataḥ

original: BhP_10.70.038/3 yad vidyamānātmatayāvabhāsate tasmai namas te sva-vilakṣaṇātmane
analyzed: yat vidyamāna ātma tayā avabhāsate tasmai namaḥ te sva vilakṣaṇa ātmane

original: BhP_10.70.039/1 jīvasya yaḥ saṃsarato vimokṣaṇaṃ na jānato 'nartha-vahāc charīrataḥ
analyzed: jīvasya yaḥ saṃsarataḥ vimokṣaṇam na jānataḥ narthavahāt śarīrataḥ

original: BhP_10.70.039/3 līlāvatāraiḥ sva-yaśaḥ pradīpakaṃ prājvālayat tvā tam ahaṃ prapadye
analyzed: līlāvatāraiḥ sva yaśaḥ pradīpakam prājvālayat tvā tam aham prapadye

original: BhP_10.70.040/1 athāpy āśrāvaye brahma nara-loka-viḍambanam
analyzed: atha api āśrāvaye brahma nara loka viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.70.040/3 rājñaḥ paitṛ-ṣvasreyasya bhaktasya ca cikīrṣitam
analyzed: rājñaḥ paitṛṣvasreyasya bhaktasya ca cikīrṣitam

original: BhP_10.70.041/1 yakṣyati tvāṃ makhendreṇa rājasūyena pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: yakṣyati tvām makha indreṇa rājasūyena pāṇḍavaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.041/3 pārameṣṭhya-kāmo nṛpatis tad bhavān anumodatām
analyzed: pārameṣṭhya kāmaḥ nṛpatiḥ tat bhavān anumodatām

original: BhP_10.70.042/1 tasmin deva kratu-vare bhavantaṃ vai surādayaḥ
analyzed: tasmin deva kratu vare bhavantam vai sura ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.042/3 didṛkṣavaḥ sameṣyanti rājānaś ca yaśasvinaḥ
analyzed: didṛkṣavaḥ sameṣyanti rājānaḥ ca yaśasvinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.043/1 śravaṇāt kīrtanād dhyānāt pūyante 'nte-vasāyinaḥ
analyzed: śravaṇāt kīrtanāt dhyānāt pūyante ntevasāyinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.043/3 tava brahma-mayasyeśa kim utekṣābhimarśinaḥ
analyzed: tava brahma mayasya īśa kim uta īkṣā abhimarśinaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.044/1 yasyāmalaṃ divi yaśaḥ prathitaṃ rasāyāṃ
analyzed: yasya amalam divi yaśaḥ prathitam rasāyām

original: BhP_10.70.044/2 bhūmau ca te bhuvana-maṅgala dig-vitānam
analyzed: bhūmau ca te bhuvana maṅgala diś vitānam

original: BhP_10.70.044/3 mandākinīti divi bhogavatīti cādho
analyzed: mandākinī iti divi bhogavatī iti ca adhas

original: BhP_10.70.044/4 gaṅgeti ceha caraṇāmbu punāti viśvam
analyzed: gaṅgā iti ca iha caraṇa ambu punāti viśvam

original: BhP_10.70.045/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.70.045/1 tatra teṣv ātma-pakṣeṣv a- gṛṇatsu vijigīṣayā
analyzed: tatra teṣu ātma pakṣeṣu a gṛṇatsu vijigīṣayā

original: BhP_10.70.045/3 vācaḥ peśaiḥ smayan bhṛtyam uddhavaṃ prāha keśavaḥ
analyzed: vācaḥ smayan bhṛtyam uddhavam prāha keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.70.046/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.70.046/1 tvaṃ hi naḥ paramaṃ cakṣuḥ suhṛn mantrārtha-tattva-vit
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ paramam cakṣuḥ suhṛd mantra artha tattva vid

original: BhP_10.70.046/3 athātra brūhy anuṣṭheyaṃ śraddadhmaḥ karavāma tat
analyzed: atha atra brūhi anuṣṭheyam śraddadhmaḥ karavāma tat

original: BhP_10.70.047/1 ity upāmantrito bhartrā sarva-jñenāpi mugdha-vat
analyzed: iti upāmantritaḥ bhartrā sarvajñena api mugdha vat

original: BhP_10.70.047/3 nideśaṃ śirasādhāya uddhavaḥ pratyabhāṣata
analyzed: nideśam śirasā ādhāya uddhavaḥ pratyabhāṣata

original: BhP_10.71.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.71.001/1 ity udīritam ākarṇya devaṛṣer uddhavo 'bravīt
analyzed: iti udīritam ākarṇya devaṛṣeḥ uddhavaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_10.71.001/3 sabhyānāṃ matam ājñāya kṛṣṇasya ca mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: sabhyānām matam ājñāya kṛṣṇasya ca mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.002/0 śrī-uddhava uvāca
analyzed: śrī uddhavaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.71.002/1 yad uktam ṛṣinā deva sācivyaṃ yakṣyatas tvayā
analyzed: yat uktam ṛṣinā deva sācivyam yakṣyataḥ tvayā

original: BhP_10.71.002/3 kāryaṃ paitṛ-ṣvasreyasya rakṣā ca śaraṇaiṣiṇām
analyzed: kāryam paitṛṣvasreyasya rakṣā ca śaraṇa eṣiṇām

original: BhP_10.71.003/1 yaṣṭavyam rājasūyena dik-cakra-jayinā vibho
analyzed: yaṣṭavyam rājasūyena diś cakra jayinā vibho

original: BhP_10.71.003/3 ato jarā-suta-jaya ubhayārtho mato mama
analyzed: atas jarā suta jayaḥ ubhaya arthaḥ mataḥ mama

original: BhP_10.71.004/1 asmākaṃ ca mahān artho hy etenaiva bhaviṣyati
analyzed: asmākam ca mahān arthaḥ hi etena eva bhaviṣyati

original: BhP_10.71.004/3 yaśaś ca tava govinda rājño baddhān vimuñcataḥ
analyzed: yaśaḥ ca tava govinda rājñaḥ baddhān vimuñcataḥ

original: BhP_10.71.005/1 sa vai durviṣaho rājā nāgāyuta-samo bale
analyzed: sa vai durviṣahaḥ rājā nāga ayuta samaḥ bale

original: BhP_10.71.005/3 balinām api cānyeṣāṃ bhīmaṃ sama-balaṃ vinā
analyzed: balinām api ca anyeṣām bhīmam sama balam vinā

original: BhP_10.71.006/1 dvai-rathe sa tu jetavyo mā śatākṣauhiṇī-yutaḥ
analyzed: dvairathe sa tu jetavyaḥ mā śata akṣauhiṇī yutaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.006/3 brāhmaṇyo 'bhyarthito viprair na pratyākhyāti karhicit
analyzed: brāhmaṇyaḥ bhyarthitaḥ vipraiḥ na pratyākhyāti karhicit

original: BhP_10.71.007/1 brahma-veṣa-dharo gatvā taṃ bhikṣeta vṛkodaraḥ
analyzed: brahma veṣa dharaḥ gatvā tam bhikṣeta vṛkodaraḥ

original: BhP_10.71.007/3 haniṣyati na sandeho dvai-rathe tava sannidhau
analyzed: haniṣyati na sandehaḥ dvairathe tava sannidhau

original: BhP_10.71.008/1 nimittaṃ param īśasya viśva-sarga-nirodhayoḥ
analyzed: nimittam param īśasya viśva sarga nirodhayoḥ

original: BhP_10.71.008/3 hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śarvaś ca kālasyārūpiṇas tava
analyzed: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śarvaḥ ca kālasya arūpiṇaḥ tava

original: BhP_10.71.009/1 gāyanti te viśada-karma gṛheṣu devyo
analyzed: gāyanti te viśada karma gṛheṣu devyo

original: BhP_10.71.009/2 rājñāṃ sva-śatru-vadham ātma-vimokṣaṇaṃ ca
analyzed: rājñām sva śatru vadham ātma vimokṣaṇam ca

original: BhP_10.71.009/3 gopyaś ca kuñjara-pater janakātmajāyāḥ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca kuñjara pateḥ janakātmajāyāḥ

original: BhP_10.71.009/4 pitroś ca labdha-śaraṇā munayo vayaṃ ca
analyzed: pitroḥ ca labdha śaraṇāḥ munayaḥ vayam ca

original: BhP_10.71.010/1 jarāsandha-vadhaḥ kṛṣṇa bhūry-arthāyopakalpate
analyzed: jarāsandha vadhaḥ kṛṣṇa bhūri arthāya upakalpate

original: BhP_10.71.010/3 prāyaḥ pāka-vipākena tava cābhimataḥ kratuḥ
analyzed: prāyas pāka vipākena tava ca abhimataḥ kratuḥ

original: BhP_10.71.011/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.71.011/1 ity uddhava-vaco rājan sarvato-bhadram acyutam
analyzed: iti uddhava vacaḥ rājan sarvatobhadram acyutam

original: BhP_10.71.011/3 devarṣir yadu-vṛddhāś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pratyapūjayan
analyzed: devarṣiḥ yadu vṛddhāḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca pratyapūjayan

original: BhP_10.71.012/1 athādiśat prayāṇāya bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: athā ādiśat prayāṇāya bhagavān devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.012/3 bhṛtyān dāruka-jaitrādīn anujñāpya gurūn vibhuḥ
analyzed: bhṛtyān dāruka jaitra ādīn anujñāpya gurūn vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.71.013/1 nirgamayyāvarodhān svān sa-sutān sa-paricchadān
analyzed: nirgamayya avarodhān svān sa sutān sa paricchadān

original: BhP_10.71.013/3 saṅkarṣaṇam anujñāpya yadu-rājaṃ ca śatru-han
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇam anujñāpya yadu rājam ca śatru han

original: BhP_10.71.013/5 sūtopanītaṃ sva-ratham āruhad garuḍa-dhvajam
analyzed: sūta upanītam sva ratham āruhat garuḍadhvajam

original: BhP_10.71.014/1 tato ratha-dvipa-bhaṭa-sādi-nāyakaiḥ
analyzed: tatas ratha dvipa bhaṭa sādi nāyakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.014/2 karālayā parivṛta ātma-senayā
analyzed: karālayā parivṛtaḥ ātma senayā

original: BhP_10.71.014/3 mṛdaṅga-bhery-ānaka-śaṅkha-gomukhaiḥ
analyzed: mṛdaṅga bherī ānaka śaṅkha gomukhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.014/4 praghoṣa-ghoṣita-kakubho nirakramat
analyzed: praghoṣa ghoṣita kakubhaḥ nirakramat

original: BhP_10.71.015/1 nṛ-vāji-kāñcana-śibikābhir acyutaṃ sahātmajāḥ patim anu su-vratā yayuḥ
analyzed: nṛ vāji kāñcana śibikābhiḥ acyutam saha ātmajāḥ patim anu suvratāḥ yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.71.015/3 varāmbarābharaṇa-vilepana-srajaḥ su-saṃvṛtā nṛbhir asi-carma-pāṇibhiḥ
analyzed: vara ambara ābharaṇa vilepana srajaḥ su saṃvṛtāḥ nṛbhiḥ asi carma pāṇibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.016/1 naroṣṭra-go-mahiṣa-kharāśvatary-anaḥ
analyzed: nara uṣṭra go mahiṣa khara aśvatarī anaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.016/2 kareṇubhiḥ parijana-vāra-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: kareṇubhiḥ parijana vāra yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.016/3 sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ kaṭa-kuṭi-kambalāmbarādy-
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtāḥ kaṭa kuṭi kambala ambara ādi

original: BhP_10.71.016/4 upaskarā yayur adhiyujya sarvataḥ
analyzed: upaskarāḥ yayuḥ adhiyujya sarvatas

original: BhP_10.71.017/1 balaṃ bṛhad-dhvaja-paṭa-chatra-cāmarair
analyzed: balam bṛhat dhvaja paṭa chatra cāmaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.017/2 varāyudhābharaṇa-kirīṭa-varmabhiḥ
analyzed: vara āyudha ābharaṇa kirīṭa varmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.017/3 divāṃśubhis tumula-ravaṃ babhau raver
analyzed: divā aṃśubhiḥ tumula ravam babhau raveḥ

original: BhP_10.71.017/4 yathārṇavaḥ kṣubhita-timiṅgilormibhiḥ
analyzed: yathā arṇavaḥ kṣubhita timiṅgila ūrmibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.018/1 atho munir yadu-patinā sabhājitaḥ praṇamya taṃ hṛdi vidadhad vihāyasā
analyzed: atho muniḥ yadu patinā sabhājitaḥ praṇamya tam hṛdi vidadhat vihāyasā

original: BhP_10.71.018/3 niśamya tad-vyavasitam āhṛtārhaṇo mukunda-sandaraśana-nirvṛtendriyaḥ
analyzed: niśamya tad vyavasitam āhṛta arhaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.019/1 rāja-dūtam uvācedaṃ bhagavān prīṇayan girā
analyzed: rāja dūtam uvāca idam bhagavān prīṇayan girā

original: BhP_10.71.019/3 mā bhaiṣṭa dūta bhadraṃ vo ghātayiṣyāmi māgadham
analyzed: mā bhaiṣṭa dūta bhadram vaḥ ghātayiṣyāmi māgadham

original: BhP_10.71.020/1 ity uktaḥ prasthito dūto yathā-vad avadan nṛpān
analyzed: iti uktaḥ prasthitaḥ dūtaḥ yathāvat avadat nṛpān

original: BhP_10.71.020/3 te 'pi sandarśanaṃ śaureḥ pratyaikṣan yan mumukṣavaḥ
analyzed: te pi sandarśanam śaureḥ pratyaikṣan yat mumukṣavaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.021/1 ānarta-sauvīra-marūṃs tīrtvā vinaśanaṃ hariḥ
analyzed: ānarta sauvīra marūn tīrtvā vinaśanam hariḥ

original: BhP_10.71.021/3 girīn nadīr atīyāya pura-grāma-vrajākarān
analyzed: girīn nadīḥ atīyāya pura grāma vraja ākarān

original: BhP_10.71.022/1 tato dṛṣadvatīṃ tīrtvā mukundo 'tha sarasvatīm
analyzed: tatas dṛṣadvatīm tīrtvā mukundaḥ sarasvatīm

original: BhP_10.71.022/3 pañcālān atha matsyāṃś ca śakra-prastham athāgamat
analyzed: pañcālān atha matsyān ca śakraprastham atha agamat

original: BhP_10.71.023/1 tam upāgatam ākarṇya prīto durdarśanaṃ nṛnām
analyzed: tam upāgatam ākarṇya prītaḥ durdarśanam nṛnām

original: BhP_10.71.023/3 ajāta-śatrur niragāt sopadhyāyaḥ suhṛd-vṛtaḥ
analyzed: ajātaśatruḥ niragāt sa upadhyāyaḥ suhṛd vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.024/1 gīta-vāditra-ghoṣeṇa brahma-ghoṣeṇa bhūyasā
analyzed: gīta vāditra ghoṣeṇa brahmaghoṣeṇa bhūyasā

original: BhP_10.71.024/3 abhyayāt sa hṛṣīkeśaṃ prāṇāḥ prāṇam ivādṛtaḥ
analyzed: abhyayāt sa hṛṣīkeśam prāṇāḥ prāṇam iva ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.025/1 dṛṣṭvā viklinna-hṛdayaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ snehena pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā viklinna hṛdayaḥ kṛṣṇam snehena pāṇḍavaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.025/3 cirād dṛṣṭaṃ priyatamaṃ sasvaje 'tha punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: cirāt dṛṣṭam priyatamam sasvaje punar punar

original: BhP_10.71.026/1 dorbhyāṃ pariṣvajya ramāmalālayaṃ mukunda-gātraṃ nṛ-patir hatāśubhaḥ
analyzed: dorbhyām pariṣvajya ramā amala ālayam mukunda gātram nṛpatiḥ hata aśubhaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.026/3 lebhe parāṃ nirvṛtim aśru-locano hṛṣyat-tanur vismṛta-loka-vibhramaḥ
analyzed: lebhe parām nirvṛtim aśru locanaḥ hṛṣyat tanuḥ vismṛta loka vibhramaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.027/1 taṃ mātuleyaṃ parirabhya nirvṛto bhīmaḥ smayan prema-jalākulendriyaḥ
analyzed: tam mātuleyam parirabhya nirvṛtaḥ bhīmaḥ smayan prema jala ākula indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.027/3 yamau kirīṭī ca suhṛttamaṃ mudā pravṛddha-bāṣpāḥ parirebhire 'cyutam
analyzed: yamau kirīṭī ca suhṛttamam mudā pravṛddha bāṣpāḥ parirebhire cyutam

original: BhP_10.71.028/1 arjunena pariṣvakto yamābhyām abhivāditaḥ
analyzed: arjunena pariṣvaktaḥ yamābhyām abhivāditaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.028/3 brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya vṛddhebhyaś ca yathārhataḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ namaskṛtya vṛddhebhyaḥ ca yathārhataḥ

original: BhP_10.71.028/5 mānino mānayām āsa kuru-sṛñjaya-kaikayān
analyzed: māninaḥ mānayām āsa kuru sṛñjaya kaikayān

original: BhP_10.71.029/1 sūta-māgadha-gandharvā vandinaś copamantriṇaḥ
analyzed: sūta māgadha gandharvāḥ vandinaḥ ca upamantriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.029/3 mṛdaṅga-śaṅkha-paṭaha vīṇā-paṇava-gomukhaiḥ
analyzed: mṛdaṅga śaṅkha paṭaha vīṇā paṇava gomukhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.029/5 brāhmaṇāś cāravindākṣaṃ tuṣṭuvur nanṛtur jaguḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ ca aravinda akṣam tuṣṭuvuḥ nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_10.71.030/1 evaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ paryastaḥ puṇya-śloka-śikhāmaṇiḥ
analyzed: evam suhṛdbhiḥ paryastaḥ puṇya śloka śikhāmaṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.030/3 saṃstūyamāno bhagavān viveśālaṅkṛtaṃ puram
analyzed: saṃstūyamānaḥ bhagavān viveśa alaṅkṛtam puram

original: BhP_10.71.031/1 saṃsikta-vartma kariṇāṃ mada-gandha-toyaiś
analyzed: saṃsikta vartma kariṇām mada gandha toyaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.031/2 citra-dhvajaiḥ kanaka-toraṇa-pūrṇa-kumbhaiḥ
analyzed: citra dhvajaiḥ kanaka toraṇa pūrṇa kumbhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.031/3 mṛṣṭātmabhir nava-dukūla-vibhūṣaṇa-srag-
BhP_10.71.031/4 gandhair nṛbhir yuvatibhiś ca virājamānam
analyzed: gandhaiḥ nṛbhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ ca virājamānam

original: BhP_10.71.032/1 uddīpta-dīpa-balibhiḥ prati-sadma jāla
analyzed: uddīpta dīpa balibhiḥ pratisadma

original: BhP_10.71.032/2 niryāta-dhūpa-ruciraṃ vilasat-patākam
analyzed: niryāta dhūpa ruciram vilasat patākam

original: BhP_10.71.032/3 mūrdhanya-hema-kalaśai rajatoru-śṛṅgair
analyzed: rajata ūru śṛṅgaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.032/4 juṣṭaṃ dadarśa bhavanaiḥ kuru-rāja-dhāma
analyzed: juṣṭam dadarśa bhavanaiḥ kuru rāja dhāma

original: BhP_10.71.033/1 prāptaṃ niśamya nara-locana-pāna-pātram
analyzed: prāptam niśamya nara locana pāna pātram

original: BhP_10.71.033/2 autsukya-viślathita-keśa-dukūla-bandhāḥ
analyzed: autsukya viślathita keśa dukūla bandhāḥ

original: BhP_10.71.033/3 sadyo visṛjya gṛha-karma patīṃś ca talpe
analyzed: sadyas visṛjya gṛhakarma patīn ca talpe

original: BhP_10.71.033/4 draṣṭuṃ yayur yuvatayaḥ sma narendra-mārge
analyzed: draṣṭum yayuḥ yuvatayaḥ sma narendra mārge

original: BhP_10.71.034/1 tasmin su-saṅkula ibhāśva-ratha-dvipadbhiḥ
analyzed: tasmin su saṅkule ibha aśva ratha dvipadbhiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.034/2 kṛṣṇam sa-bhāryam upalabhya gṛhādhirūḍhāḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam sa bhāryam upalabhya gṛha adhirūḍhāḥ

original: BhP_10.71.034/3 nāryo vikīrya kusumair manasopaguhya
analyzed: nāryaḥ vikīrya kusumaiḥ manasā upaguhya

original: BhP_10.71.034/4 su-svāgataṃ vidadhur utsmaya-vīkṣitena
analyzed: su svāgatam vidadhuḥ utsmaya vīkṣitena

original: BhP_10.71.035/1 ūcuḥ striyaḥ pathi nirīkṣya mukunda-patnīs
analyzed: ūcuḥ striyaḥ pathi nirīkṣya mukunda patnīḥ

original: BhP_10.71.035/2 tārā yathoḍupa-sahāḥ kim akāry amūbhiḥ
analyzed: tārāḥ yathā uḍupa sahāḥ kim akāri amūbhiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.035/3 yac cakṣuṣāṃ puruṣa-maulir udāra-hāsa
analyzed: yat cakṣuṣām puruṣa mauliḥ udāra hāsa

original: BhP_10.71.035/4 līlāvaloka-kalayotsavam ātanoti
analyzed: ātanoti

original: BhP_10.71.036/1 tatra tatropasaṅgamya paurā maṅgala-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: tatra tatra upasaṅgamya paurāḥ maṅgala pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.036/3 cakruḥ saparyāṃ kṛṣṇāya śreṇī-mukhyā hatainasaḥ
analyzed: cakruḥ saparyām kṛṣṇāya śreṇīmukhyāḥ hata enasaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.037/1 antaḥ-pura-janaiḥ prītyā mukundaḥ phulla-locanaiḥ
analyzed: antaḥpura janaiḥ prītyā mukundaḥ phulla locanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.037/3 sa-sambhramair abhyupetaḥ prāviśad rāja-mandiram
analyzed: sa sambhramaiḥ abhyupetaḥ prāviśat rāja mandiram

original: BhP_10.71.038/1 pṛthā vilokya bhrātreyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tri-bhuvaneśvaram
analyzed: pṛthā vilokya bhrātrā iyam kṛṣṇam tribhuvana īśvaram

original: BhP_10.71.038/3 prītātmotthāya paryaṅkāt sa-snuṣā pariṣasvaje
analyzed: prīta ātmā utthāya paryaṅkāt sa snuṣā pariṣasvaje

original: BhP_10.71.039/1 govindaṃ gṛham ānīya deva-deveśam ādṛtaḥ
analyzed: govindam gṛham ānīya devadeveśam ādṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.039/3 pūjāyāṃ nāvidat kṛtyaṃ pramodopahato nṛpaḥ
analyzed: pūjāyām na avidat kṛtyam pramoda upahataḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.040/1 pitṛ-svasur guru-strīṇāṃ kṛṣṇaś cakre 'bhivādanam
analyzed: pitṛ svasuḥ guru strīṇām kṛṣṇaḥ cakre abhivādanam

original: BhP_10.71.040/3 svayaṃ ca kṛṣṇayā rājan bhaginyā cābhivanditaḥ
analyzed: svayam ca kṛṣṇayā rājan bhaginyā ca abhivanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.041/1 śvaśṛvā sañcoditā kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇa-patnīś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: śvaśṛvā sañcoditā kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇa patnīḥ ca sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.71.041/3 ānarca rukmiṇīṃ satyāṃ bhadrāṃ jāmbavatīṃ tathā
analyzed: ānarca rukmiṇīm satyām bhadrām jāmbavatīm tathā

original: BhP_10.71.042/1 kālindīṃ mitravindāṃ ca śaibyāṃ nāgnajitīṃ satīm
analyzed: kālindīm mitravindām ca śaibyām nāgnajitīm satīm

original: BhP_10.71.042/3 anyāś cābhyāgatā yās tu vāsaḥ-sraṅ-maṇḍanādibhiḥ
analyzed: anyāḥ ca abhyāgatāḥ yāḥ tu vāsaḥ sraj maṇḍana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.71.043/1 sukhaṃ nivāsayām āsa dharma-rājo janārdanam
analyzed: sukham nivāsayām āsa dharmarājaḥ janārdanam

original: BhP_10.71.043/3 sa-sainyaṃ sānugāmatyaṃ sa-bhāryaṃ ca navaṃ navam
analyzed: sa sainyam sa anuga amatyam sa bhāryam ca navam navam

original: BhP_10.71.044/1 tarpayitvā khāṇḍavena vahniṃ phālguna-saṃyutaḥ
analyzed: tarpayitvā khāṇḍavena vahnim phālguna saṃyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.71.044/3 mocayitvā mayaṃ yena rājñe divyā sabhā kṛtā
analyzed: mocayitvā mayam yena rājñe divyā sabhā kṛtā

original: BhP_10.71.045/1 uvāsa katicin māsān rājñaḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: uvāsa katicid māsān rājñaḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.71.045/3 viharan ratham āruhya phālgunena bhaṭair vṛtaḥ
analyzed: viharan ratham āruhya phālgunena bhaṭaiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.72.001/1 ekadā tu sabhā-madhya āsthito munibhir vṛtaḥ
analyzed: ekadā tu sabhā madhye āsthitaḥ munibhiḥ vṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.001/3 brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyair bhrātṛbhiś ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ vaiśyaiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: BhP_10.72.002/1 ācāryaiḥ kula-vṛddhaiś ca jñāti-sambandhi-bāndhavaiḥ
analyzed: ācāryaiḥ kula vṛddhaiḥ ca jñāti sambandhi bāndhavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.72.002/3 śṛṇvatām eva caiteṣām ābhāṣyedam uvāca ha
analyzed: śṛṇvatām eva ca eteṣām ābhāṣya idam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.72.003/0 śrī-yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: śrī yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.72.003/1 kratu-rājena govinda rājasūyena pāvanīḥ
analyzed: kratu rājena govinda rājasūyena pāvanīḥ

original: BhP_10.72.003/3 yakṣye vibhūtīr bhavatas tat sampādaya naḥ prabho
analyzed: yakṣye vibhūtīḥ bhavataḥ tat sampādaya naḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.72.004/1 tvat-pāduke avirataṃ pari ye caranti
analyzed: tvad pāduke aviratam pari ye caranti

original: BhP_10.72.004/2 dhyāyanty abhadra-naśane śucayo gṛṇanti
analyzed: dhyāyanti a bhadra naśane śucayaḥ gṛṇanti

original: BhP_10.72.004/3 vindanti te kamala-nābha bhavāpavargam
analyzed: vindanti te kamalanābha bhava apavargam

original: BhP_10.72.004/4 āśāsate yadi ta āśiṣa īśa nānye
analyzed: āśāsate yadi te āśiṣaḥ īśa na anye

original: BhP_10.72.005/1 tad deva-deva bhavataś caraṇāravinda-
analyzed: tat devadeva bhavataḥ caraṇa aravinda

original: BhP_10.72.005/2 sevānubhāvam iha paśyatu loka eṣaḥ
analyzed: sevā anubhāvam iha paśyatu lokaḥ eṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.005/3 ye tvāṃ bhajanti na bhajanty uta vobhayeṣāṃ
analyzed: ye tvām bhajanti na bhajanti uta vā ubhayeṣām

original: BhP_10.72.005/4 niṣṭhāṃ pradarśaya vibho kuru-sṛñjayānām
analyzed: niṣṭhām pradarśaya vibho kuru sṛñjayānām

original: BhP_10.72.006/1 na brahmaṇaḥ sva-para-bheda-matis tava syāt
analyzed: na brahmaṇaḥ sva para bheda matiḥ tava syāt

original: BhP_10.72.006/2 sarvātmanaḥ sama-dṛśaḥ sva-sukhānubhūteḥ
analyzed: sarvātmanaḥ samadṛśaḥ sva sukha anubhūteḥ

original: BhP_10.72.006/3 saṃsevatāṃ sura-taror iva te prasādaḥ
analyzed: saṃsevatām sura taroḥ iva te prasādaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.006/4 sevānurūpam udayo na viparyayo 'tra
analyzed: sevā anurūpam udayaḥ na

original: BhP_10.72.007/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.72.007/1 samyag vyavasitaṃ rājan bhavatā śatru-karśana
analyzed: samyak vyavasitam rājan bhavatā śatru karśana

original: BhP_10.72.007/3 kalyāṇī yena te kīrtir lokān anubhaviṣyati
analyzed: kalyāṇī yena te kīrtiḥ lokān anubhaviṣyati

original: BhP_10.72.008/1 ṛṣīṇāṃ pitṛ-devānāṃ suhṛdām api naḥ prabho
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām pitṛ devānām suhṛdām api naḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.72.008/3 sarveṣām api bhūtānām īpsitaḥ kratu-rāḍ ayam
analyzed: sarveṣām api bhūtānām īpsitaḥ kratu rāj ayam

original: BhP_10.72.009/1 vijitya nṛpatīn sarvān kṛtvā ca jagatīṃ vaśe
analyzed: vijitya nṛpatīn sarvān kṛtvā ca jagatīm vaśe

original: BhP_10.72.009/3 sambhṛtya sarva-sambhārān āharasva mahā-kratum
analyzed: sambhṛtya sarva sambhārān āharasva mahā kratum

original: BhP_10.72.010/1 ete te bhrātaro rājaṃl loka-pālāṃśa-sambhavāḥ
analyzed: ete te bhrātaraḥ rājan lokapāla aṃśa sambhavāḥ

original: BhP_10.72.010/3 jito 'smy ātmavatā te 'haṃ durjayo yo 'kṛtātmabhiḥ
analyzed: jitaḥ smi ātmavatā te ham durjayaḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.72.011/1 na kaścin mat-paraṃ loke tejasā yaśasā śriyā
analyzed: na kaścid mad param loke tejasā yaśasā śriyā

original: BhP_10.72.011/3 vibhūtibhir vābhibhaved devo 'pi kim u pārthivaḥ
analyzed: vibhūtibhiḥ vā abhibhavet kim u pārthivaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.012/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.72.012/1 niśamya bhagavad-gītaṃ prītaḥ phulla-mukhāmbujaḥ
analyzed: niśamya bhagavat gītam prītaḥ phulla mukha ambujaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.012/3 bhrātṝn dig-vijaye 'yuṅkta viṣṇu-tejopabṛṃhitān
analyzed: bhrātṝn digvijaye yuṅkta viṣṇu teja upabṛṃhitān

original: BhP_10.72.013/1 sahadevaṃ dakṣiṇasyām ādiśat saha sṛñjayaiḥ
analyzed: sahadevam dakṣiṇasyām ādiśat saha sṛñjayaiḥ

original: BhP_10.72.013/3 diśi pratīcyāṃ nakulam udīcyāṃ savyasācinam
analyzed: diśi pratīcyām nakulam udīcyām savyasācinam

original: BhP_10.72.013/5 prācyāṃ vṛkodaraṃ matsyaiḥ kekayaiḥ saha madrakaiḥ
analyzed: prācyām vṛkodaram matsyaiḥ kekayaiḥ saha madrakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.72.014/1 te vijitya nṛpān vīrā ājahrur digbhya ojasā
analyzed: te vijitya nṛpān vīrāḥ ājahruḥ digbhyaḥ ojasā

original: BhP_10.72.014/3 ajāta-śatrave bhūri draviṇaṃ nṛpa yakṣyate
analyzed: ajātaśatrave bhūri draviṇam nṛpa yakṣyate

original: BhP_10.72.015/1 śrutvājitaṃ jarāsandhaṃ nṛpater dhyāyato hariḥ
analyzed: śrutvā ajitam jarāsandham nṛpateḥ dhyāyataḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.72.015/3 āhopāyaṃ tam evādya uddhavo yam uvāca ha
analyzed: āha upāyam tam eva adya uddhavaḥ yam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.72.016/1 bhīmaseno 'rjunaḥ kṛṣṇo brahma-linga-dharās trayaḥ
analyzed: bhīmasenaḥ rjunaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ brahma linga dharāḥ trayaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.016/3 jagmur girivrajaṃ tāta bṛhadratha-suto yataḥ
analyzed: jagmuḥ girivrajam tāta bṛhadratha sutaḥ yatas

original: BhP_10.72.017/1 te gatvātithya-velāyāṃ gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinam
analyzed: te gatvā ātithya velāyām gṛheṣu gṛhamedhinam

original: BhP_10.72.017/3 brahmaṇyaṃ samayāceran rājanyā brahma-liṅginaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇyam sama yāceran rājanyāḥ brahma liṅginaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.018/1 rājan viddhy atithīn prāptān arthino dūram āgatān
analyzed: rājan viddhi atithīn prāptān arthinaḥ dūram āgatān

original: BhP_10.72.018/3 tan naḥ prayaccha bhadraṃ te yad vayaṃ kāmayāmahe
analyzed: tat naḥ prayaccha bhadram te yat vayam kāmayāmahe

original: BhP_10.72.019/1 kiṃ durmarṣaṃ titikṣūṇāṃ kim akāryam asādhubhiḥ
analyzed: kim durmarṣam titikṣūṇām kim akāryam asādhubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.72.019/3 kiṃ na deyaṃ vadānyānāṃ kaḥ paraḥ sama-darśinām
analyzed: kim na deyam vadānyānām kaḥ paraḥ sama darśinām

original: BhP_10.72.020/1 yo 'nityena śarīreṇa satāṃ geyaṃ yaśo dhruvam
analyzed: yaḥ nityena śarīreṇa satām geyam yaśaḥ dhruvam

original: BhP_10.72.020/3 nācinoti svayaṃ kalpaḥ sa vācyaḥ śocya eva saḥ
analyzed: na ācinoti svayam kalpaḥ sa vācyaḥ śocyaḥ eva saḥ

original: BhP_10.72.021/1 hariścandro rantideva uñchavṛttiḥ śibir baliḥ
BhP_10.72.021/3 vyādhaḥ kapoto bahavo hy adhruveṇa dhruvaṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: vyādhaḥ kapotaḥ bahavaḥ hi adhruveṇa dhruvam gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.72.022/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.72.022/1 svarair ākṛtibhis tāṃs tu prakoṣṭhair jyā-hatair api
analyzed: svaraiḥ ākṛtibhiḥ tān tu prakoṣṭhaiḥ jyā hataiḥ api

original: BhP_10.72.022/3 rājanya-bandhūn vijñāya dṛṣṭa-pūrvān acintayat
analyzed: rājanya bandhūn vijñāya dṛṣṭa pūrvān acintayat

original: BhP_10.72.023/1 rājanya-bandhavo hy ete brahma-liṅgāni bibhrati
analyzed: rājanyabandhavaḥ hi ete brahma liṅgāni bibhrati

original: BhP_10.72.023/3 dadāni bhikṣitaṃ tebhya ātmānam api dustyajam
analyzed: dadāni bhikṣitam tebhyaḥ ātmānam api dustyajam

original: BhP_10.72.024/1 baler nu śrūyate kīrtir vitatā dikṣv akalmaṣā
analyzed: baleḥ nu śrūyate kīrtiḥ vitatā dikṣu akalmaṣā

original: BhP_10.72.024/3 aiśvaryād bhraṃśitasyāpi vipra-vyājena viṣṇunā
analyzed: aiśvaryāt bhraṃśitasya api vipra vyājena viṣṇunā

original: BhP_10.72.025/1 śriyaṃ jihīrṣatendrasya viṣṇave dvija-rūpiṇe
analyzed: śriyam jihīrṣatā indrasya viṣṇave dvija rūpiṇe

original: BhP_10.72.025/3 jānann api mahīm prādād vāryamāṇo 'pi daitya-rāṭ
analyzed: jānan api mahīm prādāt vāryamāṇaḥ pi daitya rāj

original: BhP_10.72.026/1 jīvatā brāhmaṇārthāya ko nv arthaḥ kṣatra-bandhunā
analyzed: jīvatā brāhmaṇa arthāya kaḥ nu arthaḥ kṣatrabandhunā

original: BhP_10.72.026/3 dehena patamānena nehatā vipulaṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: dehena patamānena na īhatā vipulam yaśaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.027/1 ity udāra-matiḥ prāha kṛṣṇārjuna-vṛkodarān
analyzed: iti udāra matiḥ prāha kṛṣṇa arjuna vṛkodarān

original: BhP_10.72.027/3 he viprā vriyatāṃ kāmo dadāmy ātma-śiro 'pi vaḥ
analyzed: he viprāḥ vriyatām kāmaḥ dadāmi ātma śiraḥ pi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.028/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.72.028/1 yuddhaṃ no dehi rājendra dvandvaśo yadi manyase
analyzed: yuddham naḥ dehi rāja indra dvandvaśas yadi manyase

original: BhP_10.72.028/3 yuddhārthino vayaṃ prāptā rājanyā nānya-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: yuddha arthinaḥ vayam prāptāḥ rājanyāḥ na anya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.029/1 asau vṛkodaraḥ pārthas tasya bhrātārjuno hy ayam
analyzed: asau vṛkodaraḥ pārthaḥ tasya bhrātā arjunaḥ hi ayam

original: BhP_10.72.029/3 anayor mātuleyaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇaṃ jānīhi te ripum
analyzed: anayoḥ mātuleyam mām kṛṣṇam jānīhi te ripum

original: BhP_10.72.030/1 evam āvedito rājā jahāsoccaiḥ sma māgadhaḥ
analyzed: evam āveditaḥ rājā jahāsa uccais sma māgadhaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.030/3 āha cāmarṣito mandā yuddhaṃ tarhi dadāmi vaḥ
analyzed: āha ca amarṣitaḥ mandāḥ yuddham tarhi dadāmi vaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.031/1 na tvayā bhīruṇā yotsye yudhi viklava-tejasā
analyzed: na tvayā bhīruṇā yotsye yudhi viklava tejasā

original: BhP_10.72.031/3 mathurāṃ sva-purīṃ tyaktvā samudraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: mathurām sva purīm tyaktvā samudram śaraṇam gataḥ

original: BhP_10.72.032/1 ayaṃ tu vayasātulyo nāti-sattvo na me samaḥ
analyzed: ayam tu vayasā atulyaḥ na atisattvaḥ na me samaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.032/3 arjuno na bhaved yoddhā bhīmas tulya-balo mama
analyzed: arjunaḥ na bhavet yoddhā bhīmaḥ tulya balaḥ mama

original: BhP_10.72.033/1 ity uktvā bhīmasenāya prādāya mahatīṃ gadām
analyzed: iti uktvā bhīmasenāya prādāya mahatīm gadām

original: BhP_10.72.033/3 dvitīyāṃ svayam ādāya nirjagāma purād bahiḥ
analyzed: dvitīyām svayam ādāya nirjagāma purāt bahis

original: BhP_10.72.034/1 tataḥ samekhale vīrau saṃyuktāv itaretaram
analyzed: tatas sa mekhale vīrau saṃyuktau itaretaram

original: BhP_10.72.034/3 jaghnatur vajra-kalpābhyāṃ gadābhyāṃ raṇa-durmadau
analyzed: jaghnatuḥ vajra kalpābhyām gadābhyām raṇa durmadau

original: BhP_10.72.035/1 maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi savyaṃ dakṣiṇam eva ca
analyzed: maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi savyam dakṣiṇam eva ca

original: BhP_10.72.035/3 caratoḥ śuśubhe yuddhaṃ naṭayor iva raṅgiṇoḥ
analyzed: caratoḥ śuśubhe yuddham naṭayoḥ iva raṅgiṇoḥ

original: BhP_10.72.036/1 tataś caṭa-caṭā-śabdo vajra-niṣpesa-sannibhaḥ
analyzed: tatas caṭacaṭā śabdaḥ vajra niṣpesa sannibhaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.036/3 gadayoḥ kṣiptayo rājan dantayor iva dantinoḥ
analyzed: gadayoḥ kṣiptayoḥ rājan dantayoḥ iva dantinoḥ

original: BhP_10.72.037/1 te vai gade bhuja-javena nipātyamāne
analyzed: te vai gade bhuja javena nipātyamāne

original: BhP_10.72.037/2 anyonyato 'ṃsa-kaṭi-pāda-karoru-jatrum
analyzed: anyonyatas ṃsa kaṭi pāda kara ūru jatrum

original: BhP_10.72.037/3 cūrṇī-babhūvatur upetya yathārka-śākhe
analyzed: cūrṇībabhūvatuḥ upetya yathā arka śākhe

original: BhP_10.72.037/4 saṃyudhyator dviradayor iva dīpta-manvyoḥ
analyzed: saṃyudhyatoḥ dviradayoḥ iva dīpta manvyoḥ

original: BhP_10.72.038/1 itthaṃ tayoḥ prahatayor gadayor nṛ-vīrau
analyzed: ittham tayoḥ prahatayoḥ gadayoḥ nṛ vīrau

original: BhP_10.72.038/2 kruddhau sva-muṣṭibhir ayaḥ-sparaśair apiṣṭām
analyzed: kruddhau sva muṣṭibhiḥ ayaḥ sparaśaiḥ a piṣṭām

original: BhP_10.72.038/3 śabdas tayoḥ praharator ibhayor ivāsīn
analyzed: śabdaḥ tayoḥ praharatoḥ ibhayoḥ iva asīn

original: BhP_10.72.038/4 nirghāta-vajra-paruṣas tala-tāḍanotthaḥ
BhP_10.72.039/1 tayor evaṃ praharatoḥ sama-śikṣā-balaujasoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ evam praharatoḥ sama śikṣā bala ojasoḥ

original: BhP_10.72.039/3 nirviśeṣam abhūd yuddham akṣīṇa-javayor nṛpa
analyzed: nirviśeṣam abhūt yuddham a kṣīṇa javayoḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.72.040/1 śatror janma-mṛtī vidvāñ jīvitaṃ ca jarā-kṛtam
analyzed: śatroḥ janma mṛtī vidvām jīvitam ca jarā kṛtam

original: BhP_10.72.040/3 pārtham āpyāyayan svena tejasācintayad dhariḥ
analyzed: pārtham āpyāyayan svena tejasā acintayat hariḥ

original: BhP_10.72.041/1 sañcintyārī-vadhopāyaṃ bhīmasyāmogha-darśanaḥ
analyzed: sañcintya arī vadha upāyam bhīmasya amogha darśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.041/3 darśayām āsa viṭapaṃ pāṭayann iva saṃjñayā
analyzed: darśayām āsa viṭapam pāṭayan iva saṃjñayā

original: BhP_10.72.042/1 tad vijñāya mahā-sattvo bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: tat vijñāya mahā sattvaḥ bhīmaḥ praharatām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.042/3 gṛhītvā pādayoḥ śatruṃ pātayām āsa bhū-tale
analyzed: gṛhītvā pādayoḥ śatrum pātayām āsa bhū tale

original: BhP_10.72.043/1 ekam pādaṃ padākramya dorbhyām anyaṃ pragṛhya saḥ
analyzed: ekam pādam padā ākramya dorbhyām anyam pragṛhya saḥ

original: BhP_10.72.043/3 gudataḥ pāṭayām āsa śākham iva mahā-gajaḥ
analyzed: gudataḥ pāṭayām āsa śākham iva mahā gajaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.044/1 eka-pādoru-vṛṣaṇa- kaṭi-pṛṣṭha-stanāṃsake
BhP_10.72.044/3 eka-bāhv-akṣi-bhrū-karṇe śakale dadṛśuḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: eka bāhu akṣi bhrū karṇe śakale dadṛśuḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.72.045/1 hāhā-kāro mahān āsīn nihate magadheśvare
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ mahān āsīt nihate magadha īśvare

original: BhP_10.72.045/3 pūjayām āsatur bhīmaṃ parirabhya jayācyatau
analyzed: pūjayām āsatuḥ bhīmam parirabhya jaya acyatau

original: BhP_10.72.046/1 sahadevaṃ tat-tanayaṃ bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: sahadevam tad tanayam bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.72.046/3 abhyaṣiñcad ameyātmā magadhānāṃ patiṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: abhyaṣiñcat ameya ātmā magadhānām patim prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.72.046/5 mocayām āsa rājanyān saṃruddhā māgadhena ye
analyzed: mocayām āsa rājanyān saṃruddhāḥ māgadhena ye

original: BhP_10.73.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.73.001/1 ayute dve śatāny aṣṭau niruddhā yudhi nirjitāḥ
analyzed: ayute dve śatāni aṣṭau niruddhāḥ yudhi nirjitāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.001/3 te nirgatā giridroṇyāṃ malinā mala-vāsasaḥ
analyzed: te nirgatāḥ giri droṇyām malināḥ mala vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.002/1 kṣut-kṣāmāḥ śuṣka-vadanāḥ saṃrodha-parikarśitāḥ
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāmāḥ śuṣka vadanāḥ saṃrodha parikarśitāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.002/3 dadṛśus te ghana-śyāmaṃ pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
analyzed: dadṛśuḥ te ghana śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam

original: BhP_10.73.003/1 śrīvatsāṅkaṃ catur-bāhuṃ padma-garbhāruṇekṣaṇam
analyzed: śrīvatsa aṅkam catur bāhum padmagarbha aruṇa īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.73.003/3 cāru-prasanna-vadanaṃ sphuran-makara-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: cāru prasanna vadanam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.73.004/1 padma-hastaṃ gadā-śaṅkha rathāṅgair upalakṣitam
analyzed: padma hastam gadā śaṅkha rathāṅgaiḥ upalakṣitam

original: BhP_10.73.004/3 kirīṭa-hāra-kaṭaka- kaṭi-sūtrāṅgadāñcitam
BhP_10.73.005/1 bhrājad-vara-maṇi-grīvaṃ nivītaṃ vana-mālayā
analyzed: bhrājat vara maṇi grīvam nivītam vanamālayā

original: BhP_10.73.005/3 pibanta iva cakṣurbhyāṃ lihanta iva jihvayā
analyzed: pibantaḥ iva cakṣurbhyām lihantaḥ iva jihvayā

original: BhP_10.73.006/1 jighranta iva nāsābhyāṃ rambhanta iva bāhubhiḥ
analyzed: jighrantaḥ iva nāsābhyām rambhantaḥ iva bāhubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.73.006/3 praṇemur hata-pāpmāno mūrdhabhiḥ pādayor hareḥ
analyzed: praṇemuḥ hata pāpmānaḥ mūrdhabhiḥ pādayoḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_10.73.007/1 kṛṣṇa-sandarśanāhlāda dhvasta-saṃrodhana-klamāḥ
BhP_10.73.007/3 praśaśaṃsur hṛṣīkeśaṃ gīrbhiḥ prāñjalayo nṛpāḥ
analyzed: praśaśaṃsuḥ hṛṣīkeśam gīrbhiḥ prāñjalayaḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.008/0 rājāna ūcuḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.73.008/1 namas te deva-deveśa prapannārti-harāvyaya
analyzed: namaḥ te devadeveśa prapanna ārti hara avyaya

original: BhP_10.73.008/3 prapannān pāhi naḥ kṛṣṇa nirviṇṇān ghora-saṃsṛteḥ
analyzed: prapannān pāhi naḥ kṛṣṇa nirviṇṇān ghora saṃsṛteḥ

original: BhP_10.73.009/1 nainaṃ nāthānusūyāmo māgadhaṃ madhusūdana
analyzed: na enam nātha anusūyāmaḥ māgadham madhusūdana

original: BhP_10.73.009/3 anugraho yad bhavato rājñāṃ rājya-cyutir vibho
analyzed: anugrahaḥ yat bhavataḥ rājñām rājya cyutiḥ vibho

original: BhP_10.73.010/1 rājyaiśvarya-madonnaddho na śreyo vindate nṛpaḥ
analyzed: rājya aiśvarya mada unnaddhaḥ na śreyaḥ vindate nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.010/3 tvan-māyā-mohito 'nityā manyate sampado 'calāḥ
analyzed: tvad māyā mohitaḥ nityāḥ manyate sampadaḥ calāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.011/1 mṛga-tṛṣṇāṃ yathā bālā manyanta udakāśayam
analyzed: mṛgatṛṣṇām yathā bālāḥ manyante udakāśayam

original: BhP_10.73.011/3 evaṃ vaikārikīṃ māyām ayuktā vastu cakṣate
analyzed: evam vaikārikīm māyām ayuktāḥ vastu cakṣate

original: BhP_10.73.012/1 vayaṃ purā śrī-mada-naṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo jigīṣayāsyā itaretara-spṛdhaḥ
analyzed: vayam purā śrīmat anaṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ jigīṣayā asyāḥ itaretara spṛdhaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.012/3 ghnantaḥ prajāḥ svā ati-nirghṛṇāḥ prabho mṛtyuṃ puras tvāvigaṇayya durmadāḥ
analyzed: ghnantaḥ prajāḥ svāḥ ati nirghṛṇāḥ prabho mṛtyum puras tvā a vigaṇayya durmadāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.013/1 ta eva kṛṣṇādya gabhīra-raṃhasā durante-vīryeṇa vicālitāḥ śriyaḥ
analyzed: te eva kṛṣṇa adya gabhīra raṃhasā durantevīryeṇa vicālitāḥ śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.013/3 kālena tanvā bhavato 'nukampayā vinaṣṭa-darpāś caraṇau smarāma te
analyzed: kālena tanvā bhavataḥ nukampayā vinaṣṭa darpāḥ caraṇau smarāma te

original: BhP_10.73.014/1 atho na rājyam mṛga-tṛṣṇi-rūpitaṃ dehena śaśvat patatā rujāṃ bhuvā
analyzed: atho na rājyam mṛgatṛṣṇi rūpitam dehena śaśvat patatā rujām bhuvā

original: BhP_10.73.014/3 upāsitavyaṃ spṛhayāmahe vibho kriyā-phalaṃ pretya ca karṇa-rocanam
analyzed: upāsitavyam spṛhayāmahe vibho kriyā phalam pretya ca karṇa rocanam

original: BhP_10.73.015/1 taṃ naḥ samādiśopāyaṃ yena te caraṇābjayoḥ
analyzed: tam naḥ samādiśa upāyam yena te caraṇa abjayoḥ

original: BhP_10.73.015/3 smṛtir yathā na viramed api saṃsaratām iha
analyzed: smṛtiḥ yathā na viramet api saṃsaratām iha

original: BhP_10.73.016/1 kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya haraye paramātmane
analyzed: kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya haraye paramātmane

original: BhP_10.73.016/3 praṇata-kleśa-nāśāya govindāya namo namaḥ
analyzed: praṇata kleśa nāśāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.017/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.73.017/1 saṃstūyamāno bhagavān rājabhir mukta-bandhanaiḥ
analyzed: saṃstūyamānaḥ bhagavān rājabhiḥ mukta bandhanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.73.017/3 tān āha karuṇas tāta śaraṇyaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: tān āha karuṇaḥ tāta śaraṇyaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā

original: BhP_10.73.018/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.73.018/1 adya prabhṛti vo bhūpā mayy ātmany akhileśvare
analyzed: adya prabhṛti vaḥ bhūpāḥ mayi ātmani akhila īśvare

original: BhP_10.73.018/3 su-dṛḍhā jāyate bhaktir bāḍham āśaṃsitaṃ tathā
analyzed: su dṛḍhā jāyate bhaktiḥ bāḍham āśaṃsitam tathā

original: BhP_10.73.019/1 diṣṭyā vyavasitaṃ bhūpā bhavanta ṛta-bhāṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā vyavasitam bhūpāḥ bhavantaḥ ṛta bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.019/3 śrīy-aiśvarya-madonnāhaṃ paśya unmādakaṃ nṛṇām
BhP_10.73.020/1 haihayo nahuṣo veṇo rāvaṇo narako 'pare
analyzed: haihayaḥ nahuṣaḥ veṇaḥ rāvaṇaḥ pare

original: BhP_10.73.020/3 śrī-madād bhraṃśitāḥ sthānād deva-daitya-nareśvarāḥ
analyzed: śrī madāt bhraṃśitāḥ sthānāt deva daitya nareśvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.021/1 bhavanta etad vijñāya dehādy utpādyam anta-vat
analyzed: bhavantaḥ etat vijñāya deha ādi utpādyam antavat

original: BhP_10.73.021/3 māṃ yajanto 'dhvarair yuktāḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣyatha
analyzed: mām yajantaḥ dhvaraiḥ yuktāḥ prajāḥ dharmeṇa rakṣyatha

original: BhP_10.73.022/1 santanvantaḥ prajā-tantūn sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavābhavau
analyzed: santanvantaḥ prajā tantūn sukham duḥkham bhava abhavau

original: BhP_10.73.022/3 prāptaṃ prāptaṃ ca sevanto mac-cittā vicariṣyatha
analyzed: prāptam prāptam ca sevantaḥ mad cittāḥ vicariṣyatha

original: BhP_10.73.023/1 udāsīnāś ca dehādāv ātmārāmā dhṛta-vratāḥ
analyzed: udāsīnāḥ ca deha ādau ātma ārāmāḥ dhṛta vratāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.023/3 mayy āveśya manaḥ samyaṅ mām ante brahma yāsyatha
analyzed: mayi āveśya manaḥ samyak mām ante brahma yāsyatha

original: BhP_10.73.024/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.73.024/1 ity ādiśya nṛpān kṛṣṇo bhagavān bhuvaneśvaraḥ
analyzed: iti ādiśya nṛpān kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān bhuvaneśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.73.024/3 teṣāṃ nyayuṅkta puruṣān striyo majjana-karmaṇi
analyzed: teṣām nyayuṅkta puruṣān striyaḥ majjana karmaṇi

original: BhP_10.73.025/1 saparyāṃ kārayām āsa sahadevena bhārata
analyzed: saparyām kārayām āsa sahadevena bhārata

original: BhP_10.73.025/3 naradevocitair vastrair bhūṣaṇaiḥ srag-vilepanaiḥ
analyzed: naradeva ucitaiḥ vastraiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ sraj vilepanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.73.026/1 bhojayitvā varānnena su-snātān samalaṅkṛtān
analyzed: bhojayitvā vara annena su snātān samalaṅkṛtān

original: BhP_10.73.026/3 bhogaiś ca vividhair yuktāṃs tāmbūlādyair nṛpocitaiḥ
analyzed: bhogaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ yuktān tāmbūla ādyaiḥ nṛpa ucitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.73.027/1 te pūjitā mukundena rājāno mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍalāḥ
analyzed: te pūjitāḥ mukundena rājānaḥ mṛṣṭa kuṇḍalāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.027/3 virejur mocitāḥ kleśāt prāvṛḍ-ante yathā grahāḥ
analyzed: virejuḥ mocitāḥ kleśāt prāvṛḍ ante yathā grahāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.028/1 rathān sad-aśvān āropya maṇi-kāñcana-bhūṣitān
analyzed: rathān sat aśvān āropya maṇi kāñcana bhūṣitān

original: BhP_10.73.028/3 prīṇayya sunṛtair vākyaiḥ sva-deśān pratyayāpayat
analyzed: prīṇayya su nṛtaiḥ vākyaiḥ sva deśān pratyayāpayat

original: BhP_10.73.029/1 ta evaṃ mocitāḥ kṛcchrāt kṛṣṇena su-mahātmanā
analyzed: te evam mocitāḥ kṛcchrāt kṛṣṇena su mahātmanā

original: BhP_10.73.029/3 yayus tam eva dhyāyantaḥ kṛtāni ca jagat-pateḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ tam eva dhyāyantaḥ kṛtāni ca jagatpateḥ

original: BhP_10.73.030/1 jagaduḥ prakṛtibhyas te mahā-puruṣa-ceṣṭitam
analyzed: jagaduḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ te mahāpuruṣa ceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.73.030/3 yathānvaśāsad bhagavāṃs tathā cakrur atandritāḥ
analyzed: yathā anvaśāsat bhagavān tathā cakruḥ atandritāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.031/1 jarāsandhaṃ ghātayitvā bhīmasenena keśavaḥ
analyzed: jarāsandham ghātayitvā bhīmasenena keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.031/3 pārthābhyāṃ saṃyutaḥ prāyāt sahadevena pūjitaḥ
analyzed: pārthābhyām saṃyutaḥ prāyāt sahadevena pūjitaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.032/1 gatvā te khāṇḍava-prasthaṃ śaṅkhān dadhmur jitārayaḥ
analyzed: gatvā te khāṇḍavaprastham śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ jita arayaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.032/3 harṣayantaḥ sva-suhṛdo durhṛdāṃ cāsukhāvahāḥ
analyzed: harṣayantaḥ sva suhṛdaḥ durhṛdām ca asukha āvahāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.033/1 tac chrutvā prīta-manasa indraprastha-nivāsinaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā prīta manasaḥ indraprastha nivāsinaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.033/3 menire māgadhaṃ śāntaṃ rājā cāpta-manorathaḥ
analyzed: menire māgadham śāntam rājā ca āpta manorathaḥ

original: BhP_10.73.034/1 abhivandyātha rājānaṃ bhīmārjuna-janārdanāḥ
analyzed: abhivandya atha rājānam bhīma arjuna janārdanāḥ

original: BhP_10.73.034/3 sarvam āśrāvayāṃ cakrur ātmanā yad anuṣṭhitam
analyzed: sarvam āśrāvayām cakruḥ ātmanā yat anuṣṭhitam

original: BhP_10.73.035/1 niśamya dharma-rājas tat keśavenānukampitam
analyzed: niśamya dharmarājaḥ tat keśavena anukampitam

original: BhP_10.73.035/3 ānandāśru-kalāṃ muñcan premṇā novāca kiñcana
analyzed: ānanda aśru kalām muñcan premṇā nā uvāca kiñcana

original: BhP_10.74.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.74.001/1 evaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā jarāsandha-vadhaṃ vibhoḥ
analyzed: evam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā jarāsandha vadham vibhoḥ

original: BhP_10.74.001/3 kṛṣṇasya cānubhāvaṃ taṃ śrutvā prītas tam abravīt
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya ca anubhāvam tam śrutvā prītaḥ tam abravīt

original: BhP_10.74.002/0 śrī-yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
analyzed: śrī yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.74.002/1 ye syus trai-lokya-guravaḥ sarve lokā maheśvarāḥ
analyzed: ye syuḥ trailokya guravaḥ sarve lokāḥ mahā īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.002/3 vahanti durlabhaṃ labdvā śirasaivānuśāsanam
analyzed: vahanti durlabham śirasā eva anuśāsanam

original: BhP_10.74.003/1 sa bhavān aravindākṣo dīnānām īśa-māninām
analyzed: sa bhavān aravinda akṣaḥ dīnānām īśa māninām

original: BhP_10.74.003/3 dhatte 'nuśāsanaṃ bhūmaṃs tad atyanta-viḍambanam
analyzed: dhatte nuśāsanam bhūman tat atyanta viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.74.004/1 na hy ekasyādvitīyasya brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: na hi ekasya advitīyasya brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.004/3 karmabhir vardhate tejo hrasate ca yathā raveḥ
analyzed: karmabhiḥ vardhate tejaḥ hrasate ca yathā raveḥ

original: BhP_10.74.005/1 na vai te 'jita bhaktānāṃ mamāham iti mādhava
analyzed: na vai te jita bhaktānām mama aham iti mādhava

original: BhP_10.74.005/3 tvaṃ taveti ca nānā-dhīḥ paśūnām iva vaikṛtī
analyzed: tvam tava iti ca nānā dhīḥ paśūnām iva vaikṛtī

original: BhP_10.74.006/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.74.006/1 ity uktvā yajñiye kāle vavre yuktān sa ṛtvijaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā yajñiye kāle vavre yuktān saḥ ṛtvijaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.006/3 kṛṣṇānumoditaḥ pārtho brāhmaṇān brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa anumoditaḥ pārthaḥ brāhmaṇān brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.007/1 dvaipāyano bharadvājaḥ sumantur gotamo 'sitaḥ
analyzed: dvaipāyanaḥ bharadvājaḥ sumantuḥ gotamaḥ sitaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.007/3 vasiṣṭhaś cyavanaḥ kaṇvo maitreyaḥ kavaṣas tritaḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭhaḥ cyavanaḥ kaṇvaḥ maitreyaḥ kavaṣaḥ tritaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.008/1 viśvāmitro vāmadevaḥ sumatir jaiminiḥ kratuḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ vāmadevaḥ sumatiḥ jaiminiḥ kratuḥ

original: BhP_10.74.008/3 pailaḥ parāśaro gargo vaiśampāyana eva ca
analyzed: pailaḥ parāśaraḥ gargaḥ vaiśampāyanaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.74.009/1 atharvā kaśyapo dhaumyo rāmo bhārgava āsuriḥ
analyzed: atharvā kaśyapaḥ dhaumyaḥ rāmaḥ bhārgavaḥ āsuriḥ

original: BhP_10.74.009/3 vītihotro madhucchandā vīraseno 'kṛtavraṇaḥ
analyzed: vītihotraḥ madhucchandāḥ vīrasenaḥ kṛtavraṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.010/1 upahūtās tathā cānye droṇa-bhīṣma-kṛpādayaḥ
analyzed: upahūtāḥ tathā ca anye droṇa bhīṣma kṛpa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.010/3 dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha-suto viduraś ca mahā-matiḥ
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha sutaḥ viduraḥ ca mahāmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.74.011/1 brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā yajña-didṛkṣavaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ yajña didṛkṣavaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.011/3 tatreyuḥ sarva-rājāno rājñāṃ prakṛtayo nṛpa
analyzed: tatra īyuḥ sarva rājānaḥ rājñām prakṛtayaḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.74.012/1 tatas te deva-yajanaṃ brāhmaṇāḥ svarṇa-lāṅgalaiḥ
analyzed: tatas te devayajanam brāhmaṇāḥ svarṇa lāṅgalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.74.012/3 kṛṣṭvā tatra yathāmnāyaṃ dīkṣayāṃ cakrire nṛpam
analyzed: kṛṣṭvā tatra yathāmnāyam cakrire nṛpam

original: BhP_10.74.013/1 haimāḥ kilopakaraṇā varuṇasya yathā purā
analyzed: haimāḥ kila upakaraṇāḥ varuṇasya yathā purā

original: BhP_10.74.013/3 indrādayo loka-pālā viriñci-bhava-saṃyutāḥ
analyzed: indra ādayaḥ lokapālāḥ viriñci bhava saṃyutāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.014/1 sa-gaṇāḥ siddha-gandharvā vidyādhara-mahoragāḥ
analyzed: sa gaṇāḥ siddha gandharvāḥ vidyādhara mahā uragāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.014/3 munayo yakṣa-rakṣāṃsi khaga-kinnara-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: munayaḥ yakṣa rakṣāṃsi khaga kinnara cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.015/1 rājānaś ca samāhūtā rāja-patnyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ca samāhūtāḥ rāja patnyaḥ ca sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.74.015/3 rājasūyaṃ samīyuḥ sma rājñaḥ pāṇḍu-sutasya vai
analyzed: rājasūyam samīyuḥ sma rājñaḥ pāṇḍu sutasya vai

original: BhP_10.74.015/5 menire kṛṣṇa-bhaktasya sūpapannam avismitāḥ
analyzed: menire kṛṣṇa bhaktasya su upapannam a vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.016/1 ayājayan mahā-rājaṃ yājakā deva-varcasaḥ
analyzed: ayājayat mahā rājam yājakāḥ deva varcasaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.016/3 rājasūyena vidhi-vat pracetasam ivāmarāḥ
analyzed: rājasūyena vidhivat pracetasam iva amarāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.017/1 sūtye 'hany avanī-pālo yājakān sadasas-patīn
analyzed: sūtye hani avanīpālaḥ yājakān sadasaspatīn

original: BhP_10.74.017/3 apūjayan mahā-bhāgān yathā-vat su-samāhitaḥ
analyzed: apūjayat mahābhāgān yathāvat su samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.018/1 sadasyāgryārhaṇārhaṃ vai vimṛśantaḥ sabhā-sadaḥ
analyzed: sadasya agrya arhaṇa arham vai vimṛśantaḥ sabhāsadaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.018/3 nādhyagacchann anaikāntyāt sahadevas tadābravīt
analyzed: na adhyagacchan anaikāntyāt sahadevaḥ tadā bravīt

original: BhP_10.74.019/1 arhati hy acyutaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: arhati hi acyutaḥ śraiṣṭhyam bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ

original: BhP_10.74.019/3 eṣa vai devatāḥ sarvā deśa-kāla-dhanādayaḥ
analyzed: eṣa vai devatāḥ sarvāḥ deśa kāla dhana ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.020/1 yad-ātmakam idaṃ viśvaṃ kratavaś ca yad-ātmakāḥ
analyzed: yad ātmakam idam viśvam kratavaḥ ca yad ātmakāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.020/3 agnir āhutayo mantrā sāṅkhyaṃ yogaś ca yat-paraḥ
analyzed: agniḥ āhutayaḥ mantrāḥ sāṅkhyam yogaḥ ca yad paraḥ

original: BhP_10.74.021/1 eka evādvitīyo 'sāv aitad-ātmyam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: ekaḥ eva advitīyaḥ sau aitadātmyam idam jagat

original: BhP_10.74.021/3 ātmanātmāśrayaḥ sabhyāḥ sṛjaty avati hanty ajaḥ
analyzed: ātmanā ātma āśrayaḥ sabhyāḥ sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.022/1 vividhānīha karmāṇi janayan yad-avekṣayā
analyzed: vividhāni iha karmāṇi janayan yad avekṣayā

original: BhP_10.74.022/3 īhate yad ayaṃ sarvaḥ śreyo dharmādi-lakṣaṇam
analyzed: īhate yat ayam sarvaḥ śreyaḥ dharma ādi lakṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.74.023/1 tasmāt kṛṣṇāya mahate dīyatāṃ paramārhaṇam
analyzed: tasmāt kṛṣṇāya mahate dīyatām parama arhaṇam

original: BhP_10.74.023/3 evaṃ cet sarva-bhūtānām ātmanaś cārhaṇaṃ bhavet
analyzed: evam ced sarva bhūtānām ātmanaḥ ca arhaṇam bhavet

original: BhP_10.74.024/1 sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtāya kṛṣṇāyānanya-darśine
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātma bhūtāya kṛṣṇāya an anya darśine

original: BhP_10.74.024/3 deyaṃ śāntāya pūrṇāya dattasyānantyam icchatā
analyzed: deyam śāntāya pūrṇāya dattasya ānantyam icchatā

original: BhP_10.74.025/1 ity uktvā sahadevo 'bhūt tūṣṇīṃ kṛṣṇānubhāva-vit
analyzed: iti uktvā sahadevaḥ bhūt tūṣṇīm kṛṣṇa anubhāva vid

original: BhP_10.74.025/3 tac chrutvā tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve sādhu sādhv iti sattamāḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve sādhu sādhu iti sattamāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.026/1 śrutvā dvijeritaṃ rājā jñātvā hārdaṃ sabhā-sadām
analyzed: śrutvā dvija īritam rājā jñātvā hārdam sabhāsadām

original: BhP_10.74.026/3 samarhayad dhṛṣīkeśaṃ prītaḥ praṇaya-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: samarhayat hṛṣīkeśam prītaḥ praṇaya vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.027/1 tat-pādāv avanijyāpaḥ śirasā loka-pāvanīḥ
analyzed: tad pādau avanijya apaḥ śirasā loka pāvanīḥ

original: BhP_10.74.027/3 sa-bhāryaḥ sānujāmātyaḥ sa-kuṭumbo vahan mudā
analyzed: sa bhāryaḥ sa anuja amātyaḥ sa kuṭumbaḥ vahan mudā

original: BhP_10.74.028/1 vāsobhiḥ pīta-kauṣeyair bhūṣaṇaiś ca mahā-dhanaiḥ
analyzed: vāsobhiḥ pīta kauṣeyaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca mahādhanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.74.028/3 arhayitvāśru-pūrṇākṣo nāśakat samavekṣitum
analyzed: arhayitvā aśru pūrṇa akṣaḥ na aśakat samavekṣitum

original: BhP_10.74.029/1 itthaṃ sabhājitaṃ vīkṣya sarve prāñjalayo janāḥ
analyzed: ittham sabhājitam vīkṣya sarve prāñjalayaḥ janāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.029/3 namo jayeti nemus taṃ nipetuḥ puṣpa-vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: namaḥ jaya iti nemuḥ tam nipetuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.030/1 itthaṃ niśamya damaghoṣa-sutaḥ sva-pīṭhād
analyzed: ittham niśamya damaghoṣa sutaḥ sva pīṭhāt

original: BhP_10.74.030/2 utthāya kṛṣṇa-guṇa-varṇana-jāta-manyuḥ
analyzed: utthāya kṛṣṇa guṇa varṇana jāta manyuḥ

original: BhP_10.74.030/3 utkṣipya bāhum idam āha sadasy amarṣī
analyzed: utkṣipya bāhum idam āha sadasi amarṣī

original: BhP_10.74.030/4 saṃśrāvayan bhagavate paruṣāṇy abhītaḥ
analyzed: saṃśrāvayan bhagavate paruṣāṇi abhītaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.031/1 īśo duratyayaḥ kāla iti satyavatī srutiḥ
analyzed: īśaḥ duratyayaḥ kālaḥ iti satyavatī srutiḥ

original: BhP_10.74.031/3 vṛddhānām api yad buddhir bāla-vākyair vibhidyate
analyzed: vṛddhānām api yat buddhiḥ bāla vākyaiḥ vibhidyate

original: BhP_10.74.032/1 yūyaṃ pātra-vidāṃ śreṣṭhā mā mandhvaṃ bāla-bhāṣītam
analyzed: yūyam pātra vidām śreṣṭhāḥ mā mandhvam

original: BhP_10.74.032/3 sadasas-patayaḥ sarve kṛṣṇo yat sammato 'rhaṇe
analyzed: sadasaspatayaḥ sarve kṛṣṇaḥ yat sammataḥ rhaṇe

original: BhP_10.74.033/1 tapo-vidyā-vrata-dharān jñāna-vidhvasta-kalmaṣān
analyzed: tapaḥ vidyā vrata dharān jñāna vidhvasta kalmaṣān

original: BhP_10.74.033/3 paramaṛṣīn brahma-niṣṭhāṃl loka-pālaiś ca pūjitān
analyzed: parama ṛṣīn brahma niṣṭhān lokapālaiḥ ca pūjitān

original: BhP_10.74.034/1 sadas-patīn atikramya gopālaḥ kula-pāṃsanaḥ
analyzed: sadaspatīn atikramya gopālaḥ kula pāṃsanaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.034/3 yathā kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ saparyāṃ katham arhati
analyzed: yathā kākaḥ puroḍāśam saparyām katham arhati

original: BhP_10.74.035/1 varṇāśrama-kulāpetaḥ sarva-dharma-bahiṣ-kṛtaḥ
analyzed: varṇa āśrama kula apetaḥ sarva dharma bahiṣkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.035/3 svaira-vartī guṇair hīnaḥ saparyāṃ katham arhati
analyzed: svaira vartī guṇaiḥ hīnaḥ saparyām katham arhati

original: BhP_10.74.036/1 yayātinaiṣāṃ hi kulaṃ śaptaṃ sadbhir bahiṣ-kṛtam
analyzed: yayātinā eṣām hi kulam śaptam sadbhiḥ bahiṣkṛtam

original: BhP_10.74.036/3 vṛthā-pāna-rataṃ śaśvat saparyāṃ katham arhati
analyzed: vṛthā apāna ratam śaśvat saparyām katham arhati

original: BhP_10.74.037/1 brahmarṣi-sevitān deśān hitvaite 'brahma-varcasam
analyzed: brahmarṣi sevitān deśān hitvā ete brahmavarcasam

original: BhP_10.74.037/3 samudraṃ durgam āśritya bādhante dasyavaḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: samudram durgam āśritya bādhante dasyavaḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.038/1 evam-ādīny abhadrāṇi babhāṣe naṣṭa-maṅgalaḥ
analyzed: evamādīni abhadrāṇi babhāṣe naṣṭa maṅgalaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.038/3 novāca kiñcid bhagavān yathā siṃhaḥ śivā-rutam
analyzed: na uvāca kiñcid bhagavān yathā siṃhaḥ śivārutam

original: BhP_10.74.039/1 bhagavan-nindanaṃ śrutvā duḥsahaṃ tat sabhā-sadaḥ
analyzed: bhagavat nindanam śrutvā duḥsaham tat sabhāsadaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.039/3 karṇau pidhāya nirjagmuḥ śapantaś cedi-paṃ ruṣā
analyzed: karṇau pidhāya nirjagmuḥ śapantaḥ cedipam ruṣā

original: BhP_10.74.040/1 nindāṃ bhagavataḥ śṛṇvaṃs tat-parasya janasya vā
analyzed: nindām bhagavataḥ śṛṇvan tad parasya janasya vā

original: BhP_10.74.040/3 tato nāpaiti yaḥ so 'pi yāty adhaḥ sukṛtāc cyutaḥ
analyzed: tatas na apaiti yaḥ saḥ u pi yāti adhas sukṛtāt cyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.041/1 tataḥ pāṇḍu-sutāḥ kruddhā matsya-kaikaya-sṛñjayāḥ
analyzed: tatas pāṇḍu sutāḥ kruddhāḥ matsya kaikaya sṛñjayāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.041/3 udāyudhāḥ samuttasthuḥ śiśupāla-jighāṃsavaḥ
analyzed: udāyudhāḥ samuttasthuḥ śiśupāla jighāṃsavaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.042/1 tataś caidyas tv asambhrānto jagṛhe khaḍga-carmaṇī
analyzed: tatas caidyaḥ tu asambhrāntaḥ jagṛhe khaḍga carmaṇī

original: BhP_10.74.042/3 bhartsayan kṛṣṇa-pakṣīyān rājñaḥ sadasi bhārata
analyzed: bhartsayan kṛṣṇa pakṣīyān rājñaḥ sadasi bhārata

original: BhP_10.74.043/1 tāvad utthāya bhagavān svān nivārya svayaṃ ruṣā
analyzed: tāvat utthāya bhagavān svān nivārya svayam ruṣā

original: BhP_10.74.043/3 śiraḥ kṣurānta-cakreṇa jahāra patato ripoḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ kṣura anta cakreṇa jahāra patataḥ ripoḥ

original: BhP_10.74.044/1 śabdaḥ kolāhalo 'thāsīc chiśupāle hate mahān
analyzed: śabdaḥ kolāhalaḥ śiśupāle hate mahān

original: BhP_10.74.044/3 tasyānuyāyino bhūpā dudruvur jīvitaiṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tasya anuyāyinaḥ bhūpāḥ dudruvuḥ jīvita eṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.045/1 caidya-dehotthitaṃ jyotir vāsudevam upāviśat
analyzed: caidya deha utthitam jyotiḥ vāsudevam upāviśat

original: BhP_10.74.045/3 paśyatāṃ sarva-bhūtānām ulkeva bhuvi khāc cyutā
analyzed: paśyatām sarva bhūtānām ulkā iva bhuvi khāt cyutā

original: BhP_10.74.046/1 janma-trayānuguṇita- vaira-saṃrabdhayā dhiyā
analyzed: vaira saṃrabdhayā dhiyā

original: BhP_10.74.046/3 dhyāyaṃs tan-mayatāṃ yāto bhāvo hi bhava-kāraṇam
analyzed: dhyāyan tanmaya tām yātaḥ bhāvaḥ hi bhava kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.74.047/1 ṛtvigbhyaḥ sa-sadasyebhyo dakṣināṃ vipulām adāt
analyzed: ṛtvigbhyaḥ sasadasyebhyaḥ dakṣi nām vipulām adāt

original: BhP_10.74.047/3 sarvān sampūjya vidhi-vac cakre 'vabhṛtham eka-rāṭ
analyzed: sarvān sampūjya vidhivat cakre vabhṛtham ekarāj

original: BhP_10.74.048/1 sādhayitvā kratuḥ rājñaḥ kṛṣṇo yogeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: sādhayitvā kratuḥ rājñaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yoga īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.74.048/3 uvāsa katicin māsān suhṛdbhir abhiyācitaḥ
analyzed: uvāsa katicid māsān suhṛdbhiḥ abhiyācitaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.049/1 tato 'nujñāpya rājānam anicchantam apīśvaraḥ
analyzed: tatas nujñāpya rājānam an icchantam api īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.74.049/3 yayau sa-bhāryaḥ sāmātyaḥ sva-puraṃ devakī-sutaḥ
analyzed: yayau sa bhāryaḥ sa amātyaḥ sva puram devakī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.74.050/1 varṇitaṃ tad upākhyānaṃ mayā te bahu-vistaram
analyzed: varṇitam tat upākhyānam mayā te bahu vistaram

original: BhP_10.74.050/3 vaikuṇṭha-vāsinor janma vipra-śāpāt punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: vaikuṇṭha vāsinoḥ janma vipra śāpāt punar punar

original: BhP_10.74.051/1 rājasūyāvabhṛthyena snāto rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: rājasūya āvabhṛthyena snātaḥ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: BhP_10.74.051/3 brahma-kṣatra-sabhā-madhye śuśubhe sura-rāḍ iva
analyzed: brahma kṣatra sabhā madhye śuśubhe surarāj iva

original: BhP_10.74.052/1 rājñā sabhājitāḥ sarve sura-mānava-khecarāḥ
analyzed: rājñā sabhājitāḥ sarve sura mānava khecarāḥ

original: BhP_10.74.052/3 kṛṣṇaṃ kratuṃ ca śaṃsantaḥ sva-dhāmāni yayur mudā
analyzed: kṛṣṇam kratum ca śaṃsantaḥ sva dhāmāni yayuḥ mudā

original: BhP_10.74.053/1 duryodhanam ṛte pāpaṃ kaliṃ kuru-kulāmayam
analyzed: duryodhanam ṛte pāpam kalim kuru kula āmayam

original: BhP_10.74.053/3 yo na sehe śrīyaṃ sphītāṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍu-sutasya tām
analyzed: yaḥ na sehe śrīyam sphītām dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍu sutasya tām

original: BhP_10.74.054/1 ya idaṃ kīrtayed viṣṇoḥ karma caidya-vadhādikam
analyzed: yaḥ idam kīrtayet viṣṇoḥ karma caidya vadha ādikam

original: BhP_10.74.054/3 rāja-mokṣaṃ vitānaṃ ca sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: rāja mokṣam vitānam ca sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: BhP_10.75.001/0 śrī-rājovāca10750011 ajāta-śatros tam dṛṣṭvā rājasūya-mahodayam
analyzed: ajātaśatroḥ tam dṛṣṭvā rājasūya mahā udayam

original: BhP_10.75.001/3 sarve mumudire brahman nṛ-devā ye samāgatāḥ
analyzed: sarve mumudire brahman nṛdevāḥ ye samāgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.002/1 duryodhanaṃ varjayitvā rājānaḥ sarṣayaḥ surāḥ
analyzed: duryodhanam varjayitvā rājānaḥ sa ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.002/3 iti śrutaṃ no bhagavaṃs tatra kāraṇam ucyatām
analyzed: iti śrutam naḥ bhagavan tatra kāraṇam ucyatām

original: BhP_10.75.003/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.75.003/1 pitāmahasya te yajñe rājasūye mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: pitāmahasya te yajñe rājasūye mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.003/3 bāndhavāḥ paricaryāyāṃ tasyāsan prema-bandhanāḥ
analyzed: bāndhavāḥ paricaryāyām tasya āsan prema bandhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.004/1 bhīmo mahānasādhyakṣo dhanādhyakṣaḥ suyodhanaḥ
analyzed: bhīmaḥ mahānasa adhyakṣaḥ dhanādhyakṣaḥ suyodhanaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.004/3 sahadevas tu pūjāyāṃ nakulo dravya-sādhane
analyzed: sahadevaḥ tu pūjāyām nakulaḥ dravya sādhane

original: BhP_10.75.005/1 guru-śuśrūṣaṇe jiṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pādāvanejane
analyzed: guru śuśrūṣaṇe jiṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāda avanejane

original: BhP_10.75.005/3 pariveṣaṇe drupada-jā karṇo dāne mahā-manāḥ
analyzed: pariveṣaṇe drupada jā karṇaḥ dāne mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.006/1 yuyudhāno vikarṇaś ca hārdikyo vidurādayaḥ
analyzed: yuyudhānaḥ vikarṇaḥ ca hārdikyaḥ vidura ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.006/3 bāhlīka-putrā bhūry-ādyā ye ca santardanādayaḥ
analyzed: vāhlīka putrāḥ bhūri ādyāḥ ye ca santardana ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.007/1 nirūpitā mahā-yajñe nānā-karmasu te tadā
analyzed: nirūpitāḥ mahā yajñe nānā karmasu te tadā

original: BhP_10.75.007/3 pravartante sma rājendra rājñaḥ priya-cikīrṣavaḥ
analyzed: pravartante sma rāja indra rājñaḥ priya cikīrṣavaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.008/1 ṛtvik-sadasya-bahu-vitsu suhṛttameṣu
analyzed: ṛtvij sadasya bahuvitsu suhṛttameṣu

original: BhP_10.75.008/2 sv-iṣṭeṣu sūnṛta-samarhaṇa-dakṣiṇābhiḥ
analyzed: su iṣṭeṣu sūnṛta samarhaṇa dakṣiṇābhiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.008/3 caidye ca sātvata-pateś caraṇaṃ praviṣṭe
analyzed: caidye ca sātvata pateḥ caraṇam praviṣṭe

original: BhP_10.75.008/4 cakrus tatas tv avabhṛtha-snapanaṃ dyu-nadyām
analyzed: cakruḥ tatas tu avabhṛthasnapanam dyunadyām

original: BhP_10.75.009/1 mṛdaṅga-śaṅkha-paṇava- dhundhury-ānaka-gomukhāḥ
analyzed: mṛdaṅga śaṅkha paṇava dhundhurya ānaka gomukhāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.009/3 vāditrāṇi vicitrāṇi nedur āvabhṛthotsave
analyzed: vāditrāṇi vicitrāṇi neduḥ ā avabhṛtha utsave

original: BhP_10.75.010/1 nārtakyo nanṛtur hṛṣṭā gāyakā yūthaśo jaguḥ
analyzed: nārtakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ gāyakāḥ yūthaśas jaguḥ

original: BhP_10.75.010/3 vīṇā-veṇu-talonnādas teṣāṃ sa divam aspṛśat
analyzed: vīṇā veṇu tala unnādaḥ teṣām sa divam aspṛśat

original: BhP_10.75.011/1 citra-dhvaja-patākāgrair ibhendra-syandanārvabhiḥ
analyzed: citra dhvaja patākā agraiḥ ibha indrasyandana arvabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.011/3 sv-alaṅkṛtair bhaṭair bhūpā niryayū rukma-mālinaḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ bhūpāḥ niryayuḥ rukma mālinaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.012/1 yadu-sṛñjaya-kāmboja- kuru-kekaya-kośalāḥ
analyzed: yadu sṛñjaya kāmboja kuru kekaya kośalāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.012/3 kampayanto bhuvaṃ sainyair yayamāna-puraḥ-sarāḥ
analyzed: kampayantaḥ bhuvam sainyaiḥ yayamāna puraḥsarāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.013/1 sadasyartvig-dvija-śreṣṭhā brahma-ghoṣeṇa bhūyasā
analyzed: sadasya ṛtvij dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ brahmaghoṣeṇa bhūyasā

original: BhP_10.75.013/3 devarṣi-pitṛ-gandharvās tuṣṭuvuḥ puṣpa-varṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharvāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ puṣpa varṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.014/1 sv-alaṇkṛtā narā nāryo gandha-srag-bhūṣaṇāmbaraiḥ
analyzed: su alaṇkṛtāḥ narāḥ nāryaḥ gandha sraj bhūṣaṇa ambaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.014/3 vilimpantyo 'bhisiñcantyo vijahrur vividhai rasaiḥ
analyzed: vilimpantyaḥ bhisiñcantyaḥ vijahruḥ vividhaiḥ rasaiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.015/1 taila-gorasa-gandhoda- haridrā-sāndra-kuṅkumaiḥ
BhP_10.75.015/3 pumbhir liptāḥ pralimpantyo vijahrur vāra-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: pumbhiḥ liptāḥ pralimpantyaḥ vijahruḥ vāra yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.016/1 guptā nṛbhir niragamann upalabdhum etad
analyzed: guptāḥ nṛbhiḥ niragaman upalabdhum etat

original: BhP_10.75.016/2 devyo yathā divi vimāna-varair nṛ-devyo
analyzed: devyaḥ yathā divi vimāna varaiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.016/3 tā mātuleya-sakhibhiḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ mātuleya sakhibhiḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.016/4 sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-vikasad-vadanā virejuḥ
analyzed: sa vrīḍa hāsa vikasat vadanāḥ virejuḥ

original: BhP_10.75.017/1 tā devarān uta sakhīn siṣicur dṛtībhiḥ
analyzed: tāḥ devarān uta sakhīn siṣicuḥ dṛtībhiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.017/2 klinnāmbarā vivṛta-gātra-kucoru-madhyāḥ
analyzed: klinna ambarāḥ vivṛta gātra kuca ūru madhyāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.017/3 autsukya-mukta-kavarāc cyavamāna-mālyāḥ
analyzed: autsukyamuktakavarāt cyavamānamālyāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.017/4 kṣobhaṃ dadhur mala-dhiyāṃ rucirair vihāraiḥ
analyzed: kṣobham mala dhiyām ruciraiḥ vihāraiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.018/1 sa samrāḍ ratham āruḍhaḥ sad-aśvaṃ rukma-mālinam
analyzed: sa samrāj ratham āruḍhaḥ sat aśvam rukma mālinam

original: BhP_10.75.018/3 vyarocata sva-patnībhiḥ kriyābhiḥ kratu-rāḍ iva
analyzed: vyarocata sva patnībhiḥ kriyābhiḥ kratu rāj iva

original: BhP_10.75.019/1 patnī-samyājāvabhṛthyaiś caritvā te tam ṛtvijaḥ
analyzed: patnī samyāja āvabhṛthyaiḥ caritvā te tam ṛtvijaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.019/3 ācāntaṃ snāpayāṃ cakrur gaṅgāyāṃ saha kṛṣṇayā
analyzed: ācāntam cakruḥ gaṅgāyām saha kṛṣṇayā

original: BhP_10.75.020/1 deva-dundubhayo nedur nara-dundubhibhiḥ samam
analyzed: deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ nara dundubhibhiḥ samam

original: BhP_10.75.020/3 mumucuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi devarṣi-pitṛ-mānavāḥ
analyzed: mumucuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi deva ṛṣi pitṛ mānavāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.021/1 sasnus tatra tataḥ sarve varṇāśrama-yutā narāḥ
analyzed: sasnuḥ tatra tatas sarve varṇa āśrama yutāḥ narāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.021/3 mahā-pātaky api yataḥ sadyo mucyeta kilbiṣāt
BhP_10.75.022/1 atha rājāhate kṣaume paridhāya sv-alaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: atha rājā ahate kṣaume paridhāya su alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.022/3 ṛtvik-sadasya-viprādīn ānarcābharaṇāmbaraiḥ
analyzed: ṛtvij sadasya vipra ādīn ānarca ābharaṇa ambaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.023/1 bandhūñ jñātīn nṛpān mitra- suhṛdo 'nyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: bandhūm jñātīn nṛpān mitra suhṛdaḥ nyān ca sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.75.023/3 abhīkṣnaṃ pūjayām āsa nārāyaṇa-paro nṛpaḥ
analyzed: abhīkṣnam pūjayām āsa nārāyaṇa paraḥ nṛpaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.024/1 sarve janāḥ sura-ruco maṇi-kuṇḍala-srag-
analyzed: sarve janāḥ sura rucaḥ maṇi kuṇḍala sraj

original: BhP_10.75.024/2 uṣṇīṣa-kañcuka-dukūla-mahārghya-hārāḥ
analyzed: uṣṇīṣa kañcuka dukūla mahā arghya hārāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.024/3 nāryaś ca kuṇḍala-yugālaka-vṛnda-juṣṭa-
analyzed: nāryaḥ ca kuṇḍala yuga alaka vṛnda juṣṭa

original: BhP_10.75.024/4 vaktra-śriyaḥ kanaka-mekhalayā virejuḥ
analyzed: vaktra śriyaḥ kanaka mekhalayā virejuḥ

original: BhP_10.75.025/1 athartvijo mahā-śīlāḥ sadasyā brahma-vādinaḥ
analyzed: atha ṛtvijaḥ mahā śīlāḥ sadasyāḥ brahma vādinaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.025/3 brahma-kṣatriya-viṭ-śudrā- rājāno ye samāgatāḥ
analyzed: brahma kṣatriya viś śudrāḥ rājānaḥ ye samāgatāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.026/1 devarṣi-pitṛ-bhūtāni loka-pālāḥ sahānugāḥ
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni lokapālāḥ saha anugāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.026/3 pūjitās tam anujñāpya sva-dhāmāni yayur nṛpa
analyzed: pūjitāḥ tam anujñāpya sva dhāmāni yayuḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.75.027/1 hari-dāsasya rājarṣe rājasūya-mahodayam
BhP_10.75.027/3 naivātṛpyan praśaṃsantaḥ piban martyo 'mṛtaṃ yathā
analyzed: na eva atṛpyan praśaṃsantaḥ piban martyaḥ mṛtam yathā

original: BhP_10.75.028/1 tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā suhṛt-sambandhi-bāndhavān
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā suhṛd sambandhi bāndhavān

original: BhP_10.75.028/3 premṇā nivārayām āsa kṛṣṇaṃ ca tyāga-kātaraḥ
analyzed: premṇā nivārayām āsa kṛṣṇam ca tyāga kātaraḥ

original: BhP_10.75.029/1 bhagavān api tatrāṅga nyāvātsīt tat-priyaṃ-karaḥ
analyzed: bhagavān api tatra aṅga nyāvātsīt tad priyaṃkaraḥ

original: BhP_10.75.029/3 prasthāpya yadu-vīrāṃś ca sāmbādīṃś ca kuśasthalīm
analyzed: prasthāpya yadu vīrān ca sāmba ādīn ca kuśasthalīm

original: BhP_10.75.030/1 itthaṃ rājā dharma-suto manoratha-mahārṇavam
analyzed: ittham rājā dharmasutaḥ manoratha mahā arṇavam

original: BhP_10.75.030/3 su-dustaraṃ samuttīrya kṛṣṇenāsīd gata-jvaraḥ
analyzed: sudustaram samuttīrya kṛṣṇena āsīt gata jvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.75.031/1 ekadāntaḥ-pure tasya vīkṣya duryodhanaḥ śriyam
analyzed: ekadā antaḥpure tasya vīkṣya duryodhanaḥ śriyam

original: BhP_10.75.031/3 atapyad rājasūyasya mahitvaṃ cācyutātmanaḥ
analyzed: atapyat rājasūyasya mahi tvam ca acyuta ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.032/1 yasmiṃs narendra-ditijendra-surendra-lakṣmīr
analyzed: yasmin narendra ditija indra sura indra lakṣmīḥ

original: BhP_10.75.032/2 nānā vibhānti kila viśva-sṛjopakḷptāḥ
analyzed: nānā vibhānti kila viśvasṛjā upakḷptāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.032/3 tābhiḥ patīn drupada-rāja-sutopatasthe
analyzed: tābhiḥ patīn drupada rāja sutā upatasthe

original: BhP_10.75.032/4 yasyāṃ viṣakta-hṛdayaḥ kuru-rāḍ atapyat
analyzed: yasyām viṣakta hṛdayaḥ kururāj atapyat

original: BhP_10.75.033/1 yasmin tadā madhu-pater mahiṣī-sahasraṃ
analyzed: yasmin tadā madhupateḥ mahiṣī sahasram

original: BhP_10.75.033/2 śroṇī-bhareṇa śanakaiḥ kvaṇad-aṅghri-śobham
analyzed: śroṇī bhareṇa śanakais kvaṇat aṅghri śobham

original: BhP_10.75.033/3 madhye su-cāru kuca-kuṅkuma-śoṇa-hāraṃ
analyzed: madhye su cāru kuca kuṅkuma śoṇa hāram

original: BhP_10.75.033/4 śrīman-mukhaṃ pracala-kuṇḍala-kuntalāḍhyam
analyzed: śrīmat mukham pracala kuṇḍala kuntala āḍhyam

original: BhP_10.75.034/1 sabhāyāṃ maya-kḷptāyāṃ kvāpi dharma-suto 'dhirāṭ
analyzed: sabhāyām maya kḷptāyām kvāpi dharmasutaḥ dhirāj

original: BhP_10.75.034/3 vṛto 'nugair bandhubhiś ca kṛṣṇenāpi sva-cakṣuṣā
analyzed: vṛtaḥ nugaiḥ bandhubhiḥ ca kṛṣṇena api sva cakṣuṣā

original: BhP_10.75.035/1 āsīnaḥ kāñcane sākṣād āsane maghavān iva
analyzed: āsīnaḥ kāñcane sākṣāt āsane maghavān iva

original: BhP_10.75.035/3 pārameṣṭhya-śrīyā juṣṭaḥ stūyamānaś ca vandibhiḥ
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ stūyamānaḥ ca vandibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.75.036/1 tatra duryodhano mānī parīto bhrātṛbhir nṛpa
analyzed: tatra duryodhanaḥ mānī parītaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.75.036/3 kirīṭa-mālī nyaviśad asi-hastaḥ kṣipan ruṣā
analyzed: kirīṭamālī nyaviśat asi hastaḥ kṣipan ruṣā

original: BhP_10.75.037/1 sthale 'bhyagṛhṇād vastrāntaṃ jalaṃ matvā sthale 'patat
analyzed: sthale bhyagṛhṇāt vastra antam jalam matvā sthale patat

original: BhP_10.75.037/3 jale ca sthala-vad bhrāntyā maya-māyā-vimohitaḥ
analyzed: jale ca sthala vat bhrāntyā maya māyā vimohitaḥ

original: BhP_10.75.038/1 jahāsa bhīmas taṃ dṛṣṭvā striyo nṛpatayo pare
analyzed: jahāsa bhīmaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā striyaḥ pare

original: BhP_10.75.038/3 nivāryamāṇā apy aṅga rājñā kṛṣṇānumoditāḥ
analyzed: nivāryamāṇāḥ api aṅga rājñā kṛṣṇa anumoditāḥ

original: BhP_10.75.039/1 sa vrīḍito 'vag-vadano ruṣā jvalan niṣkramya tūṣṇīṃ prayayau gajāhvayam
analyzed: sa vrīḍitaḥ vak vadanaḥ ruṣā jvalan niṣkramya tūṣṇīm prayayau gajāhvayam

original: BhP_10.75.039/3 hā-heti śabdaḥ su-mahān abhūt satām ajāta-śatrur vimanā ivābhavat
analyzed: hāhā iti śabdaḥ su mahān abhūt satām ajātaśatruḥ vimanāḥ iva abhavat

original: BhP_10.75.039/5 babhūva tūṣṇīṃ bhagavān bhuvo bharaṃ samujjihīrṣur bhramati sma yad-dṛśā
analyzed: babhūva tūṣṇīm bhagavān bhuvaḥ bharam samujjihīrṣuḥ bhramati sma yad dṛśā

original: BhP_10.75.040/1 etat te 'bhihitaṃ rājan yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā
analyzed: etat te bhihitam rājan yat pṛṣṭaḥ ham iha tvayā

original: BhP_10.75.040/3 suyodhanasya daurātmyaṃ rājasūye mahā-kratau
analyzed: suyodhanasya daurātmyam rājasūye mahā kratau

original: BhP_10.76.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.76.001/1 athānyad api kṛṣṇasya śṛṇu karmādbhutaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: atha anyat api kṛṣṇasya śṛṇu karma adbhutam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.76.001/3 krīḍā-nara-śarīrasya yathā saubha-patir hataḥ
analyzed: krīḍā nara śarīrasya yathā saubha patiḥ hataḥ

original: BhP_10.76.002/1 śiśupāla-sakhaḥ śālvo rukmiṇy-udvāha āgataḥ
analyzed: śiśupāla sakhaḥ śālvaḥ rukmiṇī udvāhe āgataḥ

original: BhP_10.76.002/3 yadubhir nirjitaḥ saṅkhye jarāsandhādayas tathā
analyzed: yadubhiḥ nirjitaḥ saṅkhye jarāsandha ādayaḥ tathā

original: BhP_10.76.003/1 śālvaḥ pratijñām akaroc chṛṇvatāṃ sarva-bhūbhujām
analyzed: śālvaḥ pratijñām akarot śṛṇvatām sarva bhūbhujām

original: BhP_10.76.003/3 ayādavāṃ kṣmāṃ kariṣye pauruṣaṃ mama paśyata
analyzed: a yādavām kṣmām kariṣye pauruṣam mama paśyata

original: BhP_10.76.004/1 iti mūḍhaḥ pratijñāya devaṃ paśu-patiṃ prabhum
analyzed: iti mūḍhaḥ pratijñāya devam paśupatim prabhum

original: BhP_10.76.004/3 ārādhayām āsa nṛpaḥ pāṃśu-muṣṭiṃ sakṛd grasan
analyzed: ārādhayām āsa nṛpaḥ pāṃśu muṣṭim sakṛt grasan

original: BhP_10.76.005/1 saṃvatsarānte bhagavān āśu-toṣa umā-patiḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsara ante bhagavān āśutoṣaḥ umāpatiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.005/3 vareṇa cchandayām āsa śālvaṃ śaraṇam āgatam
analyzed: vareṇa chandayām āsa śālvam śaraṇam āgatam

original: BhP_10.76.006/1 devāsura-manuṣyāṇāṃ gandharvoraga-rakṣasām
analyzed: deva asura manuṣyāṇām gandharva uraga rakṣasām

original: BhP_10.76.006/3 abhedyaṃ kāma-gaṃ vavre sa yānaṃ vṛṣṇi-bhīṣaṇam
analyzed: abhedyam kāma gam vavre sa yānam vṛṣṇi bhīṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.76.007/1 tatheti giriśādiṣṭo mayaḥ para-puraṃ-jayaḥ
analyzed: tathā iti giriśa ādiṣṭaḥ mayaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.007/3 puraṃ nirmāya śālvāya prādāt saubham ayas-mayam
analyzed: puram nirmāya śālvāya prādāt saubham ayasmayam

original: BhP_10.76.008/1 sa labdhvā kāma-gaṃ yānaṃ tamo-dhāma durāsadam
analyzed: sa labdhvā kāma gam yānam tamaḥ dhāma durāsadam

original: BhP_10.76.008/3 yayas dvāravatīṃ śālvo vairaṃ vṛṣṇi-kṛtaṃ smaran
analyzed: yayaḥ dvāravatīm śālvaḥ vairam vṛṣṇi kṛtam smaran

original: BhP_10.76.009/1 nirudhya senayā śālvo mahatyā bharatarṣabha
analyzed: nirudhya senayā śālvaḥ mahatyā bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.76.009/3 purīṃ babhañjopavanān udyānāni ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: purīm babhañja upavanān udyānāni ca sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.76.010/1 sa-gopurāṇi dvārāṇi prāsādāṭṭāla-tolikāḥ
analyzed: sa gopurāṇi dvārāṇi prāsāda aṭṭāla tolikāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.010/3 vihārān sa vimānāgryān nipetuḥ śastra-vṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: vihārān sa vimāna agryān nipetuḥ śastra vṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.011/1 śilā-drumāś cāśanayaḥ sarpā āsāra-śarkarāḥ
analyzed: śilā drumāḥ ca aśanayaḥ sarpāḥ āsāra śarkarāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.011/3 pracaṇḍaś cakravāto 'bhūd rajasācchāditā diśaḥ
analyzed: pracaṇḍaḥ cakra vātaḥ bhūt rajasā ācchāditāḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.012/1 ity ardyamānā saubhena kṛṣṇasya nagarī bhṛśam
analyzed: iti ardyamānā saubhena kṛṣṇasya nagarī bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.76.012/3 nābhyapadyata śaṃ rājaṃs tri-pureṇa yathā mahī
analyzed: na abhyapadyata śam rājan tripureṇa yathā mahī

original: BhP_10.76.013/1 pradyumno bhagavān vīkṣya bādhyamānā nijāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ bhagavān vīkṣya bādhyamānāḥ nijāḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.013/3 ma bhaiṣṭety abhyadhād vīro rathārūḍho mahā-yaśāḥ
analyzed: ma bhaiṣṭa iti abhyadhāt vīraḥ ratha ārūḍhaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.014/1 sātyakiś cārudeṣṇaś ca sāmbo 'krūraḥ sahānujaḥ
analyzed: sātyakiḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbo krūraḥ sahānujaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.014/3 hārdikyo bhānuvindaś ca gadaś ca śuka-sāraṇau
analyzed: hārdikyaḥ bhānuvindaḥ ca gadaḥ ca śuka sāraṇau

original: BhP_10.76.015/1 apare ca maheṣv-āsā ratha-yūthapa-yūthapāḥ
analyzed: apare ca mahā iṣvāsāḥ ratha yūthapa yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.015/3 niryayur daṃśitā guptā rathebhāśva-padātibhiḥ
analyzed: niryayuḥ daṃśitāḥ guptāḥ ratha ibha aśva padātibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.016/1 tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ śālvānāṃ yadubhiḥ saha
analyzed: tatas pravavṛte yuddham śālvānām yadubhiḥ saha

original: BhP_10.76.016/3 yathāsurāṇāṃ vibudhais tumulaṃ loma-harṣaṇam
analyzed: yathā asurāṇām vibudhaiḥ tumulam loma harṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.76.017/1 tāś ca saubha-pater māyā divyāstrai rukmiṇī-sutaḥ
analyzed: tāḥ ca saubha pateḥ māyāḥ divya astraiḥ rukmiṇī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.017/3 kṣaṇena nāśayām āsa naiśaṃ tama ivoṣṇa-guḥ
analyzed: kṣaṇena nāśayām āsa naiśam tamaḥ iva uṣṇaguḥ

original: BhP_10.76.018/1 vivyādha pañca-viṃśatyā svarṇa-puṅkhair ayo-mukhaiḥ
analyzed: vivyādha pañcaviṃśatyā svarṇa puṅkhaiḥ ayomukhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.018/3 śālvasya dhvajinī-pālaṃ śaraiḥ sannata-parvabhiḥ
analyzed: śālvasya dhvajinī pālam śaraiḥ sannata parvabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.019/1 śatenātāḍayac chālvam ekaikenāsya sainikān
analyzed: śatena atāḍayat śālvam ekaikena asya sainikān

original: BhP_10.76.019/3 daśabhir daśabhir netṝn vāhanāni tribhis tribhiḥ
analyzed: daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ netṝn vāhanāni tribhiḥ tribhiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.020/1 tad adbhutaṃ mahat karma pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat adbhutam mahat karma pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.020/3 dṛṣṭvā taṃ pūjayām āsuḥ sarve sva-para-sainikāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tam pūjayām āsuḥ sarve sva para sainikāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.021/1 bahu-rūpaika-rūpaṃ tad dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate
analyzed: bahu rūpa eka rūpam tat dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate

original: BhP_10.76.021/3 māyā-mayaṃ maya-kṛtaṃ durvibhāvyaṃ parair abhūt
analyzed: māyā mayam maya kṛtam durvibhāvyam paraiḥ abhūt

original: BhP_10.76.022/1 kvacid bhūmau kvacid vyomni giri-mūrdhni jale kvacit
analyzed: kvacid bhūmau kvacid vyomni giri mūrdhni jale kvacid

original: BhP_10.76.022/3 alāta-cakra-vad bhrāmyat saubhaṃ tad duravasthitam
analyzed: alāta cakra vat bhrāmyat saubham tat duravasthitam

original: BhP_10.76.023/1 yatra yatropalakṣyeta sa-saubhaḥ saha-sainikaḥ
analyzed: yatra yatra upalakṣyeta sa saubhaḥ saha sainikaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.023/3 śālvas tatas tato 'muñcañ charān sātvata-yūthapāḥ
analyzed: śālvaḥ tatas tatas muñcam śarān sātvata yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.024/1 śarair agny-arka-saṃsparśair āśī-viṣa-durāsadaiḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ agni arka saṃsparśaiḥ āśīviṣa durāsadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.024/3 pīḍyamāna-purānīkaḥ śālvo 'muhyat pareritaiḥ
analyzed: pīḍyamāna pura anīkaḥ śālvaḥ muhyat para īritaiḥ

original: BhP_10.76.025/1 śālvānīkapa-śastraughair vṛṣṇi-vīrā bhṛśārditāḥ
analyzed: śālva anīkapa śastra oghaiḥ vṛṣṇi vīrāḥ bhṛśa arditāḥ

original: BhP_10.76.025/3 na tatyajū raṇaṃ svaṃ svaṃ loka-dvaya-jigīṣavaḥ
analyzed: na tatyajuḥ raṇam svam svam loka dvaya jigīṣavaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.026/1 śālvāmātyo dyumān nāma pradyumnaṃ prak prapīḍitaḥ
analyzed: śālva amātyaḥ dyumān nāma pradyumnam prak prapīḍitaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.026/3 āsādya gadayā maurvyā vyāhatya vyanadad balī
analyzed: āsādya gadayā maurvyā vyāhatya vyanadat balī

original: BhP_10.76.027/1 pradyumnaṃ gadayā sīrṇa- vakṣaḥ-sthalam ariṃ-damam
analyzed: pradyumnam gadayā sīrṇa vakṣaḥ sthalam ariṃdamam

original: BhP_10.76.027/3 apovāha raṇāt sūto dharma-vid dārukātmajaḥ
analyzed: apovāha raṇāt sūtaḥ dharma vid dāruka ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.028/1 labdha-samjño muhūrtena kārṣṇiḥ sārathim abravīt
