analyzed: labdha samjñaḥ muhūrtena kārṣṇiḥ sārathim abravīt

original: BhP_10.76.028/3 aho asādhv idaṃ sūta yad raṇān me 'pasarpaṇam
analyzed: aho asādhu idam sūta yat raṇāt me pasarpaṇam

original: BhP_10.76.029/1 na yadūnāṃ kule jātaḥ śrūyate raṇa-vicyutaḥ
analyzed: na yadūnām kule jātaḥ śrūyate raṇa vicyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.029/3 vinā mat klība-cittena sūtena prāpta-kilbiṣāt
analyzed: vinā mat klība cittena sūtena prāpta kilbiṣāt

original: BhP_10.76.030/1 kiṃ nu vakṣye 'bhisaṅgamya pitarau rāma-keśavau
analyzed: kim nu vakṣye bhisaṅgamya pitarau rāma keśavau

original: BhP_10.76.030/3 yuddhāt samyag apakrāntaḥ pṛṣṭas tatrātmanaḥ kṣamam
analyzed: yuddhāt samyak apakrāntaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tatra ātmanaḥ kṣamam

original: BhP_10.76.031/1 vyaktaṃ me kathayiṣyanti hasantyo bhrātṛ-jāmayaḥ
analyzed: vyaktam me kathayiṣyanti hasantyaḥ bhrātṛ jāmayaḥ

original: BhP_10.76.031/3 klaibyaṃ kathaṃ kathaṃ vīra tavānyaiḥ kathyatāṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: klaibyam katham katham vīra tava anyaiḥ kathyatām mṛdhe

original: BhP_10.76.032/0 sārathir uvāca
analyzed: sārathiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.76.032/1 dharmaṃ vijānatāyuṣman kṛtam etan mayā vibho
analyzed: dharmam vijānatā āyuṣman kṛtam etat mayā vibho

original: BhP_10.76.032/3 sūtaḥ kṛcchra-gataṃ rakṣed rathinaṃ sārathiṃ rathī
analyzed: sūtaḥ kṛcchra gatam rakṣet rathinam sārathim rathī

original: BhP_10.76.033/1 etad viditvā tu bhavān mayāpovāhito raṇāt
analyzed: etat viditvā tu bhavān mayā apovāhitaḥ raṇāt

original: BhP_10.76.033/3 upasṛṣṭaḥ pareṇeti mūrcchito gadayā hataḥ
analyzed: upasṛṣṭaḥ pareṇa iti mūrcchitaḥ gadayā hataḥ

original: BhP_10.77.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.77.001/1 sa upaspṛśya salilaṃ daṃśito dhṛta-kārmukaḥ
analyzed: saḥ upaspṛśya salilam daṃśitaḥ dhṛta kārmukaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.001/3 naya māṃ dyumataḥ pārśvaṃ vīrasyety āha sārathim
analyzed: naya mām dyumataḥ pārśvam vīrasya iti āha sārathim

original: BhP_10.77.002/1 vidhamantaṃ sva-sainyāni dyumantaṃ rukmiṇī-sutaḥ
analyzed: vidhamantam sva sainyāni dyumantam rukmiṇī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.002/3 pratihatya pratyavidhyān nārācair aṣṭabhiḥ smayan
analyzed: pratihatya pratyavidhyāt nārācaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ smayan

original: BhP_10.77.003/1 caturbhiś caturo vāhān sūtam ekena cāhanat
analyzed: caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān sūtam ekena ca ahanat

original: BhP_10.77.003/3 dvābhyaṃ dhanuś ca ketuṃ ca śareṇānyena vai śiraḥ
analyzed: dvābhyam dhanuḥ ca ketum ca śareṇa anyena vai śiraḥ

original: BhP_10.77.004/1 gada-sātyaki-sāmbādyā jaghnuḥ saubha-pater balam
analyzed: gada sātyaki sāmba ādyāḥ jaghnuḥ saubha pateḥ balam

original: BhP_10.77.004/3 petuḥ samudre saubheyāḥ sarve sañchinna-kandharāḥ
analyzed: petuḥ samudre saubheyāḥ sarve sañchinna kandharāḥ

original: BhP_10.77.005/1 evaṃ yadūnāṃ śālvānāṃ nighnatām itaretaram
analyzed: evam yadūnām śālvānām nighnatām itaretaram

original: BhP_10.77.005/3 yuddhaṃ tri-nava-rātraṃ tad abhūt tumulam ulbaṇam
analyzed: yuddham tri nava rātram tat abhūt tumulam ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.77.006/1 indraprasthaṃ gataḥ kṛṣṇa āhūto dharma-sūnunā
analyzed: indraprastham gataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ āhūtaḥ dharmasūnunā

original: BhP_10.77.006/3 rājasūye 'tha nivṛtte śiśupāle ca saṃsthite
analyzed: rājasūye tha nivṛtte śiśupāle ca saṃsthite

original: BhP_10.77.007/1 kuru-vṛddhān anujñāpya munīṃś ca sa-sutāṃ pṛthām
analyzed: kuru vṛddhān anujñāpya munīn ca sa sutām pṛthām

original: BhP_10.77.007/3 nimittāny ati-ghorāṇi paśyan dvāravatīṃ yayau
analyzed: nimittāni ati ghorāṇi paśyan dvāravatīm yayau

original: BhP_10.77.008/1 āha cāham ihāyāta ārya-miśrābhisaṅgataḥ
analyzed: āha ca aham iha āyātaḥ āryamiśra abhisaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_10.77.008/3 rājanyāś caidya-pakṣīyā nūnaṃ hanyuḥ purīṃ mama
analyzed: rājanyāḥ caidya pakṣīyāḥ nūnam hanyuḥ purīm mama

original: BhP_10.77.009/1 vīkṣya tat kadanaṃ svānāṃ nirūpya pura-rakṣaṇam
analyzed: vīkṣya tat kadanam svānām nirūpya pura rakṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.77.009/3 saubhaṃ ca śālva-rājaṃ ca dārukaṃ prāha keśavaḥ
analyzed: saubham ca śālva rājam ca dārukam prāha keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.010/1 rathaṃ prāpaya me sūta śālvasyāntikam āśu vai
analyzed: ratham prāpaya me sūta śālvasya antikam āśu vai

original: BhP_10.77.010/3 sambhramas te na kartavyo māyāvī saubha-rāḍ ayam
analyzed: sambhramaḥ te na kartavyaḥ māyāvī saubha rāj ayam

original: BhP_10.77.011/1 ity uktaś codayām āsa ratham āsthāya dārukaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ codayām āsa ratham āsthāya dārukaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.011/3 viśantaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarve sve pare cāruṇānujam
analyzed: viśantam dadṛśuḥ sarve sve pare ca aruṇānujam

original: BhP_10.77.012/1 śālvaś ca kṛṣṇam ālokya hata-prāya-baleśvaraḥ
analyzed: śālvaḥ ca kṛṣṇam ālokya hata prāya bala īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.77.012/3 prāharat kṛṣṇa-sūtaya śaktiṃ bhīma-ravāṃ mṛdhe
analyzed: prāharat kṛṣṇasūtaya śaktim bhīma ravām mṛdhe

original: BhP_10.77.013/1 tām āpatantīṃ nabhasi maholkām iva raṃhasā
analyzed: tām āpatantīm nabhasi mahā ulkām iva raṃhasā

original: BhP_10.77.013/3 bhāsayantīṃ diśaḥ śauriḥ sāyakaiḥ śatadhācchinat
analyzed: bhāsayantīm diśaḥ śauriḥ sāyakaiḥ śatadhā ācchinat

original: BhP_10.77.014/1 taṃ ca ṣoḍaśabhir viddhvā bānaiḥ saubhaṃ ca khe bhramat
analyzed: tam ca ṣoḍaśabhiḥ viddhvā bānaiḥ saubham ca khe bhramat

original: BhP_10.77.014/3 avidhyac chara-sandohaiḥ khaṃ sūrya iva raśmibhiḥ
analyzed: avidhyat śara sandohaiḥ kham sūryaḥ iva raśmibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.77.015/1 śālvaḥ śaures tu doḥ savyaṃ sa-śārṅgaṃ śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ
analyzed: śālvaḥ śaureḥ tu dos savyam sa śārṅgam śārṅgadhanvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.015/3 bibheda nyapatad dhastāc chārṅgam āsīt tad adbhutam
analyzed: bibheda nyapatat hastāt śārṅgam āsīt tat adbhutam

original: BhP_10.77.016/1 hāhā-kāro mahān āsīd bhūtānāṃ tatra paśyatām
analyzed: hāhākāraḥ mahān āsīt bhūtānām tatra paśyatām

original: BhP_10.77.016/3 ninadya saubha-rāḍ uccair idam āha janārdanam
analyzed: ninadya saubha rāj uccais idam āha janārdanam

original: BhP_10.77.017/1 yat tvayā mūḍha naḥ sakhyur bhrātur bhāryā hṛtekṣatām
analyzed: yat tvayā mūḍha naḥ sakhyuḥ bhrātuḥ bhāryā hṛtā īkṣatām

original: BhP_10.77.017/3 pramattaḥ sa sabhā-madhye tvayā vyāpāditaḥ sakhā
analyzed: pramattaḥ sa sabhā madhye tvayā vyāpāditaḥ sakhā

original: BhP_10.77.018/1 taṃ tvādya niśitair bāṇair aparājita-māninam
analyzed: tam tvā adya niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ aparājita māninam

original: BhP_10.77.018/3 nayāmy apunar-āvṛttiṃ yadi tiṣṭher mamāgrataḥ
analyzed: nayāmi apunarāvṛttim yadi tiṣṭheḥ mama agratas

original: BhP_10.77.019/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.77.019/1 vṛthā tvaṃ katthase manda na paśyasy antike 'ntakam
analyzed: vṛthā tvam katthase manda na paśyasi antike ntakam

original: BhP_10.77.019/3 paurusaṃ darśayanti sma śūrā na bahu-bhāṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: paurusam darśayanti sma śūrāḥ na bahu bhāṣiṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.020/1 ity uktvā bhagavāñ chālvaṃ gadayā bhīma-vegayā
analyzed: iti uktvā bhagavān śālvam gadayā bhīma vegayā

original: BhP_10.77.020/3 tatāḍa jatrau saṃrabdhaḥ sa cakampe vamann asṛk
analyzed: tatāḍa jatrau saṃrabdhaḥ sa cakampe vaman asṛj

original: BhP_10.77.021/1 gadāyāṃ sannivṛttāyāṃ śālvas tv antaradhīyata
analyzed: gadāyām sannivṛttāyām śālvaḥ tu antaradhīyata

original: BhP_10.77.021/3 tato muhūrta āgatya puruṣaḥ śirasācyutam
analyzed: tatas muhūrte āgatya puruṣaḥ śirasā acyutam

original: BhP_10.77.021/5 devakyā prahito 'smīti natvā prāha vaco rudan
analyzed: devakyā prahitaḥ smi iti natvā prāha vacaḥ rudan

original: BhP_10.77.022/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bāho pitā te pitṛ-vatsala
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā bāho pitā te pitṛ vatsala

original: BhP_10.77.022/3 baddhvāpanītaḥ śālvena saunikena yathā paśuḥ
analyzed: baddhvā apanītaḥ śālvena saunikena yathā paśuḥ

original: BhP_10.77.023/1 niśamya vipriyaṃ kṛṣṇo mānusīṃ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: niśamya vipriyam kṛṣṇaḥ mānusīm prakṛtim gataḥ

original: BhP_10.77.023/3 vimanasko ghṛṇī snehād babhāṣe prākṛto yathā
analyzed: vimanaskaḥ ghṛṇī snehāt babhāṣe prākṛtaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.77.024/1 kathaṃ rāmam asambhrāntaṃ jitvājeyaṃ surāsuraiḥ
analyzed: katham rāmam asambhrāntam jitvā ajeyam sura asuraiḥ

original: BhP_10.77.024/3 śālvenālpīyasā nītaḥ pitā me balavān vidhiḥ
analyzed: śālvena alpīyasā nītaḥ pitā me balavān vidhiḥ

original: BhP_10.77.025/1 iti bruvāṇe govinde saubha-rāṭ pratyupasthitaḥ
analyzed: iti bruvāṇe govinde saubha rāj pratyupasthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.025/3 vasudevam ivānīya kṛṣṇaṃ cedam uvāca saḥ
analyzed: vasudevam iva ānīya kṛṣṇam ca idam uvāca saḥ

original: BhP_10.77.026/1 eṣa te janitā tāto yad-artham iha jīvasi
analyzed: eṣa te janitā tātaḥ yad artham iha jīvasi

original: BhP_10.77.026/3 vadhiṣye vīkṣatas te 'mum īśaś cet pāhi bāliśa
analyzed: vadhiṣye vīkṣataḥ te mum īśaḥ ced pāhi bāliśa

original: BhP_10.77.027/1 evaṃ nirbhartsya māyāvī khaḍgenānakadundubheḥ
analyzed: evam nirbhartsya māyāvī khaḍgena ānakadundubheḥ

original: BhP_10.77.027/3 utkṛtya śira ādāya kha-sthaṃ saubhaṃ samāviśat
analyzed: utkṛtya śiraḥ ādāya kha stham saubham samāviśat

original: BhP_10.77.028/1 tato muhūrtaṃ prakṛtāv upaplutaḥ sva-bodha āste sva-janānuṣaṅgataḥ
analyzed: tatas muhūrtam prakṛtau upaplutaḥ sva bodhe āste sva jana anuṣaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_10.77.028/3 mahānubhāvas tad abudhyad āsurīṃ māyāṃ sa śālva-prasṛtāṃ mayoditām
analyzed: mahā anubhāvaḥ tat abudhyat āsurīm māyām sa śālva prasṛtām mayā uditām

original: BhP_10.77.029/1 na tatra dūtaṃ na pituḥ kalevaraṃ prabuddha ājau samapaśyad acyutaḥ
analyzed: na tatra dūtam na pituḥ kalevaram prabuddhaḥ ājau samapaśyat acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.029/3 svāpnaṃ yathā cāmbara-cāriṇaṃ ripuṃ saubha-stham ālokya nihantum udyataḥ
analyzed: svāpnam yathā ca ambara cāriṇam ripum saubha stham ālokya nihantum udyataḥ

original: BhP_10.77.030/1 evaṃ vadanti rājarṣe ṛṣayaḥ ke ca nānvitāḥ
analyzed: evam vadanti rājarṣe ṛṣayaḥ ke ca na anvitāḥ

original: BhP_10.77.030/3 yat sva-vāco virudhyeta nūnaṃ te na smaranty uta
analyzed: yat sva vācaḥ virudhyeta nūnam te na smaranti uta

original: BhP_10.77.031/1 kva śoka-mohau sneho vā bhayaṃ vā ye 'jña-sambhavāḥ
analyzed: kva śoka mohau snehaḥ vā bhayam vā ye jña sambhavāḥ

original: BhP_10.77.031/3 kva cākhaṇḍita-vijñāna- jñānaiśvaryas tv akhaṇḍitaḥ
analyzed: kva ca akhaṇḍita vijñāna jñāna aiśvaryaḥ tu akhaṇḍitaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.032/1 yat-pāda-sevorjitayātma-vidyayā hinvanty anādyātma-viparyaya-graham
analyzed: yad pāda sevā ūrjitayā ātma vidyayā hinvanti anādya ātma viparyaya graham

original: BhP_10.77.032/3 labhanta ātmīyam anantam aiśvaraṃ kuto nu mohaḥ paramasya sad-gateḥ
analyzed: labhante ātmīyam anantam aiśvaram kutas nu mohaḥ paramasya sat gateḥ

original: BhP_10.77.033/1 taṃ śastra-pūgaiḥ praharantam ojasā
analyzed: tam śastra pūgaiḥ praharantam ojasā

original: BhP_10.77.033/2 śālvaṃ śaraiḥ śaurir amogha-vikramaḥ
analyzed: śālvam śaraiḥ śauriḥ amogha vikramaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.033/3 viddhvācchinad varma dhanuḥ śiro-maṇiṃ
analyzed: viddhvā ācchinat varma dhanuḥ śiromaṇim

original: BhP_10.77.033/4 saubhaṃ ca śatror gadayā ruroja ha
analyzed: saubham ca śatroḥ gadayā ruroja ha

original: BhP_10.77.034/1 tat kṛṣṇa-hasteritayā vicūrṇitaṃ papāta toye gadayā sahasradhā
analyzed: tat kṛṣṇa hasta īritayā vicūrṇitam papāta toye gadayā sahasradhā

original: BhP_10.77.034/3 visṛjya tad bhū-talam āsthito gadām udyamya śālvo 'cyutam abhyagād drutam
analyzed: visṛjya tat bhū talam āsthitaḥ gadām udyamya śālvaḥ cyutam abhyagāt drutam

original: BhP_10.77.035/1 ādhāvataḥ sa-gadaṃ tasya bāhuṃ bhallena chittvātha rathāṅgam adbhutam
analyzed: ādhāvataḥ sa gadam tasya bāhum bhallena chittvā atha rathāṅgam adbhutam

original: BhP_10.77.035/3 vadhāya śālvasya layārka-sannibhaṃ bibhrad babhau sārka ivodayācalaḥ
analyzed: vadhāya śālvasya laya arka sannibham bibhrat babhau sa arkaḥ iva udayācalaḥ

original: BhP_10.77.036/1 jahāra tenaiva śiraḥ sa-kuṇḍalaṃ kirīṭa-yuktaṃ puru-māyino hariḥ
analyzed: jahāra tena eva śiraḥ sa kuṇḍalam kirīṭa yuktam puru māyinaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.77.036/3 vajreṇa vṛtrasya yathā purandaro babhūva hāheti vacas tadā nṛṇām
analyzed: vajreṇa vṛtrasya yathā purandaraḥ babhūva hāhā iti vacaḥ tadā nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.77.037/1 tasmin nipatite pāpe saubhe ca gadayā hate
analyzed: tasmin nipatite pāpe saubhe ca gadayā hate

original: BhP_10.77.037/3 nedur dundubhayo rājan divi deva-gaṇeritāḥ
analyzed: neduḥ dundubhayaḥ rājan divi deva gaṇa īritāḥ

original: BhP_10.77.037/5 sakhīnām apacitiṃ kurvan dantavakro ruṣābhyagāt
analyzed: sakhīnām apacitim kurvan dantavakraḥ ruṣā abhyagāt

original: BhP_10.78.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.78.001/1 śiśupālasya śālvasya pauṇḍrakasyāpi durmatiḥ
analyzed: śiśupālasya śālvasya pauṇḍrakasya api durmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.78.001/3 para-loka-gatānāṃ ca kurvan pārokṣya-sauhṛdam
analyzed: para loka gatānām ca kurvan pārokṣya sauhṛdam

original: BhP_10.78.002/1 ekaḥ padātiḥ saṅkruddho gadā-pāṇiḥ prakampayan
analyzed: ekaḥ padātiḥ saṅkruddhaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ prakampayan

original: BhP_10.78.002/3 padbhyām imāṃ mahā-rāja mahā-sattvo vyadṛśyata
analyzed: padbhyām imām mahā rāja mahā sattvaḥ vyadṛśyata

original: BhP_10.78.003/1 taṃ tathāyāntam ālokya gadām ādāya satvaraḥ
analyzed: tam tathā āyāntam ālokya gadām ādāya sa tvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.78.003/3 avaplutya rathāt kṛṣṇaḥ sindhuṃ veleva pratyadhāt
analyzed: avaplutya rathāt kṛṣṇaḥ sindhum velā iva pratyadhāt

original: BhP_10.78.004/1 gadām udyamya kārūṣo mukundaṃ prāha durmadaḥ
analyzed: gadām udyamya kārūṣaḥ mukundam prāha durmadaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.004/3 diṣṭyā diṣṭyā bhavān adya mama dṛṣṭi-pathaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā diṣṭyā bhavān adya mama dṛṣṭi patham gataḥ

original: BhP_10.78.005/1 tvaṃ mātuleyo naḥ kṛṣṇa mitra-dhruṅ māṃ jighāṃsasi
analyzed: tvam mātuleyaḥ naḥ kṛṣṇa mitra druh mām jighāṃsasi

original: BhP_10.78.005/3 atas tvāṃ gadayā manda haniṣye vajra-kalpayā
analyzed: atas tvām gadayā manda haniṣye vajra kalpayā

original: BhP_10.78.006/1 tarhy ānṛṇyam upaimy ajña mitrāṇāṃ mitra-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: tarhi ānṛṇyam upaimi ajña mitrāṇām mitra vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.006/3 bandhu-rūpam ariṃ hatvā vyādhiṃ deha-caraṃ yathā
analyzed: bandhu rūpam arim hatvā vyādhim deha caram yathā

original: BhP_10.78.007/1 evaṃ rūkṣais tudan vākyaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ totrair iva dvipam
analyzed: evam rūkṣaiḥ tudan vākyaiḥ kṛṣṇam totraiḥ iva dvipam

original: BhP_10.78.007/3 gadayātāḍayan mūrdhni siṃha-vad vyanadac ca saḥ
analyzed: gadayā atāḍayat mūrdhni siṃha vat vyanadat ca saḥ

original: BhP_10.78.008/1 gadayābhihato 'py ājau na cacāla yadūdvahaḥ
analyzed: gadayā abhihataḥ pi ājau na cacāla yadu udvahaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.008/3 kṛṣṇo 'pi tam ahan gurvyā kaumodakyā stanāntare
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ u pi tam ahan gurvyā kaumodakyā stanāntare

original: BhP_10.78.009/1 gadā-nirbhinna-hṛdaya udvaman rudhiraṃ mukhāt
analyzed: gadā nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ udvaman rudhiram mukhāt

original: BhP_10.78.009/3 prasārya keśa-bāhv-aṅghrīn dharaṇyāṃ nyapatad vyasuḥ
analyzed: prasārya keśa bāhu aṅghrīn dharaṇyām nyapatat vyasuḥ

original: BhP_10.78.010/1 tataḥ sūkṣmataraṃ jyotiḥ kṛṣṇam āviśad adbhutam
analyzed: tatas sūkṣmataram jyotiḥ kṛṣṇam āviśat adbhutam

original: BhP_10.78.010/3 paśyatāṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ yathā caidya-vadhe nṛpa
analyzed: paśyatām sarva bhūtānām yathā caidya vadhe nṛpa

original: BhP_10.78.011/1 vidūrathas tu tad-bhrātā bhrātṛ-śoka-pariplutaḥ
analyzed: vidūrathaḥ tu tad bhrātā bhrātṛ śoka pariplutaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.011/3 āgacchad asi-carmābhyām ucchvasaṃs taj-jighāṃsayā
analyzed: āgacchat asi carmābhyām ucchvasan tad jighāṃsayā

original: BhP_10.78.012/1 tasya cāpatataḥ kṛṣṇaś cakreṇa kṣura-neminā
analyzed: tasya ca āpatataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ cakreṇa kṣura neminā

original: BhP_10.78.012/3 śiro jahāra rājendra sa-kirīṭaṃ sa-kuṇḍalam
analyzed: śiraḥ jahāra rāja indra sa kirīṭam sa kuṇḍalam

original: BhP_10.78.013/1 evaṃ saubhaṃ ca śālvaṃ ca dantavakraṃ sahānujam
analyzed: evam saubham ca śālvam ca dantavakram sahānujam

original: BhP_10.78.013/3 hatvā durviṣahān anyair īḍitaḥ sura-mānavaiḥ
analyzed: hatvā durviṣahān anyaiḥ īḍitaḥ sura mānavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.78.014/1 munibhiḥ siddha-gandharvair vidyādhara-mahoragaiḥ
analyzed: munibhiḥ siddha gandharvaiḥ vidyādhara mahā uragaiḥ

original: BhP_10.78.014/3 apsarobhiḥ pitṛ-gaṇair yakṣaiḥ kinnara-cāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: apsarobhiḥ pitṛ gaṇaiḥ yakṣaiḥ kinnara cāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.78.015/1 upagīyamāna-vijayaḥ kusumair abhivarṣitaḥ
analyzed: upagīyamāna vijayaḥ kusumaiḥ abhivarṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.015/3 vṛtaś ca vṛṣṇi-pravarair viveśālaṅkṛtāṃ purīm
analyzed: vṛtaḥ ca vṛṣṇi pravaraiḥ viveśa alaṅkṛtām purīm

original: BhP_10.78.016/1 evaṃ yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo bhagavān jagad-īśvaraḥ
analyzed: evam yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān jagat īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.78.016/3 īyate paśu-dṛṣṭīnāṃ nirjito jayatīti saḥ
analyzed: īyate paśu dṛṣṭīnām nirjitaḥ jayati iti saḥ

original: BhP_10.78.017/1 śrutvā yuddhodyamaṃ rāmaḥ kurūṇāṃ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
analyzed: śrutvā yuddha udyamam rāmaḥ kurūṇām saha pāṇḍavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.78.017/3 tīrthābhiṣeka-vyājena madhya-sthaḥ prayayau kila
analyzed: tīrtha abhiṣeka vyājena madhyasthaḥ prayayau kila

original: BhP_10.78.018/1 snātvā prabhāse santarpya devarṣi-pitṛ-mānavān
analyzed: snātvā prabhāse santarpya deva ṛṣi pitṛ mānavān

original: BhP_10.78.018/3 sarasvatīṃ prati-srotaṃ yayau brāhmaṇa-saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: sarasvatīm pratisrotam yayau brāhmaṇa saṃvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.019/1 pṛthūdakaṃ bindu-saras tritakūpaṃ sudarśanam
analyzed: pṛthūdakam bindusaraḥ tritakūpam sudarśanam

original: BhP_10.78.019/3 viśālaṃ brahma-tīrthaṃ ca cakraṃ prācīṃ sarasvatīm
analyzed: viśālam brahmatīrtham ca cakram prācīm sarasvatīm

original: BhP_10.78.020/1 yamunām anu yāny eva gaṅgām anu ca bhārata
analyzed: yamunām anu yāni eva gaṅgām anu ca bhārata

original: BhP_10.78.020/3 jagāma naimiṣaṃ yatra ṛṣayaḥ satram āsate
analyzed: jagāma naimiṣam yatra ṛṣayaḥ satram āsate

original: BhP_10.78.021/1 tam āgatam abhipretya munayo dīrgha-satriṇaḥ
analyzed: tam āgatam abhipretya munayaḥ dīrgha satriṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.021/3 abhinandya yathā-nyāyaṃ praṇamyotthāya cārcayan
analyzed: abhinandya yathānyāyam praṇamya utthāya ca arcayan

original: BhP_10.78.022/1 so 'rcitaḥ sa-parīvāraḥ kṛtāsana-parigrahaḥ
analyzed: saḥ rcitaḥ sa parīvāraḥ kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.022/3 romaharṣaṇam āsīnaṃ maharṣeḥ śiṣyam aikṣata
analyzed: romaharṣaṇam āsīnam mahā ṛṣeḥ śiṣyam aikṣata

original: BhP_10.78.023/1 apratyutthāyinaṃ sūtam akṛta-prahvaṇāñjalim
analyzed: a pratyutthāyinam sūtam a kṛta prahvaṇa añjalim

original: BhP_10.78.023/3 adhyāsīnaṃ ca tān viprāṃś cukopodvīkṣya mādhavaḥ
analyzed: adhyāsīnam ca tān viprān cukopa udvīkṣya mādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.024/1 yasmād asāv imān viprān adhyāste pratiloma-jaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt asau imān viprān adhyāste pratiloma jaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.024/3 dharma-pālāṃs tathaivāsmān vadham arhati durmatiḥ
analyzed: dharma pālān tathā eva asmān vadham arhati durmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.78.025/1 ṛṣer bhagavato bhūtvā śiṣyo 'dhītya bahūni ca
analyzed: ṛṣeḥ bhagavataḥ bhūtvā śiṣyaḥ dhītya bahūni ca

original: BhP_10.78.025/3 setihāsa-purāṇāni dharma-śāstrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: sa itihāsa purāṇāni dharma śāstrāṇi sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.78.026/1 adāntasyāvinītasya vṛthā paṇḍita-māninaḥ
analyzed: adāntasya avinītasya vṛthā paṇḍita māninaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.026/3 na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasyevājitātmanaḥ
analyzed: na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasya iva ajita ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.027/1 etad-artho hi loke 'sminn avatāro mayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: etad arthaḥ hi loke smin avatāraḥ mayā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.027/3 vadhyā me dharma-dhvajinas te hi pātakino 'dhikāḥ
analyzed: vadhyāḥ me dharma dhvajinaḥ te hi pātakinaḥ dhikāḥ

original: BhP_10.78.028/1 etāvad uktvā bhagavān nivṛtto 'sad-vadhād api
analyzed: etāvat uktvā bhagavān nivṛttaḥ sat vadhāt api

original: BhP_10.78.028/3 bhāvitvāt taṃ kuśāgreṇa kara-sthenāhanat prabhuḥ
analyzed: bhāvi tvāt tam kuśa agreṇa kara sthena ahanat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.78.029/1 hāheti-vādinaḥ sarve munayaḥ khinna-mānasāḥ
analyzed: hāhā iti vādinaḥ sarve munayaḥ khinna mānasāḥ

original: BhP_10.78.029/3 ūcuḥ saṅkarṣaṇaṃ devam adharmas te kṛtaḥ prabho
analyzed: ūcuḥ saṅkarṣaṇam devam adharmaḥ te kṛtaḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.78.030/1 asya brahmāsanaṃ dattam asmābhir yadu-nandana
analyzed: asya brahmāsanam dattam asmābhiḥ yadu nandana

original: BhP_10.78.030/3 āyuś cātmāklamaṃ tāvad yāvat satraṃ samāpyate
analyzed: āyuḥ ca ātma aklamam tāvat yāvat satram samāpyate

original: BhP_10.78.031/1 ajānataivācaritas tvayā brahma-vadho yathā
analyzed: a jānatā eva ācaritaḥ tvayā brahma vadhaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.78.031/3 yogeśvarasya bhavato nāmnāyo 'pi niyāmakaḥ
analyzed: yogeśvarasya bhavataḥ nāmnā ayaḥ pi niyāmakaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.032/1 yady etad-brahma-hatyāyāḥ pāvanaṃ loka-pāvana
analyzed: yadi etat brahmahatyāyāḥ pāvanam loka pāvana

original: BhP_10.78.032/3 cariṣyati bhavāṃl loka- saṅgraho 'nanya-coditaḥ
analyzed: cariṣyati bhavān loka saṅgrahaḥ na anya coditaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.033/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.78.033/1 cariṣye vadha-nirveśaṃ lokānugraha-kāmyayā
analyzed: cariṣye vadha nirveśam loka anugraha kāmyayā

original: BhP_10.78.033/3 niyamaḥ prathame kalpe yāvān sa tu vidhīyatām
analyzed: niyamaḥ prathame kalpe yāvān sa tu vidhīyatām

original: BhP_10.78.034/1 dīrgham āyur bataitasya sattvam indriyam eva ca
analyzed: dīrgham āyuḥ bata etasya sattvam indriyam eva ca

original: BhP_10.78.034/3 āśāsitaṃ yat tad brūte sādhaye yoga-māyayā
analyzed: āśāsitam yat tat brūte sādhaye yoga māyayā

original: BhP_10.78.035/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.78.035/1 astrasya tava vīryasya mṛtyor asmākam eva ca
analyzed: astrasya tava vīryasya mṛtyoḥ asmākam eva ca

original: BhP_10.78.035/3 yathā bhaved vacaḥ satyaṃ tathā rāma vidhīyatām
analyzed: yathā bhavet vacaḥ satyam tathā rāma vidhīyatām

original: BhP_10.78.036/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.78.036/1 ātmā vai putra utpanna iti vedānuśāsanam
analyzed: ātmā vai putraḥ utpannaḥ iti veda anuśāsanam

original: BhP_10.78.036/3 tasmād asya bhaved vaktā āyur-indriya-sattva-vān
analyzed: tasmāt asya bhavet vaktā āyuḥ indriya sattvavān

original: BhP_10.78.037/1 kiṃ vaḥ kāmo muni-śreṣṭhā brūtāhaṃ karavāṇy atha
analyzed: kim vaḥ kāmaḥ muni śreṣṭhāḥ brūta aham karavāṇi atha

original: BhP_10.78.037/3 ajānatas tv apacitiṃ yathā me cintyatāṃ budhāḥ
analyzed: a jānataḥ tu apacitim yathā me cintyatām budhāḥ

original: BhP_10.78.038/0 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.78.038/1 ilvalasya suto ghoro balvalo nāma dānavaḥ
analyzed: ilvalasya sutaḥ ghoraḥ balvalaḥ nāma dānavaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.038/3 sa dūṣayati naḥ satram etya parvaṇi parvaṇi
analyzed: sa dūṣayati naḥ satram etya parvaṇi parvaṇi

original: BhP_10.78.039/1 taṃ pāpaṃ jahi dāśārha tan naḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṃ param
analyzed: tam pāpam jahi dāśārha tat naḥ śuśrūṣaṇam param

original: BhP_10.78.039/3 pūya-śoṇita-vin-mūtra- surā-māṃsābhivarṣiṇam
analyzed: pūya śoṇita vid mūtra surā māṃsa abhivarṣiṇam

original: BhP_10.78.040/1 tataś ca bhārataṃ varṣaṃ parītya su-samāhitaḥ
analyzed: tatas ca bhāratam varṣam parītya su samāhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.78.040/3 caritvā dvādaśa-māsāṃs tīrtha-snāyī viśudhyasi
analyzed: caritvā dvādaśa māsān tīrtha snāyī viśudhyasi

original: BhP_10.79.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.79.001/1 tataḥ parvaṇy upāvṛtte pracaṇḍaḥ pāṃśu-varṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas parvaṇi upāvṛtte pracaṇḍaḥ pāṃśu varṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.001/3 bhīmo vāyur abhūd rājan pūya-gandhas tu sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: bhīmaḥ vāyuḥ abhūt rājan pūya gandhaḥ tu sarvaśas

original: BhP_10.79.002/1 tato 'medhya-mayaṃ varṣaṃ balvalena vinirmitam
analyzed: tatas medhya mayam varṣam balvalena vinirmitam

original: BhP_10.79.002/3 abhavad yajña-śālāyāṃ so 'nvadṛśyata śūla-dhṛk
analyzed: abhavat yajña śālāyām saḥ nu adṛśyata śūladhṛk

original: BhP_10.79.003/1 taṃ vilokya bṛhat-kāyaṃ bhinnāñjana-cayopamam
analyzed: tam vilokya bṛhat kāyam bhinnāñjana caya upamam

original: BhP_10.79.003/3 tapta-tāmra-śikhā-śmaśruṃ daṃṣṭrogra-bhru-kuṭī-mukham
analyzed: tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśrum daṃṣṭra ugra bhrukuṭi mukham

original: BhP_10.79.004/1 sasmāra mūṣalaṃ rāmaḥ para-sainya-vidāraṇam
analyzed: sasmāra mūṣalam rāmaḥ para sainya vidāraṇam

original: BhP_10.79.004/3 halaṃ ca daitya-damanaṃ te tūrṇam upatasthatuḥ
analyzed: halam ca daityadamanam te tūrṇam upatasthatuḥ

original: BhP_10.79.005/1 tam ākṛṣya halāgreṇa balvalaṃ gagane-caram
analyzed: tam ākṛṣya hala agreṇa balvalam gaganecaram

original: BhP_10.79.005/3 mūṣalenāhanat kruddho mūrdhni brahma-druhaṃ balaḥ
analyzed: mūṣalena ahanat kruddhaḥ mūrdhni brahma druham balaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.006/1 so 'patad bhuvi nirbhinna- lalāṭo 'sṛk samutsṛjan
analyzed: saḥ patat bhuvi nirbhinna lalāṭaḥ sṛj samutsṛjan

original: BhP_10.79.006/3 muñcann ārta-svaraṃ śailo yathā vajra-hato 'ruṇaḥ
analyzed: muñcan ārta svaram śailaḥ yathā vajra hataḥ ruṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.007/1 saṃstutya munayo rāmaṃ prayujyāvitathāśiṣaḥ
analyzed: saṃstutya munayaḥ rāmam prayujya avitatha āśiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.007/3 abhyaṣiñcan mahā-bhāgā vṛtra-ghnaṃ vibudhā yathā
analyzed: abhyaṣiñcat mahābhāgāḥ vṛtra ghnam vibudhāḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.79.008/1 vaijayantīṃ dadur mālāṃ śrī-dhāmāmlāna-paṅkajāṃ
analyzed: vaijayantīm daduḥ mālām śrī dhāma a mlāna paṅkajām

original: BhP_10.79.008/3 rāmāya vāsasī divye divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
analyzed: rāmāya vāsasī divye divyāni ābharaṇāni ca

original: BhP_10.79.009/1 atha tair abhyanujñātaḥ kauśikīm etya brāhmaṇaiḥ
analyzed: atha taiḥ abhyanujñātaḥ kauśikīm etya brāhmaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.79.009/3 snātvā sarovaram agād yataḥ sarayūr āsravat
analyzed: snātvā sarovaram agāt yatas sarayūḥ āsravat

original: BhP_10.79.010/1 anu-srotena sarayūṃ prayāgam upagamya saḥ
analyzed: anusrotena sarayūm prayāgam upagamya saḥ

original: BhP_10.79.010/3 snātvā santarpya devādīn jagāma pulahāśramam
analyzed: snātvā santarpya deva ādīn jagāma pulaha āśramam

original: BhP_10.79.011/1 gomatīṃ gaṇḍakīṃ snātvā vipāśāṃ śoṇa āplutaḥ
analyzed: gomatīm gaṇḍakīm snātvā vipāśām śoṇaḥ āplutaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.011/3 gayāṃ gatvā pitṝn iṣṭvā gaṅgā-sāgara-saṅgame
analyzed: gayām gatvā pitṝn iṣṭvā gaṅgāsāgara saṅgame

original: BhP_10.79.012/1 upaspṛśya mahendrādrau rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvābhivādya ca
analyzed: upaspṛśya mahendra adrau rāmam dṛṣṭvā abhivādya ca

original: BhP_10.79.012/3 sapta-godāvarīṃ veṇāṃ pampāṃ bhīmarathīṃ tataḥ
analyzed: sapta godāvarīm veṇām pampām bhīmarathīm tatas

original: BhP_10.79.013/1 skandaṃ dṛṣṭvā yayau rāmaḥ śrī-śailaṃ giriśālayam
analyzed: skandam dṛṣṭvā yayau rāmaḥ śrīśailam giriśa ālayam

original: BhP_10.79.013/3 draviḍeṣu mahā-puṇyaṃ dṛṣṭvādriṃ veṅkaṭaṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: draviḍeṣu mahā puṇyam dṛṣṭvā adrim veṅkaṭam prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.79.014/1 kāma-koṣṇīṃ purīṃ kāñcīṃ kāverīṃ ca sarid-varām
analyzed: kāmakoṣṇīm purīm kāñcīm kāverīm ca sarit varām

original: BhP_10.79.014/3 śrī-rangākhyaṃ mahā-puṇyaṃ yatra sannihito hariḥ
analyzed: śrī ranga ākhyam mahā puṇyam yatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ

original: BhP_10.79.015/1 ṛṣabhādriṃ hareḥ kṣetraṃ dakṣiṇāṃ mathurāṃ tathā
analyzed: ṛṣabhādrim hareḥ kṣetram dakṣiṇām mathurām tathā

original: BhP_10.79.015/3 sāmudraṃ setum agamat mahā-pātaka-nāśanam
analyzed: sāmudram setum agamat mahāpātaka nāśanam

original: BhP_10.79.016/1 tatrāyutam adād dhenūr brāhmaṇebhyo halāyudhaḥ
analyzed: tatra ayutam adāt dhenūḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ halāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.016/3 kṛtamālāṃ tāmraparṇīṃ malayaṃ ca kulācalam
analyzed: kṛtamālām tāmraparṇīm malayam ca kula acalam

original: BhP_10.79.017/1 tatrāgastyaṃ samāsīnaṃ namaskṛtyābhivādya ca
analyzed: tatra agastyam samāsīnam namaskṛtya abhivādya ca

original: BhP_10.79.017/3 yojitas tena cāśīrbhir anujñāto gato 'rṇavam
analyzed: yojitaḥ tena ca āśīrbhiḥ anujñātaḥ gataḥ rṇavam

original: BhP_10.79.017/5 dakṣiṇaṃ tatra kanyākhyāṃ durgāṃ devīṃ dadarśa saḥ
analyzed: dakṣiṇam tatra kanyā ākhyām durgām devīm dadarśa saḥ

original: BhP_10.79.018/1 tataḥ phālgunam āsādya pañcāpsarasam uttamam
analyzed: tatas phālgunam āsādya pañca apsarasam uttamam

original: BhP_10.79.018/3 viṣṇuḥ sannihito yatra snātvāsparśad gavāyutam
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ sannihitaḥ yatra snātvā asparśat gavāyutam

original: BhP_10.79.019/1 tato 'bhivrajya bhagavān keralāṃs tu trigartakān
analyzed: tatas bhivrajya bhagavān keralān tu trigartakān

original: BhP_10.79.019/3 gokarṇākhyaṃ śiva-kṣetraṃ sānnidhyaṃ yatra dhūrjaṭeḥ
analyzed: gokarṇa ākhyam śiva kṣetram sānnidhyam yatra dhūrjaṭeḥ

original: BhP_10.79.020/1 āryāṃ dvaipāyanīṃ dṛṣṭvā śūrpārakam agād balaḥ
analyzed: āryām dvaipāyanīm dṛṣṭvā śūrpārakam agāt balaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.020/3 tāpīṃ payoṣṇīṃ nirvindhyām upaspṛśyātha daṇḍakam
analyzed: tāpīm payoṣṇīm nirvindhyām upaspṛśya atha daṇḍakam

original: BhP_10.79.021/1 praviśya revām agamad yatra māhiṣmatī purī
analyzed: praviśya revām agamat yatra māhiṣmatī purī

original: BhP_10.79.021/3 manu-tīrtham upaspṛśya prabhāsaṃ punar āgamat
analyzed: manutīrtham upaspṛśya prabhāsam punar āgamat

original: BhP_10.79.022/1 śrutvā dvijaiḥ kathyamānaṃ kuru-pāṇḍava-saṃyuge
analyzed: śrutvā dvijaiḥ kathyamānam kuru pāṇḍava saṃyuge

original: BhP_10.79.022/3 sarva-rājanya-nidhanaṃ bhāraṃ mene hṛtaṃ bhuvaḥ
analyzed: sarva rājanya nidhanam bhāram mene hṛtam bhuvaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.023/1 sa bhīma-duryodhanayor gadābhyāṃ yudhyator mṛdhe
analyzed: sa bhīma duryodhanayoḥ gadābhyām yudhyatoḥ mṛdhe

original: BhP_10.79.023/3 vārayiṣyan vinaśanaṃ jagāma yadu-nandanaḥ
analyzed: vārayiṣyan vinaśanam jagāma yadu nandanaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.024/1 yudhiṣṭhiras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā yamau kṛṣṇārjunāv api
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā yamau kṛṣṇa arjunau api

original: BhP_10.79.024/3 abhivādyābhavaṃs tuṣṇīṃ kiṃ vivakṣur ihāgataḥ
analyzed: abhivādya abhavan tuṣṇīm kim vivakṣuḥ iha āgataḥ

original: BhP_10.79.025/1 gadā-pāṇī ubhau dṛṣṭvā saṃrabdhau vijayaiṣiṇau
analyzed: gadā pāṇī ubhau dṛṣṭvā saṃrabdhau vijaya eṣiṇau

original: BhP_10.79.025/3 maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi carantāv idam abravīt
analyzed: maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi carantau idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.79.026/1 yuvāṃ tulya-balau vīrau he rājan he vṛkodara
analyzed: yuvām tulya balau vīrau he rājan he vṛkodara

original: BhP_10.79.026/3 ekaṃ prāṇādhikaṃ manye utaikaṃ śikṣayādhikam
analyzed: ekam prāṇa adhikam manye uta ekam śikṣayā adhikam

original: BhP_10.79.027/1 tasmād ekatarasyeha yuvayoḥ sama-vīryayoḥ
analyzed: tasmāt ekatarasya iha yuvayoḥ sama vīryayoḥ

original: BhP_10.79.027/3 na lakṣyate jayo 'nyo vā viramatv aphalo raṇaḥ
analyzed: na lakṣyate jayaḥ nyaḥ vā viramatu aphalaḥ raṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.028/1 na tad-vākyaṃ jagṛhatur baddha-vairau nṛpārthavat
analyzed: na tad vākyam jagṛhatuḥ baddha vairau nṛpa artha vat

original: BhP_10.79.028/3 anusmarantāv anyonyaṃ duruktaṃ duṣkṛtāni ca
analyzed: anusmarantau anyonyam duruktam duṣkṛtāni ca

original: BhP_10.79.029/1 diṣṭaṃ tad anumanvāno rāmo dvāravatīṃ yayau
analyzed: diṣṭam tat anumanvānaḥ rāmaḥ dvāravatīm yayau

original: BhP_10.79.029/3 ugrasenādibhiḥ prītair jñātibhiḥ samupāgataḥ
analyzed: ugrasena ādibhiḥ prītaiḥ jñātibhiḥ samupāgataḥ

original: BhP_10.79.030/1 taṃ punar naimiṣaṃ prāptam ṛṣayo 'yājayan mudā
analyzed: tam punar naimiṣam prāptam ṛṣayaḥ yājayan mudā

original: BhP_10.79.030/3 kratv-aṅgaṃ kratubhiḥ sarvair nivṛttākhila-vigraham
analyzed: kratu aṅgam kratubhiḥ sarvaiḥ nivṛtta akhila vigraham

original: BhP_10.79.031/1 tebhyo viśuddhaṃ vijñānaṃ bhagavān vyatarad vibhuḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ viśuddham vijñānam bhagavān vyatarat vibhuḥ

original: BhP_10.79.031/3 yenaivātmany ado viśvam ātmānaṃ viśva-gaṃ viduḥ
analyzed: yena eva ātmani adaḥ viśvam ātmānam viśva gam viduḥ

original: BhP_10.79.032/1 sva-patyāvabhṛtha-snāto jñāti-bandhu-suhṛd-vṛtaḥ
BhP_10.79.032/3 reje sva-jyotsnayevenduḥ su-vāsāḥ suṣṭhv alaṅkṛtaḥ
analyzed: reje sva jyotsnayā iva induḥ su vāsāḥ suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.033/1 īdṛg-vidhāny asaṅkhyāni balasya bala-śālinaḥ
analyzed: īdṛgvidhāni asaṅkhyāni balasya bala śālinaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.033/3 anantasyāprameyasya māyā-martyasya santi hi
analyzed: anantasya aprameyasya māyā martyasya santi hi

original: BhP_10.79.034/1 yo 'nusmareta rāmasya karmāṇy adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ nusmareta rāmasya karmāṇi adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.79.034/3 sāyaṃ prātar anantasya viṣṇoḥ sa dayito bhavet
analyzed: sāyam prātar anantasya viṣṇoḥ sa dayitaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_10.80.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.80.001/1 bhagavan yāni cānyāni mukundasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: bhagavan yāni ca anyāni mukundasya mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.001/3 vīryāṇy ananta-vīryasya śrotum icchāmi he prabho
analyzed: vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya śrotum icchāmi he prabho

original: BhP_10.80.002/1 ko nu śrutvāsakṛd brahmann uttamaḥśloka-sat-kathāḥ
analyzed: kaḥ nu śrutvā asakṛt brahman uttamaḥśloka sat kathāḥ

original: BhP_10.80.002/3 virameta viśeṣa-jño viṣaṇṇaḥ kāma-mārgaṇaiḥ
analyzed: virameta viśeṣa jñaḥ viṣaṇṇaḥ kāma mārgaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.80.003/1 sā vāg yayā tasya guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tat-karma-karau manaś ca
analyzed: sā vāc yayā tasya guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tad karma karau manaḥ ca

original: BhP_10.80.003/3 smared vasantaṃ sthira-jaṅgameṣu śṛṇoti tat-puṇya-kathāḥ sa karṇaḥ
analyzed: smaret vasantam sthira jaṅgameṣu śṛṇoti tad puṇya kathāḥ sa karṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.004/1 śiras tu tasyobhaya-liṅgam ānamet tad eva yat paśyati tad dhi cakṣuḥ
analyzed: śiraḥ tu tasya ubhaya liṅgam ānamet tat eva yat paśyati tat hi cakṣuḥ

original: BhP_10.80.004/3 aṅgāni viṣṇor atha taj-janānāṃ pādodakaṃ yāni bhajanti nityam
analyzed: aṅgāni viṣṇoḥ atha tad janānām pāda udakam yāni bhajanti nityam

original: BhP_10.80.005/0 sūta uvāca
analyzed: sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.80.005/1 viṣṇu-rātena sampṛṣṭo bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ
analyzed: viṣṇurātena sampṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.80.005/3 vāsudeve bhagavati nimagna-hṛdayo 'bravīt
analyzed: vāsudeve bhagavati nimagna hṛdayaḥ bravīt

original: BhP_10.80.006/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.80.006/1 kṛṣṇasyāsīt sakhā kaścid brāhmaṇo brahma-vittamaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya āsīt sakhā kaścid brāhmaṇaḥ brahma vittamaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.006/3 virakta indriyārtheṣu praśāntātmā jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: viraktaḥ indriya artheṣu praśānta ātmā jita indriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.007/1 yadṛcchayopapannena vartamāno gṛhāśramī
analyzed: yadṛcchayā upapannena vartamānaḥ gṛhāśramī

original: BhP_10.80.007/3 tasya bhāryā ku-cailasya kṣut-kṣāmā ca tathā-vidhā
analyzed: tasya bhāryā kucailasya kṣudh kṣāmā ca tathāvidhā

original: BhP_10.80.008/1 pati-vratā patiṃ prāha mlāyatā vadanena sā
analyzed: pativratā patim prāha mlāyatā vadanena sā

original: BhP_10.80.008/3 daridraṃ sīdamānā vai vepamānābhigamya ca
analyzed: daridram sīdamānā vai vepamānā abhigamya ca

original: BhP_10.80.009/1 nanu brahman bhagavataḥ sakhā sākṣāc chriyaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: nanu brahman bhagavataḥ sakhā sākṣāt śriyaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_10.80.009/3 brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca bhagavān sātvatarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ ca śaraṇyaḥ ca bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.010/1 tam upaihi mahā-bhāga sādhūnāṃ ca parāyaṇam
analyzed: tam upaihi mahābhāga sādhūnām ca parāyaṇam

original: BhP_10.80.010/3 dāsyati draviṇaṃ bhūri sīdate te kuṭumbine
analyzed: dāsyati draviṇam bhūri sīdate te kuṭumbine

original: BhP_10.80.011/1 āste 'dhunā dvāravatyāṃ bhoja-vṛṣṇy-andhakeśvaraḥ
analyzed: āste dhunā dvāravatyām bhoja vṛṣṇi andhaka īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.80.011/3 smarataḥ pāda-kamalam ātmānam api yacchati
analyzed: smarataḥ pāda kamalam ātmānam api yacchati

original: BhP_10.80.011/5 kiṃ nv artha-kāmān bhajato nāty-abhīṣṭān jagad-guruḥ
analyzed: kim nu artha kāmān bhajataḥ na ati abhīṣṭān jagadguruḥ

original: BhP_10.80.012/1 sa evaṃ bhāryayā vipro bahuśaḥ prārthito muhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ evam bhāryayā vipraḥ bahuśas prārthitaḥ muhur

original: BhP_10.80.012/3 ayaṃ hi paramo lābha uttamaḥśloka-darśanam
analyzed: ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ uttamaḥśloka darśanam

original: BhP_10.80.013/1 iti sañcintya manasā gamanāya matiṃ dadhe
analyzed: iti sañcintya manasā gamanāya matim dadhe

original: BhP_10.80.013/3 apy asty upāyanaṃ kiñcid gṛhe kalyāṇi dīyatām
analyzed: api asti upāyanam kiñcid gṛhe kalyāṇi dīyatām

original: BhP_10.80.014/1 yācitvā caturo muṣṭīn viprān pṛthuka-taṇḍulān
analyzed: yācitvā caturaḥ muṣṭīn viprān pṛthuka taṇḍulān

original: BhP_10.80.014/3 caila-khaṇḍena tān baddhvā bhartre prādād upāyanam
analyzed: caila khaṇḍena tān baddhvā bhartre prādāt upāyanam

original: BhP_10.80.015/1 sa tān ādāya viprāgryaḥ prayayau dvārakāṃ kila
analyzed: sa tān ādāya vipra agryaḥ prayayau dvārakām kila

original: BhP_10.80.015/3 kṛṣṇa-sandarśanaṃ mahyaṃ kathaṃ syād iti cintayan
analyzed: kṛṣṇa sandarśanam mahyam katham syāt iti cintayan

original: BhP_10.80.016/1 trīṇi gulmāny atīyāya tisraḥ kakṣāś ca sa-dvijaḥ
analyzed: trīṇi gulmāni atīyāya tisraḥ kakṣāḥ ca sa dvijaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.016/3 vipro 'gamyāndhaka-vṛṣṇīnāṃ gṛheṣv acyuta-dharmiṇām
analyzed: vipraḥ gamya andhaka vṛṣṇīnām gṛheṣu acyuta dharmiṇām

original: BhP_10.80.017/1 gṛhaṃ dvy-aṣṭa-sahasrāṇāṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ harer dvijaḥ
analyzed: gṛham dvi aṣṭa sahasrāṇām mahiṣīṇām hareḥ dvijaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.017/3 viveśaikatamaṃ śrīmad brahmānandaṃ gato yathā
analyzed: viveśa ekatamam śrīmat brahma ānandam gataḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.80.018/1 taṃ vilokyācyuto dūrāt priyā-paryaṅkam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: tam vilokya acyutaḥ dūrāt priyā paryaṅkam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.018/3 sahasotthāya cābhyetya dorbhyāṃ paryagrahīn mudā
analyzed: sahasā utthāya ca abhyetya dorbhyām paryagrahīt mudā

original: BhP_10.80.019/1 sakhyuḥ priyasya viprarṣer aṅga-saṅgāti-nirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: sakhyuḥ priyasya viprarṣeḥ aṅgasaṅga ati nirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.019/3 prīto vyamuñcad ab-bindūn netrābhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: prītaḥ vyamuñcat ap bindūn netrābhyām puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.020/1 athopaveśya paryaṅke svayam sakhyuḥ samarhaṇam
analyzed: atha upaveśya paryaṅke svayam sakhyuḥ samarhaṇam

original: BhP_10.80.020/3 upahṛtyāvanijyāsya pādau pādāvanejanīḥ
analyzed: upahṛtya avanijya asya pādau pāda avanejanīḥ

original: BhP_10.80.021/1 agrahīc chirasā rājan bhagavāṃl loka-pāvanaḥ
analyzed: agrahīt śirasā rājan bhagavān loka pāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.021/3 vyalimpad divya-gandhena candanāguru-kuṅkamaiḥ
analyzed: vyalimpat divya gandhena candana aguru kuṅkamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.80.022/1 dhūpaiḥ surabhibhir mitraṃ pradīpāvalibhir mudā
analyzed: dhūpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ mitram pradīpa āvalibhiḥ mudā

original: BhP_10.80.022/3 arcitvāvedya tāmbūlaṃ gāṃ ca svāgatam abravīt
analyzed: arcitvā āvedya tāmbūlam gām ca svāgatam abravīt

original: BhP_10.80.023/1 ku-cailaṃ malinaṃ kṣāmaṃ dvijaṃ dhamani-santatam
BhP_10.80.023/3 devī paryacarat sākṣāc cāmara-vyajanena vai
analyzed: devī paryacarat sākṣāt cāmara vyajanena vai

original: BhP_10.80.024/1 antaḥ-pura-jano dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇenāmala-kīrtinā
analyzed: antaḥpura janaḥ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇena amala kīrtinā

original: BhP_10.80.024/3 vismito 'bhūd ati-prītyā avadhūtaṃ sabhājitam
analyzed: vismitaḥ bhūt ati prītyā avadhūtam sabhājitam

original: BhP_10.80.025/1 kim anena kṛtaṃ puṇyam avadhūtena bhikṣuṇā
analyzed: kim anena kṛtam puṇyam avadhūtena bhikṣuṇā

original: BhP_10.80.025/3 śriyā hīnena loke 'smin garhitenādhamena ca
analyzed: śriyā hīnena loke smin garhitena adhamena ca

original: BhP_10.80.026/1 yo 'sau tri-loka-guruṇā śrī-nivāsena sambhṛtaḥ
analyzed: sau triloka guruṇā śrīnivāsena sambhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.026/3 paryaṅka-sthāṃ śriyaṃ hitvā pariṣvakto 'gra-jo yathā
analyzed: paryaṅka sthām śriyam hitvā pariṣvaktaḥ grajaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.80.027/1 kathayāṃ cakratur gāthāḥ pūrvā guru-kule satoḥ
analyzed: cakratuḥ gāthāḥ pūrvāḥ guru kule satoḥ

original: BhP_10.80.027/3 ātmanor lalitā rājan karau gṛhya parasparam
analyzed: ātmanoḥ lalitā rājan karau gṛhya parasparam

original: BhP_10.80.028/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.80.028/1 api brahman guru-kulād bhavatā labdha-dakṣiṇāt
analyzed: api brahman guru kulāt bhavatā labdha dakṣiṇāt

original: BhP_10.80.028/3 samāvṛttena dharma-jña bhāryoḍhā sadṛśī na vā
analyzed: samāvṛttena dharma jña bhāryā ūḍhā sadṛśī na vā

original: BhP_10.80.029/1 prāyo gṛheṣu te cittam akāma-vihitaṃ tathā
analyzed: prāyas gṛheṣu te cittam a kāma vihitam tathā

original: BhP_10.80.029/3 naivāti-prīyase vidvan dhaneṣu viditaṃ hi me
analyzed: na eva ati prīyase vidvan dhaneṣu viditam hi me

original: BhP_10.80.030/1 kecit kurvanti karmāṇi kāmair ahata-cetasaḥ
analyzed: kecid kurvanti karmāṇi kāmaiḥ ahata cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.030/3 tyajantaḥ prakṛtīr daivīr yathāhaṃ loka-saṅgraham
analyzed: tyajantaḥ prakṛtīḥ daivīḥ yathā aham loka saṅgraham

original: BhP_10.80.031/1 kaccid guru-kule vāsaṃ brahman smarasi nau yataḥ
analyzed: kaccit guru kule vāsam brahman smarasi nau yatas

original: BhP_10.80.031/3 dvijo vijñāya vijñeyaṃ tamasaḥ pāram aśnute
analyzed: dvijaḥ vijñāya vijñeyam tamasaḥ pāram aśnute

original: BhP_10.80.032/1 sa vai sat-karmaṇāṃ sākṣād dvijāter iha sambhavaḥ
analyzed: sa vai sat karmaṇām sākṣāt dvijāteḥ iha sambhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.032/3 ādyo 'ṅga yatrāśramiṇāṃ yathāhaṃ jñāna-do guruḥ
analyzed: ādyaḥ ṅga yatra āśramiṇām yathā aham jñāna daḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_10.80.033/1 nanv artha-kovidā brahman varṇāśrama-vatām iha
analyzed: nanu artha kovidāḥ brahman varṇa āśramavatām iha

original: BhP_10.80.033/3 ye mayā guruṇā vācā taranty añjo bhavārṇavam
analyzed: ye mayā guruṇā vācā taranti añjas bhava arṇavam

original: BhP_10.80.034/1 nāham ijyā-prajātibhyāṃ tapasopaśamena vā
analyzed: na aham ijyā prajātibhyām tapasā upaśamena vā

original: BhP_10.80.034/3 tuṣyeyaṃ sarva-bhūtātmā guru-śuśrūṣayā yathā
analyzed: tuṣyeyam sarva bhūta ātmā guru śuśrūṣayā yathā

original: BhP_10.80.035/1 api naḥ smaryate brahman vṛttaṃ nivasatāṃ gurau
analyzed: api naḥ smaryate brahman vṛttam nivasatām gurau

original: BhP_10.80.035/3 guru-dāraiś coditānām indhanānayane kvacit
analyzed: guru dāraiḥ coditānām indhana ānayane kvacid

original: BhP_10.80.036/1 praviṣṭānāṃ mahāraṇyam apartau su-mahad dvija
analyzed: praviṣṭānām mahā araṇyam apartau su mahat dvija

original: BhP_10.80.036/3 vāta-varṣam abhūt tīvraṃ niṣṭhurāḥ stanayitnavaḥ
analyzed: vāta varṣam abhūt tīvram niṣṭhurāḥ stanayitnavaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.037/1 sūryaś cāstaṃ gatas tāvat tamasā cāvṛtā diśaḥ
analyzed: sūryaḥ ca astam gataḥ tāvat tamasā ca āvṛtāḥ diśaḥ

original: BhP_10.80.037/3 nimnaṃ kūlaṃ jala-mayaṃ na prājñāyata kiñcana
analyzed: nimnam kūlam jala mayam na prājñāyata kiñcana

original: BhP_10.80.038/1 vayaṃ bhṛśam tatra mahānilāmbubhir nihanyamānā mahur ambu-samplave
analyzed: vayam bhṛśam tatra mahā anila ambubhiḥ nihanyamānāḥ ambu samplave

original: BhP_10.80.038/3 diśo 'vidanto 'tha parasparaṃ vane gṛhīta-hastāḥ paribabhrimāturāḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ tha parasparam vane gṛhīta hastāḥ paribabhrima āturāḥ

original: BhP_10.80.039/1 etad viditvā udite ravau sāndīpanir guruḥ
analyzed: etat viditvā udite ravau sāndīpaniḥ guruḥ

original: BhP_10.80.039/3 anveṣamāṇo naḥ śiṣyān ācāryo 'paśyad āturān
analyzed: anveṣamāṇaḥ naḥ śiṣyān ācārya paśyat āturān

original: BhP_10.80.040/1 aho he putrakā yūyam asmad-arthe 'ti-duḥkhitāḥ
analyzed: aho he putrakāḥ yūyam asmad arthe ti duḥkhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.80.040/3 ātmā vai prāṇinām preṣṭhas tam anādṛtya mat-parāḥ
analyzed: ātmā vai prāṇinām preṣṭhaḥ tam an ādṛtya mad parāḥ

original: BhP_10.80.041/1 etad eva hi sac-chiṣyaiḥ kartavyaṃ guru-niṣkṛtam
analyzed: etat eva hi sat śiṣyaiḥ kartavyam guru niṣkṛtam

original: BhP_10.80.041/3 yad vai viśuddha-bhāvena sarvārthātmārpaṇaṃ gurau
analyzed: yat vai viśuddha bhāvena sarva artha ātma arpaṇam gurau

original: BhP_10.80.042/1 tuṣṭo 'haṃ bho dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ satyāḥ santu manorathāḥ
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ ham bho dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ satyāḥ santu manorathāḥ

original: BhP_10.80.042/3 chandāṃsy ayāta-yāmāni bhavantv iha paratra ca
analyzed: chandāṃsi ayātayāmāni bhavantu iha paratra ca

original: BhP_10.80.043/1 itthaṃ-vidhāny anekāni vasatāṃ guru-veśmani
analyzed: itthaṃvidhāni anekāni vasatām guru veśmani

original: BhP_10.80.043/3 guror anugraheṇaiva pumān pūrṇaḥ praśāntaye
analyzed: guroḥ anugraheṇa eva pumān pūrṇaḥ praśāntaye

original: BhP_10.80.044/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.80.044/1 kim asmābhir anirvṛttaṃ deva-deva jagad-guro
analyzed: kim asmābhiḥ anirvṛttam devadeva jagadguro

original: BhP_10.80.044/3 bhavatā satya-kāmena yeṣāṃ vāso guror abhūt
analyzed: bhavatā satya kāmena yeṣām vāsaḥ guroḥ abhūt

original: BhP_10.80.045/1 yasya cchando-mayaṃ brahma deha āvapanaṃ vibho
analyzed: yasya chandaḥ mayam brahma dehe āvapanam vibho

original: BhP_10.80.045/3 śreyasāṃ tasya guruṣu vāso 'tyanta-viḍambanam
analyzed: śreyasām tasya guruṣu vāso tyanta viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.81.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.81.001/1 sa itthaṃ dvija-mukhyena saha saṅkathayan hariḥ
analyzed: saḥ ittham dvijamukhyena saha saṅkathayan hariḥ

original: BhP_10.81.001/3 sarva-bhūta-mano-'bhijñaḥ smayamāna uvāca tam
analyzed: sarva bhūta manobhijñaḥ smayamānaḥ uvāca tam

original: BhP_10.81.002/1 brahmaṇyo brāhmaṇaṃ kṛṣṇo bhagavān prahasan priyam
analyzed: brahmaṇyaḥ brāhmaṇam kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān prahasan priyam

original: BhP_10.81.002/3 premṇā nirīkṣaṇenaiva prekṣan khalu satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: premṇā nirīkṣaṇena eva prekṣan khalu satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.81.003/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.81.003/1 kim upāyanam ānītaṃ brahman me bhavatā gṛhāt
analyzed: kim upāyanam ānītam brahman me bhavatā gṛhāt

original: BhP_10.81.003/3 aṇv apy upāhṛtaṃ bhaktaiḥ premṇā bhury eva me bhavet
analyzed: aṇu api upāhṛtam bhaktaiḥ premṇā bhurī eva me bhavet

original: BhP_10.81.003/5 bhūry apy abhaktopahṛtaṃ na me toṣāya kalpate
analyzed: bhūri api a bhakta upahṛtam na me toṣāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.81.004/1 patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
analyzed: patram puṣpam phalam toyam yaḥ me bhaktyā prayacchati

original: BhP_10.81.004/3 tad ahaṃ bhakty-upahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat aham bhakti upahṛtam aśnāmi prayata ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.005/1 ity ukto 'pi dviyas tasmai vrīḍitaḥ pataye śriyaḥ
analyzed: iti uktaḥ pi tasmai vrīḍitaḥ pataye śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.005/3 pṛthuka-prasṛtiṃ rājan na prāyacchad avāṅ-mukhaḥ
analyzed: pṛthuka prasṛtim rājan na prāyacchat avāṅmukhaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.006/1 sarva-bhūtātma-dṛk sākṣāt tasyāgamana-kāraṇam
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātma dṛś sākṣāt tasya āgamana kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.81.006/3 vijṅāyācintayan nāyaṃ śrī-kāmo mābhajat purā
analyzed: na ayam śrī kāmaḥ mā ābhajat purā

original: BhP_10.81.007/1 patnyāḥ pati-vratāyās tu sakhā priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: patnyāḥ pativratāyāḥ tu sakhā priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.81.007/3 prāpto mām asya dāsyāmi sampado 'martya-durlabhāḥ
analyzed: prāptaḥ mām asya dāsyāmi sampadaḥ martya durlabhāḥ

original: BhP_10.81.008/1 itthaṃ vicintya vasanāc cīra-baddhān dvi-janmanaḥ
analyzed: ittham vicintya vasanāt cīra baddhān dvijanmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.008/3 svayaṃ jahāra kim idam iti pṛthuka-taṇḍulān
analyzed: svayam jahāra kim idam iti pṛthuka taṇḍulān

original: BhP_10.81.009/1 nanv etad upanītaṃ me parama-prīṇanaṃ sakhe
analyzed: nanu etat upanītam me parama prīṇanam sakhe

original: BhP_10.81.009/3 tarpayanty aṅga māṃ viśvam ete pṛthuka-taṇḍulāḥ
analyzed: tarpayanti aṅga mām viśvam ete pṛthuka taṇḍulāḥ

original: BhP_10.81.010/1 iti muṣṭiṃ sakṛj jagdhvā dvitīyāṃ jagdhum ādade
analyzed: iti muṣṭim sakṛt jagdhvā dvitīyām jagdhum ādade

original: BhP_10.81.010/3 tāvac chrīr jagṛhe hastaṃ tat-parā parameṣṭhinaḥ
analyzed: tāvat śrīḥ jagṛhe hastam tad parā parameṣṭhinaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.011/1 etāvatālaṃ viśvātman sarva-sampat-samṛddhaye
analyzed: etāvatā alam viśvātman sarva sampad samṛddhaye

original: BhP_10.81.011/3 asmin loke 'tha vāmuṣmin puṃsas tvat-toṣa-kāraṇam
analyzed: asmin loke tha vā amuṣmin puṃsaḥ tvad toṣa kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.81.012/1 brāhmaṇas tāṃ tu rajanīm uṣitvācyuta-mandire
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ tām tu rajanīm uṣitvā acyuta mandire

original: BhP_10.81.012/3 bhuktvā pītvā sukhaṃ mene ātmānaṃ svar-gataṃ yathā
analyzed: bhuktvā pītvā sukham mene ātmānam svargatam yathā

original: BhP_10.81.013/1 śvo-bhūte viśva-bhāvena sva-sukhenābhivanditaḥ
analyzed: śvobhūte viśvabhāvena sva sukhena abhivanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.013/3 jagāma svālayaṃ tāta pathy anavrajya nanditaḥ
analyzed: jagāma sva ālayam tāta pathi an a vrajya nanditaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.014/1 sa cālabdhvā dhanaṃ kṛṣṇān na tu yācitavān svayam
analyzed: sa ca a labdhvā dhanam kṛṣṇāt na tu yācitavān svayam

original: BhP_10.81.014/3 sva-gṛhān vrīḍito 'gacchan mahad-darśana-nirvṛtaḥ
analyzed: sva gṛhān vrīḍitaḥ gacchan mahat darśana nirvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.015/1 aho brahmaṇya-devasya dṛṣṭā brahmaṇyatā mayā
analyzed: aho brahmaṇyadevasya dṛṣṭā brahmaṇya tā mayā

original: BhP_10.81.015/3 yad daridratamo lakṣmīm āśliṣṭo bibhratorasi
analyzed: yat daridratamaḥ lakṣmīm āśliṣṭaḥ bibhratā urasi

original: BhP_10.81.016/1 kvāhaṃ daridraḥ pāpīyān kva kṛṣṇaḥ śrī-niketanaḥ
analyzed: kva aham daridraḥ pāpīyān kva kṛṣṇaḥ śrīniketanaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.016/3 brahma-bandhur iti smāhaṃ bāhubhyāṃ parirambhitaḥ
analyzed: brahmabandhuḥ iti sma aham bāhubhyām parirambhitaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.017/1 nivāsitaḥ priyā-juṣṭe paryaṅke bhrātaro yathā
analyzed: nivāsitaḥ priyā juṣṭe paryaṅke bhrātaraḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.81.017/3 mahiṣyā vījitaḥ śrānto bāla-vyajana-hastayā
analyzed: mahiṣyā vījitaḥ śrāntaḥ bāla vyajana hastayā

original: BhP_10.81.018/1 śuśrūṣayā paramayā pāda-saṃvāhanādibhiḥ
analyzed: śuśrūṣayā paramayā pāda saṃvāhana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.81.018/3 pūjito deva-devena vipra-devena deva-vat
analyzed: pūjitaḥ devadevena vipradevena deva vat

original: BhP_10.81.019/1 svargāpavargayoḥ puṃsāṃ rasāyāṃ bhuvi sampadām
analyzed: svarga apavargayoḥ puṃsām rasāyām bhuvi sampadām

original: BhP_10.81.019/3 sarvāsām api siddhīnāṃ mūlaṃ tac-caraṇārcanam
analyzed: sarvāsām api siddhīnām mūlam tad caraṇa arcanam

original: BhP_10.81.020/1 adhano 'yaṃ dhanaṃ prāpya mādyann uccair na māṃ smaret
analyzed: adhanaḥ yam dhanam prāpya mādyan uccais na mām smaret

original: BhP_10.81.020/3 iti kāruṇiko nūnaṃ dhanaṃ me 'bhūri nādadāt
analyzed: iti kāruṇikaḥ nūnam dhanam me bhūri na adadāt

original: BhP_10.81.021/1 iti tac cintayann antaḥ prāpto niya-gṛhāntikam
analyzed: iti tat cintayan antar prāptaḥ niya gṛha antikam

original: BhP_10.81.021/3 sūryānalendu-saṅkāśair vimānaiḥ sarvato vṛtam
analyzed: sūrya anala indu saṅkāśaiḥ vimānaiḥ sarvatas vṛtam

original: BhP_10.81.022/1 vicitropavanodyānaiḥ kūjad-dvija-kulākulaiḥ
analyzed: vicitra upavana udyānaiḥ kūjat dvija kula ākulaiḥ

original: BhP_10.81.022/3 protphulla-kamudāmbhoja- kahlārotpala-vāribhiḥ
BhP_10.81.023/1 juṣṭaṃ sv-alaṅkṛtaiḥ pumbhiḥ strībhiś ca hariṇākṣibhiḥ
analyzed: juṣṭam su alaṅkṛtaiḥ pumbhiḥ strībhiḥ ca hariṇa akṣibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.81.023/3 kim idaṃ kasya vā sthānaṃ kathaṃ tad idam ity abhūt
analyzed: kim idam kasya vā sthānam katham tat idam iti abhūt

original: BhP_10.81.024/1 evaṃ mīmāṃsamānaṃ taṃ narā nāryo 'mara-prabhāḥ
analyzed: evam mīmāṃsamānam tam narāḥ nāryaḥ mara prabhāḥ

original: BhP_10.81.024/3 pratyagṛhṇan mahā-bhāgaṃ gīta-vādyena bhūyasā
analyzed: pratyagṛhṇan mahābhāgam gīta vādyena bhūyasā

original: BhP_10.81.025/1 patim āgatam ākarṇya patny uddharṣāti-sambhramā
analyzed: patim āgatam ākarṇya patnī uddharṣa ati sambhramā

original: BhP_10.81.025/3 niścakrāma gṛhāt tūrṇaṃ rūpiṇī śrīr ivālayāt
analyzed: niścakrāma gṛhāt tūrṇam rūpiṇī śrīḥ iva ālayāt

original: BhP_10.81.026/1 pati-vratā patiṃ dṛṣṭvā premotkaṇṭhāśru-locanā
analyzed: pativratā patim dṛṣṭvā prema utkaṇṭhā aśru locanā

original: BhP_10.81.026/3 mīlitākṣy anamad buddhyā manasā pariṣasvaje
analyzed: mīlita akṣī anamat buddhyā manasā pariṣasvaje

original: BhP_10.81.027/1 patnīṃ vīkṣya visphurantīṃ devīṃ vaimānikīm iva
analyzed: patnīm vīkṣya visphurantīm devīm vaimānikīm iva

original: BhP_10.81.027/3 dāsīnāṃ niṣka-kaṇṭhīnāṃ madhye bhāntīṃ sa vismitaḥ
analyzed: dāsīnām niṣka kaṇṭhīnām madhye bhāntīm sa vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.028/1 prītaḥ svayaṃ tayā yuktaḥ praviṣṭo nija-mandiram
analyzed: prītaḥ svayam tayā yuktaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nija mandiram

original: BhP_10.81.028/3 maṇi-stambha-śatopetaṃ mahendra-bhavanaṃ yathā
analyzed: maṇi stambha śata upetam mahā indra bhavanam yathā

original: BhP_10.81.029/1 payaḥ-phena-nibhāḥ śayyā dāntā rukma-paricchadāḥ
analyzed: payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyā dāntā rukma paricchadāḥ

original: BhP_10.81.029/3 paryaṅkā hema-daṇḍāni cāmara-vyajanāni ca
analyzed: paryaṅkāḥ hema daṇḍāni cāmara vyajanāni ca

original: BhP_10.81.030/1 āsanāni ca haimāni mṛdūpastaraṇāni ca
analyzed: āsanāni ca haimāni mṛdu upastaraṇāni ca

original: BhP_10.81.030/3 muktādāma-vilambīni vitānāni dyumanti ca
BhP_10.81.031/1 svaccha-sphaṭika-kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca
analyzed: svaccha sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā mārakateṣu ca

original: BhP_10.81.032/3 ratna-dīpān bhrājamānān lalanā ratna-saṃyutāḥ
analyzed: ratna dīpān bhrājamānān lalanāḥ ratna saṃyutāḥ

original: BhP_10.81.032/1 vilokya brāhmaṇas tatra samṛddhīḥ sarva-sampadām
analyzed: vilokya brāhmaṇaḥ tatra samṛddhīḥ sarva sampadām

original: BhP_10.81.032/3 tarkayām āsa nirvyagraḥ sva-samṛddhim ahaitukīm
analyzed: tarkayām āsa nirvyagraḥ sva samṛddhim ahaitukīm

original: BhP_10.81.033/1 nūnaṃ bataitan mama durbhagasya śaśvad daridrasya samṛddhi-hetuḥ
analyzed: nūnam bata etat mama durbhagasya śaśvat daridrasya samṛddhi hetuḥ

original: BhP_10.81.033/3 mahā-vibhūter avalokato 'nyo naivopapadyeta yadūttamasya
analyzed: mahā vibhūteḥ avalokataḥ nyaḥ nā evā upapadyeta yadu uttamasya

original: BhP_10.81.034/1 nanv abruvāṇo diśate samakṣaṃ yāciṣṇave bhūry api bhūri-bhojaḥ
analyzed: nanu abruvāṇaḥ diśate samakṣam yāciṣṇave bhūri api bhūri bhojaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.034/3 parjanya-vat tat svayam īkṣamāṇo dāśārhakāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sakhā me
analyzed: parjanya vat tat svayam īkṣamāṇaḥ dāśārhakāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sakhā me

original: BhP_10.81.035/1 kiñcit karoty urv api yat sva-dattaṃ
analyzed: kiñcid karoti uru api yat sva dattam

original: BhP_10.81.035/2 suhṛt-kṛtaṃ phalgv api bhūri-kārī
analyzed: suhṛd kṛtam phalgu api bhūrikārī

original: BhP_10.81.035/3 mayopaṇītaṃ pṛthukaika-muṣṭiṃ
analyzed: mayā upaṇītam pṛthuka eka muṣṭim

original: BhP_10.81.035/4 pratyagrahīt prīti-yuto mahātmā
analyzed: pratyagrahīt prīti yutaḥ mahātmā

original: BhP_10.81.036/1 tasyaiva me sauhṛda-sakhya-maitrī- dāsyaṃ punar janmani janmani syāt
analyzed: tasya eva me sauhṛda sakhya maitrī dāsyam punar janmani janmani syāt

original: BhP_10.81.036/3 mahānubhāvena guṇālayena viṣajjatas tat-puruṣa-prasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: mahā anubhāvena guṇa ālayena viṣajjataḥ tatpuruṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.037/1 bhaktāya citrā bhagavān hi sampado rājyaṃ vibhūtīr na samarthayaty ajaḥ
analyzed: bhaktāya citrāḥ bhagavān hi sampadaḥ rājyam vibhūtīḥ na samarthayati ajaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.037/3 adīrgha-bodhāya vicakṣaṇaḥ svayaṃ paśyan nipātaṃ dhanināṃ madodbhavam
analyzed: a dīrgha bodhāya vicakṣaṇaḥ svayam paśyan nipātam dhaninām mada udbhavam

original: BhP_10.81.038/1 itthaṃ vyavasito buddhyā bhakto 'tīva janārdane
analyzed: ittham vyavasitaḥ buddhyā tīva janārdane

original: BhP_10.81.038/3 viṣayān jāyayā tyakṣyan bubhuje nāti-lampaṭaḥ
analyzed: viṣayān jāyayā tyakṣyan bubhuje na ati lampaṭaḥ

original: BhP_10.81.039/1 tasya vai deva-devasya harer yajña-pateḥ prabhoḥ
analyzed: tasya vai devadevasya hareḥ yajñapateḥ prabhoḥ

original: BhP_10.81.039/3 brāhmaṇāḥ prabhavo daivaṃ na tebhyo vidyate param
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ prabhavaḥ daivam na tebhyaḥ vidyate param

original: BhP_10.81.040/1 evaṃ sa vipro bhagavat-suhṛt tadā dṛṣṭvā sva-bhṛtyair ajitaṃ parājitam
analyzed: evam sa vipraḥ bhagavat suhṛd tadā dṛṣṭvā sva bhṛtyaiḥ ajitam parājitam

original: BhP_10.81.040/3 tad-dhyāna-vegodgrathitātma-bandhanas tad-dhāma lebhe 'cirataḥ satāṃ gatim
analyzed: tad dhyāna vega udgrathita ātma bandhanaḥ tat dhāma lebhe ciratas satām gatim

original: BhP_10.81.041/1 etad brahmaṇya-devasya śrutvā brahmaṇyatāṃ naraḥ
analyzed: etat brahmaṇyadevasya śrutvā brahmaṇya tām naraḥ

original: BhP_10.81.041/3 labdha-bhāvo bhagavati karma-bandhād vimucyate
analyzed: labdha bhāvaḥ bhagavati karma bandhāt vimucyate

original: BhP_10.82.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.001/1 athaikadā dvāravatyāṃ vasato rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: atha ekadā dvāravatyām vasataḥ rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.82.001/3 sūryoparāgaḥ su-mahān āsīt kalpa-kṣaye yathā
analyzed: sūrya uparāgaḥ su mahān āsīt kalpa kṣaye yathā

original: BhP_10.82.002/1 taṃ jñātvā manujā rājan purastād eva sarvataḥ
analyzed: tam jñātvā manujāḥ rājan purastāt eva sarvatas

original: BhP_10.82.002/3 samanta-pañcakaṃ kṣetraṃ yayuḥ śreyo-vidhitsayā
analyzed: samantapañcakam kṣetram yayuḥ śreyaḥ vidhitsayā

original: BhP_10.82.003/1 niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīṃ kurvan rāmaḥ śastra-bhṛtāṃ varaḥ
analyzed: niḥkṣatriyām mahīm kurvan rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.003/3 nṛpāṇāṃ rudhiraugheṇa yatra cakre mahā-hradān
analyzed: nṛpāṇām rudhira ogheṇa yatra cakre mahā hradān

original: BhP_10.82.004/1 īje ca bhagavān rāmo yatrāspṛṣṭo 'pi karmaṇā
analyzed: īje ca bhagavān rāmaḥ yatra a spṛṣṭaḥ pi karmaṇā

original: BhP_10.82.004/3 lokaṃ saṅgrāhayann īśo yathānyo 'ghāpanuttaye
analyzed: lokam saṅgrāhayan īśaḥ yathā anyaḥ gha apanuttaye

original: BhP_10.82.005/1 mahatyāṃ tīrtha-yātrāyāṃ tatrāgan bhāratīḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: mahatyām tīrtha yātrāyām tatra agan bhāratīḥ prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.005/3 vṛṣṇayaś ca tathākrūra- vasudevāhukādayaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇayaḥ ca tathā akrūra vasudeva āhuka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.006/1 yayur bhārata tat kṣetraṃ svam aghaṃ kṣapayiṣṇavaḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ bhārata tat kṣetram svam agham kṣapayiṣṇavaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.006/3 gada-pradyumna-sāmbādyāḥ sucandra-śuka-sāraṇaiḥ
analyzed: gada pradyumna sāmba ādyāḥ sucandra śuka sāraṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.82.006/5 āste 'niruddho rakṣāyāṃ kṛtavarmā ca yūtha-paḥ
analyzed: āste niruddhaḥ rakṣāyām kṛtavarmā ca yūthapaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.007/1 te rathair deva-dhiṣṇyābhair hayaiś ca tarala-plavaiḥ
analyzed: te rathaiḥ deva dhiṣṇya ābhaiḥ hayaiḥ ca tarala plavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.82.007/3 gajair nadadbhir abhrābhair nṛbhir vidyādhara-dyubhiḥ
analyzed: gajaiḥ nadadbhiḥ abhra ābhaiḥ nṛbhiḥ vidyādhara dyubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.82.008/1 vyarocanta mahā-tejāḥ pathi kāñcana-mālinaḥ
analyzed: vyarocanta mahā tejāḥ pathi kāñcana mālinaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.008/3 divya-srag-vastra-sannāhāḥ kalatraiḥ khe-carā iva
analyzed: divya sraj vastra sannāhāḥ kalatraiḥ khecarāḥ iva

original: BhP_10.82.009/1 tatra snātvā mahā-bhāgā upoṣya su-samāhitāḥ
analyzed: tatra snātvā mahābhāgāḥ upoṣya su samāhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.009/3 brāhmaṇebhyo dadur dhenūr vāsaḥ-srag-rukma-mālinīḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ daduḥ dhenūḥ vāsaḥ sraj rukma mālinīḥ

original: BhP_10.82.010/1 rāma-hradeṣu vidhi-vat punar āplutya vṛṣṇayaḥ
analyzed: rāmahradeṣu vidhivat punar āplutya vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.010/3 dadaḥ sv-annaṃ dvijāgryebhyaḥ kṛṣṇe no bhaktir astv iti
analyzed: dadaḥ su annam dvijāgryebhyaḥ kṛṣṇe naḥ bhaktiḥ astu iti

original: BhP_10.82.011/1 svayaṃ ca tad-anujñātā vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-devatāḥ
analyzed: svayam ca tad anujñātāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa devatāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.011/3 bhuktvopaviviśuḥ kāmaṃ snigdha-cchāyāṅghripāṅghriṣu
analyzed: bhuktvā upaviviśuḥ kāmam snigdha chāyā aṅghripa aṅghriṣu

original: BhP_10.82.012/1 tatrāgatāṃs te dadṛśuḥ suhṛt-sambandhino nṛpān
analyzed: tatra āgatān te dadṛśuḥ suhṛd sambandhinaḥ nṛpān

original: BhP_10.82.012/3 matsyośīnara-kauśalya- vidarbha-kuru-sṛñjayān
analyzed: matsya uśīnara kauśalya vidarbha kuru sṛñjayān

original: BhP_10.82.013/1 kāmboja-kaikayān madrān kuntīn ānarta-keralān
analyzed: kāmboja kaikayān madrān kuntīn ānarta keralān

original: BhP_10.82.013/3 anyāṃś caivātma-pakṣīyān parāṃś ca śataśo nṛpa
analyzed: anyān ca eva ātma pakṣīyān parān ca śataśas nṛpa

original: BhP_10.82.013/5 nandādīn suhṛdo gopān gopīś cotkaṇṭhitāś ciram
analyzed: nanda ādīn suhṛdaḥ gopān gopīḥ ca utkaṇṭhitāḥ ciram

original: BhP_10.82.014/1 anyonya-sandarśana-harṣa-raṃhasā protphulla-hṛd-vaktra-saroruha-śriyaḥ
analyzed: anyonya sandarśana harṣa raṃhasā protphulla hṛd vaktra saroruha śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.014/3 āśliṣya gāḍhaṃ nayanaiḥ sravaj-jalā hṛṣyat-tvaco ruddha-giro yayur mudam
analyzed: āśliṣya gāḍham nayanaiḥ sravat jalāḥ hṛṣyat tvacaḥ ruddha giraḥ yayuḥ mudam

original: BhP_10.82.015/1 striyaś ca saṃvīkṣya mitho 'ti-sauhṛda-
analyzed: striyaḥ ca saṃvīkṣya mithas ti sauhṛda

original: BhP_10.82.015/2 smitāmalāpāṅga-dṛśo 'bhirebhire
analyzed: smita amala apāṅga dṛśaḥ bhirebhire

original: BhP_10.82.015/3 stanaiḥ stanān kuṅkuma-paṅka-rūṣitān
analyzed: stanaiḥ stanān kuṅkuma paṅka rūṣitān

original: BhP_10.82.015/4 nihatya dorbhiḥ praṇayāśru-locanāḥ
analyzed: nihatya dorbhiḥ praṇaya aśru locanāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.016/1 tato 'bhivādya te vṛddhān yaviṣṭhair abhivāditāḥ
analyzed: tatas bhivādya te vṛddhān yaviṣṭhaiḥ abhivāditāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.016/3 sv-āgataṃ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā cakruḥ kṛṣṇa-kathā mithaḥ
analyzed: svāgatam kuśalam pṛṣṭvā cakruḥ kṛṣṇa kathāḥ mithas

original: BhP_10.82.017/1 pṛthā bhrātṝn svasṝr vīkṣya tat-putrān pitarāv api
analyzed: pṛthā bhrātṝn svasṝḥ vīkṣya tad putrān pitarau api

original: BhP_10.82.017/3 bhrātṛ-patnīr mukundaṃ ca jahau saṅkathayā śucaḥ
analyzed: bhrātṛ patnīḥ mukundam ca jahau saṅkathayā śucaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.018/0 kunty uvāca
analyzed: kuntī uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.018/1 ārya bhrātar ahaṃ manye ātmānam akṛtāśiṣam
analyzed: ārya bhrātar aham manye ātmānam a kṛta āśiṣam

original: BhP_10.82.018/3 yad vā āpatsu mad-vārtāṃ nānusmaratha sattamāḥ
analyzed: yat vai āpatsu mad vārtām na anusmaratha sattamāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.019/1 suhṛdo jñātayaḥ putrā bhrātaraḥ pitarāv api
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ jñātayaḥ putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ pitarau api

original: BhP_10.82.019/3 nānusmaranti sva-janaṃ yasya daivam adakṣiṇam
analyzed: na anusmaranti sva janam yasya daivam a dakṣiṇam

original: BhP_10.82.020/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.020/1 amba māsmān asūyethā daiva-krīḍanakān narān
analyzed: amba mā asmān asūyethāḥ daiva krīḍanakān narān

original: BhP_10.82.020/3 īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ kurute kāryate 'tha vā
analyzed: īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ kurute kāryate vā

original: BhP_10.82.021/1 kaṃsa-pratāpitāḥ sarve vayaṃ yātā diśaṃ diśam
analyzed: kaṃsa pratāpitāḥ sarve vayam yātāḥ diśam diśam

original: BhP_10.82.021/3 etarhy eva punaḥ sthānaṃ daivenāsāditāḥ svasaḥ
analyzed: etarhi eva punar sthānam daivena āsāditāḥ svasaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.022/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.022/1 vasudevograsenādyair yadubhis te 'rcitā nṛpāḥ
analyzed: vasudeva ugrasena ādyaiḥ yadubhiḥ te rcitāḥ nṛpāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.022/3 āsann acyuta-sandarśa- paramānanda-nirvṛtāḥ
analyzed: āsan acyuta sandarśa parama ānanda nirvṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.023/1 bhīṣmo droṇo 'mbikā-putro gāndhārī sa-sutā tathā
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ mbikā putraḥ gāndhārī sa sutā tathā

original: BhP_10.82.023/3 sa-dārāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kuntī sañjayo viduraḥ kṛpaḥ
analyzed: sa dārāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kuntī sañjayaḥ viduraḥ kṛpaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.024/1 kuntībhojo virāṭaś ca bhīṣmako nagnajin mahān
analyzed: kuntībhojaḥ virāṭaḥ ca bhīṣmakaḥ nagnajit mahān

original: BhP_10.82.024/3 purujid drupadaḥ śalyo dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sa kāśi-rāṭ
analyzed: purujit drupadaḥ śalyaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ sa kāśirāj

original: BhP_10.82.025/1 damaghoṣo viśālākṣo maithilo madra-kekayau
analyzed: damaghoṣaḥ viśālākṣaḥ maithilaḥ madra kekayau

original: BhP_10.82.025/3 yudhāmanyuḥ suśarmā ca sa-sutā bāhlikādayaḥ
analyzed: yudhāmanyuḥ suśarmā ca sa sutāḥ bāhlika ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.026/1 rājāno ye ca rājendra yudhiṣṭhiram anuvratāḥ
analyzed: rājānaḥ ye ca rāja indra yudhiṣṭhiram anuvratāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.026/3 śrī-niketaṃ vapuḥ śaureḥ sa-strīkaṃ vīkṣya vismitāḥ
analyzed: śrīniketam vapuḥ śaureḥ sa strīkam vīkṣya vismitāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.027/1 atha te rāma-kṛṣṇābhyāṃ samyak prāpta-samarhaṇāḥ
analyzed: atha te rāma kṛṣṇābhyām samyak prāpta samarhaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.027/3 praśaśaṃsur mudā yuktā vṛṣṇīn kṛṣṇa-parigrahān
analyzed: praśaśaṃsuḥ mudā yuktāḥ vṛṣṇīn kṛṣṇa parigrahān

original: BhP_10.82.028/1 aho bhoja-pate yūyaṃ janma-bhājo nṛṇām iha
analyzed: aho bhoja pate yūyam janma bhājaḥ nṛṇām iha

original: BhP_10.82.028/3 yat paśyathāsakṛt kṛṣṇaṃ durdarśam api yoginām
analyzed: yat paśyatha asakṛt kṛṣṇam durdarśam api yoginām

original: BhP_10.82.029/1 yad-viśrutiḥ śruti-nutedam alaṃ punāti
analyzed: yat viśrutiḥ śruti nutā idam alam punāti

original: BhP_10.82.029/2 pādāvanejana-payaś ca vacaś ca śāstram
analyzed: pāda avanejana payaḥ ca vacaḥ ca śāstram

original: BhP_10.82.029/3 bhūḥ kāla-bharjita-bhagāpi yad-aṅghri-padma-
analyzed: bhūḥ kāla bharjita bhagā api yad aṅghri padma

original: BhP_10.82.029/4 sparśottha-śaktir abhivarṣati no 'khilārthān
analyzed: sparśa uttha śaktiḥ abhivarṣati no khila arthān

original: BhP_10.82.030/1 tad-darśana-sparśanānupatha-prajalpa-
analyzed: tad darśana sparśana anupatha prajalpa

original: BhP_10.82.030/2 śayyāsanāśana-sayauna-sapiṇḍa-bandhaḥ
analyzed: śayyā āsana aśana sayauna sapiṇḍa bandhaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.030/3 yeṣāṃ gṛhe niraya-vartmani vartatāṃ vaḥ
analyzed: yeṣām gṛhe niraya vartmani vartatām vaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.030/4 svargāpavarga-viramaḥ svayam āsa viṣṇuḥ
analyzed: svarga apavarga viramaḥ svayam āsa viṣṇuḥ

original: BhP_10.82.031/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.031/1 nandas tatra yadūn prāptān jñātvā kṛṣṇa-purogamān
analyzed: nandaḥ tatra yadūn prāptān jñātvā kṛṣṇa purogamān

original: BhP_10.82.031/3 tatrāgamad vṛto gopair anaḥ-sthārthair didṛkṣayā
analyzed: tatra agamat vṛtaḥ gopaiḥ anaḥstha arthaiḥ didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_10.82.032/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṇayo hṛṣṭās tanvaḥ prāṇam ivotthitāḥ
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṇayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ tanvaḥ prāṇam iva utthitāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.032/3 pariṣasvajire gāḍhaṃ cira-darśana-kātarāḥ
analyzed: pariṣasvajire gāḍham cira darśana kātarāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.033/1 vasudevaḥ pariṣvajya samprītaḥ prema-vihvalaḥ
analyzed: vasudevaḥ pariṣvajya samprītaḥ prema vihvalaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.033/3 smaran kaṃsa-kṛtān kleśān putra-nyāsaṃ ca gokule
analyzed: smaran kaṃsa kṛtān kleśān putra nyāsam ca gokule

original: BhP_10.82.034/1 kṛṣṇa-rāmau pariṣvajya pitarāv abhivādya ca
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau pariṣvajya pitarau abhivādya ca

original: BhP_10.82.034/3 na kiñcanocatuḥ premṇā sāśru-kaṇṭhau kurūdvaha
analyzed: na kiñcana ūcatuḥ premṇā sa aśru kaṇṭhau kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.82.035/1 tāv ātmāsanam āropya bāhubhyāṃ parirabhya ca
analyzed: tau ātma āsanam āropya bāhubhyām parirabhya ca

original: BhP_10.82.035/3 yaśodā ca mahā-bhāgā sutau vijahatuḥ śucaḥ
analyzed: yaśodā ca mahābhāgā sutau vijahatuḥ śucaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.036/1 rohiṇī devakī cātha pariṣvajya vrajeśvarīm
analyzed: rohiṇī devakī ca atha pariṣvajya vrajeśvarīm

original: BhP_10.82.036/3 smarantyau tat-kṛtāṃ maitrīṃ bāṣpa-kaṇṭhyau samūcatuḥ
analyzed: smarantyau tad kṛtām maitrīm bāṣpa kaṇṭhyau samūcatuḥ

original: BhP_10.82.037/1 kā vismareta vāṃ maitrīm anivṛttāṃ vrajeśvari
analyzed: kā vismareta vām maitrīm anivṛttām vrajeśvari

original: BhP_10.82.037/3 avāpyāpy aindram aiśvaryaṃ yasyā neha pratikriyā
analyzed: avāpya api aindram aiśvaryam yasyāḥ na iha pratikriyā

original: BhP_10.82.038/1 etāv adṛṣṭa-pitarau yuvayoḥ sma pitroḥ
analyzed: etau adṛṣṭa pitarau yuvayoḥ sma pitroḥ

original: BhP_10.82.038/2 samprīṇanābhyudaya-poṣaṇa-pālanāni
analyzed: samprīṇana abhyudaya poṣaṇa pālanāni

original: BhP_10.82.038/3 prāpyoṣatur bhavati pakṣma ha yadvad akṣṇor
analyzed: prāpya ūṣatuḥ bhavati pakṣma ha yadvat akṣṇoḥ

original: BhP_10.82.038/4 nyastāv akutra ca bhayau na satāṃ paraḥ svaḥ
analyzed: nyastau akutra ca bhayau na satām paraḥ svaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.039/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.039/1 gopyaś ca kṛṣṇam upalabhya cirād abhīṣṭaṃ
analyzed: gopyaḥ ca kṛṣṇam upalabhya cirāt abhīṣṭam

original: BhP_10.82.039/2 yat-prekṣaṇe dṛśiṣu pakṣma-kṛtaṃ śapanti
analyzed: yad prekṣaṇe dṛśiṣu pakṣma kṛtam śapanti

original: BhP_10.82.039/3 dṛgbhir hṛdī-kṛtam alaṃ parirabhya sarvās
analyzed: dṛgbhiḥ hṛdīkṛtam alam parirabhya sarvāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.039/4 tad-bhāvam āpur api nitya-yujāṃ durāpam
analyzed: tad bhāvam āpuḥ api nitya yujām durāpam

original: BhP_10.82.040/1 bhagavāṃs tās tathā-bhūtā vivikta upasaṅgataḥ
analyzed: bhagavān tāḥ tathābhūtāḥ viviktaḥ upasaṅgataḥ

original: BhP_10.82.040/3 āśliṣyānāmayaṃ pṛṣṭvā prahasann idam abravīt
analyzed: āśliṣya anāmayam pṛṣṭvā prahasan idam abravīt

original: BhP_10.82.041/1 api smaratha naḥ sakhyaḥ svānām artha-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: api smaratha naḥ sakhyaḥ svānām artha cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.82.041/3 gatāṃś cirāyitāñ chatru- pakṣa-kṣapaṇa-cetasaḥ
analyzed: gatān cirāyi tām śatru pakṣa kṣapaṇa cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.042/1 apy avadhyāyathāsmān svid akṛta-jñāviśaṅkayā
analyzed: api avadhyāyatha asmān svid a kṛtajña a viśaṅkayā

original: BhP_10.82.042/3 nūnaṃ bhūtāni bhagavān yunakti viyunakti ca
analyzed: nūnam bhūtāni bhagavān yunakti viyunakti ca

original: BhP_10.82.043/1 vāyur yathā ghanānīkaṃ tṛṇaṃ tūlaṃ rajāṃsi ca
analyzed: vāyuḥ yathā ghana anīkam tṛṇam tūlam rajāṃsi ca

original: BhP_10.82.043/3 saṃyojyākṣipate bhūyas tathā bhūtāni bhūta-kṛt
analyzed: saṃyojya ākṣipate bhūyas tathā bhūtāni bhūta kṛt

original: BhP_10.82.044/1 mayi bhaktir hi bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate
analyzed: mayi bhaktiḥ hi bhūtānām amṛta tvāya kalpate

original: BhP_10.82.044/3 diṣṭyā yad āsīn mat-sneho bhavatīnāṃ mad-āpanaḥ
analyzed: diṣṭyā yat āsīt mad snehaḥ bhavatīnām madāpanaḥ

original: BhP_10.82.045/1 ahaṃ hi sarva-bhūtānām ādir anto 'ntaraṃ bahiḥ
analyzed: aham hi sarva bhūtānām ādiḥ antaḥ ntaram bahis

original: BhP_10.82.045/3 bhautikānāṃ yathā khaṃ vār bhūr vāyur jyotir aṅganāḥ
analyzed: bhautikānām yathā kham vār bhūḥ vāyuḥ jyotiḥ aṅganāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.046/1 evaṃ hy etāni bhūtāni bhūteṣv ātmātmanā tataḥ
analyzed: evam hi etāni bhūtāni bhūteṣu ātma ātmanā tatas

original: BhP_10.82.046/3 ubhayaṃ mayy atha pare paśyatābhātam akṣare
analyzed: ubhayam mayi atha pare paśyata ābhātam akṣare

original: BhP_10.82.047/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.82.047/1 adhyātma-śikṣayā gopya evaṃ kṛṣṇena śikṣitāḥ
analyzed: adhyātma śikṣayā gopyaḥ evam kṛṣṇena śikṣitāḥ

original: BhP_10.82.047/3 tad-anusmaraṇa-dhvasta- jīva-kośās tam adhyagan
analyzed: tad anusmaraṇa dhvasta jīva kośāḥ tam adhyagan

original: BhP_10.82.048/1 āhuś ca te nalina-nābha padāravindaṃ
analyzed: āhuḥ ca te nalina nābha pada aravindam

original: BhP_10.82.048/2 yogeśvarair hṛdi vicintyam agādha-bodhaiḥ
analyzed: yoga īśvaraiḥ hṛdi vicintyam agādha bodhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.82.048/3 saṃsāra-kūpa-patitottaraṇāvalambaṃ
analyzed: saṃsāra kūpa patita uttaraṇa avalambam

original: BhP_10.82.048/4 gehaṃ juṣām api manasy udiyāt sadā naḥ
analyzed: geham juṣām api manasi udiyāt sadā naḥ

original: BhP_10.83.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.001/1 tathānugṛhya bhagavān gopīnāṃ sa gurur gatiḥ
analyzed: tathā anugṛhya bhagavān gopīnām sa guruḥ gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.83.001/3 yudhiṣṭhiram athāpṛcchat sarvāṃś ca suhṛdo 'vyayam
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhiram athā apṛcchat sarvān ca suhṛdaḥ vyayam

original: BhP_10.83.002/1 ta evaṃ loka-nāthena paripṛṣṭāḥ su-sat-kṛtāḥ
analyzed: te evam lokanāthena paripṛṣṭāḥ su satkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.002/3 pratyūcur hṛṣṭa-manasas tat-pādekṣā-hatāṃhasaḥ
analyzed: pratyūcuḥ hṛṣṭa manasaḥ tad pāda īkṣā hata aṃhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.003/1 kuto 'śivaṃ tvac-caraṇāmbujāsavaṃ mahan-manasto mukha-niḥsṛtaṃ kvacit
analyzed: kutas śivam tvad caraṇa ambuja āsavam mahat manastaḥ mukha niḥsṛtam kvacid

original: BhP_10.83.003/3 pibanti ye karṇa-puṭair alaṃ prabho dehaṃ-bhṛtāṃ deha-kṛd-asmṛti-cchidam
analyzed: pibanti ye karṇa puṭaiḥ alam prabho dehaṃbhṛtām deha kṛt asmṛti chidam

original: BhP_10.83.004/1 hi tvātma dhāma-vidhutātma-kṛta-try-avasthām
analyzed: hi tvā ātma dhāma vidhuta ātma kṛta tri avasthām

original: BhP_10.83.004/2 ānanda-samplavam akhaṇḍam akuṇṭha-bodham
BhP_10.83.004/3 kālopasṛṣṭa-nigamāvana ātta-yoga-
analyzed: kāla upasṛṣṭa nigama avane ātta yoga

original: BhP_10.83.004/4 māyākṛtiṃ paramahaṃsa-gatiṃ natāḥ sma
analyzed: māyā ākṛtim paramahaṃsa gatim natāḥ sma

original: BhP_10.83.005/0 śrī-ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: śrī ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.005/1 ity uttamaḥ-śloka-śikhā-maṇiṃ janeṣv
analyzed: iti uttamaḥśloka śikhāmaṇim janeṣu

original: BhP_10.83.005/2 abhiṣṭuvatsv andhaka-kaurava-striyaḥ
analyzed: abhiṣṭuvatsu andhaka kaurava striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.005/3 sametya govinda-kathā mitho 'gṛnaṃs
analyzed: sametya govinda kathāḥ mithas

original: BhP_10.83.005/4 tri-loka-gītāḥ śṛṇu varṇayāmi te
analyzed: triloka gītāḥ śṛṇu varṇayāmi te

original: BhP_10.83.006/0 śrī-draupady uvāca
analyzed: śrī draupadī uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.006/1 he vaidarbhy acyuto bhadre he jāmbavati kauśale
analyzed: he vaidarbhi acyutaḥ bhadre he jāmbavati kauśale

original: BhP_10.83.006/3 he satyabhāme kālindi śaibye rohiṇi lakṣmaṇe
analyzed: he satyabhāme kālindi śaibye rohiṇi lakṣmaṇe

original: BhP_10.83.007/1 he kṛṣṇa-patnya etan no brūte vo bhagavān svayam
analyzed: he kṛṣṇa patnyaḥ etat naḥ brūte vaḥ bhagavān svayam

original: BhP_10.83.007/3 upayeme yathā lokam anukurvan sva-māyayā
analyzed: upayeme yathā lokam anukurvan sva māyayā

original: BhP_10.83.008/0 śrī-rukmiṇy uvāca
analyzed: śrī rukmiṇī uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.008/1 caidyāya mārpayitum udyata-kārmukeṣu
analyzed: caidyāya mā arpayitum udyata kārmukeṣu

original: BhP_10.83.008/2 rājasv ajeya-bhaṭa-śekharitāṅghri-reṇuḥ
analyzed: rājasu ajeya bhaṭa śekharita aṅghri reṇuḥ

original: BhP_10.83.008/3 ninye mṛgendra iva bhāgam ajāvi-yūthāt
analyzed: ninye mṛgendraḥ iva bhāgam aja avi yūthāt

original: BhP_10.83.008/4 tac-chrī-niketa-caraṇo 'stu mamārcanāya
analyzed: tat śrīniketa caraṇaḥ astu mama arcanāya

original: BhP_10.83.009/0 śrī-satyabhāmovāca
analyzed: śrī satyabhāmā uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.009/1 yo me sanābhi-vadha-tapta-hṛdā tatena
analyzed: yaḥ me sanābhi vadha tapta hṛdā tatena

original: BhP_10.83.009/2 liptābhiśāpam apamārṣṭum upājahāra
analyzed: liptā abhiśāpam apamārṣṭum upājahāra

original: BhP_10.83.009/3 jitvarkṣa-rājam atha ratnam adāt sa tena
analyzed: jitvā ṛkṣarājam atha ratnam adāt sa tena

original: BhP_10.83.009/4 bhītaḥ pitādiśata māṃ prabhave 'pi dattām
analyzed: bhītaḥ pitā ādiśata mām prabhave dattām

original: BhP_10.83.010/0 śrī-jāmbavaty uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.010/1 prājñāya deha-kṛd amuṃ nija-nātha-daivaṃ
analyzed: prājñāya dehakṛt amum nija nātha daivam

original: BhP_10.83.010/2 sītā-patiṃ tri-navahāny amunābhyayudhyat
analyzed: sītā patim tri nava hāni amunā abhyayudhyat

original: BhP_10.83.010/3 jñātvā parīkṣita upāharad arhaṇaṃ māṃ
analyzed: jñātvā parīkṣitaḥ upāharat arhaṇam mām

original: BhP_10.83.010/4 pādau pragṛhya maṇināham amuṣya dāsī
analyzed: pādau pragṛhya maṇinā aham amuṣya dāsī

original: BhP_10.83.011/0 śrī-kālindy uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.011/1 tapaś carantīm ājñāya sva-pāda-sparśanāśayā
analyzed: tapaḥ carantīm ājñāya sva pāda sparśa nāśayā

original: BhP_10.83.011/3 sakhyopetyāgrahīt pāṇiṃ yo 'haṃ tad-gṛha-mārjanī
analyzed: sakhyā upetya agrahīt pāṇim yaḥ ham tad gṛha mārjanī

original: BhP_10.83.012/0 śrī-mitravindovāca
analyzed: śrī mitravindā uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.012/1 yo māṃ svayaṃ-vara upetya vijitya bhū-pān
analyzed: yaḥ mām svayaṃvare upetya vijitya bhūpān

original: BhP_10.83.012/2 ninye śva-yūtha-gaṃ ivātma-baliṃ dvipāriḥ
analyzed: ninye śva yūtha gam iva ātma balim dvipa ariḥ

original: BhP_10.83.012/3 bhrātṝṃś ca me 'pakurutaḥ sva-puraṃ śriyaukas
analyzed: bhrātṝn ca me sva puram śriyaukaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.012/4 tasyāstu me 'nu-bhavam aṅghry-avanejanatvam
analyzed: tasyāḥ tu me aṅghri avanejana tvam

original: BhP_10.83.013/0 śrī-satyovāca
analyzed: śrī satyā uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.013/1 saptokṣaṇo 'ti-bala-vīrya-su-tīkṣṇa-śṛṅgān
BhP_10.83.013/2 pitrā kṛtān kṣitipa-vīrya-parīkṣaṇāya
analyzed: pitrā kṛtān kṣitipa vīrya parīkṣaṇāya

original: BhP_10.83.013/3 tān vīra-durmada-hanas tarasā nigṛhya
analyzed: tān vīra durmada hanaḥ tarasā nigṛhya

original: BhP_10.83.013/4 krīḍan babandha ha yathā śiśavo 'ja-tokān
analyzed: krīḍan babandha ha yathā śiśavaḥ jatokān

original: BhP_10.83.014/1 ya itthaṃ vīrya-śulkāṃ māṃ
analyzed: yaḥ ittham vīrya śulkām mām

original: BhP_10.83.014/2 dāsībhiś catur-angiṇīm
analyzed: dāsībhiḥ caturangiṇīm

original: BhP_10.83.014/3 pathi nirjitya rājanyān
analyzed: pathi nirjitya rājanyān

original: BhP_10.83.014/4 ninye tad-dāsyam astu me
analyzed: ninye tat dāsyam astu me

original: BhP_10.83.015/0 śrī-bhadrovāca10830151 pitā me mātuleyāya svayam āhūya dattavān
analyzed: pitā me mātuleyāya svayam āhūya dattavān

original: BhP_10.83.015/3 kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇāya tac-cittām akṣauhiṇyā sakhī-janaiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇāya tad cittām akṣauhiṇyā sakhī janaiḥ

original: BhP_10.83.016/1 asya me pāda-saṃsparśo bhavej janmani janmani
analyzed: asya me pāda saṃsparśaḥ bhavet janmani janmani

original: BhP_10.83.016/3 karmabhir bhrāmyamāṇāyā yena tac chreya ātmanaḥ
analyzed: karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇāyāḥ yena tat śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.017/0 śrī-lakṣmaṇovāca
analyzed: śrī lakṣmaṇā uvāca

original: BhP_10.83.017/1 mamāpi rājñy acyuta-janma-karma śrutvā muhur nārada-gītam āsa ha
analyzed: mama api rājñi acyuta janma karma śrutvā muhur nārada gītam āsa ha

original: BhP_10.83.017/3 cittaṃ mukunde kila padma-hastayā vṛtaḥ su-sammṛśya vihāya loka-pān
analyzed: cittam mukunde kila padma hastayā vṛtaḥ su sammṛśya vihāya lokapān

original: BhP_10.83.018/1 jñātvā mama mataṃ sādhvi pitā duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: jñātvā mama matam sādhvi pitā duhitṛ vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.018/3 bṛhatsena iti khyātas tatropāyam acīkarat
analyzed: bṛhatsenaḥ iti khyātaḥ tatra upāyam acīkarat

original: BhP_10.83.019/1 yathā svayaṃ-vare rājñi matsyaḥ pārthepsayā kṛtaḥ
analyzed: yathā svayaṃvare rājñi matsyaḥ pārtha īpsayā kṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.019/3 ayaṃ tu bahir ācchanno dṛśyate sa jale param
analyzed: ayam tu bahis ācchannaḥ dṛśyate sa jale param

original: BhP_10.83.020/1 śrutvaitat sarvato bhū-pā āyayur mat-pituḥ puram
analyzed: śrutvā etat sarvatas bhūpāḥ āyayuḥ mad pituḥ puram

original: BhP_10.83.020/3 sarvāstra-śastra-tattva-jñāḥ sopādhyāyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: sarva astra śastra tattva jñāḥ sa upādhyāyāḥ sahasraśas

original: BhP_10.83.021/1 pitrā sampūjitāḥ sarve yathā-vīryaṃ yathā-vayaḥ
analyzed: pitrā sampūjitāḥ sarve yathāvīryam yathāvayas

original: BhP_10.83.021/3 ādaduḥ sa-śaraṃ cāpaṃ veddhuṃ parṣadi mad-dhiyaḥ
analyzed: ādaduḥ sa śaram cāpam veddhum parṣadi mad dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.022/1 ādāya vyasṛjan kecit sajyaṃ kartum anīśvarāḥ
analyzed: ādāya vyasṛjan kecid sajyam kartum anīśvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.022/3 ā-koṣṭhaṃ jyāṃ samutkṛṣya petur eke 'munāhatāḥ
analyzed: ākoṣṭham jyām samutkṛṣya petuḥ eke munā hatāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.023/1 sajyaṃ kṛtvāpare vīrā māgadhāmbaṣṭha-cedipāḥ
analyzed: sajyam kṛtvā apare vīrāḥ māgadha ambaṣṭha cedipāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.023/3 bhīmo duryodhanaḥ karṇo nāvidaṃs tad-avasthitim
analyzed: bhīmaḥ duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ na avidan tad avasthitim

original: BhP_10.83.024/1 matsyābhāsaṃ jale vīkṣya jñātvā ca tad-avasthitim
analyzed: matsya ābhāsam jale vīkṣya jñātvā ca tad avasthitim

original: BhP_10.83.024/3 pārtho yatto 'sṛjad bāṇaṃ nācchinat paspṛśe param
analyzed: pārthaḥ yattaḥ sṛjat bāṇam na ācchinat paspṛśe param

original: BhP_10.83.025/1 rājanyeṣu nivṛtteṣu bhagna-māneṣu māniṣu
analyzed: rājanyeṣu nivṛtteṣu bhagna māneṣu māniṣu

original: BhP_10.83.025/3 bhagavān dhanur ādāya sajyaṃ kṛtvātha līlayā
analyzed: bhagavān dhanuḥ ādāya sajyam kṛtvā atha līlayā

original: BhP_10.83.026/1 tasmin sandhāya viśikhaṃ matsyaṃ vīkṣya sakṛj jale
