analyzed: tasmin sandhāya viśikham matsyam vīkṣya sakṛt jale

original: BhP_10.83.026/3 chittveṣuṇāpātayat taṃ sūrye cābhijiti sthite
analyzed: chittvā iṣuṇā apātayat tam sūrye ca abhijiti sthite

original: BhP_10.83.027/1 divi dundubhayo nedur jaya-śabda-yutā bhuvi
analyzed: divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ jaya śabda yutāḥ bhuvi

original: BhP_10.83.027/3 devāś ca kusumāsārān mumucur harṣa-vihvalāḥ
analyzed: devāḥ ca kusuma āsārān mumucuḥ harṣa vihvalāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.028/1 tad raṅgam āviśam ahaṃ kala-nūpurābhyāṃ
analyzed: tat raṅgam āviśam aham kala nūpurābhyām

original: BhP_10.83.028/2 padbhyāṃ pragṛhya kanakoijvala-ratna-mālām
analyzed: padbhyām pragṛhya

original: BhP_10.83.028/3 nūtne nivīya paridhāya ca kauśikāgrye
analyzed: nūtne nivīya paridhāya ca kauśika agrye

original: BhP_10.83.028/4 sa-vrīḍa-hāsa-vadanā kavarī-dhṛta-srak
analyzed: sa vrīḍa hāsa vadanā kavarī dhṛta sraj

original: BhP_10.83.029/1 unnīya vaktram uru-kuntala-kuṇḍala-tviḍ-
analyzed: unnīya vaktram uru kuntala kuṇḍala tviṣ

original: BhP_10.83.029/2 gaṇḍa-sthalaṃ śiśira-hāsa-kaṭākṣa-mokṣaiḥ
analyzed: gaṇḍa sthalam śiśira hāsa kaṭākṣa mokṣaiḥ

original: BhP_10.83.029/3 rājño nirīkṣya paritaḥ śanakair murārer
analyzed: rājñaḥ nirīkṣya paritas śanakais murāreḥ

original: BhP_10.83.029/4 aṃse 'nurakta-hṛdayā nidadhe sva-mālām
analyzed: aṃse nurakta hṛdayā nidadhe sva mālām

original: BhP_10.83.030/1 tāvan mṛdaṅga-paṭahāḥ śaṅkha-bhery-ānakādayaḥ
analyzed: tāvat mṛdaṅga paṭahāḥ śaṅkha bherī ānaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.030/3 ninedur naṭa-nartakyo nanṛtur gāyakā jaguḥ
analyzed: nineduḥ naṭa nartakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ gāyakāḥ jaguḥ

original: BhP_10.83.031/1 evaṃ vṛte bhagavati mayeśe nṛpa-yūthapāḥ
analyzed: evam vṛte bhagavati mayā īśe nṛpa yūthapāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.031/3 na sehire yājñaseni spardhanto hṛc-chayāturāḥ
analyzed: na sehire yājñaseni spardhantaḥ hṛcchaya āturāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.032/1 māṃ tāvad ratham āropya haya-ratna-catuṣṭayam
analyzed: mām tāvat ratham āropya haya ratna catuṣṭayam

original: BhP_10.83.032/3 śārṅgam udyamya sannaddhas tasthāv ājau catur-bhujaḥ
analyzed: śārṅgam udyamya sannaddhaḥ tasthau ājau caturbhujaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.033/1 dārukaś codayām āsa kāñcanopaskaraṃ ratham
analyzed: dārukaḥ codayām āsa kāñcana upaskaram ratham

original: BhP_10.83.033/3 miṣatāṃ bhū-bhujāṃ rājñi mṛgāṇāṃ mṛga-rāḍ iva
analyzed: miṣatām bhūbhujām rājñi mṛgāṇām mṛgarāj iva

original: BhP_10.83.034/1 te 'nvasajjanta rājanyā niṣeddhuṃ pathi kecana
analyzed: te nu asajjanta rājanyāḥ niṣeddhum pathi kecana

original: BhP_10.83.034/3 saṃyattā uddhṛteṣv-āsā grāma-siṃhā yathā harim
analyzed: saṃyattāḥ uddhṛta iṣvāsāḥ grāma siṃhāḥ yathā harim

original: BhP_10.83.035/1 te śārṅga-cyuta-bāṇaughaiḥ kṛtta-bāhv-aṅghri-kandharāḥ
analyzed: te śārṅga cyuta bāṇa oghaiḥ kṛtta bāhu aṅghri kandharāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.035/3 nipetuḥ pradhane kecid eke santyajya dudruvuḥ
analyzed: nipetuḥ pradhane kecid eke santyajya dudruvuḥ

original: BhP_10.83.036/1 tataḥ purīṃ yadu-patir aty-alaṅkṛtāṃ
analyzed: tatas purīm yadupatiḥ ati alaṅkṛtām

original: BhP_10.83.036/2 ravi-cchada-dhvaja-paṭa-citra-toraṇām
analyzed: ravicchada dhvaja paṭa citra toraṇām

original: BhP_10.83.036/3 kuśasthalīṃ divi bhuvi cābhisaṃstutāṃ
analyzed: kuśasthalīm divi bhuvi ca abhisaṃstutām

original: BhP_10.83.036/4 samāviśat taraṇir iva sva-ketanam
analyzed: samāviśat taraṇiḥ iva sva ketanam

original: BhP_10.83.037/1 pitā me pūjayām āsa suhṛt-sambandhi-bāndhavān
analyzed: pitā me pūjayām āsa suhṛd sambandhi bāndhavān

original: BhP_10.83.037/3 mahārha-vāso-'laṅkāraiḥ śayyāsana-paricchadaiḥ
analyzed: mahārha vāsa ulaṅkāraiḥ śayyā āsana paricchadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.83.038/1 dāsībhiḥ sarva-sampadbhir bhaṭebha-ratha-vājibhiḥ
analyzed: dāsībhiḥ sarva sampadbhiḥ bhaṭa ibha ratha vājibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.83.038/3 āyudhāni mahārhāṇi dadau pūrṇasya bhaktitaḥ
analyzed: āyudhāni mahārhāṇi dadau pūrṇasya bhaktitaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.039/1 ātmārāmasya tasyemā vayaṃ vai gṛha-dāsikāḥ
analyzed: ātma ārāmasya tasya imāḥ vayam vai gṛha dāsikāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.039/3 sarva-saṅga-nivṛttyāddhā tapasā ca babhūvima
analyzed: sarva saṅga nivṛttyā addhā tapasā ca babhūvima

original: BhP_10.83.040/0 mahiṣya ūcuḥ
analyzed: mahiṣyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.83.040/1 bhaumaṃ nihatya sa-gaṇaṃ yudhi tena ruddhā
analyzed: bhaumam nihatya sa gaṇam yudhi tena ruddhā

original: BhP_10.83.040/2 jñātvātha naḥ kṣiti-jaye jita-rāja-kanyāḥ
analyzed: jñātvā atha naḥ kṣiti jaye jita rāja kanyāḥ

original: BhP_10.83.040/3 nirmucya saṃsṛti-vimokṣam anusmarantīḥ
analyzed: nirmucya saṃsṛti vimokṣam anusmarantīḥ

original: BhP_10.83.040/4 pādāmbujaṃ pariṇināya ya āpta-kāmaḥ
analyzed: pāda ambujam pariṇināya yaḥ āpta kāmaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.041/1 na vayaṃ sādhvi sāmrājyaṃ svārājyaṃ bhaujyam apy uta
analyzed: na vayam sādhvi sāmrājyam svārājyam bhaujyam api uta

original: BhP_10.83.041/3 vairājyaṃ pārameṣṭhyaṃ ca ānantyaṃ vā hareḥ padam
analyzed: vairājyam pārameṣṭhyam ca ānantyam vā hareḥ padam

original: BhP_10.83.042/1 kāmayāmaha etasya śrīmat-pāda-rajaḥ śriyaḥ
analyzed: kāmayāmahe etasya śrīmat pāda rajaḥ śriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.042/3 kuca-kuṅkuma-gandhāḍhyaṃ mūrdhnā voḍhuṃ gadā-bhṛtaḥ
analyzed: kuca kuṅkuma gandha āḍhyam mūrdhnā voḍhum gadābhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.043/1 vraja-striyo yad vāñchanti pulindyas tṛṇa-vīrudhaḥ
analyzed: vraja striyaḥ yat vāñchanti pulindyaḥ tṛṇa vīrudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.83.043/3 gāvaś cārayato gopāḥ pada-sparśaṃ mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: gāvaḥ cārayataḥ gopāḥ pada sparśam mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.001/1 śrutvā pṛthā subala-putry atha yājñasenī
analyzed: śrutvā pṛthā subala putrī atha yājñasenī

original: BhP_10.84.001/2 mādhavy atha kṣitipa-patnya uta sva-gopyaḥ
analyzed: mādhavī atha kṣitipa patnyaḥ uta sva gopyaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.001/3 kṛṣṇe 'khilātmani harau praṇayānubandhaṃ
analyzed: kṛṣṇe khilātmani harau praṇaya anubandham

original: BhP_10.84.001/4 sarvā visismyur alam aśru-kalākulākṣyaḥ
analyzed: sarvāḥ visismyuḥ alam aśru kalā ākula akṣyaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.002/1 iti sambhāṣamāṇāsu strībhiḥ strīṣu nṛbhir nṛṣu
analyzed: iti sambhāṣamāṇāsu strībhiḥ strīṣu nṛbhiḥ nṛṣu

original: BhP_10.84.002/3 āyayur munayas tatra kṛṣṇa-rāma-didṛkṣayā
analyzed: āyayuḥ munayaḥ tatra kṛṣṇa rāma didṛkṣayā

original: BhP_10.84.003/1 dvaipāyano nāradaś ca cyavano devalo 'sitaḥ
analyzed: dvaipāyanaḥ nāradaḥ ca cyavanaḥ sitaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.003/3 viśvāmitraḥ śatānando bharadvājo 'tha gautamaḥ
analyzed: viśvāmitraḥ śatānandaḥ bharadvājaḥ gautamaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.004/1 rāmaḥ sa-śiṣyo bhagavān vasiṣṭho gālavo bhṛguḥ
analyzed: rāmaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ gālavaḥ bhṛguḥ

original: BhP_10.84.004/3 pulastyaḥ kaśyapo 'triś ca mārkaṇḍeyo bṛhaspatiḥ
analyzed: pulastyaḥ kaśyapaḥ tris ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.005/1 dvitas tritaś caikataś ca brahma-putrās tathāṅgirāḥ
analyzed: dvitaḥ tritaḥ ca ekataḥ ca brahma putrāḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.005/3 agastyo yājñavalkyaś ca vāmadevādayo 'pare
analyzed: agastyaḥ yājñavalkyaḥ ca vāmadeva ādayaḥ pare

original: BhP_10.84.006/1 tān dṛṣṭvā sahasotthāya prāg āsīnā nṛpādayaḥ
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya prāk āsīnāḥ nṛpa ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.006/3 pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmau ca praṇemur viśva-vanditān
analyzed: pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa rāmau ca praṇemuḥ viśva vanditān

original: BhP_10.84.007/1 tān ānarcur yathā sarve saha-rāmo 'cyuto 'rcayat
analyzed: tān ānarcuḥ yathā sarve saharāmaḥ u cyutaḥ rcayat

original: BhP_10.84.007/3 svāgatāsana-pādyārghya- mālya-dhūpānulepanaiḥ
analyzed: svāgata āsana pādya arghya mālya dhūpa anulepanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.008/1 uvāca sukham āsīnān bhagavān dharma-gup-tanuḥ
analyzed: uvāca sukham āsīnān bhagavān

original: BhP_10.84.008/3 sadasas tasya mahato yata-vāco 'nuśṛṇvataḥ
analyzed: sadasaḥ tasya mahataḥ yata vācaḥ nuśṛṇvataḥ

original: BhP_10.84.009/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.009/1 aho vayaṃ janma-bhṛto labdhaṃ kārtsnyena tat-phalam
analyzed: aho vayam janma bhṛtaḥ labdham kārtsnyena tad phalam

original: BhP_10.84.009/3 devānām api duṣprāpaṃ yad yogeśvara-darśanam
analyzed: devānām api duṣprāpam yat yoga īśvara darśanam

original: BhP_10.84.010/1 kiṃ svalpa-tapasāṃ nṝṇām arcāyāṃ deva-cakṣuṣām
analyzed: kim su alpa tapasām nṝṇām arcāyām deva cakṣuṣām

original: BhP_10.84.010/3 darśana-sparśana-praśna- prahva-pādārcanādikam
BhP_10.84.011/1 na hy am-mayāni tīrthāni na devā mṛc-chilā-mayāḥ
analyzed: na hi am mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ mṛd śilā mayāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.011/3 te punanty uru-kālena darśanād eva sādhavaḥ
analyzed: te punanti uru kālena darśanāt eva sādhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.012/1 nāgnir na sūryo na ca candra-tārakā
analyzed: na agniḥ na sūryaḥ na ca candra tārakā

original: BhP_10.84.012/2 na bhūr jalaṃ khaṃ śvasano 'tha vāṅ manaḥ
analyzed: na bhūḥ jalam kham vāc manaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.012/3 upāsitā bheda-kṛto haranty aghaṃ
analyzed: upāsitāḥ bheda kṛtaḥ haranti agham

original: BhP_10.84.012/4 vipaścito ghnanti muhūrta-sevayā
analyzed: vipaścitaḥ ghnanti muhūrta sevayā

original: BhP_10.84.013/1 yasyātma-buddhiḥ kuṇape tri-dhātuke
analyzed: yasya ātma buddhiḥ kuṇape tri dhātuke

original: BhP_10.84.013/2 sva-dhīḥ kalatrādiṣu bhauma ijya-dhīḥ
analyzed: sva dhīḥ kalatra ādiṣu bhaumaḥ ijya dhīḥ

original: BhP_10.84.013/3 yat-tīrtha-buddhiḥ salile na karhicij
analyzed: yat tīrtha buddhiḥ salile na karhicit

original: BhP_10.84.013/4 janeṣv abhijñeṣu sa eva go-kharaḥ
analyzed: janeṣu abhijñeṣu saḥ eva go kharaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.014/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.014/1 niśamyetthaṃ bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasyākuṇtha-medhasaḥ
analyzed: niśamya ittham bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya akuṇtha medhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.014/3 vaco duranvayaṃ viprās tūṣṇīm āsan bhramad-dhiyaḥ
analyzed: vacaḥ duranvayam viprāḥ tūṣṇīm āsan bhramat dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.015/1 ciraṃ vimṛśya munaya īśvarasyeśitavyatām
analyzed: ciram vimṛśya munayaḥ īśvarasya īśitavya tām

original: BhP_10.84.015/3 jana-saṅgraha ity ūcuḥ smayantas taṃ jagad-gurum
analyzed: jana saṅgrahaḥ iti ūcuḥ smayantaḥ tam jagadgurum

original: BhP_10.84.016/0 śrī-munaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī munayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.84.016/1 yan-māyayā tattva-vid-uttamā vayaṃ vimohitā viśva-sṛjām adhīśvarāḥ
analyzed: yad māyayā tattva vid uttamāḥ vayam vimohitāḥ viśvasṛjām adhīśvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.016/3 yad īśitavyāyati gūḍha īhayā aho vicitram bhagavad-viceṣṭitam
analyzed: yat gūḍhe īhayā aho vicitram bhagavat viceṣṭitam

original: BhP_10.84.017/1 anīha etad bahudhaika ātmanā sṛjaty avaty atti na badhyate yathā
analyzed: anīhaḥ etat bahudhā ekaḥ ātmanā sṛjati avati atti na badhyate yathā

original: BhP_10.84.017/3 bhaumair hi bhūmir bahu-nāma-rūpiṇī aho vibhūmnaś caritaṃ viḍambanam
analyzed: bhaumaiḥ hi bhūmiḥ bahu nāmarūpiṇī aho vibhūmnaḥ caritam viḍambanam

original: BhP_10.84.018/1 athāpi kāle sva-janābhiguptaye bibharṣi sattvaṃ khala-nigrahāya ca
analyzed: athā api kāle sva jana abhiguptaye bibharṣi sattvam khala nigrahāya ca

original: BhP_10.84.018/3 sva-līlayā veda-pathaṃ sanātanaṃ varṇāśramātmā puruṣaḥ paro bhavān
analyzed: sva līlayā veda patham sanātanam varṇa āśrama ātmā puruṣaḥ paraḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.84.019/1 brahma te hṛdayaṃ śuklaṃ tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṃyamaiḥ
analyzed: brahma te hṛdayam śuklam tapaḥ svādhyāya saṃyamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.019/3 yatropalabdhaṃ sad vyaktam avyaktaṃ ca tataḥ param
analyzed: yatra upalabdham sat vyaktam avyaktam ca tatas param

original: BhP_10.84.020/1 tasmād brahma-kulaṃ brahman śāstra-yones tvam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt brahma kulam brahman śāstra yoneḥ tvam ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.020/3 sabhājayasi sad dhāma tad brahmaṇyāgraṇīr bhavān
analyzed: sabhājayasi sat dhāma tat brahmaṇya agraṇīḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.84.021/1 adya no janma-sāphalyaṃ vidyāyās tapaso dṛśaḥ
analyzed: adya naḥ janma sāphalyam vidyāyāḥ tapasaḥ dṛśaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.021/3 tvayā saṅgamya sad-gatyā yad antaḥ śreyasāṃ paraḥ
analyzed: tvayā saṅgamya sat gatyā yat antaḥ śreyasām paraḥ

original: BhP_10.84.022/1 namas tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase

original: BhP_10.84.022/3 sva-yogamāyayācchanna- mahimne paramātmane
analyzed: sva yoga māyayā ācchanna mahimne paramātmane

original: BhP_10.84.023/1 na yaṃ vidanty amī bhū-pā ekārāmāś ca vṛṣṇayaḥ
analyzed: na yam vidanti amī bhūpāḥ eka ārāmāḥ ca vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.023/3 māyā-javanikācchannam ātmānaṃ kālam īśvaram
analyzed: māyā javanikā ācchannam ātmānam kālam īśvaram

original: BhP_10.84.024/1 yathā śayānaḥ puruṣa ātmānaṃ guṇa-tattva-dṛk
analyzed: yathā śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmānam guṇa tattva dṛś

original: BhP_10.84.024/3 nāma-mātrendriyābhātaṃ na veda rahitaṃ param
analyzed: nāma mātra indriya ābhātam na veda rahitam param

original: BhP_10.84.025/1 evaṃ tvā nāma-mātreṣu viṣayeṣv indriyehayā
analyzed: evam tvā nāma mātreṣu viṣayeṣu indriya īhayā

original: BhP_10.84.025/3 māyayā vibhramac-citto na veda smṛty-upaplavāt
analyzed: māyayā vibhramat cittaḥ na veda smṛti upaplavāt

original: BhP_10.84.026/1 tasyādya te dadṛśimāṅghrim aghaugha-marṣa-
analyzed: tasya adya te dadṛśima aṅghrim agha ogha marṣa

original: BhP_10.84.026/2 tīrthāspadaṃ hṛdi kṛtaṃ su-vipakva-yogaiḥ
analyzed: tīrtha āspadam hṛdi kṛtam su vipakva yogaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.026/3 utsikta-bhakty-upahatāśaya jīva-kośā
analyzed: utsikta bhakti upahata āśaya jīva kośā

original: BhP_10.84.026/4 āpur bhavad-gatim athānugṛhāna bhaktān
analyzed: āpuḥ bhavat gatim atha anugṛhāna bhaktān

original: BhP_10.84.027/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.027/1 ity anujñāpya dāśārhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
analyzed: iti anujñāpya dāśārham dhṛtarāṣṭram yudhiṣṭhiram

original: BhP_10.84.027/3 rājarṣe svāśramān gantuṃ munayo dadhire manaḥ
analyzed: rājarṣe sva āśramān gantum munayaḥ dadhire manaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.028/1 tad vīkṣya tān upavrajya vasudevo mahā-yaśāḥ
analyzed: tat vīkṣya tān upavrajya vasudevaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.028/3 praṇamya copasaṅgṛhya babhāṣedaṃ su-yantritaḥ
analyzed: praṇamya ca upasaṅgṛhya babhāṣa idam su yantritaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.029/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.029/1 namo vaḥ sarva-devebhya ṛṣayaḥ śrotum arhatha
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ sarva devebhyaḥ ṛṣayaḥ śrotum arhatha

original: BhP_10.84.029/3 karmaṇā karma-nirhāro yathā syān nas tad ucyatām
analyzed: karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ yathā syāt naḥ tat ucyatām

original: BhP_10.84.030/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.030/1 nāti-citram idaṃ viprā vasudevo bubhutsayā
analyzed: na ati citram idam viprāḥ vasudevaḥ bubhutsayā

original: BhP_10.84.030/3 kṛṣṇam matvārbhakaṃ yan naḥ pṛcchati śreya ātmanaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇam matvā arbhakam yat naḥ pṛcchati śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.031/1 sannikarṣo 'tra martyānām anādaraṇa-kāraṇam
analyzed: sannikarṣaḥ tra martyānām an ādaraṇa kāraṇam

original: BhP_10.84.031/3 gāṅgaṃ hitvā yathānyāmbhas tatratyo yāti śuddhaye
analyzed: gāṅgam hitvā yathā anya ambhaḥ tatratyaḥ yāti śuddhaye

original: BhP_10.84.032/1 yasyānubhūtiḥ kālena layotpatty-ādināsya vai
analyzed: yasya anubhūtiḥ kālena laya utpatti ādinā asya vai

original: BhP_10.84.032/3 svato 'nyasmāc ca guṇato na kutaścana riṣyati
analyzed: svatas nyasmāt ca guṇataḥ na kutaścana riṣyati

original: BhP_10.84.033/1 taṃ kleśa-karma-paripāka-guṇa-pravāhair avyāhatānubhavam īśvaram advitīyam
analyzed: tam kleśa karma paripāka guṇa pravāhaiḥ avyāhata anubhavam īśvaram advitīyam

original: BhP_10.84.033/3 prāṇādibhiḥ sva-vibhavair upagūḍham anyo manyeta sūryam iva megha-himoparāgaiḥ
analyzed: prāṇa ādibhiḥ sva vibhavaiḥ upagūḍham anyaḥ manyeta sūryam iva megha hima uparāgaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.034/1 athocur munayo rājann ābhāṣyānalsadundabhim
analyzed: athā ūcuḥ munayaḥ rājan ābhāṣya anal sa dundabhim

original: BhP_10.84.034/3 sarveṣāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ rājñāṃ tathaivācyuta-rāmayoḥ
analyzed: sarveṣām śṛṇvatām rājñām tathā eva acyuta rāmayoḥ

original: BhP_10.84.035/1 karmaṇā karma-nirhāra eṣa sādhu-nirūpitaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ eṣa sādhu nirūpitaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.035/3 yac chraddhayā yajed viṣṇuṃ sarva-yajñeśvaraṃ makhaiḥ
analyzed: yat śraddhayā yajet viṣṇum sarva yajña īśvaram makhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.036/1 cittasyopaśamo 'yaṃ vai kavibhiḥ śāstra-cakṣusā
analyzed: cittasya upaśamaḥ yam vai kavibhiḥ śāstra cakṣusā

original: BhP_10.84.036/3 darśitaḥ su-gamo yogo dharmaś cātma-mud-āvahaḥ
analyzed: darśitaḥ sugamaḥ yogaḥ dharmaḥ ca ātma mudāvahaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.037/1 ayaṃ svasty-ayanaḥ panthā dvi-jāter gṛha-medhinaḥ
analyzed: ayam svasti ayanaḥ panthāḥ dvijāteḥ gṛhamedhinaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.037/3 yac chraddhayāpta-vittena śuklenejyeta pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: yat śraddhayā āpta vittena śuklena ijyeta pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.038/1 vittaiṣaṇāṃ yajña-dānair gṛhair dāra-sutaiṣaṇām
analyzed: vitta eṣaṇām yajña dānaiḥ gṛhaiḥ dāra suta eṣaṇām

original: BhP_10.84.038/3 ātma-lokaiṣaṇāṃ deva kālena visṛjed budhaḥ
analyzed: ātma loka eṣaṇām deva kālena visṛjet budhaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.038/5 grāme tyaktaiṣaṇāḥ sarve yayur dhīrās tapo-vanam
analyzed: grāme tyakta eṣaṇāḥ sarve yayuḥ dhīrāḥ tapaḥ vanam

original: BhP_10.84.039/1 ṛṇais tribhir dvijo jāto devarṣi-pitṝṇāṃ prabho
analyzed: ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ dvijaḥ jātaḥ deva ṛṣi pitṝṇām prabho

original: BhP_10.84.039/3 yajñādhyayana-putrais tāny anistīrya tyajan patet
analyzed: yajña adhyayana putraiḥ tāni a nistīrya tyajan patet

original: BhP_10.84.040/1 tvaṃ tv adya mukto dvābhyāṃ vai ṛṣi-pitror mahā-mate
analyzed: tvam tu adya muktaḥ dvābhyām vai ṛṣi pitroḥ mahāmate

original: BhP_10.84.040/3 yajñair devarṇam unmucya nirṛṇo 'śaraṇo bhava
analyzed: yajñaiḥ deva ṛṇam unmucya nirṛṇo śaraṇaḥ bhava

original: BhP_10.84.041/1 vasudeva bhavān nūnaṃ bhaktyā paramayā harim
analyzed: vasudeva bhavān nūnam bhaktyā paramayā harim

original: BhP_10.84.041/3 jagatām īśvaraṃ prārcaḥ sa yad vāṃ putratāṃ gataḥ
analyzed: jagatām īśvaram prārcaḥ sa yat vām putra tām gataḥ

original: BhP_10.84.042/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.042/1 iti tad-vacanaṃ śrutvā vasudevo mahā-manāḥ
analyzed: iti tat vacanam śrutvā vasudevaḥ mahā manāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.042/3 tān ṛṣīn ṛtvijo vavre mūrdhnānamya prasādya ca
analyzed: tān ṛṣīn ṛtvijaḥ vavre mūrdhnā ānamya prasādya ca

original: BhP_10.84.043/1 ta enam ṛṣayo rājan vṛtā dharmeṇa dhārmikam
analyzed: te enam ṛṣayaḥ rājan vṛtāḥ dharmeṇa dhārmikam

original: BhP_10.84.043/3 tasminn ayājayan kṣetre makhair uttama-kalpakaiḥ
analyzed: tasmin ayājayan kṣetre makhaiḥ uttama kalpakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.044/1 tad-dīkṣāyāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ puṣkara-srajaḥ
analyzed: tad dīkṣāyām pravṛttāyām vṛṣṇayaḥ puṣkara srajaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.044/3 snātāḥ su-vāsaso rājan rājānaḥ suṣṭhv-alaṅkṛtāḥ
analyzed: snātāḥ su vāsasaḥ rājan rājānaḥ suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.045/1 tan-mahiṣyaś ca muditā niṣka-kaṇṭhyaḥ su-vāsasaḥ
analyzed: tad mahiṣyaḥ ca muditāḥ niṣka kaṇṭhyaḥ su vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.045/3 dīkṣā-śālām upājagmur āliptā vastu-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: dīkṣā śālām upājagmuḥ āliptāḥ vastu pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.046/1 nedur mṛdaṅga-paṭaha- śaṅkha-bhery-ānakādayaḥ
analyzed: neduḥ mṛdaṅga paṭaha śaṅkha bherī ānaka ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.046/3 nanṛtur naṭa-nartakyas tuṣṭuvuḥ sūta-māgadhāḥ
analyzed: nanṛtuḥ naṭa nartakyaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ sūta māgadhāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.046/5 jaguḥ su-kaṇṭhyo gandharvyaḥ saṅgītaṃ saha-bhartṛkāḥ
analyzed: jaguḥ su kaṇṭhyaḥ gandharvyaḥ saṅgītam sahabhartṛkāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.047/1 tam abhyaṣiñcan vidhi-vad aktam abhyaktam ṛtvijaḥ
analyzed: tam abhyaṣiñcan vidhivat aktam abhyaktam ṛtvijaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.047/3 patnībhir aṣṭā-daśabhiḥ soma-rājam ivoḍubhiḥ
analyzed: patnībhiḥ aṣṭādaśabhiḥ somarājam iva uḍubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.048/1 tābhir dukūla-valayair hāra-nūpura-kuṇḍalaiḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ dukūla valayaiḥ hāra nūpura kuṇḍalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.048/3 sv-alaṅkṛtābhir vibabhau dīkṣito 'jina-saṃvṛtaḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtābhiḥ vibabhau dīkṣitaḥ jina saṃvṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.049/1 tasyartvijo mahā-rāja ratna-kauśeya-vāsasaḥ
analyzed: tasya ṛtvijaḥ mahā rāja ratna kauśeya vāsasaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.049/3 sa-sadasyā virejus te yathā vṛtra-haṇo 'dhvare
analyzed: sasadasyāḥ virejuḥ te yathā vṛtra haṇaḥ dhvare

original: BhP_10.84.050/1 tadā rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca svaiḥ svair bandhubhir anvitau
analyzed: tadā rāmaḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca svaiḥ svaiḥ bandhubhiḥ anvitau

original: BhP_10.84.050/3 rejatuḥ sva-sutair dārair jīveśau sva-vibhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: rejatuḥ sva sutaiḥ dāraiḥ jīva īśau sva vibhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.051/1 īje 'nu-yajñaṃ vidhinā agni-hotrādi-lakṣaṇaiḥ
analyzed: īje nu yajñam vidhinā agnihotra ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.051/3 prākṛtair vaikṛtair yajñair dravya-jñāna-kriyeśvaram
analyzed: prākṛtaiḥ vaikṛtaiḥ yajñaiḥ dravya jñāna kriyā īśvaram

original: BhP_10.84.052/1 athartvigbhyo 'dadāt kāle yathāmnātaṃ sa dakṣiṇāḥ
analyzed: atha ṛtvigbhyaḥ dadāt kāle yathāmnātam sa dakṣiṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.052/3 sv-alaṅkṛtebhyo 'laṅkṛtya go-bhū-kanyā mahā-dhanāḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ laṅkṛtya go bhū kanyāḥ mahādhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.053/1 patnī-saṃyājāvabhṛthyaiś caritvā te maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: patnīsaṃyāja āvabhṛthyaiḥ caritvā te mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.053/3 sasnū rāma-hrade viprā yajamāna-puraḥ-sarāḥ
analyzed: sasnuḥ rāmahrade viprāḥ yajamāna puraḥsarāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.054/1 snāto 'laṅkāra-vāsāṃsi vandibhyo 'dāt tathā striyaḥ
analyzed: snātaḥ laṅkāra vāsāṃsi vandibhyaḥ dāt tathā striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.054/3 tataḥ sv-alaṅkṛto varṇān ā-śvabhyo 'nnena pūjayat
analyzed: tatas su alaṅkṛtaḥ varṇān āśvabhyaḥ nnena pūjayat

original: BhP_10.84.055/1 bandhūn sa-dārān sa-sutān pāribarheṇa bhūyasā
analyzed: bandhūn sa dārān sa sutān pāribarheṇa bhūyasā

original: BhP_10.84.055/3 vidarbha-kośala-kurūn kāśi-kekaya-sṛñjayān
analyzed: vidarbha kośala kurūn kāśi kekaya sṛñjayān

original: BhP_10.84.056/1 sadasyartvik-sura-gaṇān nṛ-bhūta-pitṛ-cāraṇān
analyzed: sadasya ṛtvij sura gaṇān nṛ bhūta pitṛ cāraṇān

original: BhP_10.84.056/3 śrī-niketam anujñāpya śaṃsantaḥ prayayuḥ kratum
analyzed: śrīniketam anujñāpya śaṃsantaḥ prayayuḥ kratum

original: BhP_10.84.057/1 dhṛtarāṣṭro 'nujaḥ pārthā bhīṣmo droṇaḥ pṛthā yamau
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ nujaḥ pārthāḥ bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ pṛthā yamau

original: BhP_10.84.057/3 nārado bhagavān vyāsaḥ suhṛt-sambandhi-bāndhavāḥ
BhP_10.84.058/1 bandhūn pariṣvajya yadūn sauhṛdāklinna-cetasaḥ
analyzed: bandhūn pariṣvajya yadūn sauhṛda āklinna cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.058/3 yayur viraha-kṛcchreṇa sva-deśāṃś cāpare janāḥ
analyzed: yayuḥ viraha kṛcchreṇa sva deśān ca apare janāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.059/1 nandas tu saha gopālair bṛhatyā pūjayārcitaḥ
analyzed: nandaḥ tu saha gopālaiḥ bṛhatyā pūjayā arcitaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.059/3 kṛṣṇa-rāmograsenādyair nyavātsīd bandhu-vatsalaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāma ugrasena ādyaiḥ nyavātsīt bandhu vatsalaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.060/1 vasudevo 'ñjasottīrya manoratha-mahārṇavam
analyzed: vasudevaḥ ñjasā uttīrya manoratha mahā arṇavam

original: BhP_10.84.060/3 suhṛd-vṛtaḥ prīta-manā nandam āha kare spṛśan
analyzed: suhṛd vṛtaḥ prīta manāḥ nandam āha kare spṛśan

original: BhP_10.84.061/0 śrī-vasudeva uvāca
analyzed: śrī vasudevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.061/1 bhrātar īśa-kṛtaḥ pāśo nṛnāṃ yaḥ sneha-saṃjñitaḥ
analyzed: bhrātar īśa kṛtaḥ pāśaḥ nṛnām yaḥ sneha saṃjñitaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.061/3 taṃ dustyajam ahaṃ manye śūrāṇām api yoginām
analyzed: tam dustyajam aham manye śūrāṇām api yoginām

original: BhP_10.84.062/1 asmāsv apratikalpeyaṃ yat kṛtājñeṣu sattamaiḥ
analyzed: asmāsu a pratikalpā iyam yat kṛta ājñeṣu sattamaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.062/3 maitry arpitāphalā cāpi na nivarteta karhicit
analyzed: maitrī arpita aphalā ca api na nivarteta karhicit

original: BhP_10.84.063/1 prāg akalpāc ca kuśalaṃ bhrātar vo nācarāma hi
analyzed: prāk akalpāt ca kuśalam bhrātar vaḥ na ācarāma hi

original: BhP_10.84.063/3 adhunā śrī-madāndhākṣā na paśyāmaḥ puraḥ sataḥ
analyzed: adhunā śrīmat āndha akṣāḥ na paśyāmaḥ puras sataḥ

original: BhP_10.84.064/1 mā rājya-śrīr abhūt puṃsaḥ śreyas-kāmasya māna-da
analyzed: mā rājya śrīḥ abhūt puṃsaḥ śreyaskāmasya mānada

original: BhP_10.84.064/3 sva-janān uta bandhūn vā na paśyati yayāndha-dṛk
analyzed: sva janān uta bandhūn vā na paśyati yayā andha dṛś

original: BhP_10.84.065/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.84.065/1 evaṃ sauhṛda-śaithilya- citta ānakadundubhiḥ
analyzed: evam sauhṛda śaithilya cittaḥ ānakadundubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.065/3 ruroda tat-kṛtāṃ maitrīṃ smarann aśru-vilocanaḥ
analyzed: ruroda tad kṛtām maitrīm smaran aśru vilocanaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.066/1 nandas tu sakhyuḥ priya-kṛt premṇā govinda-rāmayoḥ
analyzed: nandaḥ tu sakhyuḥ priya kṛt premṇā govinda rāmayoḥ

original: BhP_10.84.066/3 adya śva iti māsāṃs trīn yadubhir mānito 'vasat
analyzed: adya śvas iti māsān trīn yadubhiḥ mānitaḥ vasat

original: BhP_10.84.067/1 tataḥ kāmaiḥ pūryamāṇaḥ sa-vrajaḥ saha-bāndhavaḥ
analyzed: tatas kāmaiḥ pūryamāṇaḥ sa vrajaḥ sahabāndhavaḥ

original: BhP_10.84.067/3 parārdhyābharaṇa-kṣauma- nānānarghya-paricchadaiḥ
analyzed: parārdhya ābharaṇa kṣauma nānā anarghya paricchadaiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.068/1 vasudevograsenābhyāṃ kṛṣṇoddhava-balādibhiḥ
analyzed: vasudeva ugrasenābhyām kṛṣṇa uddhava bala ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.84.068/3 dattam ādāya pāribarhaṃ yāpito yadubhir yayau
analyzed: dattam ādāya pāribarham yāpitaḥ yadubhiḥ yayau

original: BhP_10.84.069/1 nando gopāś ca gopyaś ca govinda-caraṇāmbuje
analyzed: nandaḥ gopāḥ ca gopyaḥ ca govinda caraṇa ambuje

original: BhP_10.84.069/3 manaḥ kṣiptaṃ punar hartum anīśā mathurāṃ yayuḥ
analyzed: manaḥ kṣiptam punar hartum anīśāḥ mathurām yayuḥ

original: BhP_10.84.070/1 bandhuṣu pratiyāteṣu vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-devatāḥ
analyzed: bandhuṣu pratiyāteṣu vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa devatāḥ

original: BhP_10.84.070/3 vīkṣya prāvṛṣam āsannād yayur dvāravatīṃ punaḥ
analyzed: vīkṣya prāvṛṣam āsannāt yayuḥ dvāravatīm punar

original: BhP_10.84.071/1 janebhyaḥ kathayāṃ cakrur yadu-deva-mahotsavam
analyzed: janebhyaḥ cakruḥ yadu deva mahā utsavam

original: BhP_10.84.071/3 yad āsīt tīrtha-yātrāyāṃ suhṛt-sandarśanādikam
analyzed: yat āsīt tīrtha yātrāyām suhṛd sandarśana ādikam

original: BhP_10.85.001/0 śrī-bādarāyaṇir uvāca
analyzed: śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.001/1 athaikadātmajau prāptau kṛta-pādābhivandanau
analyzed: atha ekadā ātmajau prāptau kṛta pāda abhivandanau

original: BhP_10.85.001/3 vasudevo 'bhinandyāha prītyā saṅkarṣaṇācyutau
analyzed: vasudevaḥ bhinandya āha prītyā saṅkarṣaṇa acyutau

original: BhP_10.85.002/1 munīnāṃ sa vacaḥ śrutvā putrayor dhāma-sūcakam
analyzed: munīnām sa vacaḥ śrutvā putrayoḥ dhāma sūcakam

original: BhP_10.85.002/3 tad-vīryair jāta-viśrambhaḥ paribhāṣyābhyabhāṣata
analyzed: tad vīryaiḥ jāta viśrambhaḥ paribhāṣya abhyabhāṣata

original: BhP_10.85.003/1 kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin saṅkarṣaṇa sanātana
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahāyogin saṅkarṣaṇa sanātana

original: BhP_10.85.003/3 jāne vām asya yat sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣau parau
analyzed: jāne vām asya yat sākṣāt pradhāna puruṣau parau

original: BhP_10.85.004/1 yatra yena yato yasya yasmai yad yad yathā yadā
analyzed: yatra yena yatas yasya yasmai yat yat yathā yadā

original: BhP_10.85.004/3 syād idaṃ bhagavān sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣeśvaraḥ
analyzed: syāt idam bhagavān sākṣāt pradhāna puruṣa īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.85.005/1 etan nānā-vidhaṃ viśvam ātma-sṛṣṭam adhokṣaja
analyzed: etat nānāvidham viśvam ātma sṛṣṭam adhokṣaja

original: BhP_10.85.005/3 ātmanānupraviśyātman prāṇo jīvo bibharṣy aja
analyzed: ātmanā anupraviśya ātman prāṇaḥ jīvaḥ bibharṣi aja

original: BhP_10.85.006/1 prāṇādīnāṃ viśva-sṛjāṃ śaktayo yāḥ parasya tāḥ
analyzed: prāṇa ādīnām viśvasṛjām śaktayaḥ yāḥ parasya tāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.006/3 pāratantryād vaisādṛṣyād dvayoś ceṣṭaiva ceṣṭatām
analyzed: pāratantryāt vaisādṛṣyāt dvayoḥ ceṣṭā eva ceṣṭatām

original: BhP_10.85.007/1 kāntis tejaḥ prabhā sattā candrāgny-arkarkṣa-vidyutām
analyzed: kāntiḥ tejaḥ prabhā sattā candra agni arka ṛkṣa vidyutām

original: BhP_10.85.007/3 yat sthairyaṃ bhū-bhṛtāṃ bhūmer vṛttir gandho 'rthato bhavān
analyzed: yat sthairyam bhūbhṛtām bhūmeḥ vṛttiḥ gandhaḥ rthataḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.85.008/1 tarpaṇaṃ prāṇanam apāṃ deva tvaṃ tāś ca tad-rasaḥ
analyzed: tarpaṇam prāṇanam apām deva tvam tāḥ ca tad rasaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.008/3 ojaḥ saho balaṃ ceṣṭā gatir vāyos taveśvara
analyzed: ojaḥ sahaḥ balam ca iṣṭā gatiḥ vāyoḥ tava īśvara

original: BhP_10.85.009/1 diśāṃ tvam avakāśo 'si diśaḥ khaṃ sphoṭa āśrayaḥ
analyzed: diśām tvam avakāśaḥ si diśaḥ kham sphoṭaḥ āśrayaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.009/3 nādo varṇas tvam oṃ-kāra ākṛtīnāṃ pṛthak-kṛtiḥ
analyzed: nādaḥ varṇaḥ tvam oṃkāraḥ ākṛtīnām pṛthakkṛtiḥ

original: BhP_10.85.010/1 indriyaṃ tv indriyāṇāṃ tvaṃ devāś ca tad-anugrahaḥ
analyzed: indriyam tu indriyāṇām tvam devāḥ ca tad anugrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.010/3 avabodho bhavān buddher jīvasyānusmṛtiḥ satī
analyzed: avabodhaḥ bhavān buddheḥ jīvasya anusmṛtiḥ satī

original: BhP_10.85.011/1 bhūtānām asi bhūtādir indriyāṇāṃ ca taijasaḥ
analyzed: bhūtānām asi bhūtādiḥ indriyāṇām ca taijasaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.011/3 vaikāriko vikalpānāṃ pradhānam anuśāyinam
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ vikalpānām pradhānam anuśāyinam

original: BhP_10.85.012/1 naśvareṣv iha bhāveṣu tad asi tvam anaśvaram
analyzed: naśvareṣu iha bhāveṣu tat asi tvam anaśvaram

original: BhP_10.85.012/3 yathā dravya-vikāreṣu dravya-mātraṃ nirūpitam
analyzed: yathā dravya vikāreṣu dravya mātram nirūpitam

original: BhP_10.85.013/1 sattvam rajas tama iti guṇās tad-vṛttayaś ca yāḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ tad vṛttayaḥ ca yāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.013/3 tvayy addhā brahmaṇi pare kalpitā yoga-māyayā
analyzed: tvayi addhā brahmaṇi pare kalpitāḥ yoga māyayā

original: BhP_10.85.014/1 tasmān na santy amī bhāvā yarhi tvayi vikalpitāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt na santi amī bhāvāḥ yarhi tvayi vikalpitāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.014/3 tvaṃ cāmīṣu vikāreṣu hy anyadāvyāvahārikaḥ
analyzed: tvam ca amīṣu vikāreṣu hi anyadā āvyāvahārikaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.015/1 guṇa-pravāha etasminn abudhās tv akhilātmanaḥ
analyzed: guṇa pravāhe etasmin abudhāḥ tu akhilātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.015/3 gatiṃ sūkṣmām abodhena saṃsarantīha karmabhiḥ
analyzed: gatim sūkṣmām abodhena saṃsaranti iha karmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.85.016/1 yadṛcchayā nṛtāṃ prāpya su-kalpām iha durlabhām
analyzed: yadṛcchayā nṛtām prāpya su kalpām iha durlabhām

original: BhP_10.85.016/3 svārthe pramattasya vayo gataṃ tvan-māyayeśvara
analyzed: sva arthe pramattasya vayaḥ gatam tvad māyayā īśvara

original: BhP_10.85.017/1 asāv aham mamaivaite dehe cāsyānvayādiṣu
analyzed: asau aham mama eva ete dehe ca asya anvaya ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.85.017/3 sneha-pāśair nibadhnāti bhavān sarvam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: sneha pāśaiḥ nibadhnāti bhavān sarvam idam jagat

original: BhP_10.85.018/1 yuvāṃ na naḥ sutau sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣeśvarau
analyzed: yuvām na naḥ sutau sākṣāt pradhāna puruṣa īśvarau

original: BhP_10.85.018/3 bhū-bhāra-kṣatra-kṣapaṇa avatīrṇau tathāttha ha
analyzed: bhū bhāra kṣatra kṣapaṇa avatīrṇau tathā āttha ha

original: BhP_10.85.019/1 tat te gato 'smy araṇam adya padāravindam
analyzed: tat te gataḥ smi araṇam adya pada aravindam

original: BhP_10.85.019/2 āpanna-saṃsṛti-bhayāpaham ārta-bandho
analyzed: āpanna saṃsṛti bhaya apaham ārta bandho

original: BhP_10.85.019/3 etāvatālam alam indriya-lālasena
analyzed: etāvatā alam alam indriya lālasena

original: BhP_10.85.019/4 martyātma-dṛk tvayi pare yad apatya-buddhiḥ
analyzed: martya ātma dṛś tvayi pare yat apatya buddhiḥ

original: BhP_10.85.020/1 sūtī-gṛhe nanu jagāda bhavān ajo nau
analyzed: sūtīgṛhe nanu jagāda bhavān ajaḥ nau

original: BhP_10.85.020/2 sañjajña ity anu-yugaṃ nija-dharma-guptyai
analyzed: sañjajñe iti anuyugam nija dharma guptyai

original: BhP_10.85.020/3 nānā-tanūr gagana-vad vidadhaj jahāsi
analyzed: nānā tanūḥ gaganavat vidadhat jahāsi

original: BhP_10.85.020/4 ko veda bhūmna uru-gāya vibhūti-māyām
analyzed: kaḥ veda bhūmnaḥ uru gāya vibhūti māyām

original: BhP_10.85.021/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.021/1 ākarṇyetthaṃ pitur vākyaṃ bhagavān sātvatarṣabhaḥ
analyzed: ākarṇya ittham pituḥ vākyam bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.021/3 pratyāha praśrayānamraḥ prahasan ślakṣṇayā girā
analyzed: pratyāha praśraya ānamraḥ prahasan ślakṣṇayā girā

original: BhP_10.85.022/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.022/1 vaco vaḥ samavetārthaṃ tātaitad upamanmahe
analyzed: vacaḥ vaḥ samaveta artham tāta etat upamanmahe

original: BhP_10.85.022/3 yan naḥ putrān samuddiśya tattva-grāma udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: yat naḥ putrān samuddiśya tattva grāmaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.023/1 ahaṃ yūyam asāv ārya ime ca dvārakāukasaḥ
analyzed: aham yūyam asau āryaḥ ime ca dvārakā okasaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.023/3 sarve 'py evaṃ yadu-śreṣṭha vimṛgyāḥ sa-carācaram
analyzed: sarve pi evam yadu śreṣṭha vimṛgyāḥ sacarācaram

original: BhP_10.85.024/1 ātmā hy ekaḥ svayaṃ-jyotir nityo 'nyo nirguṇo guṇaiḥ
analyzed: ātmā hi ekaḥ svayam jyotiḥ nityaḥ nyaḥ nirguṇaḥ guṇaiḥ

original: BhP_10.85.024/3 ātma-sṛṣṭais tat-kṛteṣu bhūteṣu bahudheyate
analyzed: ātma sṛṣṭaiḥ tad kṛteṣu bhūteṣu bahudhā iyate

original: BhP_10.85.025/1 khaṃ vāyur jyotir āpo bhūs tat-kṛteṣu yathāśayam
analyzed: kham vāyuḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ bhūḥ tad kṛteṣu yathāśayam

original: BhP_10.85.025/3 āvis-tiro-'lpa-bhūry eko nānātvaṃ yāty asāv api
analyzed: āvis tiras ulpa bhūri ekaḥ nānātvam yāti asau api

original: BhP_10.85.026/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.026/1 evaṃ bhagavatā rājan vasudeva udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: evam bhagavatā rājan vasudevaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.026/3 śrutvā vinaṣṭa-nānā-dhīs tūṣṇīṃ prīta-manā abhūt
analyzed: śrutvā vinaṣṭa nānā dhīḥ tūṣṇīm prīta manāḥ abhūt

original: BhP_10.85.027/1 atha tatra kuru-śreṣṭha devakī sarva-devatā
analyzed: atha tatra kuruśreṣṭha devakī sarva devatā

original: BhP_10.85.027/3 śrutvānītaṃ guroḥ putram ātmajābhyāṃ su-vismitā
analyzed: śrutvā ānītam guroḥ putram ātmajābhyām su vismitā

original: BhP_10.85.028/1 kṛṣṇa-rāmau samāśrāvya putrān kaṃsa-vihiṃsitān
analyzed: kṛṣṇa rāmau samāśrāvya putrān kaṃsa vihiṃsitān

original: BhP_10.85.028/3 smarantī kṛpaṇaṃ prāha vaiklavyād aśru-locanā
analyzed: smarantī kṛpaṇam prāha vaiklavyāt aśru locanā

original: BhP_10.85.029/0 śrī-devaky uvāca
analyzed: śrī devakī uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.029/1 rāma rāmāprameyātman kṛṣṇa yogeśvareśvara
analyzed: rāma rāma aprameya ātman kṛṣṇa yogeśvara īśvara

original: BhP_10.85.029/3 vedāhaṃ vāṃ viśva-sṛjām īśvarāv ādi-pūruṣau
analyzed: veda aham vām viśva sṛjām īśvarau ādi pūruṣau

original: BhP_10.85.030/1 kala-vidhvasta-sattvānāṃ rājñām ucchāstra-vartinām
analyzed: kala vidhvasta sattvānām rājñām ucchāstra vartinām

original: BhP_10.85.030/3 bhūmer bhārāyamāṇānām avatīrṇau kilādya me
analyzed: bhūmeḥ bhārāyamāṇānām avatīrṇau kila adya me

original: BhP_10.85.031/1 yasyāṃśāṃśāṃśa-bhāgena viśvotpatti-layodayāḥ
BhP_10.85.031/3 bhavanti kila viśvātmaṃs taṃ tvādyāhaṃ gatiṃ gatā
analyzed: bhavanti kila viśvātman tam tvā adya aham gatim gatā

original: BhP_10.85.032/1 cirān mṛta-sutādāne guruṇā kila coditau
analyzed: cirāt mṛta sutā dāne guruṇā kila coditau

original: BhP_10.85.032/3 āninyathuḥ pitṛ-sthānād gurave guru-dakṣiṇām
analyzed: āninyathuḥ pitṛ sthānāt gurave guru dakṣiṇām

original: BhP_10.85.033/1 tathā me kurutaṃ kāmaṃ yuvāṃ yogeśvareśvarau
analyzed: tathā me kurutam kāmam yuvām yoga īśvara īśvarau

original: BhP_10.85.033/3 bhoja-rāja-hatān putrān kāmaye draṣṭum āhṛtān
analyzed: bhoja rāja hatān putrān kāmaye draṣṭum āhṛtān

original: BhP_10.85.034/0 ṛṣir uvāca
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.034/1 evaṃ sañcoditau mātrā rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca bhārata
analyzed: evam sañcoditau mātrā rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca bhārata

original: BhP_10.85.034/3 sutalaṃ saṃviviśatur yoga-māyām upāśritau
analyzed: sutalam saṃviviśatuḥ yoga māyām upāśritau

original: BhP_10.85.035/1 tasmin praviṣṭāv upalabhya daitya-rāḍ
analyzed: tasmin praviṣṭau upalabhya daitya rāj

original: BhP_10.85.035/2 viśvātma-daivaṃ sutarāṃ tathātmanaḥ
analyzed: viśvātma daivam sutarām tathā ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.035/3 tad-darśanāhlāda-pariplutāśayaḥ
analyzed: tad darśana āhlāda paripluta āśayaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.035/4 sadyaḥ samutthāya nanāma sānvayaḥ
analyzed: sadyas samutthāya nanāma sa anvayaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.036/1 tayoḥ samānīya varāsanaṃ mudā niviṣṭayos tatra mahātmanos tayoḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ samānīya varāsanam mudā niviṣṭayoḥ tatra mahātmanoḥ tayoḥ

original: BhP_10.85.036/3 dadhāra pādāv avanijya taj jalaṃ sa-vṛnda ā-brahma punad yad ambu ha
analyzed: dadhāra pādau avanijya tat jalam sa vṛndaḥ ābrahma punat yat ambu ha

original: BhP_10.85.037/1 samarhayām āsa sa tau vibhūtibhir mahārha-vastrābharaṇānulepanaiḥ
analyzed: samarhayām āsa sa tau vibhūtibhiḥ mahārha vastra ābharaṇa anulepanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.85.037/3 tāmbūla-dīpāmṛta-bhakṣaṇādibhiḥ sva-gotra-vittātma-samarpaṇena ca
analyzed: tāmbūla dīpa amṛta bhakṣaṇa ādibhiḥ sva gotra vitta ātma samarpaṇena ca

original: BhP_10.85.038/1 sa indraseno bhagavat-padāmbujaṃ bibhran muhuḥ prema-vibhinnayā dhiyā
analyzed: saḥ indrasenaḥ bhagavat pada ambujam bibhran muhur prema vibhinnayā dhiyā

original: BhP_10.85.038/3 uvāca hānanda-jalākulekṣaṇaḥ prahṛṣṭa-romā nṛpa gadgadākṣaram
analyzed: uvāca ha ānanda jala ākula īkṣaṇaḥ prahṛṣṭa romā nṛpa gadgada akṣaram

original: BhP_10.85.039/0 balir uvāca
analyzed: baliḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.039/1 namo 'nantāya bṛhate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
analyzed: namaḥ nantāya bṛhate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase

original: BhP_10.85.039/3 sāṅkhya-yoga-vitānāya brahmaṇe paramātmane
analyzed: sāṅkhya yoga vitānāya brahmaṇe paramātmane

original: BhP_10.85.040/1 darśanaṃ vāṃ hi bhūtānāṃ duṣprāpaṃ cāpy adurlabham
analyzed: darśanam vām hi bhūtānām duṣprāpam ca api adurlabham

original: BhP_10.85.040/3 rajas-tamaḥ-svabhāvānāṃ yan naḥ prāptau yadṛcchayā
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ svabhāvānām yat naḥ prāptau yadṛcchayā

original: BhP_10.85.041/1 daitya-dānava-gandharvāḥ siddha-vidyādhra-cāraṇāḥ
analyzed: daitya dānava gandharvāḥ siddha vidyādhra cāraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.041/3 yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-piśācāś ca bhūta-pramatha-nāyakāḥ
analyzed: yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśācāḥ ca bhūta pramatha nāyakāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.042/1 viśuddha-sattva-dhāmny addhā tvayi śāstra-śarīriṇi
analyzed: viśuddha sattva dhāmni addhā tvayi śāstra śarīriṇi

original: BhP_10.85.042/3 nityaṃ nibaddha-vairās te vayaṃ cānye ca tādṛśāḥ
analyzed: nityam nibaddha vairāḥ te vayam ca anye ca tādṛśāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.043/1 kecanodbaddha-vaireṇa bhaktyā kecana kāmataḥ
analyzed: kecana udbaddha vaireṇa bhaktyā kecana kāmataḥ

original: BhP_10.85.043/3 na tathā sattva-saṃrabdhāḥ sannikṛṣṭāḥ surādayaḥ
analyzed: na tathā sattva saṃrabdhāḥ sannikṛṣṭāḥ sura ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.044/1 idam ittham iti prāyas tava yogeśvareśvara
analyzed: idam ittham iti prāyas tava yoga īśvara īśvara

original: BhP_10.85.044/3 na vidanty api yogeśā yoga-māyāṃ kuto vayam
analyzed: na vidanti api yogeśāḥ yoga māyām kutas vayam

original: BhP_10.85.045/1 tan naḥ prasīda nirapekṣa-vimṛgya-yuṣmat
analyzed: tat naḥ prasīda nirapekṣa vimṛgya yuṣmat

original: BhP_10.85.045/2 pādāravinda-dhiṣaṇānya-gṛhāndha-kūpāt
analyzed: pāda aravinda dhiṣaṇā anya gṛha andhakūpāt

original: BhP_10.85.045/3 niṣkramya viśva-śaraṇāṅghry-upalabdha-vṛttiḥ
analyzed: niṣkramya viśva śaraṇa aṅghri upalabdha vṛttiḥ

original: BhP_10.85.045/4 śānto yathaika uta sarva-sakhaiś carāmi
analyzed: śāntaḥ yathā ekaḥ uta sarva sakhaiḥ carāmi

original: BhP_10.85.046/1 śādhy asmān īśitavyeśa niṣpāpān kuru naḥ prabho
analyzed: śādhi asmān īśitavya īśa niṣpāpān kuru naḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.85.046/3 pumān yac chraddhayātiṣṭhaṃś codanāyā vimucyate
analyzed: pumān yat śraddhayā a tiṣṭhan codanāyāḥ vimucyate

original: BhP_10.85.047/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.047/1 āsan marīceḥ ṣaṭ putrā ūrṇāyāṃ prathame 'ntare
analyzed: āsan marīceḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ ūrṇāyām prathame ntare

original: BhP_10.85.047/3 devāḥ kaṃ jahasur vīkṣya sutaṃ yabhitum udyatam
analyzed: devāḥ kam jahasuḥ vīkṣya sutam yabhitum udyatam

original: BhP_10.85.048/1 tenāsurīm agan yonim adhunāvadya-karmaṇā
analyzed: tena āsurīm agan yonim adhunā avadya karmaṇā

original: BhP_10.85.048/3 hiraṇyakaśipor jātā nītās te yoga-māyayā
analyzed: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ jātāḥ nītāḥ te yoga māyayā

original: BhP_10.85.049/1 devakyā udare jātā rājan kaṃsa-vihiṃsitāḥ
analyzed: devakyāḥ udare jātāḥ rājan kaṃsa vihiṃsitāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.049/3 sā tān śocaty ātmajān svāṃs ta ime 'dhyāsate 'ntike
analyzed: sā tān śocati ātmajān svān te ime dhyāsate ntike

original: BhP_10.85.050/1 ita etān praṇeṣyāmo mātṛ-śokāpanuttaye
analyzed: itas etān praṇeṣyāmaḥ mātṛ śoka apanuttaye

original: BhP_10.85.050/3 tataḥ śāpād vinirmaktā lokaṃ yāsyanti vijvarāḥ
analyzed: tatas śāpāt vinirmaktāḥ lokam yāsyanti vijvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.051/1 smarodgīthaḥ pariṣvaṅgaḥ pataṅgaḥ kṣudrabhṛd ghṛṇī
BhP_10.85.051/3 ṣaḍ ime mat-prasādena punar yāsyanti sad-gatim
analyzed: ṣaṭ ime mad prasādena punar yāsyanti sat gatim

original: BhP_10.85.052/1 ity uktvā tān samādāya indrasenena pūjitau
analyzed: iti uktvā tān samādāya indrasenena pūjitau

original: BhP_10.85.052/3 punar dvāravatīm etya mātuḥ putrān ayacchatām
analyzed: punar dvāravatīm etya mātuḥ putrān ayacchatām

original: BhP_10.85.053/1 tān dṛṣṭvā bālakān devī putra-sneha-snuta-stanī
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā bālakān devī putra sneha snuta stanī

original: BhP_10.85.053/3 pariṣvajyāṅkam āropya mūrdhny ajighrad abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
analyzed: pariṣvajya aṅkam āropya mūrdhni ajighrat abhīkṣṇaśas

original: BhP_10.85.054/1 apāyayat stanaṃ prītā suta-sparśa-parisnutam
analyzed: apāyayat stanam prītā suta sparśa parisnutam

original: BhP_10.85.054/3 mohitā māyayā viṣṇor yayā sṛṣṭiḥ pravartate
analyzed: mohitāḥ māyayā viṣṇoḥ yayā sṛṣṭiḥ pravartate

original: BhP_10.85.055/1 pītvāmṛtaṃ payas tasyāḥ pīta-śeṣaṃ gadā-bhṛtaḥ
analyzed: pītvā amṛtam payaḥ tasyāḥ pīta śeṣam gadābhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.055/3 nārāyaṇāṅga-saṃsparśa- pratilabdhātma-darśanāḥ
analyzed: nārāyaṇa aṅga saṃsparśa pratilabdha ātma darśanāḥ

original: BhP_10.85.056/1 te namaskṛtya govindaṃ devakīṃ pitaraṃ balam
analyzed: te namaskṛtya govindam devakīm pitaram balam

original: BhP_10.85.056/3 miṣatāṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ yayur dhāma divaukasām
analyzed: miṣatām sarva bhūtānām yayuḥ dhāma divaukasām

original: BhP_10.85.057/1 taṃ dṛṣṭvā devakī devī mṛtāgamana-nirgamam
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā devakī devī mṛta āgamana nirgamam

original: BhP_10.85.057/3 mene su-vismitā māyāṃ kṛṣṇasya racitāṃ nṛpa
analyzed: mene su vismitā māyām kṛṣṇasya racitām nṛpa

original: BhP_10.85.058/1 evaṃ-vidhāny adbhutāni kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ
analyzed: evaṃvidhāni adbhutāni kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.85.058/3 vīryāṇy ananta-vīryasya santy anantāni bhārata
analyzed: vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya santi anantāni bhārata

original: BhP_10.85.059/0 śrī-sūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.85.059/1 ya idam anuśṛṇoti śrāvayed vā murāreś
analyzed: yaḥ idam anuśṛṇoti śrāvayet vā murāreḥ

original: BhP_10.85.059/2 caritam amṛta-kīrter varṇitaṃ vyāsa-putraiḥ
BhP_10.85.059/3 jagad-agha-bhid alaṃ tad-bhakta-sat-karṇa-pūraṃ
analyzed: jagat agha bhid alam tad bhakta sat karṇapūram

original: BhP_10.85.059/4 bhagavati kṛta-citto yāti tat-kṣema-dhāma
analyzed: bhagavati kṛta cittaḥ yāti tad kṣema dhāma

original: BhP_10.86.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.001/1 brahman veditum icchāmaḥ svasārāṃ rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
analyzed: brahman veditum icchāmaḥ svasārām rāma kṛṣṇayoḥ

original: BhP_10.86.001/3 yathopayeme vijayo yā mamāsīt pitāmahī
analyzed: yathā upayeme vijayaḥ yā mama āsīt pitāmahī

original: BhP_10.86.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.002/1 arjunas tīrtha-yātrāyāṃ paryaṭann avanīṃ prabhuḥ
analyzed: arjunaḥ tīrtha yātrāyām paryaṭan avanīm prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.86.002/3 gataḥ prabhāsam aśṛṇon mātuleyīṃ sa ātmanaḥ
analyzed: gataḥ prabhāsam aśṛṇot mātuleyīm saḥ ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.003/1 duryodhanāya rāmas tāṃ dāsyatīti na cāpare
analyzed: duryodhanāya rāmaḥ tām dāsyati iti na ca apare

original: BhP_10.86.003/3 tal-lipsuḥ sa yatir bhūtvā tri-daṇḍī dvārakām agāt
analyzed: tad lipsuḥ sa yatiḥ bhūtvā tridaṇḍī dvārakām agāt

original: BhP_10.86.004/1 tatra vai vārṣitān māsān avātsīt svārtha-sādhakaḥ
analyzed: tatra vai vārṣitān māsān avātsīt sva artha sādhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.004/3 pauraiḥ sabhājito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ rāmeṇājānatā ca saḥ
analyzed: pauraiḥ sabhājitaḥ bhīkṣṇam rāmeṇa a jānatā ca saḥ

original: BhP_10.86.005/1 ekadā gṛham ānīya ātithyena nimantrya tam
analyzed: ekadā gṛham ānīya ātithyena nimantrya tam

original: BhP_10.86.005/3 śraddhayopahṛtaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ balena bubhuje kila
analyzed: śraddhayā upahṛtam bhaikṣyam balena bubhuje kila

original: BhP_10.86.006/1 so 'paśyat tatra mahatīṃ kanyāṃ vīra-mano-harām
analyzed: saḥ paśyat tatra mahatīm kanyām vīra manoharām

original: BhP_10.86.006/3 prīty-utphullekṣaṇas tasyāṃ bhāva-kṣubdhaṃ mano dadhe
analyzed: prīti utphulla īkṣaṇaḥ tasyām bhāva kṣubdham manaḥ dadhe

original: BhP_10.86.007/1 sāpi taṃ cakame vīkṣya nārīṇāṃ hṛdayaṃ-gamam
analyzed: sā api tam cakame vīkṣya nārīṇām hṛdayaṃgamam

original: BhP_10.86.007/3 hasantī vrīḍitāpaṅgī tan-nyasta-hṛdayekṣaṇā
analyzed: hasantī vrīḍita apaṅgī tad nyasta hṛdaya īkṣaṇā

original: BhP_10.86.008/1 tāṃ paraṃ samanudhyāyann antaraṃ prepsur arjunaḥ
analyzed: tām param samanudhyāyan antaram prepsuḥ arjunaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.008/3 na lebhe śaṃ bhramac-cittaḥ kāmenāti-balīyasā
analyzed: na lebhe śam bhramat cittaḥ kāmena ati balīyasā

original: BhP_10.86.009/1 mahatyāṃ deva-yātrāyāṃ ratha-sthāṃ durga-nirgatāṃ
analyzed: mahatyām deva yātrāyām ratha sthām durga nirgatām

original: BhP_10.86.009/3 jahārānumataḥ pitroḥ kṛṣṇasya ca mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: jahāra anumataḥ pitroḥ kṛṣṇasya ca mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.010/1 ratha-stho dhanur ādāya śūrāṃś cārundhato bhaṭān
analyzed: ratha sthaḥ dhanuḥ ādāya śūrān ca arundhataḥ bhaṭān

original: BhP_10.86.010/3 vidrāvya krośatāṃ svānāṃ sva-bhāgaṃ mṛga-rāḍ iva
analyzed: vidrāvya krośatām svānām sva bhāgam mṛgarāj iva

original: BhP_10.86.011/1 tac chrutvā kṣubhito rāmaḥ parvaṇīva mahārṇavaḥ
analyzed: tat śrutvā kṣubhitaḥ rāmaḥ parvaṇi iva mahā arṇavaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.011/3 gṛhīta-pādaḥ kṛṣṇena suhṛdbhiś cānusāntvitaḥ
analyzed: gṛhīta pādaḥ kṛṣṇena suhṛdbhiḥ ca anusāntvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.012/1 prāhiṇot pāribarhāṇi vara-vadhvor mudā balaḥ
analyzed: prāhiṇot pāribarhāṇi vara vadhvoḥ mudā balaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.012/3 mahā-dhanopaskarebha- rathāśva-nara-yoṣitaḥ
analyzed: ratha aśva nara yoṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.013/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.013/1 kṛṣṇasyāsīd dvija-śreṣṭhaḥ śrutadeva iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya āsīt dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ śrutadevaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.013/3 kṛṣṇaika-bhaktyā pūrṇārthaḥ śāntaḥ kavir alampataḥ
BhP_10.86.014/1 sa uvāsa videheṣu mithilāyāṃ gṛhāśramī
analyzed: saḥ uvāsa videheṣu mithilāyām gṛha āśramī

original: BhP_10.86.014/3 anīhayāgatāhārya- nirvartita-nija-kriyaḥ
analyzed: nirvartita nija kriyaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.015/1 yātrā-mātraṃ tv ahar ahar daivād upanamaty uta
analyzed: yātrā mātram tu ahar ahar daivāt upanamati uta

original: BhP_10.86.015/3 nādhikaṃ tāvatā tuṣṭaḥ kriyā cakre yathocitāḥ
analyzed: na adhikam tāvatā tuṣṭaḥ kriyā cakre yathā ucitāḥ

original: BhP_10.86.016/1 tathā tad-rāṣṭra-pālo 'ṅga bahulāśva iti śrutaḥ
analyzed: tathā tad rāṣṭra pālaḥ ṅga bahulāśvaḥ iti śrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.016/3 maithilo niraham-māna ubhāv apy acyuta-priyau
analyzed: maithilaḥ nirahammānaḥ ubhau api acyuta priyau

original: BhP_10.86.017/1 tayoḥ prasanno bhagavān dārukeṇāhṛtaṃ ratham
analyzed: tayoḥ prasannaḥ bhagavān dārukeṇa āhṛtam ratham

original: BhP_10.86.017/3 āruhya sākaṃ munibhir videhān prayayau prabhuḥ
analyzed: āruhya sākam munibhiḥ videhān prayayau prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.86.018/1 nārado vāmadevo 'triḥ kṛṣṇo rāmo 'sito 'ruṇiḥ
analyzed: nāradaḥ vāmadevaḥ tris kṛṣṇaḥ sitaḥ ruṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.018/3 ahaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ kaṇvo maitreyaś cyavanādayaḥ
analyzed: aham bṛhaspatiḥ kaṇvaḥ maitreyaḥ cyavana ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.019/1 tatra tatra tam āyāntaṃ paurā jānapadā nṛpa
analyzed: tatra tatra tam āyāntam paurāḥ jānapadāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.86.019/3 upatasthuḥ sārghya-hastā grahaiḥ sūryam ivoditam
analyzed: upatasthuḥ sa arghya hastāḥ grahaiḥ sūryam iva uditam

original: BhP_10.86.020/1 ānarta-dhanva-kuru-jāṅgala-kaṅka-matsya-
analyzed: ānarta dhanva kurujāṅgala kaṅka matsya

original: BhP_10.86.020/2 pāñcāla-kunti-madhu-kekaya-kośalārṇāḥ
analyzed: pāñcāla kunti madhu kekaya kośala arṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.86.020/3 anye ca tan-mukha-sarojam udāra-hāsa-
analyzed: anye ca tad mukha sarojam udāra hāsa

original: BhP_10.86.020/4 snigdhekṣaṇaṃ nṛpa papur dṛśibhir nr-nāryaḥ
analyzed: snigdha īkṣaṇam nṛpa papuḥ dṛśibhiḥ nṛ nāryaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.021/1 tebhyaḥ sva-vīkṣaṇa-vinaṣṭa-tamisra-dṛgbhyaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ sva vīkṣaṇa vinaṣṭa tamisra dṛgbhyaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.021/2 kṣemaṃ tri-loka-gurur artha-dṛśaṃ ca yacchan
analyzed: kṣemam triloka guruḥ artha dṛśam ca yacchan

original: BhP_10.86.021/3 śṛṇvan dig-anta-dhavalaṃ sva-yaśo 'śubha-ghnaṃ
analyzed: śṛṇvan diś anta dhavalam sva yaśaḥ śubha ghnam

original: BhP_10.86.021/4 gītaṃ surair nṛbhir agāc chanakair videhān
analyzed: gītam suraiḥ nṛbhiḥ agāt śanakais videhān

original: BhP_10.86.022/1 te 'cyutaṃ prāptam ākarṇya paurā jānapadā nṛpa
analyzed: te cyutam prāptam ākarṇya paurāḥ jānapadāḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.86.022/3 abhīyur muditās tasmai gṛhītārhaṇa-pāṇayaḥ
analyzed: abhīyuḥ muditāḥ tasmai gṛhīta arhaṇa pāṇayaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.023/1 dṛṣṭvā ta uttamaḥ-ślokaṃ prīty-utphulānanāśayāḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā te uttamaḥślokam prīti utphula ānana āśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.86.023/3 kair dhṛtāñjalibhir nemuḥ śruta-pūrvāṃs tathā munīn
analyzed: kaiḥ dhṛta añjalibhiḥ nemuḥ śruta pūrvān tathā munīn

original: BhP_10.86.024/1 svānugrahāya samprāptaṃ manvānau taṃ jagad-gurum
analyzed: sva anugrahāya samprāptam manvānau tam jagadgurum

original: BhP_10.86.024/3 maithilaḥ śrutadevaś ca pādayoḥ petatuḥ prabhoḥ
analyzed: maithilaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca pādayoḥ petatuḥ prabhoḥ

original: BhP_10.86.025/1 nyamantrayetāṃ dāśārham ātithyena saha dvijaiḥ
analyzed: nyamantrayetām dāśārham ātithyena saha dvijaiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.025/3 maithilaḥ śrutadevaś ca yugapat saṃhatāñjalī
analyzed: maithilaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca yugapad saṃhata añjalī

original: BhP_10.86.026/1 bhagavāṃs tad abhipretya dvayoḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
analyzed: bhagavān tat abhipretya dvayoḥ priya cikīrṣayā

original: BhP_10.86.026/3 ubhayor āviśad geham ubhābhyāṃ tad-alakṣitaḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ āviśat geham ubhābhyām tad alakṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.027/1 śrāntān apy atha tān dūrāj janakaḥ sva-gṛhāgatān
analyzed: śrāntān api atha tān dūrāt janakaḥ sva gṛha āgatān

original: BhP_10.86.027/3 ānīteṣv āsanāgryeṣu sukhāsīnān mahā-manāḥ
analyzed: ānīteṣu āsana agryeṣu sukha āsīnān mahāmanāḥ

original: BhP_10.86.028/1 pravṛddha-bhaktyā uddharṣa- hṛdayāsrāvilekṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: pravṛddha bhaktyā uddharṣa hṛdaya asra āvila īkṣaṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.028/3 natvā tad-aṅghrīn prakṣālya tad-apo loka-pāvanīḥ
analyzed: natvā tad aṅghrīn prakṣālya tad apaḥ loka pāvanīḥ

original: BhP_10.86.029/1 sa-kuṭumbo vahan mūrdhnā pūjayāṃ cakra īśvarān
analyzed: sa kuṭumbaḥ vahan mūrdhnā cakre īśvarān

original: BhP_10.86.029/3 gandha-mālyāmbarākalpa- dhūpa-dīpārghya-go-vṛṣaiḥ
analyzed: dhūpa dīpa arghya govṛṣaiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.030/1 vācā madhurayā prīṇann idam āhānna-tarpitān
analyzed: vācā madhurayā prīṇan idam āha anna tarpitān

original: BhP_10.86.030/3 pādāv aṅka-gatau viṣṇoḥ saṃspṛśañ chanakair mudā
analyzed: pādau aṅka gatau viṣṇoḥ saṃspṛśam śanakais mudā

original: BhP_10.86.031/0 śrī-bahulāśva uvāca
analyzed: śrī bahulāśvaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.031/1 bhavān hi sarva-bhūtānām ātmā sākṣī sva-dṛg vibho
analyzed: bhavān hi sarva bhūtānām ātmā sākṣī svadṛś vibho

original: BhP_10.86.031/3 atha nas tvat-padāmbhojaṃ smaratāṃ darśanaṃ gataḥ
analyzed: atha naḥ tvad pada ambhojam smaratām darśanam gataḥ

original: BhP_10.86.032/1 sva-vacas tad ṛtaṃ kartum asmad-dṛg-gocaro bhavān
analyzed: sva vacaḥ tat ṛtam kartum asmad dṛś gocaraḥ bhavān

original: BhP_10.86.032/3 yad ātthaikānta-bhaktān me nānantaḥ śrīr ajaḥ priyaḥ
analyzed: yat āttha ekānta bhaktāt me na anantaḥ śrīḥ ajaḥ priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.033/1 ko nu tvac-caraṇāmbhojam evaṃ-vid visṛjet pumān
analyzed: kaḥ nu tvad caraṇa ambhojam evaṃvid visṛjet pumān

original: BhP_10.86.033/3 niṣkiñcanānāṃ śāntānāṃ munīnāṃ yas tvam ātma-daḥ
analyzed: niṣkiñcanānām śāntānām munīnām yaḥ tvam ātma daḥ

original: BhP_10.86.034/1 yo 'vatīrya yador vaṃśe nṛṇāṃ saṃsaratām iha
analyzed: yaḥ vatīrya yadoḥ vaṃśe nṛṇām saṃsaratām iha

original: BhP_10.86.034/3 yaśo vitene tac-chāntyai trai-lokya-vṛjināpaham
analyzed: yaśaḥ vitene tad śāntyai trailokya vṛjina apaham

original: BhP_10.86.035/1 namas tubhyaṃ bhagavate kṛṣṇāyākuṇṭha-medhase
analyzed: namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase

original: BhP_10.86.035/3 nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye su-śāntaṃ tapa īyuṣe
analyzed: nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye su śāntam tapaḥ īyuṣe

original: BhP_10.86.036/1 dināni katicid bhūman gṛhān no nivasa dvijaiḥ
analyzed: dināni katicid bhūman gṛhān naḥ nivasa dvijaiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.036/3 sametaḥ pāda-rajasā punīhīdaṃ nimeḥ kulam
analyzed: sametaḥ pāda rajasā punīhi idam nimeḥ kulam

original: BhP_10.86.037/1 ity upāmantrito rājñā bhagavāṃl loka-bhāvanaḥ
analyzed: iti upāmantritaḥ rājñā bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.037/3 uvāsa kurvan kalyāṇaṃ mithilā-nara-yoṣitām
analyzed: uvāsa kurvan kalyāṇam mithilā nara yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.86.038/1 śrutadevo 'cyutaṃ prāptaṃ sva-gṛhāñ janako yathā
analyzed: cyutam prāptam sva gṛhām janakaḥ yathā

original: BhP_10.86.038/3 natvā munīn su-saṃhṛṣṭo dhunvan vāso nanarta ha
analyzed: natvā munīn su saṃhṛṣṭaḥ dhunvan vāsaḥ nanarta ha

original: BhP_10.86.039/1 tṛṇa-pīṭha-bṛṣīṣv etān ānīteṣūpaveśya saḥ
analyzed: tṛṇa pīṭha bṛṣīṣu etān ānīteṣu upaveśya saḥ

original: BhP_10.86.039/3 svāgatenābhinandyāṅghrīn sa-bhāryo 'vanije mudā
analyzed: svāgatena abhinandya aṅghrīn sa bhāryaḥ vanije mudā

original: BhP_10.86.040/1 tad-ambhasā mahā-bhāga ātmānaṃ sa-gṛhānvayam
analyzed: tad ambhasā mahābhāgaḥ ātmānam sa gṛha anvayam

original: BhP_10.86.040/3 snāpayāṃ cakra uddharṣo labdha-sarva-manorathaḥ
analyzed: cakre uddharṣaḥ labdha sarva manorathaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.041/1 phalārhaṇośīra-śivāmṛtāmbubhir mṛdā surabhyā tulasī-kuśāmbuyaiḥ
BhP_10.86.041/3 ārādhayām āsa yathopapannayā saparyayā sattva-vivardhanāndhasā
analyzed: ārādhayām āsa yathā upapannayā saparyayā sattva vivardhana andhasā

original: BhP_10.86.042/1 sa tarkayām āsa kuto mamānv abhūt gṛhāndha-kupe patitasya saṅgamaḥ
analyzed: sa tarkayām āsa kutas mama anu abhūt gṛha andhakupe patitasya saṅgamaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.042/3 yaḥ sarva-tīrthāspada-pāda-reṇubhiḥ kṛṣṇena cāsyātma-niketa-bhūsuraiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sarva tīrtha āspada pāda reṇubhiḥ kṛṣṇena ca asya ātma niketa bhūsuraiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.043/1 sūpaviṣṭān kṛtātithyān śrutadeva upasthitaḥ
analyzed: su upaviṣṭān kṛta ātithyān śrutadevaḥ upasthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.043/3 sa-bhārya-svajanāpatya uvācāṅghry-abhimarśanaḥ
analyzed: sa bhāryā sva janāpatyaḥ uvāca aṅghri abhimarśanaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.044/0 śrutadeva uvāca
analyzed: śrutadevaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.044/1 nādya no darśanaṃ prāptaḥ paraṃ parama-pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: na adya naḥ darśanam prāptaḥ param parama pūruṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.044/3 yarhīdaṃ śaktibhiḥ sṛṣṭvā praviṣṭo hy ātma-sattayā
analyzed: yarhi idam śaktibhiḥ sṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaḥ hi ātma sattayā

original: BhP_10.86.045/1 yathā śayānaḥ puruṣo manasaivātma-māyayā
analyzed: yathā śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ manasā eva ātma māyayā

original: BhP_10.86.045/3 sṛṣṭvā lokaṃ paraṃ svāpnam anuviśyāvabhāsate
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā lokam param svāpnam anuviśya avabhāsate

original: BhP_10.86.046/1 śṛṇvatāṃ gadatāṃ śaśvad arcatāṃ tvābhivandatām
analyzed: śṛṇvatām gadatām śaśvat arcatām tvā abhivandatām

original: BhP_10.86.046/3 ṇṛṇāṃ saṃvadatām antar hṛdi bhāsy amalātmanām
analyzed: saṃvadatām antar hṛdi bhāsi amala ātmanām

original: BhP_10.86.047/1 hṛdi-stho 'py ati-dūra-sthaḥ karma-vikṣipta-cetasām
analyzed: hṛdisthaḥ pi ati dūra sthaḥ karma vikṣipta cetasām

original: BhP_10.86.047/3 ātma-śaktibhir agrāhyo 'py anty upeta-guṇātmanām
analyzed: ātma śaktibhiḥ a grāhyaḥ antī upeta guṇa ātmanām

original: BhP_10.86.048/1 namo 'stu te 'dhyātma-vidāṃ parātmane
analyzed: namaḥ stu te dhyā ātma vidām parātmane

original: BhP_10.86.048/2 anātmane svātma-vibhakta-mṛtyave
analyzed: anātmane sva ātma vibhakta mṛtyave

original: BhP_10.86.048/3 sa-kāraṇākāraṇa-liṅgam īyuṣe
analyzed: sa kāraṇa akāraṇa liṅgam īyuṣe

original: BhP_10.86.048/4 sva-māyayāsaṃvṛta-ruddha-dṛṣṭaye
analyzed: sva māyayā asaṃvṛta ruddha dṛṣṭaye

original: BhP_10.86.049/1 sa tvaṃ śādhi sva-bhṛtyān naḥ kiṃ deva karavāma he
analyzed: sa tvam śādhi sva bhṛtyān naḥ kim deva karavāma he

original: BhP_10.86.049/3 etad-anto nṛṇāṃ kleśo yad bhavān akṣi-gocaraḥ
analyzed: etad antaḥ nṛṇām kleśaḥ yat bhavān akṣi gocaraḥ

original: BhP_10.86.050/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.050/1 tad-uktam ity upākarṇya bhagavān praṇatārti-hā
analyzed: tat uktam iti upākarṇya bhagavān praṇata ārti hā

original: BhP_10.86.050/3 gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇiṃ prahasaṃs tam uvāca ha
analyzed: gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim prahasan tam uvāca ha

original: BhP_10.86.051/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.051/1 brahmaṃs te 'nugrahārthāya samprāptān viddhy amūn munīn
analyzed: brahman te nugraha arthāya samprāptān viddhi amūn munīn

original: BhP_10.86.051/3 sañcaranti mayā lokān punantaḥ pāda-reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: sañcaranti mayā lokān punantaḥ pāda reṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.052/1 devāḥ kṣetrāṇi tīrthāni darśana-sparśanārcanaiḥ
analyzed: devāḥ kṣetrāṇi tīrthāni darśana sparśana arcanaiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.052/3 śanaiḥ punanti kālena tad apy arhattamekṣayā
analyzed: śanais punanti kālena tat api arhattama īkṣayā

original: BhP_10.86.053/1 brāhmaṇo janmanā śreyān sarveṣām prāṇinām iha
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ janmanā śreyān sarveṣām prāṇinām iha

original: BhP_10.86.053/3 tapasā vidyayā tuṣṭyā kim u mat-kalayā yutaḥ
analyzed: tapasā vidyayā tuṣṭyā kim u mad kalayā yutaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.054/1 na brāhmaṇān me dayitaṃ rūpam etac catur-bhujam
analyzed: na brāhmaṇāt me dayitam rūpam etat catur bhujam

original: BhP_10.86.054/3 sarva-veda-mayo vipraḥ sarva-deva-mayo hy aham
analyzed: sarva veda mayaḥ vipraḥ sarva deva mayaḥ hi aham

original: BhP_10.86.055/1 duṣprajñā aviditvaivam avajānanty asūyavaḥ
analyzed: duṣprajñāḥ a viditvā evam avajānanti asūyavaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.055/3 guruṃ māṃ vipram ātmānam arcādāv ijya-dṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: gurum mām vipram ātmānam arcā ādau ijya dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.056/1 carācaram idaṃ viśvaṃ bhāvā ye cāsya hetavaḥ
analyzed: carācaram idam viśvam bhāvāḥ ye ca asya hetavaḥ

original: BhP_10.86.056/3 mad-rūpāṇīti cetasy ādhatte vipro mad-īkṣayā
analyzed: mad rūpāṇi iti cetasi ādhatte vipraḥ mad īkṣayā

original: BhP_10.86.057/1 tasmād brahma-ṛṣīn etān brahman mac-chraddhayārcaya
analyzed: tasmāt brahma ṛṣīn etān brahman mad śraddhayā arcaya

original: BhP_10.86.057/3 evaṃ ced arcito 'smy addhā nānyathā bhūri-bhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: evam ced arcitaḥ smi addhā na anyathā bhūri bhūtibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.86.058/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.86.058/1 sa itthaṃ prabhunādiṣṭaḥ saha-kṛṣṇān dvijottamān
analyzed: saḥ ittham prabhunā ādiṣṭaḥ saha kṛṣṇān dvijottamān

original: BhP_10.86.058/3 ārādhyaikātma-bhāvena maithilaś cāpa sad-gatim
analyzed: ārādhya eka ātma bhāvena maithilaḥ ca āpa sat gatim

original: BhP_10.86.059/1 evaṃ sva-bhaktayo rājan bhagavān bhakta-bhaktimān
analyzed: evam sva bhaktayaḥ rājan bhagavān bhakta bhaktimān

original: BhP_10.86.059/3 uṣitvādiśya san-mārgaṃ punar dvāravatīm agāt
analyzed: uṣitvā ādiśya sat mārgam punar dvāravatīm agāt

original: BhP_10.87.001/0 śrī-parīkṣid uvāca
analyzed: śrī parīkṣit uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.001/1 brahman brahmaṇy anirdeśye nirguṇe guṇa-vṛttayaḥ
analyzed: brahman brahmaṇi anirdeśye nirguṇe guṇa vṛttayaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.001/3 kathaṃ caranti śrutayaḥ sākṣāt sad-asataḥ pare
analyzed: katham caranti śrutayaḥ sākṣāt sat asataḥ pare

original: BhP_10.87.002/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.002/1 buddhīndriya-manaḥ-prāṇān janānām asṛjat prabhuḥ
analyzed: buddhīndriya manaḥ prāṇān janānām asṛjat prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.87.002/3 mātrārthaṃ ca bhavārthaṃ ca ātmane 'kalpanāya ca
analyzed: mātrā artham ca bhava artham ca ātmane kalpanāya ca

original: BhP_10.87.003/1 saiṣā hy upaniṣad brāhmī pūrveśāṃ pūrva-jair dhṛtā
analyzed: sā eṣā hi upaniṣad brāhmī pūrva īśām pūrvajaiḥ dhṛtā

original: BhP_10.87.003/3 śrraddhayā dhārayed yas tāṃ kṣemaṃ gacched akiñcanaḥ
analyzed: śrraddhayā dhārayet yaḥ tām kṣemam gacchet akiñcanaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.004/1 atra te varṇayiṣyāmi gāthāṃ nārāyaṇānvitām
analyzed: atra te varṇayiṣyāmi gāthām nārāyaṇa anvitām

original: BhP_10.87.004/3 nāradasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣer nārāyaṇasya ca
analyzed: nāradasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣeḥ nārāyaṇasya ca

original: BhP_10.87.005/1 ekadā nārado lokān paryaṭan bhagavat-priyaḥ
analyzed: ekadā nāradaḥ lokān paryaṭan bhagavat priyaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.005/3 sanātanam ṛṣiṃ draṣṭuṃ yayau nārāyaṇāśramam
analyzed: sanātanam ṛṣim draṣṭum yayau nārāyaṇa āśramam

original: BhP_10.87.006/1 yo vai bhārata-varṣe 'smin kṣemāya svastaye nṛṇām
analyzed: yaḥ vai bhārata varṣe smin kṣemāya svastaye nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.87.006/3 dharma-jñāna-śamopetam ā-kalpād āsthitas tapaḥ
analyzed: dharma jñāna śama upetam ā kalpāt āsthitaḥ tapaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.007/1 tatropaviṣṭam ṛṣibhiḥ kalāpa-grāma-vāsibhiḥ
analyzed: tatra upaviṣṭam ṛṣibhiḥ kalāpa grāma vāsibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.007/3 parītaṃ praṇato 'pṛcchad idam eva kurūdvaha
analyzed: parītam praṇataḥ pṛcchat idam eva kuru udvaha

original: BhP_10.87.008/1 tasmai hy avocad bhagavān ṛṣīṇāṃ śṛṇvatām idam
analyzed: tasmai hi avocat bhagavān ṛṣīṇām śṛṇvatām idam

original: BhP_10.87.008/3 yo brahma-vādaḥ pūrveṣāṃ jana-loka-nivāsinām
analyzed: yaḥ brahma vādaḥ pūrveṣām janaloka nivāsinām

original: BhP_10.87.009/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.009/1 svāyambhuva brahma-satraṃ jana-loke 'bhavat purā
analyzed: svāyambhuva brahma satram jana loke bhavat purā

original: BhP_10.87.009/3 tatra-sthānāṃ mānasānāṃ munīnām ūrdhva-retasām
analyzed: tatrasthānām mānasānām munīnām ūrdhvaretasām

original: BhP_10.87.010/1 śvetadvīpaṃ gatavati tvayi draṣṭuṃ tad-īśvaram
analyzed: śvetadvīpam gatavati tvayi draṣṭum tad īśvaram

original: BhP_10.87.010/3 brahma-vādaḥ su-saṃvṛttaḥ śrutayo yatra śerate
analyzed: brahma vādaḥ su saṃvṛttaḥ śrutayaḥ yatra śerate

original: BhP_10.87.010/5 tatra hāyam abhūt praśnas tvaṃ māṃ yam anupṛcchasi
analyzed: tatra ha ayam abhūt praśnaḥ tvam mām yam anupṛcchasi

original: BhP_10.87.011/1 tulya-śruta-tapaḥ-śīlās tulya-svīyāri-madhyamāḥ
analyzed: tulya śruta tapaḥ śīlāḥ tulya svīya ari madhyamāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.011/3 api cakruḥ pravacanam ekaṃ śuśrūṣavo 'pare
analyzed: api cakruḥ pravacanam ekam śuśrūṣavaḥ pare

original: BhP_10.87.012/0 śrī-sanandana uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.012/1 sva-sṛṣṭam idam āpīya śayānaṃ saha śaktibhiḥ
analyzed: sva sṛṣṭam idam āpīya śayānam saha śaktibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.012/3 tad-ante bodhayāṃ cakrus tal-liṅgaiḥ śrutayaḥ param
analyzed: tad ante cakruḥ tad liṅgaiḥ śrutayaḥ param

original: BhP_10.87.013/1 yathā śayānaṃ saṃrājaṃ vandinas tat-parākramaiḥ
analyzed: yathā śayānam saṃrājam vandinaḥ tad parākramaiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.013/3 pratyūṣe 'bhetya su-ślokair bodhayanty anujīvinaḥ
analyzed: pratyūṣe bhetya su ślokaiḥ bodhayanti anujīvinaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.014/0 śrī-śrutaya ūcuḥ
analyzed: śrī śrutayaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.87.014/1 jaya jaya jahy ajām ajita doṣa-gṛbhīta-guṇāṃ
analyzed: jaya jaya jahi ajām ajita doṣa gṛbhīta guṇām

original: BhP_10.87.014/2 tvam asi yad ātmanā samavaruddha-samasta-bhagaḥ
analyzed: tvam asi yat ātmanā samavaruddha samasta bhagaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.014/3 aga-jagad-okasām akhila-śakty-avabodhaka te
analyzed: aga jagat okasām akhila śakti avabodhaka te

original: BhP_10.87.014/4 kvacid ajayātmanā ca carato 'nucaren nigamaḥ
analyzed: kvacid ajayā ātmanā ca carataḥ nu caret nigamaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.015/1 bṛhad upalabdham etad avayanty avaśeṣatayā
analyzed: bṛhat upalabdham etat avayanti avaśeṣa tayā

original: BhP_10.87.015/2 yata udayāstam-ayau vikṛter mṛdi vāvikṛtāt
analyzed: yatas udaya astamayau vikṛteḥ mṛdi vā a vikṛtāt

original: BhP_10.87.015/3 ata ṛṣayo dadhus tvayi mano-vacanācaritaṃ
analyzed: atas ṛṣayaḥ tvayi manaḥ vacana ācaritam

original: BhP_10.87.015/4 katham ayathā bhavanti bhuvi datta-padāni nṛṇām
analyzed: katham ayathā bhavanti bhuvi datta padāni nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.87.016/1 iti tava sūrayas try-adhipate 'khila-loka-mala-
analyzed: iti tava sūrayaḥ tryadhipate khila loka mala

original: BhP_10.87.016/2 kṣapaṇa-kathāmṛtābdhim avagāhya tapāṃsi jahuḥ
analyzed: kṣapaṇa kathā amṛta abdhim avagāhya tapāṃsi jahuḥ

original: BhP_10.87.016/3 kim uta punaḥ sva-dhāma-vidhutāśaya-kāla-guṇāḥ
analyzed: kim uta punar sva dhāma vidhuta āśaya kāla guṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.016/4 parama bhajanti ye padam ajasra-sukhānubhavam
analyzed: bhajanti ye padam ajasra sukha anubhavam

original: BhP_10.87.017/1 dṛtaya iva śvasanty asu-bhṛto yadi te 'nuvidhā
analyzed: dṛtayaḥ iva śvasanti asu bhṛtaḥ yadi te

original: BhP_10.87.017/2 mahad-aham-ādayo 'ṇḍam asṛjan yad-anugrahataḥ
analyzed: mahat aham ādayaḥ ṇḍam asṛjan yad anugrahataḥ

original: BhP_10.87.017/3 puruṣa-vidho 'nvayo 'tra caramo 'nna-mayādiṣu yaḥ
analyzed: puruṣavidhaḥ caramaḥ nna maya ādiṣu yaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.017/4 sad-asataḥ paraṃ tvam atha yad eṣv avaśeṣam ṛtam
analyzed: sat asataḥ param tvam atha yat eṣu avaśeṣam ṛtam

original: BhP_10.87.018/1 udaram upāsate ya ṛṣi-vartmasu kūrpa-dṛśaḥ
analyzed: udaram upāsate ye ṛṣi vartmasu kūrpa dṛśaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.018/2 parisara-paddhatiṃ hṛdayam āruṇayo daharam
analyzed: parisara paddhatim hṛdayam āruṇayaḥ daharam

original: BhP_10.87.018/3 tata udagād ananta tava dhāma śiraḥ paramaṃ
analyzed: tatas udagāt ananta tava dhāma śiraḥ paramam

original: BhP_10.87.018/4 punar iha yat sametya na patanti kṛtānta-mukhe
analyzed: punar iha yat sametya na patanti kṛtānta mukhe

original: BhP_10.87.019/1 sva-kṛta-vicitra-yoniṣu viśann iva hetutayā
analyzed: sva kṛta vicitra yoniṣu viśan iva hetutayā

original: BhP_10.87.019/2 taratamataś cakāssy anala-vat sva-kṛtānukṛtiḥ
analyzed: taratamataḥ cakāssi anala vat sva kṛta anukṛtiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.019/3 atha vitathāsv amūṣv avitathāṃ tava dhāma samaṃ
analyzed: atha vitathāsu amūṣu avitathām tava dhāma samam

original: BhP_10.87.019/4 viraja-dhiyo 'nuyanty abhivipaṇyava eka-rasam
analyzed: viraja dhiyaḥ nuyanti abhivipaṇyavaḥ eka rasam

original: BhP_10.87.020/1 sva-kṛta-pureṣv amīṣv abahir-antara-saṃvaraṇaṃ
analyzed: sva kṛta pureṣu amīṣu a bahis antara saṃvaraṇam

original: BhP_10.87.020/2 tava puruṣaṃ vadanty akhila-śakti-dhṛto 'ṃśa-kṛtam
analyzed: tava puruṣam vadanti akhila śakti dhṛtaḥ ṃśa kṛtam

original: BhP_10.87.020/3 iti nṛ-gatiṃ vivicya kavayo nigamāvapanaṃ
analyzed: iti nṛ gatim vivicya kavayaḥ nigama āvapanam

original: BhP_10.87.020/4 bhavata upāsate 'ṅghrim abhavam bhuvi viśvasitāḥ
analyzed: bhavataḥ upāsate ṅghrim abhavam bhuvi viśvasitāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.021/1 duravagamātma-tattva-nigamāya tavātta-tanoś
analyzed: duravagama ātma tattva nigamāya tava ātta tanoḥ

original: BhP_10.87.021/2 carita-mahāmṛtābdhi-parivarta-pariśramaṇāḥ
BhP_10.87.021/3 na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam apīśvara te
analyzed: na parilaṣanti kecid apavargam api īśvara te

original: BhP_10.87.021/4 caraṇa-saroja-haṃsa-kula-saṅga-visṛṣṭa-gṛhāḥ
BhP_10.87.022/1 tvad-anupathaṃ kulāyam idam ātma-suhṛt-priya-vac
analyzed: tvad anupatham kulāyam idam ātma suhṛd priya vat

original: BhP_10.87.022/2 carati tathonmukhe tvayi hite priya ātmani ca
analyzed: carati tathā unmukhe tvayi hite priye ātmani ca

original: BhP_10.87.022/3 na bata ramanty aho asad-upāsanayātma-hano
analyzed: na bata ramanti aho asat upāsanayā ātma hano

original: BhP_10.87.022/4 yad-anuśayā bhramanty uru-bhaye ku-śarīra-bhṛtaḥ
analyzed: yad anuśayāḥ bhramanti uru bhaye ku śarīra bhṛtaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.023/1 nibhṛta-marun-mano-'kṣa-dṛḍha-yoga-yujo hṛdi yan
analyzed: nibhṛta marut mana ukṣa dṛḍha yoga yujaḥ hṛdi yan

original: BhP_10.87.023/2 munaya upāsate tad arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇāt
analyzed: munayaḥ upāsate tat arayaḥ pi yayuḥ smaraṇāt

original: BhP_10.87.023/3 striya uragendra-bhoga-bhuja-daṇḍa-viṣakta-dhiyo
analyzed: striyaḥ uraga indra bhoga bhuja daṇḍa viṣakta dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.023/4 vayam api te samāḥ sama-dṛśo 'ṅghri-saroja-sudhāḥ
analyzed: vayam api te samāḥ samadṛśaḥ ṅghri saroja sudhāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.024/1 ka iha nu veda batāvara-janma-layo 'gra-saraṃ
analyzed: kaḥ iha nu veda bata avara janma layaḥ grasaram

original: BhP_10.87.024/2 yata udagād ṛṣir yam anu deva-gaṇā ubhaye
analyzed: yatas udagāt ṛṣiḥ yam anu deva gaṇāḥ ubhaye

original: BhP_10.87.024/3 tarhi na san na cāsad ubhayaṃ na ca kāla-javaḥ
analyzed: tarhi na sat na ca asat ubhayam na ca kāla javaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.024/4 kim api na tatra śāstram avakṛṣya śayīta yadā
analyzed: kim api na tatra śāstram avakṛṣya śayīta yadā

original: BhP_10.87.025/1 janim asataḥ sato mṛtim utātmani ye ca bhidāṃ
analyzed: janim asataḥ sataḥ mṛtim uta ātmani ye ca bhidām

original: BhP_10.87.025/2 vipaṇam ṛtaṃ smaranty upadiśanti ta ārupitaiḥ
analyzed: vipaṇam ṛtam smaranti upadiśanti te ārupitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.025/3 tri-guṇa-mayaḥ pumān iti bhidā yad abodha-kṛtā
analyzed: triguṇa mayaḥ pumān iti bhidā yat a bodha kṛtā

original: BhP_10.87.025/4 tvayi na tataḥ paratra sa bhaved avabodha-rase
analyzed: tvayi na tatas paratra sa bhavet avabodha rase

original: BhP_10.87.026/1 sad iva manas tri-vṛt tvayi vibhāty asad ā-manujāt
analyzed: sat iva manaḥ trivṛt tvayi vibhāti asat āmanujāt

original: BhP_10.87.026/2 sad abhimṛśanty aśeṣam idam ātmatayātma-vidaḥ
analyzed: sat abhimṛśanti aśeṣam idam ātma tayā ātma vidaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.026/3 na hi vikṛtiṃ tyajanti kanakasya tad-ātmatayā
analyzed: na hi vikṛtim tyajanti kanakasya tad ātma tayā

original: BhP_10.87.026/4 sva-kṛtam anupraviṣṭam idam ātmatayāvasitam
analyzed: svakṛtam anupraviṣṭam idam ātma tayā avasitam

original: BhP_10.87.027/1 tava pari ye caranty akhila-sattva-niketatayā
analyzed: tava pari ye caranti akhila sattva niketa tayā

original: BhP_10.87.027/2 ta uta padākramanty avigaṇayya śiro nirṛteḥ
analyzed: te uta padā ākramanti a vigaṇayya śiraḥ nirṛteḥ

original: BhP_10.87.027/3 parivayase paśūn iva girā vibudhān api tāṃs
analyzed: parivayase paśūn iva girā vibudhān api tān

original: BhP_10.87.027/4 tvayi kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ khalu punanti na ye vimukhāḥ
analyzed: tvayi kṛta sauhṛdāḥ khalu punanti na ye vimukhāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.028/1 tvam akaraṇaḥ sva-rāḍ akhila-kāraka-śakti-dharas
analyzed: tvam akaraṇaḥ svarāj akhila kāraka śakti dharaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.028/2 tava balim udvahanti samadanty ajayānimiṣāḥ
analyzed: tava balim udvahanti samadanti ajaya animiṣāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.028/3 varṣa-bhujo 'khila-kṣiti-pater iva viśva-sṛjo
analyzed: varṣa bhujaḥ khila kṣitipateḥ iva viśvasṛjaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.028/4 vidadhati yatra ye tv adhikṛtā bhavataś cakitāḥ
analyzed: vidadhati yatra ye tu adhikṛtāḥ bhavataḥ cakitāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.029/1 sthira-cara-jātayaḥ syur ajayottha-nimitta-yujo
analyzed: sthira cara jātayaḥ syuḥ ajayā uttha nimitta yujaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.029/2 vihara udīkṣayā yadi parasya vimukta tataḥ
analyzed: vihara udīkṣayā yadi parasya vimukta tatas

original: BhP_10.87.029/3 na hi paramasya kaścid aparo na paraś ca bhaved
analyzed: na hi paramasya kaścid aparaḥ na paraḥ ca bhavet

original: BhP_10.87.029/4 viyata ivāpadasya tava śūnya-tulāṃ dadhataḥ
analyzed: viyataḥ iva āpadasya tava śūnya tulām dadhataḥ

original: BhP_10.87.030/1 aparimitā dhruvās tanu-bhṛto yadi sarva-gatās
analyzed: aparimitāḥ dhruvāḥ tanubhṛtaḥ yadi sarva gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.030/2 tarhi na śāsyateti niyamo dhrava netarathā
analyzed: tarhi na śāsyate iti niyamaḥ dhrava na itarathā

original: BhP_10.87.030/3 ajani ca yan-mayaṃ tad avimucya niyantṛ bhavet
analyzed: ajani ca yat mayam tat a vimucya niyantṛ bhavet

original: BhP_10.87.030/4 samam anujānatāṃ yad amataṃ mata-duṣṭatayā
analyzed: samam anujānatām yat amatam mata duṣṭa tayā

original: BhP_10.87.031/1 na ghaṭata udbhavaḥ prakṛti-pūruṣayor ajayor
analyzed: na ghaṭataḥ udbhavaḥ prakṛti pūruṣayoḥ ajayoḥ

original: BhP_10.87.031/2 ubhaya-yujā bhavanty asu-bhṛto jala-budbuda-vat
analyzed: ubhaya yujā bhavanti asu bhṛtaḥ jala budbuda vat

original: BhP_10.87.031/3 tvayi ta ime tato vividha-nāma-guṇaiḥ parame
analyzed: tvayi te ime tatas vividha nāma guṇaiḥ parame

original: BhP_10.87.031/4 sarita ivārṇave madhuni lilyur aśeṣa-rasāḥ
analyzed: saritaḥ iva arṇave madhuni lilyuḥ aśeṣa rasāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.032/1 nṛṣu tava mayayā bhramam amīṣv avagatya bhṛśaṃ
analyzed: nṛṣu tava bhramam amīṣu avagatya bhṛśam

original: BhP_10.87.032/2 tvayi su-dhiyo 'bhave dadhati bhāvam anuprabhavam
analyzed: tvayi sudhiyaḥ bhave dadhati bhāvam anuprabhavam

original: BhP_10.87.032/3 katham anuvartatāṃ bhava-bhayaṃ tava yad bhru-kuṭiḥ
analyzed: katham anuvartatām bhava bhayam tava yat bhrukuṭiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.032/4 sṛjati muhus tri-nemir abhavac-charaṇeṣu bhayam
analyzed: sṛjati muhur trinemiḥ abhavat śaraṇeṣu bhayam

original: BhP_10.87.033/1 vijita-hṛṣīka-vāyubhir adānta-manas tura-gaṃ
analyzed: vijita hṛṣīka vāyubhiḥ a dānta manaḥ turagam

original: BhP_10.87.033/2 ya iha yatanti yantum ati-lolam upāya-khidaḥ
analyzed: ye iha yatanti yantum ati lolam upāya khidaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.033/3 vyasana-śatānvitāḥ samavahāya guroś caraṇaṃ
analyzed: vyasana śata anvitāḥ samavahāya guroḥ caraṇam

original: BhP_10.87.033/4 vaṇija ivāja santy akṛta-karṇa-dharā jaladhau
analyzed: vaṇijaḥ santi a kṛta karṇa dharāḥ jaladhau

original: BhP_10.87.034/1 svajana-sutātma-dāra-dhana-dhāma-dharāsu-rathais
analyzed: sva jana suta ātma dāra dhana dhāma dhara asu rathaiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.034/2 tvayi sati kiṃ nṛṇām śrayata ātmani sarva-rase
analyzed: tvayi sati kim nṛṇām śrayate ātmani sarvarase

original: BhP_10.87.034/3 iti sad ajānatāṃ mithunato rataye caratāṃ
analyzed: iti sat a jānatām mithunataḥ rataye caratām

original: BhP_10.87.034/4 sukhayati ko nv iha sva-vihate sva-nirasta-bhage
analyzed: sukhayati kaḥ nu iha sva vihate sva nirasta bhage

original: BhP_10.87.035/1 bhuvi puru-puṇya-tīrtha-sadanāny ṛṣayo vimadās
analyzed: bhuvi puru puṇya tīrtha sadanāni ṛṣayaḥ vimadāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.035/2 ta uta bhavat-padāmbuja-hṛdo 'gha-bhid-aṅghri-jalāḥ
analyzed: te uta bhavat pada ambuja hṛdaḥ ghabhid aṅghri jalāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.035/3 dadhati sakṛn manas tvayi ya ātmani nitya-sukhe
analyzed: dadhati sakṛt manaḥ tvayi yaḥ ātmani nitya sukhe

original: BhP_10.87.035/4 na punar upāsate puruṣa-sāra-harāvasathān
analyzed: na punar upāsate puruṣa sāra hara āvasathān

original: BhP_10.87.036/1 sata idaṃ utthitaṃ sad iti cen nanu tarka-hataṃ
analyzed: sataḥ idam utthitam sat iti ced nanu tarka hatam

original: BhP_10.87.036/2 vyabhicarati kva ca kva ca mṛṣā na tathobhaya-yuk
analyzed: vyabhicarati kva ca kva ca mṛṣā na tathā ubhaya yuj

original: BhP_10.87.036/3 vyavahṛtaye vikalpa iṣito 'ndha-paramparayā
analyzed: vyavahṛtaye vikalpaḥ iṣitaḥ ndha paramparayā

original: BhP_10.87.036/4 bhramayati bhāratī ta uru-vṛttibhir uktha-jaḍān
analyzed: bhramayati bhāratī te uru vṛttibhiḥ uktha jaḍān

original: BhP_10.87.037/1 na yad idam agra āsa na bhaviṣyad ato nidhanād
analyzed: na yat idam agre āsa na bhaviṣyat atas nidhanāt

original: BhP_10.87.037/2 anu mitam antarā tvayi vibhāti mṛṣaika-rase
analyzed: anu mitam antarā tvayi vibhāti mṛṣā ekarase

original: BhP_10.87.037/3 ata upamīyate draviṇa-jāti-vikalpa-pathair
analyzed: atas upamīyate draviṇa jāti vikalpa pathaiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.037/4 vitatha-mano-vilāsam ṛtam ity avayanty abudhāḥ
analyzed: vitatha manaḥ vilāsam ṛtam iti avayanti abudhāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.038/1 sa yad ajayā tv ajām anuśayīta guṇāṃś ca juṣan
analyzed: sa yat ajayā tu ajām anuśayīta guṇān ca juṣan

original: BhP_10.87.038/2 bhajati sarūpatāṃ tad anu mṛtyum apeta-bhagaḥ
analyzed: bhajati sarūpa tām tat anu mṛtyum apeta bhagaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.038/3 tvam uta jahāsi tām ahir iva tvacam ātta-bhago
analyzed: tvam uta jahāsi tām ahiḥ iva tvacam ātta bhago

original: BhP_10.87.038/4 mahasi mahīyase 'ṣṭa-guṇite 'parimeya-bhagaḥ
analyzed: mahasi mahīyase ṣṭa guṇite parimeya bhagaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.039/1 yadi na samuddharanti yatayo hṛdi kāma-jaṭā
analyzed: yadi na samuddharanti yatayaḥ hṛdi kāma jaṭā

original: BhP_10.87.039/2 duradhigamo 'satāṃ hṛdi gato 'smṛta-kaṇṭha-maṇiḥ
analyzed: satām hṛdi gataḥ smṛta kaṇṭha maṇiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.039/3 asu-tṛpa-yoginām ubhayato 'py asukhaṃ bhagavann
analyzed: asutṛpa yoginām ubhayatas pi asukham bhagavan

original: BhP_10.87.039/4 anapagatāntakād anadhirūḍha-padād bhavataḥ
analyzed: an apagata antakāt an adhirūḍha padāt bhavataḥ

original: BhP_10.87.040/1 tvad avagamī na vetti bhavad-uttha-śubhāśubhayor
analyzed: tvat avagamī na vetti bhavat uttha śubha aśubhayoḥ

original: BhP_10.87.040/2 guṇa-viguṇānvayāṃs tarhi deha-bhṛtāṃ ca giraḥ
analyzed: guṇa viguṇa anvayān tarhi dehabhṛtām ca giraḥ

original: BhP_10.87.040/3 anu-yugam anv-ahaṃ sa-guṇa gīta-paramparayā
analyzed: anuyugam anvaham sa guṇa gīta paramparayā

original: BhP_10.87.040/4 śravaṇa-bhṛto yatas tvam apavarga-gatir manu-jaiḥ
analyzed: śravaṇa bhṛtaḥ yatas tvam apavarga gatiḥ manujaiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.041/1 dyu-pataya eva te na yayur antam anantatayā
analyzed: dyupatayaḥ eva te na yayuḥ antam ananta tayā

original: BhP_10.87.041/2 tvam api yad-antarāṇḍa-nicayā nanu sāvaraṇāḥ
analyzed: tvam api yad antara aṇḍa nicayāḥ nanu sa āvaraṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.041/3 kha iva rajāṃsi vānti vayasā saha yac chrutayas
analyzed: khe iva rajāṃsi vānti vayasā saha yat śrutayaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.041/4 tvayi hi phalanty atan-nirasanena bhavan-nidhanāḥ
analyzed: tvayi hi phalanti a tad nirasanena bhavat nidhanāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.042/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.042/1 ity etad brahmaṇaḥ putrā āśrutyātmānuśāsanam
analyzed: iti etat brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ āśrutya ātma anuśāsanam

original: BhP_10.87.042/3 sanandanam athānarcuḥ siddhā jñātvātmano gatim
analyzed: sanandanam atha anarcuḥ siddhāḥ jñātvā ātmanaḥ gatim

original: BhP_10.87.043/1 ity aśeṣa-samāmnāya- purāṇopaniṣad-rasaḥ
analyzed: iti aśeṣa samāmnāya purāṇa upaniṣad rasaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.043/3 samuddhṛtaḥ pūrva-jātair vyoma-yānair mahātmabhiḥ
analyzed: samuddhṛtaḥ pūrva jātaiḥ vyomayānaiḥ mahātmabhiḥ

original: BhP_10.87.044/1 tvaṃ caitad brahma-dāyāda śraddhayātmānuśāsanam
analyzed: tvam ca etat brahma dāyāda śraddhayā ātma anuśāsanam

original: BhP_10.87.044/3 dhārayaṃś cara gāṃ kāmaṃ kāmānāṃ bharjanaṃ nṛṇām
analyzed: dhārayan cara gām kāmam kāmānām bharjanam nṛṇām

original: BhP_10.87.045/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.045/1 evaṃ sa ṛṣiṇādiṣṭaṃ gṛhītvā śraddhayātmavān
analyzed: evam saḥ ṛṣiṇā ādiṣṭam gṛhītvā śraddhayā ātmavān

original: BhP_10.87.045/3 pūrṇaḥ śruta-dharo rājann āha vīra-vrato muniḥ
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ śrutadharaḥ rājan āha vīravrataḥ muniḥ

original: BhP_10.87.046/0 śrī-nārada uvāca
analyzed: uvāca

original: BhP_10.87.046/1 namas tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāyāmala-kīrtaye
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya amala kīrtaye

original: BhP_10.87.046/3 yo dhatte sarva-bhūtānām abhavāyośatīḥ kalāḥ
