analyzed: yaḥ dhatte sarva bhūtānām abhavāya uśatīḥ kalāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.047/1 ity ādyam ṛṣim ānamya tac-chiṣyāṃś ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti ādyam ṛṣim ānamya tad śiṣyān ca mahātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.047/3 tato 'gād āśramaṃ sākṣāt pitur dvaipāyanasya me
analyzed: tatas gāt āśramam sākṣāt pituḥ dvaipāyanasya me

original: BhP_10.87.048/1 sabhājito bhagavatā kṛtāsana-parigrahaḥ
analyzed: sabhājitaḥ bhagavatā kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.048/3 tasmai tad varṇayām āsa nārāyaṇa-mukhāc chrutam
analyzed: tasmai tat varṇayām āsa nārāyaṇa mukhāt śrutam

original: BhP_10.87.049/1 ity etad varṇitaṃ rājan yan naḥ praśnaḥ kṛtas tvayā
analyzed: iti etat varṇitam rājan yat naḥ praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ tvayā

original: BhP_10.87.049/3 yathā brahmaṇy anirdeśye nīṛguṇe 'pi manaś caret
analyzed: yathā brahmaṇi anirdeśye manaḥ caret

original: BhP_10.87.050/1 yo 'syotprekṣaka ādi-madhya-nidhane yo 'vyakta-jīveśvaro
analyzed: ādi madhya nidhane yaḥ

original: BhP_10.87.050/2 yaḥ sṛṣṭvedam anupraviśya ṛṣiṇā cakre puraḥ śāsti tāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ sṛṣṭvā idam anupraviśya ṛṣiṇā cakre puras śāsti tāḥ

original: BhP_10.87.050/3 yaṃ sampadya jahāty ajām anuśayī suptaḥ kulāyaṃ yathā
analyzed: yam sampadya jahāti ajām anuśayī suptaḥ kulāyam yathā

original: BhP_10.87.050/4 taṃ kaivalya-nirasta-yonim abhayaṃ dhyāyed ajasraṃ harim
analyzed: tam kaivalya nirasta yonim abhayam dhyāyet ajasram harim

original: BhP_10.88.001/0 śrī-rājovāca
analyzed: śrī rājā uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.001/1 devāsura-manuṣyesu ye bhajanty aśivaṃ śivam
analyzed: deva asura manuṣyesu ye bhajanti aśivam śivam

original: BhP_10.88.001/3 prāyas te dhanino bhojā na tu lakṣmyāḥ patiṃ harim
analyzed: prāyas te dhaninaḥ bhojāḥ na tu lakṣmyāḥ patim harim

original: BhP_10.88.002/1 etad veditum icchāmaḥ sandeho 'tra mahān hi naḥ
analyzed: etat veditum icchāmaḥ sandehaḥ mahān hi naḥ

original: BhP_10.88.002/3 viruddha-śīlayoḥ prabhvor viruddhā bhajatāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: viruddha śīlayoḥ prabhvoḥ viruddhā bhajatām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.88.003/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.003/1 śivaḥ śakti-yutaḥ śaśvat tri-liṅgo guṇa-saṃvṛtaḥ
BhP_10.88.003/3 vaikārikas taijasaś ca tāmasaś cety ahaṃ tridhā
analyzed: vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā

original: BhP_10.88.004/1 tato vikārā abhavan ṣoḍaśāmīṣu kañcana
analyzed: tatas vikārāḥ abhavan ṣoḍaśa amīṣu kañcana

original: BhP_10.88.004/3 upadhāvan vibhūtīnāṃ sarvāsām aśnute gatim
analyzed: upadhāvan vibhūtīnām sarvāsām aśnute gatim

original: BhP_10.88.005/1 harir hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ
analyzed: hariḥ hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ

original: BhP_10.88.005/3 sa sarva-dṛg upadraṣṭā taṃ bhajan nirguṇo bhavet
analyzed: sa sarva dṛś upadraṣṭā tam bhajan nirguṇaḥ bhavet

original: BhP_10.88.006/1 nivṛtteṣv aśva-medheṣu rājā yuṣmat-pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: nivṛtteṣu aśvamedheṣu rājā yuṣmad pitāmahaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.006/3 śṛṇvan bhagavato dharmān apṛcchad idam acyutam
analyzed: śṛṇvan bhagavataḥ dharmān apṛcchat idam acyutam

original: BhP_10.88.007/1 sa āha bhagavāṃs tasmai prītaḥ śuśrūṣave prabhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ āha bhagavān tasmai prītaḥ śuśrūṣave prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.88.007/3 nṛṇāṃ niḥśreyasārthāya yo 'vatīrṇo yadoḥ kule
analyzed: nṛṇām niḥśreyasa arthāya yaḥ vatīrṇaḥ yadoḥ kule

original: BhP_10.88.008/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.008/1 yasyāham anugṛhṇāmi hariṣye tad-dhanaṃ śanaiḥ
analyzed: yasya aham anugṛhṇāmi hariṣye tat dhanam śanais

original: BhP_10.88.008/3 tato 'dhanaṃ tyajanty asya svajanā duḥkha-duḥkhitam
analyzed: tatas dhanam tyajanti asya sva janāḥ duḥkha duḥkhitam

original: BhP_10.88.009/1 sa yadā vitathodyogo nirviṇṇaḥ syād dhanehayā
analyzed: sa yadā vitatha udyogaḥ nirviṇṇaḥ syāt dhana īhayā

original: BhP_10.88.009/3 mat-paraiḥ kṛta-maitrasya kariṣye mad-anugraham
analyzed: mad paraiḥ kṛta maitrasya kariṣye mad anugraham

original: BhP_10.88.010/1 tad brahma paramaṃ sūkṣmaṃ cin-mātraṃ sad anantakam
analyzed: tat brahma paramam sūkṣmam cit mātram sat anantakam

original: BhP_10.88.010/3 vijñāyātmatayā dhīraḥ saṃsārāt parimucyate
analyzed: vijñāya ātma tayā dhīraḥ saṃsārāt parimucyate

original: BhP_10.88.011/1 ato māṃ su-durārādhyaṃ hitvānyān bhajate janaḥ
analyzed: atas mām su durārādhyam hitvā anyān bhajate janaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.011/3 tatas ta āśu-toṣebhyo labdha-rājya-śriyoddhatāḥ
analyzed: tatas te āśu toṣebhyaḥ labdha rājya śriyā uddhatāḥ

original: BhP_10.88.011/5 mattāḥ pramattā vara-dān vismayanty avajānate
analyzed: mattāḥ pramattāḥ vara dān vismayanti avajānate

original: BhP_10.88.012/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.012/1 śāpa-prasādayor īśā brahma-viṣṇu-śivādayaḥ
analyzed: śāpa prasādayoḥ īśāḥ brahma viṣṇu śiva ādayaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.012/3 sadyaḥ śāpa-prasādo 'ṅga śivo brahmā na cācyutaḥ
analyzed: sadyas śāpa prasādaḥ ṅga śivaḥ brahmā na ca acyutaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.013/1 atra codāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
analyzed: atra ca udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam

original: BhP_10.88.013/3 vṛkāsurāya giriśo varaṃ dattvāpa saṅkaṭam
analyzed: vṛka asurāya giriśaḥ varam dattvā āpa saṅkaṭam

original: BhP_10.88.014/1 vṛko nāmāsuraḥ putraḥ śakuneḥ pathi nāradam
analyzed: vṛkaḥ nāma asuraḥ putraḥ śakuneḥ pathi nāradam

original: BhP_10.88.014/3 dṛṣṭvāśu-toṣaṃ papraccha deveṣu triṣu durmatiḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā āśu toṣam papraccha deveṣu triṣu durmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.88.015/1 sa āha devaṃ giriśam upādhāvāśu siddhyasi
analyzed: saḥ āha devam giriśam upādhāva āśu siddhi asi

original: BhP_10.88.015/3 yo 'lpābhyāṃ guṇa-doṣābhyām āśu tuṣyati kupyati
analyzed: yaḥ lpābhyām guṇa doṣābhyām āśu tuṣyati kupyati

original: BhP_10.88.016/1 daśāsya-bāṇayos tuṣṭaḥ stuvator vandinor iva
analyzed: daśa āsya bāṇayoḥ tuṣṭaḥ stuvatoḥ vandinoḥ iva

original: BhP_10.88.016/3 aiśvaryam atulaṃ dattvā tata āpa su-saṅkaṭam
analyzed: aiśvaryam atulam dattvā tatas āpa su saṅkaṭam

original: BhP_10.88.017/1 ity ādiṣṭas tam asura upādhāvat sva-gātrataḥ
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭaḥ tam asuraḥ upādhāvat sva gātrataḥ

original: BhP_10.88.017/3 kedāra ātma-kravyeṇa juhvāno gni-mukhaṃ haram
analyzed: kedāre ātma kravyeṇa juhvānaḥ gni mukham haram

original: BhP_10.88.018/1 devopalabdhim aprāpya nirvedāt saptame 'hani
analyzed: deva upalabdhim a prāpya nirvedāt saptame hani

original: BhP_10.88.018/3 śiro 'vṛścat sudhitinā tat-tīrtha-klinna-mūrdhajam
analyzed: śiraḥ vṛścat sudhitinā tad tīrtha klinna mūrdhajam

original: BhP_10.88.019/1 tadā mahā-kāruṇiko sa dhūrjaṭir yathā vayaṃ cāgnir ivotthito 'nalāt
analyzed: tadā mahā kāruṇikaḥ sa dhūrjaṭiḥ yathā vayam ca agniḥ iva utthitaḥ nalāt

original: BhP_10.88.019/3 nigṛhya dorbhyāṃ bhujayor nyavārayat tat-sparśanād bhūya upaskṛtākṛtiḥ
analyzed: nigṛhya dorbhyām bhujayoḥ nyavārayat tad sparśanāt bhūyas upaskṛta ākṛtiḥ

original: BhP_10.88.020/1 tam āha cāṅgālam alaṃ vṛṇīṣva me yathābhikāmaṃ vitarāmi te varam
analyzed: tam āha cāṅgālam alam vṛṇīṣva me yathā abhikāmam vitarāmi te varam

original: BhP_10.88.020/3 prīyeya toyena nṛṇāṃ prapadyatām aho tvayātmā bhṛśam ardyate vṛthā
analyzed: prīyeya toyena nṛṇām prapadyatām aho tvayā ātmā bhṛśam ardyate vṛthā

original: BhP_10.88.021/1 devaṃ sa vavre pāpīyān varaṃ bhūta-bhayāvaham
analyzed: devam sa vavre pāpīyān varam bhūta bhaya āvaham

original: BhP_10.88.021/3 yasya yasya karaṃ śīrṣṇi dhāsye sa mriyatām iti
analyzed: yasya yasya karam śīrṣṇi dhāsye sa mriyatām iti

original: BhP_10.88.022/1 tac chrutvā bhagavān rudro durmanā iva bhārata
analyzed: tat śrutvā bhagavān rudraḥ durmanāḥ iva bhārata

original: BhP_10.88.022/3 oṃ iti prahasaṃs tasmai dade 'her amṛtaṃ yathā
analyzed: om iti prahasan tasmai dade heḥ amṛtam yathā

original: BhP_10.88.023/1 sa tad-vara-parīkṣārthaṃ śambhor mūrdhni kilāsuraḥ
analyzed: sa tad vara parīkṣā artham śambhoḥ mūrdhni kila asuraḥ

original: BhP_10.88.023/3 sva-hastaṃ dhātum ārebhe so 'bibhyat sva-kṛtāc chivaḥ
analyzed: sva hastam dhātum ārebhe saḥ bibhyat sva kṛtāt śivaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.024/1 tenopasṛṣṭaḥ santrastaḥ parādhāvan sa-vepathuḥ
analyzed: tena upasṛṣṭaḥ santrastaḥ parādhāvan sa vepathuḥ

original: BhP_10.88.024/3 yāvad antaṃ divo bhūmeḥ kaṣṭhānām udagād udak
analyzed: yāvat antam divaḥ bhūmeḥ kaṣṭhānām udagāt udak

original: BhP_10.88.025/1 ajānantaḥ prati-vidhiṃ tūṣṇīm āsan sureśvarāḥ
analyzed: a jānantaḥ pratividhim tūṣṇīm āsan sura īśvarāḥ

original: BhP_10.88.025/3 tato vaikuṇṭham agamad bhāsvaraṃ tamasaḥ param
analyzed: tatas vaikuṇṭham agamat bhāsvaram tamasaḥ param

original: BhP_10.88.026/1 yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣān nyāsināṃ paramo gatiḥ
analyzed: yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt nyāsinām paramaḥ gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.88.026/3 śāntānāṃ nyasta-daṇḍānāṃ yato nāvartate gataḥ
analyzed: śāntānām nyasta daṇḍānām yatas na āvartate gataḥ

original: BhP_10.88.027/1 taṃ tathā vyasanaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān vṛjinārdanaḥ
analyzed: tam tathā vyasanam dṛṣṭvā bhagavān vṛjina ardanaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.027/3 dūrāt pratyudiyād bhūtvā baṭuko yoga-māyayā
analyzed: dūrāt pratyudiyāt bhūtvā baṭukaḥ yoga māyayā

original: BhP_10.88.028/1 mekhalājina-daṇḍākṣais tejasāgnir iva jvalan
analyzed: mekhalā ajina daṇḍa akṣaiḥ tejasā agniḥ iva jvalan

original: BhP_10.88.028/3 abhivādayām āsa ca taṃ kuśa-pāṇir vinīta-vat
analyzed: abhivādayām āsa ca tam kuśa pāṇiḥ vinīta vat

original: BhP_10.88.029/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.029/1 śākuneya bhavān vyaktaṃ śrāntaḥ kiṃ dūram āgataḥ
analyzed: śākuneya bhavān vyaktam śrāntaḥ kim dūram āgataḥ

original: BhP_10.88.029/3 kṣaṇaṃ viśramyatāṃ puṃsa ātmāyaṃ sarva-kāma-dhuk
analyzed: kṣaṇam viśramyatām puṃsaḥ ātmā ayam sarva kāmaduh

original: BhP_10.88.030/1 yadi naḥ śravaṇāyālaṃ yuṣmad-vyavasitaṃ vibho
analyzed: yadi naḥ śravaṇāya alam yuṣmad vyavasitam vibho

original: BhP_10.88.030/3 bhaṇyatāṃ prāyaśaḥ pumbhir dhṛtaiḥ svārthān samīhate
analyzed: bhaṇyatām prāyaśas pumbhiḥ dhṛtaiḥ sva arthān samīhate

original: BhP_10.88.031/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.031/1 evaṃ bhagavatā pṛṣṭo vacasāmṛta-varṣiṇā
analyzed: evam bhagavatā pṛṣṭaḥ vacasā amṛta varṣiṇā

original: BhP_10.88.031/3 gata-klamo 'bravīt tasmai yathā-pūrvam anuṣṭhitam
analyzed: gata klamaḥ bravīt tasmai yathāpūrvam anuṣṭhitam

original: BhP_10.88.032/0 śrī-bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: BhP_10.88.032/1 evaṃ cet tarhi tad-vākyaṃ na vayaṃ śraddadhīmahi
analyzed: evam ced tarhi tat vākyam na vayam śraddadhīmahi

original: BhP_10.88.032/3 yo dakṣa-śāpāt paiśācyaṃ prāptaḥ preta-piśāca-rāṭ
analyzed: yaḥ dakṣa śāpāt paiśācyam prāptaḥ preta piśāca rāj

original: BhP_10.88.033/1 yadi vas tatra viśrambho dānavendra jagad-gurau
analyzed: yadi vaḥ tatra viśrambhaḥ dānava indra jagadgurau

original: BhP_10.88.033/3 tarhy aṅgāśu sva-śirasi hastaṃ nyasya pratīyatām
analyzed: tarhi aṅga āśu sva śirasi hastam nyasya pratīyatām

original: BhP_10.88.034/1 yady asatyaṃ vacaḥ śambhoḥ kathañcid dānavarṣabha
analyzed: yadi asatyam vacaḥ śambhoḥ kathañcid dānava ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.88.034/3 tadainaṃ jahy asad-vācaṃ na yad vaktānṛtaṃ punaḥ
analyzed: tadā enam jahi asat vācam na yat vaktā anṛtam punar

original: BhP_10.88.035/1 itthaṃ bhagavataś citrair vacobhiḥ sa su-peśalaiḥ
analyzed: ittham bhagavataḥ citraiḥ vacobhiḥ sa su peśalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.88.035/3 bhinna-dhīr vismṛtaḥ śīrṣṇi sva-hastaṃ kumatir nyadhāt
analyzed: bhinna dhīḥ vismṛtaḥ śīrṣṇi sva hastam kumatiḥ nyadhāt

original: BhP_10.88.036/1 athāpatad bhinna-śirāḥ vrajāhata iva kṣaṇāt
analyzed: atha apatat bhinna śirāḥ vraja āhataḥ iva kṣaṇāt

original: BhP_10.88.036/3 jaya-śabdo namaḥ-śabdaḥ sādhu-śabdo 'bhavad divi
analyzed: jaya śabdaḥ namaḥ śabdaḥ sādhu śabdaḥ bhavat divi

original: BhP_10.88.037/1 mumucuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi hate pāpe vṛkāsure
analyzed: mumucuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi hate pāpe vṛka asure

original: BhP_10.88.037/3 devarṣi-pitṛ-gandharvā mocitaḥ saṅkaṭāc chivaḥ
analyzed: deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharvāḥ mocitaḥ saṅkaṭāt śivaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.038/1 muktaṃ giriśam abhyāha bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: muktam giriśam abhyāha bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.038/3 aho deva mahā-deva pāpo 'yaṃ svena pāpmanā
analyzed: aho deva mahādeva pāpaḥ yam svena pāpmanā

original: BhP_10.88.039/1 hataḥ ko nu mahatsv īśa jantur vai kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: hataḥ kaḥ nu mahatsu īśa jantuḥ vai kṛta kilbiṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.88.039/3 kṣemī syāt kim u viśveśe kṛtāgasko jagad-gurau
analyzed: kṣemī syāt kim viśveśe kṛta āgaskaḥ jagadgurau

original: BhP_10.88.040/1 ya evam avyākṛta-śakty-udanvataḥ parasya sākṣāt paramātmano hareḥ
analyzed: yaḥ evam avyākṛta śakti udanvataḥ parasya sākṣāt paramātmanaḥ hareḥ

original: BhP_10.88.040/3 giritra-mokṣaṃ kathayec chṛṇoti vā vimucyate saṃsṛtibhis tathāribhiḥ
analyzed: kathayet śṛṇoti vā vimucyate saṃsṛtibhiḥ tathā aribhiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.001/1 sarasvatyās taṭe rājann ṛṣayaḥ satram āsata
analyzed: sarasvatyāḥ taṭe rājan ṛṣayaḥ satram āsata

original: BhP_10.89.001/3 vitarkaḥ samabhūt teṣāṃ triṣv adhīśeṣu ko mahān
analyzed: vitarkaḥ samabhūt teṣām triṣu adhīśeṣu kaḥ mahān

original: BhP_10.89.002/1 tasya jijñāsayā te vai bhṛguṃ brahma-sutaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: tasya jijñāsayā te vai bhṛgum brahma sutam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.89.002/3 taj-jñaptyai preṣayām āsuḥ so 'bhjagād brahmaṇaḥ sabhām
analyzed: tad jñaptyai preṣayām āsuḥ saḥ bhjagāt brahmaṇaḥ sabhām

original: BhP_10.89.003/1 na tasmai prahvaṇaṃ stotraṃ cakre sattva-parīkṣayā
analyzed: na tasmai prahvaṇam stotram cakre sattva parīkṣayā

original: BhP_10.89.003/3 tasmai cukrodha bhagavān prajvalan svena tejasā
analyzed: tasmai cukrodha bhagavān prajvalan svena tejasā

original: BhP_10.89.004/1 sa ātmany utthitam manyum ātmajāyātmanā prabhuḥ
analyzed: saḥ ātmani utthitam manyum ātmajāya ātmanā prabhuḥ

original: BhP_10.89.004/3 aśīśamad yathā vahniṃ sva-yonyā vāriṇātma-bhūḥ
analyzed: aśīśamat yathā vahnim sva yonyā vāriṇā ātmabhūḥ

original: BhP_10.89.005/1 tataḥ kailāsam agamat sa taṃ devo maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: tatas kailāsam agamat sa tam devaḥ maheśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.89.005/3 parirabdhuṃ samārebha utthāya bhrātaraṃ mudā
analyzed: parirabdhum samārebhe utthāya bhrātaram mudā

original: BhP_10.89.006/1 naicchat tvam asy utpatha-ga iti devaś cukopa ha
analyzed: na aicchat tvam asi utpatha gaḥ iti devaḥ cukopa ha

original: BhP_10.89.006/3 śūlam udyamya taṃ hantum ārebhe tigma-locanaḥ
analyzed: śūlam udyamya tam hantum ārebhe tigmalocanaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.007/1 patitvā pādayor devī sāntvayām āsa taṃ girā
analyzed: patitvā pādayoḥ devī sāntvayām āsa tam girā

original: BhP_10.89.007/3 atho jagāma vaikuṇṭhaṃ yatra devo janārdanaḥ
analyzed: atho jagāma vaikuṇṭham yatra devaḥ janārdanaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.008/1 śayānaṃ śriya utsaṅge padā vakṣasy atāḍayat
analyzed: śayānam śriyaḥ utsaṅge padā vakṣasi atāḍayat

original: BhP_10.89.008/3 tata utthāya bhagavān saha lakṣmyā satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: tatas utthāya bhagavān saha lakṣmyā satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.009/1 sva-talpād avaruhyātha nanāma śirasā munim
analyzed: sva talpāt avaruhya atha nanāma śirasā munim

original: BhP_10.89.009/3 āha te svāgataṃ brahman niṣīdātrāsane kṣaṇam
analyzed: āha te svāgatam brahman niṣīda atra āsane kṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.89.009/5 ajānatām āgatān vaḥ kṣantum arhatha naḥ prabho
analyzed: a jānatām āgatān vaḥ kṣantum arhatha naḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.89.010/1 punīhi saha-lokaṃ māṃ loka-pālāṃś ca mad-gatān
analyzed: punīhi saha lokam mām lokapālān ca mad gatān

original: BhP_10.89.010/3 pādodakena bhavatas tīrthānāṃ tīrtha-kāriṇā
analyzed: pāda udakena bhavataḥ tīrthānām tīrthakāriṇā

original: BhP_10.89.011/1 adyāhaṃ bhagavaṃl lakṣmyā āsam ekānta-bhājanam
analyzed: adya aham bhagavan lakṣmyāḥ āsam ekānta bhājanam

original: BhP_10.89.011/3 vatsyaty urasi me bhūtir bhavat-pāda-hatāṃhasaḥ
analyzed: vatsyati urasi me bhūtiḥ bhavat pāda hata aṃhasaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.012/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.012/1 evaṃ bruvāṇe vaikuṇṭhe bhṛgus tan-mandrayā girā
analyzed: evam bruvāṇe vaikuṇṭhe bhṛguḥ tat mandrayā girā

original: BhP_10.89.012/3 nirvṛtas tarpitas tūṣṇīṃ bhakty-utkaṇṭho 'śru-locanaḥ
analyzed: nirvṛtaḥ tarpitaḥ tūṣṇīm bhakti utkaṇṭhaḥ śru locanaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.013/1 punaś ca satram āvrajya munīnāṃ brahma-vādinām
analyzed: punar ca satram āvrajya munīnām brahma vādinām

original: BhP_10.89.013/3 svānubhūtam aśeṣeṇa rājan bhṛgur avarṇayat
analyzed: sva anubhūtam aśeṣeṇa rājan bhṛguḥ avarṇayat

original: BhP_10.89.014/1 tan niśamyātha munayo vismitā mukta-saṃśayāḥ
analyzed: tat niśamya atha munayaḥ vismitāḥ mukta saṃśayāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.014/3 bhūyāṃsaṃ śraddadhur viṣṇuṃ yataḥ śāntir yato 'bhayam
analyzed: bhūyāṃsam śraddadhuḥ viṣṇum yatas śāntiḥ yatas bhayam

original: BhP_10.89.015/1 dharmaḥ sākṣād yato jñānaṃ vairāgyaṃ ca tad-anvitam
analyzed: dharmaḥ sākṣāt yatas jñānam vairāgyam ca tad anvitam

original: BhP_10.89.015/3 aiśvaryaṃ cāṣṭadhā yasmād yaśaś cātma-malāpaham
analyzed: aiśvaryam ca aṣṭadhā yasmāt yaśaḥ ca ātma mala apaham

original: BhP_10.89.016/1 munīnāṃ nyasta-daṇḍānāṃ śāntānāṃ sama-cetasām
analyzed: munīnām nyasta daṇḍānām śāntānām sama cetasām

original: BhP_10.89.016/3 akiñcanānāṃ sādhūnāṃ yam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: akiñcanānām sādhūnām yam āhuḥ paramām gatim

original: BhP_10.89.017/1 sattvaṃ yasya priyā mūrtir brāhmaṇās tv iṣṭa-devatāḥ
analyzed: sattvam yasya priyā mūrtiḥ brāhmaṇāḥ tu iṣṭadevatāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.017/3 bhajanty anāśiṣaḥ śāntā yaṃ vā nipuṇa-buddhayaḥ
analyzed: bhajanti an āśiṣaḥ śāntāḥ yam vā nipuṇa buddhayaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.018/1 tri-vidhākṛtayas tasya rākṣasā asurāḥ surāḥ
analyzed: trividha ākṛtayaḥ tasya rākṣasāḥ asurāḥ surāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.018/3 guṇinyā māyayā sṛṣṭāḥ sattvaṃ tat tīrtha-sādhanam
analyzed: guṇinyā māyayā sṛṣṭāḥ sattvam tat tīrtha sādhanam

original: BhP_10.89.019/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.019/1 itthaṃ sārasvatā viprā nṛṇām saṃśaya-nuttaye
analyzed: ittham sārasvatāḥ viprāḥ nṛṇām saṃśaya nuttaye

original: BhP_10.89.019/3 puruṣasya padāmbhoja- sevayā tad-gatiṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: puruṣasya pada ambhoja sevayā tad gatim gatāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.020/0 śrī-sūta uvāca
analyzed: śrī sūtaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.020/1 ity etan muni-tanayāsya-padma-gandha
analyzed: iti etat muni tanaya āsya padma gandha

original: BhP_10.89.020/2 pīyūṣaṃ bhava-bhaya-bhit parasya puṃsaḥ
analyzed: pīyūṣam bhava bhaya bhid parasya puṃsaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.020/3 su-ślokaṃ śravaṇa-puṭaiḥ pibaty abhīkṣṇam
analyzed: suślokam śravaṇapuṭaiḥ pibati abhīkṣṇam

original: BhP_10.89.020/4 pāntho 'dhva-bhramaṇa-pariśramaṃ jahāti
analyzed: pānthaḥ dhva bhramaṇa pariśramam jahāti

original: BhP_10.89.021/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.021/1 ekadā dvāravatyāṃ tu vipra-patnyāḥ kumārakaḥ
analyzed: ekadā dvāravatyām tu vipra patnyāḥ kumārakaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.021/3 jāta-mātro bhuvaṃ spṛṣṭvā mamāra kila bhārata
analyzed: jāta mātraḥ bhuvam spṛṣṭvā mamāra kila bhārata

original: BhP_10.89.022/1 vipro gṛhītvā mṛtakaṃ rāja-dvāry upadhāya saḥ
analyzed: vipraḥ gṛhītvā mṛtakam rāja dvāri upadhāya saḥ

original: BhP_10.89.022/3 idaṃ provāca vilapann āturo dīna-mānasaḥ
analyzed: idam provāca vilapan āturaḥ dīna mānasaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.023/1 brahma-dviṣaḥ śaṭha-dhiyo lubdhasya viṣayātmanaḥ
analyzed: brahma dviṣaḥ śaṭha dhiyaḥ lubdhasya viṣaya ātmanaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.023/3 kṣatra-bandhoḥ karma-doṣāt pañcatvaṃ me gato 'rbhakaḥ
analyzed: kṣatrabandhoḥ karma doṣāt pañcatvam me gataḥ ṛbhakaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.024/1 hiṃsā-vihāraṃ nṛpatiṃ duḥśīlam ajitendriyam
analyzed: hiṃsā vihāram nṛpatim duḥśīlam ajita indriyam

original: BhP_10.89.024/3 prajā bhajantyaḥ sīdanti daridrā nitya-duḥkhitāḥ
analyzed: prajāḥ bhajantyaḥ sīdanti daridrāḥ nitya duḥkhitāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.025/1 evaṃ dvitīyaṃ viprarṣis tṛtīyaṃ tv evam eva ca
analyzed: evam dvitīyam viprarṣiḥ tṛtīyam tu evam eva ca

original: BhP_10.89.025/3 visṛjya sa nṛpa-dvāri tāṃ gāthāṃ samagāyata
analyzed: visṛjya sa nṛpa dvāri tām gāthām samagāyata

original: BhP_10.89.026/1 tām arjuna upaśrutya karhicit keśavāntike
analyzed: tām arjunaḥ upaśrutya karhicit keśava antike

original: BhP_10.89.026/3 parete navame bāle brāhmaṇaṃ samabhāṣata
analyzed: parete navame bāle brāhmaṇam samabhāṣata

original: BhP_10.89.027/1 kiṃ svid brahmaṃs tvan-nivāse iha nāsti dhanur-dharaḥ
analyzed: kim svid brahman tvad nivāse iha na asti dhanurdharaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.027/3 rājanya-bandhur ete vai brāhmaṇāḥ satram āsate
analyzed: rājanyabandhuḥ ete vai brāhmaṇāḥ satram āsate

original: BhP_10.89.028/1 dhana-dārātmajāpṛktā yatra śocanti brāhmaṇāḥ
analyzed: dhana dāra ātmaja apṛktāḥ yatra śocanti brāhmaṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.028/3 te vai rājanya-veṣeṇa naṭā jīvanty asum-bharāḥ
analyzed: te vai rājanya veṣeṇa naṭāḥ jīvanti asumbharāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.029/1 ahaṃ prajāḥ vāṃ bhagavan rakṣiṣye dīnayor iha
analyzed: aham prajāḥ vām bhagavan rakṣiṣye dīnayoḥ iha

original: BhP_10.89.029/3 anistīrṇa-pratijño 'gniṃ pravekṣye hata-kalmaṣaḥ
analyzed: anistīrṇa pratijñaḥ gnim pravekṣye hata kalmaṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.030/0 śrī-brāhmaṇa uvāca
analyzed: śrī brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.030/1 saṅkarṣaṇo vāsudevaḥ pradyumno dhanvināṃ varaḥ
analyzed: saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vāsudevaḥ pradyumnaḥ dhanvinām varaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.030/3 aniruddho 'prati-ratho na trātuṃ śaknuvanti yat
analyzed: a niruddhaḥ pratirathaḥ na trātum śaknuvanti yat

original: BhP_10.89.031/1 tat kathaṃ nu bhavān karma duṣkaraṃ jagad-īśvaraiḥ
analyzed: tat katham nu bhavān karma duṣkaram jagat īśvaraiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.031/3 tvaṃ cikīrṣasi bāliśyāt tan na śraddadhmahe vayam
analyzed: tvam cikīrṣasi bāliśyāt tat na śraddadhmahe vayam

original: BhP_10.89.032/0 śrī-arjuna uvāca
analyzed: śrī arjunaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.89.032/1 nāhaṃ saṅkarṣaṇo brahman na kṛṣṇaḥ kārṣṇir eva ca
analyzed: na aham saṅkarṣaṇaḥ brahman na kṛṣṇaḥ kārṣṇiḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.89.032/3 ahaṃ vā arjuno nāma gāṇḍīvaṃ yasya vai dhanuḥ
analyzed: aham vai arjunaḥ nāma gāṇḍīvam yasya vai dhanuḥ

original: BhP_10.89.033/1 māvamaṃsthā mama brahman vīryaṃ tryambaka-toṣaṇam
analyzed: mā avamaṃsthāḥ mama brahman vīryam tryambaka toṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.89.033/3 mṛtyuṃ vijitya pradhane āneṣye te prajāḥ prabho
analyzed: mṛtyum vijitya pradhane āneṣye te prajāḥ prabho

original: BhP_10.89.034/1 evaṃ viśrambhito vipraḥ phālgunena parantapa
analyzed: evam viśrambhitaḥ vipraḥ phālgunena parantapa

original: BhP_10.89.034/3 jagāma sva-gṛhaṃ prītaḥ pārtha-vīryaṃ niśāmayan
analyzed: jagāma sva gṛham prītaḥ pārtha vīryam niśāmayan

original: BhP_10.89.035/1 prasūti-kāla āsanne bhāryāyā dvija-sattamaḥ
analyzed: prasūti kāle āsanne bhāryāyāḥ dvijasattamaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.035/3 pāhi pāhi prajāṃ mṛtyor ity āhārjunam āturaḥ
analyzed: pāhi pāhi prajām mṛtyoḥ iti āha arjunam āturaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.036/1 sa upaspṛśya śucy ambho namaskṛtya maheśvaram
analyzed: saḥ upaspṛśya śuci ambhaḥ namaskṛtya maheśvaram

original: BhP_10.89.036/3 divyāny astrāṇi saṃsmṛtya sajyaṃ gāṇḍīvam ādade
analyzed: divyāni astrāṇi saṃsmṛtya sajyam gāṇḍīvam ādade

original: BhP_10.89.037/1 nyaruṇat sūtikāgāraṃ śarair nānāstra-yojitaiḥ
analyzed: nyaruṇat sūtikāgāram śaraiḥ nānā astra yojitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.037/3 tiryag ūrdhvam adhaḥ pārthaś cakāra śara-pañjaram
analyzed: tiryak ūrdhvam adhas pārthaḥ cakāra śara pañjaram

original: BhP_10.89.038/1 tataḥ kumāraḥ sañjāto vipra-patnyā rudan muhuḥ
analyzed: tatas kumāraḥ sañjātaḥ vipra patnyā rudan muhur

original: BhP_10.89.038/3 sadyo 'darśanam āpede sa-śarīro vihāyasā
analyzed: sadyas darśanam āpede sa śarīraḥ vihāyasā

original: BhP_10.89.039/1 tadāha vipro vijayaṃ vinindan kṛṣṇa-sannidhau
analyzed: tat āha vipraḥ vijayam vinindan kṛṣṇa sannidhau

original: BhP_10.89.039/3 mauḍhyaṃ paśyata me yo 'haṃ śraddadhe klība-katthanam
analyzed: mauḍhyam paśyata me yaḥ ham śraddadhe klība katthanam

original: BhP_10.89.040/1 na pradyumno nāniruddho na rāmo na ca keśavaḥ
analyzed: na pradyumnaḥ na aniruddhaḥ na rāmaḥ na ca keśavaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.040/3 yasya śekuḥ paritrātuṃ ko 'nyas tad-aviteśvaraḥ
analyzed: yasya śekuḥ paritrātum kaḥ nyaḥ tad avita īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.89.041/1 dhig arjunaṃ mṛṣā-vādaṃ dhig ātma-ślāghino dhanuḥ
analyzed: dhik arjunam mṛṣāvādam dhik ātma ślāghinaḥ dhanuḥ

original: BhP_10.89.041/3 daivopasṛṣṭaṃ yo mauḍhyād āninīṣati durmatiḥ
analyzed: daiva upasṛṣṭam yaḥ mauḍhyāt āninīṣati durmatiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.042/1 evaṃ śapati viprarṣau vidyām āsthāya phālgunaḥ
analyzed: evam śapati viprarṣau vidyām āsthāya phālgunaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.042/3 yayau saṃyamanīm āśu yatrāste bhagavān yamaḥ
analyzed: yayau saṃyamanīm āśu yatra āste bhagavān yamaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.043/1 viprāpatyam acakṣāṇas tata aindrīm agāt purīm
analyzed: vipra apatyam a cakṣāṇaḥ tatas aindrīm agāt purīm

original: BhP_10.89.043/3 āgneyīṃ nairṛtīṃ saumyāṃ vāyavyāṃ vāruṇīm atha
analyzed: āgneyīm nairṛtīm saumyām vāyavyām vāruṇīm atha

original: BhP_10.89.044/1 rasātalaṃ nāka-pṛṣṭhaṃ dhiṣṇyāny anyāny udāyudhaḥ
analyzed: rasātalam nāka pṛṣṭham dhiṣṇyāni anyāni udāyudhaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.044/3 tato 'labdha-dvija-suto hy anistīrṇa-pratiśrutaḥ
analyzed: tatas labdha dvija sutaḥ hi anistīrṇa pratiśrutaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.044/5 agniṃ vivikṣuḥ kṛṣṇena pratyuktaḥ pratiṣedhatā
analyzed: agnim vivikṣuḥ kṛṣṇena pratyuktaḥ pratiṣedhatā

original: BhP_10.89.045/1 darśaye dvija-sūnūṃs te māvajñātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: darśaye dvija sūnūn te mā avajñā ātmānam ātmanā

original: BhP_10.89.045/3 ye te naḥ kīrtiṃ vimalāṃ manuṣyāḥ sthāpayiṣyanti
analyzed: ye te naḥ kīrtim vimalām manuṣyāḥ sthāpayiṣyanti

original: BhP_10.89.046/1 iti sambhāṣya bhagavān arjunena saheśvaraḥ
analyzed: iti sambhāṣya bhagavān arjunena saha īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.89.046/3 divyaṃ sva-ratham āsthāya pratīcīṃ diśam āviśat
analyzed: divyam sva ratham āsthāya pratīcīm diśam āviśat

original: BhP_10.89.047/1 sapta dvīpān sa-sindhūṃś ca sapta sapta girīn atha
analyzed: sapta dvīpān sa sindhūn ca sapta sapta girīn atha

original: BhP_10.89.047/3 lokālokaṃ tathātītya viveśa su-mahat tamaḥ
analyzed: lokālokam tathā atītya viveśa su mahat tamaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.048/1 tatrāśvāḥ śaibya-sugrīva- meghapuṣpa-balāhakāḥ
analyzed: tatra aśvāḥ śaibya sugrīva meghapuṣpa balāhakāḥ

original: BhP_10.89.048/3 tamasi bhraṣṭa-gatayo babhūvur bharatarṣabha
analyzed: tamasi bhraṣṭa gatayaḥ babhūvuḥ bharata ṛṣabha

original: BhP_10.89.049/1 tān dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇo mahā-yogeśvareśvaraḥ
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ mahā yoga īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.89.049/3 sahasrāditya-saṅkāśaṃ sva-cakraṃ prāhiṇot puraḥ
analyzed: sahasra āditya saṅkāśam sva cakram prāhiṇot puras

original: BhP_10.89.050/1 tamaḥ su-ghoraṃ gahanaṃ kṛtaṃ mahad
analyzed: tamaḥ su ghoram gahanam kṛtam mahat

original: BhP_10.89.050/2 vidārayad bhūri-tareṇa rociṣā
analyzed: vidārayat bhūritareṇa rociṣā

original: BhP_10.89.050/3 mano-javaṃ nirviviśe sudarśanaṃ
analyzed: manojavam nirviviśe sudarśanam

original: BhP_10.89.050/4 guṇa-cyuto rāma-śaro yathā camūḥ
analyzed: guṇa cyutaḥ rāma śaraḥ yathā camūḥ

original: BhP_10.89.051/1 dvāreṇa cakrānupathena tat tamaḥ paraṃ paraṃ jyotir ananta-pāram
analyzed: dvāreṇa cakra anupathena tat tamaḥ param param jyotiḥ ananta pāram

original: BhP_10.89.051/3 samaśnuvānaṃ prasamīkṣya phālgunaḥ pratāḍitākṣo pidadhe 'kṣiṇī ubhe
analyzed: samaśnuvānam prasamīkṣya phālgunaḥ pratāḍita akṣaḥ pidadhe kṣiṇī ubhe

original: BhP_10.89.052/1 tataḥ praviṣṭaḥ salilaṃ nabhasvatā balīyasaijad-bṛhad-ūrmi-bhūṣaṇam
analyzed: tatas praviṣṭaḥ salilam nabhasvatā balīyasā ejat bṛhat ūrmi bhūṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.89.052/3 tatrādbhutaṃ vai bhavanaṃ dyumat-tamaṃ bhrājan-maṇi-stambha-sahasra-śobhitam
analyzed: tatra adbhutam vai bhavanam dyumattamam bhrājat maṇi stambha sahasra śobhitam

original: BhP_10.89.053/1 tasmin mahā-bhogam anantam adbhutaṃ
analyzed: tasmin mahā bhogam anantam adbhutam

original: BhP_10.89.053/2 sahasra-mūrdhanya-phaṇā-maṇi-dyubhiḥ
BhP_10.89.053/3 vibhrājamānaṃ dvi-guṇekṣaṇolbaṇaṃ
analyzed: vibhrājamānam dviguṇa īkṣaṇa ulbaṇam

original: BhP_10.89.053/4 sitācalābhaṃ śiti-kaṇṭha-jihvam
BhP_10.89.054/1 dadarśa tad-bhoga-sukhāsanaṃ vibhuṃ
analyzed: dadarśa tad bhoga sukha āsanam vibhum

original: BhP_10.89.054/2 mahānubhāvaṃ puruṣottamottamam
analyzed: mahā anubhāvam puruṣottama uttamam

original: BhP_10.89.054/3 sāndrāmbudābhaṃ su-piśaṅga-vāsasaṃ
analyzed: sāndra ambuda ābham su piśaṅga vāsasam

original: BhP_10.89.054/4 prasanna-vaktraṃ rucirāyatekṣaṇam
analyzed: prasanna vaktram rucira āyata īkṣaṇam

original: BhP_10.89.055/1 mahā-maṇi-vrāta-kirīṭa-kuṇḍala
BhP_10.89.055/2 prabhā-parikṣipta-sahasra-kuntalam
analyzed: prabhā parikṣipta sahasra kuntalam

original: BhP_10.89.055/3 pralamba-cārv-aṣṭa-bhujaṃ sa-kaustubhaṃ
analyzed: pralamba cāru aṣṭa bhujam sa kaustubham

original: BhP_10.89.055/4 śrīvatsa-lakṣmaṃ vana-mālayāvṛtam
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣmam vanamālayā āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.89.056/1 mahā-maṇi-vrāta-kirīṭa-kuṇḍala
BhP_10.89.056/2 prabhā-parikṣipta-sahasra-kuntalam
analyzed: prabhā parikṣipta sahasra kuntalam

original: BhP_10.89.056/3 pralamba-cārv-aṣṭa-bhujaṃ sa-kaustubhaṃ
analyzed: pralamba cāru aṣṭa bhujam sa kaustubham

original: BhP_10.89.056/4 śrīvatsa-lakṣmaṃ vana-mālayāvṛtam
analyzed: śrīvatsa lakṣmam vanamālayā āvṛtam

original: BhP_10.89.057/1 vavanda ātmānam anantam acyuto jiṣṇuś ca tad-darśana-jāta-sādhvasaḥ
analyzed: vavande ātmānam anantam acyutaḥ jiṣṇuḥ ca tad darśana jāta sādhvasaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.057/3 tāv āha bhūmā parameṣṭhināṃ prabhur beddhāñjalī sa-smitam ūrjayā girā
analyzed: tau āha bhūmā parameṣṭhinām prabhuḥ beddhāñjalī sa smitam ūrjayā girā

original: BhP_10.89.058/1 dvijātmajā me yuvayor didṛkṣuṇā mayopanītā bhuvi dharma-guptaye
analyzed: dvija ātmajāḥ me yuvayoḥ didṛkṣuṇā mayā upanītāḥ bhuvi dharma guptaye

original: BhP_10.89.058/3 kalāvatīrṇāv avaner bharāsurān hatveha bhūyas tvarayetam anti me
analyzed: kalā avatīrṇau avaneḥ bhara asurān hatvā iha bhūyas tvarayetam anti me

original: BhP_10.89.059/1 pūrṇa-kāmāv api yuvāṃ nara-nārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
analyzed: pūrṇa kāmau api yuvām nara nārāyaṇau ṛṣī

original: BhP_10.89.059/3 dharmam ācaratāṃ sthityai ṛṣabhau loka-saṅgraham
analyzed: dharmam ācaratām sthityai ṛṣabhau loka saṅgraham

original: BhP_10.89.060/1 ity ādiṣṭau bhagavatā tau kṛṣṇau parame-ṣṭhinā
analyzed: iti ādiṣṭau bhagavatā tau kṛṣṇau parameṣṭhinā

original: BhP_10.89.060/3 oṃ ity ānamya bhūmānam ādāya dvija-dārakān
analyzed: om iti ānamya bhūmānam ādāya dvija dārakān

original: BhP_10.89.061/1 nyavartetāṃ svakaṃ dhāma samprahṛṣṭau yathā-gatam
analyzed: nyavartetām svakam dhāma samprahṛṣṭau yathāgatam

original: BhP_10.89.061/3 viprāya dadatuḥ putrān yathā-rūpaṃ yathā-vayaḥ
analyzed: viprāya dadatuḥ putrān yathārūpam yathāvayas

original: BhP_10.89.062/1 niśāmya vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma pārthaḥ parama-vismitaḥ
analyzed: niśāmya vaiṣṇavam dhāma pārthaḥ parama vismitaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.062/3 yat kiñcit pauruṣaṃ puṃsāṃ mene kṛṣṇānukampitam
analyzed: yat kiñcid pauruṣam puṃsām mene kṛṣṇa anukampitam

original: BhP_10.89.063/1 itīdṛśāny anekāni vīryāṇīha pradarśayan
analyzed: iti īdṛśāni anekāni vīryāṇi iha pradarśayan

original: BhP_10.89.063/3 bubhuje viṣayān grāmyān īje cāty-urjitair makhaiḥ
analyzed: bubhuje viṣayān grāmyān īje ca ati urjitaiḥ makhaiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.064/1 pravavarṣākhilān kāmān prajāsu brāhmaṇādiṣu
analyzed: pravavarṣa akhilān kāmān prajāsu brāhmaṇa ādiṣu

original: BhP_10.89.064/3 yathā-kālaṃ yathaivendro bhagavān śraiṣṭhyam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: yathākālam yathā eva indraḥ bhagavān śraiṣṭhyam āsthitaḥ

original: BhP_10.89.065/1 hatvā nṛpān adharmiṣṭhān ghāṭayitvārjunādibhiḥ
analyzed: hatvā nṛpān adharmiṣṭhān ghāṭayitvā arjuna ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.89.065/3 añjasā vartayām āsa dharmaṃ dharma-sutādibhiḥ
analyzed: añjasā vartayām āsa dharmam dharmasuta ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.001/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.90.001/1 sukhaṃ sva-puryāṃ nivasan dvārakāyāṃ śriyaḥ patiḥ
analyzed: sukham sva puryām nivasan dvārakāyām śriyaḥ patiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.001/3 sarva-sampat-samṛddhāyāṃ juṣṭāyāṃ vṛṣṇi-puṅgavaiḥ
analyzed: sarva sampad samṛddhāyām juṣṭāyām vṛṣṇi puṅgavaiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.002/1 strībhiś cottama-veṣābhir nava-yauvana-kāntibhiḥ
analyzed: strībhiḥ ca uttama veṣābhiḥ nava yauvana kāntibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.002/3 kandukādibhir harmyeṣu krīḍantībhis taḍid-dyubhiḥ
analyzed: kanduka ādibhiḥ harmyeṣu krīḍantībhiḥ taḍit dyubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.003/1 nityaṃ saṅkula-mārgāyāṃ mada-cyudbhir mataṅ-gajaiḥ
analyzed: nityam saṅkula mārgāyām mada cyudbhiḥ mataṅga jaiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.004/1 sv-alaṅkṛtair bhaṭair aśvai rathaiś ca kanakojjvalaiḥ
analyzed: su alaṅkṛtaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ aśvaiḥ rathaiḥ ca kanaka ujjvalaiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.004/3 udyānopavanāḍhyāyāṃ puṣpita-druma-rājiṣu
analyzed: udyāna upavana āḍhyāyām puṣpita druma rājiṣu

original: BhP_10.90.005/1 nirviśad-bhṛṅga-vihagair nāditāyāṃ samantataḥ
analyzed: nirviśat bhṛṅga vihagaiḥ nāditāyām samantataḥ

original: BhP_10.90.005/3 reme ṣoḍaśa-sāhasra- patnīnāṃ eka-vallabhaḥ
analyzed: reme ṣoḍaśa sāhasra patnīnām eka vallabhaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.006/1 tāvad vicitra-rūpo 'sau tad-geheṣu maharddhiṣu
analyzed: tāvat tad geheṣu mahā ṛddhiṣu

original: BhP_10.90.006/3 protphullotpala-kahlāra- kumudāmbhoja-reṇubhiḥ
analyzed: protphulla utpala kahlāra kumuda ambhoja reṇubhiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.007/1 vāsitāmala-toyeṣu kūjad-dvija-kuleṣu ca
analyzed: vāsita amala toyeṣu kūjat dvija kuleṣu ca

original: BhP_10.90.007/3 vijahāra vigāhyāmbho hradinīṣu mahodayaḥ
analyzed: vijahāra vigāhya ambhaḥ hradinīṣu mahodayaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.007/5 kuca-kuṅkuma-liptāṅgaḥ parirabdhaś ca yoṣitām
analyzed: kuca kuṅkuma lipta aṅgaḥ parirabdhaḥ ca yoṣitām

original: BhP_10.90.008/1 upagīyamāno gandharvair mṛdaṅga-paṇavānakān
analyzed: upagīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava ānakān

original: BhP_10.90.008/3 vādayadbhir mudā vīṇāṃ sūta-māgadha-vandibhiḥ
analyzed: vādayadbhiḥ mudā vīṇām sūta māgadha vandibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.009/1 sicyamāno 'cyutas tābhir hasantībhiḥ sma recakaiḥ
analyzed: sicyamānaḥ cyutaḥ tābhiḥ hasantībhiḥ sma recakaiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.009/3 pratiṣiñcan vicikrīḍe yakṣībhir yakṣa-rāḍ iva
analyzed: pratiṣiñcan vicikrīḍe yakṣībhiḥ yakṣa rāj iva

original: BhP_10.90.010/1 tāḥ klinna-vastra-vivṛtoru-kuca-pradeśāḥ
analyzed: tāḥ klinna vastra vivṛta ūru kuca pradeśāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.010/2 siñcantya uddhṛta-bṛhat-kavara-prasūnāḥ
analyzed: siñcantyaḥ uddhṛta bṛhat kavara prasūnāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.010/3 kāntaṃ sma recaka-jihīrṣayayopaguhya
analyzed: kāntam sma recaka jihīrṣayayā upaguhya

original: BhP_10.90.010/4 jāta-smarotsmaya-lasad-vadanā virejuḥ
analyzed: jāta smara utsmaya lasat vadanāḥ virejuḥ

original: BhP_10.90.011/1 kṛṣṇas tu tat-stana-viṣajjita-kuṅkuma-srak
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ tu tad stana viṣajjita kuṅkuma sraj

original: BhP_10.90.011/2 krīḍābhiṣaṅga-dhuta-kuntala-vṛnda-bandhaḥ
BhP_10.90.011/3 siñcan muhur yuvatibhiḥ pratiṣicyamāno
analyzed: siñcan muhur yuvatibhiḥ pratiṣicyamānaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.011/4 reme kareṇubhir ivebha-patiḥ parītaḥ
analyzed: reme kareṇubhiḥ iva ibha patiḥ parītaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.012/1 naṭānāṃ nartakīnāṃ ca gīta-vādyopajīvinām
analyzed: naṭānām nartakīnām ca gīta vādya upajīvinām

original: BhP_10.90.012/3 krīḍālaṅkāra-vāsāṃsi kṛṣṇo 'dāt tasya ca striyaḥ
analyzed: krīḍā alaṅkāra vāsāṃsi kṛṣṇaḥ dāt tasya ca striyaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.013/1 kṛṣṇasyaivaṃ viharato gaty-ālāpekṣita-smitaiḥ
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya evam viharataḥ gati ālāpa īkṣita smitaiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.013/3 narma-kṣveli-pariṣvaṅgaiḥ strīṇāṃ kila hṛtā dhiyaḥ
analyzed: narma kṣveli pariṣvaṅgaiḥ strīṇām kila hṛtāḥ dhiyaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.014/1 ūcur mukundaika-dhiyo gira unmatta-vaj jaḍam
analyzed: ūcuḥ mukunda eka dhiyaḥ giraḥ unmatta vat jaḍam

original: BhP_10.90.014/3 cintayantyo 'ravindākṣaṃ tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
analyzed: cintayantyaḥ ravinda akṣam tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu

original: BhP_10.90.015/0 mahiṣya ūcuḥ
analyzed: mahiṣyaḥ ūcuḥ

original: BhP_10.90.015/1 kurari vilapasi tvaṃ vīta-nidrā na śeṣe
analyzed: kurari vilapasi tvam vīta nidrā na śeṣe

original: BhP_10.90.015/2 svapiti jagati rātryām īśvaro gupta-bodhaḥ
analyzed: svapiti jagati rātryām īśvaraḥ gupta bodhaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.015/3 vayam iva sakhi kaccid gāḍha-nirviddha-cetā
analyzed: vayam iva sakhi kaccit gāḍha nirviddha cetā

original: BhP_10.90.015/4 nalina-nayana-hāsodāra-līlekṣitena
analyzed: nalina nayana hāsa udāra līlā īkṣitena

original: BhP_10.90.016/1 netre nimīlayasi naktam adṛṣṭa-bandhus
analyzed: netre nimīlayasi naktam adṛṣṭa bandhuḥ

original: BhP_10.90.016/2 tvaṃ roravīṣi karuṇaṃ bata cakravāki
analyzed: tvam roravīṣi karuṇam bata cakravāki

original: BhP_10.90.016/3 dāsyaṃ gata vayam ivācyuta-pāda-juṣṭāṃ
analyzed: dāsyam gata vayam iva acyuta pāda juṣṭām

original: BhP_10.90.016/4 kiṃ vā srajaṃ spṛhayase kavareṇa voḍhum
analyzed: kim vā srajam spṛhayase kavareṇa voḍhum

original: BhP_10.90.017/1 bho bhoḥ sadā niṣṭanase udanvann alabdha-nidro 'dhigata-prajāgaraḥ
analyzed: bho bhoḥ sadā niṣṭanase udanvan alabdha nidraḥ dhi gata prajāgaraḥ

original: BhP_10.90.017/3 kim vā mukundāpahṛtātma-lāñchanaḥ prāptāṃ daśāṃ tvaṃ ca gato duratyayām
analyzed: kim vā mukunda apahṛta ātma lāñchanaḥ prāptām daśām tvam ca gataḥ duratyayām

original: BhP_10.90.018/1 tvaṃ yakṣmaṇā balavatāsi gṛhīta indo
analyzed: tvam yakṣmaṇā balavatā asi gṛhītaḥ indo

original: BhP_10.90.018/2 kṣīṇas tamo na nija-dīdhitibhiḥ kṣiṇoṣi
analyzed: kṣīṇaḥ tamaḥ na nija dīdhitibhiḥ kṣiṇoṣi

original: BhP_10.90.018/3 kaccin mukunda-gaditāni yathā vayaṃ tvaṃ
analyzed: kaccit mukunda gaditāni yathā vayam tvam

original: BhP_10.90.018/4 vismṛtya bhoḥ sthagita-gīr upalakṣyase naḥ
analyzed: vismṛtya bhoḥ sthagita gīḥ upalakṣyase naḥ

original: BhP_10.90.019/1 kiṃ nv ācaritam asmābhir malayānila te 'priyam
analyzed: kim nu ācaritam asmābhiḥ malaya anila te priyam

original: BhP_10.90.019/3 govindāpāṅga-nirbhinne hṛdīrayasi naḥ smaram
analyzed: govinda apāṅga nirbhinne hṛdi īrayasi naḥ smaram

original: BhP_10.90.020/1 megha śrīmaṃs tvam asi dayito yādavendrasya nūnaṃ
analyzed: megha śrīman tvam asi dayitaḥ yādava indrasya nūnam

original: BhP_10.90.020/2 śrīvatsāṅkaṃ vayam iva bhavān dhyāyati prema-baddhaḥ
analyzed: śrīvatsa aṅkam vayam iva bhavān dhyāyati prema baddhaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.020/3 aty-utkaṇṭhaḥ śavala-hṛdayo 'smad-vidho bāṣpa-dhārāḥ
analyzed: ati utkaṇṭhaḥ śavala hṛdayaḥ smadvidhaḥ bāṣpa dhārāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.020/4 smṛtvā smṛtvā visṛjasi muhur duḥkha-das tat-prasaṅgaḥ
analyzed: smṛtvā smṛtvā visṛjasi muhur duḥkha daḥ tad prasaṅgaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.021/1 priya-rāva-padāni bhāṣase mṛta-sañjīvikayānayā girā
analyzed: priya rāva padāni bhāṣase mṛtasañjīvikayā anayā girā

original: BhP_10.90.021/3 karavāṇi kim adya te priyaṃ vada me valgita-kaṇṭha kokila
analyzed: karavāṇi kim adya te priyam vada me valgita kaṇṭha kokila

original: BhP_10.90.022/1 na calasi na vadasy udāra-buddhe kṣiti-dhara cintayase mahāntam artham
analyzed: na calasi na vadasi udāra buddhe kṣitidhara cintayase mahāntam artham

original: BhP_10.90.022/3 api bata vasudeva-nandanāṅghriṃ vayam iva kāmayase stanair vidhartum
analyzed: api bata vasudeva nandana aṅghrim vayam iva kāmayase stanaiḥ vidhartum

original: BhP_10.90.023/1 śuṣyad-dhradāḥ karaśitā bata sindhu-patnyaḥ
analyzed: śuṣyat hradāḥ kara śitāḥ bata sindhu patnyaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.023/2 sampraty apāsta-kamala-śriya iṣṭa-bhartuḥ
analyzed: samprati apāsta kamala śriyaḥ iṣṭa bhartuḥ

original: BhP_10.90.023/3 yadvad vayaṃ madhu-pateḥ praṇayāvalokam
analyzed: yadvat vayam madhupateḥ praṇaya avalokam

original: BhP_10.90.023/4 aprāpya muṣṭa-hṛdayāḥ puru-karśitāḥ sma
analyzed: a prāpya muṣṭa hṛdayāḥ puru karśitāḥ sma

original: BhP_10.90.024/1 haṃsa svāgatam āsyatāṃ piba payo brūhy aṅga śaureḥ kathāṃ
analyzed: haṃsa svāgatam āsyatām piba payaḥ brūhi aṅga śaureḥ kathām

original: BhP_10.90.024/2 dūtaṃ tvāṃ nu vidāma kaccid ajitaḥ svasty āsta uktaṃ purā
analyzed: dūtam tvām nu vidāma kaccit ajitaḥ svasti āste uktam purā

original: BhP_10.90.024/3 kiṃ vā naś cala-sauhṛdaḥ smarati taṃ kasmād bhajāmo vayaṃ
analyzed: kim vā naḥ cala sauhṛdaḥ smarati tam kasmāt bhajāmaḥ vayam

original: BhP_10.90.024/4 kṣaudrālāpaya kāma-daṃ śriyam ṛte saivaika-niṣṭhā striyām
analyzed: kṣaudra ālāpaya kāma dam śriyam ṛte sā eva eka niṣṭhā striyām

original: BhP_10.90.025/0 śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: BhP_10.90.025/1 itīdṛśena bhāvena kṛṣṇe yogeśvareśvare
analyzed: iti īdṛśena bhāvena kṛṣṇe yogeśvara īśvare

original: BhP_10.90.025/3 kriyamāṇena mādhavyo lebhire paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: kriyamāṇena mādhavyaḥ lebhire paramām gatim

original: BhP_10.90.026/1 śruta-mātro 'pi yaḥ strīṇāṃ prasahyākarṣate manaḥ
analyzed: śruta mātraḥ pi yaḥ strīṇām prasahya ākarṣate manaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.026/3 uru-gāyoru-gīto vā paśyantīnāṃ ca kiṃ punaḥ
analyzed: urugāya uru gītaḥ vā paśyantīnām ca kim punar

original: BhP_10.90.027/1 yāḥ samparyacaran premṇā pāda-saṃvāhanādibhiḥ
analyzed: yāḥ samparyacaran premṇā pāda saṃvāhana ādibhiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.027/3 jagad-guruṃ bhartṛ-buddhyā tāsāṃ kim varṇyate tapaḥ
analyzed: jagadgurum bhartṛ buddhyā tāsām kim varṇyate tapaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.028/1 evaṃ vedoditaṃ dharmam anutiṣṭhan satāṃ gatiḥ
analyzed: evam veda uditam dharmam anutiṣṭhan satām gatiḥ

original: BhP_10.90.028/3 gṛhaṃ dharmārtha-kāmānāṃ muhuś cādarśayat padam
analyzed: gṛham dharma artha kāmānām muhur ca adarśayat padam

original: BhP_10.90.029/1 āsthitasya paraṃ dharmaṃ kṛṣṇasya gṛha-medhinām
analyzed: āsthitasya param dharmam kṛṣṇasya gṛhamedhinām

original: BhP_10.90.029/3 āsan ṣoḍaśa-sāhasraṃ mahiṣyaś ca śatādhikam
analyzed: āsan ṣoḍaśa sāhasram mahiṣyaḥ ca śata adhikam

original: BhP_10.90.030/1 tāsāṃ strī-ratna-bhūtānām aṣṭau yāḥ prāg udāhṛtāḥ
analyzed: tāsām strī ratna bhūtānām aṣṭau yāḥ prāk udāhṛtāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.030/3 rukmiṇī-pramukhā rājaṃs tat-putrāś cānupūrvaśaḥ
analyzed: rukmiṇī pramukhāḥ rājan tad putrāḥ ca anupūrvaśas

original: BhP_10.90.031/1 ekaikasyāṃ daśa daśa kṛṣṇo 'jījanad ātmajān
analyzed: ekaikasyām daśa daśa kṛṣṇaḥ jījanat ātmajān

original: BhP_10.90.031/3 yāvatya ātmano bhāryā amogha-gatir īśvaraḥ
analyzed: yāvatyaḥ ātmanaḥ bhāryāḥ amogha gatiḥ īśvaraḥ

original: BhP_10.90.032/1 teṣām uddāma-vīryāṇām aṣṭā-daśa mahā-rathāḥ
analyzed: teṣām uddāma vīryāṇām aṣṭādaśa mahā rathāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.032/3 āsann udāra-yaśasas teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu
analyzed: āsan udāra yaśasaḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu

original: BhP_10.90.033/1 pradyumnaś cāniruddhaś ca dīptimān bhānur eva ca
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ ca aniruddhaḥ ca dīptimān bhānuḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.90.033/3 sāmbo madhur bṛhadbhānuś citrabhānur vṛko 'ruṇaḥ
analyzed: sāmbaḥ madhuḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ citrabhānuḥ vṛkaḥ ruṇaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.034/1 puṣkaro vedabāhuś ca śrutadevaḥ sunandanaḥ
BhP_10.90.034/3 citrabāhur virūpaś ca kavir nyagrodha eva ca
analyzed: citrabāhuḥ virūpaḥ ca kaviḥ nyagrodhaḥ eva ca

original: BhP_10.90.035/1 eteṣām api rājendra tanu-jānāṃ madhu-dviṣaḥ
analyzed: eteṣām api rāja indra tanujānām madhudviṣaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.035/3 pradyumna āsīt prathamaḥ pitṛ-vad rukmiṇī-sutaḥ
analyzed: pradyumnaḥ āsīt prathamaḥ pitṛ vat rukmiṇī sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.036/1 sa rukmiṇo duhitaram upayeme mahā-rathaḥ
analyzed: sa rukmiṇaḥ duhitaram upayeme mahā rathaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.036/3 tasyāṃ tato 'niruddho 'bhūt nāgāyata-balānvitaḥ
analyzed: tasyām tatas niruddhaḥ bhūt nāga āyata bala anvitaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.037/1 sa cāpi rukmiṇaḥ pautrīṃ dauhitro jagṛhe tataḥ
analyzed: sa ca api rukmiṇaḥ pautrīm dauhitraḥ jagṛhe tatas

original: BhP_10.90.037/3 vajras tasyābhavad yas tu mauṣalād avaśeṣitaḥ
analyzed: vajraḥ tasya abhavat yaḥ tu mauṣalāt avaśeṣitaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.038/1 pratibāhur abhūt tasmāt subāhus tasya cātmajaḥ
analyzed: pratibāhuḥ abhūt tasmāt subāhuḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.038/3 subāhoḥ śāntaseno 'bhūc chatasenas tu tat-sutaḥ
analyzed: subāhoḥ śāntasenaḥ bhūt śatasenaḥ tu tad sutaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.039/1 na hy etasmin kule jātā adhanā abahu-prajāḥ
analyzed: na hi etasmin kule jātāḥ adhanāḥ a bahu prajāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.039/3 alpāyuṣo 'lpa-vīryāś ca abrahmaṇyāś ca jajñire
analyzed: alpa āyuṣaḥ lpa vīryāḥ ca abrahmaṇyāḥ ca jajñire

original: BhP_10.90.040/1 yadu-vaṃśa-prasūtānāṃ puṃsāṃ vikhyāta-karmaṇām
analyzed: yadu vaṃśa prasūtānām puṃsām vikhyāta karmaṇām

original: BhP_10.90.040/3 saṅkhyā na śakyate kartum api varṣāyutair nṛpa
analyzed: saṅkhyā na śakyate kartum api varṣa ayutaiḥ nṛpa

original: BhP_10.90.041/1 tisraḥ koṭyaḥ sahasrāṇām aṣṭāśīti-śatāni ca
analyzed: tisraḥ koṭyaḥ sahasrāṇām aṣṭāśīti śatāni ca

original: BhP_10.90.041/3 āsan yadu-kulācāryāḥ kumārāṇām iti śrutam
analyzed: āsan yadu kula ācāryāḥ kumārāṇām iti śrutam

original: BhP_10.90.042/1 saṅkhyānaṃ yādavānāṃ kaḥ kariṣyati mahātmanām
analyzed: saṅkhyānam yādavānām kaḥ kariṣyati mahātmanām

original: BhP_10.90.042/3 yatrāyutānām ayuta- lakṣeṇāste sa āhukaḥ
analyzed: yatra ayutānām ayuta lakṣeṇa āste saḥ āhukaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.043/1 devāsurāhava-hatā daiteyā ye su-dāruṇāḥ
analyzed: deva asura āhava hatāḥ daiteyāḥ ye su dāruṇāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.043/3 te cotpannā manuṣyeṣu prajā dṛptā babādhire
analyzed: te ca utpannāḥ manuṣyeṣu prajāḥ dṛptāḥ babādhire

original: BhP_10.90.044/1 tan-nigrahāya hariṇā proktā devā yadoḥ kule
analyzed: tad nigrahāya hariṇā proktāḥ devāḥ yadoḥ kule

original: BhP_10.90.044/3 avatīrṇāḥ kula-śataṃ teṣām ekādhikaṃ nṛpa
analyzed: avatīrṇāḥ kula śatam teṣām eka adhikam nṛpa

original: BhP_10.90.045/1 teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ bhagavān prabhutvenābhavad dhariḥ
analyzed: teṣām pramāṇam bhagavān prabhu tvena abhavat hariḥ

original: BhP_10.90.045/3 ye cānuvartinas tasya vavṛdhuḥ sarva-yādavāḥ
analyzed: ye ca anuvartinaḥ tasya vavṛdhuḥ sarva yādavāḥ

original: BhP_10.90.046/1 śayyāsanāṭanālāpa- krīḍā-snānādi-karmasu
analyzed: śayyā āsana aṭana ālāpa krīḍā snāna ādi karmasu

original: BhP_10.90.046/3 na viduḥ santam ātmānaṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ
analyzed: na viduḥ santam ātmānam vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa cetasaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.047/1 tīrthaṃ cakre nṛponaṃ yad ajani yaduṣu svaḥ-sarit pāda-śaucaṃ
analyzed: tīrtham cakre nṛpa ūnam yat ajani yaduṣu svaḥsarit pāda śaucam

original: BhP_10.90.047/2 vidviṭ-snigdhāḥ svarūpaṃ yayur ajita-para śrīr yad-arthe 'nya-yatnaḥ
analyzed: vidviṣ snigdhāḥ sva rūpam yayuḥ ajita para śrīḥ yad arthe nyayatnaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.047/3 yan-nāmāmaṅgala-ghnaṃ śrutam atha gaditaṃ yat-kṛto gotra-dharmaḥ
analyzed: yad nāma amaṅgala ghnam śrutam atha gaditam yad kṛtaḥ gotra dharmaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.047/4 kṛṣṇasyaitan na citraṃ kṣiti-bhara-haraṇaṃ kāla-cakrāyudhasya
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya etat na citram kṣiti bhara haraṇam kāla cakra āyudhasya

original: BhP_10.90.048/1 jayati jana-nivāso devakī-janma-vādo
analyzed: jayati jana nivāsaḥ

original: BhP_10.90.048/2 yadu-vara-pariṣat svair dorbhir asyann adharmam
analyzed: yadu vara pariṣad svaiḥ dorbhiḥ asyan adharmam

original: BhP_10.90.048/3 sthira-cara-vṛjina-ghnaḥ su-smita-śrī-mukhena
analyzed: sthira cara vṛjina ghnaḥ su smita śrī mukhena

original: BhP_10.90.048/4 vraja-pura-vanitānāṃ vardhayan kāma-devam
analyzed: vraja pura vanitānām vardhayan kāmadevam

original: BhP_10.90.049/1 itthaṃ parasya nija-vartma-rirakṣayātta-
analyzed: ittham parasya nija vartma rirakṣayā atta

original: BhP_10.90.049/2 līlā-tanos tad-anurūpa-viḍambanāni
BhP_10.90.049/3 karmāṇi karma-kaṣaṇāni yadūttamasya
analyzed: karmāṇi karma kaṣaṇāni yadu uttamasya

original: BhP_10.90.049/4 śrūyād amuṣya padayor anuvṛttim icchan
analyzed: śrūyāt amuṣya padayoḥ anuvṛttim icchan

original: BhP_10.90.050/1 martyas tayānusavam edhitayā mukunda
analyzed: martyaḥ tayā anusavam edhitayā mukunda

original: BhP_10.90.050/2 śrīmat-kathā-śravaṇa-kīrtana-cintayaiti
analyzed: śrīmat kathā śravaṇa kīrtana cintayā eti

original: BhP_10.90.050/3 tad dhāma dustara-kṛtānta-javāpavargaṃ
analyzed: tat dhāma dustara kṛtānta java apavargam

original: BhP_10.90.050/4 grāmād vanaṃ kṣiti-bhujo 'pi yayur yad-arthāḥ
analyzed: grāmāt vanam kṣitibhujaḥ pi yayuḥ yad arthāḥ
